CPLetWærf
B9.1.1.
Gregory the Great, The Pastoral Care, Letter to Wærferth: Sweet 1871, 3-9.



 1. ÐEOS BOC SCEAL TO WIOGORA CEASTRE.
 1. Ælfred kyning hateð gretan Wærferð biscep his wordum
luflice & freondlice;
 2. & ðe cyðan hate ðæt me com swiðe oft on gemynd,
hwelce wiotan iu wæron giond Angelcynn, ægðer ge godcundra hada ge
woruldcundra;
 4. & hu gesæliglica tida ða wæron giond Angelcynn;
 5. & hu ða kyningas ðe ðone onwald hæfdon ðæs
folces on ðam dagum Gode & his ærendwrecum hyrsumedon;
 6. & hie ægðer ge hiora sibbe ge hiora siodo ge hiora
onweald innanbordes wel gehioldon, & eac ut hiora eðel gerymdon;
 8. & hu him ða speow ægðer ge mid wige ge mid wisdome;
 9. & eac ða godcundan hadas hu giorne hie wæron ægðer
ge ymb lare ge ymb liornunga, ge ymb ealle ða ðiowotdomas ðe hie Gode don
scoldon;
 11. & hu man utanbordes wisdom & lare hieder on lond sohte,
& hu we hie nu sceoldon ute begietan gif we hie habban sceoldon.
 13. Swæ clæne hio wæs oðfeallenu on Angelcynne ðæt
swiðe feawa wæron behionan Humbre ðe hiora ðeninga cuðen
understondan on Englisc, oððe furðum an ærendgewrit of Lædene on
Englisc areccan;
 16. & ic wene ðætte noht monige begiondan Humbre
næren.
 17. Swæ feawa hiora wæron ðæt ic furðum anne anlepne
ne mæg geðencean besuðan Temese ða ða ic ærest to rice feng.
 18. Gode ælmihtegum sie ðonc ðætte we nu ænigne on
stal habbað lareowa.
 19. & forðon ic ðe bebiode ðæt ðu do swæ ic
geliefe ðæt ðu wille, ðæt ðu ðe ðissa woruldðinga to
ðæm geæmetige swæ ðu oftost mæge, ðæt ðu ðone wisdom
ðe ðe God sealde ðær ðær ðu hiene befæstan mæge, georne
befæste.
 23. Geðenc hwelc witu us ða becomon for ðisse worulde, ða
ða we hit nohwæðer ne selfe ne lufodon ne eac oðrum monnum ne lefdon:
ðone naman anne we lufodon ðæt we Cristne wæren, & swiðe feawe
ða ðeawas.
 26. Ða ic ða ðis eall gemunde ða gemunde ic eac hu ic
geseah, ærðæmðe hit eall forhergod wære & forbærned, hu
ða ciricean giond eall Angelcynn stodon maðma & boca gefyldæ ond eac
micel menigeo Godes ðiowa & ða swiðe lytle fiorme ðara boca wiston,
forðæmðe hie hiora nan wuht ongiotan ne meahton ond þæt wæs
forðæmðe hie næron on hiora agen geðiode awritene.
 31. Swelce hie cwæden: Ure ieldran, ða ðe ðas stowa ær
hioldon, hie lufodon wisdom & ðurh ðone hie begeaton welan & us
læfdon.
 33. Her mon mæg giet gesion hiora swæð, ac we him ne cunnon
æfterspyrigean, & forðæm we habbað nu ægðer forlæten ge
ðone welan ge ðone wisdom, forðæmðe we noldon to ðæm spore mid
ure mode onlutan.
 36. Ða ic ða ðis eall gemunde, ða wundrade ic swiðe
swiðe ðara godena wiotona ðe giu wæron giond Angelcynn, & ða bec
eallæ befullan geliornod hæfdon, ðæt hie hiora ða nænne dæl
noldon on hiora agen geðiode wendan.
 39. Ac ic ða sona eft me selfum andwyrde & cwæð: Hie ne
wendon ðætte æfre menn sceolden swæ recclease weorðan & sio
lar swæ oðfeallan;
 41. For ðære wilnunga hie hit forleton, & woldon ðæt
her ðy mara wisdom on londe wære ðy we ma geðeoda cuðon.
 43. Ða gemunde ic hu sio æ wæs ærest on Ebreisc
geðiode funden, & eft, ða hie Creacas geliornodon, ða wendon hie hie
on hiora agen geðiode ealle, & eac ealle oðre bec.
 46. & eft Lædenware swæ same, siððan hie hie
geliornodon, hie hie wendon ealla ðurh wise wealhstodas on hiora agen
geðiode.
 47. Ond eac ealla oðræ Cristnæ ðioda sumne dæl hiora
on hiora agen geðiode wendon.
 49. Forðy me ðyncð betre, gif iow swæ ðyncð, ðæt
we eac sumæ bec, ða ðe niedbeðearfosta sien eallum monnum to wiotonne,
ðæt we ða on ðæt geðiode wenden ðe we ealle gecnawan mægen,
& ge don swæ we swiðe eaðe magon mid Godes fultume, gif we ða
stilnesse habbað, ðæt eall sio gioguð ðe nu is on Angelcynne friora
monna, ðara ðe ða speda hæbben ðæt hie ðæm befeolan
mægen, sien to liornunga oðfæste, ða hwile ðe hie to nanre oðerre
note ne mægen, oð ðone first ðe hie wel cunnen Englisc gewrit
arædan: lære mon siððan furður on Lædengeðiode ða ðe mon
furðor læran wille & to hieran hade don wille.
 58. Ða ic ða gemunde hu sio lar Lædengeðiodes ær
ðissum afeallen wæs giond Angelcynn, & ðeah monige cuðon Englisc
gewrit arædan, ða ongan ic ongemang oðrum mislicum & manigfealdum
bisgum ðisses kynerices ða boc wendan on Englisc ðe is genemned on
Læden <foreign>Pastoralis</foreign>, & on Englisc Hierdeboc, hwilum word be worde, hwilum
andgit of andgiete, swæ swæ ic hie geliornode æt Plegmunde minum
ærcebiscepe & æt Assere minum biscepe & æt Grimbolde minum
mæsseprioste & æt Iohanne minum mæssepreoste.
 66. Siððan ic hie ða geliornod hæfde, swæ swæ ic hie
forstod, & swæ ic hie andgitfullicost areccean meahte, ic hie on Englisc
awende: ond to ælcum biscepstole on minum rice wille ane onsendan;
 69. & on ælcre bið an æstel, se bið on fiftegum
mancessan.
 70. Ond ic bebiode on Godes naman ðæt nan mon ðone æstel
from ðære bec ne do, ne ða boc from ðæm mynstre: uncuð hu longe
ðær swæ gelærede biscepas sien, swæ swæ nu Gode ðonc ge wel
hwær siendon;
 73. Forðy ic wolde ðætte hie ealneg æt ðære stowe
wæren, buton se biscep hie mid him habban wille oððe hio hwær to
læne sie, oððe hwa oðre biwrite.

END_TEXT

CPHead
B9.1.2.
Gregory the Great, Pastoral Care, Headings: Sweet 1871, 9-23.



 1. Ðætte unlærede ne dyrren underfon lariowdom.
 2. Ne eft ða gelæredan, ðe sua nyllað libban sua hie on
bocum leornedon, ðæt hie sceoldon ne underfon ða are ðæs
lariowdomes.
 3. Be ðære byrðenne ðæs reccenddomes, & hu he scyle
eall earfoðu forsion, & hu forht he sceal bion for ælcre orsorgnesse.
 4. Ond hu oft sio bisgung ðæs rices & ðæs recedomes
toslit ðæt mod ðæs recceres.
 5. Bi ðæm ðe magon on ealdordome nytte bion on bisnum &
on cræftum, & ðonne for hiora agenre ieðnesse ðæt fleoð.
 6. Bi ðam ðe for eaðmodnesse fleoð ða byrðenne ðæs
lariowdomes;
 7. Ðonne hie bioð ryhtlice eaðmode ðonne hie ne winnað
wið ðone godcundan dom.
 7. Ðætte oft ðæs lariowdomes ðegnung bið suiðe
untælwierðlice gewilnad, & eac suiðe untælwyrðlice monige
bioð togeniedde.
 8. Bi ðæm ðe wilnað biscephad to underfonne, hu hie
gegripað ðone cuide ðæs apostoles Paules hira gitsunge to fultume.
 9. Hu ðæt mod ðætte wilnað for oðre bion, lihð
himselfum ðonne hit ðencð fela godra weorca to wyrcanne, & ðæt
licet oðrum monnum, gif he woroldare hæbbe, & wile hit ðonne
oferhebban siððan he hi hæfð.
 10. Huelc se beon sceal ðe to reccenddome cuman sceal.
 11. Huelc se beon sceal se ðærto cuman ne sceal.
 12. Hu se se ðe gedafenlice & endebyrdlice to cymð, hu he
ðæron drohtian scyle.
 13. Hu se lareow sceal beon clæne on his mode.
 14. Hu se lariow sceal beon on his weorcum fyrmesð.
 15. Hu se lariow sceal beon gesceadwis on his suigean &
nyttwyrðe on his wordum.
 16. Hu se lariow sceal bion eallum monnum efnðrowiende &
foreðencende on hira earfeðum.
 17. Hu se reccere sceal bion ðæm weldoendum monnum fore
eaðmodnesse gefera, & wið ðara yfelena unðeawas stræc for
ryhtwislecum andan.
 18. Hu se lariow ne sceal ða inneran gimenne gewanian for
ðære/, uterran abisgunge, ne eft ða uterran ne forlæte he for
ðære innerran.
 19. Ðætte se reccere his godan weorc fore gielpe anum ne do,
ac ma for Godes lufan.
 20. Ðætte se reccere sceal geornlice witan ðætte oft ða
unðeawas leogað & licettað ðætte hi sien gode ðeawas.
 21. Hu gesceadwis se reccere sceal bion on his ðreaunga & on
his oleccunga, & eac on his hatheortnesse & on his manðwærnesse.
 22. Hu suiðe se reccere sceal bion on his smeaunga abisgod ymb
ða halgan æ.
 23. Hu micel scyle bion ðæt toscead, & hu mislice mon
scyle men læran mid ðæm cræfte ðæs lareowdomes.
 24. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne weras, on oðre
wiif.
 25. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða iungan, on
oðre ða ealdan.
 26. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða welegan, on
oðre ða wædlan.
 27. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða gladan, on
oðre ða unrotan.
 28. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða aldormen, on
oðre wisan ða hiremen.
 29. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða hlafordas, on
oðre/ wisan ða ðegnas & eac ða ðeowas.
 30. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða dolan, on
oðre ða wisan.
 31. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða scamfæstan,
on oðre ða scamleasan.
 32. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ofermodan
& ða upahafenan on hira mode, on oðre wisan ða earmheortan & ða
wacmodan.
 33. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
ungeðylðegan, & on oðre ða geðyldegan.
 34. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða welwillendan,
& on oðre ða æfstegan.
 35. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða bilwitan, on
oðre ða ðweoran & ða lytegan.
 36. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða halan, on
oðre ða unhalan.
 37. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe him
ondrædað Godes suingellan oððe monna, & for ðy forlætað
ðæt hi yfel ne doð;
 38. On oðre wisan ða ðe bioð sua aheardode on
unryhtwisnesse ðæt hi mon ne mæg mid nanre ðreaunge geðreatian.
 38. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe to
suiðe suige beoð, on oðre wisan ða ðe willað to fela idles &
unnyttes gesprecan.
 39. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe bioð to
late, on oðre ða ðe bioð to hrade.
 40. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
monðwæran, on oðre ða grambæran.
 41. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða eaðmodan, on
oðre wisan ða uppahæfenan on hira mode.
 42. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða anwillan, on
oðre ða ungestæððegan & unfæsðrædan.
 43. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe hi selfe
forgiefað gifernesse, on oðre wisan ða ðe doð forhæfdnesse.
 44. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe hira
agenu ðing mildheortlice sellað, & on oðre wisan ða ðe ðanne
git wullniað oðerra monna gereafian.
 45. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
nohuæðer ne oðra monna ne wilniað, ne hira agen nyllað sellan;
 45. On oðre wisan ða ðe willað sellan ðæt hi
gestrinað & ðeah nyllað geswican ðæt hi oðre men ne reafien.
 46. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða geðwæran,
on oðre ða ungeðwæran.
 47. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða wrohtgeornan,
on oðre ða gesibsuman.
 48. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða ðe ða
halgan æ ryhtlice ongitan ne cunnan;
 48. On oðre wisan ða ðe hi ryhtlice angietað & ðeah
for eaðmodnesse swigiað ðæt hi hie ne bodiat.
 49. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe medomlice
cunnon læran, & ðeah for miclum ege & for micelre eaðmodnesse
forwandiað;
 49. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ðanne giet to ðæm
gewintrede ne beoð ne geðigene, & ðeah for hrædhydignesse beoð
to gegripene.
 50. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe woroldare
wilniað, & hi ðonne orsorglice habbað;
 50. & on oðre wisan ða ðe woroldare wilniað, &
ðonne hi gewilnode habbað, hi ðonne mid micelre earforðnesse & mid
micle broce onwuniað.
 51. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe beoð
gebundene mid somrædenne, on oðre wisan ða ðe freo beoð ðara
benda.
 52. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe gefandod
habbað ðara flæsclicra synna, on oðre wisan ða ðe ðæs nowiht
ne cunnan.
 53. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to moniane ða ðe ða
geworhtan synna wepað, on oðre ða ðe ða geðohtan wepað.
 54. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
ðurhtogena scylda wepað, & hi suaðeah ne forlætað;
 54. On oðre wisan ða ðe hi no ne hreowsiað, & ðeah
forlætað.
 55. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe ða
unaliefedan ðing ða ðe hi doð herigeað, on oðre ða ðe hi
tælað & suaðeah doð.
 56. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe suiðe
hrædlice beoð ofersuiðde mid sumere unryhtre gewilnunge;
 56. On oðre wisan ða ðe longe ær ymbðeahtiað, &
hit ðonne on lasð ðurhteoð.
 57. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
ofthrædlice lytla scylda wyrceað, on oðre wisan ða ðe hi gehealdað
wið þa lytlan scylda, & ðeah hwiltidum afealleð on hefegum
scyldum.
 58. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe nan wuht
godes ne onginnað;
 58. On oðre wisan ða ðe hit onginnað, & wel ne
geendiað.
 59. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
deogollice yfel doð & god openlice;
 59. On oðre wisan ða ðe willað helan ðæt hi to gode
doð, & of sumum ðingum openlice kyðað ðæt hi willað ðæt
men wenen ðæt hi yfele bion.
 61. Ymbe ðæt hu man monige scyndan scyle to ðæm
ðætte his godan dæda ne weorðen to yfelum dædum.
 61. Ymbe ðæt hu mon ænne mon scyndan scile ðonne he yfle
costunga monige ðrowað.
 62. Ðætte hwilum ða leohtan scylda beoð beteran to
forlætan, ðylæs ða hefegran ne weorðen ðurhtogen.
 63. Ðætte ða untruman mod mon ne scyle eallinga to helice
læran.
 64. Be ðæm weorcum ðæs lareowes & be his wordum.
 65. Ðonne hwa ðis eall gefylled hæbbe, hu he ðonne sceal
hine selfne geðencean & ongætan, ðylæs hine auðer oððe his
lif oððe his lar to upahebbe.

END_TEXT

CP
B9.1.3.
Gregory the Great, Pastoral Care: Sweet 1871, 24-467.



 0.23.9. Þu leofusta broður, suiðe freondlice & suiðe
fremsumlice ðu me tældesð, & mid eaðmode ingeðonce ðu me
ciddesð, forðon ic min mað, & wolde fleon ða byrðenne ðære
hirdelecan giemenne.
 0.23.11. Ðara byrðenna hefignesse, eall ðæt ic his geman,
ic awrite on ðisse andweardan bec, ðylæs hi hwæm leohte ðyncen to
underfonne;
 0.23.13. & ic eac lære ðæt hira nan ðara ne wilnie
ðe hine unwærlice bega;
 0.23.14. & se ðe hi unwærlice & unryhtlice gewilnige,
ondræde he ðæt he hi æfre underfenge.
 0.23.16. Nu ic wilnige ðætte ðeos spræc stigge on
ðæt ingeðonc ðæs leorneres, suæ suæ on sume hlædre,
stæpmælum near & near, oððæt hio fæstlice gestonde on
ðæm solore ðæs modes ðe hi leornige;
 0.23.18. & forðy ic hi todæle on feower: an is ðara
dæla hu he on ðone folgoð becume;
 0.23.20. Oðer hu he ðæron libbe;
 0.23.20. Ðridda is hu he ðæron lære;
 0.23.21. Feorðe is hu he his agene unðeawas ongietan wille
& hira geðæf bion, þylæs he for ðy underfenge his eaðmodnesse
forlæte, oððe eft his lif sie ungelic his ðenunga, oððe he to
ðriste & to stið sie for ðy underfenge his lareowdomes;
 0.23.24. Ac gemetgige hit se ege his agenra unðeawa, &
befæste he mid his lifes bisenum ða lare ðæm ðe his wordum ne
geliefen;
 0.25.2. & ðonne he god weorc wyrce, gemyne he ðæs yfeles
ðe he worhte, ðette sio unrotnes, ðe he for ðæm yflan weorcum
hæbbe, gemetgige ðone gefean ðe he for ðæm godan weorcum hæfde;
 0.25.5. Ðylæs he beforan ðæs dieglan deman eagum sie
ahafen on his mode & on his ofermettum aðunden, & ðonne ðurh
ðæt selflice his godan weorc forleose.
 0.25.7. Ac monige sindon me suiðe onlice on ungelærednesse,
ðeah ðe hi næfre leorningcnihtas næren, wilniað ðeah lareowas to
beonne, & ðyncet him suiðe leoht sio byrðen ðæs lareowdomes,
forðonðe hi ne cunnon ðæt mægen his micelnesse.
 0.25.11. From ðære dura selfre ðisse bec, ðæt is from
onginne ðisse spræce, sint adrifene & getælde ða unwaran, ðe
him agniat ðone cræft ðæs lareowdomes ðe hi na ne geleornodon.
 1.25.14. Ðætte unlærde ne dyrren underfon lareowdom.
 1.25.15. Forðonðe nan cræft nis to læranne ðæm ðe
hine ær geornlice ne leornode, forhwon beoð æfre suæ ðriste ða
ungelæredan ðæt hi underfon ða heorde ðæs lariowdomes, ðonne
se cræft ðæs lareowdomes bið cræft ealra cræfta?
 1.25.18. Hua nat ðæt ða wunda ðæs modes bioð digelran
ðonne ða wunda ðæs lichaman?
 1.25.19. & ðeah ða woroldlecan læcas scomaþ ðæt
hi onginnen ða wunda lacnian ðe hi gesion ne magon, & huru gif hi
nouðer gecnawan ne cunnan ne ða medtrymnesse ne eac ða wyrta ðe
ðærwið sculon.
 1.25.22. & hwilon ne scomað ða ðe ðæs modes
læceas beon scoldon, ðeah ðe hi nana wuht ongitan ne cunnon ðara
gæstlecena beboda, ðæt hie him onteoð ðæt hie sien heortan
læcas.
 1.27.2. Ac forðonðe nu eall se weorðscipe ðisse worolde is
gecierred, Gode ðonc, to weorðscipe ðæm æwfæstam, ðæt ða
sindon nu weorðoste ðe æwfæstoste sindon, forðon licet suiðe
monig ðæt he æwfæsð lareow sie, ðe he wilniað micle woroldare
habban.
 1.27.5. Be ðam Crisð selfa cleopode, & ðus cwæð: Hi
secað ðæt hi mon ærest grete & weorðige on ceapstowum & on
gebeorscipum, & ðæt hie fyrmest hlynigen æt æfengieflum, &
ðæt ieldesðe setl on gemetengum hi secað.
 1.27.8. Forðon hie sua on ofermettum & mid upahafenesse
becumað to ðære are ðære hirdelecan giemenne, hi ne magon medomlice
ðenian ða ðenunga, & ðære eaðmodnesse lareowas bion;
 1.27.11. Ac sio tunge bið gescinded on ðam lariowdome ðonne
hio oðer lærð, oðer hio liornode.
 1.27.12. Suelcum monnum Dryhten cidde ðurh ðone witgan, &
him suelc oðwat, ða he cuæð: Hie ricsedon, næs ðeah mines
ðonces;
 1.27.14. Ealdormen hi wæron, & ic hie ne cuðe.
 1.27.15. Ða ðe sua ricsieað, hi ricsiað of hira agnum dome,
næs of ðæs hiehstan deman, ðonne hi ne beoð mid nanre sylle
underscotene ðæs godcundlican mægenes, ne for nanum cræfte gecorene,
ac mid hira agenre gewilnunge hie bioð onbærnede, ðæt hie gereafiað
sua heane lariowdom suiðor ðonne hi hine geearnien.
 1.27.20. Hie ðonne se eca & se diegla dema upahefeð suelce
he hi nyte, & geðafiende he hit forbireð for ðam dome his geðylde.
 1.27.21. Ac ðeah hi on ðam hade fela wundra wyrcen, eft ðonne
hi to him cumað, he cuið: Gewitað from me ge unryhtwyrhtan;
 1.27.23. Nat ic hwæt ge sint.
 1.27.24. Eft he hie ðreade ðurh ðone witgan for hira
ungelærednesse, ða he cuæð: ða hierdas næfdon andgit: hie
hæfdon mine æ, & hi me ne gecniowon.
 1.29.1. Se ðe Godes bebodu ne gecnæwð, ne bið he oncnawen
from Gode.
 1.29.2. Ðæt ilce cuæð sanctus Paulus: Se ðe God ne
ongit, ne ongit God hine.
 1.29.3. Unwise lareowas cumað for ðæs folces synnum.
 1.29.4. Forðon oft for ðæs lareowes unwisdome misfarað
ða hieremenn, & oft for ðæs lareowes wisdome unwisum hieremonnum
bið geborgen.
 1.29.6. Gif ðonne ægðer bið unwis, ðonne is to
geðencanne hwæt Crisð self cuæð on his godspelle, he cwæð: Gif
se blinda ðone blindan læt, hi feallað begen on ænne pytt.
 1.29.8. Be ðæm ilcan se sealmscop cuæð: Sien hira eagan
aðistrode ðæt hi ne geseon, & hiora hrygc simle gebieged.
 1.29.10. Ne cuæð he ðæt forðyðe he ænegum men
ðæs wyscte oððe wilnode, ac he witgode sua sua hit geweorðan
sceolde.
 1.29.12. Soðlice ða eagan ðæt beoð ða lareowas, &
se hrygc ðæt sint ða hieremenn;
 1.29.13. Forðan ða eagan bioð on ðam lichoman foreweardum
& ufeweardum, & se hrycg færð æfter ælcre wuhte;
 1.29.14. Sua gað ða lareowas beforan ðæm folce, &
ðæt folc æfter.
 1.29.15. Ðonne ðam lareowum aðistriað ðæs modes eagan,
ðe beforan gan scoldon mid godum bisenum, ðonne gebigð ðæt folc hira
hrycg to hefegum byrðenum manegum.
 2.29.18. Ne eft ða gelæredan ðe swa nyllað libban swa hie
on bocum leornedon, ðæt hi scoldon ne underfon ða are ðæs
lareowdomes.
 2.29.21. Monige eac wise lareowas winnað mid hira ðeawum wið
ða gæsðlecan bebodu ðe hi mid wordum lærað, ðonne hie on oðre
wisan libbað on oðre hi lærað.
 2.29.23. Oft ðonne se hirde gæð on frecne wegas, sio hiord
ðe unwærre bið, gehrist.
 2.31.1. Be suelcum hirdum cwæð se witga: Ge fortrædon Godes
sceapa gærs & ge gedrefdon hiora wæter mid iowrum fotum, ðeah ge
hit ær undrefed druncen.
 2.31.3. Sua ða lareowas hi drincað suiðe hluter wæter,
ðonne hi ðone godcundan wisdom leorniað, & eac ðonne hie hiene
lærað;
 2.31.5. Ac hie hit gedrefað mid hira agnum unðeawum, ðonne
ðæt folc bisenað on hira unðeawum, nals on hira lare.
 2.31.6. Ðeah ðæt folc ðyrste ðære lare, hie hie ne
magon drincan, ac hio bið gedrefed midðamðe ða lareowas oðer doð
oðer hie lærað.
 2.31.8. Be ðæm Dryhten cwæð eft ðurh ðone witgan:
Yfle preostas bioþ folces hryre.
 2.31.9. Ne dereð nan mon suiðor ðære halgan gesomnunge
ðonne ða ðe ðonne noman underfoð & ða endebyrdnesse ðæs
halgan hades & ðone on woh doð;
 2.31.12. Forðon hie nan monn ne dearr ðreagean ðeah hie
agyltan, ac mid ðam beoð synna suiðe gebrædda ðe hie beoð sua
geweorðade.
 2.31.14. Ac hie woldon selfe fleon ða byrðenne sua micelre
scylde, ða ðe his unwierðe wæron, gif hie mid hiora heortan earum
woldon gehieran & geornlice geðencan ðone Cristes cuide, ða he
cuæð: Se ðe ænigne ðissa ierminga besuicð, him wære betere
ðæt him wære sumu esulcweorn to ðæm suiran getiged, & sua
aworpen to sæs grunde.
 2.31.18. Ðurh ða cweorne is getacnod se ymbhwyrft ðisse
worolde & eac monna lifes & hira gesuinces, & ðurh ðone
sægrund hira ende & se siðemesða demm.
 2.31.21. Ðonne bið sio cweorn becierred ðonne se monn bið
geendod;
 2.31.21. Ðonne bið sio micle cweorn becierred ðonne ðeos
weorld bið geendod.
 2.31.22. Se ðonne to halgum hade becymð, & ðonne mid
yflum bisnum oððe worda oððe weorca oðre on won gebringð, betre him
wære ðæt he on læssan hade & on eorðlicum weorcum his lif
geendode;
 2.31.25. Forðæm gif he on ðæm wel deð, he hæfð
ðæs god lean, gif he yfle deð, læsse wite he ðrowað on helle, gif
he ana ðider cymð, ðonne he do, gif he oðerne mid him ðider
bringð.
 3.33.4. Be ðære byrðenne ðæs reccenddomes, & hu he
scyle eall earfoðu forsion, & hu forht he sceal beon for ælcre
orsorgnesse.
 3.33.6. Forðon we ðiss feawum wordum sædon, ðy we woldon
gecyðan hu micel sio byrðen bið ðæs lareowdomes, ðylæs ænig
hine underfon durre ðara ðe his unwierðe sie, ðylæs hie ðurh ða
wilnunga ðære woroldare underfo ðone latteowdom ðæs forlores.
 3.33.9. Suiðe medomlice Iacobus se apostol his stirde, ða he
cuæð: Broðor ne beo eower to fela lareowa.
 3.33.11. Forðæm se wealhstod self Godes & monna, ðæt
is Crist, fleah eorðrice to underfonne.
 3.33.12. Se se ðe ealne ðone wisdom ðara uferrenna gæsta
oferstigð & ær worolde ricsode on hefenum, hit is awriten on ðæm
godspelle, Iudeas comon & woldon hine don niedenga to cyninge.
 3.33.15. Ða se Hælend ðæt ongeat, ða becierde he hie
& gehydde hiene.
 3.33.15. Hwa meahte ieð monnum rædan butan scylde, ðonne se
ðe hi gescop?
 3.33.16. Ne fleah he ðy rice ðy his ænig monn bet wyrðe
wære, ac he wolde us ða bisene astellan, ðæt we his to suiðe ne
gitseden;
 3.33.18. & eac wolde for us ðrowian.
 3.33.19. He nolde beon cyning, & his agnum willan he com to
rode gealgan.
 3.33.20. Ða weorðmynde cynehades he fleah, & ðæt wite
ðæs fraceðlecestan deaðes he geceas, forðam ðætte we, ðe his
liomu sindon, leornedon æt him ðæt we flugen ða oliccunga ðisses
middangeardes;
 3.33.23. & eac ðæt ðæt we his ege & his brogan us
ne ondreden, & for soðfæsðnesse ðæt we lufigen gesuinc, &
orsorgnesse we us ondræden, & hi forðy forbugen.
 3.35.2. Forðam for ðære orsorgnesse monn oft aðint on
ofermettum, & ða earfeðu ðurh sar & ðurh sorge hiene
geclænsiað & geeaðmedað.
 3.35.4. On ðæm gesundfulnessum ðæt mod wierð upahafen;
 3.35.5. & on ðæm earfeðum, ðeah hit ær upahafen
wære, hit bið geeaðmedd.
 3.35.6. On ðære gesundfulnesse mon forgiett his selfes;
 3.35.8. On ðæm gesuincum he sceal hine selfne geðencean,
ðeah he nylle.
 3.35.8. On ðære orsorgnesse oft ðæt he to gode gedyde he
forliesð, on ðæm earfoðum oft ðæt he longe ær to yfle gedyde,
he gebett.
 3.35.9. Suiðe oft monn bið ðære earfoðnesse lareowdome
underðieded, ðeah he ær nolde his lareowes ðeawum & larum bion.
 3.35.11. Ac ðeah hine ðonne ða brocu getyn & gelæren,
sona, gif he on rice becymð, for ðære weorðunge ðæs folces, he
bið on ofermettu awended, & gewunað to ðæm gielpe.
 3.35.14. Sua sua Saul se cyning, æresð he fleah ðæt rice,
& tealde hine selfne his suiðe unwierðne.
 3.35.15. Ac sona sua he ðone anwald onfeng ðæs rices, he
astag on ofermetto, & hine bealg wið ðone ilcan Samuel ðe hine ær
on ðæm rice gebrohte, & hine to gehalgode, forðamðe he him sæde
beforan ðam folce his unðeawas, ða he him ær hiera ðonces gestieran
ne meahte;
 3.35.19. & ða he him from wolde, ða gefeng he hine, &
toslat his hrægl, & hine geunarode.
 3.35.20. Sua eac Dauit, ðe folneah on eallum ðingum Gode
licode, sona sua he ða byrðenne næfde sua monegra earfeða, he wæs
mid ofermettum gewundad, & ðæt suiðe wælhreowlice gecyðde on
Urias slæge his agenes holdes ðegnes, for ðære scamleaslecan
gewilnunge his wifes.
 3.35.24. Se ilca se monegum yfelum wið hine selfne forworhtum
ær gearode, he wearð eft sua ungemetlice grædig ðæs godan
deaþes, butan ælcre scylde & ælcre wiðerweardnesse wið hine.
 3.37.3. Se ilcan Dauid ðe forbær ðæt he ðone kyning ne
yfelode, ðe hine on sua heardum wræce gebrohte, & of his earde
adræfde, ða he his wel geweald ahte on ðæm scræfe, he genom his
loðan ænne læppan to tacne ðæt he his geweald ahte, & hine
ðeah for ðam ealdan treowum forlet.
 3.37.7. Se ilca Dauid miclum his agenes herges pleah, & monigne
forsende, ðær he ymb his getreowne ðegn unsynnigne sierede.
 3.37.9. Sio scyld hine suiðe feorr of ealra haligra rime atuge,
ðær him eft ða gesuinc & ða earfeðu ne gehulpen.
 4.37.11. Ond hu oft sio bisgung ðæs rices & ðæs
recedomes toslit ðæt mod ðæs recceres.
 4.37.13. Suiðe oft gedrefeð ða heortan sio manigfealde giemen
ðæs underfangenan lareowdomes, & ðonne ðæt mod bið on monig
todæled, hit bið on anes hwæm ðe unfæstre, & eac ðe
unyttre.
 4.37.15. Bi ðam cuæð Salomonn se snottra: Sunu min, ne
todæl ðu on to fela ðin mod, & ðin weorc endemes.
 4.37.17. Forðan oft ðonne mon forlæt ðone ege & ða
fæsðrædnesse ðe he mid ryhte on him innan habban scolde, hine
spænð his mod to suiðe manegum unnyttum weorce.
 4.37.19. He sorgað ymb ða, & bið ðara suiðe gemyndig,
& forgiett his selfes, ðonne he suiðor his mod gebint to ðam
unnyttran weorcum ðonne he ðyrfe.
 4.37.21. Him bið sua sua ðam menn ðe bið abisgod on
færelde mid oðrum cierrum, oððæt he nat hwider he ær wolde, ne
geðencan ne con hwæt him losað on ðære gælinge ðe he ða
hwile amierreð, & hu suiðe he on ðam gesyngað.
 4.39.2. Ne wende na Ezechias Israhela kyning ðæt he gesyngade,
ða he lædde ða ællðeodgan ærenddracan on his maðmhus, &
him geiewde his goldhord.
 4.39.4. Ac he onfunde ðeah Godes ierre on ðam hearme ðe his
bearne æfter his dagum becom.
 4.39.5. & ðeah he wende ðæt hit nan syn nære.
 4.39.6. Oft ðonne hwæm gebyreð ðæt he hwæt
mærlices & wundorlices gedeð, & his ðonne wundriað ða ðe
him underðiedde bioð, & hine heriegeað, ðonne ahefð he hine on
his mode, & his Deman ierre fullice to him gecigð, ðeah ðe he hit on
yfelum weorcum ne geopenige.
 4.39.10. Suaðeah mid ðy selflice se Dema bið genieded to
ðæm ierre, & se Dema se ðe ðæt inngeðonc eall wat, he eac
ðæm inngeðonce demð.
 4.39.11. We magon monnum bemiðan urne geðonc & urne willan,
ac we ne magon Gode.
 4.39.13. Hwæt se Babylonia cyning wæs suiðe upahafen on his
mode for his anwalde & for his gelimpe, ða he fægnode ðæs miclan
weorces & fægernesse ðærre ceastre, & hine oðhof innan his
geðohte eallum oðrum monnum, & suigende he cwæð on his mode: Hu ne
is ðis sio micle Babilon ðe ic self atimbrede to kynestole & to
ðrymme, me selfum to wlite & wuldre, mid mine agne mægene &
strengo?
 4.39.18. Ða suigendan stefne suiðe hraðe se diegla Dema
gehirde, & him suiðe undeogollice gondwyrde mid ðam witum ðe he hit
suiðe hrædlice wræc.
 4.39.20. Ða upahafenesse he arasode & hie getælde, ða he
hine ascead of ðam woroldrice, & hine gehwyrfde to ungesceadwisum neatum,
& sua awende mode he hine geðiedde to feldgogendum deorum;
 4.39.23. & sua ðy ðearlan dome he forleas his mennisce.
 4.39.24. Se ilca se ðe wende ðæt he wære ofer ealle
oðere menn, him gebyrede ðæt he nyste self hwæðer he monn wæs.
 4.41.2. Suaðeah, ðeah ic nu ðis recce, næ tæle ic na
micel weorc ne ryhtne anwald, ac ic tæle ðæt hine mon forðy upahebbe
on his mode;
 4.41.3. & ða untrymnesse hiera heortan ic wolde getrymman
& gestiran ðære wilnunge ðæm unmedemum, ðæt hiera nan ne
durre gripan sua orsorglice on ðæt rice & on ðone lareowdom,
ðylæs ða gongen on suafrecne stige, ða ðe ne magon uncwaciende
gestondan on emnum felda.
 5.41.9. Bi ðæm ðe magon on ealdordome nytte beon on bisnum
& on cræftum, & ðonne for hira agenre ieðnesse ðæt
fleoð.
 5.41.11. Ac monige siendun mid miclum giefum monegra cræfta
& mægene geweorðode, forðonðe hie hie scoldon monegum tæcan,
& for oðerra monna ðearfe onfoð ðylicca giefa.
 5.41.13. Ðæt is ðæt hie gehealdað hira lichoman
firenlusta clænne;
 5.41.14. Oðer is ðæt hi beoð on færhæfðnesse
strenge strange;
 5.41.15. Ðridde is ðæt hi beoð mid lara suetmettum
gefylde;
 5.41.15. Feorðe is ðæt hi beoð on ælengum ðingum
& ælcre longunge geðyldige, & on forebyrde eaðmode;
 5.41.17. Fifte is ðæt hie habbað ða arodnesse & ða
bieldo ðæt hie magon anweald habban;
 5.41.18. Siexte is ðæt hi beoð fremsume;
 5.41.19. Siofoðe is ðæt hi beoð reðe & stræce for
ryhtwisnesse.
 5.41.19. Ða ðe ðonne ðyllice beoð, & him mon suelcne
folgað beodeð, & hie him wiðsacað, oft him gebyreð ðæt hie
weorðað bereafod ðara giefa ðe him God for monigra monna ðingum geaf,
næs for hiera anra.
 5.41.22. Ðonne hie synderlice ðenceað hu hie selfe scylen
fullfremodeste weorðan, & ne giemað to hwon oðerra monna wise
weorðe, mid ðy hi bereafiað hie selfe ðara goda ðe hie wilniað
synderlice habban.
 5.43.1. Be suelcum monnum Crist on his godspelle cuæð: Ne
scyle nan mon blæcern ælan under mittan.
 5.43.3. & eft he cuæð to Petre ðæm apostole: Petrus
lufastu me?
 5.43.3. He cuæð: ðu wast ðæt ic ðe lufige.
 5.43.4. & ða cuæð Dryhten: Fed ðonne min sceap, gif
ðu me lufige.
 5.43.5. Gif ðonne seo feding ðara sceapa bið ðære lufan
tacen, hwi forcwið ðonne se ðe him God suelce cræftas giefð ðæt
he ne fede his heorde, buton he cueðan wielle ðæt he ne lufige ðone
Hlaford & ðone hean Hierde eallra gesceafta?
 5.43.8. Be ðam Paulus se apostol cuæð: Gif Crist for us
eallum dead wæs, ðonne weorðað ealle menn deade.
 5.43.10. Hwæt is ðonne betere ða hwile ðe we libben,
ðonne we ures flæsces lustum ne libben, ac ðæs bebodum ðe for us
dead wæs & eft aras?
 5.43.12. Be ðam cuæð Moyses: Gif hwa gefare & nan bearn
ne gestriene, gif he broðor læfe, fo se to his wife.
 5.43.13. Gif he ðonne bearn ðærbig gestriene, ðonne cenne
he ðæt ðam gefarenan breðer ðe hie ær ahte.
 5.43.15. Gif he ðonne ðæt wif wille forsacan, ðonne
hræce hio him on ðæt nebb foran, & his mægas hine anscogen
oðre fet, ðæt mon mæge siððan hatan his tun ðæs anscodan
tun.
 5.43.17. Ðis wæs ryht dom on ðære ealdan æ, & is
nu us to bispelle.
 5.43.18. Se ær gefarena broðor getacnað Crist.
 5.43.19. He hine ætiede æfter ðære æriste, &
cuæð: Farað & cyðað minum broðrum ðæt hie cumen to
Galileum;
 5.43.20. Ðær hie me geseoð.
 5.43.21. He gefor suelce he butan bearnum gefore, forðon he
næfde gefylled ðagiet ðone rim his gecorenra.
 5.43.22. Sua sua ðæs gefarenan broðor wif on ðære
ealdan æ wæs geboden ðæm lifiendan breðer to onfonne, sua is cynn
ðæt sio giemen ðære halgan ciricean, ðæt is Cristes folces
gesomnung, sie ðam beboden ðe hie wel ofer mæge, & hiere wel
rædan cunne.
 5.45.2. Gif hire ðonne se wiðsace, ðonne is cynn ðæt him
spiwe ðæt wif on ðæt nebb, ðæt is ðæt hine tæle ðæs
folces gesomnung, emne suelce hie him on ðæt nebb spæten, forðonðe
he nyle giefan ðæt him God geaf, & helpan ðæs folces mid ðam
ðe he his healp.
 5.45.5. Sua is cynn ðæt sio halige gesomnung tæle ælces
ðara god ðe hit him anum wile to gode habban, & nyle oðera mid
helpan.
 5.45.7. Se bið eac mid ryhte oðre fet anscod, & hine mon
scyle on bismer hatan se anscoda.
 5.45.8. Be ðæm cuæð Crist on his gospelle: Sceawiað
iowre fet, ðæt ge sien gearwe to ganganne on sibbe weg æfter minra boca
bebodum.
 5.45.10. Gief we ðonne habbað sua micle sorge & sua micle
gieman urra niehstena sua sua ure selfra, ðonne hæbbe we begen fet gescode
suiðe untællice;
 5.45.12. Gif we ðonne agiemeleasiað urra niehstena ðearfa,
& ðenceað ymbe ure synderlice, ðonne bið us suiðe fracoðlice
oðer fot unscod.
 5.45.14. Monige menn siendon, sua sua we ær cuædon, ðe
beoð geweorðode mid miclum & mid monegum Godes giefum, & ðonne
beoð onælede mid ðære gierninge ðara smeaunga Godes wisdomes anes,
& fleoð ðonne ða nyttwyrðan hiersumnesse ðære lare, &
nyllað ðæs ðencean hu hie mægen nyttweorðuste bion hiera
niehstum, ac lufiað diegla stowa, & fleoð monna onsiena.
 5.45.20. Gif him ðonne God ryhtlice & stræclice deman
wile, & he him for his mildheortnesse ne arað, ðonne beoð hie sua
monegum scyldum scyldige sua hie manegra unðeawa gestiran meahton mid hiora
larum & bisenum, gif hi ongemong monnum beon wolden.
 5.45.24. Hwæt ðenceað ða ðe on suelcum weorcum scinað,
& magon hiera niehstum sua nytte beon, hwy hie ðara geearnunga &
diegelnesse & anette bet truwigen ðonne ðære hu hie oðerra monna
mæst gehelpen?
 5.47.3. Hwæt se ancenneda Godes sunu of his fæder bosme
wæs ferende to urre andweardnesse ðæt he ure gehulpe.
 6.47.5. Bi ðæm ðe for eaðmodnesse fleoð ða byrðenne
ðæs lareowdomes, ðonne hie beoð ryhtlice eaðmode ðonne hie ne
winnað wið ðone godcundan dom.
 6.47.8. Ðonne siendon monige ðe fleoð for eaðmodnesse anre,
forðon hie noldon ðæt hie mon ahofe ofer ða ðe him beteran
ðynceað ðonne hie selfe.
 6.47.10. Nis ðæs ðonne nan tweo, gif suelc eaðmodnes bið
mid oðrum godum ðeawum begyrded, ðæt ðæt bið beforan Godes
eagum soð eaðmodness, ðonne he for nanre anwielnesse ne wiðcuið ðam
nyttan weorcum ðe him mon beodeð to underfonne.
 6.47.13. Ne bið ðæt na soð eaðmodnes, gif mon ongiett
ðæt ðæt Godes willa sie ðæt he ofer oðre beon scyle, ðæt
he ðonne wiðsace, ac beo underðieded Godes willan & his dome, &
forlæte ða uncyste ðære anwielnesse.
 6.47.16. Ðonne he oferstæled bið, & him gereaht bið
ðæt he oðrum mæg nytt bion on ðam ðe him mon ðonne bebeodeð,
mid his mode he hit sceal fleon & ðeah for hiersumnesse he hit sceal
underfon.
 7.47.20. Ðætte oft ðæs lareowdomes ðenung bið swiðe
untælwyrðlice gewilnad, & eac swiðe untælwierðlice monige
beoð to geniedde.
 7.47.23. Þeahhwæðre monige wilniað folgoðes &
ealdordomes suiðe untælwierðlice, & monige beoð togeniedde eac
suiðe untælwierðlice.
 7.49.1. Ðæt we magon sueotole ongietan, gif we geðenceað
ða twegen witgan ðe God wolde sendan to læranne.
 7.49.3. Oðer hiene his selfes willum gebead to ðære lare
& to ðæm færelte.
 7.49.4. Oðer for ðæm ege, ðe he ondred ðæt he hit sua
medomlice don ne meahte, him wiðsoc.
 7.49.5. Ðæt wæs Heremias.
 7.49.6. Ða he hine sendan wolde, ða bæd he eaðmodlice
ðæt he hiene ne sende & cuæð: Eala eala eala Dryhten, ic eom
cnioht;
 7.49.7. Hwæt conn ic sprecan?
 7.49.8. Ac Essaias, ða Dryhten acsode hwone he sendan meahte,
ða cuæð Essaias: Ic eom gearo;
 7.49.9. Send me.
 7.49.9. Loca nu hu ungelic spræc eode of ðissa tuega monna
muðe.
 7.49.10. Ac hio wæs of suiðe gelicum willan, forðon hio
aweoll of anum wille;
 7.49.11. Ðeah heo an tu tefleowe, ðeah wæs sio æspryng
sio soðe lufu.
 7.49.12. Ymb ða we habbað tua bebodu: an is ðæt we lufigen
God, oðer ðæt we lufien ure niehstan.
 7.49.13. For ðære lufan Essaias wilnode hu he nyttosð meahte
beon his nihstum on ðys eorðlican life, & forðon he wilnode ðære
ðegnunga ðæs lariowdomes.
 7.49.16. Hieremias ðonne wilnode singallice hine geðiedan to
ðære lufan his Scippendes, & forðam he forcwæð, & nolde
ðæt hine mon sende to læranne.
 7.49.18. Ðæt ilce ðæt he untælwyrðlice ondred to
underfonne, ðæt ilce se oðer swiðe hergeondlice gewilnode.
 7.49.19. Oðer ondred ðæt he forlure sprecende ða gestrion
ðe he on ðære swigean geðencan meahte;
 7.49.20. Oðer ondred ðæt he ongeate on his swygean ðæt
he sumne hearm geswigode ðær ðær he freme gecleopian meahte, gif he
ymb ðæt geornlice swunce.
 7.49.23. Ac we sculon swiðe smealice ðissa ægðer
underðencean, forðonðe se ðe ðær wiðcwæð, na fullice ne
wiðcwæð, & se se ðe wolde ðæt hine mon sende, he geseah ær
hine clænsian ðurh ða colu ðæs alteres, ðylæs ænig
unclænsod dorste on swa micelne haligdom fon ðære clænan ðegnenga
ðæs sacerdhades, oððe eft ænig durre on eaðmodnesse hiwe hit
ofermodlice forcweðan, swelce he licette eaðmetto, & doo ðeah for
gilpe, gif hine gecist sio uplice gifu.
 7.51.4. Ac forðæmðe hit swa earfoðe is ænegum menn to
witanne hwonne he geclænsod sie, he mæg ðy orsorglicor forbugan ða
ðegnunga;
 7.51.7. Ond næs swaðeah to anwillice ne forbuge he, swa we
ær cwædon, ðonne he ongiete ðone ufancundan willan ðæt he hit
don scyle.
 7.51.9. Ægðer ðissa gefylde Moyses ða he wiðsoc swa
miclum ealdordome.
 7.51.10. Ægðer ge he wolde ge he nolde, & ðeah for
eaðmodnesse geðafode.
 7.51.11. We witon ðæt he nære eaðmod, gif he underfenge
ðone ealdordom swelces unrimfolces buton ege;
 7.51.12. & eft he wære ofermod, gif he wiðcwæde
ðæt he nære underðidd his Scippende.
 7.51.13. Ac ægðer ðissa he dyde for eaðmodnesse & for
underðidednesse.
 7.51.14. He sceawode hine selfne, & pinsode, ða ða him
ðuhte ðæt he hit doon ne meahte, & swaðeah geðafode,
forðamðe he getruwode ðæs mægene ðe hit him bebead.
 7.51.17. Hwæt se haliga wer ongeat þæt he hæfde Godes
fultom, & swaðeah ondred ðæt he underfenge ðone lattiowdom
ðæs folces, & nu him ne ondrædað ða dolan for hiera agnum
scyldum ðæt hie sien ofer oðre, & ne magon him gegaderian on
ðyllicum biwene hu micel synn & hu micel frecennes hit bið.
 7.51.21. God selfa tyhte Moyses on ðone folgoð, swaðeah he
him ondred;
 7.51.22. Ond nu fandiað swelce wræccan & teoð to, woldon
underfon ðone weorðscipe & eac ða byrðenne;
 7.51.23. & ða ðe beoð mid hira agnum byrðennum
ofðrycte ðæt hie ne magon gestondan, hie willað lustlice underfon
oðerra monna, ond unniedige hie underlutað mid hira sculdrum oðerra
byrðenna toeacan hiera agnum;
 7.53.1. He ne mæg his agne aberan, & wolde ðeah maran
habban.
 8.53.3. Be ðæm ðe wilnað biscephad to underfonne, hu hie
gegripað ðone cwide ðæs apostoles Paules hiora gitsunge to fultome.
 8.53.6. Ac ða ðe willað gripan on swelcne folgað for hiera
gitsunge hie doð him to leafe ðone cwide ðe sanctus Paulus cwæð: Se
ðe biscephade gewilnað, god weorc he gewilnað.
 8.53.8. Gif he hit ða herede & on tyhte, eft he stierde
ðære gewilnunge ða he cwæð: Biscepe gedafnað ðæt he sie
tælleas.
 8.53.10. Ðærbufan is geteald hwelc he beon sceal, gif he
untælwierðe bið.
 8.53.11. Mid oðrum worde he hierte, mid oðrum he bregde, swelce
he openlice cwæde: Ic herige ðæt ge secað, ac leorniað ðæt ge
witen hwæt hit sie, ac gif ge agiemeleasiað ðæt ge ameten eow selfe
hwelce ge sien, sua eow on hierran folgoðe ahebbað, swa ge sweotolran &
widmærran gedoð eowre tælweorðlicnesse.
 8.53.15. Sua se micla cræftiga hiertende toscyfð, &
egesiende stierð ofermetta mid ðære tælinge his hieremonnum, ðæt
he hie gebringe on life.
 8.53.17. Eac is to geðencanne ðæt on ða tiid ðe se
biscephad swa gehiered wæs, sua hwelc swa hine underfeng, he underfeng
martyrdom.
 8.53.19. On ða tiid wæs to herigeanne ðæt mon wilnode
biscephades, ða ðe nan twio næs ðæt he ðurh ðone sceolde cuman
to hefegum martyrdome.
 8.53.21. Ðæt is to tacne ðæt mon endebyrðlice ðone
biscepdom healde, ðæt he hine on godum weorcum geendige.
 8.53.23. Forðon hit is gecweden: Se ðe biscephad gewilnað,
god weorc he gewilnað.
 8.55.1. Se ðonne for ðære gewilnunge swelcra weorca
biscopdom ne secð, he bið ðonne him self gewita ðæt he wilnað him
selfum gielpes;
 8.55.3. Ne deð he ðonne ðæt an yfel ðæt he ne lufað
ða halgan ðegnunga, ac eallinga he hie forsiehð;
 8.55.4. Ond ðonne he fundað to ðæm weorðscipe ðæs
folgoðes, his mod bið afedd mid ðære smeaunga ðære wilnunga
oðerra monna hiernesse & his selfes upahæfenesse, & fægenað
ðæs hu hie ne mon scyle herigean.
 8.55.7. Ahefð ðonne his heortan forðy, & for ðære
genyhte ðæs flowendan welan he blissað.
 8.55.8. He licet eaðmodnesse, & secð mid ðam ðisses
middangeardes gestreon.
 8.55.9. On ðæm hiewe ðe he sceolde his gielpes stieran on
ðæm he his strienð.
 8.55.11. Mid ðy ðe he sceolde his gestreon toweorpan, mid ðy
he hie gadrað.
 8.55.12. Ðonne ðæt mod ðenceð gegripan him to
upahefenesse ða eaðmodnesse, ðæt ðæt he utan eowað innan he hit
anwent.
 9.55.14. Hu ðæt mod ðætte wilnað for oðre beon lihð
him selfum, ðonne hit ðencð fela godra weorca to wyrcanne, & ðæt
licett oðrum monnum, gif he worldare hæbbe, & wile hit ðonne
oferhebban, siððan he hie hæfð.
 9.55.18. Ac ðonne he wilnað to underfonne ða Are & ðone
ealdordom, he ðencð on ðam oferbrædelse his modes ðæt he sciele
monig god weorc ðæron wyrcan, & he ðencð mid innewearde mode
ðæt he gierneð for gilpe & for upahafenesse ðæs folgoðes,
smeageað ðeah & ðeahtigað on hiera modes rinde monig god weorc to
wyrcanne, ac on ðam piðan bið oðer gehyded.
 9.55.23. Ac on uteweardum his mode he liehð him selfum ymbe hine
selfne bie ðæm godum weorcum;
 9.55.24. Licet ðæt he lufige ðæt he ne lufað: ðisses
middangeardes gilp he lufað, & he licett swelce he ðone onscunige,
& hine him ondræde.
 9.57.2. Ðonne he wilnað on his mode ðæt he sciele ricsian
he bið swiðe forht & swiðe behealden;
 9.57.4. Ðonne he hæfð ðæt he habban wolde, he bið
swiðe ðriste.
 9.57.5. Ðonne he to fundað, he ondræt ðæt he ne mote to
cuman, ond sona swa he to ðære are cymð, swa ðyncð him ðæt se
hie him niedscylde sceolde se se hie him sealde, & brycð ðære
godcundan are woruldcundlice , & forgitt swiðe hræðe ðæt he
ær æfæstlices geðohte.
 9.57.8. Hu mæg hit butan ðam beom ðætte ðæt mod ðe
ær wæs keled of his gewunan for ðære wilnunge ðære worldare,
ðæt hit ne sie eft to gecirred ðonne hit hæfð ðætte hit ær
wilnode?
 9.57.11. Ac sona beoð ðæs modes eagan eft gewende to
ðæm weorcum ðe hit ær worhte.
 9.57.12. Ac ðence ælc mon ær hu nytwyrðe he sie & hu
gehiersum ðæm ðe he ðonne mid ryhte hieran scyle on ðam ðe he
ðonne deð.
 9.57.14. Ðonne mæg he witan be ðy, gif he hierran folgað
habban sceal, hwæðer he ðonne don mæg ðæt ðæt he ær
ðencð ðæt he don wolde, forðon seldun mon geleornað on miclum rice
eaðmodnesse, gif he ær on læssan folgoðe ofermod wæs &
recceleas.
 9.57.18. Hu mæg he ðonne ðæt lof & ðone gilp fleon
ðonne he onahæfen bið, se his ær wilnode ða he butan wæs?
 9.57.19. Hu mæg he ðonne beon butan gitsunge, ðonne he sceal
ymb monigra monna are ðencan, gif he nolde ða ða he moste ymb his anes?
 9.57.21. Healde hine ðæt hine his agen geðanc ne biswice,
ðæt he ne truwige ðæt he on ðæm folgoðe wille wel don, gif he
nolde on ðæm læssan;
 9.57.23. Forðæmðe oftor on ðæm hieran folgoðe mon
forlæt goodne gewunan, ðonne he hine ðæron geleornige, gif he hine
ær næfde on læssan folgoðe & on maran æmettan.
 9.59.1. Swiðe eaðe mæg on smyltre sæ ungelæred
scipstiera genoh ryhte stieran, ac se gelæreda him ne getruwað on
ðære hreon sæ & on ðæm miclan stormum.
 9.59.3. Hwæt is ðonne ðæt rice & se ealdordoom butan
ðæs modes storm, se simle bið cnyssende ðæt scip ðære heortan
mid ðara geðohta ystum, & bið drifen hider & ðider on swiðe
nearwe bygeas worda & weorca, swelce hit sie ongemong miclum & monigum
stancludum tobrocen?
 9.59.7. Hwæt is nu ma ymbe ðis to sprecenne, buton se se ðe
swelc ongieten sie ðæt he ða cræftas hæbbe ðe we ær bufan
cwædon, ðæt he ðonne to foo, gif he niede sciele, & se se ðe
swelc ne sie, ðær no æt ne cume, ðeah hiene mon niede?
 9.59.11. Se ðonne se ðe ðeonde bið on swelcum cræftum
& geearnungum, swelce we ær spræcon, & ðonne to swiðe
wiðsceorað ðæm ealdordome, healde hine ðæt he ne cnytte ðæt
underfongne feoh on ðæm swatline ðe Xrist ymbe spræc on his
godspelle;
 9.59.14. Ðæt is ðæt he ða Godes gifa ðe he onfeng ge
on cræftum ge on æhtum ðæt he ða ne becnytte on ðæm sceate
his slæwðe, & he for his swongornesse hie ne gehyde, ðylæs hit
him sie eft witnod.
 9.59.17. Ða ðonne ðe idle beoð swelcra giefa, & ðeah
wilniað ðæs ealdordomes, healden hie ðæt hie mid hiera unryhtum
bisenum ða ne screncen ða ðe gað on ryhtne weg toweard ðæs
hefonrices, swa dydon Fariseos: naðer ne hie selfe on ryhtne weg gan noldon,
ne oðrum geðafigean.
 9.59.21. Ymb ðyllic is to geðencenne & to smeaganne,
forðan se ðe biscephad underfehð, he underfehð ðæs folces
mettrymnesse, & he sceal faran gind lond swa swa læce æfter untrumra
monna husum.
 9.59.24. Gif he ðonne giet geswicen næfð his agenra
unðeawa, hu mæg he ðonne oðerra monna mod lacnian, ðonne he bireð
on his agnum moniga opena wunda?
 9.61.2. Se læce bið micles to beald & to scomleas ðe
gæð æfter oðra monna husum læcnigende, & hæfð on his
agnum nebbe opene wunde unlacnode.
 10.61.5. Hwelc se bion sceal ðe to reccenddome cuman sceal.
 10.61.6. Ac ðone monn scyle eall mægene to bisscephade teon,
ðe on monigum ðrowungum his lichoman cwilmð, & gæstlice liofað,
& ðisses middangeardes orsorgnesse ne gimð, ne him nane
wiðerweardnesse ne andræt ðisse worolde, ac Godes anne willan lufað.
 10.61.9. Suelcum ingeðonce gerist ðæt he for licuman
tiedernesse ne for woroldbismere anum wið ða scire ne winne, ne he ne sie
gietsiende oðerra monna æhta, ac sie his agenra rummod, & his breosð
sien simle onhielde for arfæstnesse to forgiefnesse, næfre ðeah
suiðor ðonne hit gedafenlic sie for ryhtwisnesse.
 10.61.14. Ne sceal he naht unaliefedes don, ac ðæt ðætte
oðre menn unaliefedes doth he sceal wepan sua sua his agne scylde, & hira
untrymnesse he sceal ðrowian on his heortan, & ðæs godes his
nihstena he sceal fægnian sua sua his agnes.
 10.61.17. His weorc sceolon beon ðæs weorðe ðæt him
oðre menn onhyrien.
 10.61.18. He sceal tilian sua to libbanne sua he mæge ða
adrugodan heortan geðwænnan mid ðæm flowendan yðon his lare.
 10.61.20. He sceal geleornian ðæt he gewunige to singallecum
gebedum, oð he ongite ðæt he mæge abiddan æt Gode ðæt he
ongiene, suelce him mon to cueðe: Nu ðu me cleopodesð: nu ic eom her.
 10.63.1. Hwæt wenstu nu, gif hwelc forworht monn cymð, &
bitt urne hwelcne ðæt we hine læden to sumum ricum menn, & him
geðingien ðonne he wið hine iersað?
 10.63.3. Gif he me ðonne cuð ne bið, ne nan monn his hiredes,
ic wille him suiðe ræðe andwyrdan & cueðan: Ne mæg ic ðæt
ærendigean: ic ne eom him sua hiwcuð.
 10.63.5. Gif we ðonne scomiað ðæt we to uncuðum monnum
suelc sprecen, hu durre we ðonne to Gode suelc sprecan?
 10.63.7. Oððe hu dear se gripan on ða scire ðæt he
ærendige oðrum monnum to Gode se se ðe hine selfne hiwcuðne ne ongiet
Gode ðurh his lifes geearnunga?
 10.63.9. Oððe hu dearr he ðingian oðrum monnum, & nat
hwæðer him selfum geðingod bið?
 10.63.10. He mæg ondrædan ðæt he for his ægnum
scyldum mare ierre gewyrce.
 10.63.11. Ealle we witon bi monnum, se se ðe bitt ðone monn
ðæt him ðingie wið oðerne ðe he bið eac ierre, ðæt
irsigende mod he gegremeð, & wierse ierre he astyreð Geðencen
ðæt ða ðe ðonne giet ðisse worolde wilniað, & healden hie
ðæt hie mid hira ðingengum hefigre ierre ne astyrien ðæs
ðearlwisan deman.
 10.63.16. Healden hie hie ðonne hie gitsiað sua micles
ealdordomes domes ðæt hie ne weorðen ealdormenn to forlore hira
hieramonnum.
 10.63.18. Ac pinsige ælc mon hiene selfne georne, ðylæs he
durre underfon ðone lareowdom ðæs folces ða hwile ðe him ænig
unðeaw on ricsige.
 10.63.19. Ne wilnige se na beon ðingere for oðerra scylde se
ðe bið mid his agenum gescinded.
 11.63.22. Hwelc se beon sceal se ðe ðærto cuman ne sceal.
 11.63.23. Bi ðon cuæð sio uplice stemn to Moyse ðæt he
sceolde beodan Arone ðæt nan monn hiera cynnes ne hiera hieredes ne
offrode his Gode nanne hlaf, ne to his ðegnunga ne come, gif he ænig wom
hæfde: gif he blind wære oððe healt, oððe to micle nosu hæfde,
oððe to lytle, oððe eft wo nosu oððe tobrocene honda oððe fet,
oððe hoferede wære, oððe torenige, oððe fleah hæfde on eagan
oððe singale sceabbas oððe teter oððe healan.
 11.65.6. Se bið eallenga blind se ðe noht ne ongiet be ðam
leohte ðære uplecan sceawunge, ond se se ðe bið ofseten mid ðæm
ðistrum ðisses andweardan lifes, ðonne he næfre ne gesiehð mid his
modes eagum ðæt towearde leoht, ðy ðe he hit lufige, & he nat
hwider he recð mid ðæm stæpum his weorca.
 11.65.10. Be ðæm witgode Anna, ða hio cuæð: Dryhten
gehilt his haligra fet, ond ða unryhtwisan sicettað on ðam ðiestrum.
 11.65.12. Se bið eallenga healt se ðe wat hwider he gaan sceal,
& ne mæg for his modes untrymnesse, ðeah he geseo lifes weg, he ne
mæg medomlice ongan, ðonne he hæfð to godum weorce gewunad, &
læt ðonne ðæt aslacian, & hit nyle uparæran to ðam staðole
fulfremedes weorces;
 11.65.16. Ðonne ne magon ðider fullice becuman ða stæpas
ðæs weorces ðieder ðe he wilnað.
 11.65.17. Be ðæm cuæð Paulus: Astreccað eowre agalodan
honda & eowru cneowu, & stæppað ryhte, ne healtigeað leng, ac
beoð hale.
 11.65.19. Ðonne is sio lytle nosu ðæt mon ne sie gescadwis;
 11.65.20. Forðæm mid ðære nose we tosceadað ða
stencas, forðam is sio nosu gereaht to gesceadwisnesse.
 11.65.21. Ðurh ða gesceadwisnesse we tocnawað good &
yfel, & geceosað ðæt god, & aweorpað ðæt yfel.
 11.65.23. Be ðæm is gecueden on ðære bryde lofe: ðin
nosu is suelc suel se torr on Liuano ðæm munte.
 11.65.24. Forðæm sio halige gesomnung ðurh gesceadwisnesse
gesiehð & ongietað of huan ælc costung cymeð, ond ðæt
towearde gefeoht ðara uncysta, hwonon hie ðæs wenan sculon.
 11.67.2. Ac monige menn beoð ðe noldon ðone hlisan habban
ðæt hie unwiese sien;
 11.67.3. Angiennað ðonne oftrædlice mare seNcgean &
smeagean suiðor ðonne him ðearf sie to begonganne, & rædað sume
leasunge on ðære smeaunge.
 11.67.5. Ðæt is sio micle nosu & sio woo se ðe wile
ungemetlice gesceadwis beon, & secð ðæt smealicor ðonne he
ðyrfe, se hæfð to micle nosu & to woo, forðon sio gesceadwisnes
hie selfe gescind mid ðære ungemetgodan smeaunge.
 11.67.8. Ðæt is ðonne se foreda foot & sio forude hond
ðæt mon wite Godes biboda weg, & ðær nylle on gan, ac sie
bedæled & aidlad ælces godes weorces, nals na sua sua healt monn
oððe untrum, hwilum hie gað, hwilum hie restað, ac se foreda fot a
bið ælces feðes bedæled.
 11.67.12. Se ðonne bið hoferede se ðe sio byrðen
ofðrycð ðisse eorðlican gewilnunge, & næfre ne besyhð to
ðære uplican are;
 11.67.14. Ac ealne weg fundað to ðeosum eorðlecum, ond
ðonne hie gehierað awuht be ðæm gode ðæs hefonlican rices,
ðonne ahefegiað hira heortan ða byrðenna ðæs forhwirfdan gewunan
ðætte hie ne magon hiera geðohtes staðol uparæran.
 11.67.17. Be ðæm se salmsceop cwæð: Ic eom gebiged, &
æghwonon ic eom gehiened.
 11.67.19. Ond eft be ðæm ilcan scyldum sio Soðfæstnes
ðurh hie selfe cwæð: Hiera sæd gefeollon on ða ðornas.
 11.67.20. Ðæt sindon ða ðe gehierað Godes word, &
mid ðære geornfulnesse & mid ðære wilnunge ðisse worlde &
hiere welena bið asmorod ðæt sæd Godes worda, ðeah hie
upaspryttæn, ðæt hie ne moten fulgrowan ne wæstmbære weorðan.
 11.67.24. Se ðonne bið siwenige se ðe his andgit bið to
ðon beorhte scinende ðæt he mæge ongietan soðfæstnesse, gif hit
ðonne aðistriað ða flæsclican weorc.
 11.69.1. Hwæt on ðæs siwenigean eagum beoð ða æpplas
hale, ac ða bræwas greatigað, forðam hie beoð oft drygde for
ðæm tearum ðe ðær gelome offlowað, oððæt sio scearpnes
bið gewird ðæs æpples.
 11.69.4. Swa sindon wel monege ðara ðe gewundiað hiera mod
mid ðæm weorcum ðisses flæsclican lifes, ða ðe meahton smealice
& scearplice mid hiera andgite ryht geseon, ac mid ðæm gewunan ðara
wona weorca ðæt mod bið adimmod.
 11.69.7. Se bið eallinga siwenige ðonne his mod & his
andgit ðæt gecynd ascirpð, & he hit ðonne self gescient mid his
ungewunan & wom wilnungum.
 11.69.9. Be ðæm wæs wel gecweden ðurh ðone ængel:
Smiriað eowre eagan mid sealfe ðæt ge mægen geseon.
 11.69.11. Ðonne we smierewað ure heortan eage mid sealfe
ðæt we mægen ðy bet geseon, ðonne we mid ðæm læcedome godra
weorca gefultumað urum ondgite ðæt hit bið ascirped to ongietenne ða
bierhtu ðæs soðan leohtes.
 11.69.14. Se ðonne hæfð eallinga fleah on his modes eagum,
ðe on nane wisan ne mæg ryhtwisnesse geseon, ac bið ablend mid unwisdome
ðæt he ne ongit ða uplican ryhtwisnesse.
 11.69.17. Ðurh ðone æpl ðæs eagan mon mæg geseon,
gif him ðæt fleah on ne gæð, gif hine ðonne ðæt fleah mid
ealle ofergæð, ðonne ne mæg he noht geseon.
 11.69.19. Sua eac bi ðæs modes eagum is gecueden, gif ðæt
ondgit ðæs menniscan geðohtes ongiett ðæt hit self dysig sie &
synfull, ðonne gegripð hit ðurh ðone wenan ðæt andgit ðære
incundan byrhto;
 11.69.22. Gif he ðonne self wenð ðæt he sie wis &
gescadwislice ryhtwis, mid ðy he hiene bedælð ðære oncnawnesse
ðæs uplecan leohtes, & micle ðy læs he ongiet ða bierhto
ðæs soðan leohtes ðonne he hiene upahefeð on his mode on suelc gielp
& on suelc selflice;
 11.71.1. Sua sua be sumum monnum cueden is: Hie sædon ðæt
hie wæren wiese, & ða wurdon hie dysige forðam.
 11.71.3. Soðlice se ðe hæfð singalne sceabb se ðe
næbre ne ablinð ungestæððignesse.
 11.71.4. Ðonne bi ðam sceabbe suiðe ryhte sio hreofl
getacnað ðæt wohhæmed.
 11.71.5. Ðonne bið se lichoma hreof, ðonne se bryne ðe on
ðæm innoðe bið utaslihð to ðære hyde.
 11.71.6. Sua bið sio costung æresð on ðæm mode, &
ðonne fereð utweardes to ðære hyde, oððæt hio utasciet on
weorc.
 11.71.8. Butan tweon gif ðæt mod ær ðæm willan ne
wiðbritt, se wielm ðæs innoðes utabiersð & wierð to sceabbe,
& moniga wunda utane wyrcð mid ðæm won weorcum.
 11.71.10. Forðon wilnode sanctus Paulus ðæt he ðære
hyde giocðan ofadrygde mid ðæm worde, ða he cuðæ: Ne gegripe eow
næfre nan costnung buton menniscu.
 11.71.12. Suelce he openlice cuæde: Mennisclic is ðæt mon
on his mode costunga ðrowige on ðæm luste yfles weorces, ac ðæt is
deofullic ðæt he ðone willan ðurhteo.
 11.71.15. Se ðonne hæfð teter on his lichoman se hæfð
on his mode gitsunga, gif hiere ne bið sona gestiered, hio wile weahsan mid
ungemete.
 11.71.17. Butan tueon se teter butan sare he ofergæð ðone
lichoman, & sua ðeah ðæt lim geunwlitegað;
 11.71.18. Se giecða bið suiðe unsar, & se cleweða bið
suiðe row, & ðeahhwæðere gif him mon to longe fylgð, he wundað
& sio wund sarað.
 11.71.20. Sua eac sio gitsung ðæt mod ðæt hio gebindeð
mid ðære lustfulnesse hio hit gewundað, ðonne hio wyrpð on ðæt
geðoht hwæthugu to bigietenne.
 11.71.22. Hio gehæt him æghwæs genog, ðeah ðæt
ðonne ðæm mode licige & lustfullige, ðeah hit gewundað
midðæmðe hit wyrcð feondscipe.
 11.71.24. Ðurh ða wunde he forliest ðone wlite his lioma,
ðonne he ðurh ðæt woo weorc forliest ðone wlite oðerra godra
weorca, gelicost ðæm ðe he gewemme ealne ðone lichoman, ðonne he
ðurh ealle uncysta ða mod gescrencð;
 11.73.2. Ðæt trymede sanctus Paulus ða he cuæð ðæt
ælces yfeles wyrttruma wære ðæt mon wilnode hwelcre gitsunge.
 11.73.3. Se ðonne se bið healede he ne mæg mid weorce begean
ða scondlicnesse, & suaðeah bið ahefegod mid ðæm singalum
geðohte butan ælcum gemete, & suaðeah næfre ne mæg ðurhteon
ðæT UNRYHTLICE WEORC, ond hwæðere ðæt mod hæfð fulfremedne
willan to ðære wrænnesse butan ælcre steore & wearne gif he hit
ðurhteon meahte.
 11.73.8. Ðonan cymeð sio mettrymnes ðæm healedum, ðe se
wæta ðara innoða astigð to ðæm lime, ðonne asuilð hit &
ahefegað & unwlitegað.
 11.73.10. Se bið eac eallenga healede se se ðe eall his mod
bið aflogen to gæglbærnesse & to dole, ðonne he bierð on his
heortan ða byrðenne ðæs bismeres, & suaðeah mid won weorcum hit
to ðweorlice ne fremeð, ðeah he hit on his mode forlætan ne mæge,
ne fullice gewunian to godum weorcum, forðon sio byrðen ðære sconde
hine diogollice hefegað.
 11.73.15. Sua hwelc ðonne sua ðissa uncysta hwelcre
underðieded bið, him bið forboden ðæt he offrige Gode hlaf,
forðæm hit is wen ðæt se ne mæge oðerra monna scylda ofaðuean,
se se ðe hine ðonne giet his agena onherigeað.
 11.73.19. Ær ðioson we sægdon feam wordum hwelc se bion
scolde ðe medome hierde & lareow bion sceolde, ond eac hwelc se bið
ðe him ondrædan sceal ðæt he unmedome sie.
 11.73.21. Ær ðiosum we rehton hwelc se beon sceolde ðe to
ðæm biscepdome cuman sceolde;
 11.73.22. Nu we willað reccan, gif he ær suelc to cyme, hu he
ðæron libban scyle.
 12.75.1. Hu se se ðe gedafenlice & endebyrdlice to cymð, hu
he ðæron drohtian scyle.
 12.75.3. Þæs biscepes weorc sceolon bion ofer oðra monna
weorc sua micle beteran sua hit micel bið betwux ðæs hirdes life &
ðære heorde.
 12.75.4. Him gedafenað ðæt he geðence & geornlice
smeage hu micel niedðearf him is ðæt he sie gebunden to ðære
ryhtwiesnesse mid ðy rape ðæt he ongite for hwæs geðyncðum
ðæt folc sie genemned heord.
 12.75.7. Hwæt ðæm hierde ðonne wel gerisð ðæt he
sie healic on his weorcum, & his word sien nyttwyrðu, & on his
suigean he sie gescadwis;
 12.75.10. Him sculan eglan oðerra monna brocu suelce he
efnsuiðe him ðrowige;
 12.75.11. He sceal sorgian ymbe ealle & foreðencean;
 12.75.11. He sceal bion for eaðmodnesse hira gefera ælces
ðara ðe wel doo;
 12.75.12. He sceal bion stræc wið ða ðe ðær
agyltað, ond for ryhtwisnesse he sceal habban andan to hira yfele;
 12.75.14. Ond ðeah for ðara bisgunge ne sie his giemen na ðy
læsse ymb ða gehirsuman;
 12.75.15. Ne eac for hira lufan geornfulnesse ne forlæte he ða
ungehirsuman.
 12.75.16. Ac ðis ðæt we nu feam wordum arimdon we willað
hwene rumedlicor heræfter areccean.
 13.75.18. Hu se lareow sceal bion clæne on his mode.
 13.75.19. Se reccere sceal bion simle clæne on his geðohte,
ðætte nan unclænnes hine ne besmite ðonne he ða ðegnunga
underfehð, forðæm ðæt he mæge adrygean of oðra monna heortan
ðæt ðæron fules sie.
 13.75.22. Hit is ðearf ðæt sio hond sie ær geclænsad
ðe wille ðæt fenn of oðerre aðierran;
 13.75.23. Gif sio ðonne bið eac fennegu, ðonne is wen
ðæt hio ða oðre wiers besmite gif hio hire anhrinð.
 13.77.1. Forðæm wæs ðurh ðone witgan gecueden: Dooð
eow clæne, ge ðe berað Godes fatu.
 13.77.3. Ða ðonne berað Godes fatu, ða ðe oðerra monna
saula underfooð to lædanne on ða treowa hira agenra gearnunga to
ðæm innemestan halignessum.
 13.77.5. Geðencen hie ðonne betwuh him selfum hu suiðe hie
sculon beon geclænsode ða ðe berað on hira greadum ða a libbendan
fatu to ðæm ecean temple on hira agenne borg.
 13.77.7. Forðy wæs ðurh ða halgan stemne beboden
ðætte on Arones breostum sceolde beon awriten sio racu ðæs domes on
ðæm hrægle ðe mon hæt rationale, & mid noslum gebunden,
forðæm ðætte sio oferflownes ðara geðohta ne meahte ofsittan
ðæs sacerdes heortan, ac hio sciolde beon gebunden mid ðære ilcan
race, ðætte he ne ðohte nawuht ungesceadwislices ne ungenetlices.
 13.77.13. Forðæm he bið gesett to bisene oðrum monnum,
simle he sceal ætiewan on his lifes gestæððignesse hu micle
gesceadwisnesse he bere on his breostum.
 13.77.15. On ðæm selfan hrægle, ðe he on his breostum
wæg, wæs eac awriten ða naman ðara twelf heahfædera.
 13.77.16. Ðonne birð se sacerd suiðe untællice awriten
ðara fædra naman on his breostum, ðonne he singallice geðencð hiera
lifes bisene.
 13.77.18. Ðonne stæpð se sacerd suiðe tælleaslice on
ðone weg, ðonne he ða bisene ðara forðgefarenra federa geornlice
& unablinnendlice sceawað, & on ðæt suæð ðara haligra
singallice winnað to spyriganne, & unaliefde geðohtas ofðrycð,
ðylæs he ofer ðone ðerscold his endebyrdnesse stæppe.
 13.77.22. Suiðe ryhte ðæt hrægl is gehaten, ðæt se
sacerd beran sceolde ðæs domes racu, forðam se sacerd scolde & git
sceal simle smealice geðencean ðæt he cunne god & yfel tosceadan,
ond siððan geornlice geðence hu he gehwelcne læran scyle & hwonne,
& hwæt him gecopust sie, & nowuht him selfum synderlice wilnige, ac
his niehstena god he sceal tellan him selfum.
 13.79.1. Be ðam is awriten ðæt mon sceolde writan on
ðæm hrægle ðe Aron bær on his breostum, ðonne he inneode beforan
Gode, ða lare & ða domas & ða soðfæsðnesse.
 13.79.4. Ða domas he bær on his breostum beforan Gode Israhela
bearna simle.
 13.79.5. Sua sceal se sacerd giet simle beran ða domas awritene
on his breostum Israhela bearna, ðæt is ðæt hie ðara ðing ðe
him underðiodde bioð for ðæm ege anum ðæs innecundan deman
inweardlice undersece, ðætte sio mennisce oliccung for nanum freondscipe
ðærto ne gemencge, forðon he bið to Cristes bisene & to his
anlicnesse ðær aset.
 13.79.10. & ðeah for ðære geornfulnesse ðære
ryhtinge ne sie he to hræd ne to stið to ðære wrace, ac ðonne he
bið ongieten æfstig wið oðra monna yfelu, anscunige he eac his agenu,
ðylæs ða smyltnesse ðæs domes gewemme oððe se dierna æfst
oððe to hræd ierre.
 13.79.14. Ac gif he geðencð ðone ege ðæs deman ðe ofer
eall sitt, ðonne ne stierð he no his hieremonnum butan miclum ege.
 13.79.16. Ac se ege ðonne he geeaðmed ðæt mod he hit
geclænsað, ðylæs sio gedyrstignes his modes hine to uppahebbe,
oððe ðæs flæsces lusðfulnes hiene besmite, oððe ðurh ða
wilnunga ðissa eorðcundlicra ðinga ðæt mod aðistrige se
forhwierfeda gewuna gemalicnesse, sio oft ðæt mod ðæs recceres
astyreð.
 13.79.20. Ac hit is micel ðearf ðæt mon hire suiðe
hrædlice wiðbregde, ðylæs sio scyld ðe hiene ðurh scienesse
costað for his luste & for his wacmodnesse hine ofersuiðe;
 13.79.23. Forðon gif hio ne bið hrædlice aweg adrifen, he
bið ofslægen mid ðæm sueorde ðære geðafunge.
 14.81.1. Hu se lareow sceal beon on his weorcum fyrmest.
 14.81.2. Se lareow sceal bion on his weorcum healic, ðæt he on
his life gecyðe lifes weg his hieremonnum, ðætte sio hiord se ðe
folgað ðæm wordum & ðæm ðeawum ðæs hierdes, ðætte
sio heord mæge bet gan æfter his ðeawum ðonne æfter his wordum.
 14.81.5. He bið genied mid ðæm folgoðe ðæt he sceal
healice sprecan;
 14.81.6. Geðence he ðonne ðæt him is efnmicel nied,
siððan he hit gesprecen hæfð, ðæt he eac sua doo sua sua he
lærð, forðon sio stefn ðæs lariowes micle ðe ieðelicor
ðurhfærð ða heortan ðæs gehirendes, gif he mid his ðeawum hi
ðæron gefæsðnað;
 14.81.10. Ðæt is ðæt he sprecende bebiet ðæt he
ðæt wyrcende oðiewe, ðæt hit ðurh ðone fultum sie forðgenge.
 14.81.11. Bi ðæm wæs gecueden ðurh ðone witgan: ðu
ðe wilt godspellian Sion, astig ofer heane munt.
 14.81.13. Ðæt is ðætte se sceal, se ðe wile brucan
ðara godcundra ðinga & ðara hefonlicra lara, forlætan ðas
niðerlican & ðas eorðlecan weorc, forðam he bið gesewen standende
on ðam hrofe godcundra ðinga.
 14.81.16. Sua micle he mæg ieð his hieremenn geteon to
beteran, & he bið sua micle sel gehiered sua he ufor gestent on his lifes
geearnungum.
 14.81.18. Forðam bebiet sio halige æ ðæt se sacerd scyle
onfon ðone suiðran bogh æt ðære offrunge, & se sceolde bion
asyndred from ðæm odrum flæsce.
 14.81.20. Ðæt ðonne tacnað ðæt ðæs sacerdes
weorc sculon beon asyndred from oðerra monna weorcum.
 14.81.22. Nalles na ðæt an ðæt he god doo gemang oðrum
monnum, ac eac synderlice sua suæ he on ðyncðum bið furður ðonne
oðre, ðæt he eac sie on his weorcum & ðeawum sua micle furður.
 14.81.24. Eac him mon scolde sellan ða breosð ðæs neates
toeacan ðæm boge, ðæt is ðæt he geleornige ðæt he selle
Gode his agne breosð, ðæt is his inngeðonc;
 14.83.1. Nalles na ðæt an ðæt he on his breostum ðence
ðætte ryht sie, ac eac ða spone ðe his ðeawa giemað to ðæm
illcan mid his godum biesenum.
 14.83.3. Ne wilnige he nanes eorðlices ofer ðæt, ne he him
ne ondræde nanne eorðlicne ege ðyses andweardan lifes, ac geðence he
ðone inncundan ege Godes, & forsio ælce olicunge ðisses
middangeardes, & eac his ege for ðære wynsuman suetnesse Godes.
 14.83.7. Forðon ðurh ða uplecan stefne wæs beboden on
ðære æ ðæt se sacerd scolde beon fæste bewæfed on bæm
sculdrum mid ðæm mæssehrægle.
 14.83.9. Ðæt is ðæt he bio simle gestrymed &
gefrætwod wið ælce frecenesse ge gæstlice ge mennisclice & wið
ælce orsorgnesse besuapen mid ðyssum mægenum, sua sua Paulus cuæð:
Gað ge gewæpnode ægðer ge on ða suiðran hond, ge on ða winstran
mid ðæm wæpnum ryhtwisnesse.
 14.83.13. Forðæm ðonne he higað to ðæm godcundum
ðingum anum, ðæt he ne ðyrfe an nane healfe anbugan to nanum fullicum
& synlicum luste, ne eac ne ðyrfe bion to upahæfen for nanum wlencum
ne for nanre orsorgnesse, ne hine ne gedrefe nan wuht wiðerweardes, ne hine
ne geloccige nan oliccung to hiere willan, ne hine ne geðrysce nan
wiðermodnes to ormodnesse.
 14.83.19. Gif ðonne mid nanum ðissa ne bið onwæced his
inngeðonc, ðonne bið hit swutul ðæt he bið suiðe gerisenlice
besuapen mid swiðe wlitige oferbrædelse on bæm sculdrum.
 14.83.22. Ðæt hrægl wæs beboden ðæt scolde bion
geworht of purpuran & of tweobleom derodine & of twispunnenum twine
linenum & gerenod mid golde & mid ðæm stane iacincta, forðæm
ðæt wære getacnod on hu mislecum & on hu monigfaldum mægenum se
sacerd scolde scinan beforan Gode, mannum to biesene.
 14.85.1. Æresð alra glengea & ymesð scolde scinan gold
on his hrægle.
 14.85.2. Ðæt is ðætte on his mode scine ealra ðinga
fyrmesð ongit wisdomes.
 14.85.3. Toeacan ðæm golde ealra glenga fyrmesð on his
hrægle wæs beboden ðæt scolde bion se giem iacinctus, se is lyfte
onlicusð on hiwe.
 14.85.5. Se ðonne tacnað ðæt eall ðætte ðæs
sacerdes ondgit ðurhfaran mæge, sie ymb ða hefonlican lufan, næs ymbe
idelne gilp, ðylæs him losige ðæt heofenlice ondgit, forðæmðe
he sie gehæfted mid ðæm luste his selfes heringe.
 14.85.9. Eac ðæm golde & ðæm line wæs ongemang
purpura, ðæt is cynelic hrægl, forðæm hit tacnað kynelicne
anwald.
 14.85.11. Be ðæm geðence se sacerd, ðonne he oðre men
healice lærð, ðæt he eac on him selfum healice ofðrysce ða lustas
his unðeawa, forðæmðe he kynelic hrægl hæfð, ðæt he eac
sie kyning ofer his agne unðeawas, & ða cynelican ofersuiðe;
 14.85.14. & geðence he simle sie sua æðele sua
unæðele suæðer he sie ða æðelu ðære æfterran
acennesse, ðæt is on ðæm fulluhte, & simle atiewe on his ðeawum
ða ðing ðe he ðær Gode gehet, & ða ðeawas ðe him mon
ðær bebead.
 14.85.17. Be ðæm æðelum ðæs gæstes Petrus
cuæð: Ge sint acoren kynn Gode & cynelices preosthades.
 14.85.19. Bi ðæm anwalde, ðe we sculon ure unðeawas mid
ofercuman, we magon beon getrymede mid Iohannes cuide ðæs godspelleres,
ðe he cuæð: ða ðe hine onfengon he salde him anwald ðæt hie
meahton beon Godes bearn.
 14.85.22. Ða medomnesse ðære strengio se salmscop ongeat,
ða he cuæð: Dryhten, suiðe suiðe sint geweorðode mid me ðine
friend, & suiðe is gestrangod hiera ealdordom;
 14.85.25. Forðæmðe ðæt mod ðinra haligra bið
aðened suiðe healice & suiðe stranglice to ðe, ðonne ðonne
oðrum monnum ðyncð ðæt hie mæstne demm & mæste scande
ðrowigen, & hie forsewenuste bioð for worulde.
 14.87.2. On ðæs sacerdes hrægle wæs toeacan golde &
iacincðe & purpuran, dyrodine twegera bleo.
 14.87.3. Ðæt tacnað ðætte eal ða god & ða
mægenu ðe heo doð beon gewlitegode mid ðære lufan Godes & monna
beforan ðæm eagum ðæs ecean Deman, ðætte se spearca ðara godra
weorca ðe her tuinclað beforan mannum, bierne healice licge on ðære
inncundan lufan beforan ðæm dieglan Deman.
 14.87.8. Sio lufu ðonne hio lufað ætsomne ægðer ge God
ge his niehstan, hio scinð suiðe smicere on twæm bleom sua sua twegea
bleo godwebb.
 14.87.10. Se ðonne se ðe sua higað ealneweg to andweardnesse
his scippendes, & agiemeleasað ða giemene his nihstena, oððe eft
sua singallice folgað ðære giemenne his niehstena, ðæt he
agiemeleasað ða godcundan lufe, ðonne hæfð he anforlæten ðæt
twegea bleo godwebb ðæt he habban sceolde on ðæm halgan hrægle,
gif he auðer ðissa forlæt.
 14.87.15. Ac ðonne ðæt mod bið aðened on ða lufan
ægðer ge Godes ge his niehstena, ne bið hit ðonne nohtes hwon buton
forhæfdnesse anre, ðæt he his lichoman suence & hlænige.
 14.87.17. Forðon is toeacan ðæm twiblion godwebbe ðæt
scyle beon twiðræwen twin on ðæm mæssegierelan.
 14.87.19. Of ðære eorðan cymeð ðæt fleax, ðæt
bið hwites hiwes.
 14.87.20. Hwæt mæg ðonne elles beon getacnod ðurh
ðæt fleax butan lichoman clænnes, sio sceal scinan of clænre
heortan?
 14.87.21. Forðæm bið gefæsðnod ðæt geðræwene
twin to ðæm wlite ðæs mæssehrægles, forðam sio clænnes
bið ðonne to fulbeorhtum wlite becumen, ðonne ðæt flæsc bið
gesuenced ðurh færhæfdnesse, & ðonne betweox oðrum mægenum
bið ðionde sio earnung ðæs gesuenctan flæsces, sua sua on ðæm
mæssehrægle scienð ongemang oðrum bleon ðæt tweoðræwene
twin.
 15.89.3. Hu se lareow sceal bion gesceadwis on his swigean &
nytwyrðe on his wordum.
 15.89.5. Sie se lariow gemetfæsð & gescadwis &
nyttwyrðe on his wordum, ðætte he ne suigige ðæs ðe nyttwyrðe
sie to sprecanne, ne ðæt ne sprece ðæt he suigigean scyle.
 15.89.7. Forðæm sua sua unwærlicu & giemeleaslicu
spræc menn dweleð, sua eac sio ungemetgode suige ðæs lareowes on
gedwolan gebringð ða ðe he læran meahte, gif he sprecende beon
wolde.
 15.89.10. Oft eac ða unwaran lareowas for ege ne durron cleopian,
ondrædað him sumra monna unðonc, ne durron forðon ryht freolice
læran & unforwandodlice sprecan.
 15.89.13. Be ðæm sio Soðfæsðness cuæð: Ne healde
ge mid suelcum eornoste ða heorde suelce hirdas scoldon, ac hyrena ðeawe ge
fleoð, & hydað eow mid ðære suigean, sua se hyrra ðonne he
ðone wulf gesiehð.
 15.89.16. Ðæt ilce oðwat Dryhten ðurh ðone witgan, ða
he cuæð: Dumbe hundas ne magon beorcan.
 15.89.17. Ond eft he cidde, ða he cuæð: Ne come ge no
togenes minum folce ðæt ge meahton standan on minum gefeohte for Israhela
folce, ne ge ðone weall ne trymedon ymbe hira hus on ðæm dæge ðe
him niedðearf wæs.
 15.89.20. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt he fare togeanes Israhela
folce him mid to feohtanne ðæt he wiðstande mid his spræce ðam
unryhtwillendum ðe ðyses middangeardes waldað mid freore &
unforwandodlicre stefne, for gescildnesse his heorde.
 15.89.24. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt he him mid feohte on
ðæm dæge ðe him niedðearf sie, ðæt he wiðstonde ealle
mægene ðæm ðe on woh wiellen for ðære ryhtwisnesse lufan.
 15.91.2. Be ðæm wæs eft gecueden to ðæm scyldegan
folce: Eowre witgan eow witgodan dysig & leasunga, & noldon eow
gecyðan eowre unryhtwisnesse, ðæt hie eow gebrohten on hreowsunge.
 15.91.5. Ða godan lareowas beoð oft gemenmede on halgum
gewritum wietgan, forðæm hie gereccað ðis andwearde lif fleonde, &
ðæt towearde gesueotoligeað.
 15.91.7. Ða ðonne ðe sio godcundde stefn ðreade, &
cuæð ðæt hie scolden leasunga witgian, ðæt sindon ða ða ðe
him ondrædað ðæt hie menn for hira scyldum ðreagen, ac mid
ieðelre olicunge orsorgnesse gehatað ðæm scyldegan, & mid nanum
ðingum nyllað geopenian ðæm syngiendum hiera unryht, ac suigiað
ðara ðreaunga.
 15.91.12. Ðæt word ðære ðreaunge is cæg, forðæm
hit oft anlycð & geopenað ða scylde ðe se him self ær nyste se
hie ðurhteah.
 15.91.14. Be ðæm cuæð Paulus ðæt se lareow sceolde
beon miehtig to tyhtanne on halwende lare, & eac to ðreanne ða ðe him
wiðstondan wiellen.
 15.91.16. Eft wæs gecueden ðurh Zacharias: Sio æ sceal beon
soht on ðæs sacerdes muðe, & his weleras gehalðað ðæt
andgit, forðæm he bið Godes boda to ðam folce.
 15.91.18. Forðam myndgode Dryhten ðurh Essaiam ðone witgan
& cuæð: Cleopa & ne blin, hefe up ðine stefne sua ðes bime.
 15.91.20. Forðæm se se ðe ðone sacerdhad onfehð, he
onfehð friccan scire & foreryneles ða her iernað beforan kyningum,
& bodigeað hira færelt & hiera willan hlydende.
 15.91.22. Sua sculun ða sacerdas nu faran hlydende & bodiende
beforan ðæm egeslican deman ðe him suiðe andrysnlic æfter
gæð.
 15.91.24. Gif ðonne se sacerd bið ungerad ðæs lareowdomes,
hwæt forstent ðonne his gehlyd?
 15.91.25. Hwæt mæg he bodigean ma ðonne se dumba fryccea?
 15.91.26. Ac for ðeosum wæs geworden ðæt se halega
gæsð on tungena onlicnesse gesette ofer ða apostolas, forðæm butan
tweon ðone ðe he gefylð he gedeð ðæt he bið suiðe hræðe
ymbe hine sprecende.
 15.93.3. Forðæm wæs beboden Moyse ðæt se sacerd scolde
bion mid bellum behangen.
 15.93.4. Ðæt is ðæt he hæbbe ða stefne ðære
lare, ðylæs he abelge mid ðære suigean ðone dom ðæs
Sceaweres.
 15.93.6. Hit is awriten ðæt he scolde inngongende &
utgongende beforan Gode to ðam halignessum beon gehiered his sueg, ðylæs
he swulte.
 15.93.8. Hit is gecueden ðæt se sacerd scolde sweltan, gif se
sueg nære of him gehiered ægðer ge inngongendum ge utgongendum,
forðon he geniet ðone dieglan deman to irre, gif he inngæð butan ðam
swege ðære lare.
 15.93.11. Hit wæs awriten ðæt ðæs sacerdes hrægl
wære behongen mid bellum.
 15.93.12. Hwæt elles getacnað ðæs sacerdes hrægl butan
ryht weorc?
 15.93.13. Dauið se witga ðæt cyðde, ða he cuæð:
Sien ðine sacerdas gegierede mid ryhtwisnesse.
 15.93.14. On ðæs sacerdes hrægle wæron bellan
hangiende.
 15.93.15. Ðæt is ðæt ða weorc ðæs sacerdes &
eac se sueg his tungan clypien ymb lifes weg.
 15.93.16. Ac ðonne se lareow hine gegearwað to ðære
spræce, behalde he hine geornlice ðæt he wærlice sprece;
 15.93.18. Forðon gif he unendebyrdlice onet mid ðære
spræce, & wilnað ðæt he ðy wisra ðynce, ðonne is wen
ðæt he gewundige ða heortan ðara gehirendra mid ðære wunde,
ðæt is ðæt he hie gedweleð & unwislice geiecð ða idelnesse
ðe he ofaceorfan sceolde.
 15.93.21. Be ðæm sio Soðfæsðnes cuæð: Habbað ge
sealt on ieow, & sibbe habbað betweoh iow.
 15.93.23. Ðurh ðæt sealt is getacnod ða word wisdomes.
 15.93.23. Se ðonne se ðe fundige wislice to sprecanne,
ondræde he him suiðlice, ðylæs his spræc gescynde ða anmodnesse
ðara ðe ðærto hlystað.
 15.93.25. Be ðæm cuæð Paulus: Ne wilnien ge mare to
witenne ðonne iow ðearf sie, ac witað ðæt ðæt iow gemetlic sie
& iower ondefenu sien to witenne.
 15.95.1. Be ðæm wæs gecueden mid ðære godcundan stefne
ðæt on ðæs sacerdes hrægle scoldon hangigan bellan & ongemang
ðæm bellum reade apla.
 15.95.4. Hwæt elles is getacnod ðurh ða readan apla buton
sio anmodnes ryhtes geleafan?
 15.95.5. Sua se æppel bið betogen mid anfealdre rinde, &
ðeah monig corn oninnan him hæfð, sua sio halige cirice unrim folces
befehð mid anfealde geleafan, & ða habbað suaðeah suiðe misleca
geearnunga ðe ðærinne wunigeað.
 15.95.8. Forðæm geðence se lariow ðæt he unwærlice
forð ne ræse on ða spræce.
 15.95.9. Ymbe ðæt ðe we ær spræcon sio
Soðfæsðnes ðurh hie selfe cleopade to ðæm apostolum, &
cuæð: Habbað ge seaLt on iow & sibbe betweoh iow.
 15.95.11. Sio anlicnes wæs gecueden ðæt sceolde bion on
ðæs sacerdes hrægle ða readan appla ongemang ðam bellum.
 15.95.13. Ðæt is ðætte ðurh eall ðæt ðæt we
ær spræcon sie underfangen & wærlice gehealden sio anmodnes
ðæs godcundan geleafan.
 15.95.15. Se lareow sceal mid geornfullice ingehygde foreðencean
na ðæt an ðætte he ðurh hine nan woh ne bodige, ac eac ðæt he
nane ðinga ðæt ryht to suiðe & to ungemetlice & to
unaberendlice ne bodige, forðæm oft ðæt mægen ðære lare
wierð forloren, ðonne mon mid ungedafenlicre & unwærlicre
oferspræce ða heortan & ðæt andgiet gedweleð ðara ðe
ðærto hlystað, ond eac se lariow bið gescinded mid ðære
oferspræce, ðonne he ne conn geðencean hu he nyttwyrðlicost læran
mæge ða ðe ðærto hlystan willað.
 15.95.23. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecueden ðurh Moyses
ðætte se wer se ðe ðrowude oferflownesse his sædes, & ðæt
unnytlice agute, ðæt he ðonne wære unclæne.
 15.95.25. Sua eac ða word ðære lare beoð sæd, & hi
gefeallað on ða heortan ðe hiera hlyst, sua nytt sua unnyt, suæðer
hie beoð.
 15.97.2. Ðurh ða earan ða word bioð onfangen, & on
ðæm mode hie beoð acennedu ðurh ðæt ondgiet.
 15.97.3. Forðæm heton woroldwise menn wordsawere ðone
æðelan lareow Paulus.
 15.97.4. Se ðonne se ðe ðolað flowednesse his sædes he
bið unclæne gecueden.
 15.97.5. Sua eac se ðe oferspræce bið, he bið nohte ðon
læs mid ðære besmiten.
 15.97.7. Gif he ðonne endebyrdlice his spræce forðbringð,
ðonne mæg he cennan mid ðam ðæt tuder ryhtes geðohtes on ðara
tohlystendra heortan.
 15.97.9. Gif ðonne unwærlice sio lar toflewð ðurh
oferspræce, ðonne bið ðæt sæd unnnyt agoten, næs to nanre
kenninge ðæs cynrenes, ac to unclænnesse & to ungerisnum.
 15.97.11. Be ðam Paulus cuæð, ða he manode his cneoht
ðæt he scolde standan on ðære lare, he cuæð: Ic ðe bebeode
beforan Gode & ðæm hælendum Criste, se ðe demende is cucum &
deadum, & ic ðe beode ðurh his tocyme & ðurh his rice, ðæt
ðu stande on ðissum wordum, & hie lære ægðer ge gedæftlice
ge eac ungedæftlice.
 15.97.16. Ðeah he cuæde ungedæftelice, he cuæð ðeah
ær gedæftelice, forðæm sio ofersmeaung mirð ða unwisan ðe hit
gecnawan ne magon, & gedeð ða spræce unnytte ðæm tohlystendum
ðonne sio ungedæftnes hit ne cann eft gedæftan.
 16.97.20. Hu se lareow sceal bion eallum monnum efnðrowiende
& foreðencende on hiora earfoðum.
 16.97.22. Ac sie se lareow eallum monnum se niehsta & eallum
monnum efnðrowiende on hira gesuincum, & sie he for ealle upaðened mid
ðære godcundan foresceawunge his inngeðances, ðætte ðurh ða
mildheortnesse/ his arfæsðnesse ðæt he tio on hine selfne oðerra
monna scylda, & eac ða heanesse ðære sceawunga his inngeðonces he
hine selfne oferstige mid ðære gewilnunge ðara ungesewenlicra ðinga,
& ðætte hie sua healicra ðinga wilnigende ne forsio his niehstan
untrume & scyldige, ne eft for hiera untrymnesse ne forlæte ðæt he
ne wilnige ðæs hean.
 16.99.6. For ðysum wæs geworden ðætte Paulus, ðeah ðe
he wære gelæded on neorxna wong he arimde ða diogolnesse ðæs
ðriddan hefones, ond suaðeah for ðære sceawungge ðara ungesewenlicra
ðinga ðeah ðe he upaðened wære on his modes scearpnesse, ne forhogde
he ðæt he hit eft gecierde to ðam flæsclican burcotum, &
gestihtode hu men scoldon ðærinne hit macian, ða he cuæð: Hæbbe
ælc monn his wif, & ælc wif hiere ciorl;
 16.99.12. & doo ðæt wif ðæm were ðæt hio him mid
ryhte doon sceal, & he hire sua some, ðylæs hie on unryht hæmen.
 16.99.14. & hwene æfter he cuið: Ne untreowsige ge no eow
betweoxn, buton huru ðæt ge eow gehæbben sume hwile, ærðæmðe
ge eowru gebedu & eowra offrunga doon wiellen, & eft sona cirrað to
eowrum ryhthæmede.
 16.99.17. Loca nu hu se halega wer, se ðe sua fæsðlice
geimpod wæs to ðæm hefenlicum diogolnessum, & suaðeah for
mildheortnesse wæs ðonon gecierred to smeaganne hu flæsclicum monnum
gedafonode on hira burcotum & on hiera beddum to donne;
 16.99.21. & sua suiðe sua he wæs upahæfen to ðæm
ungesewenlicum, he ðeah gehwyrfde his heortan eage, & for mildheortnesse
gebigde his mod to untrumra monna diogolnessum.
 16.99.23. Hefonas he ðurhfor mid his modes sceawunga, &
suaðeah ðone ymbhogan ne forlet ðæs flæsclican beddgemanan;
 16.99.25. Forðæm he wæs gefeged mid ðære lufan Godes
& monna ægðer ge to ðam hiehstum ðingum ge to ðæm
nyðemestum.
 16.101.1. He wæs on himselfum mid ðæs halgan gæstes
mægene suiðe healice upabrogden, & ðeah eorðlicum monnum emnlice
for arfæsðnesse & for niedðearfe wæs geuntrumod.
 16.101.3. Forðæm he cuæð: Hwa bið geuntrumod ðæt
ic ne sie eac geuntrumod;
 16.101.4. Oððe hwa bið gesciended ðæt ic eac ðæs ne
scamige?
 16.101.5. Eft he cuæð be ðæm ilcan: ðonne ic wæs mid
Iudeum ic wæs suelc hie.
 16.101.6. Ne cuæð he ðæt forðyðe he wolde his treowa
& his geleafan forlætan suæ suæ hie, ac he wolde atiewan his
arfæsðnesse, ða he licette hine selfne ðæt he wære ungeleaffull,
ac on ðæm he geleornode hu he scolde oðrum monnum miltsian ðe he
geðohte hu he wolde ðæt mon him miltsode gif he suelc wære.
 16.101.11. & eft he cuæð: ðeah we nu ofer ure mæð
ðencen & smeagean, ðæt we dooð for Gode;
 16.101.12. Ðonne we hit eft gemetlæcað, ðonne doð we
ðæt for eow.
 16.101.13. He ongeat ðæt he oferstag hine selfne on ðære
sceawunge ðære godcundnesse, & eft hine selfne ofdune astiggende he
cuðe gemetgian his hieremonnum.
 16.101.15. Be ðæm eac Iacobus se heahfæder, ða he smirede
ðone stan ðe æt his heafdum læg to tacne ðæt he eft wolde his
irfe ðær geteoðian, for ðære gesihðe ðe he on ðæm swefne
geseah, ða he æt ðæm stane slæpte.
 16.101.18. He geseah ane hlædre standan æt him on eorðan.
 16.101.19. Oðer ende wæs uppe on hefenum, & æt ðæm
uferran ende Dryhten hlinode, & englas stigon up & ofdune on ða
hlædre.
 16.101.21. Forðæm ða godan lareowas upsceawiende no ðæt
an wilniað secean & sceawian ðæt halige heafod ðære halgan
gesomnunge, ðæt is Dryhten, ac wilnað for mildheortnesse ðæt hie
ofdune astigen to his limum.
 16.101.24. Forðæm Moyses oft eode inn & ut on ðæt
templ, forðæm he wæs ðærinne getogen to ðære godcundan
sceawunga, & ðærut he wæs abisgod ymb ðæs folces ðearfe.
 16.103.1. Ðærinne he sceawode on his mode ða diogolnesse
ðære godcundnesse, ond ðonon utbrohte ðæm folce, & cyðde
hwæt hie wyrcean & healdan scoldon.
 16.103.3. & symle ymb ðæt ðe hine ðonne tueode,
ðonne orn he eft innto ðæm temple, & frægn ðæs Dryhten
beforan ðære earce ðe se haligdom on wæs ðæs temples.
 16.103.5. He astealde on ðæm bisene ðæm reccerum ðe nu
siendon.
 16.103.6. Hie sculon, ðonne hie ymb hwæt tueoð ðæs ðe
hie ðærute don sculon, cierran eft to hira agnum inngeðonce, &
ðær God ascian, suæ suæ Moyses dyde beforan ðære earce on
ðæm temple.
 16.103.9. Gif hie ðonne giet ðær tueonað, gongen ðonne
to ðæm halgan gewritum, frine ðara hwæt hie don oððe læran
scylen.
 16.103.11. Forðæm sio Soðfæsðnes self, ðæt is
Krisð, ða he on eorðan wæs, he hine gebæd on muntum & on
dioglum stowum, & on burgum he worhte his wundru, mid ðæm he strewede
ðone weg ðære onhyrenesse ðæm godum lariowum, ðæt hie ne
scolden forhyggean ðone geferscipe ðara synfulra & ðara ungetydra,
ðeh ðe hi selfe wilnien ðæs heahstan.
 16.103.16. Forðæm ðonne sio lufu for mildheortnesse
nieðerastigeð, & hio hie geðied to his niehstena ðearfe, ðonne
hio suiðe wunderlice upastigeð;
 16.103.18. & sua micle sua hio estelicor ofdune astigeð, sua
hio ieðelicor upastigeð;
 16.103.19. Suelce hie sculon hie selfe atiowan, ða ðe oðrum,
fore beoð, ðætte ða ðe him underðiedde sien him dyrren hira
dieglan ðing for scome geandettan.
 16.103.21. Forðæm ðonne ða yða ðara costunga ða
synfullan ðrowiað, ðæt hi mægen iernan & fleon to ðæs
lareowes mode him to ondettunge, suæ suæ cild to his moder greadan, &
ða scylda ðe hie wenað ðæt hie mid besmitene sien, mid his fultume
& geðeahte hie mægen aðwean clænran ðonne hie ær ðære
costunge wæren, mid ðæm tearum ðara gebeda aðwægen.
 16.105.1. Forðæm eac wæs ðæt ðe beforan ðæm
temple stod æren ceac onuppan twelf ærenum oxum, ðætte ða menn
ðe into ðæm temple gan woldon meahten hira honda ðwean on ðæm
mere.
 16.105.4. Se ceac wæs sua micel ðæt he oferhelede ða oxan
ealle, buton ða heafudu totodon ut.
