 16.105.5. Hwæt getacniað ðonne twelf oxan buton ða <foreign>XII</foreign>
apostolas, & siððan ealle ða endebyrdnesse ðara biscopa ðe
ðæræfter fylgeað?
 16.105.7. Bi ðon wæs gecueden on ðære æ: Ne forbinden
ge na ðæm ðyrstendum oxum ðone muð.
 16.105.8. Ðone cwide Paulus geryhte eft to biscepum ðara
openlican weorc we gesioð, ac we nyton hwelc hira inngeðonc bið beforan
ðæm ðearlwisan deman on ðæm dieglan edleanum.
 16.105.11. Ða ðeah ðonne hi niðerastigað to aðweanne
hiera niehstena scylda, ðonne hie him ondettað, hie beoð onlicost suelce
hi beren ðone ceak beforan ðære ciricean dura, sua sua ða oxan dydon
beforan ðæm temple;
 16.105.14. Ðætte sua hwelc sua inweard higige to gangenne on
ða duru ðæs ecean lifes, he ðonne ondette ælce costunge ðe him on
becume ðam mode his scriftes beforan ðæm temple;
 16.105.16. Ond suæ suæ ðara monna honda & fet wæren
aðwægene on ðære ealdan æ on ðæm ceake beforan ðæm
temple, sua ðonne nu we aðwean ures modes honda & ure weorc mid
ðære ondetnesse.
 16.105.19. Oft eac gebyreð ðonne se scrift ongit ðæs
costunga ðe he him ondetteð ðæt eac self bið mid ðæm ilcum
gecostod.
 16.105.21. Hwæt ðæt wæter on ðæm ceake wæs
gedrefed, ðonne ðær micel folc hiera fet & honda on ðwogon.
 16.105.22. Sua bið ðæs sacerdes mod ðonne ðær bið
micel folc on aðwægen hira scylda ðurh his lare.
 16.105.24. Ðonne he underfehð ðæt fenn ðara ðweandra,
him ðyncð suelce he forleose ða smyltnesse his clænnesse.
 16.105.25. Ac nis ðæt na to andrædanne ðæm hirde,
forðæmðe Dryhten hit eall swiðe smealice geðencð, & him
forgiefð ðæt he sua micle ieðelicor bið gefriðod from his agnum
costungum sua he mildheortlicor bið gesuenced mid oðerra monna costungum.
 17.107.5. Hu se reccere sceal bion ðæm weldondum monnum for
eaðmodnesse gefera & wið ðara yfelena unðeawas stræc for
ryhtwislicum andan.
 17.107.8. Se ealdormonn sceal lætan hine selfne gelicne his
hieremonnum: he sceal bion hira gefera for eaðmodnesse ðara ðeah ðe
wel don:he sceal bion wið ðara agyltendra unðeawas upahæfen for
ðæm andan his ryhtwisnesse, & ðætte he on nænegum ðingum
hine beteran ne do ðæm godum;
 17.107.12. & ðeah ðonne he ongiete ða scylda ðara
ðweortiemena, ðonne geðence he ðone ealðordom his onwealdes;
 17.107.13. & eft ongean ða godan & ða wellibbendan
forsio he his ealdordom suæ suiðe ðæt he on allum ðingum ða ðe
him underðiedde sien læte him gelice, & ne wene he nanes ðinges hine
selfne beteran;
 17.107.16. & eft wið ða wiðerweardan ne ondræde he
ðæt he begonge his ryhtwisnesse, suæ suæ ic geman ðæt ic io
sæde on ðære bec ðe Morales Iob hatte.
 17.107.18. Ic cuæð ðæt æghwelc monn wære gelice
oðrum acenned, ac sio ungelicnes hira geearnunga hie tiehð sume behindan
sume, & hira scylda hi ðær gehabbað.
 17.107.20. Hwæt ðonne ða ungelicnesse ðe of hira
unðeawum forðcymeð, se godcunda dom geðencð ðætte ealle men
gelice beon ne magon, ac wile ðæt simle se oðer beo aræred from
ðæm oðrum.
 17.107.23. Forðæm ealle ða ðe fore oðrum bieon sculon ne
sculon hi na sua suiðe ne sua oft geðencean hiera ealderdomes sua hie
sculon geðencean hu gelice hie beoð oðrum monnum on hira gecynde;
 17.109.2. & ne gefeon hie na ðæt hie ofer oðre menn bion
moten sua suiðe sua ðæs ðæt hie oðrum monnum mægen nyttoste
beon.
 17.109.4. Hwæt hit is gesæd ðæt ure ealdan fæderas
wæron ceapes hierdas.
 17.109.5. Ond eac Dryhten cuæð to Noe & to his bearnum:
Weahsað ge & monigfaldiað & gefyllað eorðan, & iower ege
& broga sie ofer ealle eorðan nitenu.
 17.109.7. Ne cuæð he no ofer oðre menn ac ofer nietenu, ða
he wæs forboden ofer menn, ða he wæs aliefed ofer nietenu.
 17.109.8. Se monn is on gecynde betera ðonne dysig nietenu, ac he
ne bið na betera ðonne oðre menn.
 17.109.10. Forðæm hit næs na gecueden ðæt hie ne
scoldon oðre menn ondrædan, ac nietenu.
 17.109.11. Forðæm hit is ungecyndelicu ofermodgung ðæt se
monn wilnige ðæt hine his gelica ondræde, & suaðeah hit is
niedðearf ðæt mon his hlaford ondræde, & se cneoht his magister.
 17.109.14. Forðæm ðonne ða lareowas ongitað ðæt
ða ðe him underðiedde beoð him to hwon God andrædað, ðonne is
ðearf ðæt hie gedon ðæt hi huru him menniscne ege ondræden,
ðæt hie ne durren syngian ða ðe him ne ondrædað ðone godcundan
dom.
 17.109.17. Ne ofermodgiað ða scirmenn na forðy, ðeah hi for
ðyslicum wielnien ðæt hie andrysne sien, forðon hi ne secað na hira
selfra gielp on ðam, ac hioraN hieremonna ryhtwisnesse hie wilniað, &
ðæm hi wilniað ðæt hie andrysne sien ðæm ðe on woh
libbað;
 17.109.21. & ofer ða hi sculon ricsian næs na sua ofer
menn ac sua sua ofer nietenu, forðonðe hie be sumum dæle wildorlice
beoð.
 17.109.23. Hie sculon forðy ofdrædde licgean astreahte oðrum
monnum underðiodde sua sua nietenu.
 17.109.24. For ðiosum ðonne oft gebyreð ðæt se reccere
on his mode wirð upahæfen, & wierð aðunden on ofermetto, ðonne
he sua suiðe oðre oferhlifað ðætte ealle licggeað under his
willan, ond eall ðæt he bebeodeð bið suiðe hraðe gefylled to his
nytte;
 17.111.3. Ond gif hwæt welgedones bið, ðonne cnodað him
ðæt ealle ða ðe him underðiedde bioð mid herenesse;
 17.111.4. & gif he hwæt yfeles deð, ne wiðcuið ðam
nan mann, ac herigað oft sua suiðe sua hie hit lean scoldon;
 17.111.6. & mid ðy wyrð ðæt mod besuicen &
genæt mid ðæra olicunga ðe him underðiedde beoð ðæt he bið
up ofer hine selfne ahæfen on his mode;
 17.111.8. Ond ðonne he bið utane ymbhringed mid ungemetlicre
heringe, he bið innan aidlad ðære ryhtwisnesse, & forgiet hine
selfne ðonne he tolætt, & fægnað ongeagn ðara oðerra word,ond
geliefð ðæt he suelc sie suelce he gehierð ðæt his olicceras
secgað ðæt he sie, næs suelc scuelc his selfes gescadwisnes sceolde
ongietan ðæt he wære.
 17.111.13. Ac forsiehð ða ðe him underðiodde beoð, &
ne mæg ongietan ða ðe him beoð on gecynde & on ðeawum gelice, ac
wenð ðæt he hæbbe hie oferðungne on his lifes gearnunga sua he hi
hæfð oferstigene mid ðam hliete his anwaldes, ond wenð he sua micle ma
wite ðonne oðre menn, sua he gesihð ðæt he mare mæg doon ðonne
oðre menn.
 17.111.18. & ðonne hine selfne sua healice upahefeð on
sumum ðingum, ond suaðeah bið getieged to oðrum monnum mid onlicre
gecynde, ðeah he forsio ðæt he him onlocige.
 17.111.20. Ac sua he wierð self to ðæs onlicnesse ðe
awriten is ðæt he gesio ælce ofermetto, se is kyning ofer eall ða
bearn oferhygde.
 17.111.22. Se wilnode synderlices ealdordomes, & forsieh ða
geferræddene oðerra engla & hira lif, ða he cuæð: Ic wille
wyrcean min setl on norðdæle, & wielle bion gelic ðæm hiehstan,
ond ða wunderlice dome gewearð ðæt he geearnode mid his agne
inngeðonce ðone pytt ðe he on aworpen wearð, ða he hine his agnes
ðonces upahof on sua healicne anwald.
 17.113.2. Butan tweon ðonne se monn oferhyð ðæt he beo
gelic oðrum monnum, ðonne bið he gelic ðæm wiðerweardan &
ðæm aworpnan diofule.
 17.113.5. Sua sua Sawl Israhela kyning ðurh eaðmodnesse he
geearnode ðæt rice, ond for ðæs rices heanesse him weoxon ofermetto.
 17.113.6. For eaðmodnesse he wæs ahæfen ofer oðre menn,
ond fær ofermettum he wæs aworpen.
 17.113.8. Dryhten ðæt gecyðde ða ða he cuæð: ða
ðu ðe selfum ðuhtest unwenlic, ða ic ðe gesette eallum Israhelum to
heafde.
 17.113.10. Æresð him ðuhte selfum ðæt ðæt he
wære suiðe unmedeme, ac siððan he understungen & awreðed wæs
mid ðys hwilendlican onwalde, he ðuhte him selfum suiðe unlytel &
suiðe medeme.
 17.113.12. Forðæm he hine æthof from oðerra monna
geferrædenne, ond hine dyde oðrum monnum sua ungelicne.
 17.113.14. Forðy he ongeat ðæt he ma mehte ðonne ænig
oðer, ða wende he ðæt he eac mara wære.
 17.113.15. Ðæt wæs wunderlicu gemetgung ðætte ða
ða he him selfum wæs lytel geðuht, ða wæs he Gode micel geðuht,
ond ða ða he wæs him selfum micel geðuht, ða wæs he Gode lytel
geðuht.
 17.113.18. Sua oft ðonne ðæt mod aðint on ofermettum for
ðære menige ðæs folces ðe him underðied bið, hit bið gewemmed
mid ðæs anwaldes heanesse.
 17.113.20. Ðone anwald mæg wel reccan se ðe ægðer ge
hine habban cann ge wiðwinnan.
 17.113.21. Wel hine recð se ðe conn wel stræc bion &
ahæfen wið ða unryhtwisan & wið ða scyldgan & wel emn wið
oðre menn, ond he hine na bettran ne deð.
 17.113.24. Ac ðæt mennisce mod bið oft upahafen, ðeah hit
mid nane anwalde ne sie underled;
 17.113.25. Ac hu micle ma wenstu ðæt hit wolde, gif ða
wlenca & se anwald ðær wære to gemenged.
 17.115.1. & ðeah suiðe ryhte stihtað ðone anwald se
ðe geornlice conn ongietan ðæt he of him gadrige ðæt him
stælwierðe sie, & wið ðæt winne ðæt him dereð, &
ongite hine selfne, ond ongiete ðæt he bið self oðrum monnum gelic,
ond ðeah ahebbe hine ofer ða scyldgan mid andan & mid wræce.
 17.115.6. We magon eac fullecor ongietan & tosceadan ða
spræce, gif we sceawiað ða biesene ðæs forman hierdes, ðæt
wæs sanctus Petrus.
 17.115.7. Ðurh Godes giefe he onfeng ðone ealdordom ðære
halgan ciericean, ond ðeah he wiðsoc ðæt hine mon to ungemetlice
weorðode.
 17.115.9. Ða ða Cornelius for eaðmodnesse wel dyde ðæt
he hine astrehte beforan him, he ðeah hine selfne ongeat him gelicne, &
cuæð: Aris, ne do sua;
 17.115.11. Hu, ne iom ic monn sua ilce sua ðu?
 17.115.12. Ac ða ða he ongeat ða scylde on Annanian & on
Saffiram, suiðe hrædlice he oðiewde hu micelne onwald he hæfde ofer
oðre menn, ða he hira lif ðurh ða smeanga ðæs halgan gæstes
ongeat, & hine ða mid his worde geslog, & mid ðy anwalde gecyðde
ðæt he wæs ieldesð ofer ða halgan cirican & strengesð wið
scylda.
 17.115.17. Ðæt rice & ðone anwald he na ne angeat wið
Cornelius, ða ða he hine sua suiðlice weorðian wolde;
 17.115.18. He wolde him ætfæstan his eaðmetto, & mid
ðy he geearnode ðæt he ðuhte ðæt he wære his gelica.
 17.115.20. He cuæð to him ðæt he wære his gelica:
ðær he gecyðde his eaðmodnesse;
 17.115.21. Ond eft on Annaniam & on Saffiram gecyðde his
nið & his onwald mid ðære wræce.
 17.115.22. Ond eft sanctus Paulus ne ongeat he na hine selfne
beteran oðrum godum monnum, ða ða he cuæð: Ne sint we nane waldendas
eowres geleafan.
 17.117.1. Ac sint fultemend eowres gefean, forðamðe ge
stondað on geleafan Suelce he openlice cuæde: We sint emnlice on ðam
ðe we ongietað ðæt ge stondað.
 17.117.2. Eft he spræc suelce he nysse ðæt he a furðor
wære ðonne oðre broðor, ða he cuæð: We sint gewordene suelce
lytlingas betueox eow.
 17.117.4. Ond eft he cuæð: We sint eowre ðeowas for Cristes
lufan.
 17.117.5. Ac ðonne he gemette ða scylde ðe he stieran scolde,
hrædlice he gecyðde ðæt he wæs magister & ealdormonn.
 17.117.6. Ðæt he cyðde ða he cuæð on his epistolan to
Galatum: Hwæðer wille ge ðæt ic cume to eow, ðe mid gierde ðe mid
monnðwære gæste?
 17.117.8. Suelce he cuæde: Hwæðer ic cume ðe mid ege ðe
mid lufe?
 17.117.9. Ðonne bið ðæt rice wel gereht, ðonne se ðe
ðærfore bið suiðor wilnað ðæt he ricsige ofer monna unðeawas
ðonne ofer oðre gode menn.
 17.117.11. Ac ðonne ða ealdermenn ðreageað ða scyldgan,
ðonne is him micel ðearf ðæt hie geornlice geðencen ðætte
ðurh ða lare & ðurh ðone ege ðe hie niede don sculon mid hiera
anwalde gestiran ðara scylda.
 17.117.14. Ond ðeahhwæðre, ðylæs he his eaðmodnesse
forleose, geðence he ðæt he bið self suiðe gelic ðam ilcan monnum
ðe he ðær ðreatað & henð;
 17.117.16. Ond eac we magon suigende geðencean on urum
inngehygde, ðeah we hit ne sprecen, ðæt hie beoð beteran ðonne we,
& ðæs wierðe ðæt we hie furðor don, ðeah we to ðam
gesette sien ðæt we hie ðreagean scylen, & ðurh us scylen bion
hiora scylda gestiered mid cræfte & mid lare.
 17.117.21. Ac eft ðonne we selfe gesyngiað, ne ðreað us nan
monn, ne furðum ane worde ne tælð.
 17.117.22. Forðam we beoð mid Gode sua micle suiðor gebundne
sua we for monnum orsorglicor ungewitnode syngiað buton ælcre wrace.
 17.117.24. Ac ðonne we ure hieremenn lærað &
ðreageað, sua micle ma we hie gefreogað æfter ðam godcundan dome,
sua we her hiera synna wrecað suiðor;
 17.119.1. Ond suaðeah on ðære heortan is a sio eaðmodnes
to healdanne & eac on weorcum to læranne;
 17.119.2. & betuh ðæm twæm is eallenga to geðencenne
ðæt we to ungemetlice ða eaðmodnesse ne healden, ðylæs se anwald
aslacie ðæs recendomes, ond ðæt we ure hieremenn sua gearige sua we
hie eft geegesian mæge.
 17.119.6. Ðone ealdordom & ðæt riceter ðe se reccere
for monigra monna ðearfe underfehð he hine sceal eowian utan, & he
sceal healdan his eaðmodnesse innan.
 17.119.8. Eahtige he hine selfne on his inngeðonce suelcne
suelcne he ondrætt ðæt he sie.
 17.119.9. Ond ðeah hit on sumum ðingum getacnad sie ðæt he
hwelc gerisenlic wundor wyrcean mæge, gedo he ðeah ðæt his hieremenn
ongieten ðæt he sie eaðmod on his inngeðonce, ðæt hi mægen
ðæm onhyrigean, ond on his ealdorlicnesse hie ongieten ðæt hie him
mægen ondrædan.
 17.119.13. Ða ðe ofer oðre bioð giemen hie geornlice
ðætte sua micle sua hira onwald bið mara gesewen ofer oðre menn
ðæt hie sua micle ma sien innan geðryccede mid eaðmodnesse, ðylæs
ðæt geðoht hine ofersuiðe & on lustfulnesse his mod geteo hwelces
unðeawes, ðæt he hit mæge ðonne to his willan gewealdan,
forðæmðe he him ær to unðeawum his agenne willan underðeodde,
& him geðafade ðæt hit mid anwalde him moste oferricsian, ðætte
ðæt ofsetene mod mid ðære lustfulnesse his anwaldes ne sie getogen to
upahafenesse.
 17.119.21. Bi ðam wæs suiðe ryhte gecueden ðurh sumne
wisne monn, he cuæð to ðæm oðrum: To ealdormenn ðu eart gesett,
ne beo ðu ðeah to upahafen, ac bio suelce an ðinra hieremonna.
 17.119.24. Ond eft be ðam ilcan cuæð sanctus Petrus: Ne sint
we nane waldendas ðisses folces, ac we sint to bisene gesette urre heorde.
 17.119.25. Beðæm ilcan eft sio Soðfæsðness, ðæt is
Crist, ðurh hine selfne cuæð, ða he us speon to ðæm hiehstan
geearnungum, he cuæð: Wite ge ðætte ðioda kyningas bioð ðæs
folces waldendas, ond ða ðe ðone anwald begað hi beoð hlafordas
gehatene;
 17.121.4. Ne sie hit ðonne na sua betweoxn eow, ac sua hwelc sua
wille betweoxn eow fyrmest beon, se sceal beon eower ðegn, ond sua hwelc sua
wille betweoxn eow mæst beon, sie se eower ðeow.
 17.121.7. Sua sua monnes sunu, cuæð Crist be him selfum, ne
com he na to ðam on eorðan ðæt him mon ðenade, ac ðæt he wolde
ðenian.
 17.121.9. For ðeosun illcan is eac gesæd on ðæm godspelle
hwelc wite scolde ðrowian se upahafena ðegn æfter ðam anfangnan rice;
 17.121.11. He cuæð ðonne: Se yfela ðeow cuið on his
mode: Hit bið long hwonne se hlaford cume;
 17.121.12. Ic mæg slean & ierman mine heafodgemæccan.
 17.121.13. Itt him ðonne & drincð mid ðam druncenwillum
monnum, ond læt his hlafordes gebod to giemelieste.
 17.121.14. Ðonne cymð his hlaford on ðæm dæge ðe he
ne wenð, ond on ða tiid ðæt he hine ær nat;
 17.121.16. Hæfð hine ðonne siððan for ænne
licettere.
 17.121.16. & suiðe ryht deð for ðære licettunge ðe
he licette ðæt he wolde habban ða ðenunga ðeawas & ðeodscipe
to læranne;
 17.121.18. Ond ða he ðæt hæfde, ða wolde he hit habban
him to agnum anwalde, ond dyde him ðæt riceter to sida & to gewunan.
 17.121.20. Ond suaðeah oft agyltað ða ealdormenn efnsuiðe
on ðam ðe he bið to eaðmod ðam yflan mannan, ond læt hine him to
gelicne, & licett wið hie ma to geferrædenne ðonne toealdordome.
 17.121.23. Suiðe ryhte se bið geteald to ðæm liceterum se
ðe on lareowes onlicnesse ða ðenenga ðæs ealdordomes gecierð to
hlaforddome, & gemacað ðæt his ege & his onwald wierð to
gewunan & to landsida on his scire.
 17.123.1. Ond ðeah hwilum giet suiðor hie syngiað on ðam
ðe hie healdað ma geferrædenne & efnlicnesse ðonne ealdordom wið
ða yfelan & ða unryhtwisan.
 17.123.3. Sua Heli se sacerd dyde.
 17.123.3. He wæs mid leasre mildheortnesse ofersuiðed ðæt
he nolde witnian his agne suna ða hie agylton, ac beforan ðam ðearlwisan
Deman he ofslog ægðer ge ða suna ge hine selfne midðamðe he
geðafade ða scylde unwitnode.
 17.123.7. Hit wæs onlicost suelce sio godcunde stemn to him
cuæde: ðu weorðasð ðine suna ma ðonne me.
 17.123.8. Ond eft ðurh ðone witgan wæs gecid hierdum, ða
he cuæð: ðæt sceap ðæt ðær sceoncforad wæs ne spilcte ge
ðæt, ond ðæt ðær forloren wæs ne sohte ge ðæt, ne ham ne
brohtan.
 17.123.11. Se bringð ham ðone forlorenan se ðe mid
geornfulnesse ðære hierdelican giemenne ðone ðe afielð on synne eft
gehwyrfð & aræð ðæt he stent on ryhtwisnesse.
 17.123.13. Hwæt se foreda sconca bið gewriðen mid ðæm
bende, sua beoð ða synna mid ðam lareowdome gebundne.
 17.123.15. Sua sua sio wund wile toberan, gif hio ne bið
gewriðen mid wræde, sua willað ða synna weaxænde toflowan, gif hie
ne beoð gebundne hwilum mid stræclice lareowdome.
 17.123.17. Ond suaðeah oft sio wund bið ðæs ðe wierse
& ðy mare, gif hio bið unwærlice gewriðen, & him bið
ðæt sar ðe gefredre, gif sio wund bið to ungemetlice fæste
gewriðen.
 17.123.20. Sua is eac ðearf ðæt se lareow, se bið saule
læce, ðara synna wunde stirende gemetlice gewriðe on his hieremonnumm,
ond ðeah sua geornlice begaa ða ryhtwisnesse ðæs lareowdomes wið
ða gyltendan ðæt he ne forlæte his mildheortnesse.
 17.123.23. Ond eac him is to giemenne ðæt he ætiewe his
hieremonnum ðæt he sie hiera fæder & reccere on lare, & hiera
modur on mildheortnesse, ðæt he huru ne sie to stræc on ðære lare,
ne to slæc on ðære mildheortnesse.
 17.125.2. Sua sua we io cuædon on ðeawa bocum be Iobe ðæt
ægðer wære unnyt ge mildheortnes ge steor, gif hie anlipe wæron,
buton hi butu ætsomne sien.
 17.125.4. Forðæm scel bion on ðæm reccere ðæt he sie
ryhtlice & mildheortlice rædende his hieremonnum & mildheortlice
witniende.
 17.125.6. For ðioson ilcan wæs ðætte sio Soðfæstnes
self cuæð, ðæt is Crist, ða he lærde ðurh ða tielunga
ðæs Samaritaniscan ymb ðone gewundedan, ðe mon lædde helfcuicne to
ðæm giesðhuse, & bæd ðæt mon scolde ægðer ge win ge ele
giotan on his wunde.
 17.125.9. Witodlice ðæt win slit ða wunde, & se ele hie
gesmeð & gehælð.
 17.125.10. Ðis is ðearf ðæt se ðe wunde lacnigean wille
giote win on, ðæt sio reðnes ðæs wines ða forrotedan wunde suge
& clænsige, & eft ele, ðæt se hie lieðe & gehæle.
 17.125.12. Sua eac ðam lareowe is to monianne ða lieðnesse
wið ða reðnesse, & of ðam gemonnge wyrce gemetunge, ðæt he mid
ungemetlicre grimsunge his hieremonna wunda to suiðe ne slite ne ne ice, ne
eft for ungemetlicre mildheortnesse he hie ne læte unwriðena.
 17.125.16. Suiðe wel ymb ðæt tacnað sio earc on ðære
ealdan æ.
 17.125.17. On ðære wæron ða stænenan bredu ðe sio
æ wæs on awriten mid tien bebodum, & wac sio gierd mid ðæm
bredum, & eac se sweta mete ðe hie heton monna, se him cuom of hefonum.
 17.125.20. Sua eac, gif ðara haligra gewrita &git bið on
ðam breostum ðæs godan recceres, ðonne sceal ðær bion gierd.
 17.125.22. Ðæt is ðæt he ðreage his hiremenn.
 17.125.22. & eac sceal bion on ðæm breostum ðæs
monnan suetnes.
 17.125.23. Ðæt is ðæt he him sie lieðe.
 17.125.23. Be ðiosum illcan cuæð Dauið to Gode: ðin
gierd & ðin stæf me afrefredon.
 17.125.25. Mid gierde mon bið geswungen, & mid stæfe he
bið awreðed.
 17.127.1. Gif ðær ðonne sie gierd mid to ðreageanne, sie
ðær eac stæf mid to wreðianne: sie ðær eac lufu, næs ðeah
to hnesce;
 17.127.2. Sie ðær eac reðnes, næs ðeah to stið;
 17.127.3. Sie ðær eac onda, næs ðeah to ungemetlice
grim;
 17.127.4. Sie ðær eac arfæsðnes, næs ðeah
wandigendre ðonne hit gedafenlic sie;
 17.127.5. Ðætte ðonne sio ryhtwisnes & sio mildheortnes
hi gegadrige on ðæm anwalde ðæs recceres, & ðæt mod his
hieremonna oliccende egesige & ðreatigende olicce.
 18.127.8. Hu se lareow ne sceal ða inneran giemenne gewanian for
ðære uterran abisgunge, ne eft ða uterran ne forlæte he for ðære
inneran.
 18.127.11. Ne forlæte se reccere ða inneran giemenne ðæs
godcundan ðiowdomes for ðære abisgunge ðara uterra weorca, ne eac ne
gewanige he na ðone ymbhogan ðære innera scire for ðære abisgunge
ðære uterran;
 18.127.14. Ðylæs he sie gehæft mid ðam uterran, oððe
eft mid ðam inneran anum abisegad, ðæt he ne mæge ðurhteon his
niehstum ðæt he him utan don scolde.
 18.127.16. Monige ðeah nyllað na geðencean ðæt hi beoð
oðrum broðrum ofergesett, & him fore bion scoldon on godcundum
ðingum;
 18.127.18. Ac mid ealre heortan geornfulnesse begongað ða
woroldcundan giemenne, & fægniað ðæs ðæt hie ða habbað
to begongenne;
 18.127.20. & ðonne, ðonne hie hie ne habbað, dæges
& niehtes hie fundiað to bigietenne, & beoð suiðe gedrefede on
hira mode forðamðe him ðonne wona bið ðæs ðe hie habban woldon.
 18.127.22. Ac ðonne him eft gelimpð ðæt hi æmtige
beoð ðære scire, ðonne bioð hie suiður on hira mode gesuenced for
ðæm æmtan;
 18.127.24. Forðæm ðæt wære his willa ðæt he moste
ymb swincan, ond ðyncð him gesuinc ðæt he bið butan
woroldgesuincium.
 18.129.2. & sua hit gebyreð, ðonne he fægnað ðæt
he sie abisgod mid woroldðingum, ðæt he ne conn oðre læran ða
godcundan wisan ðe he læran scolde.
 18.129.4. Forðon aðreat ða hieremenn ryhtes lifes, ðonne
hie wilniað gæstlice libban, be ðæm yfelum bisenum ðe se deð ðe
him fore beon sceolde.
 18.129.6. Ðonne ætspornað hie, & weorðað mid
ðæm ascrencte.
 18.129.7. Sua eac ðær ðæt heafod bið unhal eall ða
limu bioð idelu, ðeah hie hale sien, sua eac bið se here eal idel,
ðonne he on oðer folc winnan sceal, gif se heretoga dwolað;
 18.129.9. Sua eac ðonne se biscep begæð ða ðeninga ðe
eorðlice deman sceoldon, ðonne ne tyht nan mon his hieremonna mod ne ne
bilt to gæstlicum weorcum, ne nan mon hiera scylda ne ðreað, ac se
hierde bið idel ðe scolde ðære heorde gieman.
 18.129.13. Forðy ne magon ða hieremenn begietan ðæt leoht
ðære soðfæstnesse, forðæm ðonne sio giornfulnes eorðlicra
ðinga abisgað ðæt &git, & ablent ðæs modes eagan mid
ðære costunga ðæm folce, sua sua dust deð ðæs lichoman eagan
on sumra mid ðodene.
 18.129.17. Forðæm suiðe ryhtlice se Aliesend monna cynnes,
ða he us stierde urra womba oferfylle, he cuæð: Behealdað eow ðæt
ge ne gehefegien eowre heortan mid oferæte & oferdrynce & mid
monigfaldre gieminge ðisse worolde.
 18.129.20. & eac he geicte ðærto ege, ða he cuæð:
ðylæs eow hrædlice on becume se færlica domes dæg.
 18.129.21. Ðæs dæges tocyme hwelc he beo he cyðde, ða
he cuæð: He cymð sua sua grin ofer ealle ða ðe eardiað ofer
eorðan.
 18.129.23. Ond eft he cuæð: Ne mæg nan mon twam hlafordum
hieran.
 18.129.24. Ond eac cuæð Paulus, ða ða he wolde arwierðra
monna mod from ðisses middangeardes geferrædenne ateon, suiðe suiðe he
him wiðbræd, ða he cuæð: Ne scyle nan Godes ðeow hine selfne to
ungemetlice bindan on woruldscipum, ðylæs he mislicige ðæm ðe he
ær hine selfne gesealde.
 18.131.3. Ða ða he lærde ðæt ðære ciricean
ðegnas scoldon stilnesse ðære ðenunga habban, ða lærde he hi eac
hu hie hie geæmettian scoldon oðerra weorca;
 18.131.5. He cuæð: Gif ge ymb woroldcunde domas beon scylen,
ðonne nime ge ða ðe on ðæm hirede unweorðuste sien, & settað
ða to domerum, ðæt hie strienen & stihtien ymb ða eorðlican
ðing, ða ðe ne beoð sua suiðe geweorðode mid ðæm gæstlicum
giefum.
 18.131.9. Suelce he openlice cuæde: Gedoð ðæt hie sien on
ðæm oðrum nytte, gif hie on ðæm oðrum ne cunnen.
 18.131.11. Be ðæm eac Moyses, se ðe wæs Gode sua weorð
ðæt he oft wið hine selfne spræc, æt sume cierre Githro his sueor,
ðeah he hæðen & elðiodig wære, hine tælde & sæde
ðæt he on dyslicum gesuincum wære mid ðæs folces eorðlican
ðeowote, ac lærde hine ðæt he gesette oðre for hine to demenne
betweox ðæm folce ymbe hira geflita, ðæt he wære ðæs ðe
freorra to ongietanne ða dieglan & ða gæstlican ðing, ðæt he
meahte ðæt folc ðy wislicor & ðy rædlicor læran;
 18.131.18. Forðæm ða hlafordas & ða recceras scoldon
ðencean ymb ðæt helicuste, & ða underðioddan scoldon don
ðæt unweorðlicre.
 18.131.20. Ða recceras sceolon bion beforan ðæm folce sua
sua monnes eage beforan his lichoman, his weg & his stæpas to
sceawianne.
 18.131.22. Ðonne is ðearf ðæt ðæt dust ðisse
eorðlican giemenne ne aðisðrige ðæt eage ðæs recceres,
forðæm ealle ða ðe ofer oðre bioð, bioð heafda ðara ðe
ðærunder bioð, & ðæt heafod sceal wisian ðæm fotum,
ðæt hie stæppen on ryhtne weg: ufone sceal ðæt heafod giman
ðæt ða fet ne asliden on ðæm færelte, forðæm, gif ða fet
weorðað ascrencte, eal se lichoma wierð gebiged, & ðæt heafod
gecymð on ðære eorðan.
 18.133.3. Hu gerades mæg ðonne se biscep brucan ðære
hirdelican are, gif he self drohtað on ðam eorðlicum tielongum ðe he
oðrum monnum lean sceolde?
 18.133.5. Forðæm ryhtan edleane Dryhten ðreade ðurh ðone
witgan, ða he cuæð: Suelc ðæt folc bið, suelc bið se sacerd.
 18.133.7. Ðonne bið se sacerd suelc suelc ðæt folc bið,
ðonne he ðæt ilce deð ðæt hie doð, & his on ða ilcan
wisan tielað ðe hie doð.
 18.133.8. Ðæt ongeat Heremias se witga, ða ða he suiðe
sarlice weop, & spræc suelce ðæt templ wære eal toworpen;
 18.133.10. He cuæð: Eala, hwy is ðis gold adeorcad?
 18.133.11. & ðæt æðeleste hiew hwy wearð hit
onhworfen?
 18.133.11. Toworpne sint ða stanas ðæs temples, &
licggeað æt ælcre stræte ende.
 18.133.12. Huæt tacnað ðonne ðæt gold ðe is sua
diorwyrðe ofer eall ondweorc, buton ða heanesse ðæs haligdomes?
 18.133.14. Oððe hwæt getacnað ðæt æðele hiew
buton ða arwyrðnes ðære æfesðnesse, ðe eallum monnum is to
lufigenne?
 18.133.16. Hwæt getacniað eac ða stanas ðæs halgan
huses buton ðone had ðære halgan endebyrdnesse?
 18.133.17. Hwæt getacnað eac sio rume stræt butan ðone
widan weg ðisses andwerdan lifes?
 18.133.18. Be ðam ruman wege sio Soðfæsðnes, ðæt is
Crist, ðurh hine selfne he cuæð: ðæt is suiðe rum weg &
widgille ðe læt to færwyrde.
 18.133.20. Ac ðonne bið ðæt gold asueartod, ðonne sio
halignes monnes lifes bið mid eorðlicum weorcum gewemmed.
 18.133.22. Ond ðonne bið ðæt æðeleste hiw onhworfen,
ðonne se æht ðara godra weorca, ðe he ær beeode, bið gewanod,
forðæmðe menn ær wendon ðæt he æfæsðlice drohtode.
 18.133.24. Ac ðonne hwelc æfter halgum hade hine selfne
fæstlice geimpað on eorðlicum weorcum, ðonne bið hit suelc ðæt
fægere hiw ðæs goldes sie onhworfen, & hit sie ablacod &
forsewen for monna eagum.
 18.135.2. & ða giemmas ðara halignessa licggeað toworpne
æfter stræta endum.
 18.135.4. Ðonne licggeað ða giemmas toworpne æfter
strætum, ðonne ða menn ðe hie selfe to ðære ciricean wlite
æmtegian sceoldon on ðæm dieglum ðenungum ðæs temples, ðonne
hie ute wilniað ðara rumena wega ðisse worulde.
 18.135.7. Soðlice ða gimmas ðara halignessa to ðæm
wæron gemacod ðæt hi scoldon scinan on ðæs hiehstan sacerdes
hrægle betwux ðam halegestan halignessum.
 18.135.9. Ac ðonne ða sacerdas to æfæsðnessum &
weorðunga ures Aliesendes ne bædað ða ðe him underðiedde bioð
mid hira lifes geearnungum, ðonne ne beoð hira ðære halegestan
halignesse gimmas on ðæm gerenum ðæs biscepes gierelan, ac licggeað
toworpne æfter strætum, ðonne ða hadas ðære halgan endebyrdnesse
beoð forgiefene ðæm widgillan wegum hiera agenra lusta, & beoð
getigede to eorðlicum tielengum.
 18.135.15. Eac is to witanne ðæt he ne cuæð na ðæt
ða giemmas wæren forsceadne æfter ðæm strætum, ac æt ðara
stræta endum;
 18.135.17. Forðæm ðeah hie woroldcundlice drohtigen, hie
wiliniað ðæt hie ðyncen ða betstan, ond ðeah hie gan on ðone
ruman weg hiera agnes willan & lustfulnesse, hie wilniað ðæt hie mon
hæbbe for ða betstan & ða halgestan.
 18.135.20. & suaðeah hwilum sint to geðafianne for
niedðearfe ðas eorðlican tielunga, & næfre ðeah to suiðe ne
lufige, ðylæs hie gehefegien ðæs monnes mod ðe hi to suiðe
lufað, ðæt he for ðære byrðenne gehefegad & ofersuiðed, ne
sie besenced of ðæm ymestun to ðæm nioðemestum.
 18.135.24. Ond suaðeah monige underfoð heorde, & ðeah
wilniað ðæt hie beon freo & æmtige synderlice him selfum to
gæstlicum weorcum, & noldon beon abisgode nane wuht on eorðlicum
ðingum.
 18.137.1. Ða ðonne hie eallinga agiemeleasiað ðone ymbhogan
woruldcundra ðinga, ðonne ne gefultumað he nawuht to his hieremonna
niedðearfe.
 18.137.3. Forðæm wyrð oft forsewen ðara monna lar, ðonne
hie tælað & hatigað hiera hieramonna unðeawas, & ne dooð him
nan oðer god ðisse weorolde;
 18.137.5. Forðæm ðæt word ðære lare ne mæg
ðurhfaran ðæs wædlan heortan, gif he næfð ða are ðe he on
beon mæge.
 18.137.7. Ac ðonne grewð ðæt sæd suiðe wel ðara
worda, ðonne sio mildheortnes ðæs lareowes geðwænð & gelecð
ða breost ðæs gehierendes.
 18.137.9. Forðæm is niedðearf ðæm reccere ðæt he
mæge & cunne oðerra monna inngeðonc giendgeotan & gewæterian,
& hie eac on hiera niedðearfum utane besio.
 18.137.11. Sua sculon ða hierdas weallan ymb ða geornfulnesse
ðære inneran ðearfe his hieremonna, ðæt he ne forlæte ða
giemenne hira uterran ðearfe.
 18.137.13. Niede sceal bion gebrocen ðæt mod ðara
hieremonna, gif se lareow & se hierde agiemeleasað ðæt he hiera utan
ne helpe.
 18.137.15. Be ðæm se forma hierde sanctus Petrus geornfullice
monode, & cuæð: Ic, eower emnðeowa & Cristes ðrowunge gewita,
ic eow healsige ðæt ge feden Godes heorde ðe under eow is.
 18.137.18. Suiðe hræðe æfter ðon he gecyðde
hwæðer he mænde, ðe ðæs modes foster ðe ðæs lichoman,
ða he cuæð: Ungeniedde, mid eowrum agenum willan, ge sculon ðencean
for eowre heorde Godes ðonces, nals na for fraceðlecum gestreonum.
 18.137.21. Mid ðæm wordum fullice he us warode & lærde
ðætte ðonne hie gefylden & gebeten ða wædle hiera hieremonna,
hie ne wurdon self ofslægene mid ðam sueorde ðære gitsunge,
ðætte ðonne hira niehstan ðurh hie beoð gereorde & gearode
ðæt hie selfe ne fæsten ðæs hlafes ryhtwisnesse.
 18.137.25. Ðas ilcan geornfulnesse ðara hierda sanctus Paulus
aweahte, ða he cuæð: Se ðe ne gimð ðara ðe his beoð, &
huru Godes ðeowa, he wiðsæcð Godes geleafan, & he bið
treowleas.
 18.139.3. & suaðeah betuoxn ðissum simle is to
ondrædenne & geornlice to behealdenne, ðonne hie ða uterran ðing
don sculon, ðæt hie ne sien ðæm innecundan ingeðonce afierrede;
 18.139.5. Forðæm oft ða heortan ðara reccera, sua sua we
ær cuædon, ðonne hie mid ðissum hwilendlicum ðingum hie selfe
abisegiað, & ðæm unwærlice ðiowiað, hi ðonne lætað
acolian ða innecundan lufan, & ne ondrædað him na ðæt hie
forgieten ðæt hie underfengon ðone recedom monna saula.
 18.139.9. Ac hit is ðearf ðætte sio giemen, ðe hie hira
hiremonnum utan don scylen, sie wel gemetgod.
 18.139.11. Be ðæm suiðe wel wæs gecueden to Ezechiele
ðæm witgan ðætte ða sacerdas ne scoldon no hiera heafdu scieran mid
scierseaxum, ne eft hi ne scoldon hira loccas lætan weaxan, ac hie scoldon
hie efsigean mid scearum.
 18.139.14. Suiðe ryhte ða sacerdas sint gehatene sacerdas,
ðæt is on Englisc clænseras, forðæm hie sculon latteowdom gearwian
ðæm geleaffullum & him sculon fore beon.
 18.139.16. Ðæt feax ðonne on hira heafde getacnað ða
uterran geðohtas, ðæt grewð & scinð ofer ðæm brægene,
& his mon ðeah ne gefred;
 18.139.18. Ða giemen ðises andweardan lifes ðæt
getacnað.
 18.139.19. Sua giemeleaslice oft sceacað ure geðohtas from us,
ðæt we his furðum ne gefredað, ðon ma ðe mon his feax mæg
gefredan butan ðam felle, forðæm we oft ymb ungedafenlice wisan
smeageað.
 18.139.22. Ond suaðeah ealle ða ðe for oðrum beon sculon,
sculon habban giemenne ðissa uterrena ðinga, ond ðeah ne sien hi to
fæste to gebundene.
 18.139.24. Suiðe ryhte wæs ðæm sacerde forboden ðæt
he his heafod sceare, & eac ðæt he his feax lete weaxan;
 18.139.26. Ðæt is ðæt he ealle ða geðohtas of his
mode ne aceorfe ðe he scyle his hieremonnum to nytte habban, ne eft he ne
læte forweahsan to suiðe to unnytte & to unryhte.
 18.141.2. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecueden ðæt se
efsigenda efsode his heafod, ðæt is ðæt he sua geornfullice sie ymb
ða giemenne ðissa hwilendlicra ðinga sua sua hit niedðearf sie, ond
ðeah sua sua he mæge hie iðelice butan sare ofaceorfan ðæt hie to
ungemetlice ne forweaxen;
 18.141.6. Ðylæs, ðonne ðæt lif ðæs lichoman bið
gescilðed, ðæt innegeðonc sie gebunden to ðære heortan for
ðære ungemetgunge ðæs ymbehogan ðara uterra ðinga;
 18.141.8. Sua sindon ða loccas to sparienne ðæm sacerde
ðæt hi ða hyde behelien, & ðeah ðæt he hie forceorfe ær,
ær hie on ða eagan feallen.
 19.141.11. Ðætte se reccere his godan weorc for gielpe anum ne
do, ac ma for Godes lufan.
 19.141.13. Betueox ðissum is micel ðearf ðæt se reccere
geornlice wacige & ðence ðæt hine ne cnysse sio wilnung ðæt he
scyle monnum licigean;
 19.141.15. Forðam, ðonne he geornlice ongiett ða inneran
& ða gæstlican ðing on his ingeðonce, & suiðe wel giemeð
ðara uterra ðinga, ðæt he ðonne ma ne wilnige ðæt he self
licige his hieremonnum ðonne Gode;
 19.141.17. Ðylæs ðonne he mid godum weorcum bið
underwreðed, & from woruldmonnum ongiten suelce he sie ælðiedig on
ðiosum middangearde, ðæt he ðonne for ðære wilnunga his agnes
gielpes & heringe ne weorðe ælðiodig from Gode.
 19.141.21. Se bið eallinga Godes gewinna se se ðe wilnað
ðæt he hæbbe ða weorðunga for his godan weorcum ðe God habban
sceolde æt ðæm folce.
 19.143.1. Hwæt we genoh georne witon ðæt se esne ðe
ærendað his woroldhlaforde wifes, ðæt he bið diernes gelires
scyldig wið God, & wið his hlaford eallenga forworht, gif he wilnað
ðæt hio hine lufige, & he hire licige bet ðonne se ðe hine &
ðæt feoh ðider sende.
 19.143.4. Ac ðonne ðæt selflice gegriepð ðæt mod
ðæs recceres, & he wilnað ungemetlice licigean, ðonne beræst he
oft on ungemetlice cueminge, & bið hwilum to ungemetlice smeðe, hwilum
to ungemetlice reðe.
 19.143.8. Ðonne bið ðæt mod awacod ðæs recceres,
ðonne he gesihð ðæt his hieremen agyltað, & he nyle hie arasian,
ðylæs hira lufu aslacige, & he him ðe wirs licige.
 19.143.10. Ac ðone gedwolan his hieremonna ðe he stieran
sceolde he oft to suiðe geðafað, ðonne he ne dear hie ðreagean for
ðære olicunge.
 19.143.12. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecueden ðurh ðone
witgan: Wa ðæm ðe willað under ælcne elnbogan lecggean pyle &
bolster under ælcne hneccan menn mid to gefonne.
 19.143.14. Se legeð pyle under ælces monnes elnbogan, se ðe
mid liðum oliccungum wile læcnian ða men ðe sigað on ðisses
middangeardes lufan, oððæt hie afeallað of hiera ryhtwisnessum.
 19.143.17. Ðonne bið se elnboga underled mid pyle & se
hnecca mid bolstre, ðonne ðæm synfullan menn bið oftogen ðæt hine
mon stiðlice arasige.
 19.143.19. Ðonne hine mon ne cnysð mid nanre reðnesse ne
nanre wiðercueðnisse, ðonne geðafað him mon on ðære hnescean
olecunge ðæt he hine suiðe softe resð on his agnum gedwolan.
 19.143.22. Ac ða recceras ðe hira agnes gilpes giernað,
ðæm hie geðafigað ðyllic ðe hie ondrædað ðæt him derian
mæge æt ðæm gielpe, & him oftion mæge ðisses eorðlican
weorðscipes.
 19.143.24. Ac ða ðe hi wenað ðæt him nan wuht laðes ne
wiðerweardes don ne mæge, ða hie suiðe stiðlice arasigeað, &
mid ealle ofðrysceað;
 19.145.1. Ond hie næfre bilwitlice willað monigean, ac hie
ofergietað ðære hirdelican lufan, & egesiað hie &
ðreatigeað mid onwalde sua sua hlafordas.
 19.145.3. Ðas ðonne wæron ðurh ðone witgan suiðe
ryhtlice geðreade mid ðære godcundan stefne, ða he cuæð: Ge budon
suiðe riclice & suiðe agendlice.
 19.145.5. Ðæt is be ðæm ðe ma lufigeað hie selfe
& hiera agenne weorðscipe ðonne hiera Hlafurdes.
 19.145.7. Hie ðonne ahebbað hie ofer hiera hieremenn, &
ðenceað a hwæt hie don mægen, & ne ðenceað no hwæt hie don
scoldon, & ne ondrædað ðone dom ðe ðæræfter fylgð;
 19.145.9. Ac suiðe scamleaslice gielpað ðisses hwilendlican
onwaldes, & licað him ðæt hie ðæt unaliefede doð aliefedlice,
& hiera hieremonna him nan ne wiðcuið.
 19.145.11. Se ðonne ðe wilnað woh to donne, & wilnað
ðeah ðæt ðæs oðre menn sugigen, he ðonne bið him selfum
gewuta ðæt he wilnað ma ðæt hine mon lufige ðonne ryhtwisnesse.
 19.145.14. Forðæm nan man nis ðe eallunga sua libban mæge
ðæt he hwilum ne agylte.
 19.145.15. Se ðonne wilnað suiður ðæt mon lufige
soðfæsðnesse ðonne hine selfne, se ðe wilnað ðæt mon nanre
ryhtwisnesse fore him ne wandige.
 19.145.17. For ðiosum ðingum sanctus Petrus anfeng suiðe
lustlice Paules tælinge.
 19.145.18. Ond eft Dauið se kyning anfeng suiðe eaðmodlice
his agnes ðegnes cease, ðæt wæs Nathan se witga.
 19.145.20. Forðæm eac ða godan recceras, ðonne hie ne
recceað hwæðer mon hie selfe synderlice & ungemetlice lufige, hie
wenað, ðeah hira hieremenn hie mid ryhte heregen for hiera agnum gewyrhtum,
ðæt hie ðæt don for lufan & for eaðmodnesse, nals for his
geearnungum.
 19.145.24. Ðonne is suiðe micel ðearf ðæt we mid micle
cræfte betueox ðissum gemetgien ða gemetgunge ðæs reccedomes,
ðætte ðonne ðæt mod ðara underðiedra hwæthwugu ryhtlices
ongitan mæg, ðæt hit ðonne sua bald sie for his freodome ðæt hit
ne gewende on selflice & on ofermetto, ðonne his hlaford him to
ungemetlicne anwald forgiefð his spræcce, ðæt he ðonne forðæm
ne forgiete ne ne forlæte his eaðmodnesse.
 19.147.5. Ond ðeah wel gedafonað ðætte ða godan recceras
wilnigen ðæt hie monnum licigen, forðæm ðætte ðurh ða
licunga hi mægen gedon ðætte hiera Dryhten licige ðæm folce, &
hie mægen geteon ðurh ða eahtunge ðe hie mon eahtige hira niehstan to
ðære soðfæsðnesse lufan;
 19.147.9. Nalles forðæm anum ðe hie wilnigen ðæt hi mon
synderlice lufige, ac swelce sio hira lufu si sum weg ðurh ðone hie
mægen lædan ða heortan ðe hie gehiran willað to ðære lufan
ures Scippendes.
 19.147.12. Ac hit is ðeah suiðe earfeðdæde ðæt mon
lustlice ðone lareow gehieran wille ðe mon ne lufað.
 19.147.13. Forðon se ðe for oðre beon sceal, he sceal tilian
ðæt he licige, forðæm ðæt he mæge beon gehiered.
 19.147.15. & ðeah ða his lufe ne sece he no for him selfum,
ðylæs he sie ongieten ðæt he sie wiðerwinna on ðære
diegelnesse his geðohtes, ðæs ðe he bið gesewen ðeow on his
ðenunge.
 19.147.17. Ðæt suiðe wel sanctus Paulus geopenude, ða he
us cyðde ða degolnesse his geornfulnesse, & cuæð: Sua sua ic
wilnige on eallum ðingum ðæt ic monnum cueme & licige.
 19.147.20. & suaðeah eft sona be cuæð: Gif ic monnum
cueme & licige, ðonne ne beo ic no Godes ðeow.
 19.147.21. Hwæt ðonne Paulus ægðer ge licode ge ne
licode;
 19.147.22. Forðæmðe on ðæm ðe he wilnode licigean,
nals no he, ðeahðe he cuæde, ac ðurh hine he wilnode ðæt sio
soðfæstnes monnum licode.
 20.149.1. Ðætte se reccere sceal geornlice wietan ðætte
oft ða unðeawas leogað, & licettað ðæt hi sien gode ðeawas.
 20.149.3. Eac sceal se reccere witan ðæt ða unðeawas
beoð oft geliccette to godum ðeawum & to mægenum ðurh leasunga.
 20.149.4. Monig mon deð micel fæsten, & hæfð ðone
hlisan ðæt he hit do for forhæfdnesse, & deð hit ðeah for
hneawnesse & for feohgitsunge.
 20.149.6. Monig bið agieta his goda & wilnað mid ðy
geearnigan ðone hlisan ðæt he sie rumgiful, & wenað menn ðæt
he hit do for kystum, & bið ðeah for gielpe ma ðonne for lufan.
 20.149.9. & oft eac ungemetlico forgifnes bið gelicet,
ðæt mon weneð ðæt hit sie mildheortnes.
 20.149.10. Ond oft eac ungemetlicu irsung bið gelicet, ðæt
menn wenað ðæt hit sie ryhtwislic anda.
 20.149.12. Oft mon bið suiðe rempende, & ræsð suiðe
dollice on ælc weorc & hrædlice, & ðeah wenað men ðæt
hit sie for arodscipe & for hwætscipe.
 20.149.14. Oft mon bið suiðe wandigende æt ælcum weorce
& suiðe lætræde, & wenað menn ðæt hit sie for
suarmodnesse & for unarodscipe, & bið ðeah for wisdome & for
wærscipe.
 20.149.16. Forðæm is micel niedðearf ðæt se reccere
ða ðeawas & ða unðeawas cunne wel toscadan, ðylæs se hneawa
& se gitsigenda fægnige ðæs ðætte menn wenen ðæt he sie
gehealdsum on ðæm ðe he healdan scyle oððe dælan.
 20.149.19. Oððe eft se gielpna & se agita for his goda
mierringe gielpe, & wene ðæt he sie kystig & mildheort.
 20.149.21. Oððe eft se ðafetere, se ðe wile forgiefan
ðæt he wrecan sceolde, to ecum witum geteo his hieremenn.
 20.149.22. Oððe eft se ðe ungemetlice wricð ða scylda,
ðæt he self suiður on ðæm ne gesyngige.
 20.149.24. Oððe eft ðæt he ryhtlice & stiðlice
wrecan sceolde, ðæt he ðæt ne forielde, ðylæs se ryhtwislica
anda acolige, ðæt he hit eft sua eaðe wrecan ne mæge, ðætte
forðy to ungemetlice ne sie geliðod ðæm scyldgan, ðylæs him
ðæs godan weorces lean losige ðe he mid ðære steore geearnian
sceolde.
 21.151.5. Hu gesceadwis se reccere sceal bion on his ðreaunga
& on his oleccunga, & eac on his hatheortnesse & on his
monðwærnesse.
 21.151.8. Eac is to wietanne ðætte hwilum bið god wærlice
to miðanne his hieremonna scylda & to licettanne suelce he hit nyte;
hwilum eft to secganne; hwilum, ðeah hit mon cuðlice wite, hit is to
forberanne;
 21.151.11. Hwilum eft smealice & geornlice to seccanne;
 21.151.11. Hwilum liðelice to ðreatianne;
 21.151.12. Hwilum suiðlice & stræclice to ðrafianne.
 21.151.12. Monige sint, swa swa we ær cuædon, ðe mon sceal
wærlice liccettan, & ðeahhwæðre eft cyðan, forðæm þæt
hie ongieten ðæt hie mon tæle, & ðæt eaðmodlice geðafigen,
& ðonne ða scylda ðe hie diogollice on him selfum forberað hie
geornlice on hiera agnum ingeðonce sceawigen, & on him selfum demen &
wrecen, & hie forscamige ðæt hie eft sua don;
 21.151.18. Ðonne bið he self geladod wið hine selfne mid his
agenre scame & mid his geðylde & eac mid his recceres.
 21.151.19. Be ðære ildinge suiðe wel Dryhten ðreade
Iudeas, ða he ðurh ðone witgan cuæð: Ge sindon leogende: næron ge
no min gemunende, ne ge no ne geðohton on eowerre heortan ðæt ic
suugode, suelce ic hit ne gesawe.
 21.151.22. He ilde, & ðafode ða scylda, & ðeah he him
gecyðde;
 21.151.23. Ðeah ðe he wið ða scyldgiendan swugode, he hit
him ðeah suigende gesæde.
 21.151.24. Ac monige scylda openlice witene beoð to forberanne,
ðonne ðæs ðinges tima ne bið ðæt hit mon sidelice gebetan
mæge.
 21.153.2. Swa se læce, ðonne he on untiman lacnað wunde, hio
wyrmseð & rotað.
 21.153.3. Forðæm buton he ðone timan aredige ðæs
læcedomes ðonne bið hit swutol ðæt se lacnigenda forliesð ðone
cræft his læcedomes.
 21.153.5. Ac ðonne se lareow ieldende secð ðone timan ðe he
his hieremenn sidelice on ðreatigean mæge, ðonne bið hit swutol
ðæt he bierð on his geðylde ða byrðenne hira scylda.
 21.153.8. Be ðæm is swiðe wel gecueden ðurh ðone
salmsceop, he cwæð: ða synfullan bytledon uppe on minum hrygge.
 21.153.9. He sarette ðætte ða synfullan sceoldon bytlan
onuppan his hrycge, swelce he openlice cuæde: ðonne ic man geryhtan ne
mæg & hine gelæran, ðonne bið me suelce ic hine bære uppe on
minum hrycge.
 21.153.12. Ac manegu diglu ðing sindon nearolice to smeageanne,
ðætte se reccere mæge ongietan be sumum tacnum on his hieremonna mode
eal ðæt ðær gehyddes lutige, & on ðæm anbide ðe he hira
fandige, ðæt he mæge hwilum ongietan micel of lytlum.
 21.153.16. Be ðæm wæs suiðe ryhte to Ezechiele ðæm
witgan gecueden: ðu monnes sunu, ðurhðyrela ðone wag.
 21.153.18. Ða ic ða ðone wah ðurhðyreludne hæfde,
cuæð se witga, ða iewde he me ane duru beinnan ðæm wealle, &
cuæð to me: Gong inn, geseoh ða scande & ða wierrestan ðing ðe
ðas menn her doð.
 21.153.21. Ic ða eode inn, & geseah ðær ða anlicnessa
eallra creopendra wuhta & ealra anscunigendlicra nietena, & ealle ða
hearga Israhela folces wæron atiefrede on ðæm wage.
 21.153.23. Hwæt elles meahte beon getacnod ðurh Ezechiel buton
ða scirmenn, & ðurh ðone wah seo heardheortnes ðara hieremonna?
 21.153.25. Hwæt is ðonne sio ðyrelung ðæs wages buton
scearplicu & smealicu fandung ðæs modes, ðæt mon mid ðære
ðurhðyrelige ðone weall, & onluce ða heardan heortan, &
gehnescige?
 21.155.3. He cuæð: ða ic hæfde ðone weall
ðurhðyrelod, ða geseah ic duru.
 21.155.4. Suelce he cuæde: ða ic ðære heortan heardnesse
mid geornfullicre fandunge & ascunge & ðreaunge toslat, ða geseah
ic suelce ic gesawe sume duru onlocene, ðurh ða ic geseah on ðæm ðe
ic læran scolde ealle ða innemestan geðohtas.
 21.155.7. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecueden: Gong inn, &
geseoh ða heardsælða & ða sconde ðe ðas her doð.
 21.155.8. Ðæt is ðonne suelce he ingaa & geseo ða
scande, ðonne he ongiet be sumum ðingum oððe ðeawum utanne
ætiewdum eall ðæt hie innan ðenceað, & sua ðurhfærð his
andgit ðæt mod his hieremonna ðætte him bið eall cuð ðæt hie
unaliefedes ðenceað.
 21.155.12. Forðæm wæs eac gecueden: Ic ða eode inn, &
geseah ða anlicnessa ealra creopendra wuhta & eac onscuniendlicra
nietena.
 21.155.14. Ða creopendan wuhta getacnigeað ða eorðlican
geðohtas.
 21.155.15. Ða nietenu ðonne beoð hwæthwuguningas from
eorðan ahæfen, & suaðeah onlutað to ðære eorðan forðæm
hie sculon bi ðære libban.
 21.155.17. Ða creopendan & ða scnicendan licgeað mid
ealle lichoman on eorðan.
 21.155.18. Ða nietenu ðonne, ðeah hie maran sien, hie beoð
suiður ahæfen from eorðan, & suaðeah for ðære gewilnunge
hiera giefernesse hie simle locigeað to ðære eorðan.
 21.155.20. Ða creopendan wuhta beinnan ðam wage getacniað
ða ingeðoncas ðe wealcað in ðæs monnes mode, ðe æfre willað
licgean on ðæm eorðlicum gewilnungum.
 21.155.24. Ða nietenu ðonne ðe he geseah binnan ðæm wage
getacnigeað ðonne mon hwæt ryhtlices & gerisenlices geðencð,
ðonne ne ligeð he eallinga on ðære eorðan sua ða creopendan wuhta,
ac bið hwæthwugu upahæfen sua ðæt neat from eorðan;
 21.157.2. Ac for ðære gewilnunga woroldgielpes & gietsunga
he onlytt ungerisenlice to ðissum eorðlicum, sua ðæt neat for
gifernesse onlyt to ðære eorðan.
 21.157.4. Eac wæs gesewen on ðæm wage atifred ealle ða
heargas Israhela folces, & eac sio gietsung ðe sanctus Paulus cuæð
ðæt wære hearga & idelnesse gefera.
 21.157.6. Suiðe ryhtlice hit wæs awriten æfter ðæm
nitenum ðæt ða heargas wæron atiefrede, forðam ðeah ðe ful
monige mid gerisenlicum weorcum arisen from eorðan, mid ungerisenlicum
gewilnungum ðissa woroldðinga hie hie selfe alecgeað on eorðan.
 21.157.10. Forðy wæs suiðe wel gecueden ðæt hit wære
atiefred, forðæm ðonne mon smeað on his mode ymb hwelc eorðlic
ðing, ðonne deð he suelce he hit amete & atiefre on his heortan,
& sua tweolice & unfæsðlice he atiefreð ðæs ðinges
onlicnesse on his mode ðe he ðonne ymb smeað.
 21.157.14. Eac is to wietanne ðæt æresð bið se wah
ðurhðyrelod, & siððan mon wyrcð duru to.
 21.157.15. Gif sio ðonne ontyned bið, ðonne mæg mon geseon
gif ðær hwelc dieglu scond inne bið, sua se witga dyde.
 21.157.17. Feorrane ðu meaht geseon, gif se wah bið ðyrel, ac
ðu ne meaht geseon hwæt ðærinne bið gehyddes, buton ðu ða duru
ontyne.
 21.157.19. Sua ðu meaht ælcne unðeaw on ðæm menn
æresð be sumum tacnum ongietan, hwæs ðu wenan scealt, ær he hit
mid wordum oððe mid weorcum cyðe.
 21.157.21. Sieððan he hit ðonne mid ðara awðrum cyð,
ðonne bið sio duru ðære unryhtwisnesse ontyned ðæt ðu meaht
geseon eall ðæt yfel openlice ðæt ðærinne lutað.
 21.157.23. Monige hira ðonne sindon suiðe liðelice to
ðreageanne, ðonne he of yfelum willan ne gesyngað, ac of unwisdome &
ungewisses oððe ungewealdes oððe of flæsclicum gecynde oððe of
wacmodnesse & of unbieldo oððe of untrymnesse modes oððe lichoman.
 21.159.2. Forðæm is suiðe micel niedðearf ðæt mon mid
micelre gemetgunge suelcra scylda ðreaunga geliðige & gemetgie,
forðæmðe we ealle, ðe hwile ðe we libbað on ðissum deadlican
flæsce, ðære tidernesse & ðære hnescnesse ures flæsces we
beoð underðiedde.
 21.159.6. Bi him selfum ælc mon sceal geðencean hu he oðrum
deman wille, ðylæs he sie ongieten ðæt he sie onstyred &
onæled mid ðæm andan his hieremonna unðeawa, & hæbbe hine
selfne forgietenne.
 21.159.9. Be ðæm suiðe wel Paulus us manode, ða he
cuæð: Gif hwa sie abisegod mid hwelcum scyldum, ge ðonne ðe
gæsðlice sindon gelærað ða suelcan mid monnðwærnesse
gæste;
 21.159.11. Gesceawiað eow selfe, ðylæs eow becume costung.
 21.159.12. Suelce he openlice cuæde;
 21.159.13. Ðonne eow misliciað ða mettrumnessa ða ge on
oðrum monnum geseoð, ðonne geðence ge hwæt ge sien & hwelce ge
sien;
 21.159.14. Forðæm ðæt ge eower mod gemetgien on ðæm
niðe, ðonne ge eow selfum ondrædað ðæt ðæt ge on oðrum
monnum tælað.
 21.159.16. Ond ðeah sindon monige suiðe suiðe to
ðreageanne, ðonne hie selfe nyllað ongietan hiera scylda, ðæt hi
ðonne gehieren ðreagende of ðæs lariowes muðe hu micle byrðenne
hie habbað on hiera scyldum;
 21.159.19. Ðonne hie willað him selfum ðæt yfel ðæt
hie ðurtugon to suiðe gelihtan, ðæt hie ðonne ondræden for
ðæs lareowes ðreaunga ðæt hie hit him gehefegigen.
 21.159.21. Ðæt ðonne bið ðæs recceres ryht ðæt
he ðurh ða stemne his lariowdomes ætiewe ðæt wuldor ðæs
uplican eðles, & hu moniga digla costunga ðæs ealdan feondes
lutigeað on ðys andweardan life he eac geopenige, ond ðæt he his
hieremonna yfelu to hnesclice forberan ne sceal, ac mid miclum andan &
reðnesse him stiere, ðylæs he sie scyldig ealra hira scylda, ðonne him
hiera na ne ofðyncð.
 21.161.2. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecueden to Ezechiele: Nim
sume tigelan, & lege beforan ðe, & writ on hiere ða burg
Hierusalem.
 21.161.4. & sona æfter ðæm he cuðæ: Besittað hie
utan, & wyrceað oðer fæsten wið hie, & berað hiere hlæd
to, & send ðærto gefylcio, & ðerscað ðone weall mid rammum.
 21.161.6. & eft he him tæhte to fultome ðæt he him
gename ane iserne hearstepannan, & sette betweoh hine & ða burg for
iserne weall.
 21.161.8. Hwæt tacnað ðonne Ezechhiel se witga buton ða
lareowas, to ðæm is gecueden: Genim ðe ane tigelan, & lege beforan
ðe, & writ on hiere ða burg Hierusalem?
 21.161.10. Ða halgan lareowas ðonne him nimað tigelan,
ðonne hie ðara eorðlicra monna heortan underfoð to læranne.
 21.161.12. Ðonne hie lecgeað ða tieglan beforan hie, ðe him
beboden wæs ðæt hi scolden ða ceastre Hierusalem on awritan, ðonne
hie behealdað ealle ða inngeðoncas hiora modes, & suiðe geornlice
giemað ðæt hie ða eorðlican heortan gelæren, & him ætiewen
hwelc sie ðære uplican sibbe gesiehðe, & hu on idelnesse man ongiett
Godes ðæt hefonlice wundor, gif he ne ongiett hu monega costunga ðæs
lytegan feondes him on feallað.
 21.161.18. Suiðe wel he hit geicte mid ðysum, ða he
cuæð: Ymbsittað ða burg suiðe gebyrdelice, & getrymiað eow
wið hie.
 21.161.20. Ða halgan lareowas ymbsittað ða tieglan, ðe sio
burg Hierusalem on atiefred bið, ðonne hi ðam menniscan mode, ðe ðeah
ðæt uplice lif secð, ætiewað hu manega him on ðys andweardum life
frecenlice wiðerwearde unðeawas him wiðfeohtað, & hu æghwelc syn
bið sætigende ðæs ðiondan monnes.
 21.161.24. & suæ suæ se here sceolde bion getrymed
onbutan Hierusalem, suæ sculon beon getrymed ða word ðæs sacerdes
ymbutan ðæt mod his hieremonna.
 21.163.1. & ne sceal he no ðæt an bodigan his hieremonnum
hu ða synna him wiðwinnað, ac he him sceal eac cyðan mid hwelcum
cræftum he him wiðstondan mæg.
 21.163.4. Swiðe ryhtlice wæs se eaca ðær to gedon, ða
mon to ðæm witgan cuæð: Wyrceað fæsten ymb ða burg.
 21.163.5. Wiotodlice fæsten wyrcð se halga lariow ymb ða
burg ðæs modes ðe he gelærð ðone cræft hu hit mæg costingum
wiðstondan/, & him eac gesægð hu ðæm monnum ðe him mægen
& cræft wiexð, hu him eac hwilum eakiað æfter ðæm mægenum
ða costunga.
 21.163.9. Be ðæm wæs suiðe ryhte gecueden: Berað hire
to hlæd, & ymbsittað hie, & gað to mid rammum.
 21.163.10. Ðonne bireð ælc lareow hlæd to ðæs monnes
mode, ðonne he him gecyðð hu sio byrðen wiexð & hefegað.
 21.163.12. Eac he aræð ceastre wið Hierusalem, ðonne he
ðæm ryhtlicum inngeðonce his hieremonna foresægð ða dieglan
sætenga ðæs lytegan feondes, ðe he him wenan mæg.
 21.163.14. & eac he bierð rammas ymbutan ðæt mod his
hieremonna, ðonne he him gecyð mid hu scearplicum costungum we sint
æghwonon utan behrincgde, & se weall ures mægenes ðurhðyrelað
mid ðan scearpan ramman ðara costunga.
 21.163.18. Ond suaðeah nu, ðeah se lareow ðis eall smealice
& openlice gecyðe, ne forstent hit him noht, ne him nohte ðon ma ne
beoð forlætna his agna synna, buton he sie onæled mid ryhtwislicum
andan wið his hieremonna scylda.
 21.163.21. Be ðæm is git suiðe ryhtlice gecueden to ðæm
witgan: Genim ðe ane iserne hierstepannan, & sete betweoxn ðe &
Hierusalem for iserne weall.
 21.163.23. Ðurh ða pannan is getacnod se wielm ðæs modes,
& ðurh ðæt isern ðæt mægen ðara ðreatunga.
 21.165.1. Hwæt is ðienga ðe bieterre sie on ðæs
lareowes mode, oððe hit suiður gehierste & gegremige ðonne se anda
ðe for ryhtwisnesse bið upahæfen?
 21.165.3. Mid ðisse pannan hierstinge wæs Paulus onbærned,
ða he cuæð: Hwa bið medtrum, ðæt ic ne sie eac for his ðingum
seoc?
 21.165.5. Oððe hwa bið gescended, ðæt me forðæm ne
scamige?
 21.165.5. Ond sua hwelc sua mid ðam Godes andan bið onæled,
ne bið he for giemeleste gehiened, ac he bið stranglice wið ða getrymed
on ecnesse.
 21.165.7. Bi ðæm wæs suiðe ryhte gecueden to ðæm
witgan: Sete iserne weall betuh ðe & ða burh.
 21.165.9. Ða isernan hierstepannan he tæhte for iserne weall
to settanne betuh ðæm witgan & ðære byrig, forðam nu ða
recceras ætiewað sua strangne andan ðy hie wiellað ðæt hie hiene
eft hæbben on ðæm ecan life betux him & hiera hieremonnum to
isernum wealle, ðæt is to gewitnesse ðæt hit him ne licode, ðeah he
hit gebetan ne meahte.
 21.165.14. Forðæm ðonne ðæs recceres mod wyrð to
reðe on ðære ðreaunga, ðonne abiersð ðær hwilum hwæthwugu
ut ðæs ðe he sugian sceolde.
 21.165.16. Ond oft eac gelimpeð, ðonne he to suiðe & to
ðearllice ðreapian wile his hieremenn, ðæt his word beoð gehwyrfedo
to unnyttre oferspræce.
 21.165.18. Ðonne sio ðreaung bið ungemetgad, ðonne bið
ðæt mod ðæs agyltendan mid ormodnesse geðrysced.
 21.165.19. Forðæm is micel ðearf, ðonne se reða reccere
ongiett ðæt he his hieremonna mod suiður gedrefed hæfð ðonne he
scolde, ðæt he sona forðæm hreowsige, ðæt he ðurh ða
hreowsunga gemete forgiefnesse beforan ðære Soðfæsðnesse ðæs
ðe he ðurh ða geornfulnesse his andan gesyngade.
 21.165.23. Ðæt ilce Dryhten God us bisnade ðurh Moysen, ða
he cuæð: Gif hwa gonge bilwitlice mid his friend to wuda treow to
ceorfanne, & sio æcs ðonne awient of ðæm hielfe, & sua
ungewealðes ofslieð his geferan, he ðonne sceal fleon to anra ðara
ðreora burga ðe to friðstowe gesette sint & libbe, ðylæs hwelc
ðara niehstena ðæs ofslægenan for ðæm sare his ehte, & hine
ðonne gefoo & ofslea.
 21.167.4. To wuda we gað mid urum freondum sua oft sua we
sceawiað ura hieremonna unðeawas;
 21.167.5. & bilwitlice we heawað ðone wudu, ðonne we
ðara gyltendra scylda mid arfæsððes ingeðonces lare anweg
aceorfað.
 21.167.7. Ac sio æcs wint of ðam hielfe, & eac us of
ðære honda, ðonne ðonne sio lar wint on reðnesse suiður ðonne
mon niede scyle.
 21.167.9. Sio æcs wient of ðæm hielfe, ðonne of ðære
ðreatunga gað to stiðlico word, & mid ðam his freond gewundað,
oððe ofsliehð, ðonne he hine on unrotnesse oððe on ormodnesse
gebringð mid his edwite, ðeah he hit for lufum do, ðæt he geopenige
his unðeawas.
 21.167.13. Suaðeah ðæt geðreatade mod bið suiðe raðe
gehwierfed to fiounga, gif him mon to ungemetlice mid ðære ðreapunga
oferflygð suiður ðonne mon ðyrfe.
 21.167.15. Ac se se ðe unwærlice ðone wuda hiewð, &
sua his freond ofsliehð, him bið nidðearf ðæt he fleo to ðara
ðreora burga anre, ðæt on sumere ðara weorðe genered, ðæt he
mote libban;
 21.167.18. Ðæt is ðæt he gehweorfe to hreowsunga, &
sua fleo to ðara ðreora burga sumere, ðæt is tohopa & lufu &
geleafa.
 21.167.19. Se to anra ðara burga gefliehð, ðonne mæg he
bion orsorg ðæs monnsliehtes;
 21.167.21. Ðeah hine ðær meten ða niehstan ðæs
ofslægenan, ne sleað hi hiene na: forðæm ðonne se ðearla & se
ryhtwisa Dema cymð, se ðe hine on urne geferscipe ðurh flæsces gecynd
gemengde, ne wriecð he mid nanum ðingum ða scylde on him, forðæm
under his forgiefnesse hine gefrieðode sio lufu & se geleafa & se
tohopa.
 22.169.1. Hu swiðe se reccere sceal beon on his smeaunga abisgod
ymb ða halgan æ.
 22.169.3. Ac eall ðiss aredað se reccere suiðe ryhte, ðonne
he for godes lufum & for Godes ege deð ðæt ðæt he deð, &
ælce dæge geornfullice smeað ða bebodu halegra gewrita, ðætte on
him sie upparæred se cræft ðære giemenne ymbe ða foresceawunga
ðæs hefonlican lifes, ðonne singallice ðisse eorðlican drohtunge
gewuna wile toweorpan, buton hine sio myndgung ðara haligra gewrita
onbryrde;
 22.169.8. Forðæm se eorðlica geferscipe hine tiehð on ða
lufe his ealdan ungewunan, he sceal simle higian ðæt he weorðe onbryrd
& geedniwad to ðæm hefonlican eðle.
 22.169.11. Ac his mod bið suiðe ieðegende & suiðe
abisgad mid eorðlicra monna wordum, forðam hit is openlice cuð ðætte
sio uterre abisgung ðissa woroldðinga ðæs monnes mod gedrefð, &
hine scofett hidres ðædres, oððæt he afielð of his agnum willan;
 22.169.14. Ac him bið ðearf ðæt he hine genime simle be
ðære leornunge haligra gewrita, & be ðam arise.
 22.169.16. For ðiosum ðingum manade Paulus Timotheum his cniht,
& cuæð: ðonne ic cume, ðonne beo ðu abisgad ymbe rædinge.
 22.169.17. & eft Dauit be ðam ilcan spræc, ða he
cuæð: Loca, Dryhten, hu suiðe ic lufige ðine æ;
 22.169.19. Ealne dæg ðæt bið min smeaung.
 22.169.19. Eft bi ðys ilcan Dryhten bebead Moyse hu he scolde
beran ða earce, ða he cuæð: Wyrc feower hringas ælgyldene, &
ahoh hie suiðe fæste on ða feower hyrnan ðære earce;
 22.169.22. & hat wyrcean twegen stengas of ðæm treowe,
ðe is haten sethim, ðæt ne wyrð næfre forrotad;
 22.169.23. & befoh utan mid golde: & sting ut ðurh ða
hringas bi ðære earce sidan, ðæt hie man mæge beran on ðam,
& læt hi stician ðæron;
 22.171.1. Ne tio hie mon næfre of.
 22.171.2. Hwæt mæg ðonne elles seo earc tacnian buton ða
halgan ciricean, on ðære sculon hangian ða feower hringas on ðam
feower hyrnum, ðæt sint ða feower hyrnan ðises middangeardes, binnan
ðæm is tobrædd Godes folc, ðæt is utan begyrdd mid ðam feower
godspellum?
 22.171.5. Ða saglas ðonne, ðe mon ða earce big beran sceal,
sticiað eallne weg inn on ðam hringum ða earce mid to beranne, ða
beoð geworht of ðæm treowe sethim, ðæt næfre ne rotað.
 22.171.8. Sua sindon to seceanne stronge & unaðrotene
lareowas & ðurhwuniende on ðære lare haligra boca, ða simle sculon
bion bodiende ymbe ða anmodnesse ðære halgan gesomnunga, sua sua ða
anbestungne saglas ða earce berað.
 22.171.11. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt mon ða earce bere on
ðæm saglum, ðætte ða godan lareowas ða halgan gesomnunge
lærende ða niwan & ða ungeleaffullan mod mid hira lare gelæde to
ryhtum geleafan.
 22.171.14. Ða saglas is beboden ðæt scoldon beon mid golde
befongne.
 22.171.15. Ðæt is, ðonne ða lareowas mid wordum oðre
menn lærat, ðæt hi eac selfe on hira agnum weorcum biorhte scinen.
 22.171.17. Be ðam saglum is suiðe gesceadlice gecueden ðæt
hie sculon simle stician on ðam hringum, & næfre ne moton him beon
ofatogene, forðæm is micel niedðearf ðætte ða ðe beoð gesette
to ðære ðenunga ðæs lareowdomes ðæt hi næfre ne gewiten
from ðære geornfulnesse ðære rædinge & leornunge haligra
gewrita.
 22.171.21. Forðæm is eac gecueden ðætte simle ða
ofergyldan saglas sceolden stician on ðæm gyldnum hringum, ðylæs hine
ænig wuht gælde ungearowes, ðonne mon ða earce beran scolde.
 22.171.24. Ðæt is ðonne ðonne ðara lareowa hieremenn
hwæthwugu gæsðlices to him secað, & hi frinað, ðonne is
suiðe micel scand gif he ðonne færð secende hwæt he sellan scyle,
ðonne he iowan scolde ðæt him mon to ascað.
 22.173.2. Ac ðonne sticiað ða saglas suiðe singallice on
ðæm hringum, ðonne ða lareowas simle on hira heortum smeagað ða
halgan gewritu.
 22.173.4. Ond ðonne hi hebbað suiðe arodlice ða earce up,
ðonne hi suiðe hrædlice bioð gearwe to læranne ðætte ðonne
ðearf bið.
 22.173.6. Bi ðæm suiðe wel se forma hierde ðære halgan
ciricean, ðæt is sanctus Petrus, manode oðre hierdas, ða he cuæð:
Bioð simle gearwe to læranne & to forgiefanne ælcum ðara ðe iow
ryhtlice bidde ymbe ðone tohopan ðe ge habbað on eow.
 22.173.9. Suelce he openlice cuæde: Ne bregden ge no ða
stengas of ðæm hringum, ðylæs sio earc si ungearo to beranne.
 23.173.12. Hu micel scyle bion ðæt toscead, & hu mislice
mon scyle menn læran mid ðæm cræfte ðæs lareowdomes.
 23.173.14. Nu ðonne oð ðiss we rehton hwelc se hierde bion
sceal;
 23.173.14. Nu we him willað cyðan hu he læran sceal, sua sua
hit lange ær us ðære eadegan gemynde wer Gregorius lærde, se wæs
oðrum noman genemned Nanzanzenus, he cuæð: Ne gedafenað hit no
ðæt we ealle menn on ane wisan læren, forðam hie ne sint ealle anes
modes & anra ðeawa.
 23.173.18. Forðæm oft sio ilce lar ðe oðrum hielpeð, hio
dereð ðæm oðrum;
 23.173.19. Sua sua manegra cynna wyrta & grasu beoð
gegaderad, þe neat batigað fore, sumu cuelað;
 23.173.21. Sua sua mid liðre wisðlunga mon hors gestilleð,
sua eac mid ðære illcan wistlunga mon mæg hund astyrigean;
 23.173.22. Sua beoð eac monige læcedomas ðe sume adle
gelytliað, & sume gestrongiað;
 23.175.1. Sua eac hlaf ðe strongra monna mægen gemiclað, he
gelytlað cilda.
 23.175.1. For ðære ungelicnesse ðara hieremonna sculun beon
ungelic ða word ðæs lareowes, ðæt he hiene selfne geðeode to
eallum his hieremonnum, to æghwelcum be his andefne, & ðeah
hwæðre/ sua suiðe sua he of ðære æwe & of ðære ryhtan
lare ne cerre.
 23.175.5. Hwæt cueðe we ðonne hwelce sin ða inngeðoncas
monna buton suelce sumere hearpan strengas aðenede, ða se hearpere suiðe
ungelice tiehð styreð, & mid ðy gedeð ðæt hi nanwuht ungelice
ðæm sone ne singað ðe he wilnað?
 23.175.9. Ealle he gret mid anre honda, ðy ðe he wile ðæt
he anne song singen, ðeah he hie ungelice styrige.
 23.175.10. Sua sceal æghwelc lareow to anre lufan & to anum
geleafan mid anre lare & mid mislicum manungum his hieremonna mod
styrigean.
 23.175.12. On oðre wisan mon sceal manian weras, on oðre wif;
 23.175.13. & on oðre wisan ealde, on oðre giong; & on
oðre wisan earme, on oðre eadige;
 23.175.13. & on oðre wisan ða bliðan, on oðre ða
unrotan;
 23.175.14. & on oðre wisan ða underðieddan, on oðre
ða ofer oðre gesettan;
 23.175.15. On oðre wisan ða ðeowas, on oðre ða
hlafurdas;
 23.175.16. & on oðre wisan ða woroldwisan, on oðre ða
dysegan;
 23.175.17. & on oðre wisan ða scamleasan, on oðre ða
scamfæstan;
 23.175.18. & on oðre wisan ða ofermodan, on oðre ða
wacmodan;
 23.175.19. Ond on oðre wisan ða ungeðyldegan, on oðre wisan
ða geðyldegan;
 23.175.20. & on oðre wisan ða welwillendan, on oðre ða
æfstegan;
 23.175.21. & on oðre wisan ða bilwitan, on oðre ða
felaspræcan;
 23.175.21. On oðre wisan ða halan, on oðre ða unhalan;
 23.175.22. Ond on oðre wisan ða ðe for ege forberað
ðæt hi yfel ne doð, on oðre wisan ða ðe sua aheardigað ðæt
hi hit for nanum ege ne forlætað;
 23.175.24. & on oðre wisan ða suiðe suigean, on oðre
ða felaidelspræcæn;
 23.175.25. & on oðre wisan ða slawan, on oðre ða ðe
beoð to hrade;
 23.177.1. & on oðre wisan ða manðuæran, on oðre
ða grambæran;
 23.177.2. & on oðre wisan ða eaðmodan, on oðre ða
upahæfenan;
 23.177.3. & on oðre wisan ða anwillan, on oðre ða
ungestæððegan & unfæsðrædan;
 23.177.4. & on oðre wisan ða ofergifran, on oðre ða
fæstendan;
 23.177.5. & on oðre wisan ða ðe mildheortlice hira agen
sellað, on oðre ða ðe æfter oðerra monna ierfe flitað, & hie
reafigeað;
 23.177.6. & on oðre wisan ða ðe nohwæðer ne oðerra
monna ne reafiað, ne hiera agen rumedlice ne dælað;
 23.177.8. & on oðre wisan ða ðe hira agen rumedlice
sellað, & ne forlætað ðeah ðæt hie oðerra monna ne
reafien;
 23.177.9. & on oðre wisan ða ungemodan, on oðre ða
gemodan;
 23.177.10. & on oðre wisan ða wrohtgeornan ðe cease
wyrceað, & on oðre ða gesibsuman;
 23.177.11. Ond on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe ða word
ðære halgan æ ryhte ne ongietað, on oðre ða ðe hi ryhtlice
ongietað, & ðeah for eaðmodnesse wandiað ðæt hi hit ne
sprecað;
 23.177.14. Ond on oðre wisan ða ðe fullfremede ne beoð
nohwæðer ne on ieldo ne on wisdome, & ðeah for hrædwilnesse to
foð, & on oðre wisan ða ðe medomlice & wel magon læran,
& him ðeah ondrædað for eaðmodnesse, ðæt hie hit forðy
forlætað;
 23.177.17. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ðisse hwilendlican are
wilniað, & him nan gesuinc ne ðyncð ðæt hi hie hæbben, on
oðre ða ðe him ðyncð micel earfoðu & micel gesuinc to habbanne,
& hiera suaðeah wilniað;
 23.177.20. Ond on oðre wisan ða ðe beoð mid synscipe
gebundene, on oðre ða ðe beoð frio ðara benda;
 23.177.21. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ða ðurhtogenan synna
wepað, on oðre ða ðe ða geðohtan wepað;
 23.177.23. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ða ærgedonan
wepað, & ðeah ne forlætað, on oðre ða ðe hi forlætað,
& suaðeah ne wepað;
 23.177.24. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ða unaliefedan ðing
doð, & hie eac herigað, & on oðre wisan ða ðe hie tælað,
& hi suaðeah ne forlætað;
 23.179.1. & on oðre wisan ða ðe mid sumere unryhtwilnunga
beoð færinga hrædlice ofersuiðede, on oðre ða ðe on ðære
synne ealnu weg licgað, mid geðeahte to gebundene;
 23.179.4. & on oðre wisan ða ðe ða lytlan scylda
oftrædlice wyrceað, on oðre wisan ða ðe ða lytlan forgað, &
ðeah hwilum ða maran wyrceað;
 23.179.6. & on oðre wisan ða ðe nan god nyllað
onginnan, on oðre ða ðe hit onginnan willað, & næfre ne
geendigað;
 23.179.7. & on oðre wisan ða ðe dearninga yfel doð,
& god eawunga, & on oðre wisan ða ðe hira god helað ðe hie
doð, & ne reccað ðeah menn wenen ðæt hie yfel don, & eac mid
sumum ðingum gedoð ðæt menn wenað ðæt hi yfel don.
 23.179.11. Hu nytt rehton we nu & rimdon ða cægan, buton
we eac feawum wordum ætiewen hwæt hie healden, & sua we swiotolusð
mægen æfter gereccan?
 24.179.14. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne weras, on
oðre wif.
 24.179.15. On oðre wisan sint to manianne weras, on oðre wif.
 24.179.15. Ða weras mon sceal hefiglecor & stiðlecor
læran, & ða wif leohtlecor;
 24.179.16. Forðæm ðæt ða weras higigen to maran
byrðenne, & ða wif mid oleccunga weorðen on gebrohte.
 25.179.19. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða iungan,
on oðre ða ealdan.
 25.179.21. On oðre wisan sint to læranne ða iungan, on
oðre ða ealdan;
 25.179.22. Forðæm oftor mid reðre manunga beoð ða iungan
nytwyrðe gedone, & ða ealdan mid liðelicre bene, sua hit awriten is
on ðære æwe: Ne ðreata ðu no ðone ealdan, ac healsa hine sua sua
ðinne fæder.
 26.181.3. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða welegan,
on oðre ða wædlan.
 26.181.5. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða wædlan, on
oðre ða welegan.
 26.181.6. Ða wædlan sint to frefranne & to retanne,
ðylæs hi sien to ormode for hira earfeðum.
 26.181.7. Ða oðre sint to breganne, ðylæs hi sien for
hiera wlencum to upahæfene.
 26.181.8. To ðæm wædlan wæs gecueden ðurh Dryhten to
ðæm witgan: Ne ondræd ðu ðe, forðæm ðu ne weorðesð
gescended.
 26.181.10. & suiðe hræðe eac æfter ðæm he him
olecte, ða he cuæð: ðu earma, ðu ðe eart mid ðy storme & mid
ðære yste onwend & oferworpen, ðe ic geceas on ðam ofne ðe ðu
on wære asoden, ðæt wæs on ðinum iermðum.
 26.181.13. Ac sanctus Paulus ðreade ða welegan, ða he
cuæð to his gingrum: Secgað ðæm welegum gind ðisne middangeard
ðæt hi to ofermodlice ne ðencen, ne to wel ne truwigen ðissum
ungewissum welum.
 26.181.16. Be ðæm we magon suiðe swutule oncnawan ðæt
se eaðmodnesse lareow, ða ða he ymb ða welegan spræc, na ne
cuæð: Biddað, ac: Secgað, & bebeodað.
 26.181.18. & eac we magon oncnawan ðæt, ðæt ða
earman & ða untruman sient to retanne, & ða ofermodan & ða
upahafenan ne sient no to weorðianne, ac ða mon sceal swa micle ma hatan
ðonne biddan sua man ongiet ðæt hie for ðissum woruldwlencum bioð
suiður upahafene & on ofermettum aðundene.
 26.181.22. Be ðæm Crist cuæð on his godspelle: Waa ieow
welegum, ðe eower lufu eall & eower tohopa is on eowrum woruldwelum,
& ne giemað ðæs ecan gefean, ac gefeoð ealle mode ðisses
andweardan lifes genyhte.
 26.183.2. Ac ðæs is ðearf ðæt mon ðone frefre ðe on
ðæm ofne asoden bið his iermða, & se is to ðreatiganne & to
breganne, se ðe bið upahafen mid ðy gefean & mid ðy gielpe ðisse
worulde;
 26.183.4. Ðætte ða sorgfullan ongieten ðæt him
becumað ða welan ðe him gehatene sint, ðeah hi hi ðonne git ne
geseon;
 26.183.6. & eac ða welegan ongieten ðætte ða welan
ðe hie onlociað & habbað, ðæt hie ða habban ne magon.
 26.183.7. Ac ðæm lareowe is micel ðearf ðæt he ongiete
hwa earm sie, hwa eadig, & hwone he læran scyle sua earmne, & hwane
sua eadigne.
 26.183.9. Forðæm oft se welega & se wædla habbað sua
gehweorfed hira ðeawum ðæt se welega bið eaðmod & sorgfull,
& se wædla bið upahæfen & selflice.
 26.183.11. Forðæm sceal se lareow suiðe hrædlice wendan
his tungan ongean ðæt ðe he ongiet ðæt ðæs monnes inngeðonc
bið, forðæm ðæt se earma upahafena sie mid his wordum geðreatod
& gescended, ðonne he ongiet ðæt hine ne magon his iermða
geðreatigan & geeaðmedan.
 26.183.15. Ac sua micle liðelecor he sceal olecan ðæm
welegan eaðmodan sua he ongiet ðæt he eaðmodra bið, ðonne hine ne
magon ða welan forwlencean, ðe ælcne ofermodne oðhebbað.
 26.183.18. & oft eac mon sceal ðone welegan ofermodan to him
loccian mid liðelicre olicunga, forðæm ðæt he hine to ryhte
geweeme;
 26.183.20. Forðæm oft hearda wunda beoð mid liðum
beðengum gehnescode & gehælede, & eac ða wodðraga ðæs
ungewitfullan monnes se læce gestilð & gehælð mid ðæm
ðæt he him olecð æfter his agnum willan.
 26.183.23. Ne sculon we eac forgietan hu hit wæs be Saule
ðæm kyninge: ðonne him se wiðerwearda gæsð on becom, ðonne
gefeng Dauid his hearpan, & gestillde his wodðraga mid ðæm glige.
 26.185.1. Hwæt mæg ðonne elles tacnian Saules
ungewitfullnes buton ða upahafenesse ðara welegena?
 26.185.2. Oððe hwæt is elles getacnod ðurh Dauid buton
eaðmodlic lif haligra monna?
 26.185.3. Forðæm ðonne se unclæna gæsð becom on
Saul, Dauid ðonne mid his sange gemetgode ða wodðrage Saules.
 26.185.5. Sua ðonne, ðonne ðæt mod ðara ricena for
upahæfenesse bið to ierre gehwierfed, ðonne is cynn ðætte we for
hira modes hælo olicende hi on smyltnesse gebringen mid ure spræce, sua
sua Dauid dyde Saul mid ðære hearpan.
 26.185.8. Hwilum eac ðonne mon ðæm ricum cidan sceal,
æresð mon sceal sprecan asciende, suelce he be oðrum menn sprece &
ascie, & gehiere hu be ðæm deman wille.
 26.185.10. Ðonne mon ðonne ongiete ðæt he ryhte gedemed
hæbbe, & he wene ðæt he ryht be oðrum gedemed hæbbe, ðonne
secge him mon suiðe gedæftelice for his agnum scyldum, ðylæs ðæt
aðundne mod for ðissum hwilendlicum anwalde hit gebelge wið ðone ðe
him cit, ac ðæt he mid his agnum wisdome & mid his agnum wordum ðone
suiran gebiege his agenra ofermetta, ðætte he nane lade ne mæge findan,
ac sie sua mid his agnum wordum gebunden.
 26.185.17. Forðæm com Nathan to cidanne ðæm cyninge
Dauide, & licette, suelce he ymb sumes ðearfan & sumes earmes monnes
ryht spræce, & sohte ðæs cyninges dom, & wolde ðæt he
æresð hine be oðrum menn gedemde, & siððan gehierde his agne
scylde, forðæm ðæt he eft ne meahte ðæm ilcan dome
wiðcueðan.
 26.185.21. & eac se haliga monn ongeat ægðer ge ðæs
cyninges scylde ge eac his hatheortnesse & gedyrstignesse, wolde hine ða
æresð gebindan mid his agenre ondetnesse, & forhæl him ðæt he
hine eft ðreatian wolde.
 26.185.24. Sua se læce hyd his isern wið ðone monn ðe he
sniðan wile;
 26.185.25. Wenð, gif he hit him iewe, ðæt he him nylle
geðafigean ðæt he hine sniðe.
 26.185.26. Ac grapað suiðe fægre ymbutan ðæt ðæt
he sniðan wile, & snið swiðe hrædlice.
 26.187.2. Sua se witga dyde ðone cyning mid his wordum: ic wene
ðæt he hine snide slaulecor, gif he him ær sæde ðæt he hine
sniðan wolde;
 26.187.4. Ðy hit wæs betre ðæt he grapude mid ðæm
bispelle, ærðonðe he cidde, sua se læce grapað, & stracað,
& hyt his seax & hwæt, ærðonðe he stingan wille.
 26.187.6. Se læce, ðonne he cymð ðone untruman to
sniðanne, æresð he sceawað ðæt cumbl, & siððan hine
tweonað ymb ðæs untruman geðyld, hwæðer he geðafian mæge
ðæt hine mon sniðe.
 26.187.9. Hyt ðonne his læceseax under his claðum
oððæt he hine wundað: wile ðæt he hit gefrede, ær he hit
geseo;
 26.187.10. Forðæm he wenð, gif he hit ær geseo, ðæt
he hit wille forsacan.
 27.187.12. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða gladan,
on oðre ða unrotan.
 27.187.14. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða bliðan, on
oðre/ ða unrotan.
 27.187.15. Ðæm oferbliðum is to cyðanne ða unrotnessa
ðe ðæræfter cumað, & ðam unbliðum sint to cyðanne ða
gefean ðe him gehatene sindon.
 27.187.17. Geliorngen ða bliðan on ðære ðreaunga
ðæt hie him ondræden, & gehieren ða unbliðan ða lean ðæs
gefean ðe hie tohopiað.
 27.187.18. To ðæm bliðan is gecueden: Wa eow ða nu
hliehað, forðam ge sculon eft wepan.
 27.187.20. Gehieren eac ða unrotan ðone cuide ðe him is to
gecueden ðurh ðone illcan lareow, ðæt is Crist, he cuæð: Eft ic
eow geseo, & ðonne blissiað eowre heortan, & eowerne gefean eow nan
mon æt ne genimð.
 27.187.23. Monige beoð ðeah bliðe & eac unbliðe ðara
ðe for nanum woruldðingum nahwæðer doð, buton for ðæs blodes
styringe & for lichoman medtrymnesse.
 27.189.1. Suaðeah is ðæm to cyðanne, ðæt hi hie
warenigen ægðer ge wið ða ungemetlican blisse ge wið ða
ungemetlican unrotnesse.
 27.189.3. Forðæm hira ægðer astyreð sumne unðeaw,
ðeah hie ungewealdes cumen of ðæs lichoman medtrymnesse.
 27.189.4. Ðæm oferbliðan oft folgað firenlusð, &
ðæm unrotan ierre.
 27.189.5. Forðæm is micel niedðearf ðæt mon hiene wið
ðæt irre an & wið ða ungemetlican sælða warenige, ac eac
wið ðæt ðe forcuðre bið, ðe ðæræfter cymð, ðæt is
fierenlusð & unryhtlicu iersung, ðæt is ðæt mon iersige on
oðerne for his gode.
 27.189.9. Ðonne is micel ðearf, ðonne him mon ðissa tuega
hwæðer onðrætt suiður ðonne oðer, & wið ðæt wienð,
ðæt he sua suiðe wið ðæt winne sua he on ðæt oðer ne
befealle, ðe he him ær læs ondred.
 28.189.12. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
ealdormen, on oðre wisan ða hieremenn.
 28.189.14. On oðre wisan sint ðonne to manianne ða
underðioddan, on oðre ða ofergesettan.
 28.189.15. Ða underðieddan mon sceal sua læran ðæt hie
elles ne sien genæt ne geirmed, & ða ofersettan mon sceal sua manian
ðæt se hiera folgoð hine ne oðhebbe.
 28.189.17. & ða underðioddan ðæt hie wiers ne don
ðonne him man bebeode, ond ða ofergesettan ðæt hi him to unaberendlice
ne beoden.
 28.189.19. & ða unðerðieddan ðæt hi him eaðmodlice
underlicgen, & ða ofergesettan ðæt hie gemetlice him ofer sien,
ðæt hi magon eac be ðisse bisene ongietan ðæt him is to gecueden:
Bearn, beo ge underðiodde eowrum ieldrum magum on Dryhtne.
 28.189.23. Ðæm ofergesettan is to gecueden: Ne gremigen ge
eowru bearn.
 28.191.1. Geleornigen eac ða bearn ðæt hi sua hieren hira
ieldrum sua sua hie selfe wieten on hira inngeðonce beforan ðæs dieglan
Deman eagum ðæt hi hit for Gode don, & æt Gode ða lean habban
willen.
 28.191.4. Geleornigen eac ða fæderas & ða hlafurdas
ðæt hie wel libbende gode bisene astellen ðæm ðe him underðiedde
sien.
 28.191.5. Eac sculun wietan ða ofer oðre gesettan ðæt
ðæt hie unaliefedes ðurhteoð, & oðre men bi ðam bieseniað,
sua manegra wieta hie beoð wyrðe beforan ðæm oðrum sua sua he monna
on won gebrohte, buton he eft self gesuice, & sua monige gecierre sua he
mæsð mæge.
 28.191.9. Forðæm him is suiðe micel ðearf ðæt he sua
micle wærlicor hine healde wið scylda swa he gere witan mæg ðæt he
no ana ne forwierð, ðonne he oðrum yfele bisene steleð.
 28.191.12. Eac sint to manianne ða underðioddan & ða
anlepan menn ðe æmtige beoð ðæs ðæt hie for oðre menn
suincen, ðæt hie huru hie selfe gehealden sua micle ma sua hie
æmetegran beoð ðonne oðre menn, ðylæs hie eft wyrðen
ðearlwislecor gedemede ðonne oðre menn.
 28.191.16. Ða ofer oðre gesettan sint to manianne ðæt hie
for hira monna gedwolan ne weorðen gedemde, ðonne hie wenað ðæt hie
hira selfra gewyrhtu sien clæne.
 28.191.18. Se æmetiga & se anlipa is to manianne ðæt he
sua micle sorgfulra sie ymb hine selfne, & sua micle suiður suince sua
hine læs oðerra monna giemen bisegað.
 28.191.21. Ða ofergesettan sint to monianne ðæt hie sua
oðerra monna giemenne gefyllen, ðæt hie hie selfe ne forlæten, ond
eft hie selfe sua geornfulle sien ðæt hie to slawlice ðara ne giemen
ðe him befæste sien.
 28.191.24. Ac ðam ðe ðonne æmetig bið his agenne willan
to wyrceanne, to ðæm is gecueden: ðu slawa, ga ðe to æmetthylle,
& giem hu hie doð, & leorna ðær wisdom.
 28.193.1. Ða ðonne ðe ofer oðre bion sculon sint suiðe
egeslice gemanode mid ðy worde ðe mon cuæð: Sunu min, gif ðu hwæt
gehætst for ðinne freond, ðonne hafas ðu ðin wed geseald, & ðu
bist ðonne gebunden mid ðæm wordum ðines agnes muðes, &
gehæft mid ðinre agenre spræce.
 28.193.5. Hwelc magon beon maran gehat ðonne mon gehate for his
freond ðæt he underfoo his saule on his pleoh?
 28.193.7. Ðæt is suelce he hæbbe befæsð his hond
oðrum menn, ðonne he gebint hine selfne to him mid his wordum ðæt he
sceal niede ða giemenne & ða geornfulnesse ymb ðone habban ðe he
ær ne ðorfte, forðæm he hine hæfð ðonne gehæftne mid his
agnum wordum, suelce he sie mid grine gefangen, ðæt he hine sceal nide
tela læran.
 28.193.12. Ðy him is micel ðearf, ðonne he tela lærð,
ðæt he eac tela doo, & his lif on nan oðer ne wende, on oðer he
lærð.
 28.193.14. Forðæm he eft sceal beforan ðæm ðearlwisan
Deman mid gereccelicre rake gereccan ðæt he ðæt ilce self dyde ðe
he oðre menn lærde.
 28.193.16. Ond eft suiðe hraðe æfter ðæm se ilca
Salomon cuæð: Do, min sunu, sua ic ðe lære: alies ðe selfne;
 28.193.17. Forðæm ðu eart on borg began ðinum friend.
 28.193.18. Ac iern nu & onette, awece hine.
 28.193.18. Ne geðafa ðu ðinum eagum ðæt hie slapige, ne
ne hnappigen ðine bræwas.
 28.193.19. Sua hwa ðonne sua his lif to biesene bið oðrum
monnum geset, ne sceal he no ðæt an don ðæt he ana wacie, ac he sceal
eac his friend wreccan.
 28.193.22. Ne ðynce him no genog ðæt he ana wel libbe, buton
eac ða ðe he fore beon sceal from ðære slæwðe his synna atio.
 28.193.23. Ðæt is suiþe wel ðær gecueden: Ne slapige
no ðin eage, ne ne hnappigen ðine bræwas.
 28.193.25. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt mon his eage læte
slapian ðæt mon for his unwisdome & for his suongornesse ne mæge
ongietan ða unðeawas ðara ðe him underðiedde beoð.
 28.195.2. Ac ðonne hnæppiað ure bræwas, ðonne we
hwæthwugu steorweorðes ongietað on ða ðe us underðiedde beoð,
& we gebærað for ure receliesðe swelce we hit nyten;
 28.195.5. Ðonne hnappige we.
 28.195.5. Ac ðonne we slapað fæste, ðonne we nohwæðer
ne hit witan nyllað ne hit betan nyllað, ne furðum ne reccað
hwæðer we hit ongieten, ðeah we hit gecnawan cunnen.
 28.195.7. Ne slæpð se no fæsðe, ac hnappað, se ðe
gecnawan mæg hwæt tælwierðe bið, & suaðeah for his modes
swongornesse oððe recelieste forwandað ðæt he bete & ðreage
his hieremenn be ðæs gyltes andefne.
 28.195.10. Æresð mon hnappað;
 28.195.11. Gif he ðonne ðære hnappunge ne ge swicð,
ðonne hnappað he oð he wierð on fæstum slæpe.
 28.195.12. Sua eac oft gebyreð ðæm ðe for oðre menn beon
sceal, ðonne he hwelc yfel ongiett, ðæt nyle aweg aceorfan, ðæt
ðonne æt niehstan hit wyrð to gewunan ðæt he hit ne mæg gebetan,
ne furðum ongietan ðæt hit ænig yfel sie.
 28.195.15. Ac ða sint to manianne ðe fore oðre beon sculan,
ðæt hie geornlice ða ymb sion ðe hie ofer beon sculon, ðæt hie
ðære geornfulnesse geearnigen ðæt hie sien ðæm hefonlicum neatum
gelice: ða wæron geiewde, sua hit awriten is ðæt hie wæron ymb eal
utan mid eagum besett, & eac innan eagena full.
 28.195.20. Sua hit is cynn ðætte ða sien ðe fore oðre
beon sculon, ðæt hie ægðer hæbben eagan innan ge utan, ðæt hi
mægen ðæm inncundan Deman on hira agnum inngeðonce lician, & eac
utane mid godum bisenum hiera agnes lifes hiera hieremonnum bisenigen, &
ðætte tælwyrðes on him sie, ðæt hie ðæt tælen, & hie
forðæm ðreagen.
 28.195.25. Ða underðioddan sint to manianne ðæt hie ðara
unðeawas ðe him ofergesette bioð to suiðe & to ðrisðlice ne
eahtigen, ðeah hie ryhte spræce hæbben hiera yfel on him to
tælanne;
 28.197.2. Ðylæs hie for ðære ryhtlæcinge weorðen
upahæfene, & on ofermetto gewiten.
 28.197.3. Ac hie sient suiðe georne to maniganne ðæt hi for
hira unðeawum hie ne forsion, ne no ðy suiður wið hi ne
ðrisðlæcen.
 28.197.5. Ac gif hie hwæt sua healicra yfela on him ongieten
ðæt hie hit niede sprecan scylen, ðonne don hie ðæt suiðe
diegellice betweoxn him, & ðeah for Godes ege under ðæm geoke his
hlaforddomes ðurhwunigen & hine for Godes ege weorðigen, sua mon
hlaford sceal.
 28.197.9. Ac gif we nu onginnað reccan ongemong ðissum ymbe
Dauides dæda sume, ðonne magon we ðis spel ðe openlicor gereccean.
 28.197.11. Hit gelamp æt sumum cierre ðæt he wæs gehyd
on anum eorðscræfe mid his monnum.
 28.197.12. Ða Saul hine wolde secean uppe on ðæm munte, ða
for he forð bi ðæm scræfe ðæt he oninnan wæs, & he his
ðær no ne wende.
 28.197.14. Ða gewearð hine ðæt he gecierde inn to ðæm
scræfe, & wolde him ðær gan to feltune.
 28.197.16. Ða wæs ðærinne se ilca Dauid mid his monnum,
ðe longe ær his ehtnesse earfoðlice ðolade.
 28.197.17. Ða cleopedon his ðegnas him to, & hine bædon,
& geornlice lærdon ðæt he hine ofsloge.
 28.197.18. Ac he him sona ondwyrde, & him suiðe stiernlice
stierde, & cuæð ðæt hit no gedæfenlic nære ðæt hie
slogon Gode gehalgodne kyning, & aras ðeah up, & bestæl hine to
him, & forcearf his mentles ænne læppan to tacne ðæt he his
gewald ahte.
 28.197.22. Hwæt tacnað us ðonne Saul buton yfle hlafurdas?
 28.197.23. Oððe hwæt Dauid buton gode ðeowas?
 28.197.23. Swa sua Saul elles ne meahte his wambe geclænsigan
buton he to feltune eode, sua eac ne magon ða yflan hlafurdas, ðonne hie
underfoð ða yflan geðohtas æt hiera heortan, ða ær alætan
ær hie utaberstað on fullicum weorcum.
 28.199.2. Sua sua Dauid forbær ðæt he Saul ne dorste
ofslean for Godes ege & for ðæm ealdum treowum, sua doð ða
æltæwan mod ðara godra esna.
 28.199.4. Hie forberað æghwelce unryhte tælinge: sua sua
Dauit forbær ðæt he ne slog mid his sueorde Saul, sua hie forberað
ðæt hie mid ðæm sueorde hiera tungna tælinge ne sleað hira
hlafurdes ðeawas, ðeah hie wieten ðæt hie elles æltæwe ne sin.
