 28.199.7. Ac gif he ðonne eallunge forberan ne mæg for hira
agnum unðeawum & for hiera ungestæððignesse ðæt hie hit ne
sciren, ðonne sprecen hie ymbe his ða læstan unðeawas & ðæt
ðeah suiðe diogollice.
 28.199.10. Sua sua Dauid cearf swiðe digellice suiðe lytelne
læppan of Saules mentle his ealdhlafordes, sua doð ða ðe hira
hlafordas diegellice tælað, & ðeah sua sua hit him no ne derige, ne
ne egle.
 28.199.13. Ac gif hwæm gebyrige ðæt he for his agnum
unðeawum on ða tælinge his hlafordes befoo, ðonne sceal he hine selfne
suiðe suiðlice forðæm tælan & ðara læstena worda
hreowsian.
 28.199.16. Forðæm hit is awriten ðætte Dauid, ða he
ðone læppan forcorfenne hæfde, ðæt he sloge on his heortan, &
suiðe suiðlice hreowsade ðæt he him æfre sua ungeriesenlice
geðenigan sceolde, ðeah his ðegnas hine ær lærdon ðæt he hine
mid his sweorde sloge.
 28.199.19. Swa scyle gehwelc mon forberan ðæt he mid ðæm
sweorde his tungan his hlaford ne slea;
 28.199.21. Ðæt is, ðeah he hine mid ryhte tælan mæge,
ðæt he hit ne doo.
 28.199.22. Gif him ðonne gewealdes gebyrige oððe ungewealdes
ðæt on ðæs hwæt befoo ðe wið his willan sie, ðeah hit on
ðæm ealra læstan ðingum sie, ðeah him is ðearf ðæt he his
heortan & his mod mid hreosunga suiðe pinige, & his agena scylda
ongiete, & him selfum deme suelc wite suelce he wene ðæt his hlaford
him deman wolde, gif he hit wiste;
 28.201.2. Forðæm ðonne we agyltað wið ða hlafordas,
ðonne agylte we wið þone God ðe hlafordscipe gescop.
 28.201.3. Be ðæm ilcan cuæð Moyses;
 28.201.4. Ða he gehierde ðæt ðæt folc mænde to him
Arone ymb hiera earfeðo, ða cuæð he: Hwæt is eower murcung wið
unc?
 28.201.5. Hwæt sint wit?
 28.201.6. Wið God ge doð ðæt ge dooð.
 29.201.7. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða
hlafordas, on oðre wisan ða ðegnas eac ða ðeowas.
 29.201.9. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðeowas, on oðre
ða hlafordas.
 29.201.10. Ða ðeowas sint to manianne ðæt hie simle on him
hæbben ða eaðmodnesse wið hira hlafordas.
 29.201.11. Ða hlafordas sint to manianne ðæt hie næfre ne
forgieten hu gelic hira gecynd is, & hu gelice hi sint gesceapene ðæm
ðiowum.
 29.201.13. Ða ðiowas sint to monianne ðætte hie hiera
hlafordas ne forsion.
 29.201.14. Hiera hlafordas hi forsioð, gif hie his willan &
his bebodu forhyggeað.
 29.201.15. Ðam hlafordum is eac to cyðanne ðætte hie wið
Gode ofermodgiað for his agenre giefe, gif hie ne ongietað ðæt ða
beoð hira gelican & hira efngemæccan on hira gecynde, ða ðe him
underðiedde beoð ðurh Godes gesceafte.
 29.201.19. Ðæm hlaforde is to cyðanne ðæt he ongiete
ðæt he is efnðeow his ðeowe.
 29.201.20. Ðæm ðeowan is beboden, & ðus to cueden:
Beoð ge underðeodde eowrum woroldhlafordum.
 29.201.21. & eft his is gecueden: ælc ðara ðe sie under
ðæm gioke hlafordscipes, he sceal his hlaford æghwelcre are &
weorðscipes wierðne onmunan.
 29.201.23. & eft hit is gecueden: Ge hlafordas, doð ge eowrum
monnum ðæt ilce be hira andefne & gemeggiað ðone ðrean;
 29.203.1. Geðencað ðæt ægðer ge hira hlaford ge eower
is on hefenum.
 30.203.3. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða dolan,
on oðre ða wisan.
 30.203.5. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe ðisse
worulde lotwrenceas cunnon, & ða lufigeað, on oðre ða medwisan.
 30.203.6. Ða lytegan sint to manianne ðæt hi oferhycggen
ðæt hie ðær wieton, ða sarwisan sint to manianne ðæt hie
wielnien to wietanne ðæt ðæt hie nyton.
 30.203.8. Ðæm lytegan is æresð to beleanne hiera
selflice, ðæt hie ne wenen ðæt hie sien wiese.
 30.203.10. On ðæm medwisan is to trymmanne swa hwæt sua hie
ongietan mægen ðæs godcundan wisdomes, forðon, ðonne hie nane wuht
ne ofermodgiað, ðonne beoð ða heortan suiðe gearwe wisdomes to
anfonne.
 30.203.13. Ac ymb ða lytegan we sculon suiðe suiðe suincan
ðæt hie ðone wisdom forlæten ðe him selfum ðyncð ðætte
wisdom sie, & fon to ðæm Godes wisdome ðe him dysig ðyncð.
 30.203.15. Ne ðarf mon na ðone medwisan læran ðæt he
ða lotwrencas forlæte, forðonðe he hie næfð.
 30.203.16. Forðæm him is micle ieðre to gestieganne on
ðone ryhtan wisdom ðonne ðæm lytegan sie to anbuganne, forðæmðe
he bið ær upahæfen on selflice for his lotwrencium.
 30.203.19. Be ðysum illcan cuæð sanctus Paulus: Suelc eower
suelce him selfum ðynce ðætte wisusð sie on ðæm lotwrencum,
weorðe ðæs æresð dysig, ðæt he mæge ðonan weorðan wis.
 30.203.21. Be ðam medwisan is gecueden: Ne sculon ge beon to wise
æfter ðæs lichoman luste.
 30.203.22. & eft cuðæ Paulus: ða ðe woruldmonnum
ðynceað dysige, ða geciesð Dryhten, forðæm ðæt he ða
lytegan, ðe mid ðissum woroldwrencium bioð upahæfene, gescende.
 30.205.1. & ðeah oft gebyreð ðæt ða bioð mid
liðlicre race gehwyrfde, & eft ða medwisan oft mid bisenum gehwyrfde.
 30.205.2. Ðæm lytegan ðonne is betere ðæt hie mid
ryhtre race weorðen oferreahte & mid ðære race gebundene &
ofersuiðde.
 30.205.4. Ðæm medwisan bið genog god ðæt he gecnawe
oðerra monna weorc untælwierðe.
 30.205.5. Be ðæm se æðela lareow sanctus Paulus, se
sceolde læran ægðer ge wise ge unwise, ða he ongeat ða Ebreas sume
wisran, sume medwisran, ða manode he, & cuæð to ðæm
gelæredum ðara aldena boca mid liðelicum wordum: ðætte nu foraldod
is, ðæt is forneah losad.
 30.205.9. & eft he cuæð to ðæm medwisan ða he
ongeat ðæt hie mon mid sumum bisnum manian sceolde: ða halgan menn
geðafedon on ðisse worlde monig bismer & monige swyngean & monige
bendas & carcernu, hie wæron stænde, & snidene mid snide, hie
wæron costade, & mid sweordum hi wæron ofslægene.
 30.205.14. Ond eft cuæð Paulus: Gemunað eowerra foregengena
ðara ðe eow bodedon Godes word, & behealdað hiera lif & hira
forðsiið, & gongað on ðone geleafan.
 30.205.16. Forðon he ðus cuæð ðæt he ða lotwrenceas
oferwunne & oferreahte;
 30.205.17. & eac ða medwiisan to maran angienne mid ðære
liðelican bisnunga gespone.
 31.205.19. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða
scamfæstan, & on oðre ða scamleasan.
 31.205.21. On oðre wisan sint to læranne ða scamleasan, on
oðre ða scamfæstan.
 31.205.22. Ðæm scamleasan ne wyrð no gestiered butan micelre
tælinge & miclum ðrean;
 31.205.23. Ða scamfæstan beoð oft mid gemetlicre lare
gebetrode.
 31.207.1. Ða scamleasa nyton ðæt hie untela doð, buton hit
mon him secge, & ðeah hit mon him secge, hie his ne geliefað, buton hie
monige menn forðy tælen.
 31.207.3. Se scamfæsta hæfð genoh on ðæm to his
bettrunge ðæt his lareow hine suiðe lythwon gemyndgige his unðeawa.
 31.207.4. Ðone scamleasan mon mæg ðy bet gebetan ðe hine
mon suiður ðreað & sciend, ac be ðæm scamfæstan hit is nyttre
ðæt ðæt him mon on tælan wille, ðæt hit mon healfunga sprece,
swelce hit mon hwon gehrine.
 31.207.8. Be ðæm Dryhten suiðe openlice tælde ða
scamleasan Iudeas, & cuæð: Eower nebb sint sua scamleas sua ðara
wifa ðe beoð forelegnissa.
 31.207.10. Ond eft he olehte ðam scamfæstan, ða he
cuæð: ðære scame & ðære scande ðe ðu on iuguðe worhtes
is gedoo ðæt ðu forgietsð & ðæs bismeres ðines wuduwanhades
ðu ne gemansð, forðæm ðæt is ðin Waldend ðe ðe geworhte.
 31.207.13. & eft ða scamleasan Galathas suiðe openlice
sanctus Paulus tælde, ða he cuæð: Eala ge ungewitfullan Galatæ,
hwa gehefegode eow?
 31.207.15. & eft he cuæð: Sua dysige ge sint ðætte
ðæt ðæt ge gæsðlice underfengon, ge willað geendigan
flæsclice.
 31.207.16. Ða scylda ðara scamleasena he tælde, suelce he
efnsuiðe him bære, & cuæð: Ic eom suiðe gefeonde on Dryhten
ðætte ge æfre woldon ænig wuht eow selfum wietan, ær ic hit eow
wite.
 31.207.19. Hit is god ðæt ge hit nu witon.
 31.207.20. Næron naht æmetige, ðeah ge wel ne dyden.
 31.207.21. Forðæm he spræc ðas word ðe he wolde ðara
scamleasna scylda tælende geopenian, & ðara scamfæstena giemelieste
he wolde mid liðelicum wordum gedieglan.
 32.209.1. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
ofermodan & ða upahæfenan on hira mode, on oðre wisan ða
earmheortan & ða wacmodan.
 32.209.4. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða modgan & ða
fortruwodan, on oðre ða unmodgan & ða unðristan.
 32.209.5. Ða fortruwodan, ðonne hie him selfum to suiðe
truwiað, hie forsioð oðre menn, & eac forcueðað.
 32.209.6. Ða lytelmodan ðonne & ða unðristan, ðonne
hie ongietað hiera unbældo & hiera unmiehte, hie weorðað oft
ormode.
 32.209.8. Ða modgan ðonne & ða fortruwudan, eall hiera
agen ðæt hie synderlice ðenceað oððe doð hie wenað ðæt
ðæt sie ðæt betste: ac ða unmodigan & ða ungedyrstigan
wenað ðæt ðæt suiðe forsewenlic sie ðætte hie doð, &
forðon weorðað oft ormode.
 32.209.12. Ac ðæm lareowe is swiðe smealice to underseceanne
be ðæm weorcum ðara ofertruwedena, ðæt hie him gecyðen ðætte
on ðam ðingum ðe hie him selfum sua suiðe licigað, ðæt hie Gode
misliciað.
 32.209.15. Swa we magon betst ða gedyrstigan gelæran
ðætte , ðonne hie wenen ðæt hie hæbben betst gedon, ðæt we
him ðonne secgen ðæt hie hæbben wierst gedon, ðætte, ðonne hie
wenen ðæt hie ðone gilp & ðæt lof begieten hæbben ðæt
hie ær wilnodon, ðæt hie ðonne hæbben mid ðy scame geholode.
 32.209.19. Hwilum eac, ðonne ða fortruwudan & ða anwillan
wenað ðæt hie nane scylde ðurhtogen næbben, ðonne magon we hi sua
raðosð to ryhte gecierran ðæt we him sume opene scylde, ðe ær
ðurhtogen wære, healfunga oðwieten, ðæt hie forðæm scamige,
forðæm of ðære scylde ðe he hine ðonne bereccan ne mæge, he
ongiete ða he ðonne deð, ðeah him ðonne ðynce ðæt he nan yfel
ne do.
 32.211.1. Ða fortruwodnesse & ða anwilnesse an Corinctheum
paulus ongeat suiðe wiðerweardne wið hine, & betweoh him selfum
suiðe aðundene & upahæfene;
 32.211.3. Sua ðætte sume cuædon ðæt hie wæron
Apollan, sume cuædon ðæt hi wæron Saules, sume Petres, sum cuæð
ðæt he wære Cristes.
 32.211.5. Ac Paulus ða sona ða unclænan scylde beforan him
alLum sæde, ðe an hiera ealra gewitnesse gedon wæs, & ðagiet
ungebet;
 32.211.7. He cuæð;
 32.211.7. We gehierdon betueoxn eow unryhthæmed, ge sua unryht
sua we furðum betwuxn hæðnum monnum ne hierdon, ðæt is ðæt ge
sume hæfdon eowre steopmodur, & ge ðæs næfdon nane sorge, &
noldon from eow adon ða ðe ðæt dydon, ac wæron sua upahæfene sua
ge ær wæron.
 32.211.11. Suelce he openlice cuæde: Hwæt wille ge for
eowerre fortruwodnesse & for eowerre anwilnesse cueðan, hwæs oððe
hwæs ge sien?
 32.211.13. Forðæmðe on eowerre towesnesse ge habbað
gecyðed ðæt ge ures nanes ne siendon.
 32.211.14. Ac ða lytelmodan & ða unðriestan we magon ðy
ieð on ðæm wege gebringan godra weorca, gif we healfunga & ðeah be
sumum dæle heora godan weorc secgeað, forðæm, ðonne we hira yfel
tælað, ðæt we eac hira god herigen, forðæm ðæt we hira
modes mearuwnesse gestiðigen mið ðæm ðæt hie gehiren ðæt we
hi herigen, & ðætte eft sien hira scylða geðreade mid ðam
ðæt we hie tælen.
 32.211.20. Oft we magon beon sua nyttran æt him, gif we hie
myndgiað hira godna weorca, & ða secgeað, & gif we hwæt
ongietað on him ungesceadwislices gedoon, ne sculon we no hi ðreagean
suelce hie hit gedoon hæbben, ðeah hit gedon sie, ac we sculon him
forbeodan ðæt hie huru sua ne don, suelce hit ðonne giet gedon ne sie,
forðæm ðæt sio hering ðe we ær heredon us gefultume ðæt we
hie wiðermode ne gedon mid ðære tælinge, ac ðæt sio hering
getrymme & gemetgige ðæs wacmodan & ðæs unðristan monnes
mod wið ða tælinge.
 32.213.3. Be ðam se ilcan Paulus cuæð, ða he ongeat
ðæt folc ðe Salonicensa hatte, ðæt hie on his lare fæste
wæron, & ðeah he ongeat ðæt hi gedrefde wæron mid wacmodnesse,
forðæmðe hie wendon ðæt hit near worulde endunge wære ðonne
hit wære;
 32.213.7. Ða ongon he æresð herigean on him ðæt
ðæt he fæsðrædes wiste, & sona æfter ðon suiðe
liðelice hierdde ða ðe he unfæsðrade wisse, & ðus cuæð:
We sculon simle secgan Gode ðoncas for eow broður, sua sua hit wel wierðe
is, forðæmðe eower geleafa hæfð ofer ðungen suiðe monigra
oðerra monna, & eower lufu is betweoxn eow suiðe genyhtsumu, sua
ðæt we apostolas sint suiðe gefeonde ealle for eowrum geleafan & for
eowrum geðylde.
 32.213.13. Ac sona æfter ðære liðelican spræce he
cuæð: Ic eow healsige broður for ðæm tocyme Dryhtnes Hælendan
Kristes & for ure gesomnunge ðæt ge no to hrædlice ne sien astyrede
from gewitte, ne eow to suiðe ne ondrædað for nanes monnes wordum ne for
nanes witgan gæste, ne ðeah eow hwelc ærendgewrit cume, suelce hit from
us send sie, & ðæron cyðe ðæt se domes dæg neah sie.
 32.213.19. Sua gedyde se soðfæsta lareow ðæt hie
æresð gehierdon ða heringe ðe him licode forðæm ðæt hie
æfter ðæm ðe lusðlicor gehierden ða lare, ðætte ðæt lof
hie to ðæm getrymede ðæt sio manung hie eft ne ðrycte.
 32.213.22. Ða he ongeat ðæt hie wæron onstryede mid
ðæm wenan ðæt hi ðæs endes sua neah wendon, ða spræc he
suelce he hit ðagiet nyste ðæt hie hit him ða io ondredon, ac forbead
him ðæt hit ne scolde sua weorðan, & wolde ðæt hie wenden
ðæt hie ðæs ðe untælwyrðran wæren ðe hie wendon ðæt
he nyste hira leohtmodnesse & hira unfæsðradnesse.
 33.215.3. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
ungeðyldgan, & on oðre ða geðyldgan.
 33.215.5. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ungeðyldgan, on
oðre wisan ða geðyldegan.
 33.215.6. Ðæm ungeðyldegum is to secganne ðæt hie ne
agimeleasigen ðæt hi hira mod gebridligen, ðæt hi ne hlipen
unwillende on ðæt scorene clif unðeawa;
 33.215.8. Sua hit oft gebyreð ðæt sio hatheortness & sio
hrædwilnes ðæt mod gebringð on ðæm weorce ðe hine ær nan
willa to ne spon, & deð ðeah sua astyred, suelce he hit ungewisses
oððe ungewealdes doo, ðæt him eft gehreoweð, siððan he hit wat.
 33.215.11. Forðæm him is to secgganne ðæt hie weorðað
oft ascrencte on ðæm scyfe ðære styringe hira modes, ðæt hi hira
selfra ne agon ðy mare geweald ðe oðerra monna, & suiðe seldon
magon ongietan hira ægen yfel, ærðon hi hit ðurhtogen habbað.
 33.215.15. Ac gif he ðonne ðære styringe ne wiðstent,
ðonne gescient he ða godan weorc ðe he oft ær on stillum mode
ðurhteah, & sua ungleaulice for ðæm scyfe ðære styringe suiðe
hrædlice towierpð ða godan weorc ðe he longe ær foreðonclice
timbrede, & ða geðyld ðe his modur & hierde ealra mægena for
ðæm unwrence ðære ungeðylde forlet, & eac ðæt mægen
ðære soðan lufan he forlet.
 33.215.21. Hit is awriten on Paules bocum ðæt sio Godes lufu
sie geðyld, & se ðe geðyldig ne sie, ðæt he næbbe ða Godes
lufe on him.
 33.215.23. Forðæm for ðæm unðeawe ðære ungeðylde
wirð utadrifen sio fostermodur ælcre leornunga & ælces cræftes,
& æghwelces lareowes lar wihxð ðurh his geðylde, æghwelc monn
bið onfunden sua micle læs gelæred ðonne oðer sua he bið
ungeðyldegra.
 33.217.3. Ne mæg he no ryhtlice geðyld læran, buton he
self geðyldelice oðerra monna tionan geðolige.
 33.217.5. Hwilum eac gebyreð for ðæm unðeawe ðære
ungeðylde ðæt ðæt mod wierð gesticced mid ðære scylde
gielpes, & he ne mæg geðyldgian ðæt he for ðisse worulde sie
foresewen, ac gif he hwæt diogollice for Gode to goode gedyde, ðonne ne
mæg he geðyldgian ðæt he ðæt forhele, ac wierð ðonon
gielpen, & ongienneð ðonne ðæt cyðan ðonne he ne mæg
geðolian ðæt hine menn forsion, ac geopenað hit mid gielpe.
 33.217.10. Be ðam is awriten ðæt betera beo se geðyldega
wer ðonne se gielpna, forðæmðe him bið leofre scande to ðolianne
ðonne ðæt god to cyðanne ðæt he deogollice deð, ðylæs he
for ðæm unðeawe ðæs gielpes hit forleose.
 33.217.14. Ac ðæm gielpnan bið leofre ðæt he secge on
hine selfne gif he hwæt godes wat, ge ðeah he nyte hwæt he soðes
secge, him is ðeah leofre ðæt he leoge ðonne him mon ænigra
ungerisna to wene.
 33.217.16. Ac he forlæt ðonne & towierpð eal ða godan
weorc ðe he ær worhte, ðonne he forlæt ða geðylde.
 33.217.18. Forðæm wæs suiðe ryhtlice beboden Ezechiele
ðæm witgan ðæt he scolde ðone Godes alter habban uppan aholodne
ðæt he meahte on healdan ða offrunga & ða lic ðe mon brohte to
ðæm weobude;
 33.217.21. Forðæm, gif se weobud ufan hol nære, &
ðær wind to come, ðonne tostencte he ða lac.
 33.217.22. Hwæt elles getacnað ðæt weobud buton ryhtwisra
monna saula?
 33.217.23. Forðæmðe nu eal ðæt se ryhtwisa to gode
deð eal hit bið beorht to lacum beforan Godes eagum, sua io wæs eall sio
offrung uppe on ðæt wiebed broht.
 33.217.25. Hwæt tacnað ðonne ðæt holh on ðæm
weobude buton godra monna geðyld?
 33.219.1. Forðam, ðonne mon his mod geeaðmodgað ðæt he
wiðerweardnesse & scande forbere, ðonne geeacnað he sum holh on his
mode sua sua ðæt weobud hæfð on him uppan.
 33.219.4. Holh wæs beboden ðæt sceolde beon on ðæm
weobude uppan, forðæm ðæt wind ne meahte ða lac tostencean, ðe
mon on ðæt weobud legde.
 33.219.6. Ðæt tacnað ðæt ðæt geðyld sceal
gehealdan ðara gecorenra monna mod, ðætte hit ne astyrige se wind
ðære ungeðylde, ðylæs hit forleose ða godan weorc ðe he ær
geworht hæfde.
 33.219.8. Wel hit wæs gecueden ðæt ðæt holh sceolde
beon on ðæm weobude anre elne brad & anre elne long, forðæm butan
tweon se ðe ða geðylde ne forlæt, he gehilt micle anmodnesse.
 33.219.11. Be ðæm cuæð sanctus Paulus: Bere eower ælc
oðre byrðenne betweoxn eow, ðonne gefylle ge Godes æ.
 33.219.13. Ðæt is ðonne Godes æ ðæt mon hæbbe
lufe & geðyld, ðæt micelne beam on ðinum agnan.
 33.225.2. Sio gedrefednes ðære ungeðylde on ðæm mode
ðæt is se smala cið, ac se yfela willa on ðære heortan ðæt is
se greata beam.
 33.225.4. Ðone ungeðyldegan ðonne suiðe lytel scur
ðære costunga mæg onhreran, sua sua lytel wind mæg ðone cið
awecgan, ac ðone yfelan fæsðrædan willan fulneah nan wind ne mæg
awecgan.
 33.225.7. Be ðæm cuæð Dryhten: ðu licettere, aweorp
æresð of ðinum agnum eagan ðone greatan beam, & cunna siððan
hwæðer ðu mæge adon ðone cið of ðines broður eagan.
 33.225.9. Suelce he cuæde to ðæm unryhtwisan mode, ðe
innan bið gnornigende, & utan licet geðyld: Adoo æresð from ðe
ða byrðenne ðæs yfelan willan, & tæl siððan oðerne for
his ungeðylde & for his leohtmodnesse;
 33.225.12. Forðæm ðonne ðu ne wilnasð ðæt ðu
oferswiðe/ & forlæte ða licettunge on ðe selfum, ðonne meaht
ðu ðy wyrs geðyldgian oðres monnes yfel.
 33.225.15. & oft ðeah gebyreð ðæm geðyldgan, ðeah
him mon hwæt wiðerweardes doo, oððe he hwelce scande gehiere bi him
selfum, ðæt he ðonne nawuht æt ðam cierre ne bið onstyred, ac
gebærð sua geðyldelice suelce he hit hæbbe mid ealre heortan
forlæten.
 33.225.18. Ac ðonne he hit eft ofman æfter lytlum fæce,
ðonne ofðyncð him ðæs ilcan ðe he ær forbær, & bið eft
onæled mid ðy fyre ðæs sares.
 33.225.20. Secð ðonne & smeað hu he hit gewrecan mæge,
& ða monnðwærnesse ðe he ær ðurhtogen hæfde eft
ðeahtigende on yfel gewend.
 33.225.22. Ac ðæm mæg beon suiðe hraðe geholpen from
his lareowe, gif he him sægð hwonon ðæt cymð, & hu se lytega
dioful styreð gewinn & gefeoht betweoxn him twam: oðerne he lærð
ðæt he onginne sume scande bi ðæm oðrum oððe sprecan oððe
don, oðerne he lærð ðæt he ða scande forgielde.
 33.227.1. Ac hit gebyreð oftosð ðæt se bið ofersuiðed,
se ðe ðurh diofles lare æresð bið onæled mid ðy unryhtan
niðe, ðeah he sua ne wene, ðonne he hit æresð onginð;
 33.227.4. & se hæfð oftosð ðone weorðscipe, se ðe
ær geðyldelic ða scande forbær.
 33.227.5. Ac ðonne se diobul hæfð ðone ærran
gewunnenne, & he bið under his geoc gegan, ðonne went he mid ealle
cræfte ongen ðæs oðres geðyld, ðe him ðonne giet wiðwinð,
& bið suiðe sorig, forðæm he on ðæm forman gefeohte hiene ne
meahte ofsceotan mid ðæm bismere, ðe he ðurh ðone oðerne him to
sende.
 33.227.10. Lætt ðonne an ðæt gefeoht sua openlice sume
hwile, & ongienð hine diogollice læran, & slitan his inngeðonc,
& bit ðære tide, hwonne he ðæs wierðe sie ðæt he hine
besuican mote.
 33.227.12. Forðæm he hine ne meahte mid openlicum gefeohte
ofersuiðan, sætað ðonne diogollice, & secð hu he hine mæge
gefon.
 33.227.14. Se geðyldiga ðonne eft, ðonne ðæt gestilled
bið, ðonne went he eft ongean mid his mode, & geman ðone demm
oððe ðæt bismer, ðæt him ær gedon wæs, & ðonne
suiðe hrædlice & suiðe ungemetlice eahtað eall ðæt him ær
gedon wæs, & hit ðonne suiðe unaberendlic talað, & mid sua
micelre murcunga his agen mod gedrefð, ðætte oft ðone geðyldegestan
scamað ðæs siges ðe he ofer ðone dioful hæfde mid his geðylde,
& he ðonne sua gebunden fram ðam diofle sargað ðæs, & him
ofðyncð ðæt he hit sua emne & sua geðyldelice forbær ðæt
he ðæt bismer ne forgeald, ðencð ðæs timan hwonne he hit wyrs
geleanian mæge.
 33.227.23. Ac hwam beoð ðonne ðas ðyllecan geliccran
ðonne ðæm folce ðe on clænum felda weorðlicne sige gefeohtað,
& eft innan hira burgum fæste belocene ðurh hiera giemelieste hie
lætað gebindan, oððe suelce hie ær lægen on longre medtrymnesse,
& hie ðeah gewierpten, & eft cume an lytel febbres, & hie
ofslea?
 33.229.3. Ða geðyldegan sint to manianne ðætte hie hira
heortan getrymigen æfter ðæs miclan sige, & ða burg hira modes
wið stælherigas behealden, & mid wighusum gefæsðnige, suelce he
him ðære adle edcier suiður ondræde ðonne ðone fruman, ðylæs
se lytega fiond æfter fierste suiður fægnige ðæt he hine mid his
lotwrencium besuice, ðeah he hine ær openum gefeohte ofercome, & him
ðone stiðan suiran forbræce.
 34.229.10. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða
welwillendan, & on oðre ða æfestgan.
 34.229.12. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða welwillendan, on
oðre ða æfstegan.
 34.229.13. Ða welwillendan sint to manianne ðæt hie sua
fægenigen oðra monna godra weorca ðæt hie eac selfe ðæs ilcan
lyste, & sua gielpen hiera niehstena dæda ðæt hie him eac
onhyrigen.
 34.229.15. Nimen him bisene on hira godan weorcum, & icen hie
simle mid hira agenum, ðylæs hie sien to oðerra monna gefeohte holde
haweras, & don him selfe nawuht, & ðonne eft æfter ðam gefeohte
sie butan æghwelcum edleane on ðys andweardan life.
 34.229.19. Se ðe nu on ðæm gefeohte ðisses andweardan
lifes nile suincan, ne his selfes plion, he ongiet eft hine selfne ofercymenne
& gesciendne, ðonne he gesiehð & gehierð ða weorðigan ðe
ær wel ongunnon, ða ða he idel wæs.
 34.229.22. Suiðe suiðe we gesyngiað, gif we oðerra monna
welgedona dæda ne lufigað & ne herigað, ac we nabbað ðeah nane
mede ðære heringe, gif we be sumum dæle nellað onginnan ðæt we
onhyrigen ðæm ðeawum ðe us on oðrum monnum liciað be dæle ðe
we mægen.
 34.231.4. Forðæm is to secganne ðæm welwillendan monnum
ðæt hi habbað sua micle mede oðerra monna godra weorca, gif hie him
nanwuht ne onhyrigeað, sua we habbað ðæs hleahtres, ðonne we
hliehað gligmonna unnyttes cræftes.
 34.231.7. We herigað hira cræftas, & ðeah nyllað hi
habban, forðæm we hiera nabbað nan lof.
 34.231.9. We wundriað hu wel hie liciað for hira cræfte,
& ðeah ne wilnigað no ðæt we sua licigen.
 34.231.10. Ðæm welwillendum is to secganne, ðonne hie
gesioð hiera geferena god weorc, ðæt hie eac ðencen to him selfum,
& ne fortruwigen hie for oðerra monna weorcum, ðylæs hie herigen
hiera godan weorc, & onscunigen ðæt hie selfe sua don.
 34.231.13. Ðæs ðy wyrse wite hie sculon habban on ende ðe
him licað ðæt mon wel doo, & nyllað ðæm onhyrigean be sumum
dæle.
 34.231.15. Ac ða æfstegan sint to manianne ðæt hie
ongieten hu blinde hi beoð, ðonne hie beoð unrote for oðerra monna
godan weorcum, & for hira ryhtum gefean beoð unbliðe, forðæm hie
beoð suiðe ungesælige, ðonne hie yfeliað, forðæmðe oðre
menn godigað, & ðonne hie geseoð ðara oðerra gesælða
eaciende, ðonne ðyncð him ðæt hie wiellen acuelan for ðære
medtrymnesse ðæs oðres gesælignesse, sua he bið genierwed on his
mode.
 34.231.21. Hwa mæg beon ungesæligra ðonne se æfstiga?
 34.231.22. Ðonne ðu gesiehsð ðæt he bið utan gedrefed,
hu micle ma wenstu ðæt he sie innan for ðæs oðres gode.
 34.231.24. Ðæt god ðæt se oðer ðonne deð, ðæt
meahte beon eac his god, ðeah he hit ðonne git don ne meahte, gif he hit
wolde lufigean on ðæm oðrum.
 34.233.2. Ealle ða ðe wunigeað on anum geleafan & on anum
willan hie beoð sua sua manegu limu on anum menn, & ælc hæfð
ðeah sundernytte, & ðeah ða limu mislice todælde sin, ælc hira
bið on oðres nytte swa some swa on his selfes.
 34.233.5. Ðonon hit gewyrð ðæt se fot gesiehð ðurh
ðæt eage, & ðæt eage stæpð on ðæm fotum, ða earan
gehierað for ðone muð, & ðæs muðes tunge sceal faran on ðara
earena ðearfe, & sio womb sceal fulteman ðæm hondum, & sio hond
sceal wyrcean for ða wambe.
 34.233.9. On ðæs lichoman gesceafte we underfengon ealle ða
ðenunga ðe we nu ðiowiað & wyrceað.
 34.233.10. Forðæm hit is micel sceand, gif we nyllað
licittan ðæt we sien ðæt we sindon, forðæm butan tweon ðæt
bið ure ðæt ðæt we lufigeað on oðrum monnum, ðeah we hit
selfe don ne mægen, & ðæt oðre menn on us lufigeað, ðæt
bið hira.
 34.233.14. Geðencen be ðysum ða æfstigan hu micel mægen
bið on ðære lufe ðæt hio gedeð ðæt oðerra monna gesuinc
& hira weorc bið ure butan ælcum gesuince ures lichoman.
 34.233.16. Ac ðæm æfstegum is to secganne, gif hie hie
nyllað healdan wið ðæm æfste, ðæt hie weorðað besencte on
ða ealdan unryhtwisnesse ðæs lytegan fiondes, ðe bi him awriten is
ðætte for his æfeste deað become ofer ealle eorðan.
 34.233.19. Forðæmðe he hefonrice mid his agenre scylde
forworhte, ða ofðuhte him ðætte menn wæron to ðæm gesceapene,
& icte ða his agne scylde mid ðæm æfste, ðæt he tiolode menn
forlæran ðæt hie wurden eac forlorene sua he wæs.
 34.233.23. Eac sint to læranne ða æfstigan ðætte hie
ongieten under hu micelre frecenesse hie liecgað, & hu hie iceað hira
forwyrd, ðonne hie of hira heortan nyllað aweorpan ðone æfst, ac hine
healdað, oððæt hie afeallað on opene scylde, swæ swæ Cain
dyde.
 34.235.2. Ne gefiolle he no on swæ opene scylde ðæt he his
broður ofsloge, gif he ær ne geæfstgode ðætte his broður lac
wæron ðancweorðlicor onfongne ðonne his.
 34.235.4. Be ðam is awriten ðæt Dryhten besawe to Abele
& to his lacum, & nolde to Caine ne to his lacum.
 34.235.5. Ða wearð Cain suiðe hrædlice irre, &
hnipode ofdune, & se anda ða ðe he hæfde to his breðer,
forðæmðe his lac wæron onfangne & his næron, se anda wearð
to sæde ðæs broðurslæges, forðæm him eglde ðæt he wæs
betra ðonne he, & ðohte, sua he eft gedyde, ðæt he hine ofsloge,
wurde siððan to ðæm ðe hit meahte.
 34.235.10. Forðæm is to secganne ðæm æfstegum sua
hwæt oðres godes sua on him ongieten bið.
 34.235.12. Be ðæm is awriten ðætte ðis flæsclice lif
sie æfesð, & he sie ðære flæsclican heortan hælo, &
ðeah ða ban for him forrotigen.
 34.235.14. Hwæt getacnað ðonne ðæt flæsc buton
unfæsð weorc & hnesce, & hwæt ða ban buton stronglice geworht
weorc?
 34.235.16. Oft ðeah gebyreð ðætte sume, ða ðe
welwillende beoð on monegum weorcum, unfæste beoð ongietene, & sume
beoð beforan monna eagum gesewen suelce he fæsðlicu & stranglecu
weorc wyrce, & ðeah, ðeah he swa do beforan monnum, for ðam andan
oðerra monna godena weorca, he bið aswunden oninnan him selfum.
 34.235.21. Forðy is wel gecueden ðætte ðæt flæsclice
lif sie ðære heortan hælo, forðæm se ðe gehielt his
unsceadfulnesse & his godan willan, ðeah he hwæt tiederlices oððe
yfelra weorca utan doo, he mæg ðæt æt sumum cierre betan.
 34.235.24. Ac ðæt is suiðe ryhte gecueden be ðæm banum
ðæt hie forrotigen for ðæm æfste, forðæm for ðæs
æfstes scylde forweorðað ða godan weorc, ðeah ðe hie beforan monna
eagum ðyncen trumlice gedon.
 34.237.2. Ðæt is ðæt ða ban forrotigen for ðæm
æfste ðæt he forleose sum suiðe god weorc for ðæm æfste.
 35.237.4. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manienne ða
bilwitan, on oðre ða ðweoran & ða lytegan.
 35.237.6. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða biliwitan, on
oðre ða lytegan.
 35.237.7. Ða bilewitan sint to herigenne, forðæmðe hie
simle suincað on ðæm ðæt hi tieligeað ðæt hie ne sculen
leasunga secgan.
 35.237.8. Hie mon sceal eac læran ðæt hi hwilum suigien
ðæs soðes, forðæm, sua sua sio leasung simle deret ðæm
secggendum, sua dereð eac hwilum sumum monnum ðæt soð to gehierenne.
 35.237.11. Forðæm ure Dryhten gemetgode mid suigean his
spræce beforan his ðegnum, ða he cuæð: Fela ic hæbbe eow to
secganne, ac ge hit ne magon nu giet aberan.
 35.237.13. Ðy sint to manianne ða bilwitan anfealdan
ðætte, sua sua hie ða leasunga nyttwyrðlice fleoð, ðæt hie eac
ðæt soð nytwyrðlice secgen, & geicen ða god hira anfealdnesse
mid wærscipe, & sua tilige ðære orsorgnesse mid ðære
anfealdnesse ðætte he ðone ymbeðonc ðæs wærscipes ne
forlæte.
 35.237.18. Be ðam cwæð se æðela lareow sanctus Paulus:
Ic wille ðæt ge sien wise to gode & bilwite to yfele.
 35.237.19. Ond eft be ðæm cwæð Dryhten ðurh hine selfne
to his gecorenum: Beo ge swa ware sua sua nædran & sua bilwite sua
culfran.
 35.237.21. Forðæm on ðara acorenra monna heortan sceal
ðære nædran lytignes & hire nið ðære culfran biliwitnesse
gescirpan, & eft ðære culfran biliwitnesse sceal gemetgian ðære
nædran wærscipe & hire nið, ðylæs hine se wærscipe & se
anda gelæde on ealles to micle hatheortnesse, oððe eft sio bilewitnes
& sio anfealdnes hine to ungeornfulne gedoo to ongietanne, ðylæs he
weorðe besolcen.
 35.239.3. Ongean ðæt mon sceal monian ða lytegan, & him
secgan ðæt hie ongieten hu hefig ðæt twiefalde gesuinc bið ðæt
hie him selfe ðurh hira agena scylda hira agnes gewealdes him on geteoð.
 35.239.6. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt hie eallneg ræswað
& ondrædað ðæt hi mon tælan wille, & beoð eallneg mid
ðæm ymbeðoncan abisgode & ofdrædde.
 35.239.8. Oðer is ðara gesuinca ðæt hi simle seceað
endelease ladunga, hu hie ðonne bereccan mægen.
 35.239.9. Ac nis nan scild trumra wið ðæt tuiefalde gesuinc
ðonne mon sie untwiefeald, forðæmðe nawuht nis ieðre to gesecganne,
ne eac to geliefanne ðonne soð.
 35.239.11. Ac ðonne hwa on ða leasunga befehð, ðonne ne
mæg he of, ac sceal ðonne niede ðencean hu he hie gelicettan mæge,
& gewergað ðonne his heortan suiðe hearde mid ðy gesuince.
 35.239.14. Be ðæm gesuince spræc se salmscop, ða he
cuæð: ðæt gesuinc hira agenra welena hie geðrycð.
 35.239.15. Forðæm se ilca feond se ðe nu ðæt mod ðurh
ða bisuiculan olicunga forlæreð, he hit eft mid suiðe grimmum edleane
geðryscð.
 35.239.17. Be ðæm wæs gecueden ðurh Ieremias ðone
witgan: Hie lærdon hira tungan, & wenedon to leasunge, & swuncon on
unryhtum weorce.
 35.239.19. Suelce he openlice cuæde: ða ðe meahton Godes
friend beon butan gesuince, hie suuncon ymb ðæt hu hie meahton gesyngian.
 35.239.21. Wietodlice, ðonne hwa nyle bielwitlice libban butan
gesuince, he wile geearnian mid his gesuince his agenne deað.
 35.239.23. Ac monige menn, ðonne him beoð unðeawas on
anfundene, ðonne anscunigað hie ðæt mon wite hwelce hie sien, &
wilniað ðæt hie hie gehyden & beheligen under ðæm ryfte
ðære leasunga, ge furðum ðara scylda ðe openlice beoð gesewena,
hie wilniað ðæt hie scylen hie beladian sua georne ðætte oft se
ðe wilnað hiera unðeawas arasian, bið openlice besuicen & ablend
mid ðæm miste ðære leasunga, sua ðæt him fulneah ðyncð
ðætte his nawuht sua ne sie sua sua he ær witodlice be him wende.
 35.241.5. Be ðæm ryhtlice bi Iudeum wæs gecueden ðurh
ðone witgan ymb ðæt synfulle mod ðe hit simle wile ladian, he
cuæð: ðær ðær se iil hæfde his holh.
 35.241.7. Se iil getacnað ða twiefealdnesse ðæs
unclænan modes ðe hit symle lytiglice ladað, sua sua se iil,
ærðæm he gefangen weorðe, mon mæg gesion ægðer ge his fet ge
his heafod ge eac eall ðæt bodig, ac sona sua hiene mon gefehð, sua
gewint he to anum cliewene, & tihð his fet sua he inmest mæg, &
gehyt his heafod, sua ðætte betwuh hondum ðu nast hwær him awðer
cymð, oððe fet oððe heafod, & ær, ær ðu his o onhriene,
ðu meahtes geseon ægðer ge fet ge heafod.
 35.241.14. Swa doð ða lytegan & ða unclænan mod:
ðonne him bið sum unðeaw on onfunden, ðonne bið ðæs iles heafud
gesewen;
 35.241.16. Ðonne mon mæg ongietan of hwam hit æresð com,
& for hwæm.
 35.241.17. & ðonne beoð ða fet gesewene, ðonne mon
ongiet mid hwelcum stæpum ðæt nawht wæs ðurhtogen, ac ðeah
ðæt unclæne mod suiðe hrædlice fehð on ða ladunga, & mid
ðære beheleð his fet & ða stæpas his unnyttan weorces.
 35.241.20. Ðonne he tiehð his heafod in to him, ðonne he mid
wunderlicre ladunga ætiewð ðæt he furðum næfre ðæt yfel ne
ongunne, sua he hit hæfð mid his lotwrencium bewunden oninnan him selfum,
suelce se lareow hæbbe an cliwen on his honda suiðe nearwe & suiðe
smealice gefealden, & nyte hwær se ende sie, sua feor & sua fæste
hit bið gefealden oninnan ðæs synnfullan monnes ingeðonce, & mid
his lote bewunden, ðætte se lareow ðæs yfeles ðe he stieran scolde,
ðeah ðe he hit ær wisðe, ðæt he hit ðonne nat, & eall
ðæt he ær tælwyrðlices geseah mid ðam forhwirfdan gewunan
ðære unryhtan ladunge he bið amierred ðæt he hit eal endemes
forlæt, & his nanwuht nat.
 35.243.5. Wietodlice se il hæfð his holh on ðæs unnyttan
monnes heortan, forðæm ðæt yfelwillende mod gefielt hit self twiefald
oninnan him selfum, & gehyt hine on ðæm ðiestran mid ðære
ladunge, sua se iil hine selfne gehyt on him selfum.
 35.243.10. Gehieren ða unclænan & ða lytegan hu hit
awriten is on Salomonnes bocum ðætte se libbe getreowlice se ðe
bilwitlice libbe.
 35.243.12. Ðæt is se truwa micelre orsorgnesse, biliwitnes
& anfealdnes his weorca.
 35.243.13. Gehirað hwæt of ðæs wisan Salomonnes muðe
wæs gecueden;
 35.243.14. He cuæð ðæt ðæs Halgan Gæstes lar
wille fleon leasunga.
 35.243.15. Gehirað eac ðætte ðæræfter awriten is
ðætte he hæbbe his geðeaht & his sundorspræce mid ðæm
bilwitum & mid ðæm anfealdum.
 35.243.17. Ðonne spricð God to ðæm menn, ðonne he
onlieht ðæt mennisce mod mid his agenre andweardnesse, & him his
dieglan ðing geopenað.
 35.243.19. Ðonne is eac gecueden ðætte God spræce to
ðæm bilwitum, ðonne he mid ðæm uplicum & mid ðæm dieglum
ðingum hira mod onlieht mid ðæm sciman his giefe & his fandunga
& eac his tiehtinge.
 35.243.22. Ðæt beoð ðonne ealles suiðusð ða mod ða
ðe nan sceadu ne geðiestrað ðære twiefaldnesse.
 35.243.23. Ac ðæt is ðeah syndrig yfel twiefaldra monna
ðætte, ðonne ðonne hie oðre menn mid hira lote bismriað, ðonne
gielpað hie & fægeniað ðæs, suelce hi sien micle wærran
& wisran ðonne hie, forðæmðe hie ne geðenceað ða ðearlan
edlean, ac fægniað irmingas hiera agnes dysiges & hearmes.
 35.245.2. Gehiren eac ða ilcan mid hwelcum ymbeðonce godcundes
onwaldes hie ðreade Soffonias se witga, ða he cuæð: Giet cymð se
micla & se mæra & se egeslica Godes dæg, se dæg bið irres
dæg & ðiestra dæg & mistes & gebreces & biemena dæg
& gedynes ofer ealla truma ceastra & ofer ealle hea hwammas.
 35.245.7. Hwæt getacniað ðonne ða truman ceastra butan
hwurfulu mod, getrymedu & ymbtrymedu mid lytelicre ladunge, ðæt him ne
magon to cuman ða speru ðære soðfæsðnesse, ðæt sindon
haligra gewrita manunga?
 35.245.10. Wið ða speru ðære soðfæstnesse hie
hie scildað, ðonne hi mon tælan wile & arasian for hira unðeawum.
 35.245.11. Hwæt getacniað ðonne ða hean hwammas buton
unclænu & twiefeald mod?
 35.245.13. Forðæm ælc wag bið gebieged twiefeald on
ðæm heale.
 35.245.13. Sua bið ðæs monnes heorte: ðonne he ða
bilewitnesse & ða anfealdnesse flihð, he gefielt his mod mid wore &
mid unnytre twiefealdnesse, & eac ðætte wierse bið, he hine ahefð
on his geðohte on gielp & on ofermetto for ðæm wærscipe his
agenre scylde, & deð his agenne unðeaw him to weorðscipe.
 35.245.18. Ðonne cymð se Dryhtnes domes dæg & wrace
dæg ofer ða truman ceastra & ofer ða hean hwammas, ðonne ðæt
ierre ðæs ytemestan domes ða menniscan heortan towyrpð, ða ðe nu
sindon betynede & getrymede mid lytelicum ladungum wið ða
soðfæsðnesse, & arafað ðæt cliwen ðære twifaldan
heortan.
 35.245.22. Ðonne feallað ða truman ceastra, ðonne ða mod
ðe Dryhtne ungeferu sint weorðað gesciende.
 35.245.24. Ðonne feallað ða hean hwammas, ðonne ða
heortan ðe hie ahebbað for ðære tuiefealdnesse ðæs unryhtan
wærscipes ðurh ryhtlicne cuide & dom weorðað ofdune aworpne.
 36.247.3. Ðætte on oþre wisan sint to manienne ða halan,
on oðre ða unhalan.
 36.247.5. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða truman, on oðre
ða untruman.
 36.247.6. Ða truman sint to manianne ðæt hie gewilnigen mid
ðæs licuman trumnesse ðæt him ne losige sio hælo ðæs modes,
ðylæs him ðy wirs sie, gif hie ða trumnesse ðære Godes giefe him
to unnyte gehweorfað, & ðylæs hie siððan geearnigen sua micle
hefigre wite sua hie nu egeleaslicor & unnytlicor brucað ðære
mildheortlican Godes giefe.
 36.247.11. Forðon sint to manianne ða halan ðæt hie ne
forhycgen ðæt hie her on worulde on ðære hwilendlican hælo him
geearnigen ða ecan hælo.
 36.247.13. Ymb ða hwilendlican tida sanctus Paulus spræc, ða
he cuæð: Nu is hiersumnesse tima & nu sint hælnesse dagas.
 36.247.14. Eac sint to manianne ða halan ðæt hie Gode
wilnigen to licianne ðe hwile ðe hie mægen, ðylæs hie eft ne
mægen, ðonne hie willen.
 36.247.16. Forðon wæs gesprecen ðurh ðone wisan Salomonn
bi ðæm Wisdome ðæt se Wisdom wille sona fleon ðone ðe hine
fliehð, ðonne he hine ful oft ær to him cleopað, & he forsæcð
ðæt he him to cume.
 36.247.19. Ac eft, ðonne he ðone Wisdom habban wolde, & his
wilnað, ðonne cuið se Wisdom to him: Ic eow cleopode ær to me, ac ge
me noldon æt cuman;
 36.247.21. Ic ræhte mine hond to eow, nolde iower nan to
locian;
 36.247.22. Ac ge forsawon eall min geðeaht, & leton eow to
giemeleste, ðonne ic eow cidde.
 36.247.23. Hwæt sceal ic ðonne buton hliehchan ðæs,
ðonne ge to lose weorðað, & habban me ðæt to gamene, ðonne eow
ðæt yfel on becymð ðæt ge eow ær ondredon?
 36.249.2. Ond eac cuið se Wisdom eft: ðonne hie to me
clipiað, ðonne nylle ic hie gehieran.
 36.249.4. On uhtan hie arisað, & me seceað, ac hi me ne
findað.
 36.249.5. Ac ðonne se mon his lichoman hælo forsihð,
ðonne ðonne he wel trum bið to wyrceanne ðæt he ðonne wile,
ðonne ðonne him eft sio hæl losað, ðonne gefred he æresð hwelc
heo to habbanne wæs ða hwile ðe he hi hæfde, & wilnað hire to
late & on untiman, ðonne he ær nolde hie gehealdan, ða ða he hi
hæfde.
 36.249.9. Forðæm eft suiðe ryhtlice Salomonn cuæð: Ne
læt ðu to ælðiodigum ðinne weorðscipe, ne on ðæs
wælhreowan hond ðin gear, ðylæs fremde menn weorðen gefylled of
ðinum gesuince, & ðin mægen sie on oðres monnes gewealdum, &
ðu ðonne sargige forðæm on lasð, ðonne ðin lichoma beo to lore
gedon, & ðin flæsc gebrosnod.
 36.249.14. Hwa is ðonne from us fremde butan ða awiergdan
gæstas, ða ðe from ðæs hefencundan Fæder eðle adrifene
sindon?
 36.249.16. Oððe hwæt is ure weorðscipe on ðissum
eorðlicum lichoman buton ðæt we sint gesceapene æfter ðære
biesene ures Scippendes?
 36.249.18. & hwæt is elles se wælhreowa buton ða
aworpnan englas, ðe hie selfe mid hiera ofermettum on deaðes wite
gebrohton?
 36.249.19. & on ðone ilcan deað hie wilniað eal moncynn
to forspananne & to forlædanne.
 36.249.21. Hwæt tacnað ðonne ðæt word elles ðæt
mon ne selle his weorðscipe fremdum menn buton ðætte se ðe to Godes
bisene gesceapen is, ðonne he ða tid his lifes on gewil ðara awierdena
gæsta gehwierfð;
 36.249.24. & his gear geseleð wælhreowum, se se ðe in
yfelra & wiðerweardra onwald forlæt ða hwile his lifes?
 36.249.25. Ond eac cuæð Salomonn ðæt fremde ne scolden
beon gefyllede ures mægenes, & ure gesuinc ne scolde beon on oðres
monnes anwalde.
 36.251.2. Sua hwa ðonne sua on ðisse worulde hæfð Fulle
hæle his lichoman, & nyle wisdomes & cræftes on his mode tiligan,
ac suinceð on ðæn ðæt he leornige unðeawas & fremme, ne
fylð se no his agen hus godra cræfta, ac fremdra hus he fylð, ðæt
sint unclæne gæstas.
 36.251.6. Wiotodlice ða ðe hira lif on firenluste & on
ofermodnesse geendigað, ne gefyllað hie godra rim, ac awiergedra gæsta.
 36.251.8. Ðonne is æfter ðæm gecueden ðæt he sargige
æt niehstan, ðonne his lichoma & his flæsc sie gebrosnod,
forðæm oft sio hælo ðæs lichoman on unðeawas wierð gecierred,
ac ðonne he ðære hælo benumen wierð mid monigfaldum sare ðæs
modes & ðæs flæsces, se lichoma ðonne wierð gedrefed,
forðæm sio saul, ðonne hio hire unðonces gebædd wierð ðæt
yfel to forlætanne ðæt hio ær longe on woh hire agnes ðonces
gedyde, secð ðonne ða forlorenan hælo, & wilnað ðære,
suelce he ðonne wel & nytwyrðlice libban wolde, gif he forð moste.
 36.251.16. Murcnað ðonne forðy ðæt he Gode nolde
ðiowigan ða hwile ðe he meahte, forðon he ðonne ðone demm his
giemelieste mid nanum gesuince gebetan ne mæg, buton him ðurh his
hreowsung & ðurh Godes miltse geholpen weorðe.
 36.251.19. Forðæm cuæð se sealmscop: ðonne God hie
slog, ðonne sohton hie hine.
 36.251.20. Ongean ðæt sint to manianne ða mettruman ðæt
hie ongieten & gefreden ðæt hie sua micle ma beoð Godes bearn, &
he hie sua micle ma lufað sua he hie suiður manað & suingð,
forðæm, gif he ðæm gehiersuman mannum næfde geteohchad his eðel
to sellanne, hwie wolde he hie mid ænegum ungetæsum læran ?
 36.251.25. Forðæm cuæð Dryhten to Iohanne ðam
godspellere ðurh his engel, he cuæð: Ic ðreage & suinge ða ðe
ic lufige.
 36.253.1. Forðæm eac cuæð Salomonn: Sunu min, ne
agiemeleasa ðu Godes suingan, ne ðu ne beo werig for his ðreaunge,
forðæmðe God lufað ðone ðe he ðreað, & suingeð ælc
bearn ðe he underfon wile.
 36.253.4. Be ðam ilcan se salmscop cuæð: Suiðe monigfalde
sint ryhtwisra monna earfoðu.
 36.253.5. Be ðæm eac se eadega Iob cwæð on his
earfeðum, & geomriende cliopode to Dryhtne, & cuæð: Gif ic
ryhtwis wæs, ne ahof ic me no forðy, & ðeah ic eom gefylled mid
broce & mid iermðum.
 36.253.8. Eac is to cyðanne ðæm mettrumum, gif hie willen
geliefan ðætte Godes rice hiera sie, ðæt hie ðonne her on worulde
ðoligen earfeðu ðæm timum ðe hie ðyrfen, sua sua mon sceal on
elðiode.
 36.253.11. Be ðys ilcan is gecueden on kyninga bocum, sua sua hit
geworden wæs, & eac us to bisene.
 36.253.12. Hit is gecueden ðætte ða stanas on ðæm
mæran temple Salomonnes wæron sua wel gefegede & sua emne gesnidene
& gesmeðde, ær hie mon to ðæm stede brohte ðe hie on standan
scoldon, ðætte hie mon eft siððan on ðære halgan stowe sua
tosomne gesette ðæt ðær nan monn ne gehierde ne æxe hlem ne
bietles sueg.
 36.253.17. Ðæt ðonne tacnað us ðætte we scylen beon
on ðisse ælðeodignesse utane beheawene mid suingellan, to ðæm
ðæt we eft sien geteald & gefeged to ðæm gefogstanum on ðære
Godes ceastre butan ðæm hiewete ælcre suingean, ðætte sua hwæt
sua nu on us unnytes sie, ðætte ðæt aceorfe sio suingelle from us,
sua ðætte siððan an sibb Godes lufe butan ælcum ungerade us suiðe
fæste gebinde & gefege tosomne.
 36.253.23. Ðonne sint eac to manianne ða unhalan ðæt hie
geðencen mid hu monigfaldum ungetæsum & mid hu heardum brocum us
swingað & ðreagað ure worldcunde fædras & hlafordas,
forðæm ðe hie wilniað ðæt we him geðwære sien, & eac
hira irfes wierðe sien, & hie us ðe bliðran beon mægen.
 36.255.2. Ac hwelc wite sceal us ðonne to hefig ðyncan
ðære godcundan ðreaunga wið ðæm ðe we mægen geearnian ðone
hefonlican eðel ðe næfre to lore ne weorðeð, & forðæm
ðæt we mægen forbugan ðæt wite ðæt næfre ne wierð
geendod?
 36.255.6. Forðæm cuæð sanctus Paulus: Ure flæsclican
fædras lærdon us, & we hie ondredon;
 36.255.7. Hie ðreadon us, & we weorðodon hie.
 36.255.8. Hu micle suiðor sculon we ðonne beon gehiersume
ðæm ðe ure gæsta Fæder bið wið ðæm ðæt we moten
libban on ecnesse.
 36.255.9. Ure flæsclican fædras us lærdon to ðæm ðe
hira willa wæs, ac ðæt wæs to suiðe scortre hwile, forðæmðe
ðios woruld is suiðe lænu, ac se gæsðlica Fæder he us lærð
nytwyrðlicu ðing to underfonne, ðæt is ðæt we geearnigen
ðæt ece lif.
 36.255.13. Eac sint to manianne ða mettruman ðæt hie
geðencen hu micel hælo ðæt bið ðære heortan ðæt se
lichoma sie medtrum, forðæm sio medtrymnes ðæt mod gehwierfð
gehwelces monnes hine selfne to ongietanne, & ðæt gode mod ðe sio
hælo ful oft aweg adriefð ðæt gemynd ðære medtrymnesse
geedniewað, ðætte ðæt mod ðe ofer his mæð bið upahæfen
gemyne of ðæm suingum ðe ðæt flæsc ðolað to hwæm eal
monncynn gesceapen is.
 36.255.19. Ðæt wære suiðe ryhte getacnod ðurh Balaham
on ðære lettinge his færeltes, gif he mid his hiersumnesse Godes stemne
& his gebodum fullice folgian wolde, & on his willan fore.
 36.255.22. Baloham ðonne fulgeorne feran wolde ðær hine mon
bæd, ac his estfulnesse witteah se esol ðe he onuppan sæt.
 36.255.23. Ðæt wæs forðæmðe se assa geseah ðone
engel ongean hine standan, & him ðæs færeltes forwiernan, ðone
ðe ðæt mennisce mod geseon ne meahte.
 36.257.1. Sua eac, ðonne ðæt flæsc bið gelett mid sumum
broce, hit getacnað ðæm mode for ðære suingan hwæt Godes willa
bið, ðone illcan willan ðe ðæt mod hwilum ongietan mæg ðe ofer
ðæm flæsce sitt, & his wealdan sceolde, forðæm ðæt
flæsc oft lætt ða geornfulnesse & ðone willan ðæs ðiondan
modes her on worulde.
 36.257.5. Sua mon oft lett fundigendne monna, & his færelt
gælð, sua gælð se lichoma ðæt mod, oððæt he gebrocad
wierð mid sumre mettrymnesse, & ðonne ðurh ða mettrymnesse
getacnað se lichoma ðæm mode ðone ungesewenan engel ðe him togenes
stent, & him wiernð his unnyttan færelta ðurh ðæs lichoma
mettrymnesse.
 36.257.10. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Petrus suiðe ryhtlice:
ðæt dumbe & ðæt gehæfte neat ðreade ðone witgan for his
yfelan willan, ða hit cleopode sua sua monn, & mid ðy gestierde
ðæm witgan his unryhtre & dyslicre wilnunga.
 36.257.13. Ðonne ðreað ðæt dumbe neat ðone unwisan
monn, ðonne ðæt gebrocode flæsc gelærð ðæt upahæfene mod
to ryhttre & to nyttwyrðre eaðmodnesse.
 36.257.15. Forðæm ne meahte Balaham geearnian ða Godes giefe
ðe he biddende wæs,ða he Israhela folc wirgean wolde & for hine
selfne gebiddan;
 36.257.17. Forðæm he wearð untygða ðe he hwierfde his
stemne nales his mod: ðæt wæs ðæt he spræc oðer, oðer
ðæt he sprecan wolde.
 36.257.19. Eac sint ða seocan to monianne ðæt hie ongieten
hu micel Godes giefu him bið ðæs flæsces gesuinc, forðæmðe hit
ægðer ge ða gedonan synna aweg aðwiehð, ge hine eac ðara gelett
ðe he don wolde, gif he meahte, forðæm ðonne he bið gesargod on
ðæs lichoman wundum, ðonne gewyrceað ða wunda on ðæm gebrocodan
mode hreowsunge wunda.
 36.257.24. Bi ðæm is eac awriten on Salomonnes cuidbocum
ðæt sio wund wolde halian, æfterðæmðe heo wyrmsde.
 36.259.1. Ðonne aflewð ðæt sar of ðære wunde mid ðy
wormse, ðonne ðæt sar ðære suingellan ðissa woruldbroca
aðwiehð ægðer ge ða geðohtan synna ge ða gedonan of ðære
saule.
 36.259.4. Eac cuæð Salomon ðætte ðæt illce beo bi
ðæm wundum ðe beoð oninnan ðære wambe.
 36.259.5. Ðære wambe nama getacnað ðæt mod, forðæm
sua sua sio wamb gemielt ðone mete, sua gemielt ðæt mod mid ðære
gescadwisnesse his geðeahtes his sorga.
 36.259.7. Of Salomonnes cuidum we namon ðætte ðære wambe
nama scolde tacnian ðæt mod, ða ða he cuæð: ðæs monnes lif
bið Godes leohtfæt;
 36.259.9. Ðæt Godes leohtfæt gindsecð & gindlieht
ealle ða diogolnesse ðære wambe.
 36.259.11. Suelce he cuæde: æresð he hiene onlieht mid his
leohtfæte, ðonne he hiene gelieffæsð, & eft he hine onlieht,
ðonne he hiene onælð mid ðæm tapure ðæs godcundan lieges.
 36.259.13. Ðæt bið ðonne, ðonne he deð ðæt he
ongiet his agne unnytte ðeawas & geðohtas ðe wen is ðæt he ær
hæfde, ðeah he hit geðencean ne meahte.
 36.259.15. Ðæt worms ðonne ðara wunda ðæt is ðæt
broc ðæs lichoman, & ðæt sar innan ðære wambe, ðæt
tacnað ða sorge ðæs modes.
 36.259.17. Sio sorg ðonne aswæpð aweg ðæt yfel of
ðæm mode.
 36.259.18. Ðonne we beoð butan ðæm mode on ðæm
lichoman gesuencte, ðonne beo we suigende gemanode mid ðære mettrymnesse
ura synna to gemunanne, forðæmðe ðonne bið broht beforan ures modes
eagan eall ðæt we ær yfeles gedydon, forðæm sua se lichoma
suiður utan ðrowað, sua ðæt mod suiður innan hreowsað ðæs
unnyttes ðe he ær dyde.
 36.259.23. Forðæm gelimpð ðætte ðurh ða openlican
wunda & ðurh ðæt gesewene sar ðæs lichoman bið suiðe wel
aðwægen sio diegle wund ðæs modes, forðæm sio diegle wund
ðære hreowsunga hælð ða scylðe ðæs won weorces.
 36.261.1. Eac sint to manianne ða mettruman to ðæm ðæt
hie gehealden ða strenge ðære geðylde.
 36.261.3. Him is to secgeanne ðæt hie unablinnendlice
geðencen hu monig yfel ure Dryhten & ure Alisend geðolode mid ðam
ilcan mannum ðe he self gesceop, & hu fela edwites & unnyttra worda
he forbær, & hu manige hleorslægeas he underfeng æt ðæm ðe
hine bismredon.
 36.261.7. Se ilca se ðe ælce dæg saula gereafað of
ðæs ealdan feondes honda, se ilca se ðe us ðwiehð mid ðy halwyndan
wætre, se na ne forbeag mid his nebbe ðara triowleasena monna spatl,
ðonne hie him on ðæt nebb spætton.
 36.261.10. Se ilca se us gefreoð mid his forespræce from ecum
witum, se ilca suigende geðafode swingellan.
 36.261.11. Se ðe us sealde ece are betwuxn his engla geferscipe,
he geðafode ðæt hine mon mid fyste slog.
 36.261.13. Se ðe us gehæleð from ðæm stice urra synna,
he geðafode ðæt him mon sette ðyrnenne beag on ðæt heafud.
 36.261.14. Se ðe us oferdrencð mid ðæs ecan lifes liðe,
he gefandode geallan biternesse, ða hine ðyrstte.
 36.261.16. Se ðe for us gebæd to his Fæder, ðeah he him
emnmiehtig sie on his godhade, ða ða him mon on bismer to gebæd, ða
swugode he.
 36.261.18. Se se ðe deadum monnum lif gearuwað, & he self
lif is, he becom to deaðe.
 36.261.19. Forhwy ðonne sceal ænigum menn ðyncan to reðe
oððe to unieðe ðæt he Godes suingellan geðafige for his yfelum
dædum, nu God self sua fela yfeles geðafode, sua sua we ær cuædon,
for monncynne?
 36.261.22. Hwa sceal ðonne, ðara ðe hal & good andgiet
hæbbe, Gode unðoncfull beon, forðæm, ðeah he hine for his synnum
suinge, ne se ne for butan suingellan of ðys middangearde se ðe butan
ælcre synne wæs & giet is?
 37.263.1. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe him
ondrædað Godes swingellan oððe monna, & forðy forlætað
ðæt hie yfel ne doð;
 37.263.3. On oðre wisan ða ðe beoð swa aheardode on
unryhtwisnesse ðæt hi mon ne mæg mid nanre ðreaunge geðreatian.
 37.263.6. On oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe him suingellan
ondrædað, & forðæm unsceaðfullice libbað;
 37.263.7. & on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe on hiera
unryhtwisnessum sua aheardode beoð ðæt hie mon mid nanre swingellan
gebetan ne mæg.
 37.263.9. Ðæt is to cyðanne ðe him swingellan
ondrædað ðæt hie ðissa eorðlicena goda to suiðe ne gietsien,
ðeah hie geseon ðæt ða yfelan hie hæbben ongemong him, forðæm
hie sint ægðrum gemæne ge yfelum monnum ge godum;
 37.263.12. & ne fleon eac ðis andwearde yfel, suelce hie hit
adriogan ne mægen, forðonðe hit oft gode menn her on worlde dreogað.
 37.263.14. Eac hie sint to monianne, gif hie geornlice wilnigen
ðæt him yfel ðing losie, ðonne beo him suiðe egefull ðæt ece
wite;
 37.263.16. Nalles ðeah sua egeful ðæt hie ealneg
ðurhwunigen on ðæm ege, ac mid ðam fostre ðære Godes lufan hie
sculon uparisan & weaxan a ma & ma to lufigeanne ða godcundan weorc.
 37.263.19. Forðæm Iohannis se godspellere cwæð on his
ærendgewrite, ic cwæð: Sio fulfremede Godes lufu adrifeð aweg ðone
ege.
 37.263.20. & eft cwæð sanctus Paulus: Ne underfengon ge no
ðone Gast æt ðæm fulluhte to ðeowigeanne for ege, ac ge hine
underfengon to ðæm ðæt ge Gode geagenudu bearn beon scielen, forðy
we cliepiað to Gode, & cweðað, Fæder, Fæder.
 37.263.24. Forðæm cwið eft eac se ilca lariow: ðær se
Dryhtnes gast is, ðær is freodoom.
 37.265.1. Gif ðonne hwelc mon forbireð his synna for ðæm
ege anum ðæs wites, ðonne nafað ðæs ondrædendan monnes mod
nanne gastes freodom, forðæm, gif he hit for ðæs wites ege ne
forlete, butan tweon he fulfremede ða synne.
 37.265.4. Ðonne nat ðæt mod ðæt him bið freodom
forgiefen, ðonne hit bið gebunden mid ðæs ðeowutes ege.
 37.265.6. Ðeah monn nu good onginne for sumes wites ege, hit mon
sceal ðeah geendigean for sumes godes lufum.
 37.265.7. Se ðe for ðæm anum god deð ðæt he sumre
ðreaunge yfel him ondrætt, se wilnað ðætte nan ðing ne sie ðe
he him ondrædan ðyrfe, ðæt he ðy orsorglicor dyrre don unnyttlicu
ðing & unalifedu.
 37.265.10. Ðonne bið suiðe sweotol ðætte him ðonne
losað beforan Gode his ryhtwisnes, ðonne he ðurh his agene geornfulnesse
gesyngað unniedenga, ðonne bið suiðe sueotul ðæt he ðæt good
na ne dyde ðær he hit for ðæm ege dorste forlætan.
 37.265.14. Ongean ðæt ðonne sint to monianne ða menn ðe
suingellan ne magon forwiernan ne na gelettan hiera unryhtwisnesse.
 37.265.15. Hie beoð to ðreageanne & to swinganne mid swa
micle maran wite sua hie ungefredelicor beoð aheardode on hiera unðeawum.
 37.265.17. Oft eac ða swelcan monn sceal forsion mid eallum
forsewennessum, & unweorðian mid ælcre unweorðnesse, forðæm
ðætte sio forsewennes him ege & ondrysnu on gebringe, & eft
æfter ðæm ðæt hiene sio godcunde manung on wege gebringe, &
hine to hyhte gehwierfe.
 37.265.21. Ðonne sint eac ðæm ilcan monnum suiðe
ðearllice to recceanne ða godcundan cwidas, ðæt hie bi ðam
oncnawæn, ðonne hie geðencen ðone ecean dom, to hwæm hiera agen
wise wirð.
 37.265.24. Eac hie sculon gehieran ðæt on him bið gefylled
Salomonnes cwide ðe he cwæð, he cwæð: ðeah ðu portige ðone
dysegan on pilan, swa mon corn deð mid piilstæfe, ne meaht ðu his dysi
him from adrifan.
 37.267.2. Ðæt ilce sarette se witga, ða ða he cwæð:
ðu hie tobræce, & ðeah hie noldon underfon ðine lare.
 37.267.3. Eft bi ðæm ilcan cwæð Dryhten: Ic ofslog ðis
folc, & to forlore gedyde, & hie hie ðeah noldon onwendan from hiera
woom wegum, ðæt is, from hiera yfelum weorcum.
 37.267.6. Bi ðæm ilcan eft cwæð se witga: ðis folc nis
no gewend to ðæm ðe hie swingð.
 37.267.7. Ymb ðæt ilce sargode se witga, sua sua god lareow
deð, ðonne he his gingran suingð, gif hit him nauht ne forstent.
 37.267.9. Be ðæm cwæð se witga: We lacnodon Babylon,
& hio ðeah ne wearð gehæled.
 37.267.10. Ðonne bið Babylon gelacnad, nales ðeah fullice
gehæled, ðonne ðæs monnes mod for his unryhtum willan & for his
won weorcum gehierð sceamlice ðreaunga, & sceandlice suingellan
underfehð, & ðeahhwæðre oferhygð ðæt he gecierre to
bettran.
 37.267.13. Ðæt ilce eac Dryhten oðwat Israhela folce, ða
hie wæron gehergeode & of hiera earde alædde, & swaðeah noldon
gesuican hiera yfelena weorca, ne hie noldon awendan of hiera won wegum;
 37.267.16. Ða cwæð Dryhten: ðiss Israhela folc is geworden
nu me to sindrum & to are & to tine & to iserne & to leade inne
on minum ofne.
 37.267.18. Suelce he openlice cwæde: Ic hie wolde geclænsian
mid ðæm gesode ðæs broces, & wolde ðæt hie wurden to golde
& to seolufre, ac hie wurdon gehwierfde inne on ðam ofne to are & to
tine & to isene & to leade, forðæmðe hie noldon on ðæm
gesuincium hie selfe gecirran to nyttum ðingum, ac ðurhwunedon on hiera
unðeawum.
 37.267.23. Witodlice ðæt ar, ðonne hit mon slihð, hit
bið hludre ðonne ænig oðer ondweorc.
 37.267.24. Sua bið ðæm ðe suiðe gnornað on ðære
godcundan suingellan, he bið on middum ðæm ofne gecirred to are.
 37.269.2. Ðæt tin ðonne, ðonne hit mon mid sumum cræfte
gemengð, & to tine gewyrcð, ðonne bið hit swiðe leaslice on
siolufres hiewe.
 37.269.4. Sua hwa ðonne sua licet on ðære swingellan, he
bið ðæm tine gelic inne on ðæm ofne.
 37.269.5. Se bið ðonne ðæm isene gelic inne on ðæm
ofne, se ðe for ðære suingellan nyle his ðweorscipe forlætan, ac
ofan his nihstan his lifes.
 37.269.7. Ðæt lead ðonne is hefigre ðonne ænig oðer
andweorc.
 37.269.8. Forðy bið inne on ðæm ofne geworden to leade se
se ðe sua bið geðrysced mid ðære hefignesse his synna ðæt he
furðum on ðæm broce nyle alætan his geornfulnesse & ðas
eorðlican wilnunga.
 37.269.11. Bi ðæm ilcan is eft awriten: ðær wæs
suiðe suiðlic gesuinc, & ðær wæs micel swat agoten, &
ðeah ne meahte monn him of animan ðone miclan rust, ne furðum mid fyre ne
meahte hiene mon aweg adon.
 37.269.14. He us stiereð mid fyres broce, forðæmðe he
wolde from us adon ðone rust urra unðeawa, ac we ðeah for ðæm broce
ðæs fyres nyllað alætan from us ðæt rust ðara unnyttra weorca,
ðonne we on ðære suingellan nyllað gebetan ure unðeawas.
 37.269.18. Be ðæm cwæð eft se witga: Idel wæs se
blawere, forðon hiera awiergdan weorc ne wurdon from him asyndred.
 37.269.19. Eac is to witanne ðætte oft ðæm bið
gestiered mid manðwærlicre manunga, ðæm ðe monn mid heardre
suingellan gecirran ne mæg, & ða ðe ne magon ðrouunga gestieran
yfelra weorca, eft hie hie forlætað for liðelicre olicunga, sua sua ða
seocan, ða ðe mon oft ne mæg gelacnian mid ðæm drencium strangra
wyrta gemanges, ða ful oft beoð mid wlacum watre gelacnode, & on
ðære ilcan hælo gebrohte ðe hie ær hæfdon.
 37.271.1. Sua beoð eac ful oft ða wunda mid ele gehælda,
ða ðe mon mid gesnide gebetan ne meahte.
 37.271.2. & eac se hearda stan, se ðe aðamans hatte, ðone
mon mid nane isene ceorfan ne mæg, gif his mon onhrinð mid buccan blode,
he hnescað ongean ðæt liðe blod to ðæm suiðe ðæt hine se
cræftega wyrcean mæg to ðæm ðe he wile.
 38.271.6. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe to
swiðe swige beoð, on oðre wisan ða ðe willað to fela idles &
unnyttes gespræcan.
 38.271.9. On oðre wisan sint to monianne ða suiðe suigean, on
oðre wisan ða ðe beoð aidlode on oferspræce.
 38.271.10. Ða suiðe suigean mon sceal læran ðætte hie,
ðonne ðonne hie sumne unðeaw unwærlice fleoð, ðæt hie ne sien
to wyrsan gecirde, & ðæron befealdne, sua him oft gebyreð, ðonne
hie hiora tungan ungemetlice gemidliað ðæt hie beoð micle hefiglicor
gedrefde on hiera heortan ðonne ða oferspræcean, forðæm for
ðære suigean hiora geðohtas beoð aweallene on hiora mode, forðæm
hie hie selfe nidað to healdonne ungemetlice swigean, & forðæm
beoð suiðe forðrycte.
 38.271.17. Forðæm gebyreð oft ðæt hie beoð sua micle
ungestæððelicor toflowene on hiera mode sua hie wenað ðæt hie
stilran & orsorgtran beon mægen for hiera suigean.
 38.271.19. Ac forðæmðe mon ne mæg utane on him ongietan
for hiera suigean hwæt mon tæle, hie beoð innane oft ahafene on
ofermettum, swa ðæt hie ða felasprecan forseoð, hie for nauht doð,
& ne ongietað na hu suiðe hie onlucað hiera mod mid ðæm
unðeawe ofermetta, ðeah hie ðæs lichoman muð belucen;
 38.271.24. Ðeah sio tunge eaðmodlice licge, ðæt mod bið
suiðe upahafen, & sua micle freolicor he tælð on his ingeðonce
ealle oðre menn sua he læs ongitt his agene uncysta.
 38.273.2. Eac sint to manianne ða suiðe suigean ;
 38.273.3. Ðæt hie geornlice tiligen to wietanne ðæt him
nis na ðæs anes ðearf to ðenceanne hwelce hie hie selfe utane eowien
mannum, ac him is micle mare ðearf ðæt hie geðencen hwelce hi hie
innan geeowigen Gode, & ðæt hi swiðor him ondræden for hiera
geðohtum ðone diglan Deman, ðe hie ealle wat, ðonne hie him ondræden
wið hiera wordum & dædum hiera geferena tælinge.
 38.273.8. Hit is awriten on Salomonnes cwidum: Sunu min, ongiet
minne wisdom & minne wærscipe, & behald ðin eagean & ðin
earan to ðæm ðætte ðu mæge ðin geðoht gehealdan.
 38.273.10. Forðæm nan wuht nis on us unstilre &
ungestæððigre ðonne ðæt mod, forðæm hit gewitt sua oft fram
us sua us unnytte geðohtas to cumað, & æfter ælcum ðara
toflewð.
 38.273.13. Be ðæm cwæð se psalmsceop: Min mod & min
wisdom me forlet & eft he gehwearf to him selfum, & wearð on his
agenum gewitte, & cwæð: ðin ðeow hæfð nu funden his wisdom,
ðæt is ðæt he hine gebidde to ðe.
 38.273.16. Forðæm, ðonne monn his mod gehæft, ðæt
ðæt hit ær gewunode to fleonne hit gemet.
 38.273.17. Oft eac ða suiðe suigean, ðonne hie monige unnytte
geðohtas innan habbað, ðonne weorðað hie him to ðy maran sare
innan, gif hie hi ut ne sprecað, ond hwilum gebyreð, gif he hit
gedæftelice asægð, ðæt he mid ðy his sorge gebet.
 38.273.21. Hwæt we wieton ðæt sio diegle wund bið sarre
ðonne sio opene, forðam ðæt worsm ðæt ðærinne gehweled
bið, gif hit bið utforlæten, ðonne bið sio wund geopenod to hælo
ðæs sares.
 38.273.24. Eac sculon weotan ða ðe ma swugiað ðonne hie
ðyrfen, ðætte hie hiera sorge ne geiecen mid ðy ðæt hie hiora
tungan gehealden.
 38.275.1. Eac hie sint to manianne, gif hie hiera nihstan lufien
swa sua hie selfe, ðæt hie him ne helen forhwy hi hie tælen on hiera
geðohte, forðæm sio spræc cymð hiora ægðrum to hælo,
forðamðe hie ægðer ge ðæt gehwelede on ðæm oðrum
geopenað & utforlæt, ðæt he wierð ðonon gehæled, ge ðone
oðerne gelærð, & his unðeawa gestierð.
 38.275.6. Se ðe ðonne hwæt yfeles ongiet on his nihstan,
& hit forswugað, he deð sua sua se læce ðe gesceawað his
freondes wunde, & nyle hie ðonne gelacnigan.
 38.275.9. Hu, ne bið he ðonne swelce he sie his slaga, ðonne
he hine mæg gehælan, & nyle?
 38.275.10. Forðæm is sio tunge gemetlice to midliganne, nales
ungemetlice to gebindanne.
 38.275.11. Be ðæm is awriten: Se wisa suigað, oð he ongiet
ðæt him bið nyttre to sprecanne.
 38.275.12. Nis hit nan wundur, ðeah he swugie, & bide his
timan, ac ðonne he nytwyrðne timan ongiet to sprecenne, he forsihð ða
swigean, & spricð eall ðæt he nytwyrðes ongiet to sprecanne.
 38.275.15. & eft hit is awriten on Salomonnes bocum, ðæm
ðe Ecclesiastis hatton, ðætte hwilum sie spræce tiid, hwilum
swigean.
 38.275.17. Forðæm is gesceadwislice to ðenceanne hwelcum
tidum him gecopust sie to sprecanne, ðætte, ðonne ðonne he sprecan
wille, he his tungan gehealde ðæt hio ne racige on unnytte spræca, ne
eft ne aseolce ðær he nytte sprecan mæg.
 38.275.20. Be ðæm suiðe wel cwæð se psalmsceop: Gesete
Dryhten hirde minum muðe & ða duru gestæððignesse.
 38.275.22. Ne bæd he no ðæt he hine elle fortynde mid
gehale wage, ac he bæd dura to, ðæt he meahte hwilum ontynan, hwilum
betynan.
 38.275.24. Ðy we sculon geleornian ðæt we suiðe wærlice
gecope tiid aredigen, & ðonne sio stemn gesceadwislice ðone muð
ontyne, & eac ða tid gesceadwislice aredigen ðe sio suige hine betynan
scyle.
 38.277.3. Ongean ðæt sint to læranne ða oferspræcean
ðæt hie wacorlice ongieten fram hu micelre ryhtwisnesse hie beoð
gewietene, ðonne hie on monigfealdum wordum slidrigað.
 38.277.5. Ac ðæt mennisce mod hæfð wætres ðeaw.
 38.277.6. Ðæt wæter, ðonne hit bið gepynd, hit miclað
& uppað & fundað wið ðæs ðe hit ær from com, ðonne
hit flowan ne mot ðider hit wolde.
 38.277.8. Ac gif sio pynding wierð onpennad, oððe sio wering
wirð tobrocen, ðonne toflewð hit eall, & ne wierð to nanre nytte,
buton to fenne.
 38.277.10. Sua deð ðæs monnes mod, ðonne hit
gesceadwislice ne can his swigean gehealdan, ac hit abricð ut on idle
oferspræce, & wierð swa monigfealdlice on ðæm todæled, suelce
hit eall lytlum riðum torinne, & ut of him selfum aflowe, ðæt hit
eft ne mæge in to his agnum ondgiete & to his ingeðonce gecirran.
 38.277.14. Ðætte ne bið forðæmðe hit bið todæled
& to monigfealda spræca, suelce he self hine selfne ute betyne from
ðære smeaunga his agnes ingeðonces, & sua nacodne hine selfne eowige
to wundigeanne his feondum, forðæmðe he ne bið belocen mid nanum
gehieldum nanes fæstenes.
 38.277.18. Swa hit awriten is on Salomonnes cwidum ðætte se
mon se ðe ne mæg his tungan gehealdan sie gelicost openre byrig, ðære
ðe mid nane wealle ne bið ymbworht.
 38.277.21. Forðæm sio burg ðæs modes, ðe mid nanre
suigean ne bið bityned sceal suiðe oft gefredan hiere feonda speru,
forðæm hio ætieweð hie selfe suiðe opene hiere feondum, ðonne hio
hie selfe toweorpeð ut of hiere selfre mid unnyttum wordum, & hio bið
micle ðe ieðre to oferfeohtanne ðe hio self fieht wið hie selfe mid
oferspræce to fultome ðæm wiðfeohtende, forðæm hio bið oft
oferfohten butan ælcum gesuince.
 38.279.2. Oft ðonne ðæt hefige mod glit niðor &
niðor stæpmælum on unnyttum wordum, oð hit mid ealle afielð, &
to nauhte wirð;
 38.279.4. Forðæm hit ær hit nolde behealdan wið unnyt
word, hit sceal ðonne niedinga afeallan for ðæm slide.
 38.279.5. Æt ærestum lyst ðone monn unnyt sprecan be
oðrum monnum, & ðonne æfter firste hine lyst tælan & slitan
ðara lif butan scylde ðe he ðonne ymbspricd, oððæt hit on last of
his tungan utabirst to openum bismere ðæm oðrum.
 38.279.9. Swa he sæwð ðone sticel ðæs andan,
oððæt ðærof aweoxð towesnes, & of ðære towesnesse bið
ðæt fyr onæled ðære feounga, & sio feoung adwæscð ða
sibbe.
 38.279.11. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecweden ðurh ðone
wisan Salomon, ðætte se se ðæt wæter utforlete wære fruma
ðære towesnesse.
 38.279.13. Se forlæt ut ðæt wæter, se ðe his tungan
stemne on unnyttum wordum lætt toflowan.
 38.279.14. Ac se wisa Salomon sæde ðætte suiðe deop pol
wære gewered on ðæs wisan monnes mode, & suiðe lytel unnyttes
utfleowe.
 38.279.16. Ac se se ðe ðone wer bricð, & ðæt
wæter utforlæt, se bið fruma ðæs geflites.
 38.279.17. Ðæt is ðonne se ðe his tungan ne gemidlað, se
towierpð anmodnesse.
 38.279.18. Eft cwæð Salomon: Se gemetgað irre, se ðe
ðone disigan hætt geswugian.
 38.279.19. Forðæm se næfre ne mæg ryhtwisnesse &
gesceadwisnesse healdan, se ðe ofersprecol bið.
 38.279.21. Ðæt tacnode se salmsceop, ða he cwæð: Se
oferspræcea wer ne wierð he næfre geryht ne gelæred on ðisse
worlde.
 38.279.22. Eft cwæð Salomon bi ðæm ilcan: Ne bið
næfre sio oferspræc butan synne.
 38.279.23. Bi ðæm cwæð eac Essaias se witga, he cwæð
ðætte sio suyge wære ðære ryhtwisnesse fultum & midwyrhta.
 38.279.25. Ðæt ðonne tacnað ðætte ðæs modes
ryhtwisnes bið toflowen, ðe nele forhabban ða ungemetgodan spræce.
 38.281.2. Be ðæm cwæð Iacobus se apostol: Gif hwa
teochhað ðæt he æfæst sie, & nyle gemidlian his tungan,
ðæt mod lihð him selfum, forðæm his æfæstnes bið suiðe
idlu.
 38.281.4. & eft he cwæð: Sie æghwelc mon suiðe
hræd & suiðe geornful to gehieranne, & suiðe læt to
sprecenne.
 38.281.6. Eft bi ðam ilcan he gecyðde hwæt ðære tungan
mægen is, he cwæð ðæt hio wære unstille, yfel &
deaðberendes atres full.
 38.281.8. & eft us manode sio Soðfæstnes ðurh hie selfe,
ðæt is Crist, he cuæð: ælces unnyttes wordes ðara ðe men
sprecað hie sculon ryht awyrcean on domes dæge.
 38.281.10. Ðæt bið ðonne openlice unnyt word, ðætte
gescedwise menn ne magon ongietan ðæt hit belimpe to ryhtwislicre & to
nytwyrðlicre ðearfe auðer oððe eft uferran dogore oððe ðonne.
 38.281.13. Gif we ðonne sculon ryht agildan unnyttra worda, hwelc
wite wene we ðæt se felaspræcea scyle habban ðe simle on
oferspræce syngað?
 39.281.16. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe
bioð to late, on oðre ða ðe bioð to hrade.
 39.281.18. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe beoð to
late, on oðre ða ðe beoð to hrade.
 39.281.19. Ða slawan sint to manianne ðæt hie ne forielden
ðone timan for hiera slæwðe ðe hie tiola on don mægen.
 39.281.20. Ða hradan ðonne sint to manianne ðæt hie to
unwærlice ne onetten, ðylæs hie forhradien ðone betestan timan, &
hiera mede forðæm forleosen.
 39.281.22. Ðam slawum ðonne is to cyðanne ðætte oft,
ðonne we nellað hwæthwugu nytwyrðes don, ðonne ðonne we magon,
ðætte hwilum eft cymð sio tid ymb lytel fæc ðætte we ðonne
willað, & ne magon.
 39.283.1. Forðæm, ðonne we forslawiað ðone gecopestan
timan, ðætte we ðonne ne beoð onælde mid ðære lustbærnesse
ures modes, ðonne bistilð sio slæwð on us, & ricsað ðonne ofer
us, oððæt hio us awyrtwalað from ælcre lustbærnesse godra
weorca.
 39.283.5. Be ðæm wæs suiðe wel gecweden ðurh Salomon
ðone snottran: Sio slæwð giett slæp on ðone monnan.
 39.283.6. Se slawa ongit hwæt him ryht bið to donne, swelce he
ealneg wacige, & swaðeah he aslawað, forðæmðe he nawuht ne
wyrcð, ac sio slæwð him giet on ðone slæp, cwæð Salomonn,
forðæm, ðeah he ryhtlice ðence, lytlum & lytlum he forlist
ðæt gode andgiet, ðonne he forlætt ða geornfulnesse ðæs
goðan weorces.
 39.283.11. Be ðæm ilcan is eft suiðe ryhte gecweden:
ðæt ungeornfulle mod & ðæt toslopene hyngreð, forðæm hie
næfre ne beoð gereorde mid godum weorcum, ne hie nellað hie gehæftan
& gepyndan hiora mod, swelce mon deopne pool gewerige, ac he læt his mod
toflowan on ðæt ofdele giemelieste & ungesceadwisnesse æfter eallum
his willum, & ne gehæft hit na mid ðam gesuincium godra weorca, ac hit
wirð gewundod mid ðæm hungre ðæs nyðemestan & ðæs
fulestan geðohtes;
 39.283.18. Ðonne hit flihð ðæt hit sie gebunden mid ege
& mid lare, ðonne tostret hit on yfelre & on unnytte wilnunga, &
hæfð ðæs suiðe micelne hunger.
 39.283.20. Be ðæm eft wrat Salomon, & cwæð: ælc
idel mon liofað æfter his agnum dome.
 39.283.21. Be ðæm ilcan eft sio Soðfæstnes, ðæt is
Crist, he cwæð on his godspelle: ðonne an unclæne gast bið adrifen
of ðæm men, ðonne bið ðæt hus clæne.
 39.283.23. Ac gif he eft cymð, & ðæt hus idel gemett, he
hit gefylleð mid suiðe monigum.
 39.283.24. Oft se slawa, ðonne he agælð & forielt
ðæt weorc ðe him niedðearf wære to wyrceanne, ðonne ðynceað
him sumu weorc suiðe hefug, sumu suiðe unwærlico, & donne he wenð
ðæt he funden hæbbe hwæt he ryhtlice ondræde, ðonne wile he
gereccean ðæt he noht unryhtlice hit ne forslæwde, ðonne him
ðyncð ðæt he ryhte lade funden hæbbe.
 39.285.4. Be ðæm wæs suiðe ryhte gecweden ðurh Salomon
ðone snottran: For ciele nele se slawa erian on wintra, ac he wile biddan on
sumera, & him mon nele ðonne sellan.
 39.285.7. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt se slawa nylle erian for
ciele, ðæt hwa sie gebunden mid hefignesse ðære slæwðe, ðæt
hine ne lyste sum nytwyrðe weorc wyrcean.
 39.285.9. Forðæm is gecweden ðæt se slawa for ðæm
ege ðæs cieles nylle erigean, forðæm we oft for ðæm ege lytles
yfeles forlætað micel god.
 39.285.11. Hit is suiðe wel be ðæm gecweden ðæt he eft
bedecige on sumera, & him mon ðonne noht ne selle.
 39.285.12. Sua bið ðæm ðe nu on godum weorcum ne swæt,
& suiðe ne suinceð: eft ðonne sio sunne, ðæt is Crist, on domes
dæge on mæstum wielme ætiewð, ðonne bið he idel, gif he on
ðæm sumra bidt ingonges in hefonrice.
 39.285.16. Be ðæm men wæs eft suiðe wel gecweden ðurh
Salomon ðone snottran, he cwæð: Se ðe him ealneg wind ondræt, he
sæwð to seldon;
 39.285.18. & se ðe him ælc wolcn ondrædt, ne ripð se
næfre.
 39.285.18. Hwæt getacnað ðonne se wind buton ða costunga
ðæs awrigdan gæstes, & hwæt ðæt wolc ðe bið astyred
from ðæm winde buton ða wiðerweardnesse unryhtwisra monna?
 39.285.21. Se wind drifeð ðæt wolcn.
 39.285.21. Sua deð se unclæna gæst mid his winde;
 39.285.22. He onstyreð unryhtwise men.
 39.285.23. We cwædon ær ðæt se sceolde lytel sawan, se
de him ðone wind ondrede;
 39.285.24. & eft lytel ripan, se ðe him ða wolc ondrede.
 39.285.24. Hwæt is ðonne ðætte sua hwelc sua him
ondræt oððe deofles costunga oððe yfelra monna ehtnesse, &
forðy forlæt ðæt he hwæthwugu godes ne do, ðonne nauðer ne he
her ða corn godra weorca ne sæwð, ne he eft nænne sceaf ne ripð
ðæs ecean edleanes.
 39.287.3. Ongean ðæt is to cyðanne ðæm ðe beoð to
hrade, ðonne hie forhradigað ðone timan godes weorces, ðæt hie
forpærað ðæm edleane, & oft befeallað on micel yfel, ðonne
hie nabbað ða gesceadwisnesse ðæt hie cunnen ðæs ðinges timan
aredian, ne furðum ne giemað hwæt hie don, oððe hwonne hie hwæt
don, ac hwilum hit gebyreð ðæt hie hit eft ongietað,
æfterðæmðe hit gedon bið, ðæt hie ær sua don ne sceoldon.
 39.287.9. To swelcum monnum Salomon wæs sprecende, ða he his
cnieht lærde, he cwæð: Sunu min, ne doo ðu nan wuht butan geðeahte,
ðonne ne hriwð hit ðe, ðonne hit gedon bið;
 39.287.12. Ac læt simle gan ðin eagean beforan ðinum fotum.
 39.287.13. Ðonne stæppað ða eagan beforan ðæm fotum,
ðonne ðæt ryhte & ðæt gesceadwislice geðeaht gæð beforan
weorcum.
 39.287.14. Ac se ðe agimeleasað ðæt he ðence,
ærðæmðe he do, se stæpð forð mid ðam fotum, & wincað
mid ðæm eagum.
 39.287.16. He gæð on ðone weg, ac he nat on hwæt he
gæð, ac he wirð suiðe raðe on fielle.
 39.287.17. Sua wirð se ðe beforan ðæm stæpum his weorca
ne locað mid ðæm eagum gesceadwisra geðeahtes.
 40.287.20. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manienne ða
monðwæran, on oðre ða grambæran.
 40.287.22. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða monnðwæran,
on oðre ða grambæran.
 40.287.23. Forðæm oft gebyreð ðæm monðwæran,
ðonne he wierð riece ofer oðre menn, ðæt he for his
monnðwærnesse aslawað, & wierð to unbeald, forðæm sio bieldo
& sio monnðwærnes bioð swiðe anlice.
 40.289.2. Forðæm oft, ðonne mon læt toslupan ðone ege
& ða lare suiður ðonne hit ðearf sie for wacmodnesse, ðonne
wierð gehnescad ðonone sio ðreaung ðæs anwaldes.
 40.289.4. Ongean ðæt sint to manianne ða weamodan & ða
grambæran, forðæm, ðonne hie underfoð ðone folgoð, ðonne tyht
hie & gremeð ðæt ierre ðæt hie wealwiað on ða
wedenheortnesse, & ðurh ðæt wierð toslieten sio stilnes hiera
hieremonna modes, & bið gedrefed sio smyltnes hiera lifes.
 40.289.8. Forðæm, ðonne ðæt ierre æfð anwald
ðæs monnes, ðonne gehriesð he on sume scylde, sua ðæt he self nat
huæt he on ðæt irre deð.
 40.289.10. Ða irran nyton hwæt hie on him selfum habbað,
& eac ðætte wierse is, ðætte hie ful oft wenað ðætte hiera
hierre sie ryhtwislic anda & manung sumre ryhtwisnesse.
 40.289.12. Forðæm, ðonne hie wenað ðæt hiera
unðeawas sien sum god cræft, ðonne gadriað hie hie & ieceað
butan ælcum ege.
 40.289.14. Oft eac ða monðwæran weorðað sua besolcne
& sua wlace & sua slawe for hira monnðwærnesse ðæt hie ne
anhagað nane wuht nyttwyrðes don.
 40.289.16. Oft eac ða grambæra leogað him selfum, ðonne
hie wenað ðæt hie ryhtne andan hæbben.
 40.289.18. Oft eac sio godnes ðære monnðwærnesse bið
diegellice gemenged wið sleacnesse.
 40.289.19. Oft eac ða grambæran wenað ðæt hiera
unðeaw sie sumes ryhtwislices andan wielm.
 40.289.20. Ac we sculon manian ða manðwæran ðæt hie
hæbben ða monnðwærnesse, & fleon ðæt ðær suiðe neah
liegeð ðære monnðwærnesse, ðæt is sleacnes.
 40.289.22. Ða grambæran we sculon monian ðæt hie ongieten
hwæt hie on him selfum habbað.
 40.289.24. Ða monnðwæran we sculon monian ðæt hie
ongieten hwæt hi nabbað.
 40.289.25. Ne forlæten ða ierran ðone andan, ac geðencen
ðæt he sie gesceadwislic & gemetlic.
 40.291.1. Leorniað hine ða manðwæran & lufigað,
oððæt hie hiene hæbben.
 40.291.2. Lytligen ða grambæran hiera gedrefednesse.
 40.291.3. Ða monðwæran sint to monianne ðæt hie
geornlice tiligen ðæt hie hæbben ryhtwislicne andan.
 40.291.4. Ða grambæran sint to monianne, ðe wenað ðæt
hie ryhtwislicne andan hæbben, ðæt hie ðone gemengen wið
monnðwærnesse.
 40.291.6. Forðæm us ætiede se Halga Gæsð ægðer ge
on culfran onlicnesse ge on fyres, forðæmðe ælcne ðara ðe he
gefylð, he hiene onælð ægðer ge mid ðære culfran bilewitnesse
& mannðwærnesse ge mid ðæs fyres reðnesse.
 40.291.9. Ne bið se no gefylled ðæs Halgan Gæsðæs se
ðe on ðære smyltnesse his monðwærnesse forlæt ðone wielm
ryhtwislices andan, oððe eft on ðæm wielme ðæs andan forlæt
ðone cræft ðære monnðwærnesse.
 40.291.12. Ic wene ðæt we mægen ðis openlicor gecyðan
gif we sanctus Paulus lare sume ongemong secgað, forðæm he hæfde
twegen gingran suiðe gelices willan & on eallum ðingum suiðe onlice,
& he hie ðeah lærde suiðe ungelice.
 40.291.15. Oðer hira wæs haten Timotheus, oðer Titus.
 40.291.16. He cuæð to ðæm Timotheo: Lære hie, &
healsa, & tæl hira unðeawas, & ðeah geðyldelice.
 40.291.17. To ðæm Tite he cuæð: Lær ðæt folc,
& ðreata, & tæl, & hat, ðæt hie wieten ðæt ge sume
anwald habbað ofer hie.
 40.291.19. Hwæt mænde sanctus Paulus, ða he his lare sua
cræftelice toscead, & ðone oðerne lærde ðæt he him anwald
ontuge, oðerne he lærde geðyld, buton ðæt he ongeat Titum hwene
monðwærran & geðyldigran ðonne he sceolde, & Timotheus he
ongeat hatheortran ðonne he sceolde?
 40.291.23. Titum he wolde onælan mid ryhtwislicum andan,
Timotheum he wolde gemetgian.
 40.291.26. Oðrum he wolde geiecean ðæt him wana wæs,
oðrum he wolde oftion ðæs ðe he to fela æfde.
 40.293.1. Oðerne he draf suiðe geornfullice mid sticele,
oðrum he wiðteah mid bridle.
 40.293.2. Wietodlice se mæra landbegenga, ðæt wæs
sanctus Paulus, he underfeng ða halgan gesomnunga to plantianne & to
ymbhweorfanne, sua se ceorl deð his ortgeard.
 40.293.4. Sumu treowu he watrode, to ðæm ðæt hie ðy
suiður sceolden weaxan.
 40.293.5. Sume he cearf ðonne him ðuhte ðæt hie to suiðe
weoxsen, ðylæs hie to ðæm forweoxen ðæt hie forseareden, &
ðy unwæsðmbærran wæren.
 40.293.7. Sumu twigu he lehte mid wætere, ðonne hie to hwon
weoxson, ðæt hie ðy suiður weaxan sceolden.
 40.293.9. Ac ða irsunga sindun suiðe ungelica: oðer bið
suelce hit sie irres anlicnes, ðæt is ðæt mon wielle æt oðrum
his yfel aðreatigan, & hine on ryhtum gebringan, oðer bið ðæt
ierre ðæt mon sie gedrefed on his mode butan ælcre ryhtwisnesse;
 40.293.12. Oðer ðara irsunga bið to ungemetlice & to
ungedafenlice atyht on ðæt ðe hio mid ryhte irsian sceall, oðer on
ðæt ðe hio ne sceal bið ealneg to suiðe onbærned.
 40.293.14. Eac is to wietanne ðætte hwæthwugu bið betweoh
ðæm irsiendan & ðæm ungeðyldgan, ðæt is ðæt ða
ungeðyldgan ne magon aberan nanwuht ðæs laðes ðe him mon on legð
oððe mid wordum oððe mid dædum, ða iersigendan ðonne him to
getioð ðæt ðætte hie eaðe butan bion meahton: ðeah hie nan mann
mid laðe ne grete, hie wiellað griellan oðre menn to ðæm ðæt
hie niede sculon, & seceað ða ðe hie fleoð, & styrigað
geflitu & geciid, & fægniað ðæt hie moten suincan on
ungeðwærnesse.
 40.293.21. Ða suelcan we magon ealra betest geryhtan mid ðy
ðæt we hie forbugen, ðonne ðonne hie beoð anstyred mid hiera ierre,
forðæm, ðonne hie sua gedrefede bioð, hie nyton hwæt hie ðonne
gehierað, ðeah him mon stiere, ac eft, ðonne hie hie selfe ongietað,
hie onfooð ðære lare sua micle lusðlicor sua him mon ær
geðyldelicor forbær hiera irre, & sua micle ma scamiað hiera
unðeawes sua hiene mon ær geðyldelicor forbær.
 40.295.3. Ac ðæt mod, ða hwile ðe hit bið oferdruncen
ðæs ierres, eal ðæt him mon ryhtes sægð, hit ðyncð him woh.
 40.295.4. Forðæm ðæt wif ðe Abigall hatte suiðe
herigendlice forsuigode ðæt dysig hiere fordruncnan hlafordes, se wæs
haten Nabal, & eft, ða him ðæt lið gescired wæs, full
herigendlice hio hit him gecyðde, & he forðæm sua micle bet his agen
dysig oncnew sua he undruncenra wæs.
 40.295.8. Sua eac, ðonne ðæt gelimpð ðæt ða
iersigendan menn oðrum monnum oferfylgeað to ðon suiðe ðæt hit mon
forberan ne mæg, ne sceal mon no mid openlice edwite him wiðslean, ac bi
sumum dæle arwierðelice wandigende suiðe wærlice stieran.
 40.295.12. Ðæt we magon openlicor gecyðan, gif we æfneres
dæda sume herongemong secgað, hu Assael hine unwærlice mid anwealde
ðreatode, & him oferfylgde.
 40.295.14. Hit is awriten ðæt Æfnere cwæde to Assaele:
Gecier la, & gesuic, ne folga me,ðæt ic ðe ne dyrre ofstingan.
 40.295.16. He forhogde ðæt he hit gehierde, & nolde hine
forlætan.
 40.295.17. Ða ðydde æfner hine mid hindewerde sceafte on
ðæt smælðearme ðæt he wæs dead.
 40.295.18. Hwæs onlicnesse hæfde Assael ða buton ðara
ðe hiera hatheortnes hie suiðe hrædlice on færspild gelæd?
 40.295.20. Ða ðonne hie beræsað on suelce weamodnesse hie
sindon sua micle wærlicor to oferbuganne sua mon ongiet ðæt hie on
maran ungewitte beoð.
 40.295.22. Ðæs æfneres noma ðe ðone oðerne fleah is
on ure geðiode fæder leohtfæt.
 40.295.23. Ðæt getacnað ðætte ðara lareowa tungan
ðe ðæt uplice leoht bodiað, ðonne hie ongietað hwelcne monnan
gesuencedne mid irre & mid hatheortnesse onbærnedne, & ðonne
forwandigað ðæt hie mid ðæm kycglum hiera worda ongean hiera ierre
worpigen, sua sua æfner wandade ðæt he nolde ðane slean ðe hine
draf.
 40.297.3. Sua, ðonne ðonne ða hatheortan hie mid nane
foreðonce nyllað gestillan, ac sua wedende folgiað hwam sua sua Assael
dyde æfnere, & næfre nyllað gesuican, ðonne is micel ðearf
ðætte se, se ða hatheortnesse ofercuman wielle, ðætte he hiene
ongean ne hathierte, wærlice hine pynge mid sumum wordum, ðæt he on
ðæm ongietan mæge be sumum dæle his unðeaw.
 40.297.9. Forðæm æfner, ða ða he ongean ðone cirde
ðe hine draf, ne ofstong he hiene no mid ðy speres orde, ac mid hindewerdum
ðam sceafte.
 40.297.11. Ðæt is ðonne suelc mon mid forewearde orde
stinge, ðæt mon openlice & unforwandodlice on oðerne ræse mid
tælinge & mid ðrafunga.
 40.297.13. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt mon mid hindewearde sceafte
ðone ðydde ðe him oferfylge, ðæt mon ðone weamodan liðelice mid
sumum ðingum gehrine, suelce he hine wandigende ofersuiðe.
 40.297.15. Sua sua Assael suiðe hrædlice gefeol, sua ðæt
ahrerede mod, ðonne hit ongiet ðæt him mon birgð mid ðære
gesceadlican andsuare, hit bið getæsed on ðæt ingeðonc, & mid
ðære liðelican manunga to ðam aredod ðæt hit sceal suiðe
hrædlice afeallan of ðære weamodnesse ðe hit ær on ahæfen
wæs.
 40.297.20. Se ðe ðonne sua forbygð ðone wielm & ðone
onræs his hatheortnesse, forðæmðe hine mon slea mid liðelicre
andsuare, ðonne bið his unðeaw ofslægen butan ælcre niedðrafunga,
sua sua Assael wæs dead butan orde.
 41.299.1. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða
eaðmodan, on oðre wisan ða upahæfenan on hira mode.
 41.299.3. On oðre wisan sint to manianne ða eaðmodan, on
oðre ða upahæfenan.
 41.299.4. Ðæm eaðmodum is to cyðanne hu micel sio heanes
is & hu soðlic ðe hie to hopiað, & eac habbað.
 41.299.5. Ðæm upahæfenum is to cyðanne hwelc nawuht ðes
woruldgielp is ðe hie clyppað & lufiað, & his nawuht habbað,
ðeah hie wenen ðæt hie hiene hæbben.
 41.299.7. Gehieren ða eaðmodan hu ece ðæt is ðæt hie
wilniað, & hu gewitende & hu unagen ðæt is ðæt hie
onscuniað.
 41.299.9. Gehieren eac ða upahæfenan hu gewitende ða ðing
sint ðe hie gietsiað, & hu eciu ða sint ða hie forhycgað, &
forleosan willað.
 41.299.11. Gehieren ða eaðmodan ðære soðfæsðnesse
stemne, ðæt is Crist ure lareow, he cuæð: ælc ðara ðe bið
geeaðmed, he bið upahæfen.
 41.299.13. Gehieren eac ða upahæfenan on hiera mode hwæt he
eft cuæð, he cuæð: ælc ðara ðe hine selfne upahefeð, he
wierð gehined.
 41.299.15. Gehieren ða eaðmodan hwæt Salomon cuæð: Sio
eaðmodnes iernð beforan ðæm gielpe, & heo cymð ær ær ða
wyrðmynðu.
 41.299.16. Gehieren eac ða upahæfenan on hira mode hu he eft
cuæð, he cuæð: ær ðæs monnes hryre bið ðæt mod
upahæfen.
 41.299.18. Gehieren ða eaðmodan hwæt God cuæð ðurh
Essaim ðone witgan, he cuæð: To hwæm locige ic buton to ðæm
eaðmodum & to ðæm stillum & to ðæm ðe him ondrædað
min word?
 41.299.21. Gehieren ða upahæfenan hwæt Salomon cuæð,
