 50.387.28. Ac Dryhten hie ðreade ðurh ðone witgan, ða he
cwæð: Hie dydon min land him selfum to ierfelonde mid gefean & mid
ealre heortan & mid ealle mode.
 50.387.31. Be ðæm wordum we mægon gehieran ðæt hie
wæron swiðe suiðlice getælde, næs no forðæmðe hie
fægnodan, ac forðæmðe hie mid ealre heortan & mid ealle mode
fægnodan.
 50.387.33. Be ðæm cwæð Salomon: Giongra monna dolscipe hi
ofslihð, & dysigra monna orsorgness hi fordeð.
 50.387.35. Be ðæm ilcan cwæð sanctus Paulus: Sien ða
hæbbendan swelce hie nowiht hæbben, & ða ðe ðisses
middangeardes notigað swelce hi his no ne notigen.
 50.389.2. Ðætte we swa lufigen ðisne uterran & ðisne
eorðlican fultum ðætte we forðæm from ðære wilnunga & from
ðære geornfulnesse ðære godcundan lufan ure mod ne awenden,
ðylæs us weorðe to wope & to elðiodignesse ðæs ecean lifes
ðæt ðæt us on ðisse elðiodignesse to fultume & to are
gelæned is;
 50.389.6. Ðætte we ne fægnigen, swelce we gesælige sien
for ðissum gewitendan ðingum, ðonne ðonne we betweox ðæm ongieten
hu earme we bioð ðara ecena ðinga.
 50.389.9. Be ðissum ilcan cwæð Salomon on Cantica Canticorum
ðære bec be ðære halgan gesomnunge, he cwæð: Dryhtnes winestre
hand is under minum heafde, & his swiðre hand me beclipð.
 50.389.11. Sio winestre hand Godes he cwæð wære under his
heafde.
 50.389.12. Ðæt tacnað orsorgnesse ðisses andweardan
lifes.
 50.389.13. Ða hand ðonne geðrycð sio incunde lufu ðæs
uplican lifes.
 50.389.14. Sio swiðre hand hine ðonne beclipð, ðonne
ðonne/ he hine gehielt on ðæm willan ðæt he mid ealre estfulnesse
lufað ðæt ece lif.
 50.389.16. Eft wæs gecueden ðurh Salomon ðone snottran
ðætte on his swiðran handa wære lang lif, & on his winestran
wære wela & wyrðmynt.
 50.389.18. Ða he lærde hu we ægðer lufian sceolden, ða
he mæt ðone welan & ðone wyrðmynd to ðære winestran handa.
 50.389.19. Eft be ðæm ilcan cwæð se psalmsceop: Gehæle
me ðin sio swiðre.
 50.389.20. Ne cwæð he no ðin sio winestre hond, ac ðin sio
swiðre.
 50.389.21. Mid ðæm he gecyðde ðæt he ne mænde ðis
andwearde lif, ac ðæs ecean lifes hælo he sohte.
 50.389.22. Be ðæm ilcan is eft awriten on Exodo, ðæt is
Moyses boc, hit is awriten: ðin swiðre hand, Dryhten, gebræc ðine
feond.
 50.389.24. Ða ðonne ðe Godes fiond bioð, ðeah hi on
ðære winstran handa bion geðigene, hi beoð mid ðære swiðran
tobrocene, ðæt is ðætte oft ðis andwearde lif upahefeð ða
yfelan, ac se tocyme ðære ecan eadignesse hie geniðrað.
 50.389.27. Ðy sint to manienne ða ðe on ðisse worulde
orsorglice libbað, ðæt hie geornlice ongieten ðætte sio orsorgnes
ðisses andweardan lifes hwilum bið to ðæm gelæned ðæt hie sien
ðurh ða to beteran life getogene, hwilum to ðæm ðæt hie sien ðy
swiður on ecnesse gesciende.
 50.389.31. Forhwam wæs elles Canonea land Israhela folce
gehaten, buton forðæmðe ðæt ungetyde folc nolde geliefan ðeah him
mon feorr land on fierste gehete, gif him sona ne sealde sum on neaweste se him
ðæt mare gehett?
 50.389.35. Ond eac forðæm ðætte hie ðy fæsðlicor
& ðy untweogendlicor gelifden ðara ecena ðinga, swa hwanne swa him
ða gehete, ðylæs hi mid ðæm gehatum & mid ðæm tohopan anum
hi spone to ðære giefe, ac eac mid ðære giefe he hi teah on ðone
tohopan.
 50.391.2. Ðæt eac gecyðde se psalmsceop swiðe openlice,
ða he cwæð: He him sealde ricu oðerra kynrena, & manigra folca
gestreones hie wieoldon, to ðon ðæt hi his ryhtwisnesse geheolden, &
his æ sohten.
 50.391.5. Ac ðonne ðæt mennisce mod Godes glædmodnesse
mid godum weorcum ne geandsworað, ðonne bið he swiðe ryhtlice mid
ðæm gehined ðe mon wenð ðæt he mid gearod sie.
 50.391.8. Be ðæm wæs eft gecweden ðurh ðone salmsceop:
ðu hie geniðrades, ða hi hi selfe upahofon.
 50.391.9. Swa, ðonne ðonne unnyttan men ða godcundan gife
nyllað leanian mid ryhtum weorcum, ac willað hi selfe her mid ealle fordon
mid ðære fortruwunga ðæs toflowendan welan & orsorgnesse, &
ðonon ðe hi utan bioð ahæfene, ðanon hie bioð innan afeallene.
 50.391.13. Be ðys ilcan wæs eac gecweden be ðæm welegan
ðe gesæd is ðætte on helle ðrowude, hit wæs gecweden: ðu
onfenge ðin god eal her on worulde.
 50.391.15. Forðæm anfehð se yfla auht goodes on ðisse
worulde ðæt he eft ðy maran yfles on ðæm toweardan life, gif he her
nolde for ðæm goode to Gode gecierran.
 50.391.17. Angean ðæt sint to manigenne ða ðe ðises
middangeardes wilna & weolena wilniað, & him swaðeah sum
wiðerweardnes his forwiernð, & hi geswencð on ðisse worulde, ða
sint to manienne ðæt hie geornlice geðencen mid hu micelre giefe ofer
him wacað se Scippend & se Stihtere ealra gesceafta, ðonne he hi nyle
lætan to hiera agnum wilnungum;
 50.391.23. Swa swa se læce, ðonne he ðæm siocan ne
truwað, & wenð ðæt his gehelpan ne mæge, ðonne aliefð he
him eal ðæt ðæt hine lysð to donne & to ðycganne, ac ðæs
ðe he wenð ðæt he gehelpan mæge, ðæm he forwiernð swiðe
feola ðæs ðe he wilnað.
 50.391.27. Hwæt we eac wiernað urum cildum urra peninga mid to
plegianne, ðæm ilcum ðe we eft tiochiað urne eard & urne eðel
& ure ierfe eall ætsomne to te forlætanne, & hie tiochiað us to
ierfeweardum to habbanne.
 50.391.30. Ac nimen him nu be ðisse bisene gefean & tohopan
ðære ecan ierfeweardnesse, ða ðe sio wiðerweardnes ðisses
andweardan lifes geeaðmet: ac gif hi God næfde on ecnesse getiochod to
gehælanne, ðonne ne gebridlode he hi no mid swa swiðlicre ðreaunga his
lare.
 50.391.33. Eac sint to manigenne ða ðe ðissa hwilendlicra
ðinga wilniað, & him ðeah sum broc & sumu wiðerweardnes hiera
forwiernð, ðætte hie geornfullice geðencen ðætte oft ryhtwise
menn mid ðys hwilendlican anwealde weorðað upahæfene, oð hie ðurh
ðone anwald weorðað mid synnum gefangne, sua sua mid sume grine, swa swa
we ær herbiufan sædon on ðisse ilcan bec bi Dauide ðæm Godes
dirlinge ðæt he wære ryhtwisra ða ða he ðeng wæs ðonne he
wære siððan he kyning wæs.
 50.393.4. Ða ða he ðegn wæs, he mette his feond, &
ðeah for Godes ege & for ryhtwisnesse lufum he hine ne dorste ofslean.
 50.393.6. Ac eft siððan he kyning wæs, for lare & for
tiehtinge his agenes firenlustes he ofslog & besirede his getreowne
ðegn.
 50.393.8. Hwa mæg ðonne æhta oððe anwaldes oððe
weorðscipes wilnian butan plio, nu se swelc plioh ðæron gefor, se ðe
his no ne wilnode?
 50.393.10. Hwa mæg ðonne for ðyllecum bion gehealden butan
miclum gesuince & miclum plio, nu se on ðæm rice on swelce synne
befioll, se ðe God self to ðæm rice geceas?
 50.393.12. Eac hie sint to manigenne ðæt hie geðencen hu hit
awriten is be Salamonne, hu he æfter swa miclum wisdome afioll, emne
oððæt he dioflum ongan gieldan.
 50.393.15. Nis hit no gesæd ðæt he ænig wuht
wiðerweardes on ðys middangearde hæfde, ærðæmþe he afeol;
 50.393.16. Ac siððan him se wisdom to forlæten wæs
eallunga he forget hine selfne & ða lare & ðone ðiodscipe ðe he
geliornode, swa ðæt he his nan geswinc habban nolde ne læsse ne mare.
 51.393.20. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe
beoð gebundne mid synrædenne, on oðre wisan ða ðe freo bioð ðara
benda.
 51.393.22. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe mid
synnrædenne bioð gebundene, on oðre ða ðe ðara benda bioð frio.
 51.393.23. Ða sint to manigenne ðe mid ðæm gebundene
bioð, ðonne ðonne hie betwuh him ðenceað hu hiera ægðer oðres
willan don scyle, ðæt hira swa tilige ægðer oðrum to licianne on
hiera gesinscipe, ðæt hi ne mislicien hiera Scippende;
 51.393.27. & ðæt hie swa wyrcen ðisses middangeardes
weorc ðæt hie ne forlæten to wilnianne ðara ðe Godes sien, &
swa gefeon ðissa andweardena goda ðæt hi him eac geornlice ondræden
ða ecan yflu, & swa eac ðara yfela ðisse worulde hiofen ðæt hi
huru hiora tohopan anwealgne gefæstnigen to ðæm ecum godum;
 51.393.31. & ðonne hie ongieten hu gewitendlic ðis
andwearde bið ðæt ðæt hie her doð, & hu ðurhwunienede
ðæt bið ðæt hi wilniað, ðætte ðonne nawðer ne nan yfel
ðisses middangeardes hiora mod ne gebrece ne nan god hie ne beswice, ac se
gefea ðara hefonlicena goda hi gehierde wið ðæm brocum;
 51.395.1. & eft se wena ðara toweardena yfela on ðæm
toweardan dome hie geegesige on ðære orsorgnesse;
 51.395.2. Forðæm ðæt mod ðara cristenra gesamhiwena,
ðætte bið ægðer ge trum ge untrum & ne mæg fullice forsion
ðas hwilendlican ðing, he mæg ðeah hine formengan to ðæm ecum mid
his willan, ðeah he ðonne giet on ðæs flæsces lustfulnesse licge,
mid ðæm ðæt he hine getrymige & gefylle mid ðæm uplican
tohopan.
 51.395.7. Ond ðeah he hæbbe hwæt eorðlices &
mennisclices him on gewunan on ðys wege se weg is ðis andwearde lif ne
forlæte he ðeah ðone tohopan ðæt he becume to Gode for his godan
willan, & swaðeah ne fulga he eallunga ðæs lichoman wilnunga,
ðylæs he eallunga afealle ðonon ðe he fæsðlicost tohopian
scolde.
 51.395.11. Ymb ðæt reahte Paulus swiðe wel mid feaum wordum
on his ærendgewrite to Corinctheum, he cuæð: ða ðe wif hæbben,
sien ða swelce hie nan hæbben, & ða ðe wepen, sien ða swelce hi
no ne wepen, & ða ðe fægnigen, sien ða swelce hi no ne
fægnigen.
 51.395.15. Se ðonne hæfð wif swelce he nan næbbe, se ðe
hit hæfð for licumlicre frofre, & ðeah for ðæm bryce & for
ðære lufe hine ne awent from bettrum weorcum.
 51.395.17. Se hæfð eac wif swelce he nan næbbe, se ðe
ongiet ðætte eal ðas andweardan ðing bioð gewitendlicu, & ðeah
for niedðearfe hæfð giemenne his flæsces, & hwæðre mid
micelre wilnunga his gæstes giernð ðæs ecan gefean.
 51.395.20. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt mon wepe, & ne wepe,
ðæt mon ða iermðo ðisses middangeardes wepe, & swaðeah wite
ðæt he sceal bion afrefred, & blissian on ðæm ecum gefean.
 51.395.23. & eft is ðæt mon blissige & ne blissige
ðæt mon ahebbe his mod of ðissum eorðlican to ðæm hefonlican,
& ðeah ne forlæte ðæt he him ne ondræde ðæt he afealle of
ðæm uplican to ðæm niðerlican.
 51.395.25. Ymb ðæt swiðe wel ðærryhte æfter rehte
sanctus Paulus, ða he cwæð: ðyses middangeardes ansien ofergæð.
 51.395.27. Swelce he openlice cwæde: Ne sculon ge no eallunga to
swiðe lufian ðisne middangeard, forðam, ðeah ge hine lufigen, he eow ne
mæg ealneg standan;
 51.395.29. On idelnisse ge fæstniað eower mod on him,
forðæmðe he eow flihð, ðeah ge hine lufigen swelce he wunigende
sie.
 51.395.31. To manigenne sint ða gesomhiwan, ðeah hira
hwæðrum hwæthwugu hwilum mislicige on oðrum, ðæt hie ðæt
geðyldelice forberen;
 51.395.33. & gebidde hira ægðer for oðer ðæt hie
mægen ðurh ðæt weorðan gehælede, forðæm hit awriten is:
Berað eowre byrðenna gemænelice betwux iow, ðonne gefylle ge Godes
æ.
 51.395.35. Sio lufu ðonne is Godes æ: sio æ & sio lufu
us briengað monig god from Criste, & ure yfelu geðyldelice
forbierð.
 51.397.1. Ac ðonne we onhyrigað Criste, & eac ða
onhyringe gefyllað, ðonne we lustlice sellað oðrum ðæt ðæt us
God selð, & geðyldelice forberað hiora yfelu.
 51.397.3. Ða gesinhiwan mon sceal manian, & eac gehwelcne
mon, ðæt hie no læs ne ne geðencen hwæt oðre men him forberað
& geðafiað, ðonne hie geðenceað hwæt hi oðrum monnum
forberað;
 51.397.6. Forðæmðe he mæg micle ðy ieð adreogan ða
tionan ðe him oðre men doð, gif he wile gemunan ða ðe he oðrum
monnum deð.
 51.397.8. Eac sint to manigenne ða gesinhiwan ðæt hi gemunen
ðæt hie for nanum oðrum ðingum ne bioð gesomnode, buton forðæm
ðæt hie sculon bearna strienan.
 51.397.10. Forðæm hi sculon geðencean, gif hie to
oftrædlice & to ungemetlice hie gemengað on ðæm hæmede,
ðæt hie ne bioð no on ryhtum gesinscipe, gif hie ðæt on gewunan
habbað, ac forðæmðe hie gewemmað ðone aliefedan gesinscipe mid
ðære unliefedan gemengnesse, him is micel niedðearf ðæt hie mid
oftrædlicum gebedum ða scylde adiligien.
 51.397.15. Forðæm wæs ðæt se getyda læce ðæs
hefonlican læcedomes, ðæt wæs sanctus Paulus, ægðer ge ða
halan lærde ge ðam unhalum læcedom eowde, ða he cwæð: God bið
men ðæt he sie butan wife.
 51.397.18. & eft he cwæð: God bið mannum ðæt ælc
hæbbe his agen wif, & ælc wif hire ceorl, ðylæs hi on unryht
hæmen.
 51.397.19. Ægðer he dyde, ge he egesode ða ðe on unryht
hæmdon, ge he liefde ðæm ðe hit forberan ne meahton, forðæm
ðætte ða ðe gestondan ne meahton, gif hi afeallan scolden, ðæt hi
afeollen on ðæt hnesce bedd ðæs gesinscipes, næs on ða heardan
eorðan ðæs unryhthæmdes.
 51.397.23. & eft he cwæð to ðæm untrumum: Agife se
wer his wife hire ryht on hira gesinscipe, & swa same ðæt wif ðæm
were.
 51.397.25. Ac æfterðæmðe he hwelcehwugu gerisenlice leafe
dyde ðæm gesinhiwon hira willan to fremmanne, he cwæð: Ne cweðo ic
no ðæt ðæt ic ær cwæð bebeodende, ac lærende &
geðafigende.
 51.397.28. Ða he spræc gelicost ðæm ðe hit hwelchwugu
syn wære, ða he cwæð ðæt he hit forgiefan wolde &
geðafian.
 51.397.30. Forðæm bið sio scyld ðy hraðor gehæled,
forðæmðe hio ne bið unliefedo, ac ðeah hio aliefedu sie, ne sceal hi
mon to ungemetlice began.
 51.397.32. Ðæt us getacnode Loth swiðe wel on him selfum,
ða he fleah ða biernendan ceastre Sodoman, & com to Segor, ða ne
dorste he nawuht hrædlice ut of ðære ceastre faran up on ða muntas.
 51.397.34. Midðæmðe he fleah ða birnendan Sodoman, he
getacnode ðæt we sculon fleon ðone unliefedan bryne ures lichoman.
 51.397.36. Sio heanes ðonne ðara munta getacnað ða
clænnesse ðære forhæfdnesse.
 51.399.1. Ða ðonne bioð swelce hi eardigen upp on ðæm
munte ða ðe bioð gesponnene to gesinscipe, & ðeah ne bioð na
gemengde buton ðonne hi wilniað bearn to gestrienanne.
 51.399.4. Ðonne hie stondað up on ðæm munte, ðonne
ðæt flæsc nauht elles ne secð to ðæm oðrum buton tudor.
 51.399.5. Ðæt is ðæt mon stonde on ðæm munte
ðæt ðæt flæsc ne sie flæsclice to ðæm oðrum
gefæsðnod.
 51.399.7. Ac monige bioð ðara ðe hie gehealdað wið
unryhthæmed, & swaðeah his agenra ryhthiwena ne brycð swa swa he mid
ryhte sceolde.
 51.399.9. Loth for ut of Sodoman to Segor, & ðeah ne com he
nauht hraðe onuppan ðæm muntum.
 51.399.10. Swa, ðonne ðonne mon forlæt ðæt wyrreste
lif, & ne mæg ðeah ðonne git cuman to ðæm betstan, ne ða
forhæfdnesse gehealdan ðæs hean gesinscipes, ðonne bið ðæt swa
swa Segor stod on midwege betweox ðæm muntum & ðæm merscum ðe
Sodoma on wæs.
 51.399.14. Sio Segor gehælde Loth fleondne.
 51.399.14. Swa deð sio Segor ðæs medemestan lifes: ða ðe
hire to befleoð hio gehælð.
 51.399.15. Ac ðonne ða gesinhiwan hi gemengað ðurh
ungemetlice unforhæfdnesse, ðær ðær hi ðone fiell fleoð
ðære synne, ðonne magon hie ðeah weorðan gehælede suiðe
ieðelice ðurh forgiefnesse & ðurh gebedu, swa swa Loth funde ða
lytlan ceastre, & hine ðæron wið ðæt fyr gescilde.
 51.399.20. Ðæt lif ðara gesinhiwena, ðeah hit ful
wundorlic ne sie on mægenum weoruldwilnungum to wiðstondanne, hit mæg
ðeah bion orsorglic ælcra wita.
 51.399.22. Forðæm cwæð Loth to ðæm engle: Her is an
lytele burg swiðe neah, ðær ic mæg min feorh on generian.
 51.399.23. Hio is an lytel, & ðeah ic mæg ðæron
libban.
 51.399.24. He cwæð ðæt hio wære swiðe neah, &
ðeah genog fæst on his hælo.
 51.399.25. Swa is ðæt lif ðara gesinhiwena.
 51.399.26. Nis hit naht feor ascaden from ðisse worulde, ne eac
noht fremde ðære ecan hælo, forðæm for ðære dæde ðe hie
doð betwuh him hi beoð gefriðode mid oftrædlicum gebedum betwuh him,
swelce hie sien on sumere lytelre byrig belocene.
 51.399.29. Be ðæm wæs swiðe ryhte gecweden ðurh ðone
engel to Lothe: ðinre bene ic wille nu onfon, & for ðinre bede ic ne
toweorpe ða burg ðe ðu forespricsð.
 51.399.31. Swa bið ðæt lif ðara gesinhiwena.
 51.399.32. Ne bið hit no fordemed beforan Gode,gif ðær
gebedo æfter fylgeað.
 51.399.33. Ymb ða illcan gebedo sanctus Paulus manode, &
ðus cwæð: Ne fornime incer noðer oðer ofer will butan geðafunge,
ðæm timum ðe he hine wille gebiddan, ac geæmtigeað inc to gebedum.
 51.399.36. Ongean ðæt sint to manigenne ða ðe ne beoð
gebundne mid ðæm gesinscipe, ða sint to manienne ðæt hie swa micle
ryhtlecor ða hefonlican bebodo healden swa hie orsorgran bioð ðisses
middangeardes ymbhogena, forðæm hie nan gespann ðæs flæsclican
gesinscipes ne gebiegeð on ðisse worulde, ne se aliefeda gesinscipe hi ne
gehefegað.
 51.401.5. Ðonne is him micel ðearf ðætte sio unliefde
byrðen ðissa eorðlicena sorga hi ne geðrysce, ðætte hie swa micle
gearran finde se ytemesta dæg, ðonne he cume, swa hi her æmtegran
bioð;
 51.401.7. & ðonne hi geæmetgade bioð ðæt hie magon
bet don ðonne oðre menn, & hit swaðeah agiemeleasiað, ðæt hie
ðonne ðurh ðæt ne geearnigen wyrse wite ðonne oðre menn.
 51.401.10. Ac hi scoldon gehiran hwæt Paulus cwæð, ða
ða he sume men manode to ðære giefe Godes ðiowdomes;
 51.401.11. Ne cwæð he ðeah no ðæt ðæt he cwæð
forðæmðe he gesinscipe tælde, ac forðæmðe he wolde ða sorga
awegadrifan ðisses middangeardes of his hieremonna mode ða ðe bioð
aweaxene of ðæm gesinscipe;
 51.401.14. He cwæð: ðis ic cweðe for eowerre ðearfe,
ðylæs ic eow mid ænige grine gefoo.
 51.401.15. Ic eow secgge hwæt eow arwyrðlicost is to beganne,
& hu ge fullecost magon Gode ðiowian ðæt eow læst ðinga
mierð.
 51.401.17. Forðæm of ðæm gesinscipe weaxað eorðlice
ymbhogan & sorga, forðæm se æðela ðioda lareow his hieremen to
betran life spon, ðylæs hi mid eorðlicre sorge wurden gebundne;
 51.401.20. Forðæm, ðonne se Godes ðiow on ðæt gemearr
ðære woruldsorga befehð, ðeah he ðonne hæbbe beflogen ðone
gesinscipe, ðonne næfð he no beflogen ða byrðenne.
 51.401.22. Eac sint to manienne ða Godes ðiowas ðæt hie ne
wenen ðæt hie butan ðæm demme stranges domes hi gemengan mægen
wið ða æmtegan wifmen, ða Paulus ðæt yfel ðære forlegnesse
swa manegum awiergdum leahtrum loh.
 51.401.26. He gecyðde hwelc sio scyld bið, ða he cwæð:
Nawðer ne ða wohhæmendan, ne ða ðe diofulgieldum ðiowiað, ne
ða unfæsðradan, ðe ne magon hira unryhthæmdes geswican, ne ða
ðiofas, ne ða gietseras, ne ða druncenwillnan, ne ða wiergendan, ne
ða reaferas Godes rice ne gesittað.
 51.401.30. & eft he cwæð: ðæm wohhæmerum demeð
Dryhten.
 51.401.31. Forðæm hi sint to manigenne, gif hie ða halwendan
forhæfdnesse gehabban ne mægen, & ða scuras ðære costunga
adreogan ne mægen, ðæt hie wilnigen ðære hyðe ðæs
gesinscipes;
 51.401.33. Forðæm hit is awriten ðæt hit sie betere
ðæt mon gehiewige ðonne he birne, forðæm butan synne he mæg
gehiwian, gif he hit ær ne forhet.
 51.401.35. Ac se ðe mare god gehet ðonne he ær dyde, he
gedeð mid ðæm ðæt læsse god unaliefed ðæt he ær dyde.
 51.403.1. Hit is awrieten on ðæm godspelle ðæt nan mon ne
scyle don his hond to ðære sylg, & hawian underbæc.
 51.403.2. Ne ðon ma se ðe gehat gehæt, ne wene he ðæt
he sie a ðy near hefonrice, gif he hine from went ðæm gehatum.
 51.403.4. Forðæm se ðe hine selfne maran godes behæt,
& ðonne forlæt ða maran god, & went hine to ðæm læssum,
ðonne bið hit swutol ðæt he bið fromlociende oferswiðed.
 52.403.7. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe
gefandod habbað ðara flæsclicra synna, on oðre wisan ða ðe
ðæs noht ne cunnon.
 52.403.10. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe ongietað
& witon hiera lichoman synna, on oðre ða ða ðe hie nyton.
 52.403.11. Ða sint to manienne ðe hiera lichoman synna onfunden
habbað, ðæt hie huru æfter ðæm scipgebroce him ða sæ
ondræden & ðæt forlor hira frecennesse, ðonne hie hit oncnawen,
ðæt hi hit onscunigen;
 52.403.14. Ðætte ða ða ðe mildheortlice bioð gehealdne
æfter hiora ðurhtogenum synnum, ðætte hi eft unwærlice to ne
gecierren, & ðonne swelten.
 52.403.16. Forðæm is gecweden to ðære syngiendan sawle,
ðe næfre hire synna geswican nyle: ðu hæfst forlegisse andwlitan,
forðæm ðe no ne sceamað.
 52.403.18. Ðeah hie sint to manienne ðæt hie geornlice
giemen, ðeah hi ðæt god hira gecynde gehal nolden gehealdan, ðæt hi
hit huru tobrocen gebeten.
 52.403.20. Him is ðearf ðæt hie geðencen hu micel menigu
ðæra getreowfulra bið, ðe ægðer ge hi selfe clæne gehealdað,
ge eac oðre of hira gedwolan ahwierfað.
 52.403.22. Ac hwæt cweðað hi ðonne, ðonne ða oðre
stondað on anwalgre hælo, & hie nyllað æfter yfelre dæde
gecierran?
 52.403.24. Oððe hwæt cweðað hi, ðonne ða oðre
briengað ægðer ge hie selfe ge eac oðre mid hiora bisenum to
hefonrice;
 52.403.26. Ond hie, ðonne him God ðone first alefð, & him
hira yffel forbierð, nyllað furðum hie selfe briengan?
 52.403.27. Ac hie sint to manienne ðæt hie gemunen hwæt hi
godes ær forleton ðæs ðe hi don meahton, ðæt hi huru ðonne
forbugen ðæt andwearde yfel.
 52.403.29. Be ðæm cwæð Dryhten to ðæm gewundedum
modum ðurh Ezechiel ðone witgan, swelce he to Iudeum spræce, & he
ðara gedonena scylda eft gemyndgade, forðæmðe he wolde ðæt hi
sceamode ðæt hie eft on ðære oðerre worulde wæren unclæne, he
cwæð ðæt hi hi forlægen on Egiptum on hira gioguðe: hi wæron
ðær forlegene, & ðær wæron gehnescode hiera breost, &
forbrocene ða dela hiora mægdenhades.
 52.405.1. On Egiptum beoð hira breost gehnescod, ðonne hi ða
scandlican lustas ðisses middangeardes mid hira modes willan underhnigað.
 52.405.3. Ond eft on Egiptum bioð forbrocene ða wæstmas
ðæra dela, ðonne ðæt gecyndelice gewitt ærest sume hwile bið
on him selfun anwalg untosliten, oððæt hit bið gewemmed
midðæmðe hit cnyssað on unryhta wilnunga, & hit toterað.
 52.405.7. Forðæm sint to manienne ða ðe hiera synna
onfunden habbað, ðætte hie mid wacore mode ongieten æfter hira
misdædum mid hu miclum godum willan Dryhten tobræt ðone greadan his
mildheortnesse ongen ða ðe to him gecierrað.
 52.405.10. Swa swa he ðurh Ieremias ðone witgan cwæð, he
cwæð: Gif hwelc wif forlæt hiere ceorl, & nimð hire oðerne,
wenestu recce he hire æfre ma, oððe mæg hio æfre eft cuman to him
swa clænu swa hio ær wæs?
 52.405.13. Hwæt ðu ðonne eart forlegen wið manigne
copenere, & swaðeah ic cweðe: Gecier eft to me, cwæð Dryhten.
 52.405.15. He gereahte ðone ryhtestan dom be ðæm forlegenan
& ðæm aworpnan wife, & swaðeah us gecyðde, gif we æfter
ðæm hryre urra scylda to him gecierdon, ðæt us wære gearo his
miltsung, næs ðæt ryht.
 52.405.18. Of ðissum wordum we magon oncnawan, nu he us sparað
mid swa micelre mildheortnesse, ðonne we gesynngiað, & ðonne giet
nyllað æfter ðære scylde to him gecierran, ðæt we ðonne eft
mid micle dysige syngiað, nu sio Godes miltsung is swa micul ofer ða
dysegan, ðæt hiene na ne aðriet ðæt he hi to him ne laðige,
æfterðæmðe hie gesyngod habbað.
 52.405.23. Be ðære miltsunga æfter ðære laðunga is
swiðe wel gesæd ðurh Essaias ðone witgan;
 52.405.24. Hit is gecweden to ðæm wiðerweardan men: ðin
eagan weorðað gesionde ðinne bebiodend, & ðin earan gehirað under
bæc.
 52.405.26. Eall moncynn wæs to Gode gewend, ða ða hi
ærest gesceapene wæron on neorxna wonge;
 52.405.27. & he ða hie manode andwearde, & him forgeaf
ðæt hie moston stondan on frioum anwalde, & him getæhte hwæt hi
on ðæm don sceolden, hwæt ne scolden.
 52.405.29. Ða giet stodon men to him gewende.
 52.405.30. Ac ða hie wendon hiera bæc to him, ða hi
ofermodgiende his gebod forhogdon.
 52.405.31. & ðeah, ðeah hi hine oferhogden , ne forhogde he
hi no ne ne forlet: ðæt he gecyðde, ða ða he him sealde æ, &
hi mid ðære ham gelaðode, & oft sende his englas us ham to spananne
to him, & on ðissum deadlican flæsce he hine selfne æteowde.
 52.405.35. Ða he ðis eal dyde, ða he stod æfter us gewend,
& clipode æfter us, ðeah we from him gewende wæren;
 52.405.36. & ðeah he oferhogod wære, he us eft laðude to
his hyldo.
 52.407.1. Ac swa swa we nu ðis reahton be eallum monnum, swa hit
mæg æghwelc mon be him anum geðencean, forðæmðe æghwelc mon
ðe his bebod & his forbod ongiet, he bið swelce he beforan him stonde,
ærðæmðe he gesyngige.
 52.407.4. Ðonne giet he stent beforan him, ðonne he hine ne
forhygeð, ac for his ege forbierð ðæt he ne syngað.
 52.407.6. Ac ðonne he forlæt his godnesse & his
unsceaðfulnesse, & gecist unryhtwisnesse, & ða gefremeð, ðonne
went he his hrycg to him.
 52.407.8. Ac ðeah ðonne giet him fylgð God, & him
æfter cliopað, ðonne he hine monað æfter ðære gedonan scylde,
& hine spænð ðæt he to him gecierre.
 52.407.10. Ða scylda he nyle gesion, & ðone fromweardan he
ciegeð, & ðone greadan his arfæstnesse & his frofre he gebræt
ongean ða ðe to him gecierrað.
 52.407.12. Ðonne we gehirað under bæc ðæs maniendes
stemne, ðonne we to him gecierrað, ðonne ðonne he us ciegeð huru
æfter urum scyldum, ðonne he us æfter cliopað, ðeah we ær nolden
æfter his lare.
 52.407.15. Hit is cyn ðæt we ure scomigen, ðonne he us
æfter cliopað, gif we us nyllað ondrædan his ryhtwisnesse,
forðæm we hine mid swa micle maran unryhte & dysige oferhycgeað swa
he læs forhogað ðæt he us ðonne giet to him spane, siððan we
hiene oferhycggeað.
 52.407.19. Ongean ðæt sint to manigenne ða ðe ðonne giet
ungefandod habbað flæsclicra scylda, ðætte hie swa micle swiðor
ðone spild ðæs hryres him ondræden ðonne ða oðre swa hi ufor
stondað ðonne ða oðre.
 52.407.22. Hi sint to manienne ðæt hi witen swa swa hie on
hira stede gestondað swa him mare gescot & ma flana hiera feonda to
cymð.
 52.407.23. Forðæm he ongit swa micle swiður him on feohtan
swa he hine selfne untrumran gefred on his lichoman.
 52.407.25. Ac gif he ðonne ðæm wiðstent, ðonne ongit he
swa micle maran sige on him selfum swa he unieð wiðstod.
 52.407.27. Ac hie sint to manienne ðæt hie unablinnendlice
ðara leana wilnigen, & lustlice ðæt geswinc ðæra costunga ðe
hi ðrowiað hi forsion & geðolien, & buton tweon hi geliefen
ðara leana; forðæm, gif hie geðenceað ðara gesælða ðe him
ungeendode æfter ðæm geswincum becuman sculon, ðonne ðyncað him
ðy leohtran ða geswinc ðe ofergan sculon.
 52.407.32. Hi sculon gehieran hwæt ðurh Essaias ðone witgan
gecweden is, he cwæð: ðis cwið Dryhten: ða afyrdan, ða ðe
behealdað minne ræstedæg, & geceosað ðæt ic wille, &
minne freondscipe gehealðað, ic him selle on minum huse, & binnan minum
wealle, wic & beteran noman ðonne oðrum minum sunum oððe dohtrum.
 52.407.36. Hwæt elles getacniað ða afyrdan buton ða ða
ðe ofðryscað ða styringe ðæs flæsclican lustes, & of him
selfum aceorfað unryhtlico weorc?
 52.409.2. Ðæm monnum is gecyðed hwelce stowe hi moton habban
beforan urum fæder, swa swa we ær cwædon, ðæt hie sceolden habban
ece eardungstowe on ðæs fæder huse furðor ðonne his ægnu bearn.
 52.409.5. Hi sculon gehieran hwæt ðurh sanctus Iohannes
gecweden is, he cwæð: ðæt sindan ða ða ðe mid wifum ne beoð
besmitene, & hira mægeðhad habbað gehealdenne;
 52.409.8. Ða folgiað ðæm lambe, swa hwær swa hit
færð.
 52.409.8. Ða singað ðone sang ðe nan mon elles singan ne
mæg, buton ðæt hundteontig & feowertig & feower ðusendo.
 52.409.10. Ðæm is sundorlic sang to singanne mid ðæm
lambe on ecnesse beforan eallum geleaffullum, & to blissianne for hira
flæsces clænnesse, ðætte ða oðre gecorenan ðone song gehiran
mægen, ðeah ðe hine swa singan ne mægen, & for ðæm lufum
ðe hi to him habbað, & for ðæm weorðscipe ðe hi gesioð
ðæt hie habbað hi fægnigen, & emnswiðe him blissigen, ðeah
hie ða geearnunga næbben ðæt hi ðone weorðscipe habban mægen.
 52.409.16. Gehieren eac ða ðe ungefandod habbað ðara
flæsclicana scylda hwæt sio soðfæsðnes ðurh hie selfe cwæð
bi ðære clænnesse, he cwæð: Ne underfoð no ealle men ðas
lare.
 52.409.19. Mid ðæm worde he cyðde ðæt hit is se hiehsta
cræft, forðæm he cwæð ðæt hine ealle ne gefengen, & eac
sæde ðæt he unieðe wære to gehealdene, & eac cyðde hu
wærlice hi hine healdan scolden, ðonne hie hine underfangen hæfden.
 52.409.22. Eac sint to manienne ða ðe ungefandod habbað
ðæs lichoman scylda ðæt hie witen ðæt se mægðhad is hirra
ðonne se gesinscipe, & swaðeah hi sint to læranne ðæt hi hi ne
ahebben ofer ða oðre;
 52.409.25. Ac læten ðæt lif ðæs mægðhades beforan
ðæm oðrum, & hine selfne biæftan, & ne forlæte ðeah
ðæt lif ðe he wat ðætte betere bið, & behealde hine selfne
ðæt he hine ne ahebbe on idelnesse.
 52.409.27. Hi sint to manienne ðæt hi ongieten ðætte oft
gebyreð ðætte ðæt lif ðara gesinhiwena oferstigð ðæt lif
ðæs mægðhades, ðonne hi underfoð ægðer ge forhæfdnesse ge
eaðmodnesse furðor ðonne hie gehaten, & ða oðre ne begað
furðum hira ægne endebyrdnesse.
 52.409.31. Be ðæm wæs swiðe wel gecweden ðurh Essaias
ðone witgan to ðære byrig ðe Sidon hatte, sio stod bi ðære
sæ;
 52.409.33. Ðæ cwæð se witga: ðios sæ cwið ðæt
ðu ðin scamige, Sidon.
 52.409.34. Swelce sio burg ða wære ðurh ðæs sæs
stemne to scame geworden.
 52.409.35. Swa bið ðis eorðlice lif oft yðgiende swa swa
sæ, & ðeah bið oft swiðe acorenlic, & ðæt oðer swiðe
aworpenlic, ðætte fæstre bion scolde & trumlicre.
 52.411.1. Oft weorðað monige æfter ðæs lichoman scylde
to Gode gecerred, & hi ðonne swa micle fæsðlicor gestaðolicað on
godum weorcum swa hi hi selfe synnigran ongietað.
 52.411.3. & oft ða, ða ðe on clænnesse hiora lichoman
gehealdenne habbað, swa swa hi læsse ongietad on him selfum ðæs ðe
him hreowan ðyrfe, swa swa hie swiður wenað ðæt him genog sie on
hira lifes clænnesse, ðonne hira mod ne beoð onhæt mid nanre manunge
ðære hreowsunga.
 52.411.7. Ðonon wyrð oft Gode leofre ðæt lif ðætte
æfter his synnum onæled bið mid hreowsunga ðonne ðæt clæne
& ðæt unsceaðfulle for slæwðe & for orsorgnesse.
 52.411.9. Be ðæm cwæð ðæs Deman stemn, ðæt is
Crist, be Marian ðære forlegisse: Hire sint forgifena swiðe manega
synna, forðæmðe hio swiðe hreowsade.
 52.411.12. Ond eft he cwæð: Mara gefea wyrð on hefonum for
anum hreowsiendum ðonne ofer nigon & hundnigontig ryhtwisra ðæra
ðe him nan ðearf ne bið hreowsunga.
 52.411.14. Ðæt we magon swutolor ongietan & hræðor bi
urum agnum gewunan, gif we willað ongietan ðone dom ures agnes modes.
 52.411.16. Hwæt, we witon ðæt we ma lufiað ðone æcer
ðe ær wæs mid ðornum aswogen, & æfterðæmðe ða
ðornas beoð aheawene, & se æker bið onered, bringð godne
wæsðm ma we lufiað ðone ðonne ðone ðe stent on clænum lande,
& bið unwæsðmbære oððe ungefynde corn bringð oððe
deaf.
 52.411.20. Eac sint to manienne ða ðe ungefandod habbað
ðissa flæsclicena scylda, ðæt hie ne wenen for hira clænnesse
ðæt hie sien beforan ðæm hirrum hadum, forðæmðe hi nyton
ðeah hi sin behindan ðæm ðe læssan hades bioð, & hie wenað
ðæt hie beforan bion scylen;
 52.411.24. Forðæmðe on ðæm dome ðæs ryhtwisan
Deman onwent sio geearnung ðone had & ða geðyncðo.
 52.411.25. Hwa is nu ðæra ðe gesceadwis sie, & to
ðæm gleaw sie ðæt he swelces hwæt tocnawan cunne, ðætte nyte
ðætte on gimma gecynde carbunculus bið diorra ðonne iacinctus?
 52.411.28. & swaðeah ðæt bleoh ðæs welhæwnan
iacintes bið betera ðonne ðæs blacan carbuncules;
 52.411.29. Forðæm ðæs ðe sio endebyrdnes & ðæt
gecynd forwiernð ðæm iacinte, se wlite his beorhtnesse hit eft geiecð,
& eft, ðeah ðe ðæt gecynd & sio endebyrdnes ðæs
carbuncules hine upahebbe, his blioh hine gescent.
 52.411.32. Swa bið on ðisse menniscan gecynde manige on beteran
hade & on beteran endebyrdnesse wyrsan, & on wyrsan hade & on
wyrsan endebyrdnesse beteran;
 52.411.34. Swa ðætte oft on læwedum hade & on
læwedum girelan mid godum weorcum & mid ryhte life man oferðihð
ðone munuchad, & ða oðre, ðe ðone hierran had habbað, ðonne
hi nyllað ðæm ðeawum & ðæm geearningum folgian, ðonne
gewaniað hie ðone had & gewemmað.
 53.413.3. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða ðe
ða geworhtan synna wepað, on oðre ða ðe ða geðohtan wepað.
 53.413.5. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe hiera
geworhtan synna wepað, on oðre ða ðe hira geðohtan wepað.
 53.413.6. Ða sint to manienne ðe hira geworhtan wepað,
ðætte hie ða gedonan yfelu mid fullfremedre hreowsunga aðwean,
ðylæs hi sin to swiðe gebundne mid ðæm ðurhtogenum scyldum, &
ðonne to lange forelden ðæt hi hi ne anbinden mid ðære hreowsunge.
 53.413.10. Be ðæm is awriten on ðæm nigon &
hundsiofantigoðan sealme: God us drencte swiðe gemetlice mid tearum, swa
ðætte æghwelces mannes mod swa micle oftor wære geðwæned mid
hreowsunge tearum swa swa he gemunde ðæt hit oftor wære adrugod from
Gode on his synnum.
 53.413.14. Hi sint eac to manienne ðæt hi unaðrotenlice ða
gedonan synna gelæden beforan hira modes eagan, & ðonne hi hi gesewene
hæbben, gedon ðæt hie ne ðyrfen bion gesewene æt ðæm nearwan
dome.
 53.413.17. Be ðæm cwæð Dauid on psalmum: Ahwyrf, Dryhten,
ðin eagan from minum synnum.
 53.413.18. & lytle ær he cwæð: Mine misdæda bioð
simle beforan me.
 53.413.19. Swelce he cwæde: Ic ðe bidde ðæt ðu no ne
locige on mine synna, forðæmðe ic self him ealneg on locige.
 53.413.20. Be ðæm eac cwæð Dryhten ðurh Essaias ðone
witgan: ðinra synna ne weorðe ic gemunende, ac gemun ðu hiora.
 53.413.22. Forðæm hie sint to manienne ðæt hi ælce
synne geðencen ðæra ðe hi gemunan mægen, forðæm, ðonne hie
for anre hwelcre hreowsiað, ðonne hreowsiað hie for ealle.
 53.413.24. Be ðæm is swiðe wel gecweden ðurh Ieremias
ðone witgan, ða ða he ðæra Iudea misdæda ealle apinsode, he
cwæð: Todælnessa ðara wætera utleton min eagan.
 53.413.27. Todældu wæteru we lætað ut of urum eagum,
ðonne we for synderlecum synnum synderleca hreowsunga doð: forðæmðe
hie ne magon ealneg ealla on ane tid emnsare hreowan, ac hwilum an, hwilum
oðru cymð sarlice to gemynde;
 53.413.30. & ðonne he wierð mid ðære anre onstyred,
ðonne wyrð he eallra geclænsod.
 53.413.31. Eac hie sint to manienne ðæt hi gelefen &
baldlice getruwien ðæt hi ða forgiefnesse habbað for ðære
hreowsunga ðe hi wilniað, ðylæs hi to ungemetlice sien gewægde mid
ðære hreowsunga.
 53.415.1. Ne gedyde næfre se mildheorta Dryhten, ne an his mode
ne gebrohte swelce hreowsunga, gif he hit æfter ðæm auht swiðe wrecan
wolde.
 53.415.3. He gecyðde swiðe mildheortlice ðæt he him deman
nolde, ða he gedyde ðæt hi him selfe ær beforan demdan.
 53.415.5. Be ðæm is awriten on ðæm feower &
hundnigontigoðan psalme, hit is gecweden: Wuton cuman ær his dome
andettende.
 53.415.7. & eft hit wæs gecweden ðurh sanctus Paulus:
ðær we us selfum demden, ðonne ne demde us no God.
 53.415.8. & eft hi sint to manienne ðæt hi swa hopigen to
ðære forgiefnesse ðæt hie for ðære orsorgnesse to unwærlice
ne aslawien.
 53.415.10. Forðæm oft ðæt lytige dioful ðæt mod
ðæt he mid ðære synne ascrenceð, ðonne he gesihð ðæt hit
unrot bið for ðæm hryre his synna, ðonne forspenð he hit mid
ðære wolberendan oliccunge.
 53.415.13. Ðæt wæs mid ðære biesene getacnod ðe
Dinan gedon wæs Iacobes dohtor.
 53.415.14. Hit is awriten ðæt Dina wære ut gangende
sceawian ðæs londes wif.
 53.415.15. Ða hi ða geseah Sihhem, Emmores sunu ðæs
ebreiscan, se wæs aldormon ðæs londes, & ða gelicode hio him,
& he hi genam niedenga, & hire mid gehæmde.
 53.415.17. & ða wæs his mod gehæft mid ðæm
mædene, & he ða hi swa unrote oleccende to him geloccode.
 53.415.19. Ðonne gæð Dine ut sceawian ða elðiodigan wif,
ðonne hwelces monnes mod forlæt his ægne tilunga, & sorgað ymb
oðerra monna wisan, ðe him nauht to ne limpð, & færð swa
wandriende from his hade & of his endebyrdnesse.
 53.415.22. Sihhem, ðæs landes ealdorman, geniedde ðæt
mæden Dinan, ða he hie gemette swa wandrian.
 53.415.23. Swa deð se dioful ðæt mod ðæt he gemet on
unnyttum sorgum: he hit awiert.
 53.415.24. Sihhemes mod wæs ða gehæft to Dinan.
 53.415.25. Swa ðæt dioful, ðonne he gesihð ðæt mod on
ðæm ilcan unryhtan willan ðe he bið, & ðonne eft gesihð
ðæt hit ðæs hreowsað, ðonne gebringð he beforan ðæs modes
eagan idle orsorgnesse & tohopan, forðæm ðæt he him oftio
ðære nyttwyrðan unrotnesse.
 53.415.29. Be ðæm wæs swiðe ryhtlice gecweden ðætte
Sihhem Dinan liðelice olehte, ða ðe he hi geunrotsod hæfde.
 53.415.30. Swa deð ðæt dioful ðæm mode: hwilum he
gedeð ðæt him ðyncð ðæt hit nan scyld ne sie ðæt ðæt
he deð;
 53.415.32. Hwilum he gedeð ðæt him ðyncð, ðeah hit
scyld sie, ðæt oðre men hefiglicor syngien;
 53.415.33. Hwilum he fortruwað to swiðe Godes mildheortnesse;
 53.415.34. Hwilum him ðyncð ðæt he hæbbe fierst genogne
to hreowsianne.
 53.415.35. & ðonne ðæt beswicene mod ymb ðyllic
ðencð, ðonne wyrð hit amierred from ðære incundan hreowe, to ðon
ðæt hit nan god ne gemete, forðæm him nan yfel ne hriwð.
 53.417.1. Ac hit wyrð swa micle swiður beswicen mid ðæm
witum swa hit nu swiður gefihð on his yfelum.
 53.417.3. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe ða
geðohtan synna wepað, ðæt hie geornlice giemen on ðære degelnesse
hira modes hwæðer him ðæt geðoht cume of færlicum luste, ðe of
wilnunga & geðafunga, ðæt hie swa gesyngeden.
 53.417.6. Forðæm hit oft gebyreð ðæt ðæt mod
wyrð gecostod of ðæs flæsces lustfulnesse, & ðeah ðæt mod
wiðstent ðæs flæsces lustfulnesse, swa ðætte se ilca lust ðe
hine geunrotsað on ðære degelnesse his modes hine eft gerotsat, gif he
him wiðstent.
 53.417.10. Oft eac folgað ðæm mode swa grundleaslicu
costung, & hit swa forswilgð, ðæt hit mid nanre wiðerweardnesse
hire ne wiðstent, ac geðafigende folgað ðære costunga.
 53.417.12. Ðonne hit bið onstyred mid ðære
lustbærnesse, & hit onhagað to ðæm ðingum, ðonne forlæt
hit hrædlice ða weorc ðæs inneran godan willan, ðonne hit onhagað
to ðæm uterran.
 53.417.15. Ac ðonne ðæt gesihð se ryhta dom ðæs
ðearlwisan Deman, ðonne ne bið hit no swa swa geðoht syn, ac swa
ðurhtogen.
 53.417.16. Forðæmðe ðæt ðætte hine ne onhagode
utane forð to brenganne mid weorcun, innane he hit geðafode, &
ðurhteah mid ðy weorce ðæs fulfremedan willan.
 53.417.19. We habbað geascod from urum ærestan mæge Adame
ðæt us is from him gecynde ðæt we ælc yfel on ðrio wisan
ðurhtion: ðurh gespan, & ðurh lustfulnesse, & ðurh
geðafunga.
 53.417.21. Ðæt gespan bið ðurh dioful.
 53.417.22. Sio lustbærnes bið ðurh ðone lichoman.
 53.417.22. Sio geðafung bið ðurhtogen ðurh ðone gæst.
 53.417.23. Se sætere, ðæt is se dioful, he hine spænð
on woh.
 53.417.24. Se lichoma hine ðonne him underðied mid ðære
lustfulnesse, oððæt se gæst bið oferwunnen mid ðære
lustfulnesse, ðæt he hit geðafað.
 53.417.25. Swa swa sio nædre on neorxna wonge, ærest hio
lærde Euan on woh, & Eue hi hire underðiodde mid lustfulnesse, swa
swa lichoma.
 53.417.27. Ða wæs Adam, swa swa se gæst, ðurh gespan
ðære næddran & ðurh Euan lustbærnesse oferswiðed, ðæt
he geðafode ða synne.
 53.417.29. On ðæm gespane we magon ongietan ða synne, &
mid ðære lustfullnesse we bioð genedode, & mid ðære geðafunge
we bioð gebundne.
 53.417.31. Ac ða sint to manienne ða ðe ða geðohtan synna
hreowsiað ðæt hie geornfullice giemen on hwelce ðæra synna hie
befeollen, forðæm ðæt hi mægen ongean ðæt be ðæm ilcan
gemete hreowsian ðe hi on hira inngeðonce ongieten ðæt hie gesyngoden,
ðylæs him to hwon hreowen ða geðohtan synna, oððæt hi hi
fulfremmen.
 53.417.36. & swaðeah we hi scylen manian & bregean
ðæt we hi on ormodnesse ne gebringen, ðylæs hi wyrs don.
 53.419.1. Forðæm oft se mildheortaa Dryhten swiðe
hrædlice ða geðohtan synna awegaðwihð, ðonne he him ne geðafað
ðæt hi hi ðurhtion moten.
 53.419.3. Be ðæm he mæg witan ðæt hi bioð
hrædlice forgiefene, ðonne he him ne geðafað ðæt hi to ðæm
weorce becumen ðæt he him ðonne ðearlur deman scyle.
 53.419.5. Be ðæm is swiðe wel gecweden ðurh ðone
psalmsceop on ðæm an & ðritigoðan psalme, he cwæð: Ic wille
secgan ongean me selfne min unryht, Dryhten, forðæm ðu forgeafe ða
arleasnesse minre heortan.
 53.419.8. Ða he hæfde befæst Gode his synna, ða he
getiohchod æfde ðæt he him ondettan sceolde.
 53.419.10. Ða cyðde se witga hu ieðelic bið to forgiefenne
sio geðohte synn, ða he cwæð ðæt hio him sona forgiefen wære
swa he geðoht hæfde ðæt he hi ondettan wolde.
 53.419.12. Ðæt ilce ðæt he getiohchod hæfde to
biddanne he cwæð ðæt him wære ær forgiefen.
 53.419.13. Forðæm sio synn ne wearð ðurhtogen mid nanum
weorce, forðæm ne com seo hreowsung to nanre ðrowunge, ac sio geðohte
hreowsung adrygð ða geðohtan synne of ðæm mode.
 54.419.17. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
ða/ ðurhtogenan synna wepað, & swaðeah ne forlætað;
 54.419.18. On oðre wisan ða ðe hie no ne hreowsiað, &
hie ðeah forlætað.
 54.419.20. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe ða gedonan
synna wepað, & hi ðeah ne forlætað;
 54.419.21. On oðre wisan ða ðe hi forlætað, &
swaðeah no ne hreowsiað.
 54.419.22. Ða sint to manienne ðe ða gedonan synna wepað,
& hi swaðeah ne forlætað, ðæt hi geornlice ongieten ðæt hi
on idelnesse tiliað hi selfe to clænsianne mid ðy wope, ðonne hi eft
mid unryhte life hie besmitað;
 54.419.25. Swelce hi hi mid ðære hreowsunga to ðæm
aðwean ðæt hi hi mægen eft afylan.
 54.419.26. Be ðæm is awriten ðæt se hund wille etan
ðæt he ær aspaw, & sio sugu hi wille sylian on hire sole
æfterðæmðe hio aðwægen bið.
 54.419.28. Hwæt, se hund wile aspiwan ðone mete ðe hine
hefegað on his breostum, & ðæt ilce ðæt he for hefignesse
aspaw, ðonne he hit eft frit, ðonne gehefegað hine ðæt ilce ðæt
hine ær gelihte .
 54.419.31. Swa bið ðæm ðe ða gedonan yfelu hreowsiað,
ðonne hi ðæt yfel mid ondetnesse him of aweorpað ðætte hira modes
innað yfele & hefiglice mid gefylled wæs, & ðonne eft foð to
ðæm ilcan & fætað in æfter ðære ondetnesse ðæt ilce
yfel ðæt hi ær mid ðære ondetnesse & hreowsunga utawurpun.
 54.421.2. Swa ðet swin, ðeah hit aðwægen sie, gif hit eft
filð on ðæt sol, ðonne bið hit fulre ðonne hit ær wæs, &
ne forstent ðæt ðweal nauht, ðeah hit ær aðwægen wære;
 54.421.4. Swa bið ðæm ðe his gedonan synna wepeð, &
hi swaðeah ne forlæt: hefigran scylde & hefigran witum he hine
underðiet, gif he hit ne forlæt.
 54.421.6. Forðæm he forhogde ða forgifnesse ðe he mid
ðære hreowsunga begiten hæfde, forðæmðe he wealwode on ðæm
gedrofum wætere;
 54.421.8. & ðæt ðæt he ær mid ðære hreowsunga
geclænsode he beforan Godes eagum eft afylde.
 54.421.9. Be ðæm is eft awriten on Salomonnes bocum, hit is
awriten: Ne eftga ðu ðin word on ðinum gebede.
 54.421.11. Ðæt is ðonne ðæt mon eftgige his word on his
gebede, ðæt mon æfter his hreowsunga gewyrce ðæt he eft scyle
hreowsian.
 54.421.13. Be ðæm is eac gecweden ðurh Essaias ðone
witgan, he cwæð: Aðweað iow, ðæt ge sin clæne.
 54.421.14. Hwæt, se ðonne ne recð hwæðer he clæne
sie, ðe ne sie, se ðe æfter ðære hreowsunga hine ryhtlice &
clænlice nyle gehealdan: ealne weg hi hi ðweað, & ne beoð hie
næfre clæne, ðeah hi ealneg wepen;
 54.421.17. Ealneg hi wepað, & æfter ðæm wope hi
gewyrceað ðæt hi moton eft wepan.
 54.421.18. Be ðæm is gecweden ðurh sumne wisne mon: Gif hwa
on hand nimð hwæt unclænes, & hine æfter ðæm aðwihð,
& ðonne eft fehð on ðæt ilce ðæt he ær feng, hwæt
forstent him ðonne ðæt ærre ðweal?
 54.421.21. Se bið aðwægen of unclænnesse, se ðe
aðwihð mid hreowsunga his unclænnesse.
 54.421.22. Se ðonne gehrinð eft ðære unclænnesse ðe
syngað æfter his hreowsunga.
 54.421.23. Ac ða sint to manienne ðe ða gedonan scylda
hreowsiað, & hi ðeah ne forlætað, ðæt hi ongieten ðæt
hie beoð beforan ðæs dieglan Deman eagum gelice ðæm monnum ðe
swiðe eaðmodlice onginnað beforon ricum monnum, & him swiðe
oleccað ða hwile ðe hi him beforan beoð, & eft, ðonne hi him
beæftan beoð, ðonne doð hi him to demme & to fiondscipe ðæt
ðæt hi magon.
 54.421.29. Hwæt is ðæt, ðæt mon hreowsige his synna,
buton ðæt mon eowað Gode his eaðmodnesse & his treowa & his
hiersumnesse?
 54.421.31. Oððe hwæt is ðæt, ðæt mon æfter his
hreowsunga syngige, buton ðæt, ðæt he deð feondscipe &
ofermetto & unhiersumnesse ðæm ilcan Gode ðe he ær olehte?
 54.421.33. Swa swa Iacobus sæde se apostol, ða he cwæð:
Swa hwa swa wille bion ðisse weorlde freond to ungemetlice, he bið gehaten
Godes feond.
 54.421.35. Ða ðonne sint to manienne ðe ða gedonan scylda
wepað, & hi swaðeah ne forlætað, ðætte hi ongiten ðætte
oft bið swiðe idel & unnyt ðara yfelena manna hreowsung, ðonne hi
æfter ðæm ne tiliað nauðer ne god to donne ne yfel to
forlætanne.
 54.423.3. Swa bið eac swiðe oft synleas yfel geðoht ðæm
godum, ðonne hi hit mid weorcum ne ðorhtioð.
 54.423.4. Swa wundorlice hit todælð & gemetgað se
godcunda wisdom be hira ægðeres geearnungum, swa ðætte ða yflan
betwix eallum hira yflum ðe hi fullice gefremmað hi fortruwiað, & hi
on ofermetto ahebbað for ðæm lytlan gode ðe hi geðenceað, & no
ne anginnað to wyrceanne.
 54.423.8. Ond eft, ða godan, ðonne hi beoð onstyrede mid
ðæm yflum geðohtum ðe hi næfre nyllað ðurhtion, ðonne beoð
hi geeaðmedde, & forsioð hi selfe for ðæm lytlan yfele, & ne
forleosað nauht ðurh ðæt hira ryhtwisnesse, ac hi hi geiecað mid
ðære eaðmodnesse.
 54.423.12. Hwæt, Balam cwæð, ða he geseah ða wicstowa
ðara ryhtwisena Israhela: Geweorðe min lif swelce ðissa ryhtwisena, &
geweorðe min ende swelce hira.
 54.423.14. Ac eft, ða sio anbryrdnes hine alet, ða funde he
swiðe yfel geðeaht & searwa ymb hira lif: forðæm hine gehran sio
gitsung, he forget ðone freondscipe wið Israhele.
 54.423.17. Hwæt, sanctus Paulus cwæð ðæt he gesawe
oðerne gewunan & oðerne willan on his limum, & se wære feohtende
wið ðæm willan his modes, & hine gehæftne lædde on synne
gewunan.
 54.423.19. Sio, he cwæð, wære on his limum.
 54.423.20. Forðæm wæs sanctus Paulus gecostod mid his modes
untrumnesse ðæt he ongeate his synna, & forðæm wære ðy
strangra on godum weorcum.
 54.423.22. Forhwy bið se synfulla onbryrd mid ðære
hreowsunga, & ne bið no ðy ryhtwisra;
 54.423.23. Oððe forhwy bið se ryhtwisa gecostod mid yfle
geðohte, & ne bið ðeah gewemmed mid ðære scylde;
 54.423.25. Buton forðyðe ðæm synfullan nauht ne helpað
his godan geðohtas , forðæmðe he næfð gearone willan untweogendne
to ðæm weorce, ne eft ðæm ryhtwisan ne deriað his yflan geðohtas,
forðæmðe he næfð gearone willan ðæt woh to fulfremmanne?
 54.423.28. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe hira synna
forlætað, & hi ðeah ne betað ne ne hreowsiað, ðæt hi ne
wenen, ðeah hi hira synna forlæten, ðæt hi God him forlæte, gif hi
hi mid nanum ðingum ne betað ne ne hreowsiað.
 54.423.32. Swa se writere, gif he ne dilegað ðæt he ær
wrat, ðeah he næfre ma nauht ne write, ðæt bið ðeah undilegod
ðæt he ær wrat.
 54.423.33. & swa eac se ðe oðrum bismer cwið, oððe
deð, ðeah he geswice, & hit næfre eft ne do, ðeah hit bið gedon
ðæt he dyde, & unðingad, gif he hit ne bet.
 54.423.36. Ac he sceal ða ofermodlican word mid eaðmodlicum
wordum gemetgian, gif he wið ðone oðerne geðingian wile.
 54.425.1. Wenstu, gif hwa oðrum hwæt gieldan sceal,
hwæðer he hine mid ðy gehealdan mæge ðæt he him nauht mare on ne
nime, ne ðæt ne gielde ðæt he ær nam?
 54.425.3. Swa us bið æt Gode, ðonne we wið hine
gesyngiað: ðeah we næbre eft swa ne don, gif we ðæt gedone mid
nanum ðingum ne betað ne ne hreowsiað, ne bio we no ðæs sicore, gif
us ðæt ne mislicað ðæt us ær licode, ðonne ne bið hit no us
færgiefen, ðeah we nu nauht yfeles ne don on ðisse worulde.
 54.425.8. Ne sculon we ðeah forðy bion to orsorge, gif we nauht
to gode ne doð, forðæmðe swiðe fela unalefedes we oft
geðenceað.
 54.425.9. Hu mæg se ðonne bion orsorg se ðe him self wat
ðæt he gesyngað?
 54.425.10. Hwelce iðnesse hæfð God æt urum witum,
oððe hwelcne weorðscipe hæfð he æt urre ðrowunga, butan
ðæt he wile gehælan ða wunde urra scylda mid strangum læcedome,
gif he ne mæg mid liðum, ðætte us biterige sio hreowsung, swa swa us
ær swetedon ða synna?
 54.425.14. & swa swa we sigon ær on ðæt unaliefede,
oððæt we afeollon, swa we sculon nu forberan ðæt aliefede,
oððæt we arisen;
 54.425.16. Ðætte ðæt mod ðætte wæs abisegad mid
unryhtre blisse si eft abisegad on halwyndre & on ryhtlicre hreowsunga, swa
ðætte ðæt mod ðætte sio upahæfenes & ða ofermetto
gewundedon eft gehæle sio eaðmodnes & sio forsewennes his selfes.
 54.425.20. Be ðæm cwæð Dauid on ðæm feower &
hundsiofantigoðan psalme: Ic cwæð to ðæm unryhtwisum, ne do ge
unryhtwislice, & cwæð to ðæm ðe ðær syngedon, ne hebbe ge
to up eowre hornas.
 54.425.22. Ðonne ahebbað ða synfullan swiðe up hira hornas,
ðonne hi hi næfre nyllað geeaðmedan to ðæm ðæt hie ongieten
hira unryhtwisnesse, & ða hreowsian.
 54.425.25. Be ðæm wæs eft gecweden on ðæm fiftegoðan
psalme: ða gedrefedan heortan & ða geeaðmeddan ne forsihð hi
næfre Dryhten.
 54.425.26. Swa hwa ðonne swa his synna hreowsað, & hi
swaðeah ne forlæt, se gedrefð his heortan, & ðeah oferhygð
ðæt he hi geeaðmede.
 54.425.28. Se ðonne, se ðe his synna forlæt, & hi
swaðeah ne hreowsað, se hine eaðmed, & nyle ðeah his mod gedrefan.
 54.425.30. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Paulus on his
ærendgewrite to Corinctheum, he cwæð: Ge wæron ær on yflum
weorcum, ac ge sint nu geclænsode & gehalgode.
 54.425.32. Forðæmðe æghwelc man bið æfter ðære
hreowsunga his synna clænra ðonne he ær wæs, ær he gesyngade.
 54.425.34. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Petrus, ða he geseah
manige men ormode for hira ærron yflun, he cwæð: Hreowsiað &
weorðað gefulwade eower ælc.
 54.425.36. Ærest he lærde ðæt hi hreowsodon, &
siððan ðæt hi wurden gefullwode, swelce he cwæde: Hreowsiað
ærest on eowrum mode, & siððan æfter fierste aðweað eow,
& geclænsiað mid eowrum tearum.
 54.427.3. Hu mæg se bion orsorg ðære wrace his scylda, se
ðe nu agiemeleasað ðæt he hreowsige his synna?
 54.427.4. Hu mæg he hira bion orsorg, nu se hiehsta hierde
ðære halgan ciricean cwæð ðætte sio hreowsung scolde bion ær
ðæm fulwihte?
 54.427.6. Se fullwuht ðone mon geclænsað from his synnum,
& ealra ðinga swiðosð ða synna adwæscð.
 55.427.8. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
ða unaliefedan ðing, ða ðe hi doð, herigað;
 55.427.9. On oðre ða ðe hi tælað, & swaðeah
doð.
 55.427.11. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe ðæt
unliefde herigað, & eac doð;
 55.427.12. On oðre ða ðe hit leað, & swaðeah doð.
 55.427.12. Ða sint to manienne, ða ðe ægðer ge hit doð
ge hit herigað, ðæt hi ongieten ðæt hi oft swiðor gensyngiað
mid ðæm wordum ðonne hi don mid ðæm dædum;
 55.427.15. Forðæm, ðonne hi yfel doð, ðonne doð hi
ðæt him anum, ac ðonne hi hit heriað, ðonne lærað hi hit
ælcne ðara ðe hit gehierð herian.
 55.427.17. Forðy hi sint to manienne, ðonne hi licettað
ðæt hi willen astyfecian ðæt yfel on him selfum, ðæt hi hit
ðonne ne dyrren sæwan on oðrum monnum;
 55.427.19. Ac ðæt him ðynce genog on ðæm ðæt hi
hit selfe dydon.
 55.427.20. Ond eft hi sint to manienne, ðeah hi him nyllen
ðæt ondrædan ðæt hi yfele sien, ðæt hi huru scamige ðæt
men witen hwelce hi sin.
 55.427.22. Forðæm oft ðæt yfel ðæt forholen bið,
hit bið fleonde, forðæm, ðonne ðæt mod sceamað ðæt hit mon
wite, ðonne mæg hit eaðe gesælan æt sumum cierre ðæt hine eac
scamige ðæt he hit wyrce.
 55.427.25. Hwæt, ælc unryhtwis mon, swa he scamleaslicor his
yfel cyð, swa he freolicor hit ðurhtiehð, & hit him aliefedlicre
ðyncð.
 55.427.26. Swa hit him ðonne aliefedlicre ðyncð, swa he
ðær diopor on gedyfð.
 55.427.27. Be ðæm is awriten on Essaies bocum: Hi lærdon
hira synna swa swa Sodome dydon, & hi hi nanwuht ne hælon.
 55.427.29. Gif Sodome hira synne hælen, ðonne ne syngodon hi
na butan ege, ac hi forleton eallinga ðone bridels ðæs eges, ða hi ne
scrifon hwæðer hit wære ðe dæg ðe niht, ðonne ðonne hi
syngodon.
 55.427.32. Be ðæm is eft awriten on Genesis ðætte swiðe
wære gemanigfalðod Sodomwara hream & Gomorwara.
 55.427.33. Se cliopað, se ðe dearninga syngað;
 55.429.1. Ac se hremð, se ðe openlice & orsorglice
syngað.
 55.429.2. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe hira synna
onscuniað, & swaðeah ne forlætað, ðæt hi foreðonclice
ongieten hu hi hi willen beladian on ðæm miclan dome, ðonne hi hi
nyllað her beladian midðæmðæt hi him selfum demen, & hiora agna
scylda on him selfum wrecen.
 55.429.6. Hwæt bioð hi elles buton liceteras, ðonne hi
tælað ðæt ðæt hi nyllað forlætan?
 55.429.7. Ac hie sint to manienne ðæt hi ongieten ðæt hit
bið se degla Godes dom ðæt hi eft ðy mare wite hæbben ðe hi gere
witon ðæt hi on ðweorh doð, & ðeah nyllað geswican, ne nanwuht
ymb ðæt swincan ðæt hi hit mægen forlætan.
 55.429.10. Swa hi hit ðonne swutolor witon, swa hi swiður
forweorðað, forðæmðe hi onfengon ðæt leoht ðæs ondgietes,
& ðeah noldon forlætan ða ðistro ðæs won weorces, ac ðæt
andgiet ðæt him God sende to fultome hi agimeleasedon.
 55.429.14. Ðæt ilce andgit bið eft on gewitnesse hira yfela
æt ðæm dome, & geiecð hira witu ðætte him ær wæs
onsended mid to dielgianne hira synna.
 55.429.16. Ac forðæmðe hi her syngiað, & hit him no ne
hreowð, hi gehrinð her sumu wracu ær ðæm ecum witum ðæt hi ne
sien freo ne orsorge on ðæm anbide ðæs maran wites.
 55.429.18. Ac swa micle hi onfoð ðær mare wite swa hi her
gearor witon ðæt hi untela doð, & hit ðeah nyllað forlætan.
 55.429.20. Be ðæm cwæð Crist on his godspelle: Se ðegn,
se ðe wat his hlafordes willan, & ðonne nyle wyrcean æfter his
hlafordes willan, he bið manigra wita wyrðe.
 55.429.22. Be ðæm ilcan cwæð eac se salmscop on ðæm
feower & fiftiogoðan psalme, he cwæð: Hi sculon gan libbende on
helle.
 55.429.24. Ða ðe libbende bioð, hi witon & ongietað
hwæt ymb hi gedon bið; ða deadan ne magon nanwuht witan.
 55.429.25. Ða bioð genemde deade, & ða stigað on helle,
ða ðe nyton hwonne hi untela doð;
 55.429.27. Ac ða ðe hit witon, & swaðeah doð, ða
gað libbende & witende on helle.
 56.429.29. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
swiðe hrædlice bioð oferswiðde mid sumre unryhtgewilnunge;
 56.429.30. On oðre wisan ða ðe longe ær ymbðeahtigeað,
& hit ðonne on lasð ðurhtioð.
 56.429.33. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe mid
færlice luste bioð oferswiðde, on oðre ða ðe lange ymbðenceað
& ðeahtiað, & swa weorðað beswicene.
 56.431.1. Ða ðonne sint to manienne ðe mid færlice luste
bioð beswicene, ðæt hi ongieten ðæt hi ælce dæge beoð on
ðæm gefeohte ðisses andweardan lifes.
 56.431.3. Ac ðæt mod ðætte ne mæg gesion ða flane
ær hit sie gewundad, hit beðearf ðæt hit hæbbe simle on honda
ðone scield Godes eges, & him symle ondræde ða diglan gescotu
ðæs sweocolan feondes, & hine wærlice healde on ðære byrg his
modes wið nihtlicum gefeohtum, forðæmðe hi willað simle on ðistrum
feohtan.
 56.431.7. Ac ðæt mod ðætte næfð singale sorge hit
self to behealdanne, ðonne bið hit on sume healfe open to wundianne;
 56.431.9. Forðæm se lytega feond swa micle ieðelicor
ðæt mod gewundað swa he hit ongiet nacodre ðære byrnan
wærscipes.
 56.431.11. Forðy sint ða to manienne ða ðe mid hrædlice
luste bioð oferswiðde, ðæt hie to georne ne giemen ðissa
eorðlicena ymbhogena, forðæmðe hi ne magon ongietan mid hu manugum
unðeawum hi beoð gewundode, ða hwile ðe hi to ungemetlice smeagað ymb
ðas eorðlecan ðing.
 56.431.15. Be ðæm sæde Salomon ðæt se mon sceolde
cweðan, se ðe wæs slæpende gewundad: Hi me wundedon, & ic hit ne
gefredde;
 56.431.17. Hi me drogon, & ic hit nyste;
 56.431.17. & sona swa ic anwoc, swa wilnode ic eft wines.
 56.431.18. Swa bið ðæt mod slæpende gewundad swa hit ne
gefret, ðonne hit bið to gimeleas his agenra ðearfa.
 56.431.19. Ac ðæt mod ðætte bið mid unðeawum
oferdrenced, hit ne mæg ongietan ða toweardan yfelo, ne furðum ða nat
ðe hit deð.
 56.431.21. Hit mon drægð swa hit ne gefret, ðonne ðonne
hit iernð on ða unaliefedan unðeawas, & hit swaðeah ne
onwæcneð to ðon ðæt hit eft on ierne mid hreowsunga.
 56.431.24. Ac hit wilnað ðæt hit to ðon onwæcne
ðæt hit mæge eft weorðan oferdruncen;
 56.431.25. Forðæm, ðeah ðæt mod slæpe godra weorca,
hit wacað hwæððre on ðæm ymbhogum ðisse worlde, & wilnað
ðæt hit sie oferdruncen his agnes willan.
 56.431.27. Swa hit gebyreð ðæt ðæt mod slæpð
ðæs ðe hit wacian sceolde, & wacað ðæs ðe hit slapan
scolde.
 56.431.28. Be ðæs modes slæpe wæs ær awriten on
ðære ilcan Salomonnes bec, hit wæs awriten ðæt hit wære swelce
se stiora slepe on midre sæ, & forlure ðæt stiorroður.
 56.431.31. Ðæm stiorere bið gelicost se mon ðe ongemong
ðisses middangeardes costungum & ongemong ðæm yðum unðeawa hine
agimeleasað.
 56.431.33. Se deð swa se stiora ðe ðæt stiorroðor
forliesð, se ðe forlæt ðone ymbhogan & ða geornfulnesse ðe he
mid stioran scolde ðære sawle & ðæm lichoman.
 56.431.35. Se bið swiðe onlic ðæm stioran ðe his
stiorroðor forliest on sæ, se ðe forlæt ðone foreðonc his
gesceadwisnesse ongemong ðæm bisegum ðisses middangeardes.
 56.433.1. Ac gif se stiora his stiorroðor gehilt, ðonne cymð
he orsorglice to lande, hwilum ðeah ongean wind & ongean ða yða,
hwilum mid ægðrum.
 56.433.3. Swa deð ðæt mod, ðonne hit wacorlice stiereð
ðære sawle: sume unðeawas hit ofertrit, sume hit ær gesihð, &
utan becierð;
 56.433.5. Ðæt is ðæt hit ða gedonan unðeawas
swincende gebete, & ða ungedonan foreðoncelice becierre, swa se stiora
deð: sume ða yða he becerð mid ðy scipe, sume hit oferstigð.
 56.433.8. Ymb ðæt is eft gecweden on ðæm Salomones bocum
ðe we hatað Cantica Canticorum be ðæm strengestan cempum ðæs
uplican eðles, hit is gecweden: Hæbbe eower ælc his sweord be his ðeo
for nihtlecum ege.
 56.433.11. Ðonne mon hæfð his sweord be his ðio, ðonne
mon temeð his unaliefde lustas mid ðæm wordum ðære halgan lare.
 56.433.13. & sio niht getacnað ða ðistro ðære
blindnesse urre tidernesse.
 56.433.14. Forðæmðe nan mon ne mæg on niht gesion hu neah
him hwelc frecenes sie, him is ðearf ðæt he hæbbe his sweord be his
hype.
 56.433.15. Swa sculon ða halgan weras simle stondan gearuwe to
gefohte wið ðæm lytegan fiende, forðæm hi him ondrædað ða
frecenesse ðe hi ne gesioð.
 56.433.18. Be ðæm is eft gecweden on ðære Salomones bec
ðe we hatað Cantica Canticorum, hit is gecweden: ðin nosu is swelce se
torr on Libano.
 56.433.20. Ðæt is ðæt we oft gestincað mid urum nosum
ðæt we mid urum eagum gesion ne magon.
 56.433.21. Mid ðæm nosum we tosceadað & tocnawað gode
stencas & yfele.
 56.433.22. Hwæt is elles getacnod ðurh ða nosu buton se
foreðonc & sio gesceadwisnes ðara godena manna?
 56.433.23. Hwæt elles getacnað se hea torr on Libano buton
ðone hean foreðonc & ða gesceadwisnesse ðara godena monna, ða
sculon ongietan ða costunga & ðæt gefeoht, ærðæmðe hit
cume, ðæt hi mægen ðy fæstor gestondan, ðonne hit cume?
 56.433.27. Forðæmðe ælc here hæfð ðy læssan
cræft ðonne he cymð, gif hine mon ær wat, ær he cume;
 56.433.28. Forðæm he gesihð ða gearwe ðe he wende
ðæt he sceolde ungearwe findan.
 56.433.29. Him wære ðonne ieðre ðæt he hira ær
gearra wende ðonne he hira ungearra wende, & hi ðonne gearuwe mette.
 56.433.31. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe ær
ðenceað to syngianne, & ymbðeahtiað, ær hi hit ðurhtion,
ðæt hi ongiten mid foreðonclicre gesceadwisnesse ðæt hi onælað
ðearlran dom wið him mid ðæm ðæt hi her ymb ðæt yfel
ðeahtiað, ær hi hit don, & hi beoð mid swa micle strengran cwide
ðæs domes geslægene swa hi beoð fæstor gebundne mid ðæm bende
ðæs yflan geðeahtes.
 56.433.36. Micle hrædlicor hi wæren aðwægene ðæra
scylda mid ðære hreowsunga, gif hi færlecor syngoden unbeðohte.
 56.435.2. Ac hi beoð ðæs ðe lator ðe hi oftor
ymbðeahtiað;
 56.435.3. Forðæm, gif ðæt mod eallunga ær ne forsawe
ða ecan edlean, ðonne ne gesirede hit no ðæt hit ðurhtuge swelce
synne.
 56.435.4. Swa micel toscead is betwuh ðære beðohtan synne,
ðe mon longe ymbsireð, & ðære ðe mon færlice ðurhtiehð;
 56.435.6. Swa ðætte se se ðe ða synne gesireð,
ægðer ge gesyngað, ge eac syððan hwilum on ormodnesse gewit.
 56.435.7. Forðæm ne tælde Dryhten ða twa scylda gelice.
 56.435.8. Ðæt he cyðde, ða he cwæð ðurh Ieremias
ðone witgan: Healdað eow ðæt ge ne onælen min ierre mid eowrum
searwum, ðæt ge hit ne mægen eft adwæscan.
 56.435.10. Be ðæm ilcan he cwæð eft ierrenga ðurh
ðone ilcan witgan, he cwæð: Ic write on eow æfter eowrum geðeahte.
 56.435.12. Ðy ne wricð Dryhten no gelice ða gesiredan synne
& ða færlice ðurhtogenan, forðæm sio gesirede syn bið ungelic
eallum oðrum synnum.
 56.435.14. Ac sio ðe hrædlice ðurhtogen bið, sio bið
hwilum for giemeleste, hwilum for untrymnesse modes oððe lichoman.
 56.435.16. Sio ðonne ðe longe gesired bið, sio cymð symle
of yflum ingeðonce.
 56.435.17. Be ðæm wæs gecweden swiðe ryhte ðurh ðone
psalmscop on ðære heringe ðæs eadgan weres, & on ðæm forman
psalme, hit is gecweden ðæt he no ne sæte on ðæm wolberendan
setle.
 56.435.20. Forðæm wæs ðis gecweden ðe hit is swiðe
gewunelic ðætte domeras & rice menn on setelum sitten.
 56.435.21. Se ðonne sit on woles setle, se ðe yfel wyrcð mid
geðeahte.
 56.435.22. & se sit eac on wolberendum setle, se ðe
gesceadwislice tocnawan con god & yfel, & ðeah geleornað ðæt
he deð ðæt yfel.
 56.435.24. Se sit, swelce he sitte on ðæm stole ðæs
forhwierfdan gemotes, se ðe hine upahefeð on ða ofermetto swelcre
unryhtwisnesse ðætte he fullfremme hwelc yfel huru ðurh geðeaht.
 56.435.26. Forðæm swa micle swa se bið beforan ðe on
ðæm stole sitt ðæm oðrum ðe ðær ymb stondað, swæ bið
sio syn ðe longe ær geðoht bið, & ðonne ðurhtogen, ofer ða
ðe færlice geðoht bið, & ðonne ðurhtogen.
 56.435.29. Forðæm sint to manianne ða ðe lange
ymbsieriað ðæt hi ongieten hu micel wite hi sculun habban beforan
ðæm oðrum, forðæmðe hi nu nyllað bion ðara synnfullena
geferan, ac willað bion hira ealdormenn.
 57.437.1. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monienne ða ðe
oftrædlice lytla scylda wyrceað;
 57.437.2. On oðre wisan ða ðe hi gehealdað wið ða
lytlan scylda, & ðeah hwiltidum afellað on hefegum scyldum.
 57.437.5. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe oftrædlice
syngiað, & ðeah lytlum scyldum;
 57.437.6. On oðre wisan ða ðe hie wið ða læssan scylda
bewareniað, & ðeah hwilum afeallað on micla scylda.
 57.437.7. Hi sint to manienne, ðonne hi oft syngiað, ðeah hi
lytlum syngien, ðæt hie ma ðencen hu manega synna hi fremmað ðonne
hi ðencen hu micle hi hie gefremmen;
 57.437.10. & gif hi oferhycgen ðæt hi him ondræden
hiora lytlan synna, ðonne ðonne hi hi gesioð, ondræden hi him huru,
ðonne hi hi hrimað.
 57.437.12. Swiðe lytle beoð ða dropan ðæs smalan renes,
ac hi wyrceað ðeah swiðe micel flod & swiðe strongne stream,
ðonne hi gegaddrode beoð, forðonðe hira bið swiðe fela.
 57.437.14. Swiðe lytlum sicerað ðæt wæter & swiðe
degellice on ðæt hlece scip, & ðeah hit wilnað ðæs ilcan ðe
sio hlude yð deð on ðære hreon sæ, buton hit mon ær utaweorpe.
 57.437.17. Swiðe lytle bioð ða wunda on ðæm hreofan
lice, & ðeah, gif sio hreofl hit eal ofergæð, hio gedeð ðæt
ilce ðæt sio micle wund gedeð on ðæm breostum.
 57.437.19. Be ðæm is awriten on Salomonnes bocum ðætte
se, se ðe nylle onscunian his lytlan scylda, ðæt he wille gelisian to
maran.
 57.437.21. & gif he agiemeleasað ðæt he ða lytlan
hreowsige, & hwilum forcierre, he wile afeallan on ða miclan, ðeah hit
late sie.
 57.437.22. Ac hi sint to manienne, ðonne hi oft syngiað lytlum,
ðæt hie geornlice ongieten ðæt mon oft wyrs gesyngað on ðæm
lytlum synnum ðonne on ðæm miclum, forðæm hi mon onginð swa micle
ær betan swa hie mon ær ongiet;
 57.437.26. Ac ða lytlan mon ne gelefð to nanre synne, ac nimð
hi to gewunan, & hi ðonne ðy earfoðlicor gebet.
 57.437.27. Ðonon cymð oft ðætte ðæt mod him ærest
na ne ondræt ða lytlan scylda, ne, ðonne on last, ða miclan.
 57.437.29. Ac hit gewunað to ðæm synnum oð hit becymð to
sumum ealdordome ðara scylda, & ðonne swa micle læs onscunað ða
miclan swa hit ær orsorglicor gewunode to ðæm lytlum, & him ða
læs ondred.
 57.437.32. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe hi
gehealdað wið ða lytlan scylda, & hwilum ðeah gedufað on ðæm
miclum, hi sint to manienne ðæt hi geornlice hi selfe ongieten,
forðæmðe hiora mod bið swiðe oft upahæfen, forðæmðe hi hi
habbað swa wærlice gehealden wið ða lytlan scylda.
 57.439.1. Ac him is ðearf ðæt hi for ðære orsorgnesse
ne ðurhtion hefigran scylda, ðæt is ðæt hi for hira
upahæfennesse ne befeallen on ðone pytt ofermetta, ðylæs hi
forswelge/ sio swelgend ðære upahæfenesse.
 57.439.4. Forðæm oft, ðonne hi oferswiðað utane ða
lytlan scylda, hi aðindað innane on idlum gilpe.
 57.439.5. & ðonne ðæt mod bið innan oferswiðed mid
ðæm ofermettum, hi toflowað swiðe hræðe ut, & ætiewað on
openum yfle.
 57.439.7. Forðæm sint to manienne ða ðe hi wið ða
lytlan scylda gehealdað, ond ðeah hwilum gedufað on ðæm miclum, hi
sint to manienne ðæt hi hi behealden ðæt hi innan ne afeallen ðonon
ðe hi wenað ðæt hi utan stonden, ðylæs sio upahæfenes for
ðære lytlan ryhtwisnesse him weorðe to wege micelre scylde æfter
ðæs ðearlwisan Deman dome & edleane.
 57.439.12. Ac ðonne hi wenað ðæt hi of hira ægnum
mægene hi hæbben gehealden wið ða lytlan scylda, ðonne weorðað
hi swiðe ryhtlice forlætene from Gode, oððæt hi afeallað on maran
scylda;
 57.439.15. Forðæm ðæt hi ongiten feallende ðæt hie
ær hiora agnes ðonces ne stodon, ðætte ðæt mod, ðe ær
wæs upahæfen for lytlum gode, si ðonne gebiged to miclum yfele.
 57.439.17. Ac hi sint to manienne ðæt hie ongieten ðæt
hie oft gesyngiað giet wyrs on ðæm ðæt hi hi wareniað wið ða
lytlan scylda ðonne hi don on miclum scyldum;
 57.439.19. Forðæmðe hi licettað hie unscyldge, ðonne hi
hi wæreniað wið ða lytlan.
 57.439.20. Ac hi hi ne ladiað nowiht, ðonne hi wyrcað ða
miclan & ða openan.
 57.439.21. Ðæt is open yfel beforan Gode ðæt mon ða
miclan do, ac ðæt is licettung haligdomes for monnum ðæt mon ða
lytlan forga, & ða miclan do.
 57.439.23. Be ðæm wæs gecweden on ðæm godspelle to
Fariseum ðæt hi wiðbleowen ðære fleogan, & forswulgun ðone
olfend.
 57.439.25. Swelce he openlice cwæde: ða lytlan yflu ge
fleoð, & ða miclan ge fretað.
 57.439.26. Ðæt is ðæt ilce ðæt eft wæs getæled
ðurh ðone muð ðære Soðfæstnesse, ðæt is Crist, he
cwæð: Ge tiogoðiað eowre mintan & eowerne dile & eowerne
kymen, & lætað untiogoðad ðætte diorwyrðre is eowra oðra
æhta, & ða bebodu ðe giet maran sint on ðære æwe ge no ne
healdað: ðæt is ryht dom & mildheortnes & treowa.
 57.439.31. Nis us nawht recceleaslice to gehiranne ðætte he
nemde ða undiorestan wyrta ðe on wyrttunum weaxe, & ðeah swiðe
welstincenda.
 57.439.33. Ðurh ðone stenc sint getacnode ða liceteras, ðe
willað habban ðone hlisan haligdomes, & don ðeah lytel godes;
 57.439.34. & ðeah hi for micel god ne don, hi wilniað
ðæt hi micel ðyncen, & hi mon widherge.
 58.441.1. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
nanwuht godes ne onginnað;
 58.441.2. On oðre wisan ða ðe hit onginnað, & wel ne
geendiað.
 58.441.4. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe nan god ne
onginnað;
 58.441.4. On oðre ða ðe hit onginnað, & no ne
geendiað.
 58.441.5. Ða ðonne ðe nan god ne onginnað, ne sint hi no to
lærenne hwæt hi don scylen, ær him si belagen ðæt hi ðonne
doð;
 58.441.7. Forðæmðe hi nyllað underfon ðæt uncuðe
ðæt hi gehirað, buton hi ær ongieten hu frecenlic ðæt is
ðæt hi cunnon;
 58.441.9. Forðæm nan mon ne bitt oðerne ðæt he hine
rære, gif he self nat ðæt he afeallen bið;
 58.441.10. Ne eac se, se his wunde sar ne gefret,ne wilnað he
nanes læces.
 58.441.11. Forðy him is ærest to cyðanne hu idel ðæt is
ðæt hi lufiað & hu unnytt, & siððan him is to reccanne hu
nyttwyrðe ðæt is ðæt hi forlæten habbað.
 58.441.13. Ærest hi sculon ongietan ðæt hi fleon ðæt
ðæt hi lufiað.
 58.441.14. Ðonne magon hi sið ieðelice ongietan ðæt
ðæt is to lufianne ðæt hi ær flugon.
 58.441.15. Micle ðy bet hi underfoð ðæt uncuðe, gif hi
on ðæm cuðan gewislice ongietað hwæt ðæron tælwyrðes
bið.
 58.441.17. Ðonne hi leorniað mid fulre estfulnesse ða soðan
god to secanne, ðonne hi mid fulle gesceade ongietað ðæt ðæt
wæs leas & idelnes ðæt hi ær heoldon.
 58.441.19. Ac gehiren hi ðæt ðas andweardan god bioð from
ælcre lustfulnesse swiðe hrædlice gewitende, & swaðeah sio scyld
ðe hi ðurh ða lustfullnesse ðurhtioð ungewitendlice bið
ðurhwuniende mid wræce;
 58.441.22. & nu ðæt ðæt hie lyst hi sculon nedenga
forlætan, & ðeah ðæt hi nu nedenga forlætað him bið eft to
wite gehealden.
 58.441.24. Oft ðeah weorðað men swiðe halwendlice afærde
mid ðæm ilcan ðingum ðe hi ær unnytlice lufedon: ðonne ðæt
geslægene mod gesihð swa healicne dem his agnes hryres, & ongit hine
selfne on swelcre frecennesse & on swelcne spild forlæd, ðonne
wiðtremð he, & onhupað, & ondræt him þæt ðæt he
ær lufode.
 58.441.28. Leornað ðonne to lufianne ðæt he ær
forhogde.
 58.441.29. Be ðæm wæs gecweden to Ieremie ðæm witgan,
ða he wæs onsended to læranne, hit wæs gecweden: Ic hæbbe ðe nu
todæg gesetne ofer rice & ofer ðioda ðæt ðu hi toluce &
toweorpe & forspilde & tostence & getimbrie & geplantige.
 58.441.32. Forðæm, buton he ðæt woh ær towurpe ne
meahte he noht nytwyrðlice ðæt ryht getimbrian;
 58.441.34. Forðæm, buton he of his hieremonna mode ða
ðornas ðære idlan lufan ær upatuge, unnyt he plantode on hi ða word
ðære halgan lare.
 58.443.2. Forðæm wæs eac ðætte sanctus Petrus ærest
towearp ðæt ðæt he eft timbrede.
 58.443.3. Ðæt wæs ða ða he Iudeas nolde nan wuht
læran hwæt hi don scolden, ac him cidde, forðæmðe hi ær dydon,
& ðus cwæð: ðone Nazareniscan Hælend ðæt wæs afandon
wer betwux eow on mægenum & tacnum & foretacnum, ða worhte Dryhten
ðurh hine ongemang eow, ðone ge beswicon ðurh unryhtwisra monna honda,
& ofslogon & ahengon ðurh eower geðeaht, swa swa hit God æt
fruman wisse, & ðeah geðafode;
 58.443.9. Se ilca God hine eft aweahte to onliesanne ða
gehæftan on helle.
 58.443.10. Forðæm him ætwat Petrus ða dæde ðe he
walde, siððan hi ongeaten hiora wælhreownesse, ðæt hi wæren
gedrefde & geeaðmedde, & ðæs ðe nytweorðlicor gehierden ða
halgan lare, ðe hi ær wilnodon ðæt hi gehiran mosten.
 58.443.13. Ða andwyrdon hin ða Iudeas, & cwædon: Hwæt
magon we his nu don, broður Petrus?
 58.443.15. Petrus andswarode, & cwæð: Doð ærest
hreowsunga, & weorðað siððan gefullwade.
 58.443.16. Ða edniwunge & ða lare hi swiðe hrædlice
forsawen, ðær hi ær ne ongeten ðone hryre & ða toworpennesse
hira wælhreownesse ðurh his ðreaunga.
 58.443.18. Gelicost ðæm ðe sancte Paule wæs, ða him
ðæt leoht com of hefonum, & hine gebregde: næs him no ða giet to
gecweden hwæt he mid ryhte ðonon forð don scolde, ac him wæs gesæd
hwæt he ær to unryhte dyde .
 58.443.21. Ac ða he swa gebreged on eorðan feoll, & ascode,
& cwæð: Hwæt eart ðu, Dryhten?
 58.443.23. Ða wæs him swiðe hraðe geandwyrd: Ic eom se
Nazarenisca Hælend, ðe ðu ehtst.
 58.443.24. & ða cwæð he: Dryhten, hwæt hætst ðu
me ge don?
 58.443.24. Ða ondwyrde him Dryhten: Aris, & gong to geonre
byrig;
 58.443.25. Ðe mon sægð ðara hwæt ðu don scealt.
 58.443.26. Loca nu, hu Dryhten wæs sprecende of hefonum to his
ehtere, & hine ðreade for his ærgedonan weorcum.
 58.443.28. Ærðæmðe he him sæde hu he hine
forðhealdan sceolde, ða wæs gehroren sio upahæfenes Paules & eal
ða weorc ðe he ðurh ða worhte.
 58.443.30. & sona æfter ðæm hryre ðære
upahæfennesse he ongan timbrian eaðmodnesse.
 58.443.31. Ða ða he wilnode lare æt Gode, ða gefeoll se
egeslica ehtere to ðon ðæt he swa micle stranglicor arise swa he
hefiglicor afeoll.
 58.443.33. Swa sint to teweorpanne ærest ða ðe nan god ær
ne dydon ðurh ðreaunge of ðære heardnesse hiora yfelnesse, to ðæm
ðæt hi sien eft on firste arærde & gestonden on ryhtum weorce;
 58.443.35. Forðæm we ceorfað heah treowu on holte ðæt
we hi eft uparæren on ðæm botle, ðær ðær we timbran willen,
ðeah we hi for hrædlice to ðæm weorce don ne mægen for grennesse,
ærðæmðe hi adrugien.
 58.445.2. Ac swa swa hi swiður adrygde bioð on eorðan swa hi
mon mæg orsorglicor upfegean.
 58.445.4. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe næbre
nyllað fulfremman ðæt god ðæt hi onginnað, ðæt hi ongieten
mid wærlice ymbeðonce ðætte, ðonne ðonne hi forlætað hiora
willes & hiora gewealdes ða god ðe hi getiohchod æfdon to donne,
ðæt hi ðonne mid ðy dilgiað ða ðe hi ær ongunnon;
 58.445.8. Forðæm, gif ðæt ne wexð ðæt hie
tiohhiað to donne, ðonne wanað ðæt ðæt hi ær dydon.
 58.445.9. Ac ælces mannes mod on ðys middangearde hæfð
scipes ðeaw.
 58.445.10. Ðæt scip wile hwilum stigan ongean ðone stream,
ac hit ne mæg, buton ða rowend hit teon, ac hit sceal fleotan mid ðy
streame: ne mæg hit no stille gestondan, buton hit ankor gehæbbe,
oððe mon mid roðrum ongean tio;
 58.445.13. Elles hit gelent mid ðy streame.
 58.445.14. Swa deð sio forlætnes ðæs godan weorces.
 58.445.14. Hio winð wið ða god ðe mon ær gedon
hæfð, buton mon simle swincende & wyrcende sie god weorc oð ende.
 58.445.16. Be ðæm wæs gecweden ðurh Salomon ðone
snotran, he cwæð: Se ðe his willum for his slæwðe forlætt his
godan weorc, he bið gelicost ðæm men ðe his towirpð.
 58.445.18. Be ðæm wæs eac gecweden ðurh Iohannis ðone
godspellere to ðære ciricean biscepe ðe Sardis hatte, he cwæð: Bio
ðu wacor, & gebet ða weorc ðe deadlicu sint in ðe: ne mette ic no
ðin weorc fullfremed beforan minum Gode.
 58.445.22. Forðæm he cwæð ðæt he forðy ne funde
his weorc fulfremed beforan Gode, ða ðe he ær worhte, forðæmðe he
ða ne worhte, ða ðe he ða wyrcean sceolde.
 58.445.24. Swa eac, gif we ne gebetað ðæt on us deadbæres
is ðurh synna, ðonne acwilð ðæt ðætte on us ær lifde ðurh
god weorc.
 58.445.26. Eac hi sint to manienne ðæt hi geornlice geðencen
ðætte hit bið wyrse ðæt mon a onginne faran on soðfæstnesse
weg, gif mon eft wile ongeancierran, & ðæt ilce on faran.
 58.445.28. Forðæm, gif us ne lyst ðæra ærrena yfela
ðe we ær worhton, ðonne ne gælð us nan ðing te fullfremmanne ða
godan weorc ðe we nu wyrceað.
 58.445.30. Ac hi scoldon gehiran ðone cwide ðe awriten is on
ðæm ærendgewrite sancte Petres;
 58.445.32. Hit is awriten ðæt him wære betere ðæt hi
no soðfæstnesse weg ne ongeaten, ðonne hi underbæc gecerden,
siððan hi hine ongeaten.
 58.445.33. Eac hi sculon gehiran ðone cwide ðe be him awriten
is on ðæm bocum ðe hatton Apocalipsin, hit is awriten ðæt se engel
cwæde be ðæm biscepe to sancte Iohanne: Eala, wære he auðer,
oððe hat, oððe ceald.
 58.445.36. Ac forðonðe he is wlaco, & nis nauðer, ne hat,
ne ceald, ðeah ic hine supe, ic hine wille eft utaspiwan of minum muðe.
 58.447.2. Se ðonne bið wearm, nalles wlaco, ðe god geornlice
onginð, & eac geendað.
 58.447.3. Ac se bið ceald ðe nan god ne onginð.
 58.447.4. Ac swa swa ðæt cealde ærest onginð wlacian,
ær hit fulwearm weorðe, swa eac ðæt wearme wlacað, ær hit
eallunga acealdige.
 58.447.6. Swa eac se ðe forlæt ðone cele ungetreownesse.
 58.447.6. & wyrð wlacra treowa, & nyle ðonne ðæt
wlæce oferwinnan, & wearmian oð he wealle.
 58.447.8. Butan tweon, se ðe to lange & to fæste wunað
on ðæm wlacum treowum, he geortreowð ðæt he æfre mæge on
welme weorðan, oððæt he mid ealle acolað;
 58.447.10. & ðeah he ær truwige, ðonne he ceald bið,
ðæt he mæge wearm weorðan, he geortriewð, ðonne he wlacu bið,
gif he to longe on ðæm stent.
 58.447.11. Swa eac se ðe nu giet on synnum is, næfð he no
forlæten ðone truwan & ðone tohopan his gehwearfnesse;
 58.447.13. Ac se, se ðe æfter his gehwerfnesse to lange
wlæc bið, ðonne lytlað him se tohopa ðe he hæfde, ða he synful
wæs.
 58.447.15. Forðæm wilnað God to ælcum men ðæt he sie
oððe wearm oððe ceald, ðylæs he for wlæcnesse sie utaspiwen.
 58.447.17. Forðæm se cealda ðencð to wearmianne, & se
wearma welð on godum cræftum, ðylæs he sie wealg for wlæcnesse,
& forðæm weorðe utaspiwen.
 58.447.19. Forðæm ælc wæter bið ðy unwerodre to
drincanne, æfterðæmðe hit wearm bið, gif hit eft acolað, ðonne
hit ær wære, ær hit mon o ongunne wleccan.
 59.447.22. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to monianne ða ðe
diegellice yfel doð, & god openlice;
 59.447.23. & on oðre wisan ða ðe willað helan ðæt
hi to gode doð, & of sumum ðingum openlice cyðað ðæt hie
willað ðæt men wenen ðæt hi yfle beon.
 59.447.26. On oðre wisan sint to manienne ða ðe yfel
degellice doð, & god openlice;
 59.447.27. On oðre wisan ða ðe ða god helað ðe hi
doð, & ne reccað hwæt him mon ymbe ræswe.
 59.447.28. Ða ðonne sint to manienne ða ðe yfel degellice
doð, & god openlice, ðæt hi geðencen hu hrædlice se eorðlica
hlisa ofergæð, & hu unanwendendlice se godcunda ðurhwunað.
 59.447.30. Hi sint to manienne ðæt hi on ðara ðinga ende
hiora modes eagan afæstnien, & gesion ðætte ðis mennisce lof
swiðe hrædlice gewit, & se uplica Dema & se eca ða deglan scylda
ealla wat, & simle bið gearo to ðæm edleanum.
 59.449.1. Ac ða dieglan yfel habbað ecne gewutan on ðæm
godcundan Deman.
 59.449.2. Ac ða god ðe hi openlice doð beforan monnum beoð
fulneah swelce hi sien butan gewitnesse, forðæm hi næbbað ece
gewitnesse.
 59.449.4. Ac hi habbað ece gewitnesse ðara yfela ðe hi
diegellice doð, ðonne hi heolað from monnum ðæt hi secggan scoldon,
& secgað ðæt hi heolan scoldon.
 59.449.6. Be swelcum monnum cwæð Dryhten ðæt hi wæren
gelicost deadra manna byrgennum, ða bioð utan oft swiðe wlitige geworhte,
& bioð innan swiðe fule gefylde.
 59.449.8. Swa bioð ða ðe hira god eowiað beforum monnum,
& hira yfel helað oninnan him selfum: hi licettað, & woldon lician
for manna eagum utane buton godum weorcum innane.
 59.449.11. Ac hi sint to manienne ðæt hi ne forsion ða god
ðe hi doð, ac wenen him maran mede to ðonne hi wenað.
 59.449.12. To swiðe hi hi forsioð, gif hi him maran mede to ne
wenað ðonne eorðlices lofes, & him ðær genog ðyncð.
 59.449.14. Hi sellað wið to lytlum weorðe ðæt ðæt
hi meahton hefonrice mid gebycggan: sellað wið manna lofe.
 59.449.15. Be ðæm cwæð Dryhten on his godspelle ðæt
ðæt wære hira med.
 59.449.16. Ac forðæmðe hi ðæt god openlice doð, &
ðæt yfel diegellice, hi tacniað mid ðæm ðæt men scylen
onscunian ðæt ðæt hie degellice doð, & lufian ðæt hi
openlice doð: for ðære bisene hi libbað ðeah oðrum monnum, &
cwelað him selfum.
 59.449.20. Ongean ðæt sint to manienne ða ðe god
diegellice doð, & swaðeah on sumum weorcum geliccetað ðæt hi
openlice yfel don, & ne reccað hwæt men be him sprecen, hi sint to
manienne ðæt hi mid ðære licettunge oðrum monnum yfle bisene ne
astellen, ðeah hi self teladon ðæt hi mid ðære licettunga oðre
men ne dwellen ne him ne derigen, ðylæs hit sie ongieten ðæt hie
lufigen hi selfe swiður ðonne hiora niehstan, swelce hi hie selfe drencen
mid wine, & ðæm oðrum sellen attor.
 59.449.27. Ac ðonne hi ða yflan bisne openlice doð, &
ðæt god degellice, ðonne ne helpað hi mid oðrum ðara nauht hira
niehstum, mid oðrum hi him deriað.
 59.449.29. Forðæm swa hwa swa hilð his godan weorc,
forðæmðe he wile fleon idel gielp, ðonne ne læt he nanne oðerne
æfter him on ða godan weorc, ðonne he nyle ða bisne oðrum eowian
ðe he mid ryhte eowian sceal.
 59.449.32. He deð swelce he plantige treowu, & ceorfe of ða
wyrtruman.
 59.449.33. Be ðæm cwæð Crist on his godspelle: Doð
eower godan weorc beforan mannum, ðæt hi mægen weorðian eowerne
Fæder ðe on hefonum is.
 59.449.35. Ac swaðeah is awriten on ðæm ilcan bocum ungelic
cwide ðissum, ðæt is ðæt he cwæð: Behealdað eow ðæt ge
ne don eowre ryhtwisnesse beforan monnum, ðylæs hi eow herien.
 59.451.1. Ac hwæt wile ðæt nu beon weorca ðæt us on
oðerre stowe forbiet ðæt we hit beforan mannum don, on oðerre
lærð buton ðæt we hit forðæm helen, ðæt us mon ne herige,
& forðy yppen ðæt mon God herige, & oðre men ða ilcan bisne
underfon?
 59.451.5. Ac ðær ðær us God forbead ðæt we ure
ryhtwisnesse beforan monnum dyden, he us gecyðde forhwy he hit forbead, ða
he cwæð ðylæs hi eow herigen.
 59.451.7. Ond eft ða he us het ðæt we hit beforan monnum
dyden, ða cwæð he sona ðæræfter, to ðon ðæt hi
weorðigen eowerne Fæder ðe on hefonum is.
 59.451.9. On ðæm twæm wordum he us getacnode for hwelcum
ðingum we sceolden ure godan weorc helan, & for hwelcum we hi sceolden
cyðan, for ðæm ðætte ælc mon, swa hwæt swa he for gode don
wolde, ðæt he hit ne do for ðæm anum ðæt hine man herige, ac ma
for Gode.
 59.451.13. For ðæm ðingum bið ælc god weorc god, sie
swa open swa degle, swæðer hit sie.
 59.451.15. Ðonne se mon no his ægenne gielp mid ne secð, ac
ðæs uplican Fæder, ðeah he hit openlice do, he hit gediegleð mid
ðy ðæt he hæfð ðæs gewitnesse ðe he ðær cweman
ðencð ðæt he hit for Gode dyde, næs for gielpe.
 59.451.18. Ac se ðonne se hit degellice deð, & ðeah wolde
ðæt he wurde arasod, & siððan forðy hered, ðeah hit ðonne
nan mon nyte, swaðeah hit bið beforan monnum gedon, emne swelce hit sie on
ealra ðara gewitnesse gedon ðe he on his mode wilnode ðæt hit
hereden.
 59.451.22. Forðæm hit is betere, swa swa we ær cwædon,
ðætte ælc mon adryge of oðerra monna mode ðone wenan be him
ælces yfeles, swa swa he butan synne fyrmest mæge, forðæm, gif he
swa ne deð, ðonne scencð he ða scylde mid ðære bisene ælcum
ðara ðe him ænges yfles to wenð.
 59.451.26. Forðæm hit gebyreð oft, ðonne hwa ne recð hu
micles yfeles him mon to wene, ðeah he self nan yfel ne do, ðæt he
ðeah gesyngað ðurh ða ðe be him bisniað.
 59.451.28. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Paulus to his giongrum,
ða ða he sumun liefde to ðicgganne ðætte he nolde ðæt hi ealle
ðigden, ðylæs ða untruman be him bisneden, & ðurh ðæt
wurden astyrede mid ðæra costunga hwelcre ðe hi eft wiðstondan ne
meahton;
 59.451.31. Forðæm he cwæð: Lociað nu ðæt ðios
eowru leaf ne weorðe oðrum monnum to biswice.
 59.451.33. Ond eft he cwæð be ðæm ilcan: ðonne
forwyrð ðin broður for ðinum ðingum, for ðone ær Crist
geðrowade.
 59.451.34. Swa ðonne ge gesyngiað wið eowre broðer, &
ofsleað hira untruman gewit, ðonne gesyngige ge wið God.
 59.451.36. Ðæt ilce mænde Moyses, ða he cwæð: Ne
cweðe ge nan lað ðæm deafan.
 59.453.1. & eft he cwæð: Ne screnc ðu ðone blindan.
 59.453.2. Se ðonne cwið yfel ðæm deafan, se ðone
æfweardan tælð, gif he hine unscyldigne wat.
 59.453.3. & se screncð ðone blindan, ðe ðone
ungesceadwisan mirð mid ðy ðe he his god degellice deð, & ðeah
licet swelce he yfel do.
 60.453.6. Ymbe ðæt, hu mon monige scyndan scyle to ðæm
ðætte his godan dæda ne weorðen to yflum dædum.
 60.453.8. Ðis sint nu ða lara ðe ðæs modes hierdas &
ðære sawle sceolon ealle men læran ðæt hi ealneg hæbben ða
sealfe gearuwe ðe to ðære wunde belimpe ðe hi ðonne gesion.
 60.453.10. Forðæm hit bið swiðe geswincful ðæt mon
ælcne mon scyle on sundrum læran, hit is ðeah earfoðre ealle
ætsomne to læranne, forðæmðe he sceal gemetgian swa cræftelice
his stemne ðætte he æghwelcum men finde ðone læcedom ðe him to
gebyrge, forðæmðe ða mettrymnessa ne beoð ealra manna gelica.
