 60.453.14. & huru ðæt he self do swa swa he oðre
lærð, forðon ðæt he mæge self gan orsorglice betwuxn oðerra
monna unðeawas, swa swa scearp sweord ða wunde tosceat on tu, &
gæð gehalre ecgge forð.
 60.453.17. Ond ðæt he huru swa egesige ða ofermodan,
ðæt he ða eaðmodan mid ðy to swiðe ne fære;
 60.453.19. Ond swa lære ða oðre eaðmetta, swa he ðone
ege to swiðe ðæm oðrum ne geiece;
 60.453.20. Ðæt he swa frefre ða eaðmodan, swa ða
ofermodan ne weorðen unmidlode;
 60.453.21. Ond swa lære ða slawan geornfulnesse godes weorces,
swa he ða geornfullan to ungemetlice ne geswence;
 60.453.22. Ond swa tilige hira geswinc to gemetgianne, swa he ða
idlan ne gedo orsorge, ðæt hi forðy ne aslawien;
 60.453.24. Ond ðæt he swa stiere ðæm ungeðyldegum
irsunga, swa he ðone hnescan ðafettere on recceleste ne gebrenge;
 60.453.25. & ðeah swa tilige hi to onælenne, swa hi ða
hatheortan ne forbærnen;
 60.453.26. Ond swa eac ða uncystigan cysta lære, swa he ða
cystgan on merringe ne gebringe;
 60.453.28. Ond swa eft ða rummodan fæsthafolnesse læren,
swa hi ða uncystegan on yfelre hneawnesse ne gebrengen;
 60.453.29. Ond swa læren ða wifgalan gesinscipe, swa hi ða
forhæbbendan ne gebrengen on unryhthæmde;
 60.453.31. & swa ða forhæbbendan læren forhæfdnesse,
swa hie ne forsion ðone gesinscipe;
 60.453.32. Ond swa wilnigen to oleccanne ðæm godum, & hi
to herianne, swa hi huru ne oleccen ðæm yflum;
 60.453.33. Ond swa herien ðæt mæste god, swa hi ðæt
læste ne forsion;
 60.453.34. Ond eft swa herie ða ðe lytel god doð, ðæt hi
ne wenen ðæt hi genog don.
 61.455.1. Ymbe ðæt hu mon ænne mon scyndan scyle, ðonne
he yfle costunga monege ðrowað.
 61.455.3. Ðæt bið eac swiðe hefig broc ðæm lareowe
ðæt he scyle on gemænre lare, ðær ðær he eall folc ætsomne
lærð, ða lare findan ðe hi ealle behofigen;
 61.455.5. Forðæm hira unðeawas bioð swiðe ungelice.
 61.455.5. & ðeah bið giet earfoðre ælcne on sundrum to
læranne, forðæmðe manege bioð ðe hæbbað ða unðeawas
ealle ðe mon eallum monnum forbeodan sceolde.
 61.455.8. Oft eac gebyreð ðætte sume bioð to ungemetlice
bliðe for sumum gesælðum, oððe for ðæs blodes styringe, &
eft swiðe hræðe for sumum ungesælðum to ungemetlice unbliðe.
 61.455.10. Forðæm is to giemanne ðæm lareowe ðæt he
swa swiðe stiere ðære unrotnesse ðæt he to swiðe ne geiece ða
ungemetlican blisse;
 61.455.12. Ond eft swa gemidlige ða blisse ðe of ðære
orsorgnesse cymð ðæt sio unrotnes to swiðe ne weaxe ðe of ðære
færlican gedrefednesse cymð, oððe of yfles blodes flownesse.
 61.455.15. Forðæm oft ða oferbliðan weorðað gedrefde
for ungemetlicre onettunga, ðonne him hwæthwugu wiðstent ðæt hi ne
magon swa hrædlice forðbrengan ðæt hi tiohhiað swa hi woldon.
 61.455.17. Swa eac ða swiðe unrotan bioð oft gedrefde mid
ungemetlice ege, & ðeah hwilum bioð genedde mid sumre fortruwodnesse
ðæt hi onginnað ðæt ðæt hi willað.
 61.455.20. Swa ðonne sceal se magister gemetgian ðone
færlican ege ðæt ðær ðeah ne weaxe to ungemetlice beldo, &
swaðeah swa ðrycce ða belde on ðæm oferbliðum ðæt ðær
ðeah ne weaxe on him sio ofðrycnes ðæs eges, ðe cymð of ðæs
yflan blodes flownesse.
 61.455.23. Hwelc wundor is ðæt, ðeah ðæs modes læcas
behealden ðas lare, ðonne ðæs lichoman læcas habbað swelce
gesceadwisnesse on hira cræfte?
 61.455.25. Ac hwilum ðeah ofðrycð ðone lichoman ungemetlicu
mettrymnes.
 61.455.26. Ongean swelce mettrymnesse mon beðorfte stronges
læcedomes, ðær se mettruma lichoma hine adreogan meahte.
 61.455.28. Forðæm is ðæm læce swiðe geornlice to
giemanne ðæt he swa strangne læcedom selle ðæm seocan, swa he
mæge ða mettrymnesse mid geflieman, & eft swa liðne swa se tydra
lichoma mæge astandan, ðylæs he ægðer afierre of ðæm lichoman
ge ða mettrymnesse ge eac ðæt lif.
 61.455.32. Ac ðonne he deð ðæm siocan swiðe
gesceadwislicne fultum, ðonne he afliemð æt anum cierre ða
mettrymnesse, swa ðæt he ðeah ðæm lichoman ne dereð.
 61.457.1. Ac forhwy ne mæg ðonne micle ma ðæs modes
læce gehælan ða adle ðæra unðeawa monigra monna mid anre lare,
ðonne swa micle manigfaldran bioð ðæs modes læcedomas ðonne
ðæs lichoman?
 61.457.4. Ond ðeah ðæs lichoman læcas oft æt anum
cierre ægðer doð, ge ðæm lichoman gebeorgað, ge eac ða
mettrymnesse/ afliemað.
 62.457.7. Ðætte hwilum ða leohtan scylda bioð beteran to
forlætenne, ðylæs ða hefigran weorðen ðurhtogene.
 62.457.9. Oft eac gebyreð ðætte twegen unðeawas hreosað
on ænne man, oðer læssa, oðer mara.
 62.457.10. Forðæm sceal ðæs modes læce ær tilian
ðæs ðe he wenð ðæt ðone mon ær mæge gebrengan on
færwyrde.
 62.457.11. Hwilum ðeah, ðær ðær mon oðres tiolað,
ðær weaxð se oðer.
 62.457.12. Forðæm sceal se gesceadwisa læce lætan ær
weaxan ðone læssan, & tilian ðæs maran;
 62.457.14. Oððæt sio tid cume ðæt he ðæs oðres
tilian mote, buton he begra ætgæddre getilian mæge.
 62.457.15. Ne gaderað he no mid ðy unðeawas, ac tilað
ðæs gewundedan werpe ðe he bewitan sceal, oððæt he hine fullice
gehælan mæge.
 62.457.16. Oft weorðað ða oferswiðde mid unryhthæmde
ða ðe ne magon forlætan hira gifernesse.
 62.457.18. Oft eac gebyreð ðæm ðe him ægðer ðissa
ondrædað, gif hi hi wið ægðer gehealdað, ðæt hi befeallað
on idelgielp, forðæmðe nan mon ne mæg nauðer ðissa swa
forlætan ðæt ðæt oðer ne weaxe.
 62.457.21. Hwæðres ðonne ðara yfela is betere ær to
tilianne, buton swæðres swæðer frecenlicre is?
 62.457.22. Forðy is betere ðæt mon læte sume hwile weaxan
ðæt idelgielp, oððæt mon fullice mæge getilian ðæs
unryhthæmdes.
 62.457.24. Forðæm cwæþ sanctus Paulus to his cnihte, ða
he ongeat ðæt he wolde oðer twega, oððe ða giet yfel don, oððe
mid his gode him wilnian lofes, ða cwæð he: Gif ðu wille ðæt ðu
ne ðyrfe ðe ondrædan ðinne Hlaford, do tela: ðonne hereð he ðe
.
 62.457.28. Ne scyle ðeah nan mon for ðæm anum ðingum don
ðæt ðæt he to gode deð, ðæt he ne ðyrfe his hlaford
ondrædan, ne eft for ðæm anum ðe he wilnige eorðlices lofes.
 62.457.30. Forðæm se æðela lareow sanctus Paulus, ða he
ongeat ðæt he ægðer ne meahte his cniht gelæran ge ðæt
ðæt he yfel forlete, & eac ðæt he forðy nanes lofes ne wilnode,
ða liefde he him ðone gielp to sumre hwile, & forbead ðæt yfel.
 62.457.33. Ða he him geðafode ðone gielp, ða forbead he him
ðæt yfel, for ðæm ðæt he ðy ieð meahte ðæt oðer
forlætan ðe he on ðæm oðrum hæfde ðæt hine lyste.
 63.459.4. Ðætte ða untruman mod mon ne scyle ellenga to
healice læran.
 63.459.6. Þæm lareowe is to wietanne ðæt he huru nanum
men mare ne beode ðonne he acuman mæge, ðylæs se rap his modes
weorðe to swiðe aðened, oð he forberste.
 63.459.8. Forðæm sio hea lar is betere manegum monnum to
helanne, & feawum to secgganne.
 63.459.9. Be ðæm cwæð sio Soðfæstnes ðurh hi
selfe, ðæt is Crist, he cwæð: Hwa wenstu ðæt sie to ðæm
getreow & to ðæm wis brytnere ðæt hine God gesette ofer his
hired, to ðæm ðæt he him to tide gemetlice gedæle ðone
hwæte?
 63.459.13. Ðurh ða gemetgunge ðæs hwætes is getacnod
gemetlico word, ðylæs hira mon ma geote on ðæt undiope mod ðonne
hit behabban mæge, ðæt hi ðonne oferflowe.
 63.459.15. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Paulus: Ic ne mæg no to
eow sprecan swa swa to gæstlicum, ac swa swa to flæsclicum;
 63.459.17. Forðæm ge sint giet cilderu on eowrum geleafan,
ðy ic sceal sellan eow giet mioloc drincan, nalles flæsc etan.
 63.459.18. Forðæm wæs eac ðætte Moyses behelede ða
ofermætan bierhto his ondwlitan beforan ðæm folce, ða he com from
ðære dieglan spræce Dryhtnes, forðæmðe he ða giet nolde hi
læran ða diegelnesse ðære halgan æ, ne hi ða giet ne meahton hi
ongietan.
 63.459.22. Forðæm wæs eac beboden ðurh Moyses, gif hwa
adulfe pytt, & ðonne forgiemeleasode ðæt he hine betynde, &
ðær ðonne befeolle on oððe oxa oððe esol, ðæt he hine
scolde forgieldan.
 63.459.25. Swa eac swa hwa swa becymð to ðæm hiehstan
wisdome, & ðonne ne forhilð ða diogolnesse ðæs godcundan
wisdomes ðæm dysegum, he bið scyldig geteald, gif he gebrengð auðer
oððe clænne oððe unclænne on ormodnesse.
 63.459.28. Be ðæm cwæð Dryhten to ðæm eadgan Iobe:
Hwa sealde kokke wisdom?
 63.459.29. Ðæt getacnað ðætte æghwelc ðæra
halgena lareowa ðe nu lærað on ðære ðisternesse ðisses
middangeardes habbað onlicnesse ðæm kokkum, ðe on ðistrum niehtum
crawað.
 63.459.32. Ðonne græt se lareow swa swa kok on niht, ðonne
he cwið: Nu us is tima ðæt we onwæcnen of slæpe.
 63.459.33. Ond eft, ðonne he cwið: Onwæcnað, ge ryhtwisan,
& ne syngiað ma.
 63.461.1. Ðæs cocces ðeaw is ðæt he micle hludor
singð on uhtan ðonne on dægred.
 63.461.2. Ac ðonne hit nealæcð dæge, ðonne singð he
smælor & smicror.
 63.461.3. Swa sceal ælc gesceadwis lareow opene lare &
swutole ðæm ðiestrum modum bodian, & nane wuht ðære dieglan
& ðære diopan lare ðonne giet cyðan.
 63.461.6. Ac siððan hi gesion ðætte ða ðistran mod
ðæra dysegena monna auht nealæcen ðæm leohte ðære
soðfæstnesse, ðonne sculon hi him eowian diogolran & diopran lara of
halgum bocum.
 64.461.9. Be ðæm weorcum ðæs lareowes & be his
wordum.
 64.461.10. Hit is nu ðearf ðæt we for lufum eft cierren
betwuxn oðrum spræcum to ðæm ðe we ær spræcon.
 64.461.11. Ðæt is ðætte ælc lareow swiðor lære
mid his weorcum ðonne mid his wordum.
 64.461.12. Hwæt, se kok ðe we ær ymb spræcon,
ærðæmðe he crawan wille, hefð up his fiðru, & wecð hine
selfne: & hine selfne bet.
 64.461.14. Swa is ðearf ðæt se lareow ærest awecce hine
selfne, ðæt he wacie on ðære geornfulnesse godra weorca, ðylæs
he oðre awecce mid his wordum, & himself aslawige godra weorca.
 64.461.17. Ac hudenige ærest hine selfne, oð he wacige, &
ahrisige siððan oðre to geornfulnesse godra weorca;
 64.461.18. Ðaccige hine selfne mid ðæm fiðrum his
geðohta.
 64.461.19. Ðæt is ðæt he behealde ðurh ða wæccan
his smeaunga ærest hwæt on him selfum unnyttes sie, & ðreage
ærest hine selfne ðearlwislice on his geðohte, & siððan mid his
lare geedniwige oðerra monna lif.
 64.461.22. Ærest he sceal wrecan on him selfum his agnu yfelu
& ða hreowsian, & siððan oðerra monna cyðan & wrecan.
 64.461.24. Ærest hi sculon eowian on hiora agnum weorcum eall
ðæt hi eft læran willað mid hiora wordum, swa ðætte ða weorc
clipien ær, ær ða word.
 65.461.27. Ðonne hwa ðis eall gefylled hæbbe, hu he ðonne
sceal hine selfne geðencan & ongietan, ðylæs hine auðer, oððe
his lif oððe his lar to upahebbe.
 65.461.29. Oft eac ða lareowas weorðað onstyrede mid diegelre
blisse, ðonne hi ongietað ðæt hi gemetlice & medomlice
lærað.
 65.461.30. Ac him is ðonne micel ðearf ðæt he hine
hrædlice selfne gewundige mid ðy ege ðæt he him ondræde,
ðylæs he weorðe upahæfen for his wordum;
 65.463.1. Ðætte ðær ðær he oðerra monna wunda
lacnað, he self ne weorðe aðunden on upahæfennesse for ðære
giemeleste his hælo;
 65.463.3. Ðæt he hine selfne ne forlæte, ðær he
oðerra freonda tilige, & him self ne afealle, ðær ðær he oðre
tiolað to ræranne.
 65.463.5. Forðæm oft ða cræftas & ða mægenu
weorðað te færwyrde ðæm ðe hi hæfð, ðonne hi for hira
giemeleste hie fortruwiað on ðæm cræftum ðe hi hæbbað, &
hi nyllað iecan: ðonne weorðað hi him to færwyrde, forðæm simle
ða cræftas winnað wið ðæm unðeawum.
 65.463.9. Ac ðæt mod oft olecð him selfum, & ðonne for
ðære oleccunga forlæt ðone ege his selfes ymbeðances.
 65.463.10. Ðonne gerest ðæt mod hit orsorglice on ðære
fortruwunga.
 65.463.11. Ðonne cymð se lytega sætere to ðæm slawan
mode, & ateleð him eall ðæt he ær to gode gedyde, &
geræcð him ðonne to geleafsuman ðæt he sie se gesælgosta on
eallum cræftum ofer ealle oðre men, oððæt he wyrð aðunden &
upahæfen on his mode.
 65.463.15. Ond ðonne beforan ðæs ryhtwisan Deman eagum him
wyrð ðæt gemynd ðæra mægena & ðæra cræfta to swiðe
diopum seaðe, & he ðær ðonne swiðe hefiglice on giefielð,
forðæmðe he afelð beforan ðæm Gode ðe eaðmodnesse lareow is,
ðonne he hine upahefeð beforan him selfum for his cræftum.
 65.463.19. Be ðæm wæs gecweden ðurh Ezechiel ðone
witgan, he cwæð: Astig eft ofdune ðonan ðe ðu wenst ðæt ðu
wlitegost sie.
 65.463.21. Swelce he openlice cwæde: For ðæm wlite ðinra
cræfta ðu wurde upahæfen, & ðonan ðu wyrst geniððrad.
 65.463.23. Eft se ilca witga sæde bispell bi Hierusalem, &
tælde ðæt mod ðe for his cræftum ofermodgede, ða he cwæð:
Dryhten cwið to ðisse byrg: ðu wære fulfremed on minum wlite, &
ða fortruwdes ðu ðe for ðæm, & forlæge ðe ðines ægnes
ðonces.
 65.463.26. Ðonne bið ðæt mod upahæfen for ðære
fortruwunga his cræfta, ðonne hit for hiora geearnunga gilpð, &
orsorglice fægnað on him selfum.
 65.463.28. Ac ðurh ða fortruwednesse hit wyrð getogen to
ðon ðæt hit wyrð forlegen on ofermettum.
 65.463.29. Ærest se awiergda gæst hit lærð utane ðone
gielp, oððæt he ingæð ðurh ða ofermetta, & hit siððan
gebregð on manegum unðeawe.
 65.463.31. Be ðæm worde is to ðenceanne ðe he cwæð to
ðæm burgwarum: Ge eow forlægon eowres ægnes ðonces.
 65.463.33. Ðæt is ðætte ðæt mod sona swa hit God
forsihð, swa secð hit his agenne gielp, & gæderað him ðonne
selfum to lofe eall ðæt god ðæt him forgiefen wæs to Godes lofe;
 65.463.36. Wilnað mid ðy to gebrædenne his ægen lof,
& higað wið ðæs ðæt he wolde hu he eallum monnum
weorðfullicost & wunderlicost ðuhte.
 65.465.2. Se bið forlegen on his agnum willan se ðe hine selfne
diofle befæst, & Dryhten forlæt for mennisces lofes wilnunga.
 65.465.3. Be ðæm cwæð Dauid on ðæm siofan &
hundsiofantiogoðan psalme, he cwæð: Dryhten geðafode ðæt hiora
mægen & hiora cræft wære gehæft, & hiora wlite wære on
hira feonda honda.
 65.465.6. Gehæft bið hiora cræft, & hira wlite on hiora
feonda hond gelæd, ðonne se ealda feond onwald hæfð ðæs
beswicenan modes for ðære upahæfennesse, ðonne hit hit upahefð for
godum weorcum.
 65.465.9. Se lytega fiond wile fondian ælces monnes mid
ðære upahæfennesse for godum weorcum, ge furðum ðara acorenra monna
mod he wile costian, ðeah he hit fullice beswican ne mæge.
 65.465.12. Forðæm ælc mod swa hit bið upahæfen swa
bið hit forlæten from Gode, & sona swa hit bið forlæten from
Gode, swa bið hit gedrefed mid diofles ege.
 65.465.14. Be ðæm cwæð Dauid eft on ðæm nigon &
twentiogoðan psalme, he cwæð: Ic wende on minum wlencum & on minum
forwanan, ða ic wæs full ægðer ge welona ge godra weorca, ðæt
ðæs næfre ne wurde nan ende.
 65.465.17. Ac siððan he ongeat ðæt he wæs aðunden on
upahæfennesse for his godan weorcum, ða gecyðde he swiðe hræðe
æfter ðæm hwæt he siððan dreag, ða he cwæð: Dryhten, ðu
ahwyrfdes ðinne ondwlitan from me, ða wearð ic gedrefed.
 65.465.20. Swelce he openlice cwæde: Ic wende ðæt ic
wære swiðe strong on manegum cræftum, ac ic ongeat swiðe hraðe,
siððan ðu me forlete, hu untrum ic wæs.
 65.465.22. & eft he cwæð on ðæm eahta &
hundælleftiogoðan psalme, he cwæð: Ic swor swa swa ic getiohhod
hæfde ðæt ic wolde gehealdan ðine domas & ðine ryhtwisnesse,
Dryhten.
 65.465.25. Ac he ongeat swiðe hraðe, ða he gemette ða
gedrefednesse, ðæt hit næs on his agnum onwalde ðæt he meahte
gehealdan ðæt ðæt he ær gehet & swor.
 65.465.27. & ða wende he hine sona to his gebede, & sohte
him ðær fultum to, & cwæð: Ic eom gehened æghwonane & on
æghwam, Dryhten;
 65.465.29. Ac gecwuca me æfter ðinum wordum, Dryhten.
 65.465.30. Swa oft sio godcunde gemetgung, ærðæmðe hio
ðæm men selle cræftas & mægen, hio him geeowað his
untrymnesse, & his unmehta hine gemyndgað, ðylæs he hine upahebbe
for his cræftum.
 65.465.33. Forðæm eac wæs gecweden to Ezechiele ðæm
witgan ðæt he wære monnes sunu, ærðæmðe him wæren geeowad
ða hefonlican ðing.
 65.465.35. Swelce hine God openlice manode, & him to cwæde:
Ne beo ðu to upahæfen on ðinum mode for ðæm ðingum ðe ðu
gesihst, ac geðenc wærlice hwæt ðu eart;
 65.467.1. & ðeah ðu ðæt hehste ðurhfare, ne forgiet
ðu ðeah ðæt ðu man eart, ac geðenc ðone bridel ðinre
mettrymnesse swiðe geornlice on ðe selfum, ðeah ðu sie up ofer ðine
mæð ahæfen.
 65.467.4. Forðæm is micel ðearf ðæt we ures modes eagan
gecerren to ðære sceawunga urre untrymnesse.
 65.467.5. Ðonne us fullicost oleccað ða cræftas & ða
mægenu, ðonne is us micel ðearf ðæt we eaðmodlice ofdune anluten
mid urum mode, & halwendlice geðencen ða god ðe we forgiemeleasodon,
næs ða we dydon;
 65.467.8. Ðætte ure mod ðy fæstre & ðy strengre
beforan Gode sie on ðæm cræftum for ðære eaðmodnesse ðe we hit
mid gewundiað, ðonne we gemunað ure giemeleste.
 65.467.10. Forðæm oft se ælmiehtiga God forlet ðæt
mod his gecorenra gesyngian on sumum lytlum ðingum, ðeah hi on manegum sien
fullfremede, ðæt hi him ondræden, & murkien for hira
unfullfremednesse, ðeah hi beorhte sciene on sumum wunderlicun cræftum;
 65.467.14. Ðæt hi hi for ðæm miclum ðingum ne mægen
to upahebban, ða hwile ðe hi ne magon gebetan ðæt lytle;
 65.467.16. Ðylæs hi dyrren ofermodgian for ðæm
æðelestum weorcum, ða hwile ðe hi ne magon oferswiðan ða ytemestan
yfelu.
 65.467.18. Loca nu, ðu goda wer Iohannes, hu fægerne & hu
wlitigne monnan ic hæbbe atæfred, swa unwlitig writere swa swa ic eom.
 65.467.19. Ðær ic hæbbe getæht hwelc hierde bion sceal.
 65.467.20. To ðæm ic wæs gened mid ðinre tælnesse,
ðæt ic nu hæbbe manege men gelæd to ðæm stæðe
fullfremednesse on ðæm scipe mines modes, & nu giet hwearfige me self
on ðæm yðum minra scylda.
 65.467.23. Ac ic ðe bidde ðæt ðu me on ðæm
scipgebroce ðisses andweardan lifes sum bred geræce ðinra gebeda,
ðæt ic mæge on sittan oð ic to londe cume, & arær me mid
ðære honda ðinra geearnunga, forðæmðe me hæfð gehefegad sio
byrðen minra agenra scylda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

CP (Cotton)
B9.1.3.1.
Gregory the Great, Pastoral Care, Chapter 33 (Cotton MSS): Sweet 1871, 214-28.



 33.214.3. Ðætte on oðre wisan sint to manianne ða
ungeðyldegan, & on oðre ða geðyldegan.
 33.214.5. On oðre wisan sint to manianne þa ungeðyldegan, on
oðre ða geðyldegan.
 33.214.6. Ðæm ungeðyldegum is to sæcganne ðætte hie
ne agimeleasien ðæt hie hiera mod gebridligen, ðæt hie ne hliepen
unwillende on ðæt scorene clif unðeawa.
 33.214.8. Swæ hit oft gebyreð ðæt sio hatheortnes &
seo hrædwilnes ðæt mod gebrengð on ðæm weorce þe hiene ær
nan willa to ne spon, & deð ðeah swæ astyred, swelce he hit
ungewisses oððe ungewealdes do, ðæt him eft gehreoweð, siððan he
hit wat.
 33.214.12. Forðæm him is to sæcgeanne ðæt hie
weorðað oft ascrencte on ðæm scyfe ðære styringe hiera modes,
ðæt hie hiera selfra ne agon ðy mare geweald þe oðerra monna, &
swiðe seldon magon ongietan hiera agen yfel, ærðon hie hit ðurhtogen
habbað.
 33.214.15. Ac gif he ðonne ðære styringe ne wiðstent,
ðonne gescent he ða godan weorc þe he oft ær on stillum mode
ðurhteah.
 33.214.17. And swæ ungleawlice for ðæm scyfe ðære
styringe swiðe hrædlice towyrpð þa godan weorc þe he longe ær
foreðonclice timbrede.
 33.214.19. And ða geðylde þe is modur & hierde ealra
mægena for ðæm unwrence ðære ungeðylde forlett, & eac
ðæt mægen ðære soðan lufan he forlæt.
 33.214.21. Hit is awriten on Paules bocum ðæt sio Godes lufu
sie geðyld, & se þe geðyldig ne sie, ðæt he næbbe ða Godes
lufe on him.
 33.214.22. For ðæm unðeawe ðære ungeðylde wierð
utadrifen sio fostermodur ælcre leornunga & ælces cræftes, &
æghwelces lareowes lar wihst ðurh his geðylde, & æghwelc monn
bið onfunden swæ micle læs gelæred ðonne oðer swæ he bið
ungeðyldegra.
 33.216.3. Ne mæg he no ryhtlice geðyld læran, buton he self
geðyldelice oðerra monna teonan geðolige.
 33.216.4. Hwilum eac gebyreð for ðæm unðeawe ðære
ungeðylde ðæt ðæt mod wierð gesticced mid ðære scylde
gilpes.
 33.216.6. And he ne mæg geðyldgian ðæt he for ðisse
worlde sie forsewen, ac gif he hwæt digollice for Gode to gode gedyde,
ðonne ne mæg he geðyldgian ðæt he ðæt forhele, ac wierð
ðonon gilpen.
 33.216.9. And onginneð ðonne ðæt cyðan ðonne he ne
mæg geðolian ðæt hiene men forsion, ac geopenað hit mid gilpe.
 33.216.10. Be ðæm is awriten ðæt betra bio se geðyldega
wer ðonne se gilpna, forðæmþe him bið liofre scande to ðolianne
ðonne ðæt god to cyðanne ðæt he digollice deð, ðylæs he
for ðæm unðeawe ðæs gilpes hit forleose.
 33.216.13. Ac ðæm gilpnan bið liofre ðæt he secge on
hiene selfne, gif he hwæt godes wat, ge ðeah he nyte hwæt he soðes
secge, him is ðeah leofre ðæt he leoge ðonne him mon ænigra
ungerisna to wene.
 33.216.16. Ac he forlæt ðonne & towierpð eall þa godan
weorc þe he ær worhte, ðonne he forlæt ða geðylde.
 33.216.18. Forðæm wæs swiðe ryhtlice beboden Ezechiele
ðæm witgan ðæt he sceolde ðone Godes alter habban uppan aholodne
ðæt he meahte on healdan ða ofrunga & ða lac þe man brohte to
ðæm weobude.
 33.216.21. Forðæm, gif se weobud ufan hol nære, &
ðær wind to come, ðonne tostencte he ða lac.
 33.216.22. Hwæt elles getacnað ðæt weobud buton rihtwisra
monna saula?
 33.216.23. Forðæmþe nu eal ðæt se ryhtwisa to gode
deð eal hit bið broht to lacum beforan Godes eagum, swæ iu wæs eall
sio ofrung uppe on ðæt wiobud broht.
 33.216.25. Hwæt tacnað ðonne ðæt holh on ðæm
weobude buton godra monna geðyld?
 33.218.1. Forðæm, ðonne mon his mod geeaðmodegað
ðæt he wiðerweardnesse & scande forbere, ðonne geeacnað he sum
holh on his mode swæ swæ ðæt weobud hæfð on him uppan.
 33.218.4. Holh wæs beboden ðæt sceolde beon on ðæm
weobude uppan, forðæm ðæt wind ne meahte ða lac tostencean, þe
mon on ðæt weobud legde.
 33.218.6. Ðæt tacnað ðæt ðæt geðyld sceal
gehealdan ðara gecorenra monna mod, ðætte hit ne astyrige se wind
ðære ungeðylde, ðylæs hit forleose ða godan weorc þe he ær
geworht hæfde.
 33.218.8. Wel hit wæs gecweden ðæt ðæt holh sceolde
beon on ðæm weobude anre elne brad & anre elne long, forðæm butan
tweon se þe ða geðylde ne forlæt, he gehielt micle anmodnesse.
 33.218.11. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Paulus: Bere eower ælc
oðres byrðenne betweohxn eow, ðonne gefylle ge Godes æ.
 33.218.13. Ðæt is ðonne Godes æ ðæt mon hæbbe
lufe & geðyld, ðæt ðonne fullfremmað ða ane þe hie ne
forlætað, ðonne hie mon gremeð.
 33.218.15. Gehieren ða ungeðyldegan ðysne cwyde þe awriten
is: Betra bið se geðyldega wer ðonne se stronga & se kena, &
strongra bið se & ðristra þe his agen mod ofercymð & gewilt
ðonne se þe fæste burg abrycð.
 33.218.18. Læssan sige hæfð se se ða burhware ofercymð,
forðon him bioð fremde ða þe he ðær hinð & ðreatað.
 33.218.19. Forðæm bið se sige micle mara ðe man mid
geðylde gewinð, forðæm sio gesceadwisnes ðonne hæfð ofercumen
ðæt mod & gewielð, swelce he self hæbbe hiene selfne gewildne,
& sio geðyld hæbbe ðæt mod geðreatod & gecafstrod.
 33.218.22. Gehieren ða ungeðyldegan hwæt sio Soðfæstnes
cwæð to his gecorenum, he cwæð: On eowrum geðylde ge gehealdað
eowra saula.
 33.218.24. Swæ we sint wunderlice gesceapene ðæt ure mod
& ure gewitt hæfð ðone anwald ures lichoman, & sio gesceadwisnes
hæfð anwald ðæs modes.
 33.220.1. Forðæm, gif sio gesceadwisnes næfð nanne anwald
ðære saule & ðæs modes, ðonne næfð sio saul & ðæt
gewit nanne anwald ðæs lichoman.
 33.220.4. Ac sio geðyld is gesett to hierde urre gesceafte.
 33.220.4. Ðæt us ætiewde Dryhten, þa he us lærde
ðæt we sceoldon urra selfra waldan mid ðære geðylde.
 33.220.6. We magon eac ongietan hu micel sio scyld bið ðære
ungeðylde, ðurh þa we forlætað ðone anwald ure selfra, ðone we
sceoldon ðurh ða geðylde gehealdan.
 33.220.8. Gehieren ða ungeðyldegan ðone cwide þe eft be him
gecweden is on Salomones bocum: Se dysega ungeðyldega all his ingeðonc he
geypt, ac se wisa hit ieldcað, & bitt timan.
 33.220.10. Sio ungeðyld geniet ðone monnan ðæt he
geopenað all his ingeðonc, & ealne ðone gast utadrifð.
 33.220.12. Forðæm hiene swæ hrædlice sio gedrefednes
utadrifð ðy hiene ðærinne ne belycð nan ege ðære lare
wisdomes.
 33.220.14. Ac se wisa hilt his spræce & bitt timan, & ne
wilnað na to hrædlice ðære wræce, ðeah he gegremed sie, ac
wyscð ðæt hit him gehreowe, ðæt he hit mæge siððan
forgifan.
 33.220.16. And ðeah wite he ðætte ealle scylda þe wið
God beoð ungebetta beoð unforgifne on domes dæge & ryhtlice
gewrecene.
 33.220.18. Ac eft sint to manigenne ða geðyldegan ðætte
ðæt hie mid hiera wordum & mid hiera dædum forgiefað ðæt hie
ðæt eac on hiera ingeðonce forgifen, ðylæs he mid ðy niðe yfles
ingeðonces toweorpe ða mægenu ðæs godan weorces þe he Gode utan
anwealglice forgeaf.
 33.220.22. Forðæm, ðonne hit nan man wietan ne mæg
hwæðer hit eallinga forgiefen sie, ðætte hit ðonne se ne wrece þe
hit wat þe swiður þe he licet mildheortnesse & forgifnesse ðær
ðær nan ne bið.
 33.220.24. Ac ðæm geðyldegan & ðæm forgiefendan is
to secganne ðæt he georne wilnige ðæt he ðone mon eft lufian
mæge þe him ær abealg, ðonne he hit ðeah forgifan sceal,
forðæm, gif sio lufu ne gæð æfter ðære forgifnesse, ðonne
wierð ðær feoung, & se goda cræft ðe he ðær licette
ðære forgifnesse wierð behwirfed on wiersan scylde.
 33.222.3. Be ðæm cwæð sanctus Paulus: Lufu bið
geðyldig.
 33.222.4. And sona æfter ðæm he cwæð: Hio bið
mildu.
 33.222.5. Swiðe sweotule he ætiewde mid ðæm wordum
ðætte ðæm monnum ðe we for geðylde hwæt forberan sculon,
ðæt we hie sculon eac milde mode lufian.
 33.222.7. Be ðæm se æðela lareow cwæð, ða he spon
his hieremen to ðære geðylde, he cwæð: Ælc ðweora & ælc
ierre & unweorðscipe & geclibs & tæl sie anumen fram eow.
 33.222.9. Ða he spræc, swelce he þa uterran yflu hæfde
eall gesett, & wende hiene þa to ðæm inneran, & ðus cwæð:
And ælc yfel forlæte ge on eowrum ingeðonce.
 33.222.12. Forðæm hit bið unnyt ðæt mon unweorðunga
& tæl & geclibs utane forlæte, gif se yfela willa ðone onwald
hæfð ðæs ingeðonces, se is modur ælces yfeles.
 33.222.14. Forðæm hit bið unnyt ðæt mon hwelces yfles
bogas snæde, buton mon wille ða wyrtruman forceorfan ðæs staðoles.
 33.222.16. Be ðæm sio Soðfæstnes ðurh hie selfe
cwæð: Lufiað eowre fiend, & doð ðæm wel þe eow ær
hatedon, & gebiddað for þa þe eower ehtað & eow lað doð.
 33.222.18. Ðæt is swiðe micel cræft beforan mannum
ðæt mon ðæm men auht forberan mæge þe him wiðerweard sie,
& ðæt is micle mare beforan Gode ðæt hiene mon siððan mæge
lufian.
 33.222.21. Forðæm ða lac beoð Gode ealra andfengeost þe
beforan his eagum se lieg ðære lufe forbærnð on ðæm altere godra
weorca, swæ swæ iu mid ðæm heofoncundan fire on ðære ealdan
æ wæron ða lac forbærndu uppe on ðæm altere.
 33.222.24. Be ðæm eft Dryhten cwæð to sumum monnum þe
hæfdon ða geðyld, & næfdon ða lufe, he cwæð: Hwæt, ðu
meaht gesion lytelne cið on ðines broður eagan, & ne meaht gefredan
micelne beam on ðinum agnan.
 33.224.2. Sio gedrefednes ðære ungeðylde on ðæm mode
ðæt is se smala ciið, ac se yfela willa on ðære heortan ðæt is
se greata beam.
 33.224.4. Ðone ungeðyldegan ðonne swiðe lytel scur
ðære costunga mæg onhreran,swæ swæ lytel wind mæg ðone cið
awecggean, ac ðone yfelan fæstrædan willan folneah nan wind ne mæg
awecggean.
 33.224.7. Be ðæm cwæð eft Dryhten: Ðu licettere, aweorp
ærest of ðinum agnum eagan ðone greatan beam, & cunna siððan
hwæðer ðu mæge adon ðone cið of ðines broður eagan.
 33.224.9. Swelce he cwæde to ðæm unrhtwisan mode, þe
innan bið gnorniende, & utan licet geðyld: Ado ærest from ðe ða
byrðenne ðæs yflan willan, & tæl siððan oðerne for his
ungeðylde & for his leohtmodnesse.
 33.224.12. Forðæm, ðonne ðu ne wilnast ðæt ðu
oferswiðe ðone yfelan willan, & forlæte ða licettunge on ðe
selfum, ðonne meaht ðu ðy wyrs geðyldgian oðres monnes yfel.
 33.224.15. And oft ðeah gebyreð ðæm geðyldegan, ðeah
him mon hwæt wiðerweardes do, oððe he hwelce scande gehiere be him
selfum, ðæt he ðonne nanwuht æt ðæm cirre ne bið astired, ac
gebærð swæ geðyldelice swelce he hit hæbbe mid ealre heortan
forlæten.
 33.224.18. Ac ðonne he hit eft ofman æfter lytlum fæce,
ðonne ofðyncð him ðæs ilcan þe he ær forbær, & bið eft
onæled mid ðy fyre ðæs sares.
 33.224.20. Secð ðonne & smeað hu he hit gewrecan mæge,
& ða manðwærnesse þe he ær ðurhtogen hæfde eft
ðeahtigende on yfel gewent.
 33.224.22. Ac ðæm mæg bion swiðe hræde geholpen from
his lareowe, gif he him sægð hwonon ðæt cymð, and hu se lytega
dioful styreð gewinn & gefeoht betweox him twam: oðerne he lærð
ðæt he onginne sume sconde be ðæm oðrum oððe sprecan oððe
don, oðerne he lærð ðæt he ða scande forgielde.
 33.226.2. Ac hit gebyreð oftost ðæt se bið oferswiðed,
se þe ðurh diofles lare ærest bið onæled mid ðy unryhtum niðe,
ðeah he swæ ne wene, ðonne he hit ærest onginð.
 33.226.4. And se hæfð oftost ðone weorðscipe se þe ær
geðyldelice þa scande forbær.
 33.226.5. Ac ðonne se dioful hæfð ðone ærran
gewunnenne, & he bið under his geoc gegan, ðonne went he mid ealle
cræfte ongean ðæs oðres geðyld þe him ðonne git wiðwinð.
 33.226.7. And bið swiðe sarig, forðæmþe he on ðæm
forman gefeohte hiene ne meahte ofsceotan mid ðæm bismere, ðe he ðurh
ðone oðerne him to sende.
 33.226.9. Læt ðonne an ðæt gefeoht swæ openlice sume
hwile, & onginð hiene diegellice læran, & slitan his ingeðoht,
& bitt ðære tide, hwonne he ðæs wyrðe sie ðæt he hiene
beswican mote.
 33.226.12. Forðæm he hiene ne meahte mid openlicum gefeohte
oferswiðan, sætað ðonne digelice, & secð hu he hiene mæge
gefon.
 33.226.14. Se geðyldega ðonne eft, ðonne ðæt gestilled
bið, ðonne went he eft ongean mid his mode, & gemon ðone demm
oððe ðæt bismer, ðæt him ær gedon wæs.
 33.226.16. And ðonne swiðe hrædlice & swiðe
ungemetlice eahtað eall ðæt him ær gedon wæs, & hit ðonne
swiðe unaberendlic talað.
 33.226.18. And mid swæ micelre murcunga his agen mod gedrefð,
ðætte oft ðone geðyldegestan scamað ðæs siges þe he ofer
ðone dioful hæfde mid his geðylde.
 33.226.20. And he ðonne swæ gebunden from ðæm diofle
sargað ðæs, & him ofðyncð ðæt he hit swæ emne &
swæ geðyldelice forbær ðæt he ðæt bismer ne forgeald.
 33.226.22. And ðencð ðæs timan hwonne he hit wyrs
geleanian mæge.
 33.226.23. Ac hwæm beoð ðonne ðas ðyllecan gelicran
ðonne ðæm folce þe on clænum felda weorðlicne sige gefeohtað,
& eft innan hiera burgum fæste belocene ðurh hiera giemeliste hie
lætað gebindan, oððe swelce hie ær lægen on longre mettrymnesse,
& hie ðeah gewierpten, & eft cume an lytel fefres, & hie ofslea?
 33.228.2. Ða geðyldegan sint to manianne ðætte hie hiera
heortan getrymmen æfter ðæm miclan sige, & þa burg hiera modes
wið stælherigeas behealden.
 33.228.5. And mid wighusum gefæstnige, swelce hie him ðære
adle edcir swiður ondrede ðonne ðone fruman, ðylæs se lytega feond
æfter fyrste swiðor fægenige ðæt he hiene mid his lotwrencium
beswice, ðeah he hiene ær on openum gefeohte ofercome, & him ðone
stiðan swioran fortræde.

END_TEXT

 1.1. Hu ure ieldran ealne þisne middangeard on þreo
todældon.
 1.2. Hu Ninus, Asiria cyning, ongon monna ærest ricsian on
þiosan middangearde; & hu Sameramis his cwen feng to þæm rice
æfter him mid micelre reðnesse & wrænnesse.
 1.3. Hu þæt heofenisce fyr forbærnde þæt lond on
þæm wæron þa twa byrig on getimbred, Sodome & Gomorre.
 1.4. Hu Thelesci & Ciarsæthi þa leode him betweonum
wunnon.
 1.5. Hu Ioseph se ryhtwisa mon ahredde Egypta folc æt þæm
seofan geara miclan hungre mid his wisdome; & hu hie siþþan ealra hiora
wæstma þone fiftan dæl ælce geare heora cyninge to gafole gesellað
æfter his gesetnesse.
 1.6. Hu on Achaie wearþ micel flod on Ambictiones dagum þæs
cyninges.
 1.7. Hu Moyses lædde Israhela folc from Egyptum ofer þone
Readan Sæ.
 1.8. Hu on Egyptum wurdon on anre niht l monna ofslagen from hiora
agnum sunum; & hu Bosiridis se cyning het don to geblote ealle þa cuman
þe hiene gesohtan; & ymbe monegra oþerra folca gewinn.
 1.9. Hu Cretense & Athaniense, Creca leode, him betweonum
wunnon.

andredan ge Pirrus se reþa creca cyning, ge se mæra Alexander, ge Iulius
se casere.
 1.11. Hu Elena, þæs cyninges wif, wearð genumen on

Italie.
 1.12. Hu Sardanopolus wæs se siþemesta cyning in Asiria, ond

weras, þe hie fleon woldon; ond hu se argeotere geworhte anes fearres
onlicnesse þæm æþelinge.
 1.13. Hu Pelopensium & Atheniensium þa folc him betweonum
wunnon.
 1.14. Hu Læcedemonie & Mesiane him betweonum wunnon for
hiora mægdena offrunga.
 2.1. Hu Orosius sæde þæt ure Dryhten þone ærestan mon

þises middangeardes.
 2.2. Hu Remus & Romulus þa gebroþor getimbredan Romeburg on
Italiam.
 2.3. Hu Romulus & Brutus mid hwelcum mane hie gehalgedon Roma.
 2.4. Hu Romane & Sabine him betweonum wunnon; & hu Cirus
wearð ofslagen on Sciþþium.
 2.5. Hu Cambisis se cyning forseah þa Egyptiscan diofolgield;
& ymbe Dariuses gewinn & Xersis, & Leoniþan.
 2.6. Hu Romanum wearð an wundor oþiewed, swelce se heofon

 2.7. Hu Sicilia leode wæron him betweonum winnende.
 2.8. Hu Romane besæton Ueiorum þa burg x winter; & hu

 3.1. Hu sio bysmerlice sibb & facenlice wearð betweonum
Læcedemonium & Persum.
 3.2. Hu on Achaie wearð eorþbeofung.
 3.3. Hu se micla monncwealm wearð on Rome on twegra consula
dæge; & hu Marcus Curtius besceat on þa ginigendan eorþan.
 3.4. Hu Galliæ oferhergodon Romana lond on iii mila to þære

 3.5. Hu Cartaina ærendwracan comon to Rome & him frið
gebudon.
 3.6. Hu Romane & Latine wunnon him betweonum; & hu an nunne

 3.7. Hu Alexander se cyning wonn wið Romane, þæs maran
Alexandres eam; & hu Philippus, þæs maran Alexandres fæder, feng to

 3.8. Hu Caudenes Furculus sio stow wearþ swiþe widmære for

 3.9. Hu se mæra Alexander feng to Mæcedonia rice; & hu he

 3.10. Hu under ii consulum woldon iiii þa strengstan þeoda

 3.11. Hu under ii consulum wurdon Somnite & Gallie of Senno

unsibbe geendedon æfter Alexandres deaþe.
 4.1. Hu Tarentine gesawan Romano scipa on ðæm sæ irnan,

 4.5. Hu Himeolco, Cartaina cyning, for mid fierde on Siciliae; ond

 4.6. Hu Sicilia folc & Pena wunnon him betweonum; & hu

 4.13. Hu þæt þridde gewinn wearþ geendod Romano &
