Or 3
B9.2.4.
Orosius, Book 3: Bately 1980, 53-83.



 1.53.7. Æfter ðæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs III hunde
wintra & LVII, on þæm dagum þe Gallie Roma awest hæfdon, þa
gewearð seo mæste sibb & seo bismerleceste betwih Læcedemonium,
Creca londe, & Persum.
 1.53.10. Æfter þæm þe Læcedemonie hæfdon Perse oft
oferwunnen, þa gebudon him Perse þæt hie hæfden III winter sibbe
wiþ hie, se þe þæt wolde, & se þe þæt nolde, þæt hie
wolden þa mid gefeohte gesecan.
 1.53.13. Hie þa Læcedemoniæ lustlice þære sibbe
hirsumedan, for þæm lytlan ege þe him mon gebead.
 1.53.14. On þæm mon mæg sweotole oncnawan hu micelne willan
hie to ðæm gewinne hæfdon swa heora scopas on heora leoðum giddiende
sindon, & on heora leasspellengum.
 1.53.17. Ne geþyncð þe swelc gewin noht lustbære,
cwæð Orosius, ne þa tida þon ma, þætte him his feond mæge swa
eaþe his mid wordum gestieran?
 1.53.20. Æfter þæm þe Læcedemonie hæfdon oferwunnen
Ahtene þa burg, hiora agene leode, hi hie þa up ahofon & winnan
angunnan on ælce healfe hiora, ge wið heora agen folc, ge wið Perse, ge
wið þa læssan Asiam, ge wið Ahtene þa burg, þe hie ær awestan;
for ðon þa feawan þe þær ut oþflugon hæfdon eft þa burg
gebune, & hæfdon Thebane, Creca leode, him on fultum asponon.
 1.53.25. Læcedemonie wæron swa uppahæfene, þæt
ægðer ge hie self wendon ge ealle ða neahþeoda þæt hie ofer hie
ealle mehte anwald habban.
 1.53.28. Ac him Ahteniense mid Thebana fultume wiðstodon, &
hie mid gefeohte cnysedan.
 1.53.30. Æfter þæm Læcedemonie gecuron him to ladteowe,
Ircclidis wæs haten, & hiene sendon on Perse mid fultume wið hie to
gefeohtanne.
 1.53.32. Him þa Perse mid heora twæm ealdormonnum ongean
coman; oþer hatte Farnabuses, oþer Dissifarnon.
 1.54.1. Sona swa þara Læcedemonia ladteow wiste þæt he
wið þa twegen heras sceolde, him þa rædlecre geþuhte þæt he
wið oþerne frið gename, þæt he þone oðerne þe ieð ofercuman
mehte.
 1.54.4. & he swa gedyde, & his ærenddracan to oþrum
onsende, & him secgan het þæt he geornor wolde sibbe wið hiene
þonne gewinn.
 1.54.6. He þa se ealdormon geliefedlice mid sibbe þara
ærende anfeng, & Læcedemonie þa hwile gefliemdon þone oðerne
ealdormon.
 1.54.9. Æfter þæm Persa cyning benom þone ealdormon his
scire, þe ær þæm friþe anfeng æt Læcedemonium, & hie
gesealde anum wræccean of Ahtena, Creca byrg, se wæs haten Conon, &
hiene sende mid scipehere of Persum to Læcedemonium.
 1.54.12. & hie sendon to Egyptum Læcedemonie, & him
fultumes bædon; & hie him gesealdon an C þara miclena
þriereðrena/.
 1.54.14. Læcedemonie hæfdon him to ladteowe ænne wisne
mon, þeh he healt wære, se wæs haten Ageselaus, & him to gielpworde
hæfdon þæt him leofre wære þæt hie hæfdon healtne cyning
þonne healt rice.
 1.54.17. Hie siþþan on ðæm sæ togædere foran, &
þær swa ungemetlice gefuhton þæt hie neah ealle forwurdon, þæt
naðer ne mehte on oþrum sige geræcan.
 1.54.19. Þær wearð Læcedemonia anweald & heora dom
alegen.
 1.54.20. Ne wene ic, cwæð Orosius, ðæt ænige twegen
latteowas emnar gefuhten.
 1.54.22. Æfter þæm Conon gelædde fierd eft on
Læcedemonie, & ðæt land buton þære byrig on ælcon þingun
mid ealle aweste, þætte þa þe ær ute oþra ðeoda anwalda
girndon, him þa god þuhte þær hie mehten hie selfe æt ham wið
ðeowdom bewerian.
 1.54.25. Pissandor hatte sum Læcedemonia latteow: he gesohte
Conon mid scipun, þa he of Læcedemonium for, & þara folca
ægðer on oðerum micel wæl geslogan.
 1.54.28. Þær wurdon Læcedemonie swa swiðe forslagen
þæt hie naþer næfdon siþþan ne heora namon ne heora anweald.
 1.54.29. Ac heora hryre wearð Ahtenum to arærnesse þæt
hie ðone ealdan teonan gewrecan mehten þe him on ærdagum gemæne
wæs.
 1.54.31. & hie & Thebane hie gegaderedon, &
Læcedemonie mid gefeohte sohton, & hie gefliemdon, & hie on hiora
burg bedrifon, & siððan besætan.
 1.54.34. Þa burgware sendon þa æfter Iesulause, þe mid
heora here wæs in Asiam, & bædon þæt hie tidlice hamweard
wære & heora gehulpe.
 1.55.2. & swa gedydon & on Ahtene ungearwe becoman &
hie gefliemdon.
 1.55.3. Ahteniense wæron þa him swiðe ondrædende þæt
Læcedemonie ofer hie ricsian mehten swa hie ær dydon, for þæm lytlan
sige þe hie þa ofer hie hæfdon.
 1.55.5. Hie sendon þa on Perse æfter Conone, & hine
bædon þæt he him on fultume wære.
 1.55.6. & he him þæs getygþade & hie mid micle
sciphere gesohte, & hie Læcedemonie mæst ealle awestan, & hie to
þon gedydon þæt hi hie selfe leton ægþer ge for heane ge for
unwræste.
 1.55.9. Æfter þæm Conon gelende to Ahtena þære byrig,
his ealdcyþþe, & þær mid micle gefean þara burgleoda onfangen
wæs, & he ðær his selfes longe gemyndgunge gedyde mid þan þe
he geniedde ægþer ge Perse ge Læcedemonie þæt hie gebetton þa
burg þe hie ær tobræcon, & eac þæt Læcedemonie þære
byrig siþþan gehiersume wæron, þeh hie ær longe heora wiþerwinnan
wæren.
 1.55.15. Æfter þeosan gewinne gewearð þætte Perse
gebudan frið eallum Creca folce, næs na for þæm þe hie him
ænigra goda uþen, ac for þæm þe hie wunnon on Egypti, þæt hie
mosten for him þy bet þæm gewinne fullgongan.
 1.55.18. Ac Læcedemonie hæfdon þa hwile maran unstillnessa
þonne hie mægenes hæfden, & wæron swiþor winnende on Thebane
þonne hie fultumes hæfde, & hloðum on hie staledon, oð hie
abræcan Arcadum heora burg.
 1.55.22. Æfter þæm Thebane hie mid firde gesohton, &
him Læcedemonie oþre ongean brohton.
 1.55.23. Þa hie longe fuhton, þa cleopade Læcedemonia
ealdormon to Arcadium, & bæden þæt hie ðæs gefeohtes geswicen,
þæt hie mosten þa deadan bebyrgean þe heora folces ofslagen wæron.
 1.55.26. Þæt is mid Crecum þeaw þæt mid ðæm worde
bið gecyþed hwæðer healf hæfð þonne sige.
 1.55.28. For þon ic wolde gesecgan, cwæð Orosius, hu Creca
gewinn angan, þe of Læcedemonia ðære byrg ærest onsteled wæs,
& mid spellcwidum gemearcian, ærest on Athena þa burg, &
siþþan on Thebane, & siþþan on Boeti, & siþþan on
Macedaniæ, þiss wæron ealle Creca leode, & siþþan on þa
læssan Asiam, & ða on þa maran, & siþþan on Perse, &
siþþan on Egypti.
 1.56.1. Ic scæl eac þy lator Romana istoria asecgan þe ic
angunnen hæfde.
 2.56.3. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs III hunde
wintra & LXXVI, wæs in Achie eorþbeofung, & twa byrig, Ebora &
Elice, on eorþan besuncon.
 2.56.5. Ic mæg eac on urum agnum tidum gelic anginn þæm
gesecgan, þeh hit swelcne ende næfde, þætte Constantinopolim Creca
burg on swelcre cwacunge wæs, & hiere gewitgad wæs of soðfæstum
monnum þæt heo sceolde on eorþan besinca; ac heo wearð gescild þurh
þone cristnan casere Arcadiusan, & þurh þæt cristene folc.
 2.56.10. On þæm burgum wæs getacnad þæt Crist is
eaðmodegra help & ofermodigra fiell.
 2.56.11. Mare ic þyses gemyndgade þonne ic his mid ealle
asæde; gif his hwa sie lustfull mare to witanne, sece him þonne self
þæt.
 2.56.14. On þæm dagum gewearð þætte Wulchi &
Falisci, þe ær wæron LXX wintra wið Romane winnende, þæt hi hie
þa oferwunnon, & heora land oferhergedon.
 2.56.16. & raþe æfter þæm Suttrian þæt folc
wæron hergende on Romane oþ þære burge geata.
 2.56.17. Hit Romane æfter þæm hrædlice mid gefeohte
& mid hergiunge him forguldon, & hie gefliemdon.
 3.56.20. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs III hund
wintra & LXXXIII, þa þa Laucius, þe oþre noman wæs haten
Genutius, & Quintus, þe oþre noman wæs haten Serfilius, ða hie
wæron consulas on Rome, gewearð se micla moncwealm on þæm londe:
nales, swa hit gewuna is, of untidlican gewideran, þæt is, of wætum
sumerum, & of drygum wintrum, & of reðre lenctenhæte, & mid
ungemætre hærfestwætan & æfterhæþan; ac an wind com of
Calabria wealde, & se wol mid þæm winde.
 3.56.27. Þes moncwealm wæs on Romanum full II gear ofer ealle
menn gelice, þeh þe sume deade wæron, sume uneaþe gedrycnede aweg
coman; oþ þæt heora biscepas sædon þæt heora godas bædon
þæt him man worhte anfiteatra, þæt mon mehte þone hæðeniscan
plegan þærinne don, & hiora diofolgield, þæt wæron openlice
ealle unclænnessa.
 3.57.4. Her me magon nu, cwæð Orosius, þa geondwyrdon þe
þæs cristendomes wiðerflitan sint, hu heora godas þurh heora blotunge
& þurh hiera diofolgield þæs monncwealmes gehulpon, buton þæt
hie ne angeatan mid hwelcum scinncræfte & mid hwelcum lotwrence hit
deofla dydon, næs na se soða God, ðæt hie mid þy yfele þa menn
swenctan, to ðon þæt hie geliefdon heora ofrunga & heora
deofolgieldum, & þæt hie þonan mosten to þæm sawlum becuman,
& þæt hie hie mosten tawian mid þære mæstan bismrunge æt
heora anfiteatra.
 3.57.13. Þa wæron unarimede, & me nu monigfeald to
secganne, for þon þu, fæder Agustinus, hie hæfst on þinum bocum
sweotole gesæd; & ic gehwam wille þærto tæcan þe hiene his
lyst ma to witanne.
 3.57.17. Æfter þeosan on þæm ilcan geare tohlad seo
eorþe binnan Romebyrig.
 3.57.18. Þa sædon heora biscepas eft þæt heora godas
bædan þæt him mon sealde ænne cucne mon, þa him þuhte þæt
heo heora deadra to lyt hæfden.
 3.57.20. & seo eorþe swa giniende bad, oþ þæt Marcus,
þe oþre noman hatte Curtius, mid horse & mid wæpnum þæroninnan
besceat; & hio siþþan togædre behlad.
 4.57.23. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs III hund
wintra & LXXXVIII, þætte Gallie oferhergedan Romana lond oð IIII
mila to ðære byrig, & þa burg mehton eaðe begitan gif hie þær
ne gewacadon; for þon Romane wæron swa forhte & swa æmode, þæt
hie ne wendon þæt hie þa burg bewerian mehton.
 4.57.27. Ac þæs on morgenne Titus heora ladteow, þe oðre
noman wæs haten Quintius, hie mid firde gesohte.
 4.57.29. Þær gefeaht Mallius anwig, þe oðre noman wæs
haten Tarcwatus, wið anne Galliscne monn, & hiene ofslog; & Titus
Cuintius þa oðre sume gefliemde sume ofslog.
 4.58.2. Be þæm mon mehte ongietan hwæt ðær ofslagen
wæs, þa heora fela ðusenda gefongen wæs.
 5.58.5. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII hunde
wintra & II, ðætte Cartaina þære burge ærendracan comon to
Rome, & him gebudon þæt hie frið him betweonum hæfden, for þon
hie on an land þa winnende wæron, þæt wæs on Benefente.
 5.58.8. Mid þæm þe þa ærendracan to Rome comon, þa
com eac mid him seo ofermæte heardsælnesse & monegra ðeoda
iermþa, seo longe æfter þæm weaxende wæs, swa hit heofones tungul
on þæm tidun cyþende wæron, þæt hit wæs niht oð midne
dæg, & on sumre tide hit hagalade stanum ofer ealle Romane.
 5.58.14. On þæm dagum wæs Alexander geboren on Crecum swa
swa an micel yst come ofer ealne middangeard.
 5.58.15. & Ocus, Persa cyning, þone mon oþere noman het
Artecsersis, æfter þæm þe he Egyptum forhergede, he gefor siþþan
on Iudana lond, & hiera fela forhergeade; siþþan on Ircaniam þæm
londe he heora swiðe fela gesette wið þone sæ þe mon Caspia
hætt, & hie þær gesetene sint giet oð þisne dæg mid bradum
folcum, on ðæm tohopan þæt hie sume siðe God þonan ado to heora
agnum lande.
 5.58.21. Siþþan Artecsersis abræc Sidonem, Fenitia burg, seo
wæs þa welegast on ðæm dagum.
 5.58.23. Æfter þæm Romane angunnan þæt Somniticum
gewinn ymbe Campena land.
 5.58.24. Hie þa longe & oftrædlice ymb þæt fuhton on
hweorfendum sigum.
 5.58.25. Þa getugon Somnite him on fultum Pirrusan Epira cyning,
þone mæstan feond Romanum.
 5.58.26. Þæt gewinn wearð hwæðre sume hwile gestilled,
for þon Punici wið Romane winnan angunnan.
 5.58.29. Siþþan þæt gewin angunnen wæs, gif ænig mon
sie, cwæð Orosius, þe on gewritun findan mæge þæt Ianas dura
siþþan belocen wurde buton anum geare, & þæt wæs for þæm
þe Romane eallne þone gear an monncwealme lægan, ær eft Octauianus
dæge þæs caseres.
 5.59.3. Þæt hus hæfdon Romane to ðæm anum tacne
geworht þæt on swelce healfe swelce hie þonne winnende beon woldan, swa
suþ, swa norþ, swa east, swa west, þonne andydan hie þa duru þe on
þa healfe open wæs, þæt hie be þæm wiston hwider hie sceoldon.
 5.59.7. & mið þæm þe hie þara dura hwelce opene
gesawon, þonne tugon hie heora hrægl bufan cneow, & giredon hie to
wige; & be þæm wiston þæt hie wið sum folc frið ne
hæfdon.
 5.59.9. & þonne hie frið hæfdon, þonne wæron ealle
þa dura betyneda, & hie leton hiera hrægl ofdune to fotum.
 5.59.11. Ac þa þa Octauianus se casere to rice feng, þa
wurdon Ianas dura betyneda, & wearð sibb & friþ ofer ealne
middangeard.
 5.59.14. Æfter þæm þe Perse frið genaman wið Romanum
siþþan gelicade eallum folcum þæt hie Romanum underþieded wære,
& hiora æ to behealdanne; & swa swiþe þone frið lufedon
þæt him leofre wæs þæt hie Romanisce cyningas hæfden þonne of
heora agnum cynne.
 5.59.18. On þæm wæs sweotole getacnod þæt nan
eorþlic man ne mehte swelce lufe & swelce sibbe ofer eallne middangeard
gedon swelce þa wæs, ac heo for þæm wæs þe Crist on þæm
dagum geboren wæs, þe sibb is heofonwara & eorðwara.
 5.59.21. Þæt eac Octauianus sweotole getacnade, þa þa
Romane him woldon ofrian swa heora gewuna wæs, & sædon þæt sio
sibb of his mihte wære; ac he ægðer fleah ge þa dæd ge þa
sægene, & eac self sæde þæt seo dæd his nære, ne eac beon
ne mehte nanes eorðlices monnes, þætte ealre worolde swelce sibbe
bringan mehte, þætte twa þeoda ær habban ne mehton, ne, ðætte
læsse wæs, twa gemægþa.
 6.59.28. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintrum & VIII, gewearð þætte Romane & Latine wunnon.
 6.59.29. On þæm forman gefeohte wearð Romane consul
ofslagen Mallius, þe oðre noman wæs haten Tarcuatus.
 6.59.31. & heora oþer consul, þe mon Detius hett, &
oðre noman Mure, his agenne sunn ofslog, for þon he oferbræc heora
gecwedrædenne, þæt wæs þæt hie hæfdon gecweden þæt hie
ealle emlice on Latine tengden.
 6.60.3. Ac þær an ut asceat of Latina weorode, & anwiges
bæd, & him ðæs consules sunu ongean com, & hiene þær
ofslog.
 6.60.5. For þæm gylte hiene eft hett his fæder ofslean.
 6.60.6. For þæm slege noldan Romane brengan þæm consule
þone triumphan, þe heora gewuna wæs, þeh he sige hæfde.
 6.60.8. On ðæm æfterran geare þæs, Minutia hatte an
wifmon, þe on heora wisan sceolde nunne beon.
 6.60.9. Seo hæfde gehaten heora gydenne Dianan þæt heo
wolde hiere lif on fæmnhade alibban.
 6.60.10. Þa forlæg heo hie sona.
 6.60.11. Hie þa Romane for þæm gylte þe heo hiere beot
aleag, swa cuce on eorþan bedulfan, & nugiet to dæge þæm gylte to
tacne mon hætt ðæt lond Manfeld þær hie mon byrgde.
 6.60.14. Raþe æfter þæm on þara twegea consula dæge,
Claudius, þe oðre noman hatte Marcellus, & Ualerius, þe oðre noman
hatte Flaccus, þa gewearð hit, þeh hit me scondlic sie, cwæð
Orosius, þætte sume Romana wif on swelcum scinlace wurdon, & on
swelcum wodan dreame, þæt hie woldon ælcne mon, ge wif ge wæpned,
þara þe hie mehton, mid atre acwellan, & hit on mete oþþe on drynce
to geþicgenne gesellan.
 6.60.20. & þæt longe donde wæron ær þæt folc
wiste hwonan þæt yfel come, buton þæt hie sædon þæt hit ufane
of ðære lyfte come, ær þon hit þurh ænne þeowne mon geypped
wearð.
 6.60.22. Þa wæron ealle þa wif beforan Romana witan
gelaðede; þara wæs III hund & hundeahtatig.
 6.60.24. & þær wæron geniedde þæt hie þæt
ilce þigedan þæt hie ær oþrum sealdon, þæt hie þærryhte
deade wæron beforan eallum þæm monnum.
 7.60.27. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII hund
wintra & XXII, Alexander, Epirotarum cyning, þæs maran Alexandres eam,
he mid eallum his mægene wið Romane winnan angan, & æt Somnite
gemære & Romane gesæt, & þa nihstan landleode on ægþere
healfe him on fultum geteah, oþ Somnite him gefuhton wið, & þone
cyning ofslogon.
 7.61.1. Nu ic þyses Alexandres her gemyndgade, cwæð Orosius,
nu ic wille eac þæs maran Alexandres gemunende beon, þæs oþres
nefan, þeh ic ymbe Romana gewin on þæm gearrime forð ofer þæt
geteled hæbbe.
 7.61.4. Ic sceal hwæðre eft gewendan þæt ic hwelcnehugu
dæl gesecge Alexandres dæda; & hu Philippus his fæder IIII hund
wintrum æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs, he feng to
Mæcedonia rice on Crecum, & þæt hæfde XXV wintra, & binnan
þæm gearum he geeode ealle þa cynericu þe on Crecum wæron.
 7.61.9. An wæs Ahteniense, oþer wæs Thebane, III wæs
Thesali, IIII wæs Læcedemonie, V Focenses, VI Mesi, VII Macedonie,
þæt he ærest hæfde.
 7.61.11. Philippus þa he cniht wæs, wæs Thebanum to gisle
geseald, Paminunde, þæm strongan cyninge & þæm gelæredestan
philosophe, from his agnum breþer Alexandre, þe Læcedemonia rice þa
hæfde, & mid him gelæred wearð on þam þrim gearum þa he
ðær wæs.
 7.61.15. Þa wearð Alexander ofslagen his broðor from his
agenre meder, þeh heo hiere oþerne sunu eac ær ofsloge for hiere
geligernesse; & heo wæs Philippuses steopmodor.
 7.61.17. Þa feng Philippus to Mæcedonia rice, & hit ealle
hwile on miclan pleo & on miclan earfeþan hæfde, þæt ægþer
ge him mon utane of oðrum londum an wann, ge eac þæt his agen folc ymbe
his feorh sierede, þæt him þa æt nihstan leofre wæs þæt he
ute wunne þonne he æt ham wære.
 7.61.22. His forme gefeoht wæs wið Atheniense, & hie
oferwonn; & æfter þæm wið Hiliricos, þe we Pulgare hatað,
& heora monig ðusend ofslog, & heora mæstan burg geeode, Larisan.
 7.61.24. & siþþan on Thesali he þæt gewinn swiþost
dyde for þære gewilnunge þe he wolde hi him on fultum geteon for heora
wigcræfte, for þon hie cuþon on horsum ealra folca feohtan betst &
ærest.
 7.61.27. Hie þa ægðer ge for his ege ge for his olecunge him
to gecierdon.
 7.61.28. He þa gegaderade mid heora fultume & mid his agene
ægþer ge ridendra ge gangendra unoferwinnendlicne here.
 7.61.31. Æfter þæm þe Philippus hæfde Atheniense &
Thesali him underðieded, he begeat Arues dohtor him to wife, Malosorum
cyninges, Olimphiade wæs hatenu.
 7.62.2. Arues wende þæt he his rice gemiclian sceolde þa he
his dohtor Philippuse sealde.
 7.62.3. Ac he hiene on ðære wenunge geband, & him ðæt
an genam þæt he self hæfde, & hiene siþþan forsende oþ he his
lif forlet.
 7.62.5. Æfter þæm Philippus feaht on Thona þa burg, on
Thebana rice; & him ðær wearþ oþer eage mid anre flan ut ascoten.
 7.62.7. He hwæðre þa burg gewann, & eall þæt
moncynn acwealde þæt he ðærinne mette.
 7.62.8. & æfter þæm mid searewan he geeode eall Creca
folc, for þon heora gewuna wæs þæt hie woldon of ælcerre byrig him
self anwald habban, & nan oðerre underþied beon, ac wæron him swa
betweonum winnende.
 7.62.12. Þa bædan hie Philippus æst of anre byrig, þonne
of oþerre, þæt hie him on fultume wære wiþ þa þe him on
wunnon.
 7.62.13. Þonne he þa oferswiðed hæfde þe he þonne on
winnende wæs mid þæm folce þe hiene ær fultumes bæd, þonne
dyde he him ægþer to gewealdon: swa he belytegade ealle Crece on his
geweald.
 7.62.16. Þa Crece þæt þa undergeaton, & eac him
swiþe ofþyncendum þæt hie an cyning swa ieðelice forneah buton
ælcon gewinne on his geweald beþridian sceolde, gelice & hie him
þeowiende wæron, he hie eac oþrum folcum oftrædlice on þeowot
sealde, þe ær nan folc ne mehte mid gefeohte gewinnan, hie þa ealle
wið hiene gewin up ahofan; & he hiene geeaðmedde to þæm folce þe
he him þær heardost ondred, þæt wæron Thesalii, & on hie gelec
þæt hie mid him on Athene wunnon.
 7.62.24. Þa hie to ðæm gemære comon mid heora firde, þa
hæfdon hie hiera clusan belocene.
 7.62.25. Þa Philippus þærbinnan ne mehte þæt he his
teonan gewræce, he þa wende on þa ane þe him þa getriewe wæron,
& heora burg gefor, & þæt folc mid ealle fordyde, & heora
hergas towearp, swa he ealle dyde þe he awer mette, ge eac his agene; oþ
him þa biscepas sædon þæt ealle godas him irre wæren &
wiðwinnende; & þeh hie him ealle irre wæren, on þæm XXV wintrum
þe he winnende wæs & feohtende he na oferwunnen ne wearð.
 7.62.32. Æfter he gefor on Capadotiam þæt lond, &
þær ealle þa cyningas mid biswice ofslog.
 7.63.1. Siþþan ealle Capadotiam him gehiersumedon.
 7.63.2. & hiene siþþan wende on his þrie gebroðor,
& ænne ofslog, & þa twegen oðflugon on Olinthum þa burg, seo
wæs fæstast & welegast Mæcedonia rices.
 7.63.4. & him Philippus æfter for, & þa burg abræc,
& þa broðor ofslog & eall þæt þærinne wæs.
 7.63.5. Þa þrie gebroðor næron na Philippuse gemedren, ac
wæron gefæderen.
 7.63.7. On þæm dagum on Tracia þæm londe wæron twegen
cyningas ymb þæt rice winnende: þa wæron gebroþor.
 7.63.8. Þa sendan hie to Philippuse, & bædon þæt he
hie ymb þæt rice gesemde, & on þære gewitnesse wære þæt
hit emne gedæled wære.
 7.63.10. He þa Philippus to heora gemote com mid micelre firde,
& þa cyningas begen ofslog & ealle þa witan, & feng him to
þæm ricum bæm.
 7.63.12. Æfter þæm Atheniense bædan Philippus, þæt
he heora ladteow wære wið Focenses þæm folce, þeh hie ær hiera
clusan him ongean belucen, & þæt he oðer ðara dyde, oþþe hie
gesemde, oþþe him gefultumade þæt hi hie oferwinnan mehten.
 7.63.16. He him þa gehet þæt he him gefultuman wolde
þæt hie hie oferwunnen.
 7.63.17. Eac æt þæm ilcan cirre bædan Focense his
fultumes wið Athene.
 7.63.18. He him þa gehet þæt he hie geseman wolde.
 7.63.19. Siþþan he buta þa clusan on his gewealde hæfde,
þa dyde he him eac þa ricu to gewealdon; & his here geond þa byrig
todælde, & him bebead þæt hie ðæt lond hergiende wæron oþ
hie hit awesten; þæt þæm folce wæs ægþres waa, ge þæt
hie þæt mæste yfel forberan sceoldon, ge eac þæt hie his sciran ne
dorstan.
 7.63.24. Ac he ealle þa ricestan forslean het, & þa oðre
sume on wræcsið forsende, sume on oðra mearca gesette.
 7.63.25. Swa he Philippus þa miclan ricu geniþerade, þeh þe
ær anra gehwelc wende þæt hit ofer monig oþru anwald habban mehte,
þæt hie þa æt nihstan hie selfe to nohte bemætan.
 7.63.29. Philippuse geþuhte æfter þæm þæt he an land
ne mehte þæm folce mid gifan gecweman þe him an simbel wæron mid
winnende; ac he scipa gegaderode, & wicingas wurdon, & sona æt anum
cirre an C & eahtatig ceapscipa gefengon.
 7.63.32. Þa geceas he him ane burg wið þone sæ, Bizantium
wæs hatenu, to ðon þæt him gelicade þæt hie þær mehten
betst frið binnan habban, & eac þæt hie þær gehendaste
wæren on gehwelc lond þonan to winnanne; ac him þa burgleode þæs
wiðcwædon.
 7.64.3. Philippus mid his fultume hi besæt, & him anwann.
 7.64.4. Seo ilce Bizantium wæs ærest getimbred from Pausania,
Læcedemonia ladteowe, & æfter þæm from Constantino þæm
cristenan casere geieced, & be his noman heo wæs gehatenu
Constantinopolim, & is nu þæt hehste cynesetl & heafod ealles
eastrices.
 7.64.8. Æfter þæm þe Philippus longe þa burg beseten
hæfde, þa ofþuhte him þæt he þæt feoh to sellanne næfde his
here swa hie bewuna wæron.
 7.64.10. He þa his here on tu todælde: sum ymb þa burg
sætt; & he mid sumum hloþum for, & monega byrg bereafode on
Cheranisse, Creca folce; & siþþan for an Sciþþie mid Alexandre his
suna, þær Atheas se cyning rice hæfde, þe ær his geþofta wæs
wið Hisdriana gewinne & þa on ðæt lond faran wolde.
 7.64.14. Ac hie þa landleode wið þæt gewarnedon, & him
mid firde angean foran.
 7.64.15. Þa þæt þa Philippus geacsade, þa sende he
æfter maran fultume to ðæm þe þa burg ymbseten hæfdon, & mid
ealle mægene an hie for.
 7.64.17. Þeh þe Sciþþie hæfdon maran monmenie, &
self hwætran wæron, hie þeh Philippus besirede mid his lotwrencum, mid
þæm/ þæt he his heres þriddan dæl gehydde, & him self mid
wæs, & þæm twam dælum bebead, swa hie feohtan angunnen, þæt
hie wið his flugen, þæt he siþþan mid þæm ðriddan dæle hie
beswican mehte, þonne hie tofarene wæron.
 7.64.23. Þær wearð Sciþþia XX M ofslagen & gefangen
wifmonna & wæpnedmonna, & þær wæs XX M horsa gefangen, þeh
hie ðær nan licgende feoh ne metten, swa hie ær bewuna wæron þonne
hie wælstowe geweald ahton.
 7.64.26. On þæm gefeohte wæs ærest anfunden Sciþþia
wanspeda.
 7.64.27. Eft þa Philippus wæs þonan cirrende, þa offor
hiene oðere Sciþþie mid lytelre firde, Tribaballe wæron hatene.
 7.64.28. Philippus him dyde heora wig unweorð, oþ hiene an
cwene sceat þurh þæt þeoh, þæt þæt hors wæs dead þe he
onufan sæt.
 7.64.30. Þa his here geseah þæt he mid þy horse afeoll,
hie þa ealle flugon, & eal þæt herefeoh forleton þe hie ær
gefangen hæfdon.
 7.64.32. Wæs þæt micel wundor þæt swa micel here for
þæs cynges fielle fleah, þe na ær ðæm fleon nolde, þeh his
mon fela þusenda ofsloge.
 7.64.34. Philippus mid his lotwrence, þa hwile þe he wund
wæs, aliefde eallum Crecum þæt heora anwaldas moston standan him
betweonum, swa hie ær on ealddagum dydon.
 7.65.3. Ac sona swa he gelacnad wæs, swa hergeade he on Athene.
 7.65.3. Þa sendon hie to Læcedemonium & bædon þæt
hie gefriend wurden, þeh hie ær longe gefiend wæren, & bædon
þæt hie ealle gemænelice cunnoden, mehten hi heora gemænan fiend him
from adon.
 7.65.6. Hie þa sume him getygðedon, & gegaderodon maran
monfultum þonne Philippus hæfde, sume for his ege ne dorstan.
 7.65.8. Philippuse geþuhte þa þæt he leng mid
folcgefeohtum wið hie ne mehte, ac oftrædlice he wæs mid hloþum on hi
hergende, & onbutan sierwende oþ hie eft totwæmde wæron, & ða
on ungearwe on Ahtene mid firde gefor.
 7.65.12. Æt þæm cirre wurdon Ahteniense swa wælhreowlice
forslagen & forhiened þæt hie na siþþan nanes anwaldes hi ne
bemætan ne nanes freodomes.
 7.65.15. Æfter þæm Philippus gelædde fird on
Læcedemonie & on Thebane, & hi miclum tintrade & bismrade, oþ
hie mid ealle wæron fordon & forhiened.
 7.65.17. Æfter þæm þe Philippus hæfde ealle Crecas on
his geweald gedon, he sealde his dohtor Alexandre þæm cyninge his agnum
mæge, þe he ær Æpira rice geseald hæfde.
 7.65.19. Þa on ðæm dæge plegedon hie of horsum,
ægþer ge Philippus ge Alexander, þe he his dohtor him sellan wolde, ge
Alexander his agen sunu, swa heora þeaw æt swelcum wæs, & eac
monige oþere mid him.
 7.65.23. Þa Philippuse gebyrede þæt he for ðæm plegan
ut of ðæm monweorode arad, þa mette hiene his ealdgefana sum, &
hiene ofstang.
 7.65.25. Ic nat, cwæð Orosius, for hwi eow Romanum sindon þa
ærran gewin swa wel gelicad & swa lustsumlice on leoðcwidum to
gehieranne, & for hwy ge þa tida swelcra broca swa wel hergeað, &
nu, þeh eow lytles hwæt swelcra gebroca on becume, þonne gemænað ge
hit to þæm wyrrestan tidum, & magon hie swa hreowlice wepan swa ge
magon þara oþra bliþelice hlihhan.
 7.65.30. Gif ge swelce þegnas sint, swelce ge wenað þæt
ge sien, þonne sceoldon ge swa lustlice eowre agnu brocu aræfnan, þeh
hie læssan sien, swa ge heora sint to gehieranne.
 7.66.1. Þonne þuhte eow þas tida beteran þonne þa, for
þon eowre brocu nu læssan sindon þonne heora þa wære.
 7.66.3. For þon Philippus wæs XXV wintra Creca folc hienende,
ægþer ge heora byrig bærnende ge hiera folc sleande, & sume on
elþiodige forsende; & eower Romana brocu, þe ge ðær ealneg
drifað, næs buton þrie dagas.
 7.66.6. Philippuses yfel mehte þeh þagiet be sumum dæle
gemetlic þyncan, ær se swelgend to rice feng, Alexander his sunu, þeh ic
nu his dæda sume hwile gesugian scyle, oþ ic Romana gesecge þe on
ðæm ilcan tidun gedon wæran.
 8.66.10. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintra & VI & xxgum, Caudenes Furculus seo stow gewearþ swiþe
mære, & giet todæge is, for Romana bismere.
 8.66.12. Þæt gewearð æfter þæm gefeohte þe Romane
& Somnite hæfdon, swa we ær beforan sædon, þa þara Somnita XX
M ofslagen wurdon under Fauia þæm consule.
 8.66.14. Ac Somnite æt oþran gefeohte mid maran fultume &
mid maran wærscipe to Romana gemetinge coman þonne hie ær dyde, æt
þære stowe þe mon hætt Caudenes Furculus.
 8.66.17. & þær Romane swiþost for þæm besierede
wæron þe him þæt land uncuþre wæs þonne hit Somnitum wære;
& on ungewis on an nirewett beforan, oþ hie Somnite utan beforan;
þæt hie siþþan oþer sceoldon, oþþe for metelieste heora lif
alætan, oþþe Somnitum on hand gan.
 8.66.21. On þæm anwalde wæron Somnite swa bealde þæt
se æþeling þe heora ladteow wæs, Pontius wæs haten, het ascian
þone cyning his fæder, þe þær æt ham wæs, hwæþer him
leofre wære, þe he hie ealle acwealde, þe hie libbende to bismre
gerenian/ hete.
 8.66.25. Hie þa se æþeling to ðæm bismre getawade þe
þa on ðæm dagum mæst wæs, þæt he hie bereafade heora claþa
& heora wæpna, & siex hund gisla on his geweald underfeng, on
þæt gerad þæt hie him siþþan ece þeowas wæren.
 8.66.29. & se æþeling bebead sumum his folce þæt hie
gebrohten Romana consulas & heora witan æt heora agnum londe, & him
beforan drifen swa swa niedlingas, þæt heora bismer þy mare wære.
 8.67.3. Geornor we woldon, cwæð Orosius, iowra Romana bismra
beon forsugiende þonne secgende, þær we for eowerre agenre gnornunge
moste, þe ge wið þæm cristendome habbað.
 8.67.5. Hwæt, ge witon þæt ge giet todæge wæron
Somnitum þeowe, gif ge him ne alugen iowra wedd & eowre aþas þe ge
him sealdon; & ge murciað nu, for þæm þe monega folc þe ge
anwald ofer hæfdon, noldon eow gelæstan þæt hie eow beheton; &
nellað geþencan hu lað eow selfum wæs to gelæstanne eowre aþas
þæm þe ofer eow anwald hæfdon.
 8.67.11. Sona þæs on þæm æfterran geare forbræcon
Romane heora aþas þe hie Somnitum geseald hæfdon, & mid Papiria
heora consule hie mid firde gesohton, & þær deadlicne sige geforan,
for þæm þe ægþer þara folca wæs þæs gefeohtes georn,
Somnite for þæm anwalde þe hie on ægþere healfe hæfdon, &
Romane for þæm bismere þe hie ær æt him geforan, oþ Romane
gefengon Somnita cyning, & heora fæsten abræcon, & hie to
gafolgieldum gedydon.
 8.67.17. Se ilca Papirius wæs æfter þæm gefeohte mid
Romanum swelces domes beled þæt hie hiene to ðon gecoren hæfdon
þæt he mid gefeohte mehte þæm maran Alexandre wiþstondan, gif he
eastane of Asiam Italiam gesohte, swa he gecweden hæfde.
 9.67.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintrum & XXVI, feng Alexander to Mæcedonia rice æfter
Philippuse his fæder, & his ærestan ðegnscipe on ðon gecyþde
þa he ealle Crecas mid his snyttro on his geweald geniedde, ealle þa þe
wið hiene gewin upahofon.
 9.67.26. Þæt wearð ærest from Persum, þa hie sealdon
Demostanase þæm philosophe licgende feoh wið þæm þe he gelærde
ealle Crecas þæt hie Alexandre wiðsocen.
 9.67.28. Athene budon gefeoht Alexandre, ac he hie sona forslog
& gefliemde, þæt hie siþþan ungemetlicne ege from him hæfdon.
 9.67.30. & Thebana fæsten abræc, & mid ealle towearp,
þætte ær wæs ealra Creca heafodstol, & siþþan þæt folc
eall on ellþeodge him wið feo gesealde; & ealle þa oðre þeoda
þe an Crecum wæron he to gafolgieldum gedyde, buton Mæcedonium þe him
æst to gecirdon.
 9.68.4. & þonan wæs farende an Nilirice & on Thraci,
& hie ealle to him gebigde.
 9.68.5. & siþþan he gegaderode fird wið Perse, & þa
hwile þe he hie gaderade, he ofslog ealle his mægas þe he geræcan
mehte.
 9.68.7. On his feðehere wæron XXXII M, & þæs
gehorsedan fifte healf M, & scipa an hund & eahtatig.
 9.68.9. Nat ic, cwæð Orosius, hwæðer mare wundor wæs,
þe þæt he swa mid lytle fultume þone mæstan dæl þisses
middangeardes gegan mehte, þe þæt he mid swa lytle weorode swa micel
anginnan dorste.
 9.68.13. On þæm ærestan gefeohte þe Alexander gefeaht
wið Darius an Persum, Darius hæfde siex hund M Folces.
 9.68.14. He wearþ þeh swiþor beswicen for Alexandres searewe
þonne for his gefeohte.
 9.68.15. Þær wæs ungemetlic wæl geslagen Persa; &
Alexandres næs na ma þonne hund twelftig on þæm rædehere, &
nigan on þæm feðan.
 9.68.17. Þa afor Alexander þonan on Frigam, Asiam lond, &
heora burg abræc & towearp þe mon hætt Sardis.
 9.68.19. Þa sægde him mon þæt Darius hæfde eft fird
gegaderod on Persum.
 9.68.20. Alexander him þæt þa ondred for þære nearwan
stowe þe he þa on wæs, & hrædlice for þæm ege þonan afor
ofer Taurasan þone beorg, & ungeliefedlicne micelne weg on þæm
dæge gefor, oð he com to Tharsum þære byrg on Cilicium þæm
londe.
 9.68.24. On ðæm dæge he gemette ane ea, sio hæfde
ungemettlice ceald wæter, seo wæs Ciðnus haten.
 9.68.25. Þa ongan he hine baðian þæron swa swatigne; þa
for þæm ciele him gescruncan ealle þa ædra, þæt him mon þæs
lifes ne wende.
 9.68.28. Raðe æfter þæm com Darius mid firde to
Alexandre.
 9.68.28. He hæfde III C þusenda feðena & an hund
þusenda gehorsedra.
 9.68.29. Alexander wæs þa him swiðe ondrædende for
þære miclan menige & for þære lytlan þe he self hæfde, þeh
þe he ær mid þære ilcan Darius maran ofercome.
 9.68.32. Þæt gefeoht wæs gedon mid micelre geornfullnesse
of þæm folcum bæm, & þær wæron þa cyningas begen
gewundod.
 9.69.2. Þær wæs Persa X M ofslægen gehorsedra, &
eahtatig M feþena, & eahtatig M gefangenra.
 9.69.3. & þær wæs ungemetlic micel licgende feoh funden
on ðæm wicstowun.
 9.69.4. Þær wæs Darius modor gefangen, & his wif, sio
wæs his swiostor, & his II dohtor.
 9.69.5. Ða bead Darius healf his rice Alexandre wiþ þæm
wifmonnum, ah him nolde Alexander þæs getygþian.
 9.69.7. Darius þa giet þriddan siþe gegaderade fird of Persum
& eac of oþrum londum þone fultum þe he him to aspanan mehte, &
wið Alexandres for.
 9.69.9. Þa hwile þe Darius fird gegaderode, þa hwile sende
Alexander Parmenionem his ladteow þæt he Darius sciphere gefliemde.
 9.69.11. & he self for in Sirium, & hie him ongean comon,
& his mid eaþmodnessun anfengon, & he ðeah naþelæs heora land
oferhergeade, & þæt folc sum þær sittan let, sum þonan
adræfde, sume on elðiode him wið feo gesealde.
 9.69.14. & Tirus þa ealdan burg & þa welegan he
besætt, & siþþan tobræc, & mid ealle towearp, for þon hi
him lustlice anfon noldan.
 9.69.16. & siþþan for on Cilicium, & þæt folc to
him geniedde; & siþþan on Roðum þæt iglond, & þæt folc
to him geniedde; & æfter þæm he for on Egypti, & hi to him
geniedde; & þær het þa burg atimbran þe mon siþþan be him het
Alexandria.
 9.69.20. & siþþan he for to þæm hearge þe Egypti
sædon þæt he wære Amones heora godes, se wæs Iobeses sunu heora
oþres godes, to þon þæt he wolde beladian his modor Nectanebuses
þæs drys, þe mon sæde þæt heo hie wið forlege, & þæt
he Alexandres fæder wære.
 9.69.24. Þa bebead Alexander þæm hæðnan biscepe
þæt he becrupe on þæs Amones anlicnesse þe inne on þæm hearge
wæs, ær þæm þe he & þæt folc hie ðær gegaderede,
& sæde hu he him an his gewill beforan þam folce ondwyrdan sceolde
þæs he hiene ascade.
 9.69.28. Genoh sweotollice us gedyde nu to witanne Alexander hwelce
þa hæðnan godas sindon to weorþianne, þæt hit swiþor is of
þara biscepa gehlote & of heora agenre gewyrde þæt þæt hie
secgað þonne of þara goda mihte.
 9.69.32. Of þære stowe for Alexander þriddan siþe ongean
Darius, & hie æt Tharse þære byrig hie gemetton.
 9.69.33. On þæm gefeohte wæron Perse swa swiþe forslagen
þæt hie heora miclan anwaldas & longsuman hie selfe siþþan wið
Alexander to nohte ne bemætan.
 9.70.2. Þa Darius geseah þæt he oferwunnen beon wolde, þa
wolde he hiene selfne on ðæm gefeohte forspillan, ac hine his þegnas
ofer his willan from atugon, þæt he siþþan wæs fleonde mid
þære firde.
 9.70.4. & Alexander wæs XXXIII daga on þære stowe,
ær he þa wicstowa & þæt wæl bereafian mehte.
 9.70.6. & siþþan for on Perse & geeode Persipulis þa
burg heora cynestol, seo is giet welegast ealra burga.
 9.70.7. Þa sede man Alexandre þæt Darius hæfde gebunden
his agene mægas mid gyldenre racentan.
 9.70.9. Þa for he wið his mid siex hund monna, & funde
hiene ænne be wege licgan, mid sperum tosticad, healfcucne.
 9.70.11. He þa Alexander him anum deadum lytle mildheortnesse
gedyde, þæt he hiene hett bebyrgean an his ieldrena byrg, þe he
siþþan nanum ende his cynne gedon nolde, ne his wife, ne his meder, ne his
bearnum, ne þætte ealra læst wæs, his gingran dohtor, he nolde buton
hæftniede habban, seo wæs lytel cild.
 9.70.16. Uneaðe mæg mon to geleafsuman gesecgan swa
monigfeald yfel swa on ðæm þrim gearum gewurdon, on þrim
folcgefeohtum, betux twæm cyningum.
 9.70.18. Þæt wæron fieftiene hund þusend monna þæt
binnan þæm forwurdon.
 9.70.19. & of þæm ilcan folcum forwurdon lytle ær, swa
hit her beforan sægð, nigantiene hund M monna, buton miclan hergiungum,
þe binnan þæm þrim gearum gewurdon an monigre þeode.
 9.70.22. Þæt is þæt Asirie eall seo þeod awest wearð
from Alexandre, & monega byrig on Asiam, & Tirus seo mære burg eall
toworpenu, & Cilicia þæt lond eall awest, & Capadotia ðæt
lond & ealle Egypti on þeowote gebroht, & Roþum þæt iglond mid
ealle awest, & monog oþra land ymbe Tauros þa muntas.
 9.70.27. Nales þæt an þæt heora twegea gewinn þa
wære on ðæm eastende þisses middangeardes; ac onemn þæm Agidis,
Spartana cyning, & Antipater, oþer Creca cyning, wunnon him betweonum.
 9.70.29. & Alexander, Epira cyning, þæs miclan Alexanderes
eam/ se wilnade þæs westdæles swa se oðer dyde þæs eastdæles,
& fird gelædde in Italiam, & þær hrædlice ofslagen wearð.
 9.70.32. & on þære ilcan tide Zoffirion, Ponto cyning, in
Sciþþie mid firde gefor, & he & his folc mid ealle þær
forwearð.
 9.71.3. Alexander æfter Darius deaþe gewonn ealle Mandos,
& ealle Ircaniam.
 9.71.4. & on ðære hwile þe he þær winnende wæs,
frefelice hiene gesohte Minotheo, seo Sciþþisce cwen, mid þrim hunde
wifmonna, to þon þæt heo woldon wið Alexander & wið his
mærestan cempan bearna strienan.
 9.71.7. Æfter þæm wonn Alexander wið Parthim þæm
folce, & he hie neah ealle forslog & fordyde, ær he hie gewinnan
mehte.
 9.71.9. & æfter þæm he gewonn Drancas þæt folc,
& Euergetas, & Paramomenas, & Assapias, & monega oþra
þeoda þe gesetene sint ymbe þa muntas Caucasus, & þær het ane
burg atimbran, þe mon siþþan het Alexandria.
 9.71.13. Næs his scinlac ne his hergiung on þa fremdan ane, ac
he gelice slog & hiende þa þe him on siml wæron mid farende &
winnende.
 9.71.15. Æst he ofslog Amintas his modrian sunu, &
siþþan his broðor, & þa Parmenion his þegn, & þa Filiotes,
& þa Catulusan , þa Eurilohus, þa Pausanias, & monege oþre
þe of Mæcedonian ricoste wæron.
 9.71.17. & Clitus, se wæs ægþer ge his þegn ge ær
Philippuses his fæder, þa hie sume siþe druncne æt heora symble
sætan, þa angunnon hi treahtigean hwæðer ma mærlecra dæda
gefremed hæfde, þe Philippus þe Alexander.
 9.71.21. Þa sægde se Clitus for ealdre hyldo þæt
Philippus mare hæfde gedon þonne he.
 9.71.22. He þa Alexander ahleop, & hiene for þære
sægene ofslog.
 9.71.23. He Alexander toecan þæm þe he hienende wæs
ægþer ge his agen folc ge oðerra cyninga, he wæs sinþyrstende
monnes blodes.
 9.71.26. Raþe æfter þæm he for mid firde on Chorasmas,
& on Dacos & him to gafolgieldum hie geniedde.
 9.71.27. Chalisten þone Philosofum he ofslog, his emnscolere,
ðe hi ætgædere gelærede wæron æt Aristotolese heora magistre,
& monege men mid him, for þon hie noldon to him gebiddan swa to heora
Gode.
 9.72.1. Æfter þæm he for on Indie, to þon þæt he his
rice gebrædde oþ þone eastgarsecg.
 9.72.2. On þæm siþe he geeode Nisan, India heafodburg, &
ealle þa beorgas þe mon Dædolas hætt; & eall þæt rice
Cleoffiles þære cwene, & hie to geligre geniedde, & for þæm
he hiere rice eft ageaf.
 9.72.5. Æfter þæm þe Alexander hæfde ealle Indie him
to gewildon gedon, buton anre byrg, seo wæs ungemettan fæste mid cludum
ymbweaxen, þa geascade he þæt Ercol se ent þær wæs to gefaren on
ærdagum, to ðon þæt he hie abrecan þohte; ac he hit for þæm ne
angan þe þær wæs eorþbeofung on þære tide.
 9.72.10. He þa Alexander hit swiþost for þæm angann þe
he wolde þæt his mærþa wæren maran þonne Ercoles, þeh ðe he
hie mid micle forlore þæs folces begeate.
 9.72.13. Æfter þæm Alexander hæfde gefeoht wið Porose
þæm strengstan Indea cyninge.
 9.72.14. On ðæm gefeohte wæron þa mæstan blodgytas on
ægþere healfe þara folca.
 9.72.15. On ðæm gefeohte Poros & Alexander gefuhton anwig
of horsum.
 9.72.16. Þa ofslog Poros Alexandres hors, þe Bucefal wæs
haten, & hiene selfne mehte, þær him his þegnas to fultume ne
comen.
 9.72.18. & he hæfde Poros monegum wundum gewundodne, &
hiene eac gewildne gedyde, siþþan his þegnas him to comon.
 9.72.20. & him eft his rice to forlet for his þegnscipe, þy
he swa swiðe wæs feohtende ongean hiene.
 9.72.21. & he Alexander him het siþþan twa byrg atimbran:
oþer wæs hatenu be his horse Bucefal, oþer Nicea.
 9.72.24. Siþþan he for on Ræstas þa leode, & on
Cathenas & on Presidas, & an Gangeridas, & wið hie ealle gefeaht
& oferwon.
 9.72.25. Þa he com on India eastgemæra, þa com him þær
ongean twa hund þusenda monna gehorsades folces, & hie Alexander uneaðe
oferwonn ægþer ge for þære sumorhæte ge eac for þæm
oftrædlican gefeohtum.
 9.72.29. Siþþan æfter þæm he wolde habban maran
wicstowa þonne his gewuna ær wære, for þon he him siþþan æfter
þæm gefeohte swiðor on sæt þonne he ær dyde.
 9.72.32. Æfter þæm he for ut on garsecg of þæm
muþan, þe seo ea wæs hatenu Eginense, on an iglond, þær Siuos
þæt folc & Iersomas on eardedon, & hi Ercol þær ær
gebrohte & gesette; he him þa to gewildum gedyde.
 9.73.2. Æfter þæm he for to þæm iglande, þe monn
þæt folc Mandras hætt, & Subagros; & hi him brohton ongean
eahta C M feþena & LX M gehorsades folces.
 9.73.4. & hie lange wæron þæt dreogende ær heora
aðer mehte on oðrum sige geræcan, ær Alexander late unweorðlicne
sige geræhte.
 9.73.7. Æfter þæm he gefor to anum fæstenne.
 9.73.7. Þa he þær to com, þa ne mehton hie nanne monn on
ðæm fæstenne utan geseon.
 9.73.8. Þa wundrade Alexander hwy hit swa æmenne wære;
& hrædlice þone weall self oferclom, & he ðær wearð from
þæm burgwarum in abroden.
 9.73.11. & hie his siþþan wæran swa swiðe ehtende swa
hit is ungeliefedlic to secganne, ge mid scotum, ge mid stana torfungum, ge mid
eallum heora wigcræftum, þæt swaþeah ealle þa burgware ne mehton
hiene ænne genieddan þæt he him an hand gan wolde.
 9.73.14. Ac þa him þæt folc swiðost an þrang, þa
gestop he to anes wealles byge, & hiene ðær awerede.
 9.73.16. & swa eall þæt folc wearð mid him anum
agæled þæt hie þæs wealles nane gieman ne dydon, oð Alexandres
þegnas toemnes him þone weall abræcon, & þær in coman.
 9.73.18. Ðær wearð Alexander þurhscoten mid anre flan
underneoðan oþer breost.
 9.73.20. Nyte we nu hwæðer sie swiþor to wundrianne, þe
þæt, hu he ana wið ealle þa burgware hiene awerede, þe eft þa him
fultum com, hu he þurh þæt folc geþrang þæt he ðone ilcan
ofslog þe hiene ær þurhsceat; þe eft þara þegna angin þa hie
untweogendlice/ wendon þæt heora hlaford wære on heora feonda gewealde,
oððe cuca oððe dead, þæt hie swaþeah noldon þæs
weallgebreces geswican, þæt hie heora hlaford ne gewræcen, þeh þe
hie hiene meðigne on cneowum sittende metten.
 9.73.28. Siþþan he þa burg hæfde him to gewildum gedon,
þa for he to oðre byrg, þær Ambira se cyning on wunode.
 9.73.29. Þær forwearþ micel Alexandres heres for
geætredum gescotum.
 9.73.30. Ac Alexandre wearð on ðære ilcan niht an swefne an
wyrt oðewed.
 9.73.31. Þa nam he þa on mergen, & sealde hie ðæm
gewundedum drincan; & hie wurdon mid þæm gehæled; & siþþan
þa burg gewann.
 9.73.34. Ond he siþþan hwearf hamweard to Babylonia.
 9.73.34. Þær wæron ærendracan on anbide of eallre
worolde: þæt wæs from Spaneum, & of Affrica, & of Gallium,
& of ealre Italia.
 9.74.2. Swa egefull wæs Alexander þa þa he wæs on Indeum,
on easteweardum þissum middangearde, þætte þa from him ondredan þe
wæron on westeweardum.
 9.74.5. Eac him coman ærendracan ge of monegum þeodum, þe
nan mon Alexandres geferscipes ne wende þæt man his naman wiste, & him
friþes to him wilnedon.
 9.74.7. Þagiet þa Alexander ham com to Babylonia, þagiet
wæs on him se mæsta þurst monnes blodes.
 9.74.8. Ac þa þa his geferan ongeatan þæt he ðæs
gewinnes þagiet geswican nolde, ac he sæde þæt he on African faran
wolde, þa geleornedon his byrelas him betweonum hu hie him mehten þæt
lif oþþringan; & him gesealdon ator drincan: þa forlet he his lif.
 9.74.13. Eala, cwæð Orosius, on hu micelre dysignesse men nu
sindon on þeosan cristendome.
 9.74.14. Swa þeh þe him lytles hwæt unieðe sie, hu
earfeðlice hi hit gemænað.
 9.74.15. Oðer þara is, oððe hie hit nyton, oððe hi hit
witan nyllað, an hwelcum brocum þa lifdon þe ær him wæron.
 9.74.17. Hu wenað hie hu ðam wære þe on Alexandres onwalde
wæron, þa him ða swa swiðe hiene ondredan þe on westeweardum
þisses middangeardes wæron þæt hie on swa micle neþinge, & on
swa micel ungewiss, ægðer ge on sæs fyrhto, ge on westennum wildeora
& wyrmcynna missenlicra, ge on þeoda gereordum, þæt hie hiene
æfter friþe sohton on easteweardum þeosan middangearde.
 9.74.22. Ac we witon georne þæt hie nu ma for iergðe naþer
ne durran, ne swa feor frið gesecan, ne furþon hie selfe æt ham et heora
cotum hie werian, þonne hie monn æt ham secð.
 9.74.25. Ac þæt hie magon þæt hie þas tida leahtrien.
 10.74.27. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintra & L, under þæm twæm consulum þe oðer wæs haten
Fauius, & oðre naman Maximus, & under þæm þe Cwintus haten
wæs, & oðre noman Decius, on heora feorþan consulatu on Italium
feower/ þa strengstan ðeoda hi him betweonum gespræcon, þæt
wæron Umbri, & Ðrysci, & Somnite, & Galli, þæt hie wolden
on Romane winnan.
 10.75.3. & hi him þæt swiþe ondrædan hu hi wið him
eallum emdemes mehten, & georne siredon hu hi hie totwæman mehten, &
gewealdenne here on ðrysci & on Umbre sendon an hergiunge, & þæt
folc to amierrenne.
 10.75.6. Þa hie þæt geascedon, þa wendon hie him hamweard
to ðon þæt hie heora land bewereden.
 10.75.7. & Romane ða hwile mid heora maran fultume þe hie
æt ham hæfdon foron ongean Somnite, & ongean Gallie.
 10.75.9. Ðær on ðæm gefeohte wæs Cuintus se consul
ofslagen, & Fauius se oðer consul æfter þæs oðres fielle sige
hæfde.
 10.75.11. Þær wearð Somnita & Gallia feowertig M
ofslagen, & seofon M Romana on þæm dæle þe Decius on ofslagen
wæs.
 10.75.13. Þonne sæde Libius ðæt Somnita & Gallia
wære oðer healf hund M ofslægen þara feðena, & seofon M
gehorsedra.
 10.75.15. Eac ic hierde to soþum secgan, cwæð Orosius,
þæt hit na nære on ðæm dagum mid Romanum buton gewinne, oþþe
wið oþra folc, oþþe on him selfum mid monigfealdum wolum &
moncwealmum, swa swa hit ða wæs þa Favius se consul of þæm
gefeohte hamweard for.
 10.75.19. Þa dyde man ðone triumphan him beforan, þe heora
gewuna wæs þonne hie sige hæfdon.
 10.75.20. Ac se gefea wearð swiþe raðe on heora mode to
gedrefednesse gecierred, þa hie gesawan þa deadan men swa þiclice to
eorþan beran þe þær ær æt ham wæron; for þy þær wæs
se micla moncwealm on þære tide.
 10.75.23. & þæs ymb an gear Somnite gefuhton wið
Romanum, & hie gefliemdon, & hie bedrifon into Romebyrg.
 10.75.25. & hrædlice æfter þæm Somnite awendan on
oþre wisan ægþer ge heora sceorp, ge eall heora wæpn ofersylefredan,
to tacne þæt hie oþer woldon, oððe ealle libban oþþe ealle
licgean.
 10.75.28. On þæm dagum gecuron Romane him to consule Papirius,
& raðe þæs fird gelæddon ongean Somnitum, þeh þe heora
biscopas from hiora godum sæden þæt hie ðæt gefeoht forbuden.
 10.75.31. Ac he Papirius þa biscepas for þære sægene
swiþe bismrade, & þæt færelt swa þeh gefor, & swa
weorþlicne sige hæfde swa he ær unweorðlice þara goda biscepum
oferhirde.
 10.75.33. Þær wearð Somnita twelf M ofslagen & IIII M
gefangen.
 10.76.1. & raðe æfter þæm mærlican sige hie wurdon
eft geunret mid moncwealme, & se wæs swa ungemetlic & swa longsum,
ðæt hie ða æt nihstan witende mid deofolcræftum sohton hu hi hit
gestillan mehte, & gefetton Escolafius þone scinlacan mid þære
ungemetlican nædran þe mon Epithaurus het; & onlicost dydon swelce him
næfre ær þæm gelic yfel an ne become, ne æfter þæm eft ne
become.
 10.76.8. Þy æfterran geare þæs Fauius hieora consul, þe
oðre noman wæs haten Gurius, gefeaht wið Somnitum, & heanlice
hamweard oðfleah.
 10.76.10. Þa woldan senatus hiene aweorpan, for þon he ðæt
folc on fleame gebrohte.
 10.76.11. Þa bæd his fæder, wæs eac Fauius haten,
þæt þa senatum forgeafen þæm suna þone gylt, & þæt hie
gebiden þæt he moste mid þæm suna æt oðrum cirre wið Somnitum
mid heora ealra fultume; & hie him þæs getygþedon.
 10.76.14. Þa bebead se fæder þæm consule þæt he mid
his fierde angean fore, & he beæftan gebad mid sumum þæm fultume.
 10.76.16. Þa he geseah þæt Pontius, Somnita cyning, hæfde
þone consul his sunu besired, & mid his folce utan befangen, he him þa
to fultume com, & hiene swiðe geanmette; & Pontius Somnita cyning
gefengon.
 10.76.19. Þær wearð Somnita XX M ofslagen, & IIII M
gefangen mið þæm cyninge.
 10.76.20. Þær wearð Romana gewinn & Somnita geendad, for
þon þe hie heora cyning gefengon, þætte hie ær dreogende wæron
LVIIII wintra.
 10.76.23. Þæs on oþrum geare Curius se consul mid Romanum
gefeaht wið Sabinan, & heora ungemet ofslog, & sige hæfde; be
þæm mon mehte witan, þa he & þa consulas hie atellan ne mehton.
 11.76.26. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintrum & LXIII þa ða Dolabella & Domitius wæron consulas
on Rome, þa Lucani, & Bruti, & Somnite, & Gallie of Senno
angunnan wið Romanum winnan.
 11.76.29. Þa sendon Romane ærendracan to Gallium ymbe frið;
þa ofslogon hie ða ærendracan.
 11.76.30. Þa sendon hie eft Cecilium heora pretorium mid firde
þær Gallie & Bryti ætgædere wæron, & he þær wearð
ofslægen, & þæt folc mid him, þæt wæs eahtatyne M.
 11.77.3. Swa oft swa Galli wið Romanum wunnan, swa wurdon Romane
gecnysede.
 11.77.4. For þon ge Romane, cwæð Orosius, þonne ge ymb
þæt an gefeoht alneg ceoriað þe eow Gotan gedydon, hwy nyllað ge
geþencan þa monegan ærran þe eow Gallie oftrædlice bismerlice
þurhtugon?
 11.77.8. Ic sceal eac gemyndgian be sumum dæle þæs þe
Alexandres æfterfylgendas dydon on þæm tidum þe þis gewearð on
Romebyrg, hu hie hie selfe mid missellican gefeohtum fordydon.
 11.77.10. Hit is, cwæð he, þæm gelicost, þonne ic his
geþencean sceal, þe ic sitte on anre heare dune, & geseo þonne on
smeðum felda fela fyra byrnan.
 11.77.13. Swa ofer eall Mæcedonia rice, þæt is ofer ealle
þa maran Asiam, & ofer Europe þone mæstan dæl, & ealle
Libium, þæt hit na næs buton hete & gewinnum.
 11.77.15. Þa þe under Alexandre fyrmest wæron, þær
þær hie æfter him ricsedon, hie ðæt mid gewinnum awestan; &
þær þær hie næron, hie gedydon þone mæstan ege, swelce se
bitresta smic upp astige, & þonne wide tofare.
 11.77.19. Alexander XII gear þisne middangeard under him
þrysmde & egsade.
 11.77.20. & his æfterfolgeras feowertiene gear hit
siþþan totugon & totæron þæm gelicost þonne seo leo bringð
his hungregum hwelpum hwæt to etanne: hie ðonne gecyðað on ðæm
æte hwelc heora mæst mæg gehrifnian.
 11.77.23. Swa þonne dyde Ptholomeus, Alexandres þegna an, þa
he togædere gesweop ealle Egyptum & Arabia; & Laumenda his oþer
þegn, se befeng ealle Asirie; & Thelenus Cilicium; & Filotos
Hiliricam; & Iecrapatas þa maran Meðian; & Stromen þa læssan
Meðian; & Perdice þa læssan Asiam; & Susana þa maran Frigan;
& Antigonus Liciam & Pamphiliam; & Nearchus Cariam; &
Leonontus/ þa læssan Frigan; & Lisimachus Thraciam; & Eumen
Capadotiam & Paflagoniam.
 11.77.30. & Seleucus hæfde ealle þa æðelestan men
Alexandres heres, & on lengðe mid him he begeat ealle þa eastlond.
 11.77.32. & Cassander þa cempan mid Chaldeum.
 11.77.32. & on Pactrium & on Indeum wæron ða ealdormen
þe Alexander gesette.
 11.78.2. & ðæt lond betux þæm twam ean Induse &
Iðasfene hæfde Itaxiles; & Ithona hæfde Calonie þa þeode on
Indeum; & Parapamenas hæfde Uxiarches æt þæs beorges ende
Caucasus; & Arachasihedros hæfde Siburtus; & Stontos hæfde
Dranceas/ & Areas þa þeoda; & Omintos hæfde Atrianus; &
Sicheus hæfde Sostianos þæt folc; & Itacanor hæfde Parthos;
& Philippus Ircanus & Fratauernis hæfde Armenie; & Theleomommos
hæfde Meþas; & Feucestas hæfde Babylonias; & Polauses hæfde
Archos; & Archolaus Mesopotamiam.
 11.78.10. Eall heora gewinn awæcnedon ærest from Alexandres
epistole, for þon þe he þæron bebead þæt mon ealle þa
wræccan an cyþþe forlete þe on ðæm londum wæron þe he ær
self gehergad hæfde.
 11.78.13. Þa noldan Crecas þæm bebode hieran for þon hie
ondredon, þonne hie hie gegaderedon, þæt hie on him gewræcen þa
teonan ðe hie ær mid him geþoledon; ge eac wiðsocon þæt hie leng
Læcedemonium hieran nolde, þær heora heafodstol wæs.
 11.78.16. & raðe ðæs Atheniense gelæddon XXX M
folces, & twa hund scipa angean Antigone ðæm cyninge, þe eall Creca
rice habban sceolde, for þon þe he ðæs ærendes ærendra wæs
from Alexandre.
 11.78.19. & gesetton him to ladteowe Demostenon þone
filosofum; & asponon him to fultume Corinthum þa burgleode, &
Sihonas, & Margas; & besæton Antipatrum þone cyning on anum
fæstenne, for þon þe he wæs Antigone on fultume.
 11.78.23. Þær wearð Leostenas, oðer heora ladteowa, mid
anre flan ofscoten.
 11.78.24. Þa hie from ðære byrg hamweard wæron, þa
metton hie Leonantius, þe sceolde Antipatrume to fultume cuman, &
þær ofslagen wearð.
 11.78.27. Æfter þæm Perðica, þe þa læssan Asiam
hæfde, angan winnan wið Ariarata, Capadoca cyninge, & hiene bedraf
into anum fæstenne, & þa burgware self hit onbærndon an feower
healfa, þæt eall forwearð þæt þærbinnan wæs.
 11.78.30. Æfter þæm Antigones & Perðica gebeotedan
þæt hie woldon him betweonum gefeohtan, & longe ymb þæt siredon
hwær hie hie gemetan wolden, & monig igland awestan on ðæm geflite
hwæðer hiera mehte maran fultum him to geteon.
 11.79.1. On þæm anbide Perdica for mid firde an Egyptum,
þær Tholomeus wæs se cyning, for þon ðe him wæs gesæd
þæt he wolde Antigone fylstan þæm cyninge.
 11.79.3. Þa gegaderade Pholomeus micle fird ongean him.
 11.79.4. Þa hwile þe hie togædereweard fundedon, gefuhton
twegen cyningas Neoptolomus & Umenis.
 11.79.5. & he Umenis gefliemde Neoptolomus, þæt he com to
Antigone þæm cyninge, & hiene spon þæt he on Umenis unmyndlenga
mid here become.
 11.79.7. Þa sende Antigones hiene selfne & his oþerne
þegn/ Polipercon mid micle fultume þæt hie hiene beswiceden.
 11.79.9. Þa geascade þæt Umenis, & forsætade hie
ðær ðær hie geþoht hæfdon þæt hie hiene besætedon; &
hie begen ofslog, & þa oþre gefliemde.
 11.79.11. Æfter ðæm gefeaht Perdica & Ptholomeus &
þær wearþ Perdica ofslagen.
 11.79.12. Æfter ðæm wearð Mæcedonium cuð þæt
Eumen & Pison & Ilirgus & Alceta, Perdican broðor, wolden winnan
on hie, & fundon þæt Antigones him sceolde mid firde ongean cuman.
 11.79.15. On ðæm gefeohte gefliemde Antigones Umenis, &
hiene bedraf into anum fæstenne, & hiene ðær hwile besæt.
 11.79.17. Þa sende Umenis to Antipatre þæm cyninge, &
hiene fultumes bæd.
 11.79.18. Þa Antigones þæt angeat, þa forlet he þæt
setl.
 11.79.18. Ac he Umenis him wende from Antigones hamfærelte
micelra untreowða, & him to fultume aspon þa þe ær wæron
Alexandres cempan, þa wæron hatene Argiraspides, for þon ðe eall heora
wæpn wæron ofersylefreda.
 11.79.22. Þa on ðæm tweon þe hie swa ungeorne his willan
fulleodon, þa becom him Antigones mid firde on, & hie benæmde
ægþer ge heora wifa, ge heora bearna, ge heora eardes, ge ealles þæs
licgendan/ feos þe hie under Alexandre begeatan; & hie selfe uneaðe
oðflugon to Umene.
 11.79.26. Æfter þæm þa sendon to Antigone ymb heora
þæt mæste bismer, & hiene bædon þæt he him ageafe þæt
he ær on him gereafade.
 11.79.28. Þa onbead he him ðæt he him ðæs getygðian
wolde, gif hie him Umenes þone cyning, þe heora hlaford þa wæs,
gebundenne to him brohten; & hie þæt gefremedon swa.
 11.79.31. Ac he heora eft ægþer ge mid bismere onfeng, ge hie
eac on þone bismerlecestan eard gesette, þæt wæs on ðæm
ytemestan ende his monna, & him swaðeah nanuht agiefan nolde þæs
þe hie bena wæron.
 11.80.3. Æfter þæm Euredica, Ariþeusses cwen,
Mæcedonia cyninges, heo wæs þæm folce monig yfel donde þurh
Cassander hiere hlafordes þegn, mid þæm heo hæfde dierne geligre.
 11.80.5. & under ðæm heo gelærde þone cyning þæt
he hiene swa upp ahof þætte he wæs bufan eallum ðæm þe on
þæm rice wæron to ðæm cyninge.
 11.80.7. & heo gedyde mid hiere lare þæt ealle
Mæcedonie wæron þæm cyninge wiðerwearde, oþ hie fundon þæt
hie sendon æfter Olimpeadum, Alexandres meder, þætte hio him gefylste
þæt hie mehton ægðer ge þone cyning ge þa cuene him to gewildum
gedon.
 11.80.11. Hio þa Olimpiade him to com mid Epira fultume hiere
agnes rices, & hiere to fultume abæd Eacedam Molosorum cyning, & hie
butu ofslog, ge þone cyning ge þa cwene; & Cassander oðfleah.
 11.80.14. & Olimpiade feng to þæm rice, & þæm
folce fela laðes gedyde þa hwile þe hio þone anweald hæfde.
 11.80.16. Þa Cassander þæt geascade þæt hio ðæm
folce laðade, þa gegaderade he fird.
 11.80.17. Þa hio þæt geascade þæt þæs folces
wæs swa fela to him gecirred, þa ne getriewde hio þæt hiere wolde se
oðer dæl gelastfull beon.
 11.80.19. Ac hio genom hiere snore Roxan, Alexandres lafe, &
Alexandres sunu Ercoles, & fleah to ðæm fæstenne þe Fiðnam
wæs haten.
 11.80.21. & Cassander hiere æfter for, & þæt
fæsten abræc, & Olimpiadum ofslog.
 11.80.22. & þa burgleode oþbrudon þa snore mid hiere
suna, þa hie ongeatan þæt þæt festen sceolde abrocen bion, & hi
sendon on oðer fæstre fæsten.
 11.80.24. & Cassander hie het þær besittan; & him
ealles þæs anwaldes weold Mæcedonia rices.
 11.80.27. Þa wende man þæt þæt gewin geendad wære
betux Alexandres folgerum, þa þa wæron gefeallen þe þær mæst
gewunnan: þæt wæs Perþica, & Eumen, & Alciþen, &
Polipercon, & Olimpiadas, & Antipater, & monige oðre.
 11.80.30. Ac Antigones, se mid ungemete girnde anwalda ofer oþre,
& to þæm fæstenne for þær Alexandres laf wæs & his
sunu, & hie þær begeat, to ðon þæt he wolde þæt þa folc
him þy swiþor to buge þe he hæfde hiera ealdhlafordes sunu on his
gewealde.
 11.81.1. Siþþan Cassander þæt geascade, þa geþoftade
he wið Ptholomeus, & wið Lisimachus, & wið Seleucus þone
eastcyning, & hie ealle winnende wæron wið Antigones, & wið
Demetrias his sunu, sume on londe, sume on wætere.
 11.81.4. On þæm gefeohte gefeol se mæsta dæl Macedonia
duguðe on ægþere healfe, þeh hie sume mid Antigone wære, sume mid
Cassandre.
 11.81.6. Þær wearð Antigones gefliemed & his sunu.
 11.81.7. Æfter þæm Demetrias, Antigones sunu, gefeaht on
scipum wið Ptholomeus, & hiene bedraf on his agen lond.
 11.81.9. Æfter þæm Antigones bebead þæt mon ægðer
hete cyning, ge hiene ge his sunu, for þon þe Alexandres æfterfolgeras
næron ær þæm swa gehatene, buton ladteowas.
 11.81.11. Gemong þæm gewinnum Antigones him ondred Ercoles,
Alexandres sunu, þæt þæt folc hiene wolde to hlaforde geceosan, for
þon þe he ryhtcynecynnes wæs.
 11.81.14. Het þa ægþer ofslean ge hiene ge his modor.
 11.81.14. Þa þæt þa oþre geascedon þæt he hie ealle
beswican þohte, hie þa eft hie gegaderedon, & wið hiene wunnon.
 11.81.16. Þa ne dorste Cassander self on ðæm færelte
cuman, for his ðæm nihstan feondum þe him ymb wæron.
 11.81.18. Ac sende his fultum to Lisimache his geþoftan; &
hæfde his wisan swiþost beþoht to Seleucuse, for þon þe he monege
anwealdas mid gewinnum geeode on þæm eastlondum: þæt wæs ærest
Babylonie & Pactriane.
 11.81.21. Æfter he gefor on Indie, þær nan mon ær ne
siþþan mid firde gefaran ne dorste, buton Alexandre.
 11.81.23. & he Seleucus geniedde ealle þa ladteowas to his
hiersumnesse, & hie alle Antigones & Demetrias his sunu mid firde
gesohton.
 11.81.24. On þæm gefeohte wæs Antigones ofslagen & his
sunu of þæm rice adræfed.
 11.81.26. Ne wene ic, cwæð Orosius, þæt ænig wære
þe þæt atellan mehte þæt on ðæm gefeohte gefeoll.
 11.81.28. On þære tide gefor Cassander & his sunu feng to
þæm rice Philippus.
 11.81.29. Þa wende man eft oþere siþe þæt þæt
gewinn Alexandres folgera geendad wære.
 11.81.30. Ac hie sona þæs him betweonum wunnon; & Seleucus
& Demetrias, Antigones sunu, him togædere geþoftedan, & wið
þæm þrim wunnon, Philippuse, Cassandres suna, & wið Ptholomeuse,
& wið Lisimachuse.
 11.81.33. & hie þæt gewinn þa þæs licost angunnan
þe hi hit ær ne angunnen.
 11.82.1. On þæm gewinne ofslog Antipater his modor, Cassandres
lafe, þeh þe heo earmlice hiere feores to him wilnade.
 11.82.3. Þa bæd Alexander, hiere sunu, Demetrias þæt he
him gefylste þæt he his modor slege on his breðer gewrecan mehte, &
hi hiene raðe þæs ofslogan.
 11.82.6. Æfter þæm gewunnon Demetrias & Lisimachus; ac
Lisimachus ne mehte Demetriase wiðstondan, for þon þe Dorus Thracea
cyning him eac an wann.
 11.82.8. Þa wæs Demetrias on þære hwile swiþe geanmet,
& fird gelædde to Ptholomeuse.
 11.82.9. Þa he þæt geascade þa begeat he Seleucus him to
fultume, & Pirrus Epira cyning.
 11.82.10. & Pirrus him for þam swiþost fylste, þe he him
selfum facade Mæcedonia anweald; & hie þa Demetrias of þæm rice
adrifon, & Pirrus to feng.
 11.82.13. Æfter þæm Lisimachus ofslog his agenne sunu
Agothoclen & Antipater his aþum.
 11.82.14. On þæm dagum Lisimachus sio burg besanc on eorþan
mid folce mid ealle.
 11.82.15. Ond æfter þæm þe Lisimachus hæfde swa wið
his sunu gedon & wið his aþum, þa anscunedon hiene his agene leode,
& monige from him cirdon, & Seleucus sponan þæt he Lisimachus
beswice.
 11.82.18. Þagiet ne mehte se nið betux him twæm gelicgean,
þeh heora na ma ne lifde þara þe Alexandres folgeras wæron, ac swa
ealde swa hie þa wæron hie gefuhton: Seleucus hæfde seofon &
seofontig wintra, & Lisimachus hæfde þreo & seofontig wintra.
 11.82.22. Þær wearð Lisimachus ofslagen.
 11.82.22. & þæs ymb þreo niht com Ptolomeus, þe
Lisimahhus his sweostor hæfde, & diegellice æfter Seleucuse for, þa
he hamweard wæs, oþ his fird tofaren wæs, & hiene þær ofslog.
 11.82.25. Þa wæs seo sibb & seo mildheortnes geendad þe
hie æt Alexandre geleornedon.
 11.82.26. Þæt wæs þæt hie twegen þe þær lengest
lifdon hæfdon þritig cyninga ofslagen heora agenra ealdgeferena, & him
hæfdon siþþan ealle þa anwealdas þe hie ealle ær hæfdon.
 11.82.29. Gemong þæm gewinnum Lisimachus forlet his XV suna:
sume he self ofslog, sume an gefeohtum beforan him selfum mon afslog.
 11.82.32. Ðyllicne gebroðorscipe, cwæð Orosius, hie
heoldon him betweonum, þe an anum hierede wæron afedde & getyde.
 11.82.33. Þætte hit is us nu swiþor bismre gelic þæt we
þæt/ besprecað, & þæt, þæt we gewinn nu hatað, þonne
us fremde & ellþeodge an becumaþ, & lytles hwæt on us
bereafiað, & us eft hrædlice forlætað; & nyllað geþencan
hwelc hit þa wæs, þa nan mon ne mehte æt oþrum his feorh gebycggan,
ne furþon þætte þa wolden gefriend beon þe wæron gebroðor of
fæder & of meder.
 11.83.6. & her endað sio þridde boc, & onginð seo
feorþe.
