B9.2.5.
Orosius, Book 4: Bately 1980, 83-113.



 1.83.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs feower
hunde wintrum & feower & siextegum, þætte Tarentine þæt folc
plegedon binnan Tarentan heora byrg et heora þeatra þe þærbinnan
geworht wæs.
 1.83.11. Þa gesawon hie Romane scipa on ðæm sæ irnan.
 1.83.11. Þa hrædlice comon Tarentine to heora agnum scipum,
& þa oþre hindan offoran, & hie ealle him to gewildum gedydan
buton/ V.
 1.83.13. & þa þe þær gefongne wæron hie tawedan mid
þære mæstan unieðnesse: sume ofslogon, sume ofswungon, sume him wið
feo gesealdon.
 1.83.16. Ða Romane þæt geacsedan, þa sendon hie
ærendracan to him, & bædon þæt him man gebette þæt him
ðær to abylgðe gedon wæs.
 1.83.18. Ða tawedan hie eft þa ærendracan mid þæm
mæstan bismere, swa hie þa oþre ær dydon, & hie siþþan ham
forleton.
 1.83.20. Æfter þæm foran Romane on Tarentine.
 1.83.20. & swa clæne hie namon heora fultum mid him,
þætte heora proletarii ne moston him beæftan beon, þæt wæron
þa þe hie gesett hæfdon þæt sceoldon be heora wifum bearna
strienan, þonne hie on gewin foron, & cwædon þæt him wislecre
þuhte þæt hie ða ne forluren þe þær ut fore, hæfde bearn se
þe mehte.
 1.83.25. Hie þa Romane comon on Tarentine, & þær eall
aweston þæt hie metton, & monega byrg abræcon.
 1.83.27. Þa sendon Tarentine ægwern æfter fultume, þær
hie him æniges wendon.
 1.83.28. & Pirrus, Epira cyning, him com to mid þæm
mæstan fultume, ægþer ge an gangehere, ge on rædehere, ge an
sciphere.
 1.83.30. He wæs on ðæm dagum gemærsad ofer ealle oþere
cyningas, ægþer ge mid his miclan fultume, ge mid his rædþeahtunge,
ge mid his wigcræfte.
 1.84.1. For þon fylste Pirrus Tarentinum for þon þe Tarente
seo burg wæs getimbred of Læcedemonium, þe his rice þa wæs.
 1.84.3. & he hæfde Thesalium him to fultume &
Mæcedonie/.
 1.84.3. & he hæfde XX elpenda to þæm gefeohte mid him,
þe Romane ær nane ne gesawon: he wæs se forma mon þe hie ærest on
Italium brohte.
 1.84.6. He wæs eac on þæm dagum gleawast to wige & to
gewinne, buton þæm anum þe hiene his godas & his deofolgeld
beswicon þe he begongende wæs.
 1.84.8. Þa he hie ascade his godas hwæþer heora sceolde on
oþrum sige habban, þe he on Romanum, þe Romane on him, þa ondwyrdon hie
him tweolice, & cwædon: þu hæfst oþþe næfst.
 1.84.12. Þæt forme gefeoht þæt he wið Romanum hæfde
hit wæs in Compania, neah þære ie þe mon Lisum hætt.
 1.84.13. Þa æfter þæm þe þær on ægþere healfe
micel wæl geslagen wæs, þa het Pirrus don þa elpendas on þæt
gefeoht.
 1.84.15. Siþþan Romane þæt gesawan þæt him mon
swelcne wrenc to dyde swelcne hie ær ne gesawon ne secgan ne hirdon, þa
flugon hie ealle buton anum men, se wæs Minutius haten.
 1.84.18. He genedde under ænne elpent þæt he hiene on
þone nafelan ofstang.
 1.84.19. Þa, siþþan he irre wæs & gewundod, he ofslog
micel þæs folces, þæt ægþer ge þa forwurdon þe him onufan
wæron, ge eac þa oþre elpendas sticade.
 1.84.21. & gremede, þæt þa eac mæst ealle forwurdon
þe þæronufan wæron.
 1.84.22. & þeh þe Romane gefliemed wæren, hie wæron
þeh gebielde mid þæm þæt hie wiston hu hie to ðæm elpendon
sceoldon.
 1.84.24. On ðæm gefeohte wæs Romana IIII X M ofslagen
feþena & eahtatig & VIII hund gefangen, & þara gehorsedra
wæron ofslagen III hund & an M, & þær wæron seofon hund
guðfonena genumen.
 1.84.27. Hit næs na gesæd hwæt Pirruses folces gefeallen
wære, for þon hit næs þeaw on þæm tidum þæt mon ænig
wæl on þa healfe rimde þe þonne wieldre wæs, buton þær þy
læs ofslagen wære, swa mid Alexandre wæs on ðæm forman gefeohte
þe he wið Darius feaht: þær næs his folces na ma ofslagen þonne
nigon.
 1.84.32. Ac Pirrus gebicnede eft hu him se sige gelicade þe he
ofer Romane hæfde, þa he cwæð æt his godes dure, & hit swa on
awrat: þonc hafa þa, Iofes, þæt ic þu moste oferwinnan þe ær
wæron unoferwunnen, & ic eac from him oferwunnen eam.
 1.85.2. Þa ascedan hiene his þegnas hwy he swa heanlice word be
him selfum gecwæde, þæt he oferwunnen wære.
 1.85.4. Þa ondwyrde he him, & cwæð: gif ic eft gefare
swelcne sige æt Romanum, þonne mæg ic siþþan buton ælcon þegne
Creca lond secan.
 1.85.6. Þæt wearð eac Romanum an yfelum tacne oþiewed
ær þæm gefeohte, þa hie on firde wæron, þæt þæs folces
sceolde micel hryre beon, þa þunor ofslog XXIIII heora fodrera, & þa
oþre gebrocade aweg coman.
 1.85.10. Æfter þæm gefuhton Pirrus & Romane in Abulia
þære þeode.
 1.85.11. Þær wearð Pirrus wund on oþran earme; &
Romane hæfdon sige.
 1.85.12. & hæfdon geleornad ma cræfta hu hie þa
elpendas beswican mehton, mid þæm þæt hie namon treowu, & slogon
on oþerne ende monige scearpe isene næglas, & hie mid flexe bewundon,
& onbærndon hit, & beþyddan hit þonne on þone elpend hindan,
þæt hie þonne foran wedende ægþer ge for þæs flexes bryne ge
for þara nægla sticunge, þæt æt ælcon þa forwurdon ærest
þe him onufan wæron, & siþþan þæt oþer folc wæron swa
swiðe/ sleande swa hi him scildan sceoldon.
 1.85.19. On þæm gefeohte wæs Romana eahta þusend
ofslagen, & enlefan guðfonan genumen, & Pirruses heres wæs XX M
ofslagen, & his guðfona genumen.
 1.85.21. Þær wearð Pirruse cuð þæt Agathocles,
Siraccusa cyning þara burgleoda, wæs gefaren on Sicilia þæm londe.
 1.85.23. Þa for he þider & þæt rice to him geniedde.
 1.85.24. Sona swa þæt gewinn mid Romanum geendad wæs, swa
wæs þær seo monigfealdeste wol, mid moncwealme, ge eac þætte
nanuht berendes, ne wif ne nieten, ne mehton nanuht libbendes geberan;
þæt hie þa æt nihstan wæron ortriewe hwæþer him ænig
moneaca cuman sceolde.
 1.85.29. Þa wende Pirrus from Sicilium eft to Romanum, & him
angean com Curius se consul, & hiora þæt þridde gefeoht wæs on
Lucaniam, on Arosinis þære dune; þeh þe Romane sume hwile hæfdon
swiþor fleam geþoht þonne gefeoht, ær þan hie gesawon þæt mon
þa elpendas on þæt gefeoht dyde.
 1.85.33. Ac siþþan hi þa gesawan, hie hie gegremedan,
þæt hie þa wæron swiþe sleande þe hie fylstan sceoldon; &
Pirruses here wearð for þæm swiþost on fleame.
 1.86.1. On ðæm gefeohte Pirrus hæfde eahtatig M feþena,
& V M gehorsedra.
 1.86.3. & þær wæs XXXVI M ofslagen, & IIII hund
gefangen.
 1.86.3. Æfter þæm Pirrus for of Italium ymb fif gear
þæs þe he ær þæron com.
 1.86.4. & raþe þæs þe he ham com, he wolde abrecan
Argus þa burg, & þær wearð mid ane stane ofworpen.
 1.86.7. Æfter þæm þe Tarentine geacsedan þæt Pirrus
dead wæs, þa sendon hie on Affrice to Cartaginenses æfter fultume;
& eft wið Romanum wunnon; & raðe þæs þe hie togædere
coman Romane hæfdon sige.
 1.86.10. Þær anfundan Cartaginenses þæt hie mon
oferswiþan mehte, þeh hie nan folc ær mid gefeohte oferwinnan ne mehte.
 1.86.12. Gemong þæm þe Pirrus wið Romane winnende wæs,
hi hæfdon eahta legian.
 1.86.13. Þa hæfdon hie þa eahteðan Regiense to fultume
gesette.
 1.86.14. Þa ne getruwade se eahteþa dæl þara legian
þæt Romane Pirruse wiðstondan mehte: angunnan þa hergean & hienan
þa þe hie friþian sceoldon.
 1.86.16. Þa Romane þæt geacsedan, þa sendon hie þider
Genutius heora consul mid fultume, to þon þæt he an him gewræce
þæt hie þa slogon & hiendon þe ealle Romane friþian woldon.
 1.86.19. & he þa swa gedyde: sume he ofslog, sume geband
& ham sende; & þær wæron siþþan witnade, & siþþan
þa heafda mid ceorfæxsum of acorfena.
 2.86.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs feower
hunde wintrum & LXXVII, gewurdon on Rome þa yfelan wundor.
 2.86.23. Þæt wæs ærest þæt þunor toslog heora
hiehstan godes hus Iofeses.
 2.86.24. & eac þære burge weall micel to eorþan
gehreas.
 2.86.25. & eac þætte þrie wulfas on anre niht brohton
anes deades monnes lichoman binnan þa burg, & hiene þær siþþan
styccemælum tobrudon, oþ þa men onwocan, & ut urnon, & hie
siþþan aweg flugon.
 2.86.28. On þæm dagum gewearð þætte on anre dune neah
Romebyrig tohlad seo eorþe, & wæs byrnende fyr up of þære
eorþan, þæt on ælce healfe þæs fyres seo eorþe wæs fif
æcra bræde to axan geburnen.
 2.86.31. Sona þæs on þæm æfterran geare gefor
Sempronius se consul mid firde wið Pencentes Italia folc.
 2.86.32. Þa mið þæm þe hi hie getrymed hæfdon, &
togædere woldon, þa wearð eorþbeofung, þæt ægðer þara
folca wende untweogendlice þæt hie sceoldon on þa eorþan besincan.
 2.87.2. & hie þeah swa ondrædendlice gebidon þæt se
ege ofergongen wæs, & þær siþþan wælgrimlice gefuhton.
 2.87.4. Þær wæs se mæsta blodgyte on ægðere healfe
þara folca, þeh þe Romane sige hæfden, þa feawa þe þær to
lafe wurdon.
 2.87.5. Þær wæs gesiene þæt seo eorþbeofung tacnade
þa miclan bloddryncas þe hiere mon on þære tide to forlet.
 3.87.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII hunde
wintrum & LXXX, gemong þæm oþrum monegum wundrum þe on þæm
dagum gelumpan, þæt mon geseah weallan blod of eorþan & rinan meolc
of heofonum.
 3.87.11. On ðæm dagum Cartaginenses sendon fultum Tarentinum,
þæt hie þe ið mehton wiþ Romanum.
 3.87.12. Þa sendon Romane ærendracan to him, & hie acsedon
for hwy hie ðæt dyden.
 3.87.14. Þa oðsworan hie þæm ærendracan mid þæm
bismerlicestan aðe þæt hie him næfre on fultume nære, þeh þe
þa aðas wæren near mane þonne soðe.
 3.87.16. On ðæm dagum Ulcinienses & Thrusci ða folc
forneah ealle forwurdon for hiora agnum dysige.
 3.87.17. For þæm þe hie sume heora þeowas gefreodon, &
eac him eallum wurdon to milde & to forgiefene.
 3.87.19. Þa ofþuhte heora ceorlum þæt mon þa þeowas
freode, & hi nolde.
 3.87.20. Þa wiðsawon hie þæm hlafordum, & þa
þeowas mid him, oþ hie wyldran wæron þonne hie, & hie siþþan
mid ealle of þæm earde adrifon & him to wifum dydon þa þe
ær/ wæran heora hlæfdian; þa siþþan gesohton þa hlafordas
Romane, & hi him gefylstan þæt hie eft to hiora agnum becoman.
 4.87.25. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs IIII
hunde wintrum & LXXXI, becom on Romane micel moncwealm, þæt hie ða
æt nihstan ne acsedon hwæt þara gefarenra wære, ac hwæt heora
þonne to lafe wære.
 4.87.28. Ond eac þa diofla þe hie an simbel weorþedon hi
amirdon, toeacan þæm oþrum monigfealdum bismrum þe hi him lærende
wæron, þæt hie ne cuþan angitan þæt hit Godes wracu wæs; ac
heton þa biscepas þæt hie sædon ðæm folce þæt heora godas
him wæron irre, to þon þæt hie him þagit swiþor ofreden &
bloten þonne hie ær dyden.
 4.88.5. On ðære ilcan tide Caperronie wæs hatenu heora goda
nunne.
 4.88.6. Þa gebyrede hiere þæt heo hie forlæg.
 4.88.6. Hie þa Romane for þæm gylte hi ahengon, & eac
þone þe þone gylt mid hiere geworhte, & ealle þa þe þone gylt
mid him wiston, & mid him hælan.
 4.88.8. Hu wene we, nu Romane him self þyllic writon & setton
for heora agnum gielpe & heringe, & þeah gemong þære heringe
þyllica bismra on hie selfe asædon, hu wene we hu monegra maran bismra hie
forsugedon, ægþer ge for hiora agenre lufan & londleoda, ge eac for
hiora senatum ege.
 4.88.14. Nu we sculon fon, cwæð Orosius, ymb þæt Punica
gewin, þæt wæs of þæm folce of Cartaina þære byrig.
 4.88.15. Sio wæs getimbred from Elisan þæm wifmen,
LXXIIItigum wintra ær Romeburg.
 4.88.16. Swa some þara burgwarena yfel & heora bismeres
wearð lytel asæd & awriten, swa swa Trogus & Iustinianus sedon
heora stærwriteras, for þon þe heora wise on nænne sæl wel ne
gefor, naþer ne innan from him selfum, ne utane from oþrum folcum.
 4.88.20. Swa þeah toeacan þæm yflum, hie gesetton, þonne
him micel moncwealm on becom, þæt hie sceolden men hiera godum blotan, swa
eac ða diofla þe hie on geliefdon gelærdon hie þæt þa ðe
þær on unhæle wæran, þæt hie hale for hie cwealdon.
 4.88.24. & wæron þa men toðon dysige þæt hie wendon
þæt hie mehten þæt yfel mid þæm gestillan, & þa diofla to
þon lytige þæt hie hit mid þæm gemicledan.
 4.88.26. & for þon þe hie swa swiðe dysige wæron, him
com on Godes wracu an gefeohtum toeacan oþrum yflum.
 4.88.28. Þæt wæs oftost on Sicilium & on Sardinium
þæm iglondum, on þa hie gelomlicost wunnon.
 4.88.30. Æfter þæm þe him swa oftrædlice mislamp, hie
angunnan hit witan heora latteowum & heora cempum heora earfeþa, &
him bebudan þæt hie on wræcsiþas foran, & on ellþiede.
 4.88.32. Raþe æfter þæm hie bædon þæt hie mon to
hiora earde forlete, þæt hie mosten gefandian hweðer hie heora
medselða oferswiþan mehte.
 4.89.1. Þa him mon þæs forwiernde, þa gesohton hie hie mid
firde.
 4.89.2. On þære heriunge gemette se ieldesta ladteow Macheus
his agenne sunu mid purpurum gegieredne on biscephade.
 4.89.4. He hiene þa for þæm girelan gebealg, & hiene
oferfon het, & ahon; & wende þæt he for his forsewennesse swelc
sceorp werede, for þon þe hit næs þeaw mid him þæt ænig oþer
purpuran werede buton cyningum.
 4.89.7. Raþe æfter þæm hie begeaton Cartaina þa burg,
& ealle þa æltæwestan ofslogon þe þærinne wæron, &
þa oþre to him genieddon.
 4.89.9. Þa æt nihstan he wearþ self besiered &
ofslagen.
 4.89.10. Þis wæs geworden on Ciruses dæge Persa cyninges.
 5.89.12. Æfter þæm Himelco, Cartaina cyning, gefor mid
firde an Siciliæ, & him þær becom swa færlic yfel þæt þa
men wæron swa raðe deade swa hit him an becom, þæt hie þa æt
nihstan hie bebyrgean ne mehton.
 5.89.15. & he for ðæm ege his unwillum þonan wende,
& ham for mid þæm þe þær to lafe wæron.
 5.89.16. Sona swa ðæt forme scip land gesohte, ond þæt
egeslice spell gebodade, swa wæron ealle þa burgware Cartaginenses mid
swiðlice heafe & wope anstyred, & ælc acsiende & frinende
æfter his friend; & hie untweogendlice nanra treowþa him ne wendon,
buton þæt hie mid ealle forweorþan sceolde.
 5.89.21. Mid þæm þe þa burgware swa geomorlic angin
hæfdon, þa com se cyning self mid his scipe, & land gesohte mid
swiþe lyþerlicum gegierelan.
 5.89.23. & ægþer ge he self wepende hamweard for, ge
þæt folc þæt him ongean com, eall hit him wepende hamweard folgade.
 5.89.25. & he se cyning his handa wæs uppweardes brædende
wið þæs heofones, & mid oferheortnesse him wæs waniende
ægþer ge his agene heardsælða ge ealles þæs folces.
 5.89.27. & he þagiet him selfum gedyde þæt þær
wyrrest wæs, þa he to his inne com, þa he þæt folc þærute
betynde & hiene ænne þærinne beleac, & hiene selfne ofslog.
 5.90.1. Æfter þæm wæs sum welig mon binnan Cartaina, se
wæs haten Hanna, & wæs mid ungemete girnende þæs cynedomes; ac
him geþuhte þæt he mid þara wietena willum him ne mehte to cuman,
& him to ræde genom þæt he hie ealle to gereordum to him gehete,
þæt he hie siþþan mehte mid attre acwellan.
 5.90.5. Ac hit wearð þurh þa ameldad þe he geþoht
hæfde þæt him to þære dæde fylstan sceolde.
 5.90.7. Þa he anfunde þæt þæt cuþ wæs, þa
gegaderade he ealle þa þeowas & þa yfelan menn þe he mehte, &
þohte þæt he on þa burgware on ungearwe become; ac hit him wearð
æror cuþ.
 5.90.9. Þa him æt þære byrig ne gespeow, þa gelende he
mid XXIIII M to anre oþerre byrig, & þohte þæt he þa abræce.
 5.90.11. Þa hæfdon þa burgleode Mauritanie him to fultome,
& him ongean comon butan fæstenne, & Hannan gefengon, & þa
oþre gefliemdon.
 5.90.13. & þær siþþan tintregad wearð: ærest
hiene mon swong, þa sticode him mon þa eagan ut, & siþþan him mon
slog þa handa of, þa þæt heafod.
 5.90.15. & eall his cynn mon ofslog, þy læs hit monn
uferan dogore wræce, oþþe ænig oþer dorste eft swelc anginnan.
 5.90.17. Þis gewearð on Philippuses dæge þæs cyninges.
 5.90.18. Æfter þæm hierdon Cartainenses þæt se mæra
Alexander hæfde abrocen Tirum þa burg, seo wæs on ærdagum heora
ieldrena oeðel, & ondredon þæt he eac to him cuman wolde.
 5.90.20. Þa sendon hie þider Amilchor, heora þone gleawestan
mon, þæt he Alexandres wisan besceawade, swa he hit him eft ham bebead on
anum brede awriten, & siþþan hit awriten wæs, he hit oferworhte mid
weaxe.
 5.90.24. Eft þa Alexander gefaren wæs, & he ham com, þa
tugon hie hiene þære burge witan þæt he heora swicdomes wið
Alexander fremmende wære, & hiene for þære tihtlan ofslogon.
 5.90.27. Æfter þæm Cartainenses wunnon on Siciliæ,
þær him seldon teola gespeow, & besæton hiora heafedburg, Siracuses
wæs hatenu.
 5.90.29. Þa ne anhagode Agathocle heora cyninge þæt he wið
hie mehte buton fæstenne gefeohtan, ne eac þæt hie ealle mehten for
metelieste þærbinnan gebidan, ac leton heora fultum þærbinnan beon,
be þæm dæle þæt hie ægðer mehton, ge heora fæsten
gehealdan, ge eac þæt þa mete hæfdon þa hwile.
 5.91.4. Ond se cyning mið þæm oþrum dæle on scipum for
on Cartainense, & hie raðe þæs forbærnnan het þe he to lande
gefor, for þon he nolde þæt his find heora eft ænigne anwald
hæfde.
 5.91.7. & him þær raðe fæsten geworhte, & wæs
þæt folc þonan ut sleande & hienende, oþ þæt Hanna, þæs
folces oþer cyning, hiene æt þæm fæstenne gesohte mid XX M.
 5.91.9. Ac hiene Agothocles gefliemde, & his folces ofslog II
M, & him æfterfylgende wæs oþ V mila to þære byrig
Cartanense.
 5.91.11. Ond þær oþer fæsten geworhte, & þær
ymbutan wæs hergende & bærnende, þætte Cartainense mehton geseon
of heora byrg þæt fyr & þone teonan, þonne hie on fore wæron.
 5.91.15. Ymbe ðone timan þe þiss wæs, Andra wæs haten,
Agothocles broðor, þone he æt ham on þære byrig him beæftan let,
he besierede þæt folc þe hie ymbseten hæfden on anre niht ungearwe,
& hit mæst eall ofslog; & þa oþre to scipum oðflugon.
 5.91.18. & raðe þæs þe hie ham coman, & þæt
spell cuð wearð Cartainiensium, swa wurdon hie swa swiþe forþohte,
þætte nales þæt an þætte Agothocle monega byrg to gafolgieldum
wurdon, ac eac hie him heapmælum selfe on hand eodon.
 5.91.22. Swa eac Fefles se cyng mid Cerene his folce hiene eac
gesohte.
 5.91.23. Ac Agothocles gedyde untreowlice wið hiene, þæt he
hiene on his warum beswac & ofslog, swa him eac selfum siþþan æfter
lamp.
 5.91.25. Gif he þa þa ane untreowþa ne gedyde, from ðæm
dæge he mehte butan gebroce eallra Cartaina onwald begietan.
 5.91.26. On þære hwile þe he þone unræd þurhteah,
Amicor, Pena cyning, wæs mid sibbe wið his farende mid eallum his folce,
ac betux Agothocle & his folce wearð ungerædnes, þæt he self
ofslagen wearð.
 5.91.29. Æfter his deaðe foran eft Cartainienses an Sicilie
mid scipum.
 5.91.30. Þa hie ðæt geacsedan, þa sendon hie æfter
Piruse, Epira cyninge, & he him sume hwile gefylste.
 6.92.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs feower
hunde wintrum & LXXXIII, sendon Momertine, Sicilia folc, æfter Romana
fultume, þæt hie wið Pena folce mehte.
 6.92.3. Þa sendon hie him Appius Claudius þone consul mid
fultume.
 6.92.4. Eft, þa hie togædereweard foron mid heora folcum,
þa flugon Pene, swa hie eft selfe sædon, & his wundredan, þæt hie
ær flugon ær hie togædere genealæcten.
 6.92.6. For þæm fleame Hanna, Pena cyning, mid eallum his
folce wearð Romanum to gafolgieldum, & him ælce geare gesealde twa
hund talentana siolfres: on ælcre anre talentan wæs LXXX punda.
 6.92.10. Æfter Romane besæton þone ieldran Hannibalan, Pena
cyning, on Argentine, Sicilia byrig, oð he forneah hungre swealt.
 6.92.11. Þa com him Pena oþer cyning to fultume mid sciphere,
Hanna wæs haten, & þær gefliemed wearð.
 6.92.13. & Romane siþþan þæt fæsten abræcon.
 6.92.13. & Hannibal se cyning on niht ut oðfleah mid feawum
monnum, & hundeahtatig scipa gegaderade, & on Romana londgemæro
hergeade.
 6.92.16. On ða wrace fundon Romane ærest þæt hie scipa
worhton.
 6.92.16. Þæt gefremede Diulius hiora consul, þæt þæt
angin wearð tidlice þurhtogen, swa þætte æfter siextegum daga
þæs þe ðæt timber acorfen wæs, þær wæron XXX & C
gearora ge mid mæste ge mid segle.
 6.92.20. & oþer consul, wæs haten Cornelius Asina, se
gefor on Liparis þæt iglond to Hannibale to sundorspræce mid XVI
scipun; þa ofslog he hiene.
 6.92.22. Swa þæt þa se oðer consul gehierde Diulius, swa
gefor he to ðæm iglonde mid XXX scipun, & Hannibales folces III hund
ofslog, & his XXX scipa genom, & XIII on sæ besencte, & hiene
selfne gefliemde.
 6.92.26. Æfter þæm Punici, þæt sindon Cartainense, hie
gesetton Hannonan ofer hiora scipa, swa Hannibales wæs ær, þæt he
bewerede Sardianiam & Corsicam þa iglond wið Romanum.
 6.92.28. & he raðe þæs wið hie gefeaht mid sciphere,
& ofslagen wearð.
 6.92.30. Þæs on þæm æfterran geare Calatinus se consul
for mid firde to Camerinam, Sicilia byrg.
 6.92.31. Ac him hæfdon Pene þone weg forseten, þær he
ofer þone munt faran sceolde.
 6.93.1. Þa genom Calatinus III hund monna mid him, & on anre
diegelre stowe þonemunt oferstag, & þa men afærde, þæt hie
ealle ongean hiene wæron feohtende, & þone weg letan butan ware,
þæt/ seo fierd siððan þær þurhfor.
 6.93.4. & þær wearð þæt III hund monna ofslagen,
ealle buton ðæm consule anum: he com wund aweg.
 6.93.7. Æfter þæm Punice gesetton eft þone ealdan
Hannibalan þæt he mid scipum on Romane wunne.
 6.93.8. Ac eft þa he ðær hergean sceolde, he wearð raðe
gefliemed, & on ðæm fleame hiene oftyrfdon his agene geferan.
 6.93.11. Æfter þæm Atilius se consul aweste Liparum &
Melitam, Sicilia iglond.
 6.93.12. Æfter þæm foron Romane on Africe mid feower hunde
scipa & þritigum.
 6.93.13. Þa sendon hie heora twegen cyningas him ongean, Hannan
& Amilcor, mid scipum.
 6.93.14. & þær wurdon begen geflemed, & Romane
genamon on him LXXXIII scipa, & siþþan hie abræcon Alpeam heora
burg, & wæron hergende oð Cartaina heora heafedburg.
 6.93.18. Æfter þæm Regulus se consul underfeng Cartaina
gewinn.
 6.93.18. Þa he æst þider mid firde farende wæs, þa
gewicade he neah anre ie, seo wæs haten Bagrada.
 6.93.20. Þa com of ðæm wætre an nædre, seo wæs
ungemetlice micel, & þa men ealle ofslog þe neh ðæm wætre
coman.
 6.93.22. Þa gegaderade Regulus ealle þa scyttan þe on
ðæm færelte wæron, þæt hie mon mid flanum ofercome.
 6.93.23. Ac þonne hie mon slog oþþe sceat, þonne glad hit
on þæm scyllum, swelce hit wære smeðe isen.
 6.93.25. Þa het he mid þæm palistas, mid þæm hie
weallas bræcon, þonne hie on fæstenne fuhton, þæt hiere mon mid
þæm þwyres on wurpe.
 6.93.27. Þa wearð hiere mid anum wierpe an ribb forod, þæt
hio siþþan mægen ne hæfde hie to gescildanne, ac raðe þæs hio
wearð ofslagen; for þon hit is nædrena gecynd þæt heora mægen
& hiera feþe bið on heora ribbum, swa oþerra creopendra wyrma bið
on heora fotum.
 6.93.31. Þa hio gefylled wæs, he het hie behyldan, & þa
hyde to Rome bringan, & hie ðær to mærðe aðenian, for þon heo
wæs hund twelftiges fota lang.
 6.93.34. Æfter þæm gefeaht Regulus wið III Pena cyningas
on anum gefeohte, wið twegen Hasterbalas, & se þridda wæs haten
Amilcor, se wæs of Sicilium him to fultume gefett.
 6.94.2. On ðæm gefeohte wæs Cartainiensa VII M ofslagen,
& VX M gefangen, & XI elpendas genumen, & LXXXII tuna him eodon on
hand.
 6.94.5. Þa, æfter þæm þe Cartainiense gefliemde
wæron, hie wilnedon friþes to Regule.
 6.94.6. Ac eft þa hie angeatan þæt he ungemetlic gafol wið
þæm friþe habban wolde, þa cwædon hie þæt him leofre wære
þæt hie an swelcan niede deað fornome þonne hie mid swelcan niede
frið begeate.
 6.94.9. Þa sendon hie æfter fultume ægþer ge on Gallie,
ge on Ispanie, ge on Læcedemonie æfter Exantipuse þæm cyninge.
 6.94.11. Eft, þa hie ealle gesomnad wæron, þa beþohtan
hie ealle heora wigcræftas to Exantipuse.
 6.94.12. & he siþþan þa folc gelædde þær hie
togædere gecweden hæfdon, & gesette twa folc diegellice on twa healfa
his, & þridde beæftan him; & bebead þæm twam folcum, þonne
he self mid þæm fyrmestan dæle wið þæs æftemestan fluge,
þæt hie þonne on Reguluses fird on twa healfa þwyres on fore.
 6.94.17. Þær wearð Romana XXX M ofslagen, & Regulus
gefangen mid V hunde monna.
 6.94.18. Þiss gewearþ Punicum on þæm teoðan geare hiora
gewinnes & Romana.
 6.94.19. Raðe þæs Exantipus for eft to his agnum rice, &
him Romane andred, for þon hie for his lare æt hiora gemettinge beswicene
wurdon.
 6.94.22. Æfter þæm Enilius Paulus se consul for on African
mid þrim hunde scipa to Clepeam þæm iglonde.
 6.94.23. & him comon þær ongean Punice mid swa fela scipa,
& þær gefliemde wæron, & hiora folces wæs V M ofslagen,
& hiora scipa XXX gefangen, & IIII & an hund adruncen.
 6.94.26. & Romana wæs an C & an M ofslagen, & heora
scipa IX adruncen.
 6.94.27. & hie on þæm iglande fæsten worhton.
 6.94.27. & hie ðær eft Pene gesohton mid heora twam
cyningum, þa wæron begen Hannan hatene.
 6.94.29. Þær heora wæron IX M ofslagen, & þa oþre
gefliemed.
 6.94.29. Mid þære herehyþe Romane oferhlæstan heora
scipa, þa hi hamweard wæron, þæt heora gedearf CC & XXX, &
LXX wearð to lafe, & uneaðe genered mid þæm þæt hie mæst
eall ut awurpon þæt ðæron wæs.
 6.95.1. Æfter þæm Amilcor Pena cyning for on Numedian,
& on Mauritaniam, & hie oferhergeade, & to gafolgieldum gesette,
for þon þe hie Regule ær on hand eodon.
 6.95.4. Þæs ymb III gear Serfilius Cepio & Sempronius
Blesus þa consulas foran mid III hund scipa & LXgum on Africe, & on
Cartainiensium monega byrg abræcon.
 6.95.4. & siþþan mid miclum þingum hamweard foran, &
eft hiora scipa oferhlæston, þæt hiora gedurfon L & C.
 6.95.9. Æfter þæm Cotta se consul for on Sicilie, & hie
ealle oferhergeade.
 6.95.10. Þær wæron swa micle monslihtas on ægþere
healfe þæt hie mon æt nihstan bebyrgan ne mehte.
 6.95.12. On Luciuses dæge Eliuses, þæs consules, & on
Metelluses Gaiuses, & on Foriuses Blaciduses, com Hasterbal se niwa cyning
of Cartainum on Libeum þæt igland mid XXX M gehorsedra, & mid XXX
elpenda & cigum, & raðe þæs gefeaht wið Metellus þone
cyning.
 6.95.16. Ac siþþan Metellus þa elpendas ofercom, siþþan
he hæfde eac raðe þæt oþer folc gefliemed.
 6.95.17. Æfter þæm fleame Hasterbal wearð ofslagen from
his agnum folce.
 6.95.19. Þa wæron Cartainiense swa ofercumene & swa
gedrefde betux him selfum, þæt hie hie to nanum anwalde ne bemæton; ac
hie gewearð þæt hie wolden to Romanum friþes wilnian.
 6.95.21. Þa sendon hie Regulus þone consul, þone hie
hæfdon mid him fif winter on bendum, & he him geswor on his goda noman
þæt he ægþer wolde, ge þæt ærende abeodan, swa swa hi hiene
heton, ge eac him þæt anwyrde eft gecyþan.
 6.95.25. & he hit swa gelæste, & abead þæt
ægþer þara folca oþrum ageafe ealle þa men þe hie gehergead
hæfden, & siþþan him betweonum sibbe heolden.
 6.95.27. & æfter þæm þe he hit aboden hæfde, he
hie healsade þæt hie nanuht þara ærenda ne underfenge, &
cwæð þæt him to micel æwisce wære þæt he swa emnlice
wrixleden, & eac þæt hiora gerisna nære þæt hie swa heane hie
geþohten þæt hi heora gelican wurden.
 6.95.31. Þa æfter þæm wordum hie budon him þæt he on
cyþþe mid him wunade, & to his rice fenge.
 6.95.32. Þa ondwyrde he him, & cwæð þæt hit na
geweorþan sceolde þæt se wære leoda cyning se þe ær wæs folce
þeow.
 6.96.2. Þa he eft to Cartainum com, þa asædon his geferan
hu he heora ærenda abead.
 6.96.3. Þa forcurfon hie him þa twa ædran on twa healfa
þara eagena, þæt he æfter þæm slapan ne mehte, oþ he swa
searigende his lif forlet.
 6.96.6. Æfter þæm Atilius Regulus & Mallius Ulsca þa
consulas foron on Cartaine, on Libeum þæt igland, mid twam hunde scipa,
& þær besæton an fæsten.
 6.96.8. Þa befor hiene þær Hannibal se geonga cyning,
Amilcores sunu, þær hie ungearwe butan fæstenne sæton, &
þær ealle ofslagene wæron buton feawum.
 6.96.10. Æfter þæm Claudius se consul for eft an Punice.
 6.96.11. & him Hannibal ut on sæ ongean com, & ealle
ofslog buton XXX sciphlæsta: þa oðflugon to Libeum þæm iglande.
 6.96.13. Þær wæs ofslagen IX M, & XX M gefangen.
 6.96.13. Æfter þæm for Gaius Iunius se consul on Affrice,
& mid eallum his færelte on se forwearð.
 6.96.16. Þæs on þæm æfterran geare Hannibal sende
sciphere on Rome, & þær ungemetlice gehergeadon.
 6.96.17. Æfter þæm Lutatia se consul for on Africe mid III
hunde scipa to Sicilium, & him Punice þær wiðgefuhton.
 6.96.19. Þær wearð Lutatia wund þurh oþer cneow.
 6.96.19. Þæs on mergen com Hanna mid Hannibales firde, &
him þær gefeaht wið Lutatia, þeh he wund wære.
 6.96.21. & Hannan gefliemde, & him æfter for, oþ he
com to Cinam þære byrg.
 6.96.22. Raðe þæs coman eft Pene mid firde to him, &
gefliemde wurdon, & ofslagen II M.
 6.96.23. Þa wilnedon Cartaine oþre siþe friþes to Romanum.
 6.96.24. & hie hit him on þæt gerad geafon, þæt hie
him Siciliam to ne tugen, ne Sardiniam, & eac him gesealden þæronufan
III M talentana ælce geare.
 7.96.27. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs V hunde
wintrum & VII, wearð ungemetlic fyrbryne mid Romanum, þæt nan mon
nyste hwonan hit com.
 7.96.29. Þa þæt fyr hie alet, þa wearð Tiber seo ea swa
fledu swa heo næfre ær næs ne siþþan, þæt heo mæst eall
genom þæt binnan þære byrg wæs þæra monna ondliefene, ge eac
on heora getimbrum.
 7.97.1. On þæm dagum þe Titus Sempronius & Gratias Gaius
wæron consulas on Rome, hie gefuhton wið Faliscis þæm folce, &
hiora ofslogen XII M.
 7.97.4. On þæm geare wurdon þa Gallie Romanum wiðerwearde,
þe mon nu hæt Longbeardas, & raþe þæs heora folc togædere
gelæddon.
 7.97.5. On hiora þæm forman gefeohte wæs Romana III M
ofslagen, & on þæm æfterran geare wæs Gallia III M ofslagen,
& II M gefangen.
 7.97.7. Þa Romane hamweard foran, þa noldan hie don þone
triumphan beforan hiora consulum, þe hiora gewuna wæs þonne hie sige
hæfdon, for þon þe he æt ðæm ærran gefeohte fleah.
 7.97.10. & hie þæt siþþan fela geare an missenlicum
sigum dreogende wæron.
 7.97.12. Þa þa Titus Mallius, & Torcuatus Gaius, &
Atirius Bubulcus wæron consulas on Rome, þa ongunnon Sardinie, swa hie
Pene gelærdon, winnan wið Romanum, & raþe oferswiðde wæron.
 7.97.15. Æfter þæm Romane wunnon on Cartaine, for þæm
þe hie frið abrocen hæfdon.
 7.97.16. Þa sendon hie tua hiera ærendracan to Romanum
æfter friþe, & hit abiddan ne mehton.
 7.97.17. Þa æt þæm þriddan cirre hie sendon X hiera
ieldstena wietena, & hi hit abiddan ne mehton.
 7.97.19. Æt þæm feorðan cirre hie sendon Hannan heora
þone unweorðestan þegn, & he hit abæd.
 7.97.21. Wiotodlice, cwæð Orosius, nu we sindon cumen to
þæm godan tidun þe us Romane oþwitað, & to ðære
genihtsumnisse þe hie us ealneg fore gielpað þæt ure ne sien ðæm
gelican.
 7.97.23. Ac frine hie mon þonne æfter hu monegum wintrum sio
sibb gewurde þæs þe hie æst unsibbe wið monegum folcum hæfdon:
þonne is þæt æfter L wintra & feower hundum.
 7.97.26. Ahsige þonne eft hu longe sio sibb gestode: þonne
wæs þæt an gear.
 7.97.27. Sona þæs on ðæm æfterran geare Gallie wunnon
wið Romane, & Pene on oþre healfe.
 7.97.28. Hu þyncð eow Romanum hu seo sibb gefæstnad wære,
hwæþer hio sie þæm gelicost þe mon nime ænne eles dropan, &
drype on an micel fyr, & þence hit mid þæm adwæscan?
 7.97.31. Þonne is wen, swa micle swiðor swa he þencþ
þæt he hit adwæsce, þæt he hit swa micle swiðor ontydre.
 7.98.1. Swa þonne wæs mid Romanum þæt an gear þæt
hie sibbe hæfdon, þæt hie under þære sibbe to þære mæstan
sace become.
 7.98.3. On hiora ðæm ærestan gewinne Amilcor, Cartaina
cynig, þa he to Romanum mid firde faran wolde, þa wearð he from Spenum
beþridad & ofslagen.
 7.98.6. On ðæm geare Ilirice ofslogon Romana ærendracan.
 7.98.6. Æfter þæm Fuluius Postumius se consul for þæm
on hie fird gelædde, & fela ofslagen wearð on ægðere healfe,
& he þeh sige hæfde.
 7.98.9. Sona þæs on þæm æfterran gere gelærdan
Romana biscepas swelce niwe rædas swelce hie fol oft ær ealde gedydan,
þa him mon on þreo healfe onwinnende wæs, ægþer ge Gallie be
suþan muntum, ge Gallie be norþan muntum, ge Pene, þæt hie sceolden
mid monnum for hie heora godum blotan, & þæt sceolde beon an Gallisc
wæpnedmon, & an Gallisc wifmon, & hie þa Romane be þara biscepa
lare hie swa cuce bebyrgdan.
 7.98.15. Ac hit God wræc on him swa he ær ealneg dyde, swa
oft swa hie mid monnum ofredan, þæt hie mid hiera cucum onguldon þæt
hie ungyltige cwealdon.
 7.98.17. Þær wæs ærest gesiene on þæm gefeohte þe
hie wið Gallium hæfdon: þeh þe heora agnes fultumes wære eahta hund
M, buton oþrum folcum þe hi him hæfdon to aspanen, þæt hie raðe
flugon, þæs þe heora consul ofslagen wæs & hiora oþres folces
III M.
 7.98.21. Þæt him þa geþuhte swelc þæt mæste wæl
swelc hie oft ær for noht hæfdon.
 7.98.23. Æt hiora oþran gefeohte wæs Gallia IX M ofslagen.
 7.98.24. Þæs on þæm þriddan geare Mallius Tarcuatus
& Fuluius Falceus wæron consulas om Rome.
 7.98.25. Hie gefuhton wið Gallium, & hiora III M ofslogon,
& VI M gefengon.
 7.98.27. On þæm æfterran geare wæron monege wundor
gesewene.
 7.98.27. An wæs þæt on Piceno þæm wuda an wielle weol
blode; & on Tracio þæm londe mon geseah swelce se heofen burne; &
on Ariminio þære byrg wæs niht oð midne dæg.
 7.98.30. & weard swa micel eorþbeofung þæt on Caria
& on Roþum þæm iglondum wurdon micle hryras, ond Colosus gehreas.
 7.98.33. Þy geare Fiaminius se consul forseah þa sægene þe
þa hlyttan him sædon, & him logan, þæt he æt þæm gefeohte
ne come wið Gallie.
 7.99.1. Ac he hit þurhteah, & mid weorþscipe geendade.
 7.99.1. Þær wæs Gallia VII M ofslagen, & XVII M
gefangen.
 7.99.2. Æfter þæm Claudius se consul gefeaht wið
Gælle, & hiora ofslog XXX M, & he self gefeaht wið þone cyning
anwig, & hine ofslog, & Megelan þa burg geeode.
 7.99.5. Æfter þæm wunnon Isþrie on Romane.
 7.99.5. Þa sendon hi heora consulas angean, Cornelius &
Minutius.
 7.99.6. Þær wæs micel wæl geslagen on ægþere
healfe, & Isþrie wurdon þeh Romanum underþiedde.
 8.99.9. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs V hunde
wintrum & XXXIII, Hannibal, Pena cyning, besæt Saguntum Ispania burg,
for þon hie on symbel wið Romanum sibbe heoldon; & þær wæs
sittende eahta monað, oþ he hie ealle hungre acwealde, & þa burg
towearp, þeh þe Romane heora ærendracan him to sendon, & hie
firmetton þæt hie þæt gewinn forleten; ac he hie swa unweorðlice
forseah, þæt he heora self onseon nolde.
 8.99.15. On þam gewinne, & eac on monegum oðrum æfter
þæm, Hannibal gecyþde þone niþ & þone hete þe he beforan his
fæder geswor, þa he nigonwintre cniht wæs, þæt he næfre ne
wurde Romana freond.
 8.99.19. Þa þa Publius Cornelius, & Scipa Publius, &
Sempronius Longus, þa hie wæron consulas, Hannibal abræc mid gefeohte
ofer þa beorgas þe mon hæt Perenei, þa sindon betux Galleum &
Spaneum, & siþþan he gefor ofer þa monegan þeoda, oþ he com to
Alpis þæm muntum, & þær eac ofer abræc, þeh him mon
oftrædlice mid gefeohtum wiðstode, & þone weg geworhte ofer munt
Iof.
 8.99.24. Swa þonne he to ðæm syndrigum stane com, þonne
het he hiene mid fyre onhætan, & siþþan mid mattucun heawan; &
mid þæm mæstan geswince þa muntas oferfor.
 8.99.27. His heres wæs an M feðena & XX M gehorsedra.
 8.99.29. Þa he hæfde on þæm emnete gefaren oþ he com to
Ticenan þære ie, þa com him ðær ongean Scipio se consul, &
ðær frecenlice gewundod wearð, & eac ofslagen wære, gif his sunu
his ne gehulpe, mid þæm þæt he hiene foran forstod, oð he on fleame
fealh.
 8.100.1. Þær wearð Romana micel wæl geslagen.
 8.100.3. Hiora ðæt æfterre gefeoht wæs æt Trefia
ðære ie, & eft wæron Romane forslægen & gefliemed.
 8.100.4. Þa þæt Sempronius hierde, heora oþer consul, se
wæs on Sicilium mid firde gefaren, he þonan afor, & begen þa
consulas wæron mid firde angean Hannibal, & heora gemetting wæs eft
æt Trefia þære ie, & eac Romane gefliemed, & swiþor
forslagen, & Hannibal gewundod.
 8.100.9. Æfter þæm for Hannibal ofer Bardan þone beorg,
þeh þe ymb þone tieman wæren swa micel snawgebland swa þætte
ægþer ge þara horsa fela forwurdon ge þa elpendas ealle buton anum, ge
þa men selfe uneaðe þone ciele genæson.
 8.100.12. Ac for þæm he geneðde swiþost ofer þone munt
þe he wiste þæt Flamineus se consul wende þæt he buton sorge mehte
on þæm wintersetle gewunian þe he þa on wæs mid þæm folce þe
he ða gegaderad hæfde, & untweogendlice wende þæt nan nære
þætte þæt færelt ymbe þone timan anginnan dorste oþþe mehte
for þæm ungemetlican cile.
 8.100.17. Mid þæm þe Hannibal to ðæm londe becom, swa
gewicade he an anre diegelre stowe, neah þæm oþrum folce.
 8.100.19. & sum his folc sende gind þæt lond to
bærnanne & to hergenne, þætte se consul wæs wenende þæt
eall þæt folc wære gind þæt lond tobræd, & þiderweard
farende wæs, & þencende þæt he hie on þære hergunge beswice,
& þæt folc buton truman lædde, swa he wiste þæt þæt
oþer wæs, oþþæt Hannibal him com þwyres on mid þæm fultume
þe he ætgædere hæfde, & þone consul ofslog, & þæs
oþres folces XXV M, & VI gefengon.
 8.100.25. & Hannibales folces wæs twa M ofslagen.
 8.100.27. Æfter þæm Scipia se consul, þæs oþres
Scipian broþor, wæs monega gefeoht donde on Ispanium, & Magonem Pena
latteow gefeng.
 8.100.29. & monega wundor gewurdon on þære tide.
 8.100.29. Ærest wæs þæt seo sunne wæs swelce heo
wære eall gelytladu.
 8.100.30. Oþer wæs ðæt mon geseah swelce seo sunne &
se mona fuhte: þas wundor gewurdon on Arpis þæm londe.
 8.100.32. & on Sardinium mon geseah twegen sceldas blode
swætan.
 8.100.33. & Falisci þæt folc hie gesawon swelce se hefon
wære tohliden.
 8.100.34. & Athium þæt folc him geþuhte, þa hie heora
corn ripon, & heora cawelas afylled hæfdon, þæt ealle þa ear
wæron blodege.
 9.101.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs V hunde
wintrum & feowertegum, þa þa Lucius Amilius & Paulus Publius &
Terrentius Uarra, þa hie wæron consulas, hie geforan mid firde angean
Hannibal.
 9.101.4. Ac he hie mid þæm ilcan wrence beswac þe he æt
heora ærran gemetingge dyde, & eac mid þæm niwan þe hie ær ne
cuðon/, þæt wæs, ðæt he on fæstre stowe let sum his folc,
& mid sumum for angean þa consulas; & raðe þæs þe hie
tosomne comon, he fleah wið þara þe þær beæftan wæron, &
him þa consulas wæron æfterfylgende, & þæt folc sleande, &
wendon þæt hie on ðæm dæge sceoldon habban þone mæstan sige.
 9.101.10. Ac raðe þæs þe Hannibal to his fultume com, he
gefliemde ealle þa consulas, & on Romanum swa micel wæl geslog swa
heora næfre næs ne ær ne siþþan æt anum gefeohte, þæt
wæs feower & feowertig M, & þara consula twegen ofslog, &
þone þriddan gefeng; & þa on dæg he mehte cuman to ealra Romana
anwealde, þær he forþ gefore to ðære byrg.
 9.101.16. Æfter þæm Hannibal sende ham to Cartaina þrio
mydd gyldenra hringa his sige to tacne.
 9.101.17. Be þæm hringum mon mehte witan hwæt Romana
duguðe gefeallen wæs, for þon þe hit wæs þeaw mid him on ðæm
dagum þæt nan oþer ne moste gyldenne hring werian buton he æþeles
cynnes wære.
 9.101.21. Æfter þæm gefeohte wæron Romane swa swiðe
forþohte, þætte Celius Metellus, þe þa heora consul wæs, ge ealle
heora senatus, hæfdon geþoht þæt hie sceoldon Romeburg forlætan,
ge furþum ealle Italiam.
 9.101.24. & hie þæt swa gelæsten, gif him Scipia ne
gestirde, se wæs þara cempena ieldest, mid þæm þæt he his
sweorde gebræd, & swor ðæt him leofre wære þæt he hiene
selfne acwealde þonne he forlete his fæder oeþel; & sæde eac
þæt he þara ælces ehtend wolde beon, swa swa his feondes, þe
þæs wordes wære þæt from Romebyrg þohte.
 9.101.29. & he hie ealle mid þæm geniedde þæt hie
aþas sworan þæt hie ealle ætgædere wolden, oþþe on heora earde
licggean, oþþe on heora earde libban.
 9.101.32. Æfter ðæm hie gesetton tictator, þæt he
sceolde bion hierra ofer þa consulas, se wæs haten Decius Iunius.
 9.102.1. He næs buton seofontienewintre.
 9.102.2. & Scipian hie gesetton to consule.
 9.102.2. & ealle þa men þe hie on ðeowdome hæfdon hie
gefreodon, on þæt gerad þæt he him aðas sworan þæt hie him
æt þæm gewinnum gelæsten.
 9.102.4. Ond sume, þa þe heora hlafordas freogean noldon,
oþþe hie ne anhagade þæt hie mehten, þonne guldon hie þa consulas
mid hiera gemænan feo, & siþþan freodon.
 9.102.7. & ealle þa þe fordemede wæron ær þæm
oþþe hie selfe forworht hæfdon, hie hit eall forgeafon wið þæm
þe hie him æt þæm gewinnum fuleoden.
 9.102.9. Þara monna wæs siex M, þa hie gegaderad wæron.
 9.102.10. & ealle Italiam geswicon Romanum, & to Hannibale
gecirdon, for þon þe hie wæron orwene hwæðer æfre Romane to
heora anwealde becomen.
 9.102.12. Þa gefor Hannibal on Benefente, & hie him ongean
coman, & him to gecirdon.
 9.102.14. Æfter þæm Romane hæfdon gegaderad feower
legian heora folces, & sendon Lucius Postumius þone consul on þa Gallie
þe mon nu Longbeardan hæt, & þær ofslagen wearð, & þæs
folces fela mid him.
 9.102.17. Æfter þæm Romane gesetton Claudius Marcellus to
consule, se wæs ær Scipian gefera.
 9.102.18. He for dearnenga mid gewealdene fultume on þone ende
Hannibales folces þe he self on wæs, & fela þæs folces ofslog,
& hiene selfne gefliemde.
 9.102.20. Þa hæfde Marcellus Romanum cuð gedon þæt mon
Hannibal geflieman mehte, ðeh þe hie ær tweode hwæðer hiene mon mid
ænige monfultume geflieman mehte.
 9.102.24. Gemong ðæm gewinnum þa twegen Scipian, þe þa
wæron consulas & eac gebroðor, hie wæron on Ispanium mid firde,
& gefuhton wið Hasterbale, Hannibales fædran, & hiene ofslogon,
& his folces XXX M sume ofslogon sume gefengon.
 9.102.27. Se wæs eac Pena oþer cyning.
 9.102.29. Æfter þæm Centenus Penula se consul bæd
þætte senatus him fultum sealdon, þæt he mehte Hannibal mid gefeohte
gesecan.
 9.102.31. & þær ofslagen wearð, & eahta þusend his
folces.
 9.102.31. Æfter þæm Sempronius Craccus se consul for eft
mid fierde angean Hannibal, & gefliemed wearð, & his heres wæs
micel wæl geslagen.
 9.102.34. Hu magon nu Romane, cwæð Orosius, to soþe gesecgan
þæt hie þa hæfden beteran tida þonne hie nu hæbben, þa hie swa
monega gewin hæfdon emdenes underfongen?
 9.103.1. I wæs on Ispania; oþer on Mæcedonia; III on
Capadotia; IIII æt ham wið Hannibal: & hie eac oftost gefliemde wurdon
& gebismrade.
 9.103.3. Ac þæt wæs swiðe sweotol þæt hie þa
wæron beteran þegnas þonne hie nu sien, þæt hie þeh þæs
gewinnes geswican noldon; ac hie oft gebidon on lytlum staþole & on
unwenlicum, þæt hie þa æt nihstan hæfdon ealra þara anwald þe
ær neh heora hæfdon.
 10.103.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs V hunde
wintrum & XLIII, þætte Marcellus Claudius se consul for mid sciphere
on Sicilie, & begeat Siracuses, heora þa welegestan burg, þeh he hie
æt þæm ærran færelte begietan ne mehte, þa he hie beseten
hæfde, for Archimeðes cræfte, sumes Sicilia ðegnes.
 10.103.13. On þæm teoþan geare þæs þe Hannibal won on
Italie, he for of Campaina þæm londe oþ þrio mila to Romebyrg, &
æt þære ie gewicade þe mon Annianes hætt, eallum Romanum to
ðæm mæstan ege, swa hit mon on þara wæpnedmonna gebærum ongitan
mehte, hu hie afyrhtede wæron & agælwede, þa þa wifmen urnon mid
stanum wið þara wealla, & cwædon þæt hie þa burg werian
wolden, gif þa wæpnedmen ne dorsten.
 10.103.19. Þæs on mergen Hannibal gefor to þære byrig,
& beforan ðæm geate his folc getrymede, þe mon hætt Collina.
 10.103.21. Ac þa consulas noldon hie selfe swa earge geþencan
swa hie þa wifmen ær forcwædon, þæt hi hie binnan þære byrg
werian ne dorsten, ac hie hie butan þæm geate angean Hannibal trymedon.
 10.103.24. Ac þa hie togædere woldon, þa com swa ungemetlic
ren, þæt heora nan ne mehte nanes wæpnes gewealdan, & for þæm
toforan.
 10.103.26. Þa se ren ablon, hie foran eft togædere, & eft
wearð oþer swelc ren, þæt hie eft toforan.
 10.103.27. Þa angeat Hannibal, & him self sæde, ðeh ðe
he wilniende wære & wenende Romana anwealdes, þæt hit God ne
geþafode.
 10.103.30. Gesecgað me nu Romane, cwæð Orosius, hwonne
þæt gewurde oþþe hwara, ær ðæm cristendome, þæt oþþe
ge, oþþe oðere æt ænegum godum mehten ren abiddan, swa mon
siþþan mehte, siþþan se cristendom wæs, & nugiet magon monege
gode æt urum Hælendum Criste, þonne him þearf bið.
 10.104.3. Hit wæs þeh swiþe sweotol þæt se ilca Crist
se þe hie eft to cristendome onwende, þæt se him þone ren to
gescildnisse onsende, þeh hie þæs wyrþe næron, to þon þæt
hie selfe, & eac monege oþere þurh hie, to ðæm cristendome &
to ðæm soþan geleafan become.
 10.104.8. On þæm dagum þe þis gewearð, wæron twegen
consulas ofslagen on Ispania, þa wæron gebroðor, & wæron begen
Scipian hatene; hie wæron beswicene from Hasterbale, Pena cyninge.
 10.104.10. On þære tide Cuintus Fuluius se consul geegsade
ealle þa ieldestan men þe on Campaina wæron, þæt hie hie selfe mid
atre acwealdon.
 10.104.11. & ealle þa ieldestan men þe wæron on Capu
þære byrg he ofslog, for þon þe he wende þæt hie wolden Hannibale
on fultume beon, þeh þa senatus him hæfden þa dæd fæste
forboden.
 10.104.16. Þa Romane geacsedan þæt þa consulas on Ispanium
ofslagen wæron, þa ne mehton þa senatus nænne consul under him findan
þe dorste on Ispanie mid firde gefaran, buton þara consula oþres sunu,
Scipia wæs haten, se wæs cniht.
 10.104.19. Se wæs georne biddende þæt him mon fultum
sealde, þæt he moste on Ispanie fird gelædan, & he þæt
færelt swiþost for þæm þurteah, þe he þohte þæt he his
fæder & his fæderan gewræce, þeh þe he hit fæste wið þa
senatus hæle.
 10.104.23. Ac Romane wæron þæs færeltes swa geornfulle,
þeh þe hie swiðe gebrocode wæren on hiora licgendan feo þe hie
gemæne hæfdon, for þæm gewinnum þe hie þa hæfdon on feower
healfa þæt hie eall him gesealdon þæt hie þa hæfdon on þæm
færelte to fultume, buton þæt ælc wifmon hæfde ane yndsan goldes,
& an pund seolfres, & ælc wæpnedmon ænne hring, & ane
hoppan.
 10.104.29. Þa Scipia hæfde gefaren to ðære niwan byrig
Cartaina, þe mon nu Cordofa hætt, he besætt Magonem, Hannibales
broðor; & for þon þe he on þa burgleode on ungearwe becom, he hie
on lytlan firste mid hungre on his geweald geniedde, þæt him se cyning
self on hand eode; & he ealle þa oðre sume ofslog, sume geband, &
þone cyning gebundenne to Rome sende, & monege mid him þara ieldestena
witena.
 10.105.3. Binnan ðære byrig wæs micel licggende feoh
funden.
 10.105.4. Sum hit Scipia to Rome sende, sum he hit het ðæm
folce dælan.
 10.105.6. On ðære tide for Leuinus se consul of Mæcedonia
on Sicilie mid sciphere, & þær geeode Agrigentum þa burg, &
gefeng Hannonam heora latteow.
 10.105.8. Siþþan him eodon on hand feowertig burga, & XXVI
he geeode mid gefeohte.
 10.105.9. On ðære tide Hannibal ofslog Gneus Fuluius þone
consul on Italium, & eahta M mid him.
 10.105.10. Æfter þæm Hannibal feaht wið Marcellus þone
consul þrie dagas.
 10.105.11. Þy forman dæge þa folc feollon on ægðere
healfe gelice.
 10.105.12. Þy æfterran dæge Hannibal hæfde sige.
 10.105.13. Þy þriddan dæge hæfde se consul.
 10.105.13. Æfter þæm Fauius Maximus se consul for mid
sciphere to Tarentan þære byrg, swa Hannibal nyste, & þa burg on
niht abræc, swa þa nyston þe þærinne wæron, & Hannibales
latteow ofslog Cartalon, & XXX M mid him.
 10.105.18. Þæs on þæm æfterran geare Hannibal
bestæl on Marcellus Claudius þone consul, ðær he on firde sætt,
& hiene ofslog, & his folc mid him.
 10.105.20. On þæm dagum Scipia geflemde Hasterbal on Ispanium,
Hannibales oþerne broðor.
 10.105.21. & þæs folces him eode on hand eahtatig burga.
 10.105.22. Swa lað wæs Pena folc Scipian þa he hie gefliemed
hæfde, swa, þeh þe he hie sume wið feo gesealde, ðæt he þæt
weorð nolde agan þæt him mon wið sealde, ac he hit oþrum monnum
sealde.
 10.105.25. On ðæm ilcan geare beswac eft Hannibal twegen
consulas, Marcellus & Cirspinus, & hie ofslog.
 10.105.27. Þa Claudius Nerone & Marcolia Salinatore wæron
consulas, Hasterbal, Hannibales broðor, for mid firde of Ispanium on Italie
Hannibale to fultume.
 10.105.29. Þa geacsedon þa consulas þæt ær, ær
Hannibal, & him ongean comon, swa he þa muntas oferfaren hæfde, &
þær hæfdon longsum gefeoht, ær þara folca aþer fluge.
 10.105.32. Þæt wæs swiþost on ðæm gelong þæt
Hasterbal swa late fleah for þon þe he elpendas mid him hæfde.
 10.105.33. & Romane hæfdon sige.
 10.105.33. Þær wæs Hasterbal ofslagen, & LIII M his
heres, & V M gefangen.
 10.105.34. Þa heton þa consulas Hasterbale þæt heafod of
aceorfan, & aweorpan hit beforan Hannibales wicstowe.
 10.106.2. Þa Hannibale cuð wæs þæt his broðor
ofslagen wæs & þæs folces swa fela mid him, þa wearð him
ærest ege from Romanum, & gefor on Bruti þæt lond.
 10.106.4. Þa hæfde Hannibal & Romane an gear stilnesse him
betweonum, for ðon þe þa folc butu on feferadle mid ungemete swulton.
 10.106.6. On ðære stilnesse Scipia geeode ealle Ispanie, &
siþþan com to Rome, & Romanum to ræde gelærde þæt hie mid
scipum foren on Hannibales land.
 10.106.8. Þa sendon Romane hiene þæt he þæs færeltes
consul wære, & raðe þæs þe he on Pene com, him com ongen Hanno
se cyning unwærlice, & þær ofslagen wearð.
 10.106.11. On þære tide Hannibal gefeaht wið Sempronius
þone consul on Italiam, & hiene bedraf into Romebyrig.
 10.106.13. Æfter þæm Pene foran ongean Scipian mid eallum
hiera fultume, & wicstowa namon on twam stowum, neah þære byrg þe
mon Utica hæt.
 10.106.15. On oþerre wæron Pene, on oþerre Numeðe, þe
him on fultume wæron, & geþoht hæfdon þæt hie ðær
sceoldon wintersetl habban.
 10.106.17. Ac siþþan Scipia geascade þæt þa foreweardas
wæron feor ðæm fæstenne gesette, & eac þæt þær nane
oðre near næran, he þa diegellice gelædde his fird betuh þæm
weardum, & feawe men to oþrum þara fæstenna onsende, to þon
þæt hie his ænne ende onbærndon, þæt siþþan mæst ealle
þe þærbinnan wæron wæron wið þæs fyres weard, to þon
þæt hie hit acwencean þohton.
 10.106.23. He þa Scipia gemong þæm hie mæst ealle
ofslog.
 10.106.23. Þa þæt þa oþre onfundon þe on ðæm
oþrum fæstenne wæron, hie wæron flocmælum þiderweard þæm
oþrum to fultume, & hie Scipia wæs ealle þa niht sleande, swa hie
þonne comon, oð dæg, & siþþan he hie slog ofer ealne þone
dæg fleonde.
 10.106.27. & hiera twegen cyningas, Hasterbal & Sifax,
oþflugon to Cartaina þære byrg, & gegaderodon þone fultum þe hie
þa hæfdon, & ongean Scipian comon, & eft wurdon gefliemde into
Cartaina.
 10.106.30. Sume oþflugon to Cretan þæm iglande.
 10.106.31. & him Scipia sende sciphere æfter, þæt mon
sume ofslog, sume gefeng.
 10.106.32. & Sifax wearð gefangen, hiera oþer cyning, &
siþþan wæs to Rome on racentan sended.
 10.106.34. On þæm gefeohtum wæron Pene swa forhiende
þæt hie na siþþan hie wiþ Romane to nohte ne bemætan; &
sendon on Italie æfter Hannibale, & bædon þæt he him to fultume
come.
 10.106.34. & he him wepende þære bene getygðade, for
þon þe he sceolde Italiam forlætan, on þæm þreoteoðon geare
þæs þe he ær on com.
 10.107.3. & he ealle ofslog þe of þæm landum his men
wæron, & mid him ofer sæ nolden.
 10.107.5. Þa he hamweard seglde, þa het he ænne mon stigan
on þone mæst, & locian hwæþer he þæt land gecneowe þæt
hie toweard wæron.
 10.107.7. Þa sæde he him þæt he gesawe ane tobrocene
byrgenne, swelce hiera þeaw wæs þæt mon ricum monnum bufan eorðan
of stanum worhte.
 10.107.9. Þa wæs Hannibale æfter hiera hæðeniscum
gewunan/ þæt andwyrde swiþe lað, & him unþanc sæde þæs
ondwyrdes.
 10.107.11. & ealne þone here he het mid þæm scipum
þonan wendan þe he ær to geþoht hæfde, & up comon æt Leptan
þæm tune, & hrædlice for to Cartaina, & biddende wæs
þæt he moste wið Scipian sprecan, & wilniende wæs þæt he
frið betwux þæm folcum findan sceolde.
 10.107.15. Ac he hiera sundorspræce, þe hie betux þæm
folcum togædereweard gespræcan, to unsibbe brohton, & hie to gefeohte
geredon.
 10.107.16. & raþe þæs þe hie togædere comon,
Hannibales folc wearð gefliemed, & XX M ofslagen & D, & LXXX
elpenda, & Hannibal oþfleah feowera sum to Aþrametum þæm
fæstenne.
 10.107.19. Þa sendon þa burgleode of Cartaina æfter
Hannibale, & cwædon þæt him soelest wære þæt hie friþes
to Romanum wilnaden.
 10.107.21. Þa þa Gaius Cornelius & Lentulus Publius
wæron consulas, wearð Cartainum frið aliefed from Scipian mid þara
senata willan, on þæt gerad þæt þa igland Sicilia & Sarþinia
hierden to Romanum, & þæt hie him ælce geare gesealden swa fela
talentena seolfres swa hie him þonne aliefden.
 10.107.25. & Scipia het D hira scipa up ateon &
forbærnan; & siþþan to Rome hamweard for.
 10.107.27. Þa him mon þone triumphan ongean brohte, þa eode
þær mid Terrentius, se mæra Cartaina scop, & bær hæt on his
heafde, for þon Romane hæfdon þa niwlice gesett þæt þa þe
hæt beran moston, þonne hie hwelc folc oferwunnen hæfdon, þæt þa
moston ægþer habban ge feorh ge freodom.
 11.107.32. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs D
wintrum & L, wæs geendad Punica þæt æfterre gewin & Romana,
þæt hie dreogende wæron XIII winter.
 11.108.1. Ac Romane raðe þæs oþer angunnon wið
Mæcedonie.
 11.108.2. Þa hluton þa consulas hwelc hiera ærest þæt
gewinn underfenge.
 11.108.3. Þa gehleat hit Quintius Flaminius, & on þæm
gewinne monega gefeoht þurhteah, & oftost sige hæfde, oð Philippus
hira cyning friðes bæd, & hit him Romane aliefdon.
 11.108.5. & siþþan he for on Læcedemonie, & Quintius
Flaminius geniedde begen þa cyningas þæt hie sealdon hiera suna to
gislum.
 11.108.7. Philippus, Mæcedonia cyning, sealde Demetrias his
sunu, & Nauiða sealde, Læcedemonia cyning, Armenan his sunu.
 11.108.9. & ealle þa Romaniscan men þe Hannibal on Crece
geseald hæfde, him bebead se consul þæt hie eal hiera heafod bescearen,
to tacne þæt he hie of ðeowdome dyde.
 11.108.12. On þære tide Subres & Euoi & Cenomanni þa
folc hie togædere gesomnedon for Amilcores lare, Hannibales broðor, þone
he ær on Italiam him beæftan forlet, & siþþan for on Placentie
& on Cremone þa land, & hie mid ealle aweston.
 11.108.15. Þa sendon Romane ðider Claudius Fuluius þone
consul, & he hiene uneaðe oferwan.
 11.108.17. Æfter þæm Flamineus se consul gefeaht wið
Philippus, Mæcedonia cyning, & wið Thraci, & wið Ilirice, &
wið monega oþera þeoda on anum gefeohte, & hie ealle gefliemde.
 11.108.19. Þær wæs Mæcedoniæ eahta M ofslagen, &
VI M gefangen.
 11.108.20. Æfter þæm Sempronius se consul wearð ofslagen
on Ispania mid ealre his firde.
 11.108.21. On þære tide Marcellus se consul wearð
gefliemed/ on Etruria þæm lande.
 11.108.23. Þa com Furius, oþer consul, him to fultume, &
sige hæfde, & hie siþþan þæt land eall aweston.
 11.108.25. Þa þa Lucius Ualerius & Flaccus Marcus wæron
consulas, þa ongon Antiochus, Sira cyning, winnan wið Romanum, & of
Assia on Europe mid firde gefor.
 11.108.27. On þære tide bebudan Romane þæt mon Hannibal
Cartaina cyning gefenge, & hiene siþþan to Rome brohte.
 11.108.29. Þa he þæt hierde, þa fleah he to Antiochuse.
 11.108.29. Sira cyninge, þær he on tweogendlican onbide wæs
hwæðer he wið Romanum winnan dorste, swa he ongunnen hæfde.
 11.108.31. Ac hiene Hannibal aspon þæt he þæt gewin leng
ne ongan.
 11.109.1. Þa sendon Romane Scipian Affricanus hiera ærendracan
to Antiochuse.
 11.109.2. Þa het he Hannibal þæt he wið þa ærendracan
spræce, & him geandwyrde.
 11.109.3. Þa hie nanre sibbe ne gewearð, þa com æfter
þæm Scipia se consul mid Clafrione, oþrum consule, & Antiochuses
folces ofslog XL M.
 11.109.6. Þæs on ðæm æfterran gere gefeaht Scipia
wið Hannibal ute on sæ, & sige hæfde.
 11.109.7. Þa Antiochus þæt gehierde, þa bæd he Scipian
friþes, & him his sunu ham onsende, se wæs on his gewealde, swa he
nyste hu he him to com, butan, swa sume men sædon, þæt he sceolde beon
gefangen on hergiunge oþþe æt wearde.
 11.109.11. On þære firran Ispanie forwearð Emilius se consul
mid eallum his folce from Lusitaniam þære þeode.
 11.109.12. On þæm dagum forwearð Lucius Beuius se consul mid
eallum his folce from Etusci þæm leodum, þæt ðær nan to lafe ne
wearð þæt hit to Rome gebodode.
 11.109.15. Æfter ðæm Fuluius se consul for mid firde on
Crece to þæm beorgum þe mon Olimphus hæt.
 11.109.16. Þa wæs þæs folces fela on an fæsten
oþflogen.
 11.109.17. Þa on ðæm gefeohte þe hie þæt fæsten
brecan woldon, wæs Romana fela mid flanum ofscotod, & mid stanum
oftorfod.
 11.109.19. Þa se consul ongeat þæt hie ðæt fæsten
abrecan ne mehton, þa bebead he sumum þæm folce þæt hie from
þæm fæstenne aforen, & þa oþre he het þæt hie wið þara
oþerra flugen, þonne þæt gefeoht mæst wære, þæt hie mið
þæm aloccoden ut þa þe þærbinnan wæron.
 11.109.23. On þæm fleame þe þa burgware eft wið
þæs fæstennes flugon, hiera wearð ofslagen XL M, & þa þe
þær to lafe wurdon him on hand eodon.
 11.109.25. On þæm dagum for Marcus se consul on Ligor þæt
land, & gefliemed wearð, & his folces ofslagen feower M.
 11.109.28. Þa þa Marcus Claudius & Marcellus Quintus
wæron consulas, Philippus Mæcedonia cyning ofslog Romana ærendracan,
& sende Demetrias his sunu to þæm senatum þæt he þæt irre
gesette wið hie.
 11.109.31. & þeh þe he swa gedyde, þa he ham com,
Philippus het his oþerne sunu þæt he hiene mid atre acwealde, for þon
þe he teah hiene þæt he his ungerisno spræce wið þa senatos.
 11.110.1. On ðære ilcan tide Hannibal his agnum willum hine
selfne mid atre acwealde.
 11.110.3. On þære tide oðewde Fulcania þæt iglond on
Sicilium, þæt næs gesewen ær þa.
 11.110.4. On þære tide Quintius Fuluius se consul gefeaht
wið þa firran Ispanie, & sige hæfde.
 11.110.6. Þa þa Lapidus Mutius wæs consul, wolde seo
strengeste þeod winnan on Romane, þe mon þa het Basterne, & nu hie
mon hæt Hungerre.
 11.110.8. Hie woldon Perseuse to fultume Mæcedonia cyninge.
 11.110.9. Þa wæs Donua seo ea swa swiþe oferfroren,
þæt hie getruwedon þæt hie ofer þæm ise faran mehten; ac hie
mæst/ ealle þær forwurdon.
 11.110.12. Þa þa Plicinius Crassus & Gaius Casius wæron
consulas, þa gewearð þæt Mæcedonisce gewin, þæt mon eaðe
mæg to þæm mæstum gewinnum getellan; for þæm þe on þæm
dagum wæron ealle Italie Romanum on fultume, & eac Ptholomeus Egypta
cyning, & Argeatas Capadocia cyning, & Eumenis Asia cyning, &
Masinissa Numeðia cyning, & Perseuse Mæcedonia cyninge him wæron
on fultume ealle Thraci & Ilirice.
 11.110.18. & raðe þæs þe hie tosomne comon Romane
wurdon gefliemde, & raðe þæs æt oþrum gefeohte hie wurdon eac
gefliemede, & æfter þæm gefeohtum Perseus wæs ealne þone gear
Romane swiþe swencende.
 11.110.21. & siþþan he for on Ilirice, & abræc
Sulcanum hira burg, seo wæs Romanum underþeow, & micel þæs
moncynnes sum acwealde, sum on Mæcedonie lædde.
 11.110.24. Æfter þæm gefeaht Lucius Emilius se consul wið
Perseus, & hiene oferwon, & his folces ofslog XX M.
 11.110.25. & he self æt þæm cirre oþfleah, &
raþe æfter þæm gefangen wearð, & to Rome broht, & þær
ofslagen.
 11.110.27. & monega gefeoht gewurdon on þæm dagum on
monegum landum, þæt hit nu is to longsum eall to gesecgenne.
 12.110.29. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum, þa þa Lucius Lucinius & Lucullus Aula wæron consulas,
wearþ Romanum se mæsta ege from Sceltiuerin, Ispania folce, & nænne
mon næfdon þe þider mid firde dorste gefaran, butan Scipian þæm
consule, se wæs æfter þæm færelte Affricanus haten, for þon
þe he þa oþre siðe þider for þa nan oþer ne dorste, þeh þe
Romane hæfde geworden hwene ær þæt he on Asiam faran sceolde.
 12.111.5. Ac he monega gefeoht on Ispanium & on mislecum sigum
þurhteah.
 12.111.6. On þæm dagum Serius Galua, Scipian gefera, feaht
wið Lusitaniam, Ispania folce, & gefliemed wearð.
 12.111.9. On þæm dagum bebudon Romana godas þæm senatum
þæt mon theatrum worhte him to plegan.
 12.111.10. Ac hit Scipia oftrædlice ham onbead þæt hie hit
ne angunnen, & eac self sæde, þa he ham of Ispanium com, þæt hit
wære se mæsta unræd & se mæsta gedwola.
 12.111.13. Hie þa Romane for his cidinge & þurh his lare
oferhierdon þæm godum, & eall þæt feoh þæt hie þærto
gesomnad hæfdon, þe hie wiþ þæm sylum & wið þæm weorce
sellan woldon, hie hit wið oþrum þingum sealdon.
 12.111.16. Nu mæg þa cristenan gescomian þe swelc deofolgild
lufiað & bigongað, þa se se þe cristen næs hit swa swiðe
forseah, se þe hit fyrþran sceolde æfter hiera agnum gewunan.
 12.111.20. Æfter þæm Serius Galua for eft on Lusitanie,
& frið genam wið hie, & hi under þæm friþe beswac.
 12.111.21. Seo dæd wearð forneah Romanum to ðæm mæstan
hearme, þæt him nan folc ne getruwade þe him underþeow wæs.
 13.111.24. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & II, þa þa Censorinus Marcus & Mallius Lucius wæron
consulas, þa gewearð þæt þridde gewinn Romana & Cartaina, &
gewearð þa senatos him betweonum, gif hie mon þriddan siþe oferwunne,
þæt mon ealle Cartaina towurpe.
 13.111.28. & eft sendon Scipian þider, & he hie æt
heora forman gefeohte gefliemde, & bedraf into Cartaina.
 13.111.30. Æfter þæm hie bædon friðes Romane.
 13.111.30. Ac hit Scipia nolde him aliefan wið nanum oþrum
þinge butan hie him ealle hiera wæpeno ageafen, & þa burg forleten,
& þæt nan ne sæte hiere X milum neah.
 13.112.2. Æfter þæm þe ðæt gedon wæs, hie
cwædon þæt him leofre wære þæt hie mid þære byrig
ætgædere forwurdon þonne hie mon butan him towurpe, & him eft
wæpeno worhton, þa þe isen hæfdon, & þa þe næfdon, hie
worhton sume of seolfre, sume of treowum, & gesetton him to cyningum twegen
Hasterbalas.
 13.112.7. Nu ic wille, cwæð Orosius, secgean hulucu heo
wæs.
 13.112.7. Hiere ymbegong wæs XXX mila; & eall heo wæs mid
sæ utan befangen, butan þrim milum; & se weall wæs XX fota ðicce,
& XL elna heah; & þær wæs binnan oþer læsse fæsten on
ðæm sæs clife, þæt wæs twegea mila heah.
 13.112.11. Hie þa Cartainenses æt þæm cirre þa burg
aweredon, þeh þe Scipia ær fela þæs wealles tobrocen hæfde,
& siþþan hamweard for.
 13.112.14. Þa þa Gneo Cornelius & Lentulus Lucinius
wæron consulas, ða for Scipia þriddan siþe on Affrice, to þon
þæt he þohte Cartainan toweorpan.
 13.112.16. & þa he þærto com, he wæs VI dagas on þa
burg feohtende, oþ þa burgware bædon þæt hie mosten beon hiera
underþeowas, þa hi hie bewerian ne mehton.
 13.112.18. Þa het Scipia ealle þa wifmen ærest utgan, þara
wæs XXVI M, & þa þa wæpnedmen, þara wæs XXX M.
 13.112.20. & se cyning Hasterbal hiene selfne acwealde, &
his wif mid hiere twæm sunum hie selfe forbærnde for þæs cyninges
deaðe.
 13.112.22. & Scipia het ealle þa burg toweorpan, &
ælcne hiewestan tobeatan, þæt hie to nanum wealle siþþan ne
mehton.
 13.112.23. & seo burg inneweard barn XVI dagas, ymb DCC wintra
þæs þe heo ær getimbred wæs.
 13.112.26. Þa wæs þæt þridde gewin geendad Punica &
Romana on þæm feorþan geare þæs þe hit ær ongunnen wæs;
þeh þe Romane hæfden ær longsum gemot ymb þæt, hwæþer him
rædlecre wære, þe hie þa burg mid ealle fordyden, þæt hie a
siþþan on þa healfe frið hæfden, þe hi hie stondan forleten, to
þon þæt him gewin eft þonan onwoce, for þon þe hie ondredon, gif
hie hwilum ne wunnen, þæt hie to raþe aslawoden & aeargoden.
 13.113.1. Swa þæt eow Romanum nu eft cuþ wearþ, siþþan
se cristendom wæs, cwæð Orosius, þæt ge eowerra ieldrena hwetstan
forluran eowerra gewinna & eowres hwætscipes, for þon ge sindon nu
utan fætte & innan hlæne, & eowre ieldran wæron utan hlæne
& innan fætte, stronges modes & fæstes.
 13.113.5. Ic nat eac, cwæð he, hu nyt ic þa hwile beo þe
ic þas word sprece, butan þæt ic min geswinc amirre.
 13.113.7. Hit biþ eac geornlic þæt mon heardlice gnide
þone hnescestan mealmstan æfter þæm þæt he þence þone
soelestan hwetstan on to geræceanne.
 13.113.9. Swa þonne is me nu swiþe earfeðe hiera mod to
ahwettanne, nu hit nawþer nyle beon, ne scearp ne heard.
