Or 5
B9.2.6.
Orosius, Book 5: Bately 1980, 113-132.



 1.113.11. Ic wat, cwæð Orosius, hwæt se Romana gelp
swiþost is, for þon þe hie monega folc oferwunnan, & monege cyningas
beforan hiera triumphan oftrædlice drifon.
 1.113.13. Þæt sindon þa godan tida þe hie ealneg
foregielpað, gelicost þæm þe hie nu cweþen þæt þa tida him
anum gesealde wæron, & næren eallum folcum.
 1.113.15. Ac þær hie hit georne ongitan cuþen, þonne
wisten hie þæt hie wæron eallum folcum gemæne.
 1.113.17. Gif hie þonne cweðað þæt þa tida goda
wæron, for þon þe hie þa ane burg welge gedydan, þonne magon hie
ryhtor cweþan þæt þæt wæren þa ungesælgestan, for þon
þe þurh þære anre burge wlenco wurdon ealle oþra to wædlan
gedone.
 1.113.20. Gif hie þonne þæs ne geliefen, ascian þonne
Italie hiera agne londleode, hu him þa tida gelicoden, þa hie mon slog
& hiende, & on oþru land sealde XX wintra & C.
 1.113.23. Gif hie þonne him ne geliefen, ascien þonne Ispanie,
þe þæt ilce wæron dreogende CC wintra, & monege oþre þeoda;
& eac þa monegan cyningas, hu him licade, þonne hie mon on geocum
& on racentum beforan hiera triumphan drifon, him to gelpe, wið Rome
weard, & siþþan on carcernum lægon, oþ hie deaðe swulton.
 1.113.28. & hie monege cyningas geswencton, to þon þæt
hie eall gesealdon þæt hie þonne hæfdon wiþ hiera earman life.
 1.113.30. Ac for þon hit is us uncuð & ungeliefedlic for
þon þe we sint on þæm friþe geborene þe hie þa uneaðe hiera
feorh mid geceapedon.
 1.114.2. Þæt wæs siþþan Crist geboren wæs þæt
we wæron of ælcum þeowdome aliesde & of ælcum ege, gif we him
fulgongan willaþ.
 2.114.4. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & VI, þæt wæs þy ilcan geare þe Cartaina toworpen
wæs, æfter hiere hryre Gneo Cornelius & Lentulus Lucio towurpon
Corinthum, ealra Creca heafedburg.
 2.114.7. On hiere bryne gemulton ealle þa onlicnessa togædere
þe þærbinnan wæron, ge gyldene, ge sylfrene, ge ærene, ge cyprene,
& on pyttas besuncan.
 2.114.9. Giet to dæge mon hæt Corrinthisce fatu ealle þe
þærof gewarhte wæron, for þon þe hie sint fægran & dierran
þonne ænegu oþru.
 2.114.12. On þæm dagum wæs an hirde on Ispanium, se wæs
Ueriatus haten, & wæs micel þeofmon, & on þære stalunge he
wearð reafere.
 2.114.14. & on ðæm reaflace he him geteah to micelne
monfultum, & monege tunas oferhergeade.
 2.114.15. Æfter þæm his weorod weox to þon swiþe
þæt he monega land forhergeade.
 2.114.16. & Romanum wearð micel ege from him, & Uecilius
þone consul ongean hiene mid firde sendon, & he þær gefliemed
wearð, & his folces se mæsta dæl ofslagen.
 2.114.18. Æt oþrum cirre þider for Gaius Folucius se
consul, & eac gefliemed wearð.
 2.114.20. Æt þriddan cirre þider for Claudius se consul,
& þohte þæt he Romana bismer gewrecan sceolde, ac he hit on þæm
færelte swiþor geiecte, & uneaþe self com aweg.
 2.114.23. Æfter þæm Ueriatus gemette mid þrim hunde monna
Romana an M on anum wuda.
 2.114.24. Þær wæs Ueriatuses folces ofslagen LXX, &
Romana CCC, & þa oþre gefliemde.
 2.114.25. On þæm fleame wearð an Ueriatuses þegn þæm
oþrum to longe æfterfylgende, oþ mon his hors under him ofsceat.
 2.114.27. Þa woldon þa oþre ealle hiene ænne ofslean,
oþþe gebindan.
 2.115.1. Þa slog he anes monnes hors mid his sweorde þæt him
wand þæt heafod of.
 2.115.2. Siþþan wæs eallum þæm oþrum swa micel ege
from him þæt hi hiene leng gretan ne dorstan.
 2.115.4. Æfter þæm Apius Claudius se consul gefeaht wið
Gælle, & þær gefliemed wearð; & raþe þæs eft fird
gelædde wiþ hie, & sige hæfde, & hiera ofslog VI M.
 2.115.6. Þa he hamweard wæs, þa bæd he þæt mon dyde
beforan him þone triumphan.
 2.115.7. Ac him Romane untreowlice his forwierndon, & hit under
þæt ladedon for þon þe he ær æt þæm oþrum cirre sige
næfde.
 2.115.10. Æfter þæm wearþ swa micel moncwealm on Rome
þæt þær nan utancymen mon cuman ne dorste, & monega land binnan
þære byrig wæron butan ælcum ierfwearde.
 2.115.12. Hie witon þeah þæt þæt ilce yfel ofereode
butan geblote, swa þa monegan ær dydan þe hie wendon þæt hie mid
hiera deofolgildum gestiered hæfden.
 2.115.14. Butan tweon, gif hie þa blotan mehten, hie woldon
secgean þæt him hiera godas gehulpan.
 2.115.16. Ac hit wæs Godes gifu þæt ealle þa lægon
þe hit don sceoldon, oþ hit self ofereode.
 2.115.18. Æfter þæm Fauius se consul for mid firde ongean
Ueriatus, & gefliemed wearð.
 2.115.19. Se ilca consul gedyde eallum Romanum þa bismerlecestan
dæd, þa he aspon of Sciþþium DC monna to him his geþoftena, &
þa hie him to coman, he het him eallum þa honda of aceorfan.
 2.115.22. Æfter þæm Pompeius se consul for on Numentinas,
Ispania þeode, & gefliemed wearþ.
 2.115.23. Ymb XIIII gear þæs þe Ueriatus wið Romane winnan
ongan, he wearð from his agnum monnum ofslagen; & swa oft swa hiene
Romane mid gefeohte gesohton, he hie simle gefliemde.
 2.115.26. Þær dydon þeah Romane lytla triewþa þæt
him þa wæron laðe & unweorþe þe hiera hlaford beswican, þeh
þe hie him leana to þære dæde wenden.
 2.115.29. Ic sceal eac niede þara monegena gewinna geswigian þe
on ðæm eastlondum gewurdon.
 2.115.30. His me sceal aþreotan for Romana gewinnum.
 2.115.31. On þære tide Mitridatis, Partha cyning, geeode
Babyloniam, & ealle þa land þe betwux þæm twæm eaum wæron,
Induse & Iþasfe, þa wæron ær on Romana anwalde.
 2.116.1. & siþþan he gebrædde his rice east oþ India
gemæro.
 2.116.2. & Demetrias, Asia cyning, hiene tuwa mid firde
gesohte.
 2.116.3. Æt oþrum cirre he wearð gefliemed, æt oþrum
gefangen.
 2.116.4. He wæs on Romana onwalde, for þon þe hie hiene
þær gesetton.
 2.116.6. Æfter þæm Mantius se consul for on Numentine,
Ispania folc, & þær wæs winnende oþ he genom friþ wiþ
þæt folc, & hiene siþþan aweg bestæl.
 2.116.8. Þa he ham com, þa heton hiene Romane gebindan, &
gebringean beforan Numentia fæstennes geate.
 2.116.9. Þa nawþer ne hine þa eft ham lædan ne dorston
þe hiene þider læddon, ne his þa onfon noldon þe hiene mon to
brohte, ac swiþe hreowlice swa gebend he on anre stowe beforan þæm geate
wæs wuniende, oþ he his lif forlet.
 2.116.14. On þæm dagum Brutus se consul ofslog Ispania folces
LX M, þa wæron Lusitaniam on fultume.
 2.116.15. & raþe þæs he for eft on Lusitanie, &
hiera ofslog L M, & VI M gefeng.
 2.116.16. On þæm dagum for Lapidus se consul on þa nearran
Ispanie, & gefliemed wearð, & his folces wæs ofslagen VI M.
 2.116.18. & þa þe þær aweg comon, hie oþflugon mid
þæm mæstan bismre.
 2.116.19. Hwæþer Romane hit witen nu ænegum men to
secganne, hwæt hiera folces on Ispanium on feawum gearum forwurde?
 2.116.21. Þonne hie from gesælgum tidum gilpað, þonne
wæron þa him selfum þa ungesælgestan.
 2.116.23. Ða þa Seruius Fuluius & Flaccus Quintus wæron
consulas, wearþ on Rome an cild geboren, þæt hæfde IIII fet &
IIII handa, & IIII eagan, & IIII earan.
 2.116.25. On þæm geare asprong up Æþna fyr on Sicilium,
& mare þæs landes forbærnde þonne hit æfre ær dyde.
 3.116.27. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & XX, þa þa Mantius gedyde þone yfelan friþ on Numaantium
swa hit Romane selfe sædon þæt under hiera anwalde nan bismerlecre
dæd ne gewurde, buton on þæm gefeohte æt Caudenes Furculus, þa
sendon Romane Scipian on Numantie mid firde.
 3.116.31. Hie sindon on þæm norðwestende Ispania; & heo
hie selfe ær þæm mid feower M aweredon XIIII winter wið Romana XL M,
& oftost sige hæfdon.
 3.117.3. Þa besæt Scipia hie healf gear on hiera fæstenne,
& hie to þon gebrocode þæt him leofre wæs þæt hie hie seolfe
forneðdon þonne hie þa iermþo leng þrowoden.
 3.117.5. Þa Scipia onget þæt hie swelces modes wæron,
þa het he sum his folc feohtan on þæt fæsten þæt hie mid
þæm þæt folc ut aloccoden.
 3.117.7. Þa wæron þa burgware to þon fægene & to
þon bliðe þæt hie feohtan moston, & gemong ðæm gefean hie hie
selfe mid ealoð oferdrencton, & ut irnende wæron æt twæm
geatum.
 3.117.10. On þære byrig wæs ærest ealogeweorc ongunnen,
for þon þe hie win næfdon.
 3.117.11. On þæm swicdome wearþ Numantia duguð
gefeallen.
 3.117.12. & se dæl þe þær to lafe wearð
forbærndon/ ealle þa burg, for ðon þe hie ne uþon þæt hiera
fiend to hiera ealdgestreonum fengon; & æfter þæm hie hie selfe on
þæm fyre forspildon.
 3.117.16. Þa Scipia hiene hamweard wende of þæm lande, þa
com him to an eald mon, se wæs Numentisc.
 3.117.17. Þa frægn Scipia hiene an hwy hit gelang wære
þæt Numentiæ swa raðe ahnescaden, swa hearde swa hie longe wæron.
 3.117.19. Ða sæde he him þæt hie wæren hearde, þa
hwile þe hie hira anrædnesse geheoldon him betweonum, & anfealdnesse;
& sona swa hie him betweonum ungerædnesse upahofon, swa forwurdon hie
ealle.
 3.117.22. Ða wearð Scipian þæt ondwyrde swiþe andrysne,
& ealle Romana weotan for ðæm andwyrde & forþam wordudm hi
wurdon/ swiðe mid geegsade, þa he ham com, for þon þe hie þa
hæfdon ungerædnesse him betweonum.
 3.117.26. On þære tide Craccus wæs haten, an þara
consula, & he winnan ongon wið ealle þa oþre, oþ hie hiene
ofslogon.
 3.117.27. & eac on þære tide on Sicilium þa þeowas
wunnan wið þa hlafordas, & uneaþe oferwunnene wurdon, & VI M
ofslagen, ær hie mon gebiggiean mehte, & æt þære anre byrg
Minturnan hiera mon aheng fifte healf hund.
 4.118.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & XXI, Lucinius Crassus se consul, wæs eac Romana ieldesta
biscep, he gefor mid firde ongean Aristonocuse þæm cyninge, se wolde
geagnian him þa læssan Asiam, þeh þe hie ær Attalis his agen
broðor hæfde Romanum to boclande geseald.
 4.118.5. Crassuse wæron monege cyningas of monegum landum to
fultume cumene.
 4.118.6. An wæs of Nicomedia, oþer of Biþþinia, þridda
of Ponto, feorþa of Armenia, fifta of Argeate, sixta of Cappadocia, seofoða
of Filimine, eahteþa of Paflogoniam.
 4.118.9. & þehhwæþre, raðe þæs ðe hie
togædere comon, se consul wearð gefliemed, þeh he micelne fultum
hæfde.
 4.118.11. Þa þæt Perpena gehierde, se oþer consul, he þa
hrædlice fird gegaderade, & on þone cyning ungearone becom, þa his
fird eall tofaren wæs, & hiene bedraf into anum fæstenne, &
hiene besæt, oþ hiene þa burgleode ageafan þæm consule, & hiene
het siþþan to Rome bringan, & on carcern bescufan, & he þær
leg oþ he his lif forlet.
 4.118.17. On þære tide Antiochuse, Asia cyninge, geþuhte
ðæt he rice genoh næfde, & wilnade þæt he Parthe begeate,
& þider for mid monegum þusendum, & hiene þær Parthe
ieþelice oferwunnan, & þone cyning ofslogan, & him þæt rice
geagnedan; for þon Antiochus giemde hwæt he hæfde monna gerimes, &
ne nom nane ware hulice hie wæron, for þon hiera wæs ma forcuþra
þonne æltæwra.
 4.118.24. On þære tide Scipia, se betsta & se selesta
Romana/ witena & þegna, mænde his earfoða to Romana witum,
þær hie æt hiera gemote wæron, hwy hie hiene swa unweorðne on his
ylde dyden; & ascade hie for hwy hie nolden geþencan ealle þa brocu
& þa geswinc þe he for hira willan, & eac for hiera niedþearfe
fela wintra dreogende wæs, unarimedlice oft; & hu he hie adyde of
Hannibales þeowdome, & of monegre oþerre þeode; & hu he him to
þeowdome gewylde ealle Ispanie, & ealle Africe.
 4.119.3. On þære ilcan niht þe he on dæg þas word
spræc/ Romane him geþancodon ealles his geswinces mid wyrsan leane
þonne/ he to him geearnod hæfde þa hie hiene on his bedde asmorodon
rysemodon/; æt he his lif alet. Eala, Romane, hwa mæg eow nu
truwian/ þa ge swylc lean dydon eowrum þam getrywestan witan?
 4.119.9. Ða þa Emilius Orestes wæs consul, Eþna fyr
afleow up swa brad & swa micel, þætte feawe men þara monna mehten
beon eardfæste, þe on Lipare wæron þæm iglande, þe þær
nihst wæs, for þære hæte & for þæm stence; ge ealle ða
clifu þe neah þæm sæ wæron forburnan to ascan; & ealle þa
scipu formulton þe neah þæm se færende wæron, ge ealle þa
fiscas þe on þæm sæ wæron acwelan for þære hæte.
 4.119.16. Ða þa Marcus Flaccus wæs consul, comon
gærstapan on Affrice, & ælc wuht forscurfon þæs þe on þæm
lande wæs weaxendes & growendes.
 4.119.18. Æfter þæm com an wind, & forbleow hie ut on
sæ.
 4.119.19. Æfter þæm þe hie adruncne wæron, hie wearp
se sæ up, & siþþan mæst eall forwearð þæt on þæm
lande wæs, ge monna, ge nietena, ge wildeora for þæm stence.
 5.119.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & XXVII, þa þa Lucius Mella & Quintus Flamineus wæron
consulas, þa gewearð þa senatos þæt mon eft sceolde getimbran
Cartainam.
 5.119.25. Ac þære ilcan niht þe mon on dæg hæfde þa
burg mid stacum gemearcod, swa swa hie hie þa wyrcean woldon, wulfas atugan
þa stacan up, & þa men forleton þæt weorc for þæm, &
longe gemot ymb þæt hæfdon hwæðer hit tacnade, þe sibbe þe
unsibbe, & hie hie swa þeah eft getimbredon.
 5.120.3. On þære tide Metellus se consul for on Belearis
þæt land, & oferwan þa wicingas þe on þæt land hergedon,
þeh þara londleod a eac fela forwurde.
 6.120.6. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC
wintrum & XXVII, Fauius se consul gemette Betuitusan, Gallia cyning, &
hiene mid lytlum fultume ofercom.
 7.120.9. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DC wintra
& XXXV, þa þa Scipia Nasica & Lucius Calfurnius wæron consulas
on Rome, Romane wunnon wið Geoweorþan, Numeðia cyninge.
 7.120.11. Se ilca Geoweorða wæs Mecipsuses mæg, Numeðia
cyninges.
 7.120.12. & he hiene on his geogoðe underfeng, & hiene
fedan het, & tyhtan mid his twam sunum.
 7.120.14. & þa se cyning gefor, he bebead his twæm sunum
þæt hie þæs rices þriddan dæl Geoweorþan sealden.
 7.120.15. Ac siþþan se þridda dæl on his gewealde wæs,
he beswac begen þa suna: oþerne he ofslog, oþerne adræfde.
 7.120.17. & he siþþan gesohte Romane him to friþe.
 7.120.18. & hie sendon Calfurnan þone consul mid him mid
firde.
 7.120.18. Ac Geoweorða geceapade mid his feo æt þæm
consule þæt he þæs gewinnes lytel þurhteah.
 7.120.20. Æfter þæm Geoweorþa com to Rome, &
diegellice geceapade to þæm senatum, to anum & to anum, þæt hie
ealle wæron ymb hiene twywyrdige.
 7.120.22. Þa he hiene hamweard of þære byrig wende, þa
tælde he Romane, & hie swiþe bismrade mid his wordum, & sæde
þæt mon nane burg ne mehte ieð mid feo geceapian, gif hiere ænig mon
ceapode.
 7.120.26. Þæs on þæm æfterran geare Romane sendon
Anilius Mostumius þone consul mid LX M angean Geoweorþan.
 7.120.27. Heora gemeting wæs æt Colima þære byrig,
& þær wæron Romane oferwunnen.
 7.121.1. & siþþan lytle hwile hie genamon friþ him
betweonum, & siþþan mæst ealle Africe gecirdon to Geoweorþan.
 7.121.3. Æfter þæm Romane sendon eft Metellus mid firde
angean Geoweorþan, & he sige hæfde æt twam cierrun & æt
þriddan cierre he bedraf Geoweorþan on Numeðiam his agen lond, &
hiene geniedde þæt he sealde Romanum þreo hund gisla.
 7.121.7. & he þeh siþþan na þy læs ne hergeade on
Romane.
 7.121.8. Þa sendon hie eft Marius þone consul angean
Geoweorþan, a swa lytigne & a swa brægdenne swa he wæs; & for
to anre byrg gelicost þæm þe he hie abrecan þohte.
 7.121.10. Ac sona swa Geoweorþa hæfde his fultum to þære
byrg gelædd angean Marius, þa forlet he Marius þæt fæsten, &
for to oþrum, þær he geascade þæt Geoweorþan goldhord wæs,
& geniedde þa burgleode þæt hie him eodon on hond, & him
ageafon eall þæt licgende feoh þæt þærbinnan wæs.
 7.121.15. Þa ne getruwade Geoweorþa his agnum folce ofer
þæt, ac geþoftade him wiþ Bohan, Mauritania cyning.
 7.121.16. & he him com to mid micle monfultume, &
oftrædlice on Romane stalade, oþ hie gecwædon folcgefeoht him
betweonum.
 7.121.18. To þæm gefeohte hæfde Boho Geoweorþan broht to
fultume LX M gehorsedra butan feþan.
 7.121.20. Næs na mid Romanum ær ne siþþan swa heard
gefeoht swa þær wæs, for þon þe hie wurdon on ælce healfe utan
befangen, & heora eac mæst for þon forwearþ þe hiora gemitting
wæs on sondihtre dune, þæt hie for duste ne mehton geseon hu hi hi
behealdan sceolden.
 7.121.24. Toeacan þæm hie derede ægþer ge þurst ge
hæte, & ealne ðone dæg wæron þæt þafiende oþ niht.
 7.121.25. Þa on mergen hie wæron þæt ilce donde, &
eft wæron on ælce healfe utan befangen, swa hie ær wæron.
 7.121.27. & þa hie swiðost tweode hwæðer hie aweg
comen, þa gecwædon hie þæt hie sume hie beæftan wereden, &
sume þurh ealle þa truman ut afuhten, gif hie mehten.
 7.121.29. Þa hie swa gedon hæfdon, þa com an ren; &
swiþe Mauritaniæ wæron mid þæm gewergade, for þon þe hiera
sceldas wæron betogen mid elpenda hydum, þæt hie heora feawa for
þam/ wætan ahebban mehton, & for þæm gefliemde wurdon, for þon
þe elpendes hyd wile drincan wætan, gelice & spynge deð.
 7.122.2. Þær wearð Mauritania ofslagen LX M & an hund.
 7.122.3. Æfter þæm Boho genom friþ wið Romanum, &
him Geoweorþan gebundenne ageaf, & hiene mon dyde siþþan on carcern
& his twegen suna, oþ hie þær ealle acwælon.
 8.122.6. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VI hunde
wintra & XLII, þa þa Malius & Cuintinus wæron consulas, Romane
gefuhton wið Cimbros & wið Teutonas & wið Ambronos, þas þeoda
wæron on Gallium, & þær ealle ofslagene wurdon buton X monnum,
þæt wæs XL M.
 8.122.10. & þær wæs Romane ofslagen eahtatig þusenda,
& heora consul & his twegen suna.
 8.122.11. Æfter þæm þa ilcan ðeoda besætan Marius
þone consul on anum fæstenne, & hit long first wæs ær he ut
wolde faran to gefeohte, ær him mon sæde þæt hie wolden faran on
Italiam, Romana lond.
 8.122.14. Ac siþþan he him for to ut of þæm fæstenne,
þa hi hi on anre dune gemetton, þa mænde þæs consules folc to him
heora þurst, þe him getenge wæs.
 8.122.16. Þa andwyrde he him, & cwæð: Eaþe we magon
geseon on oþre healfe urra feonda hwær se drinca is gelang þe us nihst
is; ac for þæm þe hie us near sint, we him ne magon buton gefeohte to
cuman.
 8.122.19. Þær hæfdon Romane sige, & þær wæs
Gallia ofslagen twa hund M, & hiora latteow, & eahtatig M gefangen.
 9.122.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VI hunde
wintrum & XLV, on þæm fiftan geare þe Marius wæs consul, &
eac þa mid Romanum wæs sibb of oþrum folcum, þa ongunnon Romane þa
mæstan sace him betweonum up aræran, þeh ic hit nu scortlice secgan
scyle, cwæð Orosius, hwa þæs ordfruman wæron.
 9.122.26. Þæt wæs ærest Marius se consul, & Lucius,
& Apulcius, & Saturninus, þæt hie adræfdon Metellus þone
consul on elþeode, se wæs consul ær Marius.
 9.123.2. Hit wæs þa swiþe oþþyncende þam oþrum
consulum, Pompeiuse & Caton; þeh þe hie mid þære wrace þæm
adræfdan on nanum stale beon ne mehton, hie þeh þurhtugon þæt hie
ofslogon Lucius & Saturninus, & eft wæron biddende þæt Metellus
to Rome moste.
 9.123.6. Ac him þagiet Marius & Furius forwierndon, & him
þa siþþan se feondscipe wæs betweonum weaxende, þeh þe hie hit
openlice cyþan ne dorsten for þara senatum ege.
 10.123.9. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VI C
wintra & LXI, on þæm siextan geare þe Iulius se casere wæs
consul & Lucius Martius, wearþ ofer ealle Italia ungeferlic unsibb &
openlice cuð betuh Iuliuse & Pompeiuse, þeh hie hit ær swiþe him
betweonum diernden.
 10.123.13. & eac on þæm geare gewurdon monega wundor on
monegum londum.
 10.123.14. An wæs þæt mon geseah swelce an fyren hring
norðan cumen mid micle swege.
 10.123.15. Oþer wearþ on Tarentan þære byrig æt anre
feorme: þonne mon þa hlafas wrat to þicgeanne, þonne orn þær blod
ut.
 10.123.17. Þæt þridde wæs þæt hit hagolade seofon
niht, dæges & nihtes, ofer ealle Romane.
 10.123.18. & on Somnia þæm londe seo eorþe tobærst,
& þonan up wæs biernende fyr wið þæs hefones.
 10.123.20. & mon geseah swelce hit wære an gylden hring on
heofonum brædre þonne sunne; & wæs from þæm heofone bradiende
niþer oþ þa eorþan, & wæs eft farende wið þæs heofones.
 10.123.23. On þære tide Pincente þæt folc, & Uestine,
& Marse, & Peligni, & Marrucine, & Somnite, & Lucani hie
ealle gewearð him betweonum þæt hie wolden Romanum geswican, &
ofslogon Gaius Seruius, Romana ealdormon, se wæs mid ærendum to him
onsended.
 10.123.26. On ðæm dagum aweddon þa nietenu & þa hundas
þe wæron on Somnitum.
 10.123.28. Æfter þæm gefeaht Pompeius se consul wið eal
þa folc, & gefliemed wearþ.
 10.123.29. & Iulius se cesar gefeaht wið Marse þæm
folce, & gefliemed wearð.
 10.124.1. Raþe þæs Iulius gefeaht wið Somnitum, &
wið Lucanum, & hie gefliemde.
 10.124.2. Æfter þæm hiene mon het casere.
 10.124.2. Þa bæd he þæt mon þone triumphan him ongean
brohte.
 10.124.3. Þa sende him mon ane blace hacelan angean, him on
bismer, for triumphan.
 10.124.3. & eft hie him sendon ane tunecan ongean, þa þe
hie toge heton, þæt he ealles buton arunge to Rome ne com.
 10.124.7. Æfter þæm Silla se consul, Pompeiuses gefera,
gefeaht wið Esernium þæm folce, & hie gefliemde.
 10.124.8. Æfter þæm gefeaht Pompeius wið Pincentes
þæm folce, & hie gefliemde.
 10.124.9. Þa brohton Romane þone triumphan angean Pompeius mid
micelre weorþfulnesse for þæm lytlan sige þe he þa hæfde, &
noldon Iuliuse nænne weorþscipe don, þeh he maran dæd gedon hæfde,
buton ane tunecan, & hi heora gewin mid þæm swiþe geiecton.
 10.124.13. Æfter þæm Iulius & Pompeius abræcan
Asculum þa burg on Mærsum, & þær ofslogon eahtatiene M.
 10.124.15. Æfter þæm gefeaht Silla se consul wið
Somnitum, & heora ofslog eahtatiene M.
 11.124.17. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VI
hunde wintra & LXII, þætte Romane sendon Sillan þone consul ongean
Metreþatis Partha cyning.
 11.124.19. Þa ofþuhte þæt Mariuse þæm consule,
Iuliuses eame, þæt mon ðæt gewin nolde him betæcan.
 11.124.20. & bæd þæt him mon sealde þone seofoþan
consulatum, & eac þæt gewin, for þon þe hit wæs þeaw mid him
þæt mon ymbe XII monað dyde ælces consules setl ane pyle hierre
þonne hit ær wæs.
 11.124.23. Þa Silla geacsade on hwelc gerad Marius com to Rome,
he þa hrædlice mid ealre his firde wið Rome weard farende wæs, &
Marius bedraf into Romeburg mid eallum his folce, & hiene siþþan þa
burgleode gefengon & gebundon, & hiene siþþan þohton Sillan
agifan.
 11.124.27. Ac he fealh þære ilcan niht of þæm bendum þe
hiene mon on dæg gebende, & siþþan fleah suþ ofer sæ on
Affricam/, þær his fultum mæst wæs; & raþe eft wæs
cirrende wið Rome weard.
 11.125.3. Him wæron twegen consulas on fultume, Cinna &
Sertorius, þa wæron simle ælces yfles ordfruman.
 11.125.5. & raðe þæs þe þa senatus gehierdon
þæt Marius to Rome nealæcte, hie ealle ut aflugon on Creca lond
æfter Sillan & æfter Pompeiuse, þider hi þa mid firde gefaren
wæron.
 11.125.7. Þa wæs Silla mid micelre geornfulnisse færende of
Crecum wiþ Rome weard, & wið Marius heardlice gefeaht þurhteah, &
hiene gefliemde, & ealle ofslog binnan Romebyrg þe Mariuse on fultume
wæron.
 11.125.11. Raðe þæs ealle þa consulas wæron deade buton
twæm.
 11.125.11. Marius & Silla geforan him self, & Cinna wæs
ofslagen on Smyrna, Asia byrg, & Sertorius wæs ofslagen on Ispania.
 11.125.14. Þa underfeng Pompeius Partha gewin, for þon
Metreþatis heora cyning teah him to þa læssan Asiam & eall Creca
lond.
 11.125.15. Ac hiene Pompeius of eallum þæm londe afliemde,
& hiene bedraf on Armenie, & him æfterfylgende wæs, oþ hiene
oþþre men ofslogan, & geniedde Archaraus þone latteow þæt he
wæs his underþeow.
 11.125.19. Hit is ungeliefedlic to secganne, cwæð Orosius,
hwæt on þæm gewinne forwearþ þæt hie wæron dreogende XL
wintra, ær hit geendad mehte beon, ægþer ge on þeoda forhergiunge, ge
on cyninga slihtum, ge on hungre.
 11.125.23. Þa Pompeius hamweard wæs, þa noldan him þa
londleode þæt fæsten aliefan æt Hierusalem.
 11.125.24. Him wæron on fultume XXII cyninga.
 11.125.25. Þa het Pompeius þæt mon þæt fæsten
bræce, & on fuhte dæges & nihtes, simle an legie æfter
oþerre unwerig; & þæt folc mid þæm aþrytton þæt hie him
on hond eodon, ymbe þreo monað þæs þe hie mon ær ongon.
 11.125.28. Þær wæs Iudea ofslagen XIII M.
 11.125.28. & mon towearp þone weal niþer oþ þone
grund.
 11.125.29. & mon lædde Aristobolus to Rome gebundenne; se
wæs ægþer ge heora cyning ge heora biscop.
 12.126.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VI hund
wintra & LXVII, Romane gesealdon Gaiuse Iuliuse seofon legan, to þon
þæt he sceolde fif winter winnan on Gallie.
 12.126.3. Æfter þæm þe he hie oferwunnen hæfde, he for
on Bretanie þæt iglond, & wið þa Brettas gefeaht, & gefliemed
wearð on þæm londe þe mon hæt Centlond.
 12.126.6. Raþe þæs he gefeaht wiþ þa Brettas eft on
Centlonde, & hie wurdon gefliemede.
 12.126.7. Heora þridde gefeoht wæs neah þære ie þe mon
hæt Temes, neh þæm forda þe mon hæt Welengaford.
 12.126.8. Æfter þæm gefeohte him eode on hond se cyning
& þa burgware þe wæron on Cirenceastre, & siþþan ealle þe
on þæm iglonde wæron.
 12.126.11. Æfter þæm Iulius for to Rome, & bæd
þæt him mon brohte þone triumphan ongean.
 12.126.12. Þa onbudon hie him þæt he come mid feawum monnum
to Rome, & ealne his fultum beæftan him lete.
 12.126.13. Ac þa he hamweard for, him coman angean þa III
ealdormen þe him on fultume wæron, & him sædon þæt hie for his
þingum adræfde wæron, & eac þæt ealle þa legean wæron
Pompeiuse to fultume gesealde þe on Romana anwalde wæron, þæt he þy
fæstlecre gewinn mehte habban wið hiene.
 12.126.18. Þa wende eft Iulius to his agnum folce, & wepende
mænde þa unare þe him mon buton gewyrhton dyde, & swiþost þara
monna þe for his þingun forwurdon.
 12.126.20. & he him siþðan aspon to þa seofon legian þe
wæron on Silomone þæm londe.
 12.126.22. Þa Pompeius & Cato & ealle þa senatus
þæt hierdon, þa foran hi on Crecas, & micelne fultum gegaderedon on
Thraci þære dune.
 12.126.24. Þa for Iulius to Rome, & abræc hiera maðmhus,
& eall gedælde his firde þæt þærinne wæs.
 12.126.25. Þæt is ungeliefedlic to gesecganne, cwæð
Orosius, hwæt þæs ealles wæs.
 12.126.26. Æfter þæm he for on Marisiam þæt lond,
& þær let þreo legian beæftan him, to þon þæt hie þæt
folc to him genieddon.
 12.127.1. & he self mid þæm oþrum dæle for on
Ispanie, þær Pompeiuses legian wæron mid his þrim ladteowum, &
he hie ealle to him geniedde.
 12.127.3. & æfter þæm he for on Creca lond, þær
his Pompeius on anre dune onbad mid XXXgum cyningum, buton his agnum fultume.
 12.127.5. Þa for Pompeius þær Marcellus wæs, Iuliuses
ladteow, & hiene ofslog mid eallum his folce.
 12.127.6. Æfter þæm Iulius besæt Tarquatus, Pompeius
ladteow, on anum fæstenne.
 12.127.6. & him Pompeius æfter for.
 12.127.8. Þær wearð Iulius gefliemed, & his folces fela
forslagen, for þon þe him mon feaht on on twa healfe, on oþre Pompeus, on
oþre se ladteow.
 12.127.10. Siþþan for Iulius on Thesaliam, & þær eft
his fultum gegaderade.
 12.127.12. Þa pompeius þæt hierde, þa for he him æfter
mid ungemetlican fultume.
 12.127.13. He hæfde eahta & eahtatig coortana, þæt we
nu truman hatað, þæt wæs on þæm dagum V hund monna & an M.
 12.127.14. Þis eall he hæfde buton his agnum fultume &
buton Caton, his geferan, & buton þara senatuses.
 12.127.16. & Iulius hæfde eahtatig coortena.
 12.127.16. Heora ægþer hæfde his folc on þrim heapum,
& hie selfe wæron on þæm midmestan, & þa oþre on twa healfa
hiera.
 12.127.18. Þa Iulius hæfde ænne þara dæla gefliemed,
þa cleopode Pompeius him to ymbe Romana ealde gecwedrædenne, þeh þe he
hie self læstan ne þohte: Gefera, gefera, gemyne þæt ðu ure
gecwedrædenne & geferrædenne to longe ne oferbrec.
 12.127.22. Þa andwyrde he him & cwæð: On sumre tide þu
wære min gefera; & for þæm þe þu nu ne eart, me is eal leofast
þæt þe laþost is.
 12.127.24. Þæt wæs sio gecwedræden þe Romane geset
hæfdon, þæt hiora nan oðerne on þone andwlitan ne sloge, þær
þær hie æt gefeohtum gemette.
 12.127.26. Æfter þæm wordum Pompeius wearð gefliemed mid
eallum his folce.
 12.127.27. & he self siþþan oþfleah on Asiam mid his wife
& mid his bearnum.
 12.127.28. & siþþan he for on Ægyptum, & him
fultumes bæd æt Pholomeuse þæm cyninge.
 12.127.29. & raðe þæs þe he to him com, he him het
þæt heafod of aceorfan, & hit siþþan het Iuliuse onsendan, &
his hring mid.
 12.128.2. Ac þa hit mon to him brohte, he wæs mænende þa
dæd mid micle wope, for þon he wæs eallra monna mildheortast on
þæm dagum.
 12.128.5. Æfter þæm Photolomeus gelædde fird wið
Iuliuse, & eall his folc wearð gefliemed, & he self gefangen.
 12.128.6. & ealle þa men Iulius het ofslean þe æt
þære lare wæron þæt mon Pompeius ofslog.
 12.128.7. & he swaþeah eft forlet Phtolomeus to his rice.
 12.128.8. Æfter þæm Iulius gefeaht wið Phtolomeus
þriwa, & æt ælcum cirre sige hæfde.
 12.128.9. Æfter þæm gefeohte ealle Egypti wurdon Iuliuse
underþeowas.
 12.128.10. & he him siþþan hwearf to Rome, & eft sette
senatus, & hiene seolfne mon gesette þæt he wæs hierra þonne
consul: þæt hi heton tictator.
 12.128.13. Æfter þæm he for on Affrice æfter Caton
þæm consule.
 12.128.13. Þa he þæt geascade, þa lærde he his sunu
þæt he him ongean fore, & hiene him to friðe gesohte; For þon,
cwæð he, þe ic wat þæt nan swa god ne leofað swa he is on
þeosan life, þeh þe he me sie se laþesta, & for þon eac ic ne
mæg findan æt me seolfum þæt ic hine æfre geseo.
 12.128.18. Æfter þæm wordum he eode to þære burge
wealle, & fleah ut ofer, þæt he eall tobærst.
 12.128.19. Ac þa Iulius to þære byrig com, he him wæs
swiþe waniende þæt he to him cucan ne com, & þæt he swelce
deaðe swealt.
 12.128.21. Æfter þæm Iulius gefeaht wið Pompeiuses nefan
& wið monige his mægas, & hie ealle ofslog.
 12.128.22. & siþþan to Rome for, & þær wæs swa
onddrysne þæt him mon dyde feower siþan þone triumphan þa he ham
com.
 12.128.24. Siþþan he for on Ispanie, & gefeaht wið
Pompeiuses twæm sunum; & þær wæs his folc swa swiðe forslagen
þæt he sume hwile wende þæt hine mon gefon sceolde, & he for
þære ondrædinge þæs þe swiþor on þæt weorod þrong, for
þon þe him wæs leofre þæt hiene mon ofsloge þonne hiene mon
gebunde.
 12.128.30. Æfter þæm he com to Rome, & ealle þa
gesetnessa þe þær to stronge wæron & to hearde he hie ealle
gedyde/ leohtran & liþran.
 12.129.1. Hit þa eallum þæm senatum ofþyncendum &
þæm consulum þæt he heora ealdan gesetnessa tobrecan wolde, ahleopon
þa ealle & hiene mid heora metseacsum ofsticedon inne on heora
gemotærne.
 12.129.4. Þara wunda wæs XXIII.
 13.129.5. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintra & X, feng Octauianus to Romana onwealde, hiora unþonces,
æfter Iuliuses slege his mæges, for þon þe hiene hæfde Iulius him
ær mid gewritum gefæstnod þæt he æfter him to eallum his
gestreonum fenge, for þon þe he hiene for mægrædenne gelærde &
getyde.
 13.129.10. & he siþþan V gefeoht ungeferlice þurhteah swa
Iulius dyde ær: an wiþ Pompeius; an wæs wið Antonius þone consul;
oþer wið Cassus & wið Brutus; þridde wið Lepidus, þeh þe he
raþe þæs his freond wurde; & he eac gedyde þæt Antonius his
freond wearð, & þæt he his dohtor sealde Octauiane to wife, &
eac þæt Octauianus sealde his swostor Antoniuse.
 13.129.16. Siþþan him geteah Antonius to gewealdon ealle
Asiam.
 13.129.16. Æfter þæm he forlet Octauianuses swostor, &
him selfum onbead gewin & openne feondscipe.
 13.129.18. & he him het to wife gefeccan Cleopatron þa cwene,
þa hæfde Iulius ær, & hiere for þæm hæfde geseald ealle
Egypti.
 13.129.20. Raðe þæs Octauianus gelædde fird wiþ
Antonius, & hiene raðe gefliemde þæs þe hie togædere comon.
 13.129.21. Þæs ymb III niht hie gefuhton ut on sæ.
 13.129.22. Octauianus hæfde XXX scipa & CC þara miclena
þriereðrena, on þæm wæron farende eahta legian.
 13.129.23. & Antonius hæfde eahtatig scipa, on þæm
wæron farende X legian, for þon swa micle swa he læs hæfde, swa
micle hie wæron beteran & maran, for þon hie wæron swa geworht
þæt hie mon ne mehte mid monnum oferhlæstan, þæt hie næren X
fota hea bufan wætere.
 13.129.28. Þæt gefeoht wearð swiþe mære, þeh þe
Octauianus sige hæfde.
 13.129.29. Þær wæs Antoniuses folces ofslagen XII M; &
Cleopatra his cwen wearð gefliemed, swa hie togædere coman, mid hiere
here.
 13.130.1. Æfter þæm Octauianus gefeaht wið Antonius,
& wið Cleopatron, & hie gefliemde.
 13.130.3. Þæt wæs on þære tide calendas Agustus,
& on þæm dæge þe we hatað hlafmæsse.
 13.130.4. Siþþan wæs Octauianus Agustus haten, for þon
þe he on þære tide sige hæfde.
 13.130.6. Æfter þæm Antonius & Cleopatro hæfdon
gegaderod sciphere on þæm Readan Sæ.
 13.130.7. Ac þa him mon sæde þæt Octauianus þiderweard
wæs, þa gecierde eall þæt folc to Octauianuse, & hie selfe
oþflugon to anum tune lytle werode.
 13.130.9. Hio þa Cleopatra het adelfan hiere byrgenne, &
þæroninnan eode.
 13.130.10. Þa heo þæron gelegen wæs, þa het hio niman
ipnalis þa nædran, & don to hiere earme, þæt hio hie abite; for
þon þe hiere þuhte þæt hit on þæm lime unsarast wære, for
þon þe þære nædran gecynd is þæt ælc uht þæs þe hio
abitt scæl his lif on slæpe geendian.
 13.130.14. & hio þæt for þæm dyde þe hio nolde
þæt hie mon drife beforan þæm triumphan wiþ Rome weard.
 13.130.16. Þa Antonius geseah þæt hio hie to deaþe gerede,
þa ofsticade he hiene selfne, & bebead þæt hiene mon on þa ilcan
byrgenne to hiere swa somcucre alegde.
 13.130.18. Þa Octauianus þider com, þa het he niman oþres
cynnes nædran, uissillus is haten, sio mæg ateon ælces cynnes ator ut
of men, gif hio mon tidlice to bringð.
 13.130.20. Ac hio wæs gefaren ær he þider come.
 13.130.21. Siþþan Octauianus begeat Alexandriam, Egypta
heafedburg, & mid hiere gestreone he gewelgade Romeburg swa swiþe
þæt mon ælcne ceap mehte be twiefealdan bet geceapian þonne mon ær
mehte.
 14.130.25. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintra & XXXV, gewearð þætte Octauianus Cesar on his fiftan
consulato betynde Ianes duru, & gewearð þæt he hæfde onweald
ealles middangeardes.
 14.130.28. Þa wæs sweotole getacnad, þa he cniht wæs,
& hiene mon wið Rome weard lædde æfter Iuliuses slege, þy ilcan
dæge þe hiene mon to consule dyde, þæt mon geseah ymbe þa sunnan
swelce an gylden hring, & binnan Rome weoll an wille ele ealne dæg.
 14.131.2. On þæm hringe wes getacnad þæt on his dagum
sceolde weorþan geboren se se þe leohtra is & scinendra þonne sio
sunne þa wære.
 14.131.4. & se ele getacnade miltsunge eallum moncynne.
 14.131.4. Swa he eac monig tacen self gedyde þe eft gewurdon,
þeh he hie unwitende dyde on Godes bisene.
 14.131.7. Sum wæs ærest þæt he bebead ofer ealne
middangeard þæt ælc mægþ ymbe geares ryne togædere come,
þæt ælc mon þy gearor wiste hwær he gesibbe hæfde.
 14.131.9. Þæt tacnade þæt on his dagum sceolde beon
geboren se se þe us ealle to anum mæggemote gelaþaþ; þæt bið on
þæm toweardan life.
 14.131.12. Oþer is þæt he bebead þæt eall moncynn ane
sibbe hæfde, & an gafol guldon.
 14.131.13. Þæt tacnade þæt we ealle sculon ænne
geleafan habban, & ænne willan godra weorca.
 14.131.15. Þridde wæs þæt he bebead þæt ælc
þara þe on elðeodignesse wære, come to his agnum earde, & to his
fæder oeþle, ge þeowe ge frige.
 14.131.17. & se þe þæt nolde, he bebead þæt mon
þa ealle sloge; þara wæron VI M, þa hie gegaderad wæron.
 14.131.18. Þæt tacnade þæt us eallum is beboden þæt
we sculon cuman of þisse worolde to ures fæder oeðle, þæt is to
heofonrice; & se þe þæt nele, he wyrþ aworpen & ofslagen.
 15.131.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintrum & XXXVI, wurdon sume Ispania leode Agustuse wiþerwearde.
 15.131.23. Þa ondyde he eft Ianes duru, & wið hie fird
gelædde, & hie gefliemde, & hie siþþan on anum fæstenne
besæt; þæt hie siþþan hie selfe sume ofslogon, sume mid atre
acwealdon, sume hungre acwælan.
 15.131.27. Æfter þæm monege þeoda wunnon wið Agustus,
ægþer ge Ilirice, ge Pannonii, ge Sermende, ge monege oþra þeoda.
 15.131.28. & Agustuses ladteowas monega micla gefeoht wiþ him
þurhtugon, buton Agustuse selfum, ær hie hie ofercuman mehten.
 15.132.1. Æfter þæm Agustus sende Quintillus þone consul
on Germanie mid þrim legian.
 15.132.2. Ac hiora wearþ ælc ofslagen, buton þæm consule
anum.
 15.132.3. For þære dæde wearþ Agustus swa sarig þæt
he oft unwitende slog mid his hæfde on þone wag, þonne he on his setle
sæt; & þone consul he het ofslean.
 15.132.5. Æfter þæm Germanie gesohton Agustus ungeniedde
him to friþe, & he him forgeaf þone nið þe he to him wiste.
 15.132.8. Æfter þæm eall þeos worold geceas Agustuses
frið & his sibbe; & eallum monnum nanuht swa god ne þuhte swa hie
to his hyldo become, & þæt hie his underþeowas wurden: ne ferþan
þætte ænigum folce his ægenu æ gelicade to healdenne, buton on
þa wisan þe him Agustus bebead.
 15.132.12. Þa wurdon Ianes dura fæste betyned, & his loca
rustega, swa hie næfre ær næron.
 15.132.13. On þæm ilcan gere þe þis eall gewearð,
þæt wæs on þæm twæm & feowerteoþan wintra Agustuses
rices, þa wearð geboren se þe þa sibbe brohte eallre worolde, þæt
is ure Dryhten Hælende Crist.
 15.132.17. Nu ic hæbbe gesæd, cwæð Orosius, from
frymþe þisses middangeardes hu eall moncyn angeald þæs ærestan
monnes synna mid miclum teonum & witum, ne ic wille eac forþ gesecgan
hwelc mildsung & hwelc geþwærnes siþþan wæs siþþan se
cristendom wæs, gelicost þæm þe monna heortan awende wurden, for
þon þe þa ærran þing agoldene wæron.
 15.132.22. Her endaþ sio sixte boc, & onginð seo
siofoðe.

Orosius, Book 6: Bately 1980, 132-56.



 1.132.24. Nu Ic wille, cwæð Orosius, on foreweardre þisse
seofeþan bec gereccean þæt hit þeh Godes bebod wæs, þeh hit
strong wære, hu emnlice þa feower onwealdas þara feower heafedrica
þisses middangeardes gestodon.
 1.132.27. Þæt æreste wæs on Asirium, on þæm
eastemestan onwalde, on Babylonia þære byrig.
 1.132.28. Sio gestod tuwa seofon hund wintra on hiere onwealde
ær hio gefeolle, from Ninuse hiora ærestan cyninge, oþ Sardanopolim
heora nihstan: þæt is III C wintra & I M.
 1.133.3. Þa Cirus benom Babylonia hiere onwealde, þa ongon
ærest Romana weaxan.
 1.133.4. Eac on þæm dagum wæs þæt norþmeste
micliende on Mæcedonium.
 1.133.5. Þæt gestod lytle leng þonne seofon hund wintra from
heora ærestan cyninge Canone oþ Perseus heora æftemæstan.
 1.133.7. Swa eac on Affricum, on þæm suðmestan, Cartaina sio
burg hio gefeoll eac ymb seofon hund wintra & ymb lytelne first þæs
þe hie ærest Diþa þe wifmon getimbrede, oþ hi eft Scipia towearp se
consul.
 1.133.11. Swa eac Romana, se is mæst & westmest.
 1.133.11. Ymb VII C wintra & ymb lytelne eacon, com micel
fyrcyn/ & micel bryne on Romeburg, þæt þærbinnan forburnon XV
tunas, swa nan mon nyste hwonan þæt fyr com.
 1.133.14. & þær forwearð mæst eall þæt
þærbinnan wæs, þæt þær uneaþe ænig grot staþoles
aðstod.
 1.133.15. Mid þæm bryne hio wæs swa swiþe forhiened
þæt hio næfre siþþan swelc næs, ær hie eft Agustus swa micle
bet getimbrede þonne hio æfre ær wære, þy geare þe Crist geboren
wæs, swa þætte sume men cwædon þæt hio wære mid gimstanum
gefrætwed.
 1.133.19. Þone fultum & þæt weorc Agustus gebohte mid
fela M talentana.
 1.133.21. Hit wæs eac sweotole gesiene þæt hit wæs Godes
stihtung ymb þara rica anwaldas, þa þa Abrahame wæs gehaten Cristes
cyme on þæm twæm & on feowerteoþan wintra þæs þe Ninus
ricsade on Babylonia.
 1.133.24. Swa eac eft on þæm siþmestan onwalde & on
þæm westemestan, þæt is Roma, wearð se ilca geboren þe ær
Abrahame gehaten wæs, on þæm twæm & on feowerteogþan geare
þæs þe Agustus ricsade, þæt wæs siþþan Romeburg getimbred
wæs VII C wintra & LII.
 1.133.29. Siþþan gestod Romeburg XII winter mid miclum welum,
þa hwile þe Agustus þa eaðmetto wiþ God geheold þe he angunnen
hæfde, þæt wæs þæt he fleah & forbead þæt hiene mon
god hete, swa nan cyning nolde þe ær him wæs, ac woldon þæt mon to
him gebæde & him ofrede.
 1.134.2. Ac þæs on þæm twelftan geare Gaius his nefa for
of Egyptum on Siriæ, hit hæfde Agustus him to onwalde geseald, þa nolde
he him gebiddan to þæm ælmihtigum Gode, þa he to Hierusalem com.
 1.134.5. Þa hit mon Agustuse sæde, þa herede he þa
ofermetto, & nanuht ne leahtrade.
 1.134.6. Raþe þæs Romane anguldon þæs wordes mid swa
miclum hungre þæt Agustus adraf of Romebyrig healfe þe þærbinnan
wæron.
 1.134.8. Þa wearð eft Ianes duru andon, for þon þe þa
latteowas wæron Agustuse of monegum landum ungerade, þeh þær nan
gefeoht þurhtogen ne wurde.
 2.134.11. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintra & LXVII, feng Tiberius to rice se cesar æfter Agustuse.
 2.134.12. He wæs Romanum swa forgiefen & swa milde swa him
nan onwalda næs ær þæm, oþ him Pilatus onbead from Hierusalem
ymbe Cristes tacnunga, & ymbe his martyrunga, & eac þæt hiene
monige for god hæfde.
 2.134.16. Ac þa he hit sæde þæm senatum, þa wurdon hie
alle wið hiene swiðe wiðerwearde, for þon þe hit mon ne sæde him
æror swa hit mid him gewuna wæs, þæt hie hit siþþan mehten
eallum Romanum cyþan, & cwædon þæt hie hiene for god habban
noldon.
 2.134.20. Þa wearð Tiberius Romanum swa wrað & swa heard
swa he him ær wæs milde & ieþe, þæt he forneah nanne þara
senatusa ne let cucne, ne þara twa & twentigra monna þe he him to
fultume hæfde acoren, þæt his rædþeahteras wæren, þa mon het
patricius; ealle þa he het ofslean buton twam, ge his agene twegen suna.
 2.134.24. Hu God þa þa mæstan ofermetto gewræc on
þæm folce, & hu swiðe hi his anguldon from heora agnum casere.
 2.134.26. Þeh hit eallum þæm folcum of oþrum londum swa
swiþe gewrecen ne wurde swa hit oft ær wæs.
 2.134.29. On þæm twelftan geare Tiberiuses rices wearþ eft
Godes wracu Romanum, þa hie æt hiora theatrum wæron mid heora plegan,
þa hit eall tofeoll, & heora ofslog XX M.
 2.134.31. Wyrþigre wrace hie forwurdon ða, cwæð Orosius,
þæt þa heora synna sceoldon hreowsian & dædbote don swiþor
þonne heora plegan began, swa hiora gewuna wæs ær þæm
cristendome.
 2.135.4. On þæm eahtateoþan geare his rices, þa Crist
wæs ahangen, wearð micel þeosternes ofer eallne middangeard, & swa
micel eorðbeofung þæt cludas feollon of muntum, &, þætte þara
wundra mæst wæs, þa se mona ful wæs, & þære sunnan firrest,
þæt hio þa aþeostrade.
 2.135.8. Æfter þæm Romane acwealdon Tiberius mid attre.
 2.135.9. He hæfde rice XXIII wintra.
 3.135.10. Æfter ðæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintra & LXXXX, wearþ Gaius Gallica casere IIII gear.
 3.135.11. He wæs swiþe gefylled mid unþeawum & mid
firenlustum, & ealle he wæs swelce Romane þa wyrþe wæron, for
þon þe hie Cristes bebod hyspton, & hit forsawon.
 3.135.14. Ac he hit on him swiþe wræc, & hi him swa laðe
wæron þæt he oft wyscte þæt ealle Romane hæfden ænne
sweoran, þæt he hiene raþost forceorfan mehte; & mid ungemete
mænde þæt þær þa næs swelc sacu swelc þær oft ær
wæs.
 3.135.17. & he self for oft on oþra lond, & wolde gewin
findan, ac he ne mehte buton sibbe.
 3.135.19. Ungelice wæron þa tida, cwæð Orosius,
siþþan Crist geboren wæs, siþþan mon ne mehte unsibbe findan, &
ær þæm hie mon ne mehte mid nanum þingan forbugan.
 3.135.22. On þæm dagum com eac Godes wracu ofer Iuþan,
þæt hie ægþer hæfdon ungeþwærnesse ge betweonum him selfum ge
to eallum folcum; swa þeh hio wæs swiþost on Alexandria þære
byrig.
 3.135.25. & hie Gaius het ut adrifan.
 3.135.25. Þa sendon hie Filonem hiora þone gelæredestan mon
to þon þæt he him sceolde Gaiuses mildse geærendian.
 3.135.27. Ac he hie for þære gewilnunga swiþe bismrade,
& bebead þæt hie mon on ælce healfe hiende þær mon þænne
mehte, & bebead þæt mon afielde diofolgielda þa cirican æt
Hierusalem, & þæt mon his agen deofolgield þærtomiddes asette,
þæt wæs his agen onlicnes.
 3.136.1. & Pilatus he hæfde on þreatunge oþ he hiene
selfne ofstong: he gedæmde urne Dryhten to deaðe.
 3.136.3. Raþe þæs Romane ofslogon Gaius slæpendne.
 3.136.3. Þa funde mon on his maðmhuse twa cista, þa wæron
attres fulle.
 3.136.4. & on oþerre wæs an gewrit, þær wæron on
awritene ealra þara ricestena monna noman þe he acwellan þohte, þæt
he/ hi þe læs forgeate.
 3.136.6. Þa geat mon þæt attor ut on þone sæ, raþe
þæs þær com upp micel wæl deadra fisca.
 3.136.8. Ægþær wæs swiðe gesiene, ge Godes wracu, þa
he þæt folc costigan let, ge eft his mildsung, þa he hie fordon ne let,
swa hit Gaius geþoht hæfde.
 4.136.11. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VII
hunde wintra & XCI, þa feng Tiberius Claudius to Romana onwalde.
 4.136.12. On þæm ærestan geare his rices Petrus se apostol
com to Rome, & þær wurdon ærest cristene men þurh his lare.
 4.136.14. Þa woldon Romane ofslean Claudius for Gaiuses þingum
his mæges, þæs ærran cesares, & ealle þa þe þære
mægþe wæron.
 4.136.16. Ac mid þon þe hie þæs cristendomes onfengon, hie
wæron swa geþwære & swa gesibsume þæt hie ealle forgeafon
þæm casere þa fæhþe þe his mæg hæfde wið hie ær
geworht.
 4.136.19. Ond he forgeaf him eallum þæt unryht & þæt
facn þæt hie him don þohte.
 4.136.21. On þære tide gewearð eac oþer tacen on Romana
onwalde, siþþan him se cristendom to com.
 4.136.22. Þæt wæs þæt Dalmatie woldon gesellan
Scribanianuse þæm latteowe hiora cynerice, & siþþan wið Romane
winnan.
 4.136.24. Ac þa hie gesomnod wæron, & hiene to cyninge don
woldon, þa ne mehton hie þa guðfonan upahebban, swa hiora þeaw wæs,
þonne hie onwaldas setton.
 4.136.26. Ac wurdon him selfum wiðerwearde þæt hie hit
æfre ongunnon, & Scribanianus ofslogon.
 4.136.28. Oðsace nu, cwæð Orosius, se, se þe wille
oþþe se þe dyrre, þæt þæt angin nære gestilled for þæs
cristendomes Gode, & gesecge hwær ænig gewin ær þæm
cristendome swa gehwurfe, gif hit ongunnen wære.
 4.137.1. Oþer wundor gewearð eac þy feorþan geare
Claudiuses rices, þæt he self æfter gewinne for, & nan findan ne
mehte.
 4.137.2. On þæm geare wæs micel hungor on Siria & on
Palestina, buton þæt Elena, ætiubena cwen, sealde þæm munucum corn
genog þe wæron æt Hierusalem, for þon þe hio þa wæs niwlice
cristen.
 4.137.6. On þæm fiftan geare Claudiuses rices wearð
oþiewed an igland betuh Theram & Therasiam, V mila brad & V mila
long.
 4.137.7. On þæm seofeþan geare his rices wearð swa micel
ungeþwærnes on Hierusalem betuh þæm þe þær cristene wæron,
þæt þær wæron XXX M ofslagen, & æt þæm geate oftredd,
swa nan mon nyste hwonon sio wroht com.
 4.137.11. On þæm nigeþan geare his rices wearð micel
hunger on Rome, & Claudius het ut adrifan ealle þa Iudan þe
þærbinnan wæron.
 4.137.13. Æfter þæm Romane witan Claudiuse þone hunger
þe him getenge wæs, & he wearð him swa grom, þæt he het ofslean
þara senatorum XXXV, & þara oþerra III hund þe þær ieldeste
wæron.
 4.137.16. Æfter þæm Romane hiene acwealdon mid atre.
 5.137.17. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII
hunde wintra & IX, feng Nero to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XIIII
gear.
 5.137.18. He hæfde giet þe ma unþeawa þonne his eam
hæfde ær Gaius.
 5.137.19. Toeacan þæm monigfealdum bismrum þe he donde
wæs, he het æt sumum cierre onbærnan Romeburg, & bebead his agnum
monnum þæt hie simle gegripen þæs licgendan feos swa hie mæst
mehten, & to him brohten, þonne hit mon ut oþbrude & gestod him
self on þæm hiehstan torre þe þærbinnan wæs, & ongon wyrcan
scopleoð be þæm bryne.
 5.137.25. Se wæs VI dagas biernende & VII niht.
 5.137.25. Ac he wræc his ungewealdes ærest on þære byrig
hiora misdæda, & siþþan on him selfum, þa he hiene ofstong,
þæt hie Petrus & Paulus gemartredon.
 5.137.28. He wæs monna ærest ehtend cristenra monna.
 5.137.28. Æfter his fielle wearð þara casera mægð
offeallen.
 6.138.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII
hunde wintra & XXIIII, feng Galua se casere to Romana onwalde.
 6.138.2. Þæs on þæm seofeþan monðe hiene ofslog Othon
an mon, & him to þon anwalde feng.
 6.138.5. Sona swa Romane ærest cristenra monna ehton, swa hit
Nero onstealde, swa wurdon ealle þa folc hiora wiðerwinnan þe be eastan
Siria wæron, ge eac hie selfe him betweonum hæfdon ungerædnesse.
 6.138.8. Uitellus, Germania cyning, gefeaht þriwa wið Othon,
& hiene ofslog on þæm þriddan monðe þæs þe hie winnan
ongunnon.
 7.138.10. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC
wintra & XXV, feng Uespasianus to Romana onwalde.
 7.138.11. Þa wearð eft sibb ofer ealne Romana anwald, & he
bebead Tituse his suna þæt he towearp þæt templ on Hierusalem, &
ealle þa burg, for þon þe God nolde þæt hie þone cristendom mierde
leng.
 7.138.14. & forbead þæt mon na ðær eft ne timbrede.
 7.138.15. & he fordyde þara Iudena XI hund M: sume he ofslog,
sume on oþer land gesealde, sume he mid hungre acwealde.
 7.138.17. Æfter þæm mon dyde him twæm þone triumphan,
Uespasiane & Tituse.
 7.138.18. Seo onsien wearð þa micel wundor Romanum, for þon
hi ær ne gesawon II men atsæmne ðæron sittan.
 7.138.19. Hi betyndan Ianes dura.
 7.138.20. Æfter þæm Wespasianus gefor on utsihte, on
ðæm nigeþan geare his rices, on anum tune buton Rome.
 8.138.22. Æfter þæm ðe Romeburh getimbred wæs VIII
hunde wintra & XXIX, feng Titus to Romana onwalde, & hine hæfde II
gear.
 8.138.23. He wæs swa godes willan þæt he sægde þæt
he forlure þone dæg þe he noht on to gode ne gedyde.
 8.139.2. He gefor eac on þæm ilcan tune ðe his fæder
dyde, & on þære ilcan adle.
 9.139.4. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII
hunde wintra & XXX, feng Domitianus to Romana onwalde, Tituses broþor,
& hit hæfde XV gear.
 9.139.6. He wearþ eft ehtend cristenra monna, & wæs on
swa micle ofermetto astigen, þæt he bead þæt man on gelice to him
onbugan sceolde swa to Gode.
 9.139.8. And he bebead þæt mon Iohannes þone apostol
gebrohte on Bothmose þæm iglande, on wræcsiþe from oþrum cristenum
monnum.
 9.139.10. & he bebead þæt mon acwealde eall Dauides cynn,
to þon, gif Crist geboren nære þa giet, þæt he na siþþan
geboren ne wurde; for þon þe witgan sædon þæt he of þæm cynne
cuman sceolde.
 9.139.13. Æfter þæm bebode he wearð self unweorðlice
ofslagen.
 10.139.15. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs VIII
hund wintra & XLVI, þa feng Nerfa to Romana onwalde; & for þon þe
he/ eald wæs, he geceas him to fultume Traianus þone mon.
 10.139.17. Þa gespræcon hie him betweonum þæt hie wolden
anwendan ealle þa gesetnessa & ealle þa gebodu þe Domitianus hæfde
ær gesett, for þon þe he him wæs ær bæm lað; & heton eft
Iohannes æt his mynstre gebrengan on Effesum from þæm woruldierþum
þe he hwile on wæs.
 10.139.23. Þa gefor Nerfa, & Traianus hæfde þone anwald
XIX/ ger æfter him.
 10.139.24. & he underþiedde Romanum eall þa folc þe him
niwlice geswicen hæfdon.
 10.139.25. & he bebead his aldormonnum þæt hie wæren
cristenra monna ehtend.
 10.140.1. Þa sæde him hiora an, Plenius wæs haten, þæt
he woh bude, & miclum on þæm syngade.
 10.140.2. He hit þa hrædlice eft forbead.
 10.140.4. On þære tide wæron Iudan on miclum geflite &
on micelre unsibbe wið þa londleode þær þær hie þonne wæron,
oþ hiora fela M forwurdon on ægþere hand.
 10.140.6. On þære tide Traianus gefor on utsihte on Seleutia
þære byrig.
 11.140.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC
wintra & LXVII, feng Adrianus to Romana onwalde, Traianuses nefa, &
hiene hæfde XXI wintra.
 11.140.10. & raðe þæs þe him cristne bec cuþe
wæron þurh ænne þara apostola geongrena, Quadratus wæs haten, he
forbead ofer ealne his onwald þæt mon nanum cristenum men ne abulge; &
gif ænig cristen agylte, þæt se þonne wære beforan him gelædd,
& he him þonne demde self, swa him ryht þuhte.
 11.140.14. He wearð þa Romanum swa leof, & swa weorð
þæt hie hiene nanuht ne heton buton fæder, & him to weorðscipe
hie heton his wif casern.
 11.140.16. & he het ofslean ealle þa Iudiscan men, for þon
þe hie cristene men pinedon; þa wæron on Palestina, þæt mon het
Iudena lond.
 11.140.18. & he bebead þæt mon timbrede on oþerre stowe
Hierusalem þa burg, & þæt hie mon siþþan hete be noman Heliam.
 12.140.21. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCC
wintra & LXXXVIII, feng Ponpeius to Romana onwalde, þe mon oþre nomon
het Pius.
 12.140.23. & him sealde Iustinus se philosophus ane cristene
boc for hiora freondscipe.
 12.140.24. Siþþan he þa geleornod hæfde, he wearð
cristnum monnum swa leof & swiþe hold oþ his lifes ende.
 13.141.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC
wintra & III, feng Marcus Antonius to Romana onwalde mid his breðer
Aureliuse.
 13.141.3. Hie wæron þa ærestan men þe Romana onwald on tu
todældon; & hiene hæfden XIIII winter.
 13.141.4. & hie bebudon þæt mon ælcne cristenne mon
ofsloge.
 13.141.5. Æfter þæm hie hæfdon micel gewin wið Parthe,
for þon þe hie hæfdon awest ealle Capodotiam & Armeniam, & ealle
Siriam.
 13.141.7. Æfter þæm hie genamon frið wið Parthe.
 13.141.8. & him siþþan becom on swa micel hungor &
micel moncwealm, þæt heora feawa to lafe wurdon.
 13.141.10. Æfter þæm him becom on þæt Deniscæ
gewinn mid eallum Germanium.
 13.141.11. Þa on þæm dæge þe hie gefeohtan sceoldon,
him com on swa micel hæte & swa micel þurst þæt hie him heora
feores ne wendan.
 13.141.13. Þa bædon hie þa cristnan men þæt hi heora an
sume wisan gehulpen; & ongeaton þæt hit wæs Godes wracu.
 13.141.14. Þa abædon hie æt þæm ælmihtegum Gode
þæt hit swa swiðe rinde þæt hie hæfdon wæter genog onufan
þære dune, & þæt þær wæs swa micel þunor þæt he
ofslog fela þusend monna gemong þæm gefeohte.
 13.141.18. Þa æfter þæm ealle Romane wurdon cristnum
monnum swa holde þæt hie on monegum templum awriten þæt ælc
cristen mon hæfde frið & sibbe, & eac þæt ælc þara moste
cristendome onfon se þe wolde.
 13.141.21. & Antonius forgef ealle þæt gafol þæt mon
to Rome sellan sceolde, & het forbærnan þæt gewrit þe hit on
awriten wæs, hwæt mon on geare agiefan sceolde.
 13.141.23. & þæs on þæm æfterran geare he gefor.
 14.141.25. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC
wintra/ & XXX, feng Lucius Antonius to rice, & hit hæfde XIII ger.
 14.141.26. He wæs swiþe yfel monn ealra þeawa, buton
þæt he wæs cene, & oft feaht anwig.
 14.141.28. & fela þara senatorum he het ofslean þe þær
betste wæron.
 14.142.1. Æfter an þunor toslog hiora Capitoliam, þæt hus
þe hiora godas inne wæron & hiora diofolgield; & hiora
bibliotheoco wearð onbærned from ligette, & ealle heora ealdan bec
forburnon þærinne.
 14.142.3. Þær wæs a swa micel dem geburnen swa on
Alexandria wæs þære byrig on hiora bibliotheoco, þær forburnon
IIII hund M boca.
 15.142.6. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg wæs getimbred DCCCC
wintra & XLIII, feng Seuerus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde XVII
ger.
 15.142.7. He besæt Piscenius on anum fæstenne, oþ he him
on hond eode; & he hiene siþþan het ofslean, for þon he wolde ricsian
on Sirie & on Egypte.
 15.142.10. Æfter þæm he ofslog Albinus þone mon on
Gallium, for þon þe he eac wolde on hine winnan.
 15.142.11. Siþþan he for on Brettanie, & þær oft
gefeaht wið Peohtas & wið Scottas, ær he þa Brettas mehte wið
hie bewerian.
 15.142.13. & het ænne weall þwyres ofer eall þæt lond
asettan from sæ oþ sæ, & raþe þæs he gefor on
Eforwicceastre.
 16.142.15. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC
wintra & LXII, feng his sunu to rice Antonius, & hit hæfde VII ger.
 16.142.16. He hæfde twa geswostor him to wifum.
 16.142.17. He hæfde folc gegaderad, & wolde winnan on
Parthe, ac he wearð ofslagen on þæm færelte from his agnum monnum.
 17.142.20. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC

 17.142.22. Hiene ofslogon eac his agene men, & his modor mid.
 18.143.1. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC

 18.143.3. & Mammea his sio gode modor sende æfter Origenise

 18.143.6. He gefor mid fierde on Perse, & ofslog Xersan hiora

 18.143.7. Æfter þæm he forlet his lif on Magentsan

 19.143.9. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC

 19.143.10. He bebead eft þæt mon cristene men brocode, &

 19.143.13. & Maximus ofslog his agen ealdormon on þæm

 20.143.15. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC

 20.143.16. & he ofslog þa twegen gebroðor þe ær

 20.143.17. & he self raþe þæs gefor.
 21.143.18. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs DCCCC

 21.143.19. He wearð diegellice cristen, for þon he eawenga ne

 21.143.20. On þæm þriddan geare his rices hit gewearð swa

getimbred wæs, þæt ægþer ge hiora casere wearð cristen, ge eac

XII monað bringan togædere þone selestan dæl hiora goda gegearod to
heora/ geblote & hiora siþþan fela wucena ætgædere brucan.
 21.144.4. Æfter þæm Decius, an rice mon, beswac þone

 22.144.6. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M

 22.144.7. & sona gedyde sweotol tacn þæt he Philippus

 23.144.12. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M

 23.144.13. Þa wearð eft Godes wracu on Rome: swa longe swa seo

getenge, þæt nan hus næs binnan þære byrig þæt hit næfde

 23.144.17. Æfter þæm Emilianus ofslog Gallus, &

 23.144.18. Þæs eac on þæm þriddan monðe hiene mon

 24.144.19. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & X, þa gesetton Romane II caseras.
 24.144.20. Oþer wæs binnan Romebyrig, Gallienus wæs haten,
oþer wæs mid Emilitum þæm folce, Ualerianus wæs haten.
 24.144.22. Þa sceoldon on siml beon winnende þær hit þonne
þearf wæs.
 24.144.23. Þa bebudon hie begen cristenra monna ehtnesse.
 24.144.23. Ac hrædlice on hie begen com Godes wracu.
 24.145.1. Ualerianus for mid fierde ongean Sapan, Persa cyning,
& þær gefongen wæs.
 24.145.2. & siþþan he wæs Sapan þæm cyninge to
ðon geset, oþ his lifes ende, þæt he swa oft sceolde stupian swa he to
his horse wolde, & he þonne se cyning hæfde his hricg him to
hliepan.
 24.145.5. & þæm oþrum, Gallienuse, wæron monog folc
onwinnende, þæt he his rice mid micellre unweorðnesse & mid micelre
unieðnesse gehæfde.
 24.145.7. Ærest Germanie þe be Donua wæron, forhergedon
Italiam oþ rafennan þa burg; & Swæfas forhergedon ealle Galliam;
& Gotan oferhergedon eall Creca lond, & þa læssan Asiam; &

Pannoniam; & Parthe forhergedon Mesopotamiam, & ealle Sirie.
 24.145.12. Toeacan þæm Romane hæfdon gewin betuh him
selfum.
 24.145.13. Æfter þæm Gallienus wearð ofslagen on
Medialane þære byrig from his agnum monnum.
 25.145.15. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XXV, feng Claudius to Romana onwalde.
 25.145.16. Þy ilcan geare he oferwon Gotan, & hie adraf ut of
Crecum.
 25.145.17. & him Romane gedydan ænne gyldenne scield,
þære dæda to weorðmynte, & ane gyldene anlicnesse, & ahengon
hie/ up on hiora Capitoliam.
 25.145.19. Þæs on þæm æfterran geare he gefor, &
his broþor Quintillus feng to þæm onwalde.
 25.145.20. & þæs on þæm seofonteoþan dæge he
wearð ofslagen.
 26.145.22. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XXVII, feng Aurelius to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde V ger
& VI monað.
 26.145.23. & adraf Gotan be norþan Donua, & þonan for
on Sirie, & hie geniedde eft to Romana onwalde.
 26.145.25. & siþþan he for on Gallie, & ofslog Tetricum
þone mon, for þy þe he hi him teah to anwalde.
 26.146.1. Æfter þæm he bebead cristenra monna ehtnesse,
& raðe þæs wearþ ofslagen.
 27.146.3. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M wintra
& XXXII, feng Tacitus to Romana onwalde, & þæs on þæm sixtan
monþe he wearþ ofslagen on Ponto þæm londe.
 27.146.5. Æfter þæm Floriam feng to þæm onwalde, &
wæs ofslagen þæs on þæm þriddan monþe on Thærsa þæm
londe.
 28.146.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg wæs getimbred M wintra
& XXXIII, feng Brobus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde VI ger &
IIII monað.
 28.146.10. & he adyde Hunas of Gallium.
 28.146.10. & he ofslog Saturninus, þe æfter þæm
onwalde wonn.
 28.146.11. Æfter þæm he ofslog Proculus & Bonorum;
þa gierndon eac æfter þæm onwalde.
 28.146.12. Æfter þæm he wearð self ofslagen on Sirmie
þære dune.
 29.146.14. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XXXIX, feng Carus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde II ger.
 29.146.15. & gefeaht tuwwa wið Parthe, & geeode hiora
burga twa; þa wæron on Tigris staþe þære ie.
 29.146.17. Raþe þæs hiene ofslog an þunor.
 29.146.17. & his sunu Numerianus feng to þæm onwalde.
 29.146.17. & raþe þæs hiene ofslog his agen sweor.
 30.146.19. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XLI, feng Dioclitianus to Romano onwalde, & hiene hæfde XX
wintra.
 30.146.20. He gesette under him gingran casere, Maximus wæs
haten, & hiene sende on Gallie, for þon ðe hie þa niwlice hæfdon
gewinn up ahæfen, ac he hie þa ieðelice ofercom.
 30.147.2. On þære tide wæron Dioclitie III cyningas on
winnende: Caucarius on Bretlande, & Achileus of Egypta londe, & Marseus
of Persum.
 30.147.4. Þa gesette he III caseras under him: an wæs
Maximianus, oþer Constantius, þridda Galerius.
 30.147.6. Maximianus he sende on Affricam, & he oferwonn hiora
wiþerwinnan.
 30.147.7. & Constantius he sende on Gallie, & he oferwonn
Alamanni þæt folc, & siþþan he geeode Brettaniam þæt igland.
 30.147.8. & he self Dioclitianus for on ægypte, &
besæt Achileus þone cyning eahta monað on Alexandria þære byrig,
oð hiene þa burgleode him ageafon, & he siþþan oferhergeade ealle
Egypte.
 30.147.11. & Galerius he sende on Perse, & gefeaht II wið
Marseus þone cyning, þæt hiera naþer næfde sige.
 30.147.13. Æt heora þriddan gefeohte Galerius wearþ
gefliemed, & mid micelre fyrhtnesse com to Dioclitiane.
 30.147.14. Ac he his onfeng mid micelre unweorðnesse, & hiene
het iernan on his agenum purpurum fela mila beforan his rædwæne.
 30.147.16. Æfter þæm þe his mod wæs mid þæm
bismre ahwet, he for eft on Perse, & hie gefliemde, & Marseus gefeng,
& his wif, & his bearn.
 30.147.18. Þa onfeng Dioclitianus Galerius weorðlice.
 30.147.20. Æfter þæm Dioclitianus & Maximianus bebudon
ehtnesse cristenra monna, Dioclitianus eastane, & Maximianus westane.
 30.147.21. & for þon gebode gewurdon fela martyra on X wintra
firste.
 30.147.23. Þa gewearð hi him betweonum þæt hie woldon þa
onwaldas forlætan, & þa purpuran alecgan þa hie weredon, &
woldon hiera dagas on seftnesse geendian.
 30.147.25. & þæt swa gelæston.
 30.147.25. Dioclitianus gesæt on Nicomidio þære byrig,
&/ Maximianus gesæt on Mediolane þære byrig.
 30.147.27. & leton þa onwealdas to Galeriuse & to
Constantiuse.
 30.147.27. & hi hiene todældon siþþan on tu: Galerius
nom Ilirice, & begeondan þæm þone eastende, & þone mæstan
dæl þisses middangeardes; & Constantius nom ealle Italie, &
Affricam, & Ispanie, & Gallie, & Brettanie.
 30.148.2. Ac he wæs hwon giernende þissa woroldþinga &
micelra onwalda, & for þæm he forlet his agnum willan Italiam &
Affricam to Galeriuse.
 30.148.4. Þa gesette Galerius II cyningas under him: oþer
wæs haten Seuerus, þæm he gesealde Italiam & Africam, &
Maximianus he gesette on þa eastlond.
 30.148.7. On þæm dagum Constantius, se mildesta monn, for on
Brettannie, & þær gefor.
 30.148.8. & gesealde his suna þæt rice Constantinuse,
þone he hæfde be Elenan his ciefese.
 30.148.10. Þa wolde Maxentius, Maximianuses sunu, habban þone
anwald on Italiam.
 30.148.11. Þa sende Galerius him ongean Seuerus mid fierde, þe
him se onweald ær geseald wæs, & he þær beswicen wearð from
his agnum monnum, & ofslagen, neah Rafenne þære byrig.
 30.148.13. Þa Maximianus geacsade þæt his sunu feng to
þæm onwalde, he þa hrædlice forlet þa burg þe he on geseten
wæs, & þohte his sunu to beswicanne, & him siþþan fon to
þæm onwalde.
 30.148.16. Ac þa hit se sunu anfunde, þa adræfde he þone
fæder.
 30.148.17. & he fleah on Gallie, & wolde Constantinus
beswican his aþum, & habban him þæt rice.
 30.148.19. Ac hit anfunde his dohtor, & hit Constantinuse
asæde, & he hiene afliemde siþþan on Masiliam; & he þær
ofslagen wearð.
 30.148.21. Þa gesealde Galerius Lucinuse Italiam & Affricam;
& he het ealle þa cristnan þe þær betste wæron gebringan on
elþeode.
 30.148.23. Æfter þæm he wearð on micelre untrumnesse,
& him to gehet monigne læce.
 30.148.24. & heora nan him ne mehte bion nane gode.
 30.148.24. Ac him sæde heora an þæt hit wære Godes
wracu.
 30.148.25. Þa het he þæt mon þa cristnan eft gebrohte on
heora earde, ælcne þær he ær wæs; swa þeah he gefor on
þære mettrymnesse, & Lucinius feng to þæm onwalde.
 30.149.1. Æfter þæm weraþ gewinn betuh Constantinuse
& Maxentiuse, & raðe þæs Constantinus ofslog Maxentius binnan
Rome, æt þære brycge þe mon Moluia het.
 30.149.3. On þæm dagum Maximinus bebead cristenra monna
ehtnesse, & raðe þæs gefor on Tharsa þære byrig.
 30.149.5. On þæm dagum Lucinius bebead þæt nan cristen
mon ne come on his hierede ne on his færelte.
 30.149.6. & raþe þæs wearð gewin betuh him & betuh
Constantinuse & oftrædlica gefeoht, oþ Constantinus gefeng Lucinius,
& hiene siþþan het beheafdian, & siþþan feng to eallum Romana
onwalde.
 30.149.10. On þæm dægum Arrius se mæssepresbyter wearþ
on gedwolan ymb þone ryhtan geleafan.
 30.149.11. Ymb þone timan wæs gegaderad III hund biscepa &
eahtatiene, hiene to oferflitanne & to amansumianne.
 30.149.13. On þæm dagum Constantinus ofslog Crispum his sunu,
& Lucinius his swostor sunu, þæt nan monn nyste hwæt se gylt
wæs, buton him anum.
 30.149.15. Æfter þæm he underþiedde him selfum monege
þeoda þe ær wæron Romanum ungewilde.
 30.149.16. & het atimbran ane burg on Crecum, & het hie be
him hatan Constantinopolim.
 30.149.17. He bebead ærest monna þæt mon cirican timbrede,
& þæt mon beluce ælc diofolgieldhus.
 30.149.19. He gefor ymb XXXI wintra þæs þe he rice hæfde,
on anum tune neah Nicomedio þære byrig.
 31.149.21. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XCI, feng Constantius to þæm onwalde mid his II broþrum,
Constantine & Constante.
 31.149.23. & he Constantius hit hæfde XXIIII wintra.
 31.149.23. Hie wurdon ealle þa gebroþor on þæm Arianiscan
gedwolan.
 31.149.24. Constantinus & Constans wunnon him betweonum, oþ
Constantinus/ wearð ofslagen.
 31.149.26. Æfter þæm Magnentius ofslog Constans, & feng
him to þæm rice, þæt wæs Galliam & Italiam.
 31.149.27. On þæm dagum Ilirice gesetton Ueteromonem þone
mon to hiora anwealde, to þon þæt hie siþþan mehten winnan wið
Magnentiuse; & hi hiene nieddon to leornunga, þeh he gewintred wære.
 31.150.3. Ac Constantinus hiene benæmde ægþer ge þæs
onwaldes, ge þære purpuran þe he werede, ge þære scole þe he on
leornode.
 31.150.5. Æfter he gefeaht wið Magnentiuse, & hiene
gefliemde, & bedraf into Luchina þære byrig; & he hiene selfne
siþþan ofsticode.
 31.150.7. Æfter þæm Constantius gesette Iulianus to casere
under him, se wæs ær þæm to diacone gehalgod, & sende hiene on
Gallie mid firde; & he hrædlice oferwon ealle þe þa on Gallie
wunnon; & wæs æfter þære dædæ swa up ahæfen þæt he
wolde ealne Romana onwald him geagnian, & mid firde wæs farende þær
Constantius/ wæs mid oþerre fierde wiþ Parhte.
 31.150.12. Þa he þæt geacsade & him ongeanweard wæs,
þa he gefor on þæm færelte.
 31.150.13. & Iulianus feng to þæm onwalde, & hiene
hæfde an gear & eahta monað.
 31.150.14. Þa wæs he sona geornfull þæt he wolde
diegellice þone cristendom onwendan & forbead openlice þæt mon nane
fæste boc ne leornode, & sæde eac þæt nan cristen mon ne moste
habban nænne his sunderfolgeþa, & hie mid þæm þohte beswican.
 31.150.18. Ac ealle hie wæron þæs wordes, swa we hit eft
secgan hierdon, cwæð Orosius, þæt him leofre wæs se cristendom to
beganne þonne his scira to habbanne.
 31.150.22. Æfter þæm he gegaderade fierd, & wolde faran
on Perse, & bebead, þonne he eft wære eastane hamweard, þæt mon
hæfde anfiteatrum geworht æt Hierusalem, þæt he mehte Godes þeowas
on don, þæt hie dior þærinne abite.
 31.150.25. Ac god gewræc on þæm færelte swiþe
gedafenlice on þæm arleasan men his arlease geþoht, mid þæm
þæt hiene gemette an mon, þa he for from Actesifonte þære byrig,
gelicost þæm þe he fliema wære, & him sæde þæt he hiene
mehte lædan þurh þæt westen, þæt he on Perse on ungearwe
become.
 31.150.30. Ac þa he hiene tomiddes þæs westennes hæfde
gelædd, þa geswac he him þæt nan mon nyste þæs færeltes
hwær he com, ac foran hwærfigiende geond þæt westen, þæt he
nyste hwær he ut sceolde, oþ þæs folces wæs fela forworden,
ægþer ge for þurste ge for hæte.
 31.151.2. Þa com him ongean an uncuð mon, & ofstong
Iulianus.
 32.151.3. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & I hund & XVII, feng Iuuinianus to Romana onwalde.
 32.151.4. Hiene mon geceas on þæm westenne, þy ilcan dæge
þe mon Iulianus ofstong.
 32.151.5. He gesealde Persum Nissibi þa burg, & healfe
Mesopotamiam þæt lond, wiþ þæm þe hie of þæm londe mosten
buton laþe.
 32.151.7. On þæm eahtoþan monþe þæs þe he to
þæm onwalde feng, he wolde faran on Ilirice.
 32.151.9. Þa wæs he sume niht on anum nicealtan huse.
 32.151.9. Þa het he betan þærinne micel fyr, for þon hit
wæs ceald weder.
 32.151.10. Þa ongon se cealc mid ungemete stincan; þa wearþ
Iuninianus/ mid þæm bræþe ofsmorod.
 33.151.13. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & XCVIII, feng Ualentinianus to Romana onwalde, & hiene hæfde
endlefan gear.
 33.151.15. He wæs ær þæm Iulianuses cempena ealdormon.
 33.151.15. He him bebead þæt he forlete þone his cristendom
oððe his folgað.
 33.151.16. Þa wæs him leofre þæt he forlete his folgað
þonne þone cristendom; ac him gefylste God eft to maran are, þa he þa
læssan for his lufan forlet, & þæt he þæs ilcan rices ahte
geweald þe his wiðerwinna ær ahte.
 33.151.20. Raðe þæs he gesealde Ualente his breðer healf
his rice.
 33.151.20. & he het ofslean Percopiosus, þe þa ricsian
wolde, & monege oðre mid him.
 33.151.22. Ualens wæs gelæred from anum Arrianiscan biscepe,
Eudoxius wæs haten, ac he hit hæl swiðe fæste wið his broðor,
for þon he wiste þæt he hit on him wrecan wolde, gif he anfunde þæt
he on oþran geleafan wære, on oþran he self wæs, for þon he wiste
hu fæstmod he wæs ær on his geleafan, þa he læssan onwald
hæfde.
 33.151.27. On þæm ilcan geare Godenric, Gotena cyning, gedyde
fela martyra on his þeode cristenra monna.
 33.152.1. On þæm dagum Ualentinianus geniedde eft þa Seaxan
to hiera agnum lande, þa hie woldon winnan on Romane; þa wæron
eardfæste neh þæm garsecge.
 33.152.3. & Burgendum he gestierde eac þæt hie on Gallie
ne wunnon; mid þæm him wæs swiþost gestiered þæt him mon gehet
fulwiht.
 33.152.5. On þæm enleftan geare his rices Sermende hergedon on
Pannoniam; þa he þiderweard wæs mid fierde, þa gefor he on blodryne.
 34.152.8. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & an hund & XXVIIII, feng Ualens, Ualentinianuses broþor, to
Romana onwalde; & Gratianus, Ualentinianuses sunu, feng to Italia anwalde,
& to Gallia, & to Ispania, under Ualense.
 34.152.11. He þa Ualens oðewde openlice þæt he ær
diegellice gehyd hæfde, swa þæt he bebead þæt munecas, þe
woroldlica þing forgan sculon, & wæpna gefeoht, þæt hie wæpena
namen, & mid þæm fuhte, & yfel dyde mid oþrum monnum.
 34.152.15. & sende on Egypte & het toweorpan eal þa
munuclif þe his broðor ær gestaþelade; & sume þa munecas he het
ofslean, sume on elþiede fordrifan.
 34.152.18. On þæm dagum Firmus wæs haten sum mon on
Africum, se wæs þær wilniende þæs onwaldes.
 34.152.19. Þa sende Ualens þider Theodosius his ealdormon mid
fierde/, þæs godan þeodosiuses fæder, þe eft wæs casere.
 34.152.21. On þæm færelte Firmus wearð gefangen, &
forþ gelæded to sleanne.
 34.152.22. Þa bæd he self þæt hiene mon ær gefulwade,
& þa he gefulwad wæs, he wæs þurh þæs mæssepreostes lare
þe hiene fulwade on swa fullum geleafan heofonrices, þæt he cwæð to
ðæm folce, Doð nu swa ge willen, & him self leat forþ þæt him
mon aslog þæt heafod of, & wearð Cristes martyre.
 34.152.27. On ðæm dagum Gratianus gefeaht on Gallium wið
Alomonne þæm folce, & heora fela M ofslog.
 34.152.28. On þæm ðriddan geare his rices, þa he þæt
mæste woh dyde wið þa Godes þeowas, þa adrifon hine Gotan ut of
hiora earde, & hie foran siþþan ofer Donua þa ea on Ualenses rice,
& wilnedon to him þæt hie mosten on his rice mid friðe gesittan.
 34.153.4. Þa oferhogode he þæt he him aðer dyde, oþþe
wiernde, oþþe tigþade, ac hie let sittan þær þær hie woldon.
 34.153.5. Ac his gerefan & his ealdormen nieddon hi æfter
gafole, & micel geflit hæfdon ymb þæt, oþ þa Gotan hie mid
gefeohte gefliemdon.
 34.153.7. Þa Ualens þæt geacsade on Antiochia þære
byrig, þa wearð he swiþe sarig, & geþohte his misdæda, hu hi
hiene bædon ryhtes geleafan & fulwihtes bæðes, & he him sende
Arrianisce biscepas to lareowum & gedwolmen, swa he self wæs, &
hwæt he hæfde Godes þeowum on oftsiþas to laðe gedon; het þeh
sendon æfter, þær he ænigne libbendne wiste, þeh he þæt to
late dyde & him siþþan het gearian.
 34.153.14. On þæm feorþan geare his rices he gefeaht wiþ
Gotan, & gefliemed wearð, & bedrifen on anne tun, & þær
wearð on anum huse forbærned.
 34.153.16. Þær wæs swiþe ryht dom geendad þæt hie
þone woroldlice forbærndon þe hie þohte bærnan on ecnesse.
 35.153.18. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & C & XXXIII, feng Gratianus to Romana onwalde, & hiene
hæfde VI ger; & gesette Theodosius him to fultume, for þon him
geþuhte þæt þa þeoda þa hiora wiðerwinnan wæron wæren to
swiðe gestrongade þæt hie mon leng ne mehte mid gefeohtum oferswiþan.
 35.153.22. Ac Theodosius genam friþ wið hie, & on þære
sibbe he lædde Athanaricus hiora cyning mid him to Constantinopolim
þære byrig; & þær raðe þæs his lif geendade.
 35.153.25. Raðe þæs þe Gotan angeaton hu god Theodosius
wæs, ægþer ge hie, ge ealle þa þeoda þe on Sciþþium wæron,
gecuron his frið.
 35.153.28. On þæm dagum gecuron Brettanie Maximianus him to
casere ofer his willan.
 35.153.29. Se wære wierðe ealra Romana onwaldes for his
monigfealdum duguðum, buton þæt he þa wiþ his hlaford won for oðra
monna lare.
 35.154.1. & raðe þæs for on Gallie, & Gratianus
ofslog, & Ualentinianus his broðor he adraf ut of Italiam, þæt he
oðfleah to Theodosiuse.
 36.154.4. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & C & XXXVIII, feng Theodosius to Romana onwalde, & hiene
hæfde XI ger.
 36.154.6. He hæfde VI gearum ær onwald ofer þa
eastdælas.
 36.154.6. He þa Theodosius wæs þencende hu he Gratianus his
hlaford gewrecan mehte, & eac his broðor on þæm onwalde gebringan.
 36.154.8. & fird gelædde on Italie, þær Maximus mid
firde bad æt Aquilegia þære byrig, & his ealdormen Andregatia
hæfde beboden þa clusan to healdanne.
 36.154.10. Ac se ealdormon hie betæhte lyþrum monnum to
healdonne, & þohte him self on scipun to farenne east ymbutan, &
þonne bestelan on Theodosius hindan.
 36.154.13. Ac mid þæm þe he from þære clusan afaren
wæs wiþ þara scipa, þa com Theodosius þærto, & funde
þæræt feawa men, þa wæron yfele & earge; & he hie raðe
aweg/ aþewde, & þa clusan tobræc, & siþþan for ofer þa
muntas, oþ he com to Aquilegia, & Maximus ofslog.
 36.154.17. Þa þæt se ealdormon hierde, þa adrencte he
hiene selfne.
 36.154.18. Hu ieðelice God geendade þæt micle gewin mid
hiora twegea fielle, þe Maximus & his ealdormon hæfdon up ahæfen
mid monigum þeodum.
 36.154.21. Æfter þæm feng eft Ualentinianus to his rice.
 36.154.21. & þæs ymb II ger, þa he on Gallie com, hiene
ofsmorode Ambogestes his ealdormon, & hiene siþþan mid rapum be
þæm sweoran up aheng, gelicost þæm þe he hiene self unwitende
hæfde awierged; & gesette Eugenius to þæm rices noman, þæt he
casere wære, & feng him self to þæm onwalde, for þon þe he ne
mehte self habban þæs onwaldes noman, for þy he næs Romanisc; ac
lærde þone oþerne þæt he diofolgield georne beeode.
 36.154.28. Þa gelædde Theodosius eft fird wið him twæm to
þære ilcan clusan þe he ær hæfde wið Maximus.
 36.154.29. Þa sende Theodosius Gotene fultum beforan him,
þæt hie þa clusan tobræcon; ac hie wurdon utan ymbfaren of þæm
muntum, & ealle ofslagen: þæt wæron X M.
 36.155.1. Þa for Theodosius þiderweard, & wiste þæt
hiene mon wolde mid þæm ilcan wrence beþridian.
 36.155.2. Þa hie togædereweard foran, þa þohton Eugenius
& Arbogestes þæt hie sceoldon ærest of þæm muntum hie gebigan
mid hiora flana gescotum, ac him onsende God swelcne wind ongean þæt hie
ne mehton from him nænne flan asceotan, ac ælc com oþer þara,
oþþe on hie selfe, oþþe on þa eorþan.
 36.155.7. & Theodosius hæfde þone wind mid him þæt
his fultum mehte mæstra ælcne heora flana on hiora feondum afæstnian.
 36.155.9. Þær wearð Eugenius ofslagen, & Arbogastes
ofstang hiene selfne.
 36.155.10. Æfter þæm Theodosius for on Italie.
 36.155.10. Þa he com to Mægelan þære byrig, þa geendade
he his lif, & betahte his twæm sunum þone onwald.
 37.155.13. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & C & XLIX, feng Archadius to anwalde, to þæm eastdæle,
& hine hæfde XII ger; & Onorius to þæm westdæle, &
nugiet hæfð, cwæð Orosius.
 37.155.15. & for þæm þe hie geonge wæron, he hie
betahte his twæm ealdormonnum to bewitanne: Archadius wæs betaht
Rufinuse, & Onorius wæs betaht Stilecan.
 37.155.18. Ac hie gecyðdon raðe þæs hwelce hlafordhyldo hi
þohton to gecyþanne on hiora ealdhlafordes bearnum, gif hi hit þurhteon
mehten: Rufinus wolde habban him self þone anwold þær east, &
Stileca wolde sellan his suna þisne her west.
 37.155.21. & for þæm feondscipe he forlet Gotan on Italie
mid hiora twam ciningum, Alrican & Rædgotan, & þohte, siþþan
þæt folc oferfunden wære, þæt hie siþþan wolde eall þæt
he wolde; & wende eac þæt he þæm Gotan þæs gewinnes mehte
raðe gestieran, for þon he of hiora lande geboren wæs.
 37.155.26. Raðe þæs Alrica wearð cristen; & Rædgota
hæþen þurhwunade, & dæghwamlice wæs blotende diofolgildum mid
monslihtum, & simle him wæs leofast þæt þa wæron Romanisce.
 37.156.1. Nugiet eow Romane mæg gescomian, cwæð Orosius,
þæt ge swa heanlic geþoht sceoldon on eow geniman for anes monnes ege
& for anes monnes geblote, þæt ge sædon þæt þa hæðnan
tida wæron beteran þonne þa cristnan, & eac þæt eow selfum
wære betere þæt ge eowerne cristendom forleten, & to þæm
hæðeniscan þeawum fenge, þe eowre ieldran ær beeodon.
 37.156.6. Ge magon eac geþencan hu hean he eft wearþ his
geblota & his diofolgilda þe he on gelifde, þa þa ge hiene gebundenne
hæfdon, & hiene siþþan atugon swa swa ge woldon, & ealne his
fultum.
 37.156.9. Þæt wæs, swa swa ge selfe sædon, II C M, swa
eower nan ne wearð gewundod.
 38.156.11. Æfter þæm þe Romeburg getimbred wæs M
wintra & C & IIII & siextegum, God gedyde his miltsunge on Romanum,
þa þa he hiora misdæda wrecan let, þæt hit þeh dyde Alrica se
cristena cyning & se mildesta.
 38.156.14. & he mid swa lytle niþe abræc Romeburg,
þæt he bebead þæt mon nænne mon ne sloge, & eac þæt man
nanuht ne wanade ne ne yfelade þæs þe on þæm ciricum wære.
 38.156.16. & sona þæs on þæm þriddan dæge hie
aforan ut of þære byrig hiora agnum willan, swa þær ne wearð nan
hus hiora willum forbærned.
 38.156.19. Þær genom Hettulf, Alrican mæg, Onorius swostor
þæs cyninges, & siþþan wið hine geþingade, & hi him to
wife nam.
 38.156.20. Siþþan sæton þa Gotan þær on lande, sume
be þæs caseres willan, sume his unwillan; sume hi foron on Ispanie, &
þær gesæton, sume on Affrice.
