 3.25.4. Forþon þe þu þis dydest, God þe me on geweald
sealde.
 3.25.6. For hwon gedyrstigodest þu, þæt þu þus oft in
þisra muneca wyrtune stalodest?
 3.25.9. & he þa æfter þisum wordum þæs þeofes fot
onlysde of þam gærde, þe he ær fæste on clyfode, & hine
ungederedne ofdune asette & cwæð to him: gang mid me.
 3.25.13. Þa gelædde he hine to þæs wyrtgeardes gate,
& gehwylce wyrte, þe he ær mid stale gewilnode, he him þæt mid
mycelre wynsumnysse sealde þus cweþende: gang nu & æfter þissere
tide ne stala þu her na ma, ac þonne þe þearf sy, ga þe her to me,
& þæt þu ær mid unrihte on urum geswince begeate, ic þe
þæt mid estfulnesse sylle.
 3.25.24. Petrus cwæð: nu oð þis, swa me þinceð,
holenga ic wende, þæt nænige fædras næron in Suðlongbardum,
þa þe þyllicu mægnu & tacnu wyrcan mihton.
 4.25.31. Gregorius him &swarode: mid sægene þæs
arwyrðan weres Furtunates, se wæs abbud þæs mynstres, þe nemned is
Cicerones bæþ, & eac swylce þurh oðra arwurðra wera segena ic
geleornode, þæt ic nu secgan wille.
 4.26.3. Sum wæs se halgesta man in Ualeria mægðþe, þam
wæs nama Equitius se fore geearnunge his sylfes lifes wæs gehæfd &
ongyten mid eallum, þam þe hine cuþon, for his sylfes gewyrhtum mycelre
geearnunge man.
 4.26.10. Se ylca Furtunatus us wæs hiwcuðlic.
 4.26.12. Butan tweon se Equitius for his haligdomes mycelnesse
wearð manigra mynstra fæder & hlaford.
 4.26.15. Þa gelamp him in þa tid his geogoðe, þæt he
wearð mid grimmum gewinne his lichaman lustes geswænced.
 4.26.18. Ac þa nearonessa his agenre costunge hine gedydon þy
geornfulran to þære teolunge godcundra beboda.
 4.26.21. & he þa on þas wisan him to þam ælmihtigan
Gode mid singalum gebedum læcedom sohte.
 4.26.24. He þa sumre nihte geseah him ætstandan Godes
ængcel, se his gesihðe ætywde & him ealle þa cennendan leomu of
acearf.
 4.26.27. & of þære tide he wearð swa fremde þære
costunge, efne swa he næfre þone had on his lichaman næfde.
 4.26.31. Mid þy mægne he wæs gebælded of ðæs
ælmihtigan Godes fultume to þon swyðe, þæt he, se þe ær wæs
wera ealdorman, æfter þon he eac ongan wifhades manna lareowdom &
hlafordscipe underfon.
 4.27.4. Ne blan he hwæðre, þæt he his geongran ne manode,
þæt hi næfre gelyfdon heom sylfum to swiðe in þissere wisan,
þæt him wære eaðelic se wifhired to healdanne & to rihtanne &
þonne þurh þæt swyþur cunnedon þære Godes gife, þe hi na ne
onfengon, þonne hit wærlic wære.
 4.27.14. On þa ylcan tide hit gelamp, þa þa scincræftigan
wurdon arasode in þyssere Romaniscan byrig, þæt Basilius fleonde gesohte
in munuchade Ualeriam þa mægðe, se wæs yldost & fyrmest of þam
drycræftum.
 4.27.20. & he þa Basilius se scincræftiga ferde to þam
arwurðan were Castorio, se wæs biscop on Amiternine þære ceastre
& gehihte to him & gewilnode, þæt he hine befæste, þæt he
moste beon læce þæs nunmynstres.
 4.27.28. & þa ferde se biscop, oþ þæt he becom to
ðam mynstre & mid him lædde Basilium þone leasan munuc & bæd
þa Equitium þone Godes þeow, þæt he underfenge þone munuc in his
gesomnunge.
 4.27.34. Þa sona swa he se halga wer locode on hine, he cwæð
to þam biscope: min fæder, ne þincð me na, þæt þes sy munuc,
þe þu me her beodest, ac ic geseo, þæt he is deofol sylf.
 4.28.5. Him þa andswarode se biscop & cwæð: þu secest
nu beladunge, hu þu mage þæt findan, þæt þu ne þurfe me
tyðian þæs þe þu gebeden eart.
 4.28.9. Se Godes wer þa cwæð to him: þæt ic secge
þæt ic him on geseo.
 4.28.12. Ac ne wen þu na, þæt ic nylle þe hyran.
 4.28.13. Ic do þæt þu me hatest.
 4.28.14. & he þa hine underfeng on þæt mynster be
þæs biscopes hæse.
 4.28.16. Þa æfter naht manegum dagum ferde se Godes man hwene
fyr fram þam mynstre to trymmanne eac oþre geleaffulle men to Godes þam
upplican wyllan.
 4.28.20. Ða gelamp hit sona swa he on færelde wæs, þæt
in þam fæmnena mynstre, in þam wacode eac þæs ylcan fæder &
lareowes ymbhoga, þa an þara nunnena, þe wæs swyþe fægru æfter
þæs lichaman gesceape, wæs þa færlice mid fefre geswenced &
mid mycclum brogan nallæs na rihtstefnum, ac mid gristbitingum ongan
clypigan & cweðan: nu ic sceall sweltan, buton Basilius se munuc cume to
me, & he þonne me gehæle þurh þone wisdom his læcecræftes.
 4.28.34. Ac þa ne dorste nan þæra muneca on heora hlafordes
æfweardnysse gan in þa gesamnunge þara fæmnena, & mycle læs
þam wæs alyfed, þam þe niwan com, & his lif wæs þa gyt
uncuð eallre þære gesomnunge þara broðra.
 4.29.7. & þa sona sændon hi ærendracan to þam Godes
þeowe Equitie & him þæt bodedon, þæt seo nunne wære
inhæted mid unmætum feferadlum, & þæt heo geornlice bæde
Basilies neosunge þæs muneces.
 4.29.13. Sona swa se halga man þas ærendu gehyrde, þa hloh
he eall swylce he þæt spell oferhogode & þus cwæð: hwæt.
 4.29.16. Ne sæde ic hit ær, þæt he wære deofol nalles
munuc?
 4.29.18. Gað nu to him & hine adrifað of þam mynstre;
& be þam Godes mænnene þære nunnan, þe þær nearolice
geþread wæs mid feferadle, ne þurfe ge na sorgian, forþon on þissere
ylcan tide, þe ic þas word cweþe, na ma heo ne byþ winnende on
feferadlum, ne heo ne biddeþ Basilies tocymes.
 4.29.27. & þa cyrde him ham se munuc, þe hit ærendode,
& sona ongæt, þæt seo Godes fæmne wæs gehæled in þa
ylcan tide, þe se Godes þeow cyrde.
 4.29.31. Þeah he feor wære, Æquitius þa he hire hæle
gecwæþ & gehet.
 4.29.33. Witodlice þes halga man in þam mægne þisses
wundres wæs habbende þa bysene ures lareowes, þæt is þæs
hælendan Cristes, se wæs gelaþod to anes rices mannes suna & wæs
gebeden fram his fæder, þæt he him hæle gæfe.
 4.30.7. & he þa sona mid his anum worde hine gehælde,
& sona swa þæs cnihtes fæder him fram cyrde, on þa ylcan tid he
oncneow, þæt him wæs eft lif seald, þe he ær gehyrde of þæs
hælendes sylfes muðe, þæt him lif gehaten wæs.
 4.30.14. Witodlice ealle þa munecas heora fæder hæse &
bebod gefyldon & þone ylcan Basilium of ðæs mynstres eardunge
utadrifon.
 4.30.18. & þa þa he utadrifen wæs, he cwæð:
gelomlice ic wæs mid minum drycræftum Equities cytan & mynster
ahonde, & ic hwæþre nænigne man of his mynstre beswican ne mihte.
 4.30.24. Se æfter medmycclum fyrste eft in þyssere ylcan
Romebyrig fram cristenum folce forbærned wearð for his mandædum.
 4.30.29. Soðlice sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt an nunne of
þam ylcan mynstre þara fæmnena eode in þone wyrttun.
 4.30.32. Þa geseah heo ænne leahtric.
 4.30.33. Þa lyste hi þæs & hine genam & forgeat,
þæt heo hine mid Cristes rodetacne gebletsode, ac heo hine freclice bat.
 4.31.1. Þa wearð heo sona fram deofle gegripen & niðer on
þa eorðan gefeoll & wæs swiþe geswenced.
 4.31.4. & hi þa hrædlice to heora fæder Equito
ærendracan sændon & him þis sædon & hine bædon, þæt
he hraðe come & mid his gebedum heora swuster gehælde.
 4.31.9. & þa he halga man gebiddende arn.
 4.31.10. & sona swa se halga fæder in þone wyrtun ineode,
þa ongan se deofol, þe þa nunnan swencte, of hire muþe clypian swylce
he dædbote don wolde & þus cwæð: hwæt dyde ic hire?
 4.31.16. Hwæt dyde ic hire?
 4.31.16. Ic me sæt on anum leahtrice, þa com heo & bat
me.
 4.31.18. He þa se Godes wer mid mycelre æbylignysse bebead,
þæt he of hire gewite, & þæt he þa stowe on þæs
ælmihtigan Godes fæmnan læng ne hæfde ne on hire ne wunede.
 4.31.23. & he þa sona onweg gewat, & he na onufan
þæt hire gehrinan ne moste ne ne dorste.
 4.31.28. Sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt Felix, se wæs
æþele fæder Nursine þære mægðe & hlaford þisses ylcan
Castories, se nu gyt mid us wunað in þissere ylcan Romebyrig & us þis
spell be Equitie sæde þam halgan were.
 4.32.1. Þa þa he geacsode, þæt se arwurða wer næfde
þone halgan had, þe Godes folces lareowas habban scoldon, & swa þeah
ferde geond manige stowe & geornlice Godes bebod cyþde & lærde,
þa sume dæge gesohte Felix hine Equitium mid hiwcuþlicre byldo &
þus cwæð to him: hu dearst þu æfre þus bealdlice læran?
 4.32.11. Ne þu þone halgan had næfst, ne þu nane leafe ne
onfengce æt þam Romaniscan biscope, þe þu under drohtast &
eardast.
 4.32.15. Ða wæs se halga wer Equitius mid þære acsunge
geþread & genyded, & he þa him secgan ongan, hu he þa leafe
onfeng þære bodunge þus cweþende: þa wisan, þe þu nu to me
sprecst, þa ic me sylf ær swiþe georne gemunde.
 4.32.22. Ac sumere niht hit gelamp, þæt me sum geong man æt
gestod, se wæs swiðe fæggerre ansyne, & he asette his læceiren
on mine tungan & þus cweþende wæs: geseoh nu, þæt ic sette min
word in þinum muðe.
 4.32.28. Ac gang þu & boda.
 4.32.29. Ða æfter þam dæge, þeh þe ic wolde þara
godcundra lara geswigian, þonne ne mihte ic.
 4.32.32. Petrus cwæð: ic wolde þæs halgan fæder weorca
nu gyt ma witan & ongytan, forþon þe hit gesæd is, þæt he
þyllice gife onfenge.
 4.33.2. Gregorius him andswarode: wite þu, Petrus, þæt
þæt weorc byþ of þære gife geseald, nalles seo gifu of þam
weorce, elcor ne byþ seo gifu Godes gifu, forþon se mann ne mæg naht
gewyrcan, buton hit sy ær fram Gode gyfen.
 4.33.8. Ac symble þa gyfa gaþ nu beforan ælcum weorce,
þeah þe þa gyfa eac of þam æfterfiligendan weorce geweaxen &
gemærsien.
 4.33.12. Ne scealt þu hwæþre þæs andgites bedæled
beon þisses eadigan mannes lifes Equities.
 4.33.15. Wel þæt ongæt se eadiga wer Albinus, se wæs
biscop in þære circan on þære cæstre Reatina, & nu gyt syndon
manige men lifigende, þa þe þis gemunan magon.
 4.33.20. Ac hwæt secest þu ma þæs weorces, þa þa seo
clænnys his lifes geþwærede mid þære geornfulnesse his bodunga?
 4.33.23. & mid swiþe mycclum ege he wearð onæled,
þæt he wæs manna sawla þam ælmihtigan Gode gestreonende, & swa
he þa mynstru heold, þæt he arn þurh cristenra folca gesomnunge geond
ceastre & geond tunas on healfa gehwilce & þurh geleaffulra manna
hus, to þon þæt he þara gehyrendra heortan to þære lufan þæs
heofonlican eþles awehte.
 4.34.1. He wæs swiðe yfellic on his gegerelan & swa
forsewenlic, þeh þe hit gelumpe, þæt him hwilc man þe hine ne cuþe
ongen come & se þonne wære gegreted, þæt he forhogode togenes
gretan.
 4.34.6. & swa oft swa he to oðrum stowum faran wolde, þonne
wæs his þeaw, þæt he wolde sittan on þam horse, þe he mihte
findan forcuþlocost on þam mynstre.
 4.34.11. & eac he breac on þam hælftre for bridelse &
weþera fella for sadole & lædde him sylf his halgan bec mid him in
fellenum sæccum, þa wæron alegd his on þa swiðran healfe & on
þa wynstran.
 4.34.17. & þonne swa hwider swa he com, he symble ontynde
þone æspryng godcundra gewrita & þænde þa mædwe geleaffulra
moda.
 4.34.23. Þa æt nexstan becom þisses ylcan weres hlisa to
cyþnysse Romana biscope, & þa wæs hit sona, swa hit for oft byð,
þæt seo tunge þara leasolecendra cweleþ & swenceþ þæs
sawle, þe hi gehieran lysteþ.
 4.34.29. Swa on þa ylcan tid, þe þa preostas gehyrdon þises
apostolican setles biscopes þone hlisan þæs halgan weres, hi þa sona
olæcende wæron ymb þæt seofiende & þus cwædon: hwæt is
þes ceorlisca wer, þe þus hafað him sylfum genumen þa ealdorlicnysse
þære halgan lare & neþeþ þus ungelæred, þæt he agnað
him sylfum þa þenunga ures apostolican hlafordes?
 4.35.7. Ac la, hlaford, gif hit þin willa sy, sænde man
ærendwrecan to him, & se hine hider gefecce, þæt we magan ongytan,
hwilc his seo circlice strengþ sy.
 4.35.12. Þa sona swa hit þeaw is, þæt þam mode, þe
biþ abysgod in manigum þingum, swiþe undercreopeð seo lease olehtung,
gif heo ne byþ þy hraþor onweg adrifen fram þære heortan
æmtignesse.
 4.35.17. Swa þa lærendum þam preostum se papa geþafode,
þæt Equitius moste beon gelæded to Romebyrig, & þæt man
ongæte, hwæt se his wisdom wære.
 4.35.22. & he þa sænde Iulianum his witan, se æfter
þon wearð biscop on Sabinense þære cyrcan, & þæt bebead,
þæt he hine gelædde mid mycelre are, þy læs se Godes þeow
æniges teonan oht ongeate for þissere gemetingce.
 4.35.28. He þa sona wolde gehyran be þære wisan þara
preosta willan & ferde ofstlice to þæs halgan mannes mynstre.
 4.35.31. & þa he þær com æfweardum þam abbode, he
gemette þa writeras ærest writende & þa acsode he hi, hwær se
abbud wære.
 4.36.1. Hi him cwædon to: he maweþ heig on þissere dene,
þe ligeþ beneoþan þisum mynstre.
 4.36.4. Se ylca Iulianus hæfde ænne swiþe oferhigdigne
cniht & mycelne wiðerbrecan, þam he sylf miht uneaðe gewyldan.
 4.36.7. Þa sænde he þisne to þam halgan men, þæt he
hine hrædlice to him gelædde.
 4.36.9. Þa arn se cniht & mid þweorum gehigde eode
hwætlice on þa mædwe, & þa geseah he, þæt hi ealle meowan
þæt heig, þa þe þær wæron.
 4.36.14. Ða acsode he, hwilc wære Equitius.
 4.36.15. Þa sona swa he geacsode, hwilc he wæs, & he hine
feorran onlocode, þa wearð he mid unmætum ege geþread.
 4.36.18. He ongan him ondrædan & wergian & to þon
swiðe cwacian, þæt he uneaðe hine sylfne aberan mihte, & þa swa
bifigende com to þam Godes mæn & sona mid his earmum befeng his cneowu
& wæs cyssende & him sæde, þæt his hlaford þider to him
cumen wære.
 4.36.26. & he þa se Godes þeowa gehalette þone cniht
& him þus bebead & cwæð: aris & ber þis grene hig þam
horsum to mete, þe ge hider on comon.
 4.36.30. & nu is lytel to lafe þysses mæþes & swa
þis gedon byþ, ic ga æfter þe.
 4.36.33. Þa wundrode Iulianus swiþe, þe þider onsænded
wæs, hwæt þæt wære, þæt se cniht yldode, þæt he
hraðor ne come.
 4.37.2. Þa he þa geseah þone cniht to him cyrrende & hig
berende on his sweoran of þam mædwum, þa ongan he swiðe yrre clypigan
ongæn him & þus cwæð: hwæt is þis, þæt þu dyst?
 4.37.8. Ic wende, þæt þu scoldest me mann to lædan, nu
byrst þu heig.
 4.37.9. Se cniht him andswarode & cwæð: he cymð æfter
me, se þu secest.
 4.37.12. Þa com se Godes wer gescod mid gehammenum scon &
bær on his eaxle his hegsiþe.
 4.37.14. Þam habbude þa gyt feorr gangende se cniht sæde
þa his hlaforde, þæt þæt wære, se þe he sohte.
 4.37.17. Þa semninga se ylca Iulianus, swa he geseah þone Godes
þeowan, he forseah hine sona for his gegerelan & þohte mid þwerum
mode on his oferhigdum, hu he sceolde him to sprecan.
 4.37.22. Ac þa sona swa se Godes þeowa him wæs neah, on
þæs ylcan Iulianus mod gefor unaræfnedlicu fyrhtu, swa þæt he
forhtode, þæt uneaðe mihte his tunge genihtsumian, to þon þæt he
sæde his ærende, þe he þider fore com.
 4.37.29. He þa sona mid geeadmodadum gaste georne to his cneowum
gewilnode, þæt he for hine gebæde & sæde, þæt his fæder
se apostolica biscop hine geseon wolde.
 4.38.3. Þa ongan se arwyrða Equitius don unmæte þancas
þam ælmihtigan Gode & þæt sæde, þæt hine geneosode seo
uplice gifu þurh þone hean biscop þæs apostolican setles.
 4.38.8. & þa hraðe gecigde his broþer & him bebead,
þæt on þa ylcan tid sceoldon beon heora hors gegearwode & ongan his
geferan swiðe þreagan, þæt hi scoldon on þa tid utfaran.
 4.38.13. Þa cwæð Iulianus to him: ne mæg þæt
nænigra þinga beon, forþon ic eom swiþe werig for þy langan wege,
þæt ic ne mæg todæg heonan faran.
 4.38.18. Þa andswarode se halga him & þus cwæð: þu
geunrotsast me þonne, min sunu, forþon ic wat, gif we on þysum ylcan
dæge ne feraþ, þæt we tomorgen nænig færeld ne þurhteoð.
 4.38.23. & þa swa se Godes þeowa wæs genyded fram
werignysse his geferana, þæt he wunode þa niht on his mynstre.
 4.38.27. Þa þe æfterfylgendan dæge sona on dægred com
ærendraca to Iuliane mid epistolan & mid swiðe geswenctan horse for
ærninge.
 4.38.30. In þam epistolan wæs beboden, þæt he ne
gedyrstlæhte to þon, þæt he aht grette þone Godes þeowan,
oþþe hine of ðam mynstre styrede.
 4.39.2. & þa sona swa he acsode, for hwon se cwide
onwænded wære, he ongæt, þæt þy ylcan nihte, þe him se
ærendraca æfter wæs sænded, þæt se apostolica biscop wæs
swiðe abreged on swefne þurh nihtlice gesihþe, for hwon he
geþrysstlæhte, þæt he hete þone Godes man swa swæncan & to
him spanan.
 4.39.11. & þa hraðe aras Iulianus se ærendraca &
hine sylfne þære gebedrædenne þæs arwurðan weres befæste
& þa cwæð to him: eower fæder eow biddað, þæt ge ne scylen
eow swencan on þone siþ.
 4.39.17. Þa se Godes þeowa þis gehyrde, þa wæs he sona
geunrotsod & þus cwæð: hu, ne sægde ic gyrstandæge, þæt
gif we þa sona ne ferdon, þæt us nu nære alyfed to farene?
 4.39.22. & þa fore gegearwunge þære soþan lufe he
hæfde þone ærendracan Iulianum hwylcnehugu fyrst in þam mynstre, to
þon þæt he him swa gelettum & swa genyddum forgeafe & gedyde
hwæthugu getæse his gewinnes.
 4.39.29. Ongyt nu, Petrus, on hu mycelre Godes hyrnysse beoð,
þa þe cunnon hi sylfe forseon on þysum life, & mid hwylcum
ceasterwarum beoð in are getealde innan, þa þe ne scamiað, þæt hi
syn mannum forsewene utan.
 4.40.2. Swa eac wið þan beforan Godes eagum licgað forsewene,
þa þe aþindað & aswellað þurh þa wilnunge þæs idlan
gylpes mid heom sylfum & beforan eagum heora nehstena.
 4.40.7. Be þan seo soðfæstnys, þæt is Crist, cwæð
to sumum mannum: ge wæron þa þe eow sylfe godiaþ beforan mannum, ac
God cann eowre heortan, forþon eall þæt mannum þinceð healic,
þæt byþ onscuniendlic beforan Gode.
 4.40.14. Petrus cwæð: ic wundrige swyþe, þæt æfre
mihte be swilcum were & swa mycclum biscope beon undercropen seo deofollice
scinnys þurh þa olehtinga þara preosta.
 4.40.20. Gregorius him andswarode: to hwan wundrast þu, Petrus,
forþon þe we, men syndon & beoþ ful oft belogene fram oþrum
mannum?
 4.40.24. Hwæþer þe of mode aleah, þæt þu ne
gemundest, þæt Dauid, þe gewunade, þæt he hæfde witedomes gast
in him, he demde dom ongen þone unscyldigan Ionathanes sunu, þa þa he
gehyrde þæs leogendan cnihtes word?
 4.40.31. Þæt þonne hwæþre gedon wæs þurh Dauid, we
gelyfað, þæt hit riht wære in þam diglan Godes dome, ac hwæþre
we ne magon na geseon ne geþæncan, hu hit riht wære in þam
mænniscan rihte.
 4.41.4. Hwylc wundor is þæt forþon, Petrus, þeh þe we
hwilum syn gelædde in oþra leogendra muþe, we þe nænige witigan
næron?
 4.41.7. Ac we witan, þæt þæt swiþe mycle is, þæt
anra gehwilces biscopes mod byþ forhergod & todrifeþ full oft seo
þicnes þara woruldlicra ymbhogena, & þonne hit þæt mod byð
todæled to manegum wisum, hit byð þy medmare to hwylcum synderlicum
þingum.
 4.41.15. & swa myccle ma hit byþ undercropen mid scinnysse
& beswicen in hwylcumhugu anum þinge, swa myccle hit rumor & widdor
byþ abysgod on manegum wisum.
 4.41.20. Petrus him cwæþ to: swiðe soðe wæron þa word
þe þu sagast.
 4.41.24. Gregorius him andswarode: ne sceall ic na forswigian,
þæt ic nu ongæt þy þe me hit sægde se arwyrþa wer Ualentinus
be þam ylcan abbude.
 4.41.28. He cwæð, þæt his lichama wære bebyrged in
þam gebedhuse þæs eadigan Laurenties þæs martyres.
 4.41.31. Þa eode sum ceorl & asette his earcan mid hwæte
gefylde ofer þæs halgan mannes byrgene & ne gymde, þæt he
geþohte oþþe him ondrede, hu mycel & hu arwurðe wer þær
reste.
 4.42.5. Þa semninga wæs geworden þoden of heofonum, þæt
he ahof upp þa earcan, þe aseted wæs ofer þa byrgene & hi forð
awearp feorr of þon þe heo on stod, & elles ealle þa þing þe
þær wæron gewunedon on heora agnum stede, efne þæt swa openlice
ealle þa þe þær wæron ongæton, hu mycelre geearnunge wæs, se
þe his lichama þær reste.
 4.42.18. Eac þa word, Petrus, þe ic her gyt secgcan wille, ic
oncneow of sægene þæs forecwedenan & þæs arwurþan weres
Fortunates, þæs yldu & weorc & bylwitnes me licaþ swiþe wel.
 4.42.23. Se ylca me sæde, þæt Langbearde foron hergiende in
Ualeriam þa mægðe.
 4.42.25. Þa þa munecas of þæs arwurþan weres mynstre
Equities geflugon in þæt gebedhus, hi ongunnon teon ut þa munecas &
hi todrifon þurh manegu tintregu & eac sume mid heora swurdum acwealdon.
 4.42.31. Þa an þara muneca wæs onstyred mid grimman sare, he
ageomrode & cleopode þus: loca nu, þu halga Equitius.
 4.43.2. Licað þe, þæt we synt þus atogene, & þu us
nylt no scyldan?
 4.43.4. Sona to þæs stefne se unclæna gast gefor on þa
reþgiendan Langbeardan, & hi þa urnon geond þæt land wedende,
& swa lange hi wæron fram deofle geswencte, oþ þæt þa
Langbeardas ongæton, þa þe þær ute wæron, þæt hi ofer
þæt ne dorston nohte gretan þa halgan stowe.
 4.43.12. & hit gelamp þa, þæt se halga wer mundbyrde his
agene þegnas, & he forgæf eac manegum oþrum læcedom &
mundbyrd, þe þyder æfter þon geflugon to his byrgenne.
 5.43.20. & eac ic geleornode, þæt ic nu segcan wylle, of
þære gesægene mines efenhadan þæs biscopes, þe leofode manega
gær in munuchade in Anthonitana þære byrig, & þær his þæt
æwfæste lif leofde swyþe ungneþelice; þæt us cyðdon be þam
ure freond manige, þe on þam lande wæron.
 5.43.28. Se ylca me sæde, þæt neah þære cæstre,
þe he on wæs, wære aseted þæs eadigan Stephanes cyrice þæs
martyres.
 5.43.32. In þære wæs sum swiðe arwurðes lifes man,
þam wæs nama Constantinus, & se breac þær & þeowode
cyricweardes þenunge.
 5.44.2. Þæs halignysse hlysa hine sylfne gemærsode feor
& wide & hine gelædde to manigra manna cyþnesse, forþon þe se
ylca wer forseah eallinga þa eorðlican þing & mid ealles modes
geornnysse lufode þa heofonlican ane.
 5.44.8. Sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt in þære ylcan cyrcan
wæs eles wana, & þes forecwedena Godes þeowa næfde, þæt he
mihte þa leohtfatu onælan.
 5.44.13. Þa gefylde he mid wætre þære cyrcan cyllan &
sette tapor onmiddan, swa hit þeaw is, & þa mid fyre ontænde.
 5.44.16. & swa þæt wæter barn þa in þam leohtfatum,
swylce hit ele wære.
 5.44.18. Ac ongyt nu, Petrus, hwylcre geearnunge þes wær
wære, þe wæs swa mid nyode genyded for elelæste, þæt he
gewænde þæs wæteres gecynd on eles þicnesse.
 5.44.23. Petrus him cwæð to: hit is swiþe wundorlic,
þæt ic nu gehyrde æt þe.
 5.44.25. Ac ic wolde witan, hwylcre eadmodnesse þes man mihte
beon innan, þe swa mycelre halignysse wæs utan for þam mægenum þe
he wrohte.
 5.44.30. Gregorius him andswarode: genoh gerisenlice þu hit
secest, þæt þu wilt witan, hwilc his mod wære betwih þam wundrum
þe he dyde, forþon þe þæt swyþe mycel is, þæt symble deofol
sliteð þæs mannes mod innan mid his costunge & hine wile geteon in
oferhigd, gif se man oht wundorlices oþþe clænlices wyrceþ utan þurh
Godes gife.
 5.45.7. Ac gif þu gehyrest þysses arwurðan Constanties ane
dæde þe he gedyde, þu ongytest swiðe hraðe, hwilcre eadmodnesse man
he wæs.
 5.45.11. Petrus cwæð: æfter þan þu me sædest hwilc
wundor his dæda, ofer þæt me lysteþ get, þæt þu me hwæthugu
lære be his modes eadmodnesse.
 5.45.19. Gregorius him andswarode: forþon þe þisses mannes
halignysse hlisa swiðe weox, manige men hine geornlice lystan geseon of
manigum boldgetalum.
 5.45.23. Þa sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt sum ceorl for
feorran, to þan þæt he hine geseon wolde.
 5.45.26. Þa com he on þa ylcan tid, þe se halga wer fylde
þa leohtfatu in þære cyrcan & stod uppe on treowene hlædran.
 5.45.30. He wæs lytel on his wæstmum & swiðe yfellices
hiwes & forsewenlices.
 5.46.1. Þa se ceorl, þe þider com hine to geseonne, acsode
& geornlice bæd, þæt him scolde beon getæht, hwilc he wære.
 5.46.5. & þa tæhton him þa þe hine cuðon, hwilc he
wæs.
 5.46.6. Ac swa se man nat, þa dysigan mod leogað, þonne hi
wenaþ, þæt þæs mannes geearnung sy swylce his lichaman ansyn
byþ.
 5.46.10. Ða sona, swa se ceorl geseah þone Godes þeowan swa
lytelne & swa forseowonlicne, þa nolde he eallunga gelyfan on his mode,
þæt he se ylca wære, ac wende, forþon þe he ær gehyrde be him,
& forþon þe he geseah, hulic he wæs, þæt þæt wære sum
ceorlisc bysmrung.
 5.46.18. Forþon þe he wende, þæt swa sceort man & swa
unfægger on ansyne ne mihte næfre habban swa ormætne haligdomes
hlisan.
 5.46.22. Ac þa þa him to soðan gesæd wæs fram manegum
mannum, þæt hit se ylca wære, þa forseah he hine sona & hloh
þus cweþende: ic wende, þæt þes sceolde beon mycel & fæger.
 5.46.28. Nu næfð he naht men gelices.
 5.46.29. Þa se Godes wer Constantius þæt gehyrde, he forlet
þa swiðe bliðe þa leohtfatu, þe he rædde & fylde, &
swiðe hraðe ofdune astah & gefeoll on þæs ceorles clyppinge &
hine mid swyþlicre lufan ongan teon to him be þam earmum & cyssan &
mycle þancas him sæde, þæt he swa be him gedemde & þus
cwæð: þu ana hæfdest ontynde eagan on me & me mid rihte
oncneowe.
 5.47.6. Of þære wisan, Petrus, we magon ongytan, hwylcere
eadmodnysse man he wæs mid him sylfum, se þe lufode þone ceorl þæs
þe swiðor, þe he hine forseah.
 5.47.8. Ac symble se ongebrohta teona acunnað, hulic gehwilc man
byþ innan on his dygolnysse mid him sylfum.
 5.47.10. Forþon þa oferhydigan blissiað for þam arum þe
hi begytað, swa eac full oft þa eaðmodan blissiað for heora
forsewennysse, & þonne hi geseoð hi sylfe yfellice on oðera manna
eagum, hi þæs þonne gefeoð, forþon þe hi witon, þæt hi wile
God geseon, þeah hi men forseon.
 5.47.14. Petrus cwæð: þæs þe ic ongyte, þes wæs
mycel wer utan on þam mægnum þe he worhte, & eac he wæs mara
innan in his eaðmodnesse.
 6.47.19. Gregorius him andswarde & cwæð: eac swylce
þære ylcan cyrican Anchonitane biscop wæs swyðe arwurðes lifes
wer, þam wæs nama Marcellinus.
 6.47.21. Þæs feþe getugon mycle fotswylas & fornamon,
swa þæt hine bæron his hiwan on heora handum swa hwider swa him þearf
wæs.
 6.47.23. Soðlice sume dæge hit gelamp þurh gemeleasnysse,
þæt seo ylca cæster Anchonitana wearð on bryne.
 6.47.24. & þa þa heo swyþlice barn, þa urnon þa
gebroðru ealle, to þon þæt hi þæt fyr adwæsctan.
 6.47.25. & heom þa geornlice þæt wæter onweorpendum
to þon swiðe se lig weox, þæt heom þuhte, þæt eall seo burh
forbyrnan sceolde.
 6.47.27. & þa þa þæt fyr geondferde ealle þa
neahstowa & þære burge unlytelne dæl fornam & forbærnde
& him nænig man wiðstandan ne mihte, þa com se biscop, se wæs
boræn on his hiwcuðra broðra handum, & he wæs gecnyssed &
gebæded for neodþearfa swa myccles plyhtes.
 6.48.2. Þa bebead he þam þe hine bæron þus cweþende:
asettað nu me ongæn þysum fyre.
 6.48.4. & þæt þa swa wæs gedon, þæt he wæs
þær aseted, þær hit gesewen wæs, þæt þæs liges mægn
& strengð mæst wæs.
 6.48.5. Þa ongan seo bryne mid wundorlicum gemete beon gebiged in
hi sylfe, efne swa swa mid bignysse his agnes onræses, swylce se lig
cleopode & cwæde, þæt he for þam biscope furður faren ne
mihte.
 6.48.8. & swa hit wæs geworden, þæt se lig in þære
bærninge æt þam gemære þæs biscopes wearð swa gehæft &
gecyrred, þæt he in him sylfum acolode, & on ufan þæt he naht
þære burge botles ne gehrinan ne dorste.
 6.48.12. Gehygest þu, Petrus, hu myccles haligdomes þis
wære, þæt se mettruma man sæt ongæn þam fyre & mid his
gebedum þæs fyres mægen & strengðe todwæscte?
 6.48.14. Petrus cwæð: ic hit gehicge & his eac wundrige.
 7.48.18. Gregorius him andswarode: be þissere neahstowe ic þe
eac hwæthugu sæcge, þæs þe ic ongæt fram Maximianes gesægene
þæs arwurðan biscopes & fram Lauriones þæs ealdan muneces, þe
þu gære canst, þara ægðer nu gyt leofaþ.
 7.48.21. Se Laurio wæs afeded & gelæred fram þam halgan
were Anastasie in þam mynstre, þe is gehaten Subpentama neah Nepesinam
þære byrig.
 7.48.23. & se Anastasius wæs geþeoded mid mycelre
geornnysse to Nonnoso þæs arwurðan lifes, se wæs prafost on þam
mynstre, þe geseted is in þam munte Soractis.
 7.48.25. & he him þeodde to fore þære stowe neawiste
& for his þeawa & mægna mycelnysse.
 7.48.27. Se ylca Nonnosus drohtnode under þam reþestan fæder
his mynstres, ac þæs þeawas he aræfnode symble mid wundorlicum
geþylde.
 7.48.29. & swa he wæs fore þam broðrum mid mycelre
monþwærnysse, swa he eac swiðe gelomlice mid his eadmodnesse gestilde
þæs lareowes reþnesse & hatheortnysse.
 7.49.2. Þa forþon þe þæt mynster wæs geseted in
heanum cnolle þæs muntes, swa þæt þær nahwær næs nænigu
smeþnes, þæt man mihte aht to þan lytelne wyrtun þam broðrum to
nytte gewyrcan, þa wæs þær an stow swyþe sceort in þæs muntes
sidan, þa abysgode seo mycelnes þæs unmætan stanes, se wæs
asceoten gecyndelice of þam munte.
 7.49.7. Þa sume dæge þohte se arwyrþa wer Nonnosus,
þæt seo ylce stow mihte beon gecoplice wyrta on to settanne, gif seo
mycelnes þæs stanes nære.
 7.49.9. Þa gearn him on mod, þæt ne mihte hundteontig oxena
þone stan onstyrian .
 7.49.11. & þa þa him wæs geworden seo orwennys be þam
menniscan gewinne, he forgeaf hine sylfne to þære godcundan frofre &
hine þa þær abysgode ealle þa niht in his gebede.
 7.49.13. Þa sona swa hit morgen wæs, þa comon þa
gebroðru to þære ylcan stowe & fundon þone stan swa mycelre
mycelnesse of þære stowe feor gewitanne.
 7.49.15. & þa for his feorrunga gewearð þam gebroðrum
þær genoh rum stow wyrta on to settanne.
 7.49.20. Eac hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt se ylca arwyrða
wer hof upp glæsene leohtfatu in þam gebedhuse.
 7.49.21. Þa feoll an of his handum, þæt hit wearð tobrocen
& tostrægd on unarimedlice styccu.
 7.49.22. Þa ondred he him þa mycclan hatheortnysse þæs
mynstres hlafordes & þa sona gesamnode ealle þa styccu þæs
leohtfates & asette beforan þam weofode & hine sylfne astrehte on his
gebede mid hefige geomrunge.
 7.49.25. & mid þy þe he þæt heafod upp ahof of þam
gebede, he funde gesund þæt leohtfæt, þe he ær ondrædende
gesomnode in manegum sticcum.
 7.49.27. Swa he þa wæs onhyrigende on þam twam wundrum
twegra fædera mægnu: on þæs stanes mycelnesse Gregories dæde,
þe þone munt onstyrede, & on geedniwunge þæs leohtfates Donates
mægn, þe þone tobrocenan calic þære ærran gesynto eft ageaf.
 7.50.2. Petrus cwæð: nu we habbaþ, þæs þe me
þinceþ, be þam ealdan bysenum niwe wundru.
 7.50.4. Gregorius him andswarode: wilt þu þe nylt, þæt
þu hwæthugu in Nonnoses weorce oncnawe eac be Heliseus onhyrenesse?
 7.50.5. Petrus cwæð: ic wylle & swyþe lustlice wille.
 7.50.8. Gregorius þa gyt spræc: eac hit gelamp sume dæge,
þæt in þam mynstre wæs wana ealdes eles.
 7.50.9. & þa nealæhte seo tid, þæt man sceolde
eleberigean somnian, ac þær ne ætywde ænig wæstm on þam
eletreowum.
 7.50.11. Þa geþuhte þæs mynstres hlaforde þæt ræd,
þæt þa broþra foron on healfe gehwilce & somnedon ele &
þæt earnodon mid heora handa weorcum to utancumenum mannum, þæt hi
hwæthugu eles eft ham brohton to þam mynstre of þæra mede heora
weorces/.
 7.50.17. & sona swa þæt gehyrde se drihtnes wer Nonnosus,
he styrde hi þa mid mycelre eadmodnysse, þæt þæt swa beon ne mihte,
þy læs hit gelumpe, þæt þa broðra utfarende of þam mynstre,
þa hwile þe hi sohton þa gestreon þæs eles, þæt hi hwylcne
æfwyrdlan geþrowedon heora agenra sawla.
 7.50.26. Ac þa forþon þe he geseah, þæt on þam treowum
wæron feawa eleberigan, þe to þam mynstre belumpon, þa heht he þa
gesomnian & don on bydene, & swa hwæt swa man mihte gedon þæt
þær uteode, þeah þe hit medmycel ele wære, þæt man þæt to
him sylfum brohte.
 7.50.34. & þæt wæs swa gedon, þæt þa broðra
onfengcon hwylcnehugu ele in anum medmycclum fate & þone brohton Nonnose
þam Godes þeowe.
 7.51.5. & he þa sona þone asette beforan þam weofode,
& utgangendum eallum þam oþrum broðrum he hine gebæd lange hwile.
 7.51.8. & þa sona æfter þan eft gecigde þa broðru
& heom bebead, þæt hi þone ele namon, þe hi ær to him brohton,
& hine todældon geotende swiðe gneþelice geond ealla þa fatu
þæs mynstres, to þon þæt þa fatu ealle wæron hwæthugu in
gegotene mid bletsunge þæs ylcan eles, & het þa sona þa
fætelsas bewreon & inne belucan, swa æmtigu swa hi þa wæron.
 7.51.19. & þa oðre dæge, þe hi eft unwrigene wæron,
hie/ wæron fulle gemette, & þæt wæs fore gewilnunge þæs
halgan weres Nonnoses.
 7.51.23. Petrus cwæð: ælce dæge we acunniað, þæt
þære soþfæstnysse word beoþ gefyllede, þæt is Crist.
 7.51.26. Seo soðfæstnyss is Godes sunu, se cwæð on his
godspelle: nu gyt min fæder wyrceð, & ic eac wyrce.
 8.51.32. Gregorius him andswarode: eac hit gelamp in þa ylcan
tid, þæt se arwyrða wer Anastasius, þæs gemynd ic herbufan sæde,
se wæs writere in þissere halgan Romane cyrican, þære ic þeowige
Gode stihtigendum minum ordfruman.
 8.52.6. Se Anastasius forlet þa scrine his feohgestreones &
mynster geceas & gewilnode, þæt he geemtigode hine Gode anum to
þeowiganne.
 8.52.9. & þa on þære stowe, þe ic ær beforan
spræc, seo is haten Subpentoma, he gelædde his lif manega gær þær
on manegum dædum & þam mynstre fore wæs mid geonrlicre heordnysse.
 8.52.15. & ofer þa stowe ufon wæs hangiende unmæte
stanclif, & eac beneoðan swiþe deop neowelnys geonode.
 8.52.18. Þa sume nihte, þa þa se ælmihtiga God geteohhode,
þæt he þa gewin geedleanode þæs arwyrðan weres Anastasies, fram
þam hean clife wæs stefn geworden, seo forðgelæddum hleoðre swa
gecleopode & þus cwæð: cum, Anastasius.
 8.52.25. & þa him swa gecigdum þær wæron eac oþre
VII broðru be naman gecigde.
 8.52.27. Þa ane berhtmhwile aswygode seo stefn, þe þyder
onsænded wæs, & þa eft gecigde þone eahtoþan broður.
 8.52.30. Mid þy þa seo gesomnung eall gehyrde swa openlice þa
stefne, þa næs þær nænig tweo, þæt hit nealæhte þara
forðfore, þe þær gecigde wæron.
 8.53.1. Þa ymb feawa dagas ærest se arwyrða wer Anastasius
geferde, & þa eft þa oðre broþru wæron of lichaman gelædde be
ændebyrdnysse, swa swa hi ær gecigde wæron of þæs stanclifes
heannesse.
 8.53.7. & þa se broðer, þe æt þære cigingce seo
stefen hwæthugu geswigode & hine eft genæmde, swa þa sweltendum
þam oþrum broðrum he leofode feawa dagas & þa his lif geendode, swa
þæt openlice wæs gecyþed, þæt seo betweoh ongesette swigung
ðære ufan cymenan stefne getacnode medmycelne fyrst to lybbanne þam
broðer ofer ða oðre, þe þær eac gecigde wæron.
 8.53.18. Eac þær gelamp wundorlic wise, þæt þa þa se
arwyrða wer Anastasius utferde of his lichaman, þa wæs sum broður in
þam ylcan mynstre, þe ofer hine libban nolde, ac he þa forð onloten to
his fotum ongan hine biddan mid tearum þus cweþende: ic þe halsige þurh
þone, þe þu to færst, þæt ic ne þurfe lybban VII dagas ofer
þe in þisum middanearde.
 8.53.29. Þa ær Anastasies þam seofoðan dæge, se ylca
broðer wæs eac forðfered, se þonne hwæþre in ðære nihte
betweoh þam oþrum broðrum næs na geciged, ac hit wæs openlice
gecyþed, þæt his forðfore begeat seo þingung þæs arwyrðan
Anastasies.
 8.54.2. Petrus cwæð: þa þa þes ylca broþer næs
betweoh þam oþrum geciged & hwæþre getogen wæs of þisum
leohte mid geþingum þæs halgan weres, hwæt magon we ærest ongytan,
nemne þæt þa þe mycelre geearnunge beoð mid drihtene, hwilum hi
magon begytan þa þing, þe heom ær teohhode næron?
 8.54.11. Gregorius him andswarode: ne magon hi nænigra þinga
begytan þa þing, þe heom ær geteohhode næron, ac þa þing, þe
þa halgan weras mid heora benum gefremmað, hi beoð ær swa
forestihtode, þæt hi sceolon beon eft mid benum begytene.
 8.54.19. Soðlice seo ylce forestihtung eac þæs ecan rices
wæs geseted þus fram ælmihtigum Gode, þæt his gecorenan becumaþ
mid gewinne to þissum rice, & þæt hi sculon biddende geearnian,
þæt hi onfon, þæt se ælmihtiga God geteohhode heom to onfonne
ær eallre worulde.
 8.54.27. Petrus cwæð: ic wolde, þæt me gyt openlicor
wære gecyþed, hweþer beon mihte, þæt seo forestihtung mihte beon
mid gebedum gefultumod.
 8.54.31. Gregorius him andswarode: þu, Petrus, þis þæt ic
þe sæde, hrædlice hit mæg beon þe gecyðed, & þu þe sylf
wast, þæt ure drihten cwæð to Abrahame: þe byþ gecigd sæd in
Isaace.
 8.55.6. & eac he to him cwæð: þe ic gesette fæder
manigra þeoda.
 8.55.8. & eft he þam ylcan gehet þus cweþende: ic
bletsige þe, & is gemænifealde þin sæd swa swa heofones steorran
& swa swa þa sandcorn, þa þe beoð be sæs waroðum.
 8.55.13. Of þære wisan hit is openlice cuð, þæt se
ælmihtiga God ær forestihtode, þæt he Abrahames sæd wolde
gemanifealdigan/ þurh Isaac & hwæþre swa swa hit awriten is: Isaac
wæs to his drihtne biddende for his wife, for þon þe heo wæs
unwæstmbære.
 8.55.21. Þa gehyrde drihten his bene & sealde Robeccan his
wife wæstm.
 8.55.23. Forþon þus wæs forestihtod seo manigfealdnys
Abrahames cynnes þurh Isaac, for hwan elles onfeng Isaac unwæstmbære
wif, buton forðon þe hit cuþ is, þæt seo forestihtung scolde beon
mid bedum gefylled, þa þa he begæt mid his gebedum, þæt he mihte
suna habban, on þam ylcan ær God forestihtode, þæt Abrahames sæd
sceolde beon gemanigfealdod?
 8.55.33. Petrus cwæð: nis me naht æniges tweon nu to lafe
be þissere foresprecenan wisan, forþon þæt rihtgescead me ontynde þa
deogolnesse þurh þine gesægene.
 8.56.4. Gregorius him andswarode: wilt þu, þæt ic þe secge
hwæthugu be þam dælum Tuscie þære mægðe, þæt þu
ongyte, hulice weras wæron on þam lande & hu swyðe neah þæs
ælmihtigan Godes cyðnysse?
 8.56.10. Petrus cwæð: ic wille & þe þæs mid eallum
gemete bidde.
 9.56.14. Gregorius him andswarode: sum wæs swyþe arwyrðes
lifes wer, þam wæs nama Bonefacius.
 9.56.16. Se hæfde biscopdom in þære cæstre, þe is
haten Ferentis, & þone biscophad mid his þenunge & mid his þeawum
rihtlice gefylde.
 9.56.20. Þyses manega wundru Gaudentius se mæssepreost me
sæde, se nu gyt leofað.
 9.56.23. Se wæs afeded on his þenunge, & he mæg swa
mycele gewislicor secgan gehwylc þing be him, swa mycle ma him gelamp,
þæt he sceolde betwyh his þegnungum beon.
 9.56.28. Þisses ylcan Bonefacies cyrican gelamp, þæt
þær wæs sume gære swiðe hefigu wædl & þearfednes, seo
gewunað symble, þæt heo byþ þære eadmodnesse hyrde on godum &
acorenum modum, & þær næs naht elcor to ealles geares andlyfne,
buton þæt an, þæt he hæfde ænne wingeard.
 9.57.4. & se þa sume dæge wæs forslagen &
forhergod mid onhreosendum hægle, swa þæt on þam wingearde on feawum
wintreowum uneaðe to lafe wunodon swyþe lytle & swyþe feawa geclystru
þara winbyrgena.
 9.57.10. & þa þes forecwedena wer se arwurða Bonefacius
se biscop eode in þone wingeard, þa sæde he þam ælmihtigan Gode
mycele þancas, þæt he ongæt, þæt God hine in þære his
wædle þa gyt wolde ma geswæncan & genyrwian.
 9.57.17. Ac swa þeah þa seo tid nealæhte, þæt þa
feawa clystru þara bergena, þe þær læfde wæron, mihton ripe
beon, þa sette he weard, swa hit þeaw wæs, to þam wingearde &
bebead, þæt hine man scolde healdan mid geornlicre wacunge.
 9.57.24. Þa sume dæge het he Constantium þone
mæssepreost, se wæs his swustersunu, þæt man ealle þa winfatu in
þære biscopscire & ealle þa bydenu, swa swa hit ær gewuna wæs,
gegearwode & mid pice geondgute.
 9.57.31. & þa sona swa hit gehyrde se mæssepreost his
nefa, he wæs swiðe wundrigende & þohte, þæt þæt wære
sum ungewittignesse, þæt he bebead, þæt man scolde þa winfatu
gearwian, se þe nænig win næfde.
 9.58.4. Þehhwæþre ne dorste se mæssepreost þone biscop
geacsian, for hwon he swilc bude, ac he þa hyrde his hæsum &
gegearwode ealle þa fatu, swa hit þeaw wæs.
 9.58.9. Ac þa se Godes wer eode in þone wingeard &
gesomnode þa geclystru þara byrgena & gebrohte in þæra wintreddan
& het ealle þanon utgan, buton he ana mid anum lytlum cnihte þær
wunode & þa þone cniht asette on þa ylcan wintreddan & het hine
wringan þa feawa geclystru þære byrgena.
 9.58.18. & þa þa he of ðam ylcan geclystrum ut aþyde
lytelne dæl wines, þa ongan þæt se Godes wer mid agnum handum nyman
on an lytel fæt & todælan mid bletsunge geond ealle þa bydena &
geond ealle þa fatu, þe þær gegearwode wæron, þeh þe of þam
ylcan wine wæron uneaðe geseowene þa fatu geondgotene.
 9.58.28. & þa þa he of þam wætan þæs wines
hwæthugu sænde geond ealle þa fatu, þa cigde he him þone
mæssepreost to & het sona, þæt þa þearfan þær beon
sceoldon.
 9.58.33. & þa ongann þæt win weaxan in þære
wintreddan & þa swa gefylde ealle þa fatu þara þearfena, þe him
to gebrohte wæron.
 9.59.1. & þa þa he geseah, þæt þa þearfan genoh
hæfdon, he het þone cniht stigan of þære wintreddan & beleac
þæt winern & asette his agen insegl on þæt loc.
 9.59.6. He forlet hit swa belocen & sona him gecyrde eft to
cyrcan.
 9.59.8. Þa þy þryddan dæge, þa þa he his gebedu gedon
hæfde, he cigde þone forecwedenan mæssepreost Constantium & untynde
þæt winern & gemette þa fatu swa genihtsumlice mid wine gefyllede,
þa þe he geat ær swyðe lytelne dæl þæs þynnestan wætan,
efne þæt swa þa weaxendan winu woldon feallan ofer þa fatu on þone
flor, gif se biscop þa gyt lættra wære, þæt he inne eode.
 9.59.19. & þa Bonefacius se arwyrða wer swiðe
ondrysenlice bebead þam mæssepreoste, þæt swa lange swa he sylfa
leofode on lichaman, þæt he næfre ænigum men ne sæde þis
wundor.
 9.59.25. & he him þæt ondredde, þæt he scolde innan
þanon atyddrian, þanon he utan wære mannum mycel æteowed, gif he o
wære gecnyssed mid mænniscre herenesse fram þam mægne þyssere
wyrde.
 9.59.31. Ac he fylgde on þon þære bysene ures lareowes,
þæt is Crist, se to þon þæt he us getrymede to eadmodnysse wege, he
bebead his þegnum be him sylfum þus cweþende, þæt þæt þe hi
gesawon, hi nanum men ne sædon, ær þan þe mannes sunu fram deaðe
arise.
 9.60.4. Petrus cwæð: forþon þe nu genoh gecoplicu wise hi
sylfe gegearwode & gecyðde, me lysteþ acsian, hwæt þæt la sy,
þæt ure alysend, þa þa he ageaf leoht & gesihðe twam blindum
mannum, he bebead, þæt hi hit nanum men ne sædon, & hi þa sona
þonon gangende gemærsodon hine geond eall þæt land.
 9.60.13. Ac hwæt cwyðst þu?
 9.60.14. Hweþer se acenneda Godes sunu, se is efnece þam
fæðer & þam halgan gaste, on þissere wisan wolde gefyllan,
þæt he gefyllan ne mihte, þa þa þæt wundor, þe he forswigian
wolde, þæt hit nanra þinga forholen beon ne mihte?
 9.60.21. Gregorius him andswarode: ure alysend þurh his þone
mænniscan lichaman eall þæt he dyde, he gegearwode & gecyðde us
þæt in þære bysene his weorces, to þonN þæt we sceoldon
folgian his swaðe be þam gemete ura mægena, & þæt we sceoldon
on unforspurnedum fotum þisses andweardan weorces gan on þone weg þæs
ecan lifes.
 9.60.31. Witodlice se hælend worhte þæt wundor, & he
het hit helan, & swa þeh hit forholen beon ne mihte.
 9.60.34. On þan we magon cuðlice ongytan, þæt his
gecorenan fylgeað þære bysene his lara in þam mycclum weorcum þe hi
wyrcað.
 9.61.3. & heora wylla byþ, þæt hi syn forholene; ac
þeh þæt hi nytte syn oðrum mannum, hi beoð full oft geypte swa hi
nellað.
 9.61.7. & þæt byð mycelre eadmodnesse, þæt hi
wilniað, þæt heora weorc syn forholene, & eac mycelre eadmodnesse,
þæt hi heora weorc forhelan ne magon.
 9.61.11. Nis hit na þæt, Petrus, þæt drihten wolde aht
swylces beon & ne mihte beon, ac he sealde þa bysene mid þy lareowdome
his sylfes lare, hwæt his leomu sceolan wilnian þæt we wæron,
oððe hwæt hi sceolan nyllan.
 9.61.18. Petrus cwæð: me licað þæt þu sagast.
 9.61.21. Gregorius him andswarode: nu gyt hwylcehugu wisan wæron
to lafe, þa we willaþ sprecan be Bonefacies weorce þæs biscopes,
þæs gemynd we dydon herbufan.
 9.61.26. Hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt to genealæhte se
gebyrddæg þæs eadigan Procules mynstres.
 9.61.29. On þære stowe wunode swyþe æþel wer, þam
wæs nama Furtunatus.
 9.61.31. Se mid micclum benum bæd þone arwurðan wer
Bonefacium, þa þa he gedyde his mæssan symbelnysse æt þam eadigan
martyre, þæt he gebuge to his huse & him bletsunge sealde.
 9.62.4. Þa ne mihte he forsacan þæt Godes mægn, forðon
þe hine bæd þæs seo soðe lufu of Furtunates mode.
 9.62.7. & þa gedonum symbelnessum þæra mæssan, þa
þa he com to þæs forecwedenan Furtunates beode, þa ær ðon þe he
Gode þone lofsang asægde, swa swa sume men gewuniaþ, þæt hi
singað mid hergendlicum cræfte ær hi etan, þa stod þær semninga
sum man mid anum apan & bæd him metes & sloh cymbalan.
 9.62.16. Þa sona se halga wer wæs forhycgende þæt glig
& eorringa þus cwæð: wala wa.
 9.62.19. Dead sceall beon þes erming.
 9.62.20. Ic com to þises gereordes mysan, & nu gyt ic na
minne muþ to Godes herenysse ne ontynde, & he com mid apan & sloh
cymbalan.
 9.62.24. Þa get he togeecte þas word & cwæð þus:
gangað Ge nu & for Godes lufan syllað him mete & drync, &
witað ge hwæþre, þæt he dead byð unfyrn.
 9.62.28. Þa se ungesæliga wer sona swa he þone hlaf &
þæt win onfeng, þa wolde he gan þurh ðæs huses duru.
 9.62.31. Ac þær feoll an unmæte stan of þam hrofe
þæs huses & hine færinga ufan on þæt heafod sloh.
 9.62.34. For þam slege he feoll adune, & hine man þa
healfcwicne upp ahof, & þam oðran dæge æfter þæs Godes weres
cwide eallinga he his lif geendode.
 9.63.4. On þære wisan, Petrus, us is to gehycganne, hu mycelne
ege we sceolon witan to ðam halgum werum, þa syndon Godes templu.
 9.63.8. & þa þa se halga wer wæs getogen to
hatheortnysse for ðam unnyttan glige, hwylc wæs þær aweht to þam
eorre, butan þam ylcan temples ineardiend, þæt wæs Crist?
 9.63.13. Forþon us is swa mycle ma to ondrædanne rihtwisra
manna yrre, swa mycle ma us cuð is, þæt se byð andweard in heora
heortum, se þe naht unstrang nis wræce to donne, þam þe he wile.
 9.63.22. Eac hit gelamp on sumre tide, þæt se forecwedena
mæssepreost Constantius þæs biscopes swustersunu bebohte his hors to
twelf mancussum & þa þa mancessas alegde in his agene cyste.
 9.63.27. & he gewat feran ut sum dæl oðres weorces to
wyrcanne.
 9.63.29. Þa semninga comon þa þearfan to þam biscope, þa
hine bædon swiðe gemahlice, þæt heom se halga Bonefacies biscop
hwæthugu sellan scolde to frofre heora wædle.
 9.63.34. Ac se Godes man nyste hwæt he heom sealde.
 9.64.2. Þa ongan he hatian on his geþance & smeagan,
þæt þa þearfan ne eodon æmtige onweg fram him.
 9.64.5. Þa semninga gehwearf him to gemynde, þæt se
mæssepreost Constantius his mæg bebohte þæt hors, þæt he sylf
ær full oft on sæt, & þæt ilce weorð hæfde þa gyt on his
cyste gehealden.
 9.64.11. Þa æfweardum þam ylcan his nefan se biscop eode to
þære cyste, & arfullice nyd nimende he tosloh þa locu þære
cyste & þær genam þa XII mancossas & þa gedælde þam
þearfendum mannum, swa swa him wel licode.
 9.64.18. & þa þa Constantius com ham of his weorce, þa
funde he his cyste tobrocene, & he ne funde his horses weorð, þæt he
þær onlegde.
 9.64.22. Þa ongan he mid mycelre stefne hlydan & mid
swyðlicre/ hatheortnysse clypian & þus cwedan: ealle her libbaþ,
& ic ana ne mæg libban on þysum hirede.
 9.64.26. Þa buton tweon to þæs þam manigfealdum &
ungefohlicum stefnum se biscop com, & ealle þa witanM mid him, þe in
þære biscopscire wæron.
 9.64.31. & þa þa se Godes wer wolde hine gemetgian &
gestillan mid liðre spræce, he ongan him symble andswarian mid gecide
& cweþan: ealle man magon libban mid þe, buton ic ana ne mæg her
beforan þe libban.
 9.65.3. Ac agif me mine mancessas.
 9.65.4. Þa wæs se biscop onstyred mid þam wordum, & þa
eode he in þa cyrican þære eadigan & þære clænan fæmnan
sancta Marian, & upp ahafenum handum & aþenedum his sceate he ongan
standende biddan, þæt him God forgæfe, þæt he gestillan mihte
þæs hatheortan preostes unstilnysse.
 9.65.13. & þa þa he færinga beseah in his agenne sceat
betwih his þa astrehtan earmas, þa gemette he in his agenum sceate XII
mancessas, & þa wæron swa lixende, swa swa hi wæron on þa ylcan
tid of fyre ut atogene.
 9.65.18. & he þa sona wæs utgangende of þære cyrcan,
& þa awearp he þa mancossas in þæs hatheortan mæssepreostes
sceate þus cweþende: loca, nu þu hafast þine mancossas, þa þe þu
sohtest.
 9.65.25. Ac sy þe þis cuþ, þæt æfter minum deaðe
þu ne bist þissere cyrcan biscop for þinre gitsunge.
 9.65.28. Of þam cwide mihte beon mid soðe ongeten, þæt se
mæssepreost þæt ilce feoh to þan begæt, þe he þohte, þæt
he þone biscophad mid gebycgan wolde.
 9.65.33. Ac þæs Godes weres word wæs to þan strang,
þæt se ylca mæssepreost Constantius on preosthade his lif geendode.
 9.66.4. Eac hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt him comon twegen men
to of Gotena þeode, þa sædon, þæt hi to Rauennan faran woldon.
 9.66.7. & þa sealde he heom mid his agenre handa ane trywene
flascan wines fulle, to þon þæt hi mihton heom þa on heora færelde
to underngeweorce habban.
 9.66.12. Of þære hi druncon, oþ þæt hi to Rauennan
becomon.
 9.66.14. & wel manige dagas þa Gotan in þære ylcan
cæstre gewunodon, & þæt win, þe hi fram þam halgan were
onfengon, daga gehwylce hi heom þæt win to bryce hæfdon, & swa hit
heom gelæste, oð þæt hi eft to þam ilcan & þam arwurðan
fæder comon.
 9.66.22. & hi nanum dæge ne geblunnon, þæt hi ne
druncon of þam ylcan fate, & heom nanes wines wana næs.
 9.66.25. & swa hit wæs to ongitanne, þæt swa swa hit on
þam trywenum fate, þe se biscop sealde, þæt win nære na elles
geeced, ac swylce hit þær in weaxende wære.
 9.66.32. Eac swilce nu niwan us to com sum eald preost of þære
ylcan stowe sumum dæle, forþon þe þa wisan, þe he be him sæde,
næran us þa mid swigunge to forlætanne.
 9.67.4. Soðlice he sæde, þæt se halga wer sume dæge
eode in his wyrttun.
 9.67.6. Þa gemette he þone wyrttun oferwrigene mid
unasecgendlicre/ mænige emela.
 9.67.8. & he þæt geseah, þæt þa wyrta ealle
forweorðan sceoldon.
 9.67.10. Þa gecyrde he hine to þam ilcum emelum & þus
cwæð: ic eow halsige on naman ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes, þæt
ge heonon gewitan, & ge læng þas wyrta ne etan.
 9.67.15. Ða sona swa se Godes wer þa word gecweden hæfde,
swa wæron hi sona ealle utgangende, þæt þær nan anlipig binnan
þam fæce þæs wurtgeardes to lafe ne wunode.
 9.67.23. Ac hwilc wundor is, cwæð sanctus Gregorius, þæt
we þas wisan secgaþ be þære tide his biscophades, nu hit gesæd is,
þæt he þa geo mid þam ælmihtigan Gode weoxe samod in endebyrdnysse,
ge eac swylce in þeawum godra dæda, & þa weorc us syndon swyðor to
wundrianne, þa þe us se ealda preost cyþðe, þæt he þa worhte,
þa he þa get in his geogoðhade lytel wæs?
 9.68.2. Soðlice he cwæð, þæt on þa tid þe he mid
his meder on cnihthade eardode, he wæs utgangende of hire huse, & full
oft butan his kemese & eac gelomlice butan his tunecan he eft on hire huse
cyrde.
 9.68.8. Forðon sona gif he ænigne þearfan nacodne gemette,
þonne wæs he hine sylfne ungyrdende, & mid his hrægle he þone
þearfan gescrydde.
 9.68.13. To þon he þis dyde, þæt he him sylfum geearnode
mede beforan Godes eagum.
 9.68.15. Þa gewunode his agen moder, þæt heo hine gelomlice
mid wordum þreade þus cweðende, þæt hit riht nære, þæt he
sylf, þe wædla wæs, oðrum þearfendum mannum his hrægl sealde.
 9.68.21. Þa sume dæge eode his moder in to hire byrene.
 9.68.22. Þa gemette heo hire hwæte ealne beon neah
gedæledne fram hire agenum suna þearfendum mannum, eall þæt heo ofer
gær habban scolde to bygleofan.
 9.68.27. Þa ongan heo þerscan heo sylfe mid hire fyste ge eac
mid hire bradum handum & cwæð, þæt hire to lore gedon wære
ealles þæs gæres bigleofa.
 9.68.31. Þa com se Godes cniht Bonefacius & ongan his modur
frefrian.
 9.69.1. Ac þa þa heo naht þære frofre onfon nolde, he
bæd hire, þæt heo ut of þam byrene gan sceolde, in ðam of eallum
heora hwæte wæs funden hwæt lytles gelæfed.
 9.69.6. Þa se Godes cniht astrehte hine sylfne on gebede, &
þa þæs ymb lytel he eode ut & gelædde his moder eft in to ðam
byrene.
 9.69.10. & þa gemette heo hit eft swa full hwætes, swa hit
ærror næs þæs gæres gefylled.
 9.69.12. & heo þa sona þæs gefægnode, þæt heo
hæfde ealles þæs gæres bigleofan.
 9.69.15. Þa gesewenum þam wundre seo moder wæs onbryrded
& swiðe gefeande ongan Gode þancas secgan, forþon þe he þam
cnihte swylce gife forgæf, þæt he swa hrædlice mihte onfon swa
hwæt swa he bæd.
 9.69.24. Eac þeos ylce his modur gewunode, þæt heo hæfde
henna & fedde in þam ingange hire huses.
 9.69.27. Ac þa hire afyrrde & bereafode an fox, se com
geneahhe naht feorran.
 9.69.29. Þa sume dæge stod Bonefacius se cniht in þam ilcan
ingange; þa com se fox, swa his þeaw wæs, & genam ane hæn.
 9.70.2. & he þa sona swyþe hraðe gearn to cyrican &
astrehte hine sylfne on gebede & mid openum stefnum he cwæð: licað
þe nu, min drihten, þæt ic ne mæg etan of þam fostornoþe minre
modur?
 9.70.8. Geseoh nu, þæt se fox etað þa henne, þe heo
fedde.
 9.70.10. Þa aras he of his gebede & eode ut of þære
cyrcan.
 9.70.11. Þa sona gecyrde se fox & forlet þa henne, þe he
in his muðe hæfde, & he þa sweltende gefeoll on eorðan beforan
þæs cnihtes eagum.
 9.70.16. Petrus cwæð: swiðe wundorlic is þæt, þæt
God hine geæadmodað, þæt he gehyreð þara bene, þe on hine
gehihtað, & eac on swa yfellicum wisum.
 9.70.20. Gregorius him andswarode: þis wæs gedon, Petrus, of
mycelre stihtunge ures scyppendes, þæt we gehihtan sceolon þa maran god
þurh þa lytlan, þe we her onfoð.
 9.70.25. Soðlice hit wæs gehyred in þam yfellicum þingum,
þæt þes cniht wæs halig & bylwytte, to þan þæt he on
lytlum þingum geleornode, hu swiðe he sceolde aþristigean on mycclum
benum.
 9.70.31. Petrus cwæð: wel me licað þæt þu cwiðst.
 10.70.34. Gregorius him andswarode: sum swiþe arwyrðes lifes
wer wæs on þam ylcan dælum, þam wæs nama Furtunatus, se wæs
biscop þære ylcan cyrcan Tudertine.
 10.71.3. Se wæs þeonde & weaxende on unmætre gife
gastlicra mægna to þon swiðe, þæt he þa unclænan gastas of
mannum aflyman mihte, swa þæt he ful oft þara deofla weoredu adraf of
þam mannum, þe hi ær geswencton.
 10.71.10. & he wæs geornfull mid teolone his singalra gebeda
þem angæn gesettum deofla mænigum, þe wið him teolonge wunnon,
þæt he hi oferswyðde.
 10.71.14. Eac sum wer wæs þissere ylcan cyrican mundbora,
þæs nama wæs Iulianus.
 10.71.17. He wæs us se hiwcuðesta, & he wæs nu unfyrn
on þissere ylcan byrig forðfered.
 10.71.19. For þæs gesægenum, cwæð sanctus Gregorius,
ic geleornode, þæt ic nu secgan wille, forþon he oft betweoh wæs
Furtunates dædum mid bylde þære hiwcuðnysse.
 10.71.24. & æfter þon his gemynd he geheold us to
trymnysse, forþon hit him wæs swa wynsum, swa he hæfde beobreades
swetnysse on his muþe.
 10.71.29. He sæde, þæt þær wære sum æþele
gesiðwif in þam neahdælum Tuscie mægðe.
 10.71.31. Seo hæfde ane snore, þa hire sunu lytle ær him to
wife onfeng.
 10.71.33. Seo wæs gelaðod mid þære ylcan hire swegre to
cirichalgunge þæs eadigan martyres Sebastianes gebedhuses.
 10.72.3. Þa gelamp þære ylcan niht, þe heo scolde on
morgen to þære cyrichalgunge faran þæs foresprecenan gebedhuses, þa
wearð heo mid hire lichaman luste oferswiðed, swa þæt heo ne mihte hi
sylfe forhabban fram hire were.
 10.72.11. & þa gewordenum þam ærmergene heo wearð on
hire ingeþohte afyrhted, forþon þe heo þa þurhtogenan lustas on hire
lichaman gefremede.
 10.72.15. Hire forbead þa þone forðgang seo sceomu to
þære cyrichalgung, forþon þe heo wæs ma scamigende for manna
onsyne, þonne heo wære þone Godes dom ondrædende.
 10.72.20. Þa ferde heo forð mid hire swegre to þære
halgunge þæs gebedhuses.
 10.72.22. Þa sona swa hi wæron gangende in þæt gebedhus,
þær þa reliquias wæron þæs eadigan martyres Sebastianes, þa
gegrap se awyrgda gast heo þa ylcan snore þæs foresædan gesiþwifes,
& beforan eallum þam folce he ongan heo swiðe swencan.
 10.72.29. & þa se mæssepreost þære ylcan cyrcan
geseah, þæt heo swiðe geswenced wæs, he genam sona þa scetan of
þam weofode & oferwreah hi mid.
 10.73.1. & þa sona eode se deofol in þone ylcan
mæssepreost, & forþon þe he wolde ofer his agen mægn aht swylces
geneþan, he wæs genyded, þæt he mihte on his agenre geswæncednysse
ongytan, hwæt he sylf wæs.
 10.73.7. Þa þa men, þe þær æt wæron, namon
þæt wif on þam gebedhuse mid heora handum & hi bæron to hire
agnum huse.
 10.73.10. & þa þa se ealda feond mid langre
geswæncednysse bregde þis ylce wif swyðe & þa hire magas, þe hi
lichamlice lufedon & for þære lufan hire mid wæron, befæston hi
þam drym & þam scincræftigum, to þon þæt hi begæten hire
þær hælo & læcedom þær funden, & hi na ne scrifan,
þeh hi eallinga hire sawle adwæsctan.
 10.73.20. Þa ongunnon hi helpan hire lichaman mid heora
drycræftum to sumre hwile.
 10.73.23. Heo wæs gelæded to anre ea & bedypped in
þæt wæter, & hi þær þa dryas ongunnon ferian geond þæt
wæter & mid langum onsangum hi golon on, oð þæt se deofol of hire
uteode, þe hi ær in gefor.
 10.73.29. Ac þa for þam wunderlican dome þæs ælmihtigan
Godes, þa se an deofol hire wæs of adrifen mid heora þam forcyrdan
cræfte, sona on hi geeode mycel mæniu deofla, & heo þa ongan on
þa ylcan tid swa manegum styrenyssum beon onstyred & swa manegum stefnum
& cleopungum hlydan, efne swa heo fram manegum awyrgdum gastum wæs
gehæfd & geþread.
 10.74.7. Þa eodon hire magas in geþeaht & geandetton,
þæt hit heora agnes ungeleafan scyld wære, þæt hi þone
læcedom to þam scincræftigum sohton.
 10.74.11. Ac hi þa gelæddon þæt wif to þam arwyrðan
were Furtunato þam biscope & hi to þam forleton.
 10.74.14. & he þa hi onfeng & hine þa sylfne abysgode
on his gebede manega dagas & nihta, & swa mycele ma he gefealh fealh
mid geornnysse þam gebedum, swa myccle ma he ongæt him ongæn standan in
anum lichaman þæt weorod þara deofla mænigeo.
 10.74.22. & þa ymb manega dagas he agæf heo hire freondum
hal & gesund, swilce hire se deoful næfre ænigne anweald ne ahte.
 10.74.29. Eac hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt se ilca wer
Furtunatus þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowa adraf þone unclænan gast
of sumum geswenctum & ofsettum men.
 10.75.1. & se awyrgda þa þa se dæg æfnode geseah,
þæt seo tid wæs mannum dyglu, geonlicte hine sylfne to sumum
ælþeodigum men & ongann gan ymb þa cæstre & geond þa
stræta & þus cwæð: gehyrað nu, hwæt se halga werr dyde
Furtunatus se biscop.
 10.75.9. Nu he adraf me ælþeodigne man of his huse, & ic
forþon sece, hwær ic me gerestan scyle, nu ic on his cæstre nane ne
fand.
 10.75.13. Þa sum man sæt æt þam gledum in his huse mid
his wife & mid his lytlan suna.
 10.75.16. Se gehyrde his stefne & acsode, hwæt se biscop him
dyde, & hine laðode, þæt he sæte mid him in his huse æt þam
gledan.
 10.75.19. & he þa swa dyde.
 10.75.20. Þa spræcon hi heom betwux wel fela worda, oð æt
nexstan se ylca awyrgda gast gefor in þone lytlan sunu þæs earman mannes
& hine awearp in ða glyda, & þær sona his feorh him
ætþrang.
 10.75.26. & he þa sona se earma man swa astyped & swa
bereafod his suna ongæt hraðe, hwæne he sylfa feormode, ge eac hwane se
biscop ær ut adraf.
 10.75.31. Petrus cwæð: hwæt cweðað we la, hwæt
þæt sy, þæt se ealda feond onfeng swylcere bylde to acwyllane in
þæs huse, þe hine gelaþode to him mid cumliþnysse gyfe & wende,
þæt he ælþeodig wære?
 10.76.2. Gregorius him andswarode: fela þinga, Petrus, beoð
gode gesewene, ac hi ne beoð na gode, forþon hi ne beoð of godum mode
cumene.
 10.76.6. Be þan seo soðfæstnys cwæþ on his godspelle:
gif þin eaga byð manfull, þonne byð þin lichama eall þystrig.
 10.76.9. Forþon þonne þæt ingeþanc þæs mannes byð
woh & forcyrred, þe þær foregangeþ, þonne bið þæt weorc
eall þweorh & unriht, þe þær æfterfylgeþ.
 10.76.14. Forþon ne wene ic na, þæt þes wer wære mid
arfæstnysse mode gelustfullod, ac mid tælnysse þæs biscopes.
 10.76.17. Se þe his suna bereafod wæs, se ongan swilce he for
Godes lufan gestliþnysse gegearwode.
 10.76.20. Soðlice þæt æfterfylgende wite þær
cyþðe, þæt seo ærre feormung næs na butan scylde & gylte.
 10.76.23. Eac swylce manige men syndon, þe forþon tiliað,
þæt hi god don, þe hi willað gedwellan þa gife oðera manna
weorces.
 10.76.27. Ne hi na forþon oþre mæn feormiað, þæt hi
mycclum gyman, hwæþer heom þæt god sy þæt hi doð, ac ma hi
wyllað, þæt hi syn beforan oðrum mannum wel geherede.
 10.76.32. For þere wisan ic wene, cwæð sanctus Gregorius,
þæt we magon ma behealdan þysne wer, þe þone awyrgdan gast on
gestliþnysse onfeng in æteownysse þæs idlan gylpes þurh þa
deofollican costunge, þonne we magon geþencan, þæt he betran dæde
dyde þonne se Godes wer.
 10.77.7. Ac he wolde, þæt for mannum gesewen wære, þæt
he betran lifes wære þonne se biscop, þa he þone man onfeng, þe se
drihtnes wer Furtunatus ær onweg adraf.
 10.77.12. Petrus cwæð: eall hit is swa hit gesægd is.
 10.77.13. Soþlice þæs weorces ænde gecyþde, þæt
þæt ingeþanc næs clæne.
 10.77.18. Gregorius him andswarode: eac hit sægð, þæt sum
man wære, þe forlet his agene gesyhðe.
 10.77.20. Þa wæs he gelæded to þam Godes were, to þan
þæt he gewilnode & abæde him þa helpe þæs halgan mannes
þingunga.
 10.77.24. Soðlice þa þa se Godes wer hæfde gedon &
gefylled his gebedu, he asette & awrat Cristes rodetacen ofer þæs
mannes eagan þæs bysenan, & þa sona agyfenum þam leohte seo niht
þære blindnysse gewat fram þam eagum.
 10.77.31. & ufan þæt eac gelamp, þæt sumes militisces
mannes hors wæs gecyrred in myccle reðnysse, swa þæt hit mihte
uneaþe beon fram ænigum mannum gehealden, ac swa swilce swa hit mihte, hit
slat & wundode heora limu mid bitum.
 10.78.5. Þa wearð hit þeh gebunden fram manegum mannum &
wæs gelæded to þam Godes were.
 10.78.8. He þa sona awrat Cristes rodetacen on þam hæafde
þæs horses mid his aþenedra handa & gecyrde ealle his reðnysse in
manþwærnysse, swa þæt hit wæs stille, þonne hit wæs ær
þære wedenheortnysse.
 10.78.15. Þa se ylca þegn þæt his hors, þe he geseah
acyrred fram his wedenheortnesse mid swa hrædlicum bebode þæs halgan
wundres, he þa bebead, þæt man þam halgan were þæt ilce hors eft
bringan sceolde.
 10.78.21. Þa wiðsoc he, þæt he hit nateshwon underfon
nolde.
 10.78.22. Ac he on his wilnunge þurhwunode & bæd, þæt
he his gife ne forsawe.
 10.78.24. Þa se halga wer nam þæt hors & healfne þone
weg on geferde.
 10.78.26. & he þæs militiscan mannes bene gehyrde &
hwæþre wiðsoc, þæt he hit to gife habban nolde swa for gebedenum
mægene.
 10.78.30. Ærest he gegearwode him medeme weorð for þan horse
& þa æfter þan nam þæt hors, þe him wæs ær to gife
geboden, forþon þe he geseah, gif he hit ne underfengce, þæt se
wære geunrotsod, þe hit ær ahte.
 10.79.5. Þa nydendre þære lufe he gebohte, þæt him nan
þearf næs to habbenne.
 10.79.10. Ne sceal ic eac na þis forswigian, þæt ic ongæt
nu for anum XII nihtum huhugu swa.
 10.79.12. Þa me wæs gelæded to sum eald þearfa, & ic
þa acsode hine swiðe geornlice, hwæt he wære, swa swa symble me on
gewunan wæs, þæt me wæs swyþe leof ealdra manna spræc.
 10.79.18. & þa andswarode he me & sæde, þæt he
wære of Tudertine þære cæstre.
 10.79.20. Þa cwæð ic to þam: la, fæder, ic þe frine,
hweþer þu cuþest Furtunatum þone biscop.
 10.79.23. Se þearfa cwæð: ic hine cuþe.
 10.79.24. Þa gyt ic cwæð: saga me, ic bidde þe,
hwæðer þu ongæte his wundra ænigu & me wilniendum gecyð,
hwilc se wer wære.
 10.79.28. Þa cwæð se þearfa to me: se man wæs swiþe
feorr & ungelic þysum mannum, þe we nu geseoð.
 10.79.30. Soðlice eall swa hwæt swa he gewilnode æt Gode
þam ælmihtigan, efne swa he his bæd, swa he wæs tyðe.
 10.80.1. Þæs ylcan ic wylle secgan þæt an wundor, þe me
nu on mode bearn, þæt sume dæge Gotan comon neah Tudertinum þære
cæstre, þa onetton to Rauennan þære byrig, & hi genamon þær
of þæs biscopes æhte twegen lytle cnihtas.
 10.80.8. Seo æht þæra cnihta wæs underþeodod þære
cæstre Tudertinam.
 10.80.10. Mid þy þe þis wæs gebobod þam halgan wære
Furtunato, he sænde men sona æfter & het to him gecigan þa ylcan
Gotan.
 10.80.14. Þa se Godes man wæs sprecende to þam Gotum mid
liðum worðum & tihhode, þæt he sceolde ærest geliðian heora
reðnysse.
 10.80.17. & þa æfter þon he spræc þus &
cwæð: hwylc weorð willað ge þæt ic sylle eow, & ge me agyfan
þa cnihtas, þe ge on minum lande namon, & gegearwiað me þæt to
gife eowres þances?
 10.80.23. Þa se þe þær yldost wæs him andswarode &
þus cwæð: swa hwæt swa þu elles bebeodest, we syndon gearwe
þæt to done.
 10.80.27. Witodlice þas cnihtas we nateshwon ne gifað.
 10.80.28. Þa se arwyrða wer wæs beotigende swiðe
liðelice to þam & þus cwæð: þu me unrotsast nu þu nylt hyran
þinum fæder.
 10.80.32. Ac nylle þu me ma unrotsian, þy læs hit þe eft
ofþynce.
 10.81.1. Ac þa gyt se ylca Gota þurhwunode on his heortan
reðnysse & swa wiðsacende onweg gewat.
 10.81.4. Þa þam oðrum dæge eode he eft, oð he com to
þam biscope.
 10.81.6. & þa bæd se biscop hine eft þæs mid þam
ylcum wordum þara forecwedena cnihta.
 10.81.9. & þa þa he nolde nænigra þinga geþafa beon,
þæt he hi agyfan wolde, þa wæs se biscop swiðe geunrotsod &
þus cwæð: ic wat, þæt þe na ne helpeð, þæt þu ga fram me
þus unrotum.
 10.81.14. Se Gota forseah þa word ealle & eft gecyrde to his
huse & þa ylcan cnihtas asette on his hors.
 10.81.17. Be þam wæs þus gedon: he sænde hi beforan him
mid his mannum & him sylf sona strad upon his hors & wæs him
æfterfarende.
 10.81.21. & þa þa he com in ðære ylcan cæstre
beforan þære cyrcan þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres, þa wearð
his horse asliden se fot, & he þa mid horse mid ealle gefeoll, & sona
his scanca wæs tobrocen, þæt þæt ban wæs todæled on twa
stycca.
 10.81.28. Þa wæs he upp aræred & on manna handum
gelæded to þam cumenahuse.
 10.81.31. He þa sona sænde þa cnihtas ham, þe he ær
beforan sænde, & bead hi þam arwyrðan were Furtunato þus
cweþende: fæder, ic þe bidde, þæt þu sænde to me þinne
deacon.
 10.82.2. Sona swa his deacon com to him liggendum, he gelædde
þa cnihtas toforan him, þe he eallinga ær forsoc, þæt he hi æfre
agyfan wolde, & he hi þa agæf þam diacone & þus cwæð: ga
& sæge minum hlaforde þam biscope, þæt ic eom nu geslægen,
forþon he me wyrgde.
 10.82.10. Ac ic nu bidde hine, þæt he geþingie for me &
nime þa cnihtas, þe he ær bæd.
 10.82.12. Þa se deacon onfeng þa cnihtas & hi gelædde
to þam biscope.
 10.82.14. Þa sona se arwyrða wer Furtunatus gebletsode wæter
& cwæð to his diacone: stregd þis gehalgode wæter ofer þæs
licgendan mannes lichaman.
 10.82.19. Soðlice þa ferde se diacon to þam Gotan, & he
in to him eode & þæt gebletsode wæter stregde ofer his limu.
 10.82.22. Þa gelamp þær swyþe wundorlicu wise, seo wæs
swiðe to wafienne.
 10.82.24. Þæt is, þonne sona swa þæt gehalgode wæter
geran þæs Gotan scancan, þa wearð se bryce eall eft gestaðelod &
þam sceancan wæs seo æfre hælo agifen, swa þæt he on þa ylcan
tid aras of his ræste & eode to his horse & ferde eft on þone
ylcan weg, þe he ær ongan, efne swilce he næfre ne geþrowode ænige
deringe his lichaman.
 10.82.34. & þa wæs þis geworden, þæt se se þe
nolde beon underþeoded mid hyrsumnysse, to þon þæt he agæfe þam
halgan were Furtunato his cnihtas for heora weorðe, se wæs eft genyded,
þæt he ageaf hi butan ceape.
 10.83.9. Þa þis þus gefylled wæs, se ealda man þa gyt
tihhode, þæt he sæde me oðre wisan be þam ylcan halgan mæn.
 10.83.12. Ac forþon þe me þa wæron æt manige men for
þære lare, ic wæs abysgod, & eac me afeoll seo æfentid þæs
dæges, þæt me næs alyfed, þæt ic swa lange moste gehyran þa
weorc & þa dæde Furtunates þæs arwyrðan weres, þe ic wille
& me lysteð symble gehyran, gif me alyfed byð for oðrum þingum.
 10.83.21. Ac þa hwæþre oðrum dæge se ilca ealda man me
rehte ma be him þa gyt swyðe wundorlice wisan.
 10.83.24. He sæde me, þæt in ðære ylcan byrig
Tudertina wære sum swyþe godes weorces wer, þam wæs nama
Marcellinus.
 10.83.28. Se eardode þær mid his swystrum twam.
 10.83.29. Þam gelamp, þæt he for ðæs lichaman
hefignysse & mettrumnesse wæs forðfæred on sæternes dæg þam
halgan & þy easterlican æfenne.
 10.83.33. Þæs lichama wæs feorr to berenne, þæt he ne
mihte þy ylcan dæge beon bebyrged.
 10.84.3. Þa wæs þær hwylchugu ylding þære tide, þe
man sceolde þa licþegnunge & þa gedafenu þære byrgene gefyllan
& gyldan.
 10.84.7. Þa wæron his swustra mid his deaðe swiðe
geswencte.
 10.84.9. Hi urnon weopende to þam halgan Furtunate & ongunnon
clypian mid micclum stefnum & þus cwædon: we witon, þæt þu
hafast þara apostola lif & anweald.
 10.84.13. Þu geclænsast hreofe & onlihtest blinde.
 10.84.15. Cum eac & awæce uncerne broþur.
 10.84.16. Þa sona swa he ongæt hira broður forðfæredne,
he ongan þa sylf weopan for his deaðe & cwæð to þam wifum:
gewitað inc anweg gan & ne secge git þis nanum mæn, forþon
þæt is þæt gyt biddað þæs ælmihtigan Godes hæs, þam ne
mæg naht wiðstandan.
 10.84.24. Þa gewiton hi heom onweg gan, & þa se biscop him
þær gewunode swiðe unrot for þæs forðfarenan mannes deaðe.
 10.84.27. Þa þy æfterfylgendan sunnandæge ær þæs
uppcumendan leohtes dagunge he gecigde his daiconas twegen him to & eode
him to þæs forðfarenan mannes huse to þære stowe, þær se
orsawla lichama læg, & hine sylfne þær abysgode on his gebede.
 10.85.1. & þa gefyldum his gebede, he aras & gesæt neh
þam lichaman þæs unlifigendan mannes.
 10.85.3. & þa þone forþfarenan be naman gecigde mid
unhludre stefne þus cweþende: waca, broðor Marcelle.
 10.85.6. He dyde gelice þon swylce he swyðe leohtlice slepe
& wæs aweht to þære nealecan stefne, þeh þe heo medmicclu
wære, & sona untynde his eagan & locigende to þam biscope he þus
cwæð: eala, hwæt dydest þu?
 10.85.13. Eala, hwæt dydest þu?
 10.85.13. Þa þam se biscop andswarode þus cweðende: hwæt
dyde ic?
 10.85.15. Þa cwæð he to þam biscope: gyrstandæge comon
hi twegen to me, þa me adydon of þam lichaman, & hi me to godre stowe
gelæddon.
 10.85.20. Nu todæge wæs an onsended to me se cwæð:
gelædað hine eft to þam lichaman, forþon þe Furtunatus se biscop com
on his hus & hine to him gecigde.
 10.85.24. & þa gefyldum þam wordum sona he wearð
gelæded of þære untrumnysse & syþþan lange on þisum life
wunode.
 10.85.28. Nis hit hwæþre to gelyfanne, þæt he þa stowa
forlure, þe he ær onfeng, forþon þe hit ænig tweo nis, þæt he
mæge bet lifian for þam benum his þingeres æfter deaðe, se þe
ær þam deaðe symble tilode & wilnode, þæt he licode þam
ælmihtigan Gode.
 10.86.1. Ac for hwon secgað we swa fela be his life?
 10.86.2. Nu gyt todæge æt his lichaman we magon nyman manige
cyþnysse his mægna.
 10.86.5. He onlyseð þær deofolseoce & hæleð
untrume, & swa oft swa hine man biddeð of geleafan, efne swa swa he
gewunode þa þa he cwic wæs, þæt ylce he gyt deþ unablinnendlice,
þær he wunað mid his gebana reliquium.
 11.86.13. Ac me lysteþ, Petrus, nu gyt gelædan þa word minre
segene to þam dælum Ualeria þære mægðe.
 11.86.16. In þam me gelamp, þæt ic geacsode swyðe healicu
wundru of þæs arwyrðan weres muðe Furtunates, þæs gemynd ic dyde
ær feorr bufan.
 11.86.20. Se com nu full oft gelomlice to me, & þonne he
sæde gehwæt be ealdra manna dædum, symble he me gereordode mid niwre
gereordnysse.
 11.86.24. He sæde, þæt sum man wære in þære ylcan
mægðe, þam wæs nama Martirius, se wæs swiðe estfull þeow
þam ælmihtigan Gode & sealde þis tacen to gewitnysse his agenes
mægnes: soðlice hit gelamp sume dæge, þæt his gebroðra worhton
heom heorðbæcenne hlaf & forgæton, þæt hi him on asetton
Cristes rodetacen, swa swa hit gewunelic is in þissere mægðe, þæt
man swa mearcað mid eþelicum treowe þeorfe hlafas, þæt hi beoþ
swylce gesewene, swylce hi syn on feower feorðan dælas todælde.
 11.87.5. Þa se ylca Godes wer þær æt wæs, & hi
þær betweonan heom spræcon, þa ongæt se Godes wer, þæt se
hlaf næs na gemearcod, & swa þeah se hlaf wæs mid þam gledum
& mid þære æmyrgan bewrigen.
 11.87.11. Þa cwæð he: for hwon ne mearcode ge þysne hlaf,
swa swa hit þeaw is?
 11.87.14. & þa worhte he sylf Cristes rodetacen mid his
fingrum ongen þam gledum.
 11.87.16. & him þa swa segniendum sona se hlaf dyde unmæte
bærstlunge, efne swylce þær toburste sum mycel crocca in þam fyre.
 11.87.20. Þa æfter þan þe se hlaf wæs abaken & ut
atogen of þam fyre, he wæs gemeted & gemearcod mid Cristes rodetacne,
þone þe na ne gedyde swylcne se hrine æniges mannes, ac se geleafa
þæs halgan weres.
 12.87.29. Eac hit gelamp on þære stowe, þe is haten
Interorina seo denu, seo fram manegum mannum mid ceorliscum wordum is genemned
Interocrina, in þære wæs sum swiðe wundorlices lifes wer, þæs
nama wæs Seuerus.
 12.88.2. Se wæs sacerd in þære halgan cirican, seo wæs
halig þære eadigan & þære clænan fæmnan sancta Marian.
 12.88.5. Þa gelamp hit, þæt sum rice man bæd his
ærendracan, þæt he swiðe hraðe to him come, forþon þe hit
wæs swiðe neah his ende, þæt he mid his gebedum for his synnum
þingode, & þæt he þa dæde be his agnum yflum mihte him
geanddettan, & þæt he wære alysed mid dædbote fram his scyldum,
ær þon þe he eode of lichaman.
 12.88.16. Þa gelamp hit, þæt se mæssepreost wæs
unwenlice abysgod wingeard to settanne.
 12.88.18. Þa cwæð he to þam ærendracan, þe him to
comon: gað ge beforon; ic eow cume æfter.
 12.88.21. & þa þa he geseah, þæt him wæs in þam
weorce lytles hwæt to lafe, he gedyde þa hwylcehugu yldinge, to þon
þæt he gefylde þæt medmyccle weorc, þe þær to lafe wæs.
 12.88.26. & þa þæt gefylled wæs, þa ongan he feran
to þam seocan men.
 12.88.28. & þa him gangendum in þam wege him ongen geurnon
þa ærendracan, þe him ær to comon, & wæron ongæn hine
swiðe sarige gewordene & þus cwædon: la, fæder, to hwon latedest
þu?
 12.88.34. Nelle þu nu beon ma geswenced, forþon þe he is
forðfered.
 12.89.2. Þa þis gehyrde se Godes þeow, he ongan clypian mid
mycclum stefnum & þus cweþan, þæt he sylfa wære cwylmend
þæs mannes.
 12.89.6. & þa swa weopende eode, oþ þæt he becom to
þam forðferenan lichaman & hine sylfne þær astrehte on eorðan
mid tearum beforan þæs deadan bære.
 12.89.10. & he þa swiðlice weop on þære eorðan &
beot his heafod & a clypode & cwæð, þæt he wære sylfa
scyldig his deaðes.
 12.89.14. Þa semninga se þær forðfered wæs onfeng his
sawle, & þæt gesawon manige, þe þær ymbstodon.
 12.89.17. Hi sendon forð swiþe wundorlice stefne &
ongunnon wepan for þam gefean, & þa sona acsodon hine hwær he
wære, oþþe hu he eft gecyrde.
 12.89.21. Þa cwæð he to þam, þe hine acsodon: þæt
wæron swiðe swearte men, þæt me læddon, of þara muþe & of
heora nosum eode þæt fuleste fyr, þæt ic ne mihte nænigra þinga
aræfnian.
 12.89.27. & hi me þa gelæddon on swyþe þeostre stowe.
 12.89.29. Þa færinga sum geong swyðe fægerre gesihþe
man com þær mid oþrum ongen us gangendum.
 12.89.31. Se cwæð to þam, þe me tugon: gelædaþ hine
eft ham, forþon Seuerus se mæssepreost cwyþeð & mæneþ his
sawle & mid tearum biddeð, þæt him drihten þa forgife.
 12.90.3. Þa sona Seuerus aras of þære eorðan, & dondum
þam cwican men dædbote he forgæf him þone fultum his agenra
þingunga.
 12.90.7. & he þa se seoca mann eft acwicod dyde dædbote
seofon dagas for his þam ær gefremedum synnum, & þy eahtoðan
dæge he geferde bliðe of þam lichaman.
 12.90.12. Gehoga nu, Petrus, ic þe bidde & sceawa þisne
mæsseþreost, þe we nu ymbspræcon.
 12.90.14. Forþon drihten let hine him swa leofne, þæt he ne
geþolode, þæt he wære medmycelne fyrst geunrotsod.
 12.90.17. Petrus cwæð: þas wisan syndon swiðe to
wundrianne, þa me wæron oþ þisne fyrst æfre bediglode, & ic hi
nu hwæþre ongyte.
 12.90.21. Ac hwæt cweþaþ we, þæt þyllice weras magon
on þysum dagum beon fundene?
 12.90.24. Gregorius him andswarode: ic wene, Petrus, þæt hit
na gyt sy wana þæs, þæt þyslice magon beon fundene in þyssere
worulde, & ic eac þæt wat, þæt þa ne beoð na þyslice weras
& þysum bufancwedenum gelice, þa þe ne magon æt Gode abiddan,
þæt hi wyrcan þyslicu wundru.
 12.90.28. Ac witodlice þæt bið seo soðe æhtung þæs
mannes lifes in þam mægne his godra weorca & mægna, nalæs in
æteownysse þara foretacna.
 12.90.30. Swa þeh syndon full manega, þa þe nænegu wundra
wyrcað & þonne hweþre næron na ungemæccan þam, þe þa
foretacnu doð.
 12.90.32. Petrus cwæð: ic þe frigne, hwanon me mage beon
þis gecyþed, þæt sume syndon, þa þe nana wundru ne wyrcað &
þonne hwæðre næron ungelice þam, þe hi wyrcaþ?
 12.91.3. Gregorius him andswarode: ac cwyðst þu, þæt þu
nyte, þæt Paulus se apostol is broður in þam apostolican ealdordome
Petre þam yldestan þara apostola?
 12.91.5. Petrus cwæð: genoh geradelice ic wat & me
nænig tweo is, þæt þeh þe Paulus wære se medmesta & latost
gecoren þara apostola, þonne hwæðre he wan ma eallum þam oðrum
apostolum.
 12.91.8. Gregorius him andswarode: þæt þu þe sylfa
gemynest & ongytest genoh wel, þæt Petrus se apostol eode mid drigum
fotum ofer þone sæ, & Paulus geþrowade scipgebroc in þam sæ.
 12.91.10. Geþeng þe nu, þæt þæt wæs eall an
gesceaft þæs strangan sæs: þær Paulus ne mihte mid scipe faran,
þær Petrus eode mid drigum fotum.
 12.91.13. Emne þæt us openlice cuþ is, þæt þeh þe
heora ægðres mægen wære ungelic oþrum, þonne hwæþre heora
ægþres med & geearnung nis naht ungemæcce on heofonum.
 12.91.15. Petrus cwæð: ic þe andette, þæt me eallunga
swiðe wel licað þæt þu sagast, & ic nu openlice ongæt,
þæt þara godra manna lif & þeawas wæron ma to secanne & to
wilnigenne þonne heora wundru.
 12.91.18. Ac forþon þa wundru, þe þonne geweorðað,
bringað symble þa gewitnysse þæs godan lifes, þy ic bidde gyt, gif
hwylce syn þe cuþe þara haligra wyrda, þæt þu secge to þon
þæt þu me hingriende fede ma & trymme þurh þa bysene godra
weorca.
 12.91.22. Gregorius him andswarode: ic wolde asecgan hwylcehugu
wisan to herenesse ures alysendes be þæs arwyrðan weres wundrum
Benedictes.
 12.91.24. Ac ic geseo, þæt þeos andwearde tid þyses
dæges ne mæg us genihtsumian ne gelæstan to þysum bysenum.
 12.91.25. Ac eft we sprecað þis freolicor & bealdlicor, gif
we nimað oþerne fruman foreweardre bec þissera æfterfylgendra spella.
 12.92.1. Nu is geendod seo forme boc heora twegra gespræces
Gregories þæs papan & Petres his diacones, & her on þysan
oþran leafe onginð seo æftere boc heora gespræces be manigfealdum
wundrum þæs æadigan weres & þæs æfæstan abbudes sancte
Benedictes.

B9.5.3.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Preface to Book 2: Hecht 1900-7, 94-6.



 94.12. Her yrneð up se æftra stream þære godcundan
spræce, se cymð of þære rynelan þæs gastlican æsprynges &
þam halgan gaste forgeofendum gæþ þurh þa ofergyldan weoloras
þæs eadigan & þæs apostolican weres sancte Gregories, se mid
Grecum Crysosthomas is gehaten, to þon þæt þurh þa toflowendnysse
þæs ylcan streames sy onlihte & geþenede þa ingeþancas
geleaffulra breosta.
 94.24. Þysum wordum se ilca gyldenmuða Gregorius wæs
sprecende & þus cwæþ: sum wæs swyþe arwyrðes lifes wer, se
wæs mid Godes gife gebletsod & be naman Benedictus genemned, þæt is
on Englisc se gebletsoda.
 94.30. Se sona of þære tide his cnihthades wæs healdende
& donde swyðe gedafenlice ylde on his þeawum, & ne sealde he his
mod nænigum unrihtum.
 95.3. Ac he wæs þa gyt on þyssere eorðan geseted, þæt
he mihte hwilwendlice lifigean, swa ma manna doð.
 95.7. Þa geo sona forseah þisne middaneard mid his blostman,
efne swylce he naht & adrugod wære.
 95.10. He wæs geboren of freon & of æþelum cynne
Nursige þære mægðe, & he wæs befæsted to Romebyrig,
þæt he sceolde boccræftas & gewrita wisdomas leornian.
 95.14. Ac þa þa he geseah manige men gan þurh þa
stæþhlypan heora uncysta, his agnum fet he wiðteah, þone he asette
ær swa swa in þam ingange þisses middaneardes.
 95.19. Þam he wiðbrægd, þy læs hit gelumpe, þæt
hwæt unrihtes hine gehrine of his agenum geþohte & ungewitnysse, &
he þonne sylfa æfter þon eall geeode in mycelre forspildnyssum.
 95.25. & þa forsægenum þam onginnum þara boccræfta,
he forlet his hus & his fæder æhta & gewilnode, þæt he Gode
anum licode.
 95.29. He sohte & geceas þone had & gegyrelan þæs
halgan munuclifes & him þa gewat swiþe gewisfullice, swilce he unwis
wære, & ferde swa ungelæred swyþe snotorlice.
 96.1. Ne leornode ic sylf na ealle þa dæda þyses godan
weres, ac þa feawa, þe ic secge, ic ongæt æt feowrum his gingrum,
þa hit me sædon, witodlice fram Constantine þam swyþe arwyrðan were,
se him æfterfyligde in þæs mynstres rihtinge & hlaforddome.
 96.8. & eac swylce ic hit gehyrde fram Ualentine, se manega
gær wæs fore þam mynstre æt Latrane, & fram Simplicio, se wæs
þrydde þe rihte æfter him Benedicte his gesomnunge, & eac ic hit
gefrægn æt Honorate, se nu gyt todæge is fore þam ylcan mynstre, in
þam se ylca wer wæs drohtniende.
 96.17. Witodlice se halga wer Benedictus geþohte, þæt he
forlete þa ongin þæra boccræfta.
 96.20. He gesohte westennu, & his fostormoder ane wæs him
fylgende, forþon þe heo hine swyðe geornlice lufode.
 96.23. & þa þa hi becomon to þære stowe, þe is
genemned Effide, hi wunodon þær mid manigum arwyrðum werum.
 96.26. Þa weras hæfdon hi sylfe þær mid lufan in
þære cyrican þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres.

Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Book 2: Hecht 1900-7, 96-178.



 1.96.31. Ða gelamp hit, þæt seo forecwedene fostermoder
þæs halgan weres abæd an hriddern hire to læne æt oðrum wife
hire neahgebyrene, to þon þæt heo mihte sum dæl hwætes on
geclænsian.
 1.97.3. Þa wearþ þæt ofer þære þylinge unwærlice
forlæten, þæt hit for sumum ungetymum wearð tobrocen & todæled
on twa styccu.
 1.97.8. Þa sona swa þæt eft cyrrende wif his fostormodur
gemette hit toslegen, heo ongan swyþlice wepan, forþon þe heo geseah
tobrocen/ þæt fæt, þe heo ær to læne onfeng.
 1.97.13. & þa Benedictus se æfæsta & se arfulla
cniht, þa þa he geseah his fostormoder wepan, he wæs sona hire sare
efensarig & genam þa butu þa sticcu mid him þæs tobrocenan
hriddres & hine sylfne astrehte mid tearum on his gebed.
 1.97.20. Sona swa he aras fram his gebede, he funde þæt fæt
þær neah him swa gesund, þæt hi ne mihton on him nænige swaðe
findan þæs bryces.
 1.97.24. & he þa sona wæs frefriende his fostormoder
swiðe liþelice & hire agæf þæt hriddern gesund, þæt he
ær æt hire nam tobrocen.
 1.97.28. Seo wise in þære stowe wæs ongyten fram eallum
þam, þe þær eardodon, & in swa mycelre wundrunge gehæfd,
þæt þa landleode on þære stowe ahengon þæt ilce hriddern in
ðære cyrcan ingange, to þon þæt þa andweardan ealle & eac
þa æfterfylgendan ongætan, þæt Benedictus se cniht þa gife his
drohtnoðes ongann fram swiðe mycelre lifes fulfremednysse.
 1.98.5. Þæt hriddern þær wæs manega gær beforan
heora eallra eagum & hangode ofer þære cyrcan duru a oþ þas tide
þissera Langbeardena gewinnes.
 1.98.9. Ac Benedictus gewilnode ma, þæt he þrowode þyses
middaneardes yfel þonne þa herunga, & þæt he wære for Gode
swyþur mid gewinnum geswænced, þonne he wære up ahafen on þam
herungum þisses andweardan lifes.
 1.98.12. & he þa dygollice wæs fleonde þa his
fostormoder & gesohte þa deogolnyssa þære westan stowe, &
