þæra nama is Sublacus, seo onbyrð on feowertigum mila of þissere
Romaniscan byrig.
 1.98.15. Þær weallað upp cealde wæteru & swiðe
hluttre, & seo genihtsumnes þær þæs wæteres byð ærest
gesomnod in widum seaðe, oþ þæt æt nexstan hit byð gegæred in
myccle ea.
 1.98.18. & þa se halga man ferde þider fleonde,
 1.98.18. Hine gemette sum munuc, þam wæs nama Romanus.
 1.98.19. Se acsode hine hwider he higode, & mid þy þe he
ongæt his wyllan, he geheold & gehæl þa deogolnysse mid him &
him gefremode gedefenlicne fultum.
 1.98.21. He sealde him þone gegyrelan þæs halgan munuclifes
& him þegnode swa swyðe swa alyfed wæs.
 1.98.23. & þa þa se Godes wer becom to þære ylcan
stowe, he sealde hine sylfne in þæt nearweste scræf & wunode
þær þreo gær eallum mannum uncuþ buton Romane þam munuce.
 1.98.25. Witodlice se Romanus lifde & eardode naht feor þanon
on anum mynstre under þeodates regole þæs fæder.
 1.98.27. & eac swyþe arfullice þæs ylcan his fæder
eagum he gestaþelode þa tid, & gif he hwilcne hlaf mihte geniman him
sylfum to etane on gewissum dagum, he brohte þone Benedicte.
 1.99.1. & þa to þam ylcan scræfe næs nan weg fram
Romanes mynstre, forþon þe þær oferhlifade micel stanclif.
 1.99.2. Ac þa gewunode Romanus, þæt he of þam ylcan
stanclife let ofdune þone hlaf mid langum rape gewriðenne.
 1.99.4. On þam rape wæs eac gefæstnod sum litel belle, to
þon þæt for þære bellan hleoðre se Godes wer ongæte, hwænne
Romanus him þone hlaf brohte & gegearwode.
 1.99.6. & he þonne onfeng þam hlafe & æt hine.
 1.99.7. Ac se ealda feond ongan æfstigian þæs oðres lufan
& eac þæs oþres gereordnysse.
 1.99.8. Þa sume dæge, þa he geseah þone hlaf ofdune
lætan, he wearp mid stane & tobræc þa bellan.
 1.99.10. & þonne hwæþre ne ablan Romanus na forþon,
þæt he him ne þegnode mid gerisenlicum gemetum.
 1.99.11. Ac þa se ælmihtiga God wolde, þæt Romanus
gestilde fram þam gewinne, & Benedictes lif wære gecyþed mannum to
bysene, & þæt seo candel scine aseted ofer candelstæf, to þan
þæt heo lihte eallum þam, þe in Godes huse wæron.
 1.99.15. Hit gelamp þa, þæt sum mæssepreost wæs feorr
wuniende, se gegearwode him sylfum gereord in þa easterlican symbelnysse.
 1.99.16. Þa wæs drihten geeadmodod, þæt he æteowde him
þurh gesihðe & þus cwæð: þu gegearwodest þe nu wiste &
bleomettas, & min þeowa is geond in þære stowe mid hungre
gecwylmed.
 1.99.19. Þa sona aras he & in þære eastorlican
symbelnesse he higode to þære stowe mid þam mettum & bigleofan, þe
he him sylfum ær gegearwode.
 1.99.21. & þa sohte þone Godes wer geond ealle þa
stæþhlypan þara munta & geond þa holenesse þara dena & geond
þa seaþas & dicas þara landa.
 1.99.23. Þa gemette he hine lutian in anum scræfe.
 1.99.24. & hi þa dydon heora gebedu heom betweoh &
bletsigende þone ælmihtigan drihten hi heom tosomne gesæton, & þa
æfter þam wynsumum lifes gespræcum se mæssepreost þe þyder com
cwæð to him: aris, min broðer, & þigce wit & niman mete,
forþon nu todæg wæron eastran.
 1.99.28. Þam se Godes wer andwyrde & þus cwæð: ic wat,
þæt hit eastron wæron, forþon ic geearnode, þæt ic þe geseon
moste.
 1.99.30. Witodlice he wæs swa feorr geseted fram mannum,
þæt he nyste hwylcum dæge se eastorlica symbelnys wæs.
 1.99.31. & þa eft se arwyrða mæssepreost him to
cwæð: soðlice ic þe cyðe, þæt þis is se eastorlica dæg
þære drihtenlican æriste, & þe na geriseþ, þæt þu
fæste & þe fram mettum wiðhæbbe, forþon þe ic wæs to
þisum hider onsænded, þæt wit nyman & geþigcan samod þa gife
þæs ælmihtigan drihtnes.
 1.100.5. & hi þa bletsigende heora God onfengcon þam mete
& þigdon.
 1.100.6. & þa gefylledre þære gereordnesse & þam
gesprecum se mæssepreost him gewat eft to his agenre cyrican.
 1.100.7. Ac hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt þisne lutigendne
in þam scræfe þa hyrdas gemetton, & þa gesawon hi hine þurh þa
scealdþyfelas mid fellum gegyredne.
 1.100.10. Hi wendon & gelyfdon, þæt hi sum wilde deor
wære.
 1.100.10. Ac hwæðre ongytende þone Godes wer manige heora
wæron gewende fram þam dreorlican mode to arfæstnysse gife, & æt
nexstan his nama wæs cuð geond ealle þa neahstowa.
 1.100.13. & þa wæs geworden of þære tide, þæt he
wæs geneosod fram manegum mannum, þa brohton him lichamlice mettas &
symble of his muðe namon & heom ham bæron in heora breoste þa
bigleofe þæs ecan lifes.
 2.100.17. Eac him gelamp sume dæge, þa þa he wæs ana,
þæt him wæs æt se costere.
 2.100.18. Soðlice him com to sum swyþe sweart & lytel
fugel, se is on folcisc þrostle gehaten.
 2.100.19. Se ongann flogettan & fiþercian ymb his ansyne
& swiþe gemaglice gefeol on þæs halgan mannes andwlitan, swa
þæt heo mihte beon mid þære hande befangen, gif se halga werr hi
niman wolde.
 2.100.22. Ac þa awrat he Cristes rodetacn, & se fugel sona
onweg gewat.
 2.100.23. & þa onweg gewitendum þam ylcan fugele him wæs
fylgende & on becom swa mycclu costung his lichaman, swa mycclu se halga
wer næfre ær næs onfindende.
 2.100.28. Þa æt nexstan he geseah sum wif, þæt gelædde
se awyrgda gast beforan þam eagum his modes & mid swa mycclum fyre
onælde þam Godes þeowan þæt mod in þæs wifes ansyne, þæt
he uneaðe hine sylfne geheold in his agenum breoste for ðam lege þæs
wifes lufan.
 2.101.6. & eac swilce forneah he geþreodode, þæt he
forlet þæt westen oferswiðed mid þam unrihtan luste.
 2.101.9. Þa semninga wæs he gesewen & gemiltsod fram
þære upplican gife, & þa geseah he neah him þa þiccan
scealdþyfelas weaxan netlenu & bremla.
 2.101.14. He ungyrede hine his hrægle & hine sylfne nacodne
awearp & wylewede on þam ordum þara þorna & on þam
tændlengum þara netlena, & þær þa wæs lange welwed, oþ
þæt he gewundod wæs geond ealne his lichaman.
 2.101.20. Eode þa of þam þornum, & þa þurh þære
hyde wunde he ut gelædde of his lichaman þa wunde his modes, forþon he
geteah þone synlust in his lichaman sar.
 2.101.25. & þa þa he barn witodlice utan, he adwæscte,
þæt he unalyfedlice barn innan.
 2.101.28. Witodlice he oferswiðde þa synne, forþon he swa
onwænde þa hæte & þone synlust, þe him se ealda feond
ongebrohte.
 2.101.31. Þa of þære tide, swa swa he sylfa sæde æfter
þon his gingrum, seo costung synlustes wæs atemed on him, swa þæt he
þyslices naht on him sylfum næfre ofer þæt ne ongæt.
 2.102.3. Þa æfter þan ongunnon manige men forlætan
þisne middaneard & efston to his lareowdome.
 2.102.6. & he wæs freo þa fram þæra uncysta deofles
costunge & eallunga mid rihte wæs geworden mægna lareow.
 2.102.9. Be þon wæs þurh Moyses beboden, þæt þa
diaconas sceoldon þegnian fram fif & twentigum wintra & ofer
þæt, & þonne of þam fiftigoðan gære hi mihton beon hyrdas
þara fata & madma þæs temples.
 2.102.15. Petrus cwæð: nu me betwyh læteð hwæthugu
andgytes þyssere forðlæddan cyðnysse.
 2.102.17. Ac þonne hwæþre ic bidde, þæt me þis
geredelicor sy gerihted.
 2.102.19. Gregorius him andswarode: cuþ þæt is, Petrus,
þæt in geogoðhade þæs lichaman costung wealleþ, & þonne
fram þam fiftigoðan geare colað seo hæte þæs lichaman.
 2.102.24. Witodlice þa halgan fatu syndon geleaffulra mod.
 2.102.26. Forþon þa gecorenan, þonne hi beoþ þa gyt in
costunge heora lichaman, heom is neodþearf, þæt hi syn underþeodde
& þeowian oðrum mannum & syn mid þegnungum & gewinnum
geswencte.
 2.102.32. & þonne æfter þæt on þære smyltan ylde
þæs modes, þonne seo hæte þære costunge onweg gewiteð, hi
beoð þara fata hyrdas, forþon hi beoþ sawla lareowas.
 2.103.5. Petrus cwæð: ic þe anddette, þæt me licað
þæt þu sægst.
 2.103.7. Ac forþon þe þu nu unluce þa locu þissere
forðbrohtan cyðnysse, ic þe bidde, þæt þu scule geondyrnan gyt
þa þe syndon ungennene be þam life þæs rihtwisan mannes.
 3.103.14. Gregorius him andswarode: witodlice onweg gewitendre
þære costunge, se Godes wer swa swa wel beganum lande & upp alocenum
þornum he sealde swiðe soðlice þone wæstm of þam æcere godra
weorca, & þa for þære weorðmynde þæs healican lifes his nama
wæs swiðe gemærsod.
 3.103.22. Þa naht feorr þam wæs sum mynster; & of
þæs mynstres gesomnunge comon to þam arwurðan Benedicte &
gewilnodon to him mid mycclum benum, þæt he þam mynstre beon scolde
fore.
 3.103.30. & he þa se Godes wer wæs lange wiðsacende
& hit eldode & heom beforan sæde, þæt his þeawum ne mihton
geþwærigean þa þeawas þara gebroðra.
 3.103.35. Ac oferswiðed æt nexstan he sealde geþafunge heora
benum.
 3.104.2. & þa þa he nam þa hyrdnysse þæs regollican
lifes in þam ylcan mynstre, sona næs þæra broðra nænigum alyfed,
þæt he buge þurh þa unalyfedan dæde fram þam wege þæs
munuclifes on þa swiðran healfe oþþe on þa wynstran.
 3.104.9. Þa ongunnon þa gebroðru swiðe ungewittelice
reþgiende ærest hi sylfe oncunnan, þæt hi æfre sceoldon biddan,
þæt heom swylc wer fore wære, þara wohnes bealh for þam þeawum
his rihtwisnysse.
 3.104.15. & þa þa hi gesawon, þæt heom næs alyfed,
þæt hi ænigu unalyfedlicu weorc worhton under þam halgan were
Benedicte, hi þa sorgodon, þæt hi sceoldon heora gewunan forlætan.
 3.104.20. & heom þuhte heardlic, þæt hi wæron
genydede on eallum mode, þæt hi scoldon niwe wisan hycgan & smeagean,
swa swa þam þweorum modum & þeawum symble þincað godra manna lif
þurhhefig.
 3.104.26. Þa ongunnon hi trahtian & hwæthugu smeagean, be
his deaðe, & hi þa ongunnon þeahtian, þæt hi gemengdon attor
wið wine.
 3.104.30. & þa þa þæt glæsfæt, on þam wæs
se wolberenda drync gehæfd, to þam arwurþan fæder wæs gebroht, swa
swa hit þæs mynstres þeaw wæs, to bletsigenne, he þa Benedictus
aþenede his handa & awrat Cristes rodetacn.
 3.105.2. & þæt fæt, þe gyt wæs feorr gehæfd,
mid þære ylcan þegnunge he tobræc, þæt hit wæs swa tobrocen,
efne swilce he mid stane wurpe.
 3.105.7. On þæs fætes forwyrde, þa þa he Cristes
rodetacen þær toweard wrat, þa ongæt se Godes wer, þæt þæt
fæt hæfde deaþes drync on him, forþon þe hit aberan ne mihte
þæt lifes tacen.
 3.105.12. & þa hraðe aras he mid swiðe liðre ansyne
& smyltum mode, gecigde þa gebroðru to him & heom wæs þus to
sprecende & cwæð: gemiltsige eow gebroþrum ælmihtig God.
 3.105.17. For hwon, la, wolde ge wiþ me þus don?
 3.105.19. Ne sæde ic eow ær, þæt eowrum þeawum &
minum ne mihte an wise gewurðan?
 3.105.21. Gað nu & æfter eowrum agenum þeawum secað
eow fæder & hlaford, forþon þe ge ma nan þing ofer þis habban ne
magon.
 3.105.25. Þa se halga wer eft gehwearf to þære stowe
þære leofan anetnysse & þær beforan þam eagum þæs uplican
sceaweras eardode ana mid him sylfum.
 3.105.30. Petrus cwæð: ne ongyte ic naht openlice, hwæt
þæt sy, þæt he eardode mid him sylfum.
 3.105.33. Gregorius him andswarode: gif se halga wer þa
gebroðra, þa ongæn hine sylfne anmodlice wæron spelliende & his
agenre liflade swiðe ungelice, wolde swa lange genyded under heom habban,
þonne wære him wen, þæt he forlete þone gewunan his agenre
stiþnysse & þæt gemet his stilnysse, & eac þæt he gebigde
þæt eage his modes fram þam leohte þære godcundan sceawunge.
 3.106.10. & þonne he daga gehwilce on heora rihtinge wære
geswenced, he gymde þy læs his agenra þearfa & wenunga hine sylfne
forlete & na þy hraþor hi gelærde fram heora wohnesse.
 3.106.16. Witodlice swa oft swa we beoþ gelædde fram us sylfum
þurh þa styrunge þæs swyþlican geþohtes, we beoþ swa þeh mid
us & ne beoð, forþon þe we us sylfe na ne geþenceað, þonne ure
gehygd wide fareð ymb oþra manna wisan.
 3.106.23. Oþþe we magon cweþan, þæt se wære mid him
sylfum, þe gesæd is on ðam godspelle, þæt he fæder forlete &
feorr land sohte & forname þone dæl his fæder yrfes, þe he
underfeng, & folgode in þære cæstre anum þara ceasterwarena.
 3.106.30. He fedde his swin & geseah, þæt þa æton
beanbelgas.
 3.106.31. Þa hingrede hine; mid ty he ongan þa geþencan
æfter þan þa god, þe he ær forleas, & hit is swa awriten be him
in ðam godspelle, þæt he wære on hine sylfne gecyrred & cwæde:
eala, hu manig esnewyrhtan wæron in mines fæder huse & þam hlaf
genihtsumað.
 3.107.6. Ac nu gif he wæs mid hine sylfne, þanon gecyrde he
eft to him sylfum,
 3.107.8. Forþon þe he symble wæs ymbsewen on his sylfes
heordnysse, & symle he sceawode beforan þam eagum his scyppendes.
 3.107.14. Symble he wæs smeagende ymbe hine sylfne & na ne
aflymde ne ne abygde fram him sylfum þone ege his modes.
 3.107.18. Petrus cwæð: hwæt cwyst þu la, hwæt þæt
sy, þæt awriten is be Petre þam apostole, þa þa he wæs fram þam
engle ut gelæded of þam carcerne, þæt he wære to him sylfum
gecyrred: nu ic wat soþlice, þæt drihten sænde his engcel & me
generede of Herodes gewealde & of eallre þære bade Iudea folces?
 3.107.27. Gregorius him andswarode: twam gemetum, Petrus, we beoð
butan us sylfum gelædde, forþon oþþe we gewitað under us sylfe
þurh þone slide ures geþohtes, oððe we beoð upp ahafene ofer us
sylfe þurh þa gife þære gastlican sceawunge.
 3.107.34. Witodlice se þa swin fedde, he gefeoll under hine
sylfne for his modes wiðgalnesse & for his unclænnysse gebærum ma
þonne þes apostol, þe se engcel alysde & his mod gegrap &
gelædde in ellhygd buton him sylfum.
 3.108.5. Ac swa þeh he wæs of hine sylfne gelæded, forþon
ægþer heora gecigde to him sylfum, þa þa se ærgecwedena gegaderode
hine sylfne to his heortan for þam gedwolan his weorces, swa eac se
æftergesægda apostol gecyrde to his heortan fram heanesse þære
gastlican sceawunge, þæt he wæs in þam gemænan andgyte, þe he
ær wæs.
 3.108.15. Forþon ic secge, þæt se arwyrða wer Benedictus
eardode in þam westene mid him sylfum, swa swiðe swa he hine sylfne geheold
binnan þam locum his geþohtes.
 3.108.20. Ac soðlice swa oft swa hine gegrap & ahof in
heannysse seo hæte & se wylla þære upplican sceawunge, butan tweon
he forlet hine sylfne under him sylfum.
 3.108.25. Petrus cwæð: nu me is cuþ þæt þu sægst.
 3.108.26. Ac ic þe bidde, þæt þu me andswarige, hweþer
he scolde oððe moste forlætan þa gebroðru, þe he ær cynlice
underfeng.
 3.108.30. Gregorius him andswarode: þæs þe ic wene, Petrus,
þær þe beoþ to aberene & geþyldelice to adreoganne þa yflan
men, þær hi sume beoð gode onfundene & gemette.
 3.109.2. Ac þær þe eallum gemete se wæstm wana byð on
þam godum mannum, þær æt nehstan byð unnyt gewinn & idel on
þam yflan mannum, & eac ealle þe swyþor, gif on neawiste
genihtsumiað þa wisan & gefultumiaþ, þæt þa godan magon
bringan betran wæstm.
 3.109.10. Witodlice se halga wer forlet þa eowde þara
gebroðra, forþam he ær gestod hi to healdanne, & þa æt nehstan
he geseah, þæt hi ealle anmodlice wæron his ehtende.
 3.109.15. Witodlice swa hit byð full oft gedon in fulfremedra
& æfæstra wera mode, þæt nis na mid swigunge to forlætanne,
& þonne hi geseoð, þæt heora gewin byþ butan wæstme, hi
farað on oðre stowe mid wæstme to gewinne.
 3.109.21. Be þan cwæð se æþela lareow sanctus Paulus:
ic wilnige, þæt ic sy tolysed & ic sy mid Criste.
 3.109.24. Þam þuhte, þæt him þæt Crist wære
þæt he lifde, & gestreon þæt he swulte.
 3.109.27. Se þa gewin þære þrowunge nalæs þæt an
þæt he sylfa gewilnode, ac eac swylce he tihte & onælde oþre men
þus to aræfnienne.
 3.109.31. He þrowode Damasco ehtnesse; þæt he mihte þa
gedyglian & him bebeorgan, he sohte rap & spertan & wolde, þæt
he wære deogollice ofdune aseted ofer þone weall.
 3.110.3. Ac hwæt cweþaþ we nu, þæt Paulus him ondrede
þone deað, þone þe he sylfa wæs cyþende þæt he gewilnode for
þæs hælendes lufan?
 3.110.7. Ac þa þa he geseah, þæt in þære stowe wæs
him sylfum lytel wæstm for Gode & hefig gewin for worulde, þa geheold
he hine sylfne in þære stowe to gewinne mid wæstme þæs godan
weorces.
 3.110.13. & swa se Godes stranga wiga sanctus Paulus nolde beon
gehæfd binnan þære byrig Damasco, ac sohte þone feld þæs
campes.
 3.110.17. Be þon eac swylce gif þu hit bealdlice ongytest,
þæt se ylca arwurða wer Benedictus forþon forlet selfa cwic þa
ungelæredlican gebroðru, forþon þe he swiþe manige oþre awehte
fram hira sawle deaðe on oþrum stowum.
 3.110.24. Petrus cwæð: soþ hit is þæt þu segst, &
seo cuþe gesceadwisnes us tæcet swyþe gerysenlice cyþnesse.
 3.110.26. Ac ic þe bidde nu gyt, þæt þu gecyrre to
endebyrdnysse þære segene be þam life swa haliges fæder.
 3.110.28. Gregorius him andswarode: se halga wer weox & wearð
mære lange in þam westene for þam mægnum & þam wundrum, þe he
worhte.
 3.110.30. & þa fram him wæron manige mæn gesomnode in
þa ylcan stowe to ðæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowdome, swa þæt he
getimbrode þær XII mynstru mid fultume ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes.
 3.110.33. On ælcum þara he gesette XII munecas on þam he
getealde XII wise fæderas, & he hæfde mid him sylfum swyþe feawa,
þa þa him þuhte, þæt þa gyt mihton on his andweardnesse bet beon
gelærede.
 3.111.2. Eac ongunnon þa to him faran þa æþelan & þa
æfestan weras, þe wæron in Romebyrig, & him befæstan heora suna
to fedanne & to læranne to Godes hyrsumnesse.
 3.111.4. Þa him befæstan eac þæs godan hihtes heora
bearn: Equitius him befæste Maurum his suna, & Tertulus se ealdorman him
befæste Placidum his sunu.
 3.111.6. Of þam twam Maurus se gingra þeah sona in godum
þeawum, þæt he ongan beon fultumiend þæs lareowes in þara oðra
broþra lare.
 3.111.8. & Placidus þa gyt heold his cnihtþeawas &
gebæru.
 4.111.10. Þa gelamp hit in anum þara mynstra, þe Benedictus
trymede ymbe hine, þæt sum munuc wæs, þe næfre ne mihte æt his
gebede fæste gestandan, ac sona swa ða broðru hi onhyldon to geornesse
hira gebedes, he eode ut & mid widgalum mode worhte a hwæthugu
eorðlices & gewitendlices.
 4.111.14. Þa wæs he swiþe oft gelæred fram his abbude,
þæt he swa don ne sceolde, & þa æt nehstan he wæs gelæded
to þam Godes were Benedicte, & þa he sylf cidde & þreade þæs
gymeleasan muneces dysignysse.
 4.111.17. & þa swa gecided he wæs eft gecyrred to his
mynstre.
 4.111.18. & uneaðe twegen dagas he geheold on him þa lare
þæs eadigan weres, & þa on þam þriddan dæge he wæs eft
gecyrred to his agnum gewunan & ongan weallian symble fram þam broðrum
in þa tide heora gebedes.
 4.111.21. Þa wæs þæt gebodod þam Godes þeowe
Benedicte fram þam ylcan fæder þæs mynstres, þe he sylf þær to
gesette.
 4.111.23. Þa cwæð se halga wer: ic cume þyder & hine
þurh me sylfne gebete.
 4.111.24. & þa þa se Godes wer com in þæt mynstre,
& on gesetedre tide, þa se sealmsang wæs gefylled, & þa broðra
hi sylfe sealdon & astrehton on heora gebed, þa geseah he, þæt
þone ylcan munuc, þe in þam gebede wunian ne mihte, þæt sum sweart
cniht teah ut be þam fæsce his hrægles.
 4.111.28. Þa cwæð Benedictus deogollice to þæs mynstres
fæder, þam wæs nama Pompianus, & to Maure þam Godes were: ac la
ne geseoð git, hwæt se sy, þe þysne munuc ut atyhð?
 4.112.3. Hi andswarodon him & cwædon: nese.
 4.112.3. Benedictus cwæð to heom: gebidde we us, þæt git
eac magon geseon, hwam þes munuc fylgeð.
 4.112.5. & þa ymb twa niht wæs abeden, þæt Maurus
hine geseah, & Pompianus þæs mynstres fæder hine geseon ne mihte.
 4.112.6. Þa þe oþrum dæge gefyldum heora gebede se Godes
wer eode ut of þam gebedhuse & gemette standende þone munuc þær
ute.
 4.112.8. Þa sloh he hine mid anre gyrde for his heortan
blindnesse.
 4.112.9. & þa sona æfter þam dæge ne þrowade he
nane costunge fram þam sweartan cnihte, ac ealle niht þurhwunode
staþolfæst & unonwendedlic to þam wyllan his gebedes.
 4.112.12. & þa swa se ealda feond ne dorste ofer þæt
gehrinan þæs muneces he geþohte, efne swylce he selfa wære
geslægen & beswungcen mid Benedictus swinglan.
 5.112.15. Witodlice þæra XII mynstra, þe sanctus Benedictus
getimbrode, wæron þreo aseted in þæs muntes stanclifum, & þam
broþrum wæs symble swyðe gewinnful & uneaðe niþer to astigenne
to þam wæterseaðe, þonne hi sceoldon heom wæter hladan & ham
beran.
 5.112.18. & eac ealre swiðost, forþon þe of þære
widgyllan sidan þæs muntes wæs swiðe hefgu frecednys for ege þam
niþer stigendum.
 5.112.20. Þa wæron þa gebroðru gesomnode of þam þrym
mynstrum & comon to þam Godes þeowe Benedicte & him þus to
cwædon: la, fæder, us is þæt swiþe mycel gewinn, þæt we for
þam wætere daga gehwilce ofdune stigað to þam seaðe.
 5.112.24. Forþon us is nydþearf, þæt þa mynstru of
þære stowe moten beon gecyrrede to oþre stowe.
 5.112.25. He þa se halga wer swiðe bliðelice afrefriende hi
forlet, & þa þy ilcan nihte astah on þæs muntes stanclif mid
Placido þam lytlan cnihte, þæs gemynd ic ær bufan dyde.
 5.112.28. & þær se halga wer Benedictus hine gebæd
lange hwile, & þa gefyldum þam gebede he asette for tacne & to
mearce on þære stowe þry stanas & eft gecyrde to his agnum mynstre,
swa þæt nænig þæra broðra nyste, þe in þam mynstre
wæron.
 5.113.2. Þa eft oþrum dæge comon þa forecwedenan broðra
to þam halgan were for þæs wætres nedþearfnysse.
 5.113.4. Þa cwæð Benedictus to heom: gaþ ge & þæt
stanclif hwæthugu holiað, on þam ge gemetað þry stanas heom
betweonum tosomne asette.
 5.113.6. Þonne mæg eaðe se ælmihtiga God eac in þam
cnolle þæs muntes wæter forð gelædan & hine gemedemian,
þæt he for his mildheortnesse eow afyrreð þæt gewinn swa myccles
& swa earfoþlices weges.
 5.113.9. & hi þa gangende gemetton sona þæt stanclif
swætende & wætende, swa swa Benedictus be þam heom ær sæde.
 5.113.10. Þa ongunnon hi on þam stanclife hwylcehugu holinga
don, & þa sona þæt wæter fleow swyþe genihtsumlice, swa
þæt hi nu gyt todæge floweð genoh swiðe & is gegyred to þam
neoðerum stowum fram þam cnolle þæs muntes.
 6.113.15. Eac hit gelamp on oþre tid, þæt sum Gota, se
wæs þearfa on gaste, com to þan halgan men to drohtnienne mid him.
 6.113.16. Þone se drihtnes wer sona onfeng swiðe lustlice.
 6.113.17. Þa sume dæge sealde he him irengeloman, þæt is
haten wudubill, & het, þæt he sceolde on sumre stowe bremlas aweg
aceorfan, þæt þær mihte beon wyrtun.
 6.113.19. Seo ilce stow læg ofer þam stæþe sumes
wæterseaðes.
 6.113.21. Þas stowe se Gota underfeng to clænsienne.
 6.113.23. & þa þa se ylca Gota heow aweg þa þicnysse
þara brymela mid eallre geornnesse his mægnys, færinga þæt iren
forð ahleop of þam hylfe & gefeoll on ðone seað.
 6.113.28. Þær witodlice wæs mycclu deopnes þara
wættra, þæt þær næs nænig wen þæs geloman ofer þæt
to secanne.
 6.114.2. Swa þa forlorenum þam irene he arn forhtigende to
Maure þam munuce & him bodode þa hynðe, þe he geworhte, & eac
gehet his agenre scylde dædbote.
 6.114.7. Þæt eac swylce Maurus se munuc sona ongan secgan
Benedicte þam Godes þeowe.
 6.114.9. & þa se Godes wer Benedictus, þa he þis gehyrde,
he eode to þam seaðe & genam on þæs Gotan handa þæt hylfe
& sceat in ðone seað.
 6.114.13. & þa hraþe gecyrde þæt iren eft of þam
grunde in þæt hylfe.
 6.114.15. Þa sona eft se halga man ageaf þam Gotan þone
geloman & þus cwæð to him: loca nu.
 6.114.18. Her is þin geloma.
 6.114.18. & wyrc þin weorc, & ne beo þu ofer þis
geunrotsod.
 7.114.22. Hit gelamp eac sume dæge, þa þa se ylca arwyrða
wer Benedictus wæs in his mynstre, þa wæs utgangende se foresprecena
cniht Placidus se munuc þæs halgan weres to hladane wæter of þære
ea.
 7.114.28. Þa forlet he unwærlice in þæt wæter þæt
fæt, & sylf æfter gefeoll.
 7.114.31. Þa underfeng hine sona seo yþ & teah
ofduneweardes, oþ þæt he wæs full neah in anes flanes scyte ut fram
þam lande.
 7.115.1. Þa se drihtnes wer binnan þam mynstre geseted ongæt
þæt sona & þa ofstlice cigde Maurum þone munuc & þus
cwæð: broþor Maurus.
 7.115.5. Yrn hraðe, forþon þe se cniht, þe eode wæter
hladan, feoll in þa ea, & hine nu tyhð seo yð mid hire feorr ofdune.
 7.115.9. Eala, Petrus, þæt þæt wæs wundorlicu wise
& æfter Petre þam apostole swiðe ungewunelicu.
 7.115.12. Hwæt: he þa Maurus abæd Benedictes bletsunge,
& þa onfangenre þære he wæs swiþe hræd & ferde æfter
his fæder bebode, oþ þæt he com to þære stowe, þær se cniht
wæs fram þære yþe boren & gelæded.
 7.115.18. He arn ofer þæt wæter & wende, þæt he
fore ofer drige land.
 7.115.20. He genam þone cniht be þam loccum & eft mid
færlicum ryne gecyrde.
 7.115.22. & þa sona swa he þæt land gehran, he wæs
cyrrende to him sylfum & on bæc beseah.
 7.115.25. & þa forþon þe he ongæt, þæt he ne
mihte ne ne dorste to þon gedyrstlæcan, þæt he swa ferde, gif he hit
wiste, he wæs wundriende þa wisan & aforhtode & þa cyrde to
þam fædær & gesæde þa wisan him swa gedone.
 7.115.32. Witodlice se halga wer Benedictus ongan þis wundor
tellan nalles na his agnum geearnungum, ac Maures hyrsumnysse þæs
munuces.
 7.116.1. & þa Maurus ongæn hine cwæð, þæt hit
wære geworden for his sylfes bebode, & sæde, þæt he sylfa
nære nænig gewita þæs mægnes, & þæt dyde þæt he
dyde swa he hit nyste.
 7.116.6. Ac in þam freondlican geflite þære wrixiendlican
eadmodnesse þær eode to genoh rihtwis dema, þæt wæs se cniht, þe
wæs atogen of þam wætre.
 7.116.10. Se sæde þus & þus cwæð: þa þa ic
wæs atogen of þam wætere, ic geseah þæs abbudes þylican ofer
minum heafde, & þa ylcan ic geseah me upp gelædan of þam wætere.
 7.116.16. Petrus cwæð: swyþe wundorlice & myccle syndon
þa wisan, þe þu sægest, & nytwurþe to manigra manna trymnesse
& lare.
 7.116.19. Soþlice swa me þæs godan weres wundor habbað
geblissod, þæt swa ic swyþor drince, swa me swyþor þyrsteð.
 8.116.23. Hu se hrefn feorr abær þone geættrodan hlaf.
 8.116.24. Gregorius him andswarode: mid ty þe hi weollon &
burnon in þam ylcan stowum, þa þe mære wurdon on ures drihtnes naman
hælendes Cristes feorr & wide ymb þone halgan, þa forþon manige
men forleton þis woruldlice lif & gebygdon heora heortan & heora
sweoran under þam liðan geoce ures alysendes.
 8.117.2. Þa gelamp hit, swa swa hit þweora manna þeaw is,
þæt hi symble æfæstiað oþra manna goddæde & hefelice
niþað/ þa hi selfe no ðy ær habban willað: þær wæs
sumre neah cyrican mæssepreost, þam wæs nama Florentius, se wæs
Florenties yldrafæder ures subdiacones.
 8.117.10. Þa wearð se mid hete & mid niðe þæs ealdan
feondes gehrinen & ongan fandian þæs halgan weres willan &
geornnysse & eac tælan his liflade, & swa hwylcum mæn swa he
mihte he wolde gestyran & þa læran fram his neosunge & lufan.
 8.117.18. & þa se æfæstiga mæssepreost geseah,
þæt he ne mihte wiðwiþerian þæs halgan mannes fram ænigum
& godum weorcum, & eac gehyrde þone hlisan weaxan his godan lifes,
& þæt manige men wæron gelaðode unablinnendlice mid þære
mærðe þæs ylcan hlisan to staþole hira beteran lifes, þa wæs
he a ma & ma inæled mid þam þyccylum þære æfæste &
getihted mid þæs feondes lare, þæt he wæs wyrsa.
 8.117.30. Forþon þe he gewilnode, þæt he hæfde lof
& herenesse þæs clænan lifes, ac hwæþre he nolde in him habban
& gehealdan þæt hergendlice lif.
 8.118.1. & þa wæs he ablænded mid þam þystrum
þære ylcan æfæste, oþ þæt he wæs to þon getihted &
on þon gebroht, þæt he wæs þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowe
onsænded to lace, swylce hit his bletsung wære, beweledne hlaf & mid
attre gemengedne.
 8.118.7. Þa onfeng se drihtnes wer þam mid dæde þancunge.
 8.118.9. & in þam hlafe næs na bemiþen þæt wol,
þæt he tihhode, þæt þam halgan were bedeoglod beon sceolde.
 8.118.12. Ac symble on þa tide his gereordnysse wæs gewunod an
hræfn, þæt he com of þam neah wuda & onfeng hlaf of Benedictes
handa.
 8.118.16. Þa com se fugel mid his gewunelican þeawe, & sona
se Godes wer awearp forð beforan þam hræfne þone hlaf, þe se
æfestiga mæssepreost him sænde.
 8.118.21. & he bead him þus & cwæð in his drihtnes
naman hælendes Cristes: nim þisne hlaf & aweorp hine on swylce stowe,
þær he næfre ne mage beon gefunden fram nanum men.
 8.118.26. Þa se hræfn untyndum his muþe & Aþenedum his
fiþerum ongan yrnan ymb þone ylcan hlaf & cræccettan, emne swa he
openlice cwæde, þæt he him hyran wolde & swa þeh his hæse
gefyllan ne mihte.
 8.118.32. Þa eft se Godes wer bebead þam hræfne þus
cweþende: hefe hine upp & aweorp hine þær þær he næfre eft
ne wurðe gefunden.
 8.119.1. Þa wæs he lange eldende þone to nimane, &
hwæþre æt nexstan se hræfn hine upp ahof & him onweg gewat,
& eft ymb þreora tide fæc ongæn com & þær onfeng his
bigleofa, eall swa his gewuna wæs ær, of þæs Godes mannes handa.
 8.119.5. Þa geseah se arwurða fæder þæs sacerdes mod
byrnan & æfæstigian wiþ his life.
 8.119.6. He sorgode ma for þam æfstigan mæssepreoste
þonne for him sylfum.
 8.119.7. Eac swylce se ylca forecwedena Florentius se
mæssepreost, forþon þe he his lareowes lichaman acwellan ne mihte, he
onælde hine sylfne & þohte to acwellane þa sawla þæs halgan
weres leornungmanna, swa þæt he sænde VII nacode mædenu beforan
heora eagenum in þone wyrtun þæs ylcan mynstres, þe Benedictus on
wæs.
 8.119.12. Þa mædenu beforan þam leornungmannum hæfdon hi
sylfe be handa heom betweonan & þa lange hwile plegdon.
 8.119.14. Hi onældon & onhætton þæra geongrena mod
to forcyrrednesse heora synlustes.
 8.119.15. Þa se halga wer geseah þæt of þam mynstre &
þa sona him wæs ondrædende þone slide þære synne in þam merwum
leorningmannum, & eac þæt þohte & smeade, þæt hit wære
gedon for his anes ehtnesse.
 8.119.18. & he þa forlet þa stowe, þe he on wæs for
þære æfæste, & ealle þa mynstru, þe he ær gestaþelode
& geændebyrde & gesette mid þam gegadredum broðrum, & heom
gesette gewisse preostas & reccendas.
 8.119.21. He bewrixlede him sylf þære stowe eardunge &
genam mid him feawe munecas.
 8.119.22. & þa sona se Godes wer beseah eadmodlice þa
læþþe & feondscipe þæs æfstigan mæssepreostes.
 8.119.23. Ac se ælmihtiga God sloh þysne preost ondrysnlice.
 8.119.24. Soðlice þa þes forecwedena mæssepreost gestod in
þam solore þæs mynstres & ongæt & geseah Benedictes
onwegfæreld, þa þurhwuniendum unonwendedlice eallum þam getimbre
þæs hames þæt wundorhus sylf gefeoll, in þam stod se æfstiga
mæssepreost, se wæs feond þæs halgan Benedictes.
 8.120.1. Þæt þa sona þæs Godes weres þegn, þam
wæs nama Maurus, wende, þæt hit wære to bodianne þam arwyrðan
fæder Benedicte, se þa gyt of þære ylcan stowe wæs uneaðe
gefaren tyn milum feor.
 8.120.4. & þa cwæð Maurus to þam fæder: min
fæder, gecyrr eft, forþon se mæssepreost is acweald, þe þin ær
ehte.
 8.120.6. Þa þæt se Godes wer Benedictus gehyrde, he sealde
sona hine sylfne in hefige cyþnysse, ægþer ge forþon þe se his
feond deað geþrowode, ge eac forþon þe se his gingra gefægnode for
þæs feondes deaþe.
 8.120.9. For þære wisan wæs geworden, þæt he bebead
þam ylcan his þegne dædbote, forþon þe he geþristlæhte, þa
þa he þyllicu word bodode, þæt he gefægnode for þæs feondes
forwyrde.
 8.120.12. Petrus cwæð: wundorlice syndon & swiðe to
wafienne þa þe þu segst.
 8.120.13. Soðlice ic seo & ongyte in þam forð gelæddan
wætere of þam stane, þæt he ofhyrede Moysen þone latteow þære
ealdan æ.
 8.120.15. & in þam irene, þe gecyrde of þæs
wæteres grunde, ic ongyte Heliseum, & in þæs wæteres wege Petrum
þone apostol.
 8.120.16. In þæs hræfnes hersumnesse ic ongyte Heliam
þone witigan.
 8.120.17. In þam heofe þæs feondes deaðes ic ongyte Dauid
þone cyning.
 8.120.18. & þæs þe me þincþ ic ongytan mæg,
þæt þes wer wæs full & gehladen mid þy gaste eallra rihtwisra
& Godes gecorenra.
 8.120.20. Gregorius him andswarode: se drihtenes wer sanctus
Benedictus hæfde in him þæs anes gast, þe gefylde eallra his
gecorenra heortan þurh þa gife þære ealdan alysednesse.
 8.120.22. Be þam ylcan Iohannes se godspellere cwæð: he
wæs þæt soðe leoht, þæt onlyhteþ æghwilcne man cumende in
þisne middaneard.
 8.120.24. & be þam is eft awriten, þæt we ealle of his
gefyllednesse gife onfengon.
 8.120.25. Soþlice þa halgan Godes men mihton geearnian æt
drihtene, þæt hi hæfdon sylfe þæs godan weorces mægnu, ac hi ne
mihton na þa oþrum mannum syllan.
 8.120.28. Ac se sealde his underþeoddum þæs godan mægnes
tacnu, se þe gehet his feondum, þæt he wolde heom syllan Ionan tacen
þæs witigan, & eac gehet, þæt he wære sylfa geeadmodod,
þæt he wolde swyltan for oferhigdum & eft arisan for eadmodum,
þæt þa oferhidgan mihton geseon, hwæt hi ær forhogodon, & þa
eadmodan , hwæt hi sceoldon lufian & weorþian.
 8.121.3. Of þam geryne is gecweden & gedon & us
gecyþed, þæt þonne þa oferhygdigan sceawiað þa forsewennesse
þæs deaþes, & þa eadmodan wiþ þam deaðe onfoð þam wuldre
þæs ecan anwealdes.
 8.121.6. Petrus cwæð: ic þe bidde, þæt þu me
gecyþe, to hwylcum stowum se halga wer fore æfter þysum, oþþe
hwæþer he ænigu mægnu æteowde.
 8.121.8. Gregorius him andswarode: witodlice se halga wer, þa
þa he wæs farende to oðrum stowum, ne onwænde he noht þone ealdan
feond, þeh þe he sylfa gecyrde to oþre eardungstowe.
 8.121.11. Ac swa myccle ma he aræfnede æfter þon hefigran
gewin, swa myccle swa he ma gemette & onfand þone lareow selfne þæs
bealwes openlice feohtendne ongæn hine.
 8.121.13. An cæster wæs geseted in þæs hean muntes
sidan, & seo cæster wæs haten Casinum.
 8.121.14. Witodlice se munt tobræddum his sceate onfeng &
hæfde þis ilce cæster.
 8.121.15. & þonne ofer þreo mila upp in ða heanesse se
munt wæs aræred & aþened swylce swyþlice heah cnoll.
 8.121.17. & þær on þam cnolle wæs se hearg &
tempel aseted, in þam of ealdra hæþenra manna þeawe & fram þam
dysigum ceorla folce wæs began & weorðod se hæþena god, þe
Apollo is genemned.
 8.121.20. & eac þær ymb on healfa gehwylce weoxon bearwas
in þara deofla bigange, & in þam bearwum þa gyt in þa tid won &
hyrde þam manfullum onsægdnessum seo ungewittige mængeo ungeleaffullra
manna.
 8.121.23. & þa ferde þider se Godes wer Benedictus, &
sona swa he þider com, he toscynde þæt deofolgyld & towearp þæt
weofod.
 8.121.25. He forbærnde þa bearwas, & in þam ylcan temple
Apollones þæs hæþenan godes he worhte gebedhus þæs halgan &
þæs eadigan Martines þæs biscopes.
 8.121.27. & eac þær þæs ylcan Apollones weofod
wæs, he getimbrede gebedhus þæs halgan Iohannes.
 8.121.28. & þa þær þa wuniendan mænigu his
ymbsittendra he gecigde daga gehwylce to þam rihtan geleafan mid his
þære singalan lare.
 8.122.2. Ac þa se ealda feond ne mihte adreogan þas wisan
swigiende ne deogollice þurh swefn miðgian, swa swa is æfre his gewuna,
ac mid openlicre gesihþe he gebrohte hine sylfne & gelædde beforan
eagum þæs arwyrðan fæder Benedictes.
 8.122.6. & þa mid swa mycclum cleopungum he seofode, þæt
he þrowode his ned, emne þæt þa oþre gebroþru eac gehyrdon his
stefne, þe þær mid þam halgan were wunodon, þeh þe hi na ne
gesawon his anlicnesse.
 8.122.9. Ac swa swa se arwyrða fæder æfter þon his
geongrum sæde, þæt se ealda & se swearta feond inæled hine
æteowde his lichamlicum eagum, & þæt he gesawe þone feond
reðian on hine mid his muþe & his byrnendum eagum.
 8.122.12. Witodlice þa word, þe se feond gecwæð, ealle
þa gebroðru gehyrdon.
 8.122.13. Ærest he gecigde þone halgan man be his naman, &
se halga wer nolde geandswarian.
 8.122.14. Þa sona eft him to teonan he upp ahof his stefne &
þa cleopode & þus cwæð: Benedicte, Benedicte.
 8.122.16. Þa þuhte him þa gyt, þæt he nane þinga him
andwyrdan nolde.
 8.122.17. Þa swiðe hraðe geycte he his spræce & þus
cwæð: <foreign>Maledicte, non Benedicte</foreign>.
 8.122.18. Þæt is on Englisc, þu arwyrgda, nalæs þu
gebletsoda.
 8.122.19. & þæt swa gecwæð se deofol for hole &
for æfste & eac þas word spræc: hwæt hafast þu wiþ me
gemæne, oþþe for hwon ehtest þu min?
 8.122.21. Ac nu, Petrus, us syndon to sceawienne niwe campas &
gewin þæs ealdan feondes ongæn þone Godes þeow, on þam he
gebrohte his willum manige gefeoht, ac swa þeh genyded he gedyde bigias &
fleam fore þæs halgan mannes sigore.
 9.122.25. Eac hit gelamp sume dæge, þæt þa gebroðra
timbredon þæs mynstres hus, & þa læg þær an stan tomiddes,
þone hi mynton hebban upp on þæs huses timbrunge, ac hine ne mihton
twegen mæn ne þry onstyrian.
 9.123.2. Þa eodon þær ma manna to, ac he swa þeah wunode
fæst & unwendedlic, emne swylce he wære hæfd be wyrtwalan in
þære eorðan.
 9.123.4. & eac hit openlice mihte beon ongyten, þæt se
ealda feond sæt ofer þam stane, þone ne mihton swa manigra wera handa
onstyrian.
 9.123.6. Þa for þære earfoþnysse wæs sended to þam
Godes were, & þa broðra bædan, þæt he come & mid his
gebedum þone feond onweg adrife, þæt hi mihton þone stan upp ahebban.
 9.123.9. Þa sona swa se Godes wer þider com, he dyde þær
his gebed & his bletsunge, & þa wearð se stan mid swa mycelre
hrædnesse upp ahafen, swylce he ær nænigne hefignysse on him
næfde.
 10.123.17. Ða gelamp hit, þæt in gesyhþe þæs
godcundan weres gelicode, þæt he het adelfan in þære ylcan stowe
eorðan for sumre neodþearfe, & þa hie þa eorðan delfende deoppor
ofdune becomon, þa gebroðru fundon þær sum æren feondgyld, &
þa awurpon hie þæt to sumre hwile in þa cycenan.
 10.123.26. Þa semninga wæs him geþuht, þæt þær
eode fyr ut, & þæt æteowde in eallra þara muneca eagum, þæt
eall þæt getimbre þære cycenan sceolde beon fornumen.
 10.123.30. Þa ongunnon hio weorpan wæter & hlydan, swa
þa doð, þe fyr & bryne dwæscað.
 10.124.1. Þa wæs Benedictus se Godes wer gecnysed &
onstyred fram þam geruxle & com þider to & þa sona geseah,
þæt þæt ylce fyr wæs in þara broðra eagum geþuht &
næs na in his agnum swa gesewen.
 10.124.7. Þa hraðe he gebigde his heafod to gebede & þa
broðru gecigde to him, þe he gemette þær mid þam scinlacan fyre
bysmrian, & gelærde heo, þæt hie gebletsodon heora eagan &
gesawon, þæt þær stod gesund hus þære cycenan, & þæt
hio na leng ne beheoldon þa ligeas, þæ se ealda feond leaslice gehiwode
þurh his scincræft.
 11.124.19. Eft hit gelamp, þa þa þa gebroðra woldon
þæs huses wah hwene herran getimbrian, forþon þæs swa sum
neodþearflicu wise bædde, & Benedictus se Godes wer wunode binnan
þam locum his mynstres in þam willan & geornnysse his gebedes, þa se
ealda feond bysmriende æteowde & sæde, þæt he wolde feran to
þam gebroðrum, þe þæt hus worhton.
 11.124.29. Þa þæt sona bebead Benedictus swiþe hrædlice
þam broðrum þurh ærendracan & þus cwæð: broðra, doþ ge
wærlice, forþon þe eow cymþ in þyssere ylcan tide se awyrgda gast
to.
 11.125.1. Þa se þe on þæt ærende for, uneaðe he mihte
þa word abeodan, ær þon se awyrgda gast towearp þone wah, þe
þær getimbrod wæs, & mid þy fylle ðæs wages forþryccende
he geþræste ænne þara muneca, se wæs anes gerefan sunu.
 11.125.8. Þa sona wæron ealle þa broþra swiþe geswencte
& geunrotsode, nalæs na for þy dæmme þæs wages fylles, ac for
geþræstednysse þæs broðres.
 11.125.12. Hi þa tilodon hrædlice mid hefigum heofe, þæt
man þæt sceolde bodian þam arwyrðan fæder Benedicte.
 11.125.16. Þa se ylca fæder het, þæt man sceolde bringcan
þone gewundodan cniht to him.
 11.125.18. Þa ne mihton hi hine ne aberan buton on hwitle,
forþon þe þa stanas þæs toglidenan wages nalæs þæt an,
þæt hi his limu tobræcan, ac eac swylce mid ealle his ban gebrysedon.
 11.125.24. Þa sona bebead se Godes wer, þæt hine man alegde
in his cytan on þa meattan, þe he him on gebed, & þa sænde he þa
broðra ut & beleac þa cytan.
 11.125.28. & he þa se halga wer gefealh his gebede mycle
geornlicor, þonne he ær gewunode.
 11.125.31. Wundorlicu wise þæt wæs, Petrus, þæt on
þa ylcan tid he onsænde þone cniht eft to þam weorce swa gesundne
& swa strangne, swa he ær wæs, to þon þæt he sceolde
gegearwian & fulfremman þone wah mid þam oþrum broþrum.
 11.126.4. Mid þæs cnihtes forewyrde se ealda feond gelyfde,
þæt he mihte gebysmrian Benedictum.
 11.126.7. Þa ongan se Godes wer betweoh þysum wisum eac swylce
þeon & weaxan mid witedomes gaste, þæt he bodode þa toweardan
þing & sægde þa æfweardan andweardum mannum.
 12.126.15. Soþlice þæs mynstres þeaw wæs, þæt swa
oft swa þa broðra ut eodon to ænigre andsware, þæt hi nænigra
þinga ne namon ne ne þigdon mete ne drync wiðutan mynstre.
 12.126.20. Mid ty þe þis wæs gehealden for þam gewunan
þæs ymbhydiglican regoles, þa sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt þa
gebroðra eodon ut to sumre spræce, & in þære spræce hi
wæron genydde, þæt hi for þære lættran tide wunedon læng
þonne hi sceoldon.
 12.126.27. Þa wiston hi, þæt hi wicodon neah sumum
æwfæstum wife.
 12.126.29. Þa eodon hi in to hire huse & namon þær mete
& þigdon.
 12.126.31. Þa hi eft cyrdon lator þonne hi sceoldon to þam
mynstre, hi bædon þæs halgan fæder bletsunge, swa swa hit þeaw
wæs.
 12.127.4. Sona wæs se Godes wer acsiende þa broðra &
þus cwæð: hwær æton ge?
 12.127.6. Hi him andswaredon & cwædon: nohwær.
 12.127.7. Benedictus cwæð to þam broðrum: for hwon
leogað ge swa?
 12.127.9. Cweþað ge, þæt ge ne eodon in þæs wifes
hus?
 12.127.11. Ac la ne onfengcon ge þær ne ne þigdon þas
mettas?
 12.127.12. Cweðað ge, þæt ge ne druncon þær þus
manige calicas fulle?
 12.127.14. & þa þa se arwurða fæder rehte þam
broðrum ge þæs wifes hus ge þara metta cyn ge eac þone rim þara
drincena, hi gecneowon sona ealla þa þing, þe hi sylfe ær dydon, &
feollon forhtigende to his fotum & wæron andettende, þæt hi gegylt
hæfdon.
 12.127.22. He þa sona se Godes wer gearode heom on þære
scylde, & hi þa gehogodon, þæt hi ofer þæt swa don noldon in
þæs fæder æfweardnysse.
 12.127.26. Be þam hi ongæton, þæt he him symble wæs
ondweard on his gaste.
 13.127.30. Eac Ualentinianus Benedictes munuces broður, þæs
gemynd ic ær bufan dyde, se wæs læwde wer, ac swa þeh he wæs
swiðe æwfæst, se gewunode, þæt he for ælce gære of his
agenre stowe, þæt he becom to sancte Benedictes mynstre, to þon þæt
he onfengce þær þæs Godes weres bletsunge & gesawe Ualentinianum
his geborenan broþur.
 13.128.6. Witodlice hit gelamp sume dæge, þa þa se broðor
on þone weg ferde to Benedictes mynstre, þæt oþer wegferend hine
sylfne to him geþeodde, se bær mid him mettas to þicgenne in þam
wege.
 13.128.12. & þa þa seo lættre tid com, & seo ufere
þæs dæges weox & agan wæs, þa cwæð se wegferenda to þam
æwfæstan mæn: broþur, cum hider, þæt wit magan þicgan mete
ætsomne, þy læs wit wergien on þisum wege.
 13.128.18. He þa andswarode þam & þus cwæð: feorr
þæt sy, þæt hit gewurðe, broþor.
 13.128.21. Nelle ic þæt don, forþon þe ic gewunode,
þæt ic com fæstende to þam arwyrðan fæder Benedicte.
 13.128.24. Þa onfangenre þære andsware, se wegferenda
geswigode sume hwile.
 13.128.26. Ac þa æfter þysum hi gefremedon medmycelne dæl
þæs weges, þa eft se wegferenda hine lærde, þæt hi æton, ac
him nolde heran se þe getihhode, þæt he fæstende sceolde becuman to
þam halgan were.
 13.128.32. & þa geswigode se þe hine laðode to ete &
mid him fæstende þa gyt ferde & þæt geþafode sume hwile.
 13.128.35. Ac þa þa hi þa gyt fyrr foron on heora weg, &
hi þa seo ufere tid mid fæstene geswencte swa gangende in þam wege, þa
gemetton hi fægre mædwe & easpryng, & eall swa hwæt swa mihton
beon gesewene lustfullice þone lichaman mid to gereordianne.
 13.129.7. Þa cwæð se wegferenda to him: loca nu.
 13.129.8. Her is wæter & mædwe & geseoh, þæt
þis is fægru stow on þære wit magon unc gereordian & hwæthugu
gerestan, þæt wit magon æfter þon þe eað uncerne weg onsunde
gefaran.
 13.129.14. Mid þy þa word gecwemdon his earum, & þa stowe
gelicodon his eagum, & he þa mid þære þriddan manunge gehyrde his
wordum & æt mid him.
 13.129.18. Þa on þa æfentide he becom to þam mynstre,
& þa þa he wæs gecyðed þam arwyrðan fæder Benedicte, he
gewilnode him sylfum his bletsunge & gebedrædenne.
 13.129.23. Ac sona se Godes werr him þæt oþwat, þæt he
on þam wege dyde, þus cweþende: hwæt is þæt, broður, þæt
þu dydest?
 13.129.27. Se awyrgde feond, se to þe wæs sprecende þurh
þinne geferan on wege, se þe æne gelæran ne mihte, ne eac æt þam
æftran siþe ne mihte, ac æt ðam þriddan cyrre he þe gelærde
& oferswiðde to þon þe he wolde.
 13.129.34. Ða se æwfæsta man ongæt hraðe þa scylde
his tydran modes, he wæs forð onloten to þæs halgan mannes fotum,
& swa myccle ma ongan his scylde weopan & scamian, swa mycclum swa he
hine sylfne ma ongæt æfweardne agyltan beforan his fæder eagum
Benedictes.
 13.130.8. Petrus cwæð: me þinceþ, þæt in þam
gehigdum þyses halgan weres wære Heliseus gast þæs witigan, forþon
þe he wæs andweard his æfweardum þegne.
 14.130.14. Gregorius him andswarode: þe gedafenað, Petrus,
þæt þu sume þrage geswigige, þæt þu ofer þis magæ maran
wisan ongytan.
 14.130.17. Soþlice hit gelamp in Gotena tidum, þa þa Totilla
cyning gehyrde, þæt se halga wer hæfde witedomes gast, he ferde to his
mynstre & þa gewicode þær naht feor & þam halgan mæn hine
toweardne bodode.
 14.130.24. Þa sona þæs getreowleases modes wer hæfde
þæt he sceolde gecunnian & arasian, hwæþer se drihtnes wer
hæfde witedomes gast.
 14.130.31. Þa þæs cyningces sweordbora wæs Ricgo
gehaten, þam se cyning sealde his gescy & gedyde, þæt he wæs
gyred mid cynelicum hrægle, & he bebead him, þæt he ferde to þam
Godes men, swylce hit se cyning sylfa wære.
 14.131.3. & eac on his þegnunga he sende III ealdormen, þa
gewunodon, þæt hi him fylgdon beforan oþrum mannum, þa wæron þus
gehatene: Uult, Ruderic & Blidin, þæt hi sceoldon beforan þæs
Godes þeowes eagum þone ylcan Ricgan geonlician Totillan þam cyningce,
& þæt hi sceoldon gan on ælce healfe ymb hine.
 14.131.13. Eac swylce him man gegearwode oðre þegnunge &
gesette swurdboran, to þon þæt hit wære geþuht, þæt he se
sylfa cyngc wære, ge for þam þegnungum ge for þam godwebbenum
hræglum, þe he mid gegered wæs.
 14.131.19. & þa þa se ylca Ricga mid þam hræglum þus
gewlitegod wæs gangende in þæt mynster, & hine mid siðode seo
mænigeo þara þegniendra manna, þa sæt se Godes wer feorran lociende
on þone, þe þiderweardes wæs gangende.
 14.131.26. & þa sona swa hit mihte beon gehyred fram þam,
þe þider comon, Benedictus cleopode & þus cwæð: alege, sunu,
alege þæt þu byrst.
 14.131.30. Nis hit na þin.
 14.131.31. Þa sona feoll se Ricga on eorþan & aforhtode,
forþon þe he geþristlæhte, þæt he bysmrode swa mycclum & swa
arwyrþum were.
 14.132.2. & ealle þa men, þe mid him comon to þam Godes
men, wæron astrehte on þære eorðan & eft arisende ne dorston ne
to him genealæcan, ac eft gecyrdon to heora cyningce & bodedon &
sædon swiðe forhte, on hu mycele hrædnysse hi wæron arasode.
 14.132.10. Ða se ilca Totilla eode him self to þam Godes men,
& þa þa he geseah feorran hine sittende, he næs naht beald him to to
ganne, ac hine sylfne astrehte on þa eorðan.
 14.132.15. & þa se Godes wer cwæð twuwa & þrywa:
aris, broðor, aris.
 14.132.17. Ac swa þeah he ne dorste beon beforan him upp
aræred of þære eorðan.
 14.132.19. Benedictus þa se Cristes þeowa wæs gemedemod
þurh hine sylfne, þæt he genealæhte to þam astræhtan cyninge
& hine þa upp ahof & him for his agnum dædum cidde & mid
feawum wordum him foresæde ealle þa þing, þe him towearde wæron,
& þus cwæð: manega yfel þu wyrcest, & manigu þu worhtest
geara ær.
 14.132.28. Ac læt þe gestyran fram þinum unrihtum.
 14.132.30. Þu oferfærest þone sæ & bist gangende to
Romesbyrig.
 14.132.32. Þu rixast nygon gær & on ðam teoðan þu
sweltest.
 14.133.1. Þa se cyng þas word hæfde gehered, he wæs
swiðlice abreged & gewilnode þæs halgan mannes gebedrædene, &
he him syððan onweg gewat, & syþþan of þære tide he wæs
swiðe unwælgrim.
 14.133.7. Þa æfter lytlum fæce he gesohte Romesbyrig &
ferde to Siciliam þam ealande, & þa þe teoðan gære he wæs his
rices bereafod mid þæs ælmihtigan Godes dome.
 15.133.15. & on ufon þæt eac se biscop Canusine þære
cyrican gewunode, þæt he com hwilum to þam ilcan drihtnes þeowan.
 15.133.18. Se drihtnes wer lufode hine swyðe for his lifes
geearnungum.
 15.133.20. Witodlice þa þa he hæfde spræce wiþ
Benedictum be Totillan þæs cyngces ingange & be Romeburge
forspillednesse, he cwæð be þam cyninge þus: þurh þisne cyning
Totillan þeos ceaster byþ toworpen, þæt heo ofer þæt ne byþ ma
geeardod.
 15.133.27. Þam se drihtnes wer andswarode & þus cwæð:
ne byð næfre Romeburuh toworpen fram hæþenum þeodum, ac for
hreonessum & ligetslehtum, for þodenum & eorðstyrenum heo byð
geswenced, þæt heo weornað & brosnaþ in hire sylfre.
 15.134.3. Þæs witedomes gerynu us wæron nu geo swiþe
cuþe, forþon þe we sceawiað nu, þæt in þissere byrig syndon fram
þodene þa weallas tolysede & hus toslægene & cyrcan toworpene,
& ealle þa getimbru þissere burge we geseoð mid langre ealdunge
gewacode, & swiðe forð hi wæron gehrorene gelomlice mid fyllum.
 15.134.13. Þeah þe þis Honoratus his geongra na ne sægde,
þæt he hit sylf gehyrde of Benedictes muðe, & of Honoratus spelle
hit wæs me cuð, & eac forðon he þis sæde, þæt he cyðde,
þæt hit wæs him gesæd fram þam gebroðrum, þe neah þam halgan
were wæron.
 16.134.22. Eac hit gelamp in þa tid, þæt sum preost
Aquinensis þære cyrican wæs mid deofle geswenced.
 16.134.25. Þa wæs se onsended geond manige martyra stowe fram
þam/ arwyrðan were Constantio his cyrcan biscope, to þon þæt he
mihte beon gehæled.
 16.134.29. Ac þa halgan martyras noldon him his hælo gife
syllan, to þon þæt hi cyðdon, hu mycclu gyfe wære in Benedicte
þam Godes men.
 16.134.33. Witodlice þa wæs gelæded se wodseoca man to
þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowe Benedicte.
 16.135.2. He þa hraðe onsænde his bene to urum drihtne
hælendum Criste & sona ut adraf ðone ealdan feond of þam ofsetenan
men.
 16.135.6. & þa gehældum þam preoste he bebead &
þus cwæð: ga nu & æfter þisum ne et þu næfre flæsc,
& ne geneð þu næfre, þæt þu ga to þam halgan hade, oððe
maran underfo, þonne þu nu hæfst.
 16.135.12. Soðlice on swa hwilcum dæge swa þu
geþristlæcst, þæt þu underfehst þone halgan sacerdhad, sona þu
bist eft mid deofles anwealde gehæftned.
 16.135.16. Ða gewat se preost him hal þonon, & swa swa hit
gewunelic is, þæt þæt niwe wite abregeð symble þæs mannes mod,
he heold þa bebodu þa sume hwile, þe him bebead se Godes wer Benedictus.
 16.135.23. Ac ða æfter manegum gærum hit gelamp, þæt
his yldran geforon of þysum leohte, & he geseah, þæt geongran men
sacerdhad underfengon.
 16.135.27. He þa swa swa of langre tide wæs forgytende &
him on bæc sette þa lare þæs halgan Benedictes & geeode baldlice
to þam halgan sacerdhade.
 16.135.31. Þa sona hine eft genam se deofol, þe hine ær
forlet, & se ne ablann, þæt he hine ne swencte, oþ þæt he his
feorh aþrang of þam lichaman.
 16.136.3. Petrus cwæð: me þynceð eac swylce, þæt
þes Godes wer þurheode þa deoglan þing þære godcundnysse, se þe
þurhseah swa þone preost forðon gesealdne deofle, gif he gedyrstlæhte,
þæt he underfengce ðone halgan sacerdhad.
 16.136.10. Gregorius him andswarode: se halga wer for hwan ne
cuþe he þa deogolnysse þære godcundnysse mid þy hit awriten is: se
þe fylgeð drihtene, þæt byð an gast his & drihtnes?
 16.136.17. Petrus cwæð: nu hit byð an gast mid drihtne, se
þe him folgað, hwæt is þæt þonne, þæt se æþela lareow
cwæð sanctus Paulus: hwa can drihtnes andgyt, oððe hwilc wæs his
geþeahtere?
 16.136.22. Swyþe ungerisenlic me þynceþ, þæt þæt
wære, þæt se nyste drihtnes andgyt, mid þam þe he wæs geworden
an gast.
 16.136.25. Gregorius him andswarode: þa halgan weras swa swiþe
swa hi beoð an & samod mid drihtne, hi witon drihtnes andgyt.
 16.136.29. Soðlice se ylca apostol Paulus cwæð: hwæt is
þæt þe wite, hwylc þæt mannes modgeþancas syn, buton se gast
ðæs mannes, þe on him sylfum byþ?
 16.137.3. Swa eac þa þe beoð Godes geþeahtunge, nan man hit
ne can buton se Godes gast.
 16.137.6. Eac se ylca Paulus, to þan þæt he gecyðde hine
sylfne cunnan, hwylce wæren Godes gestihtunge, he þas word geecte &
þus cwæð: ne onfengon we na þone gast þyses middaneardes, ac þone
gast, þe fram Gode is.
 16.137.12. & eft he cwæð be þan, þæt eage ne
geseah, ne eare ne gehyrde, ne in mannes heortan ne astah þa god, þe God
gegearwode þam, þe hine lufiað.
 16.137.17. Soðlice þa he onwreah us þone halgan gast.
 16.137.19. Petrus cwæð: ac la gif þam ylcan apostole Paule
þa Godes geþeahtas wæron onwrigene þurh þone Godes gast, hu
spræc he ofer þæt, þe ic bufan gemyngode, þa þa he cwæð:
eala, hu mycclu heanes is þara welena Godes snyttro & wisdomes, & hu
unymbfangenlice syndon his domas, & unaspyrgendlice syndon his wegas?
 16.137.28. Ac þa word me secgendum eft oðru socn & frignung
me is on mod becumen.
 16.137.30. Soðlice Dauid se witega spræc to drihtne &
þus cwæð: in minum welerum ic bodode ealle þa domas þines muðes.
 16.138.1. Hwæt: we witon, þæt þæt is læsse,
þæt man wite gehwæt hwylces, þonne þæt sy, þæt his man wite
& eac bodie: hwæt is þæt, þæt Paulus sæde, þæt Godes
domas wæron unbefangenlice, & Dauid se witiga cyðde nalæs þæt
an, þæt þæt he wiste þas ealle, ac eac swylce þæt he bodode hi
& mærsode on his welerum?
 16.138.11. Gregorius him andswarode: æt ægþrum þisra ic
þe andswarode ær mid hrædnysse herbufan, þa þa ic cwæð,
þæt halige weras swa swiðe swa hi an beoð mid drihtene, hi witon &
ongytað drihtnes andgyt.
 16.138.16. Soðlice ealle þa þe fylgað drihtne & him
hyrað estfullice, hi eac mid estfulnysse beoð mid drihtne, & þonne
gyt þe hi beoð ahefegode mid byrðenne þæs brosniendlican lichaman,
hi ne beoð na mid drihtne.
 16.138.23. Ac witodlice þa dyglan Godes domas swa swiðe swa hi
beoð fram him aþeodde, hi ne cunnon his domas.
 16.138.28. & for þy þe hi þonne gyt fullfremedlice ne
þurhleoriað ne ne ongytað his deogolnysse, forþon hi secgað &
cyðað, þæt his domas syn unymbfangenlice.
 16.138.32. & þonne forþon þe hi him mid heora mode
oncleofiað & onclifigende ge on þæs halgan gewrites gesprecum ge eac
on oðrum deoglum ongewrigenyssum, swa swyðe swa hi æt Gode onfoð, hi
hit ongytað, & þonne witon hi þas & bodiað.
 16.139.5. Ac þa domas, þe God heleð, hi nyton þa, &
þa þe God spreceþ, þa hi witon.
 16.139.7. Be þan Dauid se witga spræc, þa þa he cwæð:
in minum welerum ic bodode ealle þa domas, þa geecte he þær to
þæt word þines muðes, emne swa he openlice cwæde: ic mihte þa
domas witan & bodian, þa þe ic þe ongæt secgan, & þa þe
þu sylfa ne spræce, butan tweon on urum ongytenessum þu behydest þa.
 16.139.17. Her nu geþwærað, Petrus, se wlitelica & se
apostolica cwyde þus, & Godes domas wæron unymbfangenlice, &
þonne hwæþre þa þe beoð of Godes muðe forðbrohte, þa beoð
bodode mid mænniscum welerum, forþon þe hi magon beon ongytene fram
mannum, þonne hi beoð forð gelædde þurh God, & na ne magon beon
witene, þonne hi beoð þurh God bediglode.
 16.139.28. Petrus cwæð: in þære andsware minre acsunge me
wearð cuþ nu seo wise þæs rihtan gesceades.
 16.139.31. Ac ic þe bidde, gif hwylce syn nu gyt to secganne be
þam mægne þyses halgan weres Benedictes, þæt þu þa gecyðe.
 17.140.2. Gregorius him andswarode: sum æþel wer wæs, þam
wæs nama Theoprobus.
 17.140.4. Se wæs gecyrred to geleafan for þæs ylcan
fæder lare Benedictes, & se hæfde eac mid him myccle bælde
hiwcuþnesse for geearnunge his sylfes lifes.
 17.140.8. Þa sume dæge wæs þes gangende in þa cytan
þæs halgan weres Benedictes, & þa gemette he hine swiþe bitterlice
weopende.
 17.140.12. & þa gestod he well lange, oþ þæt he
geseah, þæt þa tearas ne ablunnon, & no þonne hwæþre se Godes
wer ne weop, swa swa he gewunode ær him gebiddende, ac elles gnornigende.
 17.140.18. Þa acsode hine Theoprobus, hwæt la seo wise wære
swa myccles heofes.
 17.140.20. Þam se Godes wer hraðe andswarode & þus
cwæð: eall þis mynster, þæt ic getimbrode, & ealle þa wisan,
þe ic gegearwode þysum broðrum mid þæs ælmihtigan Godes dome,
hæþenum þeodum beoþ gesealde.
 17.140.26. Uneaðe ic mihte begytan æt Gode, þæt me
wæron befæste of þære stowe & alysde þa feorh þara
gebroðra.
 17.140.30. Þæs halgan weres stefne gehyrde Theoprobus þa,
& we nu witon & geseoþ, þæt þæt mynster is toworpen fram
Langbeardna þeode.
 17.140.34. Hit gelamp niwan, þæt on niht, þa þa gebroðra
wæron on ræste, þa comon þær þa Langbearde, & hi gereafodon
& genamon ealle þa þing, þe in þam mynstre wæron, buton þæt
hi ne mihton nænigne man þær gefon.
 17.141.5. Ac ða gefylde se ælmihtiga God, þæt he ær
gehet his getreowum freonde Benedicte, þæt he geheolde þa feorh þara
broðra, þeah þe he gesealde þa æhte hæþenum mannum.
 17.141.11. In þære wisan ic geseo, þæt Benedictus
hæfde Paules gewrixle, þa þa he þæs scipes geþrowode æfwyrdlan
& lore ealra þara þinga, þe in him wæron, & he sylfa in frofre
onfeng ealra þara lif, þe him mid ferdon.
 18.141.19. Eac hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt Exilatus þes ure
gefera, se wæs nu niwan to rihtum geleafan gecyrred, he wæs fram his
hlaforde onsænded in þæt mynster to þam Godes were Benedicte, to
þon þæt he him beran sceolde twa treowene fatu fulle wines, þa syndon
on folcisc flascan gehatene.
 18.141.28. He þa soþlice oðre þara flascena þam halgan
were brohte, oðre he in þam wege farende ahydde.
 18.141.30. Þa witodlice se drihtnes wer, þone þa æfweardan
þing bediglian ne mihton, þa oþre flascan he mid dæde þancunge
onfeng, & þone eft cyrrendan cniht he manode & lærde þus
cweþende: geseoh þu, sunu, be þære flascan, þe þu in ðam wege
hyddest/.
 18.142.4. Ne drinc ðu of þære, ac hyld þu hi wærlice,
& þu þonne onfindest, hwæt heo in hire hæfð.
 18.142.7. He þa swiþe scamiende eode eft fram þam Godes men,
& cyrrende he þa wolde gyt cunnian, hwæt þæt wære, þæt he
ær gehyrde.
 18.142.11. Mid þy þe he þa flascan gehylde, þa wæs
þær hraðe sumu nædre ut gangende.
 18.142.13. Þa se forecwedena cniht Exhilaratus for þære
nædran, þe he of ðam wine gemette, aforhtode & him swiþe ondred
þæt yfel, þe he him sylf gedyde.
 19.142.19. Eac þær wæs fram þam mynstre unfeor sum tun,
in þam wæs manna mycclu mænigeo gecyrred fram deofolgylda to Godes
geleafan for lare & trymnysse þæs eadigan weres Benedictes.
 19.142.24. Þær wæron eac in þam ylcan tune sume nunnan,
& gelomlice se Godes þeowa Benedictus gewunode, þæt he ða
broðor/ þider sænde, to þon þæt hi þæt folc trymman &
læran scoldon to heora sawla þearfe.
 19.142.30. Þa sume dæge sænde se halga wer þæra muneca
sumne, swa him geþeawe wæs.
 19.142.33. & se munuc, þe þær onsænded wæs,
æfter þære gedonan lare & bodunge þæs folces þa wæs he
gebeden fram þam nunnum, þæt he sumne dæl sceattes onfengce to leane
& to mede his ganges & his lare, & he þa on his bosme behydde.
 19.143.7. & sona swa he eft cyrrende wæs, þa ongan se
Godes wer hine mid swyþlicre biternesse þreagean & þus cwæð: hu
wæs þis unriht in þinne bosm gangende?
 19.143.12. & he þa aforhtode, forþon þe he forgæt,
hwæt he dyde, & he nyste, for hwon he swa gecided wes.
 19.143.15. Þa cwæð se halga wer him to: cwyst þu, þæt
ic nære þær ondweard, þa þa þu þa sceattas for þam nunnum
onfenge & þa on þinne bosm dydest?
 19.143.20. & he þa sona se munuc feoll to þæs halgan
weres fotum & him swiðe hreow, þæt he swa dysiglice dyde, & þa
sceattas, þe he ær in his bosme ahydde, he him fram awearp.
 20.143.27. Eac hit gelamp sume dæge, þa þa se arwyrða
fæder Benedictus on æfentid onfeng his lichaman andlifne, þa wæs
þær sum munuc mid him, se wæs sumes rices mannes sunu, & se heold
candele beforan þæs halgan mannes beode.
 20.144.1. & þa þa se Godes wer ætt, se munuc þær
æt stod mid þegnunge þære candele.
 20.144.3. & þa ongan he þurh oferhigdes gast in his mode
swigende þæncan & þurh his geþoht cweþan: hwæt is þes man,
beforan þam etendum þe ic stande & candele healde & do him
þeowdom?
 20.144.9. Hwylc eom ic la, þæt ic æfre sceolde þyslicum
men þeowian?
 20.144.11. To þam se Godes wer wæs sona gecyrred &
swiðlice ongan him cidan & þus cweþan: segna þine heortan,
broðor.
 20.144.14. Hwæt is þæt þu cwyst oððe þæncest?
 20.144.15. & þa sona cigde Benedictus þa broðru him to
& heom bebead, þæt hi namon þa candele of þæs muneces handum,
& hine sylfne het gan fram þære þegnunge & het, þæt he of
þære tide him stille gesæte.
 20.144.22. He þa sona wæs geacsod fram his gebroðrum,
hwæt he unrihtes gedon hæfde oððe geþoht in his heortan.
 20.144.25. & he þa heom þæt eall þurh endebyrdnesse
asægde, hu swiðe he wæs mid oferhygdes gaste aþunden, & hwylc
word he cwæð swigende þurh his geþoht ongæn þone Godes wer.
 20.144.30. Þa swutollice wæs eallum þam broðrum cuð,
þæt þam arwurðan were Benedicte ne mihte beon nan þing bemiþenes,
in þæs earum hleoþredon eac swylce þa word þæs muneces
geþohtes.
 21.145.3. Eac hit gelamp on oðre tid in þam ylcan
Campanialande, þæt þær onsæt mycel hunger, & seo wædl
þæra andlyfna genyrwde ealle, þa þe þær on lande wæron.
 21.145.8. & eac þa in Benedictes mynster wæs hwætes
wana, & eac þa hlafas forneah wæron ealle fornumene & gebrocene,
þæt þær ne mihte beon na ma gemette þonne V þam broðrum to
nytte on þa tid heora gereordnysse.
 21.145.14. Þa se arwyrða wer Benedictus geseah, þæt þa
broðra wæron geunrotsode, he ongan heora earfoþnyssa gebetan mid
gemetfæstlicre þreaunge & eft mid his gehate hi hyrtan & þus
cwæþ: for hwan is eower mod geunrotsod for hlafes wædle?
 21.145.21. Todæg he byð eow læssa þonne eow lyste.
 21.145.23. Tomorgene ge habbað genohne.
 21.145.24. Þa þy æfterfylgendan dæge hi gemetton beforan
þæs mynstres geate in sæccum twa hund mittena melwes, þa se
ælmihtiga God þider onsænde; & nu gyt todæge is uncuð, hwa hi
þider brohte.
 21.145.29. Þa þæt þa broþru gesawon, hi geleornodon,
þæt hi sædon drihtne þancas for þære genihtsumnysse & na
ofer þæt næron ormode ne ne getweodon in þære wædle.
 21.145.34. Petrus cwæð: ac la, ic þe bidde, cwyst þu,
hwæþer hit to gelyfenne sy, þæt þysum Godes ðeowan mihte symble
æt beon se witedomes gast, hwæþer þe hwiltidum his mod gefylde
þæs witedomes gast?
 21.146.7. Gregorius him andswarode: ne inlihteð na, Petrus,
ealling se witedomes gast þa mod þara witegæna, forþon hit is swa
gecweden be ðam halgan gaste: se gast eþað þær he wile.
 21.146.12. Forþon we magon witan, þæt þonne se gast wile,
he geeðað to þæs mannes mode & hit inlihteþ þurh þa
gastlican gife.
 21.146.26. Þæt swa se ælmihtiga God geændebyrdeð of
gestihtunge his mycclan arfæstnysse, þæt hwilum he seleð halgan
witedomes gast, hwilon he eft wiðtyhð þam modum þara witegana, hwilum
he ahefð hi on heannesse, & hwilum he eft gehealdeð hi in eadmodnysse,
to þon þæt þonne hi onfoð þone gast, hi ongytan, hwæt sy be
Gode, & eft þonne hi nabbað þone witedomes gast, hi oncnawan, hwæt
sy be heom sylfum.
 21.147.3. Petrus cwæð: seo myccle rihtwisnys cleopað &
cyþeð, þæt is swa swa þu sægst.
 21.147.6. Ac ic þe bidde nu gyt, þæt þu sprece swa hwæt
swa þe on mod geurne be þam arwyrðan fæder Benedicte.
 22.147.13. Gregorius him andswarode: hit gelamp on sume tid,
þæt Benedictus wæs gebeden fram sumum getreowum were, þæt he
onsænde his þegnas to his tune, to þon þæt hi sceoldon þær an
mynster getrymman neah Terracinense þære byrig.
 22.147.20. Þa biddendum þam getreowum freonde Benedictus
þæt sona geþafode & him þæs getyþode & þa getealde þa
gebroðru to þam mynstre & heom gesette gewisne fæder & eac
geændebyrde, hwylc æfter þam beon sceolde.
 22.147.26. Þa gangendum þam broðrum þyder Benedictus heom
gehet, þæt he æfter heom cuman wolde, & heom þone dæg
genæmde þus cweþende: gað nu, & þy dæge ic cume æfter eow
& þonne tæce ic eow, hwær ge sceolon cyrican tymbrian, &
hwær/ þara broðra metern wære, & in hwylcre stowe ge sceolon
cumena hus tymbrian, & eac eall swa hwæt swa neodðearflic byþ ic eow
secge.
 22.148.4. Hi þa þa broðra onfengcon his bletsunge &
hraþe ferdon þyder & þær gegearwodon ealle þa þing, þe hi
gesawon þæt wæron neodþearflicu & lycwyrðe þam, þe mid swa
mycclum & swa arwyrðum fæder þider coman, & hi geornlice
wæron anbidiende þone gesettan & genæmdan dæg his tocymes.
 22.148.13. Þa in ðære nihte, þa se gehatena dæg
æfter lihte, þam ilcan Godes þeowe, þe he gesette þær to
fæder, & his prafuste se drihtnes wer Benedictus in swefne æowde
& heom getæhte swyðe smealice on gehwilcum stowum, hwæt hi þær
timbrian sceoldon.
 22.148.20. & þa þa hi begen fram slæpe arison, hi
sædon heom betweonum þæt heom on swefne geþuht wæs, & na swa
þeh eallunga þære gesihþe gelyfdon, ac forð abidon þone Godes wer,
swa swa he ær gehet, þæt he cuman wolde.
 22.148.27. & þa þa se Godes wer on þam gesettan dæge
& ær genamedan ne com, hi wæron eft gecyrde to Benedicte mid
gnornunge & þus cwædon: fæder, we abidon, þæt þu come, swa
swa þu us gehete, þæt þu cuman woldest, & þæt þu us þonne
getæhtest, hwær we timbrian sceoldon, & ðu þa ne come.
 22.149.3. Benedictus cwæð to þam: for hwan, broðra, for
hwan cweðað ge þas word?
 22.149.5. Ac ne com ic swa swa ic gehet?
 22.149.7. Sona se fæder & se prafost þæs mynstres him
andswarodon & cwædon: for hwanne come þu?
 22.149.9. Benedictus heom andswarode: cweþað git, þæt ic
ne ætywde inc slæpendum & tæhte synderlice gehwylce stowe?
 22.149.13. Gað nu forð & getimbriað ealle þa
eardungstowa þæs mynstres, swa swa git gehyrdon slæpende þurh
gesihðe.
 22.149.16. Sona swa hi gehyrdon þa word, hi wundrodon swiðlice
& wæron eft gecyrde to þam forecwedenan tune, & þa getrymedon
ealle þa eardungstowa ðæs mynstres, swa swa hi ær of þære
onwrigennysse on swefne geleornodon.
 22.149.23. Petrus cwæð: ic wolde, þæt me wære
gecyþed, on hwilc gerad þæt mihte beon, þæt he swa feor eode &
slæpendum þam broðrum andsware sægde, & þæt þa broðru
wel gehyrdon ongeaton þurh gesihðe on swefne.
 22.149.30. Gregorius him andswarode: hwæt is þæt, Petrus,
þæt þu swa smeagende tweost ymb þa ændebyrdnysse gedonre &
gewordenre wisan?
 22.149.34. Witudlice hit is cuþ, þæt seo gast is
styrigendlicran & ferendran gecyndes þonne se lichama.
 22.150.1. Gewislice we, þæt witon & habbaþ us to gewitan
þæt halige gewrit, þæt Abbacuc se witga wæs ahafen færinga of
Iudealande mid his underngeworce & aseted in Chaldealande, & þa
witodlice mid þy metes gereorde Danihelem þone witgan in þam leoneseaðe
gereordode, & eft semninga he com on Iudealand.
 22.150.11. Ac hwilc wundor is þæt nu, þa Abbacuc mihte on
anre breohthwile swa feorr faran & mid him beran his undernmete, hwæt
wundrige we þæs, þeh þe Benedictus se fæder begeate, þæt he
ferde þurh þone gast & þam gastum þara restendra broðra heora
nydþearfe sæde?
 22.150.19. Ac swa swa Abbacuc lichamlice ymb þæs lichaman mete
ferde, swa eac þes halga wer gastlice ferde to lare þæs gastlican
lifes.
 22.150.23. Petrus cwæð: ic andette, þæt seo hand þinre
spræce adrigde fram me þone tweon mines modes.
 22.150.26. Ac ic wolde witan, hulic þes wer wære in gemænre
spræce.
 23.150.31. Gregorius him andswarode: uneaðe, Petrus, his seo
gemæne spræc wæs æmetegod þære mycelnysse his godan
mægnes.
 23.151.2. Ac forþon þe his heorte hi selfe aheng in heanesse,
ne feollon nanra þinga þas word on idelnysse of his muðe.
 23.151.6. Ac swa hwæt swa he æfre gecwæð bodiende,
þeah þe he hit na eorneste gecwæde, swa mycele mægnu & strengðe
his word hæfde, efne swylce he þæt untweogendlice & buton yldinge
& eac eall for rihtum dome forðbrohte, þæt he þonne spræc.
 23.151.14. Soðlice naht feor fram his mynstre wæron sume twa
nunnan of æþelum cynne geborene & drohtnodon on heora agenre stowe.
 23.151.18. Þam sum æwfæst wer gegearwode þegnunge &
hyrsumnesse to bryce þæs uttran & þæs lichamlican lifes.
 23.151.21. Ac þa swa swa manigra manna þeaw is, þæt seo
æþelnes heora gebyrda gegearwað þæs modes unæþelnesse, &
þæt hi forseoð hi selfe læs on þysum middanearde þa þe
þæncað, þæt hi syn sylfe ma gode þonne oðre men: swa na þa
gyt þa forecwedenan nunnan fulfremedlice heora tungan geheoldon mid þære
steore heora hades, ac þone ylcan æwfæstan wer hi full oft gegremedon
mid unwærlicum wordum to hatheortnesse, se gegearwode heom his hyrsumlice
þegnunge to heora þam uttran nydþearfnessum.
 23.152.2. & þa þa he lange þæt aræfnode, he ferde
to þam Godes men Benedicte & him sæde, hu manigne teonan & orwyrdu
þara nunnena fracoðwyrda he geþrowode.
 23.152.7. & þa þa se Godes wer gehyrde þa word be þam
nunnum, he onbead sona to heom þus cweþende: gerihtað incre tungan,
forþon gif git hit gebetan nellað, ic amansumige inc.
 23.152.13. Witodlice þone cwyde þære amænsumunge ne
gespræc he na þy þe he hit wolde forðbryngan, ac elles beotigende.
 23.152.16. Witudlice þa nunnan nahte þy ær næron
onwænde fram heora þam ærran unþeawum.
 23.152.19. Þa binnan feawum dagum hi wurdon forðferde butu
& bebyrgde in þære cyrcan.
 23.152.21. Þa in þære ylcan cyrican wæron gelomlice
weorðode mæssena symbelnessa, & þa wæs þeaw ær þam
huslgange, þæt se diacon cleopode & þus cwæð: swa hwilc man swa
to husle ne ga, þonne buge se of þissere stowe & ga ut of þissere
cyrcan.
 23.152.27. Þa wæs þær þara nunnena fostormodur, seo
gewunode, þæt heo brohte offrunge drihtne for ða forðferendan nunnan.
 23.152.29. & seo þa geseah, þæt þa nunnan æt þam
huslgange forð eodon of heora byrgenum & eodon ut of þære cyrcan.
 23.152.31. & heo þa þæt geseah swiþe gelome, þæt
symble æt þæs clypigendan diacones stefne þa nunnan eodon ut & in
þære cyrican gewunian ne mihton.
 23.153.2. Þa gehwearf hire to gemynde, þæt se Godes wer
þam nunnum þa gyt lifigendum bebead & cwæð, þæt he hi
asceadan wolde fram þam godcundan gemanan, buton hi gerihton þa word &
þeawas.
 23.153.5. Ða þam Godes þeowe wæs þis gesægd fram
þære fostormeder mid mycclum sare & gnornunge.
 23.153.6. & he þa sona sealde mid his agenre hand ofletan
& bebead þus & cwæð: gað nu & doð, þæt þis lac sy
drihtne geoffrod for þam nunnum.
 23.153.8. Þonne ofer þæt ne beoþ hi na amansumode.
 23.153.9. & þa þa seo offrung wæs onsægd for hi
unlifigende, & hit geclypod wæs fram þam deacone æfter þam
þeawe, þæt þa þa to husle ne eodon, eodon ut of þære cyrican,
hi næron þa ofer þæt gesewene utgangende of þære cyrican.
 23.153.12. Of þære wisan untweogendlice wæs cuþ, þæt
na syþþan aweg ne gewiton þa nunnan of þære cyrican betwyh þam,
þe bescyrede wæron þæs godcundan gemanan, forþon þe hi onfengon
þone gemanan fram drihtne þurh þone drihtnes þeowan Benedictum.
 23.153.16. Petrus cwæð: swiðe wundorlic þæt is, þeah
þe he arwyrðe & se halgosta wer wære, he þonne hwæþre þa
gyt wæs lifigende on þisum brosniendlican lichaman, þæt he æfre
mihte alysan & gefreogian þa sawla, þe eallunga gesette wæron in
þam ungesewenlican Godes dome.
 23.153.20. Gregorius him andswarode: cwyst þu la, Petrus,
þæt in þisum lichaman þa gyt nære, se þe gehyrde drihten sylfne
to him cweðan, þæt wæs se apostol: swa hwæt swa þu gebindest
ofer eorþan, hit bið gebunden on heofonum, & swa hwæt swa þu
alysest ofer eorðan, hit byð alysed on heofonum?
 23.153.24. Þam gewrixle begytað nu & habbað gebundene
& eft onlysede, þa þe nymað mid geleafan & þeawum þa stowe
þæs halgan recenddomes.
 23.153.26. Ac þæt se man mage swa fela of eorðan gefremman,
þy com to eorðan of heofonum se scyppend heofonas & eorðan, &
þæt eac mage se lichama deman be þam gastlican þeawum, þæt wæs
geeadmodod, þa he þam men forgeaf, þa þa he wæs lichama geworden
fram mannum; forþon þe þanon aras ure mænnisce tyddernes ofer hi sylfe
þurh þa gastlican sceawunge, þonne eac se Godes trymnes wæs geeadmodad
under hi selfe for þam underfengce þære menniscan tydernesse.
 23.154.5. Petrus cwæð: nu sprecð geþwærlice mid þy
mægne þara wundra seo rihtwisnes þara worda.
 24.154.8. Gregorius him andswarode: eac hit gelamp sume dæge,
þa þa sum Benedictes cniht, se wæs munuc, lufode his magas ofer þæt
þe he mid rihte sceolde, & geneahhe higode & ferde to heora huse,
& þa sume dæge eode he ut of þam mynstre butan Benedictes bletsunge,
þa þy ylcan dæge, sona swa he to þam magum becom, he wæs
forðfered & eac bebyrged.
 24.154.19. Þa þam oðran dæge wæs his lichama funden ut
aworpen of þære byrgene.
 24.154.21. Þane his magas eft tolæddon, þæt hi woldon
þære byrgene hine eft befæstan.
 24.154.23. Ac on þam æfteran dæge hi gemetton hine eft ut
aworpen & unbebyrged, swa swa he ær wæs.
 24.154.26. Þa hraðe urnon hi to Benedictus fotum & hine
bædon mid mycclum wope, þæt he wære geeadmodod, þæt he his
forgifnysse sealde þam unlifigendan cnihte.
 24.155.1. Þam se Godes wer sona sealde mid agenre hand þone
gemanan ures drihtnes lichaman, þæt is þæt husl, & heom þa
þus to cwæð: gað nu & þisne drihtenlican lichaman alecgað ofer
his lichaman breoste mid mycelre arwurðnesse & hine agyfað his
byrgene.
 24.155.9. Þæt wæs þa swa geworden, þæt seo eorðe
gehæfde his þone onfangenan lichaman & na ofer þæt hire fram ne
awearp.
 24.155.13. Ongytst þu, Petrus, hwylcre geearnunge wer þes
wære mid þam hælendan Criste urum drihtne, nu þæs lichaman eac
swylce seo eorðe hire fram awearp, þe Benedictes forgyfnesse næfde?
 24.155.18. Petrus cwæð: ic hit ongyte & eac swyþlice
wundrige.
 25.155.23. Gregorius him andswarode: eac wæs Benedictes muneca
sum, se wæs unstaþelfæst on his mode & nolde gewunian on þam
mynstre.
 25.155.27. Mid þy se Godes wer hine genehhe þreade & cidde
& eac gelomlice lærde, þæt he hit gebetan sceolde, he swa þeah
nanum gemete him to þon hyran nolde, þæt he on þære gesomnunge
þurhwunian wolde, ac fylgede þam halgan were mid gemaglicum bedum, þæt
him wære alyfed ut to farenne.
 25.156.4. Þa sume dæge se ylca arwyrða fæder wæs
geswænced mid unluste his swiðlican geornnesse & þa yrre het,
þæt he onweg gewite.
 25.156.8. Sona swa he þa eode ut of þam mynstre, he gemette on
þam wege standan sumne dracan ongæn hine mid geniendum muþe.
 25.156.12. & se draca þa dyde, swylce he him forswelgan
wolde.
 25.156.13. Þa ongan se munuc forhtiende & bredetende mid
mycclum stefnum clypian & cweþan: yrnað hider.
 25.156.16. Yrnað hider.
 25.156.17. Forþon þe þes draca wile me forswelgan.
 25.156.18. Þa urnon þa gebroþru þider & nænigne
dracan þær ne gesawon, ac ðone munuc byfiende & brodettendne hi eft
gelæddon to þam mynstre.
 25.156.22. & he þa sona gehet, þæt he næfre of þam
mynstre gewitan nolde, & he þa of þære ylcan tide þurhwunode on
his gehatum.
 25.156.26. & þa swa se munuc geseah for þæs halgan weres
benum him ongæn standan þone dracan, þæt wæs deofol sylf, þam he
ær fylgde & hyrde, þeah þe he hine na ne gesawe.
 26.157.2. Eac ic wene, þæt þis ne sy to forswygienne,
þæt ic ongæt fram þam æþelan were Aptonio, he hit me sæde.
 26.157.5. Se cwæð, þæt his fæder cniht wære
geþread mid þære hreofan adle, swa þæt him eallunga þa hær
afeollon, & seo hyd asweoll, swa þæt heo ne mihte bedyglian þæt
weaxende wyrms & wiðl.
 26.157.10. Þa wæs se cniht onsænded to þam Godes were
Benedicte fram þam ylcan his fæder, & he þa sona æt þam halgan
were onfeng mid eallre hrædnesse þære ærran hæle.
 27.157.18. Ne mæg ic eac þæt swigian, þæt his geongra
me sæde, þam wæs nama Peregrinus.
 27.157.20. Se cwæð, þæt sume dæge wære mid gafoles
neode geneded sum getreowe wer & him nyste nænne ræd.
 27.157.23. Þa gelyfde he, þæt him sylfum þæt an mihte
beon læcedom, gif he ferde to þam Godes were & him sæde, hwylc neod
þæs gafoles hine þreade.
 27.157.28. Witodlice þa com se man to þam mynstre &
þær gemette þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowan & him þa sæde,
þæt he wære hefiglice geswænced fram his moniendan fore XII
scyllingum.
 27.157.33. Þam se arwyrða fæder andswarode & sæde,
þæt he nanra þinga him sylf næfde XII scillingas.
 27.158.3. Ac þonne hwæþre his wædle he mid liðre
spræce afrefrode & þus cwæð: ga nu ymb twa niht & cum eft,
forþon nu todæge me is wana, þæt ic þe syllan sceall.
 27.158.8. Soðlice in þam twam nihtum he wæs abysgod in his
gebede.
 27.158.10. Þa þe þryddan dæge com eft þider se þe
geswænced wæs mid þæs gafoles manunge.
 27.158.13. Þa semninga ofer þæs mynstres earce, seo wæs
hwætes full, wæron fundene XIII scillingas, & þa het se Godes wer
bringan þa to him & hi þa sealde þam geswæncgtum biddere &
þus cwæð, þæt he ageafe his maniendum þa XII & þone ænne
hæfde him to his agenre nytte.
 27.158.21. Ac nu ic cyrre eft to þam, þe ic ongeat in fruman
þissere bec, swa swa me sædon his forecwedenan geongran, þæt sum wer
wunne on þære hefigestan hatunge his gesacan.
 27.158.26. Þæs læþþu & feondscipe forðweox to
þon swiðe, þæt he sealde þam oðrum swa he nyste attordrincan,
& þeh þe he ne mihte his lif him on gereafian, swa þeah he awænde
eallre þære hyde hiw, swa þæt seo fagung wæs tobræded geond
eallne his lichaman, þæt he wæs geþuht swylce he hreof wære.
 27.159.3. Ac gelæded to þam Godes men Benedicte, he onfeng
hrædlice þære ærran hæle.
 27.159.5. Soðlice sona swa hine gehran se halga wer, he geflymde
ealle þa fagunge þære hyde.
 28.159.7. Eac hit gelamp on þa tid, þe seo wædl wæs
þara andleofna his agnes mynstres missenlicum þearfendum mannum, þæt
þær forneah naht to lafe ne wunode, buton hwylchugu lytel ele .
 28.159.11. Þa se drihtnes wer Benedictus geteohhode, þæt
eall þæt he hæfde on eorðan sealde & dælde, toþon þæt
him wære eft on heofonum eall gehealden.
 28.159.13. He þa forþon þæt lytle, þe þær to lafe
þæs eles wunode, het syllan þam biddendum deacone.
 28.159.15. Þa se munuc, þa þæt hordern heold, gehyrde þa
word þæs hatendan, ac hwæþre he yldode, þæt he þa hæsa
gefyllan nolde.
 28.159.17. Mid þy ymb lytel fæc Benedictus acsode, hweþer
þæt þe he het geseald wære, se munuc him andswarode, þe þæt
hordern heold, & cwæð, gif he þæt sealde, þæt þær
eallunga naht nære to lafe þam broþrum.
 28.159.20. Þa eorre bebead Benedictus oþrum munecum, þæt
hi ut awurpon þurh þæt eahþyrl þæt ilce glæsfæt, in þam
wæs gesewen sum dæl eles to lafe, forþon þe se Godes wer nolde,
þæt þær wære aht to lafe in þam mynstre, þæt ænig man
cweþan mihte, þæt hit wære þurh unhyrsumnysse asparod.
 28.159.24. Þa wæs þæt þus geworden, þæt under
þam ylcan mynstre geonode mycclu neolnes, & seo wæs eall toweaxen mid
mycelnessum þara clifstana.
 28.159.26. Þa witodlice þæt ut aworpene glæsfæt com in
þa stanas, ac swa ansund hit wunode, swylce hit ut aworpen nære, & swa
þæt hit tobrocen beon ne mihte, ne þæs eles naht ut agoten.
 28.160.2. Þa bebead se halga wer, þæt man þæt upp name
swa gesund, swa hit ær wæs, & þæt man þone ele sealde þam
biddendan diacone.
 28.160.4. & þa Benedictus gesomnode þa gebroðru &
beforan heom eallum cidde þam ungehyrsuman munuce for his ungetreownesse
& oferhigdo.
 29.160.7. Þa gefylledre þære cæste he astrehte hine
sylfne mid þam ylcan gebroðrum to his gebede.
 29.160.8. Witodlice in þære stowe, þær Benedictus hine
gebæd mid þam broðrum, wæs sum oferwrigen byden & ælces eles
æmtig.
 29.160.10. & mid þy þe se halga man þurhwunode on his
gebede, þa færinga ongan þæt wrigels þære ylcan bydene for þam
weaxendan ele beon upp ahafen, & þa onstyredum þam wrigelse & up
ahafenum se ele, þe þær weox, feoll ofer þa brerdas þære bydene
& gewætte þone flor þære stowe, þe hi onhlinedon & hi
gebædon.
 29.160.14. & þa Benedictus se Godes þeowa þæt geseah,
he gefylde sona his gebed, & þa hraþe ablan se ele, þæt he na
tofleow geond þone flor, swa he ær dyde.
 29.160.17. Þa eft Benedictus rumlicor lærde & manode
þone ortreowan & þone unhyrsuman broðor, þæt he leornode,
þæt he hæfde geleafan & eadmodnesse.
 29.160.19. Þa se ylca broðor halwendlice geþread him
gesceamode & areodode, forþon þe se arwyrða fæder þæt mægn
þæs ælmihtigan drihtnes mid wundrum gecyþde, þæt he ær mid
his manunga tæhte & sæde.
 29.160.22. Þa næs ofer þæt, þæt æfre ænig
mihte oððe dorste getweogean be his gehatum, se in anre breohthwile for
anum glæsenum fate forneah æmtigum ageaf & ageald mycele bydene
fulle.
 30.160.25. Eac hit gelamp sume dæge, þa þa Benedictus ferde
to þæs eadigan Iohannes cyrican, seo wæs geseted in þæs muntes
heanyssum, him com ongæn se ealda feond sittende on anum mule on læces
ansyne & bær horn & his blodsex.
 30.161.2. & se halga wer acsode þone feond þus cweþende:
hwider wilt þu faran?
 30.161.3. He him andswarode & cwæð: gehyr þu, þæt
ic wylle faran to þam broþrum & him syllan drenc drincan.
 30.161.5. Witoðlice þa ferde se arwyrþa wer Benedictus to his
gebede, & þa gefyldum þam gebede swiþe recene & hraðe he eft
gecyrde to þam broþrum.
 30.161.7. & se awyrgda gast gemette ænne ealdne munuc
wæter hladende.
 30.161.8. Þa geeode he sona in þæne & hine to eorðan
awearp & hine swiðlice geswæncte.
 30.161.9. & þa þa se Godes wer wæs ham gangende fram his
gebede, he geseah þone ealdan munuc swiðe unheorlice & wælgrimlice
fram deofle geswænced.
 30.161.11. Þa sloh he hine æne mid his bradre hand, & sona
he adraf þone awyrgdan feond of þam munece, swa þæt he ne dorste ofer
þæt to þam eft gecyrran.
 30.161.13. Petrus cwæð: ic wolde witan, hweþer þes halga
wer þas mycclan wundru symble begeate mid þy mægne his gebeda, hweþer
þe he hwilum eac hi gegearwode mid þære mihte anre his godan wyllan.
 30.161.16. Gregorius him andswarode: soðlice þa þe Gode
gefeolað mid estfullum mode, þonne hwylc neod beþearf, hi magon
gegearwian þa foretacnu; hwylum hi ægþer gewuniað to donne, þæt
þa wundru, þe hi wyrcað, hwilum hi þa begytað mid heora bene, hwilum
eac hi gedoð of heora mihte.
 30.161.21. Hwilc wundor is þæt?
 30.161.21. We witon, þæt Iohannes se apostol cwæð: swa
manige swa hine onfengcon, he sealde þam mihte, þæt hi wæron Godes
bearn.
 30.161.23. Forðon nu gif hi beoð Godes bearn of heora
mihte, hwilc wundor is þæt, þeah þe hi magon þa foretacenu wyrcan
eac of heora mihte?
 30.161.25. Forþon Petrus se apostol cyðde, þæt ægðrum
gemete þa rihtwisan men gegearwiað þa wundru, se awehte mid his gebedum
þæt deade wif Thabitam, & leorende Annaniam & Saffiram he sealde
& geþreade to deaðe.
 30.161.28. Nis hit na ræded, þæt he gebæde in heora
cwale , ac þæt an, þæt he þreade þa scylde, þe hi þurhtugon.
 30.162.2. Forþon is cuð, þæt hwilum þas wundru þa
halgan mæn doð of heora mihte, hwilum eac gegearwiað of heora bene.
 30.162.5. Mid þy Petrus þysum bufan cwedenum mannum
þrægende heora lif afyrde, & eac þam deadan wife mid his gebedum
hire lif ageaf.
 30.162.9. Witodlice nu ic eac unfealde & gerecce her æfter
twa dæda þæs geleaffullan Godes þeowes Benedictes, in þam openlice
