scineþ, þæt he mihte oþer þara gedon of þære onfangenan mihte,
þe he fram Gode onfeng, oþer of his agnum gebedum.
 31.162.18. Sum Gota wæs, þam wæs nama Zalla, se wæs
fylgende þa arrianiscan gedwolan treowleasnesse, se on Totillan dagum
þæs cyninges & on þæra Gotena tidum abarn & aweoll mid þy
bryne þære unmætestan wælhreownesse ongæn þa æfæstan
weras þære æallæcan cyrican, swa þæt gif hwylc preost oþþe
munuc com to him beforan his onsyne, ne eode he nanra þinga cwic fram his
handum.
 31.162.30. Þa sume dæge wæs he onbærned mid þære
hæte his gitsunge & higiende to gestrude manna æhta.
 31.163.1. Þa geswencte he sumne ceorl for his agnum æhtum mid
wælgrimmum tintregum & hine slat & wundode þurh missenlicu witu.
 31.163.5. Þa æt nehstan mid þam witum oferswiðed se ceorl
geandette, þæt he befæste his æhte Benedicte þam Godes þeowe,
& þæt dyde to þon þæt he gelyfde, þæt fram þam
tintregiendan sume þrage wolde seo wællgrimnes gebidan & geyldan,
þæt he on þære hwile eft mihte beon gehyrted.
 31.163.14. Þa sona swa se Zalla gehyrde þone Godes wer
næmnian, he ablan, þæt he na ma ne swencte þone ceorl mid þam
tintregum, ac geband his earmas mid strangum rapum & hine ongan drifan
beforan his horse & het, þæt he him cyþde, hwylc Benedictus wære,
þe his æhta underfeng.
 31.163.22. Þa eode se ceorl beforan þam mid gebundenum earmum
& hine gelædde to þæs halgan weres mynstre & þa hine ænne
gemette sittende & rædende beforan þære dura his cytan.
 31.163.27. Þa to ðam æfterfylgendan & reþgiendan ylcan
Zallan se ceorl cwæð: loca nu, þis is Benedictus se fæder, be þam
ic þe ær sæde.
 31.163.31. Þa locade se leodhata on þone halgan wer mid
weallendum geþohte & mid unwittignysse þæs þweoran modes; he
wende, þæt he mihte þa ylcan brogan him gedon, þe he ær gewunode
oðrum mannum to donne.
 31.164.1. & þa ongan he mid mycclum stefnum clypian &
cweðan oferhygdilice: aris, leofa, aris & agif þises ceorles æhta,
þe þu underfengce.
 31.164.5. To þæs stefne se drihtnes wer hraðe his eagan upp
ahof fram þære bocrædingce & locode on þone.
 31.164.8. & eac sona swa he beseah on þone ceorl, þe
þær wæs gebunden, & his eagan gebigde to þæs earmum,
wundorlicum gemete mid swa mycelre hrædnesse ongunnon þa gewriðenan
rapas of þam earmum toslupan, swa þæt nanra þinga mid ænigre
efestinge mannes hi mihton beon undon & unwriðene.
 31.164.17. & þa se ceorl, þe þyder com gebunden, ongan
semninga þær standan unlysed & unbunden.
 31.164.19. & þa se Zalla feoll to eorðan afyrhted for þam
weorce swa mycelre are & gebigde to þæs halgan mannes fotum þone
sweoran his þære strecan wælhreownesse & hine sylfne þa
befæste þam gebedum þæs arwyrþan Godes þeowes.
 31.164.22. Soðlice se halga wer Benedictus ne aras na fram his
rædingce, ac gecigde his broðra him to & bebead, þæt hi hine
sceoldon þær adune niman & to him gelædan, þæt he onfenge his
bletsunge.
 31.164.25. & þa þone Gotan to him gelædedne Benedictus
lærde & manode, þæt he scolde gestillan fram þære wedunge
& ungewittignesse swa mycelre wælhreownysse.
 31.164.27. & þa gebrocen & oferswiðed se Gota him onweg
gewat & ne dorste ofer þæt nan þing biddan æt þam ceorle,
þone þe se Godes wer na gehrinende ac onlociende ær alysde &
unband.
 31.164.30. Geseoh nu, Petrus, þæt þis is þæt ic þe
ær sæde, þæt þa þe þam ælmihtigan Gode hiwcuþlicor &
freondlicor þrowiað, hwilum eac magon wyrcan wundru of heora agenre mihte.
 31.165.2. Nu se halga wer Benedictus wæs sittende æt his
rædingce & forsette þa reðnesse þæs ondryslican Gotan.
 31.165.3. He tolysde & unband mid his eagum þa rapas &
þa cnottan þara bænda, þa getugon tosomne þa earmas þæs
unscyldigan ceorles, & he gecyþde mid þære ylcan hrædnesse his
wundres, þæt he of þære mihte, þe he æt Gode onfeng, on him
hæfde, þæt he swylc mihte wyrcan.
 31.165.7. & eac eft ic her beneoðan to geþeodde &
gecyþde, hulic wundor & hu mycel he mihte mid his gebedum begytan.
 32.165.10. Sume dæge he wæs ut farende mid þam broþrum to
þæs landes weorce.
 32.165.11. Þa bær sum ceorl in his earmum his forðferdan
suna lichaman.
 32.165.12. He wæs byrnende & hatiende for þam heafe
þære asteopnesse.
 32.165.13. & þa he com to þam mynstre & acsode
Benedictum þone fæder, & mid þy þe þam wæs gesæd, þæt
se ylca fæder wunode uppon lande mid þam broðrum, þa sona awearp he
þæs deadan sunu lichaman beforan þære duru þæs mynstres, &
mid sare gedrefed he swiþe hraðe ongan yrnan, to þon þæt he wolde
findan þone arwyrðan fæder Benedictum.
 32.165.18. Soþlice on þa ylcan tid se Godes wer ham cyrde mid
þam broðrum fram þam weorce þæs landes.
 32.165.19. Sona se astypta ceorl locode on þone, he ongan clypian
& cweþan: agif me minne sunu, fæder.
 32.165.21. Agif me minne sunu.
 32.165.21. Þa sona se Godes wer Benedictus for þissere stefne
gestod & þus cwæð: cwyst þu, þæt ic þe þinne sunu on
gename?
 32.165.23. He him andswarode & cwæð: he is dead; ac cum
& hine eft awece.
 32.165.24. Sona swa se Godes wer þæt gehyrde, he wæs
swiðe geunrotsod þus cweþende: gewitaþ fram me, broðru, gewitaþ.
 32.165.25. Næron þis na ure weorc, ac hit wæron þara
haligra apostola.
 32.165.26. To hwan wyllað we on us alecgan & gefætan þa
byrþene, þe we aræfnan ne magon?
 32.166.1. & he swa þeah se ceorl þurhwunode in his bene,
þane genydde swyþlic sar, to þon þæt he þa swor, þæt he nolde
þanon gewitan, buton he him his sunu of deaþe awehte.
 32.166.3. Sona se Godes wer acsode hine, hwær he wære.
 32.166.4. He him andswarode & cwæð: loca nu, his lichama
ligeð æt þæs mynstres duru.
 32.166.5. Þa com se Godes wer þyder mid þam broðrum &
þær his cneowu gebigde & gehleonode ofer þæs cildes lichaman,
& eft arisende he aþenede his folmas upp to heofonum þus cweþende:
drihten, ne loca þu na to minum synnum, ac sceawa þone geleafan þisses
mannes, þe biddeþ, þæt his sunu sy aweht of deaþe, & agif þa
sawle in þysne lichaman, þe þu him on gename.
 32.166.11. Uneaþe Benedictus in his gebede þa word gefylde,
ær þon þe eft cumendre þære sawle eall se lichama þæs cnihtes
acwacode, swa þæt wæs æteowed þam eagum eallra þara manna, þe
þær æt wæron, þæt he brodette byfiende mid wundorlicre
styrunge.
 32.166.14. Sona þæs hand genam Benedictus & hine sealde
his fæder swa lifigendne & swa gesundne, swa he ær wæs.
 32.166.16. Cuð þæt is, Petrus, þæt þes halga man
næfde þis wundor in his agnum anwealde, ac he forþ astreht abæd æt
Gode, þæt he hit mihte gedon & gegearwian.
 32.166.18. Petrus cwæð: openlice hit is cuþ, þæt hit is
eall swa swa þu hit segst, forþon þa word, þe þu ær beforan
sædest, þu nu mid þam wise gecyþest.
 32.166.20. Ac ic þe bidde, þæt þu me sægce, hweþer
þa halgan weras magen abiddan eall swa hwæt swa heo biddað & begytan
eall þæt hi gewilniað.
 33.166.23. Gregorius him andswarode: hwylc man la, Petrus, byþ
æfre on þysum life betera & healicra þonne Paulus se apostol, se for
his lichaman stihtunga þriwa bæd drihten & þehhwæþre ne mihte
begytan þæt he wolde?
 33.166.26. & of þære wisan eac is nydþearf, þæt ic
þe secge be ðam arwyrðan were Benedicte, þæt sumu wise wæs, þe
he wolde gefyllan, ac he ne mihte.
 33.167.2. Soðlice his swuster, þære nama wæs Scolastica,
seo wæs gehalgod þam ælmihtigan drihtne of þære tide hire
cildhades, & heo gewunode, þæt heo ælce geare æne com to þam
breðer Benedicte, & þa to ðære se Godes wer ferde naht feorr butan
þam gæte þæs mynstres.
 33.167.6. Þa sume dæge ferde hire se arwyrða broðor mid
his geongrum & com hire to, swa swa his þeaw wæs.
 33.167.8. & hi eallne þone dæg gelæddon in Godes
herenesse in þam gespræce þære halignysse.
 33.167.9. & þa þa eallunga þære nihte þeostru heom
onsæton & feollon, samod to mete.
 33.167.11. & þa gyt þa hi sæton æt þære mysan
& betwyh heom þa halgan gespræcu spræcon, seo lætere & seo
ufore tid þa gyt forþ teah, þa seo ylce nunne seo Godes fæmne
Benedictes swuster bæd hine & þus cwæð: broðor, ic þe bidde,
þæt þu me þissere nihte ne forlæte, ac þæt wit sprecan unc
oþ morgen hwæthugu be þam gefean þæs heofonlican lifes.
 33.167.16. Benedictus hire andswarode & cwæð: hwæt is
þæt, swuster, þæt þu spycst?
 33.167.17. Ne mæg ic ne nylle nanra þinga þas niht wunian
butan mynstre.
 33.167.18. Soðlice in þa tid swa mycclu smyltnes wæs
þæs heofones, þæt in þære lyfte næs nan genip ne wolcen
æteowed.
 33.167.19. Þa seo halige nunne sona swa heo gehyrde þa word
þæs wyrnendan broðor, heo alegde hire handa & sette þa fingras
tosomne ofer þa mysan & ge bigde hire heafod in þa handa &
geornlice wæs biddende þone ælmihtigan drihten.
 33.167.23. Mid þy swa heo ahof þæt heafod upp of þære
mysan, swa mycel mægn ligetslehta & þunurrade & swa mycel
yðgiung & regnes gyte þær forþ com, þæt hi ne mihton þone
fot onstyrian ne Benedictus se arwyrþa wer ne eac þa broðra, þe mid him
wæron, ofer þa þyrxwolde þære stowe, þe hi on sæton.
 33.167.27. Witodlice seo halige nunne gebigde þæt heafod in
þa handa & ageat on þa mysan þone flod hire teara.
 33.168.1. Þurh þa tearas heo geteah to regne þa smyltnesse
þære lyfte, & naht late þæs seo yþgung þæs regnes wæs
cumen æfter hire gebede.
 33.168.3. Ac swa mycclu wæs seo geþwærnes hire gebedes
& þæs regnes, þæt eallunga heo ahof þæt heafod of ðære
mysan samod mid þære þunorade.
 33.168.5. Þæt we magon swutollice ongytan, þæt þæt
wæs an brehtmhwil, þa heo þæt heafod upp ahof, & se regn ofdune
feoll.
 33.168.7. Þa se Godes wer Benedictus geseah betwyh þam
ligetslehtum & þunorradum & yðgiunge þæs unmætan regnes,
þæt he ne mihte ham faran to mynstre.
 33.168.9. Þa ongan he seofian & geunrotsod cweþan: arie
þe, min swuster, se ælmihtiga God.
 33.168.10. Hwæt is þis, þæt þu dydest?
 33.168.10. Heo him andswarode: gehyr nu, ic bæd þe, & þu
noldest me gehyran.
 33.168.11. Þa bæd ic minne drihten, & he me gehyrde.
 33.168.12. Ga nu forþon ut, gif þu mage, & gewit þe to
mynstre fram me forlætenre.
 33.168.13. Soþlice he ne mihte na gan ut of þam huse for þam
ungewydere, ac þa gewunode genyded in þære stowe, se þe his sylfes
wyllan þær ær wunian nolde.
 33.168.15. & swa hit wæs geworden, þæt hi þa tugon
& læddon ealle niht þurh wæccende & gereordon hi sylfe mid
neahfealdlicre gesægne þurh þa halgan spræcu þæs gastlican
lifes.
 33.168.18. For þære wisan ic sæde ær, þæt he wolde
hwæthugu þæs gedon, þæs þe he gedon ne mihte.
 33.168.19. Forþon gif we sceawiað þæt mod þæs
arwyrðan weres Benedictes, þonne ne byþ us nænig tweo, þæt he
wolde, þæt seo ylce smyltnes þæs wederes þurhwunode, in þære
þe he ongan ærest feran.
 33.168.22. Ac þa wið þon þe he wolde he gemette þæt
wundor of þæs wifes breoste in þæs ælmihtigan Godes mægne.
 33.168.24. Nis hit nænig wundor, þæt in þa tid þæt
wif gestrangode ma þonne he, seo þe lange ær gewilnode to Gode, þæt
heo hire broður gesawe.
 33.168.26. Forþon æfter Iohannes stefne God is seo soðe
lufu, þy for his þam swiþe rihtwisan dome heo mihte ma begytan &
abiddan, forþon heo ma hine lufode.
 33.168.28. Petrus cwæð: ic þe andette, þæt me licað
swyþe wel þæt þu sægst.
 34.169.1. Gregorius him andswarode: mid þy hit gelamp oþre
dæge, þæt seo arwyrðe fæmne gewat hire to hire mynstres cytan,
& se Godes wer him eft gecyrde to his mynstre.
 34.169.3. Þa gelamp hit ymb þreo niht þæs, þæt
Benedictus stod in cytan, & upp ahafenum his eagum in þa lyft he geseah
þære ylcan his swuster sawle utgangende of hire lichaman in culfran
ansyne, & þæt heo gesohte heofones deogolnesse.
 34.169.10. & he þa wæs efengefeande hire mycclan wundres
& dyde þancas þæs ælmihtigan Gode on ymnum & lofsangum, &
he sæde þam broðrum & bodode hire forðfore.
 34.169.15. Eac he sænde sona þa, to þon þæt hi brohton
hire lichaman to þam mynstre & hine alegden in þa byrgene, þe he him
sylfum ær geteohhode & geworhte.
 34.169.19. Þa gedonum hit gelamp, þæt þara mod, þe
symble wæron in Godes lufan, eac swylce heora lichaman næron todælde
in byrgenne.
 35.169.26. Eac hit gelamp in sume tide, þæt Seruandus se
diacon & abbud þæs mynstres, þæt wæs getimbred iu fram Liberio
þam ealdormen in þam dælum Suþlangbeardena, se deacon hæfde him to
þeawe, þæt he com geneahhe mid geneosunge gife to þam halgan were
Benedicte.
 35.170.3. & he geneahhe geneosode his mynstres, to þon
þæt hi sænden heom betweoh þa wynsuman word þæs ecan lifes &
þone swetan mete þæs heofonlican eþles.
 35.170.8. Þeah þe hi þa gyt þone fulfremedlice geseonde ne
mihton þicgan, hi hine huru sworettende & geomriende hwæthugu
onbyrgdon, forþon þe se ylca wer fleow & wæs gefylled mid lare
þære heofonlican gife.
 35.170.14. Mid þy þa wæs seo tid heora ræste &
stilness beddes, Benedictus se arwyrða wer gestaþolode hine sylfne in þam
uferan dælum þæs torres, & Seruandus se diacon gestaþelode hine
in þam neoðeran dælum þæs ylcan torres.
 35.170.21. Witodlice in þære stowe fram þam nyþeran
dæle in to þam uferan wæs samodgang þurh gewisne upstige.
 35.170.24. Soðlice beforan þam ylcan torre wæs swiþe rum
hus, in þam hyra ægþres þenas hi gereston.
 35.170.27. Mid þy se drihtnes wer Benedictus fore com &
behogode þa tide þæs nihtlican gebedes, he gefealh his wæcce, &
þa oðre broðra hi reston.
 35.170.31. He wæs standende æt þam ehþyrle &
gebiddende him to þam ælmihtigan drihtne, & þa semninga on þa tid
þære stillan nihte he wæs forð lociende & geseah ufan onsended
leoht & aflyman ealle þa þeostru þære nihte & swa mycelre
beorhtnesse scinan, þæt þæt leoht wæs beorhtre þonne dæges
leoht, þæt þær lymde betwyh þam þeostrum.
 35.171.7. Eala þæt swiðe wundorlicu wise in þissere
sceawunge wæs æfterfylgende, forþon, swa swa he sylfa æfter þam
sæde, þæt eac eall þes middaneard swa swa under anum leoman þære
sunnan wære gegaderod & gelæded beforan his eagum.
 35.171.14. & se arwyrða fæder Benedictus, þa þa he
gefæstnode þa geornfullan gesihþe his eagena in þam leoman þæs
scinendan & þæs wlitegan leohtes, þa geseah he Germanes sawle
þæs biscopes Capuane þære cæstre in fyrenum clywene fram ænglum
beon berende in þone heofon.
 35.171.22. Þa wolde he begytan him sylfum sumne gewitan swa
myccles wundres.
 35.171.25. He cigde Seruandum þone deacon tuwa & þriwa mid
genemdum naman & mid mycelnysse his cleopunge swa myccles & swa
arwyrþes weres.
 35.171.31. Þa stah he upp & forþ locode, & þa geseah
he mycelne dæl þæs leohtes.
 35.171.34. Þam deacone wafiendum for þus mycclum wundre se
Godes wer Benedictus him sæde æfter endebyrdnysse ealle þa wisan, þe
þær gedone wæron.
 35.172.4. & þa sona in Cassinum þære stowe he onbead
þam æwfæstan were Theoprobo þæt, þæt he onsænde þære
ylcan niht man to Capuanan þære byrig, & þæt he sylf ongeate
& eft þider gebude, hwæt geworden wære be Germane þam biscope.
 35.172.11. Þa wæs þæt swa gedon, þæt þone
arwyrþestan wer Germanum þone biscop se ærendraca, þe þider
onsænded wæs, gemette þa forðferedne.
 35.172.15. & he þa acsiende smeaðancollice ongeat, þæt
on ða ylcan tid wæs þæs biscopes forðfore, þe se drihtnes wer
oncneow his upstige to heofonum.
 35.172.20. Petrus cwæð: swiðe wundorlic wise þæt is
& eac swiþe to wafienne þis, þæt her gecweden is, þæt beforan
his eagum swa swa under anum leoman eall middaneard wære gegaderod & to
him gelæded, swa swa ic næfre ær næs ongytende.
 35.172.27. Ne furþon gyt ic andswarian ne can, swylcre
ændebyrdnesse & on hwylc gerad þæt beon mæg, þæt eall
middaneard sy gesewen fram anum mæn.
 35.172.32. Gregorius him andswarode: nim þe nu fæste, Petrus,
þæt ic sprece; forþon þære sawle, þe gesyhð hire scyppend,
þynceð swiþe nearu ælc gesceaft.
 35.173.3. Þeah þe heo lytles hwæt geseo of þam leohte
þæs scyppendes, hire þynceð sceort eall þæt þær gesceapen
byþ, forþon þe in þam leohte þære incundan gesihþe þæs
modes sceat byð toleoðod & swa swiðe byð tobræded & aþened
in Gode sylfum, þæt hit byþ ufor eallum middanearde, & seo sawl sylf
þæs geseondan byð eac ofer hi selfe.
 35.173.13. & þonne heo byþ genumen in þæt Godes leoht
ofer hi sylfe, heo byþ gebræded in ðam inran dælum, & þonne heo
besyhð under hi sylfe, heo ongyteð hi upp ahafene, & hu lytel &
sceort wæs, þæt þe heo ne mihte ymbfon & oncnawan, hulic þæt
wæs, þa þa heo on lichaman wæs gehæfd & gehyned.
 35.173.23. Soðlice se halga wer Benedictus locode on þæt
fyren clywen, & swylce he geseah ænglas to heofonum hweorfende, buton
tweon ne mihte he þas geseon & sceawian buton in Godes leohte.
 35.173.28. Hwylc wundor is þæt forþon, þeah þe he gesawe
þisne middaneard beforan him sylfum gegaderodne, se þe wæs upp ahafen
ofer þisne middangeard in þam leohte his modes?
 35.173.34. Soðlice þæt þær gecweden wæs, þæt
eall þes middangeard wære gegaderod beforan his eagum, nis hit na þy
gecweden, þæt heofon & eorðe wære tosomne getogen, ac þæs
geseondan mod wæs tobræded.
 35.174.6. Þa þa þæt mod wæs to Gode genumen &
gegripen, buton earfoðnyssum him mihte gesewen & gesceawod beon eall
þæt þe beneoþan Gode wæs.
 35.174.10. Forþon in þære sceawunge, seo acsung þæs
utran, wæs þæt inre leoht in þæs halgan weres modese; þæt
leoht þæs geseondan mod Benedictes genam to þære uferan wisan
þære gastlican sceawunge & him gecyþde, hu nearwe & hu ænge
wæron ealle þa neoþeran gesceafta.
 35.174.18. Petrus cwæð: me sylfum þynceð, þæt ic na
ne ongyte fornytlice & nydþearflice þa word, þe þu sædest, þa
þe þin gerecenes & gesægn weox swa swiðe forð fram minre
lætnysse & dysegan swongernesse.
 35.174.24. Ac forþon þe þu þas sweotollice minum andgytum
ingute, ic þe bidde nu gyt, þæt þu eft gehweorfe to ændebyrdnesse
þissere gesægne.
 36.174.27. Gregorius him andsworode: me lysteþ, Petrus, þæt
ic nu gyt sæcge fela be þam arwyrðan fæder Benedicte, ac sume his
wisan fyrwetgeornlice ic forgange & forlæte, for ic þæncende efste
to þam dædum & wundrum oþra æþelra wera.
 36.174.30. & swa þeah ic nelle, þæt þe þis bedeoglie
& sy bemiðen, þæt se Godes wer Benedictus betwyh swa manegum
wundrum, for þam he wæs mære in þysum middanearde, eac swylce he scan
ungneþelice mid þy wordum þære halgan lare.
 36.175.2. Soðlice he awrat þara muneca regol mid healicum
gewrite & mid torhtum & swutolum wordum.
 36.175.4. Swa hwylc swa wile smeaþanclice þæs þeawas &
his lif ongytan, he mæg in þære ylcan gesetnesse & lare his regoles
findan & ongytan his lareowdomes dæde, forþon þe se halga wer nanum
gemete ne mihte ne nolde on oðre wisan læran on oðre he sylf lifde.
 37.175.8. Soþlice þy ylcan geare, þe he leorende wæs of
þisum life, he cyþde & sæde þone dæg his þære halgostan
forðfore sumum þam gingrum, þe mid him lifdon & drohtodon, &
sumum þam, þe feorr wunedon on oðrum stowum.
 37.175.11. He sæde þam andweardum, þæt hi mid swigunge
sceoldon helan þæt þe hi gehyrdon, & he sæde þam æfweardum,
hwæt þam to cyþnesse wære & hulic tacen, þonne his sawl of
þam lichaman ferde.
 37.175.14. Soðlice ær þam syxtan dæge his ændes he
het, þæt him wære his byrgen untyned, & he þa sona wæs
geþread mid fefre & ongan mid grimre hetan beon geswenced.
 37.175.16. Þa ælce dæge weox se ece, & seo adl
hefegode, & þa on þam syxtan dæge he het his gingran hine beran to
his gebedhuse, & þær he cyðde his ænde & getrymede mid
þære onfangennesse þæs drihtenlican lichaman & blodes.
 37.175.20. & he þa wreþiende þa tydran limu betwyh his
gingrena handum upp aræhtum his agnum handum in þone heofon gestah &
alet þone ytemestan gast & ferde betwyh þam wordum his gebedes.
 37.175.22. Witodlice on þam dæge wæs æteowed anre &
naht ungelicre gesyhðe onwrigennes twam broðrum be þam halgan were
oðrum wuniendum in þam ylcan mynstre & oðrum feor wuniendum on oþre
stowe.
 37.175.25. Hi gesawon begen, þæt an scinende weg & lyxende
wæs astreht mid godwebbenum pællum & unarimdum leohtfatum ymbseted
& mid rihtre stige eastweardes wæs aþæned to heofonum fram
Benedictes cytan.
 37.176.3. & ofer þam wege wæs standende swiðe beorht wer
mid arwyrðlicum gegyrelyn, se acsode þa broðra, hwæs weg þæt
wære, þe hi sceawedon.
 37.176.5. Hi andetten, þæt hi nyston.
 37.176.6. Se beorhta wer cwæð to þam: þis is se weg, on
þam drihtnes deorling Benedictus gestah to heofonum.
 37.176.7. Þa witodlice, swa swa þas forecwedenan þegnas
gesawon þæs halgan weres forðfore, swa eac þa æfweardan hi
ongæton of þam tacne, þe heom wæs ær foresæd.
 37.176.10. Soðlice Benedictus wæs bebyrged in ðære cyrcan
þæs eadigan fulluhteres Iohannes, þa he sylf getimbrode, þær he
towearp Apollones wigbed þæs hæþenan godes.
 37.176.12. Se eac nu gyt todæg scineþ mid wundrum in þam
ylcan scræfe, þe he ær bliþe eardode alæded fram oþrum mannum,
gif þæt findeþ æt him & abædeþ se geleafa þara, þe hine
biddað.
 38.176.16. Witodlice niwan wæs geworden seo wise, þe ic nu
secgan wille, þæt sum wif wæs afangen of hire mode, þæt heo
eallunga forleas hire gewit & andgyt, & þa weallode wide dæges
& nihtes geond þa muntas & þa dena, geond þa wudas & þa
feldas, & þæt an, þæt heo þær gereste, þær hi seo
werignes genydde, þæt heo restan sceolde.
 38.176.21. Þa sume dæge, þa þa heo swa widgal swiðe
dwolode, heo becom unmyndlinga to þam scræfe þæs eadigan weres &
þæs arwyrðan fæder Benedictus.
 38.176.23. & heo þa þær wunode ingangende, swa swa heo
nyste.
 38.176.24. Þa wæs þæt þus geworden, þæt on morgene
heo uteode mid swa halum & gesundum andgyte, swylce heo næfre ænig
ungewit oððe unhæle hire heafodes næfde.
 38.176.26. & heo þa þurhwunode on ealle tid in þære
ylcan hæle, þe heo þær onfeng.
 38.176.27. Petrus cwæð: hwæt cweþað we la, hwæt
þæt sy, þæt we full oft ongytaþ, þæt hit þus byð eac in
ðam mundbyrdum haligra martyra, þæt hi na ne cyðað swa manige
fremsumnesse þurh heora lichaman, swa hi ful oft god eowiað þurh heora
reliquias, & þær hi wyrcað full oft maran wundru, þær hi na ne
licgaþ ne ne restað þurh hi sylfe?
 38.177.4. Gregorius him andswarode: þær þa halgan martyras
licgað in heora lichaman, nis nænig tweo, þæt hi magon manige
foretacnu æteowian, & hi eac swa doð, & hi cyðað unarimedlice
wundru þam, þe hi secað mid clænum mode.
 38.177.8. Ac forþon hit mæg beon tweod fram tyddrum &
unstrangum modum, hwæþer hi syn þe ne syn þær andwearde, us is to
gehyrenne þær hit cuþ is, þæt hi ne beoð ne selfe on heora
lichaman.
 38.177.10. Ac þær is nydþearf, þæt hi æteowian maran
wundru, þær þæt tydre mod tweoð be heora andweardnysse; ac þara
manna mod, þe in Gode fæst byð, swa myccle ma hit hæfð þæs
geleafan geearnunge, swa myccle hit ma wat, þæt þa martyras þær in
heora lichaman ne licgaþ & þonne hwæþre næron wana fram
þære gehyrnesse, þæt hi ne gehyran þa, þe hi biddað æt þam
lichaman mid clænum geþohte.
 38.177.16. Be þon eac seo soðfæstnes sylf cwæð,
þæt is Crist, to þon þæt he geecte þone geleafan his gingrum: gif
ic onweg ne gewite, þonne ne cymð na to eow se frofergast.
 38.177.19. Soþlice we witon, þæt us is cuð, þæt se
frofergast symble forð gæþ of þam fæder & þam suna; for hwon
cwæð se sunu, þæt he wolde onweg gewitan, to þon þæt se halga
gast come, se næfre ne gewat fram þam suna? ac forþon þe þa gingran
sceawiende drihten in lichaman heom symble lysteþ þisne geseon mid heora
lichamlicum eagum, forþon to þam wæs rihtlice gecweden: nymþe ic
heonan gange, se frofergast ne cymþ to eow.
 38.177.25. Emne swylce hit openlice gecweden wære: gif ic ne
ateo fram eow þone lichaman, þonne ne gecyþe ic na, hwylc seo lufu is
þæs halgan gastes, & gif ge ne forlætaþ, þæt ge me
lichamlice sceawian, ne geleorniað ge næfre, þæt ge me gastlice
lufian.
 38.177.29. Petrus cwæð: me licað wel þæt þu
sægest.
 38.178.1. Gregorius him andswarode: us is nu hwæthugu to
blinnenne & to gerestenne fram þissere spræce, to þon gif we
higiað to oþra æþelra wera wundrum þa to gereccanne & to
asecganne, we þonne nu sume hwile þurh swigunge geedniwian ure mægn eft
to sprecanne.
 38.178.5. & æfter þissere onginneþ seo þridde, seo is
eac mid haligra wera wundrum geglængced & getrymed mid heora twegra
gespræce.

GDPref and 3 (C)
B9.5.5.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Preface and Book 3: Hecht 1900-7, 179-259.



 0.179.1. Her onginneð se þridda flod of ðam neorxnawanglican
wylle, þe þurh þone gyldenan muþ forð aarn þæs halgan papan
& biscopes sancte Gregories, þone Romane for þæra fægran worda
gyfe Os Avrevm nemniað.
 0.179.4. On þam flode he wæs sprecende be haligra manna
wundrum & þeawum, swa he ær dyde on þam ærrum bocum, & þus
wæs cweþende: Nu ic þus swiðe behealde þa neahfædras, þe mid us
wæron, maran & geþungenran manna dæda ic forlet, swa þæt me
þynceþ of gemynde beon Paulines wundor Nolane burge biscopes, se manige
mæn þara, þe ic gemunde, ægþer ge on tida gegange ge eac on wundrum
oferþeah.
 1.179.11. Þurh witena sægena us gecyðde se mæra nama
& þa wundorlican weorc þæs arwyrðan weres Paulines, þara witena
gesægene, þe be him sægdon, ic mæg gelyfan, efne swa ic hit mid
minum eagum gesawe.
 1.179.14. Hit gelamp in þam dagum, þa þa Wandale swiþost
ricsodon, þæt forhergod wæs Langbeardna rice, & manige men wæron
alædde of þam lande in Affricaland, se drihtnes wer Paulinus gesealde
wædligendum mannum eall, þæt ðe to his biscoprices bryce belamp.
 1.179.18. & þa he nawiht næfde, þe he mihte biddendum
sellan, þa sume dæge com to him an wydewe, seo sæde him, þæt hire
sunu wære gelæded in hæftnyde fram Wænla cyngces aðume, &
bæd þone Godes wer, þæt he hire his wliteweorþ gesealde, þæt
heo mihte hire sunu mid alysan, gif þæt his hlaford onfon wolde & hire
geunnan, þæt he eft mid hire ham gecyrde.
 1.180.2. Ac se Godes wer georne sohte, hwæt he mihte syllan
þam biddendum wife & nawiht ne funde mid him buton hine sylfne.
 1.180.4. Þa andswarode he þam biddendum wife & cwæð:
nat ic hwæt ic þe sylle elles buton me sylfne.
 1.180.5. Nim me & sæge, þæt ic þin rihtþeowa sy,
& syle me on þeowdome for hine, þæt þu þinne sunu eft onfo.
 1.180.7. Þa heo þis gehyrde of þam muþe swa myccles weres,
heo wende, þæt hit ma wære bysmrung þonne efensargung.
 1.180.9. & he þa, swa swa he wæs se getingesta wer &
mid utancumenum brocum oft gelæred, þæt tweogende wif hraðe oncneow,
þæt heo him ne gelyfde, & he þa cwæð: ne tweo þu na, þæt
þu sylle þisne biscop on þeowdome, to þon þæt þu þinne sunu
eft onfo.
 1.180.12. Hi þa ferdon butu ætsomne to Affricalande, &
þa forð gangendum þæs cyninges aðume, þe hire sunu hæfde, him
ongæn gearn seo wydewe & hine ærest bæd, þæt he hire sunu
alyfde.
 1.180.15. Þæt þa se ælþeodiga wer, se þe wæs
aþunden mid oferhigde & onblawen mid þy gefean þissere gewitendan
gesælignysse, nalæs þæt an, þæt he forseah to donne, þæt
heo hine bæd, ac eac forhogode hit gehyran.
 1.180.18. Heo þa þæt wif hraðe cwæð æfter þan to
him: geseoh, þæt ic þe sylle þysne man to gehwearfe for hine.
 1.180.20. Gedo me þæt an to are, agif me minne agene sunu.
 1.180.21. & þa þa he geseah þone biscop fægerne on
ansyne, þa acsode man hine, hwylcne cræft he cuðe.
 1.180.22. Him þa se drihtnes wer Paulinus andswarode &
cwæð: ne can ic nænigne oþerne cræft buton þone, þæt ic
mæg wyrta wel begangan.
 1.180.24. Þæt þa se hæþena wer swiþe lustlice onfeng,
þa þa he gehyrde, þæt he gelæred wæs wyrta to begangenne, &
onfeng hine him to þeowan & agæf þære wydewan hire sunu, &
sona swa heo hine hæfde, heo hire ham gewat fram Affricalande, &
Paulinus onfeng þa nytte þæs wyrtgeardes.
 1.180.28. & þa þa se ylca cyningces aðum gelomlice eode
in þone wyrtgeard & sumra wyrta acsode þone his wyrtweard, þa gecneow
he, þæt he wæs swiþe wis man.
 1.181.1. & þa ongan he his freond & his geferan bebugan
& gelomlice sprecan wiþ þone his wyrtweard & hine ongan wel his
wyrta lystan.
 1.181.3. Þam gewunode Paulinus dæghwamlice bringan to beode
grene wyrta wel stincende & onfangenum hlafe eft hweorfan to þære
gymingce his wyrtgeardes.
 1.181.5. & þa þa he þis wel lange gedyde, þa sume
dæge he spræc to his hlaforde & þus cwæð on dygolnysse: geseoh
hwæt þu do & fela sceawa hu sceole geseted beon Wændlarice,
forþon þe þes cyning under eallre hrædnesse swyltað.
 1.181.8. Þa he þis gehyrde, he hit þam cyningce ne forhæl,
forþon þe he synderlice wæs gelufod fram him, ac he him sæde, hwæt
he gehyrde æt his þam wisan wyrtwearde.
 1.181.11. Þa þa se cyning þis gehyrde, he sona cwæð: ic
wolde geseon þisne man, þe þu me big sægst.
 1.181.12. Him þa his aðum & Paulinus hwilena hlaford
andswarode & cwæð: grene wyrta he is gewunod me to bringanne; þonne
gedo ic, þæt he þa to ure mysan bringeð, þæt þu oncnawest,
hwylc he is, se þe me þis sæde.
 1.181.15. Þa wæs geworden, þæt se cyning sæt æt his
mete.
 1.181.16. Þyder com Paulinus & brohte of his weorce gehwylce
grene & wel stincende wyrta.
 1.181.17. Þa se cyning him færinga on beseah, eall he acwacode
& cwæð to his hlaforde, þe him wæs þurh his dohtor on
mægrædenne: soþ þæt is, þæt þu æt þysum men gehyrdest;
& ic þe nu secge deogollice, þæt ic þe ær ne gesæde .
 1.181.21. Witodlice nu toniht on swefne ic geseah rice deman on
heahsetle sittan ongæn me, betwyh þam ic geseah þisne ylcan sittan,
& þæt anweald mines rices, þe ic gefyrn onfeng, þurh heora dom hit
me is of genumen.
 1.181.24. Ac acsa þu, hwæt he sy; witodlice ne wene ic ne
þysne wer swa mycelre geearnunge swa swiþe beon þissere worulde man, swa
swa we wenað.
 1.181.26. He þa þæs cyngces aþum cigde Paulinum on sundor
& acsode, hwæt he wære.
 1.181.27. Him þa se drihtnes wer andswarode & cwæð: ic
eom þin þeowa, þone þu to gehwearfe name for þære wydewan sunu.
 1.181.29. & þa hine georne bæd, þæt he sæde,
hwæt he on his cyðþe wære, nalæs hwæt he þær wære,
& þis he sohte æt him mid gelomlicre acsunge & halsunge.
 1.181.31. He þa se Godes wer genyded mid mycclum halsungum ne
mihte læng wiþsacan, hwæt he wæs, ac sæde him & cwæð: ic
eom biscop.
 1.182.2. Þa þa his hlaford þæt gehyrde, he him swiðe
ondred & him eadmodlice bead & cwæð: bide swa hwæt swa þu
wille, þæt þu mage to þinum lande mid mycelre gife eft hweorfan fram
me.
 1.182.5. Þa cwæð se drihtnes wer to him: an lufu is, þe
þu miht me gegearwian: þæt þu forlæte to me ealle þa mæn, þe
on minum biscoprice gehergode wæron.
 1.182.7. & hi þa sona ealle wæron geacsode in
Affricanalande & wæron gelætene for þære eadmodnysse þæs
arwyrðan weres Paulines in his anweald.
 1.182.9. & he þa het ealla heora scipu, þe hi on sceoldon
feran, mid hwæte gehlæstan.
 1.182.10. & þa æfter feawum dagum Wændla cyning
forðferde, swa him se Godes þeowa Paulinus ær beforan sæde.
 1.182.12. & þa wæs þæt swa geworden, þæt se
Godes wer, þe hine ænne in Cristes bysene to sumre hwile in þeowdom
sealde, þæt æfter fæce mid manigum gefreod eft ham gehwyrfde.
 1.182.15. Petrus him andswarode: nu me gelamp, þæt ic þæt
gehyrde, þæt ic æfterhyrgan ne mæg, & ma me lysteþ wepan
þone sæcgan.
 1.182.17. Gregorius him andswarode: be þæs ylcan Paulines
forðfore is awriten, þæt he wæs gehrinen mid sidwærce & þurh
þæt to his ænde gelæded, þæt eall his mynsterstede full
fæste gestod, buton þam gebedhuse anum, in þam he læg seoc;
gewordenre eorðstyrene eall hit abifode, & ealle, þe þær æt
wæron, mid swyðlicum brogan astyrede.
 1.182.22. & þa wæs alysed seo halige sawl of þam
lichaman.
 1.182.22. & þa wæs geworden, þæt mycclu fyrhtu geeode
on ealle, þa þe Paulines ænde gesawon.
 1.182.25. Nu þonne gif þu wille cume wit to þam utran
wundrum, þara fela us syndon cuðe, & ic geleornode fore sægne
æfæstra wera.
 2.182.28. Hit gelamp in þam dagum Gotena rices, þa þa
Iohannes se eadegosta wer & papa þissere Romaniscan byrig ferde to
Iustine, þe þa wæs Rome hlaford, & he becom to Chorinthia þære
cæstre, þa wæs him an hors þearf, þæt man him funde, þæt he
mihte on sittan.
 2.183.3. Þa þæt geacsode sum æþele man & brohte him
his hors, on þam gewunode his wif for mycelre stilnesse on sittan, on
þæt gerad, þonne him man oþer his lic hors findan mihte, þæt man
þæs wifes hors ham asende.
 2.183.6. & þa wæs geworden, þæt se foresprecena wer
to þære gecwedstowe wegendum þam ylcan horse wæs gelæded; sona swa
he oþer gemette, ham he asænde þæt, þe him gelæned wæs.
 2.183.8. & þa þa þæt wif þæs foresædan weres
æfter hire þeawe wolde on ridan, ac heo ne mihte, forþon æfter þam
onsæte swa haliges biscopes hit wiðsoc, þæt hit wif bære.
 2.183.11. Witodlice hit ongan blawan & gremetian ungemetlice
& mid unablinnendlicra brogdettunge ealles lichaman meldian & yppan,
þæt hit ne mihte wifman beran æfter þam leomum þæs biscopes.
 2.183.13. Þa þa hire wer wislice þæt oncneow, he hit sona
eft sænde to þam arwyrþan were & mid mycclum benum bæd, þæt
he hit him sylfa hæfde, forþon he hit mid his onsetle him sylfum to
æhte ær gehalgode.
 2.183.17. Be þam ylcan Iohanne þis wundor gewunode beon sæd
fram urum witum, þæt he in Constantinopolim þære byrig cumende to
þam geate, þæt is genæmned Aurea Porta, him ongæn yrnnendum folca
mænigum in eallra gesihðe biddendum anum blindum gesyhðe he sealde
& mid ofer asetedre handa he aflymde þara eagena þeostru.
 3.183.22. Naht mycelre tide æfter þon abædendre nyde Gotena
þeode se æresta wer Agapitus þyssere halgan Rome cyrcan papa, þam ic
gestihtiendum Gode nu þeowige, ferde þa to Iustiniane þæs bufan
næmdan Iustinianes suna.
 3.183.24. Him þa gyta ferendum sume dæge on Grecalande wæs
to broht to lacnianne an man, se wæs dumb & healt, swa þæt he
nauþær ne mihte ne word acweþan ne æfre of eorðan upp arisan.
 3.184.1. & þa þa hine his magas wepende to him brohton, se
drihtnes wer georne acsode, hwæþer hi hæfdon þone geleafan, þæt
he mihte beon gehæled.
 3.184.3. Hi him andwyrdon & cwædon, þæt hi fæstne
hiht hæfden be his hæle in Godes mægne & sancte Petres
aldorlicnesse.
 3.184.4. He þa sona se arwyrþa wer onhylde hine to gebede &
ongan mæssan singan & in þæs ælmihtigan Godes gesihþe
geoffrode þa onsægdnysse.
 3.184.6. & þa þa he þæt gedon hæfde, he eode fram
þam weofode & þæs healtan handa genam ætstandendum folce &
tolociendum & hine arærde on his agene fet & him on muþ sænde
drihtnes lichaman.
 3.184.9. Þa wæs seo tunge alysed to spræce, seo þe lange
ær wæs dumb.
 3.184.10. & hi ealle wundriende ongunnon wepan & heora mod
wearð afyrhted, þa þa hi sceawodon & gesawon, hwæt Agapitus in
drihtnes mægne & sancte Petres fultume gedon mihte.
 4.184.14. Eac swylce hit gelamp on þa tide þæs ylcan
ealdermannes, þa þa Datius wæs gefyrðrod mid trymnesse rihtes
geleafan, se wæs biscop þære burge Mediolana, þa ongan he faran to
Constantinopolim þære byrig, & he becom to Cozenthi þære
mægðe.
 4.184.17. Þa ongan he secan him swa rum hus, þæt he mihte
mid his geferrædene eallum in gewician, & he þæt uneaðe findan
mihte.
 4.184.19. Þa geseah he feorran sum hus, þæt wæs
gerisenlicre mycelnysse, & þa het he, þæt man þæt him
gegearwode, þæt he mihte þa niht þær inne gewunian.
 4.184.21. Þa sædon him þa landleode þære ylcan stowe,
þæt he in þam huse beon ne mihte, forþon þe deofla þær manige
in eardodon & hit forþon weste wunode.
 4.184.24. Þa andswarode him se halga wer Datius se biscop þus
cweþende: þæs þe lustlicor we sceolon þær inne eardian, nu se
awyrgda gast to þon ferde in þæt hus, þæt he manna eardunge of
þam huse adrife.
 4.184.27. Þa bebead he, þæt hit him gegearwod beon sceolde,
& orsorh he þær in eode, to þon þæt he wære ræfnende þa
gewin þæs ealdan feondes.
 4.184.29. Þa gelamp hit in þære nihte, þa þa seo
mæsta stilnes & swigung wæs, & se Godes wer reste, þæt se
ealda feond ongan onhyrgian mid unmætum stefnum & mid mycclum cleopungum
leona grymetunge & hryðra gehlowe & eosola gehlyd & næddrena
hwistlunge & swyna grununge & musa hwicunge.
 4.185.4. Þa færinga wearð se halga wer Datius mid swa
manigra wilddeora stefnum aweaht, & he þa swyþlice eorre aras &
wið þam ealdan feonde ongan mid mycclum stefnum clypian & þus
cweðan: wel is þe gelumpen, þu earma, þe iu cwæde: ic sette min
heahsetl to norðdæle heofona rices, & ic beo þam hehstan Gode
gelic.
 4.185.9. Geseoh nu, þæt þu for þinum oferhigde eart
geworden swynum & musum gelic, & þu, þe wære unwyrðe &
hwæþre woldest þinne drihten onhyrgian, nu, swa swa þu wyrðe eart,
þu onhyrest wilddeor.
 4.185.12. & þa gehyredre þære his stemne, swa swa ic
secge, for ðære onwegadrifennesse se awyrgda gast his sceamode, se þe
onufan þæt ne eode na in þæt hus, þe he ær his scincræftas in
gegearwode.
 4.185.15. & swa æfter þon hit wæs geworden geleaffullra
manna eardunghus, forþon þa þa þær wæs an geleaffull man
soðsecgende in gangende, hraðe se leasa gast & se ungeleaffulla onweg
gewat.
 4.185.18. Ac nu gedafenað, þæt we sume hwile geswigian be
þam ærran wyrdum & dædum, & us is to cumene to þam wundrum,
þe on urum dagum gelumpon & gedone wæron.
 5.185.21. Soðlice sume æfæste weras us wæron cuðe,
þa wæron of dælum þæs boltgeteles, þe hatte Apaulie; þa us
þis cyðdon, þæt mid manigra gewitnysse feorr & wide gemærsod
wæs be Sabino, se wæs þære burge biscop, þe hatte Canusina.
 5.185.24. Hi gewunedon us cyðan, þæt þes ylca wer lange
his eagena gesihþe forlete, swa þæt he nanwiht geseon ne mihte.
 5.185.26. Þa geacsode Gotena cyning, se wæs gehaten Totila,
þæt se biscop hæfde witedomes gast; & he hwæþre þæt ne
gelyfde, ac he wolde cunnian, hwæþer hit swa wære, swa swa he ær
secgan gehyrde.
 5.186.2. & þa þa se cyning becom on þæt land, þa
gelaðode se drihtnes wer þysne cyning to underngeweorce; & þa þa se
cyning to þære mysan becom, þa nolde he sittan on þa wynstran healfe,
ac he gesæt on þa swiðran þæs arwyrðan biscopes Sauines.
 5.186.5. Þa bær þæs biscopes cniht to his fæder wines
drync, swa swa hit þeaw wæs.
 5.186.6. Þa ræhte se cyning his hand forð swigende &
genam þone hnæp æt þam cnihte & mid his handa for gewrixle
þæs cnihtes he þam biscope þone drync sealde, to þon þæt he
gesawe & ongeate, hwæþer se biscop wære geseondum & oncnawan
mihte þurh Godes gast hwa þæt wære, þe him þone drync sealde.
 5.186.11. Þa se Godes wer onfeng þam hnæppe & na ne
geseah þone þegn, ac he hwæþre cwæð: lifige þeos hand in
ecnysse, þe me þysne drync syleþ.
 5.186.13. For þam worde se cyning wæs bliðe &
þehhwæðer him sceamode, forþon þeah þe he fram þam Godes were
ongyten wære, hwæþre he þæt mægn onfunde, þæt he þær
sohte.
 5.186.16. Soðlice þyses arwyrþan weres lif in langre ylde
wæs getogen to bysne þara æfterfylgendra.
 5.186.17. Þa wearð his diacon mid unrihtre gewilnunge
onæled, & he þohte, þæt he þone biscop wolde mid attre
acwellan.
 5.186.19. Þa gebigde he þæs fylleres mod, to þon þæt
he gemængde attor to ðæs wines drynce.
 5.186.20. & þa æt þæs gereordes tide, þa se biscop
to mete sæt, þa funde se his arcedeacon æt þam cnihte, þe wæs
þæs biscopes byrele mid medum, þæt he þone geættredan drync him
to bær.
 5.186.22. Þa sona cwæð se arwyrða biscop to þam cnihte:
drinc þu þis, þæt þu me berest to drincane.
 5.186.24. Þa cwacode se cniht, forþon þe he ongæt,
þæt he arasod wæs.
 5.186.25. & ma he wolde þæs deaðes drync drincan,
þonne he wolde þæt mennisce wite & scame ræfnian for þam gylte
swa myceles morðes.
 5.186.27. & þa se cniht dyde þone hnep to his muðe, þa
styrde se drihtnes wer him þus cweþende: ne drync þu þis, ac syle me;
ic hit drince.
 5.186.29. & gang þu & sæge þam, þe þisne drync
þe sealde, þæt ic drince þis attor, & he ne biþ hwæðre
nænig bisceop.
 5.186.30. & þa hrædlice gedonum Cristes rodetacne se
biscop orsorhlice dranc þæt attor, & in þa ylcan tid se deacon
wearþ forðfered on oðre stowe, þær he þa wæs, efne swa þa
attru geondferdon þæs arcedeacnes innoþ þurh þæs biscopes muð.
 5.187.4. Þam swa þeah wæs sona þæs lichamlican attres
wana, þæt him þæt ænigne deað ongebrohte, ac he wearð acweald
mid þy attre his agnes niþes in gesihþe þæs ecan deman.
 5.187.6. Petrus cwæð: þas wisan syndon wundorlice, & on
urum tidum hi syndon us swiðe to wafienne.
 5.187.8. Ac hit sægd is, þæt þyses ylcan weres lif swylc
wære, þæt se þe ongyteð his drohtað, ne scyle he wundrian his
mægn.
 6.187.10. Gregorius him andswarode: nelle ic eac þis forswigian,
Petrus, þæt me gelomlice cyðdon þa, þe her nu syndon of Narnusnensi
þære cæstre.
 6.187.12. Witodlice on þa ylcan tid hit gelamp, þæt se
foresprecena Gotena cyning Totila com to þære cæstre Narnus.
 6.187.13. Þa ferde him ongæn se wer þæs arwyrðan lifes,
þæs nama wæs Cassius, se wæs biscop þære ylcan burge.
 6.187.15. & him wæs gecynde, þæt he symble wæs read
on his andwlitan.
 6.187.16. Þa ne gelyfde na se cyning Totila, þæt hit him for
his gecynda wære, ac he wende, þæt hit for singalum gedrynce wære,
& eallum gemetum he hine forseah & forhogode.
 6.187.18. Ac se ælmihtiga God geeowde, hu myccles mægnes he
wæs in Narnusnensi þam felda, þær se cyning to com, þa ferde se
awyrgda gast in þæs cyninges swurdboran beforan eallum his folce &
ongan hine wælgrimlice swencan.
 6.187.22. & he þa wæs gelæded beforan þæs cyninges
gesihþe to ðam arwyrðan were Cassio þam biscope.
 6.187.23. Þa se biscop gefyldum his gebede & gedonum Cristes
rodetacne adraf þone deofol ut of þam mæn, se ne geþristlæhte ofer
þæt, þæt he eft in hine eode.
 6.187.26. Swa þa wæs geworden, þæt se reþa cyning þam
Godes þeowan arode of þam dæge & wurðode mid inweardre heortan,
þone he ær demde swiþe forseowene for his ansyne.
 6.188.1. Soðlice forþon þe he geseah, þæt se wer wæs
myccles mægnes & geearnunga, þy syþþan þæt fullfremede mod
geswyðrode ymbe hine fram þære heannesse þara oferhygda.
 7.188.5. Ac nu, þa þa ic sæde þa wyrda haligra wera,
færinga me becom to gemynde, hu seo godcunde mildheortnes gecyðde ymbe
Andream þone biscop þære cæstre Fundene.
 7.188.7. Þæt þonne hwæþre ic wysce & wilnige,
þæt þa magon gehealdan, þe þis rædað, & þæt hi ne
geneþon na, þæt hi geeardian mid wifum, þa þe gehalgiað &
gehatað heora lichaman þære rihtan forhæfdnesse, þy læs hit
gelimpe, þæt þam hreowsiendan mode swa myccle ma sio færlice scyndnes
undercreope, swa mycle swa þam mode swyþur þeowað seo andweardnes
þære lustbærlican onsyne & tyhtað to þon, þæt hit yfele
& unrihtlice gelysteð .
 7.188.14. Nis eac seo wise tweogendlicu, þe ic nu secge, forþon
þe þær ful neah wæron swa manige men to gewitnesse, swa þær in
þære stowe wunedon.
 7.188.16. Witodlice þa þes arwyrða wer his lif gelædde mid
manigfealdum mægnum wel gefylled & hine sylfne geheold on þære
forhæfdnesse cræfte under þyllicum sacerdhade, þa wæs sum nunne
mid him, þe he ær on his geferscipe hæfde.
 7.188.19. Þa he nolde for his biscop hade hi aweg adrifan, ac he
geare wiste ge be his sylfes clænnesse ge eac be hire forhæfdnesse, þa
let he hi mid him wunian.
 7.188.22. Of þære wisan wæs gedon, þæt se ealda feond
begeat sume costunge ingang in þam mode þæs halgan biscopes.
 7.188.23. Cuðlice in his modes eagum he ongan hire fægernesse
behealdan, & he wæs gelustfullod in unrihtum geþohte.
 7.188.25. Þa sume dæge wæs sum Iudeisc man farende of
Campianalande & to Rome cumende.
 7.188.26. Þa þa he on þam siðe farende wæs, he becom to
þære stowe, þe Appia hatte.
 7.188.27. Þa geseah he, þæt se dæg wæs onhylded to
æfenne, & he ne mihte findan, hwær he on niht gereste.
 7.189.1. Þa wæs þær neah Apollines templ.
 7.189.1. Þa gefealh he þær in & þær þa niht
gewunode & him swiþe ondred þa feondgyld, þe þær inne wæron.
 7.189.3. Þeah þe he næfde rihtne geleafan, hwæþere he
hine mid Cristes rodetacne gesegnode.
 7.189.4. & þa soðlice ymb middeniht he læg wæccende,
þa wearð he mid mycelre fyrhte gedrefed, & þa færinga tolociende
geseah he myccle mænigu awyrgdra gasta, þa wæron fore gangende, swylce
hi on þegnunge wæron sumes hlafordes.
 7.189.8. & he þa geseah, þæt se þe heora yldost
wæs, in sumum dæle þære stowe gesæt.
 7.189.9. Þa ongan he acsian synderlice þara þegniendra gasta
gehwylcne, hwæt he gedon hæfde, & he witan wolde, hu mycelne niþ hi
hæfdon menniscum cynne æteowed.
 7.189.11. & þa þara awyrgedra gasta gehwylc his acsunge
synderlice gerehton, hwæt hi wið godum mannum yfles gedon hæfdon, þa
stelde þær an forð in heora middle, se sæde mid hu mycelre costunge
he onstyrede þone lichaman in þam mode Andreas þæs biscopes þurh
þære nunnan fægernesse, þe on his geferscipe wunode.
 7.189.16. Þa se awyrgda gast, þe þær yldost wæs, þis
geornlice gehyrde, & he gelyfde, þæt hit him þe mare gestreon
wære, gif he mihte þæs halgan mannes sawle to þam fylle ænige
forspillednysse gebigan.
 7.189.19. Þa gyt se ylca gast, se þe þas wisan anddette &
ypte, he to geecte & þus cwæð: þæt ic him næfre nahte ne
mihte ær þys ærran æfenne.
 7.189.21. On æfentid ic geteah his mod to þon, þæt he
lufode mid his bradre hand þa nunnan & ofer þa sculdru geþaccode.
 7.189.23. Þa se awyrgda gast & se ealda feond þyses
menniscan cynnes hine geornlice mid liðum wordum bæd & lærde,
þæt he gefremede, þæt he ær ongan, to þon þæt he synderlice
sigor hæfde betwyh þam oþrum hellegastum.
 7.189.26. & þa se Iudeisca man, þe þær to com,
wæccende þis sceawode, & for mycelre nearonesse fyrhto he cwacode,
& fram ðam ylcan gaste beboden wæs, se þær wæs yldra þonne
þa oðre, þe him þegnodon, þæt hi secan sceolden, hwylc se wære
þe geþristlæhte to þon, þæt he in þam temple gelæge, þa
ferdon þa awyrgdan gastas & geornlice hine beheoldon, & hi gesawon,
þæt he wæs gemearcod mid þy halgan geryne Cristes rodetacnes.
 7.190.2. Þa wæron hi wundriende & cwædon: walawa.
 7.190.3. Þis is æmtig fæt & gesegnod.
 7.190.4. Hi þa þis eft heora aldre sædon, & þa sona
eall seo mænigu þara awyrgedra gasta onweg gewat.
 7.190.5. & þa hraðe se Iudeisca man aras, þe þis eall
geseah, & to þam biscope ferde & hine þa in his cyrican gemette
& hine þa on sundor gecigde & frægn, mid hwylcere costunge he
geþread wære.
 7.190.8. Þa scamode þone biscop & nolde him þa his
costunge geandettan.
 7.190.9. Þa sæde se Iudeisce man him, þæt he beheolde
þa nunnan & mid unrihtre his eagena lufe hi lufode.
 7.190.10. Þa gyt se biscop wiðsoc, þa geecte se Iudeisca man
hit þus cweþende: for hwon wiþsæcst þu þæs þe þu eart
geacsod, þu þe gyrstan æfenne to þon gelæded wære, þæt þu
mid þinre bradre hand þa nunnan ofer hire eaxle þaccodest?
 7.190.14. & þa butan tweon eadmodlice he andette, þæt he
ær fæstlice wiðsoc, forþon þe se biscop wæs behealdende,
þæt he in his agnum wordum arasod wæs.
 7.190.16. Þæs hryre & his scame þæs ylca Iudeisca
man wæs afrefriende, & þa sæde he, hu he þis ongæt, & eac
hwylce word he gehyrde be him sprecan in gemetinge þara awyrgedra gasta.
 7.190.19. Þa se biscop þæt wæs ongytende, he þa hraðe
hine sylfne on eorðan astrehte & in gebed sealde.
 7.190.20. & he sona aweg adraf nalæs na þa nunnan ane, ac
ealle þa wif, þe ær on his geferscipe wunedon.
 7.190.22. & soðlice he gehalgode in þam Apollones temple
gebedhus þæs eadigan apostoles sanctus Andreas, & he fæstlice ealle
þa costunga of his agnum lichaman adrigde.
 7.190.24. & soðlice þone Iudeiscan man he geteah to
þære ecan hæle, þurh þæs gesihðe & þreaunge se biscop
wearð gehæled.
 7.190.26. Witodlice he gelædde hine to þam sceate þære
halgan cyrican, & he hine gelærde mid þy halgan geryne rihtes
geleafan, & he hine geclænsode mid þy wætere fullwihtes
bæþes.
 7.190.28. & swa hit wæs geworden, þæt se ylca Ebreisca
man, þa þa he þam biscope þa fremdan hælo forgæf, þa becom he
gesæliglice to his agenre hæle, & swa se ælmihtiga God þanon he
eac þone oðerne to godum life gelædde, þanon he eac þone oþerne to
godum life geheold.
 7.191.2. Petrus cwæð: þeos gedone wise, þe ic nu gehyrde,
heo me nu gegearwað gehwæþre ge mycelne ege ge mycelne hiht.
 7.191.4. Gregorius him andswarode & cwæð: witodlice swa us
gedafenað, þæt we symble ne getweogen of Godes gemiltsunge, & symble
we magon forhtian for ure sylfra untrumnesse.
 7.191.7. Geseoh nu, þæt neorxnawanges cedertreow wæs
swyþe astyred, hwæþre næs hit upp alocen, to þon þæt us
untrumum for þæs treowes styrenesse wære ege æteowed, & for his
staþolfæstnysse bældo.
 8.191.11. Eac swylce sum wer wæs swiðe arwyrþes lifes, þam
wæs nama Constantius, se wæs þære burge biscop Aquina.
 8.191.12. Se wæs niwan forðfered on þa tid mines foregengan,
se wæs eadigre gemynde papa Iohannes.
 8.191.14. Manige men cyþdon, þæt he hæfde witedomes gast,
þa þe hine cuþlice cuðon.
 8.191.15. Eac þæt secgað þa æfæstan & þa
soðsagalan weras, þe him andwearda wæron, betwyh oþrum þingum,
þæt hit gelumpe in þam dæge his forþfore, þa þe hine ymbstodon
þa ceasterwara & heom swa leof fæder wæs leorende, þæs þe
hit gecweden beon mæg, of þyssere worulde, & he þa swiðe biterlice
wæs cwiþed fram þam ymbstandendum, & weopende hi hine acsodon þus
cweðende: hwylcne fæder habbað we æfter þe?
 8.191.21. Þa se fæder þurh witedomes gast him andswarode
þus cweþende: æfter me Constantie fehð to min horsþegn, &
æfter him Iobinus, se wæs min wæscestre.
 8.191.23. Eala, þu burh, þu Equine, þæt þe þus
gelimpeð.
 8.191.24. & þa gecwedenum þyses witedomes wordum he his
gast onsænde.
 8.191.25. & him þa forðferdum Andreas, se þe ær wæs
his deacon, he onfeng þære heordelican scire gymnysse, se wæs gefyrn
þæs biscopes horsþegn Constanties.
 8.191.27. & him þa of þysum life alæddum, Iobinus wæs
hleotende þa ændebyrdnysse biscophades, se wæs ær wæscestre in
þære ylcan cæstre.
 8.192.2. & him þa gyt lifigendum swa þa eardiend þære
ceastre wurdon forhergode ealle, & mid ælþeodigra manna sweordum &
mid unmæte mancwealme hi wæron forslægene to þan swiðe, þæt
æfter his dæge þær næs nænig þara gemeted, þe biscop beon
mihte ne eac þa broðra behealdan mihte.
 8.192.6. & swa wæs gefylled se cwyde þæs halgan weres,
þæt æfter forðsiþe & æfter geleornesse þara twegra, þe
æfter him wæron, syþþan seo cyrice nænigne heorde hæfde.
 9.192.10. Eac ne forswigie ic na þis, þæt gelamp nu for twam
gærum sæcgendum þam arwyrðan were Uenantie, se wæs þære
cæstre biscop Lunan.
 9.192.12. Witodlice he sæde, þæt in Lucan þære
cæstre, seo þe him neh wæs, wære sum wer swiðe wundorlices
mægnes, þæs nama wæs Fridianus, se wæs þære cæstre
biscop.
 9.192.14. Þæs wundra sum þæt mæreste wæs gecyðed
fram eallum þam, þe þær eardodon, þæt seo ea, seo þe floweþ
be þam burhwealle, forhergiende wære his land, & oft gedonre yþunge
se stream mid his rynum & mid his uppgange gewunode, þæt he togoten
wæs geond his æceras, & þa geplantedan wingeardes, þa þe he
gemette, ealle he þa oferfleow.
 9.192.19. & þa þa þis gelomlice gedon wæs, &
mycclu neodþearf nydde þa landleode þære stowe, þæt hi þære
ea sum furlang heora weorces gesealdan, þa ongunnon hi on oðre stowe
geryman/ þa ea.
 9.192.22. Ac þeah þe hi þær lange wuniende wæron, ne
mihton hi hwæðre þone stream of his rihtryne abygan.
 9.192.24. Þa worhte se drihtnes wer Frigdianus him ane lytle
racan & eode to þære ea & þær ana hine on his gebed onhylde
& þære ylcan ea bebead, þæt heo him fylgde þurh þa stowe,
þe he on ferde.
 9.192.26. Þa geteah he þa racan æfter þære eorðan,
& þa forlætenum hire agnum streame eall seo ea wæs him fylgende,
swa þæt heo eallunga þone gewunelican ryne anforlet & hire sylfre
geahnode þone ryne, þe se drihtnes wer beforan mid þære racan ær
tacnode on þære eorðan, & heo syþþan naht ne derede heora
andlyfnum, þe þam mannum bryce wæron ne on gesawenre eorðe ne on
gesettum wingearde.
 10.193.7. Eac swylce ic oncneow oðer wundor þurh gesægene
þæs arwyrðan biscopes Uenanties.
 10.193.8. Se sæde, þæt hit gedon wære in þære byryg
Placentsan, þæt se unleasesta wer Iohannes, se is nu gerefscire healdende
in þyssere Romebyrig, se wæs eac geboren & gefeded in þære ylcan
byrig placentsan,he eac gecydde, þæt hit eall swa gedon wære, swa us se
biscop ær sæde Uenantius.
 10.193.12. Witodlice hi us sædon, þæt in þære ylcan
cæstre wære sum biscop swyðe wundorlice myccles mægnes, þam wæs
nama Sabinus.
 10.193.14. Þam þa sume dæge his agen deacon sæde,
þæt Pad seo ea wære of hire rihtryne on þære cyrican yrðland up
yrnende, & þæt þæt wæter hire flodes ealle þa stowe fornumen
hæfde, þe þær ðam mannum to bigleofa beon sceolde.
 10.193.17. Þa andswarode se arwyrða biscop Sabinus þam
deacone þus cweþende: ga & cweð to ðære ea: geblin ðu þyses
flodes & cyrr to ðinum agenum rihtryne.
 10.193.20. Þa se deacon þæt gehyrde, þa hloh he & hine
forseah.
 10.193.21. Þa se drihtnes wer him to gehet his writere & him
dihtode þus cweðende: Sabinus se drihtnes þeowa þe het beodan þis
gebod & þus cwæð: ic þe bebeode, Pad, on naman ures drihtnes
hælendes Cristes, þæt þu ut ne gange of ðinum agnum ryne ofer ðis
in þas stowe, ne þu na geþrystlæce, þæt þu ure cyricland on
ænigum þinge derige.
 10.193.26. & þa gyt to geecte þam ylcan writere þus
cweþende: geseoh þu, þæt þu þis awrite & weorp in þæt
wæter þæs ylcan flodes.
 10.194.2. He þæt bebod onfeng þæs halgan weres & swa
dyde, swa he him bebead.
 10.194.3. Þa syððan gestilde se flod & gecyrde fram þan
cyriclande to his agnum rihtryne & næfre syðþan þæt heo on
ðam lande up urne.
 10.194.5. In þære wisan, Petrus, hwæt oðres magon we
ongytan, buton þæt þær wæs onscynded manna heortena heardnes &
heora unhyrsumnes, þa þæt unandgytfulle gesceaft þæs wætres
wæs hyrende þam halgan were in his mægne?
 11.194.9. Þa wæs eac sum wer swiþe arwyrðes lifes,
þæs nama wæs Cerbonius, se wæs þære burge biscop Populine.
 11.194.10. Se us sealde in urum dagum þa cyðnesse his mycclan
haligdomes.
 11.194.11. Soðlice þa þa he wæs swyðe georne behealdende
ða teolone his gestliðnesse, þa wæron þær sume dæge militisce
men farende.
 11.194.13. Þa onfeng he þa in his gesthuse & hi ahydde,
forþon þe þær æfter com Gotiscra manna here.
 11.194.15. & se Godes man geheold heora lif wið þara oðra
nið.
 11.194.15. & þæt þa wæs gesæd þam treowleasan
Gotena cyningc Totillan.
 11.194.16. Þa wearð he onæled mid unmættre
wælhreownesse.
 11.194.17. Þa het he þysne biscop beon gelæded to þære
stowe, þe is gehaten Meroles, seo wæs VIII milum fram his byrig, þær
he þa sæt mid his here.
 11.194.19. & he het, þæt hine man wurpe berum to fretanne
beforan gesihðe ealles þæs folces.
 11.194.21. & þa þa se ylca treowleasa cyningc gesæt in
ðære sceawunge, to ðon þæt he wolde geseon þæs biscopes
deað, & þa wæs þær to cumen swyðe mycclu folca mænigu,
þa wæs eac se biscop gelæded in þone middel þæs folces, &
þær wæs begyten se mæsta & se ryþesta bera to his deaðe, se
wæs gewunod, þæt he oft wælhreowlice manna lichaman slat.
 11.194.26. & þa forlet man þone beran of his bendum.
 11.195.1. Þa wæs he swiþe mid reðnesse onæled &
þa hraðe þone biscop gesohte.
 11.195.2. Ac þa færinga he forgæt ealle þa his reðnesse
& his swyran onbigde & his heafod eadmodlice ofdune asænde &
ongan liccian þæs biscopes fet.
 11.195.4. Þa hit wæs þus gedon, þæt hit openlice mihte
beon ongyten fram eallum mannum, þæt ymb þone Godes man þara manna
heortan wæron gewended in wilddeora reðnesse, & þæs wilddeores
heorte wæs gehwyrfed in mænnisce bilwytnysse.
 11.195.7. Þa þæt folc, þe þær ær com to sceawunge
þæs biscopes deaðes, mid mycelre cleopunge wearð gecyrred in wundrunge
& in are.
 11.195.9. Þa wæs eac se cyning sylf onwænded to begangenne
þæs biscopes arwyrðnysse, & swa hit wæs gedon mid Gods dome,
þæt se þe ær Gode fylgan nolde in gehælde þæs biscopes lifes,
sona he eft him fylgde fram andweardnesse þæs wildan deores.
 11.195.13. & nu gyt syndon manige men lifigende, þe þær
þa andwearde wæron, þa us cyðdon, þæt hi mid eallum þam folce
þæt sceawedon, & hi sylfe hit gesawon.
 11.195.15. Eac swylce ic oncneow oðer wundor be ðam ylcan were,
þæt me sæde Uenantius se biscop in Lunan.
 11.195.17. Soðlice he het him gegearwian byrgenne in þære
ylcan byrig Populine, þær wæs his biscopstol in þære cyrican.
 11.195.18. Ac þa comon Langbeardisca leoda & þæt land
eall hergedon.
 11.195.19. Þa gewat se biscop to Elbam þam ealande, & þa
onhreosendre mettrumnesse he genealæhte to deaðe.
 11.195.21. Þa bebead he his preostum, þe æt his þegnunge
wæron, þus cweðende: gesettað me on mine byrgene, þe ic me
gegearwode.
 11.195.23. Þa sædon hi to him: hu magon we þinne lichaman
þider gelædan,nu we witon, þæt Langbearde habbað þa stowe
genumen & æghwær þær ymbutan farað?
 11.195.25. Þa andswarode se biscop heom & cwæð:
gelædað me þider orsorhlice & ne ondrædað eow, ac ofstlice
bebyrgað me, & sona swa min lichama bebyrged sy, beoð ge mid eallre
hrædnesse eft þanon farende.
 11.195.28. Þa forðferedum þam biscope hi asetton his lichaman
on scip & ferdon to þære byrig Populine.
 11.196.1. Þa wæs swyðe mycel genip geworden in þam
wolcnum, & unmæte renas rindon.
 11.196.2. Ac hit eallum mannum gecyðed wæs, þæt in þam
dæle þæs sæs, þær þæt scip bær þæs halgan weres
lichaman, & hi ferdon fram Elba þam ealande, þanon syndon XII mila to
þære byrig Populine, & on ægðre healfe þæs scipes wæs
swiþe mycel regnes storm, & in þæt ilce scip nan regnes dropa ne
gefeoll.
 11.196.6. Þa becomon þa preostas to þære stowe, &
þæs biscopes lichaman hi þær bebyrgdon, & his bebodu hi
geheoldon, & ofstlice hi wæron to heora scipe eft cyrrende.
 11.196.9. Þa sona swa hi on heora scipe eft wæron, þa com se
wælhreowest a Langbeardena ealdorman in þa ylcan stowe, þær se
drihtnes wer inne bebyrged wæs.
 11.196.11. Of ðæs tocyme him wæs gecyðed, þæt se
Godes wer hæfde witedomes gast, forþon þe he bebead his þegnum,
þæt hi hrædlice of þære stowe his byrgene aweg gewitan.
 12.196.14. Soðlice þis wundor þæs regnes gedales, þe
þær geworden wæs, hit is us getacnod to secgenne be sumes biscopes
arwyrðnesse.
 12.196.16. Soþlice sum eald preost is nu gyt lifigende, se us
cyðde, þæt he sylf þær andweard wære, þus cweðende:
Fulgentius wæs haten þære cyrican & þære biscopscire biscop,
seo genemned is Utricolensis.
 12.196.18. Se hæfde swiðe abelged þone wælhreowan cyning
Totila, þa þa he mid herge to þære stowe genealæhte.
 12.196.20. Þa gewilnode se biscop, þæt he wið his preostas
hwylcehugu lac þider sænde & þæs cyninges hatheortnesse
gestildan, gif hi mihton.
 12.196.22. Sona swa se cyningc þa lac geseah, he forhogode hi
& swyðe eorre bebead his mannum, þæt hi þone ylcan biscop mid
mycelre hrædnesse gebundon & hine to his dome geheoldon.
 12.196.25. Þa þa reðan þegnas þæs Gotan genamon hine
for þæs cyningces wælhreownysse & þa ymbhæfdon hine utan &
bebudon, þæt he stode in anre stowe & ymb hine gemearcodon anne hring
on þære eorðan & heton, þæt he nænige þinga mid his fet
þone hring ne oferstope.
 12.197.1. & þa þa se Godes wer wæs þær ymbstanden
fram þam ylcan Gotum, he barn in þære hæto þære swyþlican
sunnan & wæs belocen binnan þam mearce þæs hringes.
 12.197.4. Þa semninga gewurdon ligetslehtas & þunorada,
& swa mycel regnes mægn com, þæt þa þe in þone biscop fengon
to healdanne, þæt hi ne mihton adreogan þa mycelnesse þæs regnes.
 12.197.7. & of eallan þam gewyderu, ne gefeoll an dropa
þæs regnes binnan þone mearcon þæs hringces, in þam stod se Godes
wer Fulgentius.
 12.197.9. Mid þy þe þæt þus geworden wæs bodod þam
wælhreowestan cyninge, þa sona wæs his þæt reðe mod gecyrred to
mycelre arwurðnesse þæs biscopes, þæs ylcan þe hine ær lyste
wites & yflunge for his þære ungefylledlican hatheortnesse.
 12.197.12. Swa se ælmihtiga God wyrcað þa wundru his mihte
þurh his gecorene, þa beoþ mannum gesewene, ongæn þa oferhydigan mod
lichamlicra manna, & seo soðfæstnes forseteþ heora sweoran &
gebigeð þurh þa eadmodan men, forþon þe heo hi symble ahebbað
oferhigdilice ongen þa bebodu þære soðfæstnesse.
 13.197.18. Eac hit gelamp nu niwan, þæt Floridus þæs
arwyrðan lifes biscop me sæde sum swiðe wundorlic wundor.
 13.197.19. He cwæð, þæt se halga wer Erculanus min
fosterfæder, se wæs biscop Purusine þære cæstre, þæt he
wære gelæded of þæs mynstres drohtoðe to þæs sacerdlican
hades gife, & þæt wæs in Totillan dagum þæs treowleasan
cyningces.
 13.197.23. Þa ylcan buruh ymbsæt þara Gotena here singallice
VII gær.
 13.197.24. Þa of þære byrig manige þara ceasterwarena
flugon, þa þe ne mihton adreogan þæs hungres fræcnesse.
 13.197.25. & þa on þan seofoðan gære na þa gyt
eallunga geendedum se here þara Gotena geeode in ða ymbsetenan burh.
 13.198.1. Þa sende se ealdorman, se þe in þam herge yldost
wæs, his ærendwrecan to ðam cyninge Totillan his hlaforde & acsode,
hwæt he don sceolde þam biscope oððe þam folce.
 13.198.3. & he him þa bebead & cwæð: befleh ærest
ænne þwang þam biscope fram þam hneccan oþ þone hoh & him
þæt heafod syþþan of aceorf & syððan eall þæt folc, þe
þu þær finde, sleh mid sweorde.
 13.198.6. He þa se ylca ealdorman het gelædan þone
arwyrþan biscop & þone halgan wer Erculanum ofer þære burge weall
& hine þær heafde beceorfan & him het of deadum aflean þone
þwang fram þam hneccan oþ þone hoh.
 13.198.9. & syððan he awearp þæt lic ut buton þone
weall.
 13.198.11. Þa sume men mid menniscre arfæstnysse gesetton
þæt heafod eft to þe sweoran & bebyrigdon þæs biscopes lic be
ðam wealle & an lytel cild mid him, þæt þær ær funden wæs
eac ofslagen.
 13.198.14. Þa þe feowertigoðan dæge æfter þam ilcan
slehte gelyfde se ylca cyning, þæt þære burge ceasterware, þe
ær gehwider todrifene wæron, to þære ylcan byrig eft gecyrdon buton
ælcere fyrhto, & eft hi wæron cyrrende onfangenre leafe to lifigenne,
þa þe ær flugon ægþer þe þone hungor ge eac þone sleht.
 13.198.18. Þa wæron gemyndige þa buruhwaran, hwylces lifes
se heora biscop wæs, & þa geornlice sohton, hwær his lichama
bebyrged wære, þæt hi þone mid gerisenlicre are bebyrgdon in
þære cyrcan þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres.
 13.198.22. & þa þe to ðære byrgene geeodon, þa
dulfon hi in þa eorðan & gemetton þone lichaman þæs cildes, þe
þær samod mid him bebyrged wæs, mid molsne gebrosnode & wyrma
fulle, swa hit wen wæs ymb feowertig nihta, & soðlice hi gemetton
þone lichaman þæs halgan biscopes swa andsundne, swylce he þy ylcan
dæge bebyrged wære.
 13.198.27. & eac þæt nu gyt is to arianne mid maran
wundrunge, þæt swa fæste his heafod wæs gegrowen to ðam lichaman,
swylce hit næfre of acorfen nære, & swa witodlice, þæt þær
ne ætewde nænigne swaþe þæs snides.
 13.199.2. & þa oncyrdon hi þæs lichaman þone hricg upp
& sohton, hweþer hi findan mihton ænig tacen þæs aflægenan
þwanges.
 13.199.4. & þa wæs gemeted eall seo lichama swa gesund
& swa ungeonbyrded, swylce him næfre ne gehrine æniges irenes snide.
 13.199.5. Petrus cwæð: hwylc man ne awundrað swylce wundru
þara deadra, þa beoð gedone fore awæcenesse & lare þara
lifigendra?
 14.199.8. Gregorius andswarode: eac swylce on þam ærran
Gotena tidum wæs sum swiþe arwyrðes lifes wer neh Spolitane þære
byrig, þæs weres nama wæs Isac.
 14.199.10. Se lifde ful neah oþ þa utemestan Gotena tidum.
 14.199.11. Þone cuþon manige urra cuðra freonda & eallra
gearost seo halige fæmne, þære nama wæs Gregoria, seo nu eardað in
þyssere Romanebyrig be þære cyrican þære eadigan & þære
clænan fæmnan sancte Marian.
 14.199.14. Seo foresprecene fæmne Gregoria, þa þa heo in
þa tid hire geogoðhades befleah þam gesettan gyfte to Godes cyrican, in
þam hi man gifan wolde, haliges nunlifes drohtoþ heo sohte & wilnode.
 14.199.17. & fram þam ylcan Godes were gescylded &
gefreoðod fram þam gyftum heo wæs gelæded gifendum drihtne &
scyldendum to ðam munuchade, þe heo wilnode & gyrnde, & þa
forþon þe heo fleah, þæt heo hæfde ceorl on eorðan, heo geearnode
habban brydguman on heofonum.
 14.199.21. Witodlice fela ic ongæt be þysum ylcan were
sæcgendum þam arwyrðan fæder Eleutherio, se þisne hiwcuðlice
cuþe, & his lif gedyde & gegearwode, þæt man his wordum
gelyfde.
 14.199.23. Witodlice þes arwyrða Isac næs he na geboren in
Langbeardum, ac hwæþre ic secge his wundor, þa þe he in Langbeardum
lifigende worhte.
 14.200.1. Þa þa he ærest com to Spolitanebyrig of Syria
dælum his agnum earde, he abæd him ingang fram þam cyricweardum,
þæt him wære agifen leaf him to gebiddenne swa lange swa he wolde,
& þæt hi hine na ne nyddon, þæt he on deogle tid of ðære
cyrican ut aeode.
 14.200.5. He stod in his gebede ealne dæg & þam dæge
þa æfterfylgendan nihte he to geþeodde.
 14.200.7. Eac swylce þone æftran dæg mid his nihte unwerig
on benum he þurhstod.
 14.200.8. Cuðlice in his gebede þone þriddan dæg he
þær to geþeodde.
 14.200.9. & þa þa þis an þara cyricwearda geseah, mid
oferhigde gaste inblawen þonon he becom to þam dæmme his sylfes wanunge,
þonon þe he forðþeon sceolde þurh þæs oðres þeawes &
bysene.
 14.200.11. Witodlice he ongan þisne licetere næmnian & mid
ceorliscum worde hine cigan æswica, forþon þe he eowde hine sylfne
beforan manna eagum III dagas & III niht on gebede standan.
 14.200.14. & þa sona eorrende sloh þone Godes wer mid his
bradre hand ofer his wange, þæt he mid oretlan gebysmrod ut eode of
þære cyrican, swa swa he wære licetere þæs æfæstan lifes.
 14.200.17. Ac þisne þa sona færinga in geeode seo
wræcenda gast & hine astrehte & afylde to þæs Godes weres
fotum.
 14.200.19. & þa ongan se deofol beforan eallum ðam, þe in
ðære cyrican wæron, þurh ðæs gewitleasan cyricweardes muð
clypian & cweþan: Isac me ut drifeð.
 14.200.21. Witodlice nyste man ær, hwylcum naman se
ælþeodiga man genemned wæs, ær þon se awyrgda gast, se þe of
þam ylcan cyricwearde ut wæs adrifen, his naman acleopode & ameldode.
 14.200.24. He þa sona se Godes wer gebeah ofer þone lichaman
þæs geswenctan mannes, & þa aweg gewat se awyrgda gast, se þe hine
ær in geeode.
 14.200.26. Sona þæt wæs cuð geond ealle þa burh,
hwæt þær in ðære cyrcan geworden wæs.
 14.200.27. Þyder þa samod ongunnon yrnan weras & wif,
æþele & unæþele, & hine heapmælum ongunnon to hyra husum
laðian & lædan.
 14.200.29. Sume hi woldon sellan heora sundorland mynster on to
getimbrianne, sume heora feoh him to andlyfne, sume hi woldon eadmodlice
bryngan þam Godes were eall swa hwæt swa hi mihton.
 14.201.3. Ac se þeowa þæs ælmihtigan Godes þæs naht
ne onfeng, ac ut gangende of þære byrig naht feor þanon funde him ane
weste stowe, in þære he him sylfum geworhte tela mycele eardunghus.
 14.201.5. To þam halgan men þa þe ferdon manige him ongunnon
beon inæled mid þy wyllan þæs ecan lifes þurh his bysene, &
agyfen hi sylfe in ðone ðeowdom þæs ælmihtigan drihtnes under his
lareowdom.
 14.201.8. & þa þa him gelomlice & eadmodlice
ætfeolan his þegnas & lærdon hine, þæt he for his mynstres
þearfe onfenge þæt yrfe, þæt him broht wæs, & he þa se
wara weard his agen þearfednesse heold him togenes strangne & rihtne
munuclifes dom & cwæð: se munuc, se þe on þysum life wilnað,
þæt he yrfe habbe, ne byð se beforan Gode munuc.
 14.201.13. & swa se halga man forhtode, þæt he forlure
þa gymelæste his þearfednesse, swa þa welegan & þa gitseras
gewuniað healdan heora weorðendan welan, þæt hi þa ne forleosan.
 14.201.16. & þæt þær feorr & wide eardiendum his
lif wearð þearle cuþ ægþer ge mid mycclum wundra weorcum ge eac mid
witedomes gaste.
 14.201.18. Witodlice sume dæge on æfenne he het weorpan
iserne geloman in þæs mynstres wyrtgeard, þa isern geloman gewunelice
naman we hataþ spadan & spitelas, & cwæð to his þegnum:
weorpað in ðone wyrtgeard þus manige spada & eow hraðe gangað
onweg.
 14.201.22. Soþlice þære ylcan niht, þa þa he aras
æfter his gewunan mid his gebroþrum drihtne lof to secganne, æfter
þon he bebead & cwæð: gað nu & geseoðað ura wyrtena sufl,
þæt hit sy on ærnemergen gearu.
 14.201.25. & þa gewordenum ærmergenne he het beran mid him
þone suflmete, þe he ær het gegearwian, & þa in eode mid þam
broðrum in ðone wyrtgeard & þær gemette swa manige wyrcende
wyrhtan in ðone wyrtgearde, swa manige swa he ær het spadena þær in
weorpan.
 14.202.1. Soþlice þær wæron in gangende þeofas in
þone wyrtgeard; ac þurh Godes gast onwendum heora mode fram þære
þyfþe hi onfengon þa þa spada & fram þære tide, þe hi
þider in eodon, hi adulfon gehwylcne dæl þæs wyrtgeardes, þæs
þe þær ær undolfen wæs.
 14.202.4. Be þam se drihtnes wer, þa he to heom in eode, he
cwæð: on sælum, la broðru, on sælum.
 14.202.6. Hwæt.
 14.202.6. Ge wel habbað geworht & gewunnen.
 14.202.7. Blinnað nu sume hwile.
 14.202.7. & heom þa sona het syllan þa andlyfne, þe he
ær brohte, & hi gereorde æfter þam geswince swa myccles gewinnes.
 14.202.9. & þa þa hi genoh fulle wæron, ne cwæð to
heom: he willað ge nu leng þeofian ne yfel don, ac swa oft swa ge hwæt
willað of þysum wyrtgearde habban, gað þonne to þæs wyrtgeardes
geate & mid gedæftum biddað & mid bletsunge nimaþ &
geswicað fram ðam þweoran þære þyfðe.
 14.202.13. & þa het he heora æghwylcum gesomnian his
byrþene wyrta.
 14.202.14. & þa wæs swa geworden, þæt þa þe
þider comon to þam wyrtgearde, to þon þæt hi þær hwæthugu
forstælon, þæt hi æfter þon cyrdon buton þeofte mid ðære
mede heora gewinnes mid bletsunge & mid gyfum gefylgde.
 14.202.17. Eac swylce on sume tide to him genealæhton sume
ælþeodige men & his mildheortnesse bædon oferhangene mid toslitenum
claðum, swa þæt hi wæron ful neah nacode gesewene.
 14.202.20. & þa þa hi hine hrægles bædon, swigende
gehyrde heora word se drihtnes wer, & he ænne of his þegnum deogollice
to him gecigde & him bebead & cwæð: gang & sec in þære
stowe, þe ic þe secge, an hol treow & bring me þa hrægl, þe þu
þær inne finde.
 14.202.24. & þa þa se þegn eode & þæt treow
sohte & funde, swa swa him beboden wæs, & þæt hrægl
deogollice brohte to þam lareowe, þæt þa se drihtnes wer þam
ælþeodigan & þam nacodan endum mannum eowde & cwæð: cumað
nu & nimað þis hrægl & scrydað eow mid, forðon þe ge
nacode syndon.
 14.202.28. Þa hi þas hrægl gesawon, hi gecneowon, þæt
hi hi ær gehyddon, & wurdon afærede mid mycelre scame, &
scamiende hi onfengon heora agenu hrægl, þa þe hi mid facne fræmde
sohton.
 14.203.3. Hit gelamp eac on oþre tid, þæt sum man wæs
hine sylfne befæstende to his gebedum & him onsænde be his cnihtum
twa spyrtan fulle metes, þara oðre se cniht wiðbræd & on ðam
wege ahydde, & þa oðre brohte to ðam Godes men & his hlafordes
bene him sægde, se hine sylfne þam halgan men in his gebede þurh þas
lac befæste.
 14.203.8. & he þa se Godes wer þa ane þancfullice onfeng
& þone ylcan cniht lærde & cwæð: þis me is on þance, ac
beheald þu, þæt þu þære oðre ne onhrine, þe þu be þam
wege ahyddest, forþon þe an næddre þær wæs in gangende.
 14.203.11. Beo þu forþon wær, þæt þu ne sy
geslægen fram þære nædran, gif þu þa spyrtan unwærlice nyman
wylle.
 14.203.13. For ðam wordum þa se cniht swiðe scamiende wæs
gefeonde, þæt he þone deað geþigde, ac he þehhwæðre wæs
geunrotsod, þeah þe he aræfnede halwendlic wite, hwæþre he bær
his agene scame.
 14.203.16. & þa wæs eft cyrrende to þære spyrtan
& wærlice hawode & geseah, þæt seo nædre þær in wæs,
swa swa se Godes wer him ær sæde.
 14.203.18. Witodlice þa þa se Godes man unwiðmetedlice wæs
geweorðod mid forhæfdnesse mægne & forhogunge woruldæhta mid
witedomes gaste & gebedes geornesse, an þing wæs, þæt gesewen
wæs on him tælwyrðe beon, þæt full oft swa mycclu blis in him
wæs gesægenu beon, þæt he nane þinga næs gelyfed beon gefylled
mid swa manigum mægnum swa he wæs, nymðe hine man þe gearwor
cuðe/.
 14.203.24. Petrus cwæð: hwæt.
 14.203.25. Ic la acsie þe, hwæt cweþe wit þis beon, þe
he his sylfes wyllan geleoðode in him sylfum þære blisse geweald,
hwæþer þe his mod wære hwylum getogen & genyded to þysum
andweardan gefean, þeh þe him laðre wære, þa he swa manigra mægna
full wæs?
 14.203.29. Gregorius him andswarode & cwæð: mycel is seo
gestihtung þæs ælmihtigan Godes, & full oft hit gelimpeð,
þæt he hwilum ne syleð þa læssan dæde sume, þam þe he maran
wundru gegearwað, þæt symble heora mod hæfde hwæthugu þæs
þe hit mihte hit sylf symble big getælan, þæt hi, þonne hi
gewilniað fullfremede beon & þonne ne magon, hi winnan in þan, þe
hi na ne onfengon, & hwæðre ne ahebban na hi sylfe in oferhigde in
þam wundrum, þe hi habbað heom on gewealde, þeah þe hy æfter
þam læssan winnan.
 14.204.7. Ac þis byð gedon, to ðon þæt hi leornian,
þæt hi nabbað of heom sylfum þa maran wundru, þa þe in him sylfum
ne magon oferswiðan þa lytlan & þa ytemestan uncyste.
 14.204.10. Þanon wæs geworden, þæt ure drihten længest
geheold Philisteas & Chananeas adwæscende ealle þa strangan & þa
hwatestan þara wiðerbrecene gelæddum his folce to þam behatlande,
þæt þæt, swa swa hit awriten is, Israhela folc byþ acunnod on
rihtne dom in ðam twam cynnum.
 14.204.14. Forþon þe full swiðe oft, swa swa hit gecweden
wæs, eac swylce he lyfeð sumum mannum sume tælwyrðe wisan, þam þe
he ær sealde þa mycclan gife, þæt hi symble habban hwæthugu
þæs þe hi magon wið winnan & feohtan. & hi hyra mod upp ne
aræran & ne gylpan þæs þe hi habban, þeah þe hi habban heora
feond in þam mycclum dædum oferswiðede, forþon þe hi in þam
læssan dædum þonne gyta beoð geswæncte fram heora wiðerbrocum.
 14.204.21. & swa hit geweorðeð wundorlicum gemete, þæt
an & þæt ilce mod ægþer ge mid healicum mægnum weaxeð &
strangað & eac of his agenre untrymnysse wergað & teorað, to
þon þæt hit geseo hit sylf beon on oþre healfe fæstlice getimbrod
& on oþre tyderlice toworpen, to ðon þæt hit eadmodlice &
fæste healde þæt god, þæt hit hafaþ, þonne hit habban ne
mæg þæt, þæt hit seceð & georneð.
 14.204.27. Ac hwylc wundor is, þeah þe we þis be mannum
secgan, nu seo uplice leodræden þære ængellican gecynde of sumum
dæle æfwerdlan & wonunge aræfnede of hyra efenceasterwarum &
on sumum dæle fæstlice gestod & gewunode, swa þæt þa gecorenan
engla gastas selfe swa myccle strenglicor & fæstlicor gestodon, swa
myccle swa hi eadmodran wæron, þurh oferhigde þa oðre ofdune
afeollon?
 14.205.5. Soðlice hi forðfremedon & þungon þurh þa
wununge heora geferscipes, & of ðam dæle heora toworpnysse &
gedales to ecnesse staðole þy staðolfæstlicor hi wæron getrymede.
 14.205.7. Þus hit byð gedon in anlepra gehwylcre sawle,
þæt heo byð full oft to þam mæstan gestreonum gehealdenu of þam
lytlan woningum in þa heardnesse & wearde heora sylfra eadmodnesse.
 14.205.10. Petrus cwæð: wel me licað þæt þu cwyst.
 15.205.12. Gregorius cwæð: þis ic eac ne forswigie, þæt
þæt ic gecneow of þam ylcan lande þurh þa sægene þæs
arwyrðan weres & mæssepreostes, þam wæs nama Sanctulus; be
þæs wordum þu naht ne tweost, forðon þe þu geare canst his lif
& geleafan.
 15.205.14. Eac swylce in ða ylcan tid eardodon II weras on
ðam/ dælum Nursige þære mægðe in life & in hade haliges
drohtoðes, þara wæs oþer gehaten Euticius, oþer wæs genemned
Florentius.
 15.205.18. Ac se ylca Euticius aweox & gestrangode in gastlicum
elne & in þam wylme godcundra mægna & ageornde, þæt he
manigra manna sawla þurh þa trymnesse godcundre lare gelædde to
drihtne.
 15.205.21. Soðlice Florentius he helde þæt lif in
bilwitnesse & in halgum gebedum.
 15.205.22. Witodlice þær wæs mynster unfeorr fram heora
huse, þæt wæs forlæten & hyrdeleas for heora hlafordes deaðe
& forþfore of þam mynstre.
 15.205.24. Þa woldon þa munecas habban heom to hlaforde þone
ylcan Euticium.
 15.205.25. He wæs sona geþafiende heora bene & hi
underfeng & manega gær heold þæt mynstre & wel beeode &
geteah þara muneca mod in þa geornesse haliges lifes & drohtoðes
& let wunian þone arwyrðan wer Florentium in þam gebedhuse, þe he
ær in eardode, þy læs hit æmtig stode.
 15.206.2. In þam þa Florentius ana eardode, sume dæge he
astrehte hine sylfne in gebed & bæd fram þam ælmihtigan drihtne,
þæt he wære gemedemod him forgyfan & sellan hwylcehugu frofre
þær/ to eardianne.
 15.206.5. & sona swa he þæt gebed gefylde, he eode ut of
þam gebedhuse & gemette ænne beran standan beforan þam durum.
 15.206.7. He ofdune onhylde his heafod to þære eorðan &
nawiht eowode his reðnesse on his gebærum, þæt hit openlice wæs
ongyten, þæt he þyder com to þegnunge þæs Godes weres.
 15.206.9. Þæt þa se drihtnes wer sona oncneow, forþon
þær to lafe wunedon feower scep oððe V æt his cytan, & þa
nyste he, hwa hi heolde.
 15.206.11. He þa bebead þam ylcan beran & cwæð: gang
& drif þa sceap in heora læse & cum eft to middes dæges ham.
 15.206.13. Þa witodlice ongan þis unablinnendlice beon gedon,
þæt is þonne se heordelice gyming, seo ðe to þam beran wæs
beþancenu.
 15.206.15. & hyt þa þæt wilde deor swa fæstende fedde
& heold þa sceap, þe hit ær gewunode etan.
 15.206.16. & þonne se drihtnes wer to nones wolde fæstan,
þonne bebead he þam beran, þæt he ham hwurfe mid þam sceapum to
þære nontide, & þonne he fæstan nolde, þæt he þonne come
to middes dæges.
 15.206.19. & swa ða in eallum þam wisum se bere hyrde þam
bebode þæs Godes weres, þæt he no to middes dæges ham com, þonne
him wæs beboden, þæt he to nones sceolde ham cuman.
 15.206.23. & þa þa þis wæs lange swa gedon, þa ongan
in þære ylcan stowe se hlisa swa myccles mægenes feor & wide beon
gemærsad.
 15.206.25. Ac forþon þe se ealda feond þonne getihð to wite
& to yfle þa forhwyrfdan mæn þurh andan & æfæste, þonne
þe he sceawaþ þa godan fremian & weaxan to Godes wuldre, þa
ongunnon feower of þam þegnum þæs arwyrðan Euticius swiðlice
æfæstigan, þæt heora hlaford nænig wunder ne worhte, & þes,
se þe ana wæs forlæten, fore swa mycclum wundre wearð widmære.
 15.206.30. & þa hatiende hi ofslogon þone ylcan beran.
 15.207.1. & þa þa he ham ne com in ða tid, þe him
bebead, se Godes wer Florentius þa wende his hamcymes & his abad oþ
æfentid, & þa ongan he beon sarig, forþon þe se bera ham ne com,
þone he gewunode for bilwitnesse broðor cigan.
 15.207.4. He þa sona oðre dæge ferde ut geond þæt land
samod secende þone beran & þa sceap, & þa funde he þone beran
ofslægene & geornlice ongan acsian & eac hraðe geacsode, fram hwan
he ofslagen wæs, & sealde hine sylfne in wop & in cwiðnesse &
ma weop þara broðra nið, þonne þæs beran deað.
 15.207.9. Þone þa se arwyrða wer Euticius to him gelaðode
& hine ongan frefrian; ac se ylca drihtnes wer Florentius beforan þam
broþrum mid þære uneþnysse swa myccles sares onæled biddende
cwæð: ic gehyhte on þone ælmihtigan God, þæt hi in þysum life
beforan eallra manna eagum heora niðes sume wrace onfon, forþon þe hy
minne beran ofslogon unscyldigne, se þe heom nane dere ne dyde.
 15.207.14. & sona seo godcunde wracu wæs fylgende his
muðes stefne.
 15.207.15. Witodlice þa IIII munecas, þe þone ylcan beran
ofslogon, sona wurdon þurhslægene mid þære adle þæs mycclan
lices, swa þæt afuliendum lichaman hi mid ealle forwurdon.
 15.207.18. Þa se Godes wer Florentius swyðlice forhtode &
him ondred, forþon þe he þa broðra swa swiðe wyrgde, & þa
forþon weop þa hwile þe he lifde, forþon þe he swa hraþe gehyred
wæs in ðære bene, & sæde, þæt he heora deaðes myrðra
wære.
 15.207.22. We gelyfað, þæt se ælmihtiga God þæt
forþon dyde, þy læs se halga wer swa wundorlice bilwitnesse
geþristlæhte ofer þæt ænigne man wyrgan, þeh þe he mid hwylcum
sare gegremed & abolgen wære.
 15.207.25. Petrus cwæð: cwyst þu la, gelyfað we gewislice
þæt beon hefige synne & myccle, gif we hwylcum men wyrgað mid yrre
onstyrede?
 15.207.27. Gregorius cwæð: to hwan acsast þu me be þyssere
synne, hwæðer heo hefig sy?
 15.207.28. Gemyne, hwæt sanctus Paulus cwæð: wyrigcwidole
men ne magon hi sittan on Godes rice.
 15.207.29. Gehyge nu, hu mycel seo syn sy, seo þone man
asyndrað fram Godes rice.
 15.208.1. Petrus cwæð: ac hu byð þæt gif hit
gelimpeþ, þæt se man þæt wyrignesse word ne gecwið to his þam
nehstan for hete & niþe, ac hit sceoteð forð þurh his tungan
gymeleasnesse?
 15.208.4. Gregorius him andswarode: gehyr þis, Petrus: nu mid
þam þearlwisan deman þæt unnytte word byð getæled, þeah þe
hit butan niðe gecweden sy, & swa myccle ma þæt scyldige word byð
gewitnod, gif hit mid feondscipe byþ gesprecen?
 15.208.8. Ac geþenc forþon: nu þæt word byð wites
wyrðe, þe butan niðe byþ, hu swiðe fordemedlic þæt byþ, þe
ne byð butan hete & niðe gesprecen.
 15.208.10. Petrus cwæð: ic hit geþence & wel gelyfe.
 15.208.11. Gregorius þa gyt spræc: se ylca Godes wer dyde þa
gyt oðer wundor, þæt ne sceall beon forswigod.
 15.208.12. Soðlice þa þa his se myccla hlysa weox &
mærsode feor & wide, sum deacon wæs feor þanon hamfæst, se
gewilnode feran to him, þæt he hine sylfne mid his gebedum befæste.
 15.208.15. & þa þa he com to ðæs halgan mannes cytan,
he gemette ealle þa stowe fulle unarimedra nædrena in þam ingange
þære cytan, & mid þy þe se diacon swyðe aforhtode & cleopode
þus & cwæð: gebide þe la, drihtnes þeowa, gebide.
 15.208.18. & hit wæs þa wundorlic smyltnes þære
lyfte, & he þa Florentius ut eode & ahof his eagan up to heofonum
& his folme aðenede & wilnode, þæt drihten him þone wol fram
afyrsode.
 15.208.21. Þa semninga for ðæs halgan weres stefne
ahleoðrede se heofon, & seo þunorad ofsloh ealle þa nædran, þe
þa stowe abysgodon.
 15.208.22. & þa þa se drihtnes wer geseah þa nædran
ofslagene, he cwæð: drihten, geseoh, þæt þu acwealdest þas
nædran, ac hwa ahefeþ hi heonon?
 15.208.25. & sona swa þæt gecweden wæs, þær comon
swa manige fugelas, swa þara ofslagenra nædra wæron.
 15.208.26. & hi þa onweg abæron æghwylce & swiðe
feor awurpon & gedydon full clæne þara nædrena þa eardungstowe
þæs halgan mannes.
 15.209.1. Petrus cwæð: hwæt cweðað we, hwylces
mægnes & hwylcre geearnunge þæt wære, þæt symble his muðe
wæs swa swiðe neah se ælmihtiga God?
 15.209.3. Gregorius him andswarode: swyðe þyhð la, Petrus,
seo clænnes, & fremað seo bilwitnes þære mænniscan heortan mid
þæs ælmihtigan Godes þære synderlican clænnesse & his
þære bilwitan gecynde.
 15.209.6. Witodlice þæt ilce, þæt his þeowas ne
sprecaþ þa idlan word, þæt is þy þe hi beoð asceadene fram
eorðlicum dædum, & bewarniaþ hi, þæt hi hira mod ne
