GD 1 (H)
B9.5.8.2.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Book 1: Hecht 1900-7, 11, 14-90.



 1.11.1. Be Honorate þam cnihte, hu him wæs gemeted fisc on
þam munte.
 2.14.25. Com to sumre ea, þære nama is Uulturnus.
 2.14.26. Þær hy ealle ongunnon hyra hors mid heora sceftum
þerscan & mid heora spurum heawan & wundian, oð þæt hy
ungesundlice geswencede wæron.
 2.15.3. Ac þeah þa hors wæron mid swipum swiðe geswungene
& mid þam spurum mistucode, hy swa þeah of þam stedum hy astyrian ne
mihton, ac swa swiðe hi þære ea wæteres hrine him ondredon, swilce
hit wære sum deaðes scyfe.
 2.15.10. Þa þa onsittendas þara horsa mid langum geþersce
hyra hors geswencton, þa ongeat & oncneow hyra an, þæt hy gehindrode
wæron for þam gylte, þe hi þone Godes man ær on wege his horses
bereafedon & hine his siþes agældon.
 2.15.17. Hi þa sona eft gecyrdon æfter him & hine
Libertinum gemetton on his gebed astrehtne.
 2.15.19. Hi cwædon þa to him, aris & nim þin hors.
 2.15.21. He him andswarode þus, farað ge teala & his wel
brucað, nis me þæs horses nan neod.
 2.15.24. Hi þa sona lihton & hine neadlunga ahofon up on
þæt hors, þe hi hine ær of awurpon, & hrædlice him þanon
gewiton.
 2.15.27. & hyra hors þa mid swa hrædlicum ryne oferferdon
þa ea, þe hy ær oferfaran ne mihton, efne swilce seo ea on hyre næfde
nænne wæteres stream.
 2.15.32. & wæs swa geworden, þæt, þa þam Godes
þeowe wæs his an hors agifen, þa underfengon hi ealle æt him hyra
horsa to brucenne & to notienne.
 2.16.5. Be Libertine, hu he næs funden, þeah þe he andweard
wære.
 2.16.6. On þam ylcan timan gelamp on Langbeardana landes
dælum, þæt Bucellinus com mid Francum, forþam þe he gehyrde þone
hlisan of þam mynstre þæs foresprecenan Godes þeowes & him wæs
gesæd, þæt he mycel feoh on þam mynstre hæfde.
 2.16.13. Þa ongunnon þa Francan steppan in to þære
cyricean & reðgiende Libertinum sohton & hine mid hreame axodon
þær þær he on his gebedum læg astreht eallum limum.
 2.16.19. Wæs þær wundorlic þing geworden, þæt
þonne þa reðgiendan Francan inneodon hine secende, hi spurnon mid hyra
fotum æt þam halgan were, þær he on his gebedum læg, & hi swa
þeah hine geseon ne mihton.
 2.16.25. & hy swa mid blindnysse wurdon gedwelede, þæt hi
eft of þam mynstre idelhende hwurfon.
 2.17.1. Hu Libertinus awehte of deaðe sumes wifes sunu.
 2.17.2. Eac on oðrum timan he ferde to Rauennam þære byrig
for þæs mynstres þingum mid hæse þæs abbodes, þe wæs
þæs mynstres hyrde æfter Honorate his lareowe.
 2.17.7. Soðlice se Libertinus gewunode, þæt, swa hwyder swa
he ferde, simle he bær on his bosme þæs arwurðan Honorates scoh for
þære mycelan lufe his lareowes.
 2.17.11. Witodlice, þa þa he ferde on his weg, þa gelamp,
þæt sum wif bær hire deadan sunu ongean þone halgan Libertinum.
 2.17.15. Heo þa hine geornlice beheold & wearð onæled
mid lufu hire deadan suna & genam þa þæs halgan weres hors be þam
bridele & mid aðsware him to cwæð, na to þæs hwon ne færst
þu heonon, buton þu minne sunu awecce & hine me cukenne agife.
 2.17.23. He þa aforhtode for hire halsiendlican bene, forþam
þe him wæs ungewunelic swilc wundor to wyrcenne.
 2.17.26. He wolde þa þæt wif forbugan, ac he þurh nan
þing ne mihte.
 2.17.28. Smeade þa on his mode, hu him wære on þam to
donne.
 2.18.2. La, Petrus, nu me lysteð asmeagean, hwilc & hu micel
wære þæt gecamp, þe wann on þæs rihtwisan mannes breostum.
 2.18.6. Þær fleat betweoh him seo eaðmodnys his sylfes lifes
& seo arfæstnys & frofor þæs deadan mannes modor.
 2.18.9. Him wæs micel ege, gif he to þam gedyrstlæhte,
þæt he þæs ungewunelican þinges to Gode gewilnode, & he wæs
eac to þam earmheort, þæt him ofhreow þæt astepede wif, gif he ne
gehulpe hire sarlican dreorinysse.
 2.18.15. Ac þa to maran wuldre þæs ælmihtigan Godes seo
arfæstnys oferswyðde þone strangan breost, forþam nære þæs
arwurðan weres breost na oferfunden, gif hine ne geliðegode seo arfæste
behreowsung þære mildheortnysse.
 2.18.21. Ac gelihte þa of his horse & his cneowa gebigde
& to heofonum his handa aþenode & þone sco of his bosme ateah &
hine asette ofer þæs deadan cnihtes breost.
 2.18.27. & him þa gebiddendum þæs cnihtes sawl gehwearf
eft to þam lichaman.
 2.18.29. He þa hine mid his handa genam & hine libbendne
ageaf his wependan meder & ferde him forð on his weg, þe he ær
begann.
 2.18.34. Petrus cwæð, hwæt cweðað we, hwæðer
þæt mægen þus miceles wundres gedyde þe Honorates earnung, þe
Libertines gewilnung?
 2.19.3. Gregorius him andwyrde, on ætywednysse swa wundorlices
tacnes mid þæs wifes geleafan wearð gesomnod hyra begra mægen.
 2.19.6. & eac ic wene, þæt Libertinus mihte þis gedon,
forþam þe he getruwode be his lareowes mægene swyðor, þonne be his
agenum mægene.
 2.19.11. His lareowes sco he asette on þæs deadan lichaman
breost & sona butan twynunge begeat þa sawle, þe he bæd.
 2.19.14. Soðlice eac is awriten, þæt Heliseus se witega
becom to þære ea Iordanen & bær his lareowes reaf.
 2.19.17. & þa sloh he æne on þæt wæter mid þam
reafe & wolde him weg gewyrcean, swa swa he ær geseah his lareow don, ac
he ne mihte na þæt wæter todælan.
 2.19.22. He þa sona cwæð, hwær is nu Helias God mines
lareowes?
 2.19.24. Ða sloh he eft on þone stream mid his lareowes reafe
& him weg geworhte betweoh þam wæterum.
 2.19.27. Ongitst þu nu, Petrus, hu swiðe seo eadmodnys
fremað, þam þe wyrceað þa godan mægenu?
 2.19.29. & eac þu miht oncnawan, þæt Heliseus mihte sona
begitan his lareowes mægen, þa þa he him sylfum to gemynde geteah his
lareowes naman.
 2.20.1. & he sona him sylf geworhte þa mægenu, þe his
lareow ær worhte, forþam þe he under þam lareowe gehwearf to
eadmodnysse.
 2.20.4. Petrus cwæð, wel me licað þæs þe þu
sægst.
 2.20.6. Ac ic bidde þe, þæt þu secge me, hwæðer þu
nu gyta ænig þing mare wite be þam godan men us to lare & to
trymminge.
 2.20.11. Be Libertinus geþylde, þe he hæfde wið his
abbod.
 2.20.12. Gregorius him cwæð to, gewislice ic mæg be him
mare secgan, ac ic nat, hwæðer ænig is, þe hine geefenlæcean
wille.
 2.20.15. Ic soðlice gelyfe, þæt þæs geþyldes mægen
si mare, þonne þa tacna & þa wundra.
 2.20.18. Hit gelamp sumon dæge, þæt se abbod, þe æfter
þæs arwurðan Honorates forðfore heold þæs mynstres reccendom, mid
mycelre hatheortnysse wearð þearle gebolgen wið þone arwurðan wer
Libertinum, swa swyðe, þæt he hine mid his handum hetelice beot.
 2.20.25. & þa forþam þe he næfde nænne repel hine
mid to þersceanne, þa gelæhte he þone fotscamul ætforan his bedde
& beot Libertinum on þæt heafod & on þa ansyne, oð þæt
eall his andwlita wearð toswollen & awannod.
 2.20.32. Ða þa he swa swiðe mid geþersce mistucod wæs,
þa gewat he swigende to his agenum bedde.
 2.20.35. Ða oðre dæge hæfde Libertinus gecweden sume
gemotstowe for sumre þearfe þæs mynstres.
 2.21.3. & þa þa he gefylled hæfde his uhtsang & his
gebedu, þa eode he to þam abbode, þær he on his bedde wæs &
eadmodlice bæd his bledsunge.
 2.21.7. Ða gemunde se abbod, hu swiðe se halga wer wæs
gelufod & gearwurðod fram eallum mannum, wende þa, þæt he mid
ealle of þam mynstre gewitan wolde for þam teonan, þe he him ær
gedyde.
 2.21.13. Þa axode he hine þus cweðende, hwyder wylt þu
faran?
 2.21.15. Him þa Libertinus andswarode, leof fæder, ic hæfde
gyrstandæge gecweden, þæt ic nu todæg wolde cuman ymbe sume þearfe
þyses mynstres, & ic forþam hit nu yldan ne mæg.
 2.21.21. Hwæt, þa se abbod of inneweardre his heortan
besceawode his agene reðnysse & heardnysse, & eac he gemunde
Libertines mycelan eadmodnysse & geþwærnysse, & he þa of his
bedde forð aræsde & Libertinum be his fotum genam & cwæð,
þæt he wið hine agylt hæfde & wið hine scyldi wære, forþam
þe he geþristlæhte, þæt he swa micelum & swa mærum were swa
wælhreowne teonan gedyde.
 2.21.32. Þær ongean þa eac Libertinus hine sylfne on
eorðan astrehte to þæs abbodes fotum & cwæð, þæt hit
wære for his agenum gylte þæt broc, þæt he þolode, & na for
þæs abbodes reðnysse.
 2.22.6. & swa wæs geworden, þæt se abbod wearð
getogen to mycelre geþwærnysse, & wearð þæs gingran eadmodnys
þam abbode to lareowe.
 2.22.10. Þa þa he for þæs mynstres þearfe utferde, swa
swa he ær gecweden hæfde, þa beheoldon hine fela his cuðra manna,
ægðer ge æðelborene ge oðre, þe hine simle arwurðedon.
 2.22.15. & hy swyðe wundredon & geornlice axodon, hwæt
þæt þinga wære, þæt he hæfde swa toswollenne & swa wanne
andwlitan.
 2.22.19. He þa him to cwæð, gyrstanæfenne me gelamp for
minum synnum, þæt ic ungewealdes ætspearn æt anum fotsceamole, &
ic þa wearð þus getucod.
 2.22.24. & se halga wer on his breostum swa geheold þone
wurðmynd þære soðfæstnysse, swa þæt he na ne ameldode his
abbodes unþeawa, ne he eac ne bearn on leasunga synne.
 2.22.29. Petrus cwæð, wenað we, hwæðer þes arwurða
wer Libertinus, be þam þu þus fela tacna & wundra rehtest, on swa
rumre & micelre gesamnunge læfde ænie efenlæcendras his
mægena?
 3.23.4. Be þam wyrtwearde, hu he bebead þære næddran þa
wyrta to healdenne.
 3.23.6. Gregorius him andswarode, Felix wæs haten sum broður,
se wæs eac genemned Curuus, þone þu sylf wel cuðest, se nu niwan
wearð prafost þæs ylcan mynstres.
 3.23.11. Se me sæde fela wundorlicra þinga be þam broðrum
þæs ilcan mynstres.
 3.23.13. Of þam wundrum ic wille gereccean sume þing, þe me
to gemynde becumað, forþam þe ic efste to oðrum spellum.
 3.23.16. Ac swa þeah ne wene ic na, þæt sy to forlætenne
an þara spella, þe me fram þam ylcan breðer gesæd wæs.
 3.23.20. On þam ylcan mynstre wæs sum mæres lifes munuc, se
wæs wyrtweard þæs mynstres.
 3.23.22. Þa gewunode an þeof, þæt he stah ofer þone hege
& digellice stæl þa wyrta.
 3.23.25. Swa se wyrtweard his wyrta geornor & ma plantode, swa
he hyra eft læs funde, þonne he to com, he geseah, þæt sume þa
wyrta wæron mid fotum fortredene, sume hy wæron mid ealle fornumene.
 3.23.31. He þa utan ymbeode ealne þone wyrttun, oð þæt
he funde, hwær se þeof gewunode, þæt he instah ofer þone hege.
 3.24.2. Þa geondeode he eft þone wyrttun & gemette ane
næddran, þære he bebeodende þus to cwæð, fylig þu me.
 3.24.6. & hy þa becomon to þære stigole, þær se
þeof innstah on þone wyrttun.
 3.24.8. He þa se wyrtweard bebead þære næddran þus
cweðende, on þæs hælendes naman ic þe bebeode, þæt þu
gehealde þas stigole, & þu ne læte þone þeof her inngangan.
 3.24.13. Seo næddre þa hræddlice hy sylfe oncyrde & big
þære stigele hy astrehte, & se munuc gehwearf in to his cyricean.
 3.24.17. Ða þa ealle men stille wæron ymb midne dæg, þa
com se þeof, swa swa his gewuna wæs, & stah upp on þone hege.
 3.24.21. & þa þa he his oðerne fot nyðer asette binnon
þone wyrttun, þa færinga geseah he, þæt seo astrehte næddre his
weg beleac.
 3.24.25. He þa wearð on him sylfum swiðe afæred &
nyðerweard hreas.
 3.24.26. & þa wearð his oðer fot be his sco fæst on
anum hegesahle, & he swa hangode nyþer onwendum heafde, oð þæt se
wyrtweard eft þyder com.
 3.24.31. Ða com se wyrtweard on gewunelicre tide, & he þone
þeof þær on hege hangiendne funde.
 3.24.34. Ða cwæð he to þære næddran, Gode þanc,
þæt þu gefylldest, þæt ic þe bebead.
 3.25.1. Far þu nu swa hwider swa þu wille.
 3.25.2. & seo næddre sona þanon gewat.
 3.25.3. He cwæð þa to þam þeofe, broðor, hwæt is
nu?
 3.25.5. Nu hæfð God þe geseald me on geweald.
 3.25.6. Hu gedyrstlæhtest þu, þæt þu þus oft
stalodest on þysra muneca geswince?
 3.25.9. & he þa mid þysum wordum þæs þeofes fot
ahlinode of þam hege, þe he ær fæste on clifode, & hine
ungederedne nyðer asette & him to cwæð, gang mid me.
 3.25.14. He þa hine gelædde to þæs wyrttunes geate, &
þa wyrta, þe he ær mid stale gewilnode to ætbredanne, þa he him mid
mycelre werednysse sealde & him to cwæð, gang nu & æfter
þysum ne stel þu nan þing, ac þonne þe þearf beo, gang þu hider
in to me, & þæt þu ær mid unrihtum geswince gename, þæt ic
þe mid estfullum mode sylle.
 3.25.24. Petrus cwæð, nu oð þis, þæs þe me
þinceð, on idel ic wende, þæt on Suðlangbeardum næron nane
fæderas, þe wundortacnu wyrcean mihton.
 4.25.29. Be Equitio abbude, hu him wæs geþuht, þæt se
engel hine belisnode vel geldede.
 4.25.31. Gregorius cwæð, se arwurða wer Furtunatus, se
wæs abbod þæs mynstres, þe is nemned Ciceronis bæð, & eac
oðre arwurðe weras me rehton, þæt ic nu secgan wylle.
 4.26.3. On Ualeria þære mægðe wæs sum swiðe halig
wer, þam wæs nama æquitius se for his lifes geearnunge wæs gehæfd
micelre halinysse man mid eallum, þam þe hine cuðon.
 4.26.8. Þam eac se ylca Furtunatus wæs hiwcuðlice cuð.
 4.26.10. Soðlice se æquitius for þære micelnysse his
halinysse wearð manigra mynstra fæder & lareow on þære ylcan
mægðe.
 4.26.13. Witodlice him gelamp on þam timan his iugoðe, þæt
he wearð mid teartum gewinne his lichaman lustes þearle geswenced.
 4.26.17. Ac þa angsumnysse his costnunge hine gedydon micele þe
geornfulran to þam bigenge his gebeda.
 4.26.20. Þa þa he on þysum þinge mid singalum gebedum him
læcedom sohte to þam ælmihtigan Gode, þa on sumre nihte geseah he on
gesihþe him ætstandan Godes engel & hine belisnian vel gelden, &
he his gesihþe ætywde, þæt he ælce styrunge of acearf of his
cennendlicum limum.
 4.26.28. & he eac of þære tide fram þære costnunge
wearð swa fremde, swilce he þone wæpnedhad on his lichaman næfde.
 4.26.31. He wearð þa þurh Godes ælmihtiges fultum mid
þam mægene gestrangod to þam swiðe, þæt se þe ær wæs
ealdor wæpnedmanna swa þeah ne geswac he to manienne his gingran,
þæt hy of his bysene on þysum þingum him sylfum eaðelice ne
getruwodon þone wifhired to healdene & þurh þæt cunnodon þære
Godes gife, þe hy na ne onfengon, swyðor þonne hit wærlic wære.
 4.27.13. Be Basilio, þe com to æquitie on muneclicum gyrelan.
 4.27.14. On þam ylcan timan, þe þa drycræftigan wurdon
arasode on þysre Romaniscean byri, gelamp, þæt Basilius on munucreafe
fleonde gesohte Ualeriam þa mægðe.
 4.27.18. Se Basilius wæs fyrmest on þam drycræftum.
 4.27.20. He ferde þa to þam arwurðan were Castorio, se wæs
bisceop Amiternine þære ceastre.
 4.27.23. Hopode he to him & gewilnode, þæt he hine
æquitio þam abbode befæste to þam, þæt he wære læce on
þam nun mynstre.
 4.27.26. Þa ferde se bisceop, oð þæt he becom to ðam
mynstre & mid him lædde Basilium þone leasan munuc & bæd ða
Equitium þone Godes þeow, þæt he underfenge þone munuc in to his
gesamnunge.
 4.27.32. Þa sona swa se halga wer locode on hine, þa cwæð
he to þam bisceope, leof fæder, ne þinceð me na, þæt þes si
munuc, þe þu me beodest, ac ic geseo, þæt he is swutol deofol.
 4.28.5. Him þa se bisceop andswarode & cwæð, nu þu
secest beladunge, þæt þu ne þurfe getiðian þæs þe ic þe
bidde.
 4.28.9. Se Godes þeow þa sona him to cwæð, witodlice ic
secge be him þæt þæt ic him on geseo.
 4.28.12. Ac swa þeah ne wen þu na, þæt ic þe hyran
nelle.
 4.28.13. Ic do þæt þu me hatest.
 4.28.14. He wearð þa underfangen in to þam mynstre.
 4.28.16. Ða æfter feawum dagum ferde se Godes þeow hwon
feorr fram þam mynstre to lærenne geleaffulle men to þam upplicum
gewilnungum.
 4.28.20. Þa gelamp hit sona swa he on færelde wæs, þæt
on þære fæmnena mynstre, on þam wacode eac þæs ilcan fæder
ymbehoga, an þara nunnena, seo wæs swiðe fæger æfter þæs
lichaman gesceape, wearð færlice mid fefore geswenced & þearle
geangsumod & na mid rihtstefnum, ac mid micelum hreame & gristbitunge
ongann clypian & cweðan, nu ic sceal sweltan, buton Basilius se munuc
cume, & he me gehæle mid his læcecræfte.
 4.28.33. Þa ne dorste nan þæra munuca on hyra ealdres
framsiþe gangan inn to þæra fæmnena gesomnunge, & micele læs
se þe þa niwan com, & wæs his lif þa gyt uncuð þara broðra
gesamnunge.
 4.29.6. Ac þa hrædlice wæs asend to þam Godes þeowe
æquitie & him gecydde, þæt seo nunne wære getyrfed mid
ormætum feforadlum, & þæt heo mid angsumnysse geornlice bæde
Basilies neosunge þæs munuces.
 4.29.12. Swa þe halga wer þis gehyrde, þa smercode he swilce
he þæt spell forhogode and þus cwæð, hu, ne sæde ic hit ær,
þæt he wære deofol & na munuc?
 4.29.17. Farað nu & hine adrifað ut of þam mynstre, &
ne beo ge na carfulle be þære Godes þeowene, þe þær swa
angsumlice wæs mid feforadle geþread, forþam þe of þysre ylcan tide
ne bið heo na swincende on feforadlum, ne eac heo ne gyrneð Basilies
tocymes.
 4.29.25. Þa gecyrde him ham se munuc, þe hit ærendode, &
sona oncneow, þæt seo Godes fæmne wæs gehæled on þære ylcan
tide, þe se Godes þeow æquitius hyre hæle gecwæð, þeah he
feorr wære.
 4.29.30. Witodlice on þyses wundres mægene he hæfde
þæs hælendes gebysnunge, se wæs gelaðod to sumes undercininges
suna hine to gehælenne þurh his fæder bene.
 4.30.5. & he sona mid his worde anum hine gehælde, swa
þæt þæs cnihtes fæder ham cyrrende oncneow, þæt him wæs
lif forgifen on þære ilcan tide þe he ær gehyrde, þæt him wæs
lif behaten of þæs hælendes muðe.
 4.30.12. Eornostlice ealle þa munucas hyra fæder hæse
gefylldon & þone ilcan Basilium of þæs mynstres eardunge utadrifon.
 4.30.15. He þa utadrifen sæde, þæt he mid his
drycræfte gelomlice on þa lyfte ahenge æquities mynster, & he swa
þeah of his mynstre nænne man beswican ne mihte.
 4.30.20. Eft æfter lytlum fyrste on þysre ylcan Romana byrig
he wearð forbærned fram cristenum folce for his mandædum.
 4.30.28. Be þære nunfæmnan, þe bat þone leahtric.
 4.30.29. Soðlice sumon dæge hit gelamp, þæt an nunne of
þam ilcan mynstre þara fæmnena eode in on hyra wyrttun.
 4.30.32. Þa geseah heo ænne leahtric & hy gelyste
þæs.
 4.30.33. Heo þa hine genam & forgeat, þæt heo hine mid
rodetacne ne gebledsode, ac heo hine freclice bat.
 4.31.1. Þa wearð heo sona fram deofle gegripen &
hrædlice nyðer afeoll.
 4.31.3. Þa þa heo swiðe wæs gedreht, þa wearð hit
hraðe gecyðed þam fæder æquitio, & he wæs gebeden, þæt
he ofstlice come & mid his gebedum hire gehulpe.
 4.31.8. Sona þa se halga fæder wæs inn agan on þone
wyrttun, þa ongann se deofol, þe þa nunnan gegrap, of hire muðe clypian
swilce he dædbote don wolde & þus cwæð, hwæt dyde ic hire?
 4.31.14. Hwæt dyde ic hire?
 4.31.14. Ic sæt me on anum leahtrice, þa com heo & bat
me.
 4.31.16. He þa se Godes wer mid mycelre yrsunge him bebead,
þæt he fram hire gewite, & þæt he nane wunungstowe næfde on
þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowene.
 4.31.21. He þær rihte aweg gewat & na leng syððan hyre
æthrinan ne dorste.
 4.31.27. Hu æquitius onfeng leafe to bodianne.
 4.31.28. Sum wæs aðele wer Nursine þære mægðe Felix
genemned, se wæs fæder þyses ylcan Castories, þe nu git wunað mid
us on þysre Romebyrig & us þis spell sæde be æquitio þam halgan
were.
 4.32.1. Ða þa se Felix geaxode, þæt se arwurða wer
næfde þone halgan had, þe Godes folces lareowas habban sceolon, &
swa þeah ferde geond manega stowa and geornlice bodode Godes lare, þa sume
dæge ferde he to him mid hiwcuðlicre dyrstinysse & him to cwæð,
hu dearst þu æfre þus openlice læran, nu þu þone halgan had
næfst, ne þu nane leafe to bodienne ne onfenge æt þam Romaniscean
bisceope, þe þu underwunast & drohtnast?
 4.32.14. Þa wearð se halga wer æquitius mid þære axunge
geneadod, þæt he him asæde, hu he onfeng leafe to bodianne, & he
þus cwæð, þa þing, þe þu nu to me sprycst, þa ic ær on
minum mode swiðe georne me sylf smeade.
 4.32.21. Ac on sumre nihte þurh gesihðe me sum iungling æt
gestod, se wæs swiðe fægerre ansyne.
 4.32.24. Se þa an blodseax asette on mine tungan þus
cweðende, efne nu ic asette mine word on þinum muðe.
 4.32.27. Far þu nu & boda þa.
 4.32.28. & of þam dæge, þeah þe ic wylle be Godes lare
geswigian, ic ne mæg.
 4.32.30. Petrus cwæð, ic wolde nu gita ma oncnawan þara
weorca þises halgan fæder, þe is gesæd, þæt he þillice gifa
onfeng.
 4.33.1. Be Equities gyrelan & þeawum.
 4.33.2. Gregorius him to cwæð, wite þu, Petrus, þæt
þæt weorc bið seald of þære gife, na seo gifu of þam weorce,
elles seo gifu ne bið na eallunga Godes gifu, forþam þe se man ne mæg
nan þing gewyrcean, buton hit sig ær fram Gode forgifen.
 4.33.9. Witodlice þa gifa forestæppað ælc weorc, þeah
þe þa ilcan gifa eac weaxan of þam æfterfyligendan weorce.
 4.33.12. Swa þeah ne scealt þu beon bedæled þære
oncnawennysse þæs eadigan æquities lifes.
 4.33.15. Wel cuðe hine Albinus, se arwurða bisceop þære
cyrcean Reatine þære ceastre, & nu gita syndon libbende manega men,
þe þis gemunan magon.
 4.33.19. Ac hwæt secst þu mare his weorces, þonne his lifes
clænnys geþwærode mid þam bigenge his bodunge?
 4.33.22. Eornostlice swa micel hæte hine onælde sawla to
gestrynenne Gode ælmihtigum, þæt he swa wæs mynstra hyrde, þæt
he on healfa gehwilce ferde yrnende & lærende on cyrcean, geond ceastra,
geond tunas, geond hus geleaffulra manna, & þara gehyrendra heortan simle
awehte to lufe þæs heofonlican eðeles.
 4.34.1. Soðlice he wæs swiðe waclic on his gewædum &
swa forsewenlic, þæt þeah hwilc man him ongean come þe hine ne cuðon
& he þone mid wordum gegrette, he wæs forsewen, þæt he næs
ongean gegreted.
 4.34.7. & swa oft swa he to oðrum stowum feran wolde, þonne
wæs his þeaw, þæt he wolde sittan on þam horse, þe he on þam
mynstre forcuðost findan mihte.
 4.34.12. On þam eac he breac hælftre for bridele &
weðera fella for sadele.
 4.34.14. Him sylf he lædde his halgan bec mid him on fellenum
saccum, þa wæron ahangene him on þa swyðran healfe & on þa
wynstran.
 4.34.17. & swa hwyder swa he þonne becom, he simle geopenode
þone wyllspring haligra gewrita & þænde þa mæda geleaffulra
moda.
 4.34.22. Hu man het æquitium cuman to Rome.
 4.34.23. Witodlice þa æt necstan se hlisa þyses ylcan weres
bodunge becom to cyðnysse Romanebyri.
 4.34.25. & swa swa hit for oft gewuna is, þæt þæra
liffetendra tunge cwylmeð þæs sawle, þe hi gehyran wyle, on þam
timan þyses apostolican settles bisceopes preostas liffetende syrwdon þus
cweðende to þam papan, hwæt is þes ceorl, þe þus hæfð him to
genumen þa ealdorlicnysse to bodianne þa halgan lare & þus
ungelæred gedyrstlæcð, þæt he him sylfum geagnað þa þenunge
hures apostolican hlafordes?
 4.35.8. Ac, hlaford, gif þin willa sy, læt sendan
ærendracan, þe hine hider gefecce, þæt seo rihtwise strengð
þære cyrclican gesettnysse oncnawe, hwilc he sy.
 4.35.12. Soðlice swa swa hit þeaw is, þæt þam mode, þe
byð abysgod on manegum þingum, swyðe hit undercrypð seo lease
liffetung, gif heo ne bið þi raðor aweg adrifen fram þære heortan
inngange, swa þa lærendum þam preostum se papa geþafode, þæt
æquitius sceolde beon gelæded to Romebyri, & man þær oncneowe,
hwæt his wisdom wære.
 4.35.24. He þa þærto asende Iulianum his witan, se eft
syððan wearð bisceop Sabinensi þære cyrcean, & him bebead,
þæt he hine lædde mid micelum wyrðmynde, þe læs þe se Godes
wer ænies teonan æni þing ongeate for þysre gemittinge.
 4.35.30. He þa sona be þam þingum wolde hyran þara preosta
willan & ofstlice ferde to æquities mynstre & þær ærest
gemette þa writeras writende æfweardum þam abbode, & he þa axode,
hwær se abbod wære.
 4.36.1. Hi cwædon him to, he mæwð gærs on þysre dene,
þe lið beneoðan þisum mynstre.
 4.36.4. Soðlice se ylca Iulianus hæfde ænne ofermodine
cniht & micelne wiðerbrecan, þone he sylf uneaðe mihte gewyldan.
 4.36.7. Þa sende he þone to Eguitie, þæt he hine
hrædlice to him gelædde.
 4.36.9. Þa arn se cniht & mid þwyrum mode hwætlice stop
on þa mæde, & þa geseah he, þæt hy ealle meowan, þe þær
wæron.
 4.36.13. Þa axode he, hwilc æquitius wære.
 4.36.14. Þa sona swa he gehyrde, hwilc he wæs, & he þa
gita feorron him onlocode, þa wearð he mid ormætum ege geþread.
 4.36.17. He ongann þa him ondrædan & wergian & to
þam swyðe cwacian & mid fotum tealtian, þæt he uneaðe hine
sylfne aberan mihte.
 4.36.21. He þa swa bifiende com to þam Godes men & sona mid
earmum eadmodlice his cneowa cyssende befeng & him sæde, þæt his
hlaford þyder to him cumen wære.
 4.36.26. Hwæt, þa se Godes þeow þone cniht gehælde
& him bebead þus cweðende, aris & ber þis grene gærs to mete
þam horsum, þe ge hider on comon.
 4.36.31. Nu is lytel to lafe þyses mæðes & swa þis
gedon bið, ic ga æfter þe.
 4.36.33. Ða wundrode swiðe Iulianus, þe þyder asended
wæs, hwæt þæt wære, þæt se cniht yllde, þæt he hraðor
ne come.
 4.37.2. Þa geseah he þone cniht ongean yrnende & on his
swyran gærs berendne of þære mæde.
 4.37.5. Þa ongann he sona swiðe yrre clypian ongean hine &
þus cwæð, hwæt is þis, þæt þu dest?
 4.37.8. Ic sende þe, þæt þu sceoldest man to me gelædan
& na gærs to beranne.
 4.37.10. Se cniht him andswarode & cwæð, he cymð nu
æfter me, se þe þu secst.
 4.37.12. Ða com se Godes wer gesceod mid geclutedum scon &
bær his siðe on his eaxle.
 4.37.14. Ða þa he þa gita wæs feorron þyderweard, þa
sæde se cniht his hlaforde, þæt þæt wære, se þe he sohte.
 4.37.18. Mid þam þe se ilca Iulianus geseah þone Godes
þeow, þa forseah he hine sona for his wacum gyrelan & smeade mid
toþundenum mode, hu he þwyrlicost sceolde him wiðsprecan.
 4.37.23. Ac þa sona swa se Godes þeow him nealæhte, þa
gefor on þæs ylcan Iulianes mod unacumendlic forhtnys, swa þæt he
bifode & forhtode to þam swiðe, þæt he earfoðlice hæfde his
tungan geweald, þæt he mihte abeodan þæt ærende, þe he þyder
fore com.
 4.37.30. He þa sona mid geeaðmedum mode arn to his cneowum
& to him gewilnode, þæt he him fore gebæde & sæde him,
þæt his fæder se apostolica bisceop hine geseon wolde.
 4.38.3. Hwæt, þa se arwurða æquitius ongann ormætlice
to þancienne þam ælmihtigum Gode & cwæð, þæt seo upplice
gifu hine geneosode þurh þone healican bisceop.
 4.38.8. & he þær rihte gecigde his gebroðro &
bebead, þæt hyra hors on þære ylcan tide wurdon gegearwode &
ongan þa ærendracan þearle þreagean, þæt hy huruþinga
hrædlice feran sceoldon.
 4.38.14. Ða cwæð Iulianus him to, þæt na to þæs
hwon beon ne mæg, forðam þe ic eom to þam werig for þam langan wege,
þæt ic nu todæg heonan feran ne mæg.
 4.38.19. Him þa andswarode æquitius, eala, sunu, nu þu
geunrotsast me, forþam gif we ne farað nu todæg, ne farað we na
tomorgen.
 4.38.23. Witodlice se Godes þeow þa mid Iulianes werinysse
wearð geneadod, þæt he þa niht on his mynstre gewunode.
 4.38.26. Efne þæs on morgen sona on dægred com sum cniht
mid swiðe geswencedum horse for ærninge to Iuliane mid ærendgewrite.
 4.38.30. On þam write him wæs beboden, þæt he na ne
gedyrstlæhte to þam, þæt he þone Godes þeow ænig þing
hrepode, oððe hine of his mynstre styrode.
 4.39.2. Ða axode Iulianus þone cniht, for hwan se cwyde
onwended wære.
 4.39.4. Þa sæde he him, þæt on þære ylcan nyhte,
þe he se ærendraca him æfter asended wæs, se healica papa wearð
þurh nihtlice gesihþe on swefne swiðe gebreged, hu he dorste
geþristlæcean, þæt he hete þone Godes man swencean & him to
gelangian.
 4.39.11. Iulianus þa þær rihte aras & hine sylfne
befæste þæs arwurðan weres gebedræddene & him to cwæð,
la, leof, ure fæder biddeð, þæt ge eow on þone weg ne geswencean.
 4.39.16. Ða þa se Godes þeow þis gehyrde, þa wearð he
sona swiðe unrot & þus cwæð, hu, ne sæde ic gyrstandæg,
þæt gif we þær rihte ne ferdon, þæt us nære na alyfed
syððan to farenne?
 4.39.22. & he þa for gegearwunge þære soðan lufe
þone ærendracan Iulianum on þam mynstre sume hwile gehæfde, to þam
þæt he him geneadodum & gelettum gedyde sume getæse hyððe his
geswinces.
 4.39.28. Oncnaw nu, Petrus, on hu mycelre Godes gehyrdnysse beoð,
þa þe cunnon hy sylfe forseon on þysum life, & mid hwilcum
ceasterwarum hy beoð on wyrðmynde mynde innan getealde, þa þe ne
forsceamiað, þæt hi utan beon mannum forsewene.
 4.40.2. Swa eac þær ongean beforan Godes eagum licgeað
foresewene, þa þe mid him sylfum & beforan hyra necstana eagum
toþindað þurh gewilnunge ideles gylpes.
 4.40.7. Be þam se hælend cwæð to sumum mannum, ge syndon
þa þe eow sylfe rihtwisiað beforan mannum, ac God cann eowre heortan,
forþam þe eall þæt mannum þinceð healic, þæt is onscuniendlic
beforan Gode.
 4.40.14. Petrus cwæð, ic forswiðe wundrie, þæt æfre
þæra preosta lease liffetung mihte undercreopan swa micelne bisceop be
swilcum were.
 4.40.18. Gregorius him to cwæð, hwæt wundrast þu, Petrus,
forþam þe we, þe men syndon, beoð foroft belogene fram oðrum mannum?
 4.40.22. Hwæðer þe þe of mode gewat, þæt þu ne
gemundest, þæt Dauid, þe gewunode to hæbbenne witedomes gast on him,
demde dom ongean þone unscyldigan Ionathes sunu, þa þa he gehyrde
þæs leogendan cnihtes word?
 4.40.28. & þeah hwæðere þæt wæs gedon þurh
Dauid, & we gelyfað, þæt hit riht wære on Godes diglan dome, ac
swa þeah we ne magon oncnawan, hu hit riht wære on þam menniscean
rihte.
 4.41.3. Hwilc wundor is, þæt we, þe witegan ne syndon, beon
hwilum on oðer gelædde of leogendra muðe?
 4.41.6. Soðlice seo þiccnys þara woruldcara swiðe awesteð
& todrifeð anra gehwilces bisceopes mod.
 4.41.9. Þonne þæt mod byð todæled to manegum þingum,
þonne byð hit þe læsse to gehwilcum anum synderlicum þinge.
 4.41.13. & swa mycele swyðor hit byð undercropen on
gehwilcum anum þinge, swa micele swa hit byð widdor abysgod on manegum
þingum.
 4.41.17. Petrus him to cwæð, swiðe soðe syndon þa word
þe þu sægst.
 4.41.23. Hu seo earc wæs aworpen of æquities byrigene.
 4.41.24. Gregorius cwæð, ne sceal ic na forsuwian þæt,
þæt ic be þisum were oncneow of gesegene þæs arwurðan mines iu
abbodes Ualentiones.
 4.41.28. He cwæð, þæt þa þa æquities lichama
wæs bebyrged on gebedhuse þæs eadigan martires Laurenties, þa com sum
ceorl & asette his earce mid hwæte gefyllede ofer his byrgenne & ne
gymde na, þæt he asmeade oððe him ondrede, hu micel & hu mære
wer þær reste.
 4.42.4. Ða færinga wæs geworden þoden of heofenum, se
uppahof & feorr awearp þa earce, þe wæs asett ofer his byrgenne,
& elles ealle þa þing þe þær wæron gewunedon þær
þær hy gesette wæron, efne swa þæt ealle þa þe þær
wæron openlice oncneowon, hu micelre geearnunge he wæs, se þe his
lichama þær reste.
 4.42.16. Hu þa reðan Langbearde aweddon, & þa munecas
wurdon alysede.
 4.42.18. Eac þa þing, þe ic her to gita geþeode, ic
oncneow, swa swa me rehte se forecwedena arwurða wer Furtunatus se me swiðe
wel gelicode on ylde, on weorce & on bilwitnysse.
 4.42.23. Se ilca me rehte, þæt þa þa Langbearde foron
herigende on Ualeria þære ylcan mægðe, þa flugon þa munucas of
þæs arwurðan æquities mynstre in to þam forecwedenan gebedhuse to
æquities byrgenne.
 4.42.29. Ða stopon þa reðgiendan Langbearde in to þam
gebedhuse & ongunnon teon ut þa ilcan munucas, to þam þæt hi hi
mid tintregum astencton oððe mid swurdum acwealdon.
 4.42.34. Hwæt, þa an þæra munuca ageomrode & mid
teartum sare astyrod þus clypode, eala, þu halga æquitius, licað þe,
þæt we syndon þus atogene, & þu us na ne bewerast?
 4.43.4. To þæs munuces stefne þa hrædlice se unclæna
gast gefor on þa reðgiendan Langbearde.
 4.43.7. Hy þa on eorðan ahruron & wurdon geswencede swa
lange, oð þæt þa Langbearde, þe þær ute wæron, ongeaton,
þæt hy na leng ofer þæt ne dorston þa halgan stowe dyrstilice
hreppan.
 4.43.13. & swa se halga wer bewerede his gingran, þæt he
eac forgeaf frið & læcedom manegum oðrum, þe syððon þyder
flugon to his byrgenne.
 5.43.18. Hu Constantius gefyllde mid wætere þa leohtfatu &
onælde, & hy burnon.
 5.43.20. Soþlice þæt þæt ic nu secgean wille, ic
geleornode of gesegene sumes bisceopes mines efenhadan, se on munuchade manega
gear lifode on Anchonitana þære byri & þær his eawfæste lif
unheanlice adreah, þæt us eac cyddon sume ure yldran frynd, þe of þam
lande wæron.
 5.43.28. Witodlice neah þære ceastre wæs asett þæs
eadigan martires Stephanes cyrce.
 5.43.30. On þære þeowode sum arwurðes lifes wer, þam
wæs nama Constantius, se breac þær cyrcweardes þenunge.
 5.44.1. Þæs halinysse hlisa hine sylfne gewidmærsode feorr
& wide & hine gelædde to manegra manna cyððe, forþam þe se
ylca wer eallunga forseah þas eorðlican þing & þa heofonlican ane
lufode mid ealles modes geornfullnysse.
 5.44.9. Soþlice sume dæge, þa þa on þære ylcan
cyrcean wæs elewana, & se forecwedena Godes þeow næfde, þæt he
mihte furðon þa leohtfatu onælan, þa gefyllde he mid wætere ealle
þære cyrcean ciellan & sette weocon onmiddan, swa swa hit þeaw is,
& þa mid fyre ontennde.
 5.44.17. & swa þæt wæter þa barn on þam leohtfatum,
swilce hit ele wære.
 5.44.19. Understand nu, Petrus, hwilcere geearnunge þæs wer
wære, þe wæs for eleleaste swa geneadod, þæt he awennde þæs
wæteres gecynde on eles þicnysse.
 5.44.23. Petrus cwæð, hit is swiðe wundorlic, þæt ic nu
gehyrde.
 5.44.25. Ac ic wolde witan, hwilcere eadmodnysse þes wer mihte
beon innan, se þe wæs swa micelre halinysse utan for þam mægnum þe
he worhte.
 5.44.29. Gregorius him to cwæð, genoh gerisenlice þu secst
to witanne, hwilc his mod wære betweoh þam wundrum þe he worhte,
forþam þæt is swiðe micel, þæt simle deofol mid his costnunge
sliteð þæs mannes mod innan & wyle hine geteon on upahafennysse, gif
he ænig þing wundorlices wyrcð utan þurh Godes gife.
 5.45.7. Ac gif þu gehyrst þyses arwurðan Constanties ane
dæde þe he worhte, þonne oncnæwst þu sona, hwilcere eadmodnysse man
he wæs.
 5.45.11. Petrus cwæð, æfter þam þe þu me sædest
swylc wundor his weorces, ofer þæt me lysteð, þæt þu me eac secge
sum þing be his modes eadmodnysse.
 5.45.17. Hu Constantius geþancode sumon ceorle, þæt he hine
forseah.
 5.45.19. Gregorius him to cwæð, forþam þe þyses mannes
halignysse hlisa swiðe weox, fela manna of manegum scirum geornlice lyston
hine geseon.
 5.45.23. Ða sume dæge com feorran sum ceorl, to þam þæt
he wolde hine geseon.
 5.45.25. Þa gelamp hit on þære ylcan tide, þæt se halga
wer stod on treowenre hlædre & gefyllde þa leohtfatu on þære
cyrcean.
 5.45.29. Soðlice he wæs swiðe lytel on wæstme &
yfellices hiwes & forsewenlices.
 5.46.1. Se ceorl þa, þe þyder com hine to geseonne, axode,
hwilc he wære, & geornlice bæd, þæt he him ætywed beon
sceolde.
 5.46.4. & þa tæhtan him þa þe hine cuðon, hwilc he
wæs.
 5.46.6. Ac swa þa stuntan mod leogað, þonne hi wenað,
þæt þæs mannes ærnung beo of his lichaman missenlicnysse, se ceorl
geseah Constantium lytelne & forsewenlicne.
 5.46.11. Þa ongan he beon eallunga ungeleaf, þæt he hit
wære.
 5.46.13. On þam ceorliscean mode wæs swilce þær wære
geworden sum sacu betweoh þam þe he ær be him gehyrde & þam þe
he þa on him geseah, forþam þe he wende, þæt swa scort man & swa
unfæger on ansyne ne mihte na habban swa ormætne hlisan þurh
halinysse.
 5.46.21. Ða þa him fram manegum mannum wæs to soðe
gesæd, þæt he se ilca wære, þa forseah he hine sona & hloh
þus cweðende: ic gelyfde, þæt þes wære micel man & fæger.
 5.46.26. Nu næfð he nan þing men gelices.
 5.46.27. Mid þam þe se Godes wer Constantius þa þis
gehyrde, he sona swiðe bliðe forlet þa leohtfatu, þe he behwearf, &
hrædlice nyðer astah & þone ceorl beclypte & mid swiðlicre
lufe ongann mid his earmum hine clyppan & cyssan & him swiðe
þancian.
 7.50.13. Mid heora handa weorcum æt utlendisceum mannum,
þæt hi sumne dæl eles eft ham to mynstre brohton of hyra weorces mede.
 7.50.17. Sona swa þæt gehyrde se drihtnes wer Nonnosus, þa
styrde he þæs mid micelre eadmodnysse & cwæð, þæt hit swa
beon ne mihte, þe læs þe hit gelumpe, þæt þa gebroðru utfarende
of mynstre, þa hwile þe hi sohton þæs eles gestreon, þæt hi
þonne þoledon sume hynða hyra sawla.
 7.50.25. Ac þa forþam þe he geseah, þæt wæron feawa
eleberian on þam treowum, þe to þam mynstre belumpon, þa het he þa
gegaderian & don on eletreddan, & swa hwæt swa man mihte gedon
þæt þær uteode, þeah þe hit wære medmicel ele, þæt man
þæt to him sylfum brohte.
 7.50.33. Hit wearð þa swa gedon, þæt þa gebroðru
onfengon sumne dæl eles on anum lytlum fæte, & þone brohton Nonnose
þam Godes þeowe.
 7.51.4. He þa sona þone asette beforan þæt weofod, &
him eallum utgangendum he hine lange hwile gebæd & syððon eft
gelangode him to þa gebroðru & heom bebead, þæt hy namon þone
ele, þe hi ær to him brohton, & hine todældon swiðe gneðelice
geotende geond ealle þæs mynstres fatu, swa þæt ealle þa fatu
wæron hwæthwega ongoten mid bledsunge þæs ylcan eles.
 7.51.15. & het þa sona þa fatu bewreon & inne belucan,
swa æmtige swa hi þa wæron.
 7.51.17. Soþlice on þam oðrum dæge, þa hi eft unwrigene
wæron, þa wæron hi ealle fulle gemette for gewilnunge þæs halgan
weres Nonnoses.
 7.51.22. Petrus cwæð, dæghwamlice we acunniað, þæt
beoð gefyllede þa word þæs soðfæstan hælendes, þe cwæð,
nu gyta min fæder wyrceð, & eac ic wyrce.
 8.51.30. Hu Anastasius & oðre seofon broðru wæron
gecigede of þysum life.
 8.51.32. Gregorius cwæð, eac hit gelamp on þam ilcan timan,
þæt se arwurða wer Anastasius, þæs gemynd ic herbufan dyde, wæs
writere on þysre halgan Romaniscean cyrcean, þære ic þeowie under
Godes anwealde.
 8.52.5. Se Anastasius forlet þa scrine his feohgestreones &
mynster geceas & gewilnode, þæt he hine geæmtogode Gode anum to
þeowianne.
 8.52.9. & he þa on þære ilcan stowe, þe ic bufan ymbe
spræc, seo is geciged Subpentoma, manega gear his lif adreah on halgum
dædum & þam mynstre fore wæs mid geornlicre heordnysse.
 8.52.15. Witodlice ofer þa stowe wæs ufan hangiende ormæte
stanclud, & eac beneoðan swiðe deop niwolnys ginode.
 8.52.18. Soðlice on sumre nihte, þa þa se ælmihtiga God
geteohhode eallunga to geleanienne þa geswinc þæs arwurðan weres
Anastasies, fram þam hean clude wæs gehyred stefn, seo forðgelæddum
hleoðre þus clypode & cwæð, cum þu, Anastasius.
 8.52.26. Him þa swa gecigedum þær wurdon eac oðre seofon
broðru be hyra naman gecigede.
 8.52.28. Þa geswigode swiðe lytle hwile seo stefn, þe
þær ær clypode, & þa eft gecigde þone eahtoðan broðor.
 8.52.32. Þa þa seo gesomnung swa openlice gehyrde þa stefne,
þa næs þær nan twynung, þæt nealæhte þara forðsið, þe
þær gecigede wæron.
 8.53.1. Witodlice binnan fæawum dagum forðferde ærest se
arwurða wer Anastasius, & þa eft þa oðre broðru forðferdon be
endebyrdnysse/, swa swa hi of þæs stanclifes heahnysse ær gecigede
wæron.
 8.53.6. Se broðor, þe seo stefn sume hwile geswigode to his
gecigednysse & hine eft genemde, se lifde feawa daga æfter þam oðrum
sweltendum broðrum & þa his lif geendode.
 8.53.12. Þæt wæs openlice geswutelod, þæt seo lytle
betweoh gesette swigung þære ufan cumenan stefne getacnode þone lyttlan
fyrst to libbanne þam breðer ofer þa oðre, þe þær eac gecigede
wæron.
 8.53.17. Eac þær gelamp wundorlic þing, þæt þa þa
se arwurða wer Anastasius forðferde, þa wæs on þam ylcan mynstre sum
broðor, þe æfter him libban nolde, ac he forð onloten to his fotum
ongann hine biddan mid tearum þus cweðende, ic þe halsie þurh þone,
þe þu to færst, þæt ic ne þurfe libban seofon dagas æfter þe
on þysum middangearde.
 8.53.28. Þa ær þæs Anastasies seofeðan dæge, wæs
eac forðfered se ylca broðor, se swa þeah næs na geciged on þære
nihte betweoh þa oðre broðru, ac hit wæs openlice geswutelod, þæt
his forðfore begeat seo þingung ana þæs arwurðan weres Anastasies.
 8.54.3. Petrus cwæð, þa þa þes ilca broðor næs
betweoh þa oðre geciged & swa þeah wæs of þissum life atogen mid
þingungum þæs halgan weres, hwæt elles mæg beon ongiten, buton
þæt þa þe mid Gode synd micelre geearnunge, magon hwilum begitan þa
þing, þe him geteohhode næron?
 8.54.11. Gregorius him andswarode, ne magon hi to þæs hwon
begitan þa þing, þe him geteohhode næron, ac þa þing, þe þa
halgan weras mid hyra benum gefremmað, hi wæron ær swa forestihtode,
þæt hy sceolon beon eft mid benum begitene.
 8.54.19. Soðlice eac seo ylce forestihtung þæs ecean rices
is gesett fram þam ælmihtigan Gode, swa þæt his gecorenan becumað
of geswince to þam rice, þæt hi biddende geearnian, þæt hi onfon
þæt, þæt se ælmihtiga God ær ealre worulde gedihtnode him to
forgifenne.
 8.54.27. Petrus cwæð, ic wolde, þæt me wære git
openlicor gecyðed, hwæðer seo forestihtung mihte beon mid gebedum
gefultumod.
 8.54.31. Gregorius him andswarode, la, Petrus, þis þæt ic
þe sæde, mæg beon hrædlice gecyðed.
 8.55.3. Gewisslice þu þe sylf wast, þæt drihten cwæð
to Abrahame, on Isaace þe bið sæd geciged.
 8.55.6. Eac he cwæð to him, ic gesette þe manegra þeoda
fæder.
 8.55.8. & eft he him behet þus cweðende, ic gebledsige
þe, & ic gemenigfylde þin sæd swa swa heofones steoran & swa swa
þa sandcorn, þe beoð be sæs waroðe.
 8.55.12. Of þam þinge is openlice cuð, þæt se
ælmihtiga God ær forestihtode, þæt he Abrahames sæd wolde
gemenifyldan þurh Isaac, & swa þeah hit is awriten, þæt Isaac
gebæd to drihtne for his wife, for þam þe heo wæs unwæstmbære.
 8.55.20. Þa gehyrde drihten his bene & sealde wæstm
Rebeccan his wife.
 8.55.22. Þus wæs forestihtod seo menifealdnys Abrahames cynnes
þurh Isaac.
 8.55.24. Eornostlice, gif seo menifealdnys Abrahames cynnes wæs
forestihtod þurh Isaac, hwi underfeng he þonne unwæstmbære wif, buton
forþam þe hit is cuð, þæt seo forestihtung sceolde beon mid benum
gefylled, þa þa se mid his gebedum beget, þæt he mihte suna habban, se
þe on him ær God forestihtode to gemenifyldenne Abrahames sæd?
 8.55.35. Petrus cwæð, nis me nan twynung nu to laue be þam
þingum, þe þu nu sædest, forþam þe þæt rihtgescead me
geopenode þa digolnysse þurh þine segene.
 8.56.4. Gregorius cwæð, wilt þu, þæt ic þe secge sum
þing be þam dælum Tuscie þære mægðe, þæt þu oncnawe,
hwylce weras wæron on þam lande, & hu swiðe neah hi wæron
þæs ælmihtigan Godes cyððe?
 8.56.11. Petrus cwæð, ic wille, & ic þe þæs eallum
mægene bidde.
 9.56.13. Hu Bonefatius bisceop todælde win on fatu & hit
weox.
 9.56.14. Gregorius him to cwæð, sum wæs arwurðes lifes
wer, þam wæs nama Bonefatius.
 9.56.16. Se hæfde bisceophad & þone mid godum þeawum wel
gefyllde on þære ceastre, þe is genemned Ferentis.
 9.56.19. Þyses bisceopes manega wundru me rehte se mæssepreost
Gaudentius, þe nu gita leofað.
 9.56.22. Se wæs afedd on his þenunge, & he mæg gehwylc
þing be him swa mycele gewisslicor seccan, swa micele swa him gelamp,
þæt he oftor wæs betweoh his þenungum.
 9.56.27. On þisses ilcan Bonefacies cyrcean wæs swiðe hefi
wædlung & hafenleast, seo simle gewunað, þæt heo bið hirde
þære eadmodnisse on godum modum, & þær nan þing elles næs to
ealles geares andlifene, buton þæt an, þæt he heafde ænne
wingeard.
 9.57.4. Se sume dæg wearð forðorscen mid onreosendum
hetolum hagole & awæstod, swa þæt on þam wingearde on feawum
wintreowum uneaðe to lafe wunodon swiðe litle & swiðe feawa clistru
þara winbergena.
 9.57.10. Ða þa þes forcwedena wer se arwurða bisceop
Bonefatius eode in on þone wingeard, þa þancode he swiðe Gode
ælmihtigum, forþam þe he oncneow, þæt he þa gita on þære his
wædle wæs swyðor geangsumod.
 9.57.16. Ac swa þeah þa þa se tima nealæhte, þæt
mihton ripe beon þa feawa clystru þæra bergena, þe þær læfde
wæron, þa sette he hyrde, swa hit þeaw wæs, to þam wingearde &
bebead, þæt hine man heolde mid carfullre wæccean.
 9.57.23. Soþlice þa sume dæge het he Constantium þone
mæssepreost, se wæs his swustorsunu, þæt man ealle þa winfatu on
his bisceopscire & ealle þa kyfa gegearwode & mid pice geondgute, swa
swa hit ær gewunelic wæs.
 9.57.30. Sona þa se mæssepreost his nefa þæt gehyrde,
þa wundrode he swiðe & wende, þæt he spræke on unwis, þa he
bebead, þæt man winfatu gearwode, se þe nan win næfde.
 9.58.3. Ne dorste swa þeah se mæssepreost þone bisceop
geaxian, for hwan he swylce þing bude, ac he þa gehyrsumode his hæsum
& ealle þa winfatu gegearwode æfter gewunelicum þeawe.
 9.58.9. Hwæt, þa se Godes wer eode in on þone wingeard &
gegaderode þa clystru þara bergena & gebrohte on þære wintreddan
& het hi ealle þanon utgangan, & he ana mid anum lytlum cnapan
þær gewunode & þone cnapan þa asette on þa ylcan wintreddan
& het hine tredan þa feawa clystru þara bergena.
 9.58.18. Ða þa of þam clystrum ut fleow lyttles hwæt
wines, þa ongann se Godes wer mid his agenum handum þæt underfon on anum
lyttlum fæte & hit todælde for bledsunge geond ealle þa kyfa &
geond ealle þa fatu, þe þær gegearwode wæron, þæt of þam
ilcan wine wæron gesewene uneaðe ealle þa fatu geondgotene.
 9.58.28. Witodlice þa þa he of þæs wines wætan sum
þing lyttles asende on ælc þæra fata, þa clypode he him to þone
mæssepreost & hrædlice het, þæt þær þearfan beon
sceoldon.
 9.58.33. Ða ongan þæt win weaxan on þære wintreddan,
swa þæt wurdon gefyllede ealle þara þearfana fatu, þe him to brohte
wæron.
 9.59.1. & þa þa he geseah, þæt þa þearfan genoh
hæfdon, þa het he þone cnapan stigan nyðer of þære treddan &
beleac þæt winern & asette his agen insegl on þæt loc &
forlet hit swa belocen & him sona to cyrcean gehwearf.
 9.59.8. Ða þi þriddan dæge clypode he him to þone
forecwedenan mæssepreost Constantium, & geendodum his gebede he
geopenode þæt winern & gemette þa fatu, þe he ær on ageat
swiðe litelne dæl þæs þynnystan wætan, swa genihtsumlice
gefyllede mid wine, efne þæt þa weaxendan win woldon feallan ofer þa
fatu on þa flor, gif se bisceop þa a lator inn eode.
 9.59.19. Hwæt, þa se bisceop swiðe egeslice bebead þam
mæssepreoste, þæt he nanum men þis wundor ne asæde swa lange swa
he sylf on lichaman lifde, þe læs þe he on þæs weorces mægene
wurde mid mennisceum wyrðmynde gebreged & þanon innan aidlode, þanon
þe he utan wære mannum micel ætywed.
 9.59.28. Ac he on þam fyligde þæs hælendes bysene, se to
þam þæt he us getyde to eadmodnysse wege, bebead his gingrum be him
sylfum þus cweðende, þæt þa þing, þe hi gesawon, hi nanum men ne
asædon, ær þam þe mannes sunu of deaðe arise.
 9.60.4. Petrus cwæð, forþam þe þeos wise nu hi sylfe
gecwemlice gegearwode, nu lysteð me axian, hwæt þæt sy, þæt þa
þa ure alysend ageaf gesihþe twam blindum mannum, þa het he, þæt hi
hit nanum men ne asædon, & hi þa sona þanon gangende gewidmærodon
hine geond eall þæt land.
 9.60.13. Ac hwæt cwyst þu?
 9.60.13. Hwæðer se ankenneda Godes sunu, se þe is efenece
his fæder & þam halgan gaste, on þysum þinge wolde gefyllan,
þæt he gefyllan ne mihte, þa þa he wolde habban forsuwod þæt,
þæt na forholen beon ne mihte?
 9.60.20. Gregorius him andswarode, eall þæt ure alysend dyde
þurh his menniscean lichaman, eall þæt he gegearwode us on gebysnunge
godes weorces, to þam þæt we be gemete urra mægena sceolon fylian his
fotswaðe & unætspornenum fotum þyses andweardan weorkes gan on
þone weg þæs ecean lifes.
 9.60.29. Witodlice se hælend worhte þæt wundor & het hi
helan, & hit swa þeah forholen beon ne mihte.
 9.60.32. On þam we magon cuðlice ongitan, þæt his
gecorenan fylgeað þa gebysnunga his lare on þam micelum weorcum þe hi
wyrceað, & hyra willa bið, þæt hi beon forholene, ac þæt hi
oðrum mannum fremian, hi beoð for oft geyppede swa hi nellað, swa
þæt hit si for micelre eadmodnysse, þæt hi gewilniað, þæt hyra
weorc beon forholene, & hit si for micelre celre nyttlicnysse, þæt
hyra weorc forholen beon ne magon.
 9.61.11. Eornostlice drihten nolde na, þæt æni þing
swilces gewurde & hit na beon ne mihte, ac he sealde bysene mid lareowdome
his sylfes lare, hwæt his limu scylon gewilnian, oððe hwæt eac be him
nellendum gewurðan sceoldon.
 9.61.18. Petrus cwæð, me licað þæt þu sægst.
 9.61.20. Hu Bonefatius foresæde to sweltenne þone
cimbalgliwere.
 9.61.21. Gregorius him to cwæð, nu gita syndon to lafe sume
feawa þinga, þe we wyllað sprecan be þæs bisceopes weorce
Bonefaties, forþam þe we dydon herbufan his gemynd.
 9.61.26. Hit gelamp on sumum timan, þæt to nealæhte se
gebryrddæg þæs eadigan martires Procules.
 9.61.29. On þære stowe wunode sum æðele wer, þam wæs
nama Furtunatus.
 9.61.31. Se mid micelum benum bæd þone arwurðan wer
Bonefatium, þæt he gebuge to his huse to syllenne him his bledsunge,
þonne he dyde his mæssæna simbelnysse æt þam eadigan martire.
 9.62.2. Ða ne mihte se Godes wer forsacan þæt, þæt seo
soþe lufu hine bæd of Furtunates mode.
 9.62.5. Witodlice gedonum simbelnyssum þara mæssena, þa þa
he to þæs forecwedenan Furtunates mysan becom, ær þam þe he his
beodfers sunge, þa færinga stod þær ætforan þære dura sum man
mid anum apan & sloh cimbalan & bæd him metes, swa swa sume men
gewuniað, þæt hi mid gligcræfte heom andlyfene seceað.
 9.62.15. Hwæt, þa se halga wer þone sweg gehyrende yrringa
cwæð, wala, wala, dead is þes yrming, dead is þes yrming.
 9.62.18. Ic com to þyses gereordes mysan, & ic nu gyta ne
geopenode minne muð to Godes lofe, & he com mid apan & slyhð
cimbalan.
 9.62.22. He swa þeah þa git þas word geihte & cwæð,
gangað ge nu & for soðre lufu syllað him mete & drinc, &
witað ge swa þeah, þæt he is dead.
 9.62.27. Ða þa se ungesæliga wer of þam ylcan huse
underfeng hlaf & win, þa wolde he gan ut on þa duru.
 9.62.30. Ac þær færlice feoll of þam hrofe ormæte stan
& becom him on ufan þæt heafod.
 9.62.32. He wearð þa mid þam slege nyðer astreht, &
hine man healfcwiccne handlunga þanon ahof, & þa oðre dæge
æfter þæs Godes weres cwyde he eallunga his lif geendode.
 9.63.4. On þam þinge, Petrus, is to geþenceanne, hu micel ege
si to hæbbenne to þam halgum werum.
 9.63.7. Soðlice hi syndon Godes templu.
 9.63.8. & þa þa se halga wer wæs getogen to
hatheortnysse mid þam unnyttan glige, hwilc oðer wæs þær aweht to
þære yrsunge, buton þæs ylcan temples oneardiend, þæt is Crist.
 9.63.13. Eornostlice swa micele swyðor is to ondrædeanne
rihtwisra manna yrre, swa micele swahit soð is, þæt on hyra heortan se
is andweard, se þe nis na unstrang wrake on to gebringenne, þam þe he
wyle.
 9.63.21. Hu Bonefatius þæs horses wurð todælde
þearfum.
 9.63.22. Eac on oðrum timan hit gelamp, þæt se forecwedena
mæssepreost Constantius þæs bisceopes swustorsunu gesealde his hors
wið twelf mancosum & þa mancosas alede on his agene cyste & him ut
gewat sum weorc to wyrceanne.
 9.63.29. Ða færinga comon þearfan to þam bisceopstole,
þa swyðe gemahlice bædon, þæt se halga wer Bonefatius bisceop him
sum þing syllan sceolde to frofre hyra wædlunge.
 9.63.33. Ac forþam þe se Godes wer næfde hwæt he him
sealde, he ongann on his geþance þefian & smeagean, þæt huru þa
þearfan idelhende fram him ne eodon.
 9.64.5. Ða færinga gehwearf him to gemynde, þæt se
mæssepreost Constantius his mæg gesealde þæt hors, þe he sylf
ær gewunode on to sittenne, & hæfde þæt ylce weorð on his
cyste gehealden.
 9.64.11. Witodlice þa æfweardum þam ylcan his nefan se
bisceop stop to þære cyste & arfæstlice stræc tobræc
þære cyste locu & þær genam þa twelf mancosas & hi
gedælde þam þearfendum mannum, swa swa him wel licode.
 9.64.18. Witodlice þa þa Constantius mæssepreost com ham of
his weorke, he funde his cyste tobrokene & ne funde na his horses wurð,
þe he þær onlede.
 9.64.22. Þa ongann he mid micelre stefne hlydan & mid
swiðlicre hatheortnysse clypian & cweðan, ealle her libbað, ic ana on
þysum hirede libban ne mæg.
 9.64.27. Untwylice þa to þæs ungefohlicum hreame becom se
bisceop & ealle, þa þe him mid wæron on þam ylcan bisceoprice.
 9.64.30. & þa þa se Godes wer wolde hine gestillan mid
liðre spræce, þa ongann he him mid ceaste andswarian & cweðan,
ealle þine men magon libban mid þe, buton ic ana ne mæg her beforan þe
libban.
 9.65.3. Ac agif me mine mancosas.
 9.65.4. Hwæt, þa se bisceop wearð astyrod mid þam wordum
& eode in to cyricean þære simle eadigan fæmnan sanctam Marian,
& up ahafenum handum aþenedum reafe he ongann standende gebiddan,
þæt him God forgeafe mid hwam he mihte gestillan þæs hatheortan
mæssepreostes/ woffunga.
 9.65.13. Ða þa he færinga beseah on his agenne grædan
betweoh his astrehtan earmas, þa sona gemette he on his greadan twelf
mancosas, þa wæron swa scinende, swilce hi wæron on þære ylcan
tide ut atogene of fyre.
 9.65.20. He þa sona stop ut of þære cyrcean & awearp
þa mancosas on þæs hatheortan mæssepreostes greadan þus
cweðende, efne nu þu hæfst þine mancosas, þe þu sohtest.
 9.65.25. Ac si þe þis cuð, þæt æfter minum deaðe
þu ne bist na þysre cyrcean bisceop for þinre gitsunge.
 9.65.28. Of þam cwyde mihte beon mid soðe ongiten, þæt se
mæssepreost þa ilcan mancasas begeat to þam, þæt he þone
bisceopfolgoð & had mid gebicgean þohte.
 9.65.33. Ac þæs Godes weres word wæs to þam strang,
þæt se ylca mæssepreost Constantius on mæssepreosthade his lif
geendode.
 9.66.3. Hu Bonefatius þam Gotan gefyllde þa flaxan.
 9.66.4. Soðlice on oðrum timan him comon to twegen men of
Gotena þeode, þa sædan, þæt hi to Rauennam faran woldon.
 9.66.7. Þa sealde he him mid his agenre handa ane treowene flaxan
fulle wines, to þam þæt hi mihton him þa on hyra færelde to hyra
gereorde habban.
 9.66.12. Of þære hi druncon, oð þæt hi to Rauennam
becomon.
 9.66.14. Þa wunodon þa Gotan manega dagas on þære ylcan
ceastre & dæghwamlice hæfdon him to brice þæt win, þe hi æt
þam halgan were onfengon.
 9.66.18. & swa hit him gelæste, oð þæt hi eft becomon
to þam ylcan arwurðan fæder, þæt hi nanum dæge ne geswicon
þæt win to drincene, & swa þeah næs him næfre wines wana of
þam ylcan fæte, swilce þæt win nære na geiced, ac wære akenned
weaxende on þam treowenum fæte, þe se bisceop sealde.
 9.66.31. Hu Bonefatius afligde þa emelas.
 9.66.32. Nu niwan eac us to becom sum eald preost of þære
ylcan stowe dælum & þa þing, þe he be him rehte, ne syndon na mid
swigan to forlætenne.
 9.67.3. Soðlice he sæde, þæt se halga wer sume dæge
eode in to his wyrttune.
 9.67.6. Þa gemette he þone wyrttun beon oferwrigenne mid
micelre menieo emela.
 9.67.8. Þa geseah he, þæt ealle þa wyrta sceoldon
forwurðan, & he þa bewende hine to þam ylcan emelum & him to
cwæð, ic eow halsige on naman ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes, þæt
ge heonon gewiton, & ge na leng þas wyrta ne eton.
 9.67.15. Hi þa sona to þæs Godes weres worde ealle endemes
utferdon, swa þæt furðon þær an ne belaf binnon þam wyrttunhege.
 9.67.21. Hu Bonefatius forstæl þone hwæte his meder &
sealde þearfum.
 9.67.23. Ac hwilc wundor is, cwæð sanctus Gregorius, þæt
we þas þing cyðon be þam timan his bisceophades, þa þa he mid þam
ælmihtigan Gode eallunga weox on endebyrdnysse samod & on þeawum godra
dæda, þonne þa weorc syndon swyðor to wundrianne, þe her se ealda
preost sæde?
 9.67.32. Soðlice he sæde, þæt on þam timan, þe he mid
his meder on cnihthade eardode, þonne wæs he ut agan of hire huse, he
foroft butan his kemese & eac gelomlice butan his tunecan eft ham gecyrde.
 9.68.6. Forþam sona gif he ænine þearfan nacodne gemette,
þone he scrydde.
 9.68.8. He bereafode hine sylfne, to þam þæt he hine mid his
mede gescrydde beforan Godes eagum.
 9.68.11. Þa gewunode his modor, þæt heo him gelomlice cidde,
cwæð, þæt hit nære riht, þæt he sylf wædla sealde his
hrægl þearfum.
 9.68.15. Ða sume dæge eode heo in to hire berne.
 9.68.16. Þa afunde heo, þæt hire sunu hæfde þearfum
gedæled forneah eallne þone hwæte, þe heo hæfde hire begiten to
ealles geares andlyfene.
 9.68.21. Heo ongann þa hig sylfe beatan mid fystum & eac mid
bradum handum & cwæð, þæt þæs geares help hire forspilled
wære.
 9.68.24. Þa becom þyder se Godes cniht Bonefatius & ongann
hi frefrian mid swylcum wordum swylcum he mihte.
 9.69.2. Ac þa þa heo naht þære frofre ne undernam, þa
bæd he hig, þæt heo sceolde gangan ut of þam berne, on þam wæs
funden hwæthwega lyttles læfed of eallum hyra hwæte.
 9.69.7. Hwæt, þa se Godes cniht þær rihte hine sylfne on
gebed astrehte, & þæs ymbe lytel fæc he uteode & his modor
gelædde eft in to þam berne, þa wæs hit gemeted swa full hwætes,
swa hit ær næs swa full.
 9.69.14. Þa þa his modor geblissode, þæt heo ealles geares
andlyfene gegaderod hæfde.
 9.69.16. Þa gesewenum þam wundre seo modor wearð onbryrded
& ongann eallunga biddan, þæt he sealde swa micel swa he wolde, se
þe swa hrædlice mihte onfon þa þing þe he bæde.
 9.69.22. Hu Bonefatius mid his gebede adydde þone fox, þe bat
his modor henna.
 9.69.24. Witodlice þeos ilce his modor gewunode to fedenne henna
on hire huses cafortune, ac hig gelomlice awegbær & abat an fox cumende
of þam neahlande.
 9.69.28. Soðlice sume dæge, þa þa se cniht Bonefatius stod
on þam ylcan cafortune, þa com se fox, swa his gewuna wæs, &
gelæhte ane henne.
 9.70.3. He þa sona swyðe hrædlice arn in to cyrcean &
hine sylfne on gebed astrehte & mid openum stefnum þus cwæð, licað
þe, leofa drihten, þæt ic ne mæge etan of minre modor fostornoðe?
 9.70.8. & efne nu þes fox ytt þa henna, þe heo afedde.
 9.70.10. He þa aras of his gebede & eode ut of þære
cyrcean.
 9.70.11. Þa sona gecyrde se fox & forlet þa henne, þe he
on his muðe hæfde, & he sylf sweltende gefeoll on eorðan beforan
Bonefaties eagum.
 9.70.15. Petrus cwæð, swyðe wundorlic þæt is, þæt
God hine gemedemode eac on wacum þingum to gehyrenne þara bena, þe on
hine gehihtað.
 9.70.19. Gregorius him andswarode, þis wæs gedon, Petrus, of
micelre stihtunge ures scyppendes þæt we sceolon gehihtan þa maran god
þurh þa lyttlan, þe we her onfoð.
 9.70.25. Soðlice þes halga & bylwita cniht wæs gehyred
on þam waclicum þingum to þam þæt he on þam lyttlum þingum
geleornode, hu swiðe he sceolde aþristian be Gode on micelum benum.
 9.70.25. Petrus cwæð, wel me licað þæt þu sægst.
 10.70.33. Hu Furtunatus þæt deofolseoke wif gehælde.
 10.70.34. Gregorius him to cwæð, on þam ylcan dælum eac
wæs sum arwurðes lifes wer Furtunatus genemned & wæs bisceop
þære cyrcean Tudertine.
 10.71.3. Se wæs þeonde on gife ormætes mægenes to
aflymenne unclæne gastas, swa þæt he þara deofla eoredweredu foroft
adræfde of þam asettum mannum & singallice oferswyðde hyra him
ongean standendan menigeo, atiht mid bigenge his gebedes.
 10.71.11. Ðyses weres hiwcuðesta wæs Iulianus ure ciricean
mundbora, se nu for lyttlum fyrste on þysre byrig wearð forðfered.
 10.71.14. Of þæs sægene ic geleornode þæt þæt ic
nu secgean wylle, forþam þe he wæs oft betweoh Furtunates dædum mid
gedyrstlæcinge his hiwcuðnysse, & to ure trymminge he syððon
geheold his gemynd on his muðe swilce beobreades swetnysse.
 10.71.22. He sæde, þæt neah þam dælum Tuscie þære
mægðe wære sum æðele gesiðwif.
 10.71.24. Seo hæfðe ane snore, þa hire sunu lyttle ær him
to wife ongeng.
 10.71.26. Seo þa mid þære ylcan hyre swegre wearð
gelaðod to cyrichalgunge þæs eadigan martires Sebastianes gebedhuses.
 10.72.4. Soðlice on þære ylcan nihte, þe heo on morgen
sceolde faran to þære cyrichalgunge þæs forecwedenan gebedhuses, þa
wearð heo mid hyre lichaman luste oferswyðed, swa þæt heo ne mihte hy
sylfe forhabban fram hire wire.
 10.72.11. Þa gewordenum þam ærmergenne wearð heo afyrht on
hire geþohte for þam þurhtogenan luste hyre lichaman.
 10.72.15. Seo scamu hyre forbead þa fare to þære
cyrichalgunge, forþam þe hi scamode for manna ansyne swyðor, þonne heo
hire ondrede Godes dom.
 10.72.19. Ferde þa forð mid hire swegre to þæs gebedhuses
halgunge.
 10.72.21. Sona swa hi wæron ingangende on þæt gebedhus
& þæs eadigan martires Sebastianes reliquias wæron þyder in
geborene, þa gegrap se awyrgeda gast þa ylcan snore þæs foresædan
gesiðwifes & ongann hi swencean beforan eallum þam folke.
 10.72.28. Ða þa þæs ylcan gebedhuses mæssepreost
geseah, þæt heo wæs swiðe geswenced, þa hrædlice genam he of
þam weofode þa scytan & oferwreah hi mid.
 10.73.1. Ac se deofol færinga eac on hine gefor, & forþam
þe he wolde ofer his mihta æni þing gedyrstlæcean, þa wearð he
geneadod, þæt he on his agenre geswencednysse oncneowe, hwæt he sylf
wæs.
 10.73.6. Ða men, þe þær æt wæron, handlunga genamon
þæt wif of þam gebedhuse & hi bæron to hyre agenum huse.
 10.73.10. Ða þa se ealda feond mid singalre geswencednysse
þæt ylce wif þearle gedrehte, þa lufedon hi hyre magas lichamlice
& on þære lufunge wæron hyre ehtende, swa þæt hi befæston
þæt wif dryum & scincræftigum to begitenne þær hyre hæle
læcedom, & ne hogodon na, þeah hi eallunga hyre sawle adwæscton,
þa þe woldon mid drycræftum hyre lichaman to sumre hwile gehelpan.
 10.73.22. Witodlice heo wearð þa gelædd to sumre ea & on
wætere bedyfed, & þa dryas þær mid langsumum galdrum hyre on
golon & syrwdon to gedonne, þæt of hyre uteode se deofol, þe hyre
ær on gefor.
 10.73.28. Ac mid þam wundorlicum dome þæs ælmihtigan
Godes, þa þa mid forhwyrfedum cræfte se an deofol wearð hire of
adrifen, þa færinga geeode on hi micel eoredmeniu, & heo þa of
þære ylcan tide ongann mid swa fela styrungum beon onstyrod & mid swa
fela stefnum & hreamum hlydan, swa fela swa heo mid awyrgedum gastum wæs
gehæfd & geþread.
 10.74.6. Hyre magas þa ongunnon þær ymbe þeahtian &
andetton, þæt hit wære hyra ungeleaffulnysse gylt, þæt hi þone
læcedom sohton to þam scincræftigum.
 10.74.11. Gelæddon þa þæt wif to þam arwurðan were
Furtunate bisceope & hi mid him forleton.
 10.74.13. Se bisceop þa hi underfeng & to manegum dagum &
nihtum hine sylfne on his gebedum abysgode.
 10.74.16. & he swa micele swiðor mid geornfullnysse befealh
his gebedum, swa micele swa he onfunde on anum lichaman him ongean standan
þone ormætan truman þara deofla eoredmenigeo.
 10.74.22. & he þa æfter feawum dagum ageaf þæt wif
hyre freondum swa hale & swa gesunde, swilce se deofol næfre on hire
nænne anweald nahte.
 10.74.27. Hu Furtunatus þone awyrgedan gast adraf of suman
gedrehtum men.
 10.74.29. Eac on oðrum timan se ylca wer Furtunatus þæs
ælmihtigan Godes þeow adræfde þone unclænan gast of sumum ofsettum
men.
 10.75.1. He þa se awyrgeda gast þa þa se dæg æfnode
& he geseah, þæt seo tid wæs stille mid mannum, þa gehiwode he
hine sylfne to sumum ælþeodigum men & ongann faran geond þære
ceastre stræte & þus clypian, gehyrað la, hwæt se halga wer
Furtunatus bisceop dyde.
 10.75.9. Nu he adraf me ælþeodine mannan of his huse.
 10.75.11. Ic sece, hwær ic me gerestan scyle, & ic on his
ceastre nane findan ne mæg.
 10.75.13. Þa sæt sum man æt his gledum on his huse mid his
wife & mid his lyttlum suna.
 10.75.16. Se þa gehyrde his stefne & axode, hwæt se
bisceop him dyde, & he hine þa in gelaðode & gedyde, þæt he
sæt mid him æt þam gledum.
 10.75.20. Þa ða hi him betweonon spellodon & wel fela worda
spræcon, þa gefor se ylca awyrgeda gast on þæs earman mannes lytlan
sunu & hine awearp on þa ylcan gleda, & þær sona his feorh him
ætþrang.
 10.75.26. & he þa se earma man swa æt his suna bereafod
oncneow, hwæne he sylf underfeng, oððe hwæne se bisceop ær ut
adræfde.
 10.75.30. Petrus cwæð, hwæt cweðað we, hwæt þæt
sig, þæt se ealda feond onfeng swilce dyrstinysse to acwellanne on
þæs huse, þe hine to him gelaþode mid cumliðnysse gife & wende,
þæt he ælþeodi wære?
 10.76.2. Gregorius him andswarode, fela þinga, Petrus, beoð
gode gesewene, ac hi ne beoð na gode, forþam þe hi ne beoð na of godum
mode cumene.
 10.76.6. Be þam se hælend cwæð on his godspelle, gif
þin eage bið manfull, þonne bið þin lichama eall þystrig.
 10.76.9. Forþam gif þæs mannes ingeþanc, þe þær
forestæpð, bið forhwyrfed, þonne byð þwurh eall þæt weorc,
þe þær æfterfyligeð, þeah þe hit beo rihtlic geþuht.
 10.76.14. Soðlice ne wene ic na, þæt þes wer wære
gelustfullod on arfæstnysse weorke, ac on þæs bisceopes tælinge,
þa þa he ongann swylce he cumliðnysse gegearwode & wearð þa æt
his suna bereafod.
 10.76.20. Ac þæt æfterfyliende wite gecyðde, þæt seo
forestæppende underfangennys næs na butan gylte.
 10.76.23. Witodlice fela manna syndon, þe for þig þenceað
god to wyrceanne, þæt hi adilgian þa gife oðra manna weorces.
 10.76.26. Ne hi oðre men ne feormiað, forþam þe hi ahte
swiðe gymon, hwæðer him god sig gedon þæt þæt hi doð, ac hi
swyðor gewilniað, þæt hi beon toforan oðrum mannum wel geherede.
 10.76.32. Be þysum þinge ic wene, þæt we magon þysne
wer, þe þone awyrgedan gast on cumliðnysse underfeng, swyðor begyman on
bounge ideles gylpes, þonne on arfæstum weorke.
 10.77.5. Ac he wolde beon geþuht, swylce he bet dyde þonne se
bisceop, þa þa he underfeng þone, þe se drihtnes wer Furtunatus ær
ut adraf.
 10.77.9. Petrus cwæð, eall hit is swa swa hit gesæd is.
 10.77.11. Soðlice þæs weorkes ende gecydde, þæt se
ingeþanc næs na on þam weorke clæne.
 10.77.16. Hu Furtunatus gehælde þone blindan & sum hors
fram deofle.
 10.77.18. Gregorius cwæð, on sumum timan gelamp, þæt sum
man forlet his eagena gesihðe.
 10.77.20. Þa wearð he gelædd to þam halgan Furtunate,
þæt he þurh his þingunga him help abæde, & he begeat.
 10.77.24. Soðlice þa þa se drihtnes wer hæfde his gebed
geendod, þa awrat he Cristes rodetacen on þæs blindan mannes eagum &
þær rihte agifenum leohte seo niht þære blindnysse gewat fram þam
eagum.
 10.77.30. Eft syððon wearð sumes þegenes hors awend on
feondlice reðnysse, swa þæt manega men earfoðlice mihton hit
gehealdan, ac swa hwylce swa hit ongeræsan mihte, hit bat & slat &
hyra lima totær.
 10.78.5. Þa æt nextan wearð hit fram manegum mannum gebunden
& to þam Godes were gelædd.
 10.78.7. He þa sona mid aþenedre his handa awrat Cristes
rodetacen on þæs horses heafde & ealle his reðnysse awende on
geþwærnysse, swa þæt hit syððon wæs stillre & gedreohre,
þonne hit wære ær þære wodnysse.
 10.78.13. Þa þa se ilca þegen geseah, þæt his hors
wæs awended fram his wodnysse mid swa hrædlicum bebode þæs wundres,
þa geteohhode he hit to forgifenne þam ylcan halgan were.
 10.78.19. He þa wiðsoc hit to underfonne.
 10.78.20. Ac se þegen þurhwunode on his benum biddende,
þæt he his gife ne forsawe.
 10.78.22. Se halga wer þa nam þæt hors healdende midne weg
twegra dæla, swa þæt he ægðer ge þæs þegenes bene
getiðode, ge eac he forsoc þa gife to underfonne for swa begitenum
mægene.
 10.78.28. Ærest he gegearwode medeme wyrð for þam horse
& syððan underfeng þæt hors, þe him ær wæs to gife
geboden, forþam þe he geseah, gif he hit ne underfenge, þæt se wære
geunrodsod, þe hit ær ahte.
 10.79.5. & þa neadiendre þære soðan lufe he gebohte
þæt, þæt him nan neod næs to hæbbenne.
 10.79.8. Hu se Gota geneadod ageaf Furtunate þa cnapan, & hu
he awehte Marcellum of deaðe.
 10.79.10. Ne sceal ic na eac forsuwian þæt, þæt ic nu
nealice for twelf dagum oncneow be þyses weres mægenum.
 10.79.13. Witodlice me wæs to gelædd sum eald þearfa, &
ic þa geornlice hine axode, hwanone he wære, swa swa min gewuna is,
þæt me simle is swyðe leof ealldra manna gespræc.
 10.79.18. Þa sæde he, þæt he wære of Tudertina
þære ceastre.
 10.79.20. Ða cwæð ic to him, la, fæder, ic axie þe,
hwæðer þu cuðest Furtunatum þone bisceop.
 10.79.23. Se þearfa cwæð, ic hine cuðe & wel cuðe.
 10.79.24. Þa cwæð ic þa gyta, ic bidde þe, þæt þu
secge me, hwæðer þu oncneowe ænie his wundra & me wilniendum
gecyðe, hwilc wer he wære.
 10.79.28. He cwæð, se mann wæs swiðe feorr & ungelic
þysum mannum, þe we nu geseoð.
 10.79.31. Soðlice swa hwæt swa he gewilnode æt þam
ælmihtigan Gode, sona swa he his bæd, þær rihte he hit beget.
 10.80.1. Þæs ylcan an wundor ic wylle secgean, þæt me nu
on mod bearn.
 10.80.3. Witodlice sumon dæge comon Gotan neah Tudertinam
þære ceastre, þa onetton to Rauennam þære byrig.
 10.80.6. Þa genamon hi twegen lyttle cnapan of þæs bisceopes
lande.
 10.80.8. Þæt land wæs underþeodd þære foresædan
ceastre Tudertine.
 10.80.10. Þa þa þis wearð gecyðed þam halgan were
Furtunate, þa sende he sona forð æfter & het him to gelangian þa
ylcan Gotan & him to spræc mid liðre spræce.
 10.80.15. Þohte ærest, þæt he wolde hyra reðnysse
gegladian & þa syððon him þus to cwæð, hwylc wyrð wyllað
ge þæt ic sylle, & ge me agifon þa cnapan, þe ge on minum lande
genamon, & me þyses to gife eowres þances getiðiað?
 10.80.22. Se þa þe hyra fyrmest wæs gesewen, him andswarode
& cwæð, we syndon gearwe to donne, swa hwæt swa þu elles
bebydst.
 10.80.26. Gewisslice þas cnapan we natoþæshwon ne agifað.
 10.80.28. Se arwurða wer þa hine liðelice þywde & þus
cwæð, nu þu unrotsast me & nelt gehyran þinne fæder.
 10.80.31. Ac ne geunrodsa þu me, þe læs þe hit eft ne
fremie.
 10.81.1. Se ylca Gota þa þurhwunode on his heortan reðnysse
& swa wiðsacende þanon gewat.
 10.81.4. Soðlice þa oðrum dæge, þa þa se Gota faran
wolde, þa com he eft to þam bisceope.
 10.81.6. Þa bæd se bisceop hine eft mid þam ylcan worde
þara foresædra cnapena.
 10.81.8. Ða þa he þurh nan þing nolde geþwærian,
þæt he hi ageafe, þa wearð se bisceop geunrotsod & cwæð, ic
wat, þæt þe na ne fremað, þæt þu gewite fram me þus unrotum.
 10.81.14. Se Gota forseah þa word & gewennde to his inne,
& þa ylcan cnapan, þe we ymbe sprecað, asette uppon hors & asende
hi forð mid his mannum.
 10.81.18. & he sylf þær rihte astah uppon his hors &
wæs him æfterfyliende.
 10.81.20. Ða þa he on þære ylcan ceastre becom beforan
þa cyrcean þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres, þa wearð his horses
fot asliden, & he mid horse mid ealle afeoll, þæt him sona his þeoh
forbærst, swa þæt þæt ban wæs todæled on twa sticceu.
 10.81.27. He wearð þa upp aræred & on handum gelædd
ongean to his inne.
 10.81.29. & he þa ofstlice ofsennde & ongean gelædde
þa cnapan, þe he ær forð asende, & asende to þam arwurðan were
Furtunate þus cweðende, la, fæder, ic bidde þe, þæt þu sende to
me þinne diacon.
 10.82.2. Ða þa his diacon com to him licgendum, þa het he
tomiddes forð gelædan þa cnapan, þe he eallinga ær wiðsoc to
agifenne þam bisceope, & hi þam diacone ageaf þus cweðende, ga
& sege minum hlaforde þam bisceope, þæt ic eom nu geslagen, forþam
þe he me wyrigde.
 10.82.10. Ac ic bidde nu, þæt he þingie for me &
hæbbe þa cnapan, þe he ær bæd.
 10.82.13. Se diacon þa underfeng þa cnapan & hi gelædde
to þam bisceope.
 10.82.15. Hwæt, þa se arwurða wer Furtunatus þær rihte
gebletsode wæter & sealde his diacone & him to cwæð, gang
hrædlice & spreng þis wæter ofer þæs licgendan lichaman.
 10.82.19. Witodlice se diacon þa ferde & stop inn to þam
Gotan & þæt gebletsode wæter sprengde ofer his limu.
 10.82.22. Ðær gelamp þa wundorlic þing & swiðe to
wafienne.
 10.82.24. Sona swa þæt gehalgode wæter gehran þæs
Gotan þeoh, þa wearð eall seo bryce eft gestaþelod & þam þeo
wæs agifen seo ærre hælo, swa þæt he on þære ylcan tide aras
of þam bedde & wearð uppon his horse & ferde eft on þone ylcan
weg, þe he ær ongann, efne swilce he næfre nane derunge his lichaman ne
þolode.
 10.82.34. & wæs þa geworden, þæt se þe nolde beon
underþeodd hyrsumnysse, to þam þæt he þa cnapan wið weorðe
ageafe þam halgan were Furtunate, se wearð eft mid wite geneadod, þæt
he hi ageaf butan weorðe.
 10.83.8. Be Marcelle.
 10.83.9. Witodlice þysum þus geendodum se ealda man geteohhode,
þæt he me þa gyta ma þinga gerehte be þam ylcan Furtunate.
 10.83.13. Ac forþam þe me þa æt wæron manega men, ic
wearð abysgod hi to lærenne, & eac asah seo æfentid þæs
dæges, þæt ic ne moste swa lange swa me lyste gehyran þa weorc
þæs arwurðan Furtunates, þæs dæda ic simle wylle gehyran, gif me
alyfed bið for oðrum bysgungum.
 10.83.21. Ac on oðrum dæge se ylca ealda man me rehte mare
þa gita be him swiðe wundorlic þing.
 10.83.24. He cwæð, þæt on þære ylcan byri Tudertine
eardode mid his twam swystrum sum godes weorkes wer, þam wæs nama
Marcellus.
 10.83.28. Se for his lichaman hefinysse & untrumnysse wearð
forðfered on sæternes dæge on þam halgan easteræfenne.
 10.83.31. Ac his lichama ne mihte on þam ylcan dæge beon
bebyrged, forþam þe he wæs feorr to berenne.
 10.84.3. Ðær wæs þa sumre tide ylding to gefyllanne þa
licþenunge his bebyrginge.
 10.84.5. Þa wurdon his swustra geswencede mid his deaðe.
 10.84.7. Hi urnon þa wepende to þam arwurðan were Furtunate
& ongunnon clypian mid micelum stefnum & þus cwædon, we witon,
þæt þu hæfst þara apostola lif & anweald.
 10.84.12. Þu geclænsast hreofle, þu onlihtst blinde.
 10.84.14. Cum eac & awece urne deadan broðor.
 10.84.15. Sona swa he wiste hyra broðor forðferedne, he ongann
eac him sylf wepan for his deaðe & cwæð to þam swystrum, gewitað
incc heonone & ne spreke ge þas þing, forþam þe þæt þæt
git biddað is þæs ælmihtigan Godes hæs, þam ne mæg nan man
wiðstandan.
 10.84.23. Þa gewiton hi þanone, & se bisceop þær
wunode unrot for þæs farenan mannes huse.
 10.84.31. He þa genealæhte to þære stowe, þær se
sawulleasa lichama læg, & hine sylfne þær abysgode on his gebede.
 10.85.1. Soðlice þa geendodre his bene he aras & gesæt
neah þam deadan lichaman & mid unludre stefne þone forðfarenan be his
naman nemde & clypode þus cweðende, waca, broðor Marcelle.
 10.85.6. He þa dyde swylce he leohtlice slepe & wearð aweht
to his nealæcendan stefne, þeah þe heo gehwæde wære.
 10.85.10. & he þær rihte geopenode his eagan &
lokiende to þam bisceope he þus cwæð, eala, hwæt dydest þu?
 10.85.13. Eala, hwæt dydest þu?
 10.85.13. Him þa se bisceop andswarode & cwæð, hwæt
dyde ic?
 10.85.15. Þa cwæð he to þam bisceope, gyrstandæge comon
hi twegen, þa me adydon of þam lichaman, & hi me on gode stowe
gelæddon.
 10.85.19. Nu todæg wæs an send to me se cwæð,
gelædað hine eft to þam lichaman, forþam þe Furtunatus bisceop becom
in to his huse & hine to him clypode.
 10.85.24. Ða geendodum þam wordum he wearð gestrangod sona of
þære untrumnysse & syððon lange on þysum life wunode.
 10.85.27. Swa þeah nis na to gelyfenne, þæt he forlure þa
stowe, þe he ær onfeng, forþam þe untwylice for his þingeres benum
he mihte libban æfter deaðe, se þe eac ær his deaðe hogode to
gelicienne Gode ælmihtigum.
 10.86.1. Ac for hwi secgeað we þus fela þinga be his life,
þonne we nu gyta æt his lichaman magon niman wel fela cyðnyssa his
mægena?
 10.86.5. Witodlice þær beoð unbundene deofolseoce &
untrume gehælede, & swa oft swa he bið mid geleafan gebeden, þæt
þæt he libbende gewunode to donne, þæt he ungeswikendlice
þurhwunað to wyrcenne æt his deadum banum.
 11.86.12. Hu Martirius gemearcode þone hlaf.
 11.86.13. Ac nu gita, Petrus, me lysteð þa word minre kyðinge
gelædan to þam dælum Ualerie þære mægðe.
 11.86.16. Be þam me gelamp, þæt ic gehyrde swiðe healice
wundra of þæs arwurðan Furtunates muðe, þæs gemynd ic dyde ær
feorr bufon.
 11.86.19. Se nu gita gelomlice com to me, & þonne he me
hwæt rehte be ealdra manna dædum, simle he me gefyllde mid niwre
gereordunge.
 11.86.24. He sæde, þæt on þære ylcan mægðe wæs
sum man Martirius genemned, swyðe estfull þeow þam ælmihtigan Gode.
 11.86.27. Se sealde þis taken to his mægenes gewitnysse, on
sumon dæge þa þa his gebroðra gegearwodon axbakenne hlaf &
forgeatan, þæt hi him on ne asetton Cristes rodetaken, swa swa hit
gewunelic is on þære mægðe, þæt man swa mearcað mid medmicelum
treowe þeorfe hlafas, þæt hi beoð gesewene, swylce hi beon on feower
feorðan dælas todælede.
 11.87.5. Þa wæs þær mid se ilca Godes þeow & him
þa him betweonan sprecendum he oncneow, þæt se hlaf næs na
gemearcod.
 11.87.9. Ða þa se hlaf wæs eallunga mid þam gledum &
mid þære æmyrian bewrogen, þa cwæð he, for hwi ne mearcodon ge
þysne hlaf swa swa hit þeaw is?
 11.87.14. & þa þa he þis spræc, þa worhte he Cristes
rodetaken mid his fingrum ongean þa gledu.
 11.87.16. & him seniendum þær rihte se hlaf worhte
ormæte brastlunge, efne swylce þær toburste sum mycel crocca on þam
fyre.
 11.87.20. Þa æfter þam þe se hlaf wæs abaken & ut
atogen of þam fyre, þa wæs he gemeted gemearcod mid Cristes rodetacen.
 11.87.24. Þæt ne worhte nanes mannes æthrine, ac þæs
halgan weres geleafa.
 12.87.27. Hu Severus se mæssepreost awehte of deaðe þone
hiredes ealdor.
 12.87.29. Eac on þære ylcan stowe is gehaten Interorina sum
denu, seo fram manegum mannum mid cyrlisceum worde is genemned Interocrina.
 12.87.33. On þære wæs sum swyðe wundorlices lifes wer,
þam wæs nama Seuerus.
 12.88.2. Se wæs sacerd on þære cyricean, þe is hali
þære eadigan Godes cennestran & simle fæmnan sancta Marian.
 12.88.5. Hit gelamp þa, þæt sum hiredes hlaford becom to his
endeniextan dæge.
 12.88.8. Þa sende he ærendracan hrædlice to him &
bæd, þæt he swyðe raðe come to him & mid his gebedum þingode
for his synna, þæt he geworhtre dædbote & behreowsunge be his
yfelum wurde alysed fram his gyltum, ær þam þe he ferde of lichaman.
 12.88.15. Ða gelamp hit, þæt se sacerd unmyndlunga wearð
abysgod wineard to settanne & cwæð to þam ærendracan, þe him to
comon, gað ge forð beforan, ic eow cume æfter.
 12.88.21. Ða þa he geseah, þæt him on þam weorce wæs
sum þing lyttles to lafe, þa dyde he sume lytle yldinge, to þam þæt
he geendode þæt lytle weorc, þe him þær to lafe wæs.
 12.88.26. & þa þæt geendod wæs, þa ongan he faran
to þam seocan men.
 12.88.28. Soðlice þa him þyder gangendum on þam wege him
ongean urnon þa ærendracan, þe him ær to comon, & þus
cwædon, la, fæder, for hwi latodest þu?
 12.88.32. Ne swinc þu nu na mare, forþam þe he is eallinga
forðfered.
 12.89.2. Þa þis gehyrde se Godes ðeow, he ongann clypian mid
mycelum stefnum & cwæð, þæt he his cwylmend wære.
 12.89.5. Witodlice he becom þa wepende to þæs forðfarenan
mannes lice & hine sylfne mid tearum on eorðan astrehte beforan þæs
deadan bedde.
 12.89.10. Ða þa he swyðlice weop & his heafod beot on
þa eorðan & a clypode, þæt he his deaðes scyldi wære, þa
færinga se þe þær forðfered wæs onfeng his sawle.
 12.89.14. Sona swa þæt gesawon manega men, þe þær
ymbuton stodon, hi for þære blisse ongunnon swyðor wepan forð asendum
stefnum micelre wundrunge.
 12.89.19. Þa þa hi hine axodon hwær he wære, oððe hu
he eft gecyrde, þa cwæð he, þa wæron swiðe swearte men, þe me
læddon, of þara muðe & of nosum uteode þæt fuluste fyr,
þæt ic na aræfnian ne mihte.
 12.89.25. Ða þa hi me þurh swyðe þystre stowa
gelæddon, þa færinga us utgangendum com ongean sum iungling mid
fiðerum swiðe fægerre gesihðe, se cwæð to þam, þe me tugon,
gelædað hine eft ham ongean, forþam þe Seuerus mæssepreost hine
bewepð & heofað, soðlice drihten hine hæfð forgifen his tearum.
 12.90.2. Witodlice Seuerus sona of þære eorðan aras, &
dondum þam geedcukedan dædbote he him forgeaf fultum his agenre
þingunge.
 12.90.6. & þa þa se edcukeda seoca seofon dagas dyde
dædbote & behreosunge for his ær gefremdum gyltum, þa on þam
eahteoðan dæge ferde he bliðe of þam lichaman.
 12.90.11. Besceawa nu, ic þe bidde, Petrus, þysne Seuerum, be
þam we nu sprecað, þone drihten let him swa leofne, þæt he ne
geþolode, þæt he furðon litelne fyrst wurde geunrodsod.
 12.90.17. Petrus cwæð, þas þing syndon to wundrienne, þa
me wæron a oð þis bediglode.
 12.90.20. Ac hwæt cweðað we, hwi hit sy, þæt þyllice
weras ne magon nu on þyssum dagum beon gemette?
 12.90.23. Gregorius him andswarode.

END_TEXT

GDPref 2 (H)
B9.5.9.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Preface to Book 2: Hecht 1900-7, 94-6.



 94.10. Her onginneð seo æftre boc dialogorum be life &
wundrum sanctus Benedictes abbodes.
 94.12. Her uppyrneð se æftera stream ðære godcundan
spræce, se cymð of þam burnon þæs gastlican wylles & þurh
þæs halgan gastes gife gæð þurh þa ofergilldan weleras þæs
eadigan & þæs apostolican weres sancte Gregories, se mid Grecum is
genemned Crysosthomas, to þam þæt þurh þa toflowennysse þæs
ylcan streames beon onlihte & geþænede þa inngeþancas geleaffulra
breosta.
 94.23. Þysum wordum se ylca gyldenmuða Gregorius wæs
sprekende & þus cwæð, sum wæs arwurðes lifes wer, se wæs
mid Godes gife gebledsod & be naman genemned Benedictus, þæt is on
Englisc se gebletsoda.
 94.29. Se of þære tide his cnihthades wæs berende ealdlice
heortan & oferstah his ylde mid godum þeawum & ne sealde his mod to
nanum unrihtum luste.
 95.4. Ac þa þa he wæs þa gita on þissere eorðan,
þæt he mihte freolice brucan hwilwendlicra þinga, þa forseah he
þysne middaneard mid his blostman, eallunga swilce he forsearod &
forscrunken wære.
 95.10. He wæs geboren of freogum & of æðelum kynrene of
Nursie þære mægðe & wæs befæsted to Romebyrig to leornienne
þær boccræftas & gewrita wisdom.
 95.14. Ac þa þa he on þam geseah fela manna faran þurh þa
stæðhlepan hyra leahtra, þa wiðteah he his agenum fet, þone he ær
asette swilce on inngange middaneardes.
 95.19. Þam he wiðbræd, þe læs hwæt unrihtes hine on
his geþance gehrine, & he sylf syððon ferde eall on micele
forspillednysse.
 95.23. Witodlice forsewenum bigengum þara boccræfta he forlet
his fæder hus & æhta & gewilnode, þæt he Gode anum gelicode,
& sohte him þone gegyrelan haligre drohtunge.
 95.28. He gewat þanone swiðe gewissfullice, swilce he ungewis
wære, & ferde swyðe wislice swa ungelæred.
 96.1. Ne leornode ic na ealle þyses halgan weres dæda, ac þa
feawa, þe ic cyðe, ic oncneow æt his feower gingrum, þe hit me rehton,
þæt is æt þam swyðe arwurðan were Constantine, se him
æfterfyligde on þæs mynstres ealdordome, & eac ic hit gehyrde æt
Ualentiniane, se wæs mænig gear ealdor þæs mynstres æt Laterane,
& fram Simplicio, se wæs þridda þe æfter Benedicte rihte his
gesomnunge, & eac ic hit geaxode æt Honorate, se nu gita is ealdor
þæs mynstres, on þam se ylca wer ær drohtnode.
 96.16. Witodlice þa þa se halga wer Benedictus eallunga forlet
to leornienne þa boccræftas, þa geteohhode he to secenne westenstowa,
& his fostormodor ana him fyligde, forþam þe heo hine swiðe geornlice
lufode.
 96.22. Þa þa hi becomon to þære stowe, þe is genemned
Effide, þa gewunedon hi þær mid manegum wurðfullum werum.
 96.26. Þa weras hi þær mid soðre lufe gehæfdon on
þæs eadigan Petres cyricean.

END_TEXT
