GDHead 2 (H)
B9.5.10.1.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Headings to Book 2: Hecht 1900-7, 93-4.



 93.1. Hu he adwæscte þæt gedwimorlice fyr.
 93.2. Hu he gehælde þone cnapan, þe wæs mid hryre
tocwysed.
 93.3. Hu þa gebroðra æton & druncan buton leafe.
 93.4. Be Ualentinianes breðer.
 93.5. Hu he arasode þa hiwunge Totillan cininge.
 93.6. Be þære witegunge, þe wæs geworden be þam ylcan
cininge Totillan.
 93.8. Hu he alysde þone preost fram deofle.
 93.9. Hu he witegode be his mynstres toworpennysse.
 93.10. Hu he þurh gast wiste þa behyddan flaxan.
 93.11. Hu se Godes þeow onfeng þa sceatas.
 93.12. Hu he oncneow þurh gast þæs cnapan modinysse.
 93.13. Hu þa twa hund mittena melewes wæron fundene æt
þam mynstergeate.
 93.15. Hu he þurh gesihþe gedihte þa mynstertimbrunge neah
Terracine.
 93.17. Hu þa Godes þeowena æfter deaðe wurdon amansumode.
 93.18. Hu se eorðe awearp þone munuccnapan of his byrgenne.
 93.19. Hu se munuc gemette þone dracan, þa þe he of mynstre
ut gewat.
 93.21. Hu he gehælde þone man fram þære micelan adle.
 93.22. Hu þa scillingas wurdon þurh wundor agifene þam
biddendum.
 93.24. Hu þæt glæsfæt wæs aworpen uppon þa stanas
& næs tobroken.
 93.26. Hu seo æmtige kyf wearð mid ele gefylled.
 93.27. Hu he alysde þone munuc fram deofle.
 93.28. Hu he mid his eagum unband þone ceorl.
 93.29. Hu he awehte þone deadan.
 94.1. Be Scolastican wundre his swustor.
 94.2. Hu he geseah his swustor sawle, hu heo utferde of lichaman.
 94.4. Hu he geseah ealne middaneard under anum leoman &
Germanes bisceopes sawle.
 94.6. Hu he awrat munuca regol.
 94.7. Hu he witegode þam broðrum be his forðfore.
 94.8. Hu þæt wode wif wearð gehæled æt his scræfe.
 94.9. Her endiað þa capitulas þære æftran boce.

GD 2 (H)
B9.5.10.2.
Gregory the Great, Dialogues, Book 2: Hecht 1900-7, 96-174.



 1.96.30. Hu he geedstaðelode þæt tobrokene hridder.
 1.96.31. Ða gelamp hit, þæt seo forecwedene ðæs halgan
weres fostormodor abæd an hridder hire to læne æt oðrum wife hyre
neahgeburene to feormianne sumne dæl hwætes.
 1.97.3. Þa wearð hit ofer þære þylinge unwærlice
forlæten, þæt hit for sumon ungelimpe wearð tobroken & wæs swa
gemeted, þæt hit wæs todæled on twa sticceu.
 1.97.8. Sona swa his eft cyrrende fostormodor gemette hit swa
toslagen, heo ongann swiðlice wepan, forþam þe heo geseah tobroken
þæt fæt, þe heo ær to læne onfeng.
 1.97.13. Soðlice þa þa se eawfæsta & se arfulla cniht
Benedictus geseah his fostormodor wepan, þa wearð he sona hyre sare
efensarig & genam mid him butu þa sticceu þæs tobrokenan hridderes
& hine sylfne mid tearum on his gebed astrehte.
 1.97.20. He þa eft of his gebede arisende gemette wið hine
þæt fæt swa gehal, þæt on him ne mihton beon fundene nane swaðu
þæs bryces.
 1.97.24. & he þa sona his fostormodor swiðe liðelice
gefrefrode & hire ageaf gehal þæt hridder, þe he ær æt hire
tobroken genam.
 1.97.27. Þeos dæd þa wearð cuð eallum þam, þe on
þære stowe wunedon, & wæs gehæfd on swa micelre wundrunge,
þæt þære stowe landleodan þæt ylce hridder ahengon on þære
cyricean inngange, to þam þæt ægðer ge þa þe þær þa
andwearde wæron, ge þa þe þær syððon æfterfyligdon ealle
oncneowon, on hu mycelre fullfremmednysse se cniht Benedictus ongann þa gife
his drohtnunge.
 1.98.5. Ðæt hridder wæs þær þa manega gear
ætforan heora eallra eagum & hangode ofer þære cyricean duru a oð
þas/.
 2.100.24. Þam ylcan fugele him becom on swa mycel costnung his
lichaman, swa mycel swa se halga wer næfre ær ne onfunde.
 2.100.28. Þa æt nextan he geseah sum wif, þæt gelædde
se awyrgeda gast beforan his modes eagan & mid swa mycelum fyre on hire
hiwe onælde þæs Godes þeowes mod, þæt he earfoðlice hine
sylfne geheold on his breoste for þam lige hyre lufe, swa þæt he forneah
oferswyðed mid þam unrihtan luste þohte eallunga to forlætenne
þæt westen.
 2.101.8. Hwæt, þa færinga him to beseah seo upplice gifu,
þæt he wearð to him sylfum gehwyrfed.
 2.101.11. & þa geseah he þær neah him weaxan þicce
scaldþyfelas netelena & bremela.
 2.101.13. He þa unscrydde his reafe & hine sylfne nacodne
awearp & wylede on þæra þorna ordum & on þæra netela
tendingum & wæs þær þa gewylwed swa lange, oð þæt he
þanon eode of him gewundod eallum lichaman, & þurh þære hyde wunda
he ateah of his lichaman his modes wunde, forþam þe he þone unlust geteah
on his lichaman sar.
 2.101.24. & þa þa he wel witelice barn utan, þa
adwæscte he þæt, þæt he unalyfedlice barn innan.
 2.101.26. He oferswyðde þa synne, forþam þe he swa onwende
þa ontendnysse.
 2.101.28. Witodlice of þære tide seo costnung þæs
unlustes wæs gewyld on him, swa swa he syððon his gingrum sæde, swa
þæt he swilces nan þing næfre ofer þæt on him sylfum ne
gefredde.
 2.102.4. Æfter þam ongunnon fela manna eallunga forlætan
þysne middaneard & efstan to his lareowdome.
 2.102.7. Cuðlice he wæs þa freoh fram leahtre þære
costnunge & wæs eallunga rihtlice geworden mægena lareow.
 2.102.10. Be þam eac wæs þurh Moysen beboden, þæt þa
diaconas/ sceoldon þenian fram fif & twentigum wintra & ofer
þæt, & þonne of þam fiftigoðan geare hi mihton beon hyrdas
þara fata & madma þæs temples.
 2.102.16. Petrus cwæð, witodlice eallunga me nu betweoh
læteð be sumum dæle andgites þysre forð gelæddan cyðnysse.
 2.102.20. Ac swa þeah ic bidde, þæt me þis sy fullicor
getrahtnod.
 2.102.22. Gregorius him andswarode, cuð þæt is, Petrus,
þæt on geogoðhade þæs lichaman costnung wealleð, & fram þam
fiftigoðan geare colað þæs lichaman hæte.
 2.102.26. Soðlice þa halgan fatu syndon geleaffullra manna
mod.
 2.102.28. Eornostlice þam gecorenum, þe beoð þonne gita on
costnunge hyra lichaman, him is nedþearf, þæt hi beon underþeodde
& þeowian oðrum mannum, & þæt hi beon geswencede mid
þenungum & mid geswinceum.
 2.102.34. & þonne on smyltre ylde hyra modes eallunga aweg
gewiteð seo hæte þære costnunge, þonne beoð hi hyrdas þara
fata, forþam þe hi beoð þonne sawla lareowas.
 2.103.5. Petrus cwæð, ic andette, þæt me licað þæt
þæt þu sægst.
 2.103.7. Ac forþam þe þu geopenodest þæt loc þysre
forðbrohtan cyðnysse, ic bidde, þæt þu sceole geondyrnan þa
þing, þe syndon ongunnene be þæs rihtwisan mannes life.
 3.103.13. Hu he tobræc þæt glæsene fæt mid
rodetacne.
 3.103.14. Gregorius him andswarode, witodlice aweg gewitendre
þære costnunge se Godes wer swa swa up alokenum þornum & wel beganum
lande he sealde swiðe genihtsumne wæstm of þam ækere haligra
mægna, swa þæt his nama wearð gehæfd mære for þam wurðmynde
his healican drohtnunge.
 3.103.22. Ða wæs þær unfeorr sum mynster, þæs
mynstres gesomnunge ealdor wæs forðfered, & eall seo gesomnung of
þam mynstre þa becom to þam ylcan arwurðan Benedicite & mid mycelum
benum to him gewilnodon, þæt he hyra mynstres ealdor beon sceolde.
 3.103.30. He þa lange wiðsakende yllde & him foresæde,
þæt his þeawas ne mihton geþwærian to þara broðra þeawum.
 3.103.33. Ac æt nehstan oferswyðed he getiðode hyra benum.
 3.104.2. Ða þa he on þam ylcan mynstre heold þa
gehealdsumnysse regollices lifes & hyra nanum ne alyfde, þæt he buge
on þa swyðran healfe oððe on þa wynstran fram þam wege munuclicre
drohtnunge þurh unalyfedlice dæda, swa swa hi ær dydon, þa ongunnon
þa broðro ungewittilice reðgiende ærest hi sylfe oncunnan & him
betwynan cidan, forþam þe hi æfre hine bædon, þæt he hyra ealdor
wære, þara wohnys ætspearn æt þam regole his rihtinge.
 3.104.16. Ða þa hi gesawon, þæt him næs alyfed
unalyfedlic þing under him to donne, & hi besargodon, þæt hi
sceoldon hyra gewunan forlætan, & him heard wæs, þæt hi on
ealdum mode wæron geneadode niwe þing to smeagenne, swa swa þam þwyrum
þeawum symle þinceð þurhhefi godra manna lif, þa þohton hi to
smeagenne sum þing be his deaðe.
 3.104.26. Hi þa ongunnenum geþeahte gemengdon attor wið
wine.
 3.104.28. & þa þa þæt glæsene fæt, on þam
wæs gehæfd se deadberenda drinc, wæs broht to bledsianne æfter
mynsterlicum þeawe sittendum þam halgan fæder, þa aþenede Benedictus
his hand & awrat Cristes rodetaken þær toweard, & þæt fæt,
þe wæs feorr gehæfd, he mid þam ylcan tacne tobræc.
 3.105.6. & hit wearð swa tobroken, swylce he on þam
deaðes fæte asende sumne stan for rodetaken.
 3.105.9. Hwæt, þa se Godes wer undergeat hrædlice, þæt
þæt fæt hæfde on him deaðes drinc, forþam þe hit ne mihte
aberan lifes taken.
 3.105.13. & he þær rihte aras & mid bliðre ansyne
& smyltum mode gelangode him to þa broðru & him þus to spræc,
gemildsie eow, broðro, God ælmihti.
 3.105.18. La, for hwi woldon ge þus don wið me?
 3.105.19. Hu, ne sæde ic eow ær, þæt eowrum þeawum
& minum ne mihte ætgædere gewurðan?
 3.105.22. Farað nu & æfter eowrum agenum þeawum seceað
eow ealdor, forþam þe ge me na æfter þysum habban ne magon.
 3.105.25. He þa se halga wer eft gehwearf to þære stowe his
leofan ænettes & þær ana mid him sylfum eardode beforan þæs
upplican sceaweres eagum.
 3.105.30. Petrus cwæð, ne ongite ic na openlice, hwæt
þæt sy, þæt he eardode mid him sylfum.
 3.105.32. Gregorius him andswarode, gif se halga wer geneadod lange
wolde under him gehabban þa broðro, þe ongean hine wæron anmodlice
wordliende & wæron his drohtnunge feorran ungelice, þonne wære him
wen, þæt he forlete þone gewunan his stiðlican drohtnunge &
þæt gemet his stilnysse, & eac þæt he gebigde his modes eage fram
besceawunge þæs godcundan leohtes, & þæt he þe læs begymde
his agen lif, þonne he dæghwamlice wære geswenced on hyra rihtinge,
& þæt he wenunga forlete hine sylfne & na þe hraðor hi ne
gerihtlæhte fram hyra wohnysse.
 3.106.14. Witodlice swa oft swa we beoð gelædde wiðutan us
sylfe þurh styrunge swyðlices geþohtes, we beoð swa þeah, & we
mid us ne beoð, forþam þe we us sylfe na ne geþenceað, þonne ure
geþanc wide færð ymbe oðre þing.
 3.106.21. Oððe magon we cweðan, þæt se wære mid him
sylfum, se þe on þam godspelle is gesæd, þæt he fæder forlete
& feorr land sohte & forspillde his fæder æhta þone dæl,
þe he underfeng, & folgode on þære ceastre anum þara
ceasterwarena?
 3.106.28. He læsode his swyn & geseah, þæt hy æton
beanbylgas, & hine hingrode.
 3.106.30. He ongann þa syððon geþencean þa god he ær
forleas, & is awriten be him, þæt he wearð on hine sylfne gecyrred
& cwæð, eala, hu fela esnewyrhtena on mines fæder huse habbað
hlaf genohne.
 3.107.5. Gif he gewisslice wæs mid him sylfum, hwanon gecyrde he
eft to him sylfum?
 3.107.7. Eornostlice ic sæde, þæt þes arwurða wer
Benedictus eardode mid him sylfum, forþam þe he symle wæs ymbsewen on
his sylfes gehealdsumnysse, & he simle hine sylfne besceawode beforan his
scyppendes eagum hine sylfne symle ameriende, & he wiðutan hine sylfne
ne gewidmærsode his modes eage.
 3.107.17. Petrus cwæð, ac hwæt is þæt, þæt is
awriten be Petre þam apostole, þa þa he fram þam engle wæs ut
gelæded of þam cwearterne, þæt he þa to him sylfum gecyrred
cwæð, nu ic wat soþlice, þæt drihten asende his engel & me
generede of Herodes gewealde & of eallre geanbidunge Iudeisces folkes?
 3.107.26. Gregorius him andswarode, twam gemetum, Petrus, we beoð
wiðutan us gelædde, forþam oððe we beoð gelædde under us sylfe
þurh ures geþohtes slide, oððe we beoð up ahafene ofer us sylfe
þurh þa gife þære gastlican sceawunge.
 3.107.33. Witodlice se þe þa swyn fedde, he gefeoll under hine
sylfne for his modes widgalnysse & for his unclænnysse.
 3.108.2. Ac se apostol, þe se engel onlysde & his mod gegrap
on wafunge, he wæs wiðutan hine sylfne, ac he wæs þeah ofer hine
sylfne.
 3.108.5. Eornostlice hyra ægðer gecyrde to him sylfum, þa
þa se an geteah hine sylfne to his heortan fram gedwylde his weorkes, &
se apostol gecyrde to his heortan fram heahnysse þære gastlican sceawunge,
to þam þæt he wæs eft on þam gemænan andgite, þe he ær
wæs.
 3.108.14. Se arwurða Benedictus on þam westene eardode mid him
sylfum, swa swiðe swa he hine sylfne geheold binnon his geþohtes locum.
 3.108.18. Soðlice swa oft swa hine gegrap on heahnysse seo
hæte & se willa þære upplican sceawunge, buton tweon he forlet hine
sylfne under him sylfum.
 3.108.22. Petrus cwæð, me licað þæt þæt þu
sægst.
 3.108.23. Ac ic þe bidde, þæt þu me secge, hwæðer he
sceolde oððe moste forlætan þa broðro, þe he æne underfeng.
 3.108.27. Gregorius him andswarode, þæs þe ic wene, Petrus,
þær þær beoð gemette sume, þa þe gefultumiað þa godan,
þær beoð geþyldelice to forberenne þa togeþeoddan yfelan men.
 3.108.32. Ac þær þær æt neahstan idel geswinc be
þam yfelum mannum & swyðost, gif on neawiste gestrangiað þa þing,
þe Gode magon bringan selran wæstm.
 3.109.8. Witodlice se halga wer geseah, þæt hi ealle anmodlice
wæron his ehtende, þa þe he for hyra þearfe stod hi to healdenne.
 3.109.12. & foroft on fulfremedra wera mode byð gedon
þæt, þæt nis mid swigean to forlætanne, forþam þonne hi
geseoð hyra geswinc beon butan wæstme, þonne farað hy on oðre stowe
to geswince mid wæstme.
 3.109.18. Ðanon eac se æðela lareow Paulus gewilnode,
þæt he wære tolysed & wære mid Criste.
 3.109.21. Him wæs Crist þæt he lifde & gestreon
þæt he swulte.
 3.109.22. Se na þæt an þæt he sylf gewilnode þrowunga
gewinn, ac eac swilce he getihte & onælde oðre men þa þing to
forberene.
 3.109.28. He þrowode Damasci ehtnysse, & to þam þæt he
hi forbugan mihte, he sohte rap & wylian & wolde, þæt he wære
digollice ofer þone weall nyðer alæten.
 3.110.3. Ac hwæt cweðað we, hwæðer Paulus him ondrede
þone deað, þone he sylf sæde þæt he gewilnode for þæs
hælendes lufe?
 3.110.6. Ac þa þa he geseah, þæt on þære ylcan stowe
wæs him sylfum lytel wæstm for Gode & hefi geswinc for worulde, þa
geheold he hine sylfne elles hwyder to geswince mid wæstme.
 3.110.12. Soþlice se stranga Godes fyhtling nolde beon gehæfd
binnon clysingum þære burge Damasci, ac sohte þone feld þæs
gecampes.
 3.110.16. Be þam eac gif þu hit lustlice gehyrst, þu hit
hrædlice ongitst, þæt se ylca arwurða Benedictus sylf libbende forlet
þa earfoðlæran broðro, forþam þe he on oðrum stowum swiðe fela
oðre awehte fram hyra sawla deaðe.
 3.110.22. Petrus cwæð, seo cuðe gesceadwisnys &.
 6.113.20. Aræred.
 6.113.20. Seo stow, þe se Gota underfeng to clænsienne, læg
ofer sumes wæteres seaðes ofre.
 6.113.23. Ða þa se ylca Gota mid eallum his mægene heow
þara bremela þiccnysse, þa færinga ræsde forð þæt isen of
þam hylfe & befeoll on þone seað.
 6.113.27. Wæs þara wætera deopnys þær on þam seaðe
swa micel, þæt næs eallunga nan hiht to secenne þæt isene tol.
 6.114.2. Witodlice þa forspilledum þam isene se Gota gearn
forhtiende to Maure þam munuke & him cyðde þa hynðe, þe he
geworhte, & dyde behreowsunge his gyltes.
 6.114.6. Maurus se munuc eac sona hit cyðde Benedicte, þam
Godes þeowe.
 6.114.9. Hwæt, þa se drihtnes wer Benedictus þis gehyrende
stop to þam seaðe & genam þæt hylfe of þæs Gotan handa &
scet hit on þone seað.
 6.114.13. & þær rihte gehwearf þæt isen of þam
grunde & wearð on þam hylfe.
 6.114.15. He þa hrædlice ageaf þam Gotan þæt tol þus
cweðende, her is þin tol.
 6.114.17. Wyrc þin worc, & ne beo þu nan þing sari.
 7.114.21. Hu his leorningcniht eode upon þam wætere.
 7.114.22. On sumon dæge, þa þa se arwurða Benedictus
wunode on his cyricean, þa wæs ut agan þæs halgan weres se
foresprecena cnapa Placidus munuc to hladene wæter of þære ea.
 7.114.27. He þa unwærlice nyðer alet on þæt wæter
þæt fæt, þe he on handa hæfde, & eac he sylf feallende wæs
him æfterfyliende.
 7.114.31. Hine þa sona seo yð gegrap & hine fram lande
innor ateah nealice anre flane scyte.
 7.114.33. Se Godes wer þa binnan cyrcean geseted hrædlice
þæt ongeat & ofstlice clypode Maurum & þus cwæð, broðor
Maurus, yrn hraðe, forþam þe se cnapa, þe ferde to hladene wæter,
gefeoll on þa ea & hine eallunga seo yð tyhð feorr aweg.
 7.115.8. Eala, hu wundorlic þing þær gewearð &
æfter Petre þam apostole ungewunelic.
 7.115.10. Soðlice Maurus abæd Benedictes bletsunge, & hyre
onfangenre he ferde be his ealdres bebode swiðe hrædlice to þære
stowe, þær se stream bær aweg þone cnapan.
 7.115.15. He arn uppon þam wætere & wennde, þæt he
fore on drigeum lande.
 7.115.17. He gelæhte þone cnapan be þam feaxe & mid
swiftum ryne eft gecyrde.
 7.115.19. Sona swa he þæt land gehran, þa wearð he to him
sylfum gecyrred & on bæc beseah.
 7.115.22. & þa forþam þe he ongeat, þæt he arn uppon
þam wætere, & þæt he ne mihte gedyrstlæcean, þæt hit swa
gewurde, gif he hit wyste, þa wearð he mid wundrunge afyrht for þære
dæde & gecyrde to his ealdre & him rehte þa þing swa gedon.
 7.115.29. Se arwurða wer Benedictus þa ongann tellan þis
wundor to Maures hyrsumnysse, na to his agenum geearnungum.
 7.116.1. Ac þær ongean Maurus sæde, þæt hit wære
geworden for his bebode sylfum, & cwæð, þæt he nære na gewita
þæs mægenes, þe he nytende worhte.
 7.116.5. Ac on þam freondlican geflite þære wrixiendlican
eaðmodnysse þær to genealæhte rihtwis dema, þæt wæs se cnapa,
þe þær wæs up atogen of þam wætere.
 7.116.10. He þus cwæð, þa þa ic wæs getogen of þam
wætere, þa geseah ic þæs abbodes kæppan ofer minum heafde, &
ic geseah hine sylfne teon me up of þam wætere.
 7.116.15. Petrus cwæð, swiðe mære syndon þa þing,
þe þu sægst, & wel nyttwyrðe to manegra manna trymminge.
 7.116.18. Soðlice swa ic þæs godan weres wundra ma drinke,
swa me hyra swyðor þyrsteð.
 8.116.23. Hu se hrefn feorr abær þone geættrodan hlaf.
 8.116.24. Gregorius cwæð, ða þa eallunga þa ylcan stowa
feorr & wide weollon on lufe ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes, þa
forleton fela manna þis woruldlice lif & gebigdon hyra heortan swuran
under þam liðan iuke ures alysendes.
 8.117.2. Ða wæs þær sumre neah cyricean mæssepreost,
þam wæs nama Florentius, se wæs Florenties ures subdiacones
yldrafæder.
 8.117.6. Þa wearð se mid þæs ealdan feondes yfelnysse
þurhslagen & ongann andian on þæs halgan weres gecneordnyssum &
tælan eac his drohtnunge, & gehwylce men þe he mihte he ongan geweman
eac fram his neosunge, swa swa þweorra manna þeaw is, þæt hi
æfstiað on oðrum mannum hyra mægenes god, þæt hy sylfe ne
gewilniað to hæbbenne.
 8.117.16. Ða þa se niðfulla mæssepreost geseah eallunga,
þæt he ne mihte wiðstandan þæs halgan weres forðweardnysse &
godum weorcum, & gehyrde wexan þone hlisan his mæran drohtnunge, &
eac þæt manie men untolætendlice wæron gelaðode to staðole
beteran lifes mid þære ylcan mærðe his hlisan, þa wearð he
swyðor & swyðor onæled mid þæs niðes blæsum & þone
halgan tælde, forþam þe he gewilnode to hæbbenne þæt lof &
herunge his mæran drohtnunge, ac he nolde habban heriendlic lif.
 8.118.1. He wearð þa ablended mid þystrum þæs ylcan
andan, oð þæt he wæs to þam gebroht, þæt þæs
ælmihtigan drihtnes þeowe asende to lake geættrodne hlaf, swylce for
bletsunge, þone se Godes wer underfeng mid þancunge.
 8.118.7. Ac him næs on þam hlafe forholen seo cwalu, þe him
digollice wæs gemynt.
 8.118.10. Soþlice an hrefn wæs gewunod, þæt he com of
þam neah wuda symle to his gereordungtide & onfeng hlaf æt his handa.
 8.118.14. Þa com se hrefn swa his gewuna wæs, & se Godes
wer beforan þone hrefn forð awearp þone geættrodan hlaf, þe se
niðfulla mæssepreost him sende, & him bebead þus cweðende, on
þæs hælendes naman genim þysne hlaf & hine awyrp on swylce stowe,
þær hine næfre nan man findan ne mæge.
 8.118.22. Se hrefn þa mid openum muðe & mid aþenedum
fiðerum ongann yrnan hoppetende & crakettan ymbutan þone ylcan hlaf,
swilce he openlice cwæde, þæt he him hyran wolde.
 9.123.9. Upp ahebban.
 9.123.9. He þa sona com & dyde þær his gebed & his
bletsunge þær to sealde, & se stan wearð upp ahafen mid swa mycelre
hrædnysse, swylce he ær nane hefinysse næfde.
 10.123.16. Hu he adwæscte þæt gedwimorlice fyr.
 10.123.17. Ða gelicode þam Godes were, þæt hi on þære
ylcan stowe dulfon þa eorðan.
 10.123.19. & þa þa hi deoppor delfende neoðor becomon,
þa fundon þa broðru þær sum æren deofolgyld.
 10.123.22. Þa to sumre hwile awurpon hi hit in to hyra kicenan.
 10.123.24. Þa færinga wæs gesewen fyr þær of gan &
on eallra þara munuca eagum hit ætywde, þæt eall þære ylcan
kicenan getimbrung sceolde beon forburnen.
 10.123.28. Ða broðru þa mid gehlyde wurpon wæter on
þæt fyr, swylce hit to adwæscenne.
 10.124.1. Þa wearð se drihtnes wer mid þam ylcan gehruxle
astyrod & þyder becom.
 10.124.4. Þa geseah he sona, þæt þæt ylce fyr wæs
geþuht on þara broðra eagum, ac hit næs na on his agenum swa
oncnawen.
 10.124.7. He þa hrædlice gebigde his heafod on gebed &
þa broðru, þe he gemette mid þam gedwimorlicum fyre bepæhte, he
ongean gecigde, þæt hi gesenodon hyra eagan, & gesawan, þæt
þære kicenan getimbrung stod gehal & gesund, & hi na ne gesawon
þa ligeas, þe se ealda feond leaslice gehiwode.
 11.124.18. Hu he gehælde þone cnapan, þe wæs mid hryre
tocwysed.
 11.124.19. Eft hit gelamp, þæt þa gebroðru sumes huses wah
hwene heahran getimbrodon for sumre neode, & se Godes wer Benedictus wunode
binnon his mynstres clysingum on his gebedes geornfulnysse.
 11.124.25. Him þa se ealda feond bysmriende ætywde &
sæde, þæt he wolde gecuman mid þam swincendum broðrum.
 11.124.28. Se Godes wer þa þurh ærendracan swiðe swiftlice
þæt þam gebroðrum cyðde þus cweðende, broðru, doð eow
wærlice, forþam þe on þysre ylcan tide eow to becymð se arwyrgeda
gast.
 11.125.1. Se þa þe þæt ærende þyder brohte, uneaðe
mihte þa word abeodan, ær þam þe se awyrgeda gast towearp þone wah,
þe þær getimbrod wæs, & mid þæs wages hryre ofþryccende
tocwysde ænne munuccnapan sumes gerefan sunu.
 11.125.8. Hi wurdon þa ealle geunrette & swiðe geswencede,
na for þæs wages fylle, ac for þæs ofhrorenan broðres
tocwysednysse.
 11.125.11. & hi þa hrædlice tilodon mid hefigum wope
þæt to kyðanne þam arwurðan fæder Benedicte.
 11.125.14. Se ylca fæder þa het him to bringan þone
forwundedan cnapan.
 11.125.16. Ac hi ne mihton hine beran buton on anum hwitle,
forþam þe þa toglidenan stanas þæs wages na þæt an, þæt hi
his limu tocwysdon, ac hi eac swylce mid ealle his ban tobrysdon.
 11.125.22. Ða bebead se Godes wer þær rihte, þæt hi
hine aledon in on his cytan uppon his meattan, þe he gewunode on uppan to
gebiddenne, & ut asendum þam broðrum he beleac þa cytan & befealh
þa his gebede micele geornlicor, þonne he ær gewunode.
 11.125.30. Ða gewearð þær wundorlic þing, þæt on
þære ylcan tide he asende þone cnapan eft to þam weorke swa gesundne
& eall swa strangne, swa he ær wæs, þæt he eac sceolde
fullgearwian þone wah mid þam gebroðrum, be þæs forwyrde se ealda
feond gelyfde, þæt he mihte gebysmrian Benedictum.
 11.126.6. Se Godes wer þa betwux þysum þingum ongan eac
þeon on witegunge gaste & foresæde towearde þing & andweardum
mannum cyðde æfwearde þing.
 12.126.14. Hu þa broðru æton & druncon buton leafe.
 12.126.15. Soðlice þæs mynstres þeaw wæs, þæt swa
oft swa þa gebroðru ut ferdon to ænigre spræce, þæt hi ne
æton ne druncon ut of mynstre.
 12.126.19. Ða þa þis wæs carfullice gehealden be þæs
regoles gewunan, þa sume dæge gelamp hit, þæt þa broðru ferdon ut
to sumre spræce.
 12.126.22. On þære spræce hi wurdon geneadode to wunianne
oð ða lætran tide.
 12.126.25. Þa wiston hi, þæt þær neah wunode sum
eawfæst wif.
 12.126.26. Þa eodon hi in to hire huse & þær ætan.
 12.126.28. Ða þa hi eft late gecyrdon to mynstre, þa bædon
hi þæs halgan fæder bletsunge, swa swa hit þeaw wæs.
 12.127.3. Ac he hrædlice axode & þus cwæð, hwær
æton ge?
 12.127.5. Hi cwædon, nahwær.
 12.127.6. Se halga wer him to cwæð, for hwi leogað ge swa?
 12.127.7. Cweðað ge, þæt ge ne eodon in to þæs wifes
huse?
 12.127.9. Cweðað ge, þæt ge þas mettas & þas ne
onfengon?
 12.127.11. Cweðað ge, þæt ge þus fela scencea þær
ne gedruncon?
 12.127.12. Ða þa se arwurða fæder þam broðrum sæde
ge þæs wifes hus ge hu fela cynna mettas þær wæron ge þara
drincea getel, þa oncneowon hi ealle þa þing, þe hy ær dydon, &
forhtiende feollon to his fotum & andetton, þæt hi agylt hæfdon.
 12.127.20. He þa sona þam gylte gearode þencende, þæt hi
ofer þæt ne dydon on his æfweardnysse, þone hi wiston, þæt he
wæs symle andweard on his gaste.
 13.127.29. Be Ualentinianes breðer.
 13.127.30. Eac Ualentinianes broðor Benedictes munukes, þæs
gemynd ic ær bufan dyde, se wæs læwede wer, ac he wæs swyðe
eawfæst, se gewunode, þæt he ælce geare ferde of his agenum &
becom fæstende to Benedictes mynstre, to þam þæt he onfenge þæs
Godes weres bletsunga & gesawe Ualentinianum his geborenan broðor.
 13.128.5. Witodlice sume dæge, þa þa he ferde on þone weg
to þam mynstre weard, þa geþeodde him to sum oðer wegferend hine
sylfne, se bær formete mid him.
 13.128.10. Ða þa seo lætre tid eallunga weox, þa cwæð
se wegferenda to þam eawfæstum men, broðor, cum hider, þæt wyt
magon etan, þe læs þe wit werigian on þysum wege.
 13.128.15. He þa him andswarode & cwæð, ne gewurðe
þæt, broðor.
 13.128.17. Ne do ic na þæt, forþam þe ic gewunode,
þæt ic symle becom fæstende to þam arwurðan fæder Benedicte.
 13.128.20. Ða onfangenre þære andsware se wegferenda sume
hwile geswigode.
 13.128.23. Ac þa þa hi æfter þysum sumne dæl þæs
weges geferdon, þa mynegode hine eft se wegferenda, þæt hi æton.
 13.128.26. Ac he nolde geþwærian, forþam þe he teohhode
fæstende becuman to mynstre.
 13.128.28. Ða geswigode se þe hine gelaðode to æte &
sume hwile geþwærode þa gyta fæstende mid him to farenne.
 13.128.32. Ða þa hy þa gyta foron fyrr on hyra weg, & seo
lætre tid hi gangende gewæhte, þa gemetton hi be þam wege fægre
mæde & wynsumne wylle, & eall swa hwæt swa mihton beon gesewene
lustfullice to þæs lichaman gereordunge.
 13.129.7. Ða cwæð se wegferenda to him, loca nu, her is
fæger wæter, her is fæger mæd, her is smeðe stow, on þære
wit magon unc gereordian & hwæthwega gerestan, þæt wit magon
syððan þe eað unkerne weg gesunde faran.
 13.129.14. Witodlice þa gecwemdon þa word his earum, & þa
stowa gelicodon his eagum, & he þa mid þære þriddan mynegunge
gelæred him getiðode & æt mid him.
 13.129.18. Ða on þa æfentide becom he to þam mynstre,
& þa þa he becom beforan þone arwurðan fæder Benedictum, þa
bæd he his bletsunge.
 13.129.22. Ac se halga wer sona him ætwat þæt, þæt he
on þam wege dyde, þus cweðende, hwæt is nu, broðor?
 13.129.26. Se awyrgeda feond, þe þurh þinne geferan spræc
to þe on þam wege, ne mihte þe æne gelæran, ne he ne mihte oðre
siðe, ac æt þam þriddan cyrre he þe gelærde & þe
oferswyðde to þam þe he wolde.
 13.129.32. He þa oncneow þone gylt his tyddran modes &
gebigde hine sylfne to þæs halgan weres fotum, & swa micele swyðor
sceamiende ongan his gylt bewepan, swa micele swa he ongeat hine sylfne
æfweardne agyltan on gesihðe þæs fæder Benedictes.
 13.130.8. Petrus cwæð, me þingð, þæt on þæs
halgan weres inngehigdum wære Heliseus gast þæs witegan, se wæs
andweard his æfweardum leorningcnihte.
 14.130.13. Hu he arasode þa hiwunge Totillan þæs cyninges.
 14.130.14. Gregorius cwæð, ðe gedafenað, Petrus, þæt
þu sume hwile geswigie, þæt þu nu gyta mæge maran þing oncnawan.
 14.130.17. Soðlice on Gotena tidum, þa þa hyra cyning Totilla
gehyrde, þæt se halga wer hæfde witegunge gast, þa ferde he to his
mynstre & þær unfeorr gewicode & het cyðan þam halgan were
hine toweardne.
 14.130.23. Him þa sona wæs beboden of þam mynstre, þæt
he come.
 14.130.25. Ða þohte he, swa swa he wæs getrywleases modes,
þæt he wolde gecunnian & arasian, hwæðer se Godes wer hæfde
witegunge gast.
 14.130.29. Ða wæs sum his swurdbora genemned Riggo, þam he
sealde his gescy & dyde, þæt he wæs gescyrdd mid cynelicum reafum,
& him bebead, þæt he ferde to þam Godes men, swylce hit se cyning
sylf wære.
 14.131.3. & eac to his þenunge he asende his þry þegenas,
þa gewunedon, þæt hi wæron him to geþeodde toforan oðrum mannum,
þa wæron þus gehatene, Uuru, Deric & Blidin, þæt hi beforan
þæs Godes þeowes eagum þone ylcan Ricgean geanlicodon þam cyninge
Totillan & eodon him on ælce healfe.
 14.131.12. Eac he gesette him men to oðrum þenungum & funde
him swurdboran, to þam þæt sceolde beon wened, þæt he wære se
cyning, ægðer ge for þam healicum þenungum, ge for þam pællenum
reafum, þe he wæs mid gescrydd.
 14.131.19. Ða þa se ylca Riggo þus gewlitegod mid þam
reafum stop on þæt mynster þrutiende swyðe, & him mid siðode
micel meniu þeniendra manna, þa sæt se Godes wer feorron behealdende
þone cumendan Riggo, & sona swa hit mihte beon eallunga fram him gehyred
to þam Riggo, þa clypede he þus cweðende, alege, sunu, alege þæt
þæt þu byrst, nis hit na þin.
 14.131.30. Se Riggo þa þær rihte on eorðan gefeoll &
þearle aforhtode, forþam þe he geþristlæhte don to bysmore swa
mycelum were.
 14.132.1. & ealle þa þe him mid wæron comon to þam
Godes men & hi on eorðan astrehton & eft arisende ne dorston na to
him genealæcean, ac gecyrdon ongean to hyra cyninge & swyðe forhte
cyddan him, on hu mycelre hrædnysse hi wurdon arasode.
 14.132.9. He þa se ylca Totilla him sylf eode to þam Godes men,
& þa þa he feorron geseah hine sittendne, þa ne dorste he him to
genealæcean, ac he hine sylfne on eorðan astrehte.
 14.132.14. Se Godes wer þa tuwa & þriwa him to cwæð.
 14.132.15. Aris.
 14.132.15. Ac he ne dorste beforan him upp arisan of þære
eorðan.
 14.132.17. Benedictus þa þæs hælendan Cristes þeowa
wearð gemedemod þurh hine sylfne, þæt he genealæhte to þam
astrehtan cyninge & hine of þære eorðan up arærde & hine for
his agenum dædum ofercidde & mid feawum wordum him foresæde ealle
þa þing, þe him towearde wæron, & þus cwæð, fela yfela þu
gewyrycst, & fela þu geworhtest.
 14.132.27. Ac on sumne sæl gewyld þe sylfne eallunga fram
unrihtwisnysse.
 14.132.29. Witodlice in to Rome þu becymst.
 14.132.30. Ofer sæ þu færst.
 14.132.31. Nigon gear þu rixast.
 14.132.31. On þam teoðan þu swyltst.
 14.133.1. Ðysum wordum þa gehyredum se cyning wearð swiðe
þearle ablycged, & abedenre þæs halgan gebedræddenne he him
þanon gewat, & syððan of þære tide he wæs eallunga læs
wælhreow.
 14.133.7. Þa æfter unmycelum fæce he becom to Rome &
ferde to Siciliam þam iglande, & on þam teoðan geare his rices mid
þæs ælmihtigan Godes dome he forlet þæt rice samad mid his life.
 15.133.13. Be þære witegunge, þe wæs geworden be þam
ylcan cyninge Totillan.
 15.133.15. Syððon eac gewunode becuman to þam ylcan Godes
þeowe þære cyricean bisceop Canusine, þone se drihtnes wer swiðe
lufode for his lifes geearnunge.
 15.133.19. Witodlice þa þa se hæfde spræce wið þone
Godes wer be inngange Totillan þæs cyninges & be Romanaburge
forspillednysse, þa cwæð he, þurh þysne cyning Totillan þeos
ceaster byð toworpen, þæt heo leng ofer þæt ne bið on geeardod.
 15.133.26. Him þa se drihtnes wer andswarode, ne wyrð næfre
Romeburh toworpen fram hæðenum þeodum, ac mid stormum &
ligetslihtum, mid þodenum & eorðstyrungum heo byð geswenced & on
hire sylfre forweornað.
 15.134.3. Ðysre witegunge gerynu us eallunga syndon swutollice
cuðe gewordene, forþam þe we geseoð nu, þæt on þysre byri syndon
fram þodene weallas tohrorene & hus toslagene & cyricean toworpene,
& þysre burge getimbrunga we geseoð mid langre ealdunge awacode,
forþam þe hi syndon mid gelomlicum hryrum tofeallenne.
 15.134.12. Ðis spel me wearð cuð of gereccednysse Honorates
his leorningcnihtes.
 15.134.15. He sæde swa þeah, þæt he hit na ne gehyrde of
Benedictes muðe, ac forþam he hit sæde me, þe he cwæð, þæt
hit wære him gesæd fram þam broðrum, þe wæron neah þam halgan
were.
 16.134.21. Hu he alysde þone preost fram deofle.
 16.134.22. Eac on þam ylcan timan sum preost Aquinensis þære
cyricean wearð gedreht mid deofolseocnysse.
 16.134.25. Þa wearð he asended geond manega martira stowa fram
þam arwurðan were Constantio his cyrcean bisceope, to þam þæt he
mihte beon gehæled.
 16.134.29. Ac þa halgan Godes martiras noldon him syllan his
hæle, þæt hi mid þam geswutelodon, hu micel wære on þam halgan
Benedicte.
 16.134.33. Witodlice he wearð þa gelæded to þæs
ælmihtigan Godes þeowe Benedicte, & he þa his bena asende to urum
drihtne hælende Criste & sona ut adraf þone ealdan feond of þam
ofsetenan menn.
 16.135.5. Him þa gehæledum he bebead þus cweðende, ga nu
& æfter þysum ne et þu nan flæsc, ne þu næfre ne
gedyrstlæc, þæt þu to halgum hade genealæce, oððe maran
underfo, þonne þu nu hafast.
 16.135.11. Soðlice on swa hwilcum dæge swa þu dyrstilice
geþristlæcst, þæt þu þone halgan sacerdhad underfehst, þær
rihte þu bist eft mid deofles anwealde gehæftnieded.
 16.135.16. Ða gewat se preost him hal þanon, & swa swa hit
gewunelic is, þæt þæt niwe wite gebregeð þæs mannes mod, he
sume hwile geheold þa þing, þe se Godes wer him bebead.
 16.135.21. Soðlice æfter manegum gearum, þa þa ealle his
ylldran witan foron of þysum leohte, & he geseah, þæt his gingran
wæron toforan him gesette on halgum sacerdhadum, he þa him on bæc sette
swylce of langre tide forgitende þa word & lare þæs halgan weres
Benedictes & genealæhte to þam halgan sacerdhade.
 16.135.31. Hine þa sona gelæhte se deofol, þe hine ær
forlet, & na ne geswac hine to swencenne, oð þæt he his sawle him
from asceoc.
 16.136.2. Petrus cwæð, ðæs þe me þinceð, þæt
þes Godes wer þurhferde eac þa diglan þing þære godcundnesse, se
þe swa þurhseah þone preost for þi deofle gesealdne, þæt he ne
gedyrstlæhte to underfonne þone halgan sacerdhad.
 16.136.9. Gregorius cwæð, hwi ne cuðe þa diglan þing
þære godcundnysse, se þe heold þa bebodu þære godcundnysse,
þonne hit is awriten, þæt se þe geþeodeð to drihtne, þonne byð
an gast his & drihtnes?
 16.136.15. Petrus cwæð, gif hit an gast bið mid drihtne
þæs þe drihten to geþeodeð, hwæt is þonne, þæt se ylca
æðela lareow Paulus eft cwæð, hwa cann drihtnes andgit?
 16.136.20. Oððe hwylc wæs his geþeahtere?
 16.136.21. Swyðe unþæslic mæg beon geþuht, þæt se
nyte drihtnes andgit, se þe mid him byð geworden an gast.
 16.136.24. Gregorius him andswarode, þa halgan weras swa swyðe
swa hi beoð an samod mid drihtne, swa swyðe hi witon drihtnes andgit.
 16.136.28. Soðlice eac se ylca apostol Paulus cwæð, hwylc
man wat þæs mannes modgeþancas, butan þæs mannes gast, þe on him
sylfum byð?
 16.137.3. Swa eac þa þing, þe beoð on Godes geþeahtunge,
nan mann ne cann butan se Godes gast.
 16.137.6. Eac se ylca Paulus þær to geihte, þæt he
ætywde hine sylfne cunnan þa þing, þe syndon Godes gestihtunge.
 16.137.9. He cwæð, ne onfengon we na þone gast þyses
middaneardes, ac þone gast, þe is of Gode.
 16.137.12. Eft he cwæð be þam, þæt eage ne geseah, ne
eare ne gehyrde, ne on mannes heortan ne astah, hwylce þing God gegearwode
þam, þe hine lufiað.
 16.137.17. Soðlice þa he onwreah us þurh his gast.
 16.137.18. Petrus cwæð, gif þonne þam ylcan apostole Paule
þurh Godes gast wæron onwrigene þa Godes geþeahtas, hu gespræc he
ofer þæt, þe ic bufan gemynegode, þa þa he cwæð, eala, hu mycel
heahnys is þara welana Godes wisdomes & his inngehigdes, & hu
unbefangelice his domas syndon & his wegas unaspyriendlice?
 16.137.27. Ac me þas word sprekendum is eft oðer axung on mod
becumen.
 16.137.29. Soðlice Dauid se witega spræc to drihtne &
þus cwæð, on minum welerum ic bodode ealle þa domas þines muðes.
 16.138.1. & þonne hit læsse is to witenne, þonne hit sy
eac to bodianne, hwæt is þæt, þæt Paulus sæde, þæt Godes
domas syndon unbefangenlice, & Dauid cyðde na þæt an, þæt he
ealle þas þing wiste, ac he hi eac swilce bodode?
 16.138.8. Gregorius him andswarode, æt ægðrum þysum ic
þe geandswarode ær mid sceortnysse herbufan, þa þa ic cwæð,
þæt halige weras swa swyðe swa hi beoð an samod mid drihtne, swa
swyðe hi witon drihtnes andgit.
 16.138.14. Soðlice ealle þa þe estfullice drihtne fyliað,
hi eac mid estfullnysse syndon mid Gode, & þa ne syndon na mid Gode, þa
þe nu gyta syndon gehefgode mid byrðene þæs brosniendlican lichaman.
 16.138.20. Witodlice swa swyðe swa hi beoð to Gode geþeodde,
swa swiðe hi witon his diglan domas, & swa swyðe swa hi beoð him fram
aþeodde, swa swyðe hi hi nyton.
 16.138.26. Eornostlice for þy hi secgeað, þæt his domas
syndon unbefangelice, forþam þe hi nu gyta fullfremedlice ne þurhfarað
his digolnyssa, & forþam þe hi mid hyra mode him onclifiað &
onclifiende oncnawað swa swiðe swa hi onfoð oððe on spræcum
haliges gewrites oððe on digelum onwrigennyssum, þa þing hi witan &
bodiað.
 16.139.3. Witodlice þa domas, þe God forsuwað, þa hi nyton,
& þa þe he sprycð, þa hi witon.
 16.139.5. & Dauid se witega þa þa he cwæð, on minum
welerum ic bodode ealle þa domas, þa sona geeacnode he þær to þines
muðes, swilce he openlice cwæde, ic mihte witan & bodian þa domas,
þe ic oncneow þe sylfne secgean, ac þa þe þu sylf ne sprycst,
untwywlice þa þu behydst urum oncnawennyssum.
 16.139.15. Eornostlice her to geþwærað se witiendlica &
se apostolica cwyde þus, þæt Godes domas syndon unymbfangenlice, &
swa þeah þa þe of Godes muðe beoð forðbrohte, þa beoð bodode
mid mennisceum welerum, forþam þe hi magon beon ongitene fram mannum,
þonne hi beoð forðbrohte þurh God, & hi na ne magon beon oncnawene,
þonne hi beoð þurh God bediglode.
 16.139.26. Petrus cwæð, on þære andsware minre axunge me
is geopenod nu se intinga rihtes gesceades.
 16.139.29. Ac ic bidde þe, þæt þu gita gerecce, gif þu
hwilce ma wite be þyses weres Benedictes mægene.
 17.140.1. Hu he witegode be his mynstres toworpennysse.
 17.140.2. Gregorius cwæð, sum æðele wer wæs Theoprobus
genemned, se wæs gecyrred to haligre drohtnunge þurh mynegunge þæs
ylcan fæder Benedictes.
 17.140.6. Se eac for his lifes geearnunge hæfde to him mycelne
truwan synderlicre hiwcuðnysse.
 17.140.9. Sume dæge þa þa þes eode to þam halgan were in
to his cytan, þa gemette he hine þær swyðe bitterlice wependne.
 17.140.13. Ða þa he þær wel lange gestod & geseah,
þæt his tearas na ne geendodon, na swa þeah se Godes wer ne weop na mid
gebiddende, swa swa his gewuna wæs, ac gnorniende, þa axode hine
Theoprobus, hwæt wære se intinga swa miceles wopes.
 17.140.20. Him þær rihte se Godes wer andswarode &
cwæð, eall þis mynster, þe ic getimbrode, & ealle þa þing,
þe ic gegearwode þysum broðrum, mid þæs ælmihtigan Godes dome
syndon gesealde hæðenum mannum.
 17.140.27. Earfoðlice ic mihte begitan æt Gode, þæt me
wurdon forgifene of þysre stowe þara broðra feorh.
 17.140.30. Ðæs halgan weres stefne gehyrde Theoprobus þa,
& we, þe hit witon, geseoð nu, þæt his mynster is toworpen fram
Langbeardena þeode.
 17.140.34. Soðlice nu niwan gelamp on niht, þa þa broðro
wæron on reste, þæt comon þyder þa Langbearde & þær
genamon ealle þa þing, þe on þam mynstre wæron, buton þæt hi ne
mihton þær nænne mann gelæccean.
 17.141.5. Ac se ælmihtiga God þa gefyllde þæt, þæt
he ær behet his getrywum þeowe Benedicte, þæt he geheolde þara
manna lif, þeah þe he þa æhta sealde hæðenum mannum.
 17.141.10. On þam þinge ic oncnawe, þæt Benedictus
hæfde Paulus gewrixle, se þa þa he þolode scipes forwyrd & lyre
eallra þara þinga, þe þær on wæron, þa onfeng he sylf him to
frofre eallra þara lif, þe him mid ferdon.
 18.141.18. Hu he þurh gast wiste þa behyddan flaxan.
 18.141.19. Eac hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt Exhilaratus ure
gefera, þone þu canst gecyrredne to rihtre drohtnunge, he wæs fram his
hlaforde asended to þam mynstre, þæt he sceolde þam Godes were
Benedicte beran twa treowene fatu wines fulle, þa syndon on folkisc flaxan
gehatene.
 18.141.27. Þa brohte he him þa oðre, & þa oðre
gehydde be wege þyderweard farende.
 18.141.29. Witodlice se drihtnes wer, þam þa æfweardan
þing ne mihton beon bediglode, þa underfeng mid þancunge þa ane flaxan,
& þone eft cyrrendan cniht he warnode þus cweðende, sunu, foresceawa
be þære flaxan, þe þu be wege gehyddest, þæt þu þær of ne
drince, ac ahyld hi wærlice, & þu þonne onfindst, hwæt on hire
is.
 18.142.6. He þa swyðe gescynd & ofsceamod eode fram þam
Godes men & cyrrende wolde þa gyt gecunnian þæs þe he ær
gehyrde.
 18.142.10. Þa mid þam þe he þa flaxan onhyllde, þa eode
þær ut hræddlice an næddre.
 18.142.12. Se forecwedena cniht Exilaratus þa aforhtode þurh
þæt þe he on þam wine gemette, & him ondred þæt yfel, þe he
worhte.
 19.142.18. Hu se Godes þeow onfeng þa sceatas.
 19.142.19. Soðlice unfeorr fram þam mynstre wæs sum tun, on
þam wæs mycel meniu manna gecyrred fram deofolgylda bigenge to Godes
geleafan þurh Benedictus lare.
 19.142.23. Ðær on tune wæron eac sume nunnan, & se
Godes þeow Benedictus begymde, þæt he gelomlice þyder asende his
broðru, to þam þæt hi sceoldon þæt folc trymman & læran to
hyra sawla þearfe.
 19.142.29. Ða sume dæge sende he þyder sumne munuc swa him
geþywe wæs.
 19.142.31. Ac se munuc, þe þyder onsended wæs, æfter
þæs folces lare & geendodre þære bodunge wearð gebeden fram
þam nunnum, þæt he sume sceatas vel mappulas onfeng, & he him þa
behydde on his bosme.
 19.143.6. Sona þa he ham com, þa ongann se Godes wer þearle
biterlice hine þreagean & cidan þus cweðende, hu becom þeos
unrihtwisnys on þinne bosm?
 19.143.11. He þa aforhtode & hæfde forgiten, hwæt he
gedon hæfde, & nyste, for hwan he swa wæs ofercidd.
 19.143.13. Ða cwæð se halga wer him to, cwyst þu,
þæt ic nære þær andweard, þa þa þu æt þam nunnum
onfenge þa sceatas & hi dydest on þinne bosm?
 19.143.18. Se munuc þa sona feoll to Benedictes fotum &
behreowsode, þæt he swa dyslice dæde gedyde, & him fram awearp þa
sceatas, þe he ær on his bosme behydde.
 20.143.26. Hu he oncneow þurh gast þæs cnapan modinysse.
 20.143.27. Eac hit gelamp sume dæge, þa þa se arwurða
fæder Benedictus on æfentide onfeng his lichaman andlyfene, þa wæs
his an munuc sumes gerefan sunu, se heold leoht ætforan Benedictes mysan.
 20.144.1. Ða þa se Godes wer æt, se munuc stod him
ætforan mid þenunge þæs leohtes.
 20.144.3. Þa ongann he þurh oferhogodnysse gast swigende on his
mode wealcan & on his geþohte cweðan, hwæt manna is þes, þam
etendum ic æt stande & him candelle healde & him þus swiðe
þeowie?
 20.144.9. Hwylc eom ic la, þæt ic æfre þus his gelican
þeowie?
 20.144.10. Ðær rihte se Godes wer wearð to him gehwyrfed
& ongann him swiðe cidan þus cweðende, sena þine heortan, broðor,
hwæt is þæt, þæt þu sprycst on þinum geþance?
 20.144.15. Sena þine heortan.
 20.144.16. He þær rihte clypode þa broðru & het
geniman þæt leoht of his handum & het hine gewitan fram þære
þenunge, & þæt he of þære tide him stille sæte.
 20.144.21. He wearð þa geaxod fram þam broðrum, hwæt he
on his heortan smeade, & he þa him be endebyrdnesse eall asæde, hu
swyðe he wæs toþunden mid oferhigde gaste, & hwylce word he on his
geþohte swigende cwæð ongean þone Godes wer.
 20.144.28. Ða wæs eallum þam broðrum hluttorlice geopenod,
þæt þam arwurðan Benedicte ne mihte beon nan þing bediglod, þa
þa on his eare swegdon eac þa word þæs munukes geþohtes.
 21.145.1. Hu þa twa hund mittana melewes wæron fundene æt
þam mynstergeate.
 21.145.3. Witodlice on oðre tide gelamp on þam ylcan
Campanialande, þæt þær onsæt mycel hungor, & seo mycele
wædl þære meteleaste genyrwde ealle þa landleode.
 21.145.7. & eac on Benedictes mynstre wæs þa eallunga
hwætes wana, & hyra hlafas wæron forneah ealle bebrokene, swa
þæt þær ne mihton beon fundene na ma þonne fif hlafas þam
broðrum to hyra gereordungtide.
 21.145.14. Ða þa se arwurða fæder geseah, þæt þa
broðru wæron unrote, þa hogode he hyra wacmodnysse to þreagenne mid
ungemettlicre ceaste & eft mid his behate wolde hi gehyrtan, & he þus
cwæð, hwi is eower mod unrot for hlafes wædle?
 21.145.21. Witodlice nu todæg he byð eow læssa þonne eow
lyste, ac tomorgen ge habbað genohne.
 21.145.24. Soðlice on þam æfterfyliendan dæge ætforan
þæs mynstres geate wæron fundene on saccum twa hund mittana melewes,
þa se ælmihtiga God þyder asende, & nu gyta is uncuð, hwa hi
þyder brohte.
 21.145.30. Ða þa broðru þæt gesawon, hi þa drihtne
þanciende eallunga ongeaton, þæt nis na to twynienne be Godes
mildheortnesse naðor ne for genihtsumnysse ne on wædlunge.
 21.145.35. Petrus cwæð, la, leof, sege, ic þe bidde, cwyst
þu, hwæðer hit sy to gelyfenne, þæt þysum Godes þeowe mihte
symle æt beon þære witegunge gast, hwæðer þe þær witegunge
gast hwiltidum his mod gefyllde?
 21.146.7. Gregorius cwæð, þære witegunge gast, Petrus, ne
onlihteð na simle þara witegana mod.
 21.146.9. Forþam swa swa hit awriten is be þam halgan gaste,
þæt he orðað þær he wyle, swa is eac to witenne, þæt he
orðað þonne he wyle.
 21.146.14. Be þam is, þæt Nathan se witega from þam
cyninge wæs geaxod, hwæðer he mihte þæt templ getimbrian,
ærest, he geþwærode, & syððan he hit forbead.
 21.146.19. Be þam is eac, þæt Heliseus, þa þa he geseah
þæt wepende wif, & he nyste þone intingan, þa cwæð he to
þam cnihte, þe hyre wæs forbeodende þone wop, forlæt hi, forþam
þe hyre mod is on biternysse, & drihten hit bediglode fram me & hit
me na ne geswutelode.
 21.146.27. Ðæt se ælmihtiga God swa gedihtnað of
þære micelan gedihtnunge his arfæstnysse, þæt þonne he hwilum
sylð þære witegunge gast & hwilum his oftyhð, þonne onfehð he
on heahnysse þara witegiendra mod & hi eac gehealdeð on eaðmodnysse,
to þam þæt þonne hi onfoð þone gast, þonne ongiton hi, hwæt
hi for Gode syndon, & eft þonne hi nabbon þære witegunge gast,
þonne oncnawen hi, hwæt hi syndon be him sylfum.
 21.147.4. Petrus cwæð, seo micele gesceadwisnys clypað &
cwyð, þæt hit is swa swa þu sægst.
 21.147.7. Ac ic bidde, þæt þu nu gyta gerecce swa hwæt
swa þe on mod geurne be þam arwurðan fæder Benedicte.
 22.147.11. Hu he þurh gesihðe gedihte þa mynstertimbrunge
neah Terracinense.
 22.147.13. Gregorius him to cwæð, hit gelamp eac on sume tide,
þæt Benedictus wæs gebeden fram sumum getrywum were, þæt he
sceolde asendan his leorningcnihtas mynster to timbrienne on his tune neah
Terracinense þære byri.
 22.147.19. Him þa biddendum Benedictus getiðode & getealde
þa broðru to þam mynstre & him ealdor gesette & geendebyrdde,
hwylc wære æfter oðrum.
 22.147.24. Ðam broðrum þa utgangendum Benedictus behet þus
cweðende, farað nu, & on þam dæge ic cume & eow getæce, on
hwylcre stowe ge sceolon cyrcean aræran & hwær broðra beoddern,
hwær cumena inn, & gehwilce þing, þe syndon neadbehefe, ic eow eall
gewisie.
 22.148.2. Hi þa onfangenre bletsunge þær rihte ferdon &
swyðe wæron geanbidiende þone gesettan dæg his tocymes & þær
gegearwodon ealle þa þing, þe mihton beon gesewene þæt wæron
nydbehefe & licwyrðe þam, þe mid swa mycelum fæder þyder cuman
mihton.
 22.148.10. Soðlice on þære ylcan nihte, þe se behatena
dæg æfter lihte, se drihtnes wer Benedictus on swefnum ætywde þam
Godes were, þe he þær to ealdre gesette, & his prafoste & him
swyðe smeaþancollice getæhte þa syndrigan stowa, hwæt hi þær
& þær timbrian sceoldon.
 22.148.18. Ða þa hi begen of slæpe arison, þa rehton hi
hym betwynon hwæt him on swefne wæs geþuht, ac hi swa þeah eallunga
ne gelyfdon þære gesihðe, ac forð abidon, þæt se Godes wer come,
swa he ær behet.
 22.148.24. Ða þa se Godes wer ne com on þam gesettan dæge,
þa gecyrdon hi eft to him mid sarinysse & þus cwædon, leof fæder,
we geanbidodon, þæt þu come, swa swa þu behete, & us þonne
getæhtest, hwær we þæt & þæt timbrian sceoldon, & þu
na ne come.
 22.149.3. Benedictus him to cwæð, for hwi, broðru, for hwi
secge ge swa?
 22.149.5. Hu ne com ic, swa swa ic behet?
 22.149.6. Hi him to cwædon, hwænne come þu?
 22.149.7. He him andswarode & cwæð, cweðað git la,
þæt ic ne ætywde inc bam slapendum & synderlice gehwylce stowe eow
getæhte?
 22.149.11. Farað nu & ealle þæs mynstres eardungstowe
getimbriað, swa swa git þurh gesihðe slapende gehyrdon.
 22.149.15. Hi þa þas word gehyrende þearle wundrodon &
gehwurfon eft to þam foresædan tune & ealle þa eardungstowa
getimbrodon, swa swa hi of þære onwrigennysse geleornodon on swefne.
 22.149.20. Petrus cwæð, ic wolde, þæt me wære
gecyðed, on hwilc gerad þæt mihte beon, þæt he swa feorr ferde to
secgenne andsware þam slapendum broðrum, þa andsware hi þurh gesihðe
gehyrdon & ongeaton.
 22.149.27. Gregorius him andswarode, hwæt is þæt, Petrus,
þæt þu swa smeagende twynast embe þa endebyrdnysse þæs gewordenan
þinges?
 22.149.31. Gewisslice hit is cuð, þæt se gast is
styriendlicran gecyndes þonne se lichama.
 22.150.1. & gewisslice we cunnon on gewitnesse þæs halgan
gewrites, þæt Abbacuc se witega wæs færinga up ahafen mid his
underngereorde of Iudealande & wearð aseted on Chaldealande.
 22.150.7. Mid þam ylcan gemete he gereordode Danihelem þone
witegan on þara leona seaðe, & eft færinga he wearð gemeted on
Iudealande.
 22.150.11. Gif þonne Abbacuc mihte on anre bearhtmhwile
lichamlice swa feorr gefaran & mid him beran underngereord, hwylc wundor is
þæt, þeah þe Benedictus se fæder begeate, þæt he ferde þurh
his gast & þara restendra broðra gastum gecyðde hyra nydþearfe,
þæt swa swa Abbacuc lichamlice ferde ymbe þæs lichaman mete, swa eac
Benedictus gastlice ferde to gesetednysse & lare þæs gastlican lifes?
 22.150.23. Petrus cwæð, ic andette, þæt seo hand þinre
spræce adrigde fram me þa twynunge mines modes.
 22.150.26. Ac ic wolde witan, hwilc þes wer wære on gemænre
spræce.
 23.150.29. Hu þa Godes þeowena æfter deaðe wurdon
amansumode/.
 23.150.31. Gregorius him andswarode, eaðe, Petrus, seo his
gemæne spræc wæs æmti fram mægenes byrðene, forþam þe his
heorte hi sylfe aheng on heahnysse, þæt na to þæs hwon þa word of
his muðe ne befeollon on idelnysse.
 23.151.5. Soðlice swa hwæt swa he æfre gecwæð ne
cwæð he hit na eallunga gestihtiende ac þywende.
 23.151.8. Swa mycele strengðu hæfde his spræc, swilce he
hit na twyniende oððe yldende, ac eallunga þurh rihtne dom forðbrohte
þæt þæt he þonne spræc.
 23.151.13. Witodlice unfeorr fram his mynstre wæron sume twa
nunnan of æðelum cynne geborene & drohtnodon on hyra agenre stowe.
 23.151.16. Þam þenode sum eawfæst wer to bryce þæs
uttran & þæs lichaman lifes.
 23.151.19. Ac swa swa manegra manna þeaw is, þæt seo
æðelnys hyra gebyrda gegearwað unæðelnysse þæs modes, þæt
hi læs forseoð hy sylfe on þysum middanearde þa þe þenceað,
þæt hi beon be dæle beteran toforan oðrum mannum, swa þa
foresædan nunnan fulfremedlice þa gyta ne heoldon hyra tungan mid hyra
hades steore, ac mid unwærlicum wordum foroft to hatheortnysse gegremedon
þone ylcan eawfæstan wer, þe him þenunge gegearwode to þam yttrum
neadþearfum.
 23.152.1. Ða þa he lange þas þing forbær, þa ferde he
to þam Godes men Benedicte & him asæde, hu fela teonana he geþolode
hyra yfelra worda.
 23.152.6. Se Godes wer þa þas word gehyrende him sona bebead
þus cweðende, gerihtað incre tungan forþam gif git hit nellað
gebetan, ic inc amansumie.
 23.152.10. Witodlice þone cwyde þære amansumunge ne
gecwæð he na forþam þe he hit him gelæstan wolde, ac elles
þywende.
 23.152.14. Soðlice þa nunnan þa ne wurdon nan þing awennde
of hyra ærrum unþeawum, ac binnon feawum dagum wurdon butu forðferde
& in on þære cyricean bebyrgede.
 23.152.19. Ðonne on þære ylcan cyricean wæron gewurðode
mæssena symbelnyssa &, swa swa hit þeaw wæs, ær þam
huselgange.
 24.154.8. Gregorius cwæð, witodlice þa þa sum Benedictes
munuccnapana lufode his magas ofer þæt þe he sceolde, & to hyra huse
for yrnende, þa sume dæge eode he ut of mynstre buton bledsunge, & on
þam ylcan dæge wearð forðfered, sona swa he to his magum becom.
 24.154.16. He wearð þa bebyrged, ac on þam oðrum dæge
his lichama wæs funden ut aworpen.
 24.154.18. His magas þa begymdon, þæt hi hine eft
bebyrgdon.
 24.154.20. Ac on þam æfterfyliendan dæge hi fundon hine eft
uttor forð aworpenne & unbebyriedne, swa he ær wæs.
 24.154.23. Hi þa hrædlice urnon to Benedictes fotum þæs
fæder & mid mycelum wope bædon, þæt he gemedemode, þæt he
his mildse forgeafe þam unlibbendum munuccnapan.
 24.155.1. Him þa sona se Godes wer mid his agenre handa sealde
husl & him to cwæð, farað nu & þysne drihtenlican lichaman mid
mycelre arwurðnysse alecgeað uppon his breost & hine swa bebyriað.
 24.155.7. Ða þa þæt wæs sona swa gedon, þa geheold
seo eorðe his underfangenan lichaman & hine ofer þæt hire fram ne
awearp.
 24.155.11. Ongitst þu, Petrus, hwylcere geearnunge þes wer
wære mid þam hælendum Criste, þæt seo eorðe eac hyre fram awearp
þæs lichaman, þe næfde Benedictes mildsunge?
 24.155.16. Petrus cwæð, ic hit swutollice ongite, & eac ic
his swiðe wundrige.
 25.155.21. Hu se munuc gemette þone drakan, þa he of mynstre
gewat.
 25.155.23. Gregorius cwæð, soðlice sum wæs eac Benedictes
munuc, se wæs unstaðolfæst on his mode & nolde gewunian on his
mynstre.
 25.155.26. Hine þa se Godes wer geneahhe þreade & gelomlice
mynegode & lærde to his þearfe, ac he swa þeah na to þæs hwon
ne geþwærode to þurhwunianne on þære gesamnunge, ac mid gemalicum
benum befealh þam halgan were, þæt him wære alyfed ut to farenne.
 25.156.3. Ða sume dæge se ylca arwurða fæder wearð
geswenced mid gedrefednysse his swiðlican onhropes & þa yrre het,
þæt he aweg gewite.
 25.156.7. Sona swa he of þam mynstre ut eode, þa gemette he on
þam wege anne dracan him ongean standan mid giniendum muðe.
 25.156.11. Ða þa se ylca draca, þe him ætywde, wolde hine
forswelgan, þa ongann he ofdrædd bifian & broddettan & mid mycelum
hreame clypian þus cweðende, yrnað hider, yrnað, forþam þe þes
draca wyle me forswelgan.
 25.156.18. Ða urnon þa broðru þyder & þær nænne
dracan ne gesawon, ac hi þone munuc cwakiendne & broddettendne
gelæddon ongean eft to mynstre.
 25.156.22. He þa þær rihte behet, þæt he næfre
þanon forð of þam mynstre gewitan nolde, & he eac of þære ylcan
tide on his behate þurhwunode.
 25.156.26. Witodlice for þæs halgan weres benum se munuc
geseah him ongean standan þone dracan, þæt wæs sylf deofol, þam he
fyligde ær, þeah þe he hine na ne gesawe.
 26.157.1. Hu he gehælde þone cnapan fram þære mycelan
adle.
 26.157.2. Ac ic wene, þæt ne sy na to forsuwienne þæt,
þæt ic oncneow fram þam mæran were Aptonio, se me þis rehte.
 26.157.5. He cwæð, þæt his fæder cniht wære
geþread mid þære hreoflican adle, swa þæt eallunga his hær
afeollon, & his hyd tosweoll to þam, þæt heo þæt weaxende
wyrmsi bediglian ne mihte.
 26.157.11. He wearð þa asended fram þam ylcan Aptonies
fæder to þam Godes were Benedicte, & he mid ealre hrædnysse æt
him onfeng his ærran hæle.
 27.157.16. Hu þa scillingas wurdon þurh wundor agifene þam
biddendum.
 27.157.18. Ne ic eac ne forsuwie þæt, þæt his gingra
gewunode to reccenne, þam wæs nama Peregrinus.
 27.157.20. Se cwæð, þæt sume dæge wære mid gafoles
neade geþrafod sum geleaffull wer & him nyste nanne ræd.
 27.157.24. Þa gelyfde he, þæt him mihte þæt an to helpe
beon, gif he ferde to þam Godes þeowe Benedicte & him asæde, hwylc
neadung þæs gafoles hine þreatode.
 27.157.29. Witodlice he becom þa to mynstre & gemette
þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeow & him sæde, þæt he wære
hefilice geswenced fram his maniende for twelf scillingum.
 27.157.33. Him þa se arwurða fæder andswarode &
cwæð, þæt he na to þæs hwon him sylf næfde twelf scillingas.
 27.158.4. Ac swa þeah he mid liðre spræce his wædle
gefrefrode & þus cwæð, ga nu & æfter twam dagum cum eft
hider, forþam þe nu todæg me is wana þæs þe ic þe syllan
sceal.
 27.158.9. & on þam twam dagum mid his agenum þeawe he
wearð swiðe abysgod on his gebede.
 27.158.12. Ða on þam þriddan dæge com eft þyder se þe
geswenced wæs mid þæs gafoles manunge.
 27.158.15. Þa færinga wæron fundene þreottyne scyllingas
ofer þæs mynstres earke, seo wæs hwætes full.
 27.158.18. & þa het se Godes wer hi bringan to him &
syllan hi þam geswencedan biddere & het, þæt he ageafe his maniende
þa twelf scyllingas & þone ænne hæfde to his agenum behofe.
 27.158.23. Ac nu ic gecyrre eft to þam þingum, þe ic oncneow
on foreweardre þysre bec, swa swa me rehton his forecwedenan gingran,
þæt sum wer swunce on þære hefigestan hatunge his gesacan.
 27.158.29. Þæs læðð & feondscipe forðweox to
þam swiðe, þæt he gesealde attordrincan þam oðrum swa he nyste,
& þeah þe he ne mihte his lif him on gereafian, swa þeah he awende
eallre his hyde hiw, swa þæt seo fagung wæs togoten geond eallne his
lichaman, þæt he wæs geþuht swylce he hreofli wære.
 27.159.3. Ac he wearð gelæded to þam Godes men Benedicte
& hrædlice.
 30.162.1. Þæt an, þæt he þreade þone gylt, þe hi
þurhtugon.
 30.162.2. Openlice is cuð, þæt þa halgan gegearwiað þa
wundra hwilum of hyra mihte, hwilum eac of hyra bene.
 30.162.5. Forðam Petrus þam twam leogendum mannum þreagende
hyra lif afyrsode, & þam deadan wife gebiddende hyre lif ageaf.
 30.162.9. Soðlice ic eac nu gerecce þæs geleaffullan Godes
þeowes Benedictes twa dæda, on þam openlice swutelað, þæt he
mihte oðer þara gedon of þære godcundlice onfangenan mihte, oðer of
his gebedum.
 31.162.17. Hu he mid his eagum unband þone ceorl.
 31.162.18. Sum Gota, Zalla genemned, wæs fyligende þær
arrianiscean gedwolan trywleasnysse, se on Totillan hyra cyninges tidum wearð
ontend mid bryne þære ormætestan wælhreownesse ongean þa
eawfæstan weras geleaffullre gelaðunge, swa þæt gif hwilc preost
oððe munuc becom toforan his ansyne, ne eode he nateshwon libbende fram his
handum.
 31.162.28. Ða sume dæge wæs he onæled mid þære
hætan his gitsunge & wæs grædig to reaflace manna æhta.
 31.163.1. Þa geswencte he sumne ceorl for his agenum æhtum mid
wælgrimmum tintregum & hine þurh menifealde witu slat & cwylmde.
 31.163.5. Þa æt niextan se ceorl mid þam witum oferswyðed
geandette, þæt he befæste his þing Benedicte þam Godes þeowe,
& þæt he sæde to þam þæt se his cwylmend his gelyfde, &
he wurde sume hwile fram þære wælgrimnysse to life genered.
 31.163.13. Se ylca Zalla þa geswac to swencenne þone ceorl mid
þam tintregum, ac geband his earmas mid strangum rapum & ongann hine
drifan beforan his horse & het, þæt he him geswutelode, hwylc wære
Benedictus, þe his æhta underfeng.
 31.163.20. Ða stop se ceorl beforan him mid gebundenum earmum
& hine gelædde to þæs halgan weres mynstre & hine ænne
gemette sittende & rædendne ætforan þam mynstergeate.
 31.163.25. Ða cwæð se ceorl to þam æfterfyliendan &
reðgiendan Zallan, loca nu, þis is Benedictus se fæder, be þam ic þe
ær sæde.
 31.163.29. Ða locode se leodhata on þone halgan wer mid
weallendum geþohte & mid ungewittinysse his þwyran modes, wende,
þæt he mihte gedon þone ylcan ege, þe he gewunode to donne oðrum
mannum.
 31.164.1. Ongann þa mid mycelum hreame clypian & cweðan,
aris, aris & agif þyses ceorles yddisce, þe þu underfenge.
 31.164.4. Hwæt, þa se Godes wer þys gehyrende hrædlice
his eagan upp ahof fram þære bocrædinge & on hine locode & sona
eac beseah on þone ceorl, þe þær gebunden wæs gehæft.
 31.164.9. & mid þam þe he his eagan gebigde to his earmum,
þa mid wundorlicum gemete ongunnon þa on gewriðenan rapas of þam earmum
toslupan mid swa mycelre hrædnysse, swa hi mid nanes mannes ofste swa
hrædlice ne mihton beon tolysede.
 31.164.17. Ða þa se.
 34.169.5. & upp afenum eagum on þa lyfte he geseah þære
ylcan his swustor sawle ut agane of hyre lichaman & on culfran hiwe
gesecean þæs heofones digolnysse.
 34.169.9. Hwæt, þa se halga wer wæs efenblissiende hyre
wuldres & þam ælmihtigan Gode þancode of ymensangum & on
lofsangum & þam broðrum cyðde hyre forðsið.
 34.169.14. He eac hrædlice hi asennde, þæt hi hyre lichaman
brohton to þam mynstre & aledon on þa byrgenne, þe he him sylfum
ær gegearwode.
 34.169.18. Ðysum gedonum hit gelamp, þæt þara þe symle
wæs an mod on Gode, þara lichaman eac næron todælede on þære
byrgenne.
 35.169.24. Hu he geseah eallne middaneard under anum leoman &
Germanes bisceopes sawle.
 35.169.26. Eac on oðrum timan hit gelamp, þæt him to becom
for geneosunge þingon, swa swa his þeaw wæs, Seruandus se diacon &
abbod þæs mynstres, þe Liberius se ealdormann iu getimbrode on
Suðlangbeardena landes dælum.
 35.169.32. Witodlice he geneosode Benedictes mynster gelomlice, to
þam þæt hi him betwynon gemænelice him on aguton þa swetan lifes
word & þone wynsuman mete þæs heofonlican eðeles, þone hi þa
gyta fullfremedlice geblissiende þicgean ne mihton, huru þinga hi hine
geomriende onbyrigdon, forþam þe se ylca wer Seruandus eac fleow on lare
heofonlicre gife.
 35.170.11. Soðlice þa þa eallunga becom se tima hyra reste
& stillnysse, þa gelogode se arwurða Benedictus hine sylfne on sumes
stypeles upflora, & Seruandus se diacon gereste hine on þære
nyðerflore þæs ylcan stypeles.
 35.170.17. & wæs on þære ylcan stowe trum stæger mid
gewissum stapum fram þære nyðerflora to þære upflora.
 35.170.21. Wæs eac ætforan þam ylcan stypele sum rum hus,
on þam hyra begra gingran hi gereston.
 35.170.23. Ða þa se drihtnes wer Benedictus behogode þone
timan his nihtlican gebedes þam broðrum restendum, þa gestod he
þurhwacol æt anum eahþyrle biddende þone ælmihtigan drihten, &
þa færinga on þam timan þære nihte stillnysse him ut lociendum
geseah he ufan onsended leoht afligean ealle þa nihtlican þystru & mid
swa micelre beorhtnesse scinan, þæt þæt leoht.
 35.171.7. Hwæt, þa on þysre sceawunge swyðe wundorlic
þing æfterfyligde, swa swa he sylf syððan rehte, þæt eac eall
middaneard swylce under anum sunnanleoman gelogod wære beforan his eagan
gelæded.
 35.171.13. Ða þa se arwurða fæder his eagena atihtan
scearpnysse gefæstnode on þære beorhtnesse þæs scinendan leohtes,
þa geseah he englas ferian on fyrenum cliwene in to heofonum Germanes sawle,
se wæs bisceop Capuane þære ceastre.
 35.171.19. He wolde þa gelangian him sylfum sumne gewitan swa
miceles wundres & Seruandum þone diacon clypode tuwa & þriwa &
oft hrædlice his naman nemde mid hreames micelnysse.
 35.171.25. Seruandus þa wearð gedrefed for þam ungewunelican
hreame swa mæres weres, & he up astah & þyder locode & geseah
eallunga lytelne dæl þæs leohtes.
 35.171.30. Ðam diacone þa wafiendum for þus mycelum wundre se
Godes wer be endebyrdnesse gerehte þa þing, þe þær gewordene
wæron, & on Casino þam stocwic þam eawfæstan were Theoprobo
þær rihte bebead, þæt he on þære ylcan nihte asende sumne mann
to Capuanan þære byri & gewiste & him eft gecyðde, hwæt
wære geworden be Germane þam bisceope.
 35.172.10. Ða wæs geworden, þæt se þe þyder asended
wæs gemette eallunga forðferedne þone arwurðan wer Germanum bisceop,
& he þa smeaþancollice axiende oncneow, þæt his forðsið wæs
on þam ylcan timan, þe se drihtnes wer oncneow his upstige to heofonum.
 35.172.18. Petrus cwæð, þis is swiðe wundorlic þing
& þearle to wafienne, ac þis þæt her gecweden is, þæt beforan
his eagan swylce under anum sunnanleoman eall middaneard wære gegaderod
& to him gelæded, swa ic næfre ær ne gemunde, ne furðon ic
beþencean ne cann, hwylcere endebyrdnysse hit beon mæge, þæt fram
anum men si gesewen eall middaneard.
 35.172.29. Gregorius him to cwæð, Petrus, genim nu fæste,
þæt þæt ic spreke, forþam þære sawle, þe gesihð hyre
scyppend, hyre þinceð nearo & lytel ælc gesceaft.
 35.173.3. Þeah þe heo hwæt lyttles geseo of hyre scyppendes
leohte, hyre þinceð sceort eall þæt gesceapen is, forþam þe on
þam leohte þære incundan gesihðe þæs modes bosum byð tolæten
& on Gode gebræded & aþened to þam swiðe, þæt hit byð
hyhra ofer middaneard, & seo sylfe þæs geseondan sawl byð eac ofer
hi sylfe.
 35.173.13. & þonne heo byð gegripen on Godes leohte, heo
byð ofer hi sylfe tobræded on þam innrum dælum, þæt þonne heo
up ahafen besihð under hi sylfe, þonne oncnæwð heo, hu sceort þæt
is, þæt heo on lichaman geeaðmodad ongitan ne mihte.
 35.173.20. Eornostlice se halga wer Benedictus, se þe locode on
þæt fyrene cliwen & eac geseah englas hweorfende to heofonum,
untwylice ne mihte he þas þing geseon buton on Godes leohte.
 35.173.26. Hwylc wundor is þæt, þeah þe he gesawe þysne
middaneard beforan hine gegaderodne, se þe on his modes leohte wæs upp
ahafen ofer þysne middaneard?
 35.173.31. Soðlice þæt þæt gecweden is, þæt eall
middaneard wære gegaderod beforan his eagum, nis hit na þi gecweden þe
heofon & eorðe wære togædere getogen, ac þæs geseondan mod
wæs tobræded, & þa þa hit wæs on Gode gegripen, hit mihte
buton earfoðnysse geseon eall þæt þæt beneoðan Gode ys.
 35.174.9. Eornostlice on þam leohte, þe scean þam uttran
eagum, wæs on þæs halgan weres mode þæt innre leohte, þæt
gegrap þæs geseondan mod to þam upplicum þingum & for þi him
gewutelode, hu nearwe & gehwæde wæron ealle þa neoðerran
gesceafta.
 35.174.16. Petrus cwæð, me þinceð, þæt ic full
nyttlice ne undergite na þa þing, þe þu sædest, þonne of minre
lætnysse/.

END_TEXT

 2.1. Se ðe me rædan ðance.
 2.1. He in me findan mæg, gif hine feola lysteð gastlices
lifes godre biesene, þæt he ful eaþe mæg upp gestigan to ðam
heofonlican hame, þar byð a hyht ond wynblis on burgum þam, þe bearn
Godes sielfes hiora eagum geseon motan.
 2.5. Þæt mæg se mon begytan, se þe his modgeðanc
æltowe byþ and þonne þurh his ingehygd to þissa haligra helpe
geliefeð ond hiora bisene fulgað, swa þeos boc sagað.
 2.7. Me awritan het Wulfstan bisceop, þeow and þearfa þæs,
þe/ alne þrym aof, and eac walden is wihta gehwelcre, an ece God eallra
gesceafta/.
 2.9. Bideþ þe se bisceop, se þe ðas boc begeat, þe þu
on þinum handum nu hafast and sceawast, þæt þu him to þeossum
halgum helpe bidde, þe heora gemynd her on gemearcude siendon.
 2.12. And þæt him God ællmihtig forgyue þa gyltas, þe
he geworhte, and eac resðe mid him, se ðe ah ealles rices geweald, and eac
swa his beahgifan, þe him ðas bysene forgeaf, þæt is se selesða
sincesbrytta/ Ælfryd mid Englum, ealra cyninga þara þe he sið oððe
ær fore secgan hyrde, oððe he hiorðcyninga ær ænigne gefrugne.
 2.18. Her ongynneð se æresða stream þære clænan and
hlutran/ burnan þurh þone halegan breosð ures fæder and larheowes
þæs apostolican papan sanctus Gregorius up aspringan ond forþ yrnan to
lare and to bisene eallum þam, þe lysteð feran on liues weg.

BedePref
B9.6.1.
Bede, History of the English Church and Nation, Preface: Miller 1890-98, 2-6.



 2.1. Ic Beda Cristes þeow and mæssepreost sende gretan ðone
leofastan cyning Ceolwulf.
 2.2. & ic ðe sende þæt spell, þæt ic niwan awrat be
Angelþeode & Seaxum, ðe sylfum to rædanne & on emtan to
smeageanne, & eac on ma stowa to writanne & to læranne.
 2.4. & ic getreowige on ðine geornfulnysse, forþon ðu
eart swyðe gymende & smeagende ealdra manna cwidas & dæda &
ealra swyþost þara mærena wera ure þeode.
 2.7. Forðon þis gewrit oððe hit god sagað be godum
mannum, & se ðe hit gehyreþ, he onhyreþ þam, oððe hit yfel
sagaþ be yfelum mannum, & se ðe hit gehyreð, he flyhð þæt
& onscunaþ.
 2.10. Forþon hit is god godne to herianne & yfelne to leanne,
þæt se geðeo se þe hit gehyre.
 2.11. Gif se oðer nolde, hu wurð he elles gelæred?
 2.12. For þinre ðearfe & for þinre ðeode ic þis
awrat; forþon ðe God to cyninge geceas, þe gedafenað þine þeode to
læranne.
 2.14. & þæt ðy læs tweoge hwæðer þis soð sy,
ic cyðe hwanan me þas spell coman.
 2.16. Ærest me wæs fultumiend & lareow se arwurða abbad
Albinus, se wæs wide gefaren & gelæred, & wæs betst gelæred
on Angelcynne.
 2.18. Swyðost he me sæde of þeodores gemynde, se wæs
biscop on Cantwara byrig, & Adrianus abbud, forðon he swyðost wæs
mid him gelæred.
 2.20. Eall þæt he on Cantwara mægþe & eac on þam
þeodlandum þe þær to geðeodde wæron, eall ðæt he oððe on
gewritum oððe on ealdra manna sægenum ongeat oððe fram
leorningcnihtum þæs eadigan papan Sancte Gregories, þa he me ealle, ða
þe gemyndwurðe wæron, þurh Noðhelm ðone æfestan mæssepreost
on Lundenbyrig oððe hine to me sende, oððe on stafum awrat & me
sende.
 4.2. Fram fruman þyssa boca oð þa tid, þe Angelcyn Cristes
geleafan onfeng, of ealldra manna sægenum; oð þas andweardan tid
swyðost we geleornodon, þæt we her writað, of leorningcnihtum þæs
eadigan papan Sancte Gregorius, under hwilcum cyninge þæt ðonne geworden
wæs, þurh Albinus myngunge þæs abbudes & ðurh Noðhelmes
ærendo & gesægene.
 4.7. Swyðe fela hi me sædon fram gehwylcum biscopum, &
hwylcum cyninga tidum Eastseaxe & Westseaxe & Eastengle &
Norðanhumbre þære gife onfengon Cristes geleafan.
 4.10. Ðurh Albinus swiðost ic geðristlæhte þæt ic
dorste þis weorc ongynnan, & eac mid Danieles þæs arwurðan
Westseaxna biscopes, se nu gyt lifigende is.
 4.12. Fela he me sæde ymbe Suðseaxe & embe Westseaxe;
& eac ymbe Wiht ðæt igland swyðost he me sende on gewritum.
 4.14. & þurh Cedde þone arwurðan Myrcna bisceop &
Ceaddan ymbe Myrcna þeode & Eastseaxena; & eac ymb þara biscopa lif
& forþfore we geacsodan fram þam broðrum þæs mynstres, ðe hi
sylf astemnedon, ðe Læstinga ea is nemned.
 4.18. Þa þing þe on Eastenglum gewordene wæron, sume we
þa of ealdra manna gewritum oððe sægene metton, sume we mid Isses
gesægene þæs arwurþan abbudes geleornedon.
 4.21. & þæt on Lindese geworden wæs ymbe Cristes
geleafan, þurh gesegene ðæs arwurðan biscopes Cynebyrhtes & þurh
his ærendgewritu & oðra lifigendra swiðe getreowra we geleornodon.
 4.24. & eac þæt we on Norðanhymbrum geacsedon ymbe
Cristes geleafan oð ðysne andweardan dæg, nalæs mid anes mannes
geþeahte ac mid gesægene unrim geleaffulra witena, þa þe þa ðing
wiston & gemundon, & syððan þæt ic sylf ongeat, ne let ic
þæt unwriten.
 4.28. Ðæt ic be ðam halgan fæder Cuðbyrhte wrat
oððe on þysse bec oððe on oðre, þa dæda his lifes, sume ic
ærest nom of þam gewritum ðe ic awriten gemette mid þam broðrum
þære cyricean æt Lindesfearona ea, sumu, ða þe ic sylf ongitan
mihte þurh swiðe getreowra manna gesægene, ic toycte.
 4.32. & þone leornere ic nu eadmodlice bidde & halsige,
gif he hwæt ymbe ðis on oðre wisan gemete oððe gehyre, þæt he
me þæt ne otwite.

 1.6.4. Be gesetnysse Breotene oððe Hibernia Scotta ealandes,
ond heora þam ærran bigengum.
 1.6.6. Ðæt se ærra Romwara casere Gagius Iulius Breotene

 1.6.8. Ðæt se æftera Romwara casere, Claudius haten,

cynedome; ge eac Uespassianus fram him sended wæs, & he Wihte ealond

 1.6.12. Ðæt Lucius Brytta cyning sende gewritu to Eleutherio

 1.6.14. Ðæt Seuerus se casere onfeng micelne dæl Breotene,

 1.8.6. & sona æfter þam mycel eorþwæstm &

 1.8.13. Ðætte Bryttas ærest on Angelðeode sige genaman;

 1.8.25. Ðæt þa ylcan biscopas Bryttum on gefeohte godcundne

Oswaldes cyninges.
 3.14.10. Ðæt seo mægð Westseaxna, bodigendum Birino þam
biscope, onfeng Godes word; & be his æfterfyligendum ægelbyrhto &
Leotherio.
 3.14.13. Ðætte Cantwara cyning Erconbyrht bebead deofolgyld
beon toworpene : & be his dehter Ercengota & hire magan Æðelburge
Gode gehalgedum fæmnum.
 3.14.16. Ðæt on þære stowe, ðær ofslægen wæs
se cyning Oswald, gelomlicu wundurgeweorc gewordene wæron: & þæt
ðær ærest anes wegferendes mannes nyten gehæled wæs, &
æfter þam an mæden, seo wæs ær lama.
 3.14.20. Ðæt þære ylcan stowe myl wið fyre wæs
freomigende.
 3.14.21. Ðæt ofer his reliquias þæt heofonleoht ealle
niht wæs ofergestond onde & scinende; & þæt deofolseoce æt
his reliquium wæron gelacnode.
 3.14.24. Ðæt æt his byrigenne an lytel cniht fram
lengtenadle wæs gelacnod.
 3.14.26. Ðætte on Hibernia sum man fram his reliquium fram
deaðes liðe wæs gehæled.
 3.14.28. Ðætte forðferdum Paulino þam biscope Ithamar for
him æt Hrofeceastre biscopsetle onfeng.
 3.14.29. & be wundorlicre eadmodnesse Oswines þæs
cyninges, se fram Oswio wælhreowlice wæs ofslægen.
 3.14.31. Ðæt se biscop Aidan þam scypfarendum þone storm
towardne foresægde, & eac him gehalgodne ele sealde, mid þam hi þone
storm gestildon.
 3.16.1. Ðæt se ylca biscop þæt togewehgene fyr þære
cynelican burghe gebiddende onweg gewende.
 3.16.3. Ðætte Middelengla mægð under Peadan Pendan suna
wæs cristen geworden.
 3.16.5. Ðæt Eastseaxan þone rihtan Godes geleafan, ðone hi
gefyrn awurpon, under Sibrihte heora cyninge, mid geornfulnysse Oswies ðæs
cyninges, & Cedde him bodiendum, eft onfengon.
 3.16.8. Ðæt se ylca biscop Cedde onfonde fram þam cyninge
Æðelwalde sume stowe mynster on to timbrianne, & þa mid halgum
gebedum & fæstenum Drihtne gehalgode; & be his forðfore.
 3.16.11. Ðæt Mercna mægð, ofslegenum Pendan hyra cyninge,
Cristes geleafan onfengon; & Oswio se cyning for ðam sige sealdan him for
Gode æhta micle & twelf bocland Gode mynster on to getimbrianne sealde
& forgeaf.
 3.16.15. Ðæt Ecbyrht se halga wer of Angelcynnes cynne acenned
munuclif wæs lædende on Hibernia.
 3.16.17. Ðæt, forðferdum Tudan, Wilfrið wæs sended on
Gallia, & þær wæs gehadod fram Æðelbyrhte þam biscope; &
Ceadda on Westseaxum fram Wine biscope.
 3.16.19. & hi begen wæron Norðhymbrum to biscopum
gehalgode.
 3.16.21. Ðæt se mæssepreost Wigeard arcebiscop to
gehadianne on Breotene to Rome wæs onsended, þonone sona hi hider onsendon
gewritu þæs apostolican papan & þær cyddon hine forðferende.
 3.16.24. Ðæt Eastseaxan on þa tid ðæs mancwealmes to
deofolgylde wæron eft gecyrde, & eft þurh ða geornfulnesse Germanus
ðæs biscopes hi sona fram heora gedwolan wæron eft gecyrde.
 3.16.27. Her endað se þridde boc.
 3.16.28. Her onginneð seo feorðe boc.
 4.16.29. Ðætte forðferdum Deusdedit ðon arcebiscope,
Wigheard wæs þam biscophade to onfonne to Rome onsended: ac him þær
forðferendum, ðeodorus wæs to arcebiscope gehalgod & mid Adriane
þam abbude wæs to Breotone onsended.
 4.16.33. Ðæt þeodorus se arcebiscop gondferend ealle
Angelcynnes cyricean mid rihtgeleaffulre soðfæstnysse, & swylce eac
mid halgum gewritum & stæfcræftum hi georne het beon lærde: &
þæt Putta for Damiano æt Hrofeceastre to biscope wæs gehalgod.
 4.18.4. Ðæt Ceadda, be þam ðe we ær bufan spræcon,
Myrcna mægðe wæs biscop seald: & be his life, & be his
forðfore, & be his byrigenne.
 4.18.7. Ðæt Coloman se biscop, forletenre Breotone, twa
mynstro on Scottum geworhte, oðer þam Scottum, oðer ðam Engliscan, ðe
he mid hine ðider gelædde.
 4.18.10. Be deaðe Oswies & Ecbyrhtes þara cyninga: & be
þam sinoðe þe geworden wæs æt Heortfeorda, þam wæs
foresittende se arcebiscop ðeodorus.
 4.18.13. Ðæt adune asetton of þam biscoprice Winfriðe,
Seaxulf his biscoprice onfeng: & Erconwold Eastseaxum wæs biscop seald.
 4.18.15. Ðæt on Berccingum þam mynstre mid heofonlice leohte
getacnod wæs, hwær gesette beon sceoldon þa lichaman haligra
fæmnena.
 4.18.18. Þæt on þam ylcan mynstre sum lytel sweltende cniht
be naman genemde ða mynsterfæmnan, ðe him æfterfyligende wes: &
þæt oðru of lichaman utgangende sumne dæl geseah þæs heofonlican
leohtes.
 4.18.22. Hwylce heofonlicu tacnu ætywde wæron, þa ða seo
modur sylf ðære gesomnunge of middanearde ferde.
 4.18.24. Ðæt Torhtgyð seo Godes þeowen ðreo gear
æfter ðære hlæfdian forðfore þa geta on life hæfd wæs.
 4.18.26. Ðæt æt þam lictune ðæs mynstres an blind
wif hire wæs gebiddende ; & forðam onfeng þam beorhte hire eagena.
 4.18.28. Ðæt se cyning ðære ylcan mægðe Sebbe on
munuclicum drohtoðe his lif geendode.
 4.18.30. Ðæt Westseaxna biscophad for Eleutherio Hædde
wæs onfonde, & ðone æt Hrofeceastre for Puttan Cwichelm onfeng,
& for him Gifmund: & eac hwylce ða wæron Norðanhymbra
bisceopas.
 4.18.33. Ðæt se steorra ætywde, se is cometa nemned, &
þreo monað wæs wuniende, and symble on uhtatid wæs upyrnende.
 4.20.1. On þam ylcan geare Ecfrið Norðanhymbra cyning
adræfde Wilfirð þone arwyrðan biscop.
 4.20.3. Ðæt Willferð biscop Suðseaxna mægðe to Criste
gecyrde, seo hwæðere, him ðanon gewitendum, for ðære grimman feonda
ofðrycnesse agenne biscop habban ne mihte.
 4.20.6. Ðæt þæt ealond Wiht onfeng cristene bigengan,
þæs twegen cynelice cnihtas æfter þon onfangenan fulluhtes bæðe
sona wurdon ofslegene.
 4.20.9. Be þam sinoðe se wæs geworden on þam felda, se
wæs genemned Hæþfeld, andweardan þam ærcebiscope Theodore.
 4.20.11. Be Iohanne þam heahseangere þæs apostolican setles,
se for lare com to Breotone.
 4.20.13. Ðæt seo cwen Æðeldryð clæne fæmne
þurhwunode, þære lichama on byrigenne gewemmed beon ne mihte: & be
þam hymene þe we be hire geworht on.
 4.20.16. Ðæt se biscop ðeodorus betweox Ecgferðe &
Æðelrede þam cyningum sibbe geworhte.
 4.20.18. Ðæt ða benda sumes gehæftes tolysede wæron,
þonne for him mæssan sungene wæron.
 4.20.20. Be life & forðfore Hilde þære abbudissan.
 4.20.21. Ðæt on hire mynstre wæs sum broðor, þam
godcundlice forgifen wæs seo gyfu to singanne.
 4.20.23. Hwilc gesihð sumum Godes were ætywde, ær þam
ðe þæt mynster æt Coludes byrig mid bryne fornumen wære.
 4.20.25. Be deaðe þara twegea cyninga Ecferðes &
Hloðheres.
 4.20.26. Ðæt se Drihtnes wer Cuðbryht wæs biscop
geworden, & þæt he ða gyt on munuclicum life geseted lærde &
bodade.
 4.20.28. Ðæt se ylca wer Cuðbyrhtus on ancerlife geseted an
easpring of drigre eorðan gebiddende up gelædde, & ænne æcer of
ðam gewinne his agenre handa ofer þa tid ðæs sæwetes onfeng.
 4.20.31. Ðæt se ylca biscop Cuþbryht his forþfore ða
toweardan Herebyrhto þam ancran foresæde.
 4.20.33. Ðæt his lichoma æfter endleofan gearum his
byrigenne wæs clæne ælcere brosnunge funden & gemeted: &
æfter noht mycele fyrste ðæs his æfterfyligend of þyssum
middanearde geferde.
 4.22.1. Ðæt æt his reliquium nu niwan wæs sum man
gehæled fram þære adle his eagan.
 4.22.3. Ðæt oðer æt his byrigenne fram lyftadle wæs
gehæled.
 4.22.4. Her endað seo feorðe boc.
 4.22.5. Her onginneð seo fifte boc.
 5.22.6. Ðæt Æðelwold Sancte Cuþberhtes æfterfyligend
on ancersetle ond life geseted þam winnendum broðrum on sæ gebiddende
ðone storm he gesette & gestilde.
 5.22.9. Ðæt se biscop Iohannes ænne dumbne monn gebiddende
gehælde.
 5.22.11. Ðæt se ylca biscop an adliende mæden gebiddende
gehælde.
 5.22.12. Ðæt he anes gesiðmannes wif untrum mid gehalgode
wætere gelacnode .
 5.22.14. Ðæt se ylca biscop anes gesiðmannes cniht
gebiddende fram deaðe gecigde.
 5.22.16. Ðæt he his preosta ænne of horse fallende &
gebrysedne gelice gebiddende & bletsigende fram deaðe gecyrde.
 5.22.18. Ðæt Ceadwala Westseaxna cyning to gefulliane com to
Rome: swa eft his æfterfyligend Ine ða ylcan þærscwaldas þara
eadigra apostola estful gesohte.
 5.22.21. Ðæt, forðferdum Þeodoro, ðone arcebiscophad
Beorhtwald onfeng; &, betweox oðra monige þe he gehadode, eac swylce
Tobium ðone gelæredestan wer ðære cyrican æt Hrofesceastre biscop
gehalgode.
 5.22.25. Ðæt se halga wer Ecbyrht becuman wolde on Germaniam
to bodianne godcunde lare.
 5.22.26. Ac he ne mihte: ac Wihtbyrht ðyder becom for him, &
ðær nowiht ne fremede; & þa eft wæs ham hweorfende on Scotland,
þanon he ær becom.
 5.22.29. Ðæt Wilbrord on Frysena lande bodiende monega to
Drihtne gecyrde : & þæt his geferan twegen healicne martyrdom wæron
þrowiende.
 5.22.32. Ðæt se arwurða wer Swiðbyrht on Breotone, &
Wilbrord æt Rome biscopas wæron Fresna ðeode gehalgode.
 5.22.34. Ðæt sum on Norðanhymbra mægðe of deaðe
arisende sume swiðe ondryslicu & eac to gewilnienne, ða þe he geseah,
secgende wæs.
 5.24.3. Ðæt ongean þam oðer, to deaðe becumende, geseah
him fram deoflum tobrohte beon ða boc his agenra synna.
 5.24.5. Ðæt eft oðer sweltende him þa getealdan stowe mid
helwarum his agenra wita geseah.
 5.24.7. Ðæt monega cyricean on Hibernia lærendum Athamano
þa eallgeleaflican Eastran onfengon: & be Ealdelme, se ða boc de
uirginitate & eac oðra manega geworhte: ge eac þæt Suðseaxan
agenne biscopas onfengon Eadbyrht & Eollan; & Westseaxan onfengon
Danielum & Aldelmum: & be Aldelmes gewritum.
 5.24.12. Ðætte Cynred Mercna cyning & Offa Eastseaxna
cyning on munuclicum hadum to Rome becom, & þær heora lif geendode:
& be life & forðfore þæs arwurðan biscopes Wilfriðes.
 5.24.15. Ðæt þam eaufæstan abbude Adriano Albinus
æfterfyligde: & fram þam biscope Wilfriðe Acca his mæssepreost
biscophade onfeng.
 5.24.18. Ðæt se abbud Ceolfrið Peohta cyninge, Neaton wæs
haten, heahcræf tigan somod & eac epistolam be healdnesse rihtre Eastran
onsende.
 5.24.21. Ðæt þa munecas on Hii þam ealonde mid him ðam
underþeoddum mynstrum þa ða rihtgeleaffullan Eastran, bodiendum Ecbyrhte
& lærendum, weorþian ongunnon.
 5.24.24. Be forðfore Tobias þæs biscopes æt Hrofesceastre
& Ecgbyrhtes þæs arwurþan biscopes on ðone forman Easterdæg:
& ðy ylcan geare forðferde Osric Norðanhymbra cyning.
 5.24.27. Hwylc se staðol is on andweardnesse Angelcynnes þeode
ge eac ealre Breotone.
