Bede 2
B9.6.4.
Bede, History of the English Church and Nation, Book 2: Miller 1890-98, 94-152.



 1.94.1. LIBER SECUNDUS ðYSSUM tidum, þæt is fif winter &
syx hund wintra æfter þære Drihtenlican menniscnesse, se eadiga papa
Gregorius, æfter þon þe he þæt setl þære Romaniscan cyricean
& þære apostolican þreottyne gear & syx monað & tyn dagas
wulderlice heold & rehte, þa wæs forðfered & to þam ecan setle
þæs heofonlican rices læded wæs.
 1.94.6. Heold he & rehte þa cyricean on þara casera tidum
Maurici & Uocati; & þy æfteran geare þæs ylcan Uocatis
þæt he forðferde of þyssum life, & ferde to þam soðan life
þam þe on heofonum is: & his lichama wæs bebyriged on Sancte Petres
cyricean beforan þam husulportice þy feorþan dæge idus Martiarum,
& he nu hwonne on þam ilcan bið on wuldre arisende mid oþrum hyrdum
þære halgan cyricean.
 1.94.12. & awriten is on his byrigenne þysses gemetes
byrgenleoð.
 1.94.14. Onfoh þu eorþe lichaman of þinum lichaman genumen,
þæt þu hine eft agyfan mæge, þonne hine God liffæste.
 1.94.15. Se gast up to heofon gesohte; nænig anweald deaþes
him sceðþað; þam oþres lifes se sylfa deað me is weg.
 1.94.17. Þæs hean bisceopes leoma on þysse byrigenne syndon
betyned, se symble leofað gehwær on unrim godum.
 1.94.19. Earmra hungur he oferswiðde mid mettum, & heora cyle
mid hrægle, & he mid halgum monungum saule fram feonde gescylde.
 1.94.21. & he mid dede gefylde, swa hwæt swa he mid worde
lærde.
 1.94.22. Wæs he gerynelico word sprecende, þæt he lifes
bysen wære haligra manna.
 1.94.23. To Criste he Ongle gehwyrfde mid arfæstnesse
lareowdomes.
 1.94.24. Wæs he on ðære þeode begytende niwe wered Godes
geleafan.
 1.94.25. Þis gewin & þissum gelic, þeos gemen þe
wæs, & þis þu hyrde dydest, þæt þu Drihtne brohtest micel
gestreon haligra saula: þyssum sigorum þu Godes bysceop blissian miht,
forþon þu þinra weorca ece mede butan ende nimest.
 1.96.3. Nis us þonne se hlisa to foreswigienne, þe be þam
eadigan Gregorie þurh yldra manna segene to us becom, for hwilcum intingan he
monad wære, þæt he swa geornfulle gymenne dyde ymb þa hælo ure
þeode.
 1.96.6. Secgeað hi, þæt sume dæge þider niwan come
cypemen of Brytene & monig cepe þing on ceapstowe brohte, & eac
monige cwomon to bicgenne þa ðing.
 1.96.8. Þa gelomp þætte Gregorius betweoh oðre eac þider
cwom, & þa geseah betweoh oðer þing cype cneohtas þær gesette:
wæron hwites lichoman & fægres ondwlitan men & æðellice
gefeaxe.
 1.96.11. Ða he ða heo geseah & beheold, þa frægn he,
of hwelcon londe oðþe of hwylcre þeode hy brohte wæron.
 1.96.13. Sægde him mon, þæt heo of Breotone ealonde brohte
wæron, ond þæs ealondes bigengan swelcre onsyne men wæron.
 1.96.15. Eft he frægn, hwæðer þa ilcan londleode cristne
wæron þe hi þa gen in hæðennesse gedwolan lifden.
 1.96.16. Cwæð him mon to & sægde, þæt heo
hæðne wæron; & he ða of inneweardre heortan swiðe sworette
& þus cwæð: Wala wa: þæt is sarlic, þætte swa fæger
feorh & swa leohtes ondwlitan men scyle agan & besittan þeostra
aldor.
 1.96.21. Eft he frægn, hwæt seo þeod nemned wære, þe
heo of cwomon.
 1.96.22. Ondswarede him mon þæt heo Ongle nemde wæron.
 1.96.22. Cwæð he: Wel þæt swa mæg: forðon heo
ænlice onsyne habbað, & eac swylce gedafonað, þæt heo engla
æfenerfeweardas in heofonum sy.
 1.96.25. Þa gyt he furðor frægn & cwæð: Hwæt
hatte seo mægð, þe þa cneohtas hider of lædde wæron.
 1.96.26. Þa ondswarede him mon & cwæð, þæt heo Dere
nemde wæron.
 1.96.27. Cwæð he: Wel þæt is cweden Dere, <foreign>de ira eruti</foreign>;
heo sculon of Godes yrre beon abrogdene, & to Cristes mildheortnesse
gecegde.
 1.96.29. Ða gyt he ahsode hwæt heora cyning haten wære:
& him mon ondswarade & cwæð, þætte he æll haten wære.
 1.96.31. Ond þa plegode he mid his wordum to þæm noman &
cwæð: Alleluia, þæt gedafenað, þætte Godes lof usses
scyppendes in þæm dælum sungen sy.
 1.96.33. Ond he þa sona eode to ðæm biscope & to ðam
papan þæs apostolican seðles, forðon he seolfa þa gyt næs biscop
geworden: bæd hine, þæt he Ongolþeode onsende in Breotene hwelcehwego
lareowas, þætte þurh þa heo to Criste gecyrrede wæron.
 1.98.3. Ond cwæð þæt he selfa geara wære mid Godes
fultome þæt weorc to fremmenne, gif þæm apostolican papan þæt
licade, & ðæt his willa & his leafnis wære.
 1.98.5. Þa ne wolde se papa þæt þafian ne þa burgware
þon ma, þætte swa æðele wer & swa geþungen & swa
gelæred swa feor fram him gewite.
 1.98.7. Ah he sona hraðe, þæs þe he biscop geworden
wæs, þætte he gefremede þæt weorc þæt he longe wilnade, &
þa halgan lareowas hider onsende , þe we ær beforan sægdon.
 1.98.10. Ond he Sanctus Gregorius mid his trymnes sum & mid his
gebedum wæs gefultumende, þæt heora laar wære wæstmbeorende to
Godes willan & to ræde Ongolcynne.
 2.98.13. Ða wæs ðætte Agustinus se biscop mid
æðelberhtes fultome þæs cyninges gelaðode to his spræce Bretta
biscopas & lareowas in þære stowe, þe mon gyt nemneð Agustinus
aac, in Hwicna gemære & Westseaxna.
 2.98.16. Ond he ða ongon mid broðorlice lufan heo monian &
læran, þæt heo rihte sibbe & lufan him betweonum hæfden, &
gemæne gewin fore Drihtne ondfenge godcunde lare to læranne
Ongolþeode.
 2.98.19. & heo him hyran ne woldon, ne woldon riht Eastran
healdan in heora tid; ge eac monig oðer þing þære ciriclican annisse
heo ungelice & wiðerword hæfdon.
 2.98.21. Ða heo þa hæfdon longe spræce & geflit ymb
þa þing, ne heo Agustines larum ne his benum ne his þeawum & his
geferena ænige þinga geþafian woldon, ac heo heora sylfra þeawas &
gesetenesse betron dydon, þon heo geþwæredan eallum Cristes circum geond
middangeard, þa se halga fæder Agustinus þisses gewinnesfullan geflites
ende gesette & þus cwæð: Uton biddan ælmihtigne God, se ðe
eardigan deð þa anmodan in his fæder huse, þæt he geeaðmodige us
togetacnian mid heofonlicum wundrum, hwelc gesetenes to fylgenne sy, hwelcum
wegum to efestenne sy to ingonge his rices.
 2.98.30. Læde mon hider to us sumne untrumne mon; ond þurh swa
hwelces bene swa he gehæled sy, þisses geleafa & wyrcnis seo lefed God
onfenge & allum to fylgenne.
 2.100.2. Þa geðafodan þæt uneaðe þa his gesacan, þa
lædde mon forð sumne blinde mon of Ongolcynne.
 2.100.3. Wæs ærest læded to Bretta biscopum: & he
nænige hælo ne frofre þurh heora segnunge onfeng.
 2.100.5. Þa æt nehstan wæs Agustinus mid reohtre
nedþearfnisse gebæded.
 2.100.6. Aras & gebegde his cneo; bæd God Fæder
ælmihtigne, þæt he þam blindan men gesyhðe forgefe, þæt he
þurh anes monnes lichomlice inlihtnesse in monigra geleafsumra heortan
þæs gastlican leohtes gife onbærnde.
 2.100.9. Þa sona buton eldnesse wæs se blinda man onlehted
& gesyhðe onfeng: ond se soða boda þæs hean leohtes Agustinus
wæs from him eallum bodad & hered.
 2.100.11. Þa ondetton eac Brettas scomiende þæt heo ongeton,
þætte þæt wære soðfæstnesse weg þone Agustinus bodade.
 2.100.13. Cwædon hwæðre þæt heo ne meahton buton heora
leoda geþafunge & lefnesse heora ealdan þeawas onscunian &
forlætan: bædon þæt eft oðer seonoð wære; & heo þonne
wolden mid ma heora witena gesecan.
 2.100.17. Þa se ða geseted wæs, cwomon seofon Bretta
biscopas & ealle þa gelæredestan men, þa wæron swiðost of
Boncra byrig.
 2.100.18. Þære tide Dinoð wæs haten þæs mynstres
abbod.
 2.100.19. Þa heo þa to þæm gemote ferdon, þa cwomon heo
ærest to sumum aancoran, se wæs mid him halig & wiis.
 2.100.21. Frugnon heo hine & ahsodon, hwæðer heo sceoldon
to Agustinus lare heora gesetenesse & heora þeawas forlæton.
 2.100.23. Ondswarede he him: Gif he Godes man sy, fylgað ge him.
 2.100.24. Cwædon heo to him: Be hwon magon we ðæt weotan,
hwæðer he sy?
 2.100.25. Cwæð he: Drihten seolfa cwæð in his godspelle:
Nimað ge min geoc ofer eow eac & leorniað æt me, þæt ic eom
milde & eaðmodre heortan: & nu gif Agustinus is milde &
eaðmodre heortan, þonne is he gelyfed þæt he Cristes geoc bere &
eow lære to beorenne.
 2.100.29. Gif he þonne is unmilde & oferhygdig, þonne is
þæt cuð þæt he nis of Gode, ne ge his worda gemað.
 2.100.30. Cwædon heo eft: Be hwon magon we þis gescead witon?
 2.100.31. Cwæð he: Foreseoð ge þætte he ærest mid
his geferum to þære seonoðstowe cume & gesitte.
 2.100.33. Ond gif he arise ongegnes eow þonne ge cuman, þonne
witað ge þæt he bið Cristes þeow, & geeaðmodlice his word
& his lare gehyrað.
 2.102.2. Gif he þonne eow eac forhogie & eow ne wille arisan
togegnes, mid þy eower ma is, sy he þonne from eow forhogad.
 2.102.4. Hwæt heo dydon, swa swa he cwæð.
 2.102.4. Cwomon heo to þære seonoðstowe: sæt se
ærcebiscop Agustinus on setle.
 2.102.5. Þa heo þa gesegon þæt he ne aras for him, þa
wæron hi sona yrre gewordne & hine oferhygdigne tealdon & eallum his
wordum hy wiðcwædon & wiðwunnun.
 2.102.8. Cwæð he se heah biscop to him: In monegum þingum ge
wiðerworde wæron ussum gewunan & ealre Godes cirican swa.
 2.102.10. Ond hwæðre gif ge æt þissum þreom þingum me
hyrsume beon willað, þæt ge ærest rihte Eastron weorðien in heora
tiid; ond ge þa þegnunge fulwihte, þurh þa we beoð Gode to bearnum
acende, æfter þeowe þære halgan Romaniscan cirican & þære
apostolican gefyllen; ond þæt þridde, þæt ge Ongolþeode
ætgædre mid us Drihtnes word bodige, all oðer þing ða ge doð,
þeah heo ussum þeawum wiðerworde syn, we geþyldelice aræfnað.
 2.102.17. Cwædon heo, þæt heo nænig þyssa don wolde,
ne hine for ærcebiscop habban wolden.
 2.102.18. Spræcon him betweonum: Gif he nu for us arisan ne
wolde, micle ma gif we him underþeodde beoð, he us eac for noht gehygeð.
 2.102.20. Þa se Godes wer Sanctus Agustinus is sægd þæt
he beotigende forecwæde, gif heo sibbe mid Godes monnum onfon ne wolden,
þæt heo wæren unsibbe & gefeoht from heora feondum onfonde: ond gif
heo Ongolcynne lifes weg bodigan ne woldon, þæt heo þonne wæron
þurh heora honda deaðes wræc þrowigende.
 2.102.26. Þæt þurh eal, swa se Godes wer forecwæð,
rehte Godes dome geworden wæs.
 2.102.27. Ond sona hræðe æfter þissum þætte
æþelfrið Ongla cyning, bi ðæm we ær spræcon, gesomnode micle
fyrd & þa gelædde to Legaceastre & þær wið Brettum gefeaht:
& ðæt mæste wæl geslogon þære getreowleasan þeode.
 2.102.30. Mid þy he þæt feoht ongon, þa geseah he
æðelfrið se cyning heora sacerdas & biscopas & munecas sundor
stondan ungewæpnade in geheldran stowe, þæt heo scoldon for heora
compweorod gebiddan & to Gode þingian.
 2.102.33. Frægn he & ahsode, hwæt þæt weorod wære
& hwæt heo þær dydon.
 2.102.34. Þa he ða ongeat þone intingan heora cymes,
cwæð he: Hwæt ic wat, gif heo wið us to heora Gode cleopigað,
þeah þe heo wepen ne beran, þæt heo wið us feohtað, forðon heo
us mid heora wiðerwordum onbenum & wyrgnessum ehtað.
 2.104.4. Heht þa sona ærest on heo cerran & slean.
 2.104.5. Secgað men þæt þæs weorodes wære twelf hund
monna, & heora fiftig þurh fleam onweg losodon.
 2.104.6. & he swa þa oðer weorod þare manfullan þeode
fornom & fordilgade, nales buton micelre wonunge his weoredes.
 2.104.8. Ond swa wæs gefylled se witedom þæs halgan
biscopes Agustinus, þæt heo sceolden for heora treowleasnisse hwilendlicre
forwyrde wræc þrowigan, forðon heo þa ær lærdon geþeahte heora
ecre hælo forhogodon.
 3.104.12. Ða wæs æfter ðissum þætte Agustinus
Breotone ærcebiscop gehalgade twegen biscopas: oðer wæs Mellitus haten,
oðer Iustus.
 3.104.14. Þone Mellitum he sende Eastseaxum to bodigenne
godcunde lare, þa seondon Temese streame tosceadne from Centlonde & to
eastsæ geðeodde.
 3.104.16. Is heora aldorburg nemned Lundenceaster, on ofere geseted
þæs foresprecenan streames; ond seo is monigra folca ceapstow of londe
& of sæ cumendra.
 3.104.18. In þære þeode wæs in þa tid Sæberht
cyning, æðelberhtes swustorsunu & his hera.
 3.104.19. Ða onfeng Eastseaxna þeod soðfæstnisse word
& Cristes geleafan þurh Mellitus lare þæs biscopes.
 3.104.21. Þa heht æðelberht cyning in Lundenceastre cirican
getimbran, & þa gehalgian Sancti Pauli þæm apostoli, þæt he in
ðære stowe biscopsetl hæfde & his æfterfylgend.
 3.104.23. Þone Iustum he in Cent sylfre to biscope gehalgode to
Hrofesceastre.
 3.104.24. Seo is from Cantwarena byrig on feower & twentigum
mila westrihte.
 3.104.25. In þære ceastre eac swylce æðelberht cyning
heht cirican getimbran & þa gehalgian Sancte Andreæ þæm
apostoli.
 3.104.27. Ond se cyning æghwæðerum þissa biscopa his gyfe
sealde & boclond & ahte, him to brucanne mid heora geferum.
 3.104.29. After þissum þa forðferde Gode se leofa fæder
Agustinus: & his lichoma wæs ute bebyrged neah cirican þara eadigra
apostola Petrus & Paulus, þe we ær gemyngodon.
 3.104.32. Forðon heo þa gyta næs fullice geworht ne
gehalgod.
 3.104.32. Sona þæs þe heo gehalgad wæs, þa dyde mon his
lichoman in; & in þære cirican norðportice wæs bebyrged
gedæftlice.
 3.106.2. In þæm eac swilce ealra þara æfterfylgendra
ærcebiscopa lichoman sindon bebyrgede, buton twegra, þæt is þeodoris
& Berhtwaldes.
 3.106.4. Heora lichoman syndon in þære circan seolfre gesette,
forðon in þone forecwedenan portic ma ne meahte.
 3.106.6. Is wel neah in middre þære miclan cirican wigbed
geseted & þæt on Sancte Gregorius naman gehalgod.
 3.106.7. In ðæm æghwylce Sæternes dæge from þære
stowe mæssepreost heora gemynde & forðfore mid mæssesonge
mærsode syndon.
 3.106.9. Is awriten in Sancte Agustinus byrgenne þisses gemetes
gewrit: Her resteð domne Agustinus se æresta ærcebiscop Contwarena
burge, se geara hider from þæm eadigan Gregoriæ þære Romaniscan
burge biscope sended wæs, & from Gode mid wundra weorcnesse awreðed
wæs.
 3.106.13. Æðelberht cyning & his þeode from deofulgilda
ongonge to Cristes geleafan he gelæde, & on sibbe gefylldum dagum his
þegnunge forðfered wæs, ðy dæge septima Kalendas Iunias in þæs
ylcan cyninges rice.
 4.106.17. Æfter Agustini fyligde in biscophade Laurentius,
þone he forðon bi him lifigendum gehalgode, þy læs him forðferendum
se steall swa neowre cirican ænige hwile buton heorde taltrigan ongunne.
 4.106.20. Onhyrede he on þon þa bysene þæs ærestan
heordes Godes cirican Sancte Petres þæs apostoles, þa he æt Rome
ærest Cristes cirican staðolode: is sægd þæt he Clementem him to
fultome godcundre lare & him to æfterfylgende gehalgade.
 4.106.23. Þa he ða Laurentius ærcebiscophade onfeng, ða
ongon fromlice þa staðolas þære cyrican, þe he eaðelice alegde
geseah, ecan; & to forðspownisse gedefre heannisse mid gelomlicre stefne
haligre trymnisse & lare & mid singalum bysenum arfæstre wyrcnesse
he ongon hean & miclian.
 4.106.28. Nales þæt an þæt he gemæne dyde þære
neowan cirican, þe of Ongolcynne gesomnod wæs, ac swilce eac þara ealdra
biggengena Bretta & Scotta.
 4.106.30. Forðon he ongeat þæt heo on monegum þingum Godes
cirican ungeþwærodon, ond ealra swiðust þæt heo þa symbelnesse
Eastrana & þone dæg þære drihtenlecan æriste ne weorðodon
mid rihtre tide.
 4.108.2. Wrat he & sende ærendgewrit to him: bæd heo
& halsade, þæt heo in annesse sibbe & in gehælde rihtra
Eastrana geþwærede mid þa Cristes cirican, seo geond ealne middangeard
togoten is.
 4.108.5. Ac þeah þe he þas þing dyde, hu swiðe him speow,
nu gen þas ondweardan tide, þa ilcan þeowas cyðað.
 4.108.7. Ðissum tidum cwom Mellitus Lundenceastre biscop to Rome
bi þæm nedþearflicum intingan Ongolcirican.
 4.108.8. Ond he ða wæs smeagende mid þone apostolican papan
Bonefatio, se wæs feorða biscop þære Romaniscan burge from Sancti
Gregorii.
 4.108.10. Ond he ða ðes ilca papa seonoð gesomnode Eotolwara
biscopa; & he wæs endebyrdlice settende bi muneca life & bi heora
stilnesse.
 4.108.12. Wæs þes seonoð þy eahteðan geare Uocatis rices
þæs caseres.
 4.108.13. & Mellitus betweoh hy æt þæm seonoðe
sæt. & þa ðing, þe ðær regollico gedemed wæron, mid his
aldorlicnesse mid Cristes rode tacne wrat & fæstnode.
 4.108.15. Ond eft hwearf to Breotone, & þa mid hine
Ongolciricum to healdanne awriten brohte ætgædre mid þæm
ærendgewritum, þe se ilca papa Gode þam leofan ærcebiscope Laurentie
& eallum his geferum & æðelberhte cyninge & ealre Ongolþeode
sende, to frofre & to trymnisse rihtes lifes.
 5.108.21. Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & syxteno winter from
Drihtnes menniscnesse, þæt wæs ymb an & twentig wintra, þæs
Agustinus mid his geferum to læranne Ongolþeode sended wæs, þætte
æðelberht Contwara cyning æfter þæm willendlecan rice, þæt he
syx & fiftig wintra wuldorlice hæfde, ond þa to þam heofonlican rice
mid gefean astag.
 5.108.26. Wæs he se ðridda cyning in Ongolþeode cyningum
þæt allum suðmægþum weold & rice hæfde oð Humbre stream.
 5.108.28. Hæfde ærest þisses gemetes rice ælle
Suðseaxna cyning.
 5.108.28. Se æftera wæs Ceawlin haten Westseaxna cyning.
 5.108.29. Se þridda wæs, swa we ær cwædon,
æðelbehrt Contwara cyning.
 5.108.30. Feorða wæs Rædwold Eastengla cyning: fifta
Eadwine Norðanhymbra cyning, se hæfde rice ofer ealle Breotone buton
Contwarum anum.
 5.108.32. Swelce he eac Monige Bretta ealond, þa seodon geseted
betweoh Ibernia, Scotlond & Breotone, Ongolcynnes rice underþeodde.
 5.110.2. Syxta wæs Oswald, Norðanhymbra cyning se betsta &
se cristenesta, se þis sum ilcum gemærum rice hæfde.
 5.110.4. Seofoða wæs Osweo his broðor, se eac swylce Peohta
þeode & Scotta of miclum dæle geeode, & to gafolgyldum gesette.
 5.110.6. Þa forðferde æðelberht cyning æfter an &
twentegum wintra þæs þe he fulwihte & Cristes geleafan onfeng, ond
in cirican þara eadigra apostola Petrus & Paulus in Sancte Martinus
portice bebyrged wæs; & þær eac Beorhte seo cwen bebyrged is.
 5.110.10. Se cyning betweoh þa oðer god, þe he his leodum
þurh geþeaht gefremede, eac swylce rihtra doma gesetenisse mid snotera
geþeahte gesette æfter Romana bysene, & þa heht on Englisc gewritan:
þa nu gena oð þis mid him hæfde & haldne syndon.
 5.110.13. In þæm he ærest sette hu mon þæt betan
scolde, se ðe oðþe cirican eahte oðþe biscopes oþðe oðerra hada
mid stale afyrde.
 5.110.15. Wolde he ðam gescyldnesse gegearwian, þe he heora
lare onfeng.
 5.110.16. Wæs þes ilca æðelbehrt Eormanrices sunu;
þæs fæder wæs Octa haten; þæs fæder wæs Oeric; wæs his
freonama æsc, from þæm syðþan Contwara cyningas wæron
æscingas nemnde.
 5.110.19. Þæs æsces fæder wæs se Hengest, se ðe
wæs ærest latteow & heretoga Ongolcynnes in Breotone, swa we ær
beforan sægdon.
 5.110.22. Þa wæs æfter æðelberhtes forðfore, Eadbald
his sunu feng to ðam rice, ond he sona micle wonunge & æwerdlan wæs
þære mærwan cyrican weaxnisse.
 5.110.24. Forðon nales þæt aan þæt he Cristes geleafan
onfon ne wolde, ac swylce eac unalyfedre forlegenesse & egeslicre wæs
besmiten, swa þæt he eode to his fæder wife.
 5.110.27. For æghwæðrum þissa mana he intingan sealde
þæm, þæt heo hwurfe to þære ærran unclænnisse, þa ðe
under his fæder rice oðþe mid þy cynelecan fultome oððe his ege
clænnisse reht & Cristes geleafon onfengon.
 5.110.30. Ne þæm treowleasan cyninge þære uplecan þrea
sweopon gewon wæron, þæt he þurh þa geclænsed and gereht beon
sceolde; forðon he gelomlice mid wedenheortnesse modes & þæs
unclænan gastes inswogennisse þrycced wæs.
 5.112.1. Swelce eac toætecte þisse gedrefnisse storm
Sæberhtes deað Eastseaxna cyninges.
 5.112.2. Forðon þa he wæs þa ecan riceo secende, forlet he
þæs hwilenlecan rices yrfeweardas his suna ðry.
 5.112.3. Þa ongunnon heo sona openlice deofolgildum þeowian,
þe monnum þuhte þæt heo hwæthwugu forlæten hæfde bi þæm
fæder lifiendum.
 5.112.6. Ond heo freo lefnesse sealdon deofolgyld to bigongenne
þam folcum, þe him underþeodde wæron.
 5.112.7. Mid þy heo þa gesegon þone biscop mæssan
onsymbelnesse mærsian in Godes cirican & þæm folce husl syllan,
wæron heo mid elreorde dysignesse onblawne.
 5.112.9. Cwædon to him: Forhwon ne recst þu us þone hwitan
hlaf, þone þu sealdest Saban ussum fædernemdon heo hine swa & nu
gena folce in cirican sylest?
 5.112.12. Ondswarede se biscop him: Gif ge willað onþwegene
beon ðy halwendan wellan fulwihtes bæðes, swa eower fæder aðwegen
wæs, þonne magon ge eac swylce þæs halgan hlafes dælneomende beon,
swa he dælneomende wæs.
 5.112.15. Gif þonne ge lifes bæð forhycgað, ne magon ge
ænige þinga lifes hlafe onfon.
 5.112.16. Cwædon heo: Ne willað we in þæt bæð
gongan, forðon we weotan þæt we þæs þearfe nabbað; ac
hwæðre we willað mid þy hlafe gereorde beon.
 5.112.19. Mid þy heo oft & geornlice from him monode
wæron, þæt þæt Nænige þinga beon meahte, þæt hy buton
þære halgan geclæsnunge fulwihtes bæðes þæm halgan hlafe
gemænsumede, þa æt neahstan wæron heo mid hatheortnesse onstyrede.
 5.112.22. Cwædon him to: Gif þu ne wilt us geðafian in swa
æðelicum þinge, þe we biddað, ne meaht þu in usse mægðe ne
ussum gemanan wunian.
 5.112.24. & dreofon hine onweg, & heton þæt he mid his
geferum of heora rice gewite.
 5.112.25. Þa he onweg adrifen wæs, cwom he to Cent, sohte
& smeade mid Laurentio & Iusto his efnbiscopum, hwæt him be ðyssum
þingum to donne wære.
 5.112.28. Ond þa to ræde fundon mid gemænre geþeahte,
þæt him selre & gehæledre wære, þæt heo ealle hwurfon to
heora eðle & þær mid freo mode Drihtne þeowede, þonne heo
betweoh þa elreordan & þa wiðfeohtend Cristes geleafan leng buton
wæstme sæton.
 5.112.31. Ða geweoton ærest ofer sæ twegen biscopas
Mellitus & Iustus & cwomon in on dælas Gallia rices, &
gestihtedon þæt heo þær wolden þære wisan ende gebidan.
 5.112.34. Ac þa arleasan cyningas nales micelre tide, æfter
þon þe heo þone soðfæstnisse bodan from him adrifon, þæt heo
deofla bigængum freolice þeowedon.
 5.114.2. Ac heo wæran cumene wið Westseaxna þeode to
gefeohte, & ealle ætgædre gehruron & ofslegene wæron mid heora
compweorode.
 5.114.4. Ond þeah ðe heora alderas forlorene wæren, ne
meahte þæt folc þa gen gereaht beon, þætte ær to manum getogen
wæs, ne eft geceed beon to hluttornis se geleafan ne to Godes lufan.
 6.114.8. Mid ðy he ða Laurentius se ærcebiscop þa oðre
biscopas his geferan fylgan wolde & Breotone forlætan, ða heht he in
þære seolfan nihte, þa he on morne feran wolde, in cirican þara
eadigra apostola Petrus & Paulus, bi þære we gelomlice sægdon, him
streowne gegearwian, þæt he hine gerestan meahte.
 6.114.12. Ond þa ærest longe nihtes in halgum gebedum wæs,
& his tearas geat, & his bene to Gode sende for þære cirican
stealle; & geswenced & werig gesette þa his leomu to restenne &
hwæthwugo onslept.
 6.114.15. Ða æteawde him sona se eadgesta aldor þara
apostola Sanctus Petrus, & hine micelre tide þære deahlan neahte mid
grimmum swingum swong & þreade.
 6.114.18. Ond hine wæs frignende mid þa apostolican
þearlwisnesse, forhwon he þæt Godes eowde forlætan wolde, þætte
he him bead to healdanne, oðþe þa gesettan Cristes scep in middum wulfum
hwylcum heorde he fleonde forlete.
 6.114.21. Cwæð him eac to: Wære þu ofergeotende minre
bysne, hwæt ic fore Cristes cneohtum, þa he me in tacnunge his lufan
bebead, bende & swingan & carcern & monige geswencednesse &
æt neahstan þone seolfan deað & rode deað from ungeleafsumum &
Cristes feondum ic þrowade & aræfnde, þæt ic mid Criste
gesigefæsted wære?
 6.114.26. Þa wæs he se Cristes þeow Laurentius mid þæs
apostoles swingum & trymnessum swiðe gebylded.
 6.114.27. Cwom sona on marne to þam cyninge, & his hrægl
onwrag & him eawde, mid hu miclum swingum he þread & witnod wæs.
 6.114.29. Þa wundrade he swiðe, & ahsode hwylc mon to
ðæs gedyrstig wære, þæt he swa miclum were swilc witu dyde.
 6.114.31. Þa he ða se cyning gehyrde & oncneow, þætte
he se biscop fore his hælo intingan from Cristes apostole swa micele
tintregu & witu þrowade, þa wæs he swiðe forht geworden, & him
swiðe ondred ond sona towearp al þa bigong þara deofolgelda, þa he
ær beeode, & forlet þa unrihtwifunge & Cristes geleafan onfeng;
ond se biscop hine gefulwade.
 6.116.4. & sona in eallum þingum þære cirican eahtum
& godum freoðode & fultemede, swa he fyrmest meahte.
 6.116.6. Ond he swelce eac sende ærendwrecan in Gallia rice,
& heht ham laþian þa biscopas Mellitum & Iustum; & he het
freolice to heora biscopscire ham hweorfan.
 6.116.8. & heo ymb an ger ham hwurfon ðæs þe heo ær
of Breotone ferdon.
 6.116.9. Iustus hwearf to Hrofesceastre, þær he ær biscop
wæs.
 6.116.10. Mellitum þone biscop Lundenwaran onfon ne woldon, ac ma
lufodon þæt heo þeowedan heora deofolgelda biscopum.
 6.116.12. Ond heo Eadbaldes þæs cyninges worda ne gemdon,
forðon his rice ne wæs ofer heo, swa swa his fæder hæfde.
 6.116.14. Hwæðre he mid his þeode mid Contwarum, seoðþan
he to Drihtne gecerred wæs, þæm godcundan bebodum þeowode &
hearsumede.
 6.116.16. Þæs gen to tacne is, þæt he het in Sancte
Petres mynstre cirican getimbran in are þære eadigan fæmnan Sancta
Marian, ða eft Mellitus on hyre noman gehalgode, þa he wæs
ærcebiscop.
 7.116.20. In ðisses cyninges rice se eadiga ærcebiscop Sanctus
Laurentius forðferde, & þæt heofonlice rice gestah; & in circan
& in mynstre þæs eadigan apostoles Sancte Petres bii his foregengan
Sancte Agustine bebyrged wæs þy feorðan dæge nonarum Februarium.
 7.116.23. Æfter þæm Mellitus, se wæs ær Lundenceastre
biscop, feng to þam biscopseðle Contwara burge cirican ðridda biscop from
Sancte Agustine.
 7.116.26. Wæs Iustus se biscop þa gen lifigende & reahte
þa gesomnunge æt Hrofesceastre.
 7.116.27. Ond heo begen mid micle gemænne & gewinne
Ongolciricean heoldon & reahton.
 7.116.29. Wæs he Mellitus mid lichoman untrymnesse mid fotadle
swiðe gehefigad; ac hwæðre halgum gongum his modes he glædlice all
eorðlic þing wæs oferhleapende, ond symle mid his mode wæs flegende
þa heofonlecan to lufienne & to biddenne & to secenne.
 7.116.32. Wæs he lichomlicre gebyrde æðeles cynnes, ac mid
modes heanisse micle æðelra.
 7.118.1. Sculon we ane cyðnesse his mægenes secgan, þæt
we his oðer mægen þy eað ongytan magon.
 7.118.2. Gelomp sumre tide, þæt seo ceaster Contwara burge
þurh ungemænne synna wearð fyre onbærned.
 7.118.4. & þæt fyr & þæt leg swiðe weox &
miclade, & him nænig mon mid wætra onweorpnesse wiðstondan meahte;
& micel dæl þære ceastre wæs fornumen.
 7.118.6. Ða for se wallenda leg & hine brædde to þam
biscope, þa getreowde he in godcundne fultom, þær se mennesca wan
wæs; heht his þegnas hine selfne beran ongean þæm fyre & asettan,
þær se leg & seo frecnis mæst wæs.
 7.118.9. Ond untrum ongon þurh his gebed þa frecenisse
þæs fyres onweg adrifan, þætte ær seo trume hond strongra monna
þurh micel gewin don ne meahte.
 7.118.12. & se wind sona, se ðe ær suðan bleow &
þa bærnnisse in þa burg strægd, hine norðan awearp ond þa
bærnnisse ut ofbegde; & sona eallinga þurh his gebed þæt fyr
acwan & adwæsced wæs.
 7.118.14. Ond forðon þe se Godes wer stronglice innon born mid
þy fyre godcundre lufan, & oft stormas & hreonisse þara werigra
gasta from his seolfes sceðenisse & his geferena mid his gelomelicum
gebedum & trymenissum scilde & wiðsceaf, wæs þæt þæs
wyrðe, þæt he wið þam middangeardlicum windum & legum swiðan
meahte, þy læs heo him & his freondum sceðeden.
 7.118.20. Onu þes halga biscop, æfter þon þe he fif winter
þa cirican heold & reahte in Eadbaldes rice leorde to heofonum, &
bebyrged wæs mid his fædrum in þæm oft cwedenan mynstre &
cirican Sancte Petres þy eahteðan dæge Calendarum Maiarum.
 7.118.25. Þæm sona æfterfylgde Iustus in biscophade, se
wæs æt Hrofesceastre ær biscop.
 7.118.26. & he ðære cirican for hine oðerne biscop
gehalgode, Romanus wæs haten, forðon he aldorlicnisse onfeng from
Bonefatio þam papan, þæt he biscopas hadian moste.
 8.118.29. Þære tide eac swylce Norðanhymbra þeod mid heora
cyninge Eadwine Cristes geleafan onfeng, þe him Paulinus bodade se halga
biscop & lærde.
 8.118.31. Þæm cyninge þære onfongennisse Cristes geleafan
& þæs heofonlecan rices eac swelce on healsunge, geweox meaht
eorðlices rices, swa þæt, þætte nænig Ongolcynna ær him,
eall Breotono gemæro on anweald onfeng, ða ðe oððe heora megþe
Ongolcynnes oðþe Bretta eardodon: all þæt he on anwald onfeng.
 8.120.5. Ge eac Monige swelce Bretta ealond Ongolcynnes rice
underþeodde, swa we ær beforan sægdon.
 8.120.7. Ðisse þeode, þæt is Norðanhymbrum, wæs se
æresta intinga to onfonne Cristes geleafan, þætte se foresprecena heora
cyning Edwini wæs mid mægsibbe geþeoded Contwara cyningum.
 8.120.9. Onfeng he þonan wiife æþelbeorge, æðelberhtes
dohtor þæs cyninges, seo oðre noman wæs Tate haten.
 8.120.11. Þa he ærest his ærendwrecan sende to Eadbolde
hire breðer, se wæs þa Contwara cyning, & þisse fæmnan gemanan
bæd & wilnade, ondswarede he þæt þæt alyfed nære,
þætte cristeno fæmne hæðnan men to wiife seald wære, þy
læs se geleafa & þa geryno þæs heofonlecan cyninges mid þæs
cyninges gemanan aidlad wære, se ðe þæs soðan cyninges bigong ne
cuðe.
 8.120.17. Þa ða ærendwrecan eft Eadwine sægdon þas
word, þa gehet he sona þæt he noht wiðerweardes don wolde þæm
cristenan geleafan, þe seo fæmne beeode, ac þæt heo moste þone
geleafan & bigong hire æfestnisse mid eallum hire geferum, þe heo mid
cwomen, þy cristnan þeawe lifian & þone wel healdan.
 8.120.21. Ne he ne wiðsoc þæt he seolfa eac þa ilcan
æfestnisse underfenge, gif wise witan þæt funde þæt heo haligra
gemeted beon meahte.
 8.120.23. Þa wæs seo fæmne gehaten, & æfter fæce
Eadwine onsended.
 8.120.24. Ond æfter þon þe heo ær funden hæfdon,
wæs gehalgod to biscope Gode se leofa wer Sanctus Paulinus, se mid heo feran
scolde, to ðon þæt he þa fæmnan & hire geferan æghwæðer
ge mid þa mærsunge heofonlicra geryna ge mid his dæghwamlicre lare
trymede, þæt heo in þam gemanan þara hæðenra besmiten ne
wære.
 8.120.30. Wæs he Paulinus to biscope gehalgod from Iusto þam
ærcebiscope þy twelftan dæge Calendarum Augustarum.
 8.120.31. Ða cwom he mid þa foresprecenan fæmnan to Eadwini
þæm cyninge, swa swa he wære gesið licumlicre gegaderunge.
 8.120.33. Ac he ma mid ealle his mode beheold, þæt he þa
þeode, þe he gesohte, to ongytenisse þæs soðan Godes & to
Cristes geleafan þurh his lare gecegde.
 8.120.35. Mid þy he ða se biscop in þa mægðe cwom mid
þære fæmnan, þa wonn he swiðe, þæt he æghwæðer ge his
feran, þa ðe mid him cwomon, þurh Drihtnes gife geheolde þæt heo ne
asprunge from heora geleafan, & gif he hwylce meahte þara hæðenra,
þæt/ he þurh his lare to Cristes geleafan gecerde.
 8.122.5. Ac swa se apostol cwæð, þeah ðe he micelre tide
wunne in his lare, þætte God þa mood þara ungeleafsumra ablænde,
þy læs him scine seo onlihtnes Cristes godspelles & his wuldres.
 8.122.8. Ða wæs þy æfteran geare, cwom sum monn in
Norðanhymbra mægðe; wæs his noma Eomær.
 8.122.9. Wæs he sended from Westseaxna cyninge, se wæs haten
Cwichelm, þæt he scolde Eadwine þone cyning somed ge rice ge lif
beneoman.
 8.122.11. Hæfde he & wæg mid hine twiecge handseax
geættred, þæt gif seo wund to lyt genihtsumode to þæs cyninges
deaðe, þæt þæt attor gefultmade.
 8.122.13. Cwom he to þam cyninge þy ærestan Eastordæge
bii Deorwentan þære ea, þær wæs þa cyninges aldorbold.
 8.122.15. Þa eode he inn, swa swa he his hlafordes ærendo
secgan scolde.
 8.122.16. Ond mid þy he þa geswippre muþe licetende ærend
wreahte & lease fleosewade, þa astod he semninga, & getogene þy
wæpne under his sceate, ræsde on þone cyning.
 8.122.19. Þa þæt þa Lilla geseah, se cyninges þegn him
se holdesta, næfde he scyld æt honda, þæt he þone cyning mid
scyldan meahte: sette þa his lichoman betweoh beforan þam stynge.
 8.122.21. & þurhstong þone cyninges þegn & þone
cyning gewundade.
 8.122.22. Þa wæs sona æghwonan mid wæpnum ymbheped.
 8.122.23. Hwæt þa gena oðerne cyninges þegn in þæm
ungerecce, se wæs Forðhere haten, mid þy manfullan wæpne acwealde.
 8.122.26. Þa wæs þære ilcan neahte þære halgan
Eastrena, cende seo cwen dohtor þæm cyninge, þære noma wæs
Eanflæd.
 8.122.27. Mid þy þe he ða se ilca cyning in þæs biscopes
ondweardnesse þoncunge dyde his Godum for þære deahter, þe him acenned
wæs, ongegn þon ongon se biscop þoncunge don Drihtne Criste ond þam
cyninge cyþan, þæt he þæt mid his benum æt him onfenge, þæt
heo seo cwen gesund & buton hefigum sare þæt bearn cende.
 8.122.32. Þa se cyning þis gehyrde, þa ongon he lustfullian
þæs biscopes wordum, & geheht hine sylfne deofolgildum wiðsacan;
& þæt he wolde Cristes ðeowdom geceosan, gif he him lif & sige
forgefe on þæm gewinne, þe he gehogad hæfde wið þam cyninge, from
þæm þe se myrðra ær sended wæs, se þe hine gewundade.
 8.124.3. Ond þa ilcan his dohtor to gehalgienne Criste þam
biscope to wedde gesealde, þæt he þæt gehat gelæstan wolde.
 8.124.5. Seo wæs gefulwad þy halgan dæge æt Pentecosten
ærest monna of Norðanhymbra þeode, mid endleofan fæmnan oðrum of
þære cwene hyrede; heo wæs twelfta.
 8.124.8. Þære tide eac wæs se cyning gehæled from
þære wunde, þe him ær gedon wæs.
 8.124.9. Þa gesomnode he his fyrd wið Westseaxum & þider
cwom; & sona þæs þe he on heo feaht, wæron him ealle his fynd
gecyðede, þa þe ær ymb his feorh syredon.
 8.124.11. & he þa sume ofslog, sume on onweald onfeng; &
he sigefæst swa eft ham ferde.
 8.124.13. Nales þæt sona þæt innstæpe &
ungeþeahtenlice þæm gerynum onfon wolde þæs Cristenan geleafan,
þeah þe þæt wære, þæt ofer þæt deofolgeldum ne þeowode,
seoðþan he hine to Cristes þeowdome gehatenne hæfde.
 8.124.16. Ac he ærest geornlice aa of tide æghwæðer ge
from þæm arwyrðan were Sancte Paulini þæt riht leornade þæs
halgan geleafan.
 8.124.18. Ge eac mid his ealdormonnum, þa ðe he wiseste &
snottroste wiste, þæt he gelomlice mid him þeahtode & sohte, hwæt
be þissum þingum to donne wære.
 8.124.20. Ge eac he seolfa, mid þy þe he wæs in gecynde se
gleawesta mon, oft longe ana sæt swigende muðe, ac mid inneweardre heortan
monig mid hine sprecende smeade, hwæt him selest to donne wære &
hwylce æfæstnis him to healdenne wære.
 9.124.25. Ðære tide eac swylce þæs apostolican seðles
biscop Bonefatius papa sende Eadwini gretinge & gewrit, mid þy he hine
trymede to onfonne Cristes leafan.
 9.124.28. Swylce eac wæs sum Godgespræce & heofonlic
onwrigenis, þe him geo seo godcunde arfæstnis onwrah, þa he wrecca
wæs mid Rædwald Eastengla cyning, seo swiðe gefultumede his ondgit to
onfonne & to ongeotonne monunge þære halwendan lare.
 9.124.31. Mid þy he þa se biscop Paulinus geseah, þæt he
uneaðelice meahte ða heannesse þæs cynelican modes to eaðmodnesse
gecerran, þæt he onfon wolde his ecre hælo & þæm geryne
þære liffæstan rode Cristes, ond he somed for his hælo þæs
cyninges & þære þeode, þe he fore wæs, ge mid worde trymenesse
mid monnum wonn, ge eac mid ða godcundan arfæstnesse mid worde his gebeda
won, þæt he foreþingode, þa æt nyhstan geleornade he in gaste &
him onwrigen wæs, hwelc onwrigenis giu heofonlic æteawde þæm
cyninge, þa he wrecca wæs.
 9.126.9. Ne ylde he hit þa leng; ac eode sona to þam cyninge
& hine monade þæt he his gehat gefylde, þæt he in þære
onwrigenesse/ geheht, þe him æteawed wæs, gif he þære tiide
ærmþa biswicade & to heannisse cynerices becwome.
 9.126.13. Þæs þis godgespræce & þeos onwrigenis
þisses gemetes.
 9.126.13. Mid þy hine ehte æðelfrið, se ðe ær him
cyning wæs, & þurh missenlice stowe he monigra geara tide flyma
wæs, ða gesohte he æt nyhstan & cwom to Rædwolde Eastengla
cyninge; & hine bæd þæt he his lif gescylde wið swa micles
ehteres sætingum, & him feorhyrde wære.
 9.126.18. Ond he lustlice hine onfeng & him geheht, þæt he
swa don wolde swa he hine bæd.
 9.126.19. Æfter þon þa æþelfrið se cyning hine
þær geahsode, þæt he mid Rædwold þone cyning wæs, þa sende
he sona ærendwrecan to him & micel feoh, wið þon ðe he hine
ofsloge oðþe him to cwale agefe; ne hwæðre owiht on þon fromade.
 9.126.23. Sende he eft æfteran siðe ærendwrecan; synde
þriddan siðe, & maran gife micle & feoh, þonne he him ær
sende, wið his cwale: ond het eac him onbeodan, þæt he hine wolde mid
fyrde to gefeohte gesecan, gif he his word & his gife forhogode.
 9.126.26. Þa wæs his mod æghwæðer ge mid þæm
beotungum gebreged ge mid þæm geofum gewemmed, þæt he geþafode
þæs cyninges bene & gehet, þæt he Eadwine ofsloge oðþe
feondum to cwale gefe.
 9.126.29. Þa wæs sum cyninges þegn his freond se
getreowesta, þe ðas þing gehyrde & onget.
 9.126.31. Þa eode he to his inne, þær he hine restan wolde,
wæs foreweard niht & hine acegde ut & him sægde & cyðde, hu
him mon emb don wolde.
 9.126.33. Cwæð him þa gyt to: Gif ðu wilt in þas seolfan
tid, ic þe alædo of þisse mægðe, & in þa stowe alæde,
þær þe næfre Rædwald ne æðelfrið gemetan magon.
 9.128.3. Cwæð he to him: On þonce me synd þin word &
þin lufo, & hwæðre ne mæg ic þæt don, þæt þu me
lærest, þæt ic ærest þa wære forlæte, þe ic to swa miclum
cyninge nom, mid þy he me noht yfeles dyde ne laðes æteawde.
 9.128.6. Ac gif ic deað þrowian sceal, leofre me is, þæt
he mec to deaðe sylle þonne unæðelra mon.
 9.128.8. Oðþe la hwider mæg ic nu leng fleon?
 9.128.8. Monigra geara tida ofer ealle Breotone ic flyma wæs,
þæt ic me his hete bearh & warenode.
 9.128.10. Þa eode se his freond onweg from him, & he Eadwini
ana þær ute gewunade.
 9.128.11. Sæt swiðe unrot on stane beforan þære healle,
& ongon mid monegum hætum his geþohta swenced beon: & ne wiste,
hwider he eode oðþe hwæt him selest to donne wære.
 9.128.14. Mid þy he þa longe swigendum nearonissum his modes
& mid þy blindan fyre soden wæs, þa geseah he semninga on midre niht
sumne mon wið his gongan uncuþes ondwlitan & uncuðes gegyrlan.
 9.128.17. Þa he ða to him cwom, þa wæs he forht geworden.
 9.128.17. Þa eode he to him, grette hine & frægn, for hwon
he in þære tide, þe oðre men slepon & reston, ana swa unrot on
stane wæccende sæte.
 9.128.19. Ða frægn he hine, hwæt þæs to him lumpe,
hwæðer he wacode þe slepe, & hwæðer he þe ute þe inne
wære.
 9.128.21. Ða ondswarade he & him to cwæð: Ne tala þu
me, þæt ic ne cunne þone intingan þinre unrotnisse & þinre
wæcene & onlæpnesse þines seðles.
 9.128.23. Ac ic cuðlice wat, ge hwæt þu eart ge for hwon
þu gnornast, & hwylc toweard yfel þu þe in neahnesse forhtast.
 9.128.25. Ac gesaga me hwylce mede þu wille syllan þam men, gif
hwylc sy, þætte þec from þissum nearonessum alyse ond Rædwalde on
mod beswape, þæt he noht laðes ne gedo ne þec þinum feondum to cwale
agife?
 9.128.28. Þa ondswarede & cwæð, þæt he ealle ða
god, þe he meahte, for mede þislicre fremsumnesse syllan wolde.
 9.128.30. Ða ætecte he þa gyt his gesprec & cwæð:
& nu gif he ðe eac, adwæsctum þinum feondum, in soðe toweard
cynerice gehateð, swa þæt nales þæt an ealle þine yldran, ac
ealle cyningas, þa ðe in Breotone wæron ær, þu in meahte & in
rice feor oferstigest?
 9.130.1. Þa wæs he Eadwine baldra geworden in þære
frignesse, & sona gehet, se ðe him swa micle fremsumnesse forgefe,
þæt he him þæs wolde wyrðelice þoncunce don.
 9.130.4. Cwæð he þriddan siðe to him, se þe him wið
spræc: Ono gif se mon, se ðe þyslice gife & swa micle soðlice þe
towearde forecwið, ond eac swylce geþeahte þinre hælo & betran
lifes & nyttran þe æteawan mæg, þonne ænig þinra maga
oðþe yldrena æfre gehyrde cwist þu hwæðer þu his þa halwendan
monunge onfon wille & him hearsum beon?
 9.130.9. Þa ne elde he Eadwini owiht ac sona gehet, þæt he
wolde in eallum þingum him hearsum beon & his lare lustlice onfon, se
þe hine from swa monegum ermþum & teonum generede & to heanisse
cynerices forðgelædde.
 9.130.12. Þa he ða þisse ondsware onfeng, se þe mid hine
spræc, þa instæpe sette he mid þa swiðron hond him on ðæt
heafod & þus cwæð: ðonne þis tacen þislic þe tocyme, þonne
gemyne þu þas tide uncres gespreces & ne yld þu þæt þu þa
þing gefylle, þe ðu me nu gehete.
 9.130.16. Þa he ða þas word spræc, þa ne wiste he
semninga hwær he cwom; wolde þæt he in þon ongete, þæt þæt
mon ne wæs, se þe him æteawde, ac þætte þæt gast wæs.
 9.130.20. Ond mid þy he ða se geonga æþeling ana þær
þa gyt sæt, ond wæs swiðe gefeonde bi þære frofre þe him
gehaten wæs, ac hwæðre sorgende mode geornlice þohte, hwæt se
wære oðþe hwonan he cwome, se ðas þing to him sprecende wæs, þa
com eft to him se foresprecena his freond & mid bliðe ondwleotan hine
halette & grette.
 9.130.24. & þus cwæð: Aris, gong in; gerest þinne
lichoman & þin mod buton sorgum, forðon þæs cyninges heorte is
oncerred; ne wile he ðe owiht laðes gedon, ac he ma wile his treowa &
his gehat wið þe gehealdan & þe feorhhyrde beon.
 9.130.28. Sægde him þa æfter þon þæt: Se cyning his
geþoht, bi ðæm þe ic ðe ær sæde, þære cwene in
deagolnesse onwreah.
 9.130.30. Ða onwende heo hine from þære yflan inngehygde his
modes; lærde hine & monade, þætte þæt nænige þinga
gedafenode swa æðelum cyninge & swa geþungennum, þæt he sceolde
his freond þone betstan in neede gesetum in gold bebycgan, & his treowe
for fea gitsunge & lufan forleosan, seo wære deorwyrðre eallum
maðmum.
 9.132.1. Hwæt sculon we þæs nu ma secgan?
 9.132.1. Dyde se cyning swa hit ær cweden wæs; nales þæt
an þæt he ðone wreccan to cwale ne gesealde, ac eac swylce him
gefultumade, þæt he to rice becwom.
 9.132.4. Forþon sona siðþan þa ærendwrecan ham cerdon,
þe his cwale ærendodon, þa gebeon Rædwald his fyrd & micel weorod
gesomnade to gewinnenne wið æþelfriðe.
 9.132.6. Þa for he him togegnes ungelice weorode, forþon he ne
wolde him fyrst alyfan, þæt he moste his weorod eal gesomnian.
 9.132.8. Ða geforon heo tosomne & gefuhton gemære Mercna
þeode æt eastdæle þære ea, þe is Idle nemned; & þær mon
æðelfrið þone cyning slog.
 9.132.10. Swylce eac in ðæm ilcan gefeohte mon sloh
Rædwoldes sunu, se wæs haten Regenhere.
 9.132.11. Ond swa Eadwine æfter þam godgesprece, þe he ær
onfeng, nales þæt an þæt he him þa sætunge þa gewearonode
þæs unholdan cyninges, ac eac swylce æfter his slege him in þæs
rices wuldor æfterfylgde.
 9.132.15. Mid þy he þa Paulinus se biscop Godes word bodade
& lærde, & se cyning elde þa gyt to gelyfanne & þurh sume
tide, swa swa we ær cwædon, gelimplicum ana sæt, & geornlice mid
him seolfum smeade & þohte, hwæt him selest to donne wære &
hwylc æfæstnes him to healdanne wære, þa wæs sume dæge se
Godes wer ingongende to him, þær he ana sæt, ond sette his þa
swiðran hond him on þæt heafod, & hine ahsode hwæðer he
þæt tacen ongytan meahte.
 9.132.22. Þa oncneow he hit sona sweotole & wæs swiðe
forht geworden, & him to fotum feoll; & hine se Godes monn up hof,
& him cuðlice tospræc, & þus cwæð: Ono hwæt þu nu
hafast þurh Godes gife þinra feonda hond beswicade, þa ðu ðe ondrede,
& þu þurh his sylene & gife þæm rice onfenge, þe ðu
wilnadest.
 9.132.26. Ac gemyne nu þæt þu þæt þridde
gelæstest, þæt þu gehete, þæt þu onfo his geleafan & his
bebodu healde, se ðe þe from wilwendlecum earfeðum generede & eac in
are wilwendlices rices ahof.
 9.132.29. Ond gif ðu forð his willan hearsum beon wilt, þone
he þurh me bodað & læreð, he þonne þe eac from tinttregum
genereð ecra yfela ond þec dælneomende gedeð mid him þæs ecan
rices in heofonum.
 10.134.1. Þa se cyning þa þas word gehyrde, þa andswarode
he him & cwæð, þæt he æghwæþer ge wolde ge sceolde þam
geleafan onfon þe he lærde.
 10.134.3. Cwæð hwæþere, þæt he wolde mid his
freondum & mid his wytum gesprec & geþeaht habban, þæt gif hi
mid hine þæt geþafian woldan, þæt hi ealle ætsomne on lifes
willan Criste gehalgade wæran.
 10.134.6. Þa dyde se cyning swa swa he cwæð, & se
bisceop þæt geþafade.
 10.134.7. Þa hæfde he gesprec & geþeaht mid his witum
& syndriglice wæs fram him eallum frignende, hwylc him þuhte &
gesawen wære þeos niwe lar & þære godcundnesse bigong, þe
þær læred wæs.
 10.134.11. Him þa andswarode his ealdorbisceop, Cefi wæs
haten: Geseoh þu, cyning, hwelc þeos lar sie, þe us nu bodad is.
 10.134.12. Ic þe soðlice andette, þæt ic cuðlice
geleornad hæbbe, þæt eallinga nawiht mægenes ne nyttnes hafað sio
æfæstnesse, þe we oð ðis hæfdon & beeodon.
 10.134.15. Forðon nænig þinra þegna neodlicor ne
gelustfullicor hine sylfne underþeodde to ura goda bigange þonne ic; &
noht þon læs monige syndon, þa þe maran gefe & fremsumnesse æt
þe onfengon þonne ic, & on eallum þingum maran gesynto hæfdon.
 10.134.18. Hwæt ic wat, gif ure godo ænige mihte hæfdon,
þonne woldan hie me ma fultumian, forþon ic him geornlicor þeodde &
hyrde.
 10.134.20. Forþon me þynceð wislic , gif þu geseo þa
þing beteran & strangran, þe us niwan bodad syndon, þæt we þam
onfon.
 10.134.23. Þæs wordum oþer cyninges wita & ealdormann
geþafunge sealde, & to þære spræce feng & þus cwæð:
þyslic me is gesewen, þu cyning, þis andwearde lif manna on eorðan to
wiðmetenesse þære tide, þe us uncuð is, swylc swa þu æt
swæsendum sitte mid þinum ealdormannum & þegnum on wintertide, &
sie fyr onælæd & þin heall gewyrmed, & hit rine & sniwe
& styrme ute; cume an spearwa & hrædlice þæt hus þurhfleo,
cume þurh oþre duru in þurh oþre ut gewite.
 10.136.2. Hwæt he on þa tid, þe he inne bið, ne bið
hrinen mid þy storme þæs wintres; ac þæt bið an eagan bryhtm
& þæt læsste fæc, ac he sona of wintra on þone winter eft
cymeð.
 10.136.5. Swa þonne þis monna lif to medmiclum fæce
ætyweð; hwæt þær foregange, oððe hwæt þær
æfterfylige, we ne cunnun.
 10.136.7. Forðon gif þeos lar owiht cuðlicre &
gerisenlicre brenge, þæs weorþe is þæt we þære fylgen.
 10.136.8. Þeossum wordum gelicum oðre aldormen & ðæs
cyninges geþeahteras spræcan.
 10.136.10. Þa gen toætyhte Cefi & cwæð, þæt he
wolde Paulinus þone bisceop geornlicor gehyran be þam Gode sprecende þam
þe he bodade.
 10.136.12. Þa het se cyning swa don.
 10.136.12. Þa he þa his word gehyrde, þa clypode he &
þus cwæð: Geare ic þet ongeat, þæt ðæt nowiht wæs,
þæt we beeodan.
 10.136.14. Forþon swa micle swa ic geornlicor on þam bigange
þæt sylfe soð sohte, swa ic hit læs mette.
 10.136.15. Nu þonne ic openlice ondette, þæt on þysse lare
þæt sylfe soð scineð, þæt us mæg þa gyfe syllan ecre
eadignesse & eces lifes hælo.
 10.136.17. Forþon ic þonne nu lære, cyning, þæt
þæt templ & þa wigbedo, þa ða we buton wæstmum ænigre
nytnisse halgodon, þæt we þa hraþe forleosen & fyre forbærne.
 10.136.20. Ono hwæt he þa wæs se cyning openlice
ondettende/ þam biscope & him eallum, þæt he wolde fæstlice þam
deofolgildum wiðsacan ond Cristes geleafan onfon.
 10.136.23. Mid þy þe he þa se cyning from þæm
foresprecenan biscope sohte & ahsode heora halignesse, þe heo ær
bieodon, hwa ða wigbed & þa hergas þara deofolgilda mid heora heowum,
þe heo ymbsette wæron, heo ærest aidligan & toweorpan scolde, þa
ondsworede he: Efne ic.
 10.136.27. Hwa mæg þa nu eað, þe ic longe mid dysignesse
beeode, to bysene oðerra monna gerisenlecor toweorpan, þonne ic seolfa
þurh þa snytro, þe ic from þæm soðan Gode onfeng?
 10.136.29. Ond he ða sona from him awearp þa idlan dysignesse,
þe he ær beeode, ond þone cyning bæd þæt he him wæpen sealde
& stodhors, þæt he meahte on cuman & deofolgyld toweorpan.
 10.138.2. Forðon þam biscope heora halignesse ne wæs alyfed,
þæt he moste wæpen wegan, ne elcor buton on myran ridan.
 10.138.4. Þa sealde se cyning him sweord, þæt he hine mid
gyrde; & nom his spere on hond & hleop on þæs cyninges stedan
& to þæm deofulgeldum ferde.
 10.138.6. Þa ðæt folc hine þa geseah swa gescyrpedne, þa
wendon heo þæt he teola ne wiste, ac þæt he wedde.
 10.138.7. Sona þæs þe he nealehte to þæm herige, þa
sceat he mid þy spere, þæt hit sticode fæste on þæm herige, ond
wæs swiðe gefeonde þære ongytenesse þæs soðan Godes bigonges.
 10.138.10. Ond he ða heht his geferan toweorpan ealne þone
herig & þa getimbro & forbærnan.
 10.138.12. Is seo stow gyt æteawed gu ðeara deofulgilda, noht
feor east from Eoforwicceastre begeondan Deorwentan þære ea, ond gen to
dæge is nemned Godmundingaham, þær se biscop þurh þæs soðan
Godes inbryrdnesse towearp & fordyde þa wigbed, þe he seolfa ær
gehalgode.
 11.138.17. Ða onfeng Eadwine cyning mid eallum þæm
æðelingum his þeode & mid micle folce Cristes geleafan &
fulwihte bæðe þy endlyftan geare his rices.
 11.138.19. Wæs he gefulwad from Paulini þæm biscope his
lareowe in Eoforwicceastre þy halgestan Eastordæge in Sancte Petres
cirican þæs apostoles, þa he þær hræde geweorce of treo cirican
getimbrode.
 11.138.22. Siðþan he gecristnad wæs, swylce eac his lareowe
& biscope Paulini biscopseðl forgeaf.
 11.138.23. Ond sona þæs þe he gefulwad wæs, he ongon mid
þæs biscopes lare maran cirican & hyrran stænenne timbran &
wyrcan ymb þa cirican utan, þe he ær worhte.
 11.138.26. Ac ærþon heo seo heannis þæs wealles gefylled
wære & geendad, þæt he se cyning mid arleasre cwale ofslegen
wæs, & þæt ilce geweorc his æfterfylgende Oswalde forlet to
geendianne.
 11.138.28. Of þære tide Paulinus se biscop syx ger ful,
þæt is oð endan þæs cyninges rices, þæt he mid his fultome in
þære mægðe Godes word bodode & lærde; & men gelyfdon &
gefulwade wæron, swa monige swa forteode wæron to ecum life.
 11.138.32. In þæm wæron Osfrið & Eatfrið Eadwines
suna cyninges, þa begen him wæron cende, þa he wrecca wæs, of
Cwenburghe, seo wæs Ceorles dohtor Mercna cyninges.
 11.140.1. Wæron eac gefulwade æfterfylgendre tiide oðer his
bearn, of æðelberge þære cwene acende, æþelhun &
æðelfrið his dohtor & oðer his sunu, Wuscfrea wæs haten; ac
þa ærran tu under crisman forðgeleordon & in cirican in
Eoferwiicceastre bebyrgde wæron.
 11.140.5. Swilce eac wæs gefulwad Yffe Osfriðes sunu, &
monige æðelingas þæs cynecynnes.
 11.140.7. Is þæt sægd, þætte swa micel hætu &
lust wære Cristes geleafan & fulwihtbæðes in Norðanhymbra
þeode, þætte Paulinus se biscop sumre tide com mid þone cyning &
cwene in þone cynelican tun, se wæs nemned ætgefrin; & þær
wunode syx & þrittig daga, þæt he þær þæt folc cristnade
& fulwade.
 11.140.11. & he noht elles dyde eallum þam dagum from ær
morgenne oð æfen, þon þæt cumende Cristes folc þider of eallum
tunum & stowum mid godcundre lare timbrede ond synna forlætnesse
bæðe aðwog in þæm streame þe Glene is nemned.
 11.140.15. Þes tun wæs forlæten in þara æfterfylgendra
cyninga tidum, & oðer wæs fore þæm getimbred in þære stowe
þe Mælmen hatte.
 11.140.17. Þa stowe syndon in Beornica mægðe; ac swelce eac
in Dera mægðe, þær se biscop oft mid þone cyning wæs, þæt
he fulwade þæt folc in Swalwan streame, se ligeð bi Cetreht tune.
 11.140.20. Forþon þa gena ne wæron cyrican getimbrode ne
fulwihtstowe in þæm fruman þære acendan cirican.
 11.140.21. & hwæðre in Donafelda, þær wæs cyninges
bold, het Eadwine þær cirican getimbran, ða æfter fæce þa
hæðnan mid ealle þy boðle forbærndon, from þæm eft se cyning
slegen wæs.
 11.140.24. For þæm eft þa æfteran cyningas him boðl
worhton in þæm londe, þe Loidis hatte.
 12.140.26. Hæfde Edwine se cyning swa micle wilsumnesse þæs
bigonges Cristes geleafan, þæt he eac swylce Eorpwald Eastengla cyning
Rædwaldes sunu to þon gespeon, þæt he forlet þa idelnesse
deofolgilda & þæm gerynum onfeng Cristes geleafan mid his mægðe
Eastenglum.
 12.140.30. Wæs Rædwald his fæder geo geara in Cent
gelæred in þa gerynu Cristes geleafan, ac holinga; forðon þa he eft
ham com, wæs biswicen from his wife & from sumum unrihtum lareowum,
þæt he forlet þa hluttornesse Cristes geleafan.
 12.142.2. & his þa neorran tide wæron wyrson þam
ærran, swa þætte þy þeawe þe geo þa ealdan Samaritane dydon,
þæt he wæs gesewen Criste þeowian & eac deofolgeldum.
 12.142.5. Ond he in þam ilcan herige wigbed hæfde to Cristes
onsægdnesse & oðer to deofla onsægdnisse.
 12.142.6. Se ilca here þær wunade oð Aldwulfes tide
þære ilcan mægðe cyninges; sægde he þæt he hine cneoht
weosende gesawe.
 12.142.8. Wæs he se foresprecena cyning Rædwald æðelre
gebyrde, þeah þe he on dæde unæðele wære: wæs he Tyteles
sunu; þæs fæder wæs Wuffa haten, from þæm Eastengla cyningas
forðon Wuffingas wæron nemnde.
 12.142.12. Ono hwæt Eorpwald þa se cyning nales æfter
micelre tide wæs ofslegen from sumum hæðnum men, Ricberht hatte.
 12.142.13. Þonon þa seo mægð þreo gear ful in gedwolan
wæs lifiende, oðþæt Sigeberht Eorpwaldes broðor to þam rice
feng.
 12.142.15. Se mon wæs þurh eall se cristenesta & se
gelæredesta; wæs he be þam breþer lifigendum wrecca in Gallia londe;
& þær wæs mid þam gerynum Cristes geleafan wel gelæred.
 12.142.18. Þæs geleafan he wolde his leode dælnimende
gedon, sona þæs þe he to rice feng; & his þæm godan willan wel
gefultmode Felix se biscop, se cwom of Burgundena rices dælum, þær he
wæs acenned & gehalgod.
 12.142.21. Cwom he ærest hider ofer sæ to Honorie þæm
ærcebiscope; & him sægde his willan & his lust.
 12.142.22. Þa sende he hine godcunde lare to læranne in
Eastengle.
 12.142.23. Ond he sona se arfæsta bigenga þæs gastlican
londes micelne wæstm gemette in þære þeode geleafsumra folca.
 12.142.25. & he ealle þa ðeode æfter þæm geryne his
noman from longre wenisse & ungesælignesse alysde, & to Cristes
geleafan & to soðfæstnesse weorcum & to geofum þære ecan
gesælignesse gelædde.
 12.142.28. Onfeng he biscopseðl in Dommocceastre; ond mid þy
þe he seofontyne winter in biscoplicum gerece fore wæs, & þær he
in sibbe his lif geendade.
 13.142.31. Lærde he Sanctus Paulinus se biscop eac swelce Godes
word in Lindesse, seo mægð is seo neahste in suðhealfe Humbre streames;
ligeð ut on sæ.
 13.144.1. Ond þa ærest to Drihtnes geleafan gecerde Lindcylene
ceastre gerefan, þæs noma wæs Blæcca, mid his heorode.
 13.144.3. Swelce he in þære ceastre stænenne cirican
getimbrede æðeles geweorces, þære gen to dæge mæg mon geseon
þa weallas stondan; ond þær gen æghwylce geare æteawed bið monig
wundor untrumra hælo þara ðe ða stowe mid geleafan secað.
 13.144.6. In þære seolfan cirican Sanctus Paulinus se biscop,
þa Iustus se biscop to Criste leorde , Honorium for hine to biscope
gehalgode, swa we eft heræfter gemyndgiað.
 13.144.9. Bi þisse mægðe geleafan, cwæð he Beda, me
sægde sum arwyrðe mæssepreost & abbud of Peortanea þæm ham, se
wæs Deda haten.
 13.144.11. Cwæð he, þæt him sægde sum eald weota,
þæt he wære gefulwad æt middum dæge from Paulino ðæm biscope
in Eadwinis ondweardnisse þæs cyninges, ond micel menigeo þæs folces
in Treontan streame bi Teolfinga ceastre.
 13.144.14. Sægde se ilca mon hwylc þæs biscopes heow
wære Sancte Paulinus: cwæð þæt he wære long on bodige &
hwon forðheald; hæfde blæc feax & blacne ondwlitan, medmicle nose
þynne, & wære æghwæðer ge arwyrðlic ge onderslic on to
seonne.
 13.144.18. Hæfde he him to fultome in þære godcundan
þegnunge Iacobum diacon; wæs se mon wel gelæred & æðele ge in
Criste/ ge in his cirican: se leofað usse tide.
 14.144.21. Is ðæt sægd, ðæt in ða tid swa micel sib
wære in Breotone æghwyder ymb, swa Eadwines rice wære, þeah þe an
wiif wolde mid hire nicendum cilde, heo meahte gegan buton ælcere
sceðenisse from sæ to sæ ofer eall þis ealond.
 14.144.24. Swylce eac se ilca cyning to nytnisse fond his leodum,
þæt in monegum stowum, þær hluttre wællan urnon, bi fulcuðum
strætum, þær monna færnis mæst wæs, þæt he þær gehet
for wegferendra gecelnisse stapolas asetton & þær ærene ceacas
onahon: ond þa hwæðre nænig fore his ege & his lufan hrinan
dorste ne ne wolde buton his nedþearflicre þegnunge.
 14.144.30. Swelce he hæfde swa micle heannisse in þæm
cynerice, þætte nales þæt aan þæt heo segn fore him bæron
æt gefeohte, ac eac swylce in sibbe tiide, þær he rad betweoh his hamum
oðþe be tunum mid his þegnum, ge þeah he eode, þæt him mon symle
þæt tacn beforan bær.
 14.146.4. In þære tide hæfde Honorius biscophad þæs
apostolican seðles, se wæs Bonefatius æfterfylgend.
 14.146.5. Ða he ða se papa þæt geahsode, þætte
Norðanhymbro þeod mid Eadwine heora cyninge to Cristes geleafan & to
his ondetnesse gecerred wæs þurh Paulinus godcunde lare, þa sende he
þam ilcan biscope hider pallium.
 14.146.8. & eac swylce Eadwine þæm cyninge sende
trymmendlic gewrit, & mid fæderlice lufan hine wæs onbærnende,
þæt heo in þæm geleafan soðfæstnisse, þone þe heo onfengon,
symle fæstlice astoden & aa wunedon.
 15.146.12. Betweoh ðas ðing ða wæs Iustus se ærcebiscop
gelæded to þæm heofonlecan rice þy feorðan dæge iduum
Novembrium.
 15.146.13. Ond Honorius wæs haten se ðe for hine to biscope
gecoren wæs.
 15.146.14. Se cwom to Sancte Paulini, þæt he hine halgian
sceolde; & he him togegnes ferde to Lindcylene, & in þære cirican,
þe we ær befor an sægdon, he hine þær to biscope gehalgode.
 15.146.17. Se wæs from Sancte Agustine fifta ærcebiscop
Contwara burge.
 15.146.18. Þæm biscope eac swylce se ilca papa Honorius sende
pallium & gewrit, in þæm he gesette & arædde, þætte swa
oft swa Cantwareburge biscop oðþe Eoforwicceastre of þissum life
geleorde, þætte se ðe lifigende wære þæs hades, hæfde meahte
oðerne biscop his stowe to halgianne, þær se oðer forðleorde, ðy
læs nead wære, þæt heo simle swencte wæron ofer swa longne wæg
sæs & londes to Rome for halgunge ærcebiscopes.
 16.146.26. Ono hwæt he Eadwine, æfter þon þe he
seofonteone winter Ongolþeode & Bretta in cynedome wuldorlice fore
wæs, of þæm wintrum he syx winter Cristes rice compade, þa wonn wið
hine Ceadwealla Bretta cyning.
 16.146.29. & him Penda on fultome wæs, se fromesta esne of
Mercna cyningcynne.
 16.148.1. Ond he Penda of þære tide þære ilcan þeode
Mercna rice tu & twentig wintra missenlice hlete fore wæs.
 16.148.3. Þa wæs geðeoded hefig gefeoht & micel on
Hæðfelda, & þær mon Eadwine þone cyning sloh þy feorðan
dæge iduum Octobrium.
 16.148.5. Hæfde he þa seofon & feowertig wintra: &
eall his weorod oðþe ofslegen wæs oðþe geflymed.
 16.148.6. Swylce eac in þæm ilcan gefeohte Osfrið his sunu
oðer ær him gefeoll, se hwætesta fyrdesne.
 16.148.8. Oðer his sunu for neade Eadfrið to Pendan þæm
cyninge gebeag; ond se æfter fæce from him, þa Oswald cyning wæs,
unrihtlice ofslegen wæs ofer aðas & treowe.
 16.148.11. Þære tide wæs þæt mæste wæl geworden
in Norðanhymbra ðeode & cirican.
 16.148.12. Ne wæs þæt holinga; forðon oðer þara
heretogena wæs hæðen, þe þæt gefeoht fremede, oðer wæs
þæm hædnum reðra & grimra, forðon þe he elreordig wæs.
 16.148.14. Wæs he Penda mid ealle Mercna þeode deofolgeldum
geseald, & þæs Cristnan noman wæs unwis.
 16.148.16. Ceadwealla, þeah ðe he ða ondetnesse hæfde
þæs Cristenan noman, hwæðre he wæs in his mode & on his
þeawum to þon elreordig, þæt he ne furþum wiiflice hade oðþe
þære unsceðþendan eldo cilda arede, ac he ealle mid wildeorlicre
reðnesse þurh tintrego deaðe gesealde.
 16.148.20. Ond he longre tide ealle heora mægðe mid gewede
wæs geondferende, ond on his mode þohte & þreodode, þæt wolde
eall Ongolcyn of Breotone gemærum aflyman.
 16.148.22. Ond þeah þe he Cristen beon sceolde, ne wolde he
ænige aare weotan on þære Cristnan æfestnisse, seo mid him up cumen
wæs: swa gen to dæge Bretta þeaw is, þæt heo Ongolcynnes geleafan
& æfæstnisse for noht habbað, ne him in ængum þingum ma
gemænsumigan willað þon hæðnum monnum.
 16.148.28. Ða wæs broht Eadwinis heafod þæs cyninges to
Eoforwiicceastre, & wæs eft æfter þon gedon in Sancte Petres
cirican þæs apostolis, þa he timbran ongon; ac Oswald his
æfterfylgend heo geendade, swa we ær beforan sægdon.
 16.148.31. Wæs hit geseted Sancte Gregories portice þæs
papan, from þæs discipuli he lifes word & Cristes geleafan onfeng.
 16.148.34. Ða æfter Eadwinis slege & for þisse tida
frecelnisse Sanctus Paulinus se biscop genom mid hine æðelbyrge þa
cwene, þa he ær brohte, & in scipgefære hwearf eft to Cent.
 16.150.2. Wæs Bassa heora latteow Eadwines cyninges þegn se
fromesta.
 16.150.3. Ond hi from Honorie þæm ærcebiscope &
Eadbalde þam cyninge swiðe arweorðlice onfongne wæron.
 16.150.5. Hæfdon heo swylce mid him Eanflæde Eadwines dohtor
& Wuscfrean his sunu, swylce eac Yffe his suna sunu Osfriðes, ða eft
seo modor æfter þon onsende for Eadbaldes ege & Oswaldes þara
cyninga in Gallia rice to fedanne Dægbrehte þæm cyninge, se wæs hire
freond.
 16.150.9. & heo begen þær in cildhade forðferdon, &
æfter gerisenre are heora æðelnisse & unscæððednisse in
cirican bebyrgde wæron.
 16.150.11. Brohte heo seo cwen mid heo monig deorwyrðe fatu
Eadwines þæs cyninges, mid þæm wæs sum micel gylden Cristes mæl
& gylden cælic gehalgad to wigbedes þenunge, þa nu gen oð þis
mæg mon sceawigan gehealden in Contwara cirican.
 16.150.15. In þa tid seo cirice æt Hrofesceastre wæs
heordeleas, forðon Romanus þære ceastre biscop wæs from Iusto
þæm ærcebiscope to ærendwrecan onsended to Honorie þam papan,
& wearð bisenced in sæs yðum.
 16.150.18. Ond þurh þæt se foresprecena biscop Sanctus
Paulinus þære cirican scire onfeng mid þæs arcebiscopes hæse &
Eadboldes þæs cyninges; & he ða hæfde, oðþæt he on his
tide þæt heofonlice rice gestah mid wæstme his þæs wundurlican
gewinnes.
 16.150.22. On þære cyricean he forlet his pallium þæt he
onfeng fram þam Romaniscan papan, & his lichama on sibbe resteð.
 16.150.23. Forlet he on his cyricean æt Eoforwicceastre Iacobum
þone diacon; wæs þæt cyriclic wer & halig on eallum þingum:
& he syððan langre tide on þære cyricean wæs wuniende, &
micle hloþe þurh his lare & fullwihte þam ealdan feonde afyrde.
 16.150.27. & þone tun, þe he oftust oneardode, wel neah
Cetrehtan geen to dæge mon his naman cneodeð.
 16.150.29. & forþon þe he wæs on cyricsonge se
gelæredesta, & æfter fæce sibbe tide comon eft on Norðanhymbra
mægðe & þæt rim weox þara leafsumra, þæt he wæs monigra
magister ciriclices sanges æfter Romane þeawe & Cantwara.
 16.152.1. & he þa eald & dagana full, þæt is godra
dæda, æfter þon þe halige writu sprecað, þet he fædera weg
wæs fylgende.
 16.152.4. Her endaþ seo æftre boc.

Bede 3
B9.6.5.
Bede, History of the English Church and Nation, Book 3: Miller 1890-98, 152-252.



 0.152.5. <foreign>TERTIUS INCIPIT ECCLESIASTICAE HYSTORIAE GENTIS ANGLORUM
LIBER</foreign>.
 1.152.5. Ða Eadwine þa wæs on þam gefeohte ofslegen, þa
feng to Dera rice his fæderan sunu ælfrices, Osric wæs haten, forþon
of þære mægþe he Eadwine hæfde cneorisse & rices fruman.
 1.152.7. Se Osric þurh Sancte Paulines lare þæs bisceopes
mid þam gerynum Cristes geleafan gelæred wæs.
 1.152.9. Þonne feng to Beornica rice æþelfriþes sunu,
Eanfrið wæs haten, forþon he wæs þare mægþe cyningcynnes.
 1.152.11. In þas twa mægþa Norþanhymbra ðeod iu geara
todæled wæs.
 1.152.12. & eallre þære tide þe Eadwine cyning wæs,
þæt he se Eanfrið æþelfriþes sunu mid micelre æþelinga
geogeðe ge mid Scottum ge mid Pehtum wracodon; & þær þurh Scotta
lare Cristes geleafan onfengon, & gefullade wæron.
 1.152.15. & sona þæs þe Eadwine ofslegen wæs hiora
feond, þa hwurfan hi ham to hiora eðle; & se Eanfrið feng to Beornica
rice.
 1.152.17. Ono hwæt æghwæþer þara cyninga, syðþan
hi rice hæfdon, forletan þa geryno þæs heofonlican rices mid þam hi
gehalgede wæron, & eft hwurfan to þam ealdan unsyfernessum
deofolgylda.
 1.152.20. & hi sylfe þurh þæt forluran.
 1.152.21. & sona butan yldincge æghwæþerne Cadwalla
Bretta cyning mid arleasre hond, ac hwæðre mid rihte wrace heo kwealde.
 1.152.22. Ond ærest þy neahstan sumera in municep þære
byrig on ungearone þone Osric mid his fyrd becwom, & hine mid ealle his
weorode adilgade.
 1.154.1. Æfter þon he eall ger onwalg Norþanhymbra
mægðe ahte, nales swa swa sigefæst cyning, ac swa swa leodhata,
þæt he grimsigende forleas ond heo on gelicnesse þæs traiscan
wæles wundade.
 1.154.4. Þa æt nyhstan cwom Eanfrið buton geþeahte, his
weotena twelfa sum, to him, þæt he wolde sibbe & friðes wilnian.
 1.154.6. Þone he ða gelice hlete geniðrade & ofslog.
 1.154.6. Þis ungesælige gear & þæt godlease gen to
dæge laðe wunað, ge fore fleame cyninga from Cristes geleafan & eft
to deofolgyldum cerdon, ge for wedenheortnisse þæs leodhatan Bretta
cyninges.
 1.154.9. Forðon þæt þa eallum gemænelice licade, þe
ðara cyninga tiide teledon, þæt heo onweg adyde þa gemynd þara
treowleasra cyninga; ond þæt ilce ger to þæs æfterfylgendan
cyninges rice teledon, þæt is, Gode þæs leofan weres Oswaldes.
 1.154.13. Þa wæs æfter Eanfriðes slege his broðor,
þæt he cwom Oswald mid medmicle weorode ac mid Cristes geleafan getrymede,
þæt he þone manfullan Bretta cyning mid his unmætum weorode, þæm
he gealp, þæt him nowiht wiðstandan meahte, ofslog & acwealde in
þære stowe, þe Ongle nemnað Denises burna.
 1.154.19. Is seo stow gen to dæge æteawed & is in micelre
arwyrðnesse hæfd, þær se Oswald to þissum gefeohte cwom, &
þær þæt halige tacn Cristes rode arærde & his cneo begde &
God wæs biddende, þæt he in swa micelre nedþearfnisse his bigengum
mid heofonlice fultome gehulpe.
 1.154.23. Is þæt sægd, þæt he þæt Cristæs
mæl hraðe weorce geworhte & seað adulfe, in þæm hit stondan
scolde.
 1.154.24. Ond he se cyning seolf wæs wallende in his geleafan;
& þæt Cristes mæl genom & in þone seað sette & mid his
hondum bæm hit heold & hæfde, oð þæt his þegnas mid moldan
hit bestryðed hæfdon & gefæstnadan.
 1.154.28. Ond þa hit aræred wæs, þæt he his stefne up
ahof & cleopode to him eallum þæm weorode & cwæð: Uton ealle
began usser cneo & gemænelice biddan þone ælmihtigan God þone
lifiendan & þone soðan, þæt he us eac from þæm oferhygdigan
feonde & þæm reðan mid his miltsunge gescylde: forðon he wat
þæt we rihtlice winnað for hælo usse þeode.
 1.154.33. Þa dydon heo ealle swa he heht.
 1.154.34. & sona on morne, swa hit dagian ongan, þæt he
for on þone here þe him togegnes gesomnad wæs, & æfter geearnunge
his geleafan þæt heo heora feond oferswiðdon & sige ahton.
 1.156.2. In þære gebedstowe æfter þon monig mægen
& hælo tacen gefremed wæron to tacnunge & to gemynde þæs
cyninges geleafan.
 1.156.4. Ond monige gen to dæge of þæm treo þæs halgan
Cristes mæles sponas & scefþon neomað; & þa in wæter
sendað, & þæt wæter on adlige men oððe on neat stregdað
oðþe drincan syllað; & heo sona hælo onfoð.
 1.156.8. Is seo stow on Englisc genemned Heofenfeld.
 1.156.8. Wæs geo geara swa nemned fore tacnunge ðæra
toweardan wundra, forðon þe þær þæt heofonlice sigebeacen
aræred beon scolde, & þær heofonlic sige þam cinge seald wæs,
& þær gen to dæge heofonlic wundor mærsode beoð.
 1.156.13. Nis forðon ungerisne, þæt we aan mægen &
aan wundor of monegum asecgan, þe æt þissum halgan Cristes mæle
geworden wæs.
 1.156.15. Wæs sum Godes þeow of þæm broðrum þære
cirican æt Agostaldes ea, þæs noma wæs Bothelm.
 1.156.16. Þa eode he sume neahte on ise unwærlice, þa
gefeoll he semniga on his earm ufan, & þone swiðe geðræste &
gebræc, & mid þa hefignesse þæs gebrocenan earmes swiðe
geswenced wæs, swa þæt he for þy sare ne meahte furðon his hond to
muðe gedon.
 1.156.20. Ða gehyrde he sumne þara broðra sprecan, þæt
he wolde feran to þæm halgan Cristes mæle, þa bæd he hine þæt
he him þæs arwyrðan treos hwylcnehwego dæl brohte, þonne he eft ham
come; cwæð þæt he gelyfde, þæt he þurh þæt meahte hælo
onfon þurh Drihtnes gife.
 1.156.24. Þa eode se broðor, swa swa he hine bæd, & cwom
eft on æfenne ham.
 1.156.25. Þa broðor æt beode sæton.
 1.156.26. Þa brohte him sumne dæl ealdes meoses, þe on þam
halgan treo aweaxen wæs.
 1.156.27. Þa sæt he æt beode, næfde þa æt honda
hwær þæt brohte lac gehealdan scolde; sende þa in his bosm.
 1.156.29. Þa he to reste eode, þa forget he þæt he in
oðere stowe þæt geheolde; let forð in his bosme awunian.
 1.156.30. Þa wæs æt middre neahte, þa he wæccende
wæs, þa ne wiste he hwæt he gefelde cealdes æt his sidan licgan;
cunnode/ þa mid his hond & sohte, hwæt þæt wære.
 1.158.1. Þa gemette he his earm & his hond swa hale & swa
gesunde, swa him næfre bryce ne daro gedon wære.
 2.158.3. Ono ða se ilca cyning Oswald sona, þæs þe he rice
onfeng, lufade & wilnade, þætte eall seo þeod, þe he fore wæs,
mid þære gife þæs cristnan geleafan gelæred wære, þæs
geleafan ondcyðnesse he swiðust onfeng in sigegefeohtum ellreordra cynna.
 2.158.6. Þa sende he to Scotta aldormonnum ærendwrecan,
betweoh þa ðe he longre tide wræcca wæs, & from þæm he
fulwihtes geryno onfeng mid his þegnum, þe him mid wæron: bæd he
þæt heo him biscop onsende, þæs lare & þegnunge Ongolþeode,
þe rehte, þæs Drihtenlecan geleafan gife leornade & þæm geryne
onfenge fulwihtes bæðes.
 2.158.11. & heo him lustlice tigðodon & him biscop
sendon; Aidan wæs haten micelre monþwærnesse & arfæstnisse &
gemetfæstnisse monn; & he hæfde Godes ellenwodnisse & his lufan
micle.
 2.158.15. Þa he ða se biscop to þæm cyninge cwom, þa
sealde he him stowe & biscopseðl in Lindesfarena ea, þær he seolfa
bæd & wilnade.
 2.158.16. Ond he se cyning his monungum eaðmodlice & lustlice
in eallum þingum hyrsum wæs; & he Cristes cirican in his rice
geornlice timbrede & rærde.
 2.158.19. & oft fægre wæfersyne gelomp, þa se biscop
codcunde lare lærde se ðe Englisc fullice ne cuðe, þæt he se cyning
seolfa, se ðe Scyttisc fullice geleornad hæfde, his aldormonnum & his
þegnum þære heofonlecan lare wæs walhstod geworden.
 2.158.22. Of þære tide monige cwoman dæghwamlice of Scotta
lande on Breotone; & on þam mægþum Angelþeoðe, þe Oswald ofer
cyning wæs, mid micelre willsumnesse Cristes geleafan bodedon &
lærdon.
 2.158.25. & þa þe sacerdhades wæron, him fulwihte
þenedon.
 2.158.26. Þa wæron eac cyricean timbrede on monegum stowum,
& þider gefeonde coman Angelcynnes folc Godes word to gehyranne, þe hi
bodedon & lærdon.
 2.158.28. & se cyning him gef & sealde æhte & land
mynster to timbrianne; & Scottas lærdon geonge & ealde on
reogollicne þeodscipe, forþon þe þæt munecas wæron, þa þe
hider coman to læranne.
 2.158.31. Wæs eac munuc se ylca bysceop Aidan; wæs he sended
of þam ealande & of þam mynstre þe Hii is nemned.
 2.160.2. Þæt mynster on eallum Norðscottum & eallum
Peohta mynstrum mycelre tide ealldordom & heanesse onfeng; ac hwæþere
hit Peohtas sealdan & geafon Scotta munucum, forþon þe hi ær þurh
heora lare Cristes geleafan onfengon.
 3.160.6. Ono fram þyssum ealande & fram þyssa munuca
framscype to lærenne Cristes geleafan Angelþeode wæs sended Aidan se
bisceop.
 3.160.8. & he þa se bisceop, betwih oþre lare mannum to
lyfigeanne, þa fægerestan bysene his gingrum forlet, þæt he wæs
micelre forhæfdnesse & forwyrnednesse lifes.
 3.160.10. & þæt swiðust his lare gefultumade, þæt
he oðre wisan ne lyfede nemne swa he lærde.
 3.160.11. Forðon he nowiht sohte ne ne lufade ða ðe þyses
middangeardes wæron; ac eall þa woruldgod þa þe him fram cyningum
& fram weligum mannum þysse worulde gegyfene wæron, sona he þa
gifeonde þearfum rehte & sealde, þa þe him togenes coman.
 3.160.16. Ferde he geond eall ge þurh mynsterstowe ge þurh
folcstowe, ne he on horses hricge cuman wolde, nemne hwilc mare nyd abædde,
ac he hit eall his fotum geeode.
 3.160.18. & swa hwær swa he com, & swa hwilce swa he
geseah, swa rice swa heane, ðonne cyrde he to þam.
 3.160.19. Gif hi ungeleafsume wæron, þonne laþode he hi
þæt hi onfengan þam geryne Cristes geleafan; oððe gif hi geleafsume
wæron, þæt he þa strangede & trymede þæt hi fæstlice on
hiora geleafan awunaden, & to ælmessum & to godra dæda
fylignessum hi awehte ge mid wordum ge mid dædum.
 3.160.25. & swa swiðe his lif tosced fram ussa tida
aswundenesse, þætte eall, þa þe mid hine eodan, ge bescorene ge
læwede, on swa hwilcre stowe swa hi coman, þæt hi sceoldan oððe
sealmas leornian oððe oþre halige gewrito oððe þridde on halgum
gebedum standan.
 3.162.3. Þis wæs his dæghwamlice weorc & eallra þara,
þe mid hine wæron.
 3.162.4. & gif þæt wæs, þæt hwæþere seldon
gelomp, þæt he to cyninges simble gelaþad wære, eode he in mid ane
oððe mid twam his preosta, & þæs ðe hi hwon gereorde wæron,
aras he hraðe, & ut eode to his gebede oððe to leornianne mid his
geferum.
 3.162.8. Mid þyses halgan mannes bysenum wæron getrymede on
þa tid gehwilce æfeste ge wæpnedmen ge wimmen, þæt hi him to
gewunan genaman, þæt heo þurh eall ger buton fiftig neahta ofer Eastron,
þæt heo þy feorðan wicdæge & þy syxtan fæston to nones.
 3.162.12. Ond he þes biscop ricum monnum no for are ne for ege
næfre forswigian nolde, gif heo on hwon agylton, ac he mid heardre þrea
hiæ onspræc & heo gebette.
 3.162.14. Ond nænigum ricum men æfre ænig feoh sellan
wolde, nemne mete & swæsendo þæm þe hine sohton; ac he ma ða
gife & þa feoh þe him rice men sealdon, oðþe þearfum to are
gedælde oðþe to alysnesse gesealde þara monna, þe unrihtlice bebohte
wæron.
 3.162.18. Ond he monigne þara, þe he mid weorþe alysde, him
to discipulum genom, & þa æfter fæce to sacerhade mid his
geornnisse getyde & gelærde.
 3.162.21. Secgað men, þa Oswald se cyning of Scotta ealonde
biscopes bede, se ðe him meahte & his þeode Cristes geleafan &
fulwihte þegnian & healdan, þa wæs him sended ærest oðer biscop
reðes modes monn.
 3.162.24. Mid þy he ða sum fæc Ongolþeode bodade &
lærde, & he nowiht fromade in his lare, ne hine þæt folc lustlice
geheran wolde, þa hwearf he eft in his eðel on Scottas & in gemote
heora weotena sægde, þæt he nowiht fromian meahte in his lare þære
þeode þe he sended wæs; forðon þa men wæron unatemedlice &
heardes modes & elreordes.
 3.162.29. Ond heo þa hæfdon, þæs þe men sægdon, in
þæm gemote micle smeaunge & geþeahte, hwæt him to donne wære.
 3.162.31. Ond cwædon, þæt him leofre wære & heo
wilnadon, þæt heo þære þeode hælo beon meahten, þe heo bedene
wæron; ond swiðe on þon sargedon, þæt heo þam lareowe onfon ne
woldon, þe heo him to sendon.
 3.164.2. Þa sæt he Aidan in þæm gemote betweoh oðrum
weotum; cwæð to þam biscope, siðþan he his word gehyrde: Me
þynceð, broðor, cwæð he, þæt þu wære þæm
ungelærdum monnum heardra, þonne hit riht wære, in þinre lare, ond
þæt þu him ærest ne woldest æfter þæm apostolican þeodscype
meolc drincan þære hnescan lare, oðþæt heo styccemælum aafedde
mid þy Godes worde þa þa fulfremedan & þa heredan Godes beboda
onfon meahte.
 3.164.9. Ða heo þa weotan þas word gehyrdon, þa gecerdon
heo heora eagan & heora ondwlitan ealle to him, & geornlice smeadon
hwæt he cwæde.
 3.164.11. Ond þa heora ealra dome gedemed wæs, þæt he
wære biscophade wyrðe, & þæt he to lareowe sended wære
Ongolcynne/, se ðe mid Godes gife swylc gescead funde in heora geþeahte.
 3.164.13. & heo swa dydon: hine to biscope gehalgedon, ond
Oswalde þam cyninge heora freonde to lareowe onsendan.
 3.164.15. Þa he þa biscophade onfongen hæfde, swa swa he
ær mid þa metgunge þæs gesceades funden hæfde, swa he æfter
fæce mid oðrum gastlicum mægenum gefrætwed æteawde.
 4.164.19. Ono mid ðysses biscopes lare Oswald mid Ongolþeode,
þe he ofer cyning wæs, gelæred wæs, þætte nales þæt an
þæt he æt him geleornade, þæt he þa uplican ricu gehyhte heofona
to onfonne, ac swelce eac eorðlico rico ma þonne ænig his eldrena from
þæm ilcan Gode onfenge, þe heofon & eorþan gescop.
 4.164.23. Forðon eall Breotone cyn & mægðe, þa seondon
on feower gereordo todæled, þæt is Bretta & Peohta & Scotta
& Ongla, in onwald onfeng.
 4.164.25. Ond þeah þe he mid þa heanisse þæs eorðlican
rices swa ahefen wære, nohte þon læs he, þæt is wundor to
cweðanne, þearfum & elþeodigum symle eaðmod & fremsum &
rummod wæs.
 4.164.29. Secgað men, þæt þæt gelumpe in sume tid þy
halgan Eastordæge, þæt he mid þy foresprecenan biscope sæte æt
his undernswæsendum & him wæs hefen beod to; & þær stod
micel seolfren disc on, ond se wæs mid cynelicum mettum gefylled.
 4.166.1. Ond se biscop nom hlaf & bletsode & þæm
cyninge sealde.
 4.166.2. Þa eode semninga his þegna sum inn, þæm he
hæfde beboden þæt he scolde þearfena & earmra monna ærendo
wreccan, ondsægde þæm cyninge þæt æghwonan cwome micel menigeo
þearfena, þæt se weorðig ful sæte & hine ælmessan bædon.
 4.166.6. Þa het se cyning sona neoman þone mete & þa
swæsendo, þe him to aseted wæs, & beran þam þearfum; & eac
bebead, þæt mon þone disc tobræce to styccum & þæm þearfum
gedælde.
 4.166.8. Þa se biscop þæt þa geseah, þe him big sæt,
þa licode him seo arfæste dæd þæs cyninges; genom hine þa big
þære swiðran honda & cyste, & þus cwæð: Ne forealdige
þeos hond æfre.
 4.166.11. Þæt eac swa æfter þam willan his bletsunge
geworden wæs.
 4.166.12. Forðon, þa hine mon eft in gefeohte slog, þa gelomp
þætte him mon aheow þa hond mid þy earme of þæm lichoman; &
nu gena oð þis ungebrosnade wuniað.
 4.166.14. Brohte heo mon in þa cynelecan burg, þe mon nemneð
Bebbanburg; & þær in seolfrene cyste arweorðlice gehealdene syndon.
 4.166.16. Swelce eac mid þisses cyninges geornisse þa twa
mægða Norðhymbra, Dere & Beornice, þa ðe oð þæt him
betweoh ungeþwære & ungesibbe wæron, in ane sibbe & in an folc
geteoh & geþwærade.
 4.166.19. Wæs he Oswald Eadwines nefa þæs æðelan
cyninges, his sweostor sunu.
 4.166.20. Wæs þæt þæs wyrðe þæt swa æðele
foregenga swylcne yrfeweard his æfæstnisse & his rices hæfde of
his seolfes mægsibbe.
 5.166.23. Ðære tide ða Westseaxna þeod mid Cynegelse heora
cyninge Cristes geleafan onfengon.
 5.166.24. Bodade him & lærde Godes word Birinus biscop, se
mid Honorius geþeahte þæs papan cwom in Breotone.
 5.166.25. Gehet he him, þæt he wolde in þam fyrrestum
dælum Ongolcynnes, þær nænig lar ær cwom, þa sæd sawan
þæs halgan geleafan.
 5.166.27. Þa het se papa hine to biscope gehalgian, & hine on
Breotone sende.
 5.166.28. Þa com he ærest upp in Westseaxum & heo þær
hæðne gemette, þa ðuhte him nyttre & betre, þæt he ðær
Godes word bodade & lærde, þonne he fyrr in Breotone feran scolde.
 5.166.31. Ond he ða swa dyde: lærde þær godcunde lare
& þone cyning to Cristes geleafan gecerde, & hine gecristnade, &
hine eft æfter fæce mid fulwihtes bæðe aþwoh mid his þeode
Westseaxum.
 5.168.2. Þa gelomp in seolfan tid, þa mon þone cyning
fulwade, ðæt þær wæs se halgesta & se sigefæsta cyning
Norðanhymbra Oswald ondweard.
 5.168.4. Hæfde he his dohtor him to wife beweddad.
 5.168.5. Þa onfeng he him & nom æt fulwihte bæðe
& æt þæs biscopes honda þære godcundan þegnunge him to
godsuna.
 5.168.7. Ða sealdon & gefon þa cyningas begen þæm
biscope eardungstowe & biscopseðl on Dorcotceastre.
 5.168.8. Ond he þær se biscop Gode lifde & circan worhte
& halgade; & mid his arfæste gewinne monig folc to Drihtne gecerde.
 5.168.10. Ond he þær his dagas geendade & to Drihtne
ferde, & in þære ilcan ceastre bebyrged wæs.
 5.168.11. Ond eft æfter monegum gearum Hædde biscop heht his
lichoman upadon & lædan to Wintaceastre, & in cirican þara eadigra
apostola Petrus & Paulus arwyrðlice geseted is.
 5.168.15. Æfter þissum þa forðferde Cynegils se cyning,
& his sunu Cænwalh feng to his rice.
 5.168.16. Se wiðsoc, þæt he geleafan onfenge & þæm
geryne þæs heofonlican cyninges; ond sona æfter medmiclum fæce þa
meaht forleas þæs eorðlican rices.
 5.168.18. Forlet he an, Pendan swustor, þa he hæfde ær him
to wife broht, nom him oðer wiif.
 5.168.20. Þa teah Penda hine fyrd on & here, & hine his
rices benom.
 5.168.21. Ða gewat he to Eastengla cyninge, se wæs Anna
haten.
 5.168.21. Mid þon he þreo ger wæs wrecca, & he þær
onget soðfæstnisse geleafan & onfeng & gefulwad wæs.
 5.168.23. Forðon þe se cyning, þe he mid wrecca wæs,
wæs god wæpnedmon & goodes tudres & haliges gesælig, swa we
æft hereæfter ongitan magon.
 5.168.26. Mid þy þe he eft Cænwalh on his rice geseted
wæs, þa com in Westseaxe sum biscop of Ibernia Scotta ealonde, þæs
noma wæs ægelberht.
 5.168.28. Wæs he Gallia cynnes; ac for leornunge haligra
gewreota he wæs micelre tide in Ibernia Scotta ealonde wuniende.
 5.168.30. Ond he þa wilsumlice hine geþeodde to þæm
cyninge & hine godcunde lare lærde.
 5.168.31. Þa he þa se cyning his gelærednesse & his
geornfulnisse geseah, bæd he hine, þæt he gewunade in his þeode &
heora biscop wære: & he him wolde arlic biscopseðl gesceawian.
 5.168.33. Ond he his benum geþafode; & he monig ger þære
ilcan þeode on biscoplicum onwealde fore wæs.
 5.168.35. Ða æt nehstan se cyning, se ðe Seaxna gereorde an
cuðe, wæs aðroten his elreordre spræce: aspon þa in Westseaxe
oðerne biscop, se ðe his gereorde cuðe: se wæs Wine haten, & se
wæs in Gallia rice gehalgod.
 5.170.3. Ond he þa todælde in twa biscopscire Westseaxna
mægðe, ond þæm Wine gesealde biscopseðl in Wintaceastre.
 5.170.5. Þa wæs ægelberht swiðe abolgen, forþon se
cyning buton his geþeahte swa dyde; gewat þa of Breotone & hwearf eft
in his agene leode in Gallia rice.
 5.170.7. Ond þær he onfeng his agenre ceastre bisscopscire,
Parisiace hatte; & he þær ald & godra dæda ful forðferde.
 5.170.9. Ða wæs æfter noht monegum gearum æfter his
onweggewitenesse of Breotone, þætte Wine wæs adrifen from þæm
ilcan cyninge of his biscopseðle.
 5.170.11. Þa gewat he to Wulfhere Mercna cyninge; ond mid feo
gebohte æt him þæt biscopseðl æt Lundenceastre, & his biscop
wæs oð his daga ende.
 5.170.13. Ond swa Westseaxna mægð micelre tide wæs buton
biscope.
 5.170.15. Þære seolfan tide þa eac swelce se foresprecena
cyning þære þeode mid þam hefigestum wonungum his rices gelomlice from
his feondum swenced wæs.
 5.170.17. Ða cwom him æt nehstan to gemynde, þæt hine
ær his getreowleasnis of his rice adraf, ond eft, þa he Cristes geleafan
onget, þæt he his rice onfeng.
 5.170.19. & þa eac ongeat þæt he hæfde on þweorh
gedon, þætte seo mægð wæs buton bisscoPe, & þæt heo
ætgædre mid þy godcundan fultome forlæten wæs.
 5.170.21. Forðon he þa sende ærendwracan in Gallia rice to
ægelberhte þæm biscope, & mid eaðmodre þingunge & bene hine
bæd, þæt he hwurfe to þæm biscopseðle his þeode.
 5.170.24. Þa ladode he hine & cwæð, þæt he ne
meahte hider cuman, forðon he onfongen hæfde his agenre ceastre
bisscopscire.
 5.170.26. Ond hwæðre for his geornlicum benum, þæt he him
