fultom sohte, ond he him sende to Leutherium, mæssepreost his nefan.
 5.170.28. Cwæð þæt he þone meahte, gif he wolde, him to
biscope gehadigan, & he hine þæs wyrðne wisse on his lifes
geearnungum.
 5.170.29. Ond sona wæs from þæm cyninge, & from eallum
his leodum arwyrðlice onfongen.
 5.170.31. Ond þa bædon Theodorum þone þe þa wæs
ærcebiscop Contwareburge cirican, þæt he hine to biscope gehalgode.
 5.170.32. Ond he þa swa dyde; gehalgode hine in þære ilcan
ceastre; ond he ana æfter alles seonoðes dome monig ger þone biscophad
mid micle gerece heold & ræhte Westseaxna þeode.
 6.172.3. Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & feowertig wintra
from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þætte Eadbald Contwara cyning leorde of
þissum life; ond Erconberht his sunu feng to his rice, & þæt
eaðlice heold & steorde feower & twentig wintra & sumne monað.
 6.172.6. Þes cyning ærest Ongolcyninga in eallum his rice he
heht deofolgild toweorpan & fæstlice forlætan; ond swelce eac mid his
ealdorlicnesse bebead, þæt feowertiglice fæsten healden beon ær
Eastrum bi witerædenne.
 6.172.9. Þæs cyninges dohtor Ercongotæ wæs micelra
mægena fæmne, swa þæt swa æðelum aldre geras.
 6.172.11. Wæs heo seo fæmne Drihtne þeowiende in þæm
mynstre, þe in Fronclonde wæs getimbred from þære æðelan
abbudessan, þe Fara hatte, in þære stowe þe cweden is in Briige.
 6.172.14. Forðon in þa tid þa get ne wæron monig mynster
getimbred in Ongolþeode, ond forðon monige gewunedon of Breotone for
intingan munuclifes secan Froncna mynster & Gallia.
 6.172.16. Swelce eac cyningas & rice men sendon heora dohtor
þider to læranne & to geþeodenne þæm heofonlican brydguman, ond
swiþust in þissum mynstrum in Briige & in Caale & in Andelegum.
 6.172.19. Betweoh þa wæs Sæðryð Annan wiifes dohtor
Eastengla cyninges, & þæs ylcan cyninges gecyndelice dohtor
æðelberg.
 6.172.21. Æghwæðer heora wæs elþeodig þær, &
hwæðre for heora lifes geearnunge geþungon, þæt heo buu wæron
abbudissan in Briige þam mynstre.
 6.172.23. Þæs ilcan cyninges seo yldre dohtor Sæburg wæs
Erconberhtes wiif Contwara cyninges; hæfde heo dohtor þa Ercongotan, bi
ðære we nu syndon sprecende.
 6.172.26. Þisse fæmnan Gode gehalgodre monig weorc gastlicra
mægena & monig tacen heofonlicra wundra from þæm bigengum þære
stowe gewuniað oð þisne ondweardan dæg sægd beon.
 6.172.28. Ac we nu sculon hrædlice hwæthwugu be hire
forðfore anre secgan, hu heo þæt heofonlice rice gesohte.
 6.172.30. Ona þa ðæm dæge nealæhte hire gecegnesse of
þissum life, þa ongon heo ymbgongan þa hus þyses mynstres þara
untrumra Cristes þeowna, & swiðust þa þe gelyfdre eldo wæron,
oðþe in gecorenisse heora þeowa mærran & betran wæron.
 6.174.3. Ond heo ealle þa eaðmodlice hire gebeodo bæd, &
him cyðde & sægde, þæt heo geleornade on onwrignesse, þæt
hire endedæg & hire forðfore wære swiðe neah.
 6.174.5. Sægde heo him, þæt seo onwrigenis þyslic
wære; cwæð, þæt heo gesege micelne þreat hwittra monna &
fægerra in þæt ilce mynster ingongan, ond þæt heo þa hy frugne,
hwæt heo sohten oððe hwæt heo þider wolden.
 6.174.9. Ondswaredon hy & cwædon, þæt heo to þon
þider sende wæron, þæt heo sceolden þæt gyldne mynet mid him
geneoman, þætte þider of Cent cwom.
 6.174.11. Þa wæs in þære seolfan nihte þæm
ytmæstan dæle, þæt is þa hit dagian ongon, þæt heo þa
þeostru þisses ondweardan middangeardes oferstag, & to þæm uplecan
leohte leorde heofona rices.
 6.174.14. Ond monige þara broðra þæs ylcan mynstres þara
þe in oðrum husum wæron, sægdon, þæt heo swutolice engla song
geherdon, ge eac sweg gehyrdon swa swa micelre mengu in þæt mynster
gongan.
 6.174.17. Ond heo sona arison & ut eodon; woldon gewitan
hwæt þæt wære.
 6.174.18. Þa gesegon heo micel leoht heofonlic þær cuman.
 6.174.19. Þæt leoht þa halgan sawle from þæm bendum
þæs lichoman onlesde, & to ðæm ecan gefean þæs heofonlican
eðles gelædde.
 6.174.21. Ætecton heo eac & sægdon oðero wundro, þa
ðe godcundlic æteawed wæron in þæm ilcan mynstre, þa ðe nu to
long to secgenne syndon.
 6.174.23. Þa wæs bebyrged se lichoma þære arwyrðan
fæmnan & þære Cristes bryde in Sancte Stephanes cirican þæs
ærestan & þæs eadgan martires.
 6.174.25. Ða þuhte þam broðrum þy þriddan dæge,
þæs þe heo bebyrged wæs, þæt heo wolden þone stan, þe seo
byrgen mid bewrigen wæs, hear & gerisenlicor in þære ilcan stowe
gesettan.
 6.174.28. Þa hy þa hine onweg dydon, þa cwom of inneweardre
þære byrgenne swa micel swetnisse stenc, þætte eallum þam higum
þuhte, þe þær ætstodon, swa swa mon hordærn ontynde ðe balsami
& þara deorwyrðestena wyrta & þara swetestena þara þe in
middangearde wæron.
 6.174.33. Swelce eac hire modrige æðelberg Gode seo leofe, be
þære we ær sægdon, þæt wuldor hire ecre clænnisse &
mægðhades in micelre forhæfdnesse hire lichoman geheold.
 6.176.2. Hwylc hire mægen wære, ma æfter hire deaðe
gecyðed wæs.
 6.176.3. Þa heo abbudesse wæs, ongon heo on hire mynstre
cirican timbran in are ealra þara haligra apostola, in þære heo wilnade
þæt hire lichoma bebyrged wære.
 6.176.6. Ac þa ðæt weorc þære cirican huhugu healf
wæs geworht, þa wæs heo mid deaðe forgripen, ær heo hit geendian
moste; & in þære seolfan stowe þære cirican, þær heo
wilnade, bebyrged wæs.
 6.176.8. Þa wæs æfter hire deaðe, þæt þa broðor
oðerra weorca swiður gemdon, & þisse cirican timbro forlæton
seofon gear.
 6.176.10. Ða þa seofon ger gefylled wæron, þa gesetton heo
fæstlice fore unmætnisse þæs gewinnes, þæt heo eallinga forlete
þa getimbro þisse cirican.
 6.176.12. & þære abbuddyssan ban upp adydan of þære
stowe, & on oþre cyricean, þe fullice getimbred & gehalgod wære,
gesetton.
 6.176.14. Ond heo þa ontyndon hire byrgenne, ond hire lichoman
gemetton swa ungewemmedne ond swa gesundne, swa swa heo wæs from gebrosnunge
lichomlicre wilnunge clæne & unwemme.
 6.176.17. Ond heo þa eft þone lichoman onþwogon & mid
oðre hrægle gegyredon, & hine gesetton in cirican þæs eadigan
martires Sancte Stephanus.
 6.176.19. Þære abbudessan gemynddæg oð þas tid in
þære stowe in miclum wuldre weorðad is, þy dæge þe nemned is
<foreign>Nonarum Iuliarum</foreign>.
 7.176.22. Hæfde Oswald se cristnesta cyning Norðanhymbra nigon
gear rice, togeteledum þy geare þe seo wildeorlice arleasnis Bretta
cyninges & seo awegoncernis from Cristes geleafan Ongelcyninga
onscuniendlic wæs, swa swa we ær beforan sægdon.
 7.176.25. Þa se ryne þyssa geara gefylled wæs, slog mon
Oswald.
 7.176.26. Wæs hefig gefeoht & micel gefremed from þæm
ilcan hæðnan cyninge & þære hæðnan þeode Mercna, from
þæm his foregenga eac Eadwine ofslegen wæs, in þære stowe þe
nemned is Maserfeld.
 7.176.29. Hæfde he Oswald lichomlicre yldo seofon & þritig
wintra, þa hine mon slog þy fiftan dæge Agustus monðes.
 7.178.1. Hwelc þæs cyninges geleafa & modes wilsumnis in
God wære, þæt æfter his deaðe mid mægena wundrum wæs
gecyðed.
 7.178.2. Forðon in þære stowe, þe he for his eðle mid
his leodum compade & from þæm hæðnum ofslegen wæs, oð
þeosne ondweardan dæg þæt þær hælo untrumra monna & neata
mærsodon seondon.
 7.178.5. Ðonon gelomp þætte þa seolfan moldan, þær
his lichoma gefeol, monige men neomende wæron, & in wæter dydon &
sealdon heora untrumum monnum & neatum drincan; & him sona wel wæs.
 7.178.8. Ond þæt men to þon gelomlice dydon sticcemælum,
þæt heo þa moldon namon, oð þæt þær wæs deop seað
adolfen, þætte wæpnedmon meahte oð his sweoran inn stondan.
 7.178.11. Ne þæt swiðe to wundrienne is, þeah þe in
þære stowe his deaðes untrume hælo onfenge, se symle, mid þy þe
he lifde, þearfum & untrumum arode & ælmessan sealde, & heora
helpend wæs on heora sare.
 7.178.14. Ond monig wundor mægena earon sægd, þæt in
þære stowe gelumpon ge bi ðære moldan, þa ðe in þære stowe
genumene wæron.
 7.178.16. Ac us genihtsumað nu þæt we tuu an oðþe þreo
gehyran.
 7.178.18. Gelomp noht micelre tide æfter his slege, þætte
sum man rad be þære stowe.
 7.178.19. Þa ongon his hors semninga wergian & gestondan,
& his heafod on eorðan hylde; & þa faam of þæm muðe eode,
& þæt unmæte saar weox & miclade, oþþæt hit on eorðan
hreas.
 7.178.21. Þa lihte se eoredmonn & þæt gebæte of
ateah, & þær hwile bad, hwonne his horse bet wurde oðþe he hit
þær dead forlete.
 7.178.23. Þa wæs hit longe mid hefige sare swiðe swenced
& in missenlice dælas hit wond & þræste, þa semniga becwom
hit in þa stowe, þær se gemyngoda cyning ofslegen wæs.
 7.178.26. Ne wæs þa elden, þætte þæt saar gestilled
wæs; & hit blonn from unhalum styrenessum þara leoma, & þy
gewunelican þeawe horsa æfter werignesse ongon wealwian, & on
æghwæðre siidan hit gelomlice oferwearp: & sona aras þurh eall
hal & gesund, & ongon giferlice þæt gærs etan.
 7.178.31. Þa he ða se mon þæt geseah, þa onget he mid
scearpre gleawnisse hwæthwugu wundorlicre halignesse in þære stowe
beon, þær his hors swa hraðe gehæled wæs.
 7.178.33. Ond he þær tacen asette & þa stowe gemearcode,
& on his hors hleop & rad þider he ær mynte.
 7.178.34. Þa he ða cwom to þæm men þe he secan wolde,
þa gemette he þær fæmnan; wæs nift þæs higna aldres þe he
sohte; wæs mid longre aðle legeres swiðe gehefigad.
 7.180.2. Þa ongunnon þa higan beforan him seofian be þære
grimman untrymnesse þære fæmnan, þa ongon he secgan be þære
stowe, þær his hors gehæled wæs.
 7.180.4. Hwæt hy gearwodon sona wægn & asettan þa
fæmnan inn & læddon to þære stowe, & heo þær asetton.
 7.180.6. Þa heo þa on þære stowe geseted wæs, ða
wæs heo werig; onslep þær hwon.
 7.180.7. Sona þæs þe heo onwooc, þa gefelde heo, þæt
heo wæs gehæled from hire lichoman untrymnesse, & hire wætres
bæd, & heo þwoh & hire feax gerædde, & heo mid scytan
bisweop & mid þæm monnum, þe heo þider læddon, on hire fotum
hal & gesund ham hwearf & eode.
 8.180.12. Swylce eac in ða ilcan tid cwom oðer mon sum:
sægdon men þæt he wære Bretta leod.
 8.180.13. Ferde he be þære ilcan stowe, in þære þæt
foresprecene gefeoht geworden wæs.
 8.180.14. Þa geseah he anre stowe fæc þæm oðrum felda
grenra & fægera.
 8.180.15. Ða ongon he mid gleawe mode þencan & ræsian,
þætte nænig oðer intinga wære þære stowe grennis &
fægernis, nemne þæt þær sum haligra mon hwylchwugu þam oðrum
weorode ofslegen wære.
 8.180.18. Genom þa þære moldan dæl in þære stowe,
gebond in his sceate, þohte þæt seo ilce molde to læcedome & to
hælo geweorðan meahte untrumra monna: ond he eft forðeode in his weg.
 8.180.21. Þa cwom he to sumum huse in æfentiid, & eode in
þæt hus, þær þæt ham eall to symble gesomnod wæs.
 8.180.23. Wæs he onfongen from þam hlaforde þæs huses,
& him mon setl tæhte, & he sæt mid him æt þæm symble.
 8.180.24. Aheng he þone sceat mid þære moldan, þe he
brohte, on ane studu þæs wages.
 8.180.26. Wæs micel fyr onæled on middum þam huse.
 8.180.26. Mid þy heo þa longe symbledon & druncne wæron,
& þa spearcan up flugon in þæs huses hrof, se wæs mid gyrdum
awunden & mid þæce beþeaht, þa gelomp þæt þæt hus eall
wæs in fyren & ongon semninga byrnan.
 8.180.29. Þa þæt þa gebeoras gesawon, þa flugon heo
forhte ut, & nænige helpe þam beornendan huse gedon meahton; ac hit
clæne forborn, nemne seo studu aan þe seo molde on hongode, seo gesund
& ungehrinen from þæm fyre astod & awunade.
 8.182.2. Ða wundrodon heo þæt swiðe; & smealice sohton
on hwon þæt gelang wære.
 8.182.3. Þa wæs him gecyðed þæt seo molde þær on
hongode, þe in þære stowe genumen wæs, þær Oswaldes blod
þæs cyninges on agoten wæs.
 8.182.5. Wæron þas wundor feorr & wide gemæred &
gecyþed; & monige men seoðþan dæghwamlice þa stowe sohton, &
þær hælo gife him seolfum & heora freondum neoman ongunnon.
 9.182.9. Betweoh ðas ðing nis to forswigienne, hwelc heofonlic
wundor & mægen æteawed wæs, þa his ban funden & gemeted
wæron & to þære cirican gelædde, þær heo nu gehealden
syndon.
 9.182.11. Wæs þis geworden þurh Osþryðe geornnesse
Mercna cwene, seo wæs oswiges dohtor his broðor, se æfter him feng to
norðanhymbra riice.
 9.182.15. Is æðele mynster in Lindesse; is nemned Beardan ea.
 9.182.15. Ðæt mynster seo ilce cwen mid hire were
æþelrede swiðe lufade & arweorðade & beeode.
 9.182.17. In þam heo wilnade gehealdan þa arwyrðan ban hire
fædran.
 9.182.18. Mid þy se wægn þa cwom, þe þa baan in leded
wæron, in þæt foresprecene mynster, þa ne woldon þa hiwan him, þe
in þæm mynstre wæron, lustlice onfoon.
 9.182.20. Forþon þeah þe heo hine haligne wisten, hwæðre
forðon þe he of oþerre mægþe wæs & ofer heo rice onfeng,
ealdum feoungum hine eac swylce deadne ehton.
 9.182.23. Ða wæs geworden, þætte þære seolfan neahte
þa brohton ban ute awunedon, nemne mon geteld ofer abrædde.
 9.182.24. Ac seo æteawnis heofonlices wundres geopenade, hu
arwyrðlice heo wæron to underfonne eallum geleafsumum.
 9.182.26. Forðon ealle þa niht stod swylce beorht sunbeam from
þæm wægne up oð heofon heah, þone mon meahte lytesne of ealre
lindesse stowum sweotole geseon.
 9.182.28. Þa hit þa wæs on marne dæg geworden, þa
ongunnon þa broðor þæs mynstres, þa ðe ær wiðsocon, geornlice
biddan, þætte mid him þa halgan reliquias & Gode þa leofan
gehealdne beon moston.
 9.182.31. Ond heo þa ða baan onþwogon & in cyste gedydon
& in cirican æfter gerisenre aare gesetton.
 9.182.33. Ond þætte se cynelica had þæs halgan weres ece
gemynd hæfde, his segen, se wæs mid golde & mid godwebbe
gefrætwad, & ofer his byrgenne geseted.
 9.184.2. Ond þæt seolfe wæter, þæt heo þa baan mid
þwogon, guton in ænne ende þære cirican.
 9.184.4. Of þære tide wæs geworden, þætte seo seolfe
eorðe, þe þæt arwyrðe bæð onfeng, meahte to hælo feondseocra
monna & oðerra untrymnessa.
 9.184.7. Gelomp þæt æfterfylgendre tide, mid þy seo
foresprecene cwen wæs wuniende in þæm ylcan mynstre, þa cwom sum
arwyrðe abbudesse to hire, seo wæs haten æþelhild; wæs sweostor
þara haligra wera æðelwines & Aldwines.
 9.184.10. Þara wæs oðer biscop in Lindesse, oðer wæs
abbud in þæm mynstre þe hatte Peortanea, from þæm mynstre unfeor
wæs þære abbudessan mynster.
 9.184.12. Mid þy heo þa to þære cwene cwom, & heo
gesprecen hæfdon, & betweoh oðer spræcon heo be Oswalde, cwæð
heo seo abbudesse, þæt heo gesawe þære nihte þæt leoht ofer his
banum up oð heofon heah.
 9.184.15. Cwæð heo seo cwen, þætte of þære moldan
þæs flores, in þæm þæt wæter his bana þweales goten wæs,
monige untrume gehælede wæron.
 9.184.17. Ond heo þa bæd, þæt hire mon sumne dæl
þære halwendan moldan sealde; & hire mon swa dyde; & heo þa in
claðe bebond & in cyste dyde & hire ham ferde.
 9.184.20. Þa æfterfylgendre tide, seoþþon heo in hire
mynstre wæs, þætte þider cwom sum cuma, se wæs neahtlicum tidum
semninga from unclænum gaste hefiglice swenced.
 9.184.22. Þa wæs he fremsumlice onfongen; & æfter his
æfengereorde hine gerestan wolde.
 9.184.24. Þa wæs he semninga from deofle gerisen, & ongon
cleopian & hlydan & mid his toðum gristbitian, & þa faam of his
muðe ut eode, & he missenlecum styrenessum ongon his leomu þræstan.
 9.184.27. Mid þy hine þa nænig mon ne gehabban ne gebindan
meahte, þa orn sum þegn & sloh tacen æt geate, & sægde
þære abbudessan.
 9.184.29. Ond heo sona þæt geat þæs mynstres ontynde,
& eode mid ane hire þinenna to þære wæpnedmonna stowe, &
gehet þone mæssepreost to hire, þæt he sceolde mid heo gan to þam
untruman men.
 9.184.32. Þa heo þa ðider cwomon, þa gesawon heo þær
monige men æt him beon, þa ðe georne ongunnon, þæt heo his
wedenheortnisse gestilden; ac heo ne meahton.
 9.184.34. Song he se mæssepreost & rædde orationem, þa
ðe wið þære aðle awritene wæron, & þa þing dyde, þe he
selust wið þon cuðe; & he hwæðre noht on þon fremede.
 9.186.1. Mid þy heora þa nænig ænige helpe him findan
meahte, þa cwom semninga þære abbudessan in gemynd seo foresprecene
molde.
 9.186.3. Þa het heo sona hira þinenne gaan & þa cyste
hire to gefetigan, þe seo molde in wæs.
 9.186.5. Þa heo þa mid þa cyste in þone cafertun eode
þæs huses, þe se feondseoca mon in þræsted wæs, þa geswigade
he semninga & his heafod onhylde, swa swa he slapan wolde, & his leomu
in stilnesse gesette.
 9.186.8. Þa swigodon heo eac ealle & stille wæron; &
sorgiende bidon to hwon his þing weorðan scolde.
 9.186.9. Ða wæs efter medmicelre tide fæce ðæt he upp
asæt & hefiglice asworette & cwæð: Nu ic wat teala, & ic
onfeng gewit mines modes.
 9.186.12. Ond heo þa geornlice hine ahsodon, hu þæt
gelumpe.
 9.186.13. Cwæð he: Sona mid þy þe seo fæmne mid
þære cyste, þe heo bær, geneolecte þæm cafertune þæs huses,
þa gewiton ealle þa wergan gastas onweg, þa ðe mec swencton &
þrycton, & mec forleton & nower seoðþan æteawdon.
 9.186.16. Þa sealde seo abbudisse him sumne dæl þære
moldan; & seo mæssepreost orationem rædde, & heo for hine
gebædon: & he ða niht ealle hal & gesund hine reste.
 9.186.18. Ond siðþan of þære tide þa wrygedan gastas
hine mid nænige ege ne mid geswencnisse gretan dorston.
 10.186.21. Æfter ðissum wæs æfterfylgendre tide sum
cneoht in þæm mynstre in Beardan ea in longre lenctenadle hefiglice
swenced.
 10.186.22. Þa wæs sume dæge, þætte he sorgende bæd
hwonne seo aðl to him cwome, þa wæs gongende in to him sum þara
broðra; cwæð him to: Wilt þu min cild þæt ic þe lære, hu
þu gehæled beon meaht from þisse aðle hefignesse?
 10.186.26. Aris & gong to cirican to þæs halgan Oswaldes
lice, & site þær & stille wuna, & geseoh þæt þu ut
þonon ne gonge, ær seo aðl from þe gewiten sy.
 10.186.28. Þonne cume ic to ðe & þec þonon ham
lædo.
 10.186.29. Þa dyde he swa he hine lærde; eode gesittan to
þæs halgan weres liice.
 10.186.30. Þa ne cwom him no seo untrymnis to þy dæge; ac
heo, swa ondrædende, from him gewat, þætte ne ðy æfteran dæge
ne ðy þriddan ne ofer þæt siðþan hine oo gehrinan dorste.
 10.186.33. Cwom sum broðor þonon, cwæð Beda, þe me
sægde þæt hit þus gedon wære: & eac sægde, þæt se ilca
broðor þa gyt in þæm mynstre lifigende wære, in þæm
cneohtwesendum þis hælo wundor geworden wæs.
 10.188.2. Ne wæs þæt þonne to wundrienne, þeah þe
þæs cyninges bene, þa he mid Drihtne ricsade, mid him swiðade &
genge wæren, se ðe ær, þendæn he þis hwilendlice hæfde riice,
ma he gewunade, þæt he for þæm ecan riice symle wonn & God
bletsode.
 10.188.7. Sægdon þætte þa menn, þa hit cuðon,
þæt he oftost from þære tide þæs uhtlican lofsonges oð
hluttorne dæg in gebedum astode & awunade; & for þæm gelomlicum
þeawe his gebeda, swa hwær swa he sæt, þæt his gewuna wæs
þæt he his honda upweard hæfde ofer his cneo, & symle ðrihtne
Gode his gooda þanc sægde.
 10.188.11. Wæs eac swylce wiid mærsed & in gewunan gyddis
gehwyrfed, þæt he eac swylce betweoh gebedes word his lif geendade.
 10.188.13. Forðon þa he wæs mid wæpnum & mid feondum
all utan beheped, & he seolfa onget þæt hine mon ofslean scolde, þa
gebæd he for þam sawlum his weorodes.
 10.188.16. Cwædon heo bi ðon þus in gydde: Drihten God
miltsa þu sawlum ussa leoda, cwæð se halga Oswald, þa he on eorðan
saag.
 10.188.19. Wæron his baan gelæded & gehealden in þæm
mynstre, þe we ær cwædon æt Beardan ea.
 10.188.20. Heht se cyning, se ðe hine slog, his heafod on steng
asetton; & his hond mid þy earme, þe of his lichoman aslegen wæs,
het to ahoon.
 10.188.22. Þa cwom æfter geres fæce mid herige se
æfterfylgend his riices Osweo his mæg & heo þær genom: & his
heafod mon lædde to Lindesfearena eae, & þær in cirican bebyrgde;
& his hond mid þy earme in þære cynelican ceastre in Bebbanbyrig
gehealdene syndon.
 11.188.27. Nales ðæt an ðætte se hlisa þises
æðelan weres eall Breotene gemæro geondscine, ac swylce eac bi suðan
sæ in Germania & eac somod þa dælas Hibernia Scotta ealondes se
hlisa his wundra bicwoom.
 11.188.30. Forðon Acca se arwyrða biscop gewunode oft secgan,
þa he to Rome wæs ferende, & mid Wilbrord þone halgan biscop
Fresena wæs wuniende, þæt he hine gelomlice herde secgan in þære
mægðe bi þæm wundrum, þe æt þæm banum þæs arwyrðan
cyninges gedon wæron.
 11.190.4. Swelce he eac sægde se biscop, mid þy he ða gena
mæssepreost wæs in Hibernia & þær for heofona rices lufan in
elþeodignesse lifde, þæt he þær þone hlisan in þæm ealonde
his halignesse feorr & wide gelomlice herde secgan.
 11.190.7. Þonne magon we nu an wundor secgan, þe he sægde
betweoh oðer monego.
 11.190.8. Sægde he, þæt in þa tid þæs miclan woles
& monncwilde, þe Breotone ealond & Hibernia mid micle wæle fornom
& forhergade, þa wæs geslegen betweoh oðre monige mid þy wæle
þæs ilcan woles sum leornungmon in scole Scotta cynnes.
 11.190.12. Wæs se mon wel gelæred in gewritum; ac ymb þa
gemænne his ecre hælo wæs to sæne & to receleas.
 11.190.13. Ða he þa geseah þæt he wæs neah deaðe,
þa ongon he forhtian & him ondrædon, þæt he sona, þæs þe
he dead wære, fore geearnungum his synna to helle locum gelæded beon
sceolde.
 11.190.16. Cleopode mec þa & cegde, mid þy ic wæs him on
neoweste: & betweoh þa untruman sworetunge he forhtigende & wependre
stefne þus wæs spreocende & seofiende to me, & cwæð: Hwæt
þu gesyxt, þæt þeos aðl & þeos hefignes mines lichoman swiðe
weaxeð, þæt ic eom neded þæt ic sceal hraðe deað underhnigan.
 11.190.21. Ne twygeo ic þonne mec noht æfter þæs lichoman
deaðe hræðe gelæd beon to þam ecan deaðe minre sawle & helle
tintregu underðeoded ne beon.
 11.190.23. Forþon micelre tiide betweoh geleoso þære
godcundan leornunge ic ma synnum & leahtrum þeowde, þonne Godes
bebodum.
 11.190.25. Me is nu fæstlice in mode, gif seo uplice
arfæstnis me ænig fæc to lifigenne forgeofan wille, þæt ic wille
mine leohtorfulle þeawas gesecgan, & to bebode þæs godcundan willan
eall min mod & min lif fæstlice gecerran.
 11.190.29. Ic for soð wat, þæt þæt nis minre
gegearnunge, þæt ic yldenne onfo to lifigenne, oðþo ne getreowe me
onfoende beon, nemne God me earmum & unwyrðum gemiltsigan wille þurh
þara fultum & bene, þe him getreowlice þeowdon.
 11.190.32. We gehyrdon & se mæresta hlisa is, þætte
wære in eowerre þeode wundorlicre halignesse cyning, Oswald hatte,
þæs cyninges geleafan & mægenes heannis æfter deaðe eac swilce
mid gelomlicra wundra wyrcnisse scan & beorhte.
 11.192.4. Biddo ic þe la, gif þu ænige his reliquias
hæbbe mid þec, þæt þu me selle.
 11.192.5. Eaðe mæg, þæt me Drihten þurh his geearnung
miltsigan wille.
 11.192.6. Ða ondsworede ic him: Ic hæbbu, cwæð, þæs
treowes dæl, þe his heafod on aseted wæs, þe he ofslegen wæs.
 11.192.8. Ond gif þu mid trumre heortan gelefest, þonne mæg
seo godcunde arfæstnisse þurh geearnunge swa micles monnes
æghwæðer ge lengre fæc þisses lifes þe forgifan, ge þec eac
þæs ecan lifes ingonges wyrðne gedon.
 11.192.11. Ne wæs he þa eldende, ac sona andsworode &
cwæð, þæt he in þissum hæfde fæstne geleafan & onwalhne.
 11.192.12. Þa gehalgode ic wæter & scæfþan dyde in
þæs foresprecenan treoes, & sealde þam untruman drincan.
 11.192.14. & sona þæt him wæs bet & hine getrumade
& gewyrpte from þære untrymnesse.
 11.192.15. & he longe tiid seoþðan lifde & mid ealle
his heortan & dædum fæstlice to Gode gecerde; ond swa hwær swa he
cwom, þæt he eallum monnum sægde & bodade þa mildheortnesse
þæs arfæstan scyppendes & þæt wuldor his getreowan þeowes.
 12.192.20. Ono ða Oswald wæs gelæded to þam heofonlican
rice, þa onfeng þæs eorðlecan rices seþl æfter him his broðor
Osweo.
 12.192.21. Hæfde he þritig wintra, þa he to riice feng,
& þæt eahta & twentig wintra gewinnesfullice heold &
hæfde.
 12.192.23. Feaht him on & wonn Penda se cyning & seo
hæðne þeod Mercna; swelce eac his agen sunu Alhfrið &
æðelwald his broðor sunu, se ær him riice hæfde.
 12.192.25. Ða wæs þy æfteran gere his rices, þætte
se arwyrða fæder Paulinus, se wæs geo in Eoferwicceastre biscop, þa
wæs in Hrofesceastre, forðgewat & to Drihtne ferde þy syxtan dæge
Iduum Octobrium, æfter þon þe he nigontyne winter & twegen monað
& an & twentig daga biscophade onfeng.
 12.192.30. Ond he wæs bebyrged on Sancte Andreas cirican
þæs apostoles, ða æþelberht se cyning in þære ilcan
Hrofesceastre ær heht getimbran.
 12.194.1. In þære stowe Honorius se ærcebiscop gehalgode
Itthamar, se wæs Contwara leod, ac on his life & on his gelærednesse
he wæs his foregengum gelic.
 12.194.4. Hæfde Osweo se cyning in þæm ærestan tidum his
riices efenhletan þære cynelecan weorðnesse, þæt noma wæs
Oswine, of Eadwines strynde þæs cyninges.
 12.194.6. Wæs he Osrices sunu, bi þæm we beforan
sægdon.
 12.194.7. Wæs he seofon winter Dera cyning Oswini in þære
mæstan genihtsumnesse ealra þinga.
 12.194.8. Wæs he se mon æfest & arfæst, & forðon
eallum his leodum leof.
 12.194.9. Ac ne meahte he hwæðere mid þone cyning, þe
þone oþerne dæl Norðanhymbra riices hæfde, þæt is Beornica,
sibbe habban; ac swa micel ungeþwærnes & unsibb betweoh him aras,
þætte heo heora weorod & fyrd gesomnodon.
 12.194.13. Mid þy Oswini þa geseah, þætte he ne meahte
wið hine gewinnan, forðon he maran fultum & mare mægen hæfde,
þa wæs he nyttra þinga þencende, & demende þæt he þæt
gefeoht forlete & hine geheolde to betran tide.
 12.194.16. Forlet þa his weorod, & bebead þæt monn hwa
him ham ferde from þære stowe, þe is nemned Wilfares dun.
 12.194.18. Seo is tyn milum westrihte from Cetreht weorþige.
 12.194.18. Þa gecerde he mid ane his þegne, þe he him
getreowestne tealde, þæs noma wæs Tondhere, to Hunwaldes ham his
gesiðes, þæt he þær wolde deagol beon, þone he him ær þone
holdestan gelefde.
 12.194.21. Ac hit feorr on oðre wisan wæs.
 12.194.22. Forþon se ilca gesiið þurh æðelwine his
gerefan mid þy foresprecenan his þegne hine þær ameldedon; & hine
mon þær laðlice deaðe cwealde.
 12.194.24. Wæs þis geworden þy þreottoþon dæge
<foreign>Kalendarum Septembrium</foreign> þy nigoþan geare Oswios riices in þære stowe,
þe is cweden Ingetlingum.
 12.194.26. Þær æfter fæce for intingan clæsnunge
þisses manes wæs mynster getimbred, in þæm for æghwæðres
cyninges sawle alesnesse, ge þæs ofslegenan ge þæs þe hine slean
het, dæghwamlice Drihtne bene & gebedo borene beon scoldon.
 12.194.31. Wæs he Oswine se cyning ge on onsyne fæger ge on
bodie heah ge wynsum on gespræce, & in þeawum monþwære; & he
wæs eallum rumgeofa ge æðelum ge unæðelum.
 12.194.33. Ðonon gelomp, þætte fore his cynelicnesse ge
modes ge onsynes & his geearnunge wyrðnesse, þæt he wæs from
eallum monnum lufod.
 12.194.35. Ond æghwonan lytesne of eallum þissum bifylcum to
his folgaðe & his þegnunge þa æþelestan men cwomon.
 12.196.3. Þisses cyninges betweoh oðer mægen &
gemetfæstnisse & syndriglicre bletsunge wuldor, eac swilce is sægd,
þæt he wære þære mæstan eaðmodnesse, swa swa we magon on anre
bisene sweotole oncnawan.
 12.196.6. Geaf he & sealde þæt betste hors & þæs
fægerestan eondes Aidane þæm biscope, þeah þe he gewuna wære
þæt he ma eode þonne he ride, ðæt he hwæðre on þæm meahte
fordas oferridan , þonne he to hwelcere ea cwome; oðþe gif hwylc ned
gelumpe, þæt he hrædlicor feran scolde.
 12.196.10. Þa wæs æfter medmicelre tiide, þa he on
þæm horse sæt, þæt him cwom sum þearfa togeanes & him
ælmessan bæd.
 12.196.12. Þa lihte he sona & heht þam þearfan þæt
hors syllan mid þæm cynelicum gebætum þe him onstodon.
 12.196.13. Forþon he wæs swiðe mildheort & þearfena
bigenga & swa swa fæder earmra.
 12.196.15. Þa þis þa wæs þæm cyninge gesægd,
cwæð he to þam biscope, þa heo wærun to heora swæsendum
gongende: Hwæt woldest þu, min domne biscop, þæt cynelice hors
þæm þearfan syllan, þe ðe gedafenade agan to habbanne?
 12.196.18. Ac ne hæfdon wit monig oðer uncymre hors &
oðres eondes, þæt wit meahton þearfum to tigðe sellan, þeah þu
þæt hors him ne sealde, þæt ic ðe synderlice to æhte geceas?
 12.196.21. Ða andswarede se bisceop him sona & cwæð:
Hwæt sprycest þu cyning?
 12.196.22. Cwist ðu þæt þe sy leofre þære myran sunu
þonne þæt Godes bearn?
 12.196.23. Ða heo þa þis spræcon, þa iodon heo in to
swæsendum, & se biscop eode ge sæt in his stowe on his seðle.
 12.196.25. Se cyning þonne, forðon he of huntað cwom, gestod
æt þam fyre & hine wyrmde mid his þegnum.
 12.196.26. Ond þa semninga betweoh þa werminge gemunde þæt
word, þæt se biscop him ær to cwæð: ongyrde hine þa his sweorde
& sealde his þegne, & stop ofostlice toforan biscope & feoll to
his fotum, & bæd þæt he him bliðe wære, & cwæð:
Næfre ofer þis ic owiht ma spreco oððe demo, hwæt oðþe hu micel
of uncrum feo ðu Godes bearnum selle.
 12.196.31. Þa se biscop þa geseah þa eaðmodnesse þæs
cyninges swa micle, þa ondred he him swiðe & sona aras him togegnes
& hine up ahof, & geheht þæt he him swiðe bliðe wære, &
georne bæd þæt he eode to his seðle sittan to his swæsendum &
unrotnisse of his heortan asette.
 12.198.2. Mid þy he ða se cyning bi þæs biscopes hæse
& bene blisse onfeng, ða ongon he se biscop ongegn þon unrot weosan,
& swa unrot wæs, þæt he ongon wepan hluttrum tearum.
 12.198.5. Þa frægn hine & ahsode his mæssepreost on his
agen geðeode, þe se cyning ne cuðe ne his higen, for hwon he weope.
 12.198.7. Cwæð he: ic wat þætte þes cyning æfter
þissum noht longe ne leofað, forþon ic næfre ær þissum geseah
eaðmodne cyning.
 12.198.9. Forþon ic ongeote, þæt he hrædlice of þissum
life leoran sceal; ond nis þeos þeod wyrðe þæt heo swilcne reccend
& cyning hæbbe.
 12.198.11. Ne wæs þa long fæc æfter þætte se grimma
witedom þæs biscopes wæs gefylled, þæt mon laðlice deaþe
þone cyning acwealde, swa we ær beforan sægdon.
 12.198.14. Ge eac se seolfa biscop Aidan nales ma þonne þy
twelftan dæge æfter þæs cyninges slege, þone þe he lufode,
þæt is þy ærran dæge <foreign>Kalendas Septembris</foreign>, of þisse worulde
alæded wæs, & ece mede his gewinna from Drihtne onfeng.
 13.198.18. Ono hwylcre geearnunge þes biscop wære, mid wundra
tacnum eac swilce se innlica dema ælmihtig God monnum gecyðde.
 13.198.19. Þonne is us nu genoh, þæt we of monegum þreo
areccen for intingan his gemynde.
 13.198.21. Wæs sum arwyrðe mæssepreost, þæs noma
wæs Utta: wæs micelre gestæðþignesse & soðfæstnisse wer,
& he forðon eallum ge þisse worulde aldormonnum wæs leof &
weorð.
 13.198.24. Wæs he sended in sume tid to Cent, þæt he
sceolde Osweo þæm cyninge wiif fetigan Eanflæde Eadwines dohtor
þæs cyninges, seo wæs ær þider gelæded, þa hire fæder
ofslegen wæs.
 13.198.26. Þa gestihhade he & funde, þæt he wolde
londfyrde þider gefaran, & eft in sciplade mid þære fæmnan haam
hweorfan.
 13.198.28. Þa eode se mæssepreost to Aidane þæm biscope;
bæd hine þæt he for hine gebæde & for his geferan, & for
heora gesyntu to Gode þingade, þa heo swa micelne siðfæt feran
scolden.
 13.198.31. Þa dyde he swa: gebæd heo fore & heo gebletsade
& Gode bebead; sealde eac swylce þæm mæssepreoste gehalgodne ele.
 13.200.2. Cwæð him to: Ic wat sona, cwæð he, þæs
þe ge in scip astigað, þæt ofer eow cymeð micel storm & hreonis,
& wiðerweard wind astigeð.
 13.200.4. Ac gemyne þu þæt þu þisne ele, þe ic þe nu
sylle, synd in þa sæ; & sona instæpe se wind gestilleð &
sæs smyltnes æfterfylgeð, & eow eac bliðe on eowerne wilsið ham
forlætað.
 13.200.8. Ond eal þas þing, swa se biscop forecwæð, of
endebyrdnesse gelumpun & gefylde wæron.
 13.200.9. Ond sona ærest, þæs þe heo in scip eodon &
ut leton, þætte astigon wiðorwearde windas, & þa yða weollon
& weddon þæs sæs.
 13.200.11. Þa ongunnon þa nedlingas & þa scipmen þa
oncras upp teon, & in þone sæ syndon; woldon þæt scip mid
gefæstnian.
 13.200.13. & þeah þe heo þis dydon, noht heo on þon
fremedon; ac þa yða weollon & ymbsweopon & æghwonan þæt
scip fyldon, þæt heo him nænigra gesynta wendon, ac heo ealle deað
seolfne him onweardne geseagon.
 13.200.16. Þa æt nyhstan gemunde se mæssepreost þæs
biscopes word: genom his ompellan, & sumne dæl þæs eles sende in
þone sæ.
 13.200.18. Ond sona instæpe, swa hit forecweden wæs, gestilde
se sæ from þæm wylme.
 13.200.19. Ond swa wæs geworden, þætte se Godes wer þurh
witedomes gast þone storm toweardne foreseah, & þurh þæs ilcan
gastes mægen, þa he up cumen wæs, þæt he hine aswefede &
gestilde/, þeah þe he lichomlice þær æfweard wære.
 13.200.23. Þisses wundres endebyrdnesse nænig tweonde secgend,
ac se getreowesta mæssepreost usse cirican, Cynemund hatte, me þis
sægde.
 13.200.25. Sægde he, he hit gehyrde from þæm seolfan Uttan
mæssepreoste, in þæm & þurh þone þis wundor gefylled wæs.
 14.200.27. Þonne secgeað monige, þa þe hit gearuwe cuðon,
oðer gemyndelic wundor þæs ilcan fæder.
 14.200.28. Þæt gelomp in þa tid his biscophada, þætte
Penda Mercna cyning gelædde here on Norðanhymbra lond, & hit feor
& wide mid arlease wæle hyðde & hergode.
 14.200.31. Þa becwom he æt nyhstan to þære cynelecan
byrig, seo is nemned Bebbanburg.
 14.200.32. Þa he þa geseah, þæt seo burg wæs to þon
fæst, þæt he ne meahte ne mid gefeohte ne mid ymbsete heo abrecan ne
gegaan, þa wolde he mid fyre forbærnan.
 14.202.2. Aslat þa þa tunas ealle ymb þa burg onwæg, ðe
he þær on neaweste gemette, & to þære byrig gewæg, &
micelne ad gesomnade on beamum & on ræftrum & on wagum & on
watelum & on ðeacon; & mid þissum þa burg mid micelre heannisse
ymbsealde from þæm dæle, þe heo londe geþeoded is.
 14.202.7. Þa hit þa wæs wel gewinde in þa burg, þa
onbærnde he þone aad & þa burg forbærnan wolde.
 14.202.9. Ða in þa seolfan tid wæs se arwyrða biscop &
se halga Aidan in Farne þæm ealonde, þæt is on twæm milum from
þære byrig ut on sæ.
 14.202.11. Wæs his gewuna þæt he ða stowe gelomlice sohte
for intingan stilnesse & his deagolra gebeda, ond mon mæg gen to dæge
þa stowe his seðles on þæm ilcan ealonde sceawian.
 14.202.13. Þa he þa se biscop geseah swapendum windum þone
leg þæs fyres & þone rec up ofer þære burge wallas ahefenne, is
sægd, þæt he his eagan mid his hondum to heofonum hofe & mid tearum
þus cwæde: þu ðrihten, geseoh hu micel yfel Penda wyrceð.
 14.202.17. Ond þa sona instæpe oncerde se wind from þære
byrig, & se leg & seo hætu ræsde on þa seolfan, þe þæt
fyr ældon & bærndon, & monig monn swiðe gewyrdledon.
 14.202.20. & heo ealle afyrhte onweg flugon & blunnon þa
burg afeohton, þa heo ongeton þæt heo godcundlice gescilded wæs.
 14.202.23. Ða ðæt ða gen wæs, þæt þa ger
gefylled wæron his biscophada, þæt he þis deaðlice lif forlætan
sceolde, & he untrum wæs, þa wæs he in þæm cynelecan tune noht
feorr from þære byrig, þe we ær foresprecende wæron, in þæm
he hæfde cirican & cytan.
 14.202.26. & his gewuna wæs, þæt he gelomlice þider
cerde & þær wunade, & þonon eode gehwyder ymb, & þær
godcunde lare bodade & lærde.
 14.202.29. Ðæt eac swilce his þeaw wæs on oðrum
cyninges tune to donne, swa swa hit eaðe beon mihte, forðon þe he nowiht
agnes hæfde, butan his cyricean & þær to feower æceras.
 14.202.31. Þa aslogon his geferan teld, þa he untrum wæs, on
westan þære cirican fæst.
 14.204.1. Þa gelomp, þa he forðferan scolde, þæt he
genom þa studu, þe seo cirice mid awreðed wæs, & on þære
styðe stondende forðferde ymb feowertyno ger, þæs þe he biscop
wæs, ærran dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Septembrium</foreign>.
 14.204.5. Lædde mon his lichoman to Lindesfarena ea, & in
broðra lictune wæs bebyrged.
 14.204.6. Þa wæs æfterfylgendre tide, mid þy þær
mare cirice getimbred wæs & in Sancte Petres noman þæs
aldorapostoles wæs gehalgod, þæt heo his ban upp adydon & in þa
cirican in suþhealfe þæs wigbedes asetton æfter arwyrðnesse swa
micles biscopes.
 14.204.10. Æfter him fylgde in þone biscophad Fiinan, se
wæs eac from Hii Scotta mynstre & ealonde sended, & londe tiid
biscop wæs.
 14.204.13. Ða gelomp æfter unmonegum gearum, þætte Penda
Mercnacyning cwom mid Mercna here in þa stowe, & all þa ðæ he
meahte, mid iserne & fyres lege fornom & forleas, & swylce eac
þone tun, þe se biscop in forðferde, ætgædre mid þa gemyndgedan
cirican fyre forbærnde.
 14.204.17. Ac wundorlice gemete þa studu ane, þe se biscop
onhleoniende forðferde, þæt fyr gretan ne meahte.
 14.204.18. Þa þis wundor þus gecyðed wæs, timbrede mon
hraðe eft þa cirican & þa ilcan studu utan togesette to trymnesse
þæs wages, swa swa heo ær wæs.
 14.204.20. Eft gelomp æfter tida fæce þurh ungemænne
synne, þætte se ilca tun forborn & seo ilce cirice ætgædre
wæs mid fyre fornumen.
 14.204.22. Ac hwæðre se leg þa ilcan studu gehrinan ne
meahte, & mid micle wundre, þætte se leg þurhæt þa næglas
in þæm þyrelum, þe heo mid þæm to þæm timbre gefæstnad
wæs, & hwæðre þa stuðo sceðþan ne meahte.
 14.204.25. Þa timbrode mon þriddan siðe þa cirican
þær; & þa ilcan studu nales swa swa ær uton togesetton to
trymnesse þæs huses, ac in gemynd þæs wundres in þa ciricon setton,
þætte þa ingongendan þær heora cneo begean scolden & him
heofonlicre/ mildheortnesse wilnian & secan.
 14.204.30. Ond þæt cuð is, þætte monige of þære
tiide in þære ilcan stowe hælo gife onfengon.
 14.204.31. Ge eac swylce of þære ilcan styðe sponas
þweoton & sceafþan nomon, & in wæter sendon & untrumum
drincan sealdon, & monigra untrymnessa læcedomas onfengon.
 14.206.1. Soðlice þis ic wrat be þam weorcum þæs
foresprecenan weres: ac me swa þeah no ne licede on him, þæt he þa
weorþuncge Eastrena on riht ne heold ne nyste; ac ic hit swiðe onscunede,
swa swa ic on þære bec, þe ic worhte <foreign>de temporibus</foreign>, swiþe sweotole
gecyðde.
 14.206.5. Ac ic, swa swa soðsagal stærwritere, þa þing,
þe be him oððe þurh hine gewordene wæron, ic awrat, & þa
þing þe herunge wyrðe wæron, ic herede.
 14.206.7. He hæfde swiðe micle geornnesse sibbe & soðre
lufan & forhæfdnesse & eaðmodnesse.
 14.206.8. Næfde he on him naðer ne yrre ne oferhyd ne
gytsunge, ne idel gylp him on ne ricsade.
 14.206.10. He hæfde þa gleawnesse Godes bebodu to healdanne
& to læranne; & he hæfde þa geornfullnesse haligu gewritu to
rædanne & wæccean to beganganne.
 14.206.12. & he hæfde sacerde gerisene ealdorlicnesse þa
ofermedan to þreageanne & þa weligan; & he hæfde mildheortnesse
þa untruman & þa þearfendan mid to frefregenne.
 14.206.15. Swa swa ic nu æt feawum wordum secge, be þon þe
þa sædon þe hine cuþon, þæt of eallum þon, þe on halgum bocum
beboden is to healdanne, he nowiht to gymeleste ne forlet, ac he hit eall, swa
forð swa he mihte, hæfde gelæste.
 14.206.18. Ðas þing ic on þam foresprecenan bisceope swiþe
lufie, forðan ic no ne tweoge þæt hi Gode liciað.
 14.206.20. Ðæt he þa Eastran on hiora rihttid ne heold,
forðon þe oððe he hiora gesetton tide nyste oððe, þeah þe he
wiste, for þære ealldorlicnesse his agenre þeode he hire ne gymde, ic no
ne herige.
 14.206.22. On þara Eastrana mærsunge swa þeah he nowiht
oðres ne ne gelyfde ne ne weorðode ne ne bodode, buton þæt ylce
þæt we, þæt is þa alysnesse monna cynnes þurh þrowunge &
þurh æriste & þurh upstige on heofonas þæs midligendes Godes
& monna, monnes Hælendes Cristes.
 14.206.27. Ne heold he no þa Eastran, swa swa sume men wenað,
mid Iudeum on feowertynenihtne monan gehwylce dæge on wucan, ac a symle on
Sunnandæge fram feowertynenihtum monan oð twentigesnihtne, for þam
geleafan þære Dryhtenlican æriste, þa æriste he gelyfde on anum
þara restedag a beon gewordene, & eac for þam hyhte ure toweardan
æriste, þa he on anum þara restedaga, se nu Sunnandæg is nemned,
soðlice towearde mid þære halgan & mid þære rihtgeleaffullan
gesomnunge gelyfde.
 14.208.5. Þissum tidum Eastengla rice æfter Eorpwalde
Rædwaldes æfterfylgende Sigeberht his broðor fore wæs.
 14.208.6. Wæs he god man & æfest, se ær in Gallia rice
fulwihtes bæðe onfeng, þa he þær wrecca wæs & Rædwaldes
feondscipe fleah.
 14.208.8. Ond sona þæs þe he eft on his eðel hwearf ond
rice onfeng, þa wilnade he liif onhyrgan, þe he wel geseted geseah in
Gallia rice.
 14.208.10. Ond he scole gesette, in þære cneohtas & geonge
menn tydde & lærde wæron; & him fultmade Felix se biscop, þone
he of Cent onfeng.
 14.208.12. Gesette he magistras & lare æfter Contwara
þeawe.
 14.208.13. Ond swa swiðe se cyning wæs geworden lufiend
þæs heofonlican rices, þæt he æt nyhstan forlet þæt
eorðlice rice, & his mæge Ecgberhte bebead, & in mynster eode,
þæt he him seolf ær getimbrade, & sceare onfeng & ma gemde for
þam ecan rice to compienne.
 14.208.17. Þa he þæt þa longe tiid dyde, þa gelomp
þætte Penda Mercna cyning teah here & fyrd wið Eastengle &
þider to gefeohte cwom.
 14.208.19. Þa heo þa hie in þæm gefeohte neoþor gesegon
& læssan weorude heora feondum, þa bædon heo Sigeberht, þæt he
mid him cwome to þæm gefeohte heora compweorod to trymmanne.
 14.208.21. Þa ne wolde he ac wiðcwæð, þa tugon heo hine
nydinga of þam mynstre & læddon on þone here.
 14.208.23. Wendon heo þæt heora compweorodes mod þy
unforhtre beon sceolde, & þy læs fluge for his andweardnesse; forðon
he wæs ær se fromesta heretoga.
 14.208.25. Ac he wæs gemyndig his ondetnesse & his gehata,
þe he Gode geheht.
 14.208.26. Þa he wæs mid þy unmætan weorode ymbhæfd,
ne wolde he oðer wæpen nemne ane gyrde him on honda habban; ond he wæs
ofslegen mid Ecgrice þam cyninge, & eall heora weorod oðþe geslegen
oððe geflymed wæs.
 14.208.30. Wæs æfterfylgend his rices Anna geworden Eanes
sunu of heora cyningcynne; wæs god monn & þæs betstan tudres
cennend/, bi ðon her æfter in heora tiid is to secgenne.
 14.208.32. Ond he seolfa æfter þon from þam ilcan
hæðnan cyninge Mercna, from þæm eac his foregenga, ofslegen wæs.
 14.210.3. Mid ðy ðe Sigeberht þa gyta rice hæfde, cwom of
Hibernia Scotta ealonde halig wer sum, þæs noma wæs Furseus.
 14.210.4. Se wæs in wordum & dædum beorht & scinende,
swelce he wæs in æðelum mægenum mære geworden.
 14.210.6. Wilnade he, þætte he swa hwær swa he gelimplice
stowe findan meahte, þæt he wolde for Godes noman in elþeodignisse
lifian.
 14.210.8. Þa cwom he in Eastengla mægðe, & he wæs
from þæm foresprecenan cyninge arwyrðlice onfongen.
 14.210.9. Ond sona fylgde þæs weorc, þæt him gewunelic
wæs, þæt he godspellice lare lærde; & monige he mid bysene his
mægenes & mid his wordes trymnesse ungeleafsume to Cristes geleafan
getrymede.
 14.210.13. Þa wæs he þær mid sume untrymnesse his
lichoman þread, in þære he geearnade þæt he wæs brucende
engellicre gesyhðe.
 14.210.15. In þære he wæs monad, þæt he geornlice
ætfele þære ongunnan þegnunge þæs godcundan wordes & his
þæm gewunelican wæccenum & gebedum geornlice þeawe; forðon him
cuð forðfor toweard wære & ungewiis seo tid þære ilcan
forðfore, bi ðon Drihten cwæð: Waciað ge, forðon þe ge ne weoton
ne ðone dæg ne ða tide.
 14.210.19. Þa wæs se Godes monn mid þa gesihðe swiðe
getrymed: ongon þa hrædlice timbran þa stowe þæs mynstres, þe he
from þam foresprecenan cyninge onfeng Sigeberhte, & þæt mid
regellicum þeodscipum stæfnde.
 14.210.23. Wæs fæger mynster getimbred in wuda neah sæ in
sumre ceastre, seo is nemned on Englisc Cnoferesburg.
 14.210.24. Þa burg eft æfter þon Anna þære mægðe
cyning & monige æðele menn mid hearum getimbrum & geofum
frætwade & weorðade.
 14.210.26. Wæs þes wer Furseus of þæm æþelestan
cynne Scotta; ac feor micele þæt he wæs on his moode æðelra
þonne on woruldgebyrdum, ond from þære seolfan tide his cneohthada
þæt he micle gemænne hæfde haligra leornunga & eac swilce
mynsterlicra þeodscipa.
 14.210.30. & þætte swiþost halgum gedafenað, eall þa
ðe he geleornade to donne, he bighygdelice teolode to healdanne.
 14.212.1. Þa wæs forðgongendre tide, þæt he him syndrig
wiic getimbrade, in þæm he freolslice meahte lifian.
 14.212.2. Þær he wæs mid untrymnesse lichoman þread, swa
swa seo boc sagað, seo is awriten be his life, & sweotolice cyðeð,
þæt he wæs alæded of lichoman & from æfenne oð honcred,
ðæt he wæs lichoman ongyrwed & þa engla weorod & heora onsyne
sceawode.
 14.212.6. Ond he gegearnode, þæt he þa eadigan herenesse eac
gehyrde, hu heo God lofodon & heredon.
 14.212.7. Wæs his gewuna þæt he sægde, þæt he
openlice heo gehyrde betweoh monig oðer hleoðrian & singan: <foreign>Ibunt
sancti de uirtute in uirtutem; uidebitur Ds Deorum in Sion</foreign>: halige gongað of
mægene in mægen; bið gesegen haligra God in wlite sceawunge.
 14.212.11. Þa wæs he eft læded in lichoman ; & þy
ðriddan dæge eft wæs of lichoman alæded.
 14.212.12. Þa geseah he nales þæt an þa maran gefean
þara eadigra gasta, ac swylce eac þa mæstan gefleoto & gewinn þara
wærgra gasta.
 14.212.14. Ða fliton him on þa wergan gastas & þa mid
gelomlicum oncunnissum teoledon, þæt heo him þone heofonlican weg
forsette & fortynde; ne heo hwædre owiht in þon fromedon, ac þa
englas hine scyldon.
 14.212.18. Mid þy he ða wæs in heannisse ahefen, þa wæs
he haten from þæm englum, þe hine læddon, þæt he locode in
þeosne middangeard; & he þa his eagan begde & locode hider on þas
niðerlecan.
 14.212.20. Þa geseah he swa þeostre dene ane under him in
niþernesse gesette.
 14.212.22. Geseah he eac feower fyr onæled on þære lyfte
noht micle fæce betweoh him tosceaden.
 14.212.23. Þa frægn he ða englas, hwæt þa fyr
wæron.
 14.212.24. Cwædon heo: þis syndon þa fyr, þa ðe
middangeard wæron forbærnende & forneomende.
 14.212.25. An is ærest lyges fyr; þæt is, þæt we no
gefyllað, þæt we æt fulwihte hatað, þæt we deofle
wiðsæcen & eallum his weorcum.
 14.212.27. Oðer is unrihtre willunge fyr, þæt is, þonne we
þisses middangeardes welan foresettað & us leofran lætað, þon
þa lufan þara heofonlicra eadignessa.
 14.212.29. Þæt þridde is, unsibbe fyr, þæt is, þonne
we ne forhtiað, þæt we þa mod abelge ussa þara neahstena on idlum
þingum.
 14.212.31. Þæt feorðe is arleasnisse fyr, þæt is
þonne we us for noht doþ, þæt we earme men reafige & strude on
heora æhtum & on heora godum.
 14.214.1. Þa weoxon þa fyr swiðe & heo togædre
þeoddon & somnodon, oð þæt heo wæron in æne unmætne
læg geanede & gesomnade.
 14.214.3. Mid þy þæt fyr him nealecte, þa wæs he him
ondrædende & forht geworden; cwæð to þæm engle: Min domne,
hwæt is þis fyr?
 14.214.5. Me swiðe nealæceð.
 14.214.5. & he þa him ondsworede & cwæð: þæt
þu ær ne bærndest, ne beorneð þæt in ðe.
 14.214.7. Forðon þeah ðe þis fyr sy egeslic & micel
gesegen, hwæðre hit æfter weorca gegearnunge anra gehwylcne demeð
& bærneð; forðon anra gehwylces unrihtwillunge in þeossum fyre
byrneð.
 14.214.10. Forðon swa swiðe swa hwylc mon byrneð in lichoman
þurh unalyfedne willan, swa eft onlysed þy lichoman byrneð þurh
þæt gescyldgade wite.
 14.214.12. Þa geseah he ænne of þæm þreom ænglum,
þa ðe him in æghwæðre gesyhð latteowas wæron, foregongende in
þone leg þæs fyres todælan.
 14.214.14. & þa twegen him twa healfe flugon, & hine
scildon wið þæs fyres frecelnisse.
 14.214.15. Geseah he eac swylce þa wergan gastas þurh þæt
fyr fleogende; & heo bærnisse gefeht timbredon wið soðfæstum.
 14.214.17. & heo þa eac wið him wæron, & hi wrohtas
& yfel onsægdon: ac wæs mara gesyhð þara godra gasta &
heofonlicra weoroda þara þe hine scyldon.
 14.214.19. Swylce he þær eac halige weras of his cynne gemitte
& oncneow þa ðe geara in sacerdhade æðelice gewelgode wæron
& hlisan hæfdon, þæt heo Gode georne hyrden.
 14.214.22. From þæm he monig þing gehyrde, þa ðe ge him
sylfum ge eallum þæm, þe hit gehyran woldon, swiðe halwende wæron
to weotonne.
 14.214.24. Þa heo þa heora word & spræce geendedon,
& swelce eft mid þæm engelicum gastum to heofonum hwurfen, þa
wunedon mid þy eadigan Fursiæ þa þry englas, be þon we ær
sædon.
 14.214.27. Mid þy heo þa eft geneolecton þam foresprecenan
fyre & þam miclan, þa todælde se engel eft þone leg þæs fyres
fore him, swa swa he ær dyde.
 14.214.29. Ac se Godes mon, þæs þe he to þære dura
openan betweoh þa legeas becwom, ða gegreopon þa unclænan gastas
ænne of þam monnum, þe heo in þæm fyre bærndon &
þræston, & wurpon swa beornendne on hine; & he gehran his sculdra
& his ceacan, & hine swa forbærndon.
 14.214.33. Þa onget he þone mon, & him to gemynde becwom,
þæt he his hrægle onfeng, þa he forðgeleored wæs.
 14.216.1. Ða genom se engel sona þone mon; wearp eft in
þæt fyr.
 14.216.2. Cwæð he se werga feond: Ne willað la wiðscufan
þone, ðe ge ær onfengon.
 14.216.3. Forðon swa swa ge ær his synfullan gode onfengon,
swa ge sculon dælneomende beon his wiita.
 14.216.4. Þa wiðcwæð him se engel: Nese, cwæð he, ne
onfeng/ he his godum gitsiende, ac forþon þe he wolde his sawle
gehælan.
 14.216.6. Ond blon þæt fyr from him.
 14.216.7. Þa cerde se engel to him & cwæð: þæt þu
onbærndest, þæt beorneð be ðe; forðon gif þu þisses monnes
fea in his synnum deades ne onfenge, ne burne his wiite on þe.
 14.216.9. Ond he wæs se engel monig þing sprecende to him,
& mid halwende worde lærde, hwæt ymb þara hælo to donne wære,
þa ðe æt þam deaðe heora synna hreowe dydon.
 14.216.12. & þa wæs æfter medmiclum fæce eft in
lichoman geseted.
 14.216.13. & ealle his lifes tiid þæt tacen þære
bærnnisse, þæt he on his sawle aræfnde, gesenelice eallum monnum in
his sculdre & his ceacan on bær; ond wundorlice gemete, þætte seo
sawl in deagolnisse þrowiende wæs, þæt se lichoma eawesclice
foretacnode.
 14.216.17. Þa gemde se Godes mon symle georne, swa his gewuna
wæs þæt he ær dyde; eallum monnum mægena weorc æghwæðer
ge mid bysenum æteawde ge mid wordum bodade.
 14.216.19. & toendebyrdnesse his gesihða þæm monnum anum
hit cyþan & secgan wolde, þa ðe hine frugnon & ahsodon fore
þæm luste inbrydnisse & heofona rices lufan.
 14.216.22. Is nu gena sum ald broðor lifiende usses mynstres, se
me sægde, cwæð se þe ðas booc wrat, þæt him sægde sum
swiðe æfest monn & geþungen þæt he ðone Furseum gesege in
Eastengla mægðe, & þa his gesihðe æt his seolfes muðe
gehyrde.
 14.216.26. & þa gen toætecte þæt hit wære wintres
tiid; & se winter wære grim & cald & fyrstig & mid hiise
gebunden.
 14.216.27. Cwæð þæt se halga wer sæte in þynnum
hrægle, & betweoh þa his geseagone fore micelnisse þæs gemyndigan
eges his gesyhða þæt he swa swiðe swætte swa in swole middes
sumeres.
 14.216.31. He þes Godes wer monig ger ærest in Scottum allum
þæm Godes word bodode & lærde.
 14.216.32. Ða ne meahte he eaðelice þa unstillnesse
onfallendra mengu aberan, þa forlet he eal þa ðing, þe he for worulde
hæfde, for Godes naman, & eac of his eðle gewat: & mid feawum
broðrum þurh Brettas cwom in Eastengle mægðe, & þær Godes
word bodade & lærde, swa swa we ær sægdon, & æðele
mynster getimbrede.
 14.218.4. Þa he þæt hæfde mynsterlice & þeawlice
geseted, þa wilnade he hine seolfne from eallum bigongum þisse worulde
fremðne gedon.
 14.218.6. Forlet þa ða scire þæs mynstres Fullane his
breðer & twæm mæssepreostum Gobbona & Dicula; ond he from
eallum middangeardes þingum freo in ancorlifes drohtunge gestihhade his life
geendian.
 14.218.9. Hæfde eac oðerne broðor, se wæs haten Ultanus,
se of dæghwamlicre gecostnisse þæs mynstres becwom to ancorlife.
 14.218.11. & he eall ger mid him in micelre forhæfdnesse
& gebedum & on hongewinnum lifde.
 14.218.13. Æfter þissum he geseah þa mægðe mid
hæðenra hergungum gedrefde, ond he foreseah Godes cirican & mynstrum
micle frecelnisse toworde; þa forlet he þa mægðe & ofer sæ
lað in Gallia rice.
 14.218.16. Ond he þær from Hloðwiæ Froncna cyninge &
Erconwalde his aldormen arwyrðlice onfongen wæs, & þær mynster
getimbrede in þære stowe, þe nemned is Latiniaco.
 14.218.18. Þa wæs efter medmicelum fæce, þæt he wæs
untrymnesse gestonden, & on þære his dagas geendade.
 14.218.20. & his lichoman se ilca ealdormon Eorconwald onfeng,
& in portice his cirican sumre geheold, þa he in his tune getimbrode,
þæs noma is Perrona, oð þæt seo cirice gehalgod wære.
 14.218.23. Þa wæs geworden æfter seofon & twentegum
daga, þa dydon heo his lichoman up of þam portice, & in circan neah
wiigbede byrgan woldon.
 14.218.25. Þa wæs he meted swa unsceðed, swa he in þa
ilcan tid of þissum leohte gelæded wære.
 14.218.26. Þa wæs æfter feower wintrum eft, þæt mon
oðre cirican getimbrede: & him eallum þuhte þæt hit gerisenre
wære, þæt his lichoman mon gesette to eastdæle þæs wigbedes.
 14.218.29. Þa gena he buton womme gebrosnunge wæs gemeted,
& heo hine þa ðær mid wyrðre are gesetton.
 14.218.30. Ond þær his geearnunge oft þurh godcunde
wyrcnesse mid miclum mægenum scinað & beorhtað.
 14.220.1. Betweoh ðas ðing ða forðferdum Felice Eastengla
biscope æfter seofontyne gearum his þæs onfangnan biscophades, Honorius
se ærcebiscop in his stowe gehalgode Thomam his diacon to biscope, se wæs
of Gyrwa mægðe.
 14.220.4. & þes wæs æfter fif gearum his biscophade of
þissum leohte alæded.
 14.220.5. Þa wæs Berhtgels, oðre noman Bonefatius, of
Cantwara mægðe in his stowe to biscope geseted.
 14.220.7. Ond he ða swylce Honorius se ærcebiscop, æfter
þon þe he þa gemæro his yrnes gefylde, of þissum leohte leorde,
ærran dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Octobrium</foreign> ymb syx hund wintra & þreo &
fiftig from Drihtnes menniscnesse.
 14.220.10. Ond þa blonn se biscophad eall ger & þæs
oðres syx moonað.
 14.220.11. Þa wæs gecoren sexta ærcebiscop Deosdedit to
þæm seðle Contwara burge, se wæs of Westseaxna ðeode; þane cwom
þider to halgianne Itthamar se biscop þære cirican æt Hrofesceastre.
 14.220.14. Þa wæs he gehalgad þy seofoðan dæge
<foreign>Kalendarum Aprelium</foreign>, ond he þa cirican heold & rehte nigon ger &
feower monað & twegen dagas.
 14.220.16. Ond him forðferdum Itthamar gehalgode Damianum for
hine, se wæs of Suðseaxna cynne cumen.
 15.220.20. Þissum tidum Middelengle mid Peadan Pendan sunu
þæs cyninges Cristes geleafan & soðfæstnisse geryne onfengon.
 15.220.21. Wæs he Peada ging æðeling good & cyninges
noman & hada wel wyrðe; & se fæder him forðon rice gesealde
þære þeode.
 15.220.23. Þa com he to Oswiæ Norðanhymbra cyninge, &
bæd þæt he him Ealhflæde his dohtor to wife gesealde.
 15.220.25. Ne hine mon on oðre wisan his bene tygþian wolde,
nemne he Cristes geleafan onfenge mid þa ðeode, þe he cyning ofer
wæs.
 15.220.27. Þa he ða gehyrde soðfæstnesse bodunge &
lare & þæt gehat þæs heofonlican rices & ærest hyht &
þa toweardan undeaðlicnesse, þa ondette he, þæt he lustlice wolde
Cristen beon, þeah ðe he no furðum þa fæmnan onfenge.
 15.220.31. Ond he wæs swiðust gesponen to onfonne Cristes
geleafan from Oswies suna þæs cyninges, þæs noma wæs Alhfrið.
 15.220.32. Se wæs his mæg & his freond; hæfde his
sweostor to wife, seo wæs haten Cyneburg Pendan dohtor þæs cyninges.
 15.222.3. Þa wæs he gefulwad from Finano þæm biscope mid
eallum his geferum, þe mid him cwomon, & cyninges þegnum & eallum
heora þeowum, in þæm mæran tune cyninges, se is nemned æt Walle.
 15.222.6. & he onfeng, & se cyning him sealde feower
mæssepreostas, þa sceoldon his þeode fulwian & læran, ða
wæron ge on gelærednesse ge on heora life micle & goode; ond he mid
micle gefean swa wæs eft ham hweorfende.
 15.222.9. Wæron þa mæssepreostas þus hatne, Cedd &
Adda & Bete & Deoma.
 15.222.10. Se nyhsta wæs Scyttisces cynnes; þa oðre wæron
Englisce.
 15.222.11. Wæs se Adda Uttan broðor þæs mæran
mæssepreostes & abbudes þæs mynstres, þe nemned is æt
Rægeheafde, þæs we ær gemyndgodon.
 15.222.13. Þa heo þa þa gemyndgedan sacerdas in þa
mægðe cwomon mid Peadan þone cyning, & þær Godes word bodedan
& lærdon, & heo lustlice geherde wæron, ond dæghwamlice ge
æðele ge unæðele wiðsocan þære unsyfernesse deofolgilda &
mid fulwihte bæðe from synnum aðwegene wæron.
 15.222.18. Ne bewerede Penda se cyning þon ma, gif hwelce men
wolde in Mercna cynne Godes word læran, þæt heo ne mosten.
 15.222.20. Ac gen ma þætte he forseah & on hete hæfde
þa men, þe he onget, þæt heo on Cristes geleafan gelærde wæron,
& þa weorc þæs geleafan habban ne woldon.
 15.222.22. Ond cwæð, þæt heo fracuðe & earme
wære, þæt heo ne woldon heora Gode hyran, þone þe heo gelyfden.
 15.222.25. Wæron þas þing ongunnen twæm gearum ær
Pendan deaðe þæs cyninges.
 15.222.26. Ac þa he ofslegen wæs, & Oswie se cristna
cyning to his riice feng, swa we eft heræfter secgað, þa wæs Deoma
aan of þæm feower foresprecenan sacerdotum biscop geworden Middelengla
& eac Mercna somod; forðon seo feanis nedde þara sacerda, þætte
aan biscop sceolde beon ofer tuu folc.
 15.222.30. & he ða in medmicelre tiide micel folc Drihtne
begeat & gestrynde þurh his lare.
 15.222.31. Ond he forðferde in Middelenglum in þæm
þeodlonde, þe is nemned in Feppingum.
 15.222.33. Þa feng æfter him to biscophade Ceolloh, se wæs
eac Scotta cynnes.
 15.222.34. Se æfter medmicelre tide forlet þa biscopscire;
hwearf eft on his eðel to Hii þæm ealonde, þæt monigra mynstra
heannisse & heafod Scottas hæfdon.
 15.224.2. Þa feng æfter him to þam biscophade Trumhere
æfest mon & god, se wæs in munuclife gelæred; wæs Englisces
cynnes, ac he wæs from Scottum to biscope gehalgod.
 15.224.5. Þæt wæs in Wulfheres tidum þæs cyninges, bi
þæm we heræfter secgað.
 16.224.7. Ðære tide eac swylce Eastseaxan þone geleafan,
þe hy geara awurpon, þa heo Mellitum þone biscop ut ascufon, mid
gyrnfulnesse Oswiæs þæs cyninges eft onfengon.
 16.224.9. Forðon se cyning þære ilcan þeode Sigeberht, se
æfter þam oðrum Sigeberhte riice onfeng, wæs freond Oswiæs
þæs cyninges.
 16.224.11. & he geloomlice to him cwom, & hine sohte in
norðanhymbra mægðe.
 16.224.12. Þa gewunade oswia se cyning, þæt he hine trymede
& lærde, þætte he ongete þætte ne meahten godo beon, þa ðe
monna hondum geworhte wæron of eorðlicum timbre, oðþe of treom,
oðþe of stanum: þara trea æcyrfe & lafe oðþe fyre forbærnde
wæron, oðþe in hwylchwugu fatu geheowad wæren mennisces broces,
oððe cuðlice utworpen wæren & in forhogdnisse hæfde, &
fotum treden & in eorðan gehwyrfde wæron.
 16.224.22. Ac God ma wære to ongeotanne in þrymme
unbesændlicne, menniscum eagum ungesenelicne, almeahtigne, ecne, se gescop
heofon & eorðan & monna cyn & ealle gesceafta, ond wære
toweard to demanne eorðan ymbhwyrft on rihtwisnesse: ond þæs seðel
wære ece to gelyfenne in heofonum, nales in eorðlicre frætwednesse, in
gewitendre & on uðgengre: ond þæt wære rihtlic to ongeotanne,
þætte ealle þa ðe his willan leornode & worhte, from þæm þe
hy gescepene wæron, þæt heo þonne wæren from him ece mede to
onfonne.
 16.224.26. Ðas word & eac monig þysses gemetes mid þy
Osweo se cyning Sigeberhte þam cyninge mid freondlicre & mid
broðorlicre geþeahte oft & gelome tospræc, þa æt nehstan mid
fultume & mid geþafunge his freonda þæt he gelyfde.
 16.224.30. Ond þa hæfde geþeaht mid his weotum &
freondum, & mid heora trymnesse & fultume & geþafunge Cristes
geleafan onfeng, ond mid his geferum gefulwad wæs from Finano ðæm
biscope in þæm cynelecan tuune, þe we beforan gemyngodon, þe is nemned
æt Walle.
 16.226.2. Is se bi þam walle, þe geara Romani Breotone ealond
bigyrdon, twelf milum from eastsæ.
 16.226.4. Ono þa Sigeberht se cyning þa wæs ceasterwara
gefremed þæs ecan rice, & wolde eft þæt seðl secan his
hwiilwendlices riices, þa bæd he Osweo þone cyning, þæt he him
hwylcehwego lareowas sealde, þa ðe his þeode to Cristes geleafan gecerde,
& mid þa halwendan wyllan fulwihtes bæðes aþwoge.
 16.226.8. Ond he ða se cyning sende ærendwrecan to
Middelenglum, & him to geheht Cedd þone halgan Godes mon, & him
sealde oþerne geferan sumne mæssepreost to fultome, & heo sende Godes
word bodian Eastseaxna þeode.
 16.226.12. Þæs þe heo þa eal þa lond þurhferdon &
micle cirican & gesomnunge Drihtne gestryndon & begeaton, þa gelomp
sumre tide, þætte Cedd ham ferde & cwom to his cirican to Lindisfarena
ea fore sprece Finano þæs biscopes.
 16.226.15. Þa he þa se biscop onget, þæt he þære
godspellican lare georne gefealh & þa ðeode to Cristes geleafan
gecerred hæfde, þa gehadode he hine Eastseaxum to biscope, & to him
geheht oðre twegen biscopas to þære þegnunge his halgunge.
 16.226.19. Ða he ða hæfde biscophade onfongen, þa hwearf
he eft to Eastseax na mægðe & mid maran aldorlicnesse þæt
ongunnene/ weorc wæs gefyllende; timbrede cirican in monegum stowum, &
mæssepreostas & diaconas halgode, þa þe him on godcundre lare &
in þære þegnunge fulwihte bæðes fulteman scolde, ond swiþust in
þære stowe þe is nemned Yðþanceaster & in oðer stowe, þe is
nemned Tulaburg .
 16.226.25. Seo ærre stow is in Pente stæðe þære ea,
oðer is in Temese stæðe.
 16.226.26. In þæm he gesomnode micel weorod Cristes þeowa,
& heo lærde to healdanne regollices liifes þeodscipe, swa swiðe swa
þa neowan Cristnan þa get hit neoman meahton.
 16.226.29. Mid þy þa micelre tide in þære foresprecenan
mægðe, gefeondum þam cyninge & efengefeondum allum þam folce, seo
gesetenes þæs heofonlican lifes dæghwamlice toecnesse nom, þa gelomp,
inbryrdendum þæm feonde ealra goda, þæt se cyning þurh his mæga
hond wæs ofslegen.
 16.226.33. Wæron twegen gebroðor, þe þis man gefremedon.
 16.226.34. Mid þy heo mon þa eft frægn, for hwon heo þis
dydon, ne meahton heo owiht elles ondswarian, nemne þæt heo forþon yrre
wære & þæm cyninge feond, forðon he gewunode, þæt he his
feondum swiðe arode & þa gefremedan teonan fram him, sona þæs þe
heo him þingodan & forgifnesse bædon, þæt he smylte mode &
bliðe him forlet.
 16.228.5. Þyslic wæs seo syn, þe se cyning fore ofslegen
wæs, forð on he þa godspellican bebodu mid wilsume heortan heold &
læste.
 16.228.7. Hwæðre in þæm unscyldgan deaðe wæs his
soð syn witnad æfter forecwide þæs godan weres þæs halgan
biscopes.
 16.228.9. Forðon oðer þara gesiða, þe þone cyning
slogon, hæfde unalyfedne gesinscipe.
 16.228.10. Þa se biscop þæt þa ne meahte bewerian ond
gereccan, þa amænsumade he hine, & eallum bebead, þam þe him hyran
woldon, þæt heo in his hus ne eodon, ne of his swæsendum mete þege.
 16.228.13. Þa oferhogode se cyning his gebod; gelaðode se
gesið hine to his ham, & he hine gesohte & in his hus eode, & his
swæsendo þegde.
 16.228.15. Þa he þa onweg þonan ferde, þa com se biscop him
togeanes.
 16.228.16. Þa se cyning him þa on beseah, þa wæs he forht
geworden & lihte of his horse & feol him to fotum, & his scylde
forgifenesse bæd.
 16.228.18. Þa lihte se biscop eac somod ætgædre; & he
eorre þone cyning liggende gehran mid þære gyrde, þe he him on honda
hæfde.
 16.228.20. & mid biscoplicre aldorlicnesse wæs cyþende,
& þus cwæð: Ic þe secgo, cwæð he, forðon þu ne woldest
þec ahebban from þam huse þysses forlorenan mannes & þæs
geniþredan, þæt þu scealt in þæm sylfan huse sweltan & deaþ
þrowigan.
 16.228.23. Ac to gelyfanne is, þæt swylc deað þæs
æfestan monnes nales þæt an swylce synne adilgode, ac swylce eac his
geearnunge toycte; forðon him swa gelomp for arfæstnesse intingan &
for gehylde Cristes beboda.
 16.228.27. Þa feng æfter Sigeberhte to Eastseaxna rice
Swiðhelm Sexbaldes sunu, se wæs gefulwad from þam sylfan Cedde in
Eastengla mægðe in þæm cynelican tune, þe is nemned Rendlesham.
 16.228.29. & hine onfeng æt fulwihte baðe him to godsuna
æðelwold Eastengla cyning Annan broðor heora cyninges.
 17.230.1. Wæs ðisses ilcan godes monnes gewuna, þa he in
Eastseaxum biscopþegnunge brucende wæs, þæt he gelomlice his leode
Norðanhymbra mægðe sohte & neosode fore intingan godcundre lare.
 17.230.3. Þa hine þa æðelwald geseah Oswaldes sunu
þæs cyninges, se hæfde Dera riice, & ongeat haligne wer &
snotorne & gecorenne on his þeawum, þa bæd he hine, þæt he
sumne dæl londes æt him onfenge, þæt he meahte mynster getimbran
& Godes þeowas tosomnigan; in þæm se cyning gelomlice his gebedo
meahte gesecan & godcunde lare gehyran, & eac þonne he forðferde,
þæt he þær bebyrged beon sceolde.
 17.230.10. Ond cwæð, þæt he getreowlice gelyfde, þæt
he meahte swiðe gefultumed beon in heora dæghwamlicum gebeodum, þa ðe
in þære stowe Drihtne þeowdon.
 17.230.12. Hæfde he se ilca cyning þæs biscopes broðor
mid hine, se wæs Cælin haten; se wæs mæssepreost & efenlice
Godes mon til: se him & his hiwum godcunde lare lærde, & þa geryno
þegnade þæs halgan geleafan.
 17.230.15. Þurh þæs cyðþo swiþost gelomp, þæt se
cyning þone biscop lufade & cuðæ.
 17.230.16. Þa gefultmode se biscop þæs cyninges willan,
& him stowe geceas mynster to getimbrigenne in heawum morum uppe, in
þæm wæs ma gesegen sceaðena deagolnesse & wildeora fernisse
þonne monna eardungstow.
 17.230.20. Ða æfter Esaies witedome, in þæm cleofum, þe
ær dracan eardodon, wære upyrnende grownes hreodes & rixa: þæt
is to ongeotonne, þætte acende wæron wæstmas godra dæda, þær
ær oðþe wildeor eardedon oððe mæn wunedon wildeorlice lifigan.
 17.230.24. Ða teolode sona se Drihtnes wer þa onfongnan stowe
þæs mynstres ærest mid gebedum & mid fæstenum from unsyfernessum
heo clænsigan þara ærrena mana & bismitenessa, ond swa in þære
stowe þa staðolas sette þæs mynstres.
 17.230.27. Bæd þa þone cyning, þæt him spede &
lyfnesse sealde, þæt he ðær wunigan moste for intingan his gebeda
alle tid þæs feowerteglecan fæstenes ær Eastrum, þe ða toweard
wæs.
 17.230.30. Ond eallum þam dagum buton Sunnandagum he afæste
to æfenes, swa swa his þeaw wæs; ne þonne nemne medmicel dæl
hlafes & an henne æg mid litle meolc wætre gemengede he onfeng.
 17.232.3. & þeah cwæð he, þætte þæt wære
heora gewuna, from þæm he þæt gemet geleornade regollices
þeodscipes, þætte þa onfongnan neowan stowe mynster to timbrenne
oðþe cirican þætte þa sceolde ærest mid gebedum & mid
fæstenum Drihtne gehalgian.
 17.232.6. Mid þy þa ten dagas þæs feowerteglecan
fæstenes to lafe wæron, cwom ærendwraca, se ðe hine to cyninge feran
het.
 17.232.8. & he ða bæd Cynebill his mæssepreost, se
wæs eac swylce his agen broðor, þæt he ða arfæstan ongynnisse
his gefylde & geendade, þa he ne moste, þy læs þæt æfest
weorc forlæten wære for intingan þara cynelicra scira.
 17.232.12. Ond he him þa lustlice geþafode: & gefylledre
geornfulnisse þara fæstenna & gebeoda, getimbrede þær mynster,
þæt is nu geceged Læstinga ea.
 17.232.14. & he hit mid æfestum þeawum gesette &
gestaðolode æfter þam þeawum in Lindisfarena ea, þær he afeded
wæs.
 17.232.16. Þa he ða monig ger in þære foresprecenan
mægðe biscophad þegnade, swylce eac þisses mynstres gemænne dyde,
& þær prafost & ealdormon gesette, þa gelomp þætte he to
þæm seolfan mynstre becwom in þa tide þære miclan deaðlicnesse
& wooles, þe ofer moncyn cumen wæs.
 17.232.20. Þa wæs he þær gestonden lichomlicre
untrymnesse & forðferde: & his lichoma wæs ærest ute bebyrged.
 17.232.21. Ða wæs eft forðgongendre tide in þæm ilcan
mynstre stænen cirice getimbred, in are þære eadigan fæmnan Sancta
Marian, ond eft in þære his lichoma geseted wæs, be suðan þam
wigbede.
 17.232.25. Sealde he se biscop þæt mynster to reccenne
æfter him Ceaddan his breðer, se wæs æfter þon biscop geworden
& halig Godes mon, swa we heræfter secgað.
 17.232.27. Wæron heo feower gebroðor Cedd & Cynebil &
Cælin & Ceadda, ealle Godes sacerdas, þæt seldon gemeted bið,
mære & gode.
 17.232.29. Twegen wæron biscopas, twegen wæron
mæssepreostas þa selestan.
 17.232.30. Mid þy þa broðor þa gehyrdon, þa þe in his
mynstre wæron in Eastseaxna mægðe, heora biscop forðferendne &
bebyrgedne in Norðanhymbrum, þa eode heora þritig of þam mynstre &
þider cwomon.
 17.232.33. Woldon heo & willnadan æt heora fæder lice
oðþe Gode lifgan, gif þæt Gode licade, oðþe forðferde þær
bebyrged beon.
 17.234.2. & heo lustlice from þam broðrum þæs mynstres
onfongne wæron.
 17.234.3. Ond heo ealle þær mid þy wæle þæs
foresprecenan wooles hredlice forðferdon & bebyrgede wæron, buton anum
cneohte, be þæm cuð stondeð, þæt he mid gebedum þæs halgan
biscopes from deaðe gescylded wæs.
 17.234.6. Forðon mid þy he micelre tide æfter lifde &
georne halig gewreotu leornade & smeade, þa æt nyhstan onget he &
geleornade in gaste, þæt he ne wæs mid wætre fulwihtes bæðes
Gode to bearne acenned.
 17.234.9. Ond sona wæs mid þa wyllan þæs halwendan
bæðes from synnum aðwegen, ond æfter fæce geþah, þæt hine
mon to mæssepreoste gehalgode: & he monegum in Godes ciricum nytt &
bryce wæs.
 17.234.12. Bi þæm menn nis to tweogienne, ac is to gelyfenne,
swa we ær cwædon, þæt he mid þa þingunge his fæder wæs
gescylded from þære tide þæs deaþes, to ðæs lichoman he for
intingan his lufan cwom, to ðon þætte he æghwæðer ge þone ecan
deað beswicade, ond swylce eac oðrum broðrum lifes þegnunge & ecre
hælo þurh his lare & þurh his lifes bysene gegearwode.
 18.234.18. Þissum tidum Osweo se cyning, mid þy he grimme
hergunge & unaræfnedlice þrowade þæs oft cwedenan Mercna
cyninges Pendan, se eac his broðor ofslog, þa æt nyshstan wæs he mid
neade gebæded, þæt he him gebead & gehet wið his sibbe unrim
maðma & cynelicra geofona, ma þonne fela monna gelyfan mægge, wið
þon þe he ham cerde mid his fyrde & his lond & his riice oð
forwyrd ne forhergode.
 18.234.24. Mid þy he ða se getreowleasa cyning nænige
þinga his benum geþafian wolde, se ðe þæt on his mode gehogod &
geteod hæfde, þæt he wolde ealle his þeode from þæm geongrum
oð þa yldran fordon & fordilgian, ða beseah he to fultome þære
godcundan arfæstnisse, þa he from þam arleasan cyninge nænige sibbe
findan meahte.
 18.234.28. Ond he þa wæs mid gehate hine seolfne bindende,
& þus cwæð: Nu se hæðna ne con usse gife onfon, wuton we þam
syllan & bringan, þe onfon con, ussum Drihtne Hælendum Criste.
 18.234.31. Ond he þa gehet, gif Drihten him sige sellan wolde,
þæt he wolde his dohtor Gode forgeofan & gehalgian in clænum
mægðhade; ond swelce eac twelf boclanda æhte þæt he Gode geaf
mynster on to timbrenne: & swa medmicle weorode þæt he to þam compe
ferde.
 18.236.3. Is þæt sægd, þæt þa hæðnan þritigum
siða mare weorod hæfdon; þæm Osweo se cyning mid Alhfriðe his sunu
wæs getreowende in Cristes fultum mid medmicle weorode him togegnes cwom.
 18.236.6. Forðon Ecgferð his oðer sunu in þa tid in Mercna
lande mid Cynwisse þa cwene wæs to gisle geseald.
 18.236.7. Æþelwald þonne Oswaldes sunu þæs cyninges, se
þe him on fultome beon sceolde, se wæs in þara wiðerweardra dæle
& feaht & wonn wið his eðle & wið his fædran.
 18.236.10. Ða wæs sona, þæs þe heo þæt gefeoht
ongunnon, þætte þa hæðnan wæron slegene & geflemde; ond
þritig aldormonna & heretogena, þa ðe þam cyninge to fultome
cwomon, lytesne ealle wæron ofslegene.
 18.236.13. In þæm wæs Æðelhere Annan broðor
Eastengla cyninges, se æfter him to rice feng: se wæs ordfruma þæs
gefeohtes.
 18.236.15. Þone mon slog eac mid ealle his compweorode, þe he
mid him brohte.
 18.236.16. Ond forþon, þa ðis gefeoht neah Winwede streame
wæs gefohten, wæs seo ea þa for regna micelnesse swiðe reðe, &
heofonflod micel onsæt, þa gelomp, ða heo fleonde wæron, þæt
þær micle ma moncynnes adronc on þam wætre, þonne mid sweorde
ofslegen wære.
 18.236.21. Þa dyde Osweo se cyning, æfter þon þe he
Drihtne gehet, & for ðan forgifenan sige Gode þonc sægde, ond
ælfflæde his dohtor Gode forgef, & him gehalgode ecre clænnisse.
 18.236.23. Ond eac swilce þa twelf boclond him gefreode
eorðlices comphades & eorðlicre herenisse to bigongenne þone
heofonlican comphad, & to munucstowum gesette, & him weoruldspede &
æhte forgeaf, þæt heo scoldon for hine þingian & for sibbe his
þeode.
 18.236.27. Wæs þæs londes ealles hundtwelftig hida, syxtig
in Dera mægðe, syxtig in Beornicum.
 18.236.28. Þa eode seo foresprecene dohtor Oswies þæs
cyninges Gode gehalgod in þæt mynster, þe is nemned Heorot ea, in
þæm wæs in þa tid Hilde abbudesse.
 18.236.31. Seo æfter twæm gearum gebohte tyn hida lond hire
in æhte in þære stowe, seo is cweden Streoneshealh, ðær heo
mynster getimbrode, in þæm seo gemyngade cyninges dohtor ærest wæs
discipula & leornungmon regollices lifes, ond eft æfter þon wæs
magister & lareow þæs mynstres, oð þæt heora daga rim gefylled
wæs, þæt is anes wonþe syxtig wintra.
 18.238.2. Þa heo to clypnesse & to gemungum þæs
heofonlican brydguman eadig fæmne ineode.
 18.238.4. In þæm mynstre heo & Osweo hire fæder &
hire modor Eanflæd & hire modorfæder Eadwine & monige oðre
æðele in Sancte Petres cirican þæs apostoles bebyrgde wæron.
 18.238.7. Þis gefeoht Osweo se cyning þy þreotteoþan geare
his rices, in þæm londe þe Loidis hatte, þy seofonteoþan dæge
<foreign>Kalendarum Decembrium</foreign> gefremede mid micelre nytnisse æghwæðres
folces.
 18.238.10. Forþon þe he his þeode alesde & generede from
þære feondlican hergunge þara hæðenra, & eac swylce Mercna
þeode & þara neahmægða, ofheawnum þy getreowleasan hæfde
Pendan, to gife Cristes geleafan gecerde.
 18.238.13. Wæs ærest Mercna biscop & Lindesfarena &
Middelengla Deoma geworden, swa we beforan sægdon.
 18.238.15. Se in Middelenglum forðferde & bebyrged wæs.
 18.238.15. Se æftera wæs Cellah, se forlet his
biscopþegnunge in Englum & lifigende to Scottum hwearf.
 18.238.17. Æghwæðer heora wæs Scotta cynnes.
 18.238.17. Se þridda biscop wæs Trumhær, se wæs
Ongolcynnes, ac he wæs gelæred & gehadad from Scottum; se wæs
abbud in þæm mynstre, þe cweden is Ingætlingum.
 18.238.20. Þæt is seo stow, þær Oswine se cyn ing
ofslegen wæs, swa we beforan gemyndgedon.
 18.238.21. Ond forðon Eanflæd seo cwen his mæge fore
geclæsnunge his unrihtes sleges, bæd Osweo þone cyning þæt he
þær forgefe stowe mynster on to timbrenne þæm foresprecenan Godes
þeowe Trumhere forðon þe he eac swylce wæs mæg þæs ofslegenan
cyninges þæt in þæm mynstre wæron singal gebedo for
æghwæðres cyninges ecre hælo, ge þæs ofslegenan ge þæs
þe hine slean het.
 18.238.27. Ono hwæt he þa se ilca cyning Osweo æfter Pendan
slege þreo winter ful Mercna þeode & swylce eac þam oðrum folcum
þara suðmægða in aldordome ofer wæs.
 18.238.30. Ond he swylce eac Peohta þeode of þam mæstan
dæle Ongolcynnes rice underþeodde, & him to hyrnesse geteah.
 18.238.32. In þa tid eac swylce Osweo se cyning geaf & sealde
þam foresprecenan Peadan Pendan suna þæs cyninges, forðon þe he
wæs his mæg, Suðmercna rice, þa seondon, þæs þe men
cweðað, fif þusendo folces: ond þa synd tosceadenne mid Treontan
streame wið Norðmercum, þara londes is seofon þusendo.
 18.240.2. Ac he þa se ilca Peada þy nehstan lenctenne swiðe
manfullice acwald wæs þurh meldunge, þæs þe men secgað, his
agenes wiifes in þære Easterlecan symbelnesse.
 18.240.6. Ono þe ða þreo winter gefylled wæron, æfter
Pendan slege þæs cyninges, þa wunnon & fuhton wið Osweo Mercna
heretogan & aldormen Immen & Eafa & Eadberht; & hofon Wulfhere
Pendan sunu Mercum to cyninge, þone hy geongne ær deogolice heoldon &
hæfdon.
 18.240.10. & awurpon þa ealdormen þæs fremdan cyninges,
& heora land & heora gemæro stronglice geeodon & freodom
onfengon.
 18.240.11. & swa freo heo mid heora cyninge Drihtne Criste
þam soðan cyninge for þam ecan rice in heofonum gefeonde þeowodon.
 18.240.13. Wæs he Wulfhere Mercna cyning seofontyne winter:
& he hæfde ærest Trumhære biscop him to lareowe, be þam we
beforan sægdon.
 18.240.15. Se æftera wæs Gearumon: þridda wæs Ceadda,
feorða Wynferð.
 18.240.17. Ealle þas wæron endebyrdlice in his dæge
biscophada brucende in Mercna þeode.
 19.240.19. Þa wæs geworden ymb syx hund wintra & feower
& syxtig æfter Drihtnes menniscnesse <foreign>eclipsis solis</foreign>, þæt is
sunnan asprungennis, þæt heo sciman ne hæfde: & wæs eatolice on
to seonne.
 19.240.21. Wæs þy þriddan dæge Mai þæs monþes hu
hugu ymb þa teogðan tid dæges.
 19.240.23. Æfter þon swylce wæs þy ylcan geare semninga
wool & aðol forhergiende & forneomende ærest þa suðdælas
Breotone, & swylce eac Norðanhymbra mægðe wæs þreagende, &
mid grimme wæle longe feor & wide grimsigende micle menigeo monna afylde
& fornom.
 19.240.27. Þy wiite eac swylce Tuda Cristes þeow, se wæs
æfter Colmane Norþanhymbra biscop, wæs of middangearde genumen, &
wæs arweorðlice bebyrged in þæm mynstre, þe nemned is
Pæginalæh.
 19.240.30. Þis ylce wiite eac swylce Hibernia Scotta ealond
gelice wæle sloh & cwealmde.
 19.240.31. Wæron þær in þa tiid monige of Ongelþeode ge
æðelinga ge oðerra, þa ðe in þara biscopa tide Finanes &
Colmanes forleton heora eðelturf & þider gewiton, sume for godcundre
leornunge, sume for intingan forhebbendran liifes.
 19.242.3. Ond sume sona in mynsterlicre drohtnunge in regollicum
life getreowlice Drihtne þeowodon; sume geond mynster eodon & him
godcunde lareowas sohton.
 19.242.5. Ond ealle hy Scottas lustlice onfengon & him
dæghwamlice ondlifne buton ceape sealdon, & eac swylce bec on to
leornienne & lareowas orsceattinga gefon & sealdon.
 19.242.9. Betweoh þas wæron twegen geonge æðelingas
micelre gleawnisse men of Ongolþeoðe æþelhun & Ecgberht.
 19.242.10. Se ærra wæs æðelwines broðor Gode þæs
leofan weres, se seolfa eac swilce þære æfterfylgendan eldo Hiberniam
gesohte fore intingan godcundre geleornunge.
 19.242.13. Ond þa he wel gelæred wæs, þa hwearf he eft to
his eðle & wæs biscop geworden in Lindisse londe: & he micle tiide
Godes cirican æðellice & wel heold & reahte.
 19.242.15. Wæron heo in þæm mynstre, þe in Scyttisc is
genemned Rathmelsigi; ond ealle his geferan oðþo in þære
deaðlicnesse þæs wooles of worulde genumene wæron oððe þurh
oðre stowe wæron todælde.
 19.242.18. Þa wæron heo begen mid þa aðle þære ilcan
deaðlicnesse swiðe þreade & hefiglice swencte, & him mon feores
ne wende.
 19.242.20. Þa aras se Ecgberht, swa swa me sum ald mæssepreost
arwyrðlice sægde, þæt he æt his seolfes muþe gehyrde , mid þy
þe he tealde & wende, þæt he sweltan scolde & deað þrowian.
 19.242.23. Þa eode ut in dagunge of þam huse, þe ða
untruman menn in reston, & ana gesæt in deagolre stowe & geornlice
ongon þencan bi his dædum, ond wæs inbryrded mid gemynd his synna &
weop, & his onsyn mid tearum þwoh: & of inneweardre heortan God
wæs biddende, þæt he ða gena sweltan ne sceolde, ær ðon þe he
bi ðæm fordgewitenum gemeleasnissum his, þa ðe he in cildhade oððe
in cneohthade gefremede, fulfremeþlicor of tide geclæsnade, ge hine
seolfne on godum weorcum genihtsumlecor beeode.
 19.242.30. Swelce he eac gehat geheht, þæt he a wolde for
Gode his liif in elþeod ignesse lifigan & næfre to Breotone ealonde
hweorfan, þær he acenned wæs; & þæt he buton sealmsonge
regollicra tida, gif him lichoman untrymnis ne wiðstode, þæt æghwelce
dæge alne saltere in gemynd þære godcundan herenesse asunge; &
þæt ælcere wucan dæg mid neahte ætgædre afæste.
 19.244.1. Mid þy he ða his gehat & bene & his tearas
geendade, þa eode he eft to his huse, & þa gemette þone his
geþoftan slæpende.
 19.244.3. & he ða eac swylce on his reste gestag, & hine
sume hwile gerestan wolde; ond mid þy he ða medmicel fæc hine gereste,
þa onbrægd se his geþofta & locade to him, & þus cwæð:
Eala broðor Ecgberht; eala, cwæð he, hwæt dydest þu?
 19.244.7. Ic gehyhte & wende, þæt wit nu hraðe scoldon
ætgædre in ece liif gongan.
 19.244.8. Ac wite þu hwæðre, þæt þu onfehst þæs
þu bæde.
 19.244.8. Forðon he þurh gesyhð geleornade, ge hwæs he God
bæd & to him wilnade, & þæt þe his bene gehyrede wæron.
 19.244.10. Hwæt sculon we nu þæs mare sprecan?
 19.244.11. Hwæt se æðelhun þær nehstan neahte
forðferde; & Ecgberht hine þære aðle getrumade, & micle tide
æfter þon lifde & biscophade onfeng, & þone had mid
efenweorðum dædum frætwade.
 19.244.14. Ond æfter monegum goodum gastlicra mægena, swa swa
he wilnade, mid þy he wæs hundnigontiges wintra ald, þæt he leorde to
þæm heonfonlecan rice.
 19.244.16. Lifde he his lif in micelre eaðmodnesse &
monnþwærnesse & in forhæfdnesse & in bilwitnesse & in
soðfæstnesse & in fulfremednesse.
 19.244.18. Ond he þurh þæt ge his þeode ge eac þam
cynnum Scotta & Peohta, in þæm he in ellþeodignesse lifde ge mid his
liifes bysene ge mid lare ge mid alderlicnesse þrea ge mid arfæstnes se
his sylena of þam goodum, þe he from ricum monnum onfeng, swiðe
bricsade.
 19.244.21. Ætecte he eac his gehatum, þe we ær sægdon,
þæt he symle in þæm feowertiglecan fæstenne ær Eastrum æne
siða in dæge gereorde, & elles ne þeah nemne medmicel hlafes mid
þinre meolc.
 19.244.25. Þære ilcan forhæfdnesse gemet he eac swilce
heold þæt feowertig daga ær Cristes gebyrdtide & þæt feowertig
daga æfter Pentecosten.
 20.244.28. Betweoh ðas ðing sende Alhfrið se cyning Osweoes
sunu Willferð his mæssepreost, þæt hine mon sceolde him & his
hiwum to biscope gehalgian.
 20.244.30. Sende he hine to hadiganne ofer sæ to ægelberhte
biscope, bi þæm we ær beforan sægdon, se ær Breotone forlet &
Parisiace þære ceastre biscop geworden wæs.
 20.244.32. Ond he wæs gehalgad from him mid micelre are,
efencumendum monigum biscopum to þære halgunge, in þæm cynelecan
tuune, þe is ceged Inconpendia.
 20.246.3. Þa he þa gena wæs æfter his halgunge in
þæm ofersælicum dælum wuniende, ða wæs Osweo se cyning
onhyrgende þæs suna geornfulnisse.
 20.246.5. Sende þa eac to Cent haligne wer & in his þeawum
gemetfæstne & in leornunge haligra gewreota wel gelæredne; ond þa
ða he in wreotum leornade to donne, þa he in his weorcum wæs geornlice
fylgende; se sceolde beon to biscope gehalgod þære cirican to
Eoforwicceastre.
 20.246.9. Wæs mæssepreost, se wæs Ceadda haten, Ceddes
broðor þæs arwyrðan biscopes, þæs we beforan gelome gemyndgedon.
 20.246.11. Sende se cyning eac mid hine his mæssepreost,
Eadæth wæs haten, se æfter þon in Ecgferþes riice in Hrypum wæs
biscop geworden.
 20.246.13. Þa heo þa to Cent cwomon, þa gemetton heo ðone
ærcebiscop Deosdedit geleoredne of weorulde.
 20.246.15. Ond þa gyta nænig oðer biscop for hine geseted
wæs.
 20.246.16. Ða cerdon heo to Westseaxna mægðe, þær
wæs Wine biscop; & from him wæs se foresprecena Godes monn to biscope
gehalgad.
 20.246.18. Nom he twegen biscopas of Bretta ðeode in
gesiðscipe/ þære halgunge.
 20.246.19. Ne wæs in þa tiid ænig biscop buton þam Wine
in alre Breotene þara þe rihtlice gehalgad wære.
 20.246.20. Þa wæs se Cedda from him to biscope gehalgod.
 20.246.21. Ond he sona ongon þa mæstan gemænne don
