þære ciriclican soðfæstnesse & clænnisse, & eaðmodnisse
& forhæfdnisse & leornunge geornnisse sellan, ond byrig & lond
& ceastre & tunas & hus fore godspellicre lare þurhferan, nales
ridende on horse ac þara apostola þeawe on his fotum gongende.
 20.246.26. Wæs he of discipulum Aidanes þæs godan biscopes,
& his dædum & þeawum & æfter bysene Ceddes his broðor his
geherend trymede & lærde.
 20.246.28. Þa cwom eac swylce Willferð in Breotone, þa he
wæs to biscope gehalgod, & eac swylce monige gemetgunge þara
rihtgelefedra, gehælde þære Romaniscan cirican, Ongolcynnes ciricum mid
his lare brohte.
 20.246.31. Þonon wæs geworden, þæt seo rihtgelyfde laar
wæs dæghwamlice weaxende.
 20.246.32. Ond ealle Scottas, þa ðe betweohn Ongle eardodon
& þære rihtgelefdan lare wiðerwearde wæron ge in gehælde
rihtra Eastrena ge in monegum oðrum wisum, oðþe heora treowe sealdon,
þæt heo riht mid healdan woldon, oðþe ham to heora eðle hwurfen.
 21.248.3. Ðyssum tidum Ongolcyningas þa æðelestan Osweo
Norðanhymbra cyning & Ecgberht Contwarena cyning hæfdon betweoh him
spræce & geþeahte, hwæt to donne wære bi þæm stealle
Ongolcynnes cirican.
 21.248.6. Forðon Osweo soðlice onget, þeah þe he from
Scottum afeded & gelæred wære, þætte seo Romanisce cirice &
seo apostolic e wæs rehtgelefed.
 21.248.8. Ða gecuron heo & genomon mid geþafunge þære
halgan cirican Ongolþeode goodne wer & geþungenne to biscophade
mæssepreost sumne, þæs noma wæs Wigheard, of geferscipe þæs
biscopes Deosdedit.
 21.248.11. & heo hine þa to Rome sendon, þæt hine mon
scolde þær to biscope gehalgian, þæt he þær onfenge
ærcebiscopes hade & rehtgelefde biscopas þurh ealle Breotone
Ongolcynnes ciricum seoþðan hadian meahte.
 21.248.14. Þa he þa Wigheard to Rome becwom, ær þon he to
biscophade becuman meahte, wæs mid deaðe forgripen & þær
fordferde.
 21.248.17. Ða sende Uitalius se papa Osweo Seaxna cyninge
lufsumlic ærendgewrit, þa he onget his aarfæstnesse willan & his
hate Godes lufan, þa he hæfde for þam eadgan liife, & forþam þe
he þurh Drihtnes gescyldnesse to þam soðan geleafan & þæm
apostolican gehwyrfed wæs.
 21.248.21. Ond cwæð þæt he gehyhte, swa swa he in his
þeode hwilwendlice ricsade, þæt he swa in toweardnesse ecelice ricsian
mid Criste moste.
 21.248.23. Ond he eac swylce þær on þæm gewrite
gemyndgade bi þæs Wigheardes deaðe, þæt heo swiðe geunrotsade
wæron, forhwon he þær forðferan scolde, & him geheht, swa ær
swa heo geþungenne mon & hades wyrðne metan meahton, þæt heo hine
woldon to biscope gehalgian & hider onsendan.
 21.248.28. Hwelc biscop þa fore Wighearde gecoren & gehalgod
wære, þæt we in þisse æfterfylgendan bec gerisenlicor &
gelimplecor writað & secgað.
 22.250.1. In ða ilcan tid wæron in Eastseaxna mægðe
æfter Swiðhelme, bi þæm we ær beforan sægdon, twegen cyningas
Sighere & Sebbe, þeah þe heo Wulfhere Mercna cyninge underþeodde
wæren in hernesse.
 22.250.4. Seo ilce mægð þa Eastseaxna mid þy heo wæced
wæs mid þy wæle þære foresprecenan deaðlicnesse, ða Sighere
mid þy dæle his folces, þe he heold, forlet þa gerynu þæs
Cristnan geleafan & to hæðenisse wæs gehwyrfed.
 22.250.7. Forðon þe se seolfa cyning & his aldormen &
monige of his folce lufodon þis deaðlice lif & þæt towearde ne
sohton, ne þæt furðum gelefdon, þæt hit o wære.
 22.250.9. Þa ongunnon heo þa heargas edniwian, þa ðe ær
forlætene wæron, & deofolgild weorþian & gebiddan, swa swa heo
þurh þas þing meahton from þam woole & fram þære
deaþlicnesse gescilde beon.
 22.250.12. Se Sebb þonne his gefera & efnerfeward þæs
ilcan rices mid micelre geornfulnesse þone onfongenan Cristes geleafan heold
mid ealle his folce, ond mid micelre gesæglignesse getreowe lif gefylde, swa
swa we eft heræfter secgað.
 22.250.17. Þa ðæt þa Wulfhere se cyning onget, & him
gebodad wæs, þæt in þære mægðe Eastseaxna of dæle Cristes
geleafa aidlad wære, þa sende he Gearaman þone biscop, se wæs
Trumheres æfterfylgend, in þa mægðe Eastseaxna to gereccenne þone
gedwolan, & heo to soðfæstnesse geleafan eft gecegan.
 22.250.21. & he þa mid micelre geornnesse se biscop þæt
wæs donde, æfter þan þe mæssepreost sægde, þe his gefera
wæs fultumiende þæs godcundan wordes.
 22.250.23. Wæs he se biscop æfest mon & god, & feor
& wide ealle þa leode wæs þurhfærende, & þæt folc &
þone forsprecenan cyning to soðfæstnesse wege eft gelædde, to þon
þæt heo forleton & towurpon þa hergas & þæt deofolgild,
þæt heo ær dydon, & Godes cirican ontyndon, & Cristes noman,
þæm hy ær wiðcwædon, gefeonde ondettan.
 22.250.28. & heo ma mid geleafan þæs ecan lifes &
æriste wuldres wilnadon, þæt heo in þæm swulte, þon heo on
unsyfernessum getreowleasnesse betweoh deofulgyldum lifde.
 22.252.1. Þa þis þa þus gedon wæs, þa se biscop &
heora lareowas gefeonde & blissigende ham hwurfon.

 14.202.9. Þa on þa tid se arwyrþa bysceop aidan wæs on
þam ealande þe nemned is farene þæt is twam milum fram þære
foresprecenan byrig.
 14.202.11. He se godes monn gewunade swiðe oft on þam ealande
faran forþon þe him lyste þær on digolnesse his gebedu begangan 7 gode
þeowian eac swylce on þam ylcan ealonde symble oð ðysne andweardan
dæg godes þeowa sum on on ancersetle wunode.
 14.202.13. Ða he þa se halga bysceop geseah þæt se ad
onbærned wæs 7 se wind þæt fyr 7 þone smic innon þa ceastre ofer
þa weallas draf hit is sæd þæt he þa upp to heofonum his eagan 7
his handa ahofe 7 mid tearum cleopode 7 cwæde: dryhten geseoh hu mycel yfel
penda wyrceð.
 14.202.17. Þyssum wordum þa gecwedenum hine sona se wind
onwearp fram þære byrig, 7 draf þæt fyr on þa þe hit ær
onbærndon swa þæt hi sume mid þam fyre gederede wæron 7 ealle to
þon abregde þæt hi no syððan on þa burgh feohtan ne dorstan
forþon þe hi oncneowon þæt hie god scylde.
 14.202.22. Ðysne halgan bisceop þa þa hine se deað nydde on
þam ytemestan dæge his lifes þæt he of þam lichaman faran sceolde
he wæs on anum þæs cyninges tune noht feor fram þære foresprecenan
byrig forþon þe he þær hæfde ane cyrican 7 an resthus 7 him
geþywe wæs þæt he oft þær wunade 7 þonan þonne on gehwylce
healfe þær ymbutan for rihtne geleafan to læranne 7 to trymmanne.
 14.202.29. Ðæt eac swilce his þeaw wæs on oþrum
cyninges tune to donne swa swa hit eaðe beon mihte forþon þe he nowiht
agnes hæfde butan his cyricean, 7 þær to feower æceras þa men þe
him þa þenedan hi aslogan an geteld on west healfe þære cyricean on
þære cyricean fæst þæt he hine þær Inne gerestan mihte.
 14.204.1. 7 þa gelamp hit þæt se halga bisceop hine onhylde
to anre þære studa, utan to þære cyricean geseted wæs þære
cyricean to wraþe, 7 þær þa his gast ageaf he forðferde þy
seofonteogeþon geare his bisceophades þy dæge on calendas septembris.
 14.204.5. 7 his lichama þa sona wæs gelæded to þam
ealande þe nemned is lindesfarenensis 7 þær on þæra broþra
lictune bebyriged.
 14.204.6. 7 þa ymb geara fyrstmearc þa þa þær mare
cyrice getimbred wæs, 7 on þæs eadigan apostoles noman sancte petres
gehalgad, þa wæron þæs foresprecenan bisceopes ban þider broht on
þa swiðran healfe þæs wibedes swa swa hit wel swa arwyrðum bysceope
geras gerisenlice gehealdene wæron.
 14.204.10. 7 hine æfter fylgde finan on bysceophade se com of
hii scotta ealande 7 monegu gear on bysceophade wunade.
 14.204.13. 7 þa gelamp hit æfter monegum gearum þæt penda
myrcna cynincg mid miclum herige þa ylcan stowe gesohte 7 þa þa he eall
þæt he geræcean mihte mid wæpnum 7 mid fyre forspilde þa wæs
eac se tun se þe foresprecena bisceop on gefor 7 seo cyrice forbærned.
 14.204.17. Ac swiðe wunderlice gemete seo wræðstudu an ofer
þa se halga bisceop hliniende forðferde eallre þære cyricean 7 þam
oþrum getimbre forburnen gehrinen fram þam fyre stod.
 14.204.18. Þyssum wundre þa oncnawenum þær sona wæs eft
cyrice aræred 7 seo foresprecene wræðstuðu þam wage to wreþe
geseted wæs swa heo ær wæs.
 14.204.20. 7 hit þa eft gelamp æfter fæce þurh gymelyste
þæt se ylca tun forbarn 7 seo cyrice.
 14.204.22. 7 gyt se leg þære stuðe gehrinan ne mihte ac
swiðe wunderlice þæt fyr eode ondlang þara nægla þe seo studu mid
gefæstnad wæs to þam wage þurh þa þyrelo 7 þære stude none
onhran.
 14.204.25. 7 þa þriddan siðe þær wæs cyrice getimbred
7 hi þa no þa studu swa swa hie ær dydon uton to þam wage to fultume
ne setton ac hie hi on þa cyricean setton þysses wundres to gemynde.
 14.204.30. Is eac cuð þæt on þa ylcan tid on þære
stowe monige men heora lichaman hælo gesetton.
 14.204.31. Eac monige men of þære ylcan styde sprytlan acurfan
7 þa þonne hwylcum seocum men þearf wæs on wæter scofan, 7
þanon wæron monige men þurh þæt gehælde.
 14.208.5. On þas tid heold eastengla rice æfter eorpwalde
rædwealdes eoferan sigebyrht his broþor swiðe god man 7 æfæst he
sigebyrht þa þa he on gallia wracade fleonde rædwaldes feondscypas he
þær þa fulwihte onfeng.
 14.208.8. 7 eft to his eþele hwearf 7 þæt rice onfeng, 7
sona þa þing þe he on gallia begongan geseah þæt is þone rihtan
geleafan he wilnode æfterhyrgan he sette scole.
 14.208.10. 7 on þære he let cnihtas læran mid felices
fultume þæs bisceopes þone he ær on cent nam.
 14.208.12. 7 he him lareowas gesette æfter cantwara þeawe.
 14.208.13. Swa swiðe se cining lufode þæt heofonlice rice
þæt he æt nehstan forlet þæt eorðlice rice 7 hit befæste
ecgrice his mæge se eac hæfde sumne dæl þæs rices.
 14.208.15. 7 þa on þæt mynster eode þe he ær him sylf
getimbrode 7 þær þa sceare onfeng 7 for þam ecan rice in þæm
mynstre campode.
 14.208.17. 7 þa þa he þis longe dyde þa gelamp hit þæt
myrcna þeod þurh pendan laðe hyra cyninges wið eastenglum gefeohtan
wolde.
 14.208.19. Eastengle þa þa hi gesawun þæt hi læssan
fultum hæfdon þonne heora fynd þa bædon hi sigebirht þæt he mid
him to þam gefeohte fore 7 hyra fultum trymede 7 bylde.
 14.208.21. Þa he ða þam wiðsoc 7 cwæþ þæt he
þæt nolde, þa namon hi hyne on þam mynstre 7 hine neadinga mid him
læddon to þam gefeohte þæt hi þy baldran 7 þy unforhtran
wæron, 7 þy læs ymb fleam hogodon þe hi swa godne 7 swa æþelne
wer mid him hæfdon.
 14.208.25. Ac he wæs swiðe gemyndig þæs gehates þe he
gode gehet.
 14.208.26. 7 þa git þa he wæs ymbhringed mid his feondum he
nawiht on hand nyman wolde buton his agene gyrde anlipie.
 14.208.28. 7 he þa þær wæs ofslegen mid þam cyninge
sigebyrhte, 7 hiora heriges þær wæs micel ofslagen fram þam
hæþenum 7 eal todræfed.
 14.208.30. 7 þa feng anna enes sunu æfter him to eastengla

eac swiðe þæele bearn gestrynde, be þam we eft forþon on þysse bec
secgean willað.
 14.208.32. 7 þe, s annan eastengla cyning penda mercna cyning

 1.252.4. Þy gemyndgadan gere þære foresprecenan sunnan
asprungennisse & hræðe sona þæs æfterfylgendan wooles &
moncwilde, ðy geare Deosdedit se sexta ærcebiscop Contwaraburge cirican
forðferde þy ærran dæge <foreign>iduum Iuliarum</foreign>.
 1.252.7. Swelce eac Erconberht Contwara cyning þy ylcan monðe
ond/ dæge forðgeleorde, & his riices eðel forlet Ecgberhte his suna,
þæt he hæfde & heold anes wonðe twentig wintra.
 1.252.10. Þa blon micelre tiide se biscopdom, ða wæs sended
to Rome from Ecgberhte & from Osweo Norðanhymbra cyninge Wigheard
mæssepreost, swa swa we in þisse ærran bec feaum wordum forecwædon.
 1.252.13. Wæs se mon in ciriclecum þeodscipum of Ongolcynne
wel gelæred.
 1.252.14. Swylce hy eac þa cyningas begen ætgædre sendon
þæm apostolican papan micle gife on monegum goldfatum & seolforfatum:
ond bædon, þæt he Wigheard Ongolcynnes ciricum to ærcebiscope
gehalgode.
 1.252.17. Ða he ða to Rome cwom, þa wæs in þa tid
Uitalius papa þæs apostolican seðles aldorbiscop.
 1.252.19. Æfter þon þe he þone intingan his siðfætes
þæm apostolican papan gecyðed hæfde, þa æfter medmicelre tide se
Wigheard & lytestne alle his geferan, þa ðe mid him cwomon, þy
ofercumendan woole fordilgade wæron & forðgeleorde.
 1.252.23. Ða hæfde se apostolica papa geþeaht be þissum
þingum & georne sohte, hwelcne ærcebiscop he onsendan meahte
Ongolðeode ciricum.
 1.254.1. Ða wæs in Niridano þæm mynstre, þæt is
unfeor þære byrig Neapoli in Campanie þære mægðe, Adrianus
abbud.
 1.254.2. Wæs se mon in halgum gewreotum & in mynsterlecum
þeodscipum & in ciriclecum wel gelæred, & weorðlice getyd ge in
Lædenisc gereorde ge in Grecisc.
 1.254.5. Þa het se papa þone mon to him gelaðian, & heht
þæt he biscophade onfenge & to Breotone ferde.
 1.254.6. Þa ondswarede he him & cwæð, þæt he
wære swa micles hades unwyrðe; & cwæð þæt he meahte oðerne
getæcnan, þe biscophada wyrðra wære ge on gelærednesse ge on his
lifes gegearnunge ge on gedefre eldo.
 1.254.9. Tæhte þa þam biscope in þæm neahnunnmynstre
sumne gedefne munuc, þæs noma wæs Andreas.
 1.254.11. Ac ða wiðstod his lichomlic untrymnes, þæt he
biscop beon ne meahte.
 1.254.12. Eft se papa nedde þone abbud Adrianus, þæt he
biscophade onfenge.
 1.254.13. Þa bæd he hine eldenne & fyrstes, hwæðer he
æfter fæce meahte oðerne findan, þe mon to biscope hadian meahte.
 1.254.15. Wæs in þa tid sum munuc in Rome, se wæs cuð
Adriane/ þæm abbude, þæs noma wæs Theodorus.
 1.254.16. Se wæs acenned in Tarso Cilicio: wæs se mon ge in
weoruldgewreotum, ge in godcundum, ge in Grecisc ge in Læden wel gelæred;
& he gecoren wæs in his þeawum & arwyrðre ældo, þæt is
þæt he hæfde syx & syxtig wintra.
 1.254.20. Þeosne mon Adrianus se abbud þæm papan cyðde,
& sægde þæt he to biscope gehalgad beon meahte: & he þæt
geþafode.
 1.254.22. Ond hwæðre þis aræddon betweonum him, þæt
he se abbud his latteow beon sceolde in Breotone, forþon þe he ær twiga
þa dælas Gallia rices fore missenlecum intingum geferde & gesohte,
& forþon þe him se weg þæs siðfætes genoh cuð wæs, &
eac swylce þæt he wæs in his agnum geferscipe wel gemonnad.
 1.254.26. Ond þonne gen eac þætte he scolde his fultemend
beon in godcundre lare, ond þæt he geornlice bihealdan scolde, þæt he
nowiht wiðerweardes þære soðfæstnesse þæs geleafan Greca
þeawe in Ongolcynnes cirican inn gelædde, þe he ofer beon sceolde.
 1.254.30. Þa wæs he ærest to subdiacone gehalgad; &
þa baad feower monað, oððæt him feax geweoxe, þæt he to preoste
bescoren beon meahte, forþon þe he ær sceare hæfde eastleoda þeawe
Sancte Paule þæs apostoles.
 1.254.33. Þa wæs he gehalgad from Uitalio þæm papan to
biscope ymb syx hund wintra & eahta & syxtig wintra from Drihtnes
menniscnesse, þy seofeðan dæge & þy drihtenlecan <foreign>Kalendarum
Aprelium</foreign>.
 1.256.3. & swa ætgædre mid Adriano þam abbude in <foreign>Sexta
Kalendas Junias</foreign> wæs to Breotone onsended.
 1.256.6. Þa ferdon heo ætgædre ærest to Masilia &
þonon þurh Arela lond, þæt heo cwomon to Iohanne þæm
ærcebiscope þære ceastre; & him sealdon Uitalianus gewrit þæs
papan, þæt heo mon mid are onfenge.
 1.256.9. & he swa dyde; hæfde heo mid micelre are mid him,
oðþæt Ebrinus se ealdormon him spede & leafnesse sealde to ferenne,
swa hwider swa heo woldon.
 1.256.11. Ða ferde Theodorus se biscop to ægelberhte biscope
Parissiorum, bi þæm we beforan sægdon; ond from him fremsumlice wæs
onfongen, & micle tid mid him wel gehæfd wæs.
 1.256.14. Adrianus ferde ærest to Emme Senonum & æfter
þam to Pharaonem Mælda biscopum, & longe mid him wel gehæfd
wæs.
 1.256.15. Forþon hy nedde se towearda winter, þæt heo stille
wunedon, swa hwær swa heo meahten.
 1.256.17. Þa ðæt þa cuðe ærendwrecan sægdon
Ecgberhte þæm cyninge, þætte se biscop wære in Froncna rice,
þone þe hy Osweo bædon from þam Romaniscan biscope, ða sende he sona
Reðfrið his gerefan þider, þæt he scolde hine fetigan & to him
gelædan.
 1.256.20. Þa he þa þider cwom, þa nom he Theodor biscop mid
Ebrinus leafnesse þæs ealdormonnes, & hine gelædde to þam porte,
þe is nemned Cwæntwic.
 1.256.23. Þær hine gestod sumu untrymnis, & he þær
fæc gewunade; & sona swa he trumian ongon, swa eode he in scip &
ferde to Breotone.
 1.256.25. Ebrinus se ealdormon genom Adrianum þone abbud & on
fæstene hæfde, forþon he resade, þæt he hæfde caseres ærendo
sumo to Breotone cyningum wið Froncna rice, þæs he ða micle gemenne
hæfde/.
 1.256.28. Ac þa he þa soðlice onget & onfand, þæt
hit swa ne wæs, swa he resade, þa onlesde he hine & let feran æfter
þam biscope.
 1.256.30. Ond sona þæs þe he to him cwom, þa sealde he him
Sancte Petres mynster, þær þæra ærcebiscopa liic bebyrged seondon,
swa swa we ær beforan sægdon.
 1.256.32. Forþon se apostolica papa bebead Theodore biscope, þa
he from him ferde, þæt he him on his biscopscire gerisne stowe foresege
& salde, in þære he mid his geferum wunian meahte.
 1.258.1. Þa cwom he Theodor biscop to his cirican in Contwara
burg þy æfteran geare halgunge ðy syxtan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Iuniarum</foreign>.
 1.258.2. & he lifde on biscophade aan & twentig wintra
& þreo monað & syx & twentig daga.
 2.258.5. Ond he sona ðurhferde eall Breotone ealond, swa hwyder
ymb swa Ongolþeode drohtedon & wunedon; & he lustlice from eallum
onfongen wæs, & his word geornlice geherdon.
 2.258.7. Ond he rehte endebyrdnesse lifes æteawde, & rihte
Eastran to weorðianne lærde.
 2.258.9. Ond him Adrianus se abbud mid ferde, & to eallum rehte
fultemade.
 2.258.10. Wæs he ærest ærcebiscopa, þæt him eall
Ongolcyn hrynesse geþafode.
 2.258.11. Ond forðon heo begen wæron ge se biscop ge se abbud,
swa swa we ær cwædon, wel gelæred ge on godcundum gewreotum ge in
weoruldcundum, ond heo gesomnodon micelne þreat discipula; & heo betweoh
halige bec & ciriclicne þeodscipe in metercræft & in
tungolcræft & in grammaticcræft tydon & lærdon.
 2.258.16. Wæs þæt sweotol tacn, þætte heora discipulas
wæron wel gelærde ge in Grecisc gereorde ge in Lædenisc; ond him þa
swa cuðe wæron swa heora agen, þe heo in fedde wæron.
 2.258.18. Ne wæron her æfre, seoþðan Ongolcyn Breotone
gesohte, gesæligran tide ne fægeran.
 2.258.20. Wæron her stronge cyningas & wel cristne ond
eallum ellreordum cynnum ut in miclum ege; ond ealra willa hleonade to
geheranne þa gefean þæs heofonlecan rices.
 2.258.22. Ond swa hwelce men swa swa wilnadon þæt heo in
halgum leorningum tyde wæron, heo hæfdon gearwe magistras, þa ðe heo
lærdon & tydon.
 2.258.24. Swylce eac sonas to singenne in circan, ða ðe
oððæt in Cent anre menn cuðon, of þære tide ongunnon men leornian
þurh ealle cirican Ongolcynnes.
 2.258.26. Ond ærest, buton Iacobe þæm songere bi þæm
we beforan ær sægdon, wæs songes magister Norðanhymbra cirican
ædde haten, þæs freo noma wæs Steffanus.
 2.258.29. Wæs se asponen from Cent from Wilferðe þæm
arwyrðan biscope, se ærest betweoh biscopum, þa ðe of Ongolþeode
wæron, regollicne þeaw to lifgenne Ongolcynnes ciricum sægde &
lærde.
 2.258.33. Þa ferde Theodor biscop geond ealle Ongolcynnes
mægðe, & biscopas halgode in gelimplecum stowum.
 2.260.1. Ond þa þing, þe he unfulfremed gemette, mid heora
fultume he ða rehte & bette.
 2.260.3. Betweoh þon, þa he Ceddan biscop mid wordum þreade,
þæt he rihtlice gehalgad ne wære, þa ondsworede he eaðmodre stefne:
Gif þu þæt wast, þæt ic unrehtlice biscophade onfeng, ic lustlice
from þære þegnunge gewite, forþon ic þy hade mec seolfne næfre
wyrðne demde.
 2.260.7. Ac for intingan hersumnesse ic haten geþafode, þæt
ic þone had underhnah, þeah ðe ic unwyrðe wære.
 2.260.8. Þa he ða gehyrde þa eaðmodnesse his ondsware,
cwæð he þæt he þone biscophad forlætan ne scolde.
 2.260.10. Ac he eft his hadunge mid ciriclice rihte gefylde.
 2.260.10. In þa tid Deosdedit se biscop forðferde; &
Contwara burge biscop soht & sended wæs to hadienne.
 2.260.12. Ond Willferð biscop eac swylce of Breotone in Gallia
rice to hadienne sended wæs.
 2.260.13. He ða eac in Cent mæssepreostas & diaconas
hadode, oðþæt þe Theodor ærcebiscop to his seðle cwom.
 2.260.15. Sona þæs ðe he cwom to Hrofesceastre, &
forðferdum Damiano þam biscope se biscophad longe blon, þa gehadode he
sumne mon, se wæs ma in ciriclecum þeodscipum & in lifes bylwitnesse
gelæred, þon he from wære in worulde þingum, þæs noma wæs
Putta.
 2.260.19. Wæs he swiðost in cirican songcræft getyd
Romanisce þeawe, þone he geleornade from Sancte Gregories discipulum.
 3.260.22. In ða tid wæs in Mercna mægðe Wulfhere cyning.
 3.260.22. Ða forðferdum Gearomonne biscope bæd he Theodor
biscop, þæt he him & his leodum biscop funde & sealde, þa ne
wolde he him neowne biscop halgian, ac bæd Osweo Norðanhymbra cyning,
þæt he him Ceaddan gehalgodne biscop sealde, se ða in his mynstre,
þæt is in Læstinge, in stillnesse liifde.
 3.260.27. Þegnade Wilferð biscop þone biscophad in
Eoforwicceastre & eac swylce in eallum Norðanhymbrum ge eac in Peohtum,
swa Osweoes rice wæs þæs cyninges.
 3.260.29. Ond forþon þeaw wæs þæm ilcan arwyrðan
biscope, þæt he þæt weorc þæs halgan godspelles, ma þurh his
fota gong gefremede, þonne on horse ride, heht hine Theodor biscop ridan,
þær him se weg lengra gelumpe.
 3.260.33. & he swiðe wið þon wonn for geornfulnesse &
for lufan þæs aarfæstan gewinnes.
 3.262.1. Þa nedde se ærcebiscop hine swiðe, þæt he
ridan scolde, swa hwyder swa ðæs þearf wære, & efne æt nehstan
mid his seolfes hondum up on hors hof; forþon he ðone mon micelne &
haligne gemette in his lifes geearnungum.
 3.262.4. Ða onfeng Ceadda biscopdom Mercna þeode ætgædre
& Lindesfearena; ond he sona æfter bisene haligra fædra in micelre
fulfremednesse lifes þone biscophad heold & þegnade.
 3.262.7. Sealde him & geaf Wulfhere se cyning fiftig hida in
Lindisse him mynster on to getimbrenne in þære stowe þe is nemned æt
Bearwe.
 3.262.9. In þæm mynstre nu gen oð to dæge þa sweðe
awuniað regollices lifes, þe he þær gesette.
 3.262.11. Hæfde he bisceopseðl in þære stowe, þe
geceged is Liccedfeld, þær he forðferde & bebyrged is.
 3.262.12. Þær gen to dæge seðel is Mærcna mægðe
þara æfterfylgendra biscopa.
 3.262.13. Getimbrede he eac sundorwic noht feor from þære
cirican, bi ðæm he deagolice mid feaum broðrum, þæt is seofonum
oðþo eahtum, he gewunade, þæt he him gebæd, & his bec rædde,
swa oft swa he from þæm gewinne þære þegnunge godcundre lare
æmetig wæs.
 3.262.17. Þa he ða in þære mægðe tu ger &
þridda healf þa cirican wuldorlice heold & rehte, ða cwom seo tid,
þe uplican dome stihtigende, bi þære spriceð Eclesiastes seo boc:
<foreign>Tempus mittendi lapides et tempus colligendi:</foreign> þætte tid wære stanas
to sendenne & tid to somnienne.
 3.262.21. Þa cwom micel wæl & moncwild godcundlice sended,
þæt þurh lichoman deað þa lifigendan stanas þære cirican of
eorðlicum seþlum to þæm heofonlican timbre gebær.
 3.262.24. Mid þy þa monige of þære gesomnunge þæs
ilcan arwyrðan biscopes of lichoman alædde wæron, þa cwom his tid,
þæt he scolde of middangearde to Drihtne feran.
 3.262.27. Þa gelomp sume dæge, þæt he wæs in þæm
foresprecenan wicum mid ane breðer wuniende, þæs noma wæs Owine.
 3.262.28. His oðre geferan fore gelimplicum intingum hwurfon to
cirican in þæt mynster.
 3.262.30. Wæs he se ilca Oowine munuc micelre geearnunge mon,
& mid hlutre ingehygde þæs uplecan edleanes wæs iu middangeard
forlætende; & he wæs þurh all meodum & Gode gecoren; ond him
Drihten synderlice his deagolnisse onwrah.
 3.262.34. Cwom he mid æðelþryþe of Eastenglum; ond he
wæs hire þegna & huses & hire geferscipes ofer all aldormon.
 3.264.1. Ða Godes geleafa þa weox & haat wæs, þa
þohte he þæt he sceolde worulde wiðsacan, & þæt
unaswundenlice swa gedyde.
 3.264.3. & hine middangeardes þingum to þon ongyrede &
genacodade, þæt he eal forlet, þa ðe he hæfde, nemne his anfealdne
gegyrelan, ond cwom to Læstinga ea to þæm mynstre þæs aarwyrðan
biscopes.
 3.264.6. Bær him æxe & adosan on honda; tacnode in þon,
þæt he nales to idelnesse, swa sume oðre, ac to gewinne in þæt
mynster eode; & þæt seolfe eac swylce mid dædum gecyðde.
 3.264.9. Ond forþon þe he lyt genihtsumade in smeaunge & in
leornunge haligra gewreota, he þy ma mid his hondum wonn & worhte þa
þing, þe nydþearfleco wæron.
 3.264.11. Þæs is to tacne, þæt he mid þone biscop in
þæm foresprecenan wicum for his arwyrðnesse & for his geornfullnesse
betweoh þa broðor wæs hæfd.
 3.264.13. Ðonne heo inne heora leornunge & heora &
becrædon beeodon, þonne wæs he ute wyrcende, swa hwæt swa þearf
gesegen wæs.
 3.264.16. Ða he þa sume dæge hwæthwugu swelces ute dyde,
& his geferan to byrig to cirican eodon, swa heo gelomlice dydon, ond se
biscop ana in þære cirican oðþo in becrædinge oððo on gebedum
geornful wæs, þa geherde he semninga, swa swa he eft æfter þon
sægde, þa swetestan stefne & þa fægrestan singendra &
blissiendra of heofonum oð eorðan astigan.
 3.264.21. Ða stefne & þone song he cwæð þæt he
ærest geherde from eastsuðdæle heofones, þæt is from heanisse
þære winterlecan sunnan upgonge, & þonon to him sticcemælum
nealecton, oðþæt he bicwom to þeacan þære cirican, þe se biscop
in wæs; & ingongende ealle gefylde, & in ymbhwyrfte ymbsealde.
 3.264.26. Ond he þa geornlice his mod aðenede in þa þing
ðe he gehyrde.
 3.264.27. Þa geherde he eft, swa swa healfre tide fæce, of
hrofe þære ilcan cirican up astigan þone ilcan blissesong, & þy
ylcan wege, þe he ær cwom, upp oð heofonas mid unasecgendre swetnesse
eft hweorfan.
 3.264.30. Ða wunade he ðær sum fæc tide wundriende &
wafiende, & mid behygdige mode þohte & smeade, hwæt þa þing
beon sceolde.
 3.264.32. Ða ontynde se biscop þæt eaghþyrel þære
cirican & mid his honda slog tacen, swa swa his gewuna wæs, gif hwylc
mon ute wære, þæt he in to him eode.
 3.266.1. Ða eode he sona in to him.
 3.266.1. Cwæð he se biscop him to: Gong hræðe to cirican,
& hat ure seofon broðor hider to me cuman: & þu eac swelce mid
wæs.
 3.266.3. Þa heo þa to him cwomon, þa monade he heo ærest,
þæt heo betweonan him þæt mægen lufan & sibbe & betweohn
eallum Godes monnum geornlice heolde; ond eac swelce þa gesetenesse þæs
regollican þeodscipes, þe hy from him geleornodon & on him gesegon,
oðþe in þara forðgeleoredra fædra dædum oðþe godcundum
gemete, þæt heo þa ungewergedre geornfulnisse fylgden & læsten.
 3.266.9. Æfter þon he underþeodde & him sægde,
þæt se dæg swiðe neah stode his forðfore, & þus cwæð: Se
leofa cuma & se lufiendleca, se ðe gewunade ure broðor neosian, se cwom
swelce to dæge to me & mec of worulde cegde & laðode.
 3.266.13. Forðon ge þonne nu eft hweorfað to cirican &
biddað ure broðor, þæt heo mine forðfore mid heora gebedum &
benum Drihtne bebeoden, ond swelce eac heora seolfra forðfore, þære tide
is uncuð, þæt heo gemynen mid wæccenum & gebedum & mid godum
forecuman.
 3.266.17. Mid þy he ða þas word & þyses gemetes monig
to him sprecende wæs, & heo onfongenre his bletsunge swiðe unrote ut
from him eodon, ða hwearf se ana eft in to him, se ðe þone heofonlican
song gehyrde, & hine eaðmodlice on eorðan astreahte fore þone biscop;
& þus cwæð: Min fæder, mot ic þe ohtes ahsian.
 3.266.22. Cwæð he: Ahsa þæs þu wille.
 3.266.22. Þa cwæð he: Ic þa la halsie & bidde fore
Godes lufan, þæt þu me gesecge hwæt se song wære blissiendra, þe
ic gehyrde of heofonum cumendra ofer þas cirican ond æfter tide eft
hweorfendra to heofonum.
 3.266.26. Ondswarede he se biscop: Gif þu songes stefne gehyrde
& þu heofonlic weorod ongete ofer us eac cuman, ic ðe bebeode on
Drihtnes noman, þæt þu þæt nænegum men cyðe, ne secge ær
minre forðfore.
 3.266.29. Ic þe soðlice secgo, þætte þæt wæron
engla gastas þe þær cwomon, þa me to þam heofonlecan medum cegdon
& laðodon, þa ic symle lufade & wilnade.
 3.266.31. Ond æfter seofon dagum heo eft hweorfende &
cumende me gehehton; & me þonne mid him lædan woldon.
 3.266.33. Þæt wæs swa soðlice mid dæd gefylled, swa
him to cweden wæs.
 3.266.34. Þa wæs he sona gehrinen lichomlicre untrymnesse,
& seo dæghwamlice weox & hefigade; & þa ðy seofoþan
dæge, swa him gehaten wæs, æfter þon þe his forðfore getrymede
mid onfongennesse þæs Drihtenlecan lichoman & blodes, þætte seo
halige sawl wæs onlesed from þæs lichoman hefignessum, & mid engla
latteowdome & geferscipe, swa riht is to gelyfanne, þa ecan gefean &
þa heofonlecan eadignesse gestah & gesohte.
 3.268.6. Is þæt hwelc wundor, þeah ðe he þone dæg his
deaðes oðþe ma þone Drihtnes dæg bliðe gesege, þone he symle
sorgende bad, oð þæt he cwome?
 3.268.8. Forðon betweohn monige geearnunge his mægena in
forhæfednesse & in eaðmodnesse & in godcundre lare & in
gebedum & in wilsumlicre þearfeðnisse & eac oðerra mægena,
þæt he wæs swa swiðe Drihtnes ege underþeoded ond swa swiðe his
þara nehstena dogra gemyndig in eallum his weorcum, þætte swa swa me sum
broðor sægde of þæm þe me in wreotum cyde & lærde, & se
wæs in mynstre & in his lareowdome afeded & gelæred; wæs his
noma Trumberht; sægde he gif he æt leorninga sæte oððe elles
hwæt dyde, gif semninga mare blæd windes astah, þæt he sona
instæpe Drihtnes mildheortnesse gecegde & þa miltse bæd monna
cynne.
 3.268.18. Gif þonne swiðra wind aras, þonne tynde he his bec
& forþleat in his ondwlitan & geornlice in his gebede hleoðrade:
ond þonne he gen, gif strengra storm & genip swiðor þreade, &
legete & þunorrade eorðan & lyfte brægden & fyrhten, þonne
eode he to cirican & bighigdelice in gebedum & on sealmsonge fæste
moode awunade, oððæt þære lyfte smyltnis eft hwearf & cwom.
 3.268.23. Mid þy hine frugnon & ascodon his geferan, for hwon
he þis dyde, ondswarode he: Ac ge ne leornodon: <foreign>Quia intonuit de celo
dominus et altissimus dedit uocem suam: misit sagittas suas et dissipauit eos,
fulgora multiplicauit et conturbauit eos:</foreign> ðætte Drihten hleoðrað of
heofonum & se hehsta seleð his stefne; he sendeð his stræle &
heo toweorpeð: legetas gemonigfealdað & heo gedrefeð.
 3.268.29. Forþon Drihten lyfte ontyneð, windas weceð, legetas
sceotað of heofonum & hleoðrað, þæt he eorðbigengan awecce
hine to ondrædanne; þæt he heora heortan in gemynd gecege þæs
toweardan domes; þæt he heora oferhygd toweorpe & geþyrstignesse
drefe, to heora mode gelæddre þære forhtiendan tide, hwonne he,
heofonum & eorðan byrnendum, toweard sy in heofones wolcnum in micelre
meahte & þrymme to demanne cwice & deade.
 3.270.2. Forþon us gedafenað, þæt we his heofonlicre
monunge mid gedefenlice ege & lufan ondswarige; þætte, swa he lyft
onstyrge ond his hond swa swa us to sleanne beotiende æteaweð, ne
hwæðre nu gyt slæð, þæt we sona cleopien & bidden his
mildheortnesse, & geondsmeage ða deagolnesse usse heortan &
geclæsnien þa unsyfernesse uncysta, & bihigdelice don, þæt we
næfre ne geearnien þæt we slegene beon scylon.
 3.270.8. Geþwærað eac swylce þære onwrigenesse &
þære gesegene þæs foresprecenan broðor bi forðfore þisses
biscopes & eac þæt word þæs arwyrðan fæder Ecgberhtes, bi
þæm we beforan sægdon.
 3.270.11. Se geo ær mid þone ilcan Ceaddan in Hibernia Scotta
ealonde, begen in geoguðe, in munuclife in gebedum & in forhæfdnesse
& in leornunge haligra gewrita Gode lifdon.
 3.270.14. Ac he Ceadda eft æfter fæce in his eðel hwyrfde
in Breotone; se Ecgberht þær in elþeodignesse fore Godes noman awunode
oð his lifes ende.
 3.270.16. Mid þy ða æfter longre tiide cwom to him of
Breotone fore neosunge intingan se halgesta wer & se forhæfdesta,
Hygebald hatte, se wæs abbud in Lindesse, þa spræcon heo be liife
haligra fædra, swa swa halige men gedafonode, & þæt eac onhyrgan
wolden.
 3.270.20. Betweoh þa cwom gemynd þæs arwyrðan biscopes
Ceaddan.
 3.270.21. Þa cwæð he Ecgberht: Ic wat sumne mon in þissum
ealonde nu gena in lichoman lifigende, mid þy se wer of middangearde leorde,
þæt he geseah Ceaddan sawle his broðor mid engla weorude of heofonum
astigan: & gefetedon his sawle & mid him genoman & eft hweorfan to
þam heofonlecan rice.
 3.270.26. Hwæðer he þæt bi him seolfum cwæde þe bi
oðrum men hwelcum, þæt us is uncuð.
 3.270.27. Hwæðre þa swa micel wer hit gecwæð, we
weotan þæt hit soð wæs.
 3.270.28. Þa forðferde Ceadda þy syxtan dæge <foreign>Nonarum
Martiarum</foreign>: & wæs ærest bibyrged bi Sancta Marian cirican.
 3.270.29. Ac æfter fæce, þær getimbrede cirican þæs
eadgan aldores þara apostola Sancte Petres, þa wæron in þa his ban
geseted.
 3.270.31. In æghwæðre þara stowa gewuniað to tacnunge
his mægenes & halignisse gelomlecu wundor hælo geworden beon.
 3.270.33. Þæs is to tacne, þætte neowan sum gebræcseoc
man, mid þy he þurh monige stowe dwoliende orn & ferde, þa bicwom he
þider on æfenne, ne weotendum oððo ne gemændum þæm heordum
þære stowe, & þær ealle neaht wæs restende: & þa on
morne gehælde witte aras & ut eode.
 3.272.2. Þa wundredon ealle menn & on þæt gefegon,
hwylc wundor þær hælo þurh Drihtnes gife æteawde & geworden
wæs.
 3.272.4. Is ofer his byrgenne stowe treowgeweorc on gelicnesse
medmicles huses geworht mid hrægle gegyrwed.
 3.272.6. Þonne is on þæm medmicel þyrel geworht, þurh
þæt gewuniað þa men, þa ðider for intingan wilsumnisse cumað,
heora hond insendan & dæl þære moldan þonon neoman.
 3.272.8. Mid þy heo þa in wæter sendað & untrumum
monnum & neatum to byrgenne sellað, & heo sona from hefignesse
þære untrumnesse generede beoð, & þær gefean þære
willendan gesynta onfoð.
 3.272.12. In þæs biscopes stowe gehalgode Theodor biscop
Wynnferð godne wer & gemetfæstne, se fore wæs in þegnunge
biscophades, swa swa his foregengan, Mercna mægðe & Middelengla &
Lindesfarona; in eallum þæm Wulfhere, se ða gena lifiende wæs, riices
onweald hæfde.
 3.272.16. Wæs se Wynnferð of þæs biscopes geferscipe,
þæm he eft æfterfylgde, ond under him diaconðegnunge micelre tide
brucende wæs.
 4.272.19. Betweohn ðas ðing ða Colmanus se biscop, se of
Scottum cwom wæs Breotone forlætende, ond mid hine genom ealle þa
Scottas, þa he on Lindesfarena ea gesomnade, swelce eac þritig monna of
Ongolþeode.
 4.272.22. Æghwæðre þara wæron in drohtunge munuclifes
geornlice & wel gelærde; & he forlet in þære cirican sume
broðor.
 4.272.24. Ærest he cwom to Hii þæm ealonde, þonon he
wæs sended Ongolþeode Godes word to bodienne & to læranne.
 4.272.25. Æfter þon he gewat to sumum medmiclum ealonde
þæt is feor ascaden from Hibernia to westdæle; is in Scyttisc genemned
Inisbofinde, þæt is ealond hwitre heahfore.
 4.272.28. Þa he þa in þæt ealond cwom, þa getimbrede he
þær mynster & þa munecas þær gestaðolode, þa he of
æghwæðrum cynne gesomnade & mid hine brohte.
 4.272.31. Þa heo þa þær gestaðolode & gesette
wæron, þa ne meahte heo betweoh him geþwærigan & geweorðan.
 4.272.32. Forþon þe Scottas on sumera & on hærfesttide,
þonne mon wæstmas insomnode, þon forleton heo þæt mynster ond
þurh cuðe stowe swicedon & foron, & þonne on wintra eft ham
hwurfon & wilnedon þara goda gemænelice brucan, þe Ongle gewunnon
& gegearwodon.
 4.274.4. Þa sohte Colmanus þisse gewesnisse & þisse
unsibbe læcedom; eode þa ymb monige stowe ge neah ge feor; þa gemette he
sume gerisne stowe in Hibernia mynster on to timbrenne, þæt on Scyttisc
gereorde Maigeo is nemned.
 4.274.8. Ond he gebohte noht micelne dæl þæs londes mynster
þær to getimbrenne æt sumum gesiiðe, þe þæt lond ahte,
ðære arædnisse toætecedre, þæt heo eac swylce for hine, se ðe
him þa stowe gesealde, a þa stondendan munecas þær to Drihtne
cleopodon & for hine þingodon.
 4.274.12. Ond he hraðe þær mynster getimbrode, & him se
gesið eac fultmade & ealle þa neahmen; & he ðær þa Englescan
men gesette & gestaðolede, ond Scottas forlet in þæm foresprecenan
ealonde.
 4.274.15. Þæt mynster oð gen to dæge Englisce men
þær in elþeodignesse habbað.
 4.274.16. Is þæt þæt mynster, þæt is nu micel of
medmiclum gefremed, þe gewunelice is Muigeo nemned; ond geo geara þær
eallum gehwerfdum to þæm betran gesetenessum, nu gen æðele weorod
nimeð muneca, þa of Ongolcynne þær gesomnode seondon, & to bysene
arwyrðra fædra under regole & abbude in micelre forhæfdnesse &
clænnisse lifes bi heora agnum hondgewinne lifgað.
 5.274.25. Ða wæs ymb syx hund wintra & hundseofontig
wintra from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þæt is þæt æftere ger þe
Theodor biscop in Breotone cwom, þætte Oswio Norðanhymbra cyning wæs
gestonden untrymnesse, on þære he eac forðgeleorde, þa he hæfde
yldo eahta & fiftig wintra.
 5.274.29. Wæs he se cyning in þa tid bicumen in swa micle
lufan þære Romaniscan cirican gesetenisse & þære apostolican,
þæt gif he from þære untrymnesse gehæled wære, þæt he
wolde to Rome feran & þær æt þam halgum stowum his lif geendigan,
ond Wilferð biscop bæd, þæt he him þæs siiðfætes latteow
wære, & him micel feoh & unlytel wið þon gebead.
 5.274.34. Þa forðferde he þy fiftegðan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum
Martiarum</foreign>, ond Ecgferð his sunu forlet yrfeweard his rices.
 5.276.3. Þæs cyninges rices þy þriddan geare Theodor
biscop gesomnade biscopa gemot & seonoð ætgædre mid mongum
magistrum cirican, ða ðe regollican gesetenesse haligra fædra ge lufedon
ge cuðon.
 5.276.5. Þa heo ætgædre gesomnade wæron, he ða
geornlice ongon læran to healdenne þy moode, þe biscope gedafonode, þa
þing þa ðe geþwæredon annesse þære ciriclican sibbe.
 5.276.8. Þære seonoðlecan dæde þeosses gemetes gewrit
is.
 5.276.10. In noman Drihtnes Godes & ures Hælendes Ihesu
Cristi, ricsiendum in ecnesse & steorendum his cirican þæm ilcan
Drihtne Hælendum Criste, licade us efencuman æfter þeawe arwyrðra
rehta smeagende bi þæm nedþearflecum intingum Godes cirican.
 5.276.13. Efencwomon we in þas stowe, þe is cweden Heorotford,
þy twenteogðan dæge & þy feorðan Septembris monþes; wæs seo
æreste indictio.
 5.276.15. Ic Theodor, þeah ic unwyrðe sy, wæs ic from
þæm apostolican seðle sended biscop Contwara burge cirican.
 5.276.17. Ond se arwyrðesta sacerd & usser broðor Bise
Eastengla biscop, ond swelce eac usser broþor & sacerd Wilferð
Norþanhymbra biscop þurh his agenne ærendwrecan ætwæs.
 5.276.20. Eac swylce ætwæron ure broðor & sacerdas
Putta, Cantwara ceastre biscop seo is cweden Hrofesceaster, Leotherius
Westseaxna biscop, Wynferð Mercna biscop.
 5.276.22. Mid þy we ða togædre cwomon & æfter
endebyrdnesse ætsomne sæton, cwæð ic: Ic biddo eow eac, þa
leofestan broðor, for ege & lufan ures Hælendes, þæt we ealle
gemænelice smeagan for ussum geleafan, þæt þa domas & þa
gesetenesse, þa ðe from halgum fædrum & gecorenum arædde &
gesette wæron, þætte þa from eallum us ungewemmedlice healdene
wæron.
 5.276.28. Þa ic ða þas & monig oðer sprecende wæs,
þa ðe to Godes lufan gelumpon & to annesse þære halgan cirican,
þa frægn ic anra gehwylcne heora æfter endebyrdnesse, hwæðer heo
geþafedon þa domas to healdenne, þa ðe geara from halgum fædrum
gesette wæron.
 5.276.32. Ond ealle þa biscopas him ondsworodon & cwædon,
þæt him eallum þa wel licodon, ond hy ealle þa bliðe mode lustlice
healdon woldon.
 5.276.33. Ða eowde ic him sona þa ilcan boc þara regola;
& of þam ilcan bocum tyn capitulas, þa ic geond stowe awrat & ic
wiste þæt swiðost nedðearflecu wæron, sealde ic him, & bæd
þæt heo ealle þa geornlice heoldon.
 5.278.5. Is se æresta capitul: þæt we ealle gemænelice
healdan þone halgan dæg Eastrena þy Drihtenlecan dæge æfter
þæm feowerteogðan monan þæs ærestan monþes.
 5.278.7. Se æftera is: þætte nænig biscop oðres
biscopes scire inswoge, ac þætte he þoncful sy steore him þæs
bibodenan folces.
 5.278.9. Se þridda is: þætte þa mynster, þa þe Gode
gehalgode syn, nænegum biscope alefed seo in ængum þinge heo
unstillian, ne owiht of heora eahtum þurh nednyme ongeneman.
 5.278.11. Se feorða is: þætte munecas ne leoren of stowe to
oðerre, ne of mynstre to oðrum, nemne þurh leafnesse his agnes abbudes;
ac þæt heo awunien in þære hersumnesse, þe hy Gode gehehton in þa
tid heora gehwyrfnesse.
 5.278.15. Þonne is se fifta: þæt nænig Godes þeow
biscopes gefera forlæte his ægenne biscop, & geond missenlice stowe
fere & eorne; ne he ower, þær he cyme, onfongen, sy, buton biscopes
tacne oððe gewrite.
 5.278.18. Gif he æne siða onfongen, haten ham hweorfan, ne
wille, se þe hine feormade & se þe gefeormad wæs, seon heo begen
biscopes dome scyldige.
 5.278.20. Ðonne is se sexta: þætte elþeodige biscopas
& Godes þeos seon þoncfulle heora gestliðnesse & feorme; &
nængum heora alefed sy ænge sacerdlice þegnunge don buton þæs
biscopes leafe, þe hy on his scire gefeormad syn.
 5.278.23. Se seofoða is: þætte twigea on gere seonoð
gesomnode.
 5.278.24. Ac forþon missenlice intingan & unæmtan oft
gelimpað, licade us eallum gemænelice, þætte in <foreign>Agustus Kalende</foreign>
æne siða on gere seonoð gesomnode in stowe, seo is nemned Clofeshoh.
 5.278.26. Se eahtoða is: þætte nænig biscopa hine oðrum
forbære þurh unrehte willunge, ac ealle ongete þa tide &
endebyrdnesse his halgunge.
 5.278.28. Se neogoða capitul wæs gemænelice asmead:
þætte weaxendum þæm rime geleafsumra ma biscopa ætecte wæron.
 5.278.30. Se teogoða is for gesinhigum: þætte nængum
alefed sy nemne ælice gesinscipe habban; ne ænig mæghæmed ne
unclæne fremme, ne nænig his agen wiif forlæte, nemne, swa þæt
halig godspel læreð, for intingan dyrnre forlegenesse.
 5.280.3. Gif hwelc mon his agnum wife wiðscufe, þæt him mid
rehte æ forgifen & geþeoded wæs, gif he rihtlice cristen beon
wille, ne gegaderie he hine to ængum oðrum, ac swa awunie oðþo wið
his agen wiif geþwærie.
 6.280.7. Wæs ðæs seonoð geworden þy geare ymb syx hund
wintra & þreo & hundseofontig from Drihtnes menniscnesse, þy geare
eac Ecgberht Contwara cyning forðferde in Iulius monðe: & Hloðhere
his broðor feng to his rice, þæt he hæfde þreottyne winter &
seofon monað.
 6.280.12. Ðonne wæs Biise Eastengla biscop, þe we sægdon
þætte in þæm foresprecenan seonoðe wære; wæs he Bonefatius
æfterfylgend þæs biscopes, þæs we beforan gemyndgodon, se wæs
micelre halignesse & æfestnisse mon.
 6.280.15. Forðon þa Bonefatius forðferde æfter seofontyne
gearum his biscophada, þa gehalgode Theodor biscop after him þone Biise to
biscope; ond þa gena bi him lifgendum, þæt he wæs bewered from
þære biscopþegnunge mid hefigre untrymnesse, wæron twegen biscopas
Ecce & Beadowine fore hine gecorene & gehalgode.
 6.280.19. Of þære tide oð to dæge seo mægð hafað
twegen biscopas.
 7.280.22. Æfter ðissum nales micelre tide forðaurnenre,
wæs Theodor ærcebiscop abolgen from Wynferðe Mercna biscope þurh
gewyrht sumre unhearsumnesse.
 7.280.24. Þa benom he hine his biscopscire & on his stowe
gehalgode Seaxwulf biscop, se wæs timbrend & abbud þæs mynstres,
æt Medeshamstede is cweden, in Gyrwa lende.
 7.280.27. Wynferþ hwearf to his mynstre, þæt is nemned æt
Bearwe, & þær on godre drohtunge his lif geendade.
 7.280.29. Þa eac swylce he gesette Eastseaxum Erconwald biscop in
Lundenceastre.
 7.280.30. Wæron heora cyningas in þa tiid Sebbe & Sighere,
þara we beforan gemyndgodon.
 7.280.31. Þæs biscopes lif & drohtunge in biscophade ge
ær biscophade is sægd þætte wære þæt halgeste, swa swa eac
swylce æfter mid heofonlicra mægena tacnum gecyðed wæs.
 7.282.2. Ond forþon seoþþon longe his horsbær, þe hine
mon untrumne on bær, wæs from his discipulum gehealden; & monige
untrume, þa ðe in lenctenadle oðþo in oðerre hefignesse &
untrumnesse gewergade wæron, þær æt hælo onfengon.
 7.282.6. Ond nales þæt an þætte þa untruman, þa ðe
under þa bære oðþo to gesette wæron, gehælde wæron, ac
swelce eac þa scæfþan, þe ðær on genumene wæron, & to
untrumum monnum gelædde, hræðe him læcedom gebæron &
brohton.
 7.282.9. Þes halga wer, ær þon þe he biscop geworden
wære, tu æðele mynster he getimbrede, oðer him seolfum oðer
æðelburge his sweostor, & æghwæðer þara regollecum
þeodscipum wel gesette.
 7.282.12. Him he getimbrade in Suðrigna lande bi Temese streame
in stowe, seo is geceged Ceortes eig, his sweoster, in Eastseaxna mægðe in
stowe seo is nemned in Bercingum, in þære heo meahte Gode wilsumra
wifmonna lareow & festermodor gestondan.
 7.282.16. Þa heo þa onfeng þæm gerece þæs mynstres,
heo efenwyrðe heo in eallum þingum þæm biscope & hire breðer in
rehtum life & in regollecum gegearwode, swa þætte eac swylce mid
heofonlecum wundrum æfter gecyþed wæs.
 8.282.20. Forðon in ðissum mynstre, þæt is in Bercingum,
monig tacn gastlicra mægena gefremed wæron, þa ðe to gemynde & to
timbernesse þara æfterfylgendra from monegum, þa ðe hit cuðon,
awriten hæfd wæren, þa sumu woe nu gemdon geþeodan in þis user
ciriclice/ stær.
 8.282.25. Mid þy seo hreonis þæs oft cwedenan wooles feor
& wide all wæs forhergende & forneomende, þa cwom he eac swylce in
þone dæl þæs mynstre, þe ða wæpnedmen in wæron; ond
dæghwamlice gehwær of weorulde to Drihtne genumene wæron.
 8.282.28. Þa wæs seo abbudisse & seo modor þære
gesomnunge bighygdig & sorgende, in hwylce tid þone dæl þæs
mynstres, þe se þreat þara Godes þeowa in wifhada in wæs, þæt
ilce wite gehrine, ða ongon heo gelomelice in gesomnunge þara sweostra
secan & ascian, in hwelcre stowe þæs mynstres heo woldon, þæt
heora liictun geseted wære, þæt heo mon bebyrgan meahte, þonne
þæt gelumpe, þæt heo of middangearde genumene wæron þy ylcan
gehrore, þe heo oðre gesegon.
 8.284.5. Mid þy heo þa nænge cuðe ondswaro findan meahte,
þeah þe heo georne sohte æt þæm sweostrum, þa gelomp, þæt
heo seolfa mid eallum þæm swustrum þa cuðestan ondsware þære
uplican foreseonesse onfeng.
 8.284.9. Forþon sumre neahte, þa se sealmsong gefylled wæs
þæs uhtlecan lofsonges, þa wæron ða Cristes þeowe utgongende of
cirican to byrgenne þara broðra, þa ðe heo of þissum leohte
foreeodon, & þær þa wunelecan lofsongas Drihtne sungon.
 8.284.12. Þa wæs þær semninga heofonlic leoht onsended
& cwom ofer heo ealle, ond swa swa micel scete heo ealle oferbrædde,
& heo mid swa micelre fyrhtu & wafunge gesloh, þæt heo þone
song, þe heo sungon, forhtiende forleton.
 8.284.15. Wæs seo beorhtnes þæs onsendan leohtes mara,
þon sunnan leoht bið æt middan dæge.
 8.284.17. Þa wæs æfter medmiclum fæce, þæt hit
wæs up ahæfen of þære stowe & gewat in suðdæl þæs
mynstres, þæt is be westan þære cirican.
 8.284.19. & þær þa sum fæc wunade, & him þa
stowe wæs ontynende, þe heo ær ymbþeahtedon; & swa eallum
geseondum up in heofonas gewat, þætte nængum heora tweo wæs,
þætte þæt seolfe leoht þa sawle þara Cristes þeowa wæs
gelædende & onfonde in heofonas, þætte þæt eac swylce þa
stowe him æteawde, þær heora lichoman restan scoldon & æriste
dæges bidan.
 8.284.24. Þæs leohtes scima wæs swa micel, swa swa sum ald
broðor on morgenne sægde, se ðe in þa ilcan tid in þære cirican
mid oðre gingran breðer æt gebede wæs, cwæð he, þæt
þæs leohtes scima þurh þa cinan þære dura & þurh þa
eagþyrel/ ineode, þæt hit ealle beorhtnesse dæghwamlices leohtes
oferswiðde.
 9.284.30. Wæs in ðæm ilcan mynstre cneohtcild sum; ne
wæs yldre þon þrywintre, wæs his noma æsica, se fore þære
cildlecan eldo þa gena wæs in þara fæmnena mynstre Gode gehalgodra
feded & læred.
 9.286.1. Ða wæs he gehrinen mid þa foresprecenan aðle.
 9.286.1. Ða he ða to þæm ytmæstan dogor bicwom, þa
cleopode he ðriga & aane of þæm gehalgedum fæmnum Criste hire
agne noman cegde, swa swa he hire ondweardre to spræce, & cwæð:
Eadgyð, Eadgyð, Eadgyð; & swa wæs geendiende þis wilwendlice
liif, & in þæt ece ineode.
 9.286.6. Ond sona þa seo fæmne, þe he sweltende cegde, in
þære stowe þe heo wæs, þære ilcan untrymnesse wæs gehrinen,
& þy seolfan dæge, þe heo geceged wæs, of þeossum leohte wæs
atogen: & þone wæs fylgende, se ðe hy cegde, to þæm heofonlecan
rice.
 10.286.10. Eft sumu of þæm ilcan Godes þeowum mid þa
foresprecenan aðle wæs gestonden & to þæm uutmæstan dogor
gelæded.
 10.286.11. Þa ongon heo semninga on midde neaht cleopian þæm
þe hire þegnodon; bæd þæt hy þæt blæcern & þæt
leoht adwæscten, þæt þær inne onbærned wæs; & þæs
heo gelomlice bæd & monade, & hire nænig hwæðre hyran
wolde.
 10.286.15. Ða æt nehstan cwæð heo: Ic wat þæt ge
wenað, þæt ic ungewitge mode sprece.
 10.286.16. Ac hwæðre witað ge þæt hit swa nis.
 10.286.17. Forþon ic eow soð secgu, þæt ic geseo þis hus
mid swa micle leohte gefylled, þætte þæt eower blæcern & leoht
me is eallinga þeostre gesegen.
 10.286.19. Ond ne þa gena, þeah þe heo þus spræce, hire
ænig ondswarade oðþe geþafian wolde.
 10.286.20. Cwæð heo eft: Bærnað nu eower blæcern &
leoht, swa longe swa ge willen.
 10.286.21. Weotað ge hwæðre þæt þæt nis min,
forþon min leoht me to cymeð, þonne hit dagian onginneð.
 10.286.23. Ongon him þa secgan, þæt hire æteawde sum
halig wer, se þy ylcan geare forðferde, & hire cwæde to, þonne
dagunge tid cwome, þæt heo wære to þæm ecan leohte ferende.
 10.286.25. Þære gesyhðe soð wæs hraðe gecyðed &
geseðed ymb þæs dæges upyrne in þære fæmnan deaðe &
forðfore.
 11.286.28. Mid ðy ða eac seo arfæste modor Gode þære
leofan gesomnunge æðelburg abbudisse wæs of middangearde to geleoranne,
ða æteawde sweoster wundorlic gesyhð, þære noma wæs Torhtgyð.
 11.286.30. Seo monig ger in þæm ilcan mynstre wuniende wæs,
& heo symle in ealre eaðmodnesse & in hluttornisse & in
clænnisse geornlice Gode þeodde; ond wæs fultumend regollices
þeodscipes þære ilcan moder & abbudissan, & þa geongran
lærde & clænsade ge mid lare ge mid lifes bysene.
 11.288.3. Þære sweostor mægen þæt æfter þæs
apostolis cwide in untrymnesse gefremed wære, wæs heo semninga gehrinen
mid hefigre untrymnesse lichoman, & þurh nigon ger full mid þa
arfæstan foreseonisse ures alesendes swiþe swenced wæs, to þon
þætte, swa hwæt swa in hire unclænes betweoh þa mægen þurh
unwisnesse oððo þurh ungemænne gelumpe, þætte eal þæt se ofn
þære singalan costunge asude.
 11.288.9. Þeos sweostor sumre neahte, þa hit dagian ongon,
wæs utgongende of hire cleofan, þe heo inwunade.
 11.288.11. Þa geseah heo sweotole swa swa monnes lichoman mid
scetan bewundenne, se wæs beorhtra þon sunne, in heanisse boren beon.
 11.288.13. Wæs he ærest up ahefen of þæm huse, þe ða
sweostor in reston.
 11.288.14. Mid þy heo þa geornlecor bihealdende wæs, hwelcum
teonde up ahefen wære se wlite þæs wulderlecan lichoman, þe heo
sceawiende wæs, ða geseah heo, swa swa mid gyldnum rapum he in þa
uplecan ahefen wære, oðþæt þe openiendum heofonum in gelæded
wæs, & me from hire gesegen beon ne meahte.
 11.288.18. Þa þohte heo bi þære gesyhðe; & hire
nænig tweo wæs, þætte hwylchugu hraðe of þære gesomnunge
sweltende wære, þære sawl þurh þa godan weorc & þa scinendan,
þe heo dyde, swa swa þurh gyldne rapas to heofonum ahefen beon sceolde.
 11.288.22. Þæt þa soðlice swa gelomp.
 11.288.22. Forðon, nales monegum dagum betweoh gesettum, Gode seo
leofe modor þære gesomnunge of hefignesse lichoman alæded wæs; &
hire seo halige sawl þæs heofonlecan eðles ingong gestag.
 11.288.26. Swylce eac in þæm ylcan mynstre wæs sum
æðele nunne æfter þeosse worulde wyrðnisse, & in lufan
þære toweardan weorulde micle æðelre.
 11.288.28. Seo monegum gearum swa eallre þegnunge hire lichoman
ofgefen & forlæten wæs, þæt heo nænig lim onstyrian meahte.
 11.288.30. Þa heo þa geascade, þæt þære arwyrðan
abbudissan lichoma wæs in cirican broht & geseted, oðþæt hine mon
byrgan sceolde, þa bæd heo þæt hy mon þider gebære.
 11.288.32. Þa ðæt þa swa wæs, þa onhelde heo to þam
liice ond in gemet þara biddendra, swa swa heo to hire lifigendre spræce,
bæd þæt heo funde & abæde æt þæs arfæstan sceppendes
mildheortnesse, þæt heo from swa miclum clæmnessum & swa singalum
onlesed beon moste.
 11.290.2. Ne hire bene lator gehyrde wæron þon æfter twelf
dagum, þæt heo wæs of lichoman gelæded, & for þæm
hwilwendlecum geswencnessum ece mede & edlean onfeng.
 12.290.6. Mid ðy ða þa seo foresprecene Cristes þeowe
Torhtgyð þreo ger þa gena æfter þære hlafdigan forðfore in
þissum life hæfd wæs, ond heo swa swiðe mid þa untrymnesse þe we
forecwædon, soden wæs, þætte na þa baan an to lafe wæron: &
æt nehstan, þa seo tid nealecte hire tolesnesse, nales þæt an
oðerra leoma ac swylce eac þære tungan onstyrenesse biswicade.
 12.290.11. Þa wæron þreo dagas & þreo neaht fulle,
þæt heo wæs uncwisse, þa wæs heo semninga mid gastlicre gesihðe
gereted, & hire muð & hire eagan ontynde & locade up in heofon
& þus ongon sprecan to þære gesihðe, þe heo bihealdende wæs:
Me is, cwæð heo, þin cyme on miclum ðonce; & þu eart leof
wilcuma.
 12.290.16. Þa heo þa ðis cwæð, þa geswigade heo hwon,
swa swa heo bidende wære his ondsware, þone þe heo geseah & þæm
þe heo tosprecende wæs.
 12.290.18. Eft heo, swa swa heo leohtlice gebylged wære,
æfter þon heo cwæð: Nænge þinga ic þas bliðe aberan mæg.
 12.290.20. Eft heo midmicel fæc geswigade.
 12.290.20. Cwæð þa ðriddan siðe: Gif hit nænge
þinga to dæge beon mægge, ic halsio þætte ne sy long fæc
bitweonum.
 12.290.22. Swigade þa eft hwon, swa swa heo ær dyde, ond þa
ðus þæt word betynde & geendade: Gif hit eallinga þus aræded
seo, & þes cwide onwended beon ne mote, ic biddo & halsio þæt ne
sy mare fæc betweonum, þon þeos nehste neaht an.
 12.290.26. Þa heo þa þis cwæð, þa frugnon heo þa
ymbsittendan, mid hwone heo sprecende wære.
 12.290.27. Cwæð heo: Mid mine þa leofestan modor
æðelburge.
 12.290.28. Þa ongeton hy in þon, þæt heo to þon cwom,
þæt heo hire sægde þa neahtide hire geleornesse.
 12.290.29. & eac swa wæs, swa swa heo bæd: þa se dæg
& seo niht forðgewat, þæt heo wæs onlesed from bendum hire
lichoman & untrymnesse, & to gefean ineode ecre hælo.
 13.292.1. Ða æfterfylgde æðelburge in abbudissan
þegnunge seo wilsume Godes þeowe, þære noma wæs Hildelid.
 13.292.2. Ond heo monig ger, þæt is oð ða ytmæstan elde
hire, þam ilcan mynstre fromlice fore wæs æghwæðer ge in þara
þinga foresceawunge, þa ðe to gemænum brocum belumpun, ge eac in
gehælde regollices þeodscipes.
 13.292.5. Þa licade hire fore nearonisse þære stowe, þe
þæt mynster ongetimbred is, þæt heo wolde þa baan up adon þara
Cristes þeowa, þe ðær bebyrgede wæron, & in cirican gesettan
þære eadigan fæmnan Sancta Marian & þær in anre stowe
healdan.
 13.292.9. Ond þær swiðe oft seoððan beorhtnes
heofonlices leohtes æteawde; & eac oft micel swetnes wundorlices stences
becwom, & monig oðer tacn & wundor æteawdon, þa mæg in
þære bec gemetan, swa hwylc swa heo rædeð, þe we þas of
alæson.
 13.292.14. Þonne is sum wundor hælo, þe us nis to
forlætenne, þe seo ilce booc sagað, þætte æt liictune geworden
wære Gode þære leofan gesomnunge.
 13.292.16. Wæs sum gesiið þær on neaweste.
 13.292.16. Þa gestod his wiif untrymnes on hire eagum: & þa
ðurh dagas þæt heo hefegedan & þeostrodon, þæt heo æt
nehstan nænigne dæl leohtes sciman geseon meahte.
 13.292.19. Mid þy heo þa sum fæc on þisse blindnisse
wæs, þa wæs sumre neahte, þær heo betyned wunade, þætte hire
becwom on mod, gif heo to þam mynstre gelæded wære Godes þara
gehalgedra fæmnena, ond heo þær æt þara haligra reliquium hire
gebede, þæt heo meahte þæt forlorene leoht eft onfon.
 13.292.23. Ne heo þa ne ælde, ac sona gefylde þæt hire on
mod becwom.
 13.292.24. Þa wæs heo gelæded from hire þeowum &
þignenum to þæm mynstre, þe þær neah wæs.
 13.292.25. Þær heo wæs ondettende, þæt heo hæfde
onwalgne geleafan hire hælo.
 13.292.26. Þa wæs heo gelæded to liictune þara Godes
þeowa; & mid þy heo þær longe gebegdum cneom hire gebæd, sona
geearnode þæt hire bene geherde wæron.
 13.292.29. Ond sona þæs þe heo fram þam bede aras, ær
þon þe heo of þære stowe eode, þæt heo onfeng gife þæs
bedenan leohtes.
 13.292.30. Ond seo ær hire þeowa hondum þyder gelæded
wæs, heo þa freo on hire fota gongum bliðe ham hweorfende wæs, efne
þon gelicost, swa swa heo to ðon þæt wilwendlice leoht an forlete,
þæt heo in hire hælo æteawde, hu micel leoht Cristes þa halgan in
heofonum ahten, & hwylc gifu heora mægenes wære.
 14.294.3. Þære tide Eastseaxna rice fore wæs, swa swa seo
ilce boc sagað, Gode se wilsuma wer, þæs noma wæs Sebbe, þæs we
beforan gemyndgodon.
 14.294.5. Wæs he se mon æfest in his dædum & gelom in
halgum gebedum & swiðe geornful in arfæstum wæstmum ælmessena;
ond he sundorliif & munucliif wæs forebeorende allum þam weolum &
arum þæs eorðlecan riices.
 14.294.8. Þæt lif he oft & geara wolde geceosan &
þæt eorðlice rice forlætan, gif him ne wiðstode þæt
wiðerworde mod his wiifes.
 14.294.10. Þonon monegum wæs gesewen & oft cweden,
þætte swelces modes wer ma gedafonade beon to biscope gehalgad, þonne
cyning wære.
 14.294.12. Mid þy he ða þritig wintra in þæm rice
awunade & wæs cempa þæs heofonlecan rices, þa wæs he
lichomlicre untrymnesse micelre swiðe þread, & þære forðferde.
 14.294.14. Ða monade he his wif, þæt heo þa gena
ætgædre Gode þeowde, þa heo ma ætgædre ne meahton middangeard
lufian ne middangearde þeowian.
 14.294.17. Ða he þæt þa for his untrymnesse uneaðe
þurhteah, þa cwom he to Lundenceastre biscope, þæs noma wæs
Waldhere, se wæs ærconwaldes biscopes æfterfylgend; ond þurh his
bletsunge þone æfestnesse had underfeng, þone he longe ær wilnade.
 14.294.20. Swylce he brohte þæm ilcan biscope micel feoh &
unlytel þearfum to gedælanne; ond þæs ealles nowiht him seolfum
wæs gehaldende, ac he ma wilnade þearfan gaste wunian for heofona rices
lufan.
 14.294.23. Mid þy he ða hefgad wæs mid þa foresprecenan
untrymnesse, & he onget þæt him deaðes dæg toweard wæs, þa
ongon þæs cynelecan modes monn him ondrædan, þonne he to deaðe
cumende wære & mid micle sare wæced þy læs he owiht unwyrþes
oðþe ungerisnes dyde mid his muþe, oðþe mid oðerra lima
styrenesse.
 14.294.28. Gehet him þa to þære foresprecenan Lundenceastre
biscop, in þære he ða wunade; bæd hine þæt he him forgefe,
þonne he forðferan scolde, þæt þær ma monna inne ne wære,
þonne se biscop & twegen his þegna.
 14.294.32. Þa gehet se biscop, þæt he leoflice swa gedyde,
swa he hine bæd, þa wæs æfter medmiclum fæce, þætte se ilca
Godes wer his leomu in stilnesse gesette & hine gerestan wolde, &
onslepte.
 14.296.2. Þa geseah he frefrende gesihðe, seo him ealle þa
nearonesse þære gemyndgadan sorge afyrde, ond eac swelce him æteawde,
hwelce dæge he sceolde þis hwilwendlice lif geendian.
 14.296.5. Geseah he, swa swa he seolfa eft æfter sægde, þry
wæpnedmen to him cuman mid beorhtum hræglum gegyrede.
 14.296.7. Þara wæs an gesittende beforan his reste, &
stodon his geferan oðre, þa ðe mid him cwomon.
 14.296.8. Þa frugnon heo þone sittendan bi his stealle, hu be
him geweorðan scolde, þone þe hy untrumne neosian cwomon.
 14.296.10. Cwæð he, þætte sawl butan ængum sare &
mid micle beorhtnesse leohtes wære utgongende of lichoman: & him eac
cyðde & sægde, þæt he þy þriddan dæge forðferan
sceolde.
 14.296.13. Æghwæþer þara þinga swa gefylled wæs, swa
he of þære gesyhðe geleornade.
 14.296.14. Forðon æfter þy þriddan dæge, gefylleddre
nontide, þa semninga wæs, swa swa he leohtlice onslepte, buton ænigre
gefelnisse sares þone gast onsende & forðgeleorde.
 14.296.16. Þa gearwodon heo his lichoman to byrgenne stænenne
þruh.
 14.296.17. Þa heo þa ongunnon þone lichoman þær
insettan, þa wæs se lichoma sponne lengra þære þryh.
 14.296.19. Ða heowon heo þone stan, swa swiðe swa heo
meahton, & toætecton lengeo þære þryh twegra fingra gemet.
 14.296.20. Ac ne ða gen swa þætte heo þone lichoman neoman
meahte.
 14.296.21. Þa wæs micel uneðelicnes geworden bi his
byrgennesse, þa þohton heo & spræcon, þæt hy oðþe oðre
þruh sohton oððe þone lichoman on cneom gebegde, to þon þæt heo
hine þær in gedon meahton.
 14.296.24. Ac þa wundorlicwise & efne heofonlic wæs
geworden, þætte bewerede þætte nohwæðer þissa beon sceolde.
 14.296.26. Stod se biscop & þæs cyninges suna twegen æt
þæm lice, Sigeheard & Swefred, þa æfter him to rice fengon, &
eac micelu mengeo manna.
 14.296.28. Ða wæs semninga gemeted seo þruh gerisenre lenge
to gemete þæs lichoman, to þon þætte from dæle þæs heafdes
eac swylce meahte wongere betweoh geseted beon; & from dæle þara fota
feower fingra gemet seo þruh wæs þæm lichoman lengre.
 14.296.32. Þa wæs se Godes mon bebyrged in Sancte Paules
cirican þæs apostoles, þæs monungum he gelæred wæs &
geleornade, þæt he ða heofonlecan eadignesse gehyhte.
 15.298.1. Se feorða biscop Westseaxna Leutherius wæs haten.
 15.298.1. Se æresta wæs Birinus; se æftera wæs
ægelberht; þridda wæs Wine.
 15.298.3. Þa Cenwalh se cyning forðferde, in þæs rice se
ilca Leutherius wæs biscop geworden, þa fengon aldormen to þæm rice
þære þeode, & betweoh him todældon, & tyn ger hæfdon.
 15.298.5. & in heora rice Leutherius se biscop forðferde; ond
Theodor biscop fore hine gehalgode Hædde to biscope in Lundenceastre.
 15.298.7. On þæs biscopes tide wæron oferswiðde &
geflymde þa aldormen: ond Ceadwalla feng to Westseaxna rice.
 15.298.9. & mid þy he tu ger rice hæfde & cyning
wæs, þa wæs he inbryrded mid lufan þæs uplecan rices &
þæt eorðlice forlet in þæs ilcan biscopes tid, & to Rome ferde
& þær his lif geendade, swa swa hereæfter is swutolecor to
secgenne.
 16.298.13. Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & syx &
hundseofontig æfter Drihtnes menniscnesse, þætte æðelred Mercna
cyning gelædde wærge weorod, & Cent forhergode, & cirican &
mynster buton gesihðe arfæstnesse oðþe Godes egsan hwyrfde &
fornom: ond Hrofesceastre eac swelce, in þære wæs Putta biscop, þeah
þe he in ða tid þær ondweard ne wære, he mid gemæne hergunge
fornom.
 16.298.18. Ða he ða þæt onfond, þæt his cirice eallum
hire æhtum wæs bereafod & forhergad, þa cerde he to Seaxwulfe
Mercna biscope: & he him gesealde sumre cirican eahte & medmicel lond.
 16.298.22. Ond he in þære cirican Gode þeowode, & swa
hwyder ymb swa he beden wæs, ferde & ciricsong lærde; & þær
in sibbe his lif geendade.
 16.298.24. For þæm Theodor biscop in Hrofesceastre Quichelm to
biscope gehalgode; ac he æfter medmicelre tide for wæðelnesse
weoruldgoda from þæm biscopseðle gewat.
 16.298.26. He ða Gefmund for hine to biscope gesette.
 16.298.28. Þa wæs ymb tu ger, þæs þe æðelred
Mercna cyning Centlond forhergode, þæt is þæt nigoðe ger
Ecgfriðes rices þæs cyninges, ða æteawde in Agustus monðe neowe
steorra, se is cweden cometa; & þreo monað wæs awuniende, & in
uhttide wæs upeornende & micelne sciman wæs beorende swa swa
scinendes leges.
 16.300.2. Ðy ylcan gere wæs towestnis & unsib geworden
betweoh Ecgfrið cyning & þone arwyrðan biscop Wilferð.
 16.300.4. & se ilca biscop wæs ascofen & adrifen of his
biscopseðle, ond twegen biscopas on his stowe gesette, þa ðe
Norðanhymbra þeode fore wæron, þæt wæs Boosa, se styrde Dera
mægðe, & Eata Beornicea.
 16.300.7. Hæfde Bosa in Eoforwiicceastre seðl, ond Eata in
Eagostaldes ea & in Lindisfarona ea: wæron heo begen of munuchade in
biscophad gecorene.
 16.300.9. Mid þæm wæs eac Eadhæd in Lindisse mægðe
to biscope gehalgod, þa neowan Ecgfrið se cyning geeode, þa he
oferswiðde & geflymde Wulfhere in gefeohte.
 16.300.12. Ond seo ilce mægð ærest þeosne biscop agenne
onfeng.
 16.300.13. Se æftera wæs æðelwine; se þridda Eadgar;
se feorða Cyneberht.
 16.300.14. Hæfde seo mægð ær Eadhæðe Seaxwulf
biscop, se eac swelce wæs Mercna biscop & Middelengla.
 16.300.15. Ac he wæs of Lindessse adrifen, þa Ecgfrið heo
geeode, & in þara oðerra mægða gerece awunade.
 16.300.17. Wæron gehalgode in Eoforwic, Eadhæð, Boosa,
& Eata from Theodore biscope.
 16.300.18. Ond he ða eal swylce æfter þrim gearum
wilferðes onweggewitenesse þissa rime twegen biscopas toætecte,
Trumberht to cirican Heagostealdes ea & Eata hwearf to Lindesfarona ea
& Trumwine to Peohta mægðe, seo in þa tid wæs Ongolcynrice
underþeoded.
 16.300.22. Eadhæð he gesette to biscope Hrypsetna cirican,
þa he of Lindesse hwearf, forðon þa æðelred Mercna cyning þa
mægðe onfeng & beget.
 17.300.25. Ða Wilferð biscop adrifen wæs of his biscopscire
& longe geond monige stowe ferende wæs, & he Rome gesohte & eft
hwearf to Breotone.
 17.300.27. Ond þeah þe he for feondscipum þæs gemyndgedan
cyninges in his eðel oððe in his biscopscire onfongen beon ne meahte, ne
meahte he hwæðre from þære þegnunge beon bewered godspel to
lærenne.
 17.300.30. Ac he cerde to Suðseaxna mægðe, seo æfter
Contwarum suð & west belimpeð to Westseaxna gemære.
 17.300.31. Is þæs londes seofon þusendo, ond heo þære
tide þa gena hæðnum bigongum þeowdon.
 17.302.1. Þisse þeode se biscop Cristes geleafan word &
fulwihtebæþ þegnade.
 17.302.2. Wæs æðelwalh þære þeode cyning noht
micelre tide ær in Mercum gefulwad þurh Wulfheres lare & geornfulnisse
Mercna cyninges.
 17.302.4. Eac swelce þa he æt fulwihte bæðe onþwegen
wæs, him to godsuna onfeng, ond to tacne þære sibbe him twa mægðe
forgeaf, þæt is Wihte ealond & Meanware mægðe in Westseaxna
þeode.
 17.302.8. Wæs he se cyning swiðe gefeonde in þæs biscopes
cyme.
 17.302.8. Ond he ærest ealdormen þære mægðe &
cyninges þegnas mid þa halgan wyllan þwoh fulwihtes bæðes; ond
mæssepreostas Eappa & Peadda & Burghelm & Oidde þæt oðer
folc ge þa ge æfterfylgendre tide fulwadon.
 17.302.12. Seo quen þonne, þære noma wæs æbbe, in hire
mægðe, þæt is in Hwiccum, wæs gefulwad.
 17.302.13. Wæs heo Eanfriðes dohtor Eanheres broðor, þa
begen wæron Cristne mid heora folce.
 17.302.14. Ac eal seo mægð suðseaxna wæs unwis þæs
godcundan noman & geleafan.
 17.302.17. Wæs þær sum munuc of Scotta cynne, se wæs
Dicul haten; hæfde he medmicel mynster sum in þære stowe, þe is
nemned Bosanham.
 17.302.19. Wæs mid wuda & mid sæ ymbsald, & in
þæm wæron fif gebroðor oððe syxe in þearfendum life &
earmlecum Drihtne þeowiende.
 17.302.21. Ac nænig mon in þære mægðe ne heora lif
onhyrgan wolde ne heora lare gehyran.
 17.302.23. Ond þa Wilferð biscop in þære þeode godcunde
lare lærde, nales þæt an þætte from yrmðum ecre niðrunge, ac
swylce eac from þæm manfullan wæle hwilwendlicre forwyrde generede.
 17.302.25. Forþon þrym gearum ær his cyme in þa mægðe
þæt þær nænig regn in þæm stowum cwom; & þonon se
grimmesta hungor þæt folc wæs wæcende, & heo mid arleasre cwale
fylde wæron.
 17.302.28. Þæt is to tacne: secgað men, þætte oft
feowertig monna oðþe fiftig somed, þa ðe mid þy hungre gewæcte
wæron, þæt heo earmlice bi hondum noman & ealle ætgædre of
sæs ofre ut feollan, & woldon heo sylfe oðþe offyllan oðþe
adrencan.
 17.302.32. Ond þa þy sylfan dæge, ðe seo þeod Cristes
geleafan onfeng & fulwihte, þa astah & cwom smolt regn & micel
& genihtsum; & þa lond greowon & blostmedon, ond æfter cwom
god gear & wæstmbeorende.
 17.304.2. Ond swa awurpon þa aldan dysignesse & deofolgild
onscunedon, ond ealra heora heortan & lichoman wynsumedon in þone
lifgendan God; & þone ongeton, se ðe soð God is, ond þæt heo
seolfe wæron ge on þæm nearran godum, ge on þæm utteran mid
heofonlice gife gewelgade.
 17.304.6. Forðon se biscop, mid þy þe he in þa mægðe
cwom & swa micel wite hungres þær geseah, lærde he ða þæt
hie in fiscaðe him ondlifene sohton; forþon ðe æghwæðer ge sio
sæ ge hiora ea fiscum genyhtsumade.
 17.304.10. Ac sio ðeod þone cræft þæs fiscaþes ne
cuðe, nemne to ælum anum.
 17.304.11. Ða gesomnodon þa bisceopes men þa ælnet
æghwonan þe hie meahton, & sendon in ðone sæ.
 17.304.12. & seo godcunde giofu him gefultumade þæt hie
sona gefengon þreo hund fisca missenlicra cynna.
 17.304.13. Ond ða in þreo todældon: hundteontig hie sealdon
þearfum, hundteontig þæm ðe þa net ahton; hundteontig hy him selfum
to nytte dydon.
 17.304.16. Þære fremsumnesse se bisceop ealra hiora heortan in
his lufan gecerde: ond ðy neodlicor þurh his lare þa heofonlican god
gehyhton, þæs ðenunge hie ða hwilwendlican god namon & onfengon.
 17.304.20. Ðære tide æþelwalh se cyning geaf & sealde
ðæm arwyrðan bisceope Wilferþe seofon & hundeahtatig hida londes,
ðæs noma is Sylesea, þæt he meahte his men on gehabban þa þe mid
him wraccdon.
 17.304.23. Is sio stow æghwonan mid sæ ymbseald butan westan;
ðonan hit hafað ingang, swa micelre brædo swa mon mæge mid liðeran
geweorpan.
 17.304.25. Mid ðy he þa se bisceop þa stowe onfeng, þa
gestaþelode he þær mynster ond þæt to regollife gesette swiþust
of þam broðrum, þe he mid him brohte.
 17.304.27. Þæt git to dæge his æfterfylgend bisceopas
habbað & agon.
 17.304.28. Þenode se arwyrða bisceop Wilferð in ðæm
dælum ða bisceopðenunge arwyrðlice fif gear, þæt is oð
Ecgferþes deað þæs cyninges.
 17.304.30. Ond forðon him æþelwalh se cyning mid æhte
þære foresprecenan stowe ealle ða spede þe þær on wæron mid
lande ond mid monnum sealde & forgeaf, ond he ealle on Cristes geleafan
gesette & mid fulwihte bæþe aþwoh.
 17.306.1. Betwih ða twa & hundteontig & fiftig þara
manna esna ond menena gefulwade; & ealle ða swa swa he þurh fulwihte
from deofles ðeowdome gehælde, & eac swilce mennisce ðeowdome
onlesde & hie gefreode.
 17.306.5. Betwih þas ðing þa wæs cumende Ceadwalla mid
weorode Westseaxna æþeling, geong & from, þa he wreccea wæs, ond
ofsloh æþelwalh ðone cyning & þa mægþe mid grimme wæle
& herige ongebræc.
 17.306.8. Ac he wæs sona ðonon adrifen from ðæs cyninges
ealldormonnum Berhthune & Andhune, þa syððan þære mægþe
rice hæfdon.
 17.306.10. Þara se ærra wæs fram þam ylcan Ceadwala
ofslegen, þa he Westseaxna cyning wæs, & þa mægþe mid hefigran
þeowdome gehnægde.
 17.306.12. Swylce eac Ine, se ðe æfter Ceadwalan to rice feng,
gelicre geswencednesse monigra geara tide þa mægþe yfelade.
 17.306.13. For þære wisan wæs geworden þæt eallre
þære tide hi agenne bysceop habban ne mihton.
 17.306.15. Ac þa Willferð bysceop wæs eft ham gelaðad,
heora se æresta bisceop, syððan hie Westseaxna bysceopum underþeodde
wæron, þa þe wæron on Wintaceastre.
 18.306.18. Æfter þon þa þe Ceadwala wæs gemægenad
& gestrongod on Westseaxna rice, þa geeode he eac & onfeng Wiht
þæt ealond, þæt eal wæs oð þa tid deofolgildum geseald.
 18.306.20. Ond he gelice þy troiscan wæle ealle þa
londbigengan wolde utamærian & his agenra leoda monnum gesettan.
 18.306.22. Secgað men, þæt he eac wære mid gehate hine
seolfne bindende þeah þe he ða gena in Criste ne wære eft acenned
þurh fulwihtes bæð, þæt gif he þæt ealond gegan meahte,
þæt he his þone feorðan dæl & þære herehyðe for Gode
gesealde.
 18.306.25. & he þæt swa gelæste, þæt þone dæl
he Wilferðe biscope for Gode gesealde to brucenne, se in þa tid of his
þeode þider cwom & þær ondweard wæs.
 18.306.28. Is þæs ilcan ealondes gemet æfter Ongolcynnes
eahte twelf hund hida.
 18.306.29. & he þa þam biscope gesealde in æht þreo
hund hida, & þær eahta to.
 18.306.30. Ond he þa þone dæl, þe he onfeng, bebead sumum
his preosta, þæs noma wæs Berhtwini, se wæs his sweostor sunu.
 18.308.2. Ond he sealde him mæssepreost, þæs noma wæs
Hiddila, se eallum þæm þa ðe woldon gehælde beon Godes word &
fulwihte bæð þegnode.
 18.308.5. Nis þonne no to forswigienne, ðætte in fruman þa
ðe of þam ilcan ealonde þurh geleafan gehælde wæron, twegen
cynelice cneohtas þa mid synderlicre Godes gife wæron gesigefæste, þa
wæron Aarwaldes broðor þæs ealondes cyninges.
 18.308.8. Ða Ceadwalla se cyning mid þy here in þæt ealond
for, þa flugon þa cneohtas ut of þæm ealonde, & wæron
gelædde in þa neahmægðe, seo is gecegd Eota lond, in sume stowe seo
is nemned æt Stane.
 18.308.11. Woldon heo & wendon, þæt heo þær meahton
deagle & beholene beon from onsyne þæs unholdan cyninges.
 18.308.13. Him ða wæron heo þær gemeldode; & se
cyning heo ofslean het.
 18.308.14. Ða þæt þa gehyrde sum abbud &
mæssepreost, þæs noma wæs Cyneberht, se hæfde þonon noht feor
sum mynster in þære stowe, þe is geceged Hreodford, þa cwom he to
þæm cyninge, se ða in þæm ilcan dælum deagollice læcnod
wæs from his wundum, þa ðe him gedonne wæron, þa he feaht &
wonn on Wiht ðæt ealond.
 18.308.19. Ond hine bæd, gif þa cneohtas aninga ofslegene beon
sceoldon, þæt he him alefde & forgefe, þæt he moste heo
gelæran in þa gerynu þæs cristnan geleafan.
 18.308.20. Þa forgef se cyning him þæt & alefde.
 18.308.22. Ond he ða heo intimbrede & gelærde mid
soðfæstnesse worde & mid fulwihtes bæðe heo from synnum aðwoh:
& heo gewisse gedyde & gelærde bi ingonge þæs ecan rices.
 18.308.24. Ond se quellere him oferstod: & heo sona unforhte
& bliðe underhnigon þone wilwendlecan deað, þurh þone heo ne
tweodon ferende beon to þæm ecan rice heora sawla.
 18.308.28. Ono þisse endebyrdnesse, æfter þon þe ealle
Breotone mægðe Cristes geleafan onfengon, onfeng eac Wiht þæt
ealond.
 18.308.29. Hwæðre in þæm nænig for ermþo þære
utlecan underþeodnesse onfeng biscoplicre þegnunge had ær Daniele, se
þa wæs Westseaxna biscop.
 18.308.32. Is þis ealond geseted ongegn midle Suðseaxna &
Westseaxna; is sæ betweoh geseted þreora mila brad, se is gecegd
Soluente.
 18.308.34. In þæm sæ beoð twegen sæflodas, þa ðe
ymb Breotone of þæm ungeendedan norðgarsecge becumað & astigað:
& dæghwamlice him betweoh feohtende ongen cumað, & geendade þy
compe in þone sæ eft togotene hweorfað, þonon heo ær cwomon.
 19.310.3. Þissum tidum gehyrde Theodor biscop þone geleafan
þære cirican Constantinopoli þurh gedwolan Euticetis swiðe gedrefde
beon.
 19.310.5. Ond he ða wilnade, þæt he Ongolþeode cirican,
þæm he ða fore wæs, from þisses gemetes woole clæne awunade.
 19.310.6. Ond gesomnedum þreate arwyrðra biscopa & monigra
lareowa on syndrige frægn & ascode, hwylces geleafan heo wæren; ond
mid anmodre geþafunge ealra heo on rehtum geleafan gemette.
 19.310.10. & þeosne geleafan he gemde bebeodan &
gefæstnian mid seonoðlecum stafum to intimbernesse & to gemynde þara
æfterfylgendra.
 19.310.11. Þara stafa & gewrites is þes fruma.
 19.310.13. <foreign>In nomine Domini nostri Ihesu Cristi Saluatoris:</foreign> in
noman usses Drihtnes Hælendes Cristes, ricsiendum ussum þam arfæstan
hlafordum Ecgfriðe Norðanhymbra cyninge þy tegðan gere his rices, under
þæm fiftegðan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Octobris</foreign>, þy eahteðan indictione,
ond æðelrede Mercna cyninge þy syxtan geare his riices, & Ealdulfe
Eastengla cyninge þy seofonteogeðan geare his rices, ond Hlothere Contwara
cyninge his rices þy seofeðan geare; foresittendum Theodore mid Godes gife
ærcebiscope Breotone ealondes & Contwara burge ceastre; ætgædre
mid hine sittendum oðrum biscopum Breotone ealondes arwyrðum werum; ond
foregesettum þæm swiðe halgum godspellum in þære stowe, þe is
nemned Hæðfeld; ætgædre we wæron smeagende rehtne geleafan &
rehtwuldriende.
 19.310.25. We asetton, swa swa usser Drihten Hælende Crist in
menniscum lichoman sealde his discipulum, ða ðe hine ondweardlice gesegon
& gehyrdon his word.
 19.310.27. Ond he sealde haligra fædra herebeacen, <foreign>id est
Credo;</foreign> ond gemænelice ealle halige & ealle seonoðas & ealle
þreat gecorenra lareowa þære rehtgelefdan cirican.
 19.310.30. Ðas we seondon arfæstlice fylgende &
rihtwuldriende; æfter heora lare þa ðe wæron godcundlice inbryrde,
geþwærelice we gelyfað ondettende.
 19.312.2. Ond we ondettað æfter halgum fædrum swæslice
& soðlice, Fæder & Sunu & Haligne Gast, þrignisse in Annisse
efenspedelice, ond Annesse in þære þrignesse, þæt is ænne God in
þreom astondnessum oðþo hadum efenspedelecum efenlices wuldres &
aare.
 19.312.6. Ond þisses gemetes men æfter setton &
spræcon, þa ðe belumpon to ondetnesse rihtes geleafan.
 19.312.8. & þas swelce eac toætecte se halga seonoð his
stafum: We onfengon þa halgan fif seonoðas & þa rehtgelefdan eadigra
fædra & Gode ondfengra: þæt is ða ðe in Nicena gesomnade
wæron, þreo hund biscopa & eahtatyne wið þæm arleasum Arreum
eretici & his lare; ond in Constantinopoli wæron gesomnade hundteontig
& fiftig biscopa wið wedenheortnisse Macedones & Eodoxæ &
heora lare; ond in Efessum tu hundteontig biscopa wið þone wyrrestan
Nestorium & his lare; ond in Calcidone syx hund biscopa & þritig
wið Eotycem & Nestorium & his lare; ond eft in Constantinopoli se
fifta seonoð wæs gesomnad, in Iustinianes tide þæs geongran caseres,
wið þeodorum & Theodoreti & Iiba þæm ereticum & heora
larum.
 19.312.19. Ond we onfengon eac þone seonoð, se wæs geworden
in Rome byrig in Martinus tiide þæs eadgan papan, þy nigoðan gere
Constantines rice þæs arfæstan caseres.
 19.312.22. Ond we wuldriað usserne Drihten Hælendne Crist, swa
swa þas wuldredon, noht toætecende oðþe onweg ateonde þæs þe
heo wuldredon.
 19.312.24. Ond we amænsumiað mid heortum & mid muðe,
þa ðe heo amænsumedon: ond þa ðe heo onfengon, we eac swelce
onfoð, wuldriende God Fæder butan fruman, & his Sunu þone acennedan
of Fæder, acennedne ær worulde, & Haligne Gast forðleorendne of
Fæder & Suna unasecgendlice, swa swa þa bodedon & lærdon, þa
ðe we bufan gemyndgodon, þa halgan apostole & witgan & lareowas.
 19.312.29. Ond we ealle mid Cristes rode tacne fæstnodon &
underwreoton, we þa ðe asetton þone allican geleafan & þone rihtan
mid Theodore ærcebiscope.
 20.314.1. Wæs eac swylce in þæm seonoðe, &
ætgædre trymede þa domas þæs ilcan geleafan se arwyrða wer
Iohannes, Sancte Petre cirican þæs apostolis heahsongere & abbud
Sancte Martines mynstres, se neowan cwom from Rome þurh hæse Agothones
þæs papan.
 20.314.4. Wæs him latteow se arwyrða abbud, þe mon heht
Benedictus.
 20.314.5. Mid þy se ilca Benedictus mynster getimbrode in
Breotone in are Sancte Petres þæs aldorapostoles in þære stowe, þe
mon hateð æt Wiramuþan, þa cwom he to Roome mid his efnwyrhtan &
geferan þæs ilcan weorces Ceolferð, se æfter him þæs ilcan
mynstres abbud wæs.
 20.314.10. Wæs his gewuna, þæt he eac oft ær on
þære fore wæs.
 20.314.10. Ond he arwyrðlice from þære eadgan gemynde
Agothones þæs papan onfongen wæs.
 20.314.12. Ond he bæd & onfeng in trymnesse þæs
mynstres freodomes from him, þe he geworhte, priuilegium of þære
apostolican aldorlicnesse getrymede, æfter þon þe he wisse þæt
Ecgfriþes willa wæs þæs cyninges ond his leafnes wæs.
 20.314.15. Forþon þe him þa londare forgeaf & sealde,
þe he þæt mynster on getimbrade.
 20.314.17. Þa onfeng he eac þone foresprecenan abbud Iohannem
& in Breotone gelædde, þæt he sceolde in his mynstre þone song
læran to twelf monþum, þe he æt Sancte Petre geleornade.
 20.314.19. Þa dyde he Iohannes, swa þæs papan bebod wæs;
endebyrdnesse & þeaw þæs songes cwicre stæfne þæs
foresprecenan mynstres sangeras lærde.
 20.314.22. & þa þe se hring ealles geares in weorðunge
symbeldaga abædde, eac swilce stafum awrat & on bec gesette, seo in
þam ilcan mynstre oð þis is gehealden, ond from monegum siððan oft
gehwider emb writen wæs.
 20.314.26. Swylce he Iohannes eac oðer bebod from þæm
apostolican papan onfeng, þæt he þæt sceolde geornlice gewitan &
geleornian, hwylces geleafan Ongolcynnes cirice wære, & him þæt
gesægde, þonne he eft to Rome hwurfe.
 20.314.29. For þære wisan wæs se seonoð gesomnad in
Breotone, þe we ær sægdon.
 20.314.30. & þa wæs gemeted in eallum ungewemmed geleafa
& riht; ond him wæs seald seo bysen on gewrite þæs seonoðes,
þæt he sceolde to Rome lædan.
 20.314.32. Þa he þa wæs to his ylde hweorfende, þa
æfter medmiclum fæce þæs þe he sæ oferfaren hæfde, þa
wæs he gehrinen mid untrymnesse & forðferde.
 20.316.3. & his lichoma from his freondum & for Sancte
Martines lufan wæs to Turnan gelæded, & þær arwyrðlice
bebyrged in þæm mynstre, þe he fore wæs in abbuddome.
 20.316.5. Ond þeah þe he in þam siðfæte forðferde,
nohte þon læs seo bysen þæs rihtan geleafan Ongelcirican to Rome
gelæded wæs, ond from þæm apostolican papan & allum, þe þe
hine gehyrdon oðþe reordan, þancwyrðlice wæs onfongen.
 21.316.9. Onfeng Ecgfrið se cyning gemæccan & wif,
þære noma wæs æðeldryð, Annan dohtor Eastengal cyninges,
þæs we oft ær gemyndgodon.
 21.316.11. Wæs se mon god & æfest, & þurh eal ge on
mode ge on dædum æðele.
 21.316.12. Brohte heo ær oðer wer him to wife Suðgyrwa
aldormon, þæs noma wæs Tondberht; ac æfter medmiclum fæce,
þæs þe he hy to wife onfeng, he forðferde.
 21.316.15. Þa wæs heo seald & forgifen þæm
foresprecenan cyninge.
 21.316.15. Þæs gemanan myd þy heo wæs twelf winter
brucende, hwæðre heo mid ecre onwalhnesse mægðhades wuldorlice
awunade; swa swa me seolfum frinendum, mid þy sumum monnum cwom in tweon
hwæðer hit swa wære, þa þære eadgan gemynde Wilferþ biscop
sægde; & cwæð, þæt he wære se cuðesta geweota hire
clænnisse & hire mægðhades, to ðon þætte Ecgfrið se cyning
him geheht ge lond ge micel feoh to gesyllenne, gif he ða cwene gesponan
& gelæran meahte, þæt heo brucan wolde his gesynscypes; forþon he
geare wiste þæt heo nænigne wæpnedmon ma lufade þonne hine.
 21.316.26. Nis þæt to geortrywanne, þæt in usse eldo
þæt beon meahte, þætte forðgongendre eldo oft geworden getreow
spell cyðað & secgað, þurh anes Drihtnes gife & þæs ilcan,
se ðe hine gehatende wæs mid us eac wunian aa oð weorulde ende.
 21.316.29. Wæs eac swelce þæs godcundan wundres sweotol
tacnung, þæt þære ilcan fæmnan lichoma bebyrged brosnian ne
meahte, þæt heo from werlicre hrinenesse ungewemmed awunade.
 21.318.2. Bæd heo swiðe longe þone cyning, þæt heo
moste weoruldsorge & gemænne forlætan, & heo forlete in mynstre
þæm soðan cyninge Criste þeowian.
 21.318.4. Þæt heo þa æt nehstan ma þurhteah, ða eode
heo in æbban mynster þære abbudissan, seo wæs Ecgfriðes faðe
þæs cyninges; þæt is geseted in þære stowe, þe mon nemneð
Coludis byrig.
 21.318.7. & heo þær haligrefte onfeng & Godes
þeowhade from þæm foresprecenan biscope Wilferðe.
 21.318.9. Þa wæs emb an ger æfter þissum þæt heo
wæs abbudisse geworden, in þæm þeodlonde þe is geceged Elige,
þær heo mynster getimbrode Gode wilsumra fæmnena.
 21.318.11. & heo fæmne monigra modor ongon beon, ge mid
bysenum heofonlices lifes ge eac mid monungum.
 21.318.14. Secgað men be hire, seoðþan heo mynster gesohte,
þæt heo næfre linnum hræglum brucan wolde ac wyllenum.
 21.318.15. Ond seldon in hatum baðum heo baðian wolde, buton
þam hyhstan symbelnessum & tidum æt Eastran & æt Pentecosten
& þy twelftan dege ofer Geochol.
