 21.318.18. & þonne heo ærest þurh hire þegnunge &
hire þinenna þa oðre Cristes þeowas, þa ðe þær wæron, &
onþwegne, þonne wolde heo ealra nyhst hy baþian & þwean.
 21.318.20. & seldon, buton maran symbelnessum & tidum
oðþe maran nydþearfe, ma þonne æne siðe on dæge þæt heo
wolde mete þycgan.
 21.318.22. & symle, gif hire hefigre untrymnesse ne bewere, of
þære tide uhtsanges oð hluttorne dæg in cirican in halgum gebedum
stod.
 21.318.24. Sume men eac swylce sægdon, þæt heo þurh
witedomes gast þa adle forecwæde, þe heo on forðferde; ond swelce eac
þara Godes þeawa rim, þa ðe of heora mynstre of middangearde wæron
to geleorenne, þæt heo sweotolice eallum cyðde.
 21.318.28. Þa geleorde heo to Drihtne on middum hire hiwum
æfter seofon gearum, þæs þe heo abbudessan had onfeng.
 21.318.30. Ond þa, gelice swa swa heo bebead, nales in oðre
stowe butan in middum hire hiwum æfter endebyrdnesse, þe heo geleorde, in
treowenre þryh wæs bebyrged.
 21.318.33. Þa feng æfter hire in þa þegnunge abbudissan
Seaxburh hire sweostor, þa hæfde to wife ærconbyrht Contwara cyning.
 21.318.34. Ond mid þy æðeldryð wæs syxtyne gear
bebyrged, þa licode þære abbudissan hire mægan, þæt heo hire
ban up adyde & in neowe þruh gesette & in circan gedyde.
 21.320.3. Þa heht heo sume broðor faran & þone stan
secan, þæt mon meahte þa ðruh of geheawan & gewyrcan.
 21.320.5. Þa eodon heo in scip, forþon Elia lond is æghwonan
mid wætrum & mid fennum ymbseald, ne hit micele stanas hafað.
 21.320.7. Þa cwomon heo to sumre ceastre gehrorenre noht feor
þonon, seo is on Englisc Grantacester geceged.
 21.320.8. & heo sona gemetton bi þære ceastre wallum
þruh of hwitum stane fægere geworhte, & seo wæs swilce eac
gerisenlice gehleodad mid gelice stane.
 21.320.11. Þa ongeton heo sona, þæt heora ærende wæs
& heora siðfæt from Drihtne seolfum gehradod & gesyndgad; &
heo þæs Gode þanc sægdon, & þa þruh to þæm mynstre
gelæddon.
 21.320.14. Mid þy þa se lichoma þære halgan fæmnan
& þære Cristes bryde openre þære byrgenne wæs forð on leoht
gelæded, þa wæs he gemeted swa ungebrosnad & swa ungewemmed, swa
heo þy ylcan dæge forðfered & bebyrged wære; swa swa se
foresprecena biscop Wilferð & monige oðre, þa ðe hit cuðon,
cyðdon & sægdon.
 21.320.19. Ac hwæðre cuðran gewitnesse Cyneferð læce,
se æt hire wæs, þa heo forðferde & eft þa hire lichoman mon of
byrgenne uphof.
 21.320.21. Wæs his gewuna þæt he sægde, þa heo untrumu
wæs, þæt heo hæfde micelne swile on hire sweoran.
 21.320.22. Þa heht me mon, cwæð he, þæt ic þone swile
gesticade, þætte seo sceðþende wæte ut fleowe, seo þær in
wæs.
 21.320.24. Mid þy ic þæt þa dyde, þa wæs heo gesegen
þurh twegen dagas, þæt hire leohtor & wel wære, swa þætte
monige tealdon, þæt heo gehæled beon meahte from þære
untrymnesse.
 21.320.27. Þa þy þriddan dæge heo wæs eft hefigad mid
þæm ærrum sarum, & sona wæs gerisen & genumen of
middangearde, & eal þæt sar & þone deað mid ecre hælo &
liife onwænde.
 21.320.30. Mid þy þa æfter swa monegum gearum hire lichoma
wæs of byrgenne up ahæfen, þa aþenedon heo & aslogon geteld ofer,
& eal seo gesomnung broðra & sweostra on twa healfe singende
ymbstodon.
 21.320.33. Ond seo abbudisse in þæt geteld eode & fea
monna mid heo, þæt heo þa ban woldon up adon & inþwean &
gefeormian æfter monna gewunan.
 21.322.2. Þa semninga gehyrdon we þa abbudissan inne hludre
stefne cleopian: Seo wuldor, cwæð heo, Drihtnes noman.
 21.322.4. Ða æfter medmiclum fæce þa cleopode me mon
& cegde in.
 21.322.5. Onwreogon þa duru þæs geteldes; þa geseah ic
lichoman þære halgan Godes fæmnan up ahefenne of byrgenne & on
bedde gesetedne: & wæs slæpendum men gelicra þonne deadum.
 21.322.8. Þa onwreogon heo eac hire ondwlitan & eowdon me
ða wunde þæs snides, þe ic geo ær dyde.
 21.322.9. Ða wæs heo fæstlice gehalad, þætte
wundorlice gemete for openre wunde & geoniendre, mid þa heo bebyrged
wæs, þa seo þynneste dolgswæð & seo læsseste æteawde; ge
eac ealle þa scytan, þe se lichoma mid bewunden wæs, swa onwalge &
swa neowe & swa clæne æteawdon, swa swa þy seolfan dæge hire
þæm clænum leomum ymbseald wæron.
 21.322.15. Secgað eac men, þa heo þrycced wæs &
swenced mid swile & sare hire swiran, þæt heo wære swiðe
lustfulliende þisse untrymnesse cynne, & heo gewunalice cwæde oft: Ic
wat cuðlice, þæt ic be gewyrhtum on minum sweoran bere þa byrðenne
þisse aðle & þisse untrymnesse, in þæm ic gemon mec geo beran,
þa ic geong wæs, þa iidlan byrðenne gyldenra sigila.
 21.322.20. Ond ic gelyfo, þætte me forðon seo uplice
arfæstnis wolde mec hefigade beon mid sare mines sweoran, þæt ic swa
wære onlesed þære scylde þære swiðe idlan leasnisse, mid þy me
nu for golde & for gimmum of swiran forðhlifað seo readnis & bryne
þæs swiles & wærces.
 21.322.25. Hwæt þa gelomp mid þa gehrinenisse þara ilcena
gegyrelena, þe mon of hire lichoman dyde, þætte deofulseoce men &
monige oðerre untrymnesse oft gehælde wæron.
 21.322.27. Swelce eac seo þruh, in þære heo ærest
bebyrged wæs, monegum monna, þe heora eagan sargedon & hefigodon,
wearð to hælo, þonne heo heora heafod & heora eagan to onheldon
& him to gebædon: & sona seo ungescrepnes þæs sares &
þære hefignesse from heora eagan gewat.
 21.322.31. Ono hwæt heo þa þwogon & baðodon þone
lichoman þære halgan fæmnan, & mid neowum hræglum gegyredon
& in cirican bæron & in þa stænenan þruh gesetton, þe
ðyder gelæded wæs; & þær nu gena oð þisne ondweardan
dæg in micelre arwyrðnesse is hæfd.
 21.324.1. Wæs þæt eac micel wundor, þæt seo þruh
wæs swa gescrepe þære fæmnan lichoman gemeted, swa swa heo
synderlice hire gegearwad wære.
 21.324.3. Swelce eac seo heafodstow wundorcræftiglice geworht
& gescrepelice geheowod æteowde to þam gemete hire heafdes.
 21.324.6. Is Elia lond in Eastengla mægðe huhugu syx hund hida
in ealondes gelicnesse.
 21.324.7. Is eal, swa swa we cwædon, mid fenne & mid
wætre ymbsald: ond mid genihtsumnesse ælo, þa ðe in þæm ilcan
fennum fongne beoð, hit noman onfeng.
 21.324.9. Þær wilnode mynster habban seo gemyndgode Cristes
þeowe, forðon heo of þære ylcan mægðe Eastengla lichoman frymþe
lædde, swa swa we foresprecende wæron.
 22.324.13. Þy nigoðan geare Ecgfriðes rices þæs cyninges
wæs geþeoded & ongunnen hefig gewinn & micel gefeoht betweoh hine
& æþelred Mercna cyning.
 22.324.15. Þa wæs ofslegen in þæm gefeohte be Treontan
þære ea ælfwine Ecgfriðes broðor þæs cyninges, geong
æðeling eahtatynewintre.
 22.324.17. Se wæs swiðe lufiendlic & leof
æghwæðerre þeode, forðon þe his sweostor, seo wæs Osþryð
haten, hæfde æðelred Mercna cyning him to wife.
 22.324.19. Mid þy þa grimran gefeohtes & lengran
feondscipes ontimber betweoh þa reðan cyningas & þa folc wæs
gesegen up cumende, þa ðeodor Gode se leofa biscop mid godcunde gife &
fultume mid his halwendre trymenesse & lare þa ongunnon bernisse swa
micelre frecernisse allinga adwæscte, to ðon þæt he gesibbode þa
cyningas betweohn & þa folc, þætte næniges monnes feorh to lose
wearð, ne mara blodgyte wæs for þæm ofslegenan cyninges breðer; ac
he mid fea wið hine geþingade, þæt heora sib wæs.
 22.324.27. Ðære sibbe wære micelre tide æfter ðon
betweoh þa ilcan cyningas & heora rice awunedon.
 23.326.1. In þæm foresprecenan gefeohte, þa ælfwine
þæs cyninges broðor ofslegen wæs, wæs sum gemyndelic wise
geworden, seo nis to forswigienne, ac heo brycað monigra hælo, gif heo
asægd bið.
 23.326.3. Wæs þær ofslegen in þæm gefeohte betweoh
oðere sum geong cyninges þegn Ecgfriðes, þæs noma wæs Imma.
 23.326.5. Mid þy he þa þy dæge ond þære
æfterfylgendan nihte betweoh þara oðerra ofslegenra lic geliic deadum
læg, ða æt nyhstan onfeng he gaste & wearð geedwerped & up
asæt & seolfa his wunde wrað, swa swa he meahte.
 23.326.9. Ond æfter þon he hine gereste medmicel fæc, ða
ahof hine up & ongan aweggan, gif he hwær ænigne freond metan meahte,
þe his gymenne dyde & his wunda læcnian wolde.
 23.326.11. Þa he ða þæt dyde, þa wæs he gemeted &
genumen from þæm monnum þæs feondlecan weorodes; & þa læddon
hine to heora hlaforde, þæt wæs æðelredes gesiið þæs
cyninges.
 23.326.14. Þa frægn hine se, hwæt he wære, þa ondred
he ondettan, þæt he cyninges þegn wære, ac sæde, þæt he
folclic mon wære & þearfende & gewiifad hæfde; & þætte
he forðon in þa fyrd cwome, þæt he sceolde cyninges þegnum heora
ondlifen & mete lædan mid heora heafodgemæccum.
 23.326.19. Þa onfeng se gesiið hine & his gyman dyde &
his wunde het læcnian.
 23.326.20. Þa he ða ongon trumian & haligan, þa bebead he
þæt hine mon gebunde, þy læs he on niht onweg fluge &
bestæle.
 23.326.21. Þa ne meahte hine mon gebindan; forðon sona þæs
þe heo onweg eodon, þa ðe hine bundon, þonne toslupon ða bendas &
tolesde wæron.
 23.326.25. Hæfde he agenne broðor mæssepreost, þæs
noma wæs Tuna, se wæs abbud in þæm mynstre & in þære
ceastre, seo nu oð þis is nemned from his noman Tunnanceaster.
 23.326.27. Mid þy he hine hyrde in þæm gefeohte ofslegenne,
þa cwom he & sohte in þæm wæle his lic, hwæðer he hit findan
meahte.
 23.326.29. Þa funde he oðerne þurh eal þing him þone
gelicestan, þa tealde he þæt he hit wære.
 23.326.30. Bær hine þa to his mynstre, & arlice bebyrgde:
ond fore alysnesse his sawle gelomlice mæssesong dyde.
 23.328.1. Þære mærsunge wæs geworden, þæt ic ær
cwæð, þæt hine nænig mon meahte gebindan, ac sona instæpe þa
bendas toslupon, & he onlysed wæs.
 23.328.4. Betweoh þa þing þa eac se gesiþ, se ðe hine
hæfde, ongon wundrian & hine frignan, for hwon hine mon gebindan ne
meahte.
 23.328.6. Ond hine ascode hwæðer he ða alysendlecan rune
cuðe, & þa stafas mid him awritene hæfde, be swylcum men leas spel
secgað & spreocað, þæt hine mon forþon gebindan ne meahte.
 23.328.8. Þa ondswarede he þæt he noht swylcra cræfta ne
cuðe.
 23.328.9. Ac ic hæbbe, cwæð he, in minre mægðe minne
broðor mæssepreost; ond ic wat, þæt he mec ofslegene talað &
for mec gelomlice mæssan deð.
 23.328.11. & gif ic nu in oðrum life wære, þonne wære
min sawl þær þurh his þingunge from þæm ecum bendum & witum
onlysed.
 23.328.13. Mid þy he ða hwylce hugu tid mid þone gesiið
hæfd wæs, þa ongeton hy, þa hine geornlecor sceawodon, of his
ondwlitan & on gebærum & eac swylce on his wordum, þæt he ne
wæs of þearfendum folce, swa swa he sægde, ac þæt he wæs
æðele strynde.
 23.328.17. Þa gecegde se gesið hine deagollice to him; frægn
hine þa geornlice, hwonon he wære; ond him wæs gehatende, þæt he
him noht laðes ne yfeles gedon wolde, gif he him þæt hluttorlice
gecyþan wolde, hwæt he wære.
 23.328.21. Þa dyde he swa: ondette him & sægde, þæt
he wære cyninges þegn.
 23.328.22. Þa ondswarede he him & cwæð: þurh syndrige
þine ondsware ic onget & oncneow, þæt þu ne wære swa folclic
mon swa ðu sægdest.
 23.328.24. Ond ic þe nu secge, þæt þu eart wið mec
deaþe scyldig, forþon ealle mine broðor & mine magas in þæm
gefeohte wæron ofslegene.
 23.328.26. Ond hwæðre ic þec ne wille ofslean, þy læs
ic min gehat & mine treowe forleose.
 23.328.28. Þa he fullice getrumad wæs, þa bebohte he hine in
Lundenne to sumum Frysan.
 23.328.29. Þa wolde se hine bindan, ac he ne from him, ne ða he
þyder læded wæs, meahte ænige þinga gebunden beon, þeah þe his
feond hine onsette oðer benda cyn ond eft oðer: & oftost his bendas
toslupon & onlesde wæron from underntide, þonne mon mæssan oftost
singeð.
 23.328.33. Þa þa ðæt þa geseah se ðe hine gebohte,
þæt he mid bendum ne meahte gehearðrod beon, forgef him þa lyfnesse,
þæt he moste mid feo hine alysan, gif he meahte.
 23.330.1. & he him aðas sealde, þæt he hine eft gesohte
oðþe his feoh him onsende.
 23.330.2. Þa cwom he to Cent to Hlothere þæm cyninge, se
wæs sweostor sunu æðeldryðe þære cwene, bi þære bufan
sægd wæs, forðon he geo þære ilcan cwene þegn wæs.
 23.330.5. Bæd hine ða, þæt he him þæt weorð his
alesnesse gesealde; & he him getiðade, & his hlaforde for hine
onsende, swa swa he geheht.
 23.330.8. & he þa æfter þissum wæs hweorfende to his
eðle; & to his breðer becwom, ond him eal æfter endebyrdnesse
sægde, ge hwylce wiðerwordnesse ge eft hwylce frofre in þæm
wiðerwordnissum hine becwom.
 23.330.11. Ond he gecneow þurh his geseagone, þætte þæm
tidum swiðust þa bende onlesde wæron, þæm þe for hine þa
symbelnesse mæssena mærsode wæron.
 23.330.13. Ge eac feola oðerra gescrepa & gesynta, ða þe
him taltriendum gelumpon, þurh þa broðorlican þingunge & þurh lac
þære halwendan onsægdnesse he oncneow & ongeat heofon lice him
forgifen weosan.
 23.330.16. Ond monige men þa ðe þas þing gehyrdon secgan
from þæm forsprecenan were, wæron bærnde in geleafan & in
arfæstnisse willan to gebiddenne ge ælmessan to sellenne ge Gode
asægdnesse to beranne þæs halgan laces, fore generednisse heora freonda
þara ðe of weorulde geleordon.
 23.330.20. Forþon heo ongeton, þæt seo halwende onsægdnis
to ecre alysnesse swiðade & fromade ge lichoman ge sawle.
 23.330.22. Ðis spel me sume þara sægdon, þa ðe hit from
þæm seolfan were gehyrdon, in þæm hit geworden wæs.
 23.330.24. Ond ic hit forþon hluttorlice & untweondlice
gelyfde þæm cyriclecan stære to geþeodenne & in to gesettenne.
 24.330.26. Wæs ymb syx hund wintra & hundeahtatig from
þære Drihtenlecan menniscnesse, þætte seo æfeste Cristes þeowe
Hild abbudisse þæs mynstres, þe is cweden Streoneshealh, swa swa we
beforan sægdon, æfter monegum heofonlecum dædum, þe heo on eorðan
dyde, to onfonne þæs heofonlecan lifes mede ond heo of eorðan alæded
leorde þy fifteogeþan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Decembrium</foreign>, mid þy heo
hæfde syx & syxti wintra.
 24.330.32. Þæm wintrum todældum efenlice dæle, þreo
& þritig þæm ærestum heo æðelice gefylde in weoruldhade
drohtiende; ond efn fela þa æfterfylgendan in munclife heo æðelicor
Drihtne gehalgode.
 24.332.3. Wæs heo eac swylce æðele in woruldgebyrdum,
þæt heo wæs þæs cyninges Eadwines neafan dohtor, se wæs Hereric
haten.
 24.332.5. Mid þy cyninge he to bodunge & to lare þæs
eadgan gemynde Paulinus þæs ærestan biscopes Norþanhymbra Cristes
geleafan & geryno onfeng, & þone unwemne geheold, oð þæs he
geearnode, þæt he to his gesihðe becwom.
 24.332.9. Þa heo þa Hild woruldhad forlet & Gode anum
geteode þeowigan, þa gewat heo in Eastengla mægðe, forþon heo wæs
þæs cyninges mæge: willade þonon, gif heo meahte, þæt heo wolde
hire eðel forlætan & eal, þæt heo for worulde hæfde, &
wolde cuman in Gallia rice & in Caale þæm mynstre in elþeodignesse
fore Drihtne lifigean, þæt heo þy eað meahte þæt ece eðel in
heofonum geearnigean.
 24.332.14. Forþon þe in þæm ilcan mynstre hire sweostor
Hereswið, seo wæs Aldwulfes modor Eastengla cyninges, regollicum
þeodscipum underþeoded in þa tid baad þone ecan sige.
 24.332.17. Þær bysene heo wæs inhyrgende in foresetenesse
elþeodgunge, & eal ger in þære foresprecenan mægðe Eastengla
hæfd wæs, oð þæt heo eft from Aidane þæm biscope wæs ham
gelaðad & gesponen.
 24.332.20. Þa onfeng heo anes heowscipes stowe to norðdæle
Wiire þære ea, & þær efenlice an ger munuclif dyde mid feawum
hire geferum.
 24.332.22. Æfter þissum heo wæs geworden abbudisse in
þæm mynstre þe is geceged Heoroteae.
 24.332.23. Þæt mynster wæs geworden & getimbred noht
micle ær from Hegiu þære æfestan Cristes þeowe, seo ærest
wiifa is sægd in Norðanhymbra mægðe, þæt heo munuchade &
haligryfte onfenge þurh halgunge Aidanes þæs biscopes.
 24.332.27. Ac heo nales æfter micelre tide, þæs þæ
þæt mynster getimbred wæs, gewat to þære ceastre, þe in Englisc
is gehaten Kwelcaceaster, & hire wiic asette, þæt heo Gode inlifde.
 24.332.29. Þa feng to þæs mynstres gerece Hild seo Cristes
þeowe, & heo þæt sona mid regollice life gesette &
geendebyrdade, swa swa heo æt gelærdum wæpnedmonnum geleornian
meahte.
 24.332.32. Forðon Aidan se biscop & monige oðere æfeste
weras & gode, þa ðe heo cuðan, for hire snytro & wiisdome &
for lufan þæs godcundan þeowdomes heo gelomlice neosodon & sohton;
& heo georne lufodon & heo eornlice tydon & lærdon.
 24.334.3. Mid þy heo þa feola geara þissum mynstre in
regollices lifes lare swiðe geornful fore wæs, ða gelomp, þæt heo
onfeng mynster to timbrenne & to endebyrdienne in stowe, seo is geceged
Strineshalg; & heo þæt weorc, þe hire þa to geðeoded wæs,
unaswundenlice gefylde.
 24.334.7. Forþon þa seolfan, þe ær þæt mynster
heoldon & rehton, heo mid þeodscipum regollices lifes insette &
trymede.
 24.334.8. & heo eac swylce þær soðfæstnesse &
arfæstnesse & clænnesse & oðerra gastlicra mægena gehæld
ond swiþost sibbe & Godes lufan geornlice lærde, þætte in bisene
þære frymþelecan ciricean nænig þær welig wæs ne nænig
wædla; ac eallum wæron eal gemæno, & noht agnes ængum gesegen
wæs.
 24.334.13. Wæs heo swa micelre snytro & wisdomes, þætte
nales þæt an þætte þa mættran men ymb heora nydþearfnisse
wæron, ac eac swylce cyningas & ealdormen oft from hire geþeaht &
wisdom sohton, & hine þær georne gemetton.
 24.334.16. Ond heo swa swiðe leornunge godcundra gewreota &
soðfæstnisse weorcum hire underþeodde dyde to bigongenne, þætte
þær eaðelice monige meahton beon gemette þa þe to ciriclicum hade,
þæt is to wigbedes þegnunge, geþung ne wæron.
 24.334.21. Þæt is to tacne, þæt we gesawon æfter þon
fiif biscopas, þa ðe of þam ilcan mynstre cwomon & þær
gelærde wæron: & þa wæron ealle micelre leornunge &
halignesse weras.
 24.334.23. Þa wæron þus hatne & nemde, Bosa, Ætla,
Oftfor, Iohannes & Wilfrið.
 24.334.24. Bi þæm ærestan we bufan cwædon, þæt he
wære in Eoforwiicceastre to biscope gehalgad.
 24.334.26. Be þæm æfteran is hrædlice to witanne,
þæt he wæs in Dorcetceastre to biscope gehalgod.
 24.334.27. Bi þæm neahstan twæm her is æfter to
cweðanne, þæt heora se æresta wæs at Heagostealdes ea, ond se
æftera wæs in Eoforwiicceastre to biscope gehalgad.
 24.334.30. Bi þæm midlestan is nu to secgenne; þa he in
æghwæðerum mynstre Hilde þære abbudissan geornlice his leornunge
ætfealh/ & gehælde haligra gewreota, þa æt nyhstan wilnade he on
his mode þa fulfremedan þing.
 24.334.33. Cwom þa to Cent to þære eadgan gemynde Theodore
ærcebiscope.
 24.336.1. Æfter þon þe he þær sum fæc halgum
leornungum gefealh, þa wolde he eac swylce Rome gesecan, þæt in þa tid
wæs micles mægenes tald & gelefed.
 24.336.3. Þa he þonon eft hwearf, þa gesohte he eft Breotone:
ferde þa in Hwicca mægðe.
 24.336.5. Þær wæs þa Osric cyning; & he þær
Godes word & þæs halgan geleafan bodade & lærde, & somod
ætgædre lifes bysene on him seolfum gegearwode eallum þæm þe hine
gesegon & gehyrdon: & he micle tide þær wunade.
 24.336.8. In þa ilcan tid se biscop þære mægðe, se
wæs Bosel haten, wæs mid swa micle untrymnesse his lichoman hefigad,
þæt he þa biscopþegnunge þurh hine þegnian ne meahte.
 24.336.11. Forðon þa ealra heora dome se foresprecena wer for
hine in biscophade wæs gecoren; ond þa þurh æðelredes hæse
Mercna cyninges þær eadgan gemynde Wilferð biscop hine to biscope
gehalgode, se in þa tid þone biscophad þegnade Midelengla.
 24.336.14. Forþon se ærcebiscop Theodor wæs þa
forðfered, & nænig oðer biscop þa gena for hine gehalgad wæs.
 24.336.16. In þære ilcan mægðe hwene ær, þæt is
ær þæm foresprecenan Godes men Bosle, wæs of þære ilcan
abbudissan mynstre sum from wer & wel gelæred & scearpre gleawnesse,
se/ wæs to biscope gecoren, þæs noma wæs Tatfrið.
 24.336.19. Ac ær þon þe he gehadad beon meahte, þæt he
wæs mid hrædlice deaðe forgripen.
 24.336.21. Ono seo foresprecene Cristes þeowe Hild abbudisse
ealle, þa þe hy cuþon, fore arfæstnisse tacne & Godes gife
gewunedan heo modor cegean & nemnan.
 24.336.23. & nales þæt an þæt heo in hire mynstre
þæm ondweardum lifes bysen gestode, ac eac swylce monegum feor wuniendum,
to þæm þe se gesælga hlisa hire geornfulnesse & hire mægenes
becwom, þæt him se godre ræce & hælo intingan ðegnade.
 24.336.28. Wæs þæt eac gedefen, þætte þæt swefn
gefylled wære, þætte Breogoswið hire modor geseah on hire cildhade.
 24.336.29. Þa Hereric hire wer wracade under Cerdice Bretta
cyninge, & þær wæs mid attre acweald, þa geseah heo þurh swefn,
swa swa he semninga from hire ahefen & alæded wære.
 24.336.32. Þa sohte heo hine mid ealre geornfulnesse &
nænige swaðe his owern æteowdon.
 24.336.33. Þa heo hine ða bihygdelice & geornlice sohte,
þa gemette heo semninga under hire hrægle gyldne sigele swiðe
deorwyrðe.
 24.338.1. Þa heo þa geornlice heo sceawode & beheold, þa
wæs heo gesegen mid swiðe micelre beorhtnesse leohtes scinan, þæt heo
eal Breotene gemæro mid hire leohtes sciman gefylde.
 24.338.4. Þæt swefn wæs soðlice gefylled in hire deahter,
bi þære we nu sprecað.
 24.338.5. Forþon hire lif nales hire anre & hire
underðeoddum wæs leohtes bisen, ac swiðe monegum wide þæm þe
woldon Gode wel lifigean.
 24.338.8. Ono mid þy heo þa monig ger þyssum mynstre,
þæt is æt Streonesheale, in abbudissan þegnunge fore wæs, þa
licede þæm arfæstan foreseonde usse hæle hire þa halgan sawle eac
swylce/ mid longre untrymnesse lichoman ademde & asodene beon, þæt
æfter þæs apostoles bisene hire mægen in untrumnesse lichoman
gefremed & getrymed wære.
 24.338.13. Þa wæs heo gestonden mid hefigre untrymnesse
lichoman, & þurh syx singal ger þære ilcan hefignesse þære adle
unblinnendlice/ won.
 24.338.15. Ond in ealre þære tide heo næfre blon hire
sceppende ælmehtegum Gode þoncunge don, ge eac þa bebodenan heorde hire
monian & læran, þæt heo ealle gemyndige wæron hire bisene,
þæt hy in þæm gesyndelecum þingum & in þære onfangnon
hælo lichoman geornlice Drihtne þeowde & hyrde, & on þam
wiðerweardum þingum oððe on lichoman untrymnessum þæt heo symle
getreowlice Drihtne þoncunge dyde.
 24.338.22. Þa wæs þy seofoðan geare hire untrymnesse,
þætte seo adl & þæt sar hwyrfde in hyre innoðas.
 24.338.23. & heo becwom to þæm ytemæstan dæge: &
ymb honcred utan heo onfeng wegneste þære swiðe halgan gemænsumnesse
Cristes lichoman & his blode.
 24.338.25. Þa geheht heo þa Godes þeowas to hire, þa ðe
in þæm ilcan mynstre wæron; & heo þa gyt hy monade &
lærde, þæt hy betweoh hym heoldon & eallum Godes monnum sibbe &
lufan.
 24.338.28. Ond betweohn þa word hyre trymenesse & laare heo
bliðe deað geseah; & gean soðre þæt ic Drihtnes wordum spreco,
þæt heo of deaðe leorde to life.
 24.338.31. Þa wæs in þære seolfan nihte, þætte se
ælmihtega Drihten hire forðfore in oðrum mynstre fyrr gesettum, þæt
heo þy ylcan geare ær getimbrede & is nemned Heacanos, mid sweotolre
gesyhðe wæs geeaðmeded to onwreonne.
 24.340.1. Wæs in þæm seolfan mynstre sumu haligu nunne,
þære noma wæs Begu, seo wæs Drihtne gehalgad in clænum
mægðhade ma þonne þritig wintra; & heo þær in munuchade
Drihtne þeowade.
 24.340.4. Þa wæs heo restende in sweostra slæperne, ða
gehyrde heo semninga in þære lyfte uppe cuðne sweg & hleoðor heora
clucgan, þær heo wunedon to gebedum gecegde & awehte beon, þon heora
hwylc of worulde geleored wæs.
 24.340.7. Þa geseah heo openum eagum, þæs þe hire þuhte,
of þæs huses hrofe ufan micel leoht cuman; & eal þæt hus
gefylde.
 24.340.9. Þa heo þa in þæt leoht bihygdelice locade &
hit georne beheold, þa geseah heo þære foresprece nan Godes þeowe
sawle Hilde þære abbudissan in þæm seolfan leohte, engla weorodum
gelædendum, to heofonum up borenne beon.
 24.340.13. Mid þy heo þa þy slæpe tobrægd, þa geseah
heo oðere sweostor ymb heo restende.
 24.340.14. Ða onget heo ge in þæm swefne ge on hire modes
gesyhðe hire æteawed weosan, þætte heo geseah.
 24.340.15. & heo sona aras mid micle ege afyrhted & orn to
þære fæmnan, þe ða wæs mynstres abbudisse wæs Hilde gingre
þære noma wæs Freogið.
 24.340.17. & mid wope & mid tearum wæs swiðe
geondgoten, ond longe sworettunge wæs teonde; & hire sægde ealra
heora modur Hilde abbudissan þa of worulde geleoran, & hyre geseondre mid
micle leohte & mid engla þreatum to þæm ecean leohte heofona rices
wuldres & to gemanan þara uplicra ceastorwarena astigan.
 24.340.22. Ða heo þa þæt gehyrde, þa weahte heo ealle
þa sweostor, & heht to cirican gangan; & in gebedum & on
sealmsonge for heora modor sawle georne þingodon.
 24.340.24. Þa heo þæt þa geornlice dydon þa lafe
þære neahte tide, þa cwomon swiðe ær in dagunge sume broðor, þa
ðe hyre forðfore sægdon, from þære stowe þe heo forðfered
wæs.
 24.340.27. Þa ondswaredon heo & cwædon, þæt heo
þæt ilce ær wisten & ongeaton.
 24.340.28. & mid þy heo þa þurh endebyrdnesse þæm
broðrum arehton, hu heo þas þing & hwonne heo geleornodon, ond heo
him sægdon, in hwylce tiid heo of middangearde leorde, þa wæs gemeted,
þæt hyre geleornes wæs in þa ilcan tid, þe hire þurh þa
gesyhð æteawed wæs.
 24.340.32. & mid fægre geþwærnisse þara wisena wæs
godcundlice foresegen, þæt mid þy heo hyre uutgong gesegon of þeossum
life, þa ða uppe ongeton hire ingong in þæt ece liif haligra sawla.
 24.342.1. Þær seondon betweoh þæm mynstrum twæm
þreottyne mila ametene.
 25.342.3. In ðeosse abbudissan mynstre wæs sum broðor
syndriglice mid godcundre gife gemæred & geweorðad.
 25.342.4. Forþon he gewunade gerisenlice leoð wyrcan, þa ðe
to æfestnisse & to arfæstnisse belumpen, swa ðætte, swa hwæt
swa he of godcundum stafum þurh boceras geleornode, þæt he æfter
medmiclum fæce in scopgereorde mid þa mæstan swetnisse &
inbryrdnisse geglængde & in Engliscgereorde wel geworht forþbrohte.
 25.342.9. Ond for his leoþsongum monigra monna mod oft to worulde
forhogdnisse & to geþeodnisse þæs heofonlican lifes onbærnde
wæron.
 25.342.11. Ond eac swelce monige oðre æfter him in
Ongelþeode ongunnon æfeste leoð wyrcan: ac nænig hwæðre him
þæt gelice don meahte.
 25.342.13. Forþon he nales from monnum ne þurh mon gelæred
wæs, þæt he þone leoðcræft leornade, ac he wæs godcundlice
gefultumed & þurh Godes gife þone songcræft onfeng.
 25.342.16. Ond he forðon næfre noht leasunge, ne idles
leoþes wyrcan meahte, ac efne þa an þa ðe to æfestnesse belumpon,
& his þa æfestan tungan gedeofanade singan.
 25.342.19. Wæs he se mon in weoruldhade geseted oð þa tide
þe he wæs gelyfdre ylde, & næfre nænig leoð geleornade.
 25.342.20. Ond he forþon oft in gebeorscipe, þonne þær
wæs blisse intinga gedemed, þæt heo ealle scalde þurh endebyrdnesse
be hearpan singan, þonne he geseah þa hearpan him nealecan, þonne aras he
for forscome from þæm symble & ham eode to his huse.
 25.342.24. Þa he þæt þa sumre tide dyde, þæt he
forlet þæt hus þæs gebeorscipes, & ut wæs gongende to neata
scipene, þara heord him wæs þære neahte beboden.
 25.342.26. Þa he ða þær in gelimplice tide his leomu on
reste gesette & onslepte, þa stod him sum mon æt þurh swefn &
hine halette & grette & hine be his noman nemnde: Cedmon, sing me
hwæthwugu.
 25.342.29. Þa ondswarede he & cwæð: Ne con ic noht
singan; & ic forþon of þeossum gebeorscipe uteode, & hider gewat,
forþon ic naht singan ne cuðe.
 25.342.31. Eft he cwæð se ðe wið hine sprecende wæs:
Hwæðre þu meaht singan.
 25.344.1. Þa cwæð he: Hwæt sceal ic singan?
 25.344.2. Cwæð he: Sing me frumsceaft.
 25.344.2. Þa he ða þas andsware onfeng, þa ongon he sona
singan in herenesse Godes Scyppendes þa fers & þa word þe he næfre
gehyrde, þære endebyrdnesse þis is: Nu sculon herigean heofonrices
weard, meotodes meahte & his modgeþanc, weorc wuldorfæder, swa he
wundra gehwæs, ece Drihten, or onstealde.
 25.344.10. He ærest sceop eorðan bearnum heofon to hrofe halig
scyppend; þa middangeard monncynnes weard, ece Drihten, æfter teode firum
foldan, frea ælmihtig.
 25.344.15. Þa aras he from þæm slæpe, & eal, þa
þe he slæpende song, fæste in gemynde hæfde.
 25.344.16. & þæm wordum sona monig word in þæt ilce
gemet Gode wyrðes songes togeþeodde.
 25.344.17. Þa com he on morgenne to þæm tungerefan, þe his
ealdormon wæs: sægde him hwylce gife he onfeng; & he hine sona to
þære abbudissan gelædde & hire þa cyðde & sægde.
 25.344.20. Þa heht heo gesomnian ealle þa gelæredestan men
& þa leorneras: & him ondweardum het secgan þæt swefn, &
þæt leoð singan, þæt ealra heora dome gecoren wære, hwæt
oððe hwonon þæt cumen wære.
 25.344.23. Þa wæs him eallum gesegen, swa swa hit wæs,
þæt him wære from Drihtne sylfum heofonlic gifu forgifen.
 25.344.25. Þa rehton heo him & sægdon sum halig spell
& godcundre lare word: bebudon him þa, gif he meahte, þæt he in
swinsunge leoþsonges þæt gehwyrfde.
 25.344.27. Þa he ða hæfde þa wisan onfongne, þa eode he
ham to his huse; & cwom eft on morgenne, & þy betstan leoðe
geglenged him asong & ageaf, þæt him beboden wæs.
 25.344.30. Ða ongan seo abbudisse clyppan & lufigean þa
Godes gife in þæm men; & heo hine þa monade & lærde þæt
he woruldhad anforlete & munuchad onfenge: & he þæt wel þafode.
 25.344.32. Ond heo hine in þæt mynster onfeng mid his godum,
& hine geþeodde to gesomnunge þara Godes þeowa; & heht hine
læran þæt getæl þæs halgan stæres & spelles.
 25.346.1. Ond he eal, þa he in gehyrnesse geleornian meahte, mid
hine gemyndgade; & swa swa clæne neten eodorcende in þæt sweteste
leoð gehwerfde.
 25.346.3. & his song & his leoð wæron swa wynsumu to
gehyranne, þætte seolfan þa his lareowas æt his muðe wreoton &
leornodon.
 25.346.5. Song he ærest be middangeardes gesceape & bi
fruman moncynnes & eal þæt stær enesis, þæt is seo æreste
Moyses booc; & eft bi utgonge Israhela folces of ægypta londe & bi
ingonge þæs gehatlandes; & bi oðrum monegum spellum þæs halgan
gewrites canones boca; ond bi Cristes menniscnesse; & bi his þrowunge;
& bi his upastignesse in heofonas; & bi þæs Halgan Gastes cyme,
& þara apostola lare: & eft bi þæm dæge þæs toweardan
domes, & bi fyrhtu þæs tintreglican wiites, & bi swetnesse
þæs heofonlecan rices, he monig leoð geworhte.
 25.346.14. Ond swelce eac oðer monig be þæm godcundan
fremsumnessum & domum he geworhte.
 25.346.15. In eallum þæm he geornlice gemde, þæt he men
atuge from synna lufan & mandæda, & to lufan & to geornfulnesse
awehte godra dæda.
 25.346.17. Forþon he wæs se mon swiþe æfest &
regollecum þeodscipum eaðmodlice underþeoded.
 25.346.19. Ond wið þæm þa ðe in oðre wisan don woldon,
he wæs mid welme micelre ellenwodnisse onbærned.
 25.346.20. Ond he forðon fægre ænde his lif betynde &
geendade.
 25.346.22. Forþon þa ðære tide nealæcte his gewitenesse
& forðfore, þa wæs he feowertynum dagum ær, þæt he wæs
lichomlicre untrymnesse þrycced & hefgad, hwæðre to þon gemetlice,
þæt he ealle þa tid meahte ge sprecan ge gongan.
 25.346.25. Wæs þær in neaweste untrumra monna hus, in
þæm heora þeaw wæs, þæt heo þa untrumran, & þa ðe
æt forðfore wæron, inlædon sceoldon & him þær ætsomne
þegnian.
 25.346.28. Þa bæd he his þegn on æfenne þære neahte,
þe he of worulde gongende wæs, þæt he in þæm huse him stowe
gegearwode, þæt he gerestan meahte.
 25.346.30. Þa wundrode se þegn, for hwon he ðæs bæde,
forþon him þuhte þæt his forðfor swa neah ne wære: dyde
hwæðre swa swa he cwæð & bibead.
 25.346.32. Ond mid þy he ða þær on reste eode, & he
gefeonde mode sumu þing mid him sprecende ætgædere & gleowiende
wæs, þe þær ær inne wæron, þa wæs ofer midde neaht
þæt he frægn, hwæðer heo ænig husl inne hæfdon.
 25.348.1. Þa ondswarodon heo & cwædon: Hwylc þearf is
ðe husles?
 25.348.2. Ne þinre forþfore swa neah is, nu þu þus rotlice
& þus glædlice to us sprecende eart.
 25.348.4. Cwæð he eft: Berað me husl to.
 25.348.4. Þa he hit þa on honda hæfde, þa frægn he
hwæþer heo ealle smolt mod & buton eallum incan bliðe to him
hæfdon.
 25.348.6. Þa ondswaredon hy ealle & cwædon, þæt heo
nænigne incan to him wiston, ac heo ealle him swiðe bliðemode wæron:
& heo wrixendlice hine bædon, þæt he him eallum bliðe wære.
 25.348.9. Þa ondswarade he & cwæð: Mine broðor mine
þa leofan, ic eom swiðe bliðemod to eow & to eallum Godes monnum.
 25.348.11. Ond swa wæs hine getrymmende mid þy heofonlecan
wegneste, & him oðres lifes ingong gegearwode.
 25.348.13. Þa gyt he frægn, hu neah þære tide wære,
þætte þa broðor arisan scolden & Godes lof ræran & heora
uhtsong singan.
 25.348.14. Þa ondswaredon heo: Nis hit feor to þon.
 25.348.15. Cwæð he: Teala: wuton we wel þære tide bidan.
 25.348.16. & þa him gebæd & hine gesegnode mid Cristes
rode tacne, ond his heafod onhylde to þam bolstre, & medmicel fæc
onslepte; & swa mid stilnesse his lif geendade.
 25.348.19. Ond swa wæs geworden, þætte swa swa hluttre mode
& bilwitre & smyltre wilsumnesse Drihtne þeode, þæt he eac
swylce swa smylte deaðe middangeard wæs forlætende, & to his
gesihðe becwom.
 25.348.22. Ond seo tunge, þe swa monig halwende word in þæs
scyppendes lof gesette, he ða swelce eac þa ytmæstan word in his
herenisse, hine seolfne segniende & his gast in his honda bebeodende,
betynde.
 25.348.25. Eac swelce þæt is gesegen, þæt he wære
gewis his seolfes forðfore, of þæm we nu secgan hyrdon.
 26.348.27. Þyssum tidum ðæt mynster, þæt mon nemneð
æt Coludes burg, þæs we beforan gemyndgodon, þurh ungemænne synne
fyre & lege wæs fornumen.
 26.348.29. Ðæt hwæðre æðelice ongetan meahton ealle
þa þæt cuðon, þætte þæt gelomp for wean & for yfelnesse
þara eardiendra þær in þære byrig, ond þara swiþust þe
ðær aldormen wæran.
 26.348.31. Ac him hwæðre won ne wæs seo monung þær
godcundan ærfæstnesse, þæt heo heora synne witnade & bette
þurh fæsten, þurh wopas, þurh gebedo, & eorre from him acyrde
þæs soðfæstan deman, in þa onlicnesse Niniuitwearena.
 26.350.5. Wæs in þæm ylcan mynstre sum wer of Scotta
þeode, se wæs Adamnanus haten.
 26.350.6. Lifde se mon his liif in micelre forhæfdnisse & in
halgum gebedum Gode swiðe wilsumlice, swa ðæt he næfre mete onfeng ne
swæsendo þeah, buton þy Drihtenlecan dæge & þy fiftan
wiicdæge, ond oft onwalge neahte þurh wæccan in halgum gebedum astod
& awunade.
 26.350.10. Seo þearlwisnis þæs heardan lifes him ærest of
nede becwom for bote his synna; ac forðgongendre tide þæt he þæt
ned in wunan gecyrde.
 26.350.12. Gelomp him in geoguðhade his, þæt he sume
maandæde gefremede.
 26.350.13. Ða seo scyld þa to his heortan hwearf, þa
onscunede he heo hefiglice & him ondred, þæt he for þære
stronglice witnad beon sceolde from þæm þearlwisan deman.
 26.350.16. Eode þa to sumum mæssepreoste, from þæm he
gewende, þæt him hælu weg æteawed beon meahte: ondette him þa
his scylde, & bæd þæt he him geþeaht sealde, hu he meahte befleon
from þæm toweardan eorre.
 26.350.19. Þa he ða his scylde gehyrde, þa cwæð he:
Micel wund behofað micles læcedomes: & forþon, swa swiþe swa ðu
mægge, ætfealh þu þinum fæstenum & sealmsongum & gebeodum,
þætte þu seo forecumende Drihtnes onsyne in ondetnisse, & þu
geearnie hine þe mildne gemetan.
 26.350.23. Ond he þa, þæne þe þæt unmæte sar nom
& hefigode his scylde gewitnes, & he wilnode, þæt he hraðe
alysed wære from þam inlicum bendum þara synna, þe he hefigod wæs
cwæð he to þam mæssepreoste: Ic eom geongre yldo & hal in minum
lichoman.
 26.350.27. Swa hwæt swa ðu me onsettest & bebeodest to
donne, þæt ic halsige in þæm Drihtnes dæge, al ic þæt
eaþelice abere, þeah þe þu mec hate ealle niht wæccende in gebedum
stondan, & þeah þe ic sceole ealle wican fæstan, ic þæt
leoflice do.
 26.350.31. Cwæð he: Micel þæt is, þæt þu ealle
wican buton ondleofone lichoman awunige: ac twydæglic fæsten oðþe
þreodæglic fæsten is genoh to healdenne.
 26.350.33. Do þis, cwæð he, oðþæt ic eft æfter
tide to ðe cyme & þe þonne fullicor æteawe, hwæt þu don
scyle, & hu lange þu on hreowe awunian scyle.
 26.352.1. Þa ferde se mæssepreost from him.
 26.352.2. Þa gelomp for sumum intingan, þæt he semninga
gewat in Hibernia Scotta ealond, þonon he ær cwom: ne he eft ma to him
hwearf æfter heora gecwide.
 26.352.4. Wæs he hwæðre gemyndi his bebodes ond eac his
gehates; ond he in hreowe tearum & in halgum wæccenum & in micelre
forhæfdnesse Drihtne þeowade, swa ðæt he næfre oftor gereorde ne
swæsendo þah, þonne þy Drihtenlecan dæge & þy fiftan
wicdæge, swa swa ic fore cwæð; oðrum dagum he swa fæstende
awunade.
 26.352.9. Mid þy he ða gehyrde þone mæssepreost gewitan in
Hiibernia & þær forðferende beon, he symle of þære tide
þæt gemyndgade gemet þære forhæfdnesse heold & læste.
 26.352.12. & þætte for intingan þæs godcundan eges
æne siðe for his scylde onbryrded ongan, swa he eft for intingan þære
godcundan lufan lustfulliende þam ecum medum fæstlice forðlæste.
 26.352.15. Mid þy he þæt þa longre tide forðheold &
dyde, þa gelomp sume dæge, þæt he wæs from þæm mynstre for
sumum þinge fyr gongende; & wæs an þara broðra his gefera &
him mid eode.
 26.352.17. Þa heo þa hæfdon heora siðfæt geferedne,
þa hwurfon heo eft to ham.
 26.352.18. & mid þy heo þa þæm mynstre nealecton,
& heo gesegon þa getimbru healice areht & ahæfen, þa geswearc se
Godes mon semninga & ongan hatlice & biterlice wepan, & þa
unrotnesse his heortan mid his andwlitan tacnunge ypte & cyðde.
 26.352.22. Þa þæt þa se his gefera geseah & ongeat,
þa frægn he hine & ascode, hwæt him wære & forhwon he swa
gebærde.
 26.352.24. Þa cwæð he: Eal þas getimbru, þe ðu her
gesyhst & sceawast, ge þa maran ge ða mætran, neah is þæt hy
eal fyr nimeð & in ascan gehwyrfað.
 26.352.26. Þa se broðor þæt þa gehyrde, sona þæs
þe heo in þæt mynster eodon, þa cyðde he hit & sægde
þære meder þære gesomnunga þære abbudissan, seo wæs æbbe
haten.
 26.352.29. Þa wæs heo be gewyrhte swiðe gedrefed bi swelcum
witedome & forht geworden, geheht þa to hire ðone Godes monn &
geornlice hine frægn & ascade hwonan he ða wisan cuðe & ongete.
 26.352.31. Cwæð he: Ic wæs ungeara on neaht abisgad on
weacenum & on sealmsonge & on gebedum; þa geseah ic somninga me
ætstondan sumne monnan uncuþes ondwleotan.
 26.354.3. Ða wæs ic for his ondweardnisse swiðe afyrhted,
þa frefrede he mec & cwæð, þæt ic me ne ondrede.
 26.354.4. Ond swa swa he cuþre stefne wæs to me sprecende:
Wel ðu dest, cwæð he, þæt ðu in ðisse tide neahtlicre stilnisse
nalæs ðec slæpe forgeofan, ah ma woldes weacenum & gebedum
ætfeolan.
 26.354.7. Cwæð ic: ic wat þæt me ðæs is micel
ðearf þæt ic halwendum weacenum ætfeole, & for minum gedwolum
& synnum geornlice Dryhten bensie.
 26.354.10. Cwæð he se ðe mid mec spræc: Soð ðu
sagast, cwæð he, æghwæðer ge þe ðæs is þearf ge mongum,
þæt hio hiora synna mid godum weorcum alese, & þonne hio blinne from
gewinne hwilwendlicra þinga, ðæt hio ðonne fore willunga þeara ecra
goda þy freolslicor winne.
 26.354.14. Ah ðis hwæðre fea ane doð.
 26.354.14. Soð ic secge, þæt ic nu eal þis mynster ðurh
endebyrdnisse geondferde & syndrigra hus & bedd geseah: &
nænigne of eallum butan þe ic gemette ymb his saule hælo abisgodne
beon; ah alle ge wæpnedmenn ge wifmenn oððo hefige slæpe syndon,
oððe to synnum wacedon.
 26.354.18. Ond ða hus ða ðe in to gebiddenne & to
leornienne geworhte wæron, ða syndon nu in hus gehwerfed oferæta &
druncennesse & leasspellunge & oðerra unalefedlecra scylda.
 26.354.21. & eac swelce ða fæmnan, ða ðe Gode
gehalgode wæron, forhogdre are heara ondetnisse, ond swa oft swa hio
æmtan habbað, þæt hio smaelo hrægel weofað & wyrcað, mid
ðæm hio oððo hio siolfe frætwað in bryda onlicnesse, in
frecenesse hiora stalles oððo utwæpnedmonna friondscipes him
ceapiað.
 26.354.25. Forðon bi gewyrhte þysse stowe & hire eardiendum
hefig wræc of hiofenum grimsiendum legum is gegearwad.
 26.354.27. Cwæð hio sio abbudisse to him: Forhwon ne woldes
ðu sona hraðe ða deagolnisse me cyðan & secgan.
 26.354.29. Ða ondswarode he & cwæð: Ic ondred for
þinre arwyrðnisse ðæt þu sceolde to swiðe gedrefed & afyrhted
beon; & hwæðre ðas frofre ðu hafast, þæt hit on ðinum dagum
ðis wite ofer ðas burg ne cymeð.
 26.354.32. Ða ðios gesiehð ða wæs gemæred, ða
wæs hwelchugu fæc ðæt þa bigengan þære stowe, ðæt is
feaum dagum, ongunnon him ondrædan & hio seolfe clænsian, &
mandæde forleton.
 26.356.1. Ond eft sona æfter ðære abbudissan forðfore hio
hwurfon to þam ærran unsefernessum, & ec micle manfulran fremedon.
 26.356.3. & mid ðy cwædon: Nu is sib & orsorhnes: hi
ða instepe, ða hie laesest wendon, mid þy wiite ðæs foresprecenan
wræces slægene wæron.
 26.356.5. All þas ðing me ðus gewurden se arwyrða min
efenmæssepreost Eedgyls sægde, se ða in ðam mynstre eardade &
drohtode, & eft in ussum mynstre longe tide lifde & þær
forðferde, æfter ðon monge ðara bigengena ðonon gewitan for
þære burge tolesnesse.
 26.356.9. Ðis spel we forðon setton in ure bec, þæt we men
monede, ðæt hio gesege Dryhtnes weorc, hu egesfullic he is on
geðeahtingum ofer monna bearn, ðy læs we ænige tide ussum licumlicum
unalefednessum sion þeowiende, & læs Godes dom forhtige & we us
ondræde, ðonne we scylen, & his yrre semninga us eac ðreage &
usic oððe hwilwendlicum yrmðum rihtlice swence & wecce, oððe to
ecre forwyrde heardwendlice gedeme.
 27.356.17. Þa wæs ymb syx hund wintra & feower &
hundeahtatig æfter þære Drihtenlecan menniscnesse, þy geare,
þætte Ecgfrið Norðanhymbra cyning sende weorod & fyrd in Hiibernia
Scotta ealond.
 27.356.20. Þær wæs Beorht latteow & heretoga, & heo
þa unsceððendan þeode & symle Ongolcynne þa holdoston earmlice
forhergodon, swa ðæt cyricum ne mynstrum seo herehand sparode nene arode.
 27.356.22. Ond þa seolfe landleodan, swa swiðe swa hi meahton,
heo hy weredon & him wiðcompodon, & him on fultum cegdon þa
godcundan aarfæstnesse, ond singalum onbenum longe bædon, þæt heo
heofonlice gewrecene wæron.
 27.356.26. Ond þeah þe wærgcweodole Godes rice gesittan ne
mægen, hwæðre is gelyfed, þætte þa be gewyrhte wyrgde wæron
for heora arleasnesse, þæt heo hræðe þurh Drihtnes wrace heora
scylda wite þrowedon.
 27.356.30. Forþon þe soðlice þy nyhstan geare æfter
ðeossum, mid þy se ylca cyning gedyrstiglice here lædde to forhergianne
Peohta mægðe & him swiðe þæt his freond beweredon & ealra
swiðust þære eadigan gemynde Cuðberht, se þa neowan to biscope
gehalgad wæs, þa gelædde he hwæðre here in Peohtas þa licetton
heo fleam, & hine betyldon in neara fæsten micel ungeferedra mora.
 27.358.5. Ond he mid þy mæstan dæle his weorodes ofslegen
wæs þy feo wertegðan geare his yldo, þy fiftegðan geare his rices,
þy þreotteoþan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Iuniarum</foreign>.
 27.358.7. & swa swa ic ær cwæð, beweredon his freond
him, þæt he þæt gefeoht ne ongunne.
 27.358.8. Ac forþon þe he ne wolde þy ærran geare gehyran
þone arwyrðan fæder Ecgberht, þæt he Sceottas hine noht
sceðþende ne afuhte, þa wæs him seald þurh wite þære synne,
þæt he eft þa ne gehyrde, þa ðe hine wilnadon from his forwyrde
gecegean.
 27.358.13. Of þære tide ongan se hyht & mægen
Ongolcynnes rices toflowan & gewanad beon.
 27.358.14. Forðon þe Peohtas heora æhte lond eft onfengon,
þæt Engle ær hæfdon ond Sceottas, þa ðe in Breotone wæron,
swa; ond Bretta eac swelce micel dæl freodom onfengon.
 27.358.16. Þær betweoh monige Ongelþeode, þa ðe oðþe
mid sweorde ofslægene wæron oððe þeodome betæhte, oðþe of
Peohta londe onweg flugon, ond eac swylce se arwyrða Godes mon Trumwine, se
ðe heora biscop wæs, gewat mid his geferum, þa ðe wæron in þæm
mynstre æbbercurni, þæt is geseted in Engla londe ac hwæðre neah
þæm sæ, þe Engla lond & Peohta tosceadaþ.
 27.358.22. & he þa se biscop his geferan, swa hwær swa he
meahte, þurh mynster his freondum wæs befæstende; ond he him seolfum
wunenesse & wic geceas in þæm oft cwedenan mynstre, þæt is
geceged Streoneshealh.
 27.358.25. Ond he þær mid feawa his geferena in heardnesse
munuclifes nales him seolfum anum ac swiðe monegum bryce monegra geara tide
lifde.
 27.358.27. & he þær eac swelce forðferde, & in
cirican Sancte Petres þæs apostoles æfter gerisenre are his lifes &
his hada bebyrged wæs.
 27.358.29. Wæs þæs ilcan mynstres abbodesse in ða tid seo
cynelice fæmne ælflæd ætgædere mid Eanflæde hire meder,
þære we beforan gemyngodan.
 27.358.31. Ah ða se biscop þider com, mycelne fultum gereces
& somed hire lifes frofre Gode seo wilsume fæmne in him gemette.
 27.358.33. Ða feng Ealdfrið æfter Ecgfriðe to rice.
 27.360.1. Se man wæs se gelærdesta in gewreotum; se wæs
sægd, þæt he his broðor wære Osweos sunu þæs cyninges.
 27.360.2. & he ðone toworpnan steal þæs rices, þeah
ðe hit wære binnan nearwum gemærum, eaðelice geedneowade.
 27.360.5. Þy geare þaa, þæt is ymb syx hund wintra &
fif & hundehtatig from ðære Dryhtenlican menniscnesse, þæt
Hloþhere Cantwara cyning ðis deadlice lif geendode & forðferde, se
æftera Ecbyrhte his breðer, se ehta winter ricsade; þa feng he to rice
& þæt hæfde XII winter.
 27.360.9. Wæs he gewundad in Suþseaxna gefeohte, þa wið
hine Eadric Ecgbyrhtes sunu gesomnade; ond þa betweoh ðon þe hine man
lacnade, he forðferde.
 27.360.11. & þa æfter him se ilca Eadric oðer healf gear
þæt rice hæfde.
 27.360.12. Þa he ða forðferde, þa ðæt rice þa sum
fæc tide tweonde cyningas & fremde forluron & towurpun,
oþðæt heora riht cyning Wihtred, þæt wæs Ecgbyrhtes sunu, wæs
in rice gestrongad.
 27.360.15. Ond he þa somod ætgædre mid æfestnesse ge
mid geornfulnesse his ðeode fram utlicre hergunge generede & alysde.
 28.360.19. Ono ðy sylfan geare ðe Ecgferð cyning lifes ende
onfeng, gedyde he þæt man ðone halgan wer & ðone arwyrðan
Cuþbryht to biscope gehalgode ðære cirican æt Lindesfarona æ.
 28.360.21. Se ær in medmyclum ealonde, þæt is Farne nemned,
ancorlif lædde þurh monig gear in mycelre forhæfdnesse lichaman ond
modes.
 28.360.23. Is ðæt ealond from ðære ilcan cyrican feor ut
on garsecgge geseted, huhugu on nigen milum.
 28.360.25. & he se halga Godes mon from þære ærestan
yldo cnihthades simle beorn in gelise & in geornfulnesse æwfæstes
lifes: ac þa he gewexen wæs, ða wilnode he & onfeng munuchade.
 28.360.28. & ærest eode in Mailros ðæt mynster,
þæt is geseted on ofre Tuidon streames.
 28.360.29. Ðæt mynster þa heold & rihte Eata biscop, se
wæs milde wer & monðwære, & se æfter wæs gewarden biscop
in Hægstealdes æ & in Lindesfarona æ, swa swa we beforan
gemyngodon.
 28.360.32. Þæs mynstres profost & regolweard wæs in
ða tid Boisel, se wæs mycelra mægena mæssepreost & witedomes
gastes.
 28.360.33. Ðisses discipulhada Cuðbyrht wæs eadmodlice
underþeoded; & wisdom haligra gewrita & godra weorca bysene fram him
nam.
 28.362.3. Æfter þon ðe he ða to Dryhtne geleorde, þa
wæs Cuðbyrht ðæs ilcan mynstres regolweard geworden; & he monige
æghweðer ge mid aldorlicnesse his lareowdomes ge mid bisene his
gesawenlicra dæda to regollicum life gesette ond intimbrede.
 28.362.6. & nalas ðæt he ðæm mynstre anum regollices
lifes manunge & samod his bysene gearwode, ac swelce eac ðæt ymbsette
folc feor & wide from ðæm life ðæs dyslecan gewunan to lufan
þara heofenlicra gifeana georne gemde to gehwyrfenne.
 28.362.10. Forðon ðe monige ðone geleafan, þe hie
hæfdon, mid unrihtum weorcum idledon, ond swylce eac manige in ða tid
þæs myclan woles & moncwildes gymeleasedan ðæm gerynum þæs
halgan geleafan, mid þæm hie gelærede wæron, & to ðæm
dwoligendum læcedomum deofulgylda ofestton & scyndon; swa swa hie
þæt sende wite from Gode Sceppende þurh heora galdor oþþe lyfesne
oððe þurh hwylce hwugu deogolnesse deofolcræftes bewerian mehton.
 28.362.17. Ono æghweðerne gedwolan to gereccenne se Godes man
wæs ut gongende of ðæm mynstre gelomlice: hwilum wæs on horse
sittende, ac oftor on his fotum gangende; for to þæm ymbsettum tunum &
ðæm dwoligendum soðfæstnesse weg bodode & lærde.
 28.362.21. Ðæt sylfe eac swylce Boisel his magister on his
tide gewunelice dyde.
 28.362.23. Wæs in ða tid ðeaw Ongolcynnes folcum þæt,
þonne mæssepreost oðþe oðer in tun com, ðæt hie ealle to his
bebode gesomnedon Godes word to gehyrenne; & fuslice gehyrdon, ða ðe
him gelærde wæron, ond eac swylce neodlice mid dædum læstton, ða
ðe hie ongeotan mehton.
 28.362.27. Ðonne wæs ðam Godes menn Cuðbyrhte swa mycel
getydnes & gelærednes to sprecenne & swa mycel lufu godcundre lare,
ðe he læran ongon, ond swylc leoht engelices ondwlitan him ofscan,
ðætte nænig ðara onweardra his heortan degolnessa him helan dorste,
ac ealle openlice heora dæda þurh ondettnesse forðbæron.
 28.362.32. Forðon þe hi tealdon & him ðuhte, ðæt
hine ða ane miþe, þe he ðaa ne heora degolnesse witan ne gymde; ond hi
ða geondettan synne mid medemum wæstmum soðre hreowe gebetton, swa he
bebead.
 28.364.3. & gewunode he swiðost ða stowe geondferan &
in ðæm tunum godcunde lare bodian, þa ðe in heaum morum & in
reðum feorr gesette wæron & oðrum on gryre wæron to neosienne,
& æghweðer ge mid þearfendnesse ge mid heora ungelærednesse
ðara lareowa fore hiaðoradon: ða he hweðere mid arfæste gewinne mid
mycelre geornfulnesse heofenlicre lare lustfullice beeode.
 28.364.9. Ond of ðæm mynstre uteode oft onwalge wucan, hwilum
twa oððe ðreo; swylce eac oft ealle monðe þæt he ham ne hwearf, ac
wunode in ðæm morlandum & ðæt ungelærede folc somod ge mid
worde his lara ge mid weorce his mægena to þæm heofenlican cleopode
& laðode.
 28.364.14. Ono mid þy he ða se arwyrða Godes ðeow monig
gear in Mægilros ðæm mynstre drohtiende wæs, & þær mid
miclum tacnum gastlicra mægena scan & byryhte, ða genam hine æt
nehstan his se arwyrða abbod Eata to Lindesfarena ea, ðæt he ðær
eac swilce ðæm broðrum sealde regollices ðeodscipes gehæled, ge mid
ealdorlicnesse his lare ge mid his sylfes dæde, ypte & cyðde.
 28.364.20. Forðon ða sylfan stowe þe se ilca arwyrða
fæder Eata mid abbudes anwalde heold & rehte wæs ðær io on
ealdum tidum ge biscop mid his geferum, ge eac abbod wunode mid munecum.
 28.364.23. Hweðere hie to þæs biscopes scire heowesclice
belumpon.
 28.364.24. Forðon se halga Godes man Iodon, se ðe ærest
ðære stowe biscop wæs, big munuchade, he ðider com mid munecum &
munuclifes drohtunge he in ðæm mynstre gesette.
 29.364.28. Ðonon ða se halga Godes man Cuðbryht, wexendum
geearningum æfestre ingehygde, ond eac swylce to degolnesse & to
stillnesse becom ðære godcundan sceawunge ancerlifes, swa we ær beforan
sægdon.
 29.364.31. Ac forðon þe ær monegum gearum be his life &
mægenum we genyhtsumlice awriton, ge meterfersum ge geradre spræce, ðis
an nu in ondweardnesse is genog to gemyngienne, þæt ða he ðæt
ealond secan wolde, ðæt he wæs ðæm broðrum cidende & ðus
cwæð: Gif me seo godcunde geofu in ðære stowe forgifen beon wile,
þæt ic lifgan mote be minum hondgewinne, ic ðær lustlice wunige.
 29.366.6. Gif hit hwæt elles bið, ic hrædlice mid Godes
willan eft to eow hweorfe.
 29.366.7. Wæs seo stow ge wæteres wædla ge eorðwæstma
ge treowa; ah þær wæs werigra gasta weorod & eardungstow &
æghwylcere menniscre eardunge ungescræpe.
 29.366.10. Ac þa to willan ðæs Godes weres heo eardiendlic
wæs geworden; ond sona for his cyme ða wergan gastas ðonon onweg
gewiton.
 29.366.12. & þa mid þy ðe ða feond onweg gewitone
wæron, þa gesohte he him nearo wic & wununesse, ond þa mid dice
& mid eorðwealle utan ymbsealde & gefæstnode; & in ðæm
ða nedþearflican hus mid þara broðera honda & fultome, ðæt is
cyrican & gemæne eardunghus getimbrede.
 29.366.16. & ða het ða broðor in ðæs ilcan huses
flore him seað adelfan.
 29.366.17. Wæs seo eorðe to ðæs heard & to ðæs
stanihte, þæt ðær nænig wiht wyllsprynges beon mihte on gesewen.
 29.366.19. Ða hi ða broðor ðæt dydon to geleafan &
to benum ðæs Godes ðeowes, ða oðre dæge wæs he wætres ful
gemeted.
 29.366.20. Þæt ilce wæter æt ðysne ondweardan dæg
eallum ðæm ðider cumendum his heofenlicu gifu genihtsumnesse
ðegnað.
 29.366.22. Þa bæd se Godes man þæt him man isern geloman
mid hwæte ðyder brohte þæt land mid to tawienne.
 29.366.24. Ða ðæt land ða getawod wæs, & he on
gerisne tid mid hwæte hit seow, þa ne com ðær nænig grownes up ne
wæstm, ne furðum brordes oð sumeres tid.
 29.366.26. Þa neosedon hie eft þa broðor & sohtan, swa
heora ðeaw wæs, ða heht he him beresæd bringan, gif wen wære,
þæt þæt wexan wolde oðþe ðære eorðan gecynd wære,
oþþe willa wæs ðæs uplican gifendes, ðæt ðæs wæstmes
eard þær wære upp eornende.
 29.366.30. Ða him ða ðæt sæd broht wæs ofer ealle
tide to sawenne, & ofer ealne hiht wæsm to berenne he in ðæm ilcan
lande seow, þa georn ðær sona upp genihtsumlic yrð & wæstm,
& þa wilnedon gereordnesse ðam Godes were gegearwode his agnes
hondgewinnes.
 29.368.1. Mid þy he ða monig gear þær in ancerlife Dryhtne
ðeowode, þa gelamp, þæt man mycelne seonoð gesomnode be Alnes
streame in þære stowe, þe is cweden æt Twyfyrde, under andweardnesse
Ecgferðes ðæs cyninges.
 29.368.4. Ðam seonoðe in ealdordome foresæt ðære
eadigan gemynde ðeodor ercebiscop; & he ðær wæs mid anmodre
geþafunge ealra ðara weotena to biscope gecoren ðære cyrican æt
Lindesfarena ea.
 29.368.7. & hi ða manige ærendwrecan & gewreoto him
sendon, & hie hine hweðre nænige ðinga of his wicum & of his
stowe to him gelaðian ne mehton.
 29.368.9. Ða æt nehstan se foresprecena cyning self, & se
halga biscop Trumwine mid him & monige oþre æfeste weras & rice
liðon on ðæt ealond.
 29.368.11. & eac swylce mænige þara broðra of
Lindesfarena ea efncomon to him & ealle heora cneowa begdon, & tearas
guton & hine ðurh ðone lifigendon Dryhten halsedon & bædon, oþ
þæt hie hine eac swylce teara fulne of his ðæm swetan degolnessum
atugon & to ðam seonoðe gelæddon.
 29.368.16. Mid þy he ða þyder com, þeah þe he swiðe
wiðwinnende wære, mid anmode willan heora ealra he wæs oferswiðed
& geneded to onfonne þa ðegnunge biscophades.
 29.368.18. Wæs he swyðust mid þy worde oferswiðed,
ðætte Bosel se Dryhtnes þeow, þa he him þurh witedomes gast eal þa
þing openade & sægde, þa ðe ofer hine cumende wæron, þa he
eac swylce forecwæþ, ðæt he toweardlice biscop beon sceolde.
 29.368.22. Ne wæs ða hweðre sona his halgunge gedemed; ac
forðagane/ ðy wintra, ðe ða toweard wæs, in ðære seolfan
Easterlican symbelnesse in Eoferwicceastre wæs gefylled in ondweardnesse
Ecgferðes þæs cyninges: & seofen biscopas to his halgunge efencomon,
in ðæm ðære eadigan gemynde Theodor biscop ealdordom hæfde.
 29.368.26. He ða ðone onfongnan biscophad to onhyrenisse þara
eadigra apostola mid weorcum gastlicra mægena frætwode, & þæt
bebodene folc, þe he Gode healdan sceolde, ægheþer ge mid his singalum
gebedum scylde, ge mid his halwendum moningum & larum to ðæm
heofenlican cegde & laðode; & þætte swiðost gewunað halige
lareowas gefultuman, swa hwæt swa he mid his worde lærde, he ær mid
dædum gefylde.
 29.368.33. Wæs he ær eallum ðingum mid þy fyre godcundre
lufan hat & weallende, & in geðylde mægene gemetfæst, ond in
wilsumnesse haligra gebeda begneorð & geornful; & he wæs eallum
gespræce ðam þe to him for intingan frofre comon.
 29.370.3. & þæt sylfe he wæs lædende in stowe halges
gebedes, gif he ðam untruman broðrum mid his trymenesse & lare fultum
sealde.
 29.370.6. Forðon he wiste & gemunde: se þe cwæð, lufa
ðu þinne Dryhten God, se ilca cwæð, lufa ðu þinne ðone nehstan.
 29.370.7. Wæs he mid clæsnunge forhæfdnesse weorð &
mære; & symle mid þære gife onbryrdnesse wæs to ðam
heofenlican aðened.
 29.370.9. Ðæs wæs to tacne, þonne he Gode onsægdnesse
bær & mæssan sang, ðæt he his stefne on heanesse ne ahofe, ah
forðgotenum tearum of inneweardre heortan Dryhtne his willan bebead.
 30.370.13. Ða wæs twa gear ðæt he ðæt biscopsetl swa
sæt & heold.
 30.370.13. Þa wæs he godcundlice manod, þæt he eft his
ealond & his wic gecure & gewilnode; forðon se ingang nealæcte his
dæaðdæges, oðþe ma his lifes, forðon ðæt an is soðlic lif
to cweðenne.
 30.370.16. Swa swa he sylf in ða ilcan tid monegum monnum mid his
ðære gewunelican bilwitnes se diglum wordum openade & cyðde, þa
mon hweðere æfter fæce sweotollice ongeotan mihte.
 30.370.19. Sumum monnum he ðonne þæt ilce openlice onwreah
& cydde.
 30.370.21. Wæs sum mæssepreost arwyrðes lifes, þæs
noma wæs Herebyrht, se wæs geara & longe þæm Godes were in were
geðeoded gastlices freondscipes.
 30.370.23. Wæs se in ealonde þæs mycclan meres, of ðæm
ðe ða fruman aweallað Deorwentan streames; ond ancerlife lifde.
 30.370.25. Wæs his gewuna, þæt he syndrigum gearum hine
neosade & sohte, & from him monunge gehyrde ecre hæle.
 30.370.26. Ða he gehyrde þæt se biscop com to Lugubalia
ðære ceastre, ða com he, swa his ðeaw wæs, þider to him &
wilnode, ðæt he mid his halwendum trymenessum to ðæm upplican lustum
ma & ma onbærned wære.
 30.370.29. Ða hie ða betwih him spræcon be haligra fædera
life & him betwih bædeweg scencton þæs heofenlican lifes, ða
cwæð se biscop betwih: Gemyne ðu broðor Herebryht, þætte þu nu
mec frigne & to me spræce, swa hwæt swa ðu wille & ðearfe
hæbbe.
 30.372.2. Forðon ðe æfter þon ðe wit nu betwih unc nu
togangne beoð, ne geseo wit unc ofer ðæt in ðisse weorulde lichomlicum
eagum.
 30.372.4. Forðon ic cuðlice wat, þæt seo tid minre
tolysnesse & minre forðfore is swiðe neah.
 30.372.5. Þa he ða ðas word gehyrde, ða feol he to his
fotum & mid mycelre eomrunge his tearas geat: & sarlice weop &
þus cwæð: Ic ðe halsige þurh ðone lifigendan Drihten, ðæt
ðu mec ne forlæte, ac þæt þu sie gemyndig getreowan geðoftan, ond
bidde þa uplican arfæstnesse, ðæt þæm Gode, þe wit somod on
eorðan ðeowedon ðæt wit eac somod moton to heofenum feran his gife
þær to geseonne & to sceawigenne.
 30.372.11. Forðon þu wast ðæt ic symle teolode to
lifigenne to ðines muðes bebode, & swa hwæt swa ic for unwisnesse
& for tydernesse agylte, ic þæt to dome ðines willan teolode hraðe
to gebetenne.
 30.372.14. Ða aðenede se biscop hine in cruce & hine
gebæd, & sona wæs in gaste gelæred, þæt he wæs from
Dryhtne tigða þære bene, ðe he bæd; ond cwæð.
 30.372.16. Aris min broðor & ne wep þu, ah gefeoh &
geblissa: forðon seo uplice arfæstnes unc forgeaf, ðæt wit bædon.
 30.372.19. Ðæs gehates & ðæs witedomes soð se
afterfylgenda becyme ðara wisena geseðde & getrymede.
 30.372.20. Forðon ða hie betweoh him togangende wæron, ða
hie ofer ðæt lichomlicum eagum ne gesawon; & ane dæge & ðy
ilcan, ðæt is ðy ðreotteoðan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Aprelium</foreign>, þæt
hie wæron of lichoman utgongende.
 30.372.23. & heora gastas sona betwih mid eadigre gesihðe
geðeodde wæron & midd þa engellican ðegnunge ætgædere to
ðæm heofenlican rice gelædde.
 30.372.26. Ac Herebyrht wæs ær mid singalre untrumnesse soden
& geswenced.
 30.372.27. Is ðæt to gelyfenne, þætte þæt wære
mid forestihtunge don þære godcundan arfæstnesse, þætte swa
hwæt swa he læs & wonan hæfde geearnunge from ðæm eadegan
Cuðbrehte, þætte ðæt gefylde & geclænsode þæt sar
ðære longan untrumnesse, þæt he swa geefenlicad wære mid þa gife
his ðingeres: þæt swa swa he in ane tid & in ða ilcan mid hine of
lichoman gongende wæs, þæt he ðonne ec swylce swa mid hine nalas in
ungelicum selde þære ecan eadignesse geearnode onfongen beon.
 30.374.1. Forðferde se arwyrða fæder Cuðbyrht in Farne
ðæm ealonde; & he swiðe georne wæs ða broðor biddende,
þæt he ðær eac swylce bebyrged beon moste, þær he mycle tid for
Dryhtne campode.
 30.374.3. Ond hweðre æt nehstan þæt he wæs mid heora
benum oferswiðed, þæt he geðafode, þæt mon his lic lædde to
Lindesfarena ea, ond þær in cirican geseted wære.
 30.374.6. Ða ðæt geworden wæs, þa heold þære
cyrican biscophad an gear wilferð se arwyrða biscop, oðþæt se biscop
gecoren wære, se þe fore Cuðbyrhte gehalgod beon sceolde.
 30.374.8. Þa wæs æfter þon, ðæt wæs Eadbyrht to
biscope gehalgod.
 30.374.8. Wæs se wer in wisdome godcundra gewreota & eac
swylce somod in hælde heofenlicra beboda ond swiðust in weorcum
ælmesdæda weorð & mære, swa ðæt he æghwelce geare
æfter Moyses æ, nales ðæt aan feðerfotra neata ac swylce eac ealra
wæstma & æppla & hrægla ðone teoðan dæl for Gode to
ælmessum ðearfum sealde.
 31.374.15. Ðæt wolde ða openlicor æteawan seo godcunde
arfæstnes, in hu myclum wuldre se Dryhtnes wer Cuðbyrht æfter his
deaðe lifde; þæs his lif ær ðam deaðe mid healicum tacnum
heofenlicra wundra openade & æteawde.
 31.374.18. Ða wæs ymb endlefen gear þæs ðe he bebyrged
wæs, ðætte God onsende in ðara broðra mod, þæt heo woldan his
ban geneoman & up ofer eorðan adon.
 31.374.20. Tealdon hie & wendon þæt his oðer lichoma
ðy ðeawe deadra manna fornumen wære & to duste geworden, &
ðæt hie woldon his ban on niwe cyste gedon & in ðære ilcan stowe
bufan eorðan gedefelicre arwyrðnesse wel gesettan & gestaðelian.
 31.374.25. Þa sægdon hie ðæt & cyðdon Eadbyrhte
heora biscope þæt him ðæt licede & leof wære, gif hit his
willa wære, ða geðafode he þæt heora geðeahte, & het ðæt
hie þæt dydon ðy dæge, þe his gemynddæg wære & his
forðfor.
 31.374.28. & hie swa dydon: ontyndon his byrgenne & ealne
his lichoman gemetton onwalhne & gesundne, swa swa he þa gena lifde,
& he wæs begendlic in ðæm geðeodnessum leoða, þæt he
wæs myccle gelicra slæpendum menn þonne deadum.
 31.376.2. Swylce eac ealle ða hrægl, þa ðe he mid
gegearwad wæs, nales ðæt an þæt hie ungewemmed wæron, ah swylce
eac swa hwit & swa neowe wunderlice æteawdon, swa he ðy ilcan dæge
mid gewered wære.
 31.376.5. Þa þæt þa ða broðor gesawon, þa wæron
hie swiðe forhte gewordne, & ða efestton ðæm biscope to cyðenne
& secgenne ða ðing ðe hie ðær gemetton.
 31.376.7. Se þa ænlepe wunode in syndrigre stowe from
ðære cyrican, seo wæs æghwonon mid sæs yðum utan ymbgyrded.
 31.376.9. In ðisse stowe he simle on ða tid ðæs
feowertiglic an fæstennes ær Eastrum & eft ðæt feowertig ær
Cristes gebyrdtide in mycelre forhæfdnesse & in mycelre wilsumnesse
gebeda & in teara gegote gewunelice wæs.
 31.376.12. In ðære stowe eac swylce se arwyrða his foregenga
Cuðbryht, ær ðon þe he Farne þæt ealand gesohte, sum fæc in
deagolnesse Dryhtne campode.
 31.376.14. Brohton hie ðyder eac swylce ðam biscope ðara
hrægla dæl, þe se halga lichoma mid gegyrwed wæs.
 31.376.16. & he þære gife ðoncwyrðlice onfeng, &
þa wundor lustlice gehyrde ond þa sylfan hrægl mid wunderlicre lufe
cyssende wæs, swa heo ða gena þam lichoman þæs halgan fæder
ymbseald wæron.
 31.376.19. & ðus cwæð: Gegyrewað ðone lichoman mid
neowum hræglum fore ðam ðe ge ðær on noman, & swa in ða cyste
gesettað, þe ge him gegearwodon.
 31.376.21. Forðæm ic þæt cuðlice wat, þæt seo stow
noht lange æmettig ne wunað, seo mid swa mycelre gife heofenlicre gife
gehalgod is.
 31.376.23. Ond se bið swiðe eadig se ðe him Drihten, se is
ord & syllend ealra eadignessa, forgifeð, þætte he in ðære
stowe restan mote.
 31.376.25. Þa he ða se biscop ðas word & monig þysses
gemetes mid manegum tearum & mid mycelre inbryrdnesse heortan & swylce
eac forhtigendre tungan gefylde, ða dydon ða broðor swa he het, ond
þone lichoman gegyredon mid neowum hrægle, & in ða neowan cyste
gedydon, ðe hi to ðon geworhton, & bufan flore ðære cirican
asetton.
 31.376.31. Ne wæs þa elding, þætte Gode se leofa biscop
Eadbryht wæs mid grimre adle ðread & gestanden; & seo
dæghwamlice weox & hefigode, þæt he nalas after miclum fæce he
eac swylce to Dryhtne ferde, þæt is ærran dæge Nonas Maias.
 31.378.2. Ðæs lichoman þa broðor wæron gesettende in
ða byrgenne ðæs gebletsadon fæder Cuðbryhtes & ða cyste bufan
gesetton, in ða hie gestaðeledon þa ungebrosendlican leomo þæs ilcan
fæder.
 31.378.5. In ðære stowe eac swylce oft beoð geworden
heofenlicu mægen & hælo tacen untrumra in cyðnesse heora begra
geearnunga.
 31.378.7. Ða sume we geara for gemynde awriton in ðære bec
Cuðberhtes lifes; ac in ðissum ussum stære we sceolon an toætecan,
þe us gelamp þæt we neowan gehyrdon.
 32.378.10. Wæs in ðæm ilcan mynstre sum broðor, ðæs
noma wæs Beadoþegn, se wæs lange tid cumena arðegen þara ðe
þæt mynster sohton.
 32.378.12. & cwæð, þæt he ða gena lifgende wære,
þa he þis gewrit sette.
 32.378.13. Hæfde he gewitnesse & cyðnesse from eallum
ðæm broðrum & from eallum þam cumendum, þe ðæt mynster
sohton, þæt he wæs mycelre arfæstnesse wer, & þære
bebodenan ðegnunge eadmodlice underðeoded for intingan heofenlicre
meorðe.
 32.378.17. Ða eode þes broðor sume dæge, þæt he wolde
his reon & his hwitlas, ðam ðe he in cumena bure brucende wæs, in
sæ wæscan & feormian.
 32.378.19. Ða he ða eft ham hwearf, þa wearð he semninga on
middum þæm siðfæte mid hefigre aðle gehrinen & gestonden, swa
þæt he hreas & feoll on eorðan & long fæc forðheald
licgende wæs; & þa æt nehstan hwon aras.
 32.378.22. Þa he arisende wæs, þa gefelde he his lichoman
healfne dæl from þæm heafde oð þa fet mid þa aðle geslægene
beon, þe Grecas nemnað paralysis, & we cweðað lyftadl; & he mid
þy mæstan gewinne mid his crycce hine wreðigende ham becom.
 32.378.26. Weox seo adl sticcemælum, & sona on ðære
ilcan niht hefigre gefremed wæs, swa ðæt, ða dæg com, þæt he
uneaðe þurh hine sylfne ariisan oþþe gan mihte.
 32.378.28. Ða wæs he mid þære adle gewæced &
geswenced, þa geþohte he on his mode nytte geþeahte, þæt he wolde
swylce gemete, swa he mihte, to cyrican cuman & to byrgenne þæs
arwyrðan fæder Cuðbryhtes, & þær his cneow began &
eadmodlice þa uplican arfæstnesse biddan, oð þæt he from ðære
adle genered wære, gif him festre wære ðæt, oþþe gif he mid þa
godcundan foreseonnesse leng mid ða adle clænsad beon sceolde, ðæt he
þæt saar mihte geþyldiglice mid smolte mode aberan & aræfnan.
 32.380.6. Þa dyde he, swa he on his mode gehogde, & his ða
untruman leomo mid his crycce wreðgende eode in cyrican; & hine wæs in
gebed streccende æt lichoman þæs Godes weres & mid arfæstre
ingehygde þurh his fultum wæs Dryhten biddende, þæt he him arfæst
& milde wære.
 32.380.10. Ond þa betwih his gebede & bene ðæt he hwon
onslep.
 32.380.11. Ða gefelde he, swa swa he seolfa æfter sægde,
swa swa mycel hond & brad his heafod gehrine in ðæm dæle, þe
þæt sar & seo adl on wæs, & mid þære ilcan gehrinenesse
ealne þone dæl his lichoman, ðær he mid þære adle gehefigod
wæs, on styccemælum fleondum þæm sare & æfterfylgendre
hælo geondgoten wæs.
 32.380.16. Ða ðis ðus geworden wæs, sona ðæs ðe he
onwoc, ða aras he hal & gesund.
 32.380.17. Ond he for his hælo eft Dryhtne þonc secgende
wæs & þæm halgan were his fultomes gyfe; & he ðæt eac
swylce þæm broðrum cyðde & sægde, hwæt ymb hine gedon
wæs; & hie in þæm ealle blissedon & gefegon.
 32.380.20. & he æfter ðære ðreaunge ðe
geclænsodra to his ðegnunge eft hwerf, þe he ær wel &
bighydiglice heold & bigeode.
 32.380.23. Swylce eac ða gegyrelan & ða hrægl, ðam
ðe Gode ðone gehalgodan lichoman Cuðberhtes oðþe ær lifes ende
oþþe æfter forðferedne gyredon, ða eac swylce from hælo gyfe ne
adweledon, swa swa in ðære bec his lifes & his mægena gemet swa
hwylc swa hy rædeð & leornað.
 33.380.28. Nis ðæt eac swylce to forswugienne, ðætte nu
ær þrim gearum þurh his reliquias geworden wæs, & me nu neowan
þurh ðone sylfan broðor gecuðode, in ðæm þe hit geworden
wæs.
 33.380.30. Wæs ðis gedon in ðæm mynstre, þe big Docore
ðære ea getimbred is, & from ðære ea noman onfeng, ðam mynstre
ða in abbodes onwalde fore wæs Swiðbyrht, se wæs æfest wer.
 33.382.3. Wæs in ðæm mynstre sum geong monn, ðam unwlitig
swylce & atolic his eagan breg wyrde & wemde.
 33.382.4. & se dæghwamlice wæs weaxende, & ðæs
eagan forwyrde tobeotode.
 33.382.5. Teoleden his læcas & ðone swylce mid sealfum
& mid beþinge geðwænan woldon; ac hie ne mehton.
 33.382.7. Sume lærdon ðæt hine mon aweg acurfe; sume
þæt beweredon for maran frecennesse.
 33.382.8. Mid þy ða se foresprecena broðor langere tide
ðyllic ungescræpo woon, ne ða tobeotiendan frecernesse ðam eagum
mannes hond gehælan mihte ac a dæghwæmlice wæs wyrse & wyrse,
ða gelamp him semninga mid gife þære godcundan arfæstnesse þurh
reliquias ðæs halgan fæder Cuðbryhtes gehæledne beon.
 33.382.14. Forðon ða þa broðor his lichoman æfter
manegum gearum his bebyrgednesse ungewemmedne & ungebrosnodne gemetton,
þa genamon hi sumne dæl his feaxes him to reliquium, þæt hie mihton
heora biddendum freondum syllan, oþþe æteawan in tacon ðæs
wundres.
 33.382.18. Ðyssa reliquia dæl in ða tid mid him hæfde sum
mæssepreost þæs ilcan mynstres, ðæs noma wæs ðrydred, se
æfter wæs ðæs ilcan mynstres abbod.
 33.382.20. Ða wæs he sume dæg in ða cyrican gongende
& ða cyste ontynde þara reliquia, þæt he heora sumne dæl his
biddendum freonde sealde, þa gelomp þæt se ilca geonga, se ðe on his
eagan untrum wæs, þa in ðære ilcan cyrican wæs ondweard.
 33.382.24. Mid þy he ða se mæssepreost ðone dæl, þe
he wolde, his freonde sealde, ða sealde he þæt oðer þam geongan men;
heht þæt he in heora stowe hie gesette & gedyde.
 33.382.26. Ða he ða þæm feaxe onfeng þæs halgan
heafdes, ða wæs he mid halwendre onbryrdnesse manod, ðæt he togesette
þam untruman brege; & sum fæc ðone ungeþwæran swyle mid þyde
& þwænde.
 33.382.29. Þa he ðæt gedon hæfde, þa sette he þa
reliquias/ in heora cyste, swa he haten wæs, ond gelefde þæt his eage
for ðy fexe þæs Godes weres, þæm he hrinen wæs, hraðe
gehæled wære.
 33.382.32. Ne hine owiht his geleafa wægde.
 33.382.32. Wæs ða seo æftere tid dæges, swa he sylf
sægde, ða he þæt dyde; ond þa dyde forð þone dæg, ðæt
he don ær ðohte.
 33.384.1. Ða hit wæs foreweard middæg ðæs seolfan
dæges, þa semnunga gehran he his eagan; þa gemette he hit swa hal &
swa gesund mid þy brege swa him næfre ænig swyle oþþe unwlitegnes
ne æteaude.

Bede 5
B9.6.7.
Bede, History of the English Church and Nation, Book 5 and Genealogy: Miller 1890-98, 384-488.



 1.384.5. Þa æfterfylgde ðæm Drihtnes were Cuðberhte in
bigonge ðæs ancorlifes, ða he dyde in Farne ðæm ealonde ær
tiidum his bisscophaades, se aarwyrða wer aeðelwald, se monigum gearum
ær in ðæm mynstre, ðe cweden is Inhrypum, ða onfongnan ðegnunge
mæssepreosthades æfter wyrðum dædum ðæm hade gehaalgade.
 1.384.9. Ðæs godes monnes geearnung oððo his liif, hwelc
were, cuðlicor ascineð, gif ic aan his wundor asecgo, ðæt me an ðara
broðra sægde, fore ðæm & in ðæm ðe hit gefremed wæs,
ðæt wæs Cuðfrið se aarwyrða Cristes ðeow & mæssepreost,
se ec swelce æfter ðon ðæm broðrum ðære ilcan cirican
Liidisfearona eae, in ðære he afeded wæs, in onwalde abbuddoomes fore
wæs.
 1.384.16. Cwæð he: Ic cwoom mid tuæm oðrum broðrum to
Farne ðæm ealonde.
 1.384.17. Wolde ic specan mid þone arwyrðan fæder
Aeðelwald.
 1.384.18. Mid þy ic ða wæs mid his gesprece wel geroeted
& me bletsonge bæd & we haam hwurfon, ða we ða wæron on midre
ðære sæ, ða wæs somninga hiofones smyltnes tosliten, ðære
ðe we ær lioðon uut; ond swæ micel winter us onhreas & swæ
roeðe storm cuom, ðæt we ne mid segle ne mid rownesse owiht fromgan
meahton, ne we us nohtes elles wendon næmne deaðes seolfes.
 1.384.23. Mid ðy we ða swiðe longe wið ðæm winde &
wið ðæm sae holonga compadon & wunnun, ða æt nestan locadon we
on bæcling, hwæðer woen ware, ðæt we ænige ðinga furðum
ðæt ealond gesecan meahton, ðæt we ær ut of gongende wæron.
 1.386.1. Caerde we usic ðider we cærde, gemaetton we usic
æghwonon geliice storme foresette & foretynde & nænig hyht haelo
in us to lafe stondan.
 1.386.3. Ða wæs æfter longum fæce ðæt we us se
gesihð feorr upp ahofon, ða gesegon we in Farne ðæm ealonde Gode
ðone leofan fæder Aeðelwald of his deagolnissum utgongende, þæt he
wolde userne siðfæt sceawian & geseon hwæt us gelumpe; forþon he
gehyrde þæt gebrec þara storma & þæs weallendes sæs.
 1.386.8. Mid þy he þa us eac sceawode & geseah in gewinne
& in ormodnesse gesette beon, ða begde he his cneo to Fæder usses
Dryhtnes Hælendes Cristes, ond was gebiddende fore usse hælo, & for
ussum life.
 1.386.11. Ond mid ðy he ða ðæt gebed gefylde, he þa
somod ætgædre ge þone aðundnan sae gesmylte ge ðone storm gestilde,
to þon ðætte þurh all sio roeðnis ðæs stormes wæs blinnende
& gesyndge windas ðurh ðone smyltestan sae usic æt londe gebrohte.
 1.386.14. Mid ðy we ða upp cuomon to londe & user scip ec
swelce from ðæm yðum up abæron, ða sona se ilca storm eft hwearf
& cwom, se ðe for ussum intingan medmicel fæc gestilde, ond ealne
þone dæg swiðe micel & strong wæs, þætte men sweotolice
ongeaton meahton, þætte se medmicla fyrst þære stilnesse, þe
ðær becwom, to benum þæs Godes weres for intingan usse hælo
heofonlice forgifen wæs.
 1.386.21. Wunade þes ylca Godes wer in Farne þam ealonde twelf
winter & þær forðferde; ac in Lindesfarena ea bi þæra
foresprecenra biscopa liicum in Sancte Petres cyrican þæs apostoles
bibyrged is.
 1.386.24. Wæron þas þing gedon in Aldfriðes tidum þæs
cyninges, se ðe æfter his breðer Ecgfriðe Norþanhymbra þeode anes
wonþe twentig wintra in cynedom fore wæs.
 2.386.27. In ðæs cyninges rice forewordum forðferde Eata
biscop, ond ða Iohannes se halga wer onfoeng biscophad ðaere ciricean æt
Heagostealdes eae.
 2.386.29. Bi ðæm biscope gewuniað secgean monig wundor
gæstlicra mægna, ða ðe hine hiowesclice cuðon, & eallra
swiþust se arwyrða wer & se soðfæsta Berhthun, se wæs his
diacon, & eft wæs abbud ðæs mynstres, ðæt is geceged In Dera
Wuda.
 2.388.1. Ðuhte us gerisne, ðæt we ða wundur sumu in
ðysse baec gemyndgode.
 2.388.3. Sindon sumu deagol wiic mid walle & mid barwe
ymbsealde, noht feorr from ðære ciricean Heagostealdes eae, ðæt is,
huhuego in oðerre halfre mile faece; floweð Tiine seo ea betwihn.
 2.388.5. Habbað ða wiic gebaedhus & ciricean Sancte
Michaheles ðæs heahengles, in ðæm se Godes wer oft mid feaum
broðrum his geferum stille wunude to biganne his leornunge & halig
gebedu, ond swiðust in ða tiid ðæs feowertiglican fæstenes ær
Eastrum.
 2.388.9. Mid ðy he ða sumre tiide in foreword Eastorfæsten
ðider cuom to wunienne, ða heht he his geferan, ðæt hio sohton sumne
earmne ðearfan, se ðe wære micelre untrumnisse & woedelnisse
hefigad, ðæt hie meahton in ðæm dagum mid him habban & mid him
ælmesse doan.
 2.388.13. Forðon his gewuna wæs, ðæt he symle swæ
dyde.
 2.388.14. Ða wæs in sumum tune noht feorr sum ging ðearfa,
se wæs ge dumb ge hreof, se wæs ðæm biscope cuð, forðon he oft
ær for hine cuom & his ælmessan feng.
 2.388.17. Se næfre ænig word gecweðan meahte: ah swæ
micle hreofle & scyrf in his heafde hæfde, ðæt him næfre
nænig feax in ðæm uferan daele ðæs heafdes acenned beon meahte, ah
in ymbhwyrfte stodon ongrislico her.
 2.388.20. Ða bebead se biscop ðeosne to him lædan, & in
his cafortune heht him medmicel hus gewyrcan, ðæt he inwunian meahte &
his dæghwæmlice onleofne onfoan.
 2.388.22. Mid ðy hit ða an wiice ðæs fæstnes gefylled
wæs, ða wæs ðy æfterran Dryhtenlican dæge, ðæt he heht
ðone ðearfan ingongan.
 2.388.24. Ða he ða inne wæs ða heht he his tungan
forðdoon of his muðe & him heawan: genom hine ða bi his cinne &
mid tacne ðære halgan rode hio gesegnade.
 2.388.27. Ða he ða hio gesegnad hæfde, ða heht he tion eft
in muð, & heht hine spreocan; & ðus cwæð: Cweð hwelc hwugu
word; cweð nu gee.
 2.388.29. Ða sona instæpe was se bend onlesed his tungan,
& he cuæð ðæt he haten wæs.
 2.388.30. Toætecte se biscop & hine heht steafa naman
cweoðan.
 2.388.31. Cweð nu a.
 2.388.31. Cweð he a.
 2.388.31. Cwæð nu b.
 2.388.31. Cwæð he ðæt.
 2.388.32. Mid ðy he ðurh syndrige noman ðeara stafa æfter
ðæm biscope cuæð, þa heht he se biscop him syllabas & word
forecweðan, & in eallum he him gerisenlice ondsweorude.
 2.388.34. Ða bebead he þæt him mon lengran cwidas biforan
cwæde.
 2.390.1. & he symle gedæftlice æfter cwæð: &
ofer þæt ealle ðy dæge ne ablan & þære æfterfylgendan
nihte, ða hwile ðe he wacian meahte swa swa ða sægdon ða ðer
onwearde wæron þæt he a hwæthwugu spræce & oðrum mannum
æteaude ða deagolnisse his willan & his geðohta, þæt he
næfre ærþon gedon meahte; on gelicnisse þæs monnes, þe longe
halt wæs & swa geboren of his modor hrife, þæt hiene his eldran
beran scoldan & he gan ne meahte.
 2.390.8. Þa gehældan hiene ða apostole Petrus &
Iohannes, cwið seo boc, þæt he up astode & ongunne hliapettan, &
mid þæm apostolum in ðæt temple eode & aa wæs gongende &
hleapende & Dryhten herigende.
 2.390.11. Wæs he gefeonde, swa hit nænig wundor is, þære
ðenunge his fota, ðara ðe he swa micelre tide benumen wæs.
 2.390.13. Ða wæs he se bisscop eefengefeonde his hælo:
& bebead his læce, þæt he scolde ec swelce hælan & lecnian
þa hreofle his heafdes.
 2.390.14. & he swa dyde; & wæs gefultumad mid ðæs
bisscopes blætsunge & gebedum, þæt se gunga wæs geworden hale
lichoman & fægre onseone & georowyrde in gespræce, & hæfde
crispe loccas fægre, se ðe ær wæs unwlitig, þearfa, & hreof
& dumb.
 2.390.18. Ond he wæs blissiende be ðære onfongnan gesynto
his; ond eac swylce se bisscop him forgeaf þæt he moste in his geferscipe
wunian, gif him ðæt leofre wære, ah he ða ma geceas ðæt he
wæs eft ham hweorfende.
 3.390.22. Sægde se ilca Berhthun oðer wundor be ðæm
forespræcenan bisscope.
 3.390.23. Ða se arwyrða wer Wilferð biscop æfter longum
wræce wæs eft onfongen on his biscuphad ðære cirican Heagostaldes
æ, ond þæs ilca Iohannes, ða Bosa bisscop forðfoered wæs, se
wæs micelre halignisse & eadmodnisse mon, for hiene geseted
Eoforwicceastre, þa cwom he sumre tide to sumum nunmynstre, þæt is
genemned Weatadun, þæm ða Hereburh abbuddisse in aldordome fore wæs.
 3.390.30. Mid ði we ða þider cuoman, cwæð se Beorhthun,
& mid micle gefean ealra we onfongne wæron, sægde us seo abbuddisse,
þæt sumu fæmne of ðara nunnena rime, seo wæs hiere licumlic
dohtor, mid hefigre adle gestonden wære.
 3.392.2. Sægde þæt hiere niowan blod læten wære in
earme, & in ðære blodlæswe þæt hio wære mid untrymnisse
gestonden; ond seo sona wære to ðon swiðe weaxende & hefigende
þæt se earm wæs in micelne swile gecerred & to ðon swiðe
aswollen , þæt hiene monna nan mid twam handum ymbspannan ne meahte; &
þæt hio wære on bedde licgende, & hiere mon feores ne wende.
 3.392.8. Bæd heo forðon sio abbuddisse ðone biscop, þæt
he hine to ðon geeaðmodde, þæt he in to hiere geeode & heo
geblætsode; cwæð, þæt heo gelefde þæt hiere sona wel wære
æfter his blætsunge.
 3.392.10. Ða frægn he se bisscop hwonne hiere blodlæs os
ærest wære.
 3.392.11. Ða he ða ongeat, þæt hit wæs on feowernihtne
monan gedon, cwæð he: Swiðe unwislice & ungelæredlice ge dedon,
þæt ge scoldon on feowernihtne monan blod lætan.
 3.392.14. Forðon ic gemon, þæt ðære eadigan gemynde
Theodor ercebiscop cwæð, þæt ðære tide blodlæs eow wære
swiðe frecenlic, þonne ðæs monan leoht & sæs flod in weaxnesse
bið.
 3.392.17. Ah hwæt mæg ic nu ðære fæmnan don, gif hio
æt forðfore is?
 3.392.18. & hio hwædre geornlice hiene bæd & halsode
for hiere dohter, forðon hio hie swiðe lufode, & mynte heo for hiere to
abbuddissan gesettan.
 3.392.20. Þa æt nihstan geðafode se biscop, þæt he to
þæm untruman men geeode.
 3.392.22. Þa he ineode to ðære fæmnan, þe ðær
læg, þa genom he me mid hiene.
 3.392.23. Wæs mid micle sare getogen, swa ic ær sæde,
& se earm wæs swa swiðe great & aswollen, to ðon þæt he
nænge begnisse in þæm elmbogan hæfde.
 3.392.25. Ða gestod he se biscop æt hiere & orationem
gecwæð ofer hiere & geblætsode & gesægnode & wæs
utgongende.
 3.392.27. Mid ðy we ða gelimplicre tide æt beorde sæton
& æt swæsendum, þa com sum þara hina, cleopode me & het utgan
& cwæð: Cwænburh bideð wæs þæt þære fæmnan noma
þæt ðu hraðe eft to hie eode.
 3.392.30. Mid ðy ic ðæt dyde & wæs ingongende, þa
gemette ic heo glade ondwleotan & hale & gesunde.
 3.392.31. & mid ðy ic ða æt hiere gesæt, cwæð
heo: Wilt ðu, wit unc abidde ondrincan.
 3.392.32. Cwæð ic: Ic wille, & me leof is, gif ðu
mæge.
 3.392.33. Þa bær unc mon lið forð, & wið butu
druncon.
 3.394.1. Ða ongon heo me sæcgan, & cwæð: Sona
þæs ðe se biscop orationem ofer me arædde & me geblætsode
& gesægnode & utgongende wæs, sona ic wæs wyrpende & me
wel wæs.
 3.394.3. & ðeah ðe ic nu gena þa ærran mægen ne
hæbbe, hwæðre eall ðæt sar & se ece ge of minum earme,
þær he hattra & beornendra wæs, ge of eallum minum lichoman eall
onwæg alæded wæs, efne swa se biscop ðone ece & þæt sar mid
hiene ut bære.
 3.394.7. Ond þeah ðe se swile ðæs earmes nu gena gesene
sie, hwæðre þæt sar is eall of gewiten.
 3.394.8. Ða we ðonon ferdon, þa wæs sona se swile
gesweðrad, & seo fæmne hal & gesund & from deaðe genered.
 3.394.10. & hio ðæs ðryhtne Hælende lof & wuldor
sægde ætgædere mid þæm oðrum Godes þeowum þe ðær
wæron.
 4.394.13. Oðer wundor noht ungelic þissum be ðæm
foresprecenan biscope sægde se ilca abbud & ðus cwæð: Wæs
sumes gesiðes tun, se wæs Puh haten, noht feor ussum mynstre, þæt is,
hugu on twegra mila fæce.
 4.394.16. Þæs wif wæs huru feowertig daga mid grimre adle
gestonden, swa ðæt heo þreom wicum fullum ne meahte uute cuman of
ðæm huse ðe heo on læg.
 4.394.18. Ða gelomp in ða ilcan tid, þæt se Godes wer
wæs ðyder gelaðod circan to halgianne from ðæm ilcan gesiðe.
 4.394.19. Þa seo circe gehalgad wæs, & he mæssan
gesungen/ hæfde, ða bæd se gesið hiene, ðæt he eode in his hus
& ðær mete þege.
 4.394.21. Wiðsoc se biscop & cwæð þæt his mynster
neah wære, þæt he scolde þyder feran.
 4.394.23. Þa ætfealh se gesið geornlice his benum, gehet
þæt he wolde þearfum ælmessan sellan & his fæsten aliesan,
þæt hiene geeadmedde þæt he in his hus eode & mete þigde.
 4.394.25. Bæd ic eac ætgædre mid hiene, & eac swylce
mec gehet wedlum ælmessan sellan, þa unc getigðade & in þes
gesiðes hus ineode, & ðæt geblætsade & swæsendo þege.
 4.394.28. Mid þy wit ðæt þa lete & uneðelice
þurhtugon, þæt he ðæs geðafa bion wolde, þa eodon we into
swæsendum.
 4.396.1. Þa sende se biscop ðæm wife, ðe þær untrum
læg sumne dæl þæs haligwætres, ðe he to ðære circan
gehalgode þurh ænne þara broðra, ðe mid mec ðyder coman, &
bebead þæt he hiere sealde ðæt wæter to bergenne, & swa
hwær swa hiere mæst þearf & sar & ece wære, þæt hio mid
þy wætre þwoge.
 4.396.5. Þa ðæt swa gedon wæs, ða sona instæpe aras
ðæt wif hal & gesund: & nales ðæt an þæt hio þære
