longan untrymnisse beswicade, ah swylce eac ða forlorenan mægen somod
fullice onfeng; & ineode & ðæm biscupe bær drincan & us
eallum þegnode, & scencte, oðþæt ða gereorde gefylled wæs.
 4.396.9. Wæs heo onhyrgende þa swægre Sanctus Petrus
þæs apostoles, mid ðy heo wæs swenced mid hæto & mid bryne
fæferadle, þæt hio to hrinenisse þære Dryhtenlican honda somod
onfæng hælo & mægen & aras & ðæm Hælende
þegnade.
 5.396.14. Æft oðre tide wæs se biscop gelaðod sumes
gesiðes circan to halgianne, se wæs haten Addi.
 5.396.15. Mid þy he ða abedenan þenunga gefylled hæfde,
þa bæd se gesið hiene, þæt he eode in to anum his geferena, se
wæs mid þa grimmestan untrymnisse hefigad & ðrycced, swa ðæt he
wæs loma & ealra his lioma þegnunga benumen & bescired, &
monnum gesewen wæs þæt he æt forðfore wære.
 5.396.19. Wæs him eac þurh gegearwad & geworht, in
ðære he forðfered bebyrged beon scolde.
 5.396.21. Toæteacte eac swelce se gesið his benum, þæt he
his tearas geat & weop & geornlice bæd & halsade, þæt he to
ðæm untruman men ineode & him fore gebæde.
 5.396.23. & sægde þæt him leof wære & his lif
niedbehæfdlic: & cwæð þæt he gelefde, gif he his honda hiene
on sette & hiene blætsian wolde, þæt him sona wel wære.
 5.396.26. Ða eode se bisscop ðyder in to him & hiene neah
forðfore geseah, & ða men ealle unrote ða þe him æt wæron,
& ða þruh him biggesette, in ðære he to bebyrgenne geseted beon
scolde.
 5.396.28. Þa sang he orationes ofer hiene & hiene
geblætsade & gesægnade.
 5.396.29. & ða ut he gan wolde, ða cwæð he þæt
gewunelice word þæra frefrendra: Truma þec hræðe & wel.
 5.396.31. Þa wæs æfter þissum þa hio æt beode
sæton & æt swæsendum, ða sende se untruma man to his hlaforde
bæd þæt he him onsende wines ondrincan: cwæð þæt hiene
þyrste/.
 5.398.2. Þa wæs he swiðe gefeonde þæt he drincan
meahte: sende him glæsfulne wines, & þæt se biscop geblætsade.
 5.398.3. Sona swa he hit gedruncen hæfde, swa aras he instepe
& þære ealdan untrumnesse getrumad wæs, & hiene gegyrede mid
his hrægle & ut þonan eode.
 5.398.6. & he eode in to þam biscope & hiene grette &
þa ymbsittend, & cwæð þæt hine lyste mid him etan &
drincan.
 5.398.8. Hehton hiene sittan mid him to swæsendum, & swiðe
gefeonde wæron be his gesynto & hælo.
 5.398.9. Sæt he & swæsendo þeah & dronc &
blissede mid him; & monig gear æfter þissum lifde, & in ðære
ilcan hælo awunode, þe he onfæng.
 5.398.11. Þis wundor se gemyndgeda abud sægde ðæt hit ne
wære him ondweardum þus geworden, ah ðætte þa hit him sægden,
ða þe ðær ondwearde wæron.
 6.398.14. Nis ðæt wundor to forswugianne, þæt Herebald se
Cristes þeow sægde from him ge ðæt eac swylce geworden beon in him
selfum.
 6.398.16. Wæs he ða in his gefærscipe drohtigende, &
eft wæs abbud in ðæm mynstre æt ðæm gemyndum Tune streames.
 6.398.17. Cwæð he: ðæs biscopes lif, swa swiðe swa
monnum riht is to eahtienne, þæt ic ondweard gearwe cuðe, ðurh eall ic
gemette biscobwyrðe beon: ge eac swylce hwelcre gearnunge he hæfd wære
mid ðone inlican gewitan, ge in mongum oðrum ge swiðust in me seolfum,
ic wæs ongeotende.
 6.398.22. Forðon þe he mæc, þæs ðe ic cweðe, from
deaðes þirscwalde wæs acegende, & mec to lifes wege mid his gebede
& blætsunge gelædde.
 6.398.25. Wæs ic in ða ærestan tid minre geoguðhadnisse
in his geferscipe drohtigende & him befæsted wæs, to ðon þæt
ic scolde æghwæðer ge sang ge bec leornian; ac ða gena ic ne wæs
min mod fulfremedlice bewergende þæm geoguðlicum unalefednessum.
 6.398.28. Gelomp sume dæge, ða we ferende wæron mid hiene,
ðæt we becoman on smeðne feld & rumne; & wæs gescrope
ærneweg.
 6.398.30. Þa ongunnan ða geongan biddan þone bisscop, þa
ðe mid hiene wæron & swiðust læde, þæt he him alefde
þæt hio ærnan moste & gecunnian, hwelc heora swiftost hors
hæfde.
 6.400.3. Ða wiðsoc he se bisscop ærest & cwæð,
þæt ðæt idel & unnyt wære, þæt hio bædon &
wilnedon.
 6.400.4. Ac ða æt nihstan mid anmode willan monigra þæt
he wæs oferswiðed.
 6.400.6. Cwæð he: Doð swa gif ge willen: ond hwæðre
þæt Herebald allinga hiene from ðæm geflite ahebbe.
 6.400.7. Þa abæd ic geornlice & halsede, þætte me
wære eac lefnes sald to ærnenne & to flitenne mid him; forðon ic
getreowde minum horse wel, þæm betstan þæt me bisscop salde.
 6.400.10. Ond þeah ðe ic georne bæde, ne meahte nænge
þinga lefnesse abiddan.
 6.400.11. Mid ðy ic ða gelomlice hider & ðyder mec
hwerfde & se bisscop mec a beheold, þa geærndon hio sume ðrage,
& eft hwurfon.
 6.400.13. & ic wæs mid gæglisce mode oferswiðed,
þæt ic me ne meahte bewergan, þeah ðe mec se biscop bewerede, ac ic me
to ðam plegan gemængde, & ongon somod ærnan mid him.
 6.400.17. Mid ðy ic ðæt dyde, þa geherde ic þone bisscop
me on bæclinge mid geomrunge cweoðan: Eala; hwæt ðu me micel yfel
& lað dest mid þinre ærninge.
 6.400.19. & ic ða word geherde, & nohte ðon ær
þære ærninge blon.
 6.400.20. Ne wæs ða ælden; mid þy þæt hors swiðust
orn & onælþ hiene, wæs þæt hit sume sloh on þæm wæge
mid swiðþran ræse oferhleop & oferstælde.
 6.400.22. Þa wearð me slide & him of afeol, & ic sona
wæs aswolten, & min gewit & ealle mine styrenesse forleas.
 6.400.24. Wæs in ðære ilcan stowe sum stan ðære
eorðan gelic mid ðinre tyrf bewrigen, & nænig oðer stan in eallum
þam felde gemeted beon meahte.
 6.400.26. Þa gelomp mid þa godcundan foreseonnesse þære
synne to witnunge minre unhersumnesse; ða ic hreowsende wæs, ða ic mid
ðy heafde & mid honda com on ðone stan dryfan.
 6.400.28. & se ðuma gebrocen wæs, & eac swylce seo
geðeodnes þæs heafdes tobrocen wæs & tolesed; & swa swa ic
cwæð, þæt ic wæs deadum gelic & nan lim onstyrgan meahte.
 6.400.31. Ða slogan heo geteld ofer me in ðæm ic læg.
 6.402.1. Wæs hit huhugu seo seofoðe tid dæges, ðæt is
an tid ofer midne dæg: from ðære tide oð æfen ic stille læg
& swa dead wunode.
 6.402.3. Þa hit æfen wæs, ða acwicode ic hwon & mine
geferan mec ham bæran; & ic swigende ealle ða niht awunode, &
blode spaw, forðon mine innoðas in ðæm fylle tolocene wæran.
 6.402.6. & se biscop hefiglice sargade be ðæm fille &
be minre forwyrde; forðon þe he mec mid syndrigre lufan lufode; ne he wolde
ðære nihte æfter his ðeawe mid his geferum wunian: ac he ana in
gebedum stod, & ða niht ealle wacade.
 6.402.9. Ic wænu þæt he wære bensiende ða uplican
arfæstnisse minra gesynta.
 6.402.10. & sona in ærmorgen eode inn to me; & song
orationem ofer me & næmde mec mine noman.
 6.402.12. Þa wæs ic sona swa ic of hefgum slæpe aweht
wære.
 6.402.13. Ða fregn he mec, hwæðer ic wiste hwa ðæt
wære se ðe to mec spræcende wæs.
 6.402.14. Ða ontynde ic mine eagan, locode on hiene, &
cwæð: Ic wat geare þæt ðu eart min se leofesta biscop.
 6.402.15. Cwæð he: ðynceð þe?
 6.402.16. Mæge ðu lyfgan?
 6.402.16. Cwæð ic: Ic mæg þurh eower gebeodu, gif Dryhten
wile.
 6.402.17. Þa sette he his hond on min heafod & mæc
sægnade & blædsade & hwearf eft to his gebede; & æfter
medmiclum fæce niosode he min eft & cunnade.
 6.402.19. Ða gemette he mec sittende, & ic spræcan
meahte.
 6.402.20. Þa ongan he mec acsian & frinan, hwæðer ic
wiste hwæðer ic on riht butan incan gefulwad wære.
 6.402.22. Wæs he mid ða godcundan inbrydnesse monad, swa
ðæt sona æfter gecyðed wæs.
 6.402.23. Ondswarode ic him & cwæð, þæt ic butan
twion wiste mid fulwihte bæðe in synna forlætnesse aðwegen beon;
& þæs mæssepreostes noman him næmde, from ðæm ic wiste
þæt ic gefulwad wæs.
 6.402.26. Cwæð he se biscop: Gif ðu from þissum
mæssepreoste gefulwad wære, þonne ne eart ðu fullfremedlice no on
riht gefullwad.
 6.402.28. Forðon ic hiene cuðe, þa he to mæssepreoste
gehalgad wæs, & he næfre fram ungleawnesse & for his
unscearpnisse ða ðenunge to cristienne oðþe to fullwienne on riht
geleornian meahte.
 6.402.31. Ond ic him forðon ða ðenunge forbead, forðon he
rihtlice gefyllan ne meahte.
 6.402.32. Ða he ðis cwæð, sona in ða ilcan tid ða
cristnade he mæc.
 6.402.33. Ða wæs geworden, þæs ðe he on minre ondwlitan
bleow, ða sona instepe gefelde ic mec batiende & werpende.
 6.404.1. Ða heht he læce to him & him bebead, þæt he
þa tolesdan geðiodnesse minre heafudwunde gesette & awriðe.
 6.404.3. Ond sona þæs ðe ic his blætsunge hæfde, ða
getrumede ic mec & gestrongad wæs, swa þæt ic on morgen hleop on
min hors & ferde mid hiene in oðre stowe to oðrum ham.
 6.404.6. & æfter medmiclum fæce, ðæs ðe ic fullice
gehæled wæs, ðæt ic eac swylce mid ða liffestan, yðe, þæt
is mid fulwihte bæðe, rihtlice þurhgoten & gefulwad wæs.
 6.404.9. Wunode þes Godes wer in biscophade ðreo & <foreign>XXX</foreign>
wintra, & swa wæs astigende to ðam heofonlican rice, & wæs
bebyrged in Sanctæ Petrus portice in his mynstre, þæt is cweden In
Deora wuda.
 6.404.12. Forðon þa he for maran ældo ðone biscophad
ðægnian ne meahte, ða gehadede mon in biscophade Wilfrið his
mæssepreost in Eoforwicceastre; ond he gewat to ðam forespræcenan
mynstre, & ðær his lif in Gode mid wyrðre drohtunge gefylde.
 7.404.16. Þa wæs ðy þriddan geare Aldfriðes rices
ðæs cyninges, þæt Ceadwala Wesseaxna cyning, mid ðy ðe he his
ðeode twa gear fromlice in cynedome fore wæs, ða he forlet ðæt
eorðlice rice for Dryhtne & for ðam ecan rice in heofonum & to Rome
com, & him syndriglice wilnade þæt wuldor begitan, þæt he æt
stowe þara apostola mid ða wællan fullwihte bæðes aðwegen
wære, in ðam anum he geleornode monna cynne ingong geopenian ðæs
heofonlican lifes.
 7.404.22. Ond swylc eac he wæs gehihtende, þæt he, sona
þæs ðe hiene mon gefullwade, his lichoman tolesed wære & clæne
to ðam ecan gefean ferde heofona rices wuldres.
 7.404.25. Ond æghwæðer ðara, swa swa he on his mode
foresette, ðurh Dryhtnes fultum gefylled wæs.
 7.404.26. Forðon he ðyder becom & fram Sirige þæm
papan gefulwad wæs ðy halgan dæge þæs Easterlecan
ræstedæges; & under crisman wæs sona adle stonden, & ðy
twelftan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Maiarum</foreign>, þæt he wæs fram lichoman alesed
& forðferde, & wæs geðeoded to ðara eadigra rice in heofonum.
 7.404.31. Swylc him eac in ða tid fulwihtes se gemyndega papa
Petrus to naman scop, þæt he þæm eadigestan aldre þara apostola, to
ðæs þam halgestan lichoman he mid arfæstan lufan feorran fram
eorðan gemærum com, eac swylce his noman gemanan geðeoded wære.
 7.406.4. Ond he wæs on his circan bebyrged: & se papa heht
gewrit on his byrgenne awritan, ðæt in ðam æghwæðer ge seo
gemynd his wilsumnisse ðurh ealle woruld fæste awunode, ge eac swylce ða
men, ðe þæt gewrit ræddan oðþe geherde, se bysen his dæde to
æfestnesse geliese onbærnde.
 7.406.9. Þa Ceadweala to Rome gewat, ða fæng æfter him
Ine to Wesseaxna rice, se wæs eac of ðære cynelican strynde.
 7.406.10. & mid þy he seofon & <foreign>XXX</foreign> wintra rice hæfde
ðære ðiode, þæt he eac swylce þæt rice forleart & his
gingrum bebead, & to þære eadigra apostola stowe ferende wæs.
 7.406.13. Ða wæs Gregorius papa haten in ða tid.
 7.406.13. Wilnade he in neawiste ðara haligra stowe to tide
elðiodgian on eorðan, þæt he ðy cuðlicor fram ðam halgan
geearnade in heofonum onfongen beon.
 7.406.16. Þæt ðyssum ylcum tidum monige of Ongelcynne
æðele ge unæðele, lædde bescorene, wæpned & wif geflitlice
dedon.
 8.406.18. Þa wæs ðy nehstan geare, æfter ðam ðe
Ceadwala æt Rome forðfered wæs, þætte ðære eadgan gemynde
þeodor ercebiscop ald & dagena full forðfered wæs, þæt is þa
he hæfde eahta & hundeahtatig wintra.
 8.406.21. Ðone seolfan riim wintra hiene hæbbende beon, he oft
ær his monnum foresægde, ðæt he mid onwrignisse his swæfnes
ongete.
 8.406.23. Wunode he on biscophade tu & <foreign>XX</foreign> wintra, &
wæs bebyrged on Sanctæ Petrus cirican, in ðære alra ðara biscopa
lichoman Contwara burge gesette seondon.
 8.406.25. Bi ðam ætgædre mid þæm ilcum efenhletum his
hades rihtlice & soðlice mæg cweðan, þæt heora lichoman in
sibbe bebyrgde siondon, & hiora noma leofað wide ferh in ecnesse.
 8.406.27. Ond ðæt ic hrædlice cweoðe, þæt in ða
tid his biscophada swa micel fromung ongon beon in Ongelcynnes cirican swa
næfre ær ðon beon meahte.
 8.408.1. Þa feng æfter Theodore Berhtwold to ðam
bisscophade, se wæs abbud in ðæm mynstre ðe Reaculfe is nemned.
 8.408.2. Wæs se wer in wisdome gewrito wæl gelæred, ge eac
somod in ciriclicum ðiodscipum & in mynsterlicum healice intimbred,
ðeah ðe he no sie his foregengan to wiðmeotene.
 8.408.5. Wæs he gecoren in biscophade ðy ærestan dæge
Iulius monðes; wæran ða Wihtred & Swefheard cyningas on Cænt.
 8.408.7. Wæs he gehalgad ðy æftran geare ðy ðriddan
dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Iuliarum</foreign> wæs se Dryhtenlica dæg from Godwine
aldorbisscope Gallia rices.
 8.408.9. Ond he set on his setle on Cænt ærran dæge
<foreign>Kalendarum Septembrium</foreign> ðy Dryhtenlican dæge.
 8.408.10. Se betwih monge bisscopas ða he gehalgade, eac swilce,
ða Gefmund ðære circan bisscop æt Hrofeceastre forðferde, &
Tobiam for hiene gehalgade; se wer wæs on Lædenesc gereorde & in
Grecis & in Englisc micellice intimbred & well gelæred.
 9.408.15. Þære tide se arwyrþa Cristes ðeow & saceard
Ecbriht se halga, ðone ðe we ær beforan sægdon, þæt he in
Ibernia þæm londe in elðiodignisse lifde for ðæm ecan eðle in
heofonum to betanne, foresette he & ðohte on his mode, þæt he wolde
monigum brycsian, þæt is ðæt he wolde ðæt apostolice wiorc
onhyrgan, sumum ðara ðeoda Godes word & godspell læran & bodigan
þæm ðe hit ða get ne geherdan.
 9.408.21. Ðara cynna monig he wiste in Germanie wesan, þonon
Ongle & Seaxan cumene wæron, ðe nu Breotene eardiað.
 9.408.23. Wæran Fresan, Rugine, Dæne, Huna, Aldseaxan,
Boructuare.
 9.408.24. Wæron eac oðer folc monig in ðæm ilcum
dælum, ða gena æðenum þeawum þeogende, to ðæm se
forespræcana Cristes cæmpa ymbliðendre Breotene utan cuman wolde, gif
wen wære þæt he ðær hwelce meahte diofle oðgripan & to
Criste gecerran; oðþe gif ðæt beon ne meahte, þurh ðæt he wolde
Rome gesecan, & ða halgan stowe þara eadigra apostola & cristes
martyra geseon & him ðær gebedigan.
 9.410.1. Ac him ða upplican onwrigenesse & weorc somod
wiðstodon, þæt no hwæðer ðissa gefremedæ ne ðurhteah.
 9.410.3. Ða gecas him geferan, ða þe æghwæðer ge on
hiora dædum ge on gelærednesse frome & scearpe wæron Godes word to
bodienne & to lærenne, & ealle ða ðing gearwade ða ðe
scipliðendum nedþearflicu gesewen wæron, þa com sume dæge on
ærmorgen to him an ðara broðra, se wæs iu on Breotene Bosles discipul
& ðegn Gode þæs leofan sacerdes, mid ðy he ða se ilca Bosel
wæs regolweard in ðæm mynstre in Mailros, under Eatan, þem abbude,
suæ sue we beforan sægdon.
 9.410.10. Sægde him his gesihðe, sio him on ðere ilcan nihte
æteaude; cuæð he: Mid þy we gefylled haefdon userne uhtsong & ure
gebedo, & ic mine limo on beddstowe strehte & me liht slep oferorn,
þa æteaude me min giu magister & festerfæder min se leofesta Bosel
& mec frægn, hwæðer ic hine ongeotan meahte.
 9.410.14. Gea, cweð ic, þu eart min Bosel.
 9.410.15. Cueað he to þon: Ic com hider, þæt ic scealde
Drihtnes Helendes ærende Ecgbrihte bringan, ðæt þu hweðere
scealt him sæcgan & gecyþan.
 9.410.17. Sage him forsoð, ðæt he ne mæg þone
siðfæt gefyllan, þe he gemynted hæfð; forþon þe Godes willa is
ðæt he fere to Columban mynstre to læranne.
 9.410.19. Wæs se Columba se æresta laruw ðæs cristinan
geleafan in þæm morlondum, ða ðe siondan to norðdæle Peohta
rices.
 9.410.21. & he ærest getimbrede & gestaðolede þæt
mynster, þe in Hi ðem ealonde monigum folcum Pehta & Scotta longe
aarwyrðe awunede.
 9.410.23. Wæs þæt se ilca Columba, þe Scottas siððan
Columcille nemdon.
 9.410.24. Ða æcgbriht geherde ða word þære gesihðe,
ða bebead he þæm breðer ðæt he nængum mæn ne sægde þa
gesihðe: cwæð þæt hit eaðe mehte beon, ðæt hit þurh
biosmrunge eteawed wære.
 9.410.27. Hweðre he þa wisan swigende sceawede & ondred
ðæt hit soð wære; ne he ohte ðy mae blann from gearwunge þæs
siðfætes, þe he feran wolde þeode to læranne.
 9.410.29. & æfter feaum dagum eft com se foresprecena
broðor to him & him segde, þætte ðære ilcan nihte him Bosel
þurh gesihðe ætæawde æfter ðan þe uhtsang wæs gefylled,
& him cuede to: Forhwon segdes ðu æcgbrihte swa gemeleaslice & swa
wlæclice þa ðing, ðe ic bebead him to secganne.
 9.412.1. Ah gong nu & saga him; swa he welle swa he ne wille,
he sceal to Columban mynstre cuman, forðan þe hiora sylh unrihte gongað;
ah he ða sceal to rihtre stige geteon.
 9.412.4. Þa he þas word geherde, þa bebead he eft þæm
breðer, þæt he nænigum menn ma openade ne ne cydde.
 9.412.5. & þeh ðe he gewiss geworden wære þurh ða
ætewnesse þære gesihðe, nohte þon læs he his fore gegearwede mid
ðæm gemyndgadum broðrum.
 9.412.7. Mid þy heo ða þæt scip gehlested hefdan mid
þæm þingum, þe swa miceles siðfetes need abædde, & monige
dagas windes & gewidera beodan, ða wæs sumre neahte geworden swa grim
storm & swa reðe, þætte of micelum dæle þa ðing to lose
wurdan, þe in ðæm scipe wæran, & þæt scip forleort betihn
þa yða in siðian licgende.
 9.412.13. Þa oncneow se Godes monn ðæt he faran ne moste,
& cuæð: Ic wat þætte þæs storm for me is cumen & sended
wæs.
 9.412.15. & he hine ofteah þære fore & unrot ham
ferde.
 9.412.16. & he hweðre, an his geferana, wæs Wihtbriht
haten, se wæs middangeard forhycgende, & he wæs on wiisdome codcundre
lare mære, & monig gear he in Hibernia ellþeodig ancorliif dede in
micelre fullfremednesse ða astag he in scip, & com in Fresena land; &
twa gear singal þær þeode & Rædbedde hiora cyninge hælo word
& codcundre lare bodade & lærde.
 9.412.21. Ne he hwæðre ænigne wæstem swa miceles
gewinnes mid þam ellreordigum gemetan mehte.
 9.412.23. Ða hwearf he eft to ðære leofan stowe his
ellðeodinesse, & in ðære gewunelican stillnesse Drihtne lifde.
 9.412.25. & forðon þe he ðæm utlican to geleafan
brytian ne mehte, he ða his geferum ma of his mægna spedum & bisenum
byrtian gemde.
 10.412.28. Ða ðæt se Godes wer Ecgbrihte geseah, ðæt he
ne wæs forlæten, þeodum godcunde lare to bodienne, ah þæt he
wæs hæfd fore oðre nyttenesse þære halgan cirican, bi ðære he
foremanad wæs mid godcundre onwrignesse, ne ðætte Wihtbriht owiht
fremede, þeh ðe he in ða dælas become, ða ongann he þa gena in
ðæt wærc godcundre laare saendan halige weoras & geornfulle
tuelfe, þara aldormon wæs Willbrord micelre geearnunge mæssepreost.
 10.414.4. Mid ðy hio ða þider coman on land, ða cerdan hio
ærest to Pipine Froncana cyninge & ðoncweorðlice wæran from him
onfengene.
 10.414.7. Ond forðan he niwan geeode þa fyrran Fresan, &
þonon Ræbed ðone cyning adraf, sende hio ða þider, þæt hio
scoldan þær Godes word bodian & læran.
 10.414.9. & he ec swylce hio wæs gefultumiende mid his
cynelicre aldorlicnesse, ðæt him mon noht hefiges ne laðes gedon
dorste, & mid monigum fremsumnessum þa geweorðade, þa ðe Cristes
geleafan onfon woldon.
 10.414.12. Ðonon wæs geworden þurh Drihtnes gife &
fultum, þæt hio monige hrædlice from deofolgeldum to Cristes geleafan
gecerdan.
 11.414.15. Ðeossa bisene wæran fylgende sume tuegen
messepreostas of Ongolcynne, þa in Hibernia þem ealonde micelre tiide for
hiofana riices lufan in ellðeodinesse liifdan.
 11.414.17. Cuomon hio to Ealdseaxna mægðe, gif wen wære
þæt hi þær ænige þurh heora lare CristeN begytan mihte.
 11.414.19. Wæran hie begn ane naman nemned, swa hio ec swylce
anre willsumnesse wæran.
 11.414.20. Wæs hiora æghweðer Heawald nemned.
 11.414.21. Wæs ðis tosceaden hweðre, þætte for hiora
missenlice feaxes hiwe oðer wæs cueden se blaca Heawald, oðer se hwita
Heawald.
 11.414.23. Wæs hiara oeghweðer æwfestlice gelæred;
wæs se blaca Heawald hweðere mae in wisdom haligra gewrita getyd.
 11.414.26. Þa hio ða in Ealdseaxe cuomon, þa eodon hio in
sumes tungerefan giæstern, & hine bædon þætte hio onsende to
ðæm aldormen þe ofer hine wæs; segdon þæt hio hefdon nyt
ærende & nyttne intigan sumne, þe hio him lædan scoldan.
 11.416.2. Forðon hio ða ilcan Ealdseaxan næfdan agene
cyning; ah monige aldormenn wæran þeode forsette.
 11.416.4. Ond þonne sio tiid gewinnes & gefeohtes, cuomon
ðonne hio mid tanum to ðam ealdormannum, & swa hwylcne hiora swa him se
tan æteawde, þonne gecuran hio ðone him to heretogan & to lattowe,
& ðone fylgdan & him herdon.
 11.416.8. Ðonne ðæt fyht & þæt gewinn geenddad
wæs, þonne weran hie eft efnrice, wæran ealdormenn.
 11.416.9. Þa onfoeng hio se tungerefa & him wæs gehatende,
ðæt he hio wolde to his aldormen onsendan, swa swa hio bædan; & he
hio þa hwylce hugu dagas mid hine geæfde.
 11.416.12. Mid þy hio ða ða ellreordigan ongeotan ðæt
hio wæran oðere aefestnesse, forðon hio simle hiora salmas sungan &
in halgum gebedum Gode þeoddon, dæghwemlice Gode asægdnesse beran,
& mæssan sungan hæfdan hio mid him gehalgude fatu, & gehalgadne
tabul on wigbedes gewrixle ða wæran þa hæðnan betwih him
þehtiende & sprecende: gif hio to ðem ealdormen bicuomen & mid hine
sprecende wæran, ðæt hio hine from hiora godum acerden, & to
ðære niowan aæ þæs Cristes geleafan gehwerfde; swa sticcemælum
all hiora mægðe neded wære, þæt hio hiora ald bigong forleorte
& þæt niowe beode.
 11.416.21. Genaman ða semniga þa Godes menn & ofslogan;
þone hwitan Heawold hio hreðe mid sweorde ofslogan; þone blacan Heawald
hio longe cuelmdon & þurh limo witnadon.
 11.416.24. Þa hio ða ofslægene weran, þa wurpan hio hiora
lichaman uut in Riine þa eae.
 11.416.25. Ða þæt ða geherde se ealdormon, hu hie gedon
ymbe þa menn haefdan, ða ðe gesion & sæcgan waldon, þa wæs he
swiðe eorre; sende þa weord þider & heht ðone tunscipe ealne
ofslean, & þone tun forbernan.
 11.416.28. Weran þrowiende þa forsprecenan Cristes þeowas
& messepreostas þy fiftan dege Nonarum Octobrium.
 11.416.30. Ne hiora martirhada won weran heofonlico wundor.
 11.416.31. Forðon þa hio ofslægne weran, & hiora
lichaman from þem hæðnum, swa swa we ær cuædan, in ða ea worpene
weran, ða gelomp hit þæt ða licoman ongen þam ræse ðes
forðgeotendan streames geborene weran þurh all feowertig mila oð ða
stowe, þe hiora cuðe menn & hiora geferan on weran.
 11.418.3. Swylce ec se mæsta scima hiofonlices leohtes ufan
egwylcre nihte ofer þa stowe scan, þer þæt gelomp þet þa lichoman
cuomon; & þæt ec swylce ða hæðnan gesegon & beheoldon, þa
ðe hio slogon.
 11.418.6. Ah ða oðer þara martira in neahtlicere gesihðe
æteaude sumum hiora geferan, þæs nama wæs Tilmon.
 11.418.7. Wæs þæt meere wer & for weorulde ec swylce
aeðelre gebyrde; wæs he ærest from cyninges þægn, & þa
wæs eft munuc geworden.
 11.418.10. Wæs he him secgende, þæt he meahte hiora
lichoman in ðere stowe gemaetan, þær he gesawe þæt leoht of
hiofonum on eorðan scinan.
 11.418.12. Ðæt ec swylce gefylled wes.
 11.418.12. Ða fundan hio sona hiora lichoman & æfter
gerisenre aare martira bebyrgede wæran; & se deg hiora þrowunge ge
hiora lichoman gemetnesse mid arwyrðre weorðunge in ðem stowum mærsade
syndon.
 11.418.15. Mid ða Pippin se cyning Froncna þas ðing geherde
& geacsade, þa sende he weorod & heht hiora lichoman to him
gelædan, & hio mid micle wuldre & wyrðmyndum bebyrgan in cirican
Colone þæræ ceastre bii Rine.
 11.418.19. Is ðæt ec sæd þætte in ðere stowe, þer
hio ofslegne weran, weolle an welle, sio in þere illcan stowe oð ðisne
deg genihtsumu weter forðflowæð & geotet monnum to ðegnunge &
to are.
 12.418.22. Sona þæm erestan tidum, þes ða lareowas cuomon
in Fresena lond, & Willbrod from ðem cyninge lefnesse onfeng þæt he
ðær læran moste, þa wolde he hredlice to Rome cuman, þa wes bisscop
ðæs apostolican seðles Sergius papa, þæt he wolde mid his
læfnesse & mid his blætsunge þæt willsume weorc onginnan &
gefyllan þem ðiodum godspel to læranne.
 12.418.27. Ond somod he willnade from him onfon þera eadigra
apastola reliquias & Cristes martira, þæt mid þy he diofolgeld
towurpe & cirican timbrede & rærde in þære ðiode þe he
lærde, ðæt he ðer gearwe hefde haligra reliquias in to settenne,
& he gerisenlice meahte in ðara haligra aare syndri ge stowe gehwylce
haligra halgian, þe hiora reliquias þær in weran.
 12.420.4. Swylce ec monige oðre intingan he sohte & willnade
oððe þer leornian oððe þanon onfon.
 12.420.5. In ðem eallum mid ðy he willfegen wes gefremed, he
eft hwearf to codcundre laare.
 12.420.7. Þære tiide þa broðor, ða ðe in Fresum weran
mid hine in ðere þegnunge ðes Godes wordes, gecuron hio of hiora riime
gemetfæstne monn in his þeaum & monþuerne heortan Swiðberht,
þæt se him gehalgad were to bisscope.
 12.420.10. Sendon hine þa to Breotene & for hiora bene se
aarwyrða bisscop Willferð hine gehalgade, se wes in þa tiid of his
æðele adrifen & in Mercna lande folgade, ond forðon þe in ða
tiid Contweara nefdan bisscop.
 12.420.13. Wes Theodor bisscop forðfered, & Berhwald his
efterfylgend þa get ne cuom to his bisscopseðle, forðon he wes ofer sæ
sended to hadienne.
 12.420.15. Ða Swiðberht hefde bisscophade onfongen, þa ferde
he eft of Breotene & efter medmicelum fece he gewat to ðere þeode
Boruchtuarorum, & monige hiora þurh his lare to soðfestnesse wege
gecerde.
 12.420.18. Ah ða aefter noht longre tiide sio ilce þiod wes
oferwunnen from Ealdseaxum; & ða geleafsuman menn, þa ðe Godes worde
onfengon, weran wide todrifene.
 12.420.21. Ond se bisscop mid his geferum sumum sohte Pipiin
Froncna cyning; & him ða geerendade Bliðryð his cuen, þet he him
wunesse stowe gesealde in sumum ealonde bi Riine, þet is on hiora gereorde
geceged & nemned In Litore, in ðem he mynster getimbrede, þet nu gen
oðð þis agon his erfeweardas.
 12.420.25. & he þer sum fec in forhebbendum liife lifde &
ðer his deagas geendade.
 12.420.28. Efter ðon þe hie þa sum gear codcunde lare
lærdon in Fresena riice, þa ðe mid hine cuomon, þa sende Pipin mid
ealra hiora geþafunge þone arwyrðan wer Willbrord to Roome to Sergie
þem papan, ond bæd þæt he hine Fresna ðeode to ercebiscope
gehalgade.
 12.422.1. & he swa dyde swa he bæd.
 12.422.1. Wæs he gehadod in circan þære halgan fæmnan
& martires Sancte Cecilian þy dæge, ðe hire gemynddæg wes; &
se papa hine nemde freonaman Clemens.
 12.422.3. & sona þæs þe he gehaadad wæs, þæt is
æfter feowertene dagum, þes ðe he in Romeburh cuom, þet he hine eft
sende to his bisscopseðle.
 12.422.5. Salde him & forgeaf Piipin bisscopseðl in his
þere meran byrig, sio alde worde þere þiode is nemned Wiltaburg; Galleas
nemnað Traiectum; we cueðað ættreocum.
 12.422.8. Bi ðære se arwyrða bisscop ciirican getimbrede
& feorr & wide Godes word ymbe Cristes geleafan bodade & lærde;
& monige wes cegende from hæðnesse gedwolan hiora liifes.
 12.422.11. & he monig mynster & cirican in ðæm londe
getimbrede; ond æfter fæce monige oðre bisscopas þer gesette &
gehalgade of þara broðra riime, þa ðe mid hine oððe aæfter him
cuomon codcunde lare to bodienne; þara monige forðgeleordon in Drihten.
 12.422.15. Ah he Willbrord, þe se papa Clemens nemde, longe aeldo
& arwyrðe he hefde; six & ðritig wintra in bisscophade liifde, ond
efter monigfealdum gewinnum heofonlices comphades to meordum þes uplican
edleanes becuom to aare.
 13.422.19. Ðassum tidum gemyndelic wundar & ealdum wundrum
geliic in Breotene wæs geworden.
 13.422.20. Forðon ðe to awehtnesse lifgendra monna of saule
deaðe sum mon wes sum faec dead & eft to life lichoman aras & monig
ðing gemyndewyrðe segde, þa he geseah, þara sume we her hredlice
areccan & aasecgan & aawritan willað.
 13.422.24. Uues sum hioscipes fæder & higina aldor in
ðeodlonde Norðanhymbra, ðet is geceged In Cununingum; liifde he
aefestlice his liif mid his heorde.
 13.422.26. Ða wearð he licumlicre untrumnesse gehrinen &
gestonden; & seo deghwemlice weox, oððet he to ðem ytemestan dege
gelæded wes, & in forewearde neaht forðferde.
 13.422.28. Ah in dagunge he eft acuicode & semninga up heh
asæt; ond ealle þa ðe æt his lichoman woepende sæton mid unmæte
ege/ geslægene weron & utflugon butan his wiif an, ðe hine swiðust
lufade, sio an hinne aawunade, þeh ðe hio swiðe forht were &
beofiende.
 13.424.1. Ða frefrede he hio & cueð: Ne welle þu ðe
ondredan, forðon þe ic soðlice from deaðe aaras & eam eft
forlæten/ mid monnum liifgan, nales hweðre þy liife þe ic ær
liifde, ah swiðe ungelice of ðisse tiide me is to lifigenne.
 13.424.5. Ond ða sona aaras & eode to ðære cirican þes
tunes & oð lutterne dæg in gebede stod.
 13.424.6. Ond sona æfter þon ealle his æahte in þreo
todælde; enne dæl he his wiife sealde, oðerne his bearnum, þone
þriddan, þe him gelomp, he instepe þearrfum gedelde: & æfter
medmiclum fæce all weoruldþing forleorte & to Mailros ðem mynstre
cuoom, þet is of ðem mestan dæle mid ymbebegnesse Tuede streames
betyned.
 13.424.11. & he þer Godes þiohade & scare onfeng, &
in dygle aancorstowe eode, þe se abbud him foreseah; & þer oð
ðone dæg his deaðes in swa micelum gedrehtnessum & forhefdnessum
modes & lichoman aheardade & awunade, þette menn mehtan ongeotan,
þæt he monig ðing ge egslice ge willsumlice geseh, þe oðre meoðon,
þeh ðe sio tunge swigade, þet his liif wes sprecende.
 13.424.18. Sægde he þys gemete ðætte he geseah, &
cueð: Leohte gesihðe & onsione & berhte gegerelan wes, se ðe me
lædde.
 13.424.19. Eodon wiit suigiende, þes ðe me ðuhte & gesegn
wes, ongen norðeast rodor, swa sunnan upgong bið æt middum sumere.
 13.424.21. Mid ðy wit ða hwiile eodan, bicuomon wit to sumere
dene, sio wæs micelre brædo & deopnese & ungeaendadre længe;
wes unc on ða wynstran healfe gested.
 13.424.24. Oðer dæl wæs wallendum lægum full suiðe
egesfullice/, oðer wes nohte þon læs unaarefndlice cele hægles &
snawes.
 13.424.26. Wes gehweðer manna saula full, þa wrixendlice on tua
healfe gesegene weeran, swa swa mid unmætnesse miceles stormes, worpene
beon.
 13.424.28. Þonne hio þæt mægn þere unmetan hætton
aarefnan ne mehtan, þonne stældan heo eft earmlice in middel þæs
unmætan ciles.
 13.424.30. & mid þy heo ðær nænige reste gemetan
mihtan, þonne stældon heo eft in middan þæs byrnendan fyres &
ðæs unadwæscedan leges.
 13.424.32. Mid þy heo ða þæs ungesælgan wrixles feor
& wide, swa geseon meahton, butan fyrstmearce ænigre ræste mid þa
unriman/ mængo sweartra gasta þreste wæron, þa ongan ic þencan,
& wende þæt hit hel wære, be ðam tintregum unaræfnendlicum ic
oft sæcgan herde.
 13.426.3. Þa ondswarede he minum geðohte se min latteow, se
ðe me foreeode, & þus cwæð: Nis ðis seo hel, swa ðu talest
& wenest.
 13.426.6. Mid þy ic ða wæs mid þisse ongryslican
wæferseone swiðe gefyrhted & gebreged, þa lædde he me
styccemælum forð on fyran lond.
 13.426.8. Þa geseah ic sæmninga beforan unc onginnan
ðeostrian ða stowe & miclum þeostrum all gefylled.
 13.426.9. Mid ðy wit ða in ða þeostro ineodon, & heo
styccemælum swa micel & swa ðicco wæron, þæt ic noht geseon
meahte, nemne þæt seo ansien scan & þa hrægl leoht wæron, se
ðe mæc lædde.
 13.426.12. & mid ðy wit ða forðgongende wæron under
ðæm scuan þære ðeostran nihte, ða æteowdan sæmninga beforan
unc monige heapas sweartra lega, ða wæron up astigende swa swa of miclum
seaðe, & eft wæron fallende & gewitende in ðone ilcan seað.
 13.426.16. Mid ðy ic ða ðyder gelæded wæs, ða ne
wiste ic sæmninga hwær min latteow becom; & he mec forlet in middum
þæm þeostrum ond ðære ongrislican gesihðe.
 13.426.18. & mid ðy þa ilcan heapas þara fyra butan
blinne hwilum upp astigon in heanesse, hwilum niðer gewiton in ða niolnesse
ðæs seaðes, geseah ic & sceawade.
 13.426.21. Ealle ða heanesse þara upastigendra lega fulle
wæron monna gasta, þa on onlicnesse upastigendra yselena mid rece, hwilum
in heanesse beoð up worpene, hwilum eft togenum ðara fyra ðearsmum
wæron eft aslidene in neolnesse & in grund.
 13.426.25. Swelce eac unaræfnedlic fullness wæs mid þæs
fyres þrosme uppawallende, & ealle ða stowe ðara þiostra gefylde.
 13.426.26. Mid ðy ic ða longe þær forht stod, & me
wæs uncuð, hwæt ic dyde oðþe hwider ic eode oðþe hwelc ende me
come, ða geherde ic sæmninga micelne swæg me on bæcling unmætes
wopes & earmlices, swelce eac micel gehled & ceahetunge swa swa
ungelæredes folces & biosmriendes gehæftum heora feondum.
 13.426.31. Þa he ða se sweg me near wæs & to me becom,
þa geseah ic mænigo þara wergra gasta v manna saula grornende &
heofende teon & lædan on midde þa þeostra, & heo on ðon
swiðe blissedon & ceahheton.
 13.428.1. Þara manna sum wæs, þæs ðe ic gewiton meahte,
bescoren preost, sum wes læwde, sum wæs wifmon.
 13.428.3. Tugon heo ða wergan gastas & niðer mid geweotan
in midde ða niolnesse ðæs byrnendan leges.
 13.428.4. Mid ðy heo ða fir gewiten wæron, & ic ðone
wop þara manna & þone hleahtor þara diofla sweotolice geheran ne
meahte, hwæðre ic ðone sweg ða gena gemengedne in earum hæfde.
 13.428.7. Betwioh ðas þing ða upp comon sume ðara þiostra
gasta of ðere niolnesse, & of ðære witestowe, & mec utan
ymbsaldon.
 13.428.9. Hæfdon heo fyrene eagan & full fyr of heora muðe
& of heora nasum wæron ut blawende; ond fyrene tangan him on handa
hæfdon, & mæc nerwdon, & me tobeotedon, þæt heo mid þam
gegripan woldon, & in ða forwyrd sendan.
 13.428.12. Ond þeah ðe heo mec swa bregdan & fyrhton, ne
dorston heo mec hwæðre ongehrinan.
 13.428.15. Mid ðy ic ða wæs æghwonan mid ðam feondum
ymbsald & mid ða blindnesse þara ðeostra utan betyned, ða ahof ic
mine eagan upp & locade hider & geond, hwæðer me ænig fultum
toweard wære, ðæt ic gehæled beon meahte.
 13.428.18. Þa æteowde me æfter þæm wege, þe ic ær
com on, betwioh ða þeostra swa beorht scinende steorra.
 13.428.19. & ðæt leoht wæs weaxende mare & mare,
& hraðe to me wæs efstende; & sona ðæs ðe hit me nealehte,
ða wæron tostencte & onwæg flugon ealle ða awergdan gastas, ða
ðe me ær mid heora tangan tobeotodan.
 13.428.23. Wæs ðæt se min latteow, se ðe mec lædde.
 13.428.23. Þa cerde he ða sona on ða swiðran hond, &
mec ongon lædan suðeast on ðon roðor, swa swa on wintre sunne upp
gongeð.
 13.428.25. Þa wære wit sona of ðam þeostrum abrogdene,
& he mec lædde in fægernesse smoltes leohtes.
 13.428.27. Mid ðy he mec ða in openum leohte lædde, þa
geseah ic beforan unc þone mæstan weall, þæs længo on twa healfe
ne his heanesse ænig ende gesen wæs.
 13.428.29. Þa ongan ic wundrian, for hwon wit to þam walle
eodan, mid ðy ic on him nænige duru ne eahþyrl ne uppastignesse onhwonan
on ænge halfe geseon meahte.
 13.428.32. Mid ðy wit ða becoman to ðam walle, þa sona
instæpe, ne wat ic hwelcre endebyrdnesse, wæron wit on his heanesse on
ðam walle ufonweardum.
 13.430.2. & þa geseah ic ðær þone rumestan feld &
þone fægerestan, & se wæs eall swetnesse anre full growendra
blostmena .
 13.430.4. Ond seo wundrigende swetnesse þæs miclan swicces
sona ealle ða fullnessa þæs fullan ofnes & þæs þeostran, þe
mec ær ðurhseah, onwæg aflemde.
 13.430.6. Ond swa micel leoht & beorhtnes ealle þa stowe
geondscan, þæt he ealles dæges beorhtnisse oðþe ðære
middæglican sunnan sciman wæs beorhtre gesewen.
 13.430.8. Wæron on ðissum felda unrime gesomnunge hwitra manna
& fægra & monig seðel gefeondra wæroda & blissigendra.
 13.430.10. Mid ðy he mec ða lædde betwih midde ða
þreatas þara gesæligra woruda, þa ongan ic þencan & me huru
þuhte, þæt þær wære heofona rice, be ðam ic oft sæcgan
herde.
 13.430.13. Þa ondswarode he minum geðohte & cwæð: Nis
ðis, cwæð he, heofona rice, swa swa ðu talest & wenest.
 13.430.15. Mid ðy wit ða wæron forðgongende &
oferferdon þas wunenesse þara eadigra gasta, þa geseah ic beforan unc
micle maran gefe leohtes & beorhtnesse þonne ic ær geseah, in
ðære ic eac swylce þa swetestan stæfne geherde Godes lof singendra.
 13.430.18. Swylce eac of ðære stowe swa micel swetnes
wundorlices stænces wæs onsended, þæt sio swætnis, þe ic ær
bregde & me micel þuhte, in ða witgemetnisse þæs æfteran
leohtes & beorhtnesse wæs lytel & medmicel gesæwen.
 13.430.22. Swylce eac swelce þæt leoht & seo biorhtnes
þæs blostmiendan feldes wæs medmicel gesewen in ðære stowe
wynsumnesse.
 13.430.24. Mid ðy ic unc wende inngongende bion, þa somninga se
min latteow gestod & butan eldenne wæs eft his gong cerrende: & mec
eft lædde ðy selfan wæge, ðe wit ær coman.
 13.430.27. Mid ðy wit ða eft hwerfende becoman to ðan
bliðan wunenessum ðara hwittra gasta & fægra, cwæð he to me:
Wast ðu hwæt ðas þing ealle seon, ðe þu sceawadest & gesawa?
 13.430.29. Andswarode ic him: Nese, cwæð ic, ne wat ic heo.
 13.430.30. Cwæð he: Seo stow þær seo denu wæs ðe
þu gesawe wallende lege & strongum celum egeslice beon, þæt is seo
stow, in ðære siondon to ademanne & to clænsienne þæra manna
saula, þa ðe eldende wæran to andettenne & to betenne heora synna
& mandæda, þa hio gefremedan: & hwæðre æt nehstan in ða
seolfan tid heora deaðes to reowe geflugon, & swa of lichoman eodon.
 13.432.3. Þa hwæðre, forðon þe heo andetnesse &
hreowe in þam seolfan deaðe hæfdon, ealle in domes dæge to heofona
rice becumað; & monige eac swylce lifigendra manna bene & gebeda
& ælmesse & fæsten & ealra swiðust mæssesong
gefultumeð, þæt heo ær domes dæge generede beoð.
 13.432.7. & wite ðu þæt se legfamblawenda seað &
se fula, þone ðu gesawe, þæt wæs helle tintreges muð, in ðone
swa hwelc mon swa ænige siðe in befalleð, næfre he þonan in ecnisse
genered bið.
 13.432.10. Sio blostmberende stow þonne, in ðære þu
ðæt fægreste weorud in giogoðhadnesse gesawe scinan & wynsumian ,
þæt is seo stow, in ðære beoð onfangne soðfæstra saula, ða
þe on godum wiorcum of lichoman gongað, & hwæðre ne beoð swa
micelre fullfremednesse, þæt hio sona sion to heofona rice gelædde.
 13.432.14. Ealle ða hwæðre in domes dæge to Cristes
gesihðe & to gefean þæs heofonlican rices ingongað.
 13.432.16. Forðon swa hwelc swa in eallum worde & wiorce
& in geðohte fullfremede beoð, sona ðæs ðe of lichoman gongað,
becumað to ðam heofonlican rice.
 13.432.18. To ðæs rices nioweste belimpeð sio stow, þær
ðu þone sweg ðæs weðan songes mid ðy swicce þære swetnisse
geherdest, & þa beorhtnesse þæs miclan leohtes gesawa.
 13.432.21. Ac ðu þonne, forðon þu nu scealt eft to lichoman
hweorfan & eft betwih mannum lifgan, gif ðu ðine dæde & þeawas
& þin word in rihtnesse & in bilewitnisse geornlice haldan wilt,
þonne onfehstu æfter deaðe þa wunenesse stowe betwih ða blissiendan
weorud þara eadigra gasta, ðe ðu nu nehst gesawe & sceawadest.
 13.432.26. Ond eac wite ðu, þa ic sume tid fram ðe gewat, to
ðon ic ðæt dyde, þæt ic wolde geahsian & gewitan hwæt be
ðe beon scolde.
 13.432.28. Mid ðy he ða to me cwæð, þæt ic eft to
lichoman hweorfan scolde, þa wæs ic ðæs swiðe wundrigende &
onscuniende & me lað wæs.
 13.432.30. Forðon þe ic lustfullede þære stowe swetnesse
& wlite, ðe ic ðær geseah, & eac somod þara gemænan &
eadignesse brucan, ðe ic on ðære stowe sceawade.
 13.432.32. & ic hwæðre minne lateow ne dorste owiht
biddan.
 13.434.1. Ah nu betwihn ðas ðing, ne wat ic hwelcre
ændebyrdnisse, ic mec nu geseo betwih monnum lifigan.
 13.434.4. Ða ðing & eac oðero, ðe se Dryhtnes wer
geseah, nales eallum monnum æhwer suongrum & heora liifes ungemendum
sæcgan wolde; ah ðæm anum, ða ðe oðþe for ege tinterigo afyrhte
wæron, oðþe mid hyhte þara ecra gefeana & eadignesse lustfulledon,
þæm he wolde mid arfæstnesse lufan ða þing cyðan &
sæcgan.
 13.434.8. Wæs sum munuc & mæssepreost in nehnesse his
cetan eardigende, þæs noma wæs Hamgels, & þone hæd mid godum
dædum efenlice heold; se eft in Ibernia þæm ealonde þære ytmestan
eldo his lifes in ancorsetle mid medmicle hlafe & cealdan wætre
awreðede.
 13.434.12. Þa gelomlice wæs inngongende to ðam ilcan were
& þurh his geornfulle frygenisse fram him geherde hwilice ðing ðe he
geseah ða he wæs lichoman ongerwed.
 13.434.15. Þurh þæs onwriginesse & gesegene eac swylce
ða feoo ðe we her writon to usse cyðþe becuoman.
 13.434.16. Sægde he eac swylce his gesihðe Aldfriðe ðæm
cyninge, se wæs in halgum gebedum se gelæredesta; & he swa lustlice
& swa geornfullice wæs fram him gehered, þæt he in ðæt
gemyndgade mynster mid his bene inngedon wæs & inn munuchade bescoren.
 13.434.20. Ond þonne he se cynng in ða dælas ðæs londes
becom, þæt he gelomlice wæs to him gongende þæt he wolde his word
& his sægene geheran.
 13.434.22. In ðæm mynstre wæs in ða tid æfestes lifes
& gemetfæstes liifes abbud & mæssepreost æðelwald haten, se
efter ðon eft ðæt biscopsetl efenwyrðum dædum his hades ðære
cirican æt Lindesfearona ea sæt & heold.
 13.434.27. Onfæng he se Godes mon in ðæm ilcan mynstre
dehle stowe wunenesse, þæt he ðær meahte freolslice in singalum
gebedum his sceppende heran & ðeowigan.
 13.434.29. Ond forðon seo seolfe stow on ofer ðæs streames
wæs geseted, wæs his gewuna for ðære miclan lufan his lichoman
clænsunge, þæt he gelomlice inn ðone stream eode & ðær in
sealmsonge & in gebedum stod & fæste awunode hwilum oð midden
sidan, hwilum oð ðone sweoran; & hiene in ðæm streame sæncte
& defde, swa longe swæ he gesegen wæs þæt he aræfnan meahte.
 13.436.3. & þonne he ðonan gongende wæs to londe,
næfre he ða his wætan hræl & þa cealdan forlætan wolde,
oðþæt hio eft of his seolfes lichoman gewermedon & adrugedon.
 13.436.5. Mid ðy þe in midwintres tide, ymb hiene flowendum
þæm sticcum halfbrocenra iisa, ða he seolfa oft gebræc &
gescende, þæt he stowe hæfde in ðæm streame to standenne oðþe
hiene to bisæncenne, cwædon him men to, þa ðæt gesawon: Hwæt
þæt is wundor, broðor Dryhthelm wæs ðæt þæs weres nama
þæt ðu swa micle reðnesse celes ænge rehte aræfnan meaht:
ondswarode he bilwitlice, forðon þe he wæs bilwitre gleawnisse &
gemetfæstre gecynde mon, & cwæð: Caldran ic geseah.
 13.436.12. Ond mid ðy heo cwædon: þæt is wundor, þæt
ðu swa ræðe forhæfdnisse & swa hearde habban wilt: ondswarode he
him: Heardran & hræðþran ic geseah.
 13.436.15. & he swa oð þone dæg his gecænenisse of
middangearde mid ungeswencedlice luste heofonlicra goda þone ealdan lichoman
his betwihn dæghwæmlice fæsteno swæncte & temede; & he
monegum mannum ge in wordum ge on his lifes bisene on hælo wæs.
 14.436.20. Ongeæng þissum spelle wæs sum mon in Mercna
londe, þæs gesihðe & word, nales his drohtung & his lif, monegum
monna ne eac him seolfum brycsade.
 14.436.22. Wæs in Cænredes tidum Mærcna cynges, se
æfter æðelrede to rice fæng, sum wær inn læwdum hade; wæs
cyninges þeng.
 14.436.24. Ac swa swiðe swa he for ðære utran geornfulnesse
weoruldlicra dæda þam cynge wæs liciende, swa swiðe he for ðære
innlican gemeleasnesse Godes herenisse him seolfum mislicade.
 14.436.27. Monede se cyning hiene gelomlice, þæt he ondette
& bote & forlete his synna & mandæda, ær ðon he mid
ofercyme sæmninga deaðes ealle tid hreowe & bote forlure.
 14.436.29. Ond þeah ðe he gelomlice monad wære, hwæðre
he forhogode ða hælo word, ða þe he hiene lærde, ond hiene het
æfterfylgendre tide, þonne he eldra wære, his synna hreowe &
ondetnesse don.
 14.438.3. Þa betwih ðas ðing wæs he gehrinen &
gestonden sæmninga mid untrumnesse: & sona in bæd gefeol, &
grymme sar ongon þrowian.
 14.438.5. Þa wæs se cyng inngongende to him, forðon he hiene
swiðe lufode, trymede hiene & lærde, þæt he ða get hreowe &
ondetnesse dyde his synna, ær ðon he swulte.
 14.438.7. Ondswarode he him & ðus cwæð, þæt he ða
geta nolde his synna ondettan, ac eft, ðonne he eldra wære & of
ðære untrymnesse arisen wære, ðy læs him ætwite & on edwit
sette his geðoftan, þæt he for ege ðæs deaðes ða þing dyde,
þe he er gesund don nolde.
 14.438.11. Þuhte him seolfum & him gesegen wæs, þæt
heardlice & stronglice spræce; ah he wæs earmlice beswicen mid
deofles searwum, swa swa hit æfter gecyðed wæs.
 14.438.13. Mid ðy seo adl swiðe weox & hefegade, eft se
cyng ineode to him hiene to niosianne & to lærenne.
 14.438.15. Þa cleopode he sona earmlicre stæfne: Hwæt
woldest ðu oðþe to hwon come ðu hider?
 14.438.16. Forðon ne meaht ðu me nu ofer ðisne dæg
ænige helpe ne geoce gefremman.
 14.438.17. Cwæð he se cyng: Ne wille ðu swa sprecan; geseoh
ðæt ðu teola wite.
 14.438.19. Cwæð he; Ne wede ic: ah ða wyrrestan ingewitnesse
me ic geseo, & fore minum eagum hæbbe.
 14.438.20. Frægn se cyning hiene, hwæt ðæt wære.
 14.438.21. Cwæð he: ær hwene ðu come, eode inn on þis
hus to me twegengeonge men fægre & beorhte, & gesæton æt me,
oðer æt minum heafde, oðer æt minum fotum.
 14.438.23. Þa teah heora oðer forð fægre boc & swiðe
medmicle & me sealde to rædanne.
 14.438.24. Ða ic ða boc sceawade , þa mette ic ðær
awriten ealle ða god ða ic æfre gedyde.
 14.438.25. Ah ða wæron swiðe feawe & medmicle.
 14.438.26. Þa noman heo eft ða boc æt me & me noht to
cwædon.
 14.438.28. Þa com her sæmninga micel weorud werigra gasta,
& wæron swiðe ongrislicum heowe & ondwliotan.
 14.438.29. & ðis hus utan ymbsætan; innan of mæstan
dæle sittende gefyldon.
 14.438.30. Þa wæs heora sum þeostran onseone & þæm
oðrum egeslicran, se wæs setles eldest; & me ðuhte & gesegen
wæs, þæt he heora aldor beon scolde.
 14.438.32. Þa teah he forð boc ongryslicre gesihðe &
unmættre micelnisse & lytesne unabeorendlic byrdenne; sealde ða anum
his geferena & heht me beran to rædanne.
 14.440.2. Mid ðy ic ða þa boc rædde, ða gemette ic on
hiere sweartum stafum & atolecum sweotole awritene eall ða man ðe ic
æfre gefremede; & nales ðæt an þæt ic on weorce & on
worde, & eac hwylce þæt ic on þæm medmestan geðohte gesyngode,
ealle ða wæron ðær on awritene.
 14.440.6. & ða cwæð se aldor þara wergra gasta to
ðam fægran monnum & ðam beorhtan ðe me æt sæton: To hwon
sitton ge her?
 14.440.8. Hwæt git cuðlice witon, þæt þis is ure mon.
 14.440.9. Ondswaredon heo: Soð ge sæcgað; ah onfoð hiene
& in heapunge eowerre niðerunge gelædað.
 14.440.10. Ðy cwæde heo instæpe from minre gesihðe
geweoton.
 14.440.11. Ond þa wæron arisende twegen ðara atolra gasta;
hæfdon hondseax on heora hondum; slogon mec ða, oðer in heafod, oðer
in fet.
 14.440.13. & ða wunda nu mid micle sare tintrego togædre
swicað in ða innoðe mines lichoman; & sona ðæs ðe heo
togædre cumað, þonne swelte ic: & ða dioflu gearwe bidað, hwonne
heo mec gegrypen & to helle locum gelæde.
 14.440.17. Ða he ða se earma man þus mid ormodnisse
spræcende wæs, ða swealt he sona æfter on his synnum.
 14.440.18. Ond þa hreowe ða he to medmicelre tide mid
forgifnisse wæstme forælde doan, þa he witum underðeoded butan
wæstme in ecnesse doð.
 14.440.20. Ond þæt he cwæð, þæt he gesawe ungelice
bec him berene bion þurh ða godan gastas oðþe þurh ða galan,
forðon þæt ðurh ða uplican stihtunge Godes ælmihtiges geworden
wæs, þæt we gemunden þætte usse dæde & usse geðohtas,
nales on þiosne wind in idelnesse toflowenne, ah to dome þæs hean deman
ealle gehaldene beon, & us eft in ende æteowde beon, oðþe ðurh
ða freondlican ænglas oðþe ðurh ða feondas.
 14.440.27. Þæt he cwæð, þæt hie ærest ða
fægran boc & ða hwitan englas forðbrohton, & æfter þon
deofol þa sweartan, & hi þa englas swiðe medmicle ond þas
unmætan, þæt is to ongeotene, þæt he in ðære ærestan
ældo his lifes hwelchwugu god dede, ða he hwæðre in midfeorum life
ealle ðurh his unrihte dæde aðeostrade & fordilegade.
 14.442.1. Þær he ða wið þon ða gedwolan his cneohthade
gereccan gemde in giguðhade & ða þurh gode dæde from Godes eagum
ahwerfan, þonne meahte he ðara rime geðeoded bion, be ðam se sealmscop
cwæð: <foreign>Beati; quorum remisse sunt, et cetera.</foreign>
 14.442.5. Þa beoð eadge þe heora wonnesse forlætne beoð
& þara þe synna bewrigene beoð.
 14.442.6. Þis spell ic leornade fram Pehthelme ðæm
arwyrðan biscope, ond ic hit for þære hælo, ðe hit leornade
oðþe geherde, hluttorlice awrat & sægde.
 15.442.9. Ic seolfa cuðe sumne broðar, ðone ic wolde ðæt
ic næfre cuðe, ðæs noman ic eac swylce genemnan mæg, gif ðæt
owiht bryciæ.
 15.442.11. Wæs he geseted in æðelum mynstre, ah he
hwæðre unæðelice his lif lifde.
 15.442.12. Wæs he lomlice fram ðam broðrum þread &
ðæm ealdormonnum þære stowe; & hie hiene monedon & lærdon
þæt he his life gecerde to clænsnunge his synna.
 15.442.14. & ðeah ðe he geheran ne wolde, hwæðre he
geðyldelice wæs from him eallum aræfned for nedþearfe his utran
weorca; wæs he syndryglice in smiðcræfte wæl gelæred.
 15.442.17. Ðiode he swiðe druncennisse & mongum oðrum
unalefednessum ðæs slæcran lifes; ond he ma gewunade in his smiðþan
dæges & nihtæs sittan & licgan, þonne he wolde on cirican
syngan & gebiddan & mid ðæm oðrum broðrum lifes word &
godcunde lare geheran.
 15.442.21. Þonne him gelomp þæt sume men gewuniað
cweðan: Se ðe ne wile cirican duru wilsumlice geeadmoded ingongan, se sceal
nede in helle duru unwillsumlice geniþerad gelæded beon.
 15.442.24. Þa wæs se mon geslegen & gestonden hefigre
adle; & seo weox & hefigade, oððæt he wæs to þam ytemestan
dæge gelæded.
 15.442.25. Þa cygde he & het þa broþor him to.
 15.442.26. & he swiðe gnorniende & geniðredum gelic
ongan him secgan, þæt he gesawe helle opene & Satanan þone ealdan
feond moncynnes besencedne on þam grundum helle tintreges.
 15.442.29. & cwæð, þæt he þær eac gesawe Caiphan
þone ealdorman þara sacerda mid þam oþrum, þa þe Drihten Crist
ofslogon, bi him wrecendum ligum gesealdne beon.
 15.444.2. In þara neaweste, cwæð he, wa me earmum, ic geseo
me stowe gegearwade beon ecre forlorenesse.
 15.444.4. Þa þa broþor þis gehyrdon, þa ongunnun hi hine
geornlice trymman & læran, þæt he þa gena on lichaman geseted his
synna hreowe & andetnesse dyde.
 15.444.6. Andswarode he mid ormodnesse: Nis me nu, cwæð he,
tiid min lif to onwendanne, mid þy ic sylfa geseo minne dom gedemedne beon.
 15.444.8. Þa he þa þus spræc, þa he butan hælo
wegnyste of worulde gewat: & his lichama wæs bebyriged on þam
ytemestan stowum þæs mynstres.
 15.444.10. & nænig mon dorste for hine ne sealmas ne
mæssan singan ne furþum for hine gebiddan.
 15.444.11. Eala mid hu micle gesceade God todælde betwyh leoht
& þystro.
 15.444.12. Se æresta martyr se eadiga Stephanus, þa he wæs
deað þrowiende for soðfæstnesse, geseah he heofonas opene, geseah he
Godes wuldur & þone Hælend standende Godes on þa swiðran.
 15.444.15. & þider þe he sylfa toweard wæs æfter
deaþe, þider he his eagan sende ær his deaðe, þæt he þy
bliþelicor þrowade.
 15.444.17. & wið ðon þes smið þæs þystran modes
& dæde, þa he his deaþe nealæcte, geseah helle tintrego opene,
geseah he deofles niþrunge & his æfterfylgendra.
 15.444.20. Geseah he eac swylce his sylfes ungesælige stowe
& carcern betwyh swylce, þæt he þy earmlicor georwenedre hælo her
nu forwurde; ac lifigendum mannum, þe þas þing ongeton, he forlet hælo
intingan mid his forlorenesse.
 15.444.23. Wæs þis niwan geworden on Beornica mægþe,
& feor & wide gemæred; & he monige forð acigde butan yldincge
þæt hi heora mandæda hreowe dydon, þæt ic eac swylce wisce forð
swa on leornunge ura stafa.
 16.446.1. Ða wæs æfter seofon hund wintra & fif wintrum
æfter þære Dryhtenlican menniscnesse þæt Ealdfrið Norþanhymbra
cyning forðferde ymb twentig wintra his rices, butan an ne wæs þa gena
gefylled.
 16.446.4. Feng to his rice Osred his sunu; wæs eahtawintre
cniht, & þæt rice he hæfde endleofan winter.
 16.446.5. On þysses cyninges rice forweardum forðferde Hædde
Westseaxna bysceop & to þam heofonlican life ferde.
 16.446.7. Wæs he god se wer & rihtwis; & þæt
bysceoplice lif ge lare ma beeode on lufan gastlicra mægena þonne he on
leornunge gelæred wære.
 16.446.9. Be þam bysceope oft gewunelice sæde Pehthelm se
arwyrða bysceop, se mid Ealdhelme his æfterfylgende micle tid þa gena
munuc & diacon wæs, þæt on þære stowe, þe se bysceop
forðfered wæs, fore geearnunge his halignesse monig wundurhælo gefremed
wæron.
 16.446.13. Ond þære mægðe men gewunelice þa moldan
namon for adlum & untrumnessum & on wæter sendon; & mid
byrinesse oððe strægdnesse þæs wæteres monigum untrumum ge
monnum ge neatum to hælo gelomp.
 16.446.16. & for þære gelomlican onwegalædnesse
þære halgan moldan þæt þær wæs micel seað geworden.
 16.446.17. Þa he þa forðfered wæs, þa wæs se
bysceopdom þare mægðe on twa bisceopscire todæled.
 16.446.19. Oþer wæs seald Daniele, þa he gen to dæge
receð, oðer Ealdhelme, þære he feower ger fromlice fore wæs.
 16.446.20. Wæron hi begen on ciriclicum wisum ge on wisdome
haligra gewrita genihtsumlice gelæred.
 16.446.22. Þæt is to tacne, þæt Ealdhelm, mid þy he
þa gena wæs mæssepreost & abbud þæs mynstres þe hi nemnað
Maldulfes burgh, awrat he æþele boc his þeode mid sinoþes bebode wið
Brytta gedwolan, þa hi rihte Eastran ne weorþedon on heora tide, ge eac
oþer monig, þa þe hi þære cyriclican clænnesse & sibbe
wiðerword dydon.
 16.448.1. & he monige þara Brytta þe Westsexum
underðeodde wæron to rihtre weorþunge þære Dryhtenlican Eastrana
mid þa leornunge þyssa boca geteah & gelædde.
 16.448.3. Wrat he eac heah boc & weorðlice <foreign>de uirginitate</foreign>,
& þa on bysene Sedulius twifealde weorce meterfersum asang & geradre
spræce gesette.
 16.448.5. Wrat he eac swylce moni oþer gewrito.
 16.448.6. Wæs he se wer æghwonan se gelæredesta; wæs he
ge on wordum hluttor & scinende ge eac on gelærednesse gewrito ge freora
ge cyriclicra to wundrienne.
 16.448.8. Þa he þa forðferde, þa onfeng fore hine þone
bysceophad Forðhere, se gen oð to dæge, cwæð se writere, lifigende
is.
 16.448.10. Wæs se mon eac on halgum gewritum wel gelæred.
 16.448.11. Þyssum monnum þone bysceophad þeniendum wæs on
seonoþe geseted & gedemed, þæt Suðseaxna mægð sceolde habban
agenne bysceop & bysceopsetl on heora leodum.
 16.448.14. Belumpun hi ær to Wintanceastre bysceopscire,
þære þe Daniel se bysceop fore wæs.
 16.448.15. Þa wæs him to bysceope ærest gehalgad Eadbyrht,
se wæs abbud þæs mynstres þære eadigan gemynde Willfriðes
bysceopes, þæt is nemned Selesea.
 16.448.17. Þa se forðferde, þa feng to þære
bysceopþenunge Eolla: & he þa æfter unmanegum gearum of þyssum
leohte alæded wæs.
 16.448.19. & se bysceophad þær syððan fela gear blon.
 17.448.21. Wæs þy feorðan geare Osredes rices þæt
Cenred, se Myrcna rice æþelice sume tide fore wæs, & micle
æþelicor þæt anweald þæs rices forlet.
 17.448.23. Forþon he com to Rome, & þær scire onfeng
& munuc wæs geworden on Constantines tidum þæs papan; & æt
þara apostola stowe on gebedum & on fæstenum & on ælmesdædum
awunade oð ðone ytemestan dæg.
 17.448.26. Þa feng æfter him to Myrcna rice Ceollred
æþelredes sunu, se ær þam Cynrede þæt ylce rice hæfde.
 17.448.28. Com eac swylce mid hine to Rome Sigeheres sunu
Eastseaxna cyninges, þæs we beforan gemyngedon, þæs nama wæs
Offa.
 17.450.2. Wæs he on iuguþe mon willsumlicre yldo &
fægernesse, & ealre his þeode leof heora rice to habbanne & to
healdenne.
 17.450.3. Wæs he gelicre willsumnesse modes Cenrede þam
cyninge: forlet he his wif & land & magas & eþel for Cristes
lufan & for his godspelle, þæt he on þyssum life
hundteontigfealdlice mede onfenge & on þære toweardan weorolde ecce
lif.
 17.450.7. & he, sona þæs þe he to Rome com to þam
halgum stowum, scyre onfeng, & on munuchade his lif wæs endiende, &
to gesyhþe þara eadigra apostola on heofonum becom, þa he lange mid his
mode sohte & willnade.
 17.450.11. Þa þy ylcan gere, þe þas cyningas Breotone
forletan, se heah bysceop & se halga Willfrið æfter fif &
feowertigum wintra þæs onfongenan bysceophades þone ytemestan dæg
tynde & forðferde on þære mægþe, seo is gecyged Inundalum.
 17.450.14. & his lichama wæs on cyste gedon & wæs
gelæded norð ofer gemære on his mynster, þe is cweden Onhripum, &
æfter gerisenre are swa mycelum bysceope on Sancte Petres cyricean þæs
apostoles wæs bebyriged.
 17.450.18. Be þysses bysceopes lifes stealle foreweardum we
sculon feaum wordum gemyngian, þa þe be him gedon wæron.
 17.450.19. Mid þy he wæs godre gleaunesse cniht & he þa
yldo mid þeawum oferstigende, & he swa gemetfæstlice & swa
ymbsceawiendlice hine sylfne on eallum þingum beheold, þæt he be
gewyrhtum fram his ealdormannum wæs lufad & arweorðad, swa swa an of
him sylfum.
 17.450.23. Þa he geweaxen wæs & hæfde feowertyne
winter, þa he mynsterlif þam woruldlife forbær & gelufade.
 17.450.25. Þæs þe he þæt þa his fæder sæde,
forþon his moder ær forðferde, he þa lustlice his willan & his
heofonlicum lustum geþafade & gefultumade & hine het & lærde,
þæt he þam halwendan ongynnessum georne gefeole.
 17.450.28. Þa com he hraþe to Lindesfarena ea, & hine
sylfne þær on þeowdom gesealde þara muneca.
 17.450.30. & he geornlice þa ongan leornian & don þa
þe he ongeat þætte belumpun to þære mynsterlican clænsunge &
arfæstnesse; & forþon þe he wæs scearpre gleaunesse, he
hrædlice his sealmas geleornade & eac fela oþra boca.
 17.452.3. Ne wæs he hwæþere þa gena bescoren, ac
hwæþere he þam, þa þe on scire maran wæron, on þam mægenum
eaðmodnesse & hyrsumnesse nohte þon læssa ne gneðra wæs.
 17.452.6. Forþon he ge fram þam witum ge fram his efenealdum
mid rihtre lufan lufad wæs.
 17.452.7. Mid þy he þa sum ger on þam mynstre Gode þeowode,
þa onget he se giunga sticcemælum gleawes modes, þæt þæt ne
wæs fullfremed weg gastlicra mægena, þe him fram Scottum sæd &
seald wæs.
 17.452.10. Þohte þa & foresette on his mode þæt he
wolde cuman to Rome & þær geseon, hwylce cyriclice þeawas oððe
mynsterþeawas æt þam apostolican setle healdene wæron.
 17.452.13. Mid þy he þa þam broþrum þæt sæde, þa
heredon hi his gemynd & his foresetenesse & hine sponon &
lærdon, þæt he þa fore þurhtuge, þe he on his mode gelufad
hæfde.
 17.452.15. & he hraþe com to Eanflæde þære cwene,
forþon he wæs hire cuð & mid hire geþeahte & fultume on
þæt foresprecene mynster gedon & geþeoded wæs.
 17.452.18. Sægde hire þa his lust & willan, þæt his
lufu wære, þæt he þa stowe neosode & gesohte þara eadigra
apostola.
 17.452.19. Wæs heo seo cwen sona lustfulliende þære godan
foresetenesse & willan þæs iungan.
 17.452.21. Sende him þa to Cent to Ercenbyrhte þam cyninge, se
wæs hyre eames sunu; bæd þæt he hine arwurðlice to Rome onsende.
 17.452.23. Þære tide þær on Cent heold Honorius þone
arcebysceophad, se wæs an of discipulum þæs eadigan papan Sancte
Gregorii.
 17.452.24. Wæs se wer on cyrclicum wisum healice ontimbred &
gelæred.
 17.452.25. Mid þy he þa se iunga sum fæc þær wuniende
wæs mid hine, he þa cwices modes geornlice leornade þa þing, þe he
þær geseah & sceawode.
 17.452.28. Com þider eac swylce on þa sylfan tid oþer iung
man: wæs his nama Bysceop, & his freo nama Benedictus; wæs he of
æþelre strynde Angellþeode: þæs we beforan gemyngodon.
 17.452.30. Wolde he eac swylce Rome gesecean.
 17.452.31. Þysses monnes geferscype se cyning þa Willfrið
geþeodde & him bebead, þæt he hine to Rome gelædde.
 17.454.1. Mid þy hi þa to Lugdunum coman, þa wæs
Willfrið þær gehæfd fram Dalfino þære ceastre bysceope:
Benedictus þone ongunnenan siðfæt framlice to Rome geferde.
 17.454.4. Þa ongan se bysceop lustfullian þæs iungan snytro
& his wislicra worda & his anwlitan fægernesse & glædnesse
his dæda & gestæðþinesse his geþohta.
 17.454.6. & he him forðon eall þa þingc genihtsumlice
geaf & sealde, þe he þearfe hæfde mid his geferum, swa lange swa hi
mid him wæron: & him eac swylce gebead, þæt he him wolde syllan to
healdanne & to reccanne mycelne dæl Gallia rices, & him wolde his
broðor dohtor fæmnan to wife gesyllan, & hine symble on bearnlufan
habban wolde.
 17.454.11. Þa þancode he him geornlice þære
ærfæstnesse, þe he him forgifen hæfde, mid þy he ællþeodig
wæs: & him andswarode, þæt he oðer lif ma cure & lufade
þonne þæt woruldlif, & he forþon his eþelturf forlet & to
Rome feran ongunne.
 17.454.15. Þa he þa se bysceop þæt gehyrde, þa sende he
hine mid laðteowe to Rome & hine þider wel gescyrpte : & hine het,
þonne he eft to his eðle hweorfan wolde, þæt he to him come þæt
he hine well ham gescyrpte.
 17.454.18. Þa com he to Rome, & þær in gebedum & on
smeaunge cyriclicra wisena, swa swa he on his mode foresette, mid
dæghwamlicre geornfullnesse þeowiende wæs, becom he to freondscipe
þæs halgan weres & þæs gelæredestan Bonefatius archidiacones,
se wæs eac swylce wita & geþeahtere þæs apostolican papan.
 17.454.23. Þæs lareowdome he of endebyrdnesse geleornade
feower Cristes bec & getæl rihtra Eastrena & monig oþre, þa þe
belumpon to cyrclicum þeodscypum, þe he on his eþle leornian ne mihte.
 17.454.26. & se ylca magister him æghwæþer ge bec
sealde ge lare.
 17.454.27. & mid þy he þa fela monþa þær
gesæligum geslesum geornlice abysegad wæs, þa hwearf he eft on Gallia
rice to Dalfino þam bysceope his freonde, & þreo winter wæs mid him
wuniende.
 17.454.30. & he wæs to preoste besceoren fram him, & on
swa micelre lufan hæfd wæs, þæt he þohte hine him to yrfewearde
gedon.
 17.456.2. Ac þæt hwæþere swa wesan ne mihte, forðon se
bysceop wæs forgripen mid wællhreowe deaðe, & Willfrið wæs ma
gehealden Angelþeode to bysceope.
 17.456.4. Sende Balthild seo cwen mycel weorod, & het þone
bysceop ofslean.
 17.456.5. Þa he þa to þære stowe læded wæs, þær
him mon sceolde heafud ofslean, þa fyligde hine Wilfrið his preost &
his hondþeng.
 17.456.7. & he willnade ætgædere mid him sweltan, þeah
þe se bysceop him þæt swiðe bewerede.
 17.456.8. Ac þæs þe þa cwelleras hine þa elþeodigne
ongeaton, & þæt he of Engle cumen wæs, aredon him þa & ne
woldon hine cwellan mid þy bysscope, þeah þe þæt his willa wære.
 17.456.12. & he þa eft on Breotone com & hine geþeodde
on freondscype Ealhfriðes þæs cyninges.
 17.456.13. Se cyning geleornade þæt he symble rihte regolas
Godes cyricean fyligde & lufade.
 17.456.14. & forþon þe he hine Wilfrið rihtgefremedne
& wisne onfunde & gemette, geaf he him sona & sealde tyn hiwisca
landes on þære stowe, þe cweden is Stanford.
 17.456.17. & æfter medmiclum fæce sealde him mynster
þritiges hiwisca on stowe, seo is gecyged Inhripum.
 17.456.18. Þa stowe he ær sealde mynster on to timbrienne
þam monnum, þa þe to Scotta lare fyligdon.
 17.456.20. Ac forþon þe hi æfter fæce, þa him wiisc
seald wæs, ma woldon of þære stowe gewitan, þonne hi woldan rihte
Eastran healdan, & eac oþre regollice ðeawas onfon æfter gewunan
þære Romaniscan cyricean & þare apostolican, & forþon he þa
stowe þam sealde, þone þe he geseah beteran þeodscypum & þeawum
gelæredne.
 17.456.25. On þa tid to hæse þæs foresprecenan cyninges
wæs willfrið to mæssepreoste gehalgad on ðam ylcan mynstre fram
ægelbyrhte Westseaxna bysceope, þæs we beforan gemyngedon.
 17.456.28. Willnade he se cyning þæt se wer swa micelre
gelærednesse & æfestnesse him syndrilice untodælede geferscype
mæssepreost & lareow wære.
 17.456.30. Þone he eft nalæs æfter miclum fæce sende on
Gallia rice mid geþohte & geþafunge Oswioes his fæder; bæd
þæt hine mon him to byscope gehalgade, mid þy he þa hæfde þritig
wintra.
 17.458.4. Wæs se ylca ægelbyrht on þa tid Parisiace
þære ceastre bysceop.
 17.458.5. Mid þone wæron cumende oþre endlufon bysceopas he
wes twelfta to his halgunge; & hi swiðe arwyrðlice þa þenunge
gefyldon.
 17.458.7. Mid þy he þa gena wæs begeondan sæ wuniende,
het Oswio se cynincg gehalgian to bysceope on Eoforwicceastre Ceaddan þone
halgan wer, swa swa we beforan gemyngedon.
 17.458.9. & he þreo winter healice þa cyricean wæs
reccende & styrende; æfter þon he gewat to his mynsterscire, þæt
is on Læstinga ea.
 17.458.11. Ða feng Willfrið to bysceopscire eallra
Norþanhymbra mægþe: & he æfter þon on Ecgfriðes rice þæs
cyninges wæs adrifen of his bysceopscire, & oðre bysceopas fore him
gehalgade, þara we beforan gemyngedon.
 17.458.15. Þa wæs he to Rome ferende & beforan þam
apostolican papan his intingan wæs reccende.
 17.458.16. Sona þæs þe he on scyp eode & astagh, bleow
westwind: & he wæs adrifen þæt he com up on Frysana land.
 17.458.18. & he arwyrðlice wæs onfangen fram þam
ællreordum & fram Ealdgylse heora cyninge.
 17.458.19. Bodade he him sona & lærde Cristes geleafan &
monig þusendo heora mid soðfæstnesse worde wæs ontimbrende, & hi
fram unsyfernessum heora synna aðwoh mid fullwihte bæþe.
 17.458.22. & þæt æfter fæce Willbrord se arwyrða
Cristes bysceop on micelre willsumnesse gefylde, he ærest ongan þæt
weorc Cristes godspell læran.
 17.458.24. & he þær þone winter mid þy niwan folce
þe he gestrynde, gesælilice & wel wunade; & swa his siðfæt
trymede & to Rome com.
 17.458.26. & þæs þe his intinga wæs geondsohte
beforan Agathone þam papan & manegum byscopum, & ealra heora dome he
unscyldig & butan leahtrum wæs clæne gemeted þara þinga, þe
hine mon forewregde & onstælde; & þæt he wære his
bisceophade wel wyrðe.
 17.460.1. On þa sylfan tid se ylca papa pa Agatthon gesomnade
sinoð on Rome byrig fif & hund twelftig byssceopa wið þam
gedwolmannum, þa ðe bodedon & lærdon ænne willan & ane
wyrcnesse beon on Dryhtne Hælende.
 17.460.4. Ða het he se papa eac Willfrið bysceop to þam
sinoþe laþian; & him mon tæhte setl betwyh oðre bysceopas, &
het secgan his geleafan & somod þæs ealandes & þære þeode,
ðe he of com.
 17.460.7. Mid þy he wæs rihtgelyfed on geleafan mid his
geferum gemeted, þa licade ðis betwih oþre dæde þæs ylcan
sinoþes þæt hi on heora sinoðgewrit ongeþeoddon, & þus writon
betwyh him: Wilfrið Gode se leofa bysceop Eoforwicceastre þæt apostolice
setl be his intingan wæs gesecende, & fram þære apostolican mihte
be cuþum & uncuþum þingum wæs onlysed: & mid oþrum fif &
hund twelftigum his efenbysceopum on sinoþe on domsetle sittende wæs:
& for eallum norðdæle Breotone & Hibernia þam ealande, þa fram
Angellðeodum & Brytta & Scotta & Pehta wæron begongne, soðne
geleafan & rihtgelyfedne wæs andettende, & mid his handgewrite
getrymede.
 17.460.18. Æfter þyssum he hwearf eft to Breotone, &
Suðseaxna mægðe fram deofolgylda þeawum to Cristes geleafan gecyrde;
& eac swylce Godes wordes þegnas sende on Wyht þæt ealond.
 17.460.20. & þy æftran geare Ealdfriðes rices þæs
cyninges, se æfter Ecgfriðe to rice feng, his bysceopsettle onfeng: &
hine Eadlfrið se cyning togelaþade.
 17.460.23. Æfter fif gearum eft he wæs oncunnen fram þam
ylcan cyninge & monigum bysceopum; & eft of his bysceopscire adrifen
wæs, & to Rome com; & him wæs lyfnes seald þæt he him moste
scyldan & besecgan on andweardnesse his gesacona.
 17.460.26. Wæron þær monige bysceopas sittende mid Iohannem
þone apostolican papan, & eallra heora dome wæs cyþed, þæt his
wregend & his gesacan on miclum dæle licettunge & lease wið hine
syredon & onsægdon.
 17.460.29. & ða heht se foresprecena papa ærendgewrit
writan to æþelrede & to Ealdfriðe Ongelcyningum, & þær on
bead þæt hi æninga gedyden, þæt Willfrið wære onfongen on his
bysceopscire: forþon þe he hire unrihtlice benumen wære.
 17.462.1. Mid þy he þa wæs eft hweorfende to Breotone, &
he becom on dælas Gallia rices, þa wæs he gehrinen & gestonden
semninga mid untrymnesse.
 17.462.3. & seo to þon swiðe weox & hefegade, þæt
he æt nyhstan ne gan ne on horse ridan mihte; ac on his þegna handum
þæt he bære boren wæs, & swa gelæded wæs on Midd an Gallia
ceastre.
 17.462.6. & he þær læg <foreign>IIII</foreign> dagas & <foreign>IIII</foreign> niht
swa swa dead mon, nemne ðyrne eðunge anre ætywde þæt he lifes
wæs.
 17.462.7. Mid þy he swa butan mete & drynce & butan
stæfne & gehyrnesse <foreign>IIII</foreign> dagas & nihte fulle awunode, þa æt
nyhstan on dagunge þæs fiftan dæges, swa he of hefigum slæpe
onbrude, & wæs arisende & up asæt, & his eagan ontynde &
geseah ymb hine þreatas singendra broðra somod & wependra.
 17.462.12. & he sume hwile sæt & sworette.
 17.462.12. Frægn ða & acsade, hwær Acca mæssepreost
wære.
 17.462.13. Cygde hine mon sona; & he into him eode &
geseah, þæt him bet wæs & he sprecan mihte; & he his cneow
bigde, & Gode þanc sægde mid eallum þam broðrum þe þær inne
wæron æt him.
 17.462.16. & mid þy hi ða sum fæc somod sæton &
sumu þing forhte sprecan ongunnon be þam upplican domum Godes
ælmihtiges, ða het se biscop ða oðre broðru sumu hwile utgan, &
wæs ðus sprecende to Accan þam preoste: Me ætywde, cwæð he,
hwene ær ondrysnlico gesihð, þa ic ðe wylle secgan & cyðan;
& þe hate, þæt ðu hi gehele & gehealde, oð ðæt ic wite
hwæt God wylle, hwæt be me gewurðe.
 17.462.22. Com me to & ætsod sum swiðe beorht mon &
scinende on hwitum gegyrelan: cwæð þæt he wære Michael se heah
engel: & forðon ic eom sended, þæt ic ðe fram deaðe generede
& alysde.
 17.462.26. Forgeaf ðe Drihten lif þurh gebedo & tearas
ðinra discipula & ðinra broðra & þurh þingunge his þære
eadigan meder ðære unmælan fæmnan Sancta Mariam.
 17.462.28. Forðon ic ðe secge þæt þu nu bist hrædlice
fram þysse untrumnesse gehæled.
 17.462.29. Ac westu gearo; forðon æfter feower gearum ic eft
hwyrfe & þe neosige.
 17.462.30. Þu becymest to þinum eðle; & þone mæstan
dæl ðinra æhta þu onfehst, þa ðe on þe genemde wæron, &
on smyltre sibbe ðin lif geendast.
 17.464.1. Hwæt he se biscop hine ða hraðe getrumade, &
ealle his geferan to þon gefegon & Gode þoncunge dydon; & þy
ongunnenan siðfate to Breotone com.
 17.464.3. & he sealde þa ærendgewrito, þe he brohte fram
þam apostolican papan, ærest Brihtwalde þam arcebiscope to rædanne,
& eft æþelrede, se wæs ær cyning; wæs ða Beardsætena
abbud.
 17.464.6. & hi begen him lustlice & anmodlice fultumedon be
þæs papan hæse; & æþelred sona to him gelaðede Cenred þone
cyning, þam he Myrcna rice sealde.
 17.464.8. & he hine bæd & het, þæt he inlice þam
biscope freond wære: & he swa wæs.
 17.464.9. Ac Ealdfrið Norðanhymbra cyning hine forhogode onfon:
ne he langre tide ofer þæt lifigende wæs.
 17.464.11. Ða wæs geworden, sona ðæs þe Osred his sunu
to rice feng, þæt sinoð wæs gesomnod be Nide streame.
 17.464.13. & æfter hwylcehugu geflite æghwæðeres
dæles, þa æt nyhstan, him eallum fultumiendum, wæs Wilfrið
onfangen in biscophad his cyricean.
 17.464.15. & he swa <foreign>IIII</foreign> gear, þæt is oð ðone dæg
his forðfore, he his lif lædde on smyltre sibbe, & gefeonde þa
heofonlican rico gestah & gesohte.
 17.464.17. Ferde he forð on his mynstre, þe he hæfde on
Undalana mægðe under gerece Cuðbaldes þæs abbudes; & mid
ðenunge his broðra wæs gelæded on his þæt ærre mynster,
þæt is gecyged Onhripum, & wæs arwurðlice geseted & bebyriged
on Sancte Petres cyricean þæs apostoles be þam wigbede suðan, swa swa
we ær beforan sægdon & gemyngedon.
 18.464.23. Ðy nyhstan geare æfter forðfore þæs
foresprecenan fæder, þæt is þy fiftan geare Osredes rices þæs
cyninges se arwurða wer Adrianus abbud forðferde, se wæs æfenwyrcend
on Godes worde ðære eadigan gemynde Theodorus arcebiscopes; & on his
mynstre on cyricean þære eadigan fæmnan Sancta Marian bebyriged wæs
ymb an & feowertig wintra, ðæs þe he fram Uitaliano þam papan
hider mid ðeodor biscop sended wæs.
 18.464.29. Ðæs abbudes lare ætgædere & ðeodores
þæs biscopes betwih oðre cyðnesse sagað, þæt Albinus ðæs
abbudes discipul, se to his mynstres gerece æfter him feng, þæt he
wæs swa swyðe on gelesum haligra gewrita gelæred, þæt he Grecisc
gereord of miclum dæle cuðe, & Leden him wæs swa cuð & swa
gemimor swa swa Englisc, þæt him gecyndelic wæs.
 18.466.4. Ða onfeng for Wilfriðe biscophad ðære cyricean
æt Heagostealdes ea Acca his mæssepreost.
 18.466.5. Wæs he se wer se fromesta & for Gode & for
mannum micellic.
 18.466.6. & he his cyricean getimbrade, seo on are Sanctæ
Andree þæs apostoles gehalgad is, monigfealde wlite & wundorlicum
weorcum gebrædde & gemonigfylde.
 18.466.8. & he micle geornfulnesse dyde, þæt he
æghwanon mæst reliquia begeate þara eadigra apostola & martyra,
& on heora weorðunge wibedas sette & porticas worhte & todælde
on þæt sylfe binnan þære ylcan cyricean weallum.
 18.466.12. Swylce eac spell heora ðrowunge ætgædere mid
oðrum cyriclicum bocum mid micelre geornfulnesse gesomnade, & ðider
micel bocgestreon & æðele begeat.
 18.466.14. Swylce he eac husulfatu & leohtfatu & monig
oðer þysses gemetes, þa ðe to Godes huses frætwednesse belimpað,
he geornfullice gegearwode.
 18.466.16. Eac swylce he sumne æðelne cyricsangere begeat, se
wæs Mafa haten, se wæs on Cent on sangcræft gelæred fram
æfterfyligendum þara discipula þæs eadigan papan Sancte Gregorii;
& he þone <foreign>XII</foreign> winter mid him hæfde.
 18.466.20. & he gehwæðer ge þa cyricsangas lærde,
þe hi ær ne cuðan, ge eac, þa ðe hi iu cuðan & mid langre
gymeleasnesse ealdian ongunnon, þa eft mid his lare on ðone ærran steall
geedniwode wæron.
 18.466.23. Wæs he eac sylfa Acca biscop se getydesta sangere;
swylce eac he wæs on halgum gewritum se gelæredesta, & on andetnesse
þæs rihtan geleafan se clænesta; & he wæs in reogolum cyriclicre
gesetnesse se behydegæsta þa to healdenne.
 18.466.26. & he þæs ne blon, oððæt he fram Gode
mede onfeng his arfæstre wilsumnesse.
 18.466.28. Wæs he ærest fram his cnihthade on geferscipe
þæs halgan Bosan & Gode þæs leofan Eoforwicceastre biscopes
afeded & gelæred.
 18.466.30. Æfter þon he com to Wilfriðe biscope mid hyhte
beteran foresetnesse, & eall his yldo & lif on his þenunge gefylde
oð his forðfore.
 18.466.32. Mid þone he eac swilce to Rome wæs cumende &
monig nytlico ðing, ðe he on his eðle ne mihte, cyriclicra gesetnessa
þær he geseah & geleornode, & ða wel heold læste oð his
lifes ende.
 19.468.3. Ðyssum tidum Naitan Peohta cyning, ðe þone
norðdæl Breotone eardiað, wæs he monad mid gelomlicre smeawunge &
leornunge cyriclicra gewrita þæt he gedwolan wiðsoc & þone ne
geðafode, se oð þæt on his þeode hæfed wæs, be gehylde rihtra
Eastrana.
 19.468.7. & he hine & his ðeode gelædde to
mærsianne & to weorðianne þa rihtgesettan tide þære
Drihtenlican æriste.
 19.468.8. & þæt he þæt mihte mid ðy maran
ealdorlicnesse þurhteon & gefremman, sohte he him fultum of Angolþeode,
þe he geare ongeat & wiste, þæt hi ða æfestnesse geleornad
& onfongen hæfdon to bysene þære halgan Romaniscan cyrican &
ðære apostolican.
 19.468.12. Sende he ærendracan to þam arwurðan were
Ceolfriðe, se wæs abbud ðæs mynstres þara eadigra apostola Petrus
& Paulus, þæt is æt Wire muðan & be Tinan þære ea, on
ðære stowe ðe ic gecyged On Gyrwum.
 19.468.15. Þam abbuddome he Ceolfrið wuldorlice fore wæs
æfter Benedicte, be þam we beforan sægdon.
 19.468.17. Bæd he se cyning þone abbud, þæt he him sende
trymmendlice stafas & gewrito, mid þam he ðy mihtlicor wiðscufan
mihte, þa ðe gedyrstigedon þæt hi Eastran heoldan & wurðedon
butan heora rihtre tide.
 19.468.20. Swylce he eac befrægn & acsade be gemete &
rihte Godes þeowa sceare, þe þreostas & Godes þeowas getacnode beon
sceoldon.
 19.468.22. Bæd he se cyning eac hine þæt he him onsende
sumne heahcræftigan stangeworces, þæt he mihte æfter Romana þeawe
cyricean timbrian: & wæs gehatende þæt he þa wolde on are
ðæs eadigan ealdres þara apostola gehalgian Sancte Petres.
 19.468.26. & eac gehet, þæt he sylfa wolde mid ealre his
ðeode þone þeaw symble onhyrian & healdan ðære Romaniscan
cyricean & þære apostolican, swa forð swa we fyrmest geleornian
magon.
 19.468.28. Ðæs cynninges arfæstnesse willum & benum
wæs gefultumiende se arwurða abbud Ceolfrið.
 19.468.30. Sende him cræftige wyrhtan stænene cyricean to
timbrianne: sende him eac stafas & gewrit be gehealde rihtra Eastrana &
be Godes þeowa sceare, eac oðrum rihtum Godes cyricean.
 19.470.3. Mid ðy þæt gewrit ða wæs ræded beforan
þam cyninge & monigum gelæredum werum & him geornlice wæs reht
on his agen gereorde fram þam, ðe hit ongitan mihton, is þæt sæd,
þæt he wære be his trymnesse & lare swyðe gefeonde & wære
arisende of his setle of middum his ealdormannum & his witum; & his
cneow bigde on eorðan & Gode þancunge dyde, þæt he geearnode
swylce gife onfon of Angolþeode.
 19.470.9. & þus cwæð: Cuðlice ic þæt ær wiste
& ongeat, þæt ðis wæs riht weorðung soðra Eastrana.
 19.470.10. Ac swa swiðe ic nu þæt riht ongite ðisse tide
to healdanne, þæt me is ealling a lytel & medmicel gesewen, þæt
ic ær ðyssum cuðe & ongeat.
 19.470.13. Forðon ic þonne nu eow openlice andette &
cyðe, þe her andwearde sittað, þæt ic ðas tide Eastrena ecelice
healdan wille mid ealre minre ðeode, þe ic nu rihte ongite & ocnawe.
 19.470.15. & ealle preostas & Godes ðeowas, þa ðe on
minum rice syndon, ða sceare onfon sculon , ðe we gehyrað fulle beon
ealre rihtwisnesse.
 19.470.17. & he ða butan yldinge mid his cynelicre
ealdorlicnesse gefremede þæt he cwæð; & sona sende geond eall his
rice, & het writan & leornian & healdan þurh ealle Peohta
mægðe þa nigontynlican hringas rihtra Eastrana.
 19.470.20. & het fordilgian ðurh ealle ða gedwolhringas
feower & hundeahtatig geara.
 19.470.22. Ða wæron scorene ealle munecas & sacerdas on
ðone beh Sancte Petres sceare.
 19.470.23. & hi swa swa niwe discipulhada þæs eadegestan
ealdres þara apostola Sancte Petres underðeodde beon & mid his
mundbyrde gescylde & eall seo ðeod geriht gefeah & blissade.
 20.470.26. Ne wæs þa æfter miclum fæce þæt eac
swylce ða munecas Scotta cynnes, þa ðe Hii þæt ealond eardedon &
beeodan mid þam mynstrum þe him underðeodde wæron to reogollicum
þeawe rihtra Eastrena & scyre þurh Drihtnes gyfe gelædde wæron.
 20.470.29. Wæs ymb seofon hund wintra & syxtene fram
Drihtnes menniscnesse, þy geare Osred cyning wæs ofslegen & Cynred
æfter him ða steore onfeng Norðanhymbra rices, ða com on Hii þæt
ealond of Hibernia Gode se leofa fæder & sacerd & mid ealle are to
nemnenne Ecgbyrht se halga, ðæs we beforan gelomlice gemyngedon.
 20.472.4. & he arwurðlice & mid micle gefean fram him
onfangen wæs, forðon he wæs se swetesta lareow & se wynsumesta
& ðara þinga, ðe he oðre lærde to donne, he sylfa wæs se
wilsumesta fylgend & læstend: & he lustlice fram him eallum gehyred
wæs.
 20.472.8. & he onwende mid his arfæstum trymenessum &
geornfulnesse þone ealdan þeaw & gesetnysse heora ealdra, be þam
mæg þæt apostolice word cweden beon, þæt hi hæfdon Godes
ellnunge ac nalæs æfter wisdome.
 20.472.11. & he hi ðy apostolican þeawe monade &
lærde, þæt hi ða weorðunge þære mæstan symbelnesse, swa swa
we cwædon, heoldan & dydon under bycnunge þæs ecan biges.
 20.472.14. Wæs þæt mid wunderlicre stihtunge þære
godcundan arfestnesse swa geworden, þæt, forðan seo þeod þone
wisdom, ðe heo cuðe, þære godcundan cyððe lustlice butan æfeste
Angelfolcum cyðde & gemænsumede, hi ða swylce æfter fæce
þurh Angelþeode, on þam þingum þe hi won hæfdon, to fulfremedum
gemete rihtes lifes becom.
 20.472.19. Swa swa Brittas wiððon, þe næfre woldon þa
cyððo þæs cristenan geleafan, þe hi hæfdon, Angelcynne openian
& cyðan, ono þa gelyfendum eft Angelfolcum & þurh eall well
ontimbredum & gelæredum on reogole rihtes geleafan, hi nu gyt heora
ealdan gewunon healdað, & fram rihtum stigum healtiað; & heora
heafod ywað butan beage Sancte Petres sceare; & Cristes symbelnesse rihte
Eastran butan geðeodnesse ealra Godes cyricena healdað & weorþiað.
 20.472.26. Ða onfengon Hiisetena munecas þurh Ecgberhtes lare
rihtgelyfede þeawas on to lifgenne, under Dunchade þæm abbode æfter
hundeahtatigum wintra þæs þe hie sendon Aidan þone biscop Ongelþeode
to lareowe.
 20.472.29. Wunade se Godes wer Ecgbreht twelf winter in þam
ealonde, þæt he sumre neowre gefe lihtendre þære ciriclican
geþeodnesse and sibbe gehalgade.
 20.474.1. Ond æfter seofon hund wintra & nigon &
twentigum æfter þære Drihtenlican menniscnesse þy geare, þa
mærsad wæs & weorþad se Drihtenlica Eastordæg, þæt wæs
þy eahtoþan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Maiarum</foreign>, mid þy he þa ilcan
Drihtenlican æreste mid symbelnesse mæssesonga mærsade &
weorþade, þy ilcan dæge he forðferde to Drihtne.
 20.474.6. Ond gefean þære hean symbelnesse, þone he mid
þæm broðrum ongon, þa he to annesse gife gehwyrfde, he mid Drihtne
& þam halgum apostolum ond mid oðrum heofones ceasterwarum gefylde;
oþþe þæt gen soþre is þæt seolfe he ne blinneþ mærsian
& weorþian a butan ende.
 20.474.10. Wæs þæt wunderlico stihtung þære godcundan
foreseonesse, þætte se arwyrða wer nales þæt an þæt he in
Eastran forðferde of þissum middangearde to Gode Fæder, ac eac swylce
mid þy þætte þy dæge Eastran mærsode wæron, þe hie næfre
ær gewunedon in þæm stowum weorþade beon.
 20.474.14. Ond þa gefegon þa broþor be ongesetenesse
þære cuþan & þære rihtgelefdon Eastortide.
 20.474.15. Ond hie blissedon þa mundbyrde þæs farendan
fæder to Drihtne, þurh þone hie gerihte wæron.
 20.474.17. Ond he blissade in þon, þæt he oð þæt in
lichoman gehealden wæs, oð þæt he geseah þa his geherend þone
Eastordæg onfon, ond mid hine in weorþunge habban, þone hie simle ær
þon warenedon to anfonne.
 20.474.20. Ond swa gewis be hiora gerehtnesse se arwyrþa fæder
blissade, þæt he gesawe Drihtnes dæg, & he hine geseah &
gefeonde wæs.
 21.474.23. Þa wæs ymb seofon hund wintra & fif &
twentig æfter þære Drihtenlican menniscnesse, þæt wæs þæt
seofoþe gear Osrices Norþanhymbra cyninges, se æfter Cenrede to rice
feng, þa Wihtred Ecgbrihtes sunu Cantwarena cyninges forðfered wæs þy
nigeþan dæge <foreign>Kalendarum Maiarum</foreign>; ond þæm rice, þe he hæfde
feower & þritig wintra ond þæt fifte healf, his sunu þry
yrfeweardas forlet æþelbryht & Eadbryht & æþelric.
 21.474.29. Æfter þæm þy nyhstan geare Tobias Hrofeceastre
bisceop forþferde.
 21.474.30. Wæs se wer micellice gelæred; wæs he discipul
þære eadgan gemynde Theodores ercebisceopes ond Adrianus þæs
abbodes.
 21.474.32. Ond he forþon, swa swa cweden is, mid þa getydnesse
ge ciriclicra gewrita ge eac gemænelicra, þæt he eac swilce swa Grecisc
geleornade mid Lædene, þæt him ða swa cuð wæron swa his agene
reorde, þe he in acenned wæs.
