mænigfealdre spræce ne bið syn forbogen; and eft is awriten: Deað and
lif on þære tungan handa.
 6.21.21. Soþlice þæm lareowe gedafenað, þæt he sprece
and tæce, þam leornere gerist, þæt he swigie and gehyre.
 6.21.22. Forþi þonne gif hwæt to ahsienne sy fram þam
ealdre, þæt sy geahsod mid ealre eaðmodnesse and underþeodnesse willa
and micelre arweorðnesse.
 6.22.3. Ne he on ðam furþor ne sprece, þonne hit framige;
gegafspræce and idele word and þa word, þe leahter astyrien, ecum loce
on eallum stowum we geneoþeriað and forbeodaþ, and to swylcere spræce
nan leornere his muð næfre mid minre leafe ne ontyne.
 7.22.9. BE EAÐMODNESSE.
 7.22.10. Godcund gewrit us to eaðmodnesse myngað þus
clypiende: ælc þe hine anhefð, he bið geneoþerad, and ælc þe
hine mid eaðmodnesse geneoþerað, he bið mid weorðmynte onhafen.
 7.22.13. Þurh þas clypunge is gesweotolad, þæt ælc
upahafednes asprincð of modignesse cynrene; wið þone unþeaw hine
bewarode se witega, þus cweþende: Drihten, nis min heorte onhafen, ne mine
eagan upabrodene, ne ic ne ferde on mærðum, ne wundorlice mid getote ne
bode.
 7.22.17. Ac hwæt þonne, gif ic eaðmodlice me sylfne ne
understode, ac min mod on modignesse anhofe?
 7.22.19. Agyld þu me, drihten, mid biternesse lean, swa swa modor
deþ hyre bearne, þonne hio hit fram hire breosta gesoce weneþ.
 7.23.1. Forði þonne gif we þone hrof þære healican
eaðmodnesse getillan willað and to ðære heofonlican anhefednesse, þe
mid þises andweardes lifes eaðmodnesse bið gestigen, caflice cuman
þencað, seo hlædder is urum dædum to arærenne, þe Jacobe on
swefne wearð anywed, þurh ða him wæron gesweotolade ægðer ge
upstigende englas ge niþerstigende.
 7.23.6. Nis butan tweon to understandenne se upstige and se
niþerstige on nane oþere wisan, butan þæt heofona rices upstige mid
eadmodnesse geearnod bið and mid ofermettum forwyrht.
 7.23.9. Seo arærede hlædder tacnað ure lif on ðisse
weorulde, ðæt bið mid eaðmodre heortan þurh drihten aræred to
heofonum; þære hlædre sidan tacniað lichoman and saule; on ðæm
twam sidum, þæt is on saule and on lichoman, missenlice stæpas
eaðmodnesse and þeawfæstnesse sio godcunde gelaðung to ðæm
upstige gefæstnode.
 7.23.16. BE ÐAM TWELF STÆPUM EALRE EAÐMODNESSE.
 7.23.17. Ðære forman eaðmodnysse stæpe is, þæt gehwa
Godes ege hæbbe and ætforan his eagena gesyhðe singallice sette and ne
sy ofergyttol, ac a gemyndig ealra þara þinga, þe ure drihten bebead.
 7.24.2. Sy he eac gemyndig, hu ða for hiora synnum on helle
behreosað, þe his beboda forseoð, eac swylce wealce a on his mode embe
þæt ece lif, þe God gegearwod hæfð eallum þæm, þe hine
andrædað.
 7.24.6. And þus smeagende gehealde he on ælcne timan fram his
synnum and leahtrum, ægþer ge geþohta, ge spræce, ge gesyhþe, and
fram eallum yfelum dædum mid ofste his agene lustas and his flæsces
gewilnunga gewanige; wite manna gehwylc, þæt he bið a gesewen fram
drihtne of heofonum on godcundre gesyhþe and on ælcne timan.
 7.24.11. On ælcere stowe his dæda beoð gesewene fram
godcundre gesyhþe and on ælcne timan fram englum gebodode; þæt God on
urum geþohtum andwearde is, se witega gesweotelað þus cweþende: God
asmeað ægðer ge manna heortan ge æddran; eft he cweð: God cann
manna geþohtas; eft he cwyð: Drihten, þu angete mine geþohtas feorrene,
and: Mannes geþanc ge geandet.
 7.24.17. Toþi þæt he carful sy ymbe his þweoran
geþohtas, simle se nytwyrða broðor þus mid his heortan clypige: þonne
ic beo unwemmed beforan Gode, gif ic me gehealde fram minre unrihtwisnesse.
 7.24.21. Ure agen willa us is forboden, þonne halig gewrit þus
clypaþ: Gecyr þu fram þinum lustum; eft on gebede we halsiað urne
drihten, þæt his willa on us gewunige.
 7.25.1. Eornostlice we synt gelærede be geweorhtan, þæt we
be agenum willan ne wyrcen, þonne we þæt bewarniað, þæt halig
gewrit, þe þus clypað: Sume wegas syndan, þe mannum syn rihte
geþuhte, þara ænde þeah besencð on helle grunde.
 7.25.5. We us eft andrædað þurh þæt halige gewrit, þe
þus clypað: Hy synt gewemmede and andsæte gewordene on heora agenum
lustum.
 7.25.8. Wite we eac to soðe, þæt drihten a bið andweard on
urum flæslicum lustum and him ures anginnes nan ðing digle ne bið;
ðæt gesweotelað se witega, þus to Gode clypiende: Beforan þe is,
drihten, eall min gewilnung.
 7.25.11. Be þam halig gewrit monað, þus cweþende: Ne far
ðu æfter þinum lustum.
 7.25.13. Eornostlice, nu Godes gesyhða behealdað ægðer ge
gode ge yfele, and drihten of heofonum symle behylt ofer manna bearn, þæt
he geseo hwæþer heora ænig andgyttol sy and God secende, and nu fram
þam englum us betæhtum ure weorc dæges and nihtes drihtne, urum
scyppendum, beoð gebodude, us is miclom to warnienne, leofe gebroþra, swa
hit on þam salmum awriten is, þylæs þe God on ænigne timan us geseo
bugende to yfele and to nahte gehweorfan, and us þeah on þisne timan arige,
forðan þe he milde is and geanbidað, þæt we to beteran gecyrren,
þæt he us eft ne afyrre on þam toweardum, þus cweðende: þis ge
dydon, and ic swigode.
 7.26.3. BE ÐAM OÐRAN EADMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.26.4. Oðer eadmodnesse stæpe is, þæt hwa his agenne
willan ne lufige, ne his agenum lustum ne fylige, ac mid dædum ures drihtnes
stefne geefenlæce, þe þus be him sylfum cwyð: Ne com ic toþy,
þæt ic minne willan worhte, ac þæs þe me hider asænde, þæt
is mines heofonlican fæder.
 7.26.8. And eft is gecweden: Lust hæfð wite and nead
wuldorbeah gegearwað, þæt is þæt hwa hine sylfne to Gode nyde and
his agene lustas aweorpe.
 7.26.11. BE ÐAM ÐRIDDAN EADMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.26.12. Ðridde eaðmodnesse stæpe is, þæt gehwylc for
Godes lufan hine sylfne mid ealre eaðmodnesse his ealdrum underþeode, urne
drihten geefenlæcende, be him se apostol þus cwið: He wearð gehyrsum
toþi, þæt he willes deað þrowade.
 7.26.16. BE ÐAM FEORÐAN EADMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.26.17. Feorða stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif he on þære
sylfan hyrsumnesse þolemod bið on heardum and on wiþerweardum þingum
and on gehwylcum teonrædennum geþyld lufige and ne awacige, na ne his
staþel ne lætende fram Gode ne buge.
 7.27.2. Be þissum halig gewrit þus myngað: Se ðe
þurhwunað oþ ende, he bið gehealden; eft is gecweden on haligum
gewrite: Si gestrangod þin heorte and forþyldiga þinne drihten, þæt
is, þola eall, þæt God be þe geþafað.
 7.27.6. And eft is onywed, þæt þa getreowfullan for Godes
ege ealle lifes wiðerweardnesse forþyldigian scylun, be hiora
þolemodnesse is þus awriten: For þe, drihten, we synd ealne dæg to
deaþe gewæhte; we synt to deaþe getealde swa swa sceap to gesnide.
 7.27.10. Hie þeah orsorge be þam tohopan þæs godcundan
edleanes, þus æfterfylgendlice mid blisse clypiað: We oferswiðredon on
þysum eallum þurh þone þe us lufode, þæt is drihten; eft be
þære ylecan þolemodnesse on halegum gewritum is þus gecweden: Drihten,
þu fandodest ure; þu ameredest us on fyres fandunge, swa swa seolfor on
fyre amered bið; ðu us belæddest on grin, þu gesettest gedrefednessa
on urum bæcum.
 7.27.17. Eft þæt ilce halige gewrit forðon geswutelað,
þæt we under ealdra gymene beon scylen, þus cweðende: þu settest men
ofer ure heafda, þæt is ealdras, þe us gewyldon.
 7.27.20. Ge eac þurh Godes gebod earfeþa and teonrædena mid
geþylde forberað, þæs halgan godspelles cwide gefyllende, þe þus
cleopað: þonne þu geslegen sie on an gewenge, wænd þæt oðer to;
ðam þe þine tunecan þe benæme, læt þinne wæfels to; geneadod
to anre mile gange, gang willes twa.
 7.28.3. Ðæt is on andgite: Se went oþer hleor to sleandum,
se þe god deþ þæm, þe him yfeles uþe, se þe bletsað þæne,
þe hine wyrigde, he læt þa hacelan to þæm, þe hine tunecan
benæmbe, se gæþ sylfwilles twa mila, to anre geneadod, þonne he nið
oferswiðed fram þam yfelan, he gewænt þane yfelan to gode.
 7.28.8. Se þe þyllic bið, butan tweon he deð, swa swa
Paulus cwæþ, þæt is, geþyldelice lease gebroðru forbyrð and
eahtnesse for rihtwisnesse þolað and þa bletsað, þe hine wyrigdon.
 7.28.11. BE ÐAM FIFTAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.28.12. Se fifta stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif he þurh
eaðmodre andetnesse his abbode ne diglað ealle þa geðohtas, þe his
heortan cumende and þa yfelu, þe on diglan fram him þurhtogene synd.
 7.28.15. Be þam us halig gewrit myngað, þus cweþende:
Onwreoh drihtne þinne weg, þæt is þine dæde, and hyht on hine; and
eft hit cwið: Andettað drihtne, forþan þe he is god, forþan þe his
mildheortnes is on ecnesse.
 7.28.18. And eft cwið se witega: Minne gylt ic gecydde þe and
mine unrihtwisnesse ic ne bediglode; ic gecwæð, ic bodige ongean me mine
unrihtwisnesse drihtne, and þu forgeafe þa arleasnesse minre heortan.
 7.29.1. BE ÐAM SYXTAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.29.2. Se syxta stæpe eadmodnesse is, gif munuc eaðhylde
bið and geþæf, þeah hine man wacne and unweorðne talige and an
uteweardum forlæte and to uteweardum medemige.
 7.29.4. On eallum betæhtum notum hine sylfne mid his mode wacne
wyrhtan talige and unweorðne and þus mittan witegan clypige: To nahte ic
wæs gehworfen, and ic hit nyste; ic eom geworden swilce nyten mid þe, and
ic þeah simle mid þe.
 7.29.9. BE ÐAM SEOFOÐAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.29.10. Se seofeða stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif munuc hine
sylfne yttran and unweorðran talað þonne ænigne oþerne; he hine
sylfne geeaðmede and þus mid þam witegan cwede: Ic soðlice eom wyrm and
no man, manna hosp and folces æwyrp.
 7.29.14. Anhafen ic wæs, genyþerod and gescend; and eft: God
me is, þæt þu me genyþeradest, þæt ic leornige þine bebode.
 7.29.16. BE ÐAM EHTEÐAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.29.17. Se eahteoða stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif se munuc nan
þing ne deþ, butan þæt se gemæna mynstres regol tæcð, oþþe
þæt þa bysena heahþungenra lærað.
 7.30.1. BE ÐAM NIGEÐAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.30.2. Se nygeða stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif munuc his tungan
fram spræce forhæfð and swigean healdende ne sprece, oð þæt he
geahsod sy, be þam halig gewrit þus gesweotolað: On mænigfealdre
spræce ne bið syn forbogen, and se ofersprecola wer ne þyhð ofer
eorðan.
 7.30.7. BE ÐAM TEOÐAN EAÐMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.30.8. Se teoða eaðmodnesse stæpe is, gif se munuc ne bið
galsmære and eaðe and hræd on hlehtre, forþy hit is awriten: Se
stunta on lehtre his stefne geuferað.
 7.30.11. BE ÐAM ENDLYFTAN EADMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.30.12. Se endlyfta eadmodnesse stæpe is, þænne se munuc
spræce, liþelice butan hlehtre and eaðmodlice mid gestæþþignesse
feawa word and gesceadwise clypige, and he ne sy oferhlyde on stefne, swa hit
awriten is: Se þe wita is, mid feaum wordum geswytelað.
 7.31.1. BE ÐAM TWELFTAN EADMODNESSE STÆPE.
 7.31.2. Se twelfta stæpe eaðmodnesse is, gif munuc inne on his
heortan eaðmod bið and na þæt an, ac eac swylce utene mid his lichoman
eaðmodnesse eallum þam, þe him onlociað, simle gebycnige, þæt sy
æghwær, ge on weorce, ge on gebedhuse, ge innan mynstre, ge on
wyrtgearde, ge on fare, ge on æcere and swa hwær swa he sy sittende,
standende, oðþe gangende, onhnigenum heafde simle his gesyhða aduna on
eorðan besette.
 7.31.9. And hine sylfne on ælcne timan scyldigne for his synnum
talige, swylce he þænne geo to þam egefullan Godes dome geandweardod
beon scyle.
 7.31.11. Cweþe a mid his geþance, þæt se manfulla besettum
eagum on eorðan gecwæþ, þonne þæt halige godspel hereð be
þam, þe he hine sylfne scyldigne and forwyrhtne gecneow and þus
geomriende clypude: Drihten, ne eom ic wyrðe, ic synfulla, þæt ic mine
eagan to heofenum ahebbe.
 7.31.16. Uton eft þus cweðan mid þam witegan: Ic eom gebiged
æghwær and genyþerad.
 7.31.18. Eornostlice, siððan se munuc ealle þisse
eaðmodnesse stæpas gestihþ, he cymð sona to þære soðan Godes
lufe, þurh þa lufe he bið ascyred fram hellewites ogan; þurh þa lufe
he beginð to healdenne swylce gecyndelice and gewunlice, þe he ær butan
miclan ege healdan ne mihte; he gehylt þa gewunlican god haligre drohtnunge,
na for hellewites ege, ac for Godes lufe anre and haligra mægena luste.
 7.32.4. Ða drihten on sumne timan þurh haligne gast
gesweotelað on his wyrhtan, þe clæne is fram leahtrum and synnum.
 8.32.8. BE GODCUNDUM ÐENUNGUM ON NIHTLICUM TIDUM.
 8.32.10. On wintres timan, þæt is fram þan anginne þæs
monðes, þe is nouember gehaten, oþ eastran, æfter gesceades
foresceawunge, on þære eahteþan tide þære nihte is to arisenne,
þæt þa munecas hwæthwara furþor restan þonne healfe niht,
þæt seo dæges þigen tofered sy on þære nihtelicam reste and seo
hæte þære þigene oferslegen and se maga gelyht, þæt he þe
eað his wæccean healdan mæge.
 8.32.16. Ðæt þære nihte to lafe sie æfter þam
uhtsange, þæt se genotod mid sealmsange and mid leornunge gastlicra
cræfta buton slæpe.
 8.32.19. From eastron oð ða foresædan kalendas nouembris sy
se ærest þæs uhtsanges swa gemetegad, þæt lytel fæc gehealden
sy betwyh þæm uhtsange and þæm dægredsange, þæt gehwa to
gedreoge on þæm lytlum fæce gan mæge, and þærrihte
upasprungenum dægriman dægredsang sy begunnen.
 8.33.1. Se tidsang is swa to beginnenne on ælcne timan, ge on
wintra ge on sumera.
 9.33.5. HU FELA SEALMA ON NIHTLICUM TIDUM TO SINGENGE SYNT.
 9.33.7. On wintres timan is se uhtsang þus to beginnenne; cweþe
ærest þis fers: <foreign>Deus in adiutorium meum intende</foreign>; þonne syððan
þriwa: <foreign>Domine labia mea aperies</foreign>; þonne æfter þisan þone sealm:
<foreign>Domine quid multiplicati sunt</foreign>; þonne inuitatorium mid þæm sealme:
<foreign>Venite exultemus domino</foreign>; æfter þysum is ymen to singenne, þe to
þære tide belimpð; æfter þæm syx sealmas mid þrim antefenum.
 9.33.13. Þon geendedum sylle se abbod bletsunge; and man þreo
rædinga ræde and þry ræpsas, and ealle þa gebroþra þa hwile
sittan.
 9.33.15. Æt þam þriddan repse singe se sangere <foreign>Gloria
patri</foreign> and þa gebroðro ealle arisen to arweorðnesse þære halgan
þrynesse.
 9.33.17. Æt þam uhtsange ræde man þære godcundan lare
bec, ægðer ge of þære ealdan cyðnesse ge of þære niwan, and
eac swa þa haligan trahtas fram namcuþum fæderum and rihtgelyfedum
geworhte synt.
 9.33.21. Æfter þam þrim rædingum and þrim ræpsum
æfterfyligan oþre syx sealmas and þa syn gesungene mid <foreign>Alleluia</foreign>;
æfter þam fylige capitel of þære apostola lare gemyndelice butan bec
gesæd and æfter þam fers and syðþan halsunge ben, þæt is
<foreign>Kyrieleison</foreign>, and þus sy geendad se nihtlica uhtsang.
 10.34.5. HU ON SUMERA SEO NIHTLICE TID TO HEALDENNE SY.
 10.34.7. From eastron oþ kalendas nouembris sy æt uhtsange
gehealden se ylca gewuna, þe we her beforan gecwædan and seo ylece
mycelnes sealmsanges, butan þam anum þæt man rædinge ne þearf
rædan on nanre bec for þan scortan nihton, þe on sumera beoð, ac for
þan þrim rædingum sy an ænlypig rædincg geræd of þære
ealdan cyþnesse gemyndelice butan bec, and an swyþe scort ræps
æfterfylige.
 10.34.13. Elles ælc oþer þing butan þysum sy gehealden on
sumera, þæs þe mon on wintra hylt, þæt sy swa þæt næfre
læs sealma ne sy gesungen æt uhtsange þonne twelf, butan <foreign>Domine quid
multiplicati sunt</foreign> and <foreign>Uenite exultemus Domino</foreign>.
 11.35.2. HU ON SUNNANNIHTUM NIHTLIC WÆCCE TO HEALDENNE SY.
 11.35.4. On sunnandæge mon sceal hraðor arisan to uhtsange.
 11.35.5. On þam uhtsange mon sceal healdan þæt ylce gemet,
þe we herbufan gecwædon, þæt is be twelf sealmum; singe man ærest
six sealmas and þonne on ende fers; æfter þam, him eallum endebyrdlice
sittendum, ræde man feower rædinga mid feower ræpsum.
 11.35.9. Æt þam feorðan ræpse, þonne me <foreign>Gloria patri</foreign>
singe, arisen hi mid arwyrðnesse, and singan oþre syx sealmas mid þrim
antefenum and fers æfter þam, and æfterfyligan oþre feower rædinga
mid feower ræpsum þære ylecan endebyrdnesse, þe we bufan cwædan,
æfter þæm þry canticas of witigena bocum swylce se abbod gesette, and
þa syn mid alleluian begunnene.
 11.35.15. Æfter þam fers and gesealdre bletsunge fram þam
abbode, syn gerædde oþre feower rædinga of þære niwan cyþnesse
þære ylecan endebyrdnesse, þe we bufan cwædon.
 11.35.18. Æfter þæm glorian þæs feorþan repses
beginne se abbod þæne lofsang <foreign>Te deum laudamus</foreign>; þam geendedum, ræde
se abbod godspel mid arwyrðnesse and mid godcundum ege, him eallum
standendum; æt þæs godspelles endunge andswarien ealle <foreign>Amen</foreign>, æfter
ðam beginne se abbod: <foreign>Te decet laus</foreign>, and geendadre bletsunge sy
dægeredsang begunnen.
 11.36.1. Seo endebyrdnes sunnandaga uhtsanges sy gelice gehealden
on ælcne timan, ge on wintra ge on sumera, butan hit færlice swa gelimpe,
þæt man lator arise, þonne hit gebyrige, and man bedæle repsas and
rædinga gescyrte, þæt la ne geweorðe, þæt þyllic gymelest
gelimpe.
 11.36.5. Sy georne bewarnod, þæt hit na ne gesæle; ðæt
gif hit gelimpe, dædbete se Gode on his gebedhuse, þe hit þurh his
gymeleste gelamp.
 12.36.9. HU DÆGREDSANGAS ON FREOLSTIDUM TO HEALDENNE SYN.
 12.36.11. On þæm dægredsangum on sunnandæge ærest mon
sceal singan þone syxandsyxtigeþan sealm, þæt is <foreign>Deus misereatur
nostri</foreign>.
 12.36.13. Æfter þam man sceal mid allelugeam þone
fiftigeþan sealm beginnan, þæt is <foreign>Miserere mei deus</foreign>; æfter þon
þone hundteontigeðan and þone seofonteoþan, þæt is <foreign>Confitemini
domino</foreign>, siðþan þane twaandsyxtigeþan, þæt is <foreign>Deus, deus meus, ad
te de luce</foreign>.
 12.36.17. Æfter þisum þone bletsingsealm, þæt is
<foreign>Benedicite</foreign>, æfter þon þone lofsealm, þæt is <foreign>Laudate dominum de
celis</foreign>; æfter þysum sy gecweden an ræding of apocalipsin gemyndelice
butan bec, æfter þam reps, ymen, fers and lofsang of þam godspelle,
þæt is <foreign>Benedictus dominus deus Israhel</foreign>, and halsung, þæt is
<foreign>Kyrieleison, Pater noster</foreign> and collectan, and swa bið gefylled.
 13.37.4. HU HIE ON WEORCDAGUM TO HEALDENNE SYN.
 13.37.5. On weorcdagum dægredsanges weorðung is þus to
healdenne, þæt is þæt se syxandsyxtigeþa sealm, þæt is <foreign>Deus
misereatur nostri</foreign>, sy gecweden butan antefene, and he sy on swege gelencged
hwæthwara ealswa on sunnandæge, þæt eal se hired sy gegaderad æt
þam anginne þæs fiftigeðan sealmes, þe is mid antefene to beginnene,
þæt is <foreign>Miserere mei deus</foreign>.
 13.37.11. Æfter þisum oþre twegen sealmas æfter
gewunelicum þeawe, þæt is ðy oþran dæge se fifta sealm and se
fifandþrittigeða, þæt is <foreign>Uerba mea and Dixit iniustus</foreign>; ðy
þriddan dæge se twaandfeowertigeða sealm and syxandfiftigeþa, þæt
is <foreign>Judica me deus and Miserere mei deus, miserere mei</foreign>; ðy feorþam dæge
se þreoandsyxtigeða and se feowerandsyxtigeþa, þæt is <foreign>Exaudi deus
orationem meam cum tribulor and Te decet ymnus deus</foreign>.
 13.37.18. Þy fiftan dæge se seofan and hundeahtatigeþa and
se nigan and hundeahtatigeða, þæt is <foreign>Domine deus salutis mee and Domine
refugium</foreign>; ðy syxtan dæge se fif and hundseofontigeþa and se an and
hundnigonteoða, þæt is <foreign>Notus in Judea deus and Bonum est confiteri
domino</foreign>.
 13.37.23. Þy sætresdæge se hundteontigeþa and twa and
feowertigeþa, þæt is <foreign>Domine exaudi orationem meam auribus percipe</foreign> and
cantic deuteronomio, þæt is <foreign>Adtende celum</foreign>, se sy todæled on twegen
glorian.
 13.38.3. Elles oþrum dagum on ðære wucan sy cantic gesungen,
þæt is lofsang, þe to þam dæge belimpð, ealswa hit romana eclesia
hylt, þæt is on monandæge <foreign>Confitebor</foreign>, on tiwesdæg <foreign>Ego dixi</foreign>, on
wodnesdæg <foreign>Exultauit</foreign>, on þunresdæg <foreign>Cantemus</foreign>, on frigedæg <foreign>Domine
audiui</foreign>, on sætresdæg <foreign>Adtende celum</foreign>.
 13.38.8. Æfter þam ælce dæge þone lofsealm, þæt
is <foreign>Laudate dominum de celis</foreign>, and syðþan an ræding of þære
apostola lare gemyndelice butan bec gecweden, and syþþan ræps, imen,
fers, cantic of þam godspelle, þæt is <foreign>Benedictus</foreign>, and halsung; and swa
bið gefylled.
 13.38.14. Ne sy nateþæshwon geendod naðer ne dægredsang
ne æfensang butan þam drihtlican gebede, þæt is <foreign>Pater noster</foreign>, ac se
ealdor hluddre stefne eallum gehyrendum þæt gebed eal singe, þæt
gehwa hine sylfne becnawe, gif he ænig þing ungeþwærlices and
swicollices on his geþance rixade, and hine sylfne geclænsige fram
ælcre hatunge leahtre, þurh þæt þe he on þam gebede gehyrð:
<foreign>Dimitte nobis debita nostra, sicut et nos dimittimus debitoribus nostris</foreign>,
þæt is on ure geþeode: Drihten forgif us ure synna, swa swa we
forgifað þam, þe wið us gyltað.
 13.38.23. At ælcan oþran tidsange se ende an sy hlude geclypod
fram þam sacerde, þæt fram eallum sy geandswarad: <foreign>Sed libera nos a
malo</foreign>.
 14.39.2. HU ON FREOLSDAGUM SEO NIHTLICE WÆCCE TO HEALDENNE SY.
 14.39.4. On Godes halgena freolstidum and on eallum freolstidum,
þe on geares ymbryne gelimpað, eal þenung is to donne on þæt ylece
gemet and þære ylecan endebyrdnesse, þe man on sunnandæge deþ,
butan þam anum, þæt sealmas and antefenas and ræpsas and rædinga
syn gesungene, þe to þam freolsdæge belimpað, elles on oþrum
þingum sy gehealden þæt ylece gemet, þe man on sunnandæge hylt.
 15.39.12. ON HWYLCUM TIDUM ALLELUIA SCEOLE BEON SUNGEN.
 15.39.14. Fram eastron oð pentecosten sy alleluia butan
todælednesse gecweden, ægðer ge on sealmum ge on ræpsum.
 15.39.15. Fram pentecosten oþ lenctenes anginne ælce niht
æt uhtsange sy alleluia gecweden mid þam syx æftrum sealmum; ælce
sunnanniht butan lenctene þa canticas and dægredsang, primsang,
undernsang, middægsang, nonsang mid alleluian syn gesungene, and se
æfensancg mid antefene sy gecweden.
 15.39.20. Ræpsas ne syn næfre gesungene mid alleluian, butan
fram eastran oþ pentecosten.
 16.40.2. HU ÐA GODCUNDAN WEORC ON DÆGE SCEOLON BEON GEDONNE.
 16.40.4. Uton don swa se witega cwæþ: Seofonsiðum on dæg
ic þe, drihten, herede and þin lof sæde.
 16.40.5. Ðæt seofonfealde getæl bið þus þurh us
gefylled, gif dægredsang, primsang, undernsang, middægsang, nonsang,
æfensang, nihtsang bið gefylled þurh ures þeowdomes þenunge.
 16.40.8. Be þam tidum cwæð se witega: Seofonsiþum on
dæg ic drihten þe herede; soþes se yleca witega be þam uthwæccum
þus cwæþ: To middre nihte ic aras, drihten, þe to andettenne.
 16.40.11. Eornostlice on þysum tidum we herien urne scyppend be
þam domum his rihtwisnesse, þæt is on dægred, on prim, on undern, on
middæg, on non, on æfen, on nihtsange; and on niht arisan and drihtne
geandettan.
 17.40.17. HU FELA SEALMA ÐURH ÐA SYLFAN TIDA SCEOLON BEON
GECWEDENE.
 17.40.19. Nu geo we habbað gefadod þa endebyrdnesse þæs
sealmsanges, þe to uhtsange oþþe dægredsange gebyreð; uton nu
behawian be þam oþrum tidum.
 17.40.21. To primsange syn þry sealmas gecwedene, ælc on
sundron and nan under anum gloria; ær man þa sealmas beginne, sy ymen
gesungen, þe to þære tide belimpe, æfter þam ferse: <foreign>Deus in
adiutorium meum intende</foreign>.
 17.41.1. Æfter geendunge þara þreora sealma sie an capitul
gecweden and fers and kyrrieleison, and þa beon mid gebedum geendode.
 17.41.3. On undern and on middæg and on non þæt ilece gebed
þære ylecan endebyrdnesse sy geweorðod, þæt is mid ferse and mid
imene þæra sylfra tida mid þrim sealmum, mid rædinge and ferse and
kyrrieleyson, and swa mid gebede beon geendode.
 17.41.7. Gif hit mycel geferæden is, syn hy mid antefene
gesungene, gif seo geferæden lytel is, syn hy forðrihte butan sone
gesungene.
 17.41.9. Þæs æfensanges lof sy mid feower sealmum geendod
mid heora antephanum, æfter þam sealmum sy anes capitules ræding
gecweden, and siðþan reps, ymen, fers, lofsang of ðam godspelle, þæt
is <foreign>Magnificat</foreign>, halsung, þæt is <foreign>Kyrrieleison</foreign> and drihtenlic gebed,
þæt is <foreign>Pater noster</foreign>, and sy swa mid gebede geendad.
 17.41.14. Nihtsang sy mid þrim sealmum geendod; ða sealmas syn
gesungene forðrihte butan antefene; æfter þam ymen, þe to þære
tide belimpe, anes capitules ræding, fers, kyrrieleison, and sy swa mid
gebede geendod.
 18.41.19. HWYLCERE ENDEBYRDNESSE ÐA SEALMAS TO CWEÐENE SYN.
 18.41.21. Syn simle þa dæglican tida on fruman begunnene mid
ferse: <foreign>Deus in adiutorium meum intende</foreign>, and mid: <foreign>Gloria patri</foreign>, and æfter
þam ymen, þe to þære tide belimpe.
 18.41.23. Æfter þam feower capitulas, þæt is feower
todala angin þæs hundteontigeðan and eahtateoðan sealmas, þæt is
<foreign>Beati inmaculati</foreign> oð <foreign>legem pone</foreign>.
 18.42.3. On þam oðrum tidum, þæt is on undern and on
middæg ond on non þry capitulas syn gesungene of ðam foresædan
sealme, þæt is on undern fram <foreign>legem pone</foreign> oþ <foreign>portio mea</foreign>, fram <foreign>portio
mea</foreign> oð <foreign>defecit</foreign>, fram <foreign>defecit</foreign> oð <foreign>lucerna</foreign>.
 18.42.7. On monandæge to primsange syn gesungene þry sealmas,
þæt is se forma and se oþer and se syxta, þæt is <foreign>Beatus uir, Quare
fremuerunt gentes and Domine, ne in furore tuo</foreign>, and swa oþrum dagum on
þære wucan syn forðon þry sealmas gesungen oð þone nigonteoðan
sealm, swa þonne, þæt se nigeða sealm and se seofonteoða syn
todæled on twegen glorian, þæt is <foreign>Confitebor and Diligam te</foreign>.
 18.42.14. And swa syn gefadod, þæt se uhtsang sy begunnen on
sunnannihtum fram ðam twentigeðan sealme, þæt is <foreign>Domine, in uirtute
tua</foreign>.
 18.42.17. On monandæge to undernsange and to middægsange and
to nonsange syn to ælcan þry capitulas gesungene of þam nigan capitulum,
þe to lafe synt of þam hundteontigeðan and eahtateoðan sealme.
 18.42.20. Sy þonne þus geendod se hundteontigeþa and se
eahtateoða sealm on twam dagum, þæt is on sunnandæge and on
monandæge, on tiwesdæge on undern and on middæg and on non syn ðry
sealmas to ælcan þæra gesungene of þisum nigum sealmum, þæt is
fram ðam hundteontigeðan and nigonteoðan sealme oþ þone
hundteontigeðan and þone seofon and twentigeðan.
 18.42.26. Ða sylfan sealmas syn dæghwamlice geedlæhte ofer
ealle wucan gynd þa sylfan tida oð þone sunnandæg; ymenas and capitula
rædinga and fers and halsunga syn anum gemete gehealdene eallum dagum, be
þam þe we ær cwædon, and swa symle eft beginne on þone sunnandæg
fram þam hundteontigeþan and þan eahtateoðan sealme, þæt is <foreign>Beati
inmaculati</foreign>.
 18.43.7. Se æfensang sy dæghwamlice gehendod mid feower
sealma dreame.
 18.43.8. Þa sealmas beginnen fram ðam hundteontigeðan and
þam nigeðan; oð þene hundteontigeþan and þane seofan and
feowertigeðan, þæt is fram <foreign>Dixit dominus oð Laudate dominum de
celis</foreign>, butan þam, þe þær betweox ascyrede synt to oðrum tidsangum,
þæt is fram ðam hundteontigeþan and seofonteoðan oð þone
hundteontigeðan and seofon and twentigeðan, þæt is fram <foreign>Beati
inmaculati oþ Sepe expugnauerunt me</foreign>, and butan þam hundteontigeþan and
þreo and þritigeðan and þam hundteontigeþan and twa and
feowertigeþan, þæt is <foreign>Ecce nunc and Domine exaudi</foreign>, elles ealle þa
oþre syn to ðan æfendreame gesungene.
 18.43.18. Forðam þe þæs sealmgetæles is elles to lyt,
þa þry mæstan sealmas sculon beon todælede on twegen glorian,
þæt is se hundteontigeða and se eahta and þrittigeþa and se
hundteontigeða and se þreo and feowertigeða and se hundteontigeða and
se feower and feowertigeþa, þæt is <foreign>Domine probasti me, and Benedictus,
and Exaltabo te domine</foreign>.
 18.43.24. Se hundteontigeða and se syxteoða, for þan þe hy
lytel is, he sceal beon geþeod þam hundteontigeðan and þam fifteoðan
and þa twegen to anum sealme gesungen.
 18.44.1. To eacan þære endebyrdnesse þara sealma þæs
æfensanges syn oðre þing gefyllede, swa ic bufan gewissode, þæt is
rædinga, ræpsas, ymen, fers and canticas, þæt is <foreign>Magnificat</foreign>.
 18.44.5. To nihtsange mon sceal þa sylfan sealmas ælce niht
geedlæcan, þæt is þone feorðan and þone hundnigontigeðan and
þone hundteontigeðan and þreo and ðritigeþan, þæt is <foreign>Cum
inuocarum te, Qui habitat, and Ecce nunc</foreign>.
 18.44.9. Þus gefadodre endebyrdnesse þæs dæglican
sealmsanges, ealle þa oðre sealmas, þe þær to lafe synt, syn gelice
todælede to þan seofon uhtsangum þære wucan, swa þæt þa
mæstan syn todælede on twegen glorian, and swa to ælcan uhtsange syn
twelf sealmas gesungene.
 18.44.13. We þæs healice myngiað, gif hwam þises
sealmsanges fadung and endebyrdnes mislicað, fadige he sel and endebyrde, gif
him swa þince.
 18.44.15. Swa þeah þæt he þæs gyme, þæt þa
hundteontigandfiftig þæs salteres sealmas syn on ælcer wucan ealle to
þæm tidsangum todælede and gesungene, forþi hit is ealles to sleac
munuca þeowdom heora hyrsumnesse, gif hie læsse singað on þære
wucan þonne þæne saltere ealne mid gewunelican cantican.
 18.44.20. We rædað, þæt þa ealdan fæderas on anum
dæge þæt stiðlice gefyldon, eala þær we asolcene and awacode on
are wucan gelæsten.
 19.45.2. BE SEALMSANGES ÐEAWFÆSTNESSE.
 19.45.3. Æghwar we gelyfað, þæt Godes andweardnes sy and
gesihð, and his eagan behealdað ægþer ge þa godan ge þa yfelan;
þeah swiþost we þæs butan ælcere tweonunge gelyfen, þonne we
æt Godes weorce wuniað.
 19.45.6. Forþy þonne syn we a gemyndige, þæs þe se
witiga þus cwæð: ðeowiað eoweran drihtne mid ege; and eft: Singað
wislice, and: On engla gesihðe ic singe ðe.
 19.45.9. Eornostlice uton besceawian, hu we wunien on Godes
gesyhþe and on his engla; and þonne swa standan æt þam sealmsange,
þæt ure mod geþwærige mid þæs muðes clypunge.
 20.45.14. BE GEBEDES ARWEORÐNESSE.
 20.45.15. Gif we mid rican mannan hwæt embe ure neode manian
willað, þæt we ne gedyrstlæcat butan mid micelre eaðmodnesse; micle
swyþor is to halsienne ealra gesceafta drihten mid ealre eaðmodnesse and
mid ealre underþeodnesse and modes hlutternesse.
 20.45.19. We na ne wenen þæt we no þurh ða
mænigfealdnesse ura gebeda syn gehyrede, ac mid ure heortan hlutternesse and
mid teara anbryrdnesse ure gebeda beoð andfenge.
 20.45.22. Forðy þonne þæt gebed sceal beon scort and
hlutter, butan hwa mid godcundre anbryrdnesse gemanod sy, þæt he his gebed
gelenge; an metincge þeah þæs geferes sy þæt gebed gescyrt, and
geworhtum beacne fram þam ealdre ealle endemes arisen.
 21.46.6. HWYLCE MYNSTRES TEOÐINGEALDRAS BEON SCEOLON.
 21.46.8. Gif seo geferræden to þam micel sy, syn gecorene of
ðam sylfum gebroðrum, þa ðe godes gewittes syn and haligre drohtnunge,
and syn gesette to teoðingealdrum, ða syn emhydige and cariende embe heora
ealdorscypas on eallum þingum æfter Godes bebodum and heora abbodes
hæse.
 21.46.12. Syn þa ealdras swylce gecorene, þæt se abbod his
bryðenna on hy todælan mæge; ne syn hy gecorene be nanre endebyrdnesse,
ac be lifes geearnunge and wisdomes lare.
 21.46.15. Gif heora hwylc þurh þæne truwan his ealdorscipes
færinga toðint and hine on modignesse onhefð, and he on þam leahtre
bið onfunden, sy him æne gestyred and eft and þriddan siðe; gif he
þonne swa ne bete and rihtlæce, he sy of ðam ealdorscype aworpen, and
oþer sy ongeset, ðe þæs wyrðe is.
 21.46.20. And þæt sylfe we settað and tæcað be þam
prafoste.
 22.47.2. BE MUNECA RESTE.
 22.47.3. Ænlypige munecas geond ænlypige bed restan.
 22.47.3. Hy bedreaf onfon æfter heora drohtnunge gemete and
æfter heora abbodes dyhte.
 22.47.5. Gif hit beon mæge, hy ealle on anum huse restan; gif
seo menigo to þam micel sy, þæt hy ne mægen, tynum and twentigum on
anum inne ætgædere restan mid heora ealdrum, þe embe hy carien.
 22.47.8. Leoht on ðæm selfum inne singallice ofer ealle niht
byrne oð leohtne mergen.
 22.47.9. Hy gewædode and begyrde resten and nane sex be heora
sidan næbben, þelæs þe hy on slæpe gewundade weorþan, ac
þæt hy symle gearowe syn, and geworhtum beacne hy butan elcunge arisende
caflice gehwylc oþerne forestæppe and to ðam Godes weorce efste þæt
þonne sy mid mycelre gestæþðignesse and gemetfæstnesse.
 22.47.15. Seo geogoð na getanglice ne licge, ac sio yld þa
geogoðe tolicge.
 22.47.16. To þam Godes weorce arisende, heora ælc oþerne
myngige, þæt þa slapule nane lade næbben.
 23.48.2. BE GYLTA BOTE.
 23.48.3. Gyf hwylc broðor ongyten bið toþunden, oþþe
ungehyrsum, oþþe modig, oðþe ceoriende, oþþe on ænigum þinge
wiðerweard wuniende þam halgum regule, and his yldrena geboda oferhogiend,
þes þyllica æfter Godes gebode sy dyhlice mid wordum tuwa oðþe
þriwa gemyngod.
 23.48.7. Gif he swa ne bete and hine sylfne ne gerihte, he sy
geþread openlice beforan eallum.
 23.48.9. Gif he þonne swa gyt hine selfne ne geriht, gif he ongyt
hu hefigtyme wite hit is, he amænsumenge underhnige; gif he þonne gyt
wiðerræde bið, he lichamlice wrace mid swingelle þolige.
 24.48.14. HWYLC GEMET ON ÐÆRE BOTE TO HEALDENNE SY.
 24.48.15. Æfter þæs gyltes gemete sceal beon gelengen
þære amansumunge gemet oðþe þære steore; stande þara gylta
gemetgung on þæs abbodes dome.
 24.49.1. Þeahhwæþere gif hwylc broðor on lytlum gyltum
byð onfunden, sy he ascyred fram beodes gemænnesse.
 24.49.2. Ðis is mid gesceade to healdenne þæm þe ascyrede
syn fram þam gemænan gereorde, ðæt is þæt hy an cyricean ne
beginnen naðer ne sealm ne antefene, ne rædinge ne ræden oþ fulre
dædbote; his gereordes þigene he ana underfo æfter gebroðra
gereorde.
 24.49.7. Swylc ic þus cweþe: gif þa gebroþru on middæg
gereorden, gereorde he on non; gif hy on non, he on æfen, oþ þæt he o
mid þæslicre dædbote forgifenesse æt Gode begyte.
 25.49.12. BE HEFIGTYMUM GYLTUM.
 25.49.13. Se broðor, se þe mid swærra gylta hæfene bið
gedered and on hefigtymum gyltum bið arasod, sy he ascyred fram gemænre
mysan þigene and eac swa fram þam ingange þære halgan cyrican.
 25.49.16. Nan broðor him nane geþeodrædene to næbbe, ne
on spræce ne on nanum oþrum gemanan; sy he ana wuniende on betæhtre
note mid dædbote and hefefulre hreowesunge, understande eac þone egefullan
cwide, þe se apostol be swa forgyltum cwyþ: Si þus gerad man sceoccan
betæht to flæsces forwyrde, toþy þæt se gast on Godes dome
gehealden sy.
 25.50.3. His metes gereord he ana underfo, þam gemete and on
þære tide, þe se abbod understande, þe him gebyrige.
 25.50.4. Ne he ne sy gebletsod fram nanum þara, þe hine met, ne
se mete þe ma, þe him geseald bið.
 26.50.8. BE ÐAM ÐE BUTAN HESE ÐÆS ABBODES WIÐ ÐA
DÆDBETENDAN ÐEODAÐ.
 26.50.10. Gif hwylc broðor butan his abbodes hæse
gedyrstlæcð, þæt he on ænige wisan ænige geþeodrædene nime
wið þone amansumedan, oðþe þurh ænige spræce oðþe þurh
æniges oþres mannes ærendunge, sy he gelicum gelimpe amansumad, and on
gelicre wrace dædbete.
 27.50.16. HU ABBOD CAREFUL BEON SCEAL YMBE ÐA DÆDBETENDAN.
 27.50.18. Se abbod mid ealre emhydignesse carige embe þa
gyltendan gebroðru, forðy þa halan læces ne lacnunge ne behofiað, ac
þa untruman.
 27.51.1. Forðy on eallum gemete hy scylun læca þeawe on
heora heordræddenne notian; he sceal oft dyhlice ealde witan and
gestæþþige sendan, þæt þone unstaðolfæstan broðor and
þone tweonigendan to dædbote and to his agenre þearfe manigean and hine
swa frefrigean, þæt he þurh mycele gnornunge ne sy on lyre forswolgen.
 27.51.6. Sy on þone synnigan broðor seo soðe lufu acyd and
gefæstnod, and ealle gebroðru for hine gebiddan.
 27.51.9. Þearle swyþe se abbod sceal gyman and mid eallan
gleawscipe hogian, þæt nan sceap of þære heorde ne losige, þe him
betæht is.
 27.51.11. Wite he, þæt he þa gymenne þara untrumra saula
to rihtre lacnunge underfeng and na for ricetere, þe he ofer ða hæbbe,
þe hale syndon; he eac ondræde þa þeowwrace, þe drihten þurh his
witigan ðywð, þus cweþende: þæt ge fættas gesawan, þæt ge
gecuran, and þæt wanhal wæs and alewed, þæt ge awurpan.
 27.51.16. Ac se abbod geefenlæce þa bysene þæs
arfæstan and þæs mildheortan hyrdes, þe uppan þære dune forlet
niganandhundnigantig sceapa, and an, þe ðær losode and dwelede,
geornlice sohte and funde, and þæs sceapes untrumnesse him to ðam
swiðe ofhreaw, þæt he hit ofer his eaxla lede and eft up to þære
heorde bær.
 28.52.2. BE ÐAM ÐE OFT GEÐREAD BEOÐ AND NA ÐE BETERAN NE
BEOÐ.
 28.52.4. Gif hwylc broðor oft rædlice geþread for hwylcum
gylte bið, ne he furðon for amansunge gebetan nelle, ne his þeawas
gerihtlæcan, hine man þreage mid teartran steore, þæt is him sige on
swingella wracu.
 28.52.8. Gif he þænne þurh ða swingella ne bið geriht,
ac on modignesse wuniende mid upahefednesse his yfelan dæda mid leasum talum
bewarian wile, do þænne se abbod swa swa wis læce.
 28.52.11. Gif he sweðunga gegearwode and godcundra myngunga
sealfunga, haligra gewrita lacnunga, and æt nyhstan amansumunge bærnet
and swingella wita þurhteah and ongyt, þæt eal his hogu and gleawscipe
naht framað, he þonne gegearwige, þæt þæt mæst is, his agen
gebed and ealra broðra for hine, þæt drihten, þe ealle þing mæg
and ealra þinga wylt, gehæle þone untruman and þone leahterfullan
broðor.
 28.52.18. Gif he furðon þurh þa gebedu gehæled ne bið,
notige þonne se abbod cyrfes, and mid isene þa uncoðe aceorfe and fram
þære hæle ascyrige, þurh ðæs apostoles mungunge, þe ðus
cwæþ: Afyrrað þone yfelan fram eow; and eft he cwyð: Gif se
getreowleasa gewite, he gewite, þylæs þe an adlig sceap ealle heorde
besmite.
 29.53.6. BE ÐAM ÐE UTFARAÐ HWÆÐER HI MON EFT UNDERFON
SCYLE.
 29.53.8. Se broðor, þe for his agenum lehtre oðþe unðeawe
of mynstre færð oðþe adræfed bið, gif he eft gecyrran wile,
behate ærest bote and geswicenesse ealra þæra unþeawa, þe he fore
adræfed wæs, and he sy onfangen on uteweardre endebyrdnesse, þæt he
þurh þæt sy afandod, hwæþer he mid eadmodnesse gecyrre.
 29.53.14. Gif he þænne eft for his unðeawum utfærð,
oþþe adræfed bið, he þeah sy onfangen oð þan þriddan siðe;
wite he þonne, ofer ðæt þæt him ælces infæres forwyrned bið
and he næfre eft to þam mynstre gecyrran ne þearf.
 30.53.19. BE GEONGRA MANNA STEORE.
 30.53.20. Ælc yld and andgit scylun habban on steore agene
gemetu; forðy þonne geonge cild and stiðe cnapan oðþe þa, ðe
hwonlice understandan magan, hu micel wite is and hu hefigtyme, þæt man on
amansumunge sie, þa ðyllice, þonne hy agyltað, him man styre oðþe
mid swiðlicum fæstenum, oðþe mid teartum swingellum hy wylde, þæt
hy gehælede syn.
 31.54.6. BE MYNSTRES HORDERE
 31.54.7. Se mynstres hordere si gecoren of þære gesamnunge,
wis, on geripedum þeawum, syfre and na oferettol, na drefend, ne teonful, ne
lofgeorn, ac God ondrædende; sy he ealre geferrædenne swa swa fæder.
 31.54.11. He hogige embe ealle ðing; ne do he nan ðing butan
þæs abbodes hæse; healde þæt him beboden sy.
 31.54.12. He his gebroðru ne geunrotsige; gif hwylc broðor
unsceadelice hwæs bidde, he þeah mid forseawennesse hine ne geunrotsige,
ac gesceadwislice mid eaðmodnesse his yfelan bene forwyrne.
 31.54.15. Gehealde he a his geþanc, þæt he mid godan mode
þenige, and sy gemyndig þæs, þe se apostol þus cwyð: Se þe wel
þenað, he godne wyrðscipe him sylfum gestrynð.
 31.54.18. Hæbbe he care and gymene untrumra manna mid ealre
emhydignesse and eac swa cildra and cumena and þearuena, wite he butan tweon,
þæt he æt Godes dome be heom eallum gescead agyldan sceal.
 31.55.1. Ealle mynstres fata and spede he sceal beseon, swylce þa
gehalgedan fata þæs weouedes; ne læte he nan þing to gymeleste; ne he
uncysta na begange, na he lofgeorn ne sy, and he na mynstres æhta ne yte, ne
na myrre, ac ealle þing gemetlice do and æfter his abbodes hæse.
 31.55.6. Hæbbe he eaðmodnesse toforan eallum þingum,
ðæm þe he of mynstres æhta næbbe to syllanne, sylle gode andsware,
forðy hit is awriten, þæt seo gode antswaru sy ouer ða selestan
selene.
 31.55.9. Hæbbe he under his gymene eal, þæt se abbod him
betæce; and he furðor ne gedyrstlæce to donne, þonne him beboden sy.
 31.55.11. Þa gesettan bileouene his gebroðrum gebeode on rihtne
timan buton late and gnornunge, þæt hy ne geunrotsigen, sy gemyndig
þære godcundan clypunge, hwæt se geearnige, þe geæbylið enne
þara læstena, þe on God behycgað.
 31.55.15. Gif seo geferræden swa micel sy, sy him frouer and
fultum geseald, he mid heora fultume efnum mode and gladum þa ðenunga, þe
him befæste syn, lustbære gefylle.
 31.55.18. On gedafenum tidum syn gesealde þa þincg, þe to
syllenne synt, and syn gebedene, þe to biddene synt, þæt nænig sy
gedreued, ne geunrotsige on Godes huse.
 32.56.2. BE MYNSTRES TOLUM AND GEHWYLCUM ÆHTUM.
 32.56.3. Mynstres æhta on tolum oðþe on reafum oðþe on
oðrum gehwylcum þingum syn betæhte to bewitenne þam gebroþrum, þe
heora lif and þeawas gode gecorene syn and þam abbode orsorge, and he þa
betæce þæm, þe heora notian sceolan and heora eft underfon.
 32.56.7. Hæbbe se abbod a mid him gewrit ealra þæra
æhta; þonne seo notu on gebroðra gewrixle bið, sy þæt gewis a mid
þam abbode, þæt he wite, hwæt betæht sy and hwæt underfangen.
 32.56.11. Gif heora hwylc fullice oðþe gymeleaslice mynstres
þing behwyrfe, sy him gestyred; gif he betan nele, underlicgge he rihtlicre
þreale.
 33.56.15. Be ðam ðæt munecas syndrige æhte næbben.
 33.56.16. Healicast and swidost mon scel þone unþeaw of mynstre
wanian and mid ealle awyrtwalian, þæt nænig ne gedyrstlæce, ænig
ðing to syllenne oðþe to nimine, butan þæs abbodes hæse, he ne
nan ðing syndries ne age, ne nan þing eallunga, ne furðon boc, ne
weaxbreda, ne græf, ne on eallum þingum nan ðing.
 33.57.1. Eornestlice, hwæt scel he agan on sundrum, þe
furðon his agenne lichoman ne his agen mod ne sceal agan on his agenum
gewealde?
 33.57.3. Ealra neadþinga he sceal hihtan and wilnigan fram his
mynstres fæder.
 33.57.4. Ne he nan þing næbbe butan þæs abbodes sylene
and geþauunge; syn heom ealle þing gemæne, swa swa hit awriten is on
þara apostola drohtnunge, be þam muneca lif is gebysenod.
 33.57.7. Ne nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he ænig þing
syndries hæbbe oðþe furðon þæt word gecweþe, þæt he agen
hæbbe.
 33.57.10. Gif hwa on þysan manfullan and forcuðestan unðeawe
ænigne lust hæbbe, oðþe þurh myngunge his ealdrena geswice,
oðþe hine man mid swyðlicum and lichwamlicum þrealum gewylde.
 34.57.15. BE ÐÆM ÐÆT MAN EALLUM MUNECUM GELICE DON NE
SCYLE.
 34.57.17. Syn gehwam behefe þing and alefede gesealde, be þam
þe hit on ðara apostola drohtnunge awriten is þisum wordum: ælcan
ænlypium wæs geseald be ðam, þe he behofade.
 34.57.19. Ne ongyte we on þisse clypunge, þæt þær
ænigra hada andfencg wære, þæt is þæt ænig be liues
ricetere, ac ælc be his neode and untrumnesse ancnawen wære; se þe on
geferrædenne be lytlum and be eaðum þingum beon mæge, þancige he
þæs Gode, and he ne geunrotsige, þeah man mare do oþrum, þe furðor
behofað.
 34.58.2. Se þe be maran þingan beon scyle for hwylcere
lichomlicre tyddernesse, geeaðmede hine for his untrumnesse and hine na ne
anhebbe on ðæt, swylce hit for geearnungum oþþe geþincðum gedon
sy, þæt mon for mildheortnesse dyde: and swa ealle þa lima beoð on
sibbe.
 34.58.7. Toforan eallum þingum we myngiað, þæt næfre
nanre ceorunge yfelnes for ænigum þinge on ahwylcum worde oðþe
getacnunge geswutelod wurðe; gif hwa on ðam unðeawe anfunden sy, hine man
mid stiðum þrealum gewylde.
 35.58.12. BE WICÐENUM.
 35.58.13. Gebroðru gemænelice heom betwyh þenien, and
nænig sy beladod fram þære kycenan þenunge, buton hwa mid untrumnesse
oðþe mid bysegum ofset sy, þæt he hit don ne mæge; þurh þa
gemænan þenunge þysse hyrsumnesse byð seo mæste lufu Godes and
manna gestryned.
 35.58.17. Sy fultum geseald þam wacmodum and þam unstrangum,
þæt hi mid unrotnesse þa hyrsumnesse ne don, ac habban ealle fultum and
frouer be þære geferædene mycelnesse and be þære stowe staðole
and getæsnesse.
 35.59.2. Gif seo geferræden micel bið, sy se hordere aspeled
æt þære þenunge and eac swa þa, þe mid miclum bysegum ofsette
syn; elles þa oþre ealle heom gemænelice betwyh on þisse þenunge
þeowian.
 35.59.6. Ðære kycenan wicþenas on ðone sætresðæg
ægðer ge fata þwean, ge wæterclaðas wacsan, þe hy heora handa and
fet mid wipedan; þwean on þan sylfan dæge ealra gebroðra fet,
ægðer ge þære wucan wicþenas, ge þære toweardan.
 35.59.10. Heora þeningfata clæne and hale þam hordere
betæcen; se hordere eft þære toweardan wucan wicþenum þa ylcan
þeningfata betæce, and wite ægðer ge hwæt he underfo ge hwæt he
betæce.
 35.59.13. Ða wicþenas anre tide ær gemænum gereorde gan
to hlafe and sume ænlypige siþe drincan, and þæt sy toforan gesetre
bigleouene, þæt hy þe glædlicor butan gedeorfe and miclum geswince
heora gebroðrum on ætes timan þenien; ðehhweþere freolstidum beon
butan þam hlafgange and drynce, oðþæt hi mæssan hæbben.
 35.59.18. Sunnandagum þa wicþenas, ge þære ærran wucan
ge þære toweardan, sona æfter dægredsange innan cyrican betyrnan hy
wið ealra geferena cneowa, swa biddende, þæt heom foregebeden sy.
 35.59.21. Se þe þa ærran wicþenunga geendod hæbbe,
þonne he ut of þære wicþenunge fære, cweþe þis fers þus
þanciende: Gebledsod þu eart, drihten ælmihtig, þe me on þysse
ðenunge gefultumadest and gefrefrodest; and þis fers sy þriwa gecweden,
and swa mid bledsunge of þære wicþenunge fare.
 35.60.4. Æfterfylige þære toweardan wucan wicþen and
þus cweþe: Begim þu, God, me to fylste, efst þu, drihten, me to
fultume; and þæt sylue fers sy geedlæht þriwa fram ealre
geferrædenne, and swa mid bletsunge his wicþenunge beginne.
 36.60.10. BE UNTRUMUM GEBROÐRUM.
 36.60.11. Untrumra manna gymen is to healdenne toforan eallum
þingum, þæt heom swa geþenod sy, swa swa man Gode sylfan wolde,
forðy þe he sylf cwæþ: Untrum ic wæs, and ge geneosedan me, and:
þæt ge anum þam læstan, þe mine synd, dydon, þæt ge dydon me.
 36.60.15. Witen eac þa sylfan untruman, þæt heom for Godes
arwyrðnesse gehyrsumod and geþenod sy, and hy mid heora ouerflowednesse ne
gedrefen þa gebroðru, þe heom þeniað.
 36.60.18. Sy eornostlice seo mæste hogu þæm abbode,
þæt hy forgymeleasede ne syn.
 36.60.20. Sy þam untrumum gebroðrum synderlice cyte geset and
to þam anum betæht; se þen, þe heom þenað, sy careful, God
luuiende and ondrædende.
 36.60.22. Bæþ þam untrumum, swa oft swa hit framige, sy
gebodum; halum and huru þam geongum sy seldor and lator getiðod.
 36.61.1. Flæscæt þam untrumum and þam wanhalum for
geedstaþelunge sy geðafod; sona swa hy geedwyrpte beoð and gestrangode,
þam flæscæte forhæbben æfter gewunelicum þeawe.
 36.61.5. Hæbbe se abbod mycele gymene, þæt þa untruman
fram þam horderum and þam þeningmannum ne syn forgymeleasede, forðy eal
he mot astundian, swa hwæt swa fram his gingrum forgymeleasod bið.
 37.61.10. BE EALDUM MUNECUM AND CILDGEONGUM.
 37.61.11. Þeah hit gecyndelic sy on menniscum gewunan, þæt
man mildheortnesse cyðe þam oferealdum and þam cildgeongum,
þeahhweþere ne scylen hy beon butan regole, þæt is lifes rihtinge.
 37.61.14. Sy simle gesceawod on hy heora untrumnys and
natoðæshwon regoles stræc gehealden on heora bileouan; and sy
mildheortnes on hy acyþed, and mid heora þygene forhradian þa regolican
tida.
 38.62.2. BE ÐÆRE WUCAN RÆDERE.
 38.62.3. Gebroðra gereorde æt hyra mysum ne sceal beon butan
haligre rædinge.
 38.62.4. Ne nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he færlice boc
gelæcce and þær butan foresceawunge onginne to rædenne; ac þære
wucan rædere on ðone sunnandæg mid bletsunge hit beginne.
 38.62.7. Se þonne æfter mæssan and huslgonge wilnige,
þæt him fram eallum foregebeden sy, þæt God ælmihtig upahefednesse
gast fram him ado, and sy þis fers him beginnendum þriwa gecweden fram
eallum: Drihten, geopena þu mine welleras, and min muð bodige þin lof;
and þus mid bletsunge beginne þære rædinge þenunge.
 38.62.13. Sy þænne healic swige æt þæm gereorde,
þæt nanes mannes stefn oðþe reonung þærinne gehyred ne sy, butan
þæs ræderes anes.
 38.62.15. Gif hy etende oðþe drincende hwylcera þinga
behofien, þæt sy mid sumere getacnunge gebeden and na mid menniscre
stefne.
 38.62.17. Ne furþon hyra nan ne gedyrstlæce, þæt he be
þære sylfan rædinge þærinne ænig ðing ahsige, oðþe be
ænigum oðþrum þingum, þelæs þe ænig incca geseald sy, butan
hit þæt sy, þæt se ealder hwæt scortlice of þære rædinge
to hyra gastlican getimbrunge gereccan wille.
 38.63.1. Ðære wucan rædere gange to hlaue and drince,
ærðam þe he beginne to rædenne, for ðæs halgan husles þigene
and þæt him to langsum his fæsten ne þince; ete him eft æfter his
rædinge mid þeningmannum.
 38.63.5. Ne ræden gebroðru, ne ne singen be nanre
endebyrdnesse, ac ða syn gecorene to ðære note, þe hit don cunnon and
oþre getimbrien mægen.
 39.63.9. BE ÆTES GEMETE.
 39.63.10. We gelyfað, þæt genoh sy to dæghwamlicum
gereorde twa gesodene sufel for missenlicra manna untrumnesse; gif hwa for
hwylcre cisnesse þæs anes brucan ne mæge, bruce huru þæs oðres.
 39.63.13. Gif mon æppla hæbbe oðþe hwylces oþres cynnes
eorðwæstmas, sy þæt to þriddum sufle.
 39.63.14. Sy anes pundes gewihte hlaf to eallum dæge.
 39.63.15. Gif hy on twa mæl etað, sy gehealden þæs
pundmætan hlafes se þridda dæl to þam æfengifle.
 39.63.17. Gif hi mid weorces geswince to ðam swiðe ofsette
beoð, þæt hi hwilces eacan behofien, stande se eaca on ðæs abbodes
dome, þæt þonne swa sy foresceawod, swa þær næfre oferfyl ne
filige, forþi nis cristenum monnum nan ðing swa wiðerweardlic and
hefigtyme swa swa oferfyl, be ðam se hælend sylf þus clypað:
Warniað, þæt eowere heortan ne syn ofersymede mid oferfylle.
 39.64.3. Geongum cnapum ne sy bileofa geseald be ðam ilicum
gemete, ac læsse þonne þæm mærum, þæt forhæfednes
ægðer ge on ylde ge on geogoðe simble gehealden sy.
 39.64.6. Ealle endemes fram flæscæte eallum gemete hi
forhæbben, butan þam wanhalum anum and þam legerfæstum.
 40.64.9. BE DRINCES GEMETE.
 40.64.10. Anra gehwylc hæfð syndrige gyfe fram Gode, sume
furðor þonne sume; and forðy þænne ic mid tweoningum oðrum monnum
bileofan gesette; we þeah manna untrumnesse and tydernesse besceawiende
gelyfað, þæt genoh sy ænlypigum munuce to dæges drence, þæs
wines gemet, þe is emina gehaten.
 40.64.15. Witan þeah þa, þe mid geðylde fram wine
forhabbað, þæt hy æt Gode mycele and agene mede habbað.
 40.64.16. Gif þonne þære stowe neod oþþe gedeorf
oðþe sumerhæte hwylces eacan behofige, sy þæt on ðæs abbodes
dome, and þone eacan swa forsceawige, swa hy næfre mid oferfylle
undersmogene and beswicene ne weorðan.
 40.64.21. We þeah rædað, þæt munecum eallunga to
windrince naht ne belimpe, ac forðy þe þæt munecum on urum timan
gelæred beon ne mæg, we þa geðafunga þæs drynces on þa wisan
doð, þæt þær næfre seo fyl be fullum ne weorðe.
 40.65.2. Ac sy a on þære þigene forhefednes, þæt he him
læsse nime þænne hine lyste, forðy win gedeþ, þæt furðon
witan oft misfoþ and fram rihtum geleafan bugan.
 40.65.5. Ðær wana þurh þære stowe hæfenleaste sy,
þæt man þæt fulle wines gemet habban ne mæge, ac mycele læsse,
oðþe eallunga næne dæl, bletsien þa heora drihten, þe ðær
wunian, and hy na forðy ne ceorien, ne mid mode ne besargien; toforan eallum
þingum we ðæs mynegunge doð, þæt hy butan ceorunge syn.
 41.65.12. BE GEREORDES TIDUM.
 41.65.13. Fram þam halgan eastrum oð pentecosten eten
gebroþru on twa mæl, þæt is ærest on ðære syxtan tide and eft
on æfen.
 41.65.15. Fram pentecosten ouer ealne sumar fæstan twegen dagas
on þære wucan, þæt is on wodnesdæg and frigedæg, butan hy
ouermicel geswinc habben, oðþe swiðlic hæte þæs sumeres derige;
oþrum dagum etan on twa mæl, þæt is to middæges and eft on
æuen.
 41.65.19. Gif hy ut an æcere wurc habben, oðþe þæs
sumeres welm to swiðlic bið, þæs middæges gereord is singallice to
anlætenne, þæt þonne sy on ðæs abbodes foregesceawunge.
 41.66.2. He ealle þing swa gemetegige and gefadige, þæt huru
þa sawla gehealdene syn, and þæt þæt gebroðru wyrcen, wyrcan
þæt butan ceorunge.
 41.66.4. Fram idus septembris oð lenctenes anginne hy on an
mæl to nones gereorden.
 41.66.5. Ouer eallencten oþ eastran hy oð æfen fæsten.
 41.66.6. And se æfen swa sy gefadod, þæt hy candelleohtes
æt ðam gereorde ne behofien, ac eallu ðing be dæges leohte gefyllede
syn.
 41.66.8. On ælcne timan swa sy gefadod, swaþær hit sy, swa
an mæl swa twa, þæt eallu þing be dæges leohte gefadode syn.
 42.66.12. BE MUNECA SWIGAN ÆFTER NIHTSANGE.
 42.66.13. On ælcne timan munecas swigan began scylan, þeah
ealra swiðost on niht.
 42.66.14. Sam hy fæsten, sam hy ne fæsten, gif hit þonne
beo seo tid æfengereordes, arisen hy sona, swa hy heora mete hæbben, and
sitten on anre stowe, and ræde him mon þa raca oðþe lif þæra
heahfædera, oðþe sum þing, þe hy to Gode tyhte.
 42.66.18. Ne ræde him mon nauðer ne Moyses boc, ne Regum,
forðæm þæm unandgytfullum þæt gastlice angyt is earfoþe to
understandende butan haligra manna trahtnunge.
 42.67.1. Ræde hy mon þeah oþrum tidum on cirican, þonne
hit togebyrige; gif hit þonne fæstendagas beon, þonne ymbe lytel
þæs þe æfen gesungen sy, gangan hy eft and gehyran þa bufan
cwedenan rædingæ.
 42.67.5. Samnige ealgeferræden to þære rædincge, sy heom
swylc hyrsumnes betæht, swylc him sy, hy þa forlæten and to ðære
rædincge mid ofste cumen, and feower leafum oþþe fifum oðþe swa
mycel, swa þæs dæges lyhtincg geþauige, of þære boce
geræddum, ealle endemes heora nihtsang singan and ða gebedo þæs
tidsanges anmode mid anbryrdnesse gefyllen.
 42.67.11. Æfter þæm nihtsange ne sy nanum alyfed, þæt
he ænig word cweþe, butan hit swa limpe, þæt hwylc cuma unmyndluncga
cume and se abbod for ðære neode hwilcum heora hwæt gebeode; ðæt
þonne sy dygellice mid micelre gemetfæstnesse and gestæþþignesse
gedon.
 42.67.15. Gif hwa þonne butan þisse neode ðises regoles
swigan abrece, sy he gewitnod mid hetolre steore.
 43.67.18. BE ÐAM ÐE TO LATE TO TIDSANGE AND TO BEODFERSE
CUMAÐ.
 43.67.20. Sona swa þæt beacn þæs belhrincges gehyred
bið, þærrihte forlæte æghwylc swa hwæt swa he on handa
hæfde, and mid ofste þone tidsang þære godcundan þenunge gesece,
onette þeah mid gestæþignesse and no mid higeleaste, ne yrne he,
þelæs he mid þæs rynes eðgunge hwylcne wleattan and sogeðan on
his heortan ne astyrige.
 43.68.4. Ne sy nan ðing geset toforam þam Godes weorce, ne nan
ðing swa besorh, þæt he his tidsang fore forlæte.
 43.68.7. Se þe to ðæs uhtsancges anginne ne cume, ær
þæs feowerandhundneogantigan sealmes gloria sy gesungen, þonne we eac
forði on ðam sancge lencgað, ne stande he on chore on his stede and
endebyrdnesse, ac stande he ealra ytemest, oðþe on ðam stede, þe se
abbod swa gemeleasum monnum to stealle on sundrum betæht hæfð, swa
þæt he sy gewend fram þam abbode and fram eallum his geferum, and
geendedum tidsancge openlice hreousigende bete, ðæt is, astrecce hine
æt þæs tidsanges ende and mid þære gesewenlican dædbote his
gymeleaste eaðmodlice gebete.
 43.68.16. We forði tæhton, þæt hy on uteweardan oðþe
onsundrum standen, þæt hy for ðære sceame and for gewande þara,
þe him onlociað, gebeterede syn and eft cafran to Godes þeowdome.
 43.68.19. Witodlice, gif we him butan cirican for ðære
gemeleaste betæhton, wen is, þæt sume oðþe sleaclice lagon and
slepon, oðþe sittende mid idelre spellunge deofle to micelne forwyrdes
intingan gesealden.
 43.68.22. Ac he gange in, þæt him se tidsancg ealnuncge ne
losige, and þæt he on ðæm anginne forgymeleasode, gefullige and
forðon gebete.
 43.69.1. On þæm dæglicum tidum, se ðe to ðam anginne
þæs tidsanges ne cume, ær ðæm þe se gloria þæs forman
sealmes sy gesungen, stande on uteweardan, ealswa we ær cwædon; ne he ne
gedyrstlæce, þæt he hine þæm chore geþeode, oðþe on his
endebyrdnesse stande, buton se abbod him geþafunge mid leafe sylle.
 43.69.7. Sy þeah seo leaf on ða wisan, þæt þær seo
foresæde bot fylige and hine mid þæm eaðmodlice scyldigne
gesweotolige.
 43.69.9. Se þe to his beodferse ne cume, ac for sumum hwilces
unþeawes leahtre gemænlice mid gebroðerum his drihten, þe is ealra
gereorda gifend, mid herincge ne ðancað, sy him tuwa mid wordum gestyred.
 43.69.12. Gif he be þisse steore gebetan nele, ne sy him
gemæne þigen mid gebroðrum geþafod, ac he ana gereorde, ascyred fram
his gebroðrum, and be dæle æt and wæt gewanod sy, oðþæt he
þæs gyltes gymeleaste gebete.
 43.69.15. On þas ilican wisan þolige and þæt bete, þe
æt þam ferse ne bið, þe man æfter gereorde cwið.
 43.69.18. Ne gedyrstlæce nan, ne ær gesettere tide ne
æfter, nan ðing to ðigenne, ne on æte ne on wæte.
 43.69.19. Gif hwam fram his ealdore geboden sy to ðigene, and he
hit mid gebelge forsace, ne sy him to gewilnedum mæle nanre oðere þigene
getiðod, buton þæs ilican, þe he ær forsoc, oðþæt he mid
þæslicre dædbote gebete.
 44.70.2. BE ÐAM AMANSUMEDAN HU HI DÆDBETAN.
 44.70.3. Ða þe for swærum and hefigtymum gylte fram cyricean
and gemænre beodes þigene ascyrede synt, æt ælces tidsanges
geenduncge licgan hy ætforan þære cyrican dyre and forhtige astrehte to
ðara gebroðra fotum, þe ut of cyrican gangen, nan ðincg mid muþe
clypiende.
 44.70.7. And þæt swa lange don, oþ þæt þam abbode
ðince, þæt hi fulbet hæbben.
 44.70.8. Siðþan him æfter þære bote geboden byð,
þæt he to þam abbode cume, gefealle ærest þæs abbodes fet and
syðþan ealra þara gebroþra and eadmodlice bidde, þæt hy ealle him
to Gode mid heora gebedrædene þingian.
 44.70.12. Æfter þam, gif þam abbode swa þince, sy he
onfangen on chore on swylcere endebyrdnesse, swylce þam abbode þince, swa
þeh þæt he nane þenunga on cirican onsundrum ne beginne, ær eft se
abbod beode.
 44.70.15. Ac æt ælces tidsanges geendunge astrecce hine
eallum limum on þam ylecan stede, þe he stande.
 44.70.17. And forðon on þa wisan mid hreowsunge dædbete,
oð hit þam abbode fulbet þince and hine geswican hate.
 44.70.20. Ða þe for lytlum gylte fram gemænum gebroðra
gereorde ascyrede beoð, þa on cirican þæslice dædbetan and þæt
fuldon on þæs abbodes hæse, oð þæt he hine bletsige and secge,
þæt hit fulbet sy.
 45.71.4. BE ÐÆM ÐE ON CYRICEAN MISFON.
 45.71.5. Gif hwylc broðor wægð and misfehð on boduncge
sealma, oðþe ræpsa, oðþe antefena, oðþe rædincge, butan he
þærrihte beforan eallum hine dædbetende geeaðmede, he stiðran and
teartran steore underfo, eornostlice, þa he ær mid eaðmodnesse his gylt
gehælan nolde.
 45.71.9. Geonge men for swa geradum gylte swingelle þolian.
 46.71.12. BE ÐAM ÐE ON LYTLUM ÞINGUM GYLTAÐ.
 46.71.13. Se broðor, se þe giltig ameldod bið þam abbode
and his gebroþrum þurh oðerne man and no þurh hine selfne, he maran and
stiþran steore underfo, gif he aðor dyde, oðþe ofergimde, oðþe
forgeat, oðþe tobræc ænig þing on þære hyrsumnesse, þe he
onhyrsumode, aþer oðþe on kycenan, oþþe on hederne, oðþe on
mynstres bæcerne, oþþe on wyrtune, oðþe on ænigum oðerum
cræfte, þe he mid lichomlicum geswince onhyrsumode.
 46.72.2. Sy him seo steor þe stiðre, þe he him sylf his gylt
ameldian nolde.
 46.72.4. Gif his saule gyltas oþerum monnum digle beoð and him
sylfum cuðe, mid his andetnesse onwreoða his abbode, oþþe suman swa
gastlicum breðer, þe halfæst sy and his saule wundela gehælan cunne
and hi gewidmærsian nelle.
 47.72.9. BE GETACNIENDLICUM TIDUM GODES WEORCES.
 47.72.10. Sy þæs abbodes gymen, þæt mon ealle tida
þæs godcundan þeowdomes on rihte timan and gedafenlican hrincge,
oþþe he sylf ælce tid getacnige, oðþe swylcum carefullan breðer
þa gymene betæce, þe ælce tid on þæslicum timan mid beacne
geswytelige and nane tid þæs godcundan weorces ne forgymeleasige.
 47.72.16. Sealmas and antefenas be endebyrdnesse æfter þam
abbode beginnen, þa þe hit beboden bið.
 47.72.17. Ne gedyrstlæce hyra ænig, þæt he aðor do,
oðþe ræde, oðþe singe, butan he þa þenunge forðbringan
mæge, swa þæt he þa getimbrige and no ne gedrefe þa, ðe hine
gehyrað.
 48.73.2. BE DÆGHWOMLICUM WEORCUM, AND HWILCUM TIDUM HI RÆDAN
SCYLON.
 48.73.4. A bið idelnes þære saule feond, forðy þænne
sculan þa gebroðra hwiltidum beon abysegode mid heora handa geswince,
hwiltidum mid godcundre rædinge.
 48.73.6. We þænne forþy gelyfaþ, þæt mid þisse
gefaduncge ægðres weorces tima mæge beon geendebyrd: fram eastron oþ
kalendas octobris, sona swa hy fram primsange gangen, wyrcen locahwæt
þonne þearf sy, oð hit sy forneah an tid ouer undern; æfter ðam
rædan heora bec oð middæg.
 48.73.11. Æfter middæge, siððan hy gereorde beoð, gan
to hyra reste mid ealre stilnesse; gif hwam þonne leofre sy, þæt he
ræde, þonne he reste, ræde swa, þæt he oþre mid gehlyde ne
geunstille.
 48.73.14. Sy se non geradod and sy gehringed, þonne seo
eahteoðe tid bið healf agan; wyrcan syðþan, þæt neod sy, oð
æfen.
 48.73.16. Gif þonne swa micel þearf þære stowe beo,
þæt hy sculan sylfe hyra andlyfene gaderian, and hy on þam abysegode
beon, ne beon hy þeah geunrotsod, forþam þæt beoð þonne riht
munecas, gif hy libbað be þam geswince heora agenra handa, swa swa ure
fæderas and þa apostolas dydon.
 48.74.1. Beo hit þeah eal mid gemete, þelæs þe þa
wacmodan beon ormode.
 48.74.3. Ðonne from kalendas octobris oð lenctenfæsten
ræden hy heora bec, oð beo an tid to underne; wyrcen siðþan oð non
locahwæt him mon tæce.
 48.74.5. Siðþan hy þone forman cnyl to none gehyren, gangen
hy ealle from hyra weorce and don hy gearuwe, þæt hy magon to cirican gan,
þonne mon eft cnylle.
 48.74.7. Ðonne eft æfter heora nongereorde rædan hy eft
heora bec, oðþe hyra sealmas singen.
 48.74.10. Þonne on lenctenfæsten ræden heora bec from
ærmorgenne oð heane undern and wyrcen þæt, þæt þearf sy, oþ
beo an tid ofer non.
 48.74.12. Nime heora ælc on ðam fæstendagum sume boc of
þære bibliothecan, and rædan þa; sylle hie him mon onforan lencten.
 48.74.14. Beon gesette an oðþe twegen ealde witan, þe
þæt mynster geondgangen and þæs gyman, þæt þær nan broðor
ymbe idelnesse and unnette spræce beo and ne beo ymbe his rædinge, þa
hwile þe þa oðre rædan; ne biþ he na him anum unnyt, ac eac þa
oþre to ðæm tyht.
 48.74.18. Gif þær þonne hwylc bið gemet þus donde, swa
hit na ne weorðe, þonne styre him mon æne oðþe tua; gif he hit
þonne ne gebete, beo he þære regolican steore underðeod, swa þeah,
þæt þa oðre þy maran ege habban.
 48.74.22. Ne nan broðor wið oþerne ne þeode, ne mid his
þeodrædenne ne lette on unþæslicum timan.
 48.75.1. Sunnandagum rædan þa gebroðra halige bec, butan
hwylcum þenuncg betæht sy.
 48.75.3. Gif þær þonne hwylc broðor beo gemet swa gymeles
and swa asolcen, þæt he nelle, oðþe ne mæge halige bec smeagan
oðþe rædan, tæce him man oþer weorc, þæt he ealles unnyt ne
beo.
 48.75.7. Ðam untrumum gebroðrum, oðþe þæm mearewum and
þam unweorcheardum tæce heom mon sum weorc, þæt hy unnytte ne syn, ne
hy mid nanum weorces ungemete oðþe stiðnesse ofsette syn, þæt hy mid
þæm ungemete afligede ne syn; ðæm abbode is a to behealdenne heora
wanhalnes.
 49.76.2. BE LENCTENES GYMENE.
 49.76.3. Ðeah munecas eallum tidum sceolon forhæfdnesse habban
fæstenes and to feawa manna þæt lif swa stiðlice hylt, þeah ealra
swiðost healdan hy forhæfednesse clænsunge on lenctenfæstenne, swa
þæt hy þonne on ðæm halgum dagum fordiligen, þæt hy ær on
oþrum tidum mid gemeleste forleton.
 49.76.7. Ðæt ðænne bið rihtlice gefadod, gif hy fram
eallum leahtrum and unþeawum hy sylfe forhabbað; beon hy forþy geornfulle
on gastlicum rædincgum and on halgum gebedum and onbryrdnesse heora
heortan.
 49.76.12. Geycan hy on þysum dagum hwæthwega to heora þam
gewunelican þeowdome.
 49.76.13. Hæbben hy forhæfdnesse on heora mettum and drincum,
þæt heora ælc heora agenes willes Gode sumne dæl bringe mid gefean
þæs halgan gastes of þam bufan cwedenan gemete heora andlyfene, and
began hy geornlice syndrige gebeda and forhæfdnesse healdan, ægðer ge
on æte, ge on wæte, ge on slæpe, and hy georne bewerian, ge nu, ge on
ælcne timan wið leohtbrædnesse idelra worda and unnyttra gebæra,
þæt hy þara eastrona onbiden mid gefean þære gastlican gewilnunge.
 49.77.2. And þæt hy godes þances of heora andlyfene sellen,
don hy þæt be þæs abbodes leafe and geþafunge; forðæm swa
hwæt swa hy butan his leafe doþ and his geþafunge, þæt biþ
swiðor to gymeleste and to idlum gylpe to tellanne, þonne to ælmessan.
 49.77.6. Ælc þæra þinga, þe hy don, don hy hit be
þæs abbodes leafe.
 50.79.2. BE ÐAM GEBROÐRUM ÐE FEOR FRAM CYRICEAN WYRCAÐ.
 50.79.4. Ða gebroðra, þe feor synd on geswince and for þan
fyrlene on þam gedafenlicum tidum hyra cyrican and hyra tidsangas gesecan ne
magon, gif se abbod þæt ongyt, þæt hit swa sy, gefyllan hi hira tida
þærrihte þær hy wyrcan, and mid godcundan ege heora cneowa
eaðmodlice gebigan.
 50.79.9. Don handswagelice þa, þa on færelde synd, and hi na
forgyman þa gesettan tida, ac ælcne tidsang gefyllan, swa hy selest
mægen; þa gewunelican wæge hyra þeowdomes ne for weorces bysegum, ne
for færeldes hi nateshwon forgymelesian.
 51.79.14. BE ÐAM GEBROÐRUM ÐE ON FARE SYNDON.
 51.79.15. Ða gebroþra, þe for hwylcere neode utfarað and
þy ilcum dæge to mynstre cuman mægen, ne dyrstlæcen hi þæt hy
ahwær ut of mynstre etan, þeah hy hwa bidde, butan hit him from heora
abbode geboden sy.
 51.79.18. Gif hwa hit þonne butan his leafe gedyrstlæce, beo
he on amansumunge.
 52.81.2. BE MYNSTRES GEBEDHUSE.
 52.81.3. Gebedhus sy to þan anum, þe hit gecweden is, þæt
is, þæt þær nan þincg elles geworht ne sy oðþe gefadod, butan
þam anum weorce, þe to Gode belimpð, þæt is gebedræden.
 52.81.6. Æt endunge ælces tidsanges gan hy ut ealle mid
þære mæstan swigan and sy God gearwyrðod þæt se broþor, þe
hine synderlice to Gode gebiddan wile, ne sy gehremmed oðþe gelet mid
æniges oþres onhrope.
 52.81.9. Gif hwylc hyra eft onsundran diglice gebiddan wille, mid
stilnesse anfealdlice he ingange and hine gebidde, na mid hluddre stefne, ac
mid teara wope and mid his heortam and ealles geþances gymene.
 52.81.12. Eornestlice, þa ðe þyllic weorc þærinne wyrcan
nellað, ne sy him nan wunung þærinne geþafod æfter þæs
tidsanges geendunge, þylæs þe þa geremmede synd, þe þa synderlican
gebeda lufiað.
 53.81.17. BE CUMENA ANDFENGE.
 53.81.18. Ealle cuman þe to mynstre cumað, syn hy onfangenne,
swylce hit Crist sylf sy, forþy þe he sylf þus cwæþ on ðam halgan
godspelle: Ic wæs cuma, and ge onfengon min; sy him eallum þæslic and
gedafenlic wyrðment gegearewod, þeah swiðost þam rihtgelyfedum urum
gehusum and þam forwrecenum elþeodegum.
 53.83.3. Forðy eornestlice, sona swa se cuma gecyd sy, gange him
se ealder togeanes, oðþe þa gebroðra, mid ealre þenunge þære
soðan lufe, and hy ærest hy samod gebidden and swa syn on soðre sibbe
geferlæhte.
 53.83.6. Ne sy sibbecos heom geboden, ærþam þe hi to Gode hi
gebidden and bletsunge underfon, for missenlicum deofoles gebysmerungum.
 53.83.8. On þære gemænan gretinge sy eal eaðmodnes
geboden and gegearwod eallum cumum, þe to mynstre cumað, oðþe fram
mynstre farað: anlute him eaðmodlice to mid þam heafde, oðþe ealne
lichoman on eorðan astrecce, and Crist sy swa mid eaðmodnesse gebeden, þe
simle on cuman onfangen bið.
 53.83.13. Syn hi to cyrican gelædde to gebede, and siðþan hi
underfangene beoð, sitte him æfter ðan se ealdor mid, oðþe se, þe
he hate.
 53.83.15. Sy beforan þam cuman geræd seo godcunde æ and
lar, þæt he sy getrymed to Godes willan, æfter þam beo him gegearewod
gehyðlice eal mennislic fremfulnes.
 53.83.18. Abrece se ealdor his fæsten for cumena þingum, butan
hit hwylc healic fæsten sy, þe man abrecan ne dyrre; þa gebroðra
healdan þeahhweþere hyra fæsten æfter gewunan.
 53.83.21. Geote se abbod wæter þam cumum to handum; þwean
ealra cumena fet, ægþer ge se abbod ge eal seo geferræden; æfter
þam þweale sy þis fers þus gecweden: We anfengun, drihten, þine
mildheortnesse on þam midlene þines temples.
 53.85.1. Sy þam abbode seo mæste hogu þæs andfenges
þearfena and elþeodigra, forþan Crist us on hy swiðost bið onfangen;
ðara ricra manna ege and hoga gemyngað, þæt him selfum weorðlice sy
gegearwod and wyrðmynt genoh geboden, ac Godes ege ana myndgað, þæt
mon þearfum and elþeodegum monnum geþensum sy.
 53.85.7. Sy þæs abbodes cicene and þara cumena onsundrun,
þæt þa gebroþru ne synd geunstilde, þonne cuman færlice on
uncuðum tidum to mynstre cumað; seldhwænne oðþe næfre mynster
butan cuman bið.
 53.85.10. To geares fæce twegen gebroðra into cumena cicenan
gan, and þa synd swylce, þe wel þenian cunnan and þa þenunge wel
gefyllen.
 53.85.12. Sy him gefultumod, gif hy þæs behofiaþ, þæt
hy þurh þæs fultumes frouer butan ceorunge þenien; eft þonne hy
læssan bysega habbað, faran to swylcan weorce and hyrsumnesse, swylce him
beboden sy.
 53.85.15. Ðeos foresceawung sy gehealden na on þisum anum, ac
on eallum mynstres þenungum, þæt is, þænne hy behofiað, sy him
gefultumad and frofor þurhtogen, and eft þænne hy bysega on hyra wicum
nabban and emetige synd, hyrsumian on swylcum þingum, swylce him man beode.
 53.85.20. Sy cumena hus swylcum breðer betæht to bewitenne,
þe fulne Godes ege hæbbe and his saule geahnige; beon þær symble bed
genihtsumlice ofersprædde, and þæt Godes hus, þæt is cumena hus,
wislice fram witum sy gefadod.
 53.87.1. Noteþæshwon hyra nan wið cuman hine geferlæce
oðþe ænig spræce wið hine age, butan þam anum, þe hit beboden
bið; gif hi hwylcne cuman gemeten, greten hine eaðmodlice on þa wisan,
þe we ær cwædon, and hine bletsunge bidden and him swa forðgan,
secgende, þæt him alyfed nis, wið cuman to sprecænne.
 54.87.8. BE ÐAM ÐÆT NAN MUNUC ÆRENDGEWRITA NE NANE OÐRE
LAC NE UNDERFO.
 54.87.10. Ne si natoþoshwon munece alyfed, þæt he ænig
gewrit oþþe sende, oðþe lac fram hyra magum, oþþe fram ænigum
oþrum men, oðþe him betweonum underfon, oþþe sellen, butan þæs
abbodes hæse.
 54.87.13. Gif hwæt hyra hwylcum from magum asend byþ, ne
gedyrstlæce he hit no to underfonne, ær hit þam abbode gecyþed sy.
 54.87.15. Gif hit þonne se abbod underfon hate, stande on his
dome, hwan hit man selle; and se broðor, þe swylc lac to asend wæs, for
ðam ne geunrotsie, þelæs þe he deofle þurh þæt ænigne
intingan sylle, and to micelne gefean on his unrotnesse hæbbe.
 54.87.19. Se þe oðerlicor gedyrstlæce, underhnige þære
regulican þreale.
 55.89.2. BE MYNSTERMONNA HRÆGELHUSE AND BE HYRA HRÆGELTALE.
 55.89.4. Sy gebroðrum reaf geseald be swilcnesse and stæþele
þære stowe, þe hy onwuniað, and be þæs eardes oðþe þære
lyfte gewiderum; on cealdum eardum neodað, þæt þæs reafes mare sy,
on hleowfæstum læs.
 55.89.7. Ðæs abbodes foresceawunge sceal beon be þysum, hu
ðæs neodige.
 55.89.9. We þeah gelyfað, on meodumum stowum þæt
ænlipugum munecum genihtsumige, þæt he hæbbe cugelan and syric; sy
on wintra seo cuhle of þiccum hrægle, heo sceal beon on sumera þinne
oðþe eald awered; hæbban hy eac mid to wyrcenne scapulare, þæt is
gehwæde cugelan and slyflease; hæbben hy to fotgewædum hosa and meon.
 55.89.14. Ne ciden no þa munecas ymb þa deage oþþe
greatnesse hyra reafa; hæbben swylce reaf, swylce mon findan mæge on
þam earde, þe hy onwuniað, oþþe swylce mon undeorest bicgan mæge.
 55.89.17. Besceawige se abbod and hate besidian þæra reafa
gemet, þæt hy ne synd to scorte, ac gemæte þam, þe hyra notiað.
 55.91.1. Agifen a þa ealdan, þonne him man niwe reaf sylle, and
to hrægelhuse betæcen, þearfum to dælenne.
 55.91.2. Genoh is munuce and fulgenihtsum, þæt he hæbbe twa
cugelan and twegen syricas for þære nihtware and for þæs reafes
þweale; idel and oferflowend byþ eal, þæt toforan þysum is; gif hit
mare bið, hit sy gewanod.
 55.91.6. Swa oft, swa hy aþor oðþe meon, oþþe ænig
þing niwes underfon, betæce a þæt ealde.
 55.91.8. Ða þa on ytinge ahwyder farað, niman him brec of
hrægelhuse, eft swa hy ham cumen of þam færelde, betæcan him
gewaxene.
 55.91.10. Syn eac on hrægelhuse gehealden ægðer ge cugelan
ge syricas hwæthwara beteran þonne þa, þe hy gewunelice weriað; and
notian þara, þe for hwylcere neode on ytinge farað, and þa eft þam
hrægelþene betæcen, swa hy ham cumen.
 55.91.15. To bedreafe genihtsumige to hæbbenne meatte and hwitel
and bedfelt and heafodbolster.
 55.91.16. Ðeahhweþere se abbod sceal gelomlice sceawian þa
bed and asmeagan for syndrigum æhtum.
 55.91.18. Gif hi hwa hæbbe, oðþe on his bedde funden sy,
þæt he from his abbode ne onfeng and þurh his sylen ne næfde,
underlicge se þære hefigestan and þære stiþestan þreale.
 55.91.20. Toþy þæt þes leahter syndrigere æhta mid
ealle gewanod sy and adilegod, synd gesealde from þam abbode ealle neadbehefe
þing, þæt is cugele, syric, meon, hosa, slyfa, gyrdel, seax, græf,
nædl, sceat, weaxbreda, ðæt ælcere neode beladung sy adilegod,
þæt hy þurh neode nane tale to syndrigre æhte næbben.
 55.92.5. A sceal beon fram þam abbode geornlice besceawod and
behealden se cwide, þe awriten is on þære boc, þe is gehaten <foreign>Actus
Apostolorum</foreign>, ðæt is, þæt æghwylcum wæs geseald, swa swa he
behofode and neode hæfde.
 55.92.9. Swa eac se abbod foresceawige þa untrumnessa þara,
þe for neode and þearfe gehwylces þinges behofiað, and no on hyra neode
wandige for ðan yflan willan æfestigra manna; beþænce he a Godes
edlean on eallum his domum, þæt is, þæt him bið æt Godes dome
geleanod, be þæm þe he ær worhte.
 56.93.2. BE ABBODES BEODES GEREORDE.
 56.93.3. Ðæs abbodes myse sceal a beon gemæne þearuum and
elþeodegum mannum.
 56.93.4. Þænne he to lyt cumena hæbbe, laðige him to
swylce gebroðru, swylce he wille; stande on his dome, hwylce þa syn;
læte þeahhweþere ænne oþþe twegen ealdras mid þam gebroþrum,
þe heora þeawa begymen.
 57.95.2. BE MYNSTRES CRÆFTIGUM.
 57.95.3. Gif cræftige men on mynstre syn, began þane cræft
and georne wyrcen, gif hit se abbod geþafað.
 57.95.4. Gif hwylc hyra for ðæs cræftes þingon hine
toþundenlice onhefð, for þæs cræftes truan and forðy, þe he
bydæle þære stowe mid his cræfte framað, sy he ascyred from þam
cræfte, and he natoþyshwon eft þone cræft ne beginne, butan he mid
micelre eaðmodnesse þæs abbodes unnan begyte.
 57.95.10. Gif man hwæt becypan scyle, þæs þe cræftige
men on mynstre wyrcað, warnien þa, þe þone ceap drifað, þæt hi
nan þing facenlices on þam ceape ne don.
 57.95.12. Gemunen hi a Annaniam et Safiram, þylæs þe þone
deað on hyra sawle þolien, þe hi licumlice þoledon, ælc þara þe
on þisum oþþe on ænium oþerum mynstres þingum ænig þing
facenlices deð.
 57.95.15. Gif hwylc neod sy to becypenne ænig þing heora
handcræftes, þæt sy butan gitsunge undeoror geseald, þonne hit
woroldmannum gewunelic sy, þæt Godes lof on eallum þingum stande.
 58.97.2. BE NIGCUMENRA GEBROÐRA ANDFENGE.
 58.97.3. Gif hwa niwan to mynsteres drohtnunge gecyrran wille, ne
sy him no eaþelice þæs infæres getiðod; ac do man ealswa se apostol
tæcð, þæt is, þæt mon georne fandige, hwæþer hi mid Godes
gaste afyllyde syn.
 58.97.6. Gif he geþyldelice forbyrð ægðer ge hosp ge
edwitu, and on þære wearne þurhwunað þeah and eadmodlice bit,
þæt him mon infæres tiþige, sy he underfangen embe ane feower dagas
oþþe fife and wunige on cumena huse ane feawa dagas.
 58.97.11. Tæce him mon siððan to nigcumenra manna huse, and
he þær ete and reste and embe his gastlican þearfe smeage.
 58.97.13. And gastlic ealdor and wis his hæbbe gymene, þe wel
saula Gode cunne gestrynan, se georne behogige and gesinlice gime, hwæþre
he mid fulre anbryrdnesse and arweorðnesse God ælmihtigne gesece, and
hweþer he carful sy and sceot to godcundum weorce and to hyrsumnesse, and
hweþer he mid geþylde hopsas and edwitu þolian wille.
 58.97.18. Syn him gebodod eal seo stiðnesse and seo earfoðnes,
þe to Gode læt and to heofena rices gefean.
 58.97.20. Gif he þonne behæt staðolfæste þurhwununge,
embe twegen monðas sy þes regol geræd him ætforan, and sy him þus
to gecweden: Her is seo æ, þe þu under hire tæcnige winnan wilt and
campian; gif þe onhagige, þæt þu hit healdan mæge, far ðe in; gif
þe ne onhagige, far ðe freoh, þider þu wille.
 58.99.2. Gif he þonne git þurhwunað, sy he gelæd eft to
nigecumenra monna huse, and his mon georne fandige, hwæþer he þolemod sy
and geþyldig.
 58.99.4. Eft embe syx monðas sy him geræd eal þes regol fram
foreweardon, þæt he þe geornlicor understande, hwæt hit sy, þe he
tofundað.
 58.99.6. Gif he þonne gyt þurhwunað, ymbe feower monðas sy
him eft þes yleca regol geræd and þæt andgyt gewissod.
 58.99.8. Gif þonne be his agenum dome behæt, þæt he eallu
þing gehealdan wille and ealle þæs regoles beboda mid eaðmodnesse
gefyllan, sy he underfangen on þære geferrædenne.
 58.99.11. Wite he eac, þæt he mid þæs regoles bendum swa
is getiged and gestaþelod, þæt he of ðam dæge of þam mynstre
faran ne mot, ne his sweoran ascacan, ne ascyrian fram þam geoce þæs
halgan regoles, ðonne he moste ær swa geceosan swa aweorpan, swaþer he
wolde, under swa langsumre smeagunge.
 58.99.17. Siðþan he underfangen sy and innan ciricean gebroht,
behate he beforan ealre gefærrædenne Gode and eallum his halgum, þæt
he staþolfæst on mynstre gewunian wille and his þeawas ealle to Godes
willan geweman and on hyrsumnesse þurhwunian.
 58.99.21. Gif þænne ahwænne þis behat abrycð, wite he,
þæt he bið geniþered and gehyned fram ælmihtigum drihtne, þe he
bysemerað.
 58.101.1. Be þam his gehate sette he fæstnunge mid gewrite to
þæs abbodes naman and þæra halgena, þe hyra reliquie, þæt is
hyra ban, on þære stowe restað.
 58.101.3. Write he þa fæstnunge mid his agenre handa, gif he
þonne writan ne cunne, bidde oþerne, þe writan cunne, þæt hine
aspelige, and he sylf on þam gewrite rode tacn mearcige and hy swa
fæstniende mid his agenum handum uppan þone altare alecge.
 58.101.8. Sona swa he þæt gewrit uppan þone altare alecge,
beginne þis fers and þus cweþe: <foreign>Suscipe me, Domine, secundum eloquium
tuum, et uiuam, et non confundas me ab expectatione mea</foreign>, þæt is on ure
geþeode: Drihten, onfoh min æfter þinum behate, and ic libbe, and ne
gescend þu me on minre anbidunge.
 58.101.13. Þæt ylece fers he sceal þriwa cweþan and eal
geferræden þriwa mid þam ylecan ferse andswarian and þærto
geþeoden <foreign>Gloria Patri</foreign>.
 58.101.15. Se sylfa nigecumena broðor, siðþan he gehalgod
bið, gefealle ælces ænlipiges fet and þæs wilnige, þæt hi him
fore gebidden; of þæm dæge sy he broðor geteald on þære
geferrædenne.
 58.101.19. Gif he hwylce æhta hæbbe, oðþe hi on ær
þearfum gedæle, oðþe arweorðlice mid him sylfum þam mynstre
betæce; he nan ðing him sylfum to syndrigum æhtum ne gehealde;
eornestlice, of ðam dæge nah he forðon his agenes lichoman geweald, þe
oþera æhta ne sceolde.
 58.101.23. Hine man sona unscryde and þa reaf nime, þe he ær
notode, and hine mid mynstres reafum gescryde.
 58.103.1. Healde mon on hrægelhuse þa reaf, þe he him
ofdyde, toðy, gif he ahwænne mid deofles costnunge beswicen bið,
þæt on geþafunge gæþ, þæt he his gehat Gode awæge and
þæt mynster forlæte, þæt na næfre ne geweorþe, sy benæmed
þæs godcundan reafes and mid þam weoroldcundum, þe he ær forlet,
gescryd and swa of mynstre adræfed.
 58.103.6. Healde mon þeah æfre þæt gewrit his
fæstnunge on þam mynstre.
 59.103.9. BE RICCERA AND ÐEARFENA ANDFENGE.
 59.103.10. Gif hwylc rice mon and æþelboren his bearn Gode on
mynstre geoffrian wile, gif þæt cild þæs andgites næbbe, þæt
he sylf mæge oðþe cunne hine sylfne, gefæstnian hine þa magas mid
ofrunge, þæt is, bewinde þæs cildes hand and þæt gewrit his
fæstnunge on þæs altares weofodsceate and hine swa Gode geoffrien mid
offrunge hlafes and wines.
 59.103.16. Behaten þa magas and mid aþe gefæstnian, þæt
hi næfre syndrige æhta hyra mæge ne gesellan, ne þurh hy sylfe ne
þurh nænne gespelian, ne hy næfre nænne incan ne secen, hu him to
syndrigum æhtum gerymed sy.
 59.103.19. Gif hy þonne hwæt syllan willan, sellan hi þæt
þære haligan stowe to rihtum gemænscipe, him to ecum edleane; and him
siþþan sy wegnestes getiðad, and swa mid wegneste ham cyrren, gif hi
þæs wilnien.
 59.105.1. Syn ealle þa æhta, þe þam cilde gebyrien, swa
fordylegade and todælede, þæt him nan hyht beon ne þyrfe, þelæs
þe he losige, gif he his hyht beset on syndrigum æhtum, þæt na ne
geweorðe; we foroft onfundon, þæt mænig þurh þone hiht syndrigra
æhta losode.
 59.105.7. Do handswagelice be hyra bearnum, þa þe unrice synd
and hæfenlease þearfan.
 59.105.8. Gif hi nane æhta to sellenne næbben, offrigen hyra
bearn anfealdlice on gewitnesse rihtgelyfedra manna.
 60.105.12. BE ABBODUM AND OÐRUM GEÐUNGENUM ÐE MYNSTRES
WILNIAÐ.
 60.105.14. Gif hwylc mæssepreost wilnað, þæt hine mon to
munuchade to mynstre underfo, ne sy him na ðe raþor getiþad, forþy þe
he mæssepreost is.
 60.105.16. Gif he þonne þurhwunað on þisse gewilnunge, ne
sy nan ðing forlæten, þæt þe regol tæce on his fandunge, ac
underfo he georne ælcne regoles þeaw and tæcinge; sy he æfter
Cristes boce tæcincge þus geahsod: Freond, to hwy com þu?
 60.105.20. Þæt is on andgite: com þu mid sibbe and mid
soþre anbryrdnesse, þe mid ungeþwærnesse and licetunge?
 60.107.2. Sy him geþafod, þæt he styde æfter þam abbode
healde and þæt he mæssan singe, gif se abbod swa tæce; ne
gedyrstlæce he na þa þenunge to beginnenne butan þæs abbodes
hæse.
 60.107.5. Sy he simle gearo to ælcere steore be regoles
tæcincge, and swa micle eaðmodre, swa he furþor on hade is, bysnige he a
ealle eaðmodnesse eallum þam, þe hine midwuniað.
 60.107.7. Gif he for his hades arweorðnesse furðor forlæten
sy, ne gedyrstlæce he on nanre gefadunge þurh þæs hades truan no
furþar, þonne his gecyrrednes wæs; ac besceawige a þone steal his
gecyrrednesse and hine be þam gemedemige, butan hine mon for ðam sacerdhade
furðor forlæte.
 60.107.13. Ða þe clerichades synd and munuchades wilniað, syn
