hy underfangenne on medemum stydum, swa þeah, þæt hy behat don be hyra
staþelfæstnesse and be ealre þæs halgan regoles gymene.
 61.109.2. BE ELÐEODEGUM MUNECUM HU HI MON UNDERFON SCEAL.
 61.109.4. Se utancumena munuc, þe of uncuðum eardum cymð, gif
he on cuman hiwe wunian wile and mid nanre oferflowednesse þæt mynster ne
gedrefð, ac bið eaðhylde and þære stowe þeawum getricce, sy he
onfangen and swa longe wunige, swa him sylfum licige.
 61.109.8. Gif he gesceadelice mid eaðmodnesse and mid soþre
lufe hwilcu þing on mynstere tæle oþþe tæce, underfo se abbod
þæt mid eaðmodnesse and smeage on his geþance, þæt hine God
þider asende, þæt seo stow þurh hine gegodod and geriht wære.
 61.109.13. Gif he eft on ænigne timan hine sylfne to mynstres
wununge gefæstnian wile, ne sy na his gewilnung onscunod, forþy þe mon
meahte his lif tocnawan on þan fyrste, þe he on cuman hiwe on mynstre
wunade.
 61.109.16. Gif hine mon leahtorfulne ongit on þone timan his
cumliðnesse, ne sceal he agan nane geþeode, naðer ne wið þæt
mynster ne wið þa geferrædenne, ac him mon secge mid arweorðnesse,
þæt he þanon gewite, þelæs þe he mid his yrmðe oþre
geleahtrige.
 61.109.20. Gif he þænne swa aredad bið on þære
cumliðnesse, þæt he ne sy wyrðe þære scyrunge, þeah he na ne
bidde, hine mon georne weme, þæt he wununge healde, toþi þæt oðre
þurh his godan bysenunge gelærede syn and gebeterade, forþy þe on
ælcere stowe is anum drihtne, þæm heofonlican cyninge, geþeowad and
gehyrsumod.
 61.111.2. Gif se abbod his geearnunge swylce ongyte, he hine mot be
suman dæle furþor weorðian and him innor tæcan stede and setl.
 61.111.5. Na þæt an be munecum anum is þis to healdenne, ac
eac swylce be arwyrðum canonicum, þe to munuclife cumað, þæt hi
þurh gode geearnunge furðor syn gemedemad, syn swæþer hy syn, þe
sacerdhades swa clerichades, gif se abbod his lifes geearnunga swylce
tocnæwð.
 61.111.10. Warnige þeahhweþere se abbod, þæt he natohwon
of nanum cuþum mynstre munuc ne underfo to wununge, butan hit his abbodes
geþafung sy and him þæs gewrit sænde mid swutelunge, forðy hit is
þus awriten: Ne do þu oþrum, þæt þu nelle, þæt þe sylfum
gedon sy.
 62.111.16. BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM AND HYRA ÐENUM.
 62.111.17. Gif hwylc abbod mæssepreostes behofige, oðþe
diacones, geceose he of his agenum geferum þe þæs hades wyrðe sy, and
hine gehadian læte.
 62.111.20. Syþþan he þonne gehadod sy, warnige hine georne
wið modignesse and toþundenre upahefednesse, ne he nan þing furðor ne
gedyrstlæce, þonne him from his abbode beboden sy; wite he eac, þæt
he swa micle eaðmodra beon sceal on regoles underþeodnesse, swa miclum swa
he furðor forlæten is.
 62.113.2. Ne he þurh þone truwan his sacerdhades ofergumige
þa hyrsumnesse and þa steore þæs halgan regoles, ac þurh þone had
a swiþor and swiðor on God ælmihtigne þeo.
 62.113.4. Healde he simle þone styde and þa endebyrdnesse his
gecyrrednesse, butan þære þenunge anre þæs halgan weofodes, gif hit
swa getimige, þæt se abbod and seo gecorenes þære geferræddenne
hine for his lifes geearnunge weorðian wile and furðor gemedemian.
 62.113.9. Wite he þeah, þæt he sy a underþeod þam halgan
regole and þam prafoste, and ælc þing do and acume, þæs þe hy him
to rihte tæcen.
 62.113.12. Gif he ælcra þurh toþundennesse gedyrstlæcð,
ne sy he sacerd geteald, ac Godes wiþercora.
 62.113.13. Gif he þonne þurh myngunge gerihtlæcan nele, sy
he on þæs bisceopes gewitnesse gestanden.
 62.113.15. Gif he þonne gyt gebetan nelle, æt openum gyltum sy
he of mynstre adræfed, þeahhwæþere gif his toþundennes to þam
micel wæs, þæt he underþeod beon nolde, ne ðam halegum regole
hyrsumian.
 63.113.20. BE EALLES GEFERES ENDEBYRDNESSE.
 63.113.21. Ælc endebyrdnes on mynstre sceal beon gehealden and
gefadod be heora gecyrrednesse and be lifes geearnunge and be þæs abbodes
gestaþelunge.
 63.113.23. Se abbod ne geunstille, ne ne gedrefe þa heorde, þe
him underþeod is, ne he nan þing ne misfadige, ne unrihtlice ne
geendebyrde, swylce he freolice don mote þæt, þæt him licige; wite
he, þæt he æt Godes dome gescead agyldan sceal and andsware ealra his
doma and ealra his dæda.
 63.115.2. Æfter þære endebyrdnesse, þe se abbod
gestaþelað and þa gebroþra him betweoh healdað, gange ælc æfter
oðrum to cosse, to husle and be þan on chore stande and sealmas and
gehwylce þenunga beginne.
 63.115.5. On nanum stowum ne sy endebyrdnes be nanre ylde gefadod,
ne seo ylde þa geogoðe ne forþringe, forði Samuel and Daniel cildgeonge
for ealdædum mæssepreostum demdon.
 63.115.8. Forði þonne, butan þam anum, þe for heora
leahtrum of hyra endebyrdnesse utor ascofene synd, oðþe for haliges lifes
geearnunge innor genumene, ælc oþer, oferylde and geogeþe, healde his
endebyrdnesse, swa swa he gecyrde, swylce ic þus cweþe: Gif twegen on anum
dæge to Gode gecyrrað, sy se furðor on ælcre endebyrdnesse, þe on
þære forman tide þæs dæges, þonne se on þære oðre tide
cymð, sy he swylcre ylde oðþe geþincðe, swylce he sy.
 63.115.16. Ða gingran forði arweorðian hyra yldran, and þa
yldran lufian hyra gingran.
 63.115.17. Ne gedyrstlæce hyra nan, þæt he oþerne agenum
naman synderlice genemne, ac þa yldran hyra gingran broþor nemnen, and þa
gingran hyra yldran nonnos nemnen, þæt is: leof and arwesa.
 63.115.20. Se abbod forþi, þe he Godes gespelia is, sy hlaford
gehaten and fæder, na for his agenum þingum, ac for Cristes arweorðnesse
and for þæs lufe, þe he speleð.
 63.115.23. He symle þencende sy and hine swylcne on godre
drohtnunge gegearwige, þæt he sy wyrðe swa micles weorðscipes.
 63.117.1. Swa hwar swa gebroðra hi gemetan, a se gingra bletsunge
bidde fram þam yldran.
 63.117.3. Gif se yldra swa forðgange, þær se gingra sit,
arise se gingra mid eadmodnesse and þam yldran to setle ryme; ne
gedyrstlæce se gingra, þæt he mid þam yldran sitte, butan he hine
hate, þæt simle sy gehealden, þæt on haligum bocum awriten is,
þæt is, þæt hi him betweoh arweorðnesse healdan and mid
arweorðnesse hi gemeten.
 63.117.9. Þa cild and seo geogoð mid steore and
þeawfæstnesse hyra endebyrdnessum fylien, ge on cyricean ge on beodernne;
syn hy a behealdene mid steore and mid mycelre heordrædenne, ægðer ge
inne, ge ute, ge æghwær, oð þæt hy to andgyttolre yldo cumen and
to fulfremedre gestæþþignesse.
 64.117.15. BE ÐÆS ABBODES HADUNGE.
 64.117.16. On abbodes hadunge a is þæt to besceawigenne mid
miclum gesceade, þæt se sy to abbode geset, þe eal geferræden anmodum
geþeahte and halwendum æfter Godes ege gecyst.
 64.117.19. Gif geferræden þæne ræd on gemænum
geþeahte misredað and feawa witena þæs geferes þa þearfe forgode
wislicor tocnawað, stande þara ræd, þe mid Godes ege and wisdome þa
þearfe geceosað, þeah heora feawa sy.
 64.119.1. Ne þa oþre ongean þæt ne sacan.
 64.119.2. Æfter his lifes geearnunge and æfter his wisdomes
lare sy gecoren, se þe to abbodhade sceal, eac swylce þeah he latost to
mynstre come and ytemest sy on endebyrdnesse þære gesomnunge.
 64.119.5. Gif hit þonne swa getimað, þæt eal geferræden
anmodum geþeahte þone to abbode gecyst, þe hyra leahtrum geþeafige and
him on gewil gange, and þæt þurh æfeste men and rihtgelyfedum cuþ
bið þam biscope, þe seo halige stow on his bisceoprice is, forbeode he
and alecge þa þwyrnesse hyra ungeþeahtes and mid fultume abboda and
rihtgelyfedra manna, gesette þæne and gehadige to ðam dihte abbodhades,
þe Godes hus wel fadige and on Godes riht gange and na on þweorra manna
gewil.
 64.119.13. Wite ægþer ge bisceop ge þa rihtgelyfedan,
þæt hy micele mede æt Gode habbað, gif hy swa doð mid Godes ege,
eac swylce micel wite, gif hi on geþafunge gað and for gymeleaste hit ne
betað.
 64.119.17. Ðænce se abbod, siðþan he gehadod sy, hu micele
byrðene and hu hefigtyme he underfeng mid þam hade; wite he eac and smeage,
hu he swyþor þam saulum framian mæge, þonne embe ricetere his
anwealdes hogian.
 64.119.20. Eornostlice hit gedafenað, þæt he wel gelæred
sy mid godcundre lare and to þan snotor, þæt he cunne haligo spel
reccan, ægþer ge of þære ealdan cyþnesse ge of þære niwan, and
he sylf on geearnunge swylc sy, þæt man embe his agene halignesse sprecan
mæge.
 64.119.24. Sy he clæne and syueræte and mildheort, and sy a
seo mildheortnesse wyldre þonne se rihta dom, þæt he on þæt ylce
gemet Godes miltse begyte.
 64.121.1. Hatige he þa leahtras and lufige þa gebroðra.
 64.121.2. Sy he snotor and wel besceawod on his dædum and na
oferswiþe ne þreage, þylæs þæt omige fæt mid ealle toberste,
gif he hit mid ungemete scæfð; besceawige he a his agene tyddernesse and
þurh þæt gebeorh sy, ne forbryte he na þæt tocnysede hreod.
 64.121.6. Ne tæce we na mid swa geradum bysenum and gebeorhlicum
larum, þæt he leahtras fyrðrige and weaxan læte, ac þæt he
snotorlice and mid soþre lufe hy simle wanige, swa swa he ongyte, þæt
hit framian mage his underþeoddum, swa swa we geo ær wiðforan
cwædon.
 64.121.10. Hycge he and gecneordlæce, þæt hine mon lufian
mæge swiþor, þonne ondrædan.
 64.121.12. Ne sy he drefre and ancgmod, ne sy he to swið and
anwille, ne sy he æfestig and fæcne, forþy a bið ungestillod and
restleas, þe mid þam unþeawum beled bið.
 64.121.14. Sy he a foregleaw and wel besceawod on his gebodum;
ægðer ge æfter godcundum þingum ge æfter woroldcundum tosceade he
and gemetegie þa weorc ealle, þe he betæce.
 64.121.17. Geþence he þa gesceadwisnesse Sancte Jacobes,
þæs heahfæder, þe þus cwæþ: Gif ic mine heorda to swiðe on
gange þrafige and swence, hy ealle anes dæges sweltað.
 64.121.20. Nime him þas bysene and oþre swylce þæs soðan
gesceades, þe is ealra mægena modor, and swa ealle þing gemetige,
þæt sy þonne gyt on his gebodum, þæt þa strangan furðor wilnien
and þa unstrangan ofersymede heora þeowdom ne forfleon, and huru þinga
þæs anes hicge, þæt þises andweardan regoles gebodu on eallum
þingum gehealdene syn and gefyllede.
 64.123.1. Ðonne he wel þenað and hures drihtnes heorde
cwiuerlice ealgað and to rihte manað, he onfehð ece lean fram drihtne and
bliþe gehyrð, þæt se goda þeowa gehyrde, þe on rihtne timan
hwæte gedælde his efenþeowum: Soþ is, þæt ic secge, ofer ealle
his god he hine to ealdre for his gedreoge gesette.
 65.124.2. BE MYNSTRES PRAFASTE.
 65.124.3. Foroft hit getimað, þæt swyþe hefigtyme sacu and
ungeþwærnessa on mynstre aspringað þurh þæs geendebyrdan
profostes misfadunge; hyra sum mid þam awyrigdan gaste toþundennesse swa
stiþe toblawenne, þæt him þincþ, þæt he sy oþer abbod, and
þurh þæt he hine sylfne swa godne teleþ, bið swiðe sacful and
micele ungeþwærnesse and mænigfealde saca on þære geferædenne
wyrcð.
 65.124.9. Ðis gelimpð swiþust on ðam stowum, þær se
profost on gymenne bið geset fram þam ylcan biscopum oþþe abbodum, þe
þone abbod gehadodun and on þam weorðmente settan.
 65.124.12. Eaþe is to understandenne, of hwylcum antimbre þeos
unþæslicu asprincð þisse miclam toþundennesse: him þincð on his
geþance, þæt he þam abbode ne þyrfe hyran, forþy þe he hine to
prafoste ne sette, ac þa sylfan him prafostscire betæhtan, þe þæne
abbod to abbodhade gecoran.
 65.124.17. Ðurh þis beoð awecte andan mid miclan æfeste,
saca and tala and herincga, ungeþwærnessa and misfadunga.
 65.124.18. Ðonne se abbod and se prafost ungerade beoð and him
betwyx sacað, ægðer ge hyra agne saula þurh þas frecenesse losiað,
and eac swylce þara, þe him underþeodde synd, þonne hy sume mid geficum
wið þone anne þeodað and leasettað, sume wið þone oþerne.
 65.125.3. Seo frecenes þyses yfeles belimpð to ðam swiðust,
þe hi sylfe ealdras geworhton on swylcere fadunge and endebyrdnesse.
 65.125.5. We forði foresceawiað and fremful taliað to
gehealdsumnesse gemænre sibbe and soþre lufe, þæt eal mynstres fadung
and endebyrdnesse on þæs abbodes dome and tæcinge simle stande.
 65.125.8. Gif hit beon mæg, swylc notu þurh decanonas on
mynstre sy gefadod and geendebyrd on þa wisan, þe se abbod dyht, þæt
na nan ænlipig ne modige, ne hine na ne anhebbe, þonne mynstres notu
manegum bið betæht.
 65.125.12. Gif seo stow þæs neode hæbbe and seo
geferræden þæs mid gesceade and mid eaðmodnesse þæs gewilnige,
and hit þam abbode ræd þince, swa hwilcne swa se abbod geceose mid
geþeahte þara broþra, þe God ondrædæð, sette þæne him to
prauoste.
 65.125.17. Se sylfa prauost do mid arweorðnesse eal, þæt him
fram þam abbode getæht bið; ne do he nan þing ongean þæs abbodes
willan and gefadunge, forþi swa miclan swa he furður on weorðmynte
forlæten bið, swa miclan he sceal geornlicor Godes gerihta healdan and
regules beboda.
 65.126.1. Gif se prafast hlehterful onfunden bið, oþþe mid
modignesse beswicen, oþþe þæs halgan regoles beboda forsyhð, sy mid
wordum gestyred feower siðum.
 65.126.3. Gif he gebetan nele þurh worda myngunge, sy him þreal
geboden be regoles tæcinge.
 65.126.5. Gif he þurh þreale nele gerihtan, he sy aworpen of
þam prafostfolgoðe, and sy oþer on þa note geset, þe þæs wyrðe
sy.
 65.126.7. Siþþan he bescired bið, gif he on þære
geferrædene gedefe ne bið and gehyrsum, hine man of mynstre mid ealle
adræfe.
 65.126.9. Geþænce þeahhwæþere se abbod, þæt he
Gode ælmihtigum gescead agyldan sceal be eallum his dædum and domum, and
warnige, þæt he þurh andan ne sy onweard þam profaste and swa his
agene saule mid forbærne.
 66.126.14. BE ÐÆS MYNSTRES GEATWEARDE.
 66.126.15. To þæs mynstres geate sy geatweard geset, eald and
wis, þe mid gesceade cunne andswara syllan ærenda underfon; seo ripung his
gestæþþignesse sy swylc, þæt hine ne worian, ne scriðan ne
lyste.
 66.126.18. Se sylfa geatweard sceal cytan habban wið þæt
geat, þæt þa cuman, þe mynster geseceað, simle gearone hæbben and
andwyrde þæra ærenda underfo.
 66.126.20. Swa se cuma cnocige, oþþe se þearfa clypige, he
sona cweþe Gode þanc, and hine georne bletsige and geþwærlice mid
Godes ege mid ofeste andswarige mid þam wylme þære soðan lufe.
 66.127.1. Se sylfa geatweard, gif he fultumes behofige, sy him
gingra broðor betæht, þe him mid wicnige.
 66.127.4. Gif hit beon mæg, swa sceal mynster beon gestaþelod,
þæt ealle neadbehefe þing þær binnan wunien, þæt is
wæterscype, mylen, wyrtun and gehwylce misenlice cræftas, þe synd gode
to beganne, þæt nan neod ne sy munecum, utan to farenne, forþy þe seo
utfaru nan þing ne framað hira saulum.
 66.127.9. Þæs regul ic wille, þæt gesinlice sie geræd
on geferrædenne, þæt hyra nan þurh nytennesse hine beladian ne
mæge.
 67.127.12. BE ÐAM ÐE UT OF MYNSTRE ON ÆRENDE FARAÐ.
 67.127.13. Ða gebroðra, þe me for neode ut asend, bebeodan hy
sylfe gemænum gebede, ægðer ge þæs abbodes ge ealles geferes, and
þa hwile, þe hi on fare beoð, syn hy on gemynde, and æt ælces
tidsanges ende eal geferræden him foregebidden.
 67.127.17. Ðy forman dæge, þe hy ham cyrrað and to mynstre
cumað, astreccen hi æt ælces tidsanges ende on hyra gebedhuse, and him
ealle gemænlice foregebidden, þæt him nan þing ne derige, þæs
þe hi agyltan on þam færelde, aþor oðþe þurh gesihþe, oþþe
þurh gehlyste æniges yfeles þinges, oþþe þurh idele spræce.
 67.128.4. Ne hyra nan ne dyrstlæce, þæt he oðrum recce,
oðþe mid wordum gecyðe, hwæt he butan mynstre geseah, oðþe
gehyrde; hit is micel mægena tostencennes, gif hit hwa deð.
 67.128.7. Gif hit hwa gedyrstlæce, sy he gewyld mid rihtlicre
steore.
 68.128.9. BE UNACUMENLICRA ÐINGA GEBODE.
 68.128.10. Gif hwylcum breþer færlice hwæt hefelices and
unacumenlices beboden sy, underfo he þa geboda his tæcendes mid ealre
geþwærnesse and mid micelre eaðmodnesse.
 68.128.12. Gif he þonne eallunga ongyt, þæt þæs gebodes
micelnes on þære hyrsumnesse his mihta oferstihð, þæt he eft mid
geþylde on gedafenre tide his mægenleaste his ealdre gecyþe, he no
þeah na wiðstande, ne mid modignesse ne wiðcweþe.
 68.128.16. Gif þæs ealdres cwide þurhwunað and his gebod
aheardað, wite se gingra mid gewisse, þæt hit him eal framað, and
þurh Godes truwan mid soþre lufe þa hyrsumnesse beginne, þeah hine hwon
onhagige.
 69.129.2. BE ÐAM ÐÆT NAN OÐERNE ON MYNSTRE NE BEWERIGE.
 69.129.4. Miclan is to warnienne, þæt nan broðor ne
gedyrstlæce, þæt he oþerne oþþe mid wordum bewerige, oðþe mid
ænigum anginne geealgige, þeah him word gemæne sy.
 69.129.6. Ne sy þis on nanum gemete gedyrstlæht fram
munuchades mannum, forði þanun mæg aspringan seo mæste sacu and se
mæsta swice ealra ungeþwærnessa.
 69.129.9. Gif hwa þis ofergyme þurh ænige gedyrstnesse, sy
he ealra teartlicost geþread.
 70.129.12. BE ÐAM ÐE NAN OÐRUM DYNT NE GEBEODE.
 70.129.13. Sy forboden on mynstre ælcere gedyrstignesse
intinga.
 70.129.14. We geendebyrdaþ and gesettað, þæt nanum ne sy
alyfed, þæt he ænigne broðra ne amansumige, ne mid swingele þreage,
butan þam anum, þe se abbod þæs anweald sealde and leafe, þæt hi
swa don moston.
 70.129.17. Ða synfullan syn eawunge geþreade beforan ealre
geferræddenne, þæt þara oþra gehwylc þurh þæt geegesod sy.
 70.130.1. Cildgeongum mannum eal geferræden unþeawas styre,
and hyra mycele gymene hæbben oð þæt fifteoþe ger hyra ylde;
þæt þær sy gedon mid eallum gemete and mid eallum gesceade.
 70.130.4. Gif hwylc hyra þurh gedyrstignesse on maran ylde
betæcþ and þreale gebyt, butan þæs abbodes hæse, þe underlicge
rihtlicre steore.
 70.130.6. Syn eac handswagelice geþreade, þa ðe on þam
sylfum cildum mid ungesceade gehatheortað, forþy hit þus awriten is:
ðæt þu nelle, þæt þe sylfun gedon sy, ne do þu þæt
oþrum.
 71.130.10. BE ÐAM ÐÆT ÆLC OÐRUM HYRSUMIGE.
 71.130.11. Hyrsumnesse god and duguð þæt is a ðam abbode
to gegearwienne and mid mycelre eaðmodnesse to gebeodenne, na him anum, ac
eac swylce ælc broðor oþrum estelice hyrsumige; witon hi eac, þæt
þurh hyrsumnesse him bið weg gerymed to Gode.
 71.130.15. Hæbbe se abbod anweald on eallum his hæsum and eac
swa þa ealdras, þe fram him to ðam gesette synd, þæt hi oþrum
beodum; we elles nanum oðrum ne geþafiað, þæt he gebod æfter
hæse age; elles ælc oþrum hyrsumige mid soðre lufe and mid mycelre
endebyrdnesse.
 71.130.19. Gif hira hwylc geflitgeorn bið, sy him gestyred.
 71.131.1. Gif hwylcum breþer for ænigum litlum gylte byþ
gecid/ oþþe gestyred fram his abbode oþþe ænigum his yldrena,
oþþe ongyt, þæt hira æniges mod wið hine astyred bið, þeah
hit for gehwædum and eaþelicum þincge sie, he þærrihte hine
astrecce butan ælcere elcunge and swa lange astreht æt his fotum licge,
oþ þæt he his yldran mod gegladige and his bletsunge begite.
 71.131.7. Gif he þis oferhigð and hit don nelle, hine man yfele
mid swingele hæbbe; gif he on toþundennesse þurhwunað, hine man of
þam mynstre mid ealle adræfe.
 72.131.11. BE GODUM ÆFSTE, ÐE MUNECAS HABBAN SCEOLON.
 72.131.12. Eal swa yfel biternesse anda and æfst ascyreð fram
Gode and læt to helle, ealrihte swa god anda and anhering ascyreð fram
synna leahtrum and læt to Gode and to ecum life.
 72.131.14. Forþi þenne munecas þæne æran andan
awyrpende, þysene oþerne mid hatan wylme soðre lufe geornlice began;
ælc hicge mid arweorðnesse and mid þæs uplican lifes gewilnunge, hu
he oþerne on halgum þeowdome forþeon mæge.
 72.131.18. Hi mid geþylde him betweoh betende forberen þa
untrumnessa hira lichamena and þa tyddernessa hira þeawa; ælc oþrum to
geflites, hu he swyðust mæge, hyrsumige.
 72.132.3. Hira nan ne filige his ahnum dome on þam þingum, þe
he him sylfum nytwyrðe talige and behefe, ac þam swiðust, þe oðrum
furður framiam mæge, þonne him sylfum.
 72.132.6. Dælen him betweoh mid soðre lufe þa sibbe hira
broþorrædene, ondræden a hira drihten, and hira abbod lufian mid
anfealdre lufe and mid eaðmodre; hi nan þing him inmedre ne læten, ne
besorhre, þonne hira drihten, þe us ealle gemænelice to ecum life
gelæde.
 73.132.12. BE ÐAM ÐÆT ÆLC RIHTWISNESSE GYMEN ON ÐISUM
REGULE NIS GESET.
 73.132.14. Ðisne regul, þæt is lifes rihtunge, we awriton
toþy, þæt we hine on mynstre healden and æt sume cyrre geswutulian,
þæt we angin godre drohtunge and godra þeawa arwyrðnesse þurh hine
hæbben.
 73.132.18. Se þe fulfremednesse haligre drohtnunge habban wile,
þæt þa synd gesette to lifes bysene halegra fædera lara, þara gemen
and gehealdsumnes gelæt mannan to fulþungenre fulfremednesse.
 73.133.2. La, hwylc tramet is, oþþe hwylc spræc þæs
godcundan lareoudomes, aþer oðþe þære ealdan cyðnesse oþþe
þære niwan, þæt ne sy seo rihteste bysen uran menniscan lifes?
 73.133.4. Oþþe hwylc boc is þara halgan fædera and
rihtgelyfedra, þæt þæt ne clypige and swege, þæt we mid rihtum
færelde cuman scylan to urum scyppende?
 73.133.7. Eac swylce þara haligra fædera and þa gesettan lif
hira drohtnunge and se regul ures halgan fæder Basilii, hwæt is hit elles
butan getimbrunga and tol haligra manna and þara muneca, þe wel and rihte
libbað and gehyrsume synd?
 73.133.11. To sceame and to ablysunge hi sint us, þe asolcene
synd and yfele and gymeleaslice mid unrihte libbað.
 73.133.13. Swa hwylc swa onettende efst to þam heofonlican
eþle, gefreme ærest þurh Godes fultum and mid Gode geenda þisne
læstan regul, þe her awriten is, to anginne godre drohtnunge, and swa
æt nyhstan Gode fultumiendum, þu cymst to þam marum geþincþum lare
and mægna þara halgena, þe we bufan gemundum, þæt a geweorðe ece
lif to edleane and midwununcg mid Gode eallum þam, þe þissum regule
filigeað.
 73.133.20. HER GEENDAÞ ÞÆS REGULES BEC FEDERYS HEALICES AND
ÞÆS EADIGAN ABBODES BENEDICTES: IN NAMAN GODES, URES HELENDES CRYSTES.

BenRApp
B10.3.1.3.
Benedict, Rule: Schroer 1885-8, 134-41 (App. I-II).



 134.2. BE MUNECA CYNNE.
 134.3. Syx synt muneca cynerena, þara synt þreo þa selestan,
þa oþere þreo þa forcuþestan and eallum gemete to forbugenne.
 134.5. Þæt forme cyn is mynstermanna, þe gemænan life
drohtniað on mynstre, gelice þam halgum, þe þæm apostolum folgodon
and ealle æhta becypton and þearfum todeldon and swa forð heora
gemæne lif heoldon, þæt hy forþon þæt word na cwædon,
þæt hi agen ænig þing hæfdon.
 134.9. Þurh þara apostola angin and þara, þe him folgodan,
munuclif wurdon begunnene.
 134.11. Oþer cyn is muneca, þæt is westensetlan, þe feor
fram mannum gewitað and westestowa and ælætu and anwunung gelufiað,
geefenlæcende Elian, þone mæran witegan, and Johannem, þone
fulluhtere, þa þurhwununge on westenes innoþe heoldon.
 134.15. Swilce westensetlan eornestlice þisne middangeard
forhogiaþ and on westenes wununge gelustfulliað, be wyrtum anum libbende,
oþþe be hlafe and wetere, se him biþ broht on gesettum timum.
 134.18. Swa dihlice wuniende hy fram manna gesyhðe ascyriaþ and
Godes agenre spræce gelomlice brucaþ, þæm hy mid clænum mode hy
sylfe beþeoddan and for his lufan þisne middangeard and manna
geþeodrædenne forsawan.
 134.22. Þridde cyn is ansetlena, þe on mynsteres wununge
fulfremede sindon and hie sylfe on syndrigum husum for Godes lufan belucaþ
and hy sylfe fram manna gesyhþe ascyriende nara manna nealæcynge na
underfoþ, ac on Godes besceawunge anre libbaþ.
 135.2. Feorðe cyn is þara, þe hy under leasum hiwe ansetlan
teliaþ.
 135.3. Be swa geradum Sanctus Casianus cwyþ, þæt hi mid
ungesceade on þam frumwylme heora gecyrrednesse hy sylfe fulfremede taliaþ,
ac hy swiþe recene awlaciaþ and swindende acoliaþ, þonne hy þa ealdan
unðeawas and leahtras ascunian nellaþ, ne eaþmodnesse iuc and geþyldes
na leng befeolan nellaþ, ne heora ealdra gebodum hyrsumian nellaþ, forþi
ansetles wununge geceosaþ, þæt hi geþwære and eaþmode geþuhte
syn and hi nan man gegremian ne dyrre.
 135.11. Ne wyrþ næfre fulfremed, se þe on þus niwan
anginne ansetla beon wile.
 135.13. Ne beoð his unþeawas gewanode mid þysum anginne, ac
swiðe miclum geeacnode; ðonne heora unðeawas fram nanum men gebette ne
beoþ, eal hi weaxaþ on yfel, swa swa atres unlibba on men, swa he leng
þæs attres þigene bedihlað, swa his untrumnes mare.
 135.17. Nan man ne dear for arwyrðnesse þæs ansetlan
leahtras tælan; him synt eac þa ungeselþa leofran, þæt he hy nyte,
þænne he hi lacnige.
 135.20. Fifte cyn is widscriþelra hleapera, þe under muneces
gegyrlan æghwider scriþaþ, swilce hy licetunge to ceape lædan; ða
þurh nanes mannes sande ne farað, faraþ þeah geond missenlice þeoda,
nefre staþolfeste, næfre wuniende, nahwar sittende.
 135.23. Idele and lease spel hi hywiaþ and mannum reccaþ, be
wenan hi healdaþ God ælmihtigne; sume martyra lima geahniaþ, and an
tweon is, hwæder hy martyras syn; sume heora fnada and wrædas
gemiccliaþ, idel lof fram mannum begytende.
 135.27. Sume sidfeaxe gaþ, þæt seo bescorene halignes ne sy
weorþre, þenne seo unbescorene, þæt hy þurh þæt wiðmetene syn
Samuele and Elian and oþerum halgum, þe sidfeaxe wæron.
 135.31. Sume secgaþ, þæt hy micelne weordscype and rice
magas on heora earde hæfdon and þa eft geneosian willaþ; ealle hi
biddað and wilniaþ þa heafene þysse gestreonfullan wædle, oþþe
his lease hiw on halignesse wyrð.
 136.2. Ðonne hy on heora dædum and on yfelum wordum arasode
beoð and on sumon gemete onfundene, on gemænum naman muneca ingehyd byð
gehyrewed.
 136.6. Þæt sixte muneca cyn is ealra forcuþost and swiðost
forsewen, þæt asprang on anginne cristendomes þurh Annanian and
Saphiran, and mid þes apostoles Petres reþnysse wurdon forslægene,
forþam þe hy ascyriað hy sylfe fram mynsterlicum þeawum and heora
agenum lustum filiaþ, hy synt egyptiscan gereorde genemnede sarabagite
oððe renuite, þæt ys sylfedeman and widersacan.
 136.12. Hi tymbriaþ him stowa and hy leasum naman mynstra
hataþ, nellað hy ealdras habban, ne be heora tecinge libban on þeowdome,
ac be heora agenum lustum.
 136.15. To geflites hi swincað on weorce, no toþi, þæt hi
heora geswinces gestreon þearfum delen, ac þæt hy feoh gestrynen and on
hyrde lecgen; be heom cwyð Sanctus Hieronimus, swa hwæt swa hy heora
geswinces becypaþ, þæt byþ maran wyrðes, swilce heora cræft sy
halig and na heora lif.
 136.20. Soþlice, se sylfa Hieronimus be heom cwyþ, to geflites
hy fæstaþ and, þæt digle þing beon scolde, to sige, þæt is to
bodunge and to getotes gylpe, gewyrcaþ.
 136.22. Hy gelyst ealces ydeles, habbaþ side earmellan and
pohhede hosa, stiþe reaf gelomlice hy anscuniaþ, fæmnhadesmen hi
geneosiaþ, preostas tælaþ and þonne freolstid biþ, hy beoþ
oferfyllede oþ spiweþan.
 136.26. Betweoh cenobium and monasterium þyllic todal wyrhð
Sanctus Casianus, þæt monasterium mæg beon gehaten anes muneces wunung,
cenobium ne byð genemned buton manegra wunung.
 136.29. Þara drohtnunge ic gesweotelige, swa swa ure
forþfæderas hit gesettan.
 136.30. Hi witodlice, swa swa we ær cwædon, ærest þis
lif forseoð and ealles þysses lifes unalyfednessa, and halige drohtnunge on
gemænum life healdaþ, heora lif hy adreogaþ on halgum gebedum, on
rædincgum, on smegeongum, on wæccum, on fæstenum, ne synt hy na
toþundenne mid ænigre modignesse, ne synt hy ættrene þurh andan, ac
hy synt gemetfæste and glæde and sceamfæste, and geþwærum life hy
lifiaþ, heora geþohtas him betweonan anwreoð, gemænelice hy smeagaþ
and rihtað.
 137.7. Nan heora eorðlices nan þing synderlice nah, mid
deorwyrþum reafum and gefagedum ne beoþ hy gescrydde, ac mid unweorþum
and anfealdum; baþa hy næfre brucaþ for heora lichoman luste, ac seldon
for heora untrumnesse neode.
 137.10. Hy nahwider faraþ butan þæs abbodes ræde, ne nan
þincg beginnaþ butan þæs ealdres geþafuncge; hy wyrcaþ mid heora
handum, þæt hyra lichoma mid afedd sy and heora mod fram drihtne ne sy
gehremmed.
 137.14. Mid heora handum wyrcende heora sealmas singaþ, swylce hy
heora geswinc mid godcundre gladunge gefremmen.
 137.17. Þæt þæt hy wyrcaþ, hy betæcaþ hit heora
teoþingealdrum, þæt hy butan hoge and care syn ealra þinga, þe to
heora lichoman belimpeð, oþþe on æte, oþþe on scrude, oþþe on
oþrum neadbehefum þingum.
 137.20. Ða teoþincgealdras þæt ylce þam prafestan
betæcaþ, se prafast þonne þæt mid micelre embhydignesse fadaþ and
gegearewaþ, swa hwæt swa heora lif for lichamlicre untrumnesse behofaþ;
se sylfa profast gescead agylt þem, þe hy fæder nemnaþ, þæt is
þæm abbode.
 137.24. Þa federas þænne scealon beon foremære on
andgite, on þylde, on gesceade; hi þonne eaþmode and nan þincg modige
framigaþ heora bearnum, mid miclan heora gebodes ealdorscipe and mid micclan
willan heora beorna hyrsumnysse.
 137.29. Hy gegaderiaþ hy swiþe gelomlice dæges and nihtes
mid micclan ofste to heora tidsangum, gesealdum beacne; mid micelre gymenne
heora heortan heora tida singaþ, oþ þæs sealmsanges ende butan
æþrote þurhwuniende.
 138.2. Eft hy gaderiaþ hy on nixtnig, þæt hy raca gehyren
æt heora fæder.
 138.3. Hi þonne be heora race gehyraþ mid micelre gecneordnesse
and mid healicum swigean, mid geomrunge and mid wope hi getacniaþ heora modes
lufe, be þam þe hy gemyndige beoþ mid þæs reccendun spræce.
 138.7. Hy siþþan heora lichoman mid micelre swigan gereordaþ,
swa micel þicggende, swa hy heora hæle mid gehealden megen; on eallum
ætum mid forhæfednesse gifernesse gewilnunge wildaþ, þæt heora
heortan furþum mid wacum mettum and unweorþum ne syn ofersymede.
 138.12. Witodlic fram flæsce and wine hy forhabbaþ, toþy
þæt hy ælcne galscype on hy gewylden, na þæt an, ac fram eallum
þam þigenum, þe hracan oþþe innoþ to miclum luste getyhþ.
 138.15. Eallunga swa hwæt swa hy gespariaþ on heora
forhæfednessæ and swa hwæt swa toforan þam neadbehefum belifen byþ
on heora mægenes tilunge, mid swiþe micelre embhydignesse þearfum
gedælaþ and swa micel to lafe lætaþ, swa hy nede habban scylan.
 138.19. To þes halgan þeowdomes ingehyde cumaþ na þa ane,
þe freo synt, ac gyt ma þa, þe æhtborene synt and oþera manna
freosceattas and for þam anum foroft gefreode.
 138.22. Of cyrliscum life and of folclicum gedeorfe gehwelces
creftes men to þam ylcum Godes þeowdomes gecampe gecyrraþ, þa butan
tweon swa micele eaðelicor and sel drohtniaþ, swa hy stiþlice afedde
wæron.
 138.25. Gif man swilce underfon nelle, hit byþ swiðe hefigtyme
gylt.
 138.26. Heora formænig foremære wearþ and earfoþe to
geefenlæcenne, forþy God þa unstrangan þyses middangeardes geceas,
þæt þa strangmodan, þe on agenum mihtum truwiaþ, gescende wurdon.
 138.29. Þa he eac geceas, þe dyselice and nahtlice geþuhte
synt, þæt þa, þe mid ofermettum hy sylfe for aht teliaþ, aidele,
þæt nan þing flæsclices beforan Gode mid getote ne bogie.
 139.3. Witodlice, þam ylcum gemete wuniaþ and gyt aþolede
synt munecena mynstru, þe man hurum dryhtne ymbhydelice and clenlice on
þeowiaþ; þara wunung is ascyred and asyndrod feor fram munecum; hi beoþ
him þeah geþeodde mid soþre lufe and mid æfæsnesse heora halignysse
and mid efenlæcinge haligra mægena.
 139.8. Nis nanra geongra manna neosung to þæm, ne forþon
þeah hy fulripode syn and wel afandode, buton þara anra, þe for neode him
þenunge æt þæs mynstres ingange ræcan scylon.
 139.11. Heora wealdaþ anlipige staþalfeste and wel afandode and
on heora ealdorscype heora underþeodra þeawas gestaþeliaþ and
gefrætewiaþ, ne þæt an, ac gyt swiþor heora mod getimbriaþ,
gelæraþ and gegearwiaþ.
 139.14. Mid willenum reafe heora lichoman gegearwiaþ and
gescyrdaþ, hy munecum reaf syllaþ and munecas him bileofan.
 139.16. Ane þeawas, an lif and ane gesceadwisne hi healdaþ
muneca mynstra on eallum þingum.
 139.18. Munucas þurh heora eaþmodnesse hy beoþ gecorene and
Gode andfencge.
 139.19. Heora formænig mid idelum lofe byþ besmittad and mit
þam leasum gylpe beswicen, manige hy anhebbaþ for heora miclan
forhæfednesse, menige eac for heora lare.
 139.21. God hy wyrcaþ, ac þæt for idelum lofe and na for
ecum life, ac þurh þæt gewilniaþ ideles lofes wulder, þæt hy mid
toþundennysse cumen mægen to geþincðe þæs gewilnedan
wyrþmyntes.
 139.25. Betweoh swylcum ungeþwærnessa aspringaþ; gif hwylc
broþor on Gode þyhþ, on þæt hy andiaþ, him sihþ on þyssa
hwilwendra þinga lufu, hi swiþe grædilice eorþcundum lustum filigaþ
and oft swiþe sceamleaslice on manna gesyhþe.
 139.28. Þa þe þyllice beoþ, nateshwon hy na synt to
nemnenne munecas, forþy þe hy ne sint Gode geþeodde mid godum dædum,
ac mid worda andetnesse.
 140.2. BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM AND HYRA ÞENUM.
 140.3. Gif hwylc abbod geþafaþ, þæt mæssepreost
oþþe diacon in to mynstre gange, toþy þæt hy messan singan and þa
andrysnan þenunge mid arwyrþnesse gefyllen, syn hy swa gecorene, þæt
hy untæle syn and sacerdhades þurh ealle gode cysta wel wyrþe.
 140.7. Syn hy clængeorne, geþyldige and eaþmode, bewarnian
hy georne wiþ upahæfednesse and modignesse; ne hy nan þing ne
gedyrstlæcen, ne nænne ontige on þam mynstre butan þære mæssan
anre.
 140.10. Ne hy nane spræce wiþ þa gebroþra agen; ne hy
þærinne leng ne wunien, þonne seo mæsse gesungen sy, ac sona swa seo
mæsse gesungen sy, hi eaþmodlice utgan.
 140.13. Warnian þa gebroþra georne, þæt hy nane syndrigan
spræce wiþ þa mæssepreostas næbben, ne wiþ heora þeningmen.
 140.15. Gif þara gebroþra hwylc his diglan synna þæm
mæssepreoste andettan wille, sy þæt gedon be þæs abbodes leafe
innan cirican, na on digelre stowe, ac swa, þæt þa gebroþra him
onlocian mægen, ealswa hit þurh þa halgan fæderas beboden is.
 140.19. Gif hyra hwylc geuntrumad biþ, þæt he ciricean gegan
ne mæge, do his andetnesse on þan huse, þe he onwunaþ, on gesyhþe
his gebroþra.
 140.21. Gif heora hwylc butan þære neode and butan þæs
abbodes hæse gedyrstlæcþ, þæt he ænige spræce wiþ hy age,
eawunga oþþe dearnunga, he sy geþread mid þære stiþestan
þreale.
 141.2. Hæbbe se abbod swa gecorenne mæssepreost,
ægþær ge deacon ge subdiacon, and Gode swa gecweme þurh halige
drohtnunge, þæt him nan unhlisa ne fylge þurh ænigne fracodscype, ac
heora goda hlisa gearweorþige þa, þe hy to þære mæssan þenunge
gecuren.

BenR (i*)
B10.3.2.
Benedict, Rule, Chapter 4 of London, British Library, MS. Cotton Tiberius A.III: D'Aronco 1983, 124-28.



 4.124.1. Be godra weorca tolum.
 4.124.2. Ærest man sceal god lufian of ealre heortan and of
eallum mode and of eallum mægene and æfter þon his nehstan swa swa hine
sylfne.
 4.124.5. Ne sceal man manslean, ne unriht hæman, ne stelan, ne
unalyfedlice gelustfullian, ne leasunga secgan, ac ælcene man man sceal
arwurþian and ne sceal nan man don oðrum, þæt he nelle, þæt him
man do.
 4.124.8. Man sceal hys agenum lustum wiðsacun and folgian Cristes
lare, his lichaman gehwa sceal clænsian, þæt ys mid forhæfednyssed
wyllan; estmyttas na to grædiglice man ne sceal lufian, ac fæsten man
sceal lufian.
 4.124.11. Earmne man sceal hyrtan and nacode scrydan; untrume
neosian and deade bebyrgean; geswectum helpan and sarigende frefrian.
 4.124.14. And fram woruldwilnungum hine sceal gehwa fremdian and
nan þinc beforan Cristes lufe settan.
 4.125.15. Yrre ne sceal man fulfremman; yrsunge tide ne sceal man
gehealdan; facn ne sceal man on heortan habban; lease sibbe ne sceal man
syllan; soðe lufe ne sceal man forlætan.
 4.125.18. Swerigean ne seal man, þe lys man forswerige;
soðfæstnysse of heortan and of muðe man sceal symle forðbringan.
 4.125.19. Ne sceal man yfel mid yfele gyldan, ne nanum men nænne
teone ne don, ac þone þe him man yfel do, he sceal geþyldelice hit
aræfnian; his find man sceal lufian for Godes lufan; þa wyrgendan ne sceal
man na ongeanwyrgean, ac me bletsian; ehtnysse for rihte man sceal eadmodlice
þolian.
 4.125.24. Ne sceal man beon ofermod, ne to druncengeorn, ne
foræte, ne toslapol, ne to slaw, ne to grorniende, ne to tælende.
 4.125.25. Ac ealne is tohopan he sceal habban on God; þonne he
hwæt godes deð, þonne sceal he þæt he all tellan to Gode, and
þonne he hwæt yfeles deð, he sceal witan þæt þæt cymð of him
sylfum.
 4.126.28. Domesdæg he geþencan sceal symle, and ellewitu he
him sceal a ondrædan, and þæs ecan lifes he sceal mid ealre
geornfulnysse gyrnan, and ælce dæge he him deaðes wenan.
 4.126.31. His weorca he sceal giman on ælce tide, þæt þa
gode syn, and he sceal geþencan, þæt he nahwær Gode digle ne bið,
ac he hine æghwær gesihð; þa yfelan geþohtas, þe him on mod
becumað, he sceal sona on Crist toslean and his gaslican lareowe andettan.
 4.126.35. Þonne he hi toslehð on Criste, þonne he
geþencað Cristes þrowunga and his wundra and mid þam geþohtum
aflemð þa yfelan geþohtas.
 4.126.37. His muð he sceal fram ælcum þweoran and yfelum
wordum gehealdan; ne sceal he feala sprecan, ne yfel word ne leahtorbære; ne
leahtor ne sceal he lufian.
 4.127.39. Halige rædinge he sceal lustlice gehyran and gelome on
gebedum beon; his forðgewitenan yflu he sceal dæghwamlice mid tearum Gode
andettan and hi georne betan.
 4.127.42. Ne sceal he his lichaman luste folgian; his agene willan
he sceal onscunian, and his abbodes bebodum on eallum þingum gehyrsumian,
þeah hit si, swa swa hit ne gedafenað, þæt he wyrs do, þonne he
lære; hi sceolon gemunon þone drihtenlican cwyde, on þam he cwæð:
þæt þæt hie eow secgean, do ge þæt and þæt hi don, ne do ge
hwæt.
 4.127.47. Ne se man lofgeorn, ne ne wilnigende, þæt hys
dæda halige gesæde syn, ær hie halige geweorðan ac hicge, þæt
hit mid soðe gesæd beon mæge; ne sceal Godes bebodu dægwamlice mid
godum dædum gyfelled and his clænnysse lufian; ne sceal he nanne man
hatian; ne sceal he andian and æfst healdan, ne geflyt lufian; ne sceal
uphafednesse forfleon and his ealdras wyrðian and his gingrun lufian; for
Godes lufan for hyra fynd hie sceal gebiddan; ær sunnan setlgange hie scylon
to sibbe fon wið þa ungeþweran; and he nære ne ortrywe be Godes
miltse.
 4.128.56. Efne nu þis synt gastlices cræftes tol and gebetla;
þonne heo fram hus dæges and nihtes unablendelice beoð ealle gefyllede
and on domesdæge eft betæhte, seo med us bið fram drihtne agolden, þe
he sylfa behet, þæt his: þæt mænnissce eage for heora micelnysse
geseon ne mihte; ne manne eare gehyran, ne on mannes heortan ne astah, þe God
ælmihtig gegearwað eallum þam, þe hine lufiað.
 4.128.62. On mynstres claustre geferrædene staðolfæstnys
ealle þas þenunge man began sceal and geornfullice wyrcean.

END_TEXT

B10.3.3.
Benedict, Rule, Wells fragment: Schroer 1885-8, 78-122.



 50.78.2. BE ÐAM GEBROÐRUM ÐE FEOR FRAM CYRICEAN WYRCAÐ.
 50.78.4. Þa gebroðra, þe feorr beoð on geswince and hig ne
magon for ðam fyrlene on gedafenlicum tidum heora cyrcan and heora tidsangas
gesecan, gif se abbod þæt ongyt, þæt hit swa is, gefyllan hig heora
tida þærrihte þær hig wyrcan, and mid godcundan ege heora cneowa
eadmodlice gebigan.
 50.78.9. Don handswagelice þa, ðe on fare synd, and hig na
forgiman þa gesettan tida, ac ælcne tidsang gefyllan, swa hig betst magon;
þa gewunelican wæge heora ðeowdomes ne for weorces bysgum, ne for
færeldes hig nateshwon forgimeleasion.
 51.78.14. BE ÞAM GEBROÐRUM ÞE ON FARE SYND.
 51.78.15. Þa gebroðra, þe for hwylcere neode utfarað and
hig þam ylcan dæge to mynstre cuman magon, ne gedyrstlæcan hig,
þæt hig awar ut of mynstre etan, þeah hig hwa bidde, butan heora abbodes
leafe.
 51.78.18. Gif hit hwa ðonne deð butan his leafe, beo on
amansumunge.
 52.80.2. BE MYNSTRES GEBEDHUSE.
 52.80.3. Gebedhus sig to ðam anum, þe hit gecweden is, þæt
is, þæt þær nan ðing elles geworht sig oððe gefadod, butan
ðam anum weorce, þe to Gode belimpð, þæt syndon halige gebedu.
 52.80.6. Æt ælces tidsanges ende gan hig ut ealle mid
þære mæstan swigan and sig God a gewurðod þæt se broðor, ðe
hine synderlice gebiddan wyle to Gode, þæt he ne beo gehremmed oððe
gelett þurh æniges oðres onhrope.
 52.80.9. Gif hwylc heora eft onsundron hine diglice gebiddan wyle,
he inga mid stilnysse and hine gebidde, na mid hluddre stefne, ac mid teara
wope and mid his heortan abryrdnysse.
 52.80.12. Eornostlice se, ðe þyllice weorc þærinne wyrcan
nelle, ne geþafige man him, þæt he ðærinne ænige wununge
hæbbe æfter ðæs tidsanges geendunge, þelæs ðe þa gehremmede
beon, þe ða gebedu lufiað.
 53.80.17. BE CUMENA ANDFENGE.
 53.80.18. Ealle cuman, þe to mynstre cumað, underfo man hig,
swylce hit Crist sylf sig, forðam þe he sylf cwæð on þam halgan
godspelle: Ic wæs cuma and ge me underfengon; beo eallum cuman þæslic
and gedafenlic wurðmynt gegearwod, swa ðeah swiðost þam rihtgelyfedum
urum gehadum and þam forwracnedum elþeodigum.
 53.82.3. Forðig eornostlice, sona swa se cuma gecydd sig, gange
se ealdor him togeanes, oðþe þa gebroðra, mid eallre þenunge
ðære soþan lufe, and hig ærest hig samod gebiddan and swa beon on
soðre sibbe geferlæhte.
 53.82.6. Ne beode him mann sibbecoss, ærðam þe hig to Gode
gebiddan and bletsunge underfon, for mislicum deofles costnungum.
 53.82.8. On þære gemænnan gretinge beo þær eall
eadmodnyss æteowed eallum cuman, þe to mynstre cumað, oððe fram
mynstre farað: abugan him to eadmodlice mid þam heafde oððe eallne
lichaman on eorðan astrecce, and Crist sig swa mid eadmodnysse gebeden, þe
symble an cuman hiwe onfangen byð.
 53.82.13. Beon hig to cyrcan gelædde to gebede, and underfon hig
syððan, swa swa him to gebyrað; sitte hig, locahwær se ealdor him
tæce oððe hate.
 53.82.15. Beo gerædd ætforan þam cuman seo godcunde æ
and lar, þæt he sig getrymmed to Godes willan, æfter þam beo him
gegearwod gehyðlice eall mennisclic fremfullnyss.
 53.82.18. Abrece se abbod his fæsten for cumena þingon, butan
hit hwylc healic fæsten sig, þe man abrecan ne durre; ða gebroðra
healdan þeahhwæðere heora fæsten æfter gewunan.
 53.82.21. Geote se abbod wæter þam cuman to handum; þwean
eallra cumena fet, ægðer ge se abbod ge eall seo geferræden.
 53.82.23. Æfter þam ðweale singe man þis fers ðus
cweðende: <foreign>Suscipiamus domine misericordiam tuam imedio templi tui</foreign>: We
onfengon, drihten, þine mildheortnysse on midlene ðines temples.
 53.84.1. Beo ðam abbode seo mæste hogu þæs andfencges
þearfena and elðeodigra, forðam Cristus on hig swiðost byð afangen;
ðæra riccra manna ege and hoga gemynegað, þæt him sylfum wurðlic
sig gegearwod and wyrðmynt genoh geboden, ac Godes ege ana mynegað,
þæt man ðearfum and elðeodigum mannum geðensum sig.
 53.84.7. Beo þæs abbodes kicene and ðæra cumena
onsundron, þæt ða gebroðra ne beon geunstilde, þonne cuman
færlice on uncuþum tidum to mynstre cuman; seldhwænne oððe næfre
mynster butan cuman byð.
 53.84.10. To geares fæce twegen gebroðra into cumena kicenan
gan, and þa beon swylce, þe wel cunnon þenian and ða ðenunge wel
gefyllan.
 53.84.12. Beo him geseald fultum, gif hig þæs behofiað,
ðæt hig ðurh þæs fultumes frofor butan ceorunge þenian; eft
þonne hig læssan bysega habbað, faran to swylcum weorce and
gehyrsumnysse, swylce him beboden sig.
 53.84.16. Ðeos foresceawung sig gehealden na on þisum anum, ac
on eallum mynsterþenungum, þæt is, ðonne hig behofian, sig him
gefultumod and frofer þurhtogen, and eft þonne hig bysega nabbon on heora
wicum and æmtige synd, hyrsumian hig on swilcum þingum, swylce him man
beode.
 53.84.20. Sig cumena hus swylcum breðer betæht to bewitenne,
þe fullne Geodes ege hæbbe and his sawle freond sig; beon þær symble
bedd genihtsumlice ofersprædde, and þæt Godes hus, þæt is cumena
hus, wislice fram witum sig gefadod.
 53.86.1. Nateshwon heora nan wið cumena hine geferlæce
oððe æninge spræce wið hine hæbbe, butan þam anum þe hit
beboden byð; gif hig hwylcne cuman gemeton, greton hine eadmodlice on þa
wisan, þe we ær cwædon, and hine bletsunge bidden and him swa
forðgangen, secggende, þæt him alyfed nis, wið cuman to sprecenne.
 54.86.8. BE ÞAM ÞÆT NAN MUNUC ÆRENDGEWRITU NE OÞRE LAC
NE UNDERFO.
 54.86.10. Ne sig nateshwon munece alyfed, þæt he ænig
gewrit oððe sende, oððe lac underfon fram heora magum, oððe fram
ænigum oþrum menn, oððe him betwynan underfon, oððe syllon, butan
þæs abbodes hæse.
 54.86.13. Gif hwæt heora ænigum fram heora magum asend byð,
ne gedyrstlæce he hit na to underfonne, ær hit þam abbode gecydd sig.
 54.86.15. Gif hit þonne se abbod underfon hate, stande on his
dome, hwam hit man sylle; and se broðor, þe swylc lac to asend byð, for
þam ne geunrotsige, þelæs ðe he deofle þurh þæt ænige
intingan sylle, and to mycelne gefean on his unrotnysse hæbbe.
 54.86.19. Se ðe oðerlicor gedyrstlæce, underhnige þære
regollican steore.
 55.88.2. BE MYNSTERMANNA HRÆGELHUSE AND HYRA HRÆGELTALE.
 55.88.4. Sig gebroðrum reaf geseald be swylcnysse and staðele
þære stowe, þe hig onwuniað, and be þæs eardes oððe ðære
lyfte gewyrderum; on cealdum eardum is neod, þæt ðæs reafes mare sig,
on hleowfæstum læs.
 55.88.7. Þæs abbodes foresceawung sceal beon be þisum, hu
þæs neodige.
 55.88.9. We þeah gelyfað, on medemum stowum þæt
ænlipigeum munecum genihtsumige, þæt he hæbbe culan and syric; beo
seo cule on wintra of þiccum hrægle, and on sumera heo sceal beon þynne
oððe eald awered; habbon hig eac mid to wyrcene scapulare, þæt is
gewæde cule and slyflease; habbon hig to fotgewædum hosa and meon.
 55.88.14. Ne cidon þa munecas ymbe þa deage oððe greatnysse
heora reafa; habbon swylce reaf, swylce man findan mæge on ðam earde, þe
hig onwuniað, oððe swylce man undeorest gebicgan mæge.
 55.88.17. Besceawige se abbod and hate besidian þære reafa
gemet, þæt hig ne beon to sceorte, ac gemæte þam, ðe heora
notiað.
 55.90.1. Agife a þa ealdan, þonne him man niwe reaf sylle, and
to hrægelhuse betæcon, þearfum to dælene.
 55.90.2. Genoh byð þam munuce and fullgenihstum, þæt he
hæbbe twa culan and twegen syricas for ðære nihtware and for ðæs
reafes ðweale; eall hit byð oferflowendnyss and idel toforan þisum; gif
hit mare byð, hit sig gewanod.
 55.90.6. Swa oft, swa hig aðor oððe meon, oððe ænig
þing niwes underfon, betæcan a þæt ealde.
 55.90.8. Ða þe on ytinge farað ahwyder, niman him brec of
hrægelhuse, eft swa hig cumon ham of ðam færelde, betæcan him
gewahsene.
 55.90.10. Beon eac on hræglhuse gehealden ægðer ge culan ge
syricas æthwega beteran þonne ða, þe hig gewunelice weriað; and
notian þæra, ðe for hwylcere neode on ytinge farað, and þa eft ðam
hrægelþene betæcan, swa hig ham cuman.
 55.90.15. To beddreafe genihtsumige to hæbbenne meatte and
hwitel and beddfelt and heafodbolstor.
 55.90.16. Ðeahhwæðere se abbod sceal gelomlice sceawian þa
bedd and asmeagan for syndrigum æhtum.
 55.90.18. Gif hig hwa hæbbe, oððe.
 57.94.2. BE MYNSTRES CRÆFTIGAN.
 57.94.3. Gif cræftige menn on mynstre beon, began þone
cræft and georne wyrcan, gif hit se abbod geðafað.
 57.94.4. Gif hwylc heora for ðæs cræftes þingon hine
onhefð, for þæs cræftes truwan and forðig, ðe he bedæle
þære stowe mid his cræfte fremode, sig he ascyred fram ðam cræfte,
and he nateshwon þone cræft ne beginne, butan he mid mycelre eadmodnysse
þæs abbodes unnan begite.
 57.94.10. Gif man hwæt becypan sceole, þæs ðe cræftige
menn on mynstre wyrcað, warnian þa, ðe þone ceap drifað, þæt hig
nan ðing facenlices on ðam ceape ne don.
 57.94.12. Beon hig gemyndig symble Annaniam and Saphiram,
þelæs ðe hig þone deað on heora sawle þolian, ðe hig lichamlice
ðoledon, ælc þæra þe on ðisum oððe on ænigum oðrum
mynstres þincgum ænig ðincg facenlices deð.
 57.94.16. Gif hwylc neod sig to becypenne ænig þincg heore
handcræftes, þæt sig butan gitsunge undeoror geseald, þonne hit
woruldmannum gewunelic sig, þæt Godes lof on eallum þingum stande.
 58.96.2. BE NICUMENRA GEBROÐRA ANDFENCGE.
 58.96.3. Gif hwa niwan to mynstres drohtnunge gecyrran wyle, ne sig
him na eaðelic þæs infæres getiðod; ac do man eallswa se apostol
tæcð, þæt is, þæt man georne fandige, hwæðer hig mid Godes
gaste afyllede syn.
 58.96.6. Gif he geðyldelice forbyrð ægðer ge hosp ge
edwit, and on ðære wirne þeah þurhwunað and eadmodlice bitt,
þæt him man infæres tiðige, sig he underfangen embe ane feower dagas
oððe fife and wunige on cumena huse ane feawa dagas.
 58.96.11. Tæce him man syððan to nigcumenra manna huse, and
he ðær ete and reste and embe his gastlican þearfe smeage.
 58.96.13. And gastlic ealdor and wis his hæbbe gymene, þe wel
cunne sawla Gode gestrynan, se geornlice behogige and georne gyme, hwæðer
he mid fullre onbryrdnysse and arwyrðnysse God ælmihtigne sece, and
hwæðer he carfull sig and gesceot to godcundum weorcum and to
gehyrsumnysse, and hwæðer he mid geþylde hospas and witu þolian
wylle.
 58.96.18. Beo him gesæd eall seo stiðnys and earfoðnys, þe
to Gode læt and to heofenan rices gefean.
 58.96.20. Gif he þonn behæt staðolfæstnysse, þæt he
on ðam þurhwunian wylle, embe twegen monðas þises ræde him man
ætforan þone regol and cweðe þus to him: Her is seo æ, þe ðu
under hire tæcincge winnan wylt and campian; gif ðe onhagige, þæt
ðu hit healdan mæge, far ðe inn; gif þe ne onhagige, far ðe freoh
þyder, ðe þu wille.
 58.98.2. Gif he þonne gyt þurhwunað, læde hine man eft to
nicumenra manna huse, and his man georne fandige, hwæðer he þolomod sig
and geþyldig.
 58.98.4. Eft embe syx monþas sig him gerædd eall þes regol
fram foreweardan, þæt he ðe geornlicor understande, hwæt hit sig,
þe he tofundað.
 58.98.6. Gif he þonne gyt þurhwunað, embe feower monðas sig
him eft þes ylca regol gerædd and þæt andgit gewissod.
 58.98.8. Gif he þonne be his agenum dome behæt, þæt he
ealle ðincg gehealdan wylle and ealle þæs regoles beboda mid eadmodnysse
gefyllan, sig he underfangen on þære geferrædene.
 58.98.11. Wite he eac, þæt he mid ðæs regoles bendum swa
byð getiged and gestaðelod, þæt he of ðam dæge of þam mynstre
faran ne mot, ne his swuran asceacan, ne ascyrian fram ðam geoce þæs
halgan regoles, þonne he moste ær swa geceosan swa awurpan, swæðer he
wolde, under swa langsumere smeagunge.
 58.98.17. Syððan he underfangen sig and innan cyrcan gebroht,
behate he beforan eallre geferrædene Gode and eallum his halgum, þæt he
staðolfæst on mynstre wunian wille and his þeawas ealle to Godes willan
geweman and on hyrsumnysse þurhwunian.
 58.98.21. Gif he þonne ahwænne þis behat abrycð, wite he,
þæt he byð genyðerod and gehynod fram ælmihtigum drihtne, ðe he
gebysmrode.
 58.100.1. Be þam his behate sette he fæstnunga mid gewrite to
ðæs abbodes naman and ðæra halgena, þe heora reliquie, þæt is
heora ban, on ðære stowe restað.
 58.100.3. Write he ða fæstnunga mid his agenre handa, gif he
þonne writan ne cunne, bidde oðerne, þe cunne, þæt hine spelige, and
he sylf on ðam gewrite rode tacn mearcige and hy swa fæstnigende mid his
agenum handum uppan ðam altare alecge.
 58.100.7. Sona swa he þæt gewrit uppan ðam altare lecge,
beginne þis fers and ðus cweþe: <foreign>Suscipe me, Domine, secundum eloquium
tuum, et uiuam, et non confundas me ab expectatione mea</foreign>, þæt is on
englisc: Drihten, onfoh min æfter þinum behate, ic lybbe, and ne gescynd
þu me on minre andbidunge.
 58.100.12. Ðæt ylce fers he sceal þriwa cweðan and eall
geferræden þriwa mid ðam ilcan ferse andswarian and ðærto cweðan
<foreign>Gloria Patri</foreign>.
 58.100.14. Se sylfa nicumena broðor, syððan he gehalgod
byð, gefealle ælces ænlypiges fet and þæs wilnige, þæt hig
him fore gebiddan; of ðam dæge sig he broðor geteald on þære
geferrædenne.
 58.100.18. Gif he hwylce æhta hæbbe, oððe hig on ær
þearfum dæle, oððe arwyrðlice mid him sylfum ðam mynstre
betæce; he nan þing him sylfum to syndrigum æhtum ne gehealde;
eornostlice, on ðam dæge nah he furðon his agenes lichaman geweald, þe
oðera æhta ne sceole.
 58.100.22. Unscyrde hine man sona and þa reaf nime, þe he ær
notode, and hine mid mynstres reafum gescryde.
 58.102.1. Healde man on hrægelhuse ða reaf, þe he him of
adyde, toþig, gif he ahwænne þurh deofles costnunga beswicen byð,
þæt he his behat Gode awægð and þæt mynster forlæte, þæt
næfre ne gewurðe, sig he benæmed þæs godcundan reafes and mid
þam woruldcundum, ðe he ær forlet, gescryd and swa hine man of mynstre
adræfe.
 58.102.6. Healde man þeah æfre þæt gewrit his
fæstnunge on þam mynstre.
 59.102.9. BE RICRA MANNA AND ÞEARFENA BEARNA ANDFENCGE.
 59.102.11. Gif hwylc rice mann and æðelboren his bearn Gode on
mynstre geoffrian wyle, gif þæt cild þæs andgites næbbe, þæt
hit sylf mæge oððe cunne hine sylfne, gefæstnian þa magas hine mid
offrunge, þæt is, bewindan þæs cildes hand and þæt gewrit his
fæstnunge on ðæs altares weofodsceate and hine swa Gode geoffrian.
 59.102.17. Behaton þa magas and mid aþe gefæstnian, þæt
hig næfre syndrige æhta heora mæge ne gesyllon, ne ðurh hig sylfe ne
þurh nænne aspelian, ne hig næfre nænne intingan ne secan, hu him to
syndrium æhtum gerymed sig.
 59.102.20. Gif hig þonne hwæt wyllon syllon, syllon hig
þæt ðære halgon stowe to rihtum gemænscipe, him to ecan edleane
and him syððan sig dægwistes getiðod, gif hig þæs gewilnion, and
swa ham gecyrran.
 59.104.1. Beon ealle þa æhta, þe ðam cilde gebyrige, swa
fordilegode and todælede, þæt him nan hiht beon ne þurfe, þelæs
ðe he losige, gif he his hiht besett on syndrihgum æhtum, þæt
næfre ne gewurðe; we foroft onfundon, þæt mænig þurh ðone hiht
syndrigra æhta losode.
 59.104.7. Do handswagelice be heora bearnum, þa ðe unrice synd
and hafenlease þearfan.
 59.104.8. Gif hig nane æhta to syllenne nabban, offrian heora
bearn andfealdlice on gewittnysse rihtgelyfedra manna.
 60.104.12. BE ABBODUM AND OÞRUM GEÞUNGENUM ÞE MENSTRES
GEWILNIAÐ.
 60.104.14. Gif hwylc mæssepreost gewilnað, þæt hine man
to munuchade to mynstre underfo, ne sig him na ðe raðor getiðod, þeah
ðe he mæssepreost sig.
 60.104.16. Gif he þonne ðurhwunað on þissere gewilnunge, ne
sig nan ðing forlæten, ðæs ðe se regol tæce on his fandunge, ac
underfo he georne ælcne regoles þeaw and tæcinge; sig he æfter
Cristes boce tæcinge ðus geaxod: Freond, to hwig com ðu?
 60.104.20. Þæt is on andgite: com þu mid sibbe and mid
soðre abryrdnesse, þe mid ungeþwærnysse and liccetunge?
 60.106.2. Sig him geðafod, þæt he stede æfter ðam
abbode healde and þæt he mæssan sincge, gif se abbod swa tæce; ne
gedyrstlæce he na þa ðenunga to beginnenne butan þæs abbodes
hæse.
 60.106.5. Beo he symble gearu to ælcere steore be regoles
tæcinge, and swa he eadmodra beo, swa medmycclum, swa he furðor on hade
is; bysnige he a ealle eadmodnysse eallum ðam, þe him midwuniað.
 60.106.8. Gif he for his hades arwurðnysse furðor forlæten
sig, ne gedyrstlæce he on nanre fandunge þurh ðæs hades truwan na
furðor, þonne his gecyrrednyss wæs; ac besceawige a þone steall his
gecyrrednysse and hine be ðam gemedemige, butan hine man for ðam sacerdhade
furðor læte.
 60.106.13. Ða ðe clerichades synd and munuchades wilniað,
beon hig underfangene on medemum stedum, swa þeah, þæt hig behat don be
heora staðolfæstnysse and be eallre ðæs halgan regoles gymene.
 61.108.2. BE ÆLÞEODIGUM MUNUCUM HU HI MAN UNDERFON SCEAL.
 61.108.4. Se utacymena munuc, þe of uncuðum eardum cymð, gif
he on cumena hiwe wunian wylle and mid nanre oferflowednysse þæt mynster
ne gedrefð, ac byð eaðhylde and þære stowe þeawum getricce, sig he
underfangen and swa lange ðær wunige, swa him sylfum licige.
 61.108.8. Gif he sceadelice mid eadmodnysse and mid soðre lufe
hwylc þincg on mynstre astelle oððe tæce, underfo se abbod þæt
mid eadmodnysse and smeage on his geþance, þæt hine God ðyder asende,
þæt seo stow þurh hine gegodod and geriht wære.
 61.108.13. Gif he eft on ænigne timan hine sylfne to mynstres
wununge gefæstnian wyle, ne onscunige man his gewilnunga, forðam ðe man
mihte his lif tocnawan on ðam fyrste, þe he on cumena hiwe on mynstre
wunode.
 61.108.16. Gif man ænigne unðeaw on him agitt oððe onfint
on his cumliðnysse, ne sceal he habban nane geþeowræden, naðor ne wid
þæt mynster ne wið þa geferrædene, ac him man secge mid
arwurðnysse, þæt he ðanon gewite, þelæs ðe he oþre amyrre
oððe geleahtrige.
 61.108.21. Gif he ðanne swa anræde byð on þære
cumliðnysse, þæt he wurðe ne beo, þæt he beo þanon ascyred, his
man gyrne, þeah ðe he na ne bidde, þæt he wununge hæbbe, toþig
þæt ða oþre ðe gerædran beon and ðe beteran ðurh his godan
gebysnunga, forþig ðe on ælcere stowe is anum drihtne, þam heofenlican
cyninge, þæt him sig geþeowod and gehyrsumod.
 61.110.2. Gif se abbod his geearnunga swa agitt, he hine mot be
sumum dæle furðor wyrþian and him innor tæcan stede and setl.
 61.110.4. Nis na þis be munecum anum to healdene, ac eac be
arwurðum canonicum, þe to munuclife cumað, þæt hig ðurh gode
geearnunga furðor beon gemedemod, beon swæðer hig beon, swa sacerdhades
swa clerichades, gif se abbod his lifes geearnunga swa tocnæwð.
 61.110.10. Warnige se abbod þeahhwæðere, þæt he
nateshwon of nanum cuðum mynstre munuc ne underfo to wununge, butan hit his
abbodes geþafung sig and he him þæs gewrit sende mid swutelunge,
forðam hit is þus awriten: Ne do ðu oþrum, þæt ðu nelle,
þæt man ðe sylfum do.
 62.110.16. BE MYNSTRES SACERDUM.
 62.110.17. Gif hwylc abbod mæssepreostes behofige oððe
diacones, geceose he of his agenum geferum þe dæs hades wurðe sig, and
hine gehadian læte.
 62.110.20. Syððan he þonne gehadod sig, warnige hine georne
wið modinysse and toþundenre uppahafenysse, ne he nan ðing furðor ne
gedyrstlæce, þonne him fram his abbode beboden sig; wite he eac, þæt
he swa myccle eadmodra beon sceal on regoles underðeodnysse, swa myccle
furðor, swa he on hade is læten.
 62.112.2. Ne he þurh ðone truwan his sacerdhades ofergapige his
gehyrsumnysse and þa steore þæs halgan regoles, ac ðurh þone had a
swiðor and swiðor on God ælmihtigne geðeo.
 62.112.5. Healde he symble þone stede and þa endebyrdnysse his
gecyrrednysse, butan ðære þenunge anre þæs halgan weofodes, gif hit
swa getimige, þæt se abbod and seo gecorennys þære geferrædene
hine for his lifes geearnungum wurðian wyle and furðor gemedemian.
 62.112.9. Wite he þeah, þæt he sig a underþeodd þam
halgan regole and his yldrum, and ælc þing do and acume, ðæs þe hig
him to rihte tæcan.
 62.112.12. Gif he þurh dyrstignysse þonne hine onhefð mid
modignysse, ne beo he na sacerd geteald ac Godes wiðersaca.
 62.112.13. Gif he þonne ðurh mynegunge nele beon gerihtlæht,
hit stande þonne on ðæs bisceopes dome.
 62.112.15. Gif he þonne gyt gebetan nelle æt openum gylte and
he þurh his modignysse nelle beon underþeodd ðam halgan regole, ac mid
toþundennysse gæð ongean his abbod and ongean þone halgan regol, hine
man adræfe ut mid ealle of ðam mynstre.
 63.112.21. BE EALLE GEFERES ENDEBYRDNYSSE.
 63.112.22. Ælc endebyrdnys on mynstre sceal beon gehealden and
gefadod be heora gecyrrednysse and be lifes geearnunga and be ðæs abbodes
gestaðelunge.
 63.112.24. Se abbod ne geunstille, ne ne gedrefe þa heorde, ðe
him underðeodd is, ne he nan þincg ne missfadige, ne unrihtlice ne
geendebyrde, swylce he freolice don mote þæt, þæt him licige; wite
he, þæt he æt Godes dome sceal gescead agyldan and andsware eallre his
doma and eallra his dæda.
 63.114.2. Æfter þære endebyrdnysse, þe se abbod
gestaðelað and ða gebroðru him betwynan healdað, gancge ælc
æfter oðrum to cosse and to huselgancge and be ðam on chore stande and
sealmas and gehwylce þenunga beginne.
 63.114.5. On nanum stowum ne beo seo endebyrdnys be nanre ylde
gefadod, ne seo yld þa iugoðe ne forþrincge, forþig Samuhel and Danihel
cildgeonge for ealdedum mæssepreostum demdon.
 63.114.8. Forðig þonne, butan ðam anum, ðe for heora
leahtrum of heora endebyrdnysse uttor ascofene synd, oððe for haliges lifes
geearnunga innor genumene, ælc oþer, forylde and iugoðe, healde his
endebyrdnysse, swa swa he to mynstre com, swylce ic þus cweðe: Gif twegen
on anum dæge to mynstre gecyrrað, beo se furðor on ælcere
endebyrdnysse, þe on ðære forman tide þæs dæges, ðonne se on
þære oðre tide cymð, sig swylcere ylde oððe geþincðe, swylce
he sig.
 63.114.17. Þa gingran forðig arwurðian heora yldran, and þa
yldran lufian heora gingran.
 63.114.18. Ne gedyrstlæce heora nan, þæt he oðerne his
agenum naman synderlice genemne, ac ða yldran heora geongran broðor nemnen,
and þa gingran heora yldran nonas nemnon, þæt is: ðu arwurð
fæder.
 63.114.21. Se abbod forðig, þe he Godes gespelia is, sig
hlaford gehaten and fæder, na for his agenum þincgum, ac for Cristes
arwurðnysse and for þæs lufe, ðe he spelað.
 63.114.24. Ðence he symble and on goddere drohtnunge hine swa
gearwige, þæt he sig wyrðe swa myccles wurðscipes.
 63.116.2. Swa hwær swa gebroðra hig gemeton, bidde se gingra
bletsunge æt þam yldran.
 63.116.3. Eft gif se yldra gæð forð, þær se gingra
sitt, arise se gingra mid eadmodnysse and þam yldran to setle geryme.
 63.116.5. Ne dyrstlæce se gingra, þæt he mid þam yldran
sitte, butan he hine hate, þæt symble beo gehealden, þæt on halgum
bocum awriten is, þæt is, þæt hig him betwynan arwurðnysse healdan
and mid arwurðnysse hig gemeton.
 63.116.9. Ða cild and seo geoguð mid steore and
þeawfæstnysse heora endebyrdnysse healdon, ge on cyrcan ge on beoddernne;
beon hig a behealdene mid steore and mid mycelre heordrædene, ge inne, ge
ute, ge æghwær, oð þæt hig to andgitfullre ylde cumon and to
fullfremedre gestæððignysse.
 64.116.15. BE ÞÆS ABBUDES HADUNGE.
 64.116.16. On abbodes hadunge is swyðe to besceawigenne mid
mycclum gesceade, þæt se beo to abbode gesett, þe eall geferræden
anmodlice æfter Godes ege gecyst.
 64.116.18. Gif eall geferræden þone ræd on gemænum
geþeahte missrædað and þeah feawa witena on ðam geferscipe beon,
þæt ða þearfe forgode wislicor tocnawan cunnon þonne sume, stande
þæra ræd, þe mid Godes ege and wisdome þa ðearfe geceosað,
þeah heora feawa sig.
 64.118.1. Ne ða oþre ongean þæt nan ðincg
wiðcweðon.
 64.118.2. Æfter his lifes geearnunga and æfter his wisdomes
lare sig gecoren, se ðe to abbodhade sceal, eac swylce þeah ðe he latost
to mynstre come and ytemest sig on endebyrdnysse þære geferrædene.
 64.118.5. Gif hit ðonne swa getimað, þæt eall
geferræden anmodum geþeahte ðone to abbode gecyst, þe byð heora
leahtrum geþafa and him on gewil gancge, and þæt ðurh eawfæste menn
and rihtgelyfede hit beo ðam bisceope cuð, þe seo halge stow on his
bisceoprice is, forbeode he and alecge þa ðwyrnysse heora ungeþeahtes,
and mid fultume abbode and rihtgelyfedra manna gesetton þone to abbode and
gehadian to ðam dihte, þæt he Godes hus wel fadige and Godes riht
arære, and na on ðwyrra manna gewill.
 64.118.13. Wite ægðer ge bisceop, ge þa rihtgelyfedan,
þæt hig mycele mede æt Gode habbað, gif hig mid Godes ege swa doð,
eac swylce mycel wite, gif hio þæt unriht geðafiað and for gimeleaste
hit gebetan nellað.
 64.118.18. Ðence se abbod, syððan he gehadod byð, hu mycele
byrðene/ and hu hefigtyme he underfencg mid ðam hade; wite he eac and
smeage, hu he swiðor þam sawlum fremian mæge, þonne he hogige embe
ricitere his andwealdes.
 64.118.21. Eornostlice him gedafenað, þæt he wel gelæred
sig mid godcundre æ and to þam snoter, þæt he cunne halige spell
reccan, ægðer ge of ðære ealdan gecyðnysse ge of ðære niwan,
and he sylf on geearnungum swylc sig, þæt man ymbe his halignysse sprecan
mæge.
 64.118.25. Sig he clæne and syfre and mildheort, and beo a seo
mildheortnys wyldre ðonne se rihta dom, þæt he on ðam ylcan gemete
Godes miltse begite.
 64.120.1. Hatige ða leahtras and lufige ða gebroðra.
 64.120.2. Beo he snotor and wel besceawod on þeawum and na
oferswiðe ne geþreage, þelæs ðe þæt omige fæt mid ealle
toberste, gif he hit mid ungemete scæfð; besceawige a his agene
tyddernysse and ðurh þæt gebeorh sig, ne forbryte he na þæt
tocwysede hreod.
 64.120.6. Ne tæce we na mid swa geradum bysnungum and
gebeorhlicum larum, þæt he leahtras fyrðrige and wehsan læte, ac
þæt he snoterlice and mid soðre lufe hig symble wanige, swa raðe swa
he agite, þæt hit fremian mæge his underþeoddan, swa swa we ær
wiðufan cwædon.
 64.120.11. Hicge he and gecneordlæce, þæt hine man lufian
mæge, swiðor þonne ondrædan.
 64.120.12. Ne beo he drefende ne angmod, ne he ne beo to swið ne
annwille, ne he ne beo andig and fæcne, forðam a byð geunstilled and
restlease, þe mid ðam unþeawum beled byð.
 64.120.15. Beo he a foregleaw and wel besceawod on his bebodum;
ægðer ge æfter godcundum þincgum ge æfter woruldcundum tosceade he
and gemetegie ða weorc ealle, þe he betæce.
 64.120.18. Beo he gemyndig þa gesceadwisnysse Sancte Jacobes,
þæs heahfæderes, ðe þus cwæð: Gif ic mine heorde to swiðe
þrafige on gancge and swence hig, ealle hig sweltað anes dæges.
 64.120.21. Nime him ða bysene and oðre swylce ðæs soþan
gesceades, þe is eallra mægna modor, and swa ealle ðincg gemetegie,
þæt sig ðonne gyt on his bebodum, þæt ða strangan furðor
wilnion and ða unstrancgan ofersymede heora ðeowdom ne forfleon, and huru
þincga ðæs anes smeage se abbod, þæt ðæs andwerdan regoles
bebodu on eallum þincgum gehealdene beon and gefyllede.
 64.122.1. Ðonne he wel ðenaþ and ures drihtnes heorde
cwiferlice gealgað and to rihte manað, he underfehð ece edlean fram Gode
and bliðe gehyrð, þæt se gode þeawa gehyrde, ðe on rihtne timan
hwæte gedælde his efenðeowum: Soð is, þæt ic eow secge, ofer
ealle his god he hine to ealdre gesette for his gedreoge.

END_TEXT

BenRW
B10.3.4.
Benedict, Rule, Winteney Version: Schroer 1888, 3-147.



 3.3. HER ONGYNÐ URES HALIES FÆDER REGOLAN SANCTES BENEDICTES.
 3.5. Gehur ðu min bearn beboda þines lareowes & onhyld
þinre hurte eare, & þines arfæstan fæder mynagunga lustlice
underfoh & coflice gefyll, þæt þu mid þire hyrsumnysse geswince to
Gode gecyrre, þe þu ær fram buge mid aswindunge þinre
ungehirsumnesse.
 3.9. Eornestlice nu ic sende mine spece to ælc þare mannum,
ðe hir agenum lustes ascunað & mid þam strengastum & þam
beorhtestum hyrsumnysse wepnum drihtene Criste, sodum kincge hyrsumian wile,
ærest ðinga swa hwylc god swa þu beginst, þæt hit ðurh drihten to
fulfremedum ænde cuman mote, mid singalum gebede geornfullice gewilna.
 3.15. Þæt ure heofonlica fæder, ðe us him to bearnum
telð, næfre ðurh ure yfelan deda ne geunrotsie, him is on ælcne timan
to hirsumienne mid þan godum ðe he us geunnen hafð, þilæs þe he us
ahwæs benæme, þæt is fram his eadignysse ascyrige, swo swo fader
deþ his bearn, ðonne he hum gram byð for heora gyltum & his æhte
heon ne an, ne þæt an, þat he us æhte bedæle, ac þat he us, ðe
him to wuldre fylian nellað, swa swa egeful lehauerd mid urum yfelum dedum
gegremed to eceum wite ne sylle.
 3.24. Uton eornestlice on sumne timan arisan þurh haliges
gewrites munegunge, þe þus cweð: Nu is time, þat we of slepæ arisan,
þæt is, þat we synnan geswcan & on godum worcum wacole syn; mid
openre gymene godcundes andgyttes we eac gehyran wat dægwamlice seo godcunde
stefne mynegað & clypað þus cweðende: gif ge todæg Godes
steemne gehire, nelle ge elcyende aheardian eowre heortan.
 5.4. & eft þus cwyð: Se þe habbe earen to hlystenne,
gehyre hwæt se halige gast to ealle þan, þe to Godes rice gelaðede
synde þus cweð: Cumeð ye, mine biernes, gehyreð me; Godes eye ic eow
tece; yrnad ofstelice, þa wile þe ye lifes leoht habbet, þilæs þe
deaðes þystre eow gelæccen.
 5.10. And drihten on mycelre mænige smeað & scrudnað,
hwæt þa feawa syndon, þe his willen wyrcen wyllen, & þus axiende
cwyð: Hwa is manna, þe liues wylnie & gode dages ysun wylle?
 5.13. Gyf þu þis gehyrende andswarest: ic eom se þe þes
wilnað, God almichtin þus to þe cwyð: Gyf þu abben wylle soð lif
and ece, heald þine tunge fram yfelre spece & þine lippe noþing
focenlices ne specen; abuh fram ywele and do god; sech sibbe and folge hyre.
 5.17. Þo ye þus doð, mine eagen buð ofer eow & mine
eare æt eower gebedu, & ær ge me to clupian, i cweðe: Efne nu ic
eom gearue to eower nude.
 5.20. Hwet is lustlicor, leofe swustre, to gehyrenne, þonne
þeos laþiende Godes stefene?
 5.21. Efne nu drihten þurh his mildhertnesse us liues wegas
ætyweð.
 5.22. We eornestlice mid clennesse modes & lichaman & mid
geleafan & godre werce bigenge & mid haligra mægene heuene his wegas
geornlice faren & geernian, þæt we hine, þe us to þan wege
gelaðode, on his riche geseon mote.
 5.26. Natoþæshwon his rices eardung byð gefaren bute mid
gymene & gehealdsumnesse goddere deda; ofst & hradung godre weorce is
to þan rice weges fereld.
 5.29. Ac uten oxien urne drihten þurh þes witegan muneginge
þus cweðende: Drihten, hwa mot wunian on þinre eardungstowe & hwam
is rest geunne on þinre holie dune?
 5.31. We gehyreð æfter þissere æscen drihten andswariende
& þone wei his eardunge þus techende: Se on rihtne wei ferð to mine
riche, þe bute leahtre besmitenesse wunad & rihtwise weorc begeð, &
se þe soð on his hurte þeng & facenlices nan þing on his muðe ne
clypeð, & se þe his nyhstan nan þing yfeles ne dyde, & se hosp
edwt on his nixten ne setten, & se þe þane awrgede dufel, ælches
uweles lareow fram his hurten awrpð mid ealre his lare & for naht hine
telð & ealle his geþohtes and hopan on God besett, & þo þe God
ondredað & hi þurh hyre godan deda ne anhebbeð, ac drihten, þe þa
god on heom woruhte, weorðiað & mærsiað, þus mid þan wtgen
clypiende: Na us, drihten, na us, ac þine nama syle þu wuldor.
 7.11. Swa eac Paulus þurh his mere bodunge him sylfe nanes lofes
ne tilode, ac eal þat lof Gode betæhte, þe him snoternesse & wisdom
sealde, þus cweðende: Durh Godes gyfe ic eom þæt ic eom; eft se sylfe
Paulus cwyð: Se þe wuldrige, wldrige on God almihtige and no on hine
silfne.
 7.15. Be þam ylcan andgyte se helend cwyð on þan haligen
godspelle, þus clypiende: Se þe gehurd þas mine word & mid werce hi
gefylð, ic hine lete wisne man gelicne, þe ofer fasten stone bytlode;
flodes coman & windes blowan & þæt hus swyðlice gespurnan, &
hit ne afell, forþi þe hit gestaðelod wæs ofer fæstum stane.
 7.21. Ealle god wyrcende & on his halgen gefillende &
trymigende drihten anbidað, hwæðer we mid wercum his lare gefillen
willan.
 7.23. For bote ure synna þyses lifes dagas us to fyrste
gelætene synd, swa cwyð se apostel: Nast þu, þæt Godes geþyld
þe lætt to dædbote?
 7.25. Soðlice, mildheort drihten þus cwyð: Ne wilnige ic
þæs synfullan deaðes, ac þæt he gecurre & lif age.
 7.27. Þo we eornestlice drihten axoden be þam wuniunge his
eardingstowe, we gehyrdan, hwæt þa bebodu synd, þe we þa eardungstowe
mid geearnian sculon; mid gefyllednesse godre þenunge we weorðað heofene
rices yrfeardes.
 7.31. We forði heortan & ealne lichaman to gecampe gegearwian
& to hyrsumnesse haligere geboda.
 7.32. Þæt we þurh tyddernesse mænsces gecyndes
þurhteon ne magon, we urne drihten gerlice biddan, þat he us þurh his
gyfe gefultumige to gelaste his beboden.
 9.2. And guf we hellewites biternesse forbugan willað & to
ecum life becuman, þa wile þe we moten & on þysum lichaman wuniad
& ealle þas forspecenan þing þurh liues lihtinge gefyllan magon, is
to radienne & to efstenne þæt us on ecnesse to life gefurdrie.
 9.7. Toþi þonne ic eornoslice settan wille bysena &
bigengas þyses drihtenlican þeodomes.
 9.8. Þeah ic hwæt teartlices, hwæthwege stidlices on þyse
regule, þe is ures færeldes latteow to Criste, gesette & geteæce
for gesceades rihtinge & for synne bote & soðre sibbe
gehealdsumnesse, ne beo þu forði aforht ne afered, ne þurh yrhðe
þinre hæle weg ne forlæt.
 9.12. Ðæs weges angin, þe to Criste let, ne mæg beon
begunnen on fruman buten sumre angsumnesse, ac þa geþingðe halingre
mægene, & se gewuna þyssere haligen drohtnunge, þe gedeð leafluht
& eaþe, þat þe earueþe & angsumlic þuhte.
 9.16. Se wei is rum and forðheald, þe to deaðe and to
hellewite let, & se is nearu & sticol, þe to life & to heofena
rice læt.
 9.18. He is us þeah to gefarenne mid rumheorte mode & mid
gode & glæde geþance & mid gewyllednesse Godes bebode, swa
þæt we on munstre þurhwunien on Cristes lare & tæcinge, þat we
him geefenlæcende mid geþylde earfodnesse & ehtnesse þolian, þat
we his riches gemenesse & his blisse gefean mid him agen mote.
 1.13.2. HER SEIÐ URE HLAFORD SANCTE BENEDIHT HU FELE MYNECENA
KYNN SYNDAN.
 1.13.4. Feower cynne mynecene beod.
 1.13.4. Þat forme minecene cin is mynsterlice, þæt wunoð
inne mynstre & healdeð gastlic gewn under regele wissunge oððo under
abdesse tecunge.
 1.13.6. Þet oðor mynecene cyn is ancræne, þat is
westensetlena, næng þare þe mid radlicære hygunge þæt westen
gesecæð, ac þare þe þurh langsumere fandunge munstrelicere drohnunge
habboð geleornod, þat hi onstondende mit Godes fultume þurh swustren
getrymnysse ongean þane deofol heoræs fleascæs leahtres & heore
yfele geþanc winnan cunnan.
 1.13.13. Ðridðe mynecene cyn is mid ealre atelucest, þo beod
sylfdemen geclyped, þo ne buþ nodor na þurh reules wissunge, na þurh
lareowe tæcunge afondede swa swa gold on heorðe, ac æfter leades
gecynde on costnunge gemyltað, gyt mid heore werce þare worolde trywða
hælð & leogað God ælmihtige mid mynecene hywunge.
 1.13.18. Þa wuniað twam & dreom togedere & wilon
ænlypie na on Godes heorde belocene, ac on agene lustum beswikene; heomon is
for æ heore idelre wilnunge lust; swa hwilc idel swa heomon to geþonce
yrnð & heomon gecoren byð, þæt hi taliað halig, & swa hwet
swa heomon oflicað, þeah hit halig sy, hi hit lætæð unalifod.
 1.13.23. Þat feorðe mynecene cynn is þæt is widscriðel
genemned, þa ealle heore liflade geond missendlice ðeode faroð & twam
& þreom dagum geond missenlicare mannæ husum wuniað, æfre
unstaþolfæste & worigende, ægenum lustum & heore gitsunge
unalyfodlicæ fyliað & hyrsumiad.
 1.13.28. On eallum þingum hi synd wyrsan þenne ða seolfdeman,
ðe on anre wunegunge stilnysse healdað; be heore ealre earme drohnunge
selre is to swigenne, þonne embe to specenne.
 1.13.32. We ða forþi forlæten & to þam strengustum
mynstercynne mynecæna gecyrran & mid Godes fultume heore drohtnunge
geendebyrden.
 2.15.2. HWYLC SCEAL SEO ABBODESSE BEON.
 2.15.3. Þeo abbodesse, þe þæs wyrðe sy, þat heo
þæs munster wealde, heo sceal a gemunan, hwet heo gecweden is &
þæs ealderscypes naman mid dedum gefyllan.
 2.15.5. Cristes gespelia heo is & on þan mynstra Cristes
stede healt & forþy his agenum naman geciged is, swa swa se apostel
segð þus cweðonde: Ge onfengan þane gast bearne gewisinge, on þan we
clypioð abba, þat is fæder, abbodesse, þat is modor genemned.
 2.15.10. Hit forði næfre ne gewurðe, þat abbodesse eng
þing lære odðo gesette, odðo hate, buton Godes bebode; ac hyre hæs
& lare, þesme godcundre rihwisnysse, on hyre underdyddra modum beo
gestrydð.
 2.15.13. Sy heo æfre gemyndig, þat mycel smeagunge byð on
þan egefullan Godes dome, ægðer ge embe hyre lare, ge embe hyre
underðydre hyrsumnysse.
 2.15.15. Wyte hyre to soþe, þæt heo byð gewitnod swa swa
gemelæs heorde, gif þes hiredes ealdor, þæt is drihten, to litle note
& nytwyrðnisse on his hurde ongyte.
 2.15.18. Heo eft on þam dome sicar bið & sacles, gef heo
mid ealre gemene þa ungehursume heorde geheold & heora seocum, þat is
synfulle dædum ealle lacnunge gegearewude, þus mid þam witega
cweðende: þine rihtwisnysse, drihten, ic on minre heorte ne bediglode,
þine sodfæstnesse & þine halwendnysse ic sæde, hi þeah
forhoigende me forsawon.
 2.15.23. Ðurh þi þonne wite & deð rixað on þa
ungehyrsum hyrde hire gymenne.
 2.15.25. Eornestlice, þeo þe þone meren naman habbodesse
underfeheð, heo sceal mid twifealde lare þa wyldan & tyn, þe hyre
underþeodde synd, þet is, þet heo ealle gode þing & haligenesse mid
godum dædum swyðor tæce, þonne mid wordum lære, þat þa
andgetfullan mid worda lare to Godes willan gemynegod syn & þa
unandgytfullan mit godum dedum getrymede syn & gelærede.
 2.15.31. Ealle þo þing, þe heo hire underþyddan forbeode,
sceawge mid hyre dede, þat hi ne beon to donde; gif hu þonne wel lærð
& yfele mid weorce bysnað, heo byð forþearlice aworpen, & drihton
durh his witega to hyre synfulan þus clypað: Forwi atelst þu mine
rihtwysnesse & nimst mine bebode on þine muðe?
 2.17.2. Þu soðlice hatodest rihte lore & wurpe mine word
bæfte þe.
 2.17.3. Ðu gesawe þat streow on þinre swuster eage & ne
geseage þone beam on þine agene eage.
 2.17.4. Þat is on andgyte: þu ascunedust þa læstan gyltas
on þirum gingrum & þa mæstan noldest on þe sylfan.
 2.17.7. Ne sy na fram abodesse hada togescead on mynstre geheldan,
þat is, ne sy nan fram hyre gewyrðod for gebirdum, odðe for ylde, odðe
for ænigum oþrum þingum, buten for Godes ege anum & for soðes
wisdomes gesceade.
 2.17.10. Ne sceal heo nane swyðor lufian, þenne oðre, buton
þe heo on godum dedum & on hyrsumnysse beteran ongyte; ne sceal heo þa
æþelborene settan beforan þare ðeowborena, gef seo þeuborene ær
on þan mynstre was, buton heo for hwilcum gescade hit do, þæt is, gyf
þeo æþelborene mid godcundum crefte þu unæðelborena oforðyhð,
sy heo gemedemod furður be hyre geearnunge þonne þeo unæþelborena.
 2.17.17. Na be gebyrdum anum þis is to healdenne, eac be
eallæs mynstres ændebyrdnysse, þæt þeo beo furðor geleten on
stalle & on setle, þeo þu furður on geearnunge sy tofore Gode.
 2.17.20. Sy hycere gebyrde odðe gecyrrednesse swyce heo sy, buten
hwylc þonne oðre mid geearnunge oferþeon, beon hi on stede & on
setle, swa swa hyre gecyrrednesse bið, forðam ge þeow ge frig, ealle we
synd on Criste an & under anum Gode gelicne þeudom we underfengen,
forþan þe mid Gode nis anfangenesse nanre hade, þat is nanes riceteres,
ne ylde, buten geearnunge anre.
 2.17.26. Ealle heo sceal gelice lufian hyre underþeoddan &
heom ealle sceal beon an steor & an lar æfter heore earnunge andefne.
 2.17.29. Abbodesse sceal æfre healde on hyre lare sanctes Paules
cwyde, þes apostles, on þan he cwyd: þrea & witne & halsne &
cid.
 2.17.31. Heo sceal mengen reðnesse wið þo liðnesse, heo
sceal gedon, þæt hyre rednesse ætteowye moderlice & ærfeste
lufe, þæt is þa unstillan & þa heardhurtan heo sceal þreagian
& tæle, & þa gehyrsumen & þa myldan & þa geþyldian
heo sceal witnian & halsyan, þat hy bet & bet don.
 2.17.35. And þa gemelease & þa oferhogiendan heo sceal
ægðer ge mid wordum ge mid dedum swngan.
 2.19.2. Ne sceall heo na yldian & hiwian, swylce hit hyre
uncuð sy, ac sona swa heo hwæt unrihtes ongyte, heo hit sceal sone mid
ealle grundlunde towerpe & fordon; heo sceal geþencan þæs preostes
freccednesse Heli of Sylo.
 2.19.5. Ða gode, gyf hwæt misdoð, æt þam forme gylte
& æt þam oðre, styre mid wordum.
 2.19.7. Þa þe wiðe beod & hearde & prute &
ungehursume, anan swa hig misdoð, heo sceal mid swingunge oððo mid sume
odre licamlice clensunge stiran, & witon þat hit is gewriton: þam
dysegum ne mei man mid worde sturien, & eft þat gewrit seigð: Smit
þin bearn mid þare gyrd, & swa þu miht ahredde his saule fram
deaþe.
 2.19.13. Æfre seo abbodesse mot beon gemyndig, þat heo is
abbodesse, æfre beon gemyndig hwet heo geclypod sy, & wite þæt
þare, þe mare is bæteht, more me wyle habbon of hyre.
 2.19.15. Heo hah to understonden, hu ærfodlic & hu grislic
þing heo underfangon hafod, þæt heo nyme gieme of oðre mannum saule
& fele cynne mod mot hyran & abugan, suman mid olecunge & suman mid
þrætunge & suman mid wissungum.
 2.19.19. & æfter ælcære gewne & gewitta heo mot
hyre sylua swa to heom eallum hywian and dihtan, þæt heo na geþolia þe
heorde, þe is hire beateht, litlia oððo losia, ac þat heo mage blissian
on hyre goddere heorda wexunga.
 2.19.24. Beforen weallum þingum, þat heo ne beo recceleas, ne
litel ne telle of þare saule hælþe, þæt hyre beoþ beotehte,
& ni mon mare gyeme of eorðlice þingum, þe agað & atfeallað,
ac æfre geþence, þat he underfeng saule to gyemenne, for hwam hu sceal
gewistale upagifen.
 2.19.28. Þeh hit gelimpe, þat heo lytle æhte habbe, ne beo
heo þas dryri, ac gemune, þæt hit gwyrton is: ærest seced Godes rice
& his rihwisnesse & eallu þos þing scullen beon yþgeatæ &
eft þæt gewrit segeð: Næng ne ateorede þan, þe of Gode beoð
ofdræd.
 2.19.32. Wite eac se abbodesse, þat heo þe saulan haueþ
underfangan to witienne, gearewige hi seolfe to gifonne andsware for heom,
& wyte hu eac to soðe, þæt for hure ealre sawlan, þe buð under
hyre anwealde, on domesdæg heo sceal hi bitellen & ryht agylden for heom
eallum & eac þar to eacen wiðuton ealcum twynunge for hire agenre
sawle.
 2.21.4. And on þas wise æfre hu hyre ondrede, swa swa se hyrde
deð, þenne he is sceap his hlaforde sceal beteace; þæ wile þe he is
cari, þæt oþre ne misdon, he becumð þe werrer of him sylfe, &
þenne he þurh his teacungen oþren heolpoð, himsylfe is gemacod cleane
on þeawen.
 3.21.10. HWENNE ME SCEALL LAÐIAN ÞA GESWUSTREN TO REDE.
 3.21.12. Swa oft swa ænige micela þing synd to donne on þan
mynstre, se abbodesse gelaðige togedere eall þone geferscyepe & segge
hyreself, hwæt þar beo to donne.
 3.21.14. And gehyre þonne hyre sustre rædd & smeage bæ
hyre sylfro, and don la hwet hyre þince betst.
 3.21.16. Ðarfore we habboð gesæd, þæt ealle beon
geclypod to reade, forþan þe oft God þare gingeste geswytoloð, þat
selest is to donne.
 3.21.19. Swa deh gifon þa sustran red mid ealre underðydnysse
& eadmodnesse, þat nan ne dyrstlæcæ mid anwilnesse to healdene
hwet, swa heom þince, ac swyþost hit ga æfter þare abbadesse wille,
& þat þæt hyre betst licie to donne, ealle hyre beon gehyrsume.
 3.21.23. Ac swa swa hit gerysað, þat þa gingran þam yldrum
hyran, swa eac bycumð, þat se abbodesse wærlice and mid ryhte readegige
ealle þing.
 3.21.26. On eallum þingum ealle fylie þes regules wissunge, ne
nan ne beo swa ðriste, þat fram hym abuge; nan on þam mynstre hire agenre
heorte will fylia.
 3.21.28. Ne nan beo swa ðriste, þæt heo ongean þa
abbodasse wiðinne mynstre odðe widuton wiðorlice flite; gif hit ani
deð, hu ah þarfore þolian þa regullice wrecæ.
 3.21.31. Wite se abbodesse þeah, eal þæt heo do, þat heo
hit do mid Godes ege & þes regoles healtrumnysse, forþam þe buton
tweon, heo sceal ealre hire dome riht agyldon beforan þan rihwisan deman on
domesdæg.
 3.23.4. Gyf þonne ænige læsse þing sy to donne on þes
