RegC 2 (Schroer)
B10.5.2.
Regularis concordia (London, British Library, MS. Cotton Tiberius A.III, fols. 174-7): Schoer 1886, 294-6.



 1. Her ongynð seo ondebyrdnyss, hu munecum gerist to healdenne
þone regollican þeaw geond þæs geares embryne on dægðerlicum
dagum & on nihtum.
 3. A kalendis octobris synd to nimene ealle anginnu eawfestlicra
þeawa mid Godes fultume, þe synd to healdenne mid eadmodre þenunge and
neadbehefre on þam regollican gewunan and haligra fædera efenlæcunge,
ægðer ge gastlice ge tidlice, þus hi beon agunnene.
 7. Eornostlice, her sy gehealden seo nedbehefe þeaw þæs
halgon regoles mid þære mæstan gymene, ge on lytlon þingon ge on
micglum, fram eallum underþeoddum þam haligan ioce Benedictus regoles,
þeah þe ænlypige ænigne oðerne agynnen, nateshwon him nesy
geþafod, forþam þe buton ælcum twyon ne þurhwunað naðing trum
oððe strang þam, þe þolað Cristes bletsunga, þæs ælmihtigan
scyppendes and begymendes ealra gesceapenra þinga mid rihtwisra gemetegunga.
 14. Forþy ma on ælcere tide on nihtlicum timan, þonne se
broðer arist of his bedde to þam godcundlican weorce, ærest he onsette
him sylfum þæt tacn þære halgan rode þurh clypunge þære
haligan þrynnesse.
 16. Siððan he singe þæt fers, <foreign>Domine, labia mea aperies</foreign>
eal, syððan þone sealm, <foreign>Deus in adiutorium meum intende</foreign> eal, mid
<foreign>gloria patri</foreign>, þonne forsceawige his lichamlice neode, gif he beþearf on
þære tide & singe he þone sealm, <foreign>Ad te, Domine, leuaui animam meam</foreign>
eal, mid miccelre arwurðnysse & warscype efstende to cyrcean, swa
þæt he ne lætte oðra biddenda broðra.
 21. & þonne asende he his bene to drihtne mid gebigendum
cneowum on geþæslicra stowa & on wunelicra, swyðor on geþance
þonne on muðe, swa þæt his stefne þurhfare þæs mildheortan
drihtnes earan fremfullice þurh miccele onbrydnysse his mode & his synne
geþæncednessa, & he begyte ealra his synna forgyfennyssa Criste
getyðigendum.
 26. Eornostlice, on þam forman gebede he singe þa þry þara
seofan penitentiales psalmos, <foreign>Domine, ne furore tuo arguas me, Beati quorum,
Domine ne in furore tu</foreign>, and mid <foreign>Pater noster</foreign>.
 29. Þingiende for him sylfum ærest, æfter þysum he bidde
þis gebed, <foreign>Gratias</foreign>, þæt ys, Eala, þu ælmihtiga fæder, ic
þancige þe, þu þe gemedemedest me to gehealdenne on þyssere nihte, ic
bidde þine mildheortnysse, mildheorta drihten, þæt þu geunna me
þurhwunian þone toweardan dæg on þinum halgum þeowdome mid
eadmodnysse & todale swa þæt þe gelicige ure þywdom, <foreign>per Dominum
nostrum Ihesum Cristum filium tuum</foreign>.
 35. Syððan he gange to þam oþran gebede & singe þa
twegan æftre sealmas, <foreign>Miserere mei, Deus & Domine exaudi</foreign> mid <foreign>Pater
noster</foreign>, & preces þarto þingiende for þam cynge & þære
cwæne & for eallum urum weldondum & inhiredum mid þissere
collectan, <foreign>Deus, qui caritatis dona per gratiam Sancti Spiritus</foreign>, eal.
 40. Syððan he gange to þam þriddan oratione, þære he
singe þa twegen æftemestan penitentiales sealmas <foreign>De profundis and Domine
exaudi</foreign> þone oðerne, for eallum geleaffullum forðgewitenum mid þisan
collectan <foreign>Inueniant, quæsumus Domine, anime famulorum famularumque</foreign>.
 45. Witodlice, hringe me ane bellan andfealdlice, oððæt þa
cildru in to cyrcean cuman.
 46. Eac swylce notigean þa sylfan cild þrymfealdum oratione,
þonne hi beon inn aganne, þæt seo arwurðnyss þare haligan
þrynnysse sy gehealden fram eallum gebroðrum eawfæstlice.
 49. Soðlice, þonne þa þreo gebedu beon geendode fram þam
cildum, þonne hringe me þa oðre stunde, heom eallum sittendum on heore
settlum endebyrdlice and singendum fiftynum sealmum, ealswa hi standað mid
þryfealdre todælinge, swa swa þa uferan seofan sealmas, gebigendum heora
cneowum æfter fif sealmum, gewordenre cnucunge fram þam ealdre.
 54. Soðlice, betwux þam oðrum stundum & þam geendedum
mid þam ilcan fiftynum sealmum ongynnan hi þone uhtsang, geendoðum þam
uhtsange þonne singan hi twegan sealmas, <foreign>Domine, ne in furore, &
Exaudiat te, Dominus</foreign>, ænne soðlice for þam cynge synderlice, oðerne
for þære cwene & for eal inhiredum mid þisan collectan,
<foreign>Quæsumus, omnipotens Deus, ut famulus tuus, rex noster</foreign>, oðre for þare
cwene, <foreign>Rege, quæsumus, Domine, famulam tuam</foreign>, þridde for eallum
inhiredum, <foreign>Deus, qui caritatis dona</foreign>.
 60. & swa sy gedon on eallum geendedum regollicum tidum.
 61. Æfter þysum sealmum gewurðe sum litel hwil on eallum
sumere, swa swa se regol bebyt.
 62. Ga seo scola mid heora magistrum to þare gewunelican neode
& belifan þa oþre innon cyrcean on heora gebedum, butan þam, þe
þære neode beþurfan.
 64. Æfter þysan folgian æftersanges, and æfter <foreign>Miserere
mei Deus</foreign> togeycean hi twegen sealmas for þam cyncge & þære cwene
& innhiredum, <foreign>Beati quorum & inclina Domine</foreign>, þam geendodum singan
hi þone antemp be þære halgan rode & þæræfter ænne be
sancta Marian & be þæs halgan arwurðnysse, þe byð gewurðod on
þære andweardan cyrcean, and gif þar nan ne byþ, singan hi be
þære cyric halgunga.
 69. Æfter þyson ys to ganne to þam oðran æftersange,
þæt ys <foreign>De omnibus sanctis</foreign>, singende ænne antiphonam to þæs
halgan reliquie oððe to þam portice, þe he byþ to gehalgod.
 71. Æfter <foreign>De omnibus sanctis</foreign> singan hi for forðfarenum
<foreign>Laudate Dominum in sanctis eius</foreign> on uhton, & on æfen <foreign>De profundis</foreign>.
 74. Ðæt gif hit byþ geendod be dæges leohte, swa swa hit
gebyreð, onginnan hi primsangc butan ælcere bellan cnelle, soðlice, gif
hit elles byþ, abidan hi dæges, & þonne se belle cnelle, beon hi
ealle gegaderode to primsancge, siððan æfter þam primsancge singan hi
twegen sealmas, þone æftran <foreign>Domine, ne in furore tuo, & Miserere mei,
Deus</foreign>, þaræfter <foreign>Requiem eternam</foreign> mid <foreign>Kyrrieleison</foreign> & <foreign>Pater noster</foreign>,
& þonne ærest for þæs lichoman costnunge mid precen <foreign>Proba nos,
Domine, non ueniat nobis, Domine, pes superbie & Anime fratrum &
sororum nostrarum reguiescant in pace</foreign> & collectan <foreign>Ure igne sancti
spiritus</foreign> & oðre <foreign>Inueniant, quæsumus, Domine</foreign>, & swa hi singan
þa seofan penitentiales sealmos & þarbetwynan <foreign>Inclina, Domine</foreign> mid
gewunelicum þeawe.
 83. Þysum, soðlice, geendodum, licgan hi ealle eadmodlice
astrehte ætforan þam weofode buton ælcere cnucunge oððe styrunge,
oð hit beo eal gefylled, & þa geendode singon, <foreign>Pater noster</foreign> &
þas twegen sealmos, <foreign>In te, Domine, speraui</foreign>.

END_TEXT

ThCap 1 (Sauer)
B10.6.1.
Theodulf of Orleans, Capitula (Cambridge, Corpus Christi College, MS. 201, pp. 179-202): Sauer 1978, 305-403.



 0.305.1. Ic eow halsige, broðru ða leofestan, þæt ge mid
wæccendre gymen gehycgen ymbe þa fremunge godra weorca & ymbe þa
bote þa misdæda eow þæs underþeoddan folces, hu ge heom symble
mægen sweotolost getæcan þone weg þone ecan hælo ægðer ge mid
larum ge eac mid bysenum eowres þæs ryhtan lifes þæt ægðer ge ge
for heora fremunge ge we for eowre geornfulnysse mægen Gode licwyrðe
wæstmbære bringan of us þære befæstan nytte.
 0.305.10. Eac ic eow bydde georne, broðru, þætte þas
feawan cwidas þe ic for ure gemænre þearfe of halgum bocum gegaderade ge
gelome ræden & hyt on eowre gemynde gehealden & ge eower lif
dæghwamlice mid haligra boca rædinge & mid godra weorca bigenge
frætwian & betan, & mid eow þæm underþeoddan folce Gode
fultumiendum to þæm heofonlican rice higien.
 1.307.1. Butan tweon ge sceolon witan & symble gemunan þæt
we þe us befæst is seo gyming Godes folces & se recenddom heora sawle
þæt for eallum þæm þe for ure gymeleaste forweorðað we sceolon
riht agyldan on domes dæge.
 1.307.5. & for þæm þe we mid urum bisenum & larum
Gode gestreonende beoð, we beoð onfoonde þære mede eces lifes.
 1.307.7. To us is gecweden þurh urne Drihten, Ge syndan eorðan
sealt.
 1.307.8. Gif þonne þæt cristene folc is liodes mete & we
syndon þæt sealt þonne Godes fultumiendum þurh us sceal þæt folc
beon Gode to willan gehealden.
 1.307.12. Ge sceolon eac witan þæt eowre hadas syndan þa
æfteran hadas æfter urum hadum, & us þa nystan.
 1.307.14. Gelice þa biscopas syndan on gewrixle þara apostola
on þære haligra gesomnunge, swa syndan þa mæssepreostas on þam
gewrixle Cristes þegna.
 1.307.16. Ða bisceopas Arones & þa mæssepreostas
habbað þone had his suna.
 1.307.18. Forþon hit gedafenað þæt ge sien symble
gemyndige swa healicre geþinþenesse eowres hades & eac þære
halgunge & þære smyringe þe ge on eowre handa onfengon æt biscopa
handum, þa ge had underfengon, þæt ge næfre swa healice medumnesse ne
forwyrcen, ne ge eowre handa mid swa haligre smyringe gesmyrede syngiende ne
besmyten; ac healdende eowre heortan & lichoman clænnisse, eallum folce
ge bysne astellen wel to lybbene, & þæm þe ge foresyndan getæcan
þone rihtan weg to heofona rice.
 2.309.1. Eow gedafenað þæt ge swiðe syngallice halige bec
rædan & eow gelome gebiddan forþon þe þæs rihtwisan weres lif
þurh þa rædinge haligra boca to Gode bið getyhted & getrymed &
þurh þa gebedu hit bið gefrætwed be þam cwæð Dauid, in minre
heortan ic gehydde þine gespræcu þæt ic ne gesyngode wið þe.
 2.309.7. Ðis syndon witodlice þa wæpena þe deofol mid
oferswiðed bið, þæt is þonne ofthrædlice rædinga haligra boca
& gelomlice gebedu.
 2.309.9. Ðis syndan þa getawa þe mon mæg heofena rice mid
begytan.
 2.309.10. Mid þissum wæpnum beoð ælce uncysta forþricte
& mid þyssum andlyfenum bið ælc mægen gefed & gefyrðred.
 3.309.1. Ðæm tidum þonne ge þa rædinge haligra boca
forlæten & þa gebeda þonne sculon ge on sum nytlic weoroldweorc fon
forþon seo ydelnes is þære sawle feond & þæt se deofol swiðe
hraþe on sumum uncystum gebrincgð þone þe he gemet idelne ælces
godes werces.
 3.309.6. Ðurh þone gewunan haligra boca rædincge ge magon
ægðer ge geleornian hu ge sylfe to heofona rice cuman sculon ge eac hu ge
oðre læran sceolon.
 3.309.8. Ðurh þa gebedu þonne ge magon ægðer ge eow
sylfum ge oðrum mannum þæm þe eow on soðre lufan geþeodde beoð
on swiðe micelan hylpe beoð ge libbendum ge forðfarenum.
 3.309.12. Ðurh þæt handweorc ge magon eowerne lichoman
gewyldan þæt he þy lætra bið to uncystum & eac ge magon
getylian þurh þæt weorc þæt ge magon mid eowrum godum earmra manna
gehelpan þe sylfe nabbað & þæra myhta nabbað þæt hie wyrcen
magon.
 4.311.1. Ðæm tydum þe ge bisceopa gemot secen habbað eow
mid swylc mæssereaf & swylce bec & swylce huselfata & swylce ge
mid risnum eow þa befæstan þenunga þenian magon.
 4.311.4. And II preostas oððe III Oþþe swa fela læwedra
to þæm gecydra þæt hie þæt halige geryne arwurðlice mid eow
breman mægen þæt mon on eow geseon mæge hu geornlice & hu
hihtlice ge Gode on eowrum þenungum þeowien.
 5.311.1. Eac we beodað þæt þa oflætan þe ge on þam
halgan geryne Gode ofriað oððe ge sylfe bacen oððe eowre cnihtas
beforan eow þæt ge witen þæt hit clænlice & syferlice gedon sy
& þæt ægðer ge þa oflætan ge þæt win ge þæt
wæter þe to þære ofrunga sceolon on þæm mæssesange þæt
hie syn mid ealre clænnysse & geornfulnesse & mid Godes ege behogode
& begymde þæt þær nan þing unsyfernes on ne sy ne
unclænnes.
 5.311.9. Forþan nan mæssesang beon ne mæg butan þæm
þrim þingum þæt is oflætan & win & wæter swa þæt
halige gewrit cwið.
 5.311.11. Sy Godes ege mid eow & eall þæt ge don do ge mid
micelre geornfulnysse.
 5.311.12. Þæt win getacnað ures Drihtenes þrowunge þe he
for us þrowade, þæt wæter þæt folc þe Crist his blod for
ageat.
 6.313.1. Eac we beodað þæt þæm tidum þe
mæssepreost mæssan singe þæt nan wif ne genealæce þam weofode
ac standen on hyra stedum & se mæssepreost þær æt hiom onfo
þære ofrunge þe hig Gode ofrian wyllað.
 6.313.4. Wif sceolon gemunan hyra mettrumnessa & hyra hades
tyddernessa & forþon hie sculon ondrædan þæt hie ænig þara
haligra þinga onhrinen þe to cyrcean þenunga belimpað.
 6.313.8. Þæt hiom sceolon eac læwede weras ondrædan þy
læs hie geearnian swilc wite swilce Oza geearnode þa he wolde þa
Drihtenes arce beran swa him na togebyrede, forþon he wearð sona þa fram
Drihtene ofslægen.
 7.313.1. Ne sculon mæssepreostas nateshwon nænig þinga
ænlipie butan oðrum mannum mæssan syngan þæt he wite hwone he
grete & hwa him oncwæðe.
 7.313.3. He sceal gretan his ymbstandenda & hig him sceolon
andswarian.
 7.313.4. He sceal gemunan þone Drihtenlican cwide þe he on his
godspelle cwæð.
 7.313.6. He cwæð, ðær þær twegen men oððe þry
gegaderode beoð on minum naman þær ic beo tomiddes heora.
 8.315.1. We gesawon eac oft in cyrcean ægðer ge corn ge hig ge
hwylce woroldlicu þing beon gehealdene.
 8.315.2. Þonne nelle we þæt þær mon ænig þing inne
healde butan þa þe to þære cyrcean frætwum belympað, þæt is,
halige bec & huselfata & mæssereaf & cyrcean gegyrela on
gehwilcum þingum ge on hrægelum ge on fatum þylæs gif we elles, sy to
us gecweden swa swa to Iudeum þæs, Min hus is gecweden gebedhus, nu worhte
ge hit sceaðum to scræfe.
 9.315.1. Hit wæs eald þeaw on þissum landum þæt mon oft
forðgefarene men innan cyrcean byrigde & þa stowa þe wæron to
Godes þeowdome gehalgode & gebletsode him on to offrienne mon worhte to
lictunum.
 9.315.5. Ðonne nelle we nu heononforð þæt mon ænigne in
cyrcean byrie butan hit hwylc sacerdhades mon sy oððe eft swa rihtwis
læwede þæt mon wite þæt he on his lifes geearnunge libbende swilce
stowe geearnode his lichoman on to ræstanne.
 9.315.10. Nelle we eac þæt mon þa lichoman þe ær on
cyrcean bebyrgede wæron utweorpe ac þa byrgena þe þær gesyne syn
þæt mon oðer þara oððe hig feor on eorðan bedelfe oððe
oferwege & þære cyrcean flor emlice & gerysenlice gewyrce þæt
þær nan byrgen gesyne ne sy.
 9.315.15. Gif þonne on hwylcere stowe swa fela þæra byrgena
sy þæt hit to earðfoðlic sy to donne þonne læte man þa stowe to
lictune & nime þæt weofod þanon & hyt on clæne stowe asette
& þær cyrcean rære þær mon Gode arwurðlice & hluttorlice
offrigean mæge.
 10.317.1. Nis hyt ryht þæt man for ænigum oðrum þingum
to cyrcean gange butan for gebedum & for Godes lufan.
 10.317.3. Forþan þe we forbeodað ægðer ge geflytu ge
plegan ge unnytta word ge gehwylce unnyttnesse in þam halgan stowum to
ðonne/.
 10.317.5. Butan tweon þær þær Godes nama gelome gecyged
bið & þa halige gehryne on mæssesange geoffrod nis nænig tweo
þæt þær bið Godes engla andweardnes swyðe genehhe & hit
forþon swyðe pleolic is þæt man on þam halgum stowum aðer oððe
þæt do oððe þæt sprece þæt þæm stowum ne gedafenað.
 10.317.10. Ða ure Drihten þa men awearp of his temple þa þe
ægþer ge bohton ge sealdon þæt þæt hig Gode ofredon hu micele ma
wenestu þæt he mid yrre þa utaweorpe of his temple þe mid leasungum
& myd unnyttum gespræcum & mid ungemet hleahtrum & mid gehwylcum
unþeawum þa stowa þe to Godes þeowdome gehalgode wæron fylað &
besmytað.
 11.317.1. Nis hyt eac ryht þæt man mæssan synge on
ænigre stowe butan on cyrcean naðer ne on husum ne on ænigre stowe
butan on þæm stowum þe God to þæm geceas swa swa hyt awyrten is,
loca þæt þu ne offrige þine lac on ælcre stowe þe þu geseo ac
þær on þære stowe þe God to þan geceas þæt he his noman
þær sette, butan hyt on fyrde sy.
 11.317.7. Þonne hæbbe man geteld to þæm anum &
gehalgod weofod on þæm seo þenung þæs mæssesanges sy gefylled.
 12.319.1. Nis hyt ryht þæt ænig wifmon mid mæssepreoste
on husum wunige þeah hyt canones meder & swuster alifden & þæm
hadum þe mon nanes unhlysan æt wenan ne þorfte.
 12.319.4. Ðonne forbeode we hit þeah ælcum wifmen forþon
gif þær þa gesybban beoð hig habbað oðre ambihtmen þe mon mæg
ondrædan þæt þone mæssepreost to synne getyhte.
 13.319.1. Eac is gehwylcum mæssepreoste swyðe mycel þearf
þæt he hyne sylfne wið druncennysse scylde & eac þæt folc
þæt him underþeodde bið þæt ylce lære.
 13.319.3. Ne sceolon mæssepreostas æt ceapealeðelum ne etan
ne drincan ne hyg ne sceolon fremdra manna tunas ne hus ne for nanre
wæfereornnysse secan ne mid wifum ne mid nanum unclænum hadum nane
gebeorscipas habban.
 13.319.7. Ac gyf hig hwylc arwyrðe hyredes fæder to his huse
gelaðige se þe wyle mid his wife & mid bearnum on gastlicum gefean
blissian & æt him onfon þa gereord gastlicre lare & him syllan for
soðre lufan lichamlice gereordo þonne is hit cyn þæt ge þone mid
eadmedum gesecen & þone mid eowrum gastlicum larum gereordian þe eow
mid his woroldlicum godum gereordað.
 14.321.1. Ne spane nan mæssepreost nanne mon of oðre cyrcean
hyrnysse to his cyrcan ne of oðre preostscyre lære þæt mon hys cyrcan
gesece & him heora teoðinge syllan & þa geryhtu þe hig þam
oðrum syllan sceoldan.
 14.321.4. Ac gehwylc sy blyðe þæs þe him æt his cyrcan
cume & þæs Gode þancie forþon hit is awriten þæt nan man ne
scyle oðrum don þæt he nelle þæt him man do.
 14.321.7. & hit cwið eac on þæm halgan godspelle, loca,
hwæt ge willen þæt eow oðre men don do ge hiom þæt ylce.
 14.321.10. Ðonne loca hwa ongean þis wynne & ure lare
forhicgen þonne wite he þæt oðer þara oððe he sceal þæs
hades þolian oððe hit swiðe stiðlice gebetan æfter boca dome.
 15.321.1. Eac we beodað ælcum gemete þæt nænig
mæssepreost oðres mæssepreostes preost ne wyrde ne hyne ne spane ne
þeah he hyne gesece þæt he hyne na ne underfoo forþon hit is swiðe
fæstlice on canonum forboden.
 16.321.1. Gyf hwylc mæssepreost onfunden bið þæt he
aðer oððe preosthades oððe læwedes hades men ænige medsceat
selð oððe sealde forþi þe he wilnige oðres preostes cyrcean
oðþingian wite he for þyssum reaflace & for þisse reðan gytsunge
þæt oðer þæra oððe he sceal his hades þolian oððe on
cwearterne hit mid swiðe langre & strengre hreowsunge betan æfter boca
dome & be bisceopes hæse & gewitnisse.
 17.323.1. Gif man hwylc metrum cild to mæssepreoste bringe sy of
swylcre mæssepreostescyre swylce hyt sy þonne fullie he hit sona & for
nænigum unæmtan ne forlæte he hit ne fullie sy þonon þe hit sy.
 17.323.5. Gif he hit þonne for ænigum þinge forlæt &
hit butan fulluhte gewit þonne wite he þæt he sceal on domesdæge for
þa sawle riht agyldan Gode.
 18.323.1. Ne sy nan sacerdhades man ne læwedes hades þe ma
þe durre geþristlæcan þæt aðer oððe calic oððe disc
oððe ænig þara fata þe to godcundum bigonge gehalgod bið to
ænigum woruldþinge do.
 18.323.4. Witodlice se þe of gehalgodum calice aht elles drincð
butan Cristes blod þæt on þæm geryne þæs mæssesanges bið
gehalgod oððe þone disc to ænigum oðrum þeningum deð butan to
þæs weofodes he mæg wenan þæt him gebirige swa Baldazare dyde.
 18.323.9. Þa þa he nam þa Drihtenes gehalgodan fata on his
þenunge he forleas ætsomne ægðer ge his lif ge his rice.
 19.323.1. Gyf hwylc mæssepreost wile his nefan oððe his maga
hwilcne to lare don æt þære cyrcena hwilcre þe us to healdenne
befæste synt þonne unne we þæs swiðe wel.
 20.325.1. Mæssepreostas sceolon symble æt heora husum
leorningmonna sceole habban & gif hwylc godra wile his lytlingas hiom to
lare befæstan hig sceolon swiðe lustlice hig onfon & him estlice
tæcan.
 20.325.4. Ge sceolon geþencean þæt hit is awriten, þa þe
gelærede beoð hig scynað swa heofones birihto, &, þa þe manige
men to rihte tyhtað & gelærað hi scynað swa swa steorran in
ecnysse.
 20.325.9. Ne sceolon hig þeah for þære lare næniges
þinges wilnian æt hyra magum butan þæs þe hig hyra agnes þances
him don wyllað.
 21.325.1. Witodlice þeah eall halgu gewritu mid bisenum & mid
larum godra weorca gefyllde syn & mon on þam feldum þara haligra
gewryta swiðe eaðe þa wæpnu metan mæg mid þam mon þa uncysta
ofercuman mæg & gode weorc fryðian fyrðrian, þeah us gewearð
þæt we on þyssura gewryte sumes haliges fæder cwidas settan to
fryðinge & to lare godra worca.
 21.325.7. On þæm cwide is feawum wordum gesæd hwæt we
don sceolon & wið hwæt we us healdan sceolon.
 21.327.10. Ærest on forweardum þær is on beboden þæt
gehwa lufie his Drihten God mid ealre his heortan & mid ealre his sawle
& mid ealle his mægene & his þone nestan swa swa hyne sylfne.
 21.327.13. Ond æfter þon is beboden þæt mon man ne slea
ne unrihthæmed ne fremme ne ne stele ne nanes oðres mannes þinga on
unriht ne wilnige ne on leasre gewitnesse ne beo.
 21.327.17. Eac hit is beboden þæt he ælcne mon arie &
nanum men ne do þæt he nelle þæt him mon do & wiðsace his
lichoman lustum & fylige Cristes bebodum & clænsige his lichoman
& worulde glenge ne wilnige & fæsten lufie þearfan fede &
nacode scryde, untrume neosige, deade byrge, ælcum swyncendum on helpe sy
& þa sorgiendan frefrige.
 21.327.25. & hyne sylfne þæs þe he mæge symble
ægþer ge wið woroldspræce ge wið worolddæda warnige & healde
& him nan þing swa in ne læte swa Cristes lufan & on his yrre nan
þing ne do þe him eft ofþyncean þyrfe ne huru nane hwile nan yrre ne
healde & on his heortan nan facen næbbe & nanum men sybbe cosse ne
sylle butan he on heortan wið hyne fulle sybbe hæbbe & wyð nanne man
nan yrre næbbe ofer sunnan setlgong ac ælcum þara þe wyð hyne
abelge ær sunnan setlgange he hyt on his mode forgife.
 21.327.35. & soðe Godes lufan & monna he na ne forlæte
& na ne swerige þylæs þe he manswerige & of his heortan & of
his muðe symble soðfæstnysse forðbringe & nanum men yfel mid yfele
gylde ne nanne teonan ne do ac gif him hwa hwylcne do he þæt geþyldelice
forbere & for Godes lufan his feond lufie & gif hyne hwa wyrige he
þone na eft ne wyrge ac hine ma bletsige & gif hine hwa for hwylcum ryhte
onscunie & ehte geþoligie he þæt lustlice.
 21.329.45. Ne beo ge ofermode ne beo he druncengeorn ne beo he to
slapol ne beo he to micel æte ne beo he to slaw ne beo he to eornigende ne
beo he to tælende ac ealne his tohopan sette he on God & þonne he
hwæt to gode doo telle he þæt Gode næs him sylfum & þæt he
to yfele deð oððe ær dyde wite he þæt þæt com fram him
sylfum.
 21.329.52. Gemyne he symble domesdæge & ondræde him
hellewite & mid ælcre gastlicre gewilnunge wilnige he þæs ecan
lifes & geþence he dæghwamlice þone ytemestan dæg his lifes &
ealle tyda tilige he tela to donne & geþence he buton tweon þæt he
symble bið ondweard Godes eagum.
 21.329.58. & gif him hwylce yfele geþohtas on mod becumen
þonne andette he þa sona & his gastlicum læce þæt is his
scrifte & geþence he ymbe ures Drihtenes þrowunge hu he for his
eadmodnysse & for ure nydþearfe þe gesceop ealle gesceafta wæs
gemedomad on rode beon ahangen & hu him wæron ægðer ge fet ge handa
mid næglum þurhdryfene & hu he wæs mid spere on his sydan
gestungen.
 21.329.66. Þonne mæg he mid þyssum geþohte geflyman þa
yfelan geþohtas & of his mode afyrran.
 21.329.68. His muð he sceal symble from þweorum & yfelum
wordum healdan ne sceal him beon leof fela to sprecanne on unryht ne he ne
sceal spræcan ydelu worð þa þe unnytte hleahtor upahebben ne he eac ne
sceal lufigean micelne & ungemetlicne cancettende hleahtor.
 21.331.73. Ac haligra boca rædinge he sceal lustlice gehyran
& gelome he sceal his gebedu began & þa his ærgedonan yflu mid
tearum & mid geomorunge dæghwamlice on his gebedu he sceal Gode andettan
& him forgyfnysse biddan & God georne biddan þæt he hyne gehealde
ægðer ge wið þara ærgedonra yfla edlæcunge ge wyð gehwylce
misdæda.
 21.331.80. His lichoman lustum ne sceal he fulgan his agene wyllan
he ne sceal fulgan ac on eallum þingum he sceal his lareowes bebodum hyran ge
þeah þe hyt sy, swa swa God wylle þæt hit ne sy, þæt se lareow
þe him tela tæce him sylf elleshu do.
 21.331.84. He sceal gemunan þone cwyde þe ure Drihten on his
godspelle cwæð þæt þæt hig eow don haten do ge þæt &
þæt þæt hig sylfe doð ne do ge þæt þonne hig eow tela
tæcean & him sylf on þweorh doð.
 21.331.88. Ne wilnige he þæt he sy halig gecweden ærþon
þe he sy ac geearnige ærest þæt he sy þæt he drihtenlicor
mæge beon halig genemned.
 21.331.91. Godes beboda dæghwamlice mid dædum gefylle he
clænnysse lufige ne nænigne mon he ne hatige ne æfest ne andan ne
hæbbe he geflytu ne lufie he upahefednysse fleo he ealde men arige he &
geonge lufige in Cristes lufan.
 21.331.95. And for his feondum gebidde he mid þam þe wið hyne
ungerædnysse hæbben ær sunnan setlgonge gehweorfe he to sybbe be Godes
miltse ne geortrywe he næfre.
 21.331.99. Nu þonne þis synt þa lara & þa tol gastlices
cræftes þa gif hig from us dæges oððe nyhtes ungeteoriendlice
begongenne beoð & æt ures lifes ende gefylde beoð þonne bið us
seo med æt Drihtene witod þe he gehet þæm þe his bebodu healdan
& gelæstan woldan.
 21.333.104. Þa næfre nan eage ne gesyhð ne nan eare ne
gehyrde ne on nanes mannes heortan ne astah þa gegearwode God þæm þe
hyne lufiað.
 22.333.1. Ealle ge geleaffulle men synt to myngienne gemænlice
from þon læston oð þone mæstan þætte ælc mon geleornige
Pater noster & Credon.
 22.333.3. & him is to cyðenne & to bodienne þæt on
þissum twam cwydum is se staðol ealles cristenes geleafan.
 22.333.5. & butan hwa þas twegen cwydas asingan mæge &
swa gelyfe swa ðæron sægð & hyne mid oft gebidde ne mæg he
beon wel cristen.
 22.333.8. Hit wæs gefyrn gesett þæt nan þara manna þe
ne cuðe Credan & Pater noster þæt he ne moste naþer ne æt
biscopes handa ne æt fulwihte nanum men onfoon ne hine mon furðon fulluhte
fullian ne moste ne biscopian buton he þa ylde næfde þæt he þonne
gyt þa ærgenemnedan cwydas geleornian ne mihte.
 23.335.1. Eac is cristenum læwedum mannum to cyðanne
þætte gehwa him tuwa huru gebidde on dæge butan hwa oftor mæge,
þæt is on morgen & on æfenne.
 23.335.4. Butan hwa <foreign>Pater noster</foreign> & Credan cunne gesynge &
cwæðe, Drihten þu þe me gehiwadest & worhtest, gemiltsa me, God
gemiltsa me synfullum.
 23.335.6. & Gode þancie he his dæghwamlicre ondlyfene
& þæt he hine to his anlicnesse gesceop & hine from nytenum
asced.
 23.335.9. & þissum þonne swa gedonum & his Scippende
anum geweorðodon, he cleopie to Godes halgum & bidde þæt hig him to
Gode þingien, ærost to Sancta Marian & syððan to eallum Godes
halgum.
 23.335.13. Ða þe cyrcean geræcean magon don hi þis on
cyrcean.
 23.335.14. Þa þe þonne cyrcean geræcean ne magon don hig
hit þær þær hig syn ægðer ge on æfenne ge on morgenne
forþon se sealmsceop cwæð, on ælcre stowe is Godes anweald.
 23.335.17. & eft he cwæð to Gode, on ælcre stowe þu
bist & þeah ic on heofonas astyge þær þu bist, swylce he cwæde
ne mæg ic nane stowe gemetan þe þin onweald on ne sy.
 24.337.1. Sunnandæg is swiðe healice to weorðianne.
 24.337.1. Forþon we bebeodað þætte nænig mon ne
geþristlæce on þone halgan dæg on nan weoruldweorc befon butan mon
his mete gearwige butan hwam gebyrige þæt he nyde faran scyle.
 24.337.5. Þonne mot he swa ridan swa rowan swa swilce færelde
faran swylce to his wege gebyrige on þa gerad þæt he his mæssan
gehyre & his gebedu ne forlæte.
 24.337.8. On Sunnandæg gesceop God ærest leoht & on
þæm dæge he sende Israhela folce on þam westene heofonlicne hlaf
& on þone dæg he aras of deaðe þa he ær his sylfes wyllum for
moncynnes hælo deað geþrowade.
 24.337.11. & on þone dæge he sende þone halgan gast on
his þegenas.
 24.337.13. Þonne forþon is hit swyðe micel cyn þæt
gehwylc cristen man þone dæg swyðe arwurðlice weorðige.
 24.337.14. & hit gedafenað þæt gehwylce cristene men
þa þurhteon magon on Sæternesdæg cume to cyrcean & him leoht mid
bringe & þær æfensang gehyran & on uhtan þone uhtsang &
on morgenne mid heora offrungum cuman to þære mæssan symbelnysse.
 24.337.19. & þonne hig þyder cumen ne sy þær nænig
facn ne nænig geflytu ne nænig ungeþwærnes gehyred ac smylte mode
æt þære halgan þenunge ægðer ge for hig sylfe ge for eal Godes
folc þingien ægðer ge mid heora gebedum ge mid heora ælmessan.
 24.337.23. & æfter þære halgan þenunge him geliþa
ham hwyrfe & mid his freondum & his nyhstum & mid ælðeodgum
hine gastlice gereordige & hine wið oferæt & druncennysse beorge.
 25.339.1. Eac is gehwylcum mæssepreoste micel þearf þæt
he his hyremen georne tyhte & lære þæt hig cumlyðe syen &
nænegum farendum men hyra husu ne wyrnen don him elles Godes þances to
gode þæt hig þonne willen oððe mægen.
 25.339.5. Forþon butan tweon þæt mon Godes þances cumum
gedeð þæt mon deð Gode swa swa he sylf on domesdæg cwið to þam
þe him on þa swyðran hand gesette beoð, ic wæs cuma & ge me
onfengon .
 25.339.8. Ða þonne þe Godes þances hwylcne cuman underfon
ne wilnigen hig þær nanra woruldleana.
 25.339.11. Ðurh cumliðnysse swiðe monige men Gode gecwemdon
to þon swiðe þæt hig þæs wyrðe wæron þæt Godes englas
hig sohton.
 25.339.12. Ne sceal nan man woruldmede wilnian æt þam cuman
forþam þe him is gehaten ece gefea fore on Godes rice.
 26.341.1. Eac is swiðe micel þearf þæt ge georne mænra
aða styran & eowrum hyremonnum cyðon hu ungefohlicu scyld þæt is
& hu swyðe hit is forboden ægðer ge on þære æ ge on witegna
bocum ge on Cristes agenum bocum.
 26.341.5. Þonne habbað we geahsod þæt hit sume men doð
to lytelre scylde, þonne nis hit na swa ac is an þæra mæstena scylda
& on þa ylcan wisan hit is to betanne þe manslyht oððe æwbrice
oððe elles hwilc þara heafodlicra leahtra to betanne is.
 26.341.10. Eac ge sceolan witan & eowrum hyrigmonnum cyðan
þætte gehwylc þara þe þara heafodlicra leahtra hwylcne gefremed
hafað & to dædbote cyrran nele þæt him is to forbeodenne
æghwylc gemana mid cristenum mannum ge in cyrcean ge butan ge æt ge drinc
ge samodwunung on husum butan hig to dædbote gecyrran willun.
 27.343.1. Eac is mæssepreostum micel þearf þæt hig hyra
mannum cyðen þæt hyne gehwa georne wið wo gewitnysse gehealde forþon
hit swiðe hefegu scyld is & ure Drihten swyðe fæste on Synai
þæm munte þa scylde forbead & þus cwæð, Ne beo ge næfre on
nanre læsre gewitnysse forþon se leasa gewita ne bið he næfre
ungewitnod.
 27.343.7. Swilc mon swylce þa scylde gefremeð oððe gefremed
hafað mid þære ylcan dædbote he hyne sceal geclænsian þe we
ær bufan sædon be þæm mænum aðum & eac oðrum heafodlicum
leahtrum oððe fram eallum cristendome beon asceaden.
 27.345.12. Hwæt mæg beon þæslicre þonne hwa for
gytsunge goldes & seolfres oððe deorwyrða hrægla oððe
ænigra woruldþinga on swa hefige scylde gehreose þæt he sceole
oððe VII gear on swiðe nearwre yrmðe on þære dædbote lybban
oððe fram eallum cristendome beon aworpen?
 27.345.17. Ure Drihten cwæð þæt þam men nawiht ne
forstode þeah he ealne middaneard gestrinde gif he his sawle forleosan
wolde.
 28.347.1. Eac we beodað þæm mæssepreostum þe us
underþeodde synt þæt hig swiðe geornlice ymb þæs folces lare syn,
þa þe on bec gelærede syn þæt hig gelomlice & geornlice heora
hyrigmen of þæm bocum læren þa þe þonne swa forð on bec
gelærede ne syn.
 28.347.5. Þonne beoden hig hyra gyngrum þæt hig yfeles
geswicen & don good secen sybbe & folgien þære.
 28.347.7. & secgen him þæt Godes eagan beoð ofer þa
ryhtwisan men & his earan gehyrað þara ryhtwisra bene & Drihtenes
ondwlita bið ofer þa yfeldondan men to þon þæt he hig forspille
& adylige of eorðan hyra gemynd.
 28.347.12. Ne mæg eower nan hyne lare beladian.
 28.347.12. Ælc eower hafað tungan, seþe god sprecan wile
symble he mæg sumne mon gebetan.
 28.347.14. Sona swa sacerda hwylc hwone on won gesyhð he sceal
ealle mægene tilian þæt he hyne on rihtum gebrynge ægðer ge
þreagende ge halsigende ge biddende & hine no ne forlætan ær he
hyne on sumum godum weorcum gebringe.
 28.349.19. And ic wylle þæm tidum þe æt gemetinge Gode
fultumiendum we tosomne æt seonoðum cumen þæt gehwa me wite to
secganne hwylcne þæstm he Gode gefultumiendum on his scyre gestryned
hæbbe & hwæt he his hyremen on rihte gebroht hæbbe þe ær on
woh lifde.
 28.349.23. & gif hwa mines fultumes beþearf þonne bið he
him sona gearo on soðre lufan Godes & manna swa forð swa ic fyrmest
gelæstan mæg.
 29.349.1. Eac ge sceolon myngian eowre hyremen þæt hig hyra
gebedu genehlice began.
 29.349.2. On þas wisan ge hig sceolan læran þæt hie hig
gebidden.
 29.349.3. Ærest hig sceolan syngan Credon þonne bið þæt
geliccost þon þe hig æteowen þone stoðol hyra ryhtan geleafan.
 29.351.5. & æfter þon þe he Credan gesungen hæbbe
þonne cwæðe he þrywa, God þu þe me gesceope gemyltsa me, &
þriwa, God gemyldsa me synfullum.
 29.351.8. & æfter þon gesynge <foreign>Pater noster</foreign>.
 29.351.9. & æfter þon gif he þone stede hæbbe &
þone æmtan þonne bidde he Sancta Marian ærest & þa halgan
apostolas & þa halgan martyras & ealle Godes halgan þæt hig him
to Gode þingien.
 29.351.12. & þonne his heafod foreweard mid þære halgan
rode tacne gewæpnige þæt is gesenige hine.
 29.351.14. & þonne upahæfenum handum & eagum on his
heortan he Gode þancie ealles þæs þe he him forgeaf ægþer ge
yðran ge unyðran.
 29.351.16. Gif he þonne þone æmtan næbbe þæt he eall
hit þus gedon mote þonne gedo he swaþeah swa we ær bufan cwædon,
þæt is, cweðe þriwa, God þu þe me gesceope gemyltsa me, &
þrywa, God gemyltsa me synfullum, & æfter þon ynweardre heortan
gesynge <foreign>Pater noster</foreign> & hyne gesenige.
 30.353.1. Æghwylce dæg we sculon Gode æne oððe tuwa,
oððe oftor gyf we magon on urum gebede ure synna andettan cwæðendum
þæm wytgan, Drihten, mine scylde ic dyde þe cuðe & mine
unryhtwisnysse ic þe ne hæl.
 30.353.5. Ic cwæð, ic andette þe, Drihten, mine
unrihtwisnysse wið me sylfum & þu Drihten me forgeafe þa arleasnysse
mynre synne.
 30.353.8. Ðonne æfter þære andetnesse mid geomrunge &
heortan onbryrdnesse we sceolon us to Dryhtene gebiddan & þone fiftigan
sealm syngan oððe þone XXIIII oððe þone XXV oððe þara sumne
þe þær to swylcum belympð & swa þæt gebed gefyllan.
 30.355.14. Seo andetnes þe we mæssepreostum doð ura synna
þis heo us deð to gode þæt onfongnum fram him halwendum geþeahtum
& læcedomum þara wamma þe we him on us sylfe for urum agnum
gewyrhtum secgað & gehealdnum þonne þæm bebodum þe hig us
beodað we mid þon magon ure synna adiligian.
 30.355.19. Ðonne seo andetnes þe we Gode anum andettað deð
hio us þæt to Gode; Swa we oftor hig gemunað swa forgyt God hyra
hraðor Drihten cwædendum þurh þone witgan, ðinra synna ne geman ic.
 30.355.23. Ðonne ongean þon swa we oftor misdæda forgytað
swa gemon hig God geornor.
 30.355.24. Us is þearf þæt we geþencen hwæt Dauid se
witga cwæð & eac þon don swa we nyhst magan.
 30.355.26. He cwæð, Mine unryhtwisnesse ic oncnawe & min
syn bið symble ongean me.
 31.357.1. elce synne mon sceal his scrifte andettan þara þe
he æfre gefremede oððe on worde oððe on weorce oððe on
geþohte.
 31.357.4. Eahta syndan heafodlice synna þonne is swiðe lyt
monna þæt ne sy mid þæm sumum oððe eallum besmiten.
 31.357.6. An is gyfernes metes, oðer unrihthæmed, þrydde
worulde unrotnes, feorðe gytsunge feos, fyfta ydel gylp, syxta æfest,
seofoða yrre, eahtoða ofermedla.
 31.357.9. Ðonne hwa to his scrifte cymeð on þa gerad þæt
he wille his þearfa to him sprecan & his synna andettan þonne sceal se
scrift hine georne ahsian be þæm þe he him andettað hu þa þing
gedon wæron hwæðer þe gewealdes þe ungewealdes & hwæþer
þe færlice þe þurh ærbeþohte wisan.
 31.359.15. & him þonne be ælcre misdæda þa bote
scrife be þon þe seo dæd gedon wæs.
 31.359.16. Swiðe ungelic bið se mon þe hyne sylfne wergende
oðerne mon ofslyhð þæm þe oðerne gesætað & hyne
ofslyhð.
 31.359.18. Swa hit byð ægðer ge æt hæmedum ge æt
gehwylcum misdædum.
 31.359.19. Se scrift sceal ahsian gehwylces þinges þone þe to
him his þearfe sprycð & hine læran þæt he him nan þing ne
hele ne on worde ne on weorce þæs þe he æfre wene þæt he wið
Godes wyllan geworohte.
 31.359.23. & se scrift him sceal æt gehwylcum þingum þa
bote secgan.
 32.361.1. Hyngriendum we sceolon syllan mete & þyrstendum
drync nacode we sceolan oferwreon & untrume & þa þe on carcerne syn
we sceolon neosian & cumum we sceolon onfon swa ure Drihten sylf cwæð,
me hyngrede & ge me sealdon etan, me þyrste & ge me sealdon dryncan,
ic wæs nacod & ge me scriddon, ic wæs untrum & on þæm
carcerne & ge min neosodon.
 32.361.8. Ðonne sceal ælc mon on him sylfum þas þing
gastlice habban & on oðrum monnum he sceal hig licumlice gefyllan
forþon þeah he þis eal licamlice gefylle ne mæg hit him to þan ecan
life gehelpan gyf he on wrænnesse & ofermedlan & on æfeste &
on oðrum manigfealdum unþeawum þa þe nu longe to tellan is his lif
lyfað.
 32.361.15. Ac sona swa se mon ongyte þæt he Crist on him
næbbe þe cwæð, ic eom se libbenda hlaf þe of heofenum adune astah,
& þa soðan lufan seo is þære sawle fostor buton tweon þonne he
bið hyngriende.
 32.361.18. Ac þonne gyf he þurh god weorc forlætnum his
ærran unþeawum him Crist to gelaðað & hyne sylfne mid þære
soðan lufan swetnesse gefylleð þonne fet he þonne higne seolfne
hyngriende on his mode.
 32.363.23. Se þonne se hine sylfne gesyhð bedæledne beon
þara streama haligra gewrita lara & þæs Halgan Gastes þonne bið
he genoh þurstig.
 32.363.25. Ac gif he þonne hyne sylfne mid þæm æspryngum
Godes worda gelecð & his mod mid þære swetnysse þæs gastlican
gedrinces gefylleð he seleð þæs þonne dryncan his þyrstendum
mode.
 32.363.29. Se þonne seþe gesyhð hine sylfne ryhtwisnesse
& oðera godra weorca besceadenne hu ne bið he genoh nacod?
 32.363.31. Gif he þonne mid ryhtwisnysse & mid oðrum godum
weorcum hine sylfne begæð hwæt deð he þonne butan hyne sylfne
nacodne gescridd?
 32.365.34. Se þonne seþe ligeð on þæm bedde his uncysta
& on þære adle his unryhtwisnesse swinceð & gebunden bið mid
þæm rapum his synna & ymbseted mid þæm wagum his misdæda &
in þæm þystrum bið his unrihtwisnesse þonne bið he genoh seoc
& on swiðe þystran carcerne.
 32.365.39. Ac gyf he þonne ariseð of þam bedde his unþeawa
& þurh andetnisse utgæð & þurh þone wop soðre dædbote
bið alysed fram his synnum & þanon utgæð to þam leohte godra
weorca bigonges butan tweon hyne sylfe untrumne & on carcerne he neosað.
 32.365.44. Se þonne seþe hyne sylfne gesyhð on þam wege
þisses andweardan lifes swincan & mid þæm stormum unþeawa swa swa
mid strangan lyfte stormum beon geswencedne & gesyhð þæt he þa
hlywðe godra weorca næfð þonne mæg he þonne witan þæt he
bið on syðfæte & wel gysthuses beþearf.
 32.365.49. Ac gyf he þonne hyne sylfne gelædeð to þæm
huse haligra mægena & he hine þara on heora gescyldnesse gehealdeð
þonne onfehð he þonne cuman on him sylfum.
 32.367.53. Eall þas þing þonne se mon þe him sylfum
gastlice deð Crist on him þæs lim se mon is he fedeð & he
drenceð & he gescrideð & he neosað & he onfehð.
 33.369.1. Eac syndon Godes frynd to myngianne þæt hig hyra
bearn læran þæt hig hyra yldrum gehyrsume syn forþon Drihten
cwæð, Ara þinum fæder & þinre meder þæt þu sy þe leng
lifra ofer eorðan.
 33.369.4. Eac sceolan þa yldran beon hyra bearnum geþwære
cwæðendum þæm apostole, Ge yldran ne sceolan ge eowru bearn to
yrsunge geciegean.
 33.369.7. Ne sceolan ge þeah him nane misdæda lætan on
ungewitnode.
 33.369.8. Salomon cwæð, Seþe sparað þa gerde gyrde he
hatað his bearn.
 33.369.9. Ne bið nan misdæd on þære toweardan worulde
butan wrace forlæten butan hit ær þær gebet sy.
 33.369.11. Forþy is gehwæm micele betere þæt he her his
bearn þreage for his misdædum þonne sy him þær Godes yrre
gehealden.
 34.371.1. Eac þa sacerdas sceolan þam folce secgan þæt
þæt is soð lufu on þære se mon lufað God swiðor þonne hyne
sylfne & his nyhstan swa swa hyne sylfne & nænigum men nelle don
naht þæs þe he nylle þæt him mon do & monigu oðru þing þe
nu longe to reccanne synt.
 34.371.6. Ðonne wenað sume men þæt on mete & on drence
sy soð lufu þonne nis hit na swa; be þon cwæð se apostol, Godes rice
nis hyt naðer ne mete ne drync.
 34.371.8. Ac þeah þær þær mon mete & drync for
soðre Godes lufan seleð hyt bið swiðe god weorc & hit bið gemong
oðrum halgum weorcum geteald.
 35.373.1. Eac synt to manigenne þe be cypingum libbað þæt
hig swa þara woruldgestreona wilnigen swa hig huru þæt ece lif ne
forleosan.
 35.373.3. Buton tweon þa þe swiðor þenceað ymbe
woroldlicu gestreon þonne ymbe hyra sawle hælo swiðe swiðe hig
dwoliað & be þon sum wis mon cwæð, hyra ingeþanc hig forleosað
on hyra wege.
 35.373.6. Þis andwerde lif he nemde her for weg.
 35.373.7. Ac him is þearf þæt hig gehyren þæs apostoles
lare.
 35.373.8. Se apostol cwæð, Ne beswice eower nan oðerne on
cypinge, forþon loca, hwæt hwa oðrum on þon to wo gedo oððe on
ænigum þingum God his bið wrecend.
 35.375.12. Ðæm scipmannum is beboden gelice & þæm
landbuendum þæt ealles þæs þe him on heora ceape geweaxe hig Gode
þone teoðan dæl agyfen & eac of þæm nygon dælum heora
ælmessan don.
 35.375.15. Swa is eac gehwylcum men beboden þæt he of þæm
ylcan cræfte þe he his lichoman nydþearfe forðbringeð he scyle his
sawle þearfe forðbryngan seo is betere þon se lichoma.
 36.377.1. On þære nyhstan wucan ær halgan nyht sceal gehwa
to his scrifte gan & his dædum geandettan & his scrift him sceal swa
scrifan swa he þonne on his dædum gehyreð þæt him to donne bið.
 36.377.4. & he sceal his hyrigmonnum eallum beodan on Godes
bebode þæt gyf hyra ænig wið ænigne mon ænige unsome hæbbe
þæt he wið þone geþingie.
 36.377.7. Gyf þonne hwa to þan cyrran nylle þonne ne mæg
he þam scrifan ac þonne he sceal cyðan bisceope þæt he hyne to ryhte
gecyrre.
 36.377.9. Gyf he Godes beon wylle þonne man sceal ælce unsome
& ealle geflytu gestyllan.
 36.377.11. & gyf hwylce þær beoð þara þe hwæt
æbylhða wið oðre habbað þonne sceolan hig þa forgyfan þæt
hig þe freolicor cwæðan mægen on þam Drihtenlican gebede, Drihten,
forgyf us ura synna swa swa we forgyfað þam þe wið us agylteð.
 36.377.16. & þonne swa geclænsodum modum inggangen on þa
tid þæs halgan fæstenes & þurh dædbote hig sylfe clænsien
wið þara halgena Eastrena forþon seo dædbote is æfterum fulwihte
gelice & on þæm fulwihte beoð þa ærgefremedan synna forgyfene.
 36.379.21. Swa beoð eac þurh þa dædbote geclænsode þa
synna þe æfter þam fulwihte gefremede beoð.
 36.379.22. Seofon gemetum us cyðað halige gewritu þæt
synna beoð forgyfene, ærest on fulwihte þæt us wæs seald for synna
forgyfnesse.
 36.379.26. & oðre syðe for þrowunge be þon cwæð se
sealmsceop, eadig bið se wer se him Drihten synne ne getealde.
 36.381.28. Æfter þæs ylcan Dauid cwide synna beoð
forgyfene þurh fulwiht & hig beoð oferwrigenne for dædbote & heo
ne bið geteald for martyrhade.
 36.381.31. Ond þriddan syðe þurh ælmessan hig beoð
alysede be þon cwæð Daniel to Nabachodonossere þam cyninge, Lys þine
synna mid ælmessum on þearfena gemyltsunge, & þæt, swa swa
wæter adwæsceð fyr swa adwæsceð seo ælmesse þa synne.
 36.381.35. & Drihten cwæð on þam godspelle, syllað
eowre ælmessan þonne magon ge þurh þæt beon clæne.
 36.381.38. Feorðan syðe gyf þu forgyfest þæm þe wið
þe gesyngode swa hit on þæm godspelle cwið, forgyfað þonne bið
eow forgyfen, syllað þonne bið eow geseald.
 36.381.41. & eft, Gyf ge forgyfað þæm þe wið eow
gesyngode þonne forgyfeð eow eowre heofonlica fæder eowra synna.
 36.383.43. Fyftan syðe gyf hwa þurh lare & þurh bodunge
Godes beboda hwone from his wo to rihtan gecyrreð swa swa se apostol
cwæð, seþe gedeð þæt se synfulla from his woo to rihte gecyrreð
his sawle he alyseð fram deaðe & þa mengo his synna he oferwryhð.
 36.383.48. Syxtan syðe for soðre lufan Godes & manna swa
swa hit gecweden is, seo soðe lufu Godes & manna oferwryhð þa mengo
synna þurh þone Hælend Crist urne Drihten.
 36.383.52. Seofoðan syðe þurh dædbote swa Dauid cwæð,
ic beo gecyrred on mynre yrmðe þonne me bið tobrocen se hrycg swylce he
cwæde.
 36.383.54. Sona swa ic mines ofermedlan & mynra unþeawa
geswice & heora hreowsunge & dædbote do beforan Gode swa hæbbe ic
forgyfnesse.
 37.385.1. Ðæt lengtenfæsten mon sceal mid swiðe healicre
gymene healdan swa þæt þær nan dæg ne sy butan Sunnandagum anum
þæt ænig mon æniges metes bruce ær þære teoðan tide
oððe þære twelfte butan hwa to þan mettrum sy þæt he fæstan
ne mæge & geongum mannum þe þa yldo nabbað þæt hig þæt
fæsten ahebban magon.
 37.385.7. Forþon þas dagas synt teoðungdagas þæs geares
& we hig forþon sceolon mid ealre arfæstnysse & halignesse
begongen.
 37.385.10. Hit is þeaw þæt mon oðru fæstenu oft for
freonda lufan mid ælmessan lysað þonne ne mot mon þis mid nænegum
þingum brecan.
 37.385.12. On oðre tid þa men þe fæstað hy myd
fæstene mede æt Gode geearniað & hiora synna forgyfnysse gyf hig
þæt fæsten þeah mid ælmessum gefrætwiað.
 37.387.15. Ac on þas tid þonne seþe fæstan mæge &
nele butan tweon eces wites he him sylfum earnað forþon þe Drihten sylf
þas dagas þurh Moysen & þurh Eliam & þurh hyne sylfne mid
halgum fæstene gehalgode.
 38.387.1. Dæghwamlice is gehwylcum men þearf þæt he his
ælmessan sylle þearfendum mannum.
 38.387.2. Ac swaþeah þonne we fæstað þonne sceolan we
maran ælmessan syllan þonne oðrum dagum forþon þe þone mete &
þone drync þe we þonne brucan sceoldan gif we ne fæsten þonne we
sceoldan þone þearfan gedælan.
 38.387.6. Forþon gyf we fæstað & þæt underngereord
to þam æfengifle healdað þonne ne bið þæt nan fæsten ac
bið seo metetid geuferad & bið þæt æfengyfel getwifealdad.
 39.389.1. Monegra monna gewuna is þonne he fæstan sceolan
þæt sona swa hig þa nonbellan gehyrað hig to mete foð.
 39.389.3. Ac nis hit naht gelyfedlic þæt þæt sy medeme
fæsten ac þæt is riht þætte æfter nonsange mon mæssan gehyre
& æfter þære mæssan his æfensang on þa tid & æfter
þam æfensange gehwa his ælmessan sylle swa swa him to onhagie &
syððan to mete fon.
 39.389.8. Gyf þonne hwa mid hwylcum unæmtan genyd sy þæt
he to þære mæssan cuman ne mæge ne to þæm æfensange þonne
swaþeah gewunige he fæstende þæt he wite þæt seo mæsse &
se æfensang sy gesungen & swa þonne gefyldum his agnum gebedum &
his ælmessum he his goda bruce & gereorde onfoo.
 40.391.1. On þas tid sceal beon forhæfednes gehwylcra
smeametta & syferlice & clænlice is to libbenne.
 40.391.3. Ða þe on þas halgan tide magon cyse & ægru
& fisc & win forgan swiðe healic fæsten þæt bið, þa
þonne þe for untrumnesse oððe for hwylcum oðrum þingum hit forgan
ne magon him is þearf þæt hig his gemetlice brucan & þæm tidum
þe hit alyfed is þæt is æfter þæm æfensange.
 40.391.8. And naðer ne win ne oðerne drenc he ne underfo to
nanre druncennysse ac to his heortan gereordnysse.
 40.391.11. Wines druncennes & synlustas synt forbodene næs
meoloc ne cyse.
 40.393.13. Ne cwæð se apostol na ne ete ge cyse ne ægru ac
he cwæð, Ne oferdrincað ge eow wines ne oðera ealeða in þæm
bið fyrenlust.
 41.393.1. Ælce Sunnandæge on þisse halgan tide is to husle
to gangenne butan þæm monnum þe amænsumede beoð.
 41.393.2. Swa eac on ðunresdæg ær Eastrum & on
Frigedæg & on Eastoræfen & on Eastordæg ond ealle þa dagas
þære Eastorwican synt mid gelicere eawfæstnysse to begangenne.
 42.395.1. On þæm halgum fæstendagum ne sceal mon nane
geflytu ne gecid upahebban ac symble in Godes lofe & in nydbehefum weorcum
we sceolon staðolfæstlice gewunigan.
 42.395.4. Forþon þe ure Drihten þreað þa þe on
fæstendagum willað hiora borga manian & geflytu & gecid
uparæran þurh þone witgan þus cweðende, on fæstendagum bið
gesyne hwilcne willan ge habbað on þæm dagum ge asecað ealle eowre
borgas & to gecide & to geflytum ge fæstað & swiðe
arleaslice ge bærað hynað eowre broðru.
 42.395.10. Ealle cristene men synt on Gode gebroðoru.
 43.397.1. Eac is gesynscipum micel þearf þæt hi hig on þas
halgan tid clænlice healdan butan ælces hæmedes besmytennysse
þætte hig þurh arfæst lif geclænsedre heortan & hiora lichoman
gode mid gecwemum dædum to þam halgan Easterdæge becuman mægen.
 43.397.5. Forþon ne forstondeð þæt fæsten nowiht
þæt mid gesynsciplice weorce bið besmyten ne þæt forneh ðon þe
ma þæt ne bið mid gebedum & mid wæccum & mid ælmessum
gefrætwed.
 44.397.1. Eac þæm folce is to secganne þætte þæm
tidum þe hig þæm halgan geryne onfon Cristes lichoman & blodes,
þæt is þæm halgan husle, þæt hig þæt mid micle ege &
arwyðnesse don.
 44.399.5. And hig ær þæm ægðer ge mid fæstenum ge
mid ælmessum & hig sylfe clænsigen & hig forhæbben from
þæm gesynsciplican weorce & from gehwylcum uncystum & hig
ægðer ge mid gebedum ge mid ælmessum ge mid gehwylcum godum weorcum hig
frætwien swa þonne mid micelre arwyrðnysse his onfon.
 44.399.11. Ægðer is swiðe frecendlic ge þæt him hwa
ungeclænsod & unmedomlice onfoo & eac þæt him hwa to lange
butan sy.
 44.399.13. & him huru nan mon onfon ne sceal butan his scriftes
leafe þæm he sceal habban ær geandet eal þæt he wið Godes willan
geworhte þæs þe he geþencan mæge & æfter his dome betan.
 44.399.17. Monige mynstermen þeah synt & widwan swa haliges
eawfæstes lifes þæt hig þæt dæghwamlice don magon þonne hig
willað.
 45.401.1. Ðonne beodað we eac þæm mæssepreostum þe
ægðer ge Sunnandagum ge eac oðrum mæssedagum ær þære
heahmæssan syngan willað þæt hig þæt deagolice don þæt hig
nanne dæl þæs folces from þære heahmæssan ne ateon.
 45.401.4. Forþon hit is se wyresta gewuna þæt monige men
ægðer ge Sunnandagum ge eac oðrum mæssedagum begað, þæt is
þætte hig sona on ærnemergen willað mæssan gehyran & sona
æfter þære mæssan from ærnemergenne ofer ealne dæg on
druncennysse & on wiste hiora wombe þeowiað nas Gode.
 45.403.11. Ðonne bebeode we þæt nænig mon nanes metes
onbite ærþon þe seo þenung gefylled sy þære heahmæssan ac
ealle ge wif ge wæpned hie gesomnien to þære heahmæssan & to
þære halgan & gastlican cyrcean & þær þa heahmæssan
& Godes wurdes bodunge gehyren.
 45.403.15. & swa we ær cwædon þa mæssepreostas geond
þa gebedhus na ne syngen buton hig hit swa deagollice don swa hig nanne man
fram þære heahmæssan ne ateon & þæt sy ær middemorgenne
þæt hig magon him sylf eft æt þære heahmæssan beon.
 45.403.20. Gehwylces hades mannum we beodað þætte hwa þa
heahmæssan sece buton þam gehalgedum mædenum anum þam þeaw oððe
gewuna nis þæt hig of hyra mynstre gan, þa sceolon binnan heora mynstres
locum gewunian & him þær mæssan gehyran.

 25.339.13. Lic, ðe næfre gystas on husærne onfoð, buton
sellendlices gysthuses med ær apinsod sy, & þæt God don hæt for
andfenge heofena rices, for gestreone eorþlicra þinga beodon.
 26.341.1. To bodianne is eac swylce þæt geleaffulle wið
manað warnien & fram þam healice forhæbben, witende þæt hit is
mycel scyld, & on æ & on witigum & on Cristes bec forboden.
 26.341.4. We gehyrdon soðlice sume men lyt understandan ðas
scylde, & cweþan þæt sumum gemete manswarum leoht dædbote gemet
scile beon onset; ac swylce dædbote him ge sceolon onsettan, swylce be
æwbrice & be forligere & be manslihte & be oðrum
heafodleahtrum.
 26.341.10. Gyf hwylc soðlice, þurhtogenum manaþe oþþe
ahwylcre heafodlicre synne, ondrædende dædbote lange yrmþe, to
andetnesse cuman nele, fram cirycean he is to anydanne & fram
gemænsumunge & midhlyte geleaffulra, þæt nan mid him ete ne ne
drince, ne ne gebidde, ne on hys hus hine onfo.
 27.343.1. To secganne him is þæt hi eac swylce fram leasre
cyðnesse hy forhæbben, wytende þæt ðæt hefegost scyld is &
fram Gode selfum on ðære dune Synai forboden, cweþendum þam ylcan
Drihtne, Na lease cyþnesse þu sege, & on oþre stowe is sæd, Leas
cyþere ne byð ungewitnod.
 27.343.6. Wite hine eac swylce swa hwylc swa ðis þurhtyhþ,
oððe swylcere dædbote to afeormiane swa bufan gesæd is be manaþe,
oððe swylcere genyþrunge oþþe amansumunge to gehynanne swa bufan
gesæd is.
 27.345.10. & to secganne him is þæt we ne cweþað
þæt hit healic dysig sy, ac healic man þæt man for gytsunge goldes
& seolfres oþþe reafa oþþe æniges þinges, oððe þæt
oftust gesælþ, ðurh druncen, on swa mycele scyld befealle, &
oþþe seofen gear he sy on nearowre yrmþe, oþþe he sy fram cyricean
anyd, Drihtne cweþendum, Hwæt framað men þeah he gestryne ealne
middangeard & his sawle forwyrd do.
 27.345.18. Witodlice þonne he oðrum bið geþuht arfæst
wuniende, & him selfum wælhreow wunaþ.
 28.347.1. We myngiaþ eow þæt ge gearwe syn folc to
læranne.
 28.347.2. Se þe halige boc cunne, bodige halige boc; se þe
soþlice ne cunne, huruþinga þæt cuþost is he folcum secge, þæt
hy cirren fram yfele & don god, secen sibbe & fylgen þa, for þam
þe eagan Dryhtnes ofer ryhtwyse & earan hys æt hyra benum, &
Dryhtnes andwlita ofer wyrcende yfelu, þæt he forspille of heorþan hyra
gemynd.
 28.347.8. Nan eornostlice hyne beladian mæg þæt he næbbe
tungan hwanon he mæge ænigne getimbrian.
 28.347.9. Sona soþlice swa he ænigne dweliendne gesihþ, swa
swa he mæge, oþþe þreagende oððe halsiende oþþe cidende fram
gedwolan he hyne ongean teo, & to gefremmane god weorc hine tyhte.
 28.349.13. Þonne we soþlice Drihtne fultumiendum to sinoþe on
an becumaþ, wite anra gehwilc us to secganne hu micel Drihtne gefilstendum he
swunce, oþþe hwylcne wæstm he gestrinde.
 28.349.16. Oþþe gyf hwylc of belimpe ures fultumes behofað,
us mid soþre lufe he myngie, & we mid soþre lufe eac swylce him fultum
to þurhteonne na ne ylden.
 29.349.1. Myngian ge sceolon geleaffulle þæt hi syngalnesse
& gecneordnesse hæbben to gebiddanne.
 29.349.2. Þæt gemet soðlice to gebiddanne sceal swylc beon,
þæt ærest gesædum gebede þæt we credo nemnað, swylce his
geleafan staþole getealdum, cweþe swa hwylc swa hyt sy þriwa, ðu þe
me gesceope, Drihten, gemyltsa me.
 29.351.6. God, milde beo þu me synfullum, & gefylle þæt
drihtenlice gebed þæt we nemnað <foreign>pater noster</foreign>.
 29.351.8. Gif he eornostlice þæt rum & þone æmtan
hæbbe, þonne bidde he þa haligan apostolas & martyras þæt hi
for hyne þingien; & gewæpnedum andwlitan mid rodetacne upahafenum
eagum mid heortan & handum Gode þancas do.
 29.351.12. Gif soþlice seo tid eal þis to gefremmanne
ungenihtsum beo, genihtsumie þæt an, þu ðe me gesceope, Drihten,
gemildsa me.
 29.351.14. God, milde beo ðu me synfullum, & <foreign>pater noster</foreign>
mid geomrunge & heortan forbrytednesse.
 30.353.1. Ælce dæg witodlice we sceolon Gode on urum gebede
æne oþþe tuwa, butan hwa oftor mæge, andettan ure synna, swa se
witega cwæð, Minne gylt cuðne þe ic dyde, & unrihtwisnessa mine ic
ne behydde.
 30.353.4. Ic cwæð, ic andette ongean me unrihtwisnesse mine
Drihtne, & þu forgeafe arleasnysse synne minre.
 30.353.7. Gedonre andetnysse mid geomrunge & tearum Drihtne on
gebede, to singanne is se fiftigoða sealm, oþþe se feower &
twentigoða, oððe se an & þritigoða, & oðre to þam sylfum
þingce belimpende, & swa to gefyllanne is þæt gebed.
 30.355.12. For þam seo andetnes þe we mæssepreostum doð us
fultum bringð, for þam onfangenum halwendum geþeahte fram him,
halwendestum dædbote begymenum oþþe gemænum gebedum synna wommas we
adylgiað.
 30.355.15. Seo andetnes þe we Gode sylfum doð framað to þam
þæt, swa we urra synna gemyndigran beoð, swa hi swiðor God ofergyt;
& swa we hi swiðor ofergytað, swa God hi swiðor geman, him sylfum
cweþendum þurh witegan, & synna þinra ic ne geman lengc.
 30.355.20. Gemun þu hy soðlice þæt Dauid se witega cyþ
þæt he dyde, þonne he cwyð, For þam unrihtwisnesse mine ic oncnawe
& sin min ongean me is symble.
 31.357.1. Andetnessa to syllane synt be eallum synnum þe oþþe
on weorce oþþe on geþance ðurhtogene beoð.
 31.357.3. Eahta synt frymþlice leahtras, buton þam earfoþlice
ænig mæg beon gemet.
 31.357.4. Þys hy sindon: se forma is gyfernis, þæt is wambe
frecnes, oþer forliger, þridda asolcennes oþþe unrotnes, feorþa
gytsung, fifta idel wuldor, syxta anda, seofeþa yrre, eahtoþa ofermodnes.
 31.357.8. Ðonne eornostlice hwa to scryfte cymþ, he sceal beon
ahsod geornlice hu oþþe of hwylcum intingan he þa synne þurhtuge þe
he/ andet þæt he gedon hæbbe, & æfter gemete ðære dæde
him sceal dædbot beon demed.
 31.359.12. He sceal beon læred þæt he be þwyrum
geþohtum do his andetnesse.
 31.359.13. Him sceal eac swylce beon to geþeod þæt he be
eahta frymþlican leahtrum do his andetnesse, & se mæssepreost him
sceal be naman anra gehwylcne leahter secgan, & be þam his andetnesse
onfon.
 32.361.1. Hingriende synt to gefyllanne, þyrstende to drencanne,
nacode to forhelianne, untrume & þa þe on cwærterne beoð to
geneosianne, & cuman in to gelaðianne, Drihtne cweþendum, Ic hingrode
soðlice & ge sealdon me etan.
 32.361.5. Witodlice þas ealle eac swylce on him selfum gehwa
sceal gastlice don, & an oþrum flæsclice gefyllan, for þam þe
forneah naht fremiaþ þas ealle ece lif to begytanne, gif he gallice &
ofermodlice & andiendlice & strudgendlice his lif drohtnað, & gif
he leahterfullice & unendebyrdelice lyfað, & fram oþrum godum
weorcum æmtigað.
 32.363.12. Se þe eornostlice gesihð þæt he sylf Crist
næfð, þe cwæð, Ic eom hlaf lifiende þe of heofonum stah, &
soðe lufe, seo is saule foda næfð, se hingreð witodlice; ac gif he
symle gode worc Criste to geþeodeþ, & of soðre lufe swetnesse hine
gefylð, hyne sylfne hingriende eallinga he fet.
 32.363.18. Se þe lare haliges Gastes & haligra boca flodum
þoliende byð, witodlice hine þyrst; ac gif he hine of flodum Godes wordes
gindlecþ, & his mod of gastlices drinces swetnysse drencð, he him
sylfum þyrstendum drinc gyfð.
 32.363.23. Se þe gesihð hine sylfne rihtwisnesse oþþe
oðrum godra worca gegearwungum nacodne, & he scryt hine mid rihtwisnesse
oþþe oþrum mægenum, hine sylfne buton tweon he scryt.
 32.365.26. Gyf hwa on bedde hys leahtra liþ, & of adle his
unrihtwysness dyrfþ, & mid rapum hys synna gebunden byþ, & mid
wealle hys leahtra beset on þystrum his unryhtwysnesse byð, untrum
witodlice he is.
 32.365.29. Ac gyf he of bedde his leahtra þurh andetnesse ut
gæþ, & þurh dædbote heofas of bendum his synna unbunden byþ,
& to leohte godra weorca ut gæþ, hine selfne untrumne & on
cwearterne asetne buton tweon he geneosað.
 32.365.34. Gyf he on þyses lifes wege gesyhþ þæt he
dyrfe/, & of leahtra ystum & swylce of sumre lyfte hreohnesse gedrefed
byþ, & andfengcstowe godra weorca næfþ, wite he þæt he on
siþfæte aset gysthuses wædlaþ; & gyf he hine selfne to mægena
huse gelædeþ, & hine on hyra gebeorhge onfehþ, cuman witodlice he
onfehþ.
 32.367.40. Ða ealle þonne he hy him selfum gastlice
gegearwaþ, Crist on him, ðæs lim he is, he fedeþ & drencþ &
scrydeþ & geneosaþ & onfehþ.
 33.369.1. To myngianne synt geleaffulle haligre Godes gesomnunge
þæt hy hyra suna & dohtra læren þæt hy hyrsumnesse hyra yldrum
magum gegearwien, Drihtne cweþendum, Sunu, weorþa fæder þinne.
 33.369.4. Witodlice eac þa magas sceolon ymbe hyra bearn
gemetfæstlice don, apostole cweþendum, Nellen ge to yrsunge gegremian
eowre bearn.
 33.369.8. Witodlice eac þæt him is to secganne þæt, gyf
hy for gecyndlicre lufe arian willað on gyrdum hyra bearnum, na Drihten þa
witeleaslice læt, buton of belimpe þæslic dædbot gegearwod sy, for
þam þe leohtre is þam bearnum maga swingcela to geþolianne þonne
Godes yrre on to beyrnanne.
 34.371.1. To myngianne is folc þæt hi undergyten þæt
þæt is soð lufu þæt man God lufie swiðor þonne hine selfne,
& his nyhstan swa swa hine selfne, & ðæt he nelle oðrum don,
buton þæt he wille þæt him sylfum sæle, & fela þe lang is to
atellanne.
 34.371.6. Witodlice swa hwylce swa wenað þæt soð lufu sy
on æte & on wæte, oþþe on oþrum anfondlicum & sellendlicum
þingum, na hwonlice hie dweliað, cweðendum apostole, Godes rice nis mete
& drync.
 34.371.9. Witodlice eac þa selfan, þonne hie mid soþre lufe
beoð, hi beoð gode & ongemang mægenu to tellanne.
 35.373.1. To mingianne synt þa þe manggungum & þinga
ceapungum onwaciaþ, þæt hie na swiþor eorðlice gestreon þonne ece
lif gewilnien.
 35.373.3. Witodlice se þe swiþor be eorðlicum þingce
þonne be his sawle hæle ðincgþ, swiðe fram soðfæsþnesse wege
he dweleþ, & neah sumes wises wordcwide, on his life he forlist his
innoþas.
 35.373.6. To filgeanne is soþlice on þison dæle, swa swa on
oþrum þingum, seo apostollice spræc, se cwæþ, & þæt nan ne
oferga ne ne beswice on mangunge his nihstan, forþam þe God is wrecend be
þisum eallum.
 35.375.11. Swa swa witodlice fram þam þe of geswincum æcera
& oþrum geswincum andlifene & scrud & nidbehefu menniscum bricum
to begitanne geornlice onstandaþ, teoþunga & ælmessan to sillanne
syndan; swa fram þam witodlice þe for heora neodum mangungum onwuniað, to
donne is.
 35.375.16. Æghwylcum men God sealde cræft of þam he fed
byþ, & anra gehwylc of his cræfte þe he his lichoman neadbehefe
fultumas hæfþ, þære sawle witodlice, þæt is nydbehefre, he sceal
fultumas þenian.
 36.377.1. On þære ærestan ucan ær Lenctenes anginne
andetnissa mæssepreostum syndon to syllanne, dædbot to onfonne,
twyræde to gesibbianne, & ealle saca to geliþianne, & men sceolon
giltas gemænelice forgifan on hira heortum, þæt hy þe freolicor
cweþen, Forgif us giltas ure, swa swa we forgifaþ giltendum urum.
 36.377.7. & swa ingangende on eadiges Lenctenes tide clænum
& afeormodum modum to haligre Eastran genealæcan, & ðurh
dædbote hi silfe geedniwien, seo is þæt æftre fulwiht.
 36.379.11. Swa witodlice fulwiht, swa eac dædbot synna
dilgaþ.
 36.379.12. & forþam þe æfter fulwiht synful edniwan ne
mæg beon fullod, þes læcedom dædbote fram Drihtne is seald, þæt
þurh þa dædbote æfter þam fulwihte sinna syn afeormode.
 36.379.15. Þæt seofon gemetum synna beon forgifene halige bec
gesweotoliað.
 36.379.17. Ærest on fulwihte, þæt is for sinna forgifenisse
geseald.
 36.379.19. Oþre siþe þurh martyrdom neah þam þe se
sealmsangere cwæþ, Eadig byð se wer þe him Drihten his sinna ne
oþwit.
 36.381.22. & neah þæs ylcan Dauides cwide þæt sinna
beoð þurh fulwiht forgifene, & hy beoð þurh dædbote oferhelede,
& þurh martyrdom hy ne beoð oþwitene.
 36.381.25. Þriddan siðe þurh ælmessan, swa Daniel þam
awyrgedan cyninge Nabochodonosor sæde, Sinna þine mid ælmessum þu
alys on þearfena mildheortnyssum.
 36.381.27. & elleshwær is gecweden, Weter acwencð byrnende
fyr, & ælmesse acwencð sinne.
 36.381.29. & Drihten cwæð on his godspelle,
þeahhwæðre syllaþ ælmessan, & efne nu ealle þingc eow beoð
clæne.
 36.381.32. Feorðan siþe, gif hwa forgifð þam þe ongean
hyne agilt, swa swa hit gerædd is, Forgifaþ & eow bið forgifen,
syllað & eow bið seald.
 36.381.34. & eft Fæder eower forgifð eow eowre sinna, gif
eowra anra gehwilc of his heortan forgifð.
 36.383.37. Fiftan siþe, gif þurh eowre bodunge & godra
worca bigenc hwilc oþerne fram his gedwylde gecirð, neah þam þe se
apostol cwæð, Gif hwa sinnfulne of gedwilde his weges gecirð, he
gehælð his saule fram deaðe, & oferheleð his sinna mænigu.
 36.383.42. Sixtan siþe þurh soðe lufu, neah þam þe hit
awriten is, Godes sibb oferwrihð sinna mænigu þurh hælendne cyningc,
Drihten urne.
 36.383.45. Eahtoðan siðe þurh dædbote, neah þam þe
Dauid cwæð, Ic wæs gecirred on minre yrmðe þa me wæs þorn on
afæstnod.
 37.385.1. Soþlice þæt Lengtenfæsten mid healicre begimene
is to healdanne, þæt, buton Sunnandagum, þa forhæfdnesse oftogene
sint, natyþeshwon fæsten sy abrocen, for þam ða dagas syndon
teoðunga ures geares, þa we sceolon mid eallre æfestnesse &
halignesse adreogan.
 37.385.6. Ne sy soðlice nan intinga on þyssum dagum fæsten
to abrecanne: for ðam ðe on oþrum tidum is gewuna for soþre lufe
intingan fæsten beon tolysed, on þysum soðlice hit ne sceal beon
abrocen.
 37.385.9. For þam on oþre tide fæsten on selfes willan &
dome æghwylces is aset, on þysum soþlice se ðe ne fæst, he Godes
bebod forgymþ.
 37.385.12. & on oþre tide se þe fæst, he forhæfdnesse
mede geearnaþ; on þysum soðlice, buton seocum & cildum, swa hwylc swa
ne fæst, he wyte him gestrynð for ðam þa selfan dagas Dryhten ge
ðurh Moysen ge þurh Eliam ge ðurh hine selfne on haligum fæstene
gehalgode.
 38.387.1. Fæstendagum soðlice ælmesse is to donne, &
þone mete oþþe drinc þe gehwa self brucan sceolde, gyf he ne fæste,
he þearfum dæle, for þam ðe hit nis nanre mede, ac metta geeacnung,
þæt hwa fæste & his undernmete oð æfen sparie.
 39.389.1. Manega gewuniað þe wenaþ ðæt hy fæsten,
sona swa hy nonhringc gehyraþ, ðæt hy to þære nigoðan tyde
etaþ, ða natyþeshwon sint to gelyfanne þæt hy fæsten, gyf hy
etaþ ær æfenþenung sy gebremed.
 39.389.4. To efstane is soþlice to mæssan, & gehyredum
mæssan symlum & æfensangum, & ælmessum gesealdum, to mete is
to genealæceanne.
 39.389.8. Gyf soþlice hwylc mid neode gebunden sy, þæt he to
mæssan becuman ne mæge, gewenedre æfentyde, hys gebede gefylledum, he
sceal fæsten tolysan.
 40.391.1. Forhæfdnes soðlice on þysum dagum sceal beon
forneah ealra esta, & syferlice & clænlice is to lybbanne.
 40.391.3. Se ðe soðlice fram ægrum & cyse & buteran
& fixum & wine forhabban mæg, he is myceles mægenes.
 40.391.5. Se ðe witodlice fram þam, for untrumnesse oððe
ahwylcum weorce, forhabban ne mæg, he bruce, for an þæt he þæt
fæsten oð æfen symbellice breme; & win næs to druncennesse, ac
to gereorde his lichaman nyme.
 40.391.9. Ðæt hwa fram cyse & meoluce & buteran &
ægrum forhæbbe, & ne fæste, is gedwolenlicost & fram eallum
gesceade ascyred.
 40.391.11. Soþlice wines & ælces wætan druncennes
& galnes synt forbodene, næs meoluc & ægru.
 40.393.14. Ne cwæð witodlice se apostol, Nellen ge þigcan
meoluc & ægru, ac he cwæð, Nellen ge beon gynddrencede of wine, on
þam is galnes.
 41.393.1. Ælc Sunnandæge on Lencten Cristes lichaman &
his blodes haligdomas syndon to onfonne, buton fram þam þe amansumode synt,
& on þunresdæg ær Eastrun, & on Easteræfen, & on
þæm dæge Drihtnes ærystes, buton dædbetendum, fram eallum is to
gemænsumianne, & þa dagas ðære Easterlican ucan ealle mid gelicre
æfæstnesse synt to weorðianne.
 42.395.1. On þysum eowra fæstena dagum nænige geflitu,
nænige saca sceolon beon hæfde, ac on Godes lofum & on neadbehefum
weorce is to þurhwunianne.
 42.395.3. Drihten þurh his witigan ðreaþ þa þe geflitu
& saca on Lenctentyde begaþ, & þe wytu fram hyra gyltendum
gegyrnað, cweþende, Efne nu on dæge eowres fæstenes beoþ gemette
wyllan eowre, & ealle eowre gyltendras ge hametað.
 42.395.8. Efne nu to geflitum & sacum ge fæstaþ, & ge
sleaþ of fyste arleaslice.
 43.397.1. To forhæbbane is soþlice on þysum haligostum dagum
fram gemæccum, & clænlice & arfæstlice is to lybbanne,
þæt gehalgodre heortan & lichaman þas haligan dagas syn adrogene,
& swa sy becumen to þam haligan dæge Eastran, for þam þe forneah
naht ne framaþ þæt fæsten þæt mid gesynscyplicum weorce bið
besmiten, & þæt þæt gebed & wæccan, oþþe
ælmesdæda ne bebeodaþ.
 44.397.1. To myngianne is folc þæt hy to ðam þurhhaligum
haligdome Drihtnes lichaman & blodes nateþeshwon unforwandienlice
genealæcen, ne fram þam swiþe forhebben, ac anra gehwylc mid ealre
geornfulnesse & gleawnesse geceose ða tid, hwænne he sume hwile fram
gesynscyplicum weorce forhæbbe & fram leahtrum hine afeormige & mid
mægenum gefrætwige & ælmessum & gebedum onwunige, & swa
siððan mid myclum ege & arwyrþnesse to swa mærum haligdome
genealæce.
 44.397.10. Witodlice swa swa is frecenfullic gehwylcne unclænne
to swa mærum haligdome genealæcean, swa is frecenfullic fram þam
langere tide forhabban, buton gesceade þæra þe amænsumude synt.
 44.397.13. Soþlice fram eallum gewisre tide is to
gemænsumianne, buton ðam swiðe æfæstum & haliglice libbendum
þe forneah ælce dæge þæt doð.
 45.401.1. Ðæt þa mæssan ðe gind Sunnandagas sindrie
fram mæssepreostum beoð, na swa in opennesse beon, þæt ðurh ða
folc from openum mæssena symblum, þe on ðære þryddan tide regollice
beoþ, beo fram abroden, for þam ðe wyrst gewuna is, oþþe on
Sunnandagum oððe on gehwylcum freolsdagum, sona swa hwylc gehyrð
mæssan breman, eacswylce þeah heo beo for forðfarenum, he aweg gewit,
& gynd ealne dæg fram ærnemergenne druncennisse & oferfyllum
swyþor þonne Gode þeowaþ.
 46.403.10. To myngianne is folc þæt hit ær openlicre &
geendudre þenunge to mete ne genealæce, & þæt ealle to openlicre
haligre meder, þæt is to þære halgan cyrcan, mæssena symblu &
bodunge to gehyranne becumen, & mæssepreostas gynd gebedhus
nateþeshwon buton swa wærlice ær þære oðre tide bremen, þæt
þæt folc fram openlicum symblum ne sy fram abroden.
 46.403.16. Ac oþþe ða mæssepreostas ðe on þære
burge embehwyrfte oððe on þære sylfan burg syndon, oþþe folc, swa
we foresædon, on an to openlicre mæssena weorþunge tosomne becumen,
buton Gode gehalgedum wifum, þam nis þæslic þæt hy to opennesse ut
gan, ac hy sceolon on mynstres clusum beon behæfde.

ConR
B10.7.
Rules of Confraternity: Brotanek 1913, 27-8.



 2. Ðis is þæra gerædnessa sum þe bisceopas geræd
habbað heom sylfum to þearfe.
 3. Ærest þæt hy ealle anræde beon & an lufian for
gode & for worulde, & þæt hy beon swa hym to gebyreð <foreign>cor unum
et anima una</foreign>.
 5. & hy geræddon þæt æt æfre ælcere mæssan
þe heora ænig sylf gemæssige gemune mid þrim collectum synderlice hys
gehadan.
 8. & begyte heora æghwylc þæt man æfre æghwylcere
wucan for ealle geferan ane sundermæssan synderlice gesinge.
 10. & þonne hwylcum bisceope forðsið gebyrige, þonne
singe ælc bisceop sylf þreo mæssan for þa sawle butan he furþor
wylle, & butan þam wite he þæt he gefylle XXX mæssena & XXX
æfensanga & XXX uhtsanga, & gedæle an pund for þa saule; healf
wið mæssan & healf ælmesmannum.
 16. & gefreoge anne man for þa sawle, & anne þearfan
fede XXX daga.
 18. & æt þam þritigeþan dæge gebaðige swa feala
þearfena swa he mæst mæge & þam do eallum æt & wæt,
& to wæde fylste gyf he hwæt wylle.
 21. Se þe þas gerædnesse mid gode geyce, god hyt him
geleanige swa him leofost sy, amen.
 23. We gretað eac ealle ure gebroþra & geswustra þe
abbudhades syn & abbudyssan swyþe bliþelice, & hy geornlice
myngiað & eadmodlice biddað þæt hy for godes lufon heora agenne
þearfe, & þæra þe hy æt godes dome forð lædan sceolon
georne beþenceon.
 28. & we gyrnað þæt hi us on heora gebedrædene mid
heora gebroðra & geswustra fultume synderlice eac habbon, swaswa we
bisceopas us betweonan geræd habbað, nelle we to him gyrnan feohgesceotes,
ne freotmannes, butan hwa sylf wylle, & þæs þe bet unne.
 34. Ac þære gebedrædene we wilniað georne þæt hi for
us beon ge on life ge on legere & we eaþmodlice for hi beon wyllaþ, be
þam sylfan gemete þe we geahxiað þæt hi for us doþ.
 38. Eala leofan gebroðru & geswustra, geþencað swyþe
georne þa oferneode þe us eallum ys gemæne.
 40. God us gehealde for hys micelan mildheortnysse & us
gescylde þæt we næfre ne forwurðon on ðam towerdan dome þe we
ealle to gelaðode synt.
 43. AMHN.
