Conf 1.1 (Spindler)
B11.1.1.
Confessionale pseudo-Egberti (Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Junius 121): Spindler 1934, 176-94.



 1. <foreign>De episcopis vel presbyteris seu diaconis, ammonitio quomodo
iudicantur cum peccant.</foreign> Biscop gyf he dearnunga licge, æfter canones dome
fæste XII winter, and ælmessan sylle swyðe, and on teara agotenesse
bidde him Godes are, sume willað þæt he eft sy unhadod.
 5. Mæssepreost gif he hine forlicge, fæste III winter and III
æfestenu, on wucan fæste he twegen dagas to æfenes.
 7. Gif he mid nunnan hæme, sy him his fæsten ðe swyðor
geyced, þæt is VII gear.
 8. Diacon fæste þreo winter, gif he hine forlicge, and swa
munuc.
 9. Gif he bearn gestryne, fæste he ðe swyðor, swa biscop him
deme oððe mæssepreost.
 10. Man unhadod and unmunecod gif he hine forlicge, fæste XII
monað, gif he bearn cenne, fæste IV winter, gif he hit ofslea, fæste
VII winter.
 13. <foreign>De monachis, sanctimonialibus et sacerdotibus.</foreign> Munuc oððe
gehalgod fæmne gif hi heo forlicge, fæste VII winter, sume willað III.
 15. Gif hwa his had forleose, mæssere oððe biscop, sy he in
hreowe oð deað, þæt his sawl lifige.
 16. Sacerd gif he man ofslea oððe hine dearnunga forlicge, sy
he of his hade aworpen.
 18. Ne mot man geongan men wif forgyfan, gif he hine ær to
munuchade geþingað.
 20. <foreign>De laycis quomodo peniteant.</foreign> Læwede man him wif agende
gyf he oðres ceorles wif wemme oððe fæmnan, fæste an winter, gyf
heo bearn hæbbe, fæste III winter, gif he þonne hægsteald sy,
fæste VII winter, sume willað XII.
 24. Se ðe mid his meder oððe swustor oððe dohtor hæme,
fæste XII and swa ðeah geseo se sacerd, on hwylcum hade he sy.
 26. Swa hwylc man swa mid neate hæme, fæste X winter oððe
VII; sume willað III winter, sume an, sume C daga.
 28. Geseo se man, hwylc se man sy oððe þæt neat, in eallum
ðingum behofað gesceadwisnesse, swa we beforan cwædon.
 29. Swa hwylc swa on muð sæd forlæteð, fæste VII
winter.
 30. Swa hwylc man swa mid his mennen gehæme, fæste an winter,
gif heo bearn hæbbe, gefreoge þæt and swa þeah fæste an winter.
 33. <foreign>De iuvenis.</foreign> Lytel cniht gif he byð fram maran ofðrycced
in hæmede V fif niht, gif he him geðafige, fæste XV nihta.
 36. Gif he stele oððe myrten ete and he hit wite, fæste VII
dagas, gif he hæbbe XX wintra and owiht ðylces do, fæste XX nihta.
 38. Gyf þes ylca mid his handa hine besmite, fæste XX daga.
 39. Gyf men in werlicre yldo owiht þyslices gelimpe, fæste XL
nihta, sume willað C nihta.
 41. <foreign>De sacerdotibus.</foreign> Sacerd se ðe þurh unsyfre spræce
oððe þurh gesyhðe oððe sceawunga wifes hine besmiteð and nele
gefyrenian hine, fæste XX daga.
 44. Se ðe mid his willan byð besmiten swyðlice, fæste he C
daga.
 45. Se ðe on willan his slæpes byð besmites, arise he and
asinge psaltere sealma, and on morgen do his hleor XXX siðum to eorðan.
 46. Se ðe bið butan willan besmiten oððe se ðe willende
on slæpe gefyrenað, singe XXIV sealma.
 48. Gyf man on cyrican slæpende his sæd ageote, arise and
singe psaltere.
 49. Sacerd gif he mid his luste wifmon cysse, hreowsige þæt XX
daga.
 50. Sacerd gif he besmiten sy þy ðe he wife onhrine, fæste
XL nihta, sume willað XXX.
 51. Sacerd gif he in geþohtes wilnunga sy besmiten, fæste
wucan.
 52. Gyf he mid handa hrine, fæste ðreo wucan.
 53. Se ðe oft þurh swiðfæstnesse his geðohtes sæd
agyteð, fæste XX daga, gif he eft gedo, fæste XL nihta.
 55. Se ðe þonne gelome dyrnegeligeru gefremme, canon demeð
þæt he fæste X winter, sume willað VII, and mid geþeahte III.
 57. <foreign>De maritis vel pueris, cum impie agant in pecora.</foreign> Swa hwylc
ceorl swa mid his wife in monaðadle hæme, fæste XL nihta.
 59. And swa hwilc swa his blod oððe mannes sæd drince,
fæste III winter.
 60. Swa hwylc man swa on cyrcan hæme, deme þæt biscop and
ðonne witnige swa him riht ðince.
 61. Se ðe mid neate hæme oððe wæpnede, fæste X
winter.
 62. Cnihtas gyf hi heom betweonan hæmed fremman, swinge hi man.
 63. Nyten gyf hit sy mannes ende besmyten, slea man, sylle hundum,
gyf him tweonige, læte libban.
 66. <foreign>De paganis quomodo nubant, et de his qui ignorantia bis
baptizati sunt, et de his qui per adulterantem presbiterum baptizati sunt, et
de his qui sponte bis baptizati sunt.</foreign> Swa hwylc hæþen man forlæteð
hæðen wif, in his anwealde æfter heora fulluhte hwæþer he hit
hæbbe þe næbbe.
 71. Swa gelice, gif heora oðer bið hæðen oðer gefullod,
se hæðena mot fram ðam gefulledon, swa se apostol cwæð, <foreign>Infidelis
si discedit, discedat</foreign>.
 73. Þa ðe wæron tuwa gefullode, swa hi ne wiston, ne
gæð him ðær nænig fæsten, butan hi man ne mot halgian æfter
canones dome, butan nydþearf gebyrige.
 75. Gyf man sy fram dyrnegeligenan preoste gefullod, fullige hine
man eft sona.
 76. Swa hwylc man swa mid his gewitnesse hine oðre siðe
fullað, þæt is swa he Crist eft ahenge, fæste VII winter ða twegen
fæstendagas/ on wucan, and III æfesten fullice.
 80. <foreign>De infantibus non baptizatis.</foreign> Cild gyf hit hæðen swelte,
fæste his fæder and his modor ðreo winter.
 82. Se ðe ofslea his bearn hæðen, fæste X winter æfter
canones dome, sume willað VII winter.
 83. Hæðen cild gif hit bið preoste beboden, and hit sy
untrum and hit hæðen swelte, sy se preost of his hade aworpen.
 85. Gif hit sy on his yldrum gelang, fæste se preost an winter.
 86. Swa hwylc preost swa on his agenre scire oððe on fare, and
hine man on his fore fulluhtes bidde and he wyrne for ofeste his fore, and se
man hæðen swelte, sy he unhadod.
 90. <foreign>De presbitero non baptizato.</foreign> Swa hwylc mæssepreost se ðe
þæt wite þæt he unfullod sy, fullige hine man and halgie, and ða
men ealle fullige þa þe he ær fullode.
 93. Papa on Rome swa ðeana gesette, þeh ðe se mæssere
synful sy oððe hæðen, oððe oðer man se ðe fullode, þæt
þæs Halgan Gastes ðenung wære in ðære gife þæs fulluhtes
swa ðeah, nalæs þæs mannes.
 95. In cristnunga and on ðam fulluhte an fæder mæg beon,
gyf hit nydþearf bið.
 97. Ne mot se oðrum onfon se ðe him bið unfullad oððe
untrymed.
 98. Wer mot his wife on fulluhte for neode onfon, and þæt wif
ðam were.
 99. Ne mot gefullad mid þæne gecristnodon etan ne hine cyssan,
swa mycele ma swa he ne mot mid þæne hæðenan.
 101. <foreign>De generationibus quomodo possunt nubere.</foreign> In þam þriddan
cneowe mid Grecum mot man wif niman, in fiftan mid Romanum, ne he swa ðeana
in þam ðriddan hit brecað.
 104. Healice gegaderunga ne mot mon gesceadan butan begea
geðafunga.
 105. Heora ægðer mot oðrum lyfan mynstergang and him niman
oðerne gegadan, gif hi in þæm ærestan hæmede wæron.
 107. Mid Grecum þæt nis swa þeah riht.
 107. Gif hit in þæm æfteran hæmede bið, ne mot heora
aðer þriddan habban lifigendum þam were oððe þam wife.
 109. Þriddan wifes ceorl fæste heora ægðer twegen dagas
on wucan, and ðreo æfestenu flæsces þæt hi nan ne etan.
 110. In þære ærestan geðeodnysse weres and wifes preoste
gedafenað þæt he mæssan singe and ða gesamnunga bletsige, and heo
æfter þon hie ahebban, þæt hi cyrican secan, mid ælmessan, and
ðam nihtum forðgetenum hie hi gebiddan and fæsten XL nihta and æfter
ðam gan to husle.
 115. Gyf ænig wer oððe wif gehate þæt he mædenhad
gehealdan wille, and æfter ðon wære in rihthæmed geðeoded, ne
forlæte heora naþer þæt he ne fæste ðreo winter.
 117. Forðon ða dysegon gehat and ða unaræfnedan
weorðað/ tobrocene.
 118. Gif æniges mannes wif dearnunga licge, se ceorl heo mot
lætan and him oðer niman, gif þæt wæs þæt ærest wif, gif
hit wæs þæt æftere oððe þæt ðridde, ne mot he þonne
oðrum onfon.
 121. Þæt wif gif heo hire fyrena don wille, ymbe V winter heo
mot oðerne ceorl niman.
 122. Wifes wer gif he forðfereð, ymbe twelf monað þæs
heo mot niman oðerne.
 123. Swa hwylc man swa forlæte his wif and hine to
unrihthæmede þeodeð, fæste VII winter hearde fæstene oððe XV
leohtlicor.
 125. Swa hwylc se ðe fela yfela do in morðre and in
unrihthæmede mid neatum and mid wifum, ga in mynster and a fæste oð his
daga ende, gif he swyðe fela yfela fremede.
 129. <foreign>De coniunctione et aliorum causis.</foreign> Twegen gebroðra motan
twa gesystro to wife habban, and fæder and sunu modor and dohtor.
 131. Gif ðeowa and ðywen heora begra willes in hæmed hie
gesamnian, and æfter þam gif heora oþer freoh bið and ne mæge
þone ðeowan alysan, heora swa hwæðer swa freoh byð mot þam
ðeowan freols gewinnan.
 134. Swa hwylc freoman se ðe him genimeð þeowne wifman to
wife, ne mot he hi eft forlætan, gif hi ær ðeodde wæron mid heora
begra willan.
 136. Swa hwylc man se ðe cennende wif freo gedeð, þæt
bearn bið swa þeah þeow.
 138. Ða ðe in rihtum hæmede beoð, þreom nihtum ær
ðam feowertiges nihta fæstenne hi ne gesamnigan heo, and swa þæt
feowertig nihta ealle oð ða nigoðan niht in Eastron.
 140. Swa hwylc se ðe hafað gemanan oððe wifgyfte
unalyfedlice, swa þeah he mot swa hwylcne mete þicgean swa he hafað,
forðam se witega cwæð, <foreign>Domini est terra et plenitudo ejus</foreign>.
 143. Wer and wif þa ðe him in hæmede geðeodde wæron,
gyf oðer wile Godes ðeowa beon and oðer nele, oððe heora oðer bið
untrum oðer byð hal, swa þeah mid heora begra geðafunge heo hi
gedælen, gif hi wyllon.
 147. <foreign>De lavacro mariti vel aliorum causis.</foreign> Ceorl gif he mid his
agene wife hæme, ðwea hine ær he in cyrcan ga.
 149. Wif heo forswið hyre wer hyre fram, and nele eftgehwyrfan
and him wiððingian, ymbe fif winter þæs se ceorl mot mid bisceopes
geðafunga oðrum wife onfon.
 151. Gif wifes wer sy in hæftnyde læded, anbide heo his V
winter, and swa do se wer þam wife, gif hire hæftnyd gelimpe.
 153. Gif se wer onfo oðrum wife, and þæt gehæfte ymb fif
winter cume, forlæte he þæt æftere and ðam gehæftan onfo,
þæm ðe he ær hæfde, and swa heo him, gif heo oðerne ær nime.
 156. Swa hand gelice wer, gif he geðeoded bið in hæmede
ðam wife þe his cynnes sy, æfter his wifes deaðe geðeode eft
þæs wifes magum in ællriht.
 158. Ceorle ne gedafenað þæt he his wif æfre nacode
geseo.
 159. Wer and wif gyf heo geðyded beoð and se wer mid heo
gehæman ne mæge, þæt wif hine mot forlætan and hire oðerne
niman, gif þæt on þone ceorl cuð bið.
 162. Þa geweddodan fæmnan hire ealdras hi ne motan syllan
oðrum menn, nimðe heo eallunga þone wiðcweþe þæt heo nelle, heo
þonne mot þæt forlæton and hire mynstergang geceosan, gyf heo wile.
 165. Gif heo nele mid þam were eardian þam ðe heo ær
geweddod wæs, agyfe him eft þæt feoh þæt he for heo sealde, and
eac ðone ðriddan dæl þæs yrfes.
 167. And eac gif he þæt nelle, ðolige his feos, and seo
fæmne ga on mynster oððe elcor in hire clænnesse hie halde.
 170. <foreign>De etate pueri vel puelle quomodo sibi dominentur.</foreign>
Feowertynewintre/ mæden heo mot agan hire lichaman geweald.
 172. Cniht oð þæt he sy XV winter eald, sy he on his
fæder gewealdum, syððan he hine mot munecyan, gyf he wile.
 173. Fæmne oð þæt heo sy sixtynewintre oððe
seofontynewintre/, sy heo in hire eldrena mihtum.
 175. Æfter ylde hire hlaford hi mot gifan mid hire willan.
 176. Se fæder his sunu gyf him mycel ðearf bið, he hine mot
in þeowet gesyllan, oþþæt he bið VII wintre, ofer þæt, butan
þæs sunu willan he hine ne mot syllan.
 178. Gif feond æniges mannes wif him on genime and he hit eft
begytan ne mæg, he mot him oðer niman, forðon hit is swa selre þonne
he dyrnegeligeres leahtor fremme.
 181. <foreign>Item de generationibus quomodo iunguntur.</foreign> On ðære
fiftan cneorisse geleofe men hi motan gesamnigean, and in þære feorðan
gyf heo gemette syn, ne sceade hi man, æt ðam þriddan cneowe syn hie
gesceadene/.
 184. Forgange þæt wif hire wer III monað ærðon heo
cenne, and æfter hyre beorðre XL nihta.
 186. Swa hwylc man se ðe mid his wife in þisum hæme,
fæste XX oððe XL nihta.
 187. Wif in hire monaðadle cyricean ne sece ne to husle ne ga,
naðer ne nunne ne læwede wif, gif heo hit do, fæste XX nihta.
 189. Gyf wif drycræft and galdorcræft and unlibban wyrce and
swylc bega, fæste XII monað oððe þreo æfesteno oððe XL nihta,
gewite hu micelu seo fyren seo.
 191. Gif heo mid hire unlibban man acwelleð, fæste VII
winter.
 192. Wif þæt ðe gæð in cyrcan ærðon heo clæne
sy hire blode, fæste XL nihta.
 193. Wif seo ðe mencgð weres sæd in hire mete and ðone
þigeð, þæt heo þam wæpnedmen sy ðe leofre, fæste III
winter.
 195. Wif seo ðe to æwyrpe gedo hire geeacnunga in hire hrife
and cwelle ymbe XL nihta þæs ðe heo þam sæde onfo, ærðon hit
gesawlad wære, swa se myrðra fæste III winter, and æghwylcere wucan
þa twegen dagas to æfenes, and ðreo æfestenu, gif heo beorðer
forleose, I gear oððe III æfestenu.
 200. <foreign> De homicidiis vel incestis mulieribus.</foreign> Modor gif heo ofslea
hire bearn, fæste XV winter butan blinnesse nymðe in Sunnandæge.
 202. Gyf heo þearfende sy, fæste VII winter.
 203. Man gyf he hindan hæme mid his wife, fæste XL nihta.
 204. Gyf he in hire bæcþearm hæme, fæste X winter.
 205. Swa hwylc man swa hæme on Sunnandæge, fæste III
dagas.
 205. Wif gif heo mid oðre hæme, fæste III winter.
 206. Wif gif heo mid hwylcehwegu cræfte hyre hæmed gerenað,
swa heo sylf wat, fæste III gear, forðam þæt hyre byð besmitenes.
 208. An fæsten gegæð wudewan and fæmnan, mare gegæð
wife þam ðe wer hafað, gyf hy dyrnegeligera gyrneð.
 210. Ne mot wif gehat gehatan butan hire weres leafnesse.
 210. Ne mot wif hyre ceorl forlætan, þeah he dearnunga licge.
 211. Wer ne hæme mid his wife XL nihta ær Eastran ne VII
nihtum ær Pentecosten ne feowertigum nihtum ær Middanwintra.
 213. Wif mot to husle gan ærðon heo cenne, gif hyre nydþearf
bið.
 214. Wif gif heo þigeð hire weres blod for hwylcum læcedome,
fæste XL nihta.
 216. <foreign>De sacrificiis que demonis immolantur.</foreign> Gif man medlices
hwæthwegu deoflum onsægð, fæste an gear, gif he myceles hwæt
onsecge deoflum, fæste X winter.
 218. Wif gif heo set hyre dohtor ofer hus oððe on ofen,
forðam þe heo wille feferadle men gehælan, fæste heo VII winter.
 220. Swa hwylc man swa corn bærne in ðære stowe þær
man dead wære, lifigendum mannum to hæle and in his huse, fæste V
winter.
 222. Swa hwylc man swa feondum gesenodne mete þigeð and eft
preoste geandet, sceawige se sacerd hwylces hades se man sy oððe hwylcere
yldo, oððe hu getyd se man wære, and ðonne he swa deme swa him
wislicost ðince.
 226. Wif gyf sy on unrihtum hæmede, and hire wer mid hyre
eardian nelle, ga heo on mynster gyf heo wille, gyf heo nelle, nime þone
feorðan dæl þæs yrfes.
 228. Gyf hwylc wif sy þe unrihthæmed fremme, hyre wite sy in
hyre weres handum.
 229. Wif þæt bið be anum were, and heo ðonne Gode
gehateð þæt heo æfter hire weres deaðe oðerne ne wille, þonne
swelteð se hyre wer and heo oðerne onfehð þonne hreoweð hyre þæs
ðe heo hire gehat ne gefylde, wile eft gebetan, ymb endlyfan gear þæs
ðe hy gesamnodon in hyre weres anwealde þæt bið hwæðer heo hit
gefylle.
 234. Hwæðere mid nydnysse hyre man mot lyfan þæt heo mid
þone sy.
 235. Gif hwilc man butan bisceopes geþafunga gehat gehate, in
þæs bisceopes anwealde þæt bið hwæþer he hit onwende þe
anlæte.
 238. <foreign>De homicidiis vel livoribus que in homine perfecta sunt.</foreign> Gyf
man slyhð oðerne on morð on eorran mode and mid behydnysse, fæste <foreign>IV</foreign>
gear, sume willað <foreign>VII</foreign>.
 240. Swa hwylc swa morðorslege þafað and hine man þonne
gefremeð, fæste V winter, sume willað VII, and he XL nihta on cyrican ne
cume.
 243. Swa hwylc man se ðe in gecynde oðerne gedo wanhalne
oððe hine womwlite on gewyrce, forgylde him þone womwlite, and his weorc
wyrce oð þæt seo wund hal sy, and þæt læcefeoh ðam læce
gylde, and fæste twa æfestena oððe þreo, gyf he nyte hu he hit
gylde, fæste XII monað.
 248. Swa hwylc man se ðe in his mægewrece mannan ofslea,
fæste III winter, gif he hit þæs mannes magum eft gyldan wile, fæste
ðonne oðer healf gear.
 250. Gyf man oðerne slea and hine gewundige, fæste XL nihta.
 251. Gyf hit preost sy, fæste C daga.
 253. Gif man ofslea mannan on folcgefeohte oððe for nyde,
þær he his hlafordes ceap werige, fæste XL nihta.
 254. Man gyf he oðerne ofslea nalæs on morð, fæste XII
monað.
 255. Gyf man ofslea fæder oððe modor oððe sweostor
oððe broðor oððe his sunu, þæt is bisceopes dom, sume willað
þæt he hreowsige on elelande X winter.
 257. Se man byð myrðra se ðe his broðor feoð, swa
Johannes se Euuangelista cwæð, <foreign>Qui odit fratrem suum, homicida est</foreign>.
 260. <foreign>De iuramento.</foreign> Se ðe manað swerige in cyrican oððe in
euuangelio oððe in Haligra reliquium, fæste VII winter.
 262. Se ðe manað swerige on bisceopes handa oððe
mæssepreostes oððe diacones, oððe in gehalgedum Cristes mæle,
fæste an winter.
 264. Se ðe bið on aþe gelæded and he ne wite þæron
butan riht, and he swa þeah mid oþrum manswerige and swa bið beswicen,
and eft wat þæt hit leas wæs, fæste III æfesteno.
 267. Se ðe his þances manað swerige, and he wite þæt he
mæne bið, æfter ðon fæste II winter oððe þreo.
 269. Se ðe swerað on læwedes mannes handum að, nis
þæt for hweðre mid Grecum.
 271. <foreign>De operibus dominici diei et de eucharistiae
administratione.</foreign> ða þe on Sunnandæge wyrceað, Grecas ða men
ærest wordum þreatigeað, gif hy eft doð, þonne nimð him mon
heora ceapas hwæthwugu on, ðriddan siðe hie swingað oððe hatað
fæsten VII niht.
 275. Grecas æghwylce Sunnandæge willað to husle gan,
æghwæðer ge læwede ge preostas, and ða þe ðrym Sunnandagum ne
gað to husle, þa beoð amansumode æfter canones dome.
 277. Swa gað Romane to husle, butan hie ne amansiað þa ðe
swa ne magon.
 278. Mid Grecum diaconas ne motan brecan gehalgodne hlaf ne
collectionem/ rædan ne <foreign>Dominus uobiscum</foreign> cweþan.
 280. In gehwylcum anum weofode þu most on dæge gesingan twa
mæssan, and se ðe þær æt foreweardre mæssan ne bið, ne mot
he æt þam cosse cuman for husle.
 282. Se ðe nele to husle gan, ne he eft to mæssepreostes handa
to hlafe ne to husle ne ga ne to cosse.
 284. Ne mot man to mæssepreostes handa to husle gan se ðe þa
halgunga oððe þa lectionem ne mæg æfter ðeawe gefyllan.
 286. <foreign>De missarum celebratione.</foreign> For forðferedne munuc man mot
sona singan mæssan þy ðriddan dæge and syððan swa se abbod wile.
 288. For godne læwedne mannan man mot singan mæssan ðy
þriddan dæge oððe ymb VII niht, for hreowsiendne mannan man mot
mæssigean ymb XXX nihta oððe ymb VII niht, gif him fæstað his magas
and his frynd fore and doð for his sawle hwæthwuga to Godes weofode.
 292. Mid Romanum is ðeaw þæt asprungenra manna lic and
æfestra manna man byreð in cyrican, and mid crisman smyreþ his breost,
and singeð mæssan ofer, and ðonne byreð to byrgenne mid sange, þonne
hit bið in þa byrgenne seted, þonne man wyrpeð moldan on hine.
 296. Þonne ðy ærestan dæge and ðy þriddan and ði
nigoðan and þrittigoðan dæge for hine man singeð mæssan,
syððan ælc se ðe wile.
 297. Wif motan under brunum hrægle to husle gan, swa swa
Basilius demde.
 300. Mid Grecum wifmen motan onsægdnesse asecgan, ne motan swa
Romane.
 301. Ðreo æfesteno syndon on geare, an ofer eall folc, swa
þæt XL nihta foran to Eastran, þonne we ðone teoðan sceat þæs
geares lysað, and þæt XL nihta ær Geolum, þonne gebiddeð hine
eall þæt werod fore and orationes rædeð, and þæt feowertig nihta
ofer Pentecosten.
 306. <foreign>Ante Natalem Domini missarum celebratio.</foreign> On ðæm
ærran dæge æt Geolum æt none, siððan mæsse byð gesungen,
heo gereordiað Romane, Grecas to æfenne, þonne æfen bið gesungen
and mæsse, þonne foð hi to mete.
 309. Swa hwylc swa wile æt mæssetidum lectiones rædun
oððe responsoria singan, ne bið he nyded to ðon þæt he him of do
his oferhacelan oððe heden, ac gyf he euuangelium ræde, wyrpe him of
heden oððe cæppan on his gescyldro.
 313. Preost þonne he mæssan singe, ne hæbbe he him heden ne
cæppan, ac gif he euuangelium ræde, lecge him on þa gescyldra.
 315. Mæsse læwedra manna þriwa on geare man deð, þy
ðriddan dæge and ðy nigoðan dæge and ðy þreotteogaðan,
forðan/ þe Crist aras þy ðriddan dæge and in ðære nygoðan
tide his gast onsende and XXX daga Israhele hi offrodon Moysen.
 319. Muneca mæssan man mot singan gehwylce Sunnandæge and
heora naman rædan, Romane ne rædað þara manna naman on Sunnandæge
æt mæssan.
 321. Dyonisius Ariopagita cwæð þæt þæt yfelsang
wære in God se ðe for yfelne mannan mæsse sunge.
 322. Ðonne cwæð Augustinus þæt hit wære for ealle
cristene men to donne, oððe hit ðam mannum to gode wære þa ðær
deade wæren, oððe hit ða biddende and onsecgende þære
onsægdnysse frefrede.
 326. Se ðe for deadne mannan fæsteð, him byð þearf
sylfum, God ana wat hwæt is ðæm deadan gegæð.
 328. <foreign>De eucharistia perdita.</foreign> Gyf man in gemeleaste husel
forleose, fæste an gear oððe þreo æfesteno.
 330. Gyf seo onsægednes on eorðan fealle for gymeleaste,
singe L sealma.
 331. Se ðe forgymeleasige gehalgod husl on ðon þæt hit to
lange licge, þæt him sy unsyfernes on oððe hit næbbe his hiw,
fæste he XL nihta.
 333. Gyf man husel aspiwe fæste XL nihta.
 334. Gyf he for untrumnesse aspiwe, fæste VII niht oððe
twegen psalteras asinge.
 335. Gif man husl wyrpe on fyr oððe on stream, þonne hit man
syleð to ðicgenne, singe he hund sealma.
 337. Gif hund þone spiweðan frete þe man æfter ðon
spiwe, fæste hund nihta.
 338. Æghwylc husel þe bið in unsyfernesse oððe in yldo,
forbærne/ hit man.
 339. Gyf mus ete husel in gymeleaste þæs mannes þe hit
healdon sceole, fæste XL nihta oððe XXX.
 341. Se ðe husles lytelne dæl in cyrican forleose fæste XX
nihta.
 342. Se þe on folce his crisman forleose and hine eft ne fynde,
fæste III æfestenu oððe eal gear.
 343. Se ðe calic ageote þonne he hæbbe mæssan gesungen,
fæste XXX nihta.
 345. Se þe ete ærðon he to husle ga and æfter ðon husl
þicge, fæste VII niht.
 347. <foreign>De cybo sanctificato et de his qui inmunda gustant.</foreign> Gyf man
forleose gehalgodne mete hwylcnehwugu dæl, oððe gehalgodne hlaf nywne,
oððe gehalgod sealt, oððe recels, oððe owiht þisses gelices,
fæste VII niht, gyf hit mare sy and haligre, fæste swyðor.
 351. Se þe merten ete swa he nyte, fæste XL nihta oððe
XXX.
 352. Se ðe nyde genumenne mete þicge and he ne wite, gyf he hal
sy and strang and he ne wite, fæste XL nihta.
 354. Gyf he hit gelome do, fæste þreo æfestenu oððe
eal gear.
 354. Se ðe ete his lichaman hreofel oððe wyrmas, oððe
micgan drince oðþe his scearn, gyf hit cild sy oððe cniht, swinge hine
man, gyf hit geweaxan man sy, fæste an gear oððe þreo æfestenu,
and æghwæðer ga biscope under hand.
 358. Se ðe owiht ðicge þæs þe hund oððe mus ete
oððe wesle widlige, and he hit wite, singe hund sealma, gyf he hit nyte,
singe L sealma.
 360. Se ðe oþrum sylle þone wætan þe bið on deadmus
oððe wesle adruncen, gyf hit folces man sy, fæste VII niht, gyf hit
mynsterman sy, singe CCC sealma, se ðe hit ær ne wiste and eft wite, singe
saltere.
 363. Gyf man owiht blodiges ðicge in healfsodenum mete, gyf he
hit ne wite, fæste III dagas oððe saltere singe, gif he hit wite,
fæste VII dagas.
 365. Se ðe his sylfes blod in spatle mid ungewisse forswelge, nis
þæt nænig fyren.
 366. Grecas myrten flæsc nænegum men ne lyfað, þa hyda
þara myrtenra neata hi heom doð to scon, and ða wulle and ða hornas
doð heom to nytnysse, þeah hi hit in halig weorc don ne willan.
 370. <foreign>De porcis.</foreign> Gif swyn eteð myrten flæsc and mannes blod
byrigeð, we gelyfað þæt hi swa þeah ne syn to worpenne, þeah hi
mon þonne gyt etan ne mote, oððæt hi eft clæne syn.
 373. Gyf henfugel mannes blod drince, eft his man mot brucan ymbe
þreo monað, be þysum swa þeah we nabbað ealde gewitnesse.
 375. Fram wulfum and fram hundum ne synd þa to etanne þy læs
ða cwican neat þe slitcwelm begite, butan þa ane þe hie þa slitnesse
gedigean mægen, ac selle heo man hundum and swynum.
 379. <foreign>De piscibus.</foreign> Fixas man mot ðicgan þeah ðe hy deade syn
gemette, forðon þe hi synt oðre gecynde.
 381. Nis horses flæsc forboden þeah ðe hi fela mægða
þicgean nelle.
 382. Fugelas and oðre nytenu þa ðe on nette beoð awyrgede,
ne synt hi to etanne, ne ðeah heafucfugel abite, gyf he byð dead gemeted,
ne byð he syððan to etanne, forðan swa is in <foreign>Actibus Apostolorum</foreign>
beboden, <foreign>Abstinete uos a fornicatione et a suffocato sanguine et idolatria</foreign>.
 386. Haran man mot etan, and he bið god wið lenctenadle and
wið utsiht, and his geallan man mæg wið peopor mencgean wið
muðsare/.
 388. <foreign>De apibus.</foreign> Beon gyf hi mannan acwellað, cwelle hy man
hraðe and ete man þæt hunig þæt hy wrohton.
 391. Gif lytel fearh afealle and cwicu sy of atogen sprenge man
þæne wætan mid haligwætere and berece mid recelse gyf hit dead sy
and ðone wætan man ne mæge syllan, geote man ut.
 395. Gyf man mid unclæne hand hwæs mete onhrine oððe him
hund oððe cat oððe mus æthrine oððe oðer unclæne neat
hwylc, Theodorus cwæð þæt him þæt nawuht ne eglade.
 397. Gyf on mycelne wætan hwylc mus oððe wesle afealle and
ðær dead sy, sprencge man mid haligwætere and ðicge.
 399. Se man se ðe unclæne neat þigeð for his þearfum, ne
eglað þæt nawiht.
 400. Gyf man mycele þyfðe forstele, feoðerfote neat, hors
oððe hryðer, oððe hus brece, fæste an gear and forgylde þæt
he forstolen hæbbe, oððe II gear fæste.
 403. Gif maran stale forstele, fæste III winter oððe swa
him his scrift deme.
 404. Gyf hit preost sy and swylce stale forstele fæste V winter
oððe swa him bisceop deme.
 406. Untrumum men byð alyfed þæt he on ælce tid mot mete
þicgan þonne hine lysteð.
 407. Gyf hwa gebiscopie hine tuwa and he hit wite, fæste VI
winter, gyf he hit nyte, fæste III winter.
 409. Gif man wylle his dægfæsten alysan mid ælmessan,
gesylle twam mannum oððe þrym dægswæsendo, oððe saltere asinge
gif hit sumor sy, gyf hit hærfest sy oððe lecten, singe C sealma, gyf
hit winter sy, L.
 412. Gyf ðu wille alysan geares fæsten, gefrige man oððe
sylle XXX scyllinga oððe XXX saltera sealma asinge.
 413. Gyf hwylc geong man hæmedþinc gehwyrce butan rihtum
gesinscype, bete an gear.
 415. Gyf he hit æne and unforsceawodlice gedyde, sy seo bot
leohtre, and swa þeah bete þæt fulle gear.
 416. And gyf hi syn þære geoguðe binnan twentigum gearum
þæt hi ðus agyltan, beten III lenctenfæstenu and Wodnesdæge and
Frigedæge eall þæt gear.
 419. And gif hi ðonne for ðysum gylte genyrwode wurþað,
betan XL daga, and gyf heo hit þonne beginnan and ne gefremmon, beton XX
daga.
 421. Gyf hwylc wydewe hy forlicge, bete an gear and rihtymbrendagas
þæs geares.
 422. And gif heo þonne bearn hæbbe, bete twa gear fulle and
oðre twa leohtor.
 423. Gyf hwylc æmtig man gewemme oðres wif, bete II gear.
 424. And gyf hwylc man þonne sy þe on rihtan gesinscype libbe,
æmtigne man gewemme, bete twa gear and forhæbbe fram his agenum, gyf heo
þonne geðafode, gyf heo hit þonne neadunga dyde, sy seo dædbot þe
mare.

END_TEXT

 1. Scylt te wið ða eahta heahsynna þe se deofun þe wile mid
beswican, þæt is morðor & stala & mæneaþas &
unrihtgytsung & unrihthæmed & gyfernysse & tælnysse &
lease gewitnysse.
 4. & beorh ðe georne wið lyblacas & attorcræftas
& dyrnegeliru & twyspræcnysse & ofermodignysse &
hatheortnysse & drunccennysse & gyrnysse oðra manna æhta &
idelne gylp & unsybbe & leasunge & untidætas, æfest &
nið.
 8. Healh þe geornne wið ealle þas þæt næfre þæt
deoful þe beswican ne mæge mid þisum leahtrum.
 10. & healh xii ymrendagas þe on xii monþum beoð.
 10. & beorh þe geornne wið þas halgan tid & wið
þa ymdrendagas & wið.

Conf 1.4 (Logeman)
B11.1.4.
Confessionale pseudo-Egberti (London, British Library, MS. Cotton Tiberius A.III): Logeman 1889b, 515-18.



 1. <foreign>Confessio.</foreign> Ic andette þe.
 1. <foreign>Indulgentia.</foreign> Se ælmihtiga god þe gescop heofenas and
eorðan & ealle gescefta, gemildsa me.
 2. & do þe forgifnysse ealra þinra synna þe þu æfre
geworhtest fram eallum yfelum & gehealde þe æfre god on eallum godum
weorcum.
 6. & læde þe crist þæs lifigendan godes sunu to þam
ecan life into heofenan rices myrhðe þe crist sylf behaten hæfð eallum
þam mannum þe hine lufiað & his beboda healdað.
 8. & se leofa drihten nele þæt ænig mann forweorða ac
he wile þæt ealle beon hale & clæne & tosoðfæstnysse &
to bote gecyrran eal swa drihten mid his þam halgan.
 11. & þam clænan muð cwide gecwæð, on swahwilcum
dæge swa se synfulla man bið gecyrred to criste he leofað & ne
swelt.
 13. Ic wille biddan minne leofan drihtne þe nu is & a wæs
& afre bið butan synnum & þurh his þrowunga & þurh is
halgan rode & þurh his halgan blodes agotenesse þæt he þe
forgyfennesse do ealra þinra senna þe þu on eallum þinum life
gefremeð hæfst oð þis.
 18. & ic bidde god ælmihtigne þæt he ne gelte æfter
þinum wacrange earnungum ac æfter þinum warcan ac efter his micelan
mildheortnysse deme þe drihten & wecce on þe dætbote tearas þinra
synna for his halgan naman.
 21. Drihten sylle þe gemynd his beboda & gefultumige þe
& trymme his lare on þe & a dilige ealle þine misdæda fram his
gesyhðe.
 24. & drihten gestaþol festige þe on his leofan willan to
eallum godum weorcum & gescelde þe god ælmihtig wið ealle þa
þe/ yfeles unnon butan hi wið god & wið þe to bote gecyrran.
 28. & drihten gescilde þe wið ealle deofles costnunga &
wið þæne wiðer wearðan engel satan þæne derigendan &
þæne lærendan ælces yfeles.
 30. Ærest þu scealt god lufian of ealre heortan & of
eallum mode & of eallum mægene & þine nihstan swa swa þe
sylfne.
 32. & ælcne cristene man þu scealt arwurþian be is
geearnunge.
 33. Ne scealt þu beodan nanan oðran men þæt þu nelle
þæt man þe beoda þu scealt georne æfre fram yfele bugan & to
gode don eall þæt þu mage & folgian cristes lare swiðe georne
& þines scriftes & þin fæsten began mid eallre geornfulnesse.
 37. Earme men þu scealt hyrtan hungrige fedan & nacode
scredan untrume geneosian & deade þu scealt hatan bybyrgian.
 39. Geswænctum þu scealt helpan & sarigende geffremian
& nan þing ne læt þu þe leofre þænne godes willan.
 41. & his lufe yrre ne scealt þu to lange on þinre heortan
gewunian lease sibbe ne scealt þu mannan syllan.
 43. Soðe lufe wið god & wið menn þu scealt æfre
healdan.
 44. Swerian ne scealt þu on idæl.
 44. Soðfæstnesse of heortan & of muðe þu scealt
æfre forð bringan.
 46. Ne scealt þu yfel mid yfele gyldan gif man betan wile &
eft geswican ne nanan menn butan gelte nan yfel ne don ac þonne þe manyfel
do oþþe cweþe þu scealt geþyldelice hit forberan oð hit god bete
ehtnesse for rihte þu scealt eadmodlice geþolian.
 50. Ne scealt þu næfre beon ofermod ne to slapol ne to slaw ne
to tælende ac ealne þinne to hopan & þinne hiht þu scealt habban
on god sylfne þonne þu hwylce gode dæde do.
 53. Þonne scealt þu þæt eal tællan to gode &
þonne þu hwæt yfeles dest þonne scealt þu witan þæt þæt
cymð of þe sylfan.
 55. Domes dæg þu scealt simle geþencan & helle witu þu
þe scelt a ondrædan & þæs ecean lifes þu scealt mid ealre
geornfulnesse gyrnan & ælce dæge þu þe scealt deaðes wenan.
 57. Þinra weorca þu scealt gyman on ælce dide þe þa gode
syn & gode gecweme.
 59. & þu scealt geþæncean þæt þu nawer gode digle
ne bist.
 60. Ac he þe æghwær gesihð þa efelan geþanc þe þe
on mod becumað þu scealt sone on criste toslean & þinan gastlican
scrifte geandettan þonne þu hi to slihst on criste.
 63. Þonne þu geþæncst cristes þrowunga & his wundra
& mid þam geþange þu aflæmst þa yfelan.
 64. Þine muð þu scealt fram ælcan idelum worde gehealdan.
 65. Ne scealt þu idelne hleahtor lufian.
 66. Halige lare þu scealt lustlice geheran & gelome on
þinum gebedum beon.
 67. Ealle þine forðgewitenan yfelu þu scealt dæghwamlice
mid tearum gode andettan & hi georne betan.
 68. Ne beo þu na georne ne gewilnigende þæt þine deda
halige gesæde beon ær hi halige gewurðan.
 70. Ac smea georne þurh godes fultum þæt hit midsoðe
gesæd beon mage þu scealt godes bebodu dæghwamlice mid godum gefyllan.
 72. Ne scealt þu nænne mann unscyldig hatian ne scealt þu
andan & nið healdan þu scealt upahyfeðnysse for leon & þinne
hlaford æfre arwurþian swæþe georne & þine under þeoddan eac
lufian be heora geearnunge for godes lufan.
 76. Þu scealt for þine fynd gebiddan þænne gestrangað
þe god ongean hi & ofer ealle oþre þinge sy þu næfre swa synful
þæt þu æfre geortrywe on godes mildheortnysse for þam þe he
meg don eal þæt þæt his leofa willa is leof gefell.
 80. & geheald þis litle bebod þe ic þe nu gesæd
hæbbe swa ford swa þu fyrmest mahe.
 81. & seo med þe bið fram drihtne agolden þe he sylf
behet, þæt is þæt mænnisce eage for hora micelnysse geseon me
mihte ne mannes eare geheran ne on mannes heortan ne astah þe god ælmihtig
gegearwað eallum þam þe hine lufiað & his bebodu healdað.
 86. Se mildheorta hælend þe micel forbær & deað
þrowade for hus synfullan & us swa dyrancepe gebohte mid his þam halgan
dyrwurðan blode, sylle þe forgyfeness eallra þinra synna þe þu
æfre siþ oþþe ær geþohtest oþþe geworhtest for his miclan
& mæran mildheortnesse & efter þisan lænan life mid him wununge
on þære ecean worulde on godes blisse & on his myrhðe þe næfre
to nanum ende nycemð.
 92. Gelyf æfre georne on god ælmihtigne & on þane sunu
& on þone halgan gast & gelyf eac þæt ealle menn sculan arisan
on domes dæg of deaðe & bet & behreowsia æfre swiðe georne.
 95. Ealles þæs þe þu to yfele hæfst geþoht &
gecwædon & geworht god hit þe forgyfe.
 97. & ic mote foh nu on þin fæsten mid godes geleue &
mid minre & began hit mid ealre georfulnesse & clænnesse & mid
geswicenysse þinra gylta.
 99. & fæst ælce dæge to nones & to anes mæles
& forgang hwit.
 100. & be beorh þe wið þa eahta heahsynna þe þu þa
ne fremige þæt is gitsunge & gifernes Galnes & weamodnes &
unrotnes & asolcennes Gilpgeornes.
 103. & ofermodines seo is heofod & wyrtruma ealra leahtra.
 104. Nis þeah nan man lybbend on þisan life þe butan suman
þyssa leahtra beon mage.
 105. Ac hit is micel þearf þæt se þe aslide & on senne
befeale þæt he eft raðe arise & georne bete þæt he ær to
bræc swa his scrift him tæce & æfre ma æft swylces geswice for
þam hit his gecyndlic þæt se earma man syngie.
 109. Ac hit his swyðe deoflic & egeslic þæt he on synnum
þurwunie forð oð his ende & lufa þinne drihten mid eallum mode
& mid eallum mægne & eallum mihtum & ealre inwerdre heortan
fæstlice & beo earmum mannum milde & man þære & ælmes
georn to godes ciric geornn & teoþung georn to godes cyrecan & earmum
mannum þonne bið god þe milde & bliðe & þu mid him most
þonne libban & rixian in ealra worulda woruld abutan ælcum ende,
amen.

END_TEXT
