Conf 2.1 (Spindler A-Y)
B11.2.1.
Additional Sections Printed by Spindler, Sections a-y: Spindler 1934, 170-74.



 1. Her is scrift and andetnes ægðer twegra ge gehadodra ge
læwedra, þæra þe þæs andgit habbað and ðæs Ledenes
deopnesse ne cunnon.
 4. Þonne man to his scrifte gange, þonne sceall he mid swyðe
mycelum Godes ege and eadmodnesse beforan him hine aþenian and hine biddan
wependre stefne þæt he him dædbote tæce ealra þæra gylta þe
he ongean Godes willan gedon hæbbe.
 7. And he sceal him andettan his misdæda, þæt se sacerd
wite hwylce dædbote he him tæcan scyle.
 9. Ðonne sceal se sacerd hine axian hwylcne geleafan he to Gode
hæbbe, and hine mænigfealdlice to his sawle þearfe tihtan and mynegian
and ðus cweþan, Gelyfst ðu on God ælmihtigne and on þæne Sunu and
on ðone Halgan Gast?
 12. <foreign>Respondeat.</foreign> Gelyfst ðu þæt ealle men arisan sculon on
domes dæg of deaþe?
 13. <foreign>Respondeat.</foreign> Ofðinceð þe ealles þæs þe ðu to
yfele geworht hæfst and geþoht and gecweden?
 15. <foreign>Respondeat.</foreign> Wilt ðu forgyfon ælcon þæra þe wið
þe æfre agyltan?
 16. Gyf he cweð, Ic wille, cweð him þonne to, God ælmihtig
gemildsige þin and me geunne þæt ic mote.
 17. Fæst ælce dæge on ðis lenctene to nones and forgang
hwit and bebeorh þe wið þa ehta heahsynna, þæt ðu þa ne fremme,
þæt synd morðor and stala and mæne aþas and unrihtgytsung and
unrihthæmedu/ and gyfernysse and tælnysse and lease gewitnysse, and heald
þa twelf Ymbrendagas, þe on twelf monðum beoð, and bebeorh ðe wið
liblacas and attorcræftas and dyrnegeligeru and twispræcnysse and
ofermodignysse and gyrnesse oðra manna æhta and ealle þas uncræftas
þu georne forbuh.
 25. And lufa þinne Drihten mid eallum mode and mid eallum
mægene and eallum mihtum and ealre inneweardre heortan fæstlice and beo
earmum mannum milde and manþwære and ælmesgeorn and cyricgeorn and
teoðunggeorn to Godes cyrican and earmum mannum.
 29. Þonne byð þe God hold and milde and bliðe and ðu most
mid him þonne rixian in ealra worulda woruld a butan ende gif ðu þus
dest.
 30. And ic bidde þe þæt ðu asecge me eall þæt ðu
to yfele æfre geworhtest forðon betere þe is þæt ðe sceamige nu
her beforan me anum yrmincge þonne eft on domes dæge beforan Gode,
þær hefenwaru and helwaru and eorðwaru beoð ealle ætsomne þær
eall open byð þæt we her on worulde doð oððe geþencað, beo hit
god beo hit yfel, ælcon men þær gedemed byð be his agenum
gehwyrhtum.
 36. Þær us þonne generige Wealdene ealra.
 36. Ðæt gedafenað ælcum sacerde þonne he mannum
fæsten scrifeð, þæt he wite hwylc se man sig, trum þe untrum, welig
þe þearfa, hu geong he sig oþþe hu eald, hwæðer he sig gehadod
þe læwede, and hwylce hreowe he hæbbe, and hwæþer he sig
hægsteald þe hæmedceorl.
 40. On eallum mannum behofað gesceadwisnysse, þeah þe hi
gelice fyrene fremmen.
 41. Ricum mannum man sceal strangor deman þonne þam heanum
æfter canones dome.
 42. Be þeodores gesetnysse hu man sceall fæsten alysan.
 43. Ðeodorus, se halga and se goda biscop, gesette þas
rædinge to bysne and to lare ælcum þæra þe his gyltas wið God
betan wyle and ðus cwæð, We ræddon on ðam Penitentiale þæt man
sceolde don dædbote for heafodlicum gyltum gear oððe twa oððe þreo
on hlafe and on wætere, and be ðam læssan gyltum wucan oððe monað
eall be gelican.
 48. Ac þis is mid sumum mannum swyðe gendyne þing and
earfoðlic, forði we willað tæcan mid hwilcum ðingum hit alysan mot
se ðe þis fæsten gehealdan ne mæg, þæt is þæt he sceal mid
sealmsange and mid ælmesdædum don dædbote swiðe langne fyrst.
 52. And se ðe eall gefyllan mæg þæt on ðære bec
gecweden is, þæt bið swyðe god and hit bið riht endebyrdnys.
 53. And se ðe ne mæge, gesinge he fiftig sealma and gecneowige
æt ælcon heora, gyf he þonne cneowige ne mæge, singe he
hundseofontig sealma be endebyrdnysse on cyrican oððe on oðre digelre
stowe.
 56. And se ðe sceall ane wucan dædbote don on hlafe and on
wætere, singe he ðreo hund sealma cneowiende oððe feower hund and XX
butan cneowunge, eallswa hit bufan gecweden is.
 59. And se ðe scule monðes fyrst dædbote don on hlafe and on
wætere, singe ðusend sealma and twa hund mid cneowunga, butan cneowunge
þusend and six hund ehtatig sealma.
 61. And syððan ælce dæge gereordige him to middæges,
butan Wodnesdæge and Frigedæge, þonne he sceall fæstan to nones, and
forgange flæsc and win, þæt is ælces cynnes drync ðe man mæge
foredruncen beon, and bruce him oðra metta, swylcera swylce him God sylle,
æfter ðam þe he gesungen hæbbe.
 66. And se ðe sealmas ne cunne ne fæsten ne mæge, dæle
he æghwylce dæge ænne pening oððe þæs weorð þearfendum
mannum.
 68. And on ælcere wucan fæste he ænne dæg to nones,
oðerne to æfenes, and bruce ðæs þe he hæbbe, ealswa hit bufan
gecweden is.
 69. And se ðe scule an gear ðyllice dædbote don, þonne
gedæle he six and XX scillinga on ælmessan, and on æghwylcere wucan
fæste twegen dagas, eallswa hit bufan gecweden is, and asmeage on ðam
þreom lenctenum hwæt his bigleofen sy, and dæle þæt healf on
ælmessan.
 74. On ðam oðrum geare man mot lihtan his dædbote fram
Drihtnes Gebyrdtide oð Twelftan Dæg and fram Eastrum oð Pentecosten.
 76. And se man þe ne mæge dædbote don hys synna swa hit
bufan gecweden is, gedæle he on þam forman geare six and XX scillinga on
ælmessan, and on þam oðrum XX, and on ðam þriddan ehtatyne, þæt
synd feower and sixtig scillinga.
 80. And wite se rica man, þe him God hæfð mycelne welan and
æhta þisses lifes to forlæten, hu he scule his heafodlican gyltas
betan, Genime him þæt godspell and ræde þæron, hu Zacheus wið
Drihten spræc þa he hine to gereorde on his hus onfeng, þa clypode he to
him and ðus cwæð, Drihten ealra minra goda ic sylle healfne dæl
ðearfum, and gif ic þurh unrihtfacen ænigum men ætbræd, þæt
ic forgylde feowerfealdlice.
 86. And ða geearnode he fram Drihtne to gehyrenne, Todæg is
þissere hiwrædenne hæl geworden, þæt is ealra synna forgyfennys.
 88. And toeacan þyssum godum weorcum þe we herbufan gecweden
habbað, freoge he men and alyse þa ðe on hæftnyde synd.
 90. And of ðam dæge þe he his unrihtweorc forlæte, ne
geedlæce hi na, ðe læs þe he sy geanlicod þam hunde þe fret
þæt he ær aspaw.
 92. And þæt nis na to forlætenne þæt se Apostol
cwæð, Se þe ðurh his lichaman gesyngige, he eac þurh his lichaman
bete, þæt is on fæstene and on wæccan and on gebedum and on
halsungum to Gode mid heortan onbryrdnysse and mid teara agotenesse.
 96. <foreign>Judicium de peccatis multis.</foreign> Seo æreste forlætnes is
fyrena fulwiht.
 97. Seo æftere is Godes lufu.
 98. Seo ðridde is ælmessan wæstm.
 98. Seo feorðe is agotennes teara on godre reowe.
 99. Seo fifte is andetnes fyrena.
 99. Seo sixte is geswencednes heortan and lichaman in gewinnum and
fæstenum.
 101. Seo seofoðe is þæt man his ðeawas bete for Gode.
 101. Seo eahtoðe is haligra gebedu for ðone fyrenfullan.
 102. Seo nigoðe is mildheortnys and god geleafa.
 103. Seo teoðe is þæt man oðerne hwyrfe fram fyrenum to
Godes willan.
 104. Seo endlyfte is godforgifnes, þæt ðurh þæt God his
fyrena him forgife.
 105. Seo twelfte is martirhad, swa ðam sceaðan wearð æt
Cristes ðrowunga.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Conf 2.2 (Spindler Z)
B11.2.2.
Additional Sections Printed by Spindler, Section z: Spindler 1934, 174-5.



 1. On halgum gewritum is geræd þæt se ælmihtiga God
þurh XII þing syleð mannum forgifenesse heora synna.
 2. Seo æreste synna forgifenes is þurh fulluhtes bæð.
 3. Seo æftere forgyfenes is þurh Godes lufan and manna,
þæt gehwa lufige God of ealre his heortan meagolnesse and þonne his
nehstan, þæt is ælc cristenman swa hine sylfne.
 6. Seo þridde forgyfenes is þurh ælmessylene, forþam hit
is awriten þæt, eallswa ma mid wætere fyr adwæsceð, swa adiligað
seo ælmesse þæs mannes synna.
 8. Seo feorðe forgyfenes is þurh sealmsang and teara
agotenesse, þæt gehwa for his synnum hreowsige and weope, swa gehwa deð
for his freondes forðsiðe.
 10. Seo fifte forgyfenes is þurh andetnesse, þæt gehwa his
synna andette mid inweardlicre heortan his scrifte and him his digolnessa
onwreo and syððan bete swa he him tæce.
 13. Seo sixte forgyfenes is þæt gehwa for Godes lufan and for
his sawle þearfe winne wið his lichaman unrihtlustas and hine sylfne swa
gewylde mid fæstene and mid oðrum mægne, þæt se innera man,
þæt is seo sawl, beo for Gode gehealden.
 16. Seo seofeðe forgyfenes is þæt gehwa his æhta and his
bearn and his eard for Godes lufan forlæte and on elþeodinesse fare and
þær his lif geendige.
 18. Seo eahtoðe forgifenes is þæt se man of þisse life
fare to wite, and his freond þonne þe on þisse life beoð hine magon
alysan and him forgifenesse æt Gode geearnian mid godcundum þeowdome and
mid heora woruldæhton.
 22. Seo nigoðe forgifenes is mildheortnes and god geleafa.
 23. Seo teoðe forgifenes is þæt man oðerne gehwyrfe fram
his synnum to Godes willan.
 24. Seo endlyfte forgifenes is þæt gehwa for Godes lufan
forgife þæs mannes gyltas þe wið hine agylt, forþam se Hælend
cwæð on his godspelle, Forgifað and eow bið forgifen.
 27. Seo twelfte forgifenes is martirhad, swa þam sceaðan
wearð æt Drihtnes þrowunge, þa se hælend cwæð to him, Soð
is þæt ic secge, Nu todæg þu bist mid me on mines fæder rice.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Conf 3.1.1 (Raith Y)
B11.3.1.1.
Poenitentiale pseudo-Egberti (Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Laud Misc 482, fols. 1-19): Raith 1933, 1-69.



 1.1. Þis is ærest se forma capitul, hu hit gebyreð to
foresceawienne be þære synne mæðe.
 1.1. Hit gebyrað, þæt se sacerd smeage synfulra manna bote
be bisceopes dome.
 1.1. & ne wandige he na ne for ricum ne for heanum, þæt he
him riht tæce swa him seo boc tæcð.
 1.1. Forþam se hælend cwæð, gif se sacerd nolde þam
synfullan his synna bote tæcan, þæt he eft þa sawle æt him secean
wolde.
 1.2. Be þam men þe on his ytemestan dæge his synna gecyrran
wyle to dædbote, þæt him man þæs ne wyrne.
 1.2. Sanctus Isodorus cwæð, þæt wen wære, þæt
þæs mannes soðe andetnes & gecyrrednes gode andfenge wære on his
ytemestan dæge.
 1.2. Forþam se hælend cwæð, on swa hwylcum dæge swa se
man gecyrð to gode, life he leofað & na ne swelteð.
 1.2. Þi nis na to onscunienne seo soðe gecyrrednes on swa
hwylcum timan swa hit sy.
 1.2. Forþam god besceawað ælces mannes ingeðang & wat
ealra manna heortena digelnessa.
 1.3. Be þam men þe gyrnð dædbote & wegnyste, þæt
is cristes lichama, for deaðes ege, & be þam þe him his spræc
ofnimð ær him his scrift to cume.
 1.3. Þises is þearf, þæt se sacerd swa geradne man
frefrige & his andetnesse gehyre & him huruþinga husles ne wyrne.
 1.3. & þeah he beo mid þære untrumnesse swa gehefegod
þæt he sprecan ne mæge swa he ær mihte, þonne gif he gewitnesse
hæfð þæra manna þe him mid beoð, þæt he scriftes gyrnde
& husles, þonne do se sacerd him forgifenesse & his gerihto.
 1.4. Be þam men þe smeað ymbe his synna andetnesse.
 1.4. Gif ænig man wilnað dædbote to underfonne for his
synnum, þonne tweonað him eft for þæra synna manigfealdnesse &
bið orwene, þæt he ne mæge þa bote aberan þe his scrift him
tæcð, & forlæt hit, þonne bið him seo orwennis to maran synne
geteald þonne þa synna þe he geðohte to andettenne & þæt þa
forlet.
 1.4. Ac se ðe wylle mid andbryrdnesse his synna andettan, onfo se
sacerd hine & him þa bote tæce þe þærto gebyreð, þæt seo
gewundode sawl þe mid synnum bið gebunden & gewundod mote becuman to
þam soðan læcedome, þæt is godes forgifnes.
 1.5. Be þam þe se man hine forhabban sceal on manegum þingum
his lifes lusta, gif he wyle his synna bote habban.
 1.5. An is þæt se rihtwisa man hreowsige hine sylfne swylce he
wið god forworht sy, & oðer is þæt he forhicge þa þing þe
his lichaman leofeste syn for lufan þæs ecean lifes.
 1.5. Forþam Paulus se apostol cwæð, Ealle þing me synt
alyfede, ac hi ne fremiað me ealle, þæt is, woruldlic wilnung þæt
hit nan þæra manna ne fremeð þe hit fullice begæð.
 1.5. Forþam is ælcum men mycel þearf, þæt he his synna
ne forhogige to andettenne oððe to betenne.
 1.5. Forþam ælcum men is betere, þæt he his synna her
bete þonne he on þam ecum tintregum þurhwunian scyle.
 1.6. Be þam þe þam dædbetan nis alyfed nænie cypinge to
drifanne.
 1.6. Sanctus Isodorus þe þas boc sette sprecð ymbe þa men
þe dædbote underfoð for hefelicum gyltum & hwilum eard forboden
bið & segð, þæt him na alyfed ne bið, þæt he on ceapstowe
ænige cypinge bega ne hine sylfne ne abysige ymbe nane worldlice bysgunge,
ær þam þe he gefylled hæbbe þæt him his scrift tæhte.
 1.7. Be þam ðe se dædbeta æfter his dædbote hreownesse
ne sceal gecyrran to þisse worulde gefeohte.
 1.7. Halige gewritu cweðað þæt hit ungedafenlic sy
þæt se dædbeta, æfter þam þe he gebet hæfð swa him his
scrift tæhte, þæt he hine na on þa wisan þissa worldlicra þinga
ne underþeode, þæt he æfre ne beþence ymbe þa hreowsunge þe he
ær hreowsade.
 1.7. Forþam sanctus Paulus cwæð, þæt se godes þeow
þe gode sceal þeowian ne sceal hine na abysgian worldlicra bysgunga.
 1.8. Be ðam þe se dædbeta ne healt þæt his scrift him
tæcð.
 1.8. Se halga apostol cwyð sanctus Petrus, þæt se man þe
gecyrð æfter his synna bote to þisse worlde idelnesse ealswa þam hunde
bið þe spiwð & eft fret.
 1.8. Þis synt þa idelnessa þisse worlda, ærost is
ofermetta & nið & æfesta & hatheortnes & stala &
druncennes & galscipe & dyrne geligro & lyblac & gytsung &
reaflac & scincræft & manslihtas & feala oðra þissa
gelican.
 1.8. Soðlice se man se ðe þas þing begæð, ne bið he
na wyrðe ænigre gemænnesse mid æwfæstum mannum.
 1.8. & þeah he to cyrcan gange mid oðrum mannum, ne
gedyrstlæce he hine þæt he hine to godes weofode gehnige oððe
cristes lichaman underfo, ær þam þe he to dædbote gecyrre &
syððan do swa him his scrift tæce & wisige.
 1.9. Be þam þe þam dædbetan mæg beon geseald þurh
biscopes þingunge forgifenes.
 1.9. Nis þam bisceope ne þam sacerde þam men to forwyrnenne
scriftes þe him þæs to gyrnð, þeah he mid þære manifealdnesse
þære synne bisgung abisgod sy.
 1.9. Forþam godes mildheortnes is swa mycel, swa nis nan
eorðlic man þæt mæge oðrum his mildheortnesse areccan.
 1.9. & eac se witega cwyð þurh þone halgan gast, gif se
synfulla man gehwyrfð fram his synnum to bote, þonne bið he hal.
 1.9. & eft he cwyð, andette þe sylf þine unrihtwisnesse,
þæt þu beo gerihtwisod, & se sealmsceop cwyð, þæt mid drihtne
sy unarimedlicu mildheortnes.
 1.9. Þy sceal se bisceop & se sacerd mildheortlice þam
synfullan deman, forþam nis nan man leahterleas.
 1.10. Be þam men þe gyrnð husles æt orwenum life & eft
of þam yfele ariseð.
 1.10. On þæra haligra apostola lare is gereht, gif se man on
his ytemestan dæge gyrneð cristes lichaman to underfonne, ne wyrne him man
na, þeah he on hreowsunge ær wære & hit fullice gebet næbbe,
forþam þæt bið his wegnyst & ælces þæra manna þe to
godes rice becymð.
 1.10. & gif he eft to þisum life gehwyrfð & þæt
gehealt þæt he gode behet & his scrifte, bruce his godes dæl &
wunige him mid þeawfæstum mannum.
 1.11. Be þam þe se mæssepreost þæne dædbetan
underfon ne mot butan bisceopes leafan, butan he þone bisceop geræcean ne
mæge.
 1.11. Þam sacerde gedafenað soðlice, þæt he geornlice
asmeage ymbe þæra manna sawle þearfe þe him æt bote seceað, hu he
hy rihtlicost getrymman mæge to godes willan & to heora sawle þearfe,
& him bote tæce a be þæs gyltes mæðe.
 1.11. & gif þa gyltas to þam hefelice beon þæt he to
bisceopes dome tæcan þurfe, tæce him þider.
 1.11. Forþam sanctus Agustinus cwæð on oðre stowe,
þæt gif hwa mid heafodlicum synnum gebunden wære, þæt man him to
bisceopes dome tæcean sceolde.
 1.11. & gif he bisceop geræcean ne mæge, þæt se
mæssepreost æt þam þingum þæne bisceop aspelian mote.
 1.12. Be þam dædbetan, on hwylcum timan him man forgifenesse
don scyle.
 1.12. Þas þeawas man healt begeondan sæ mid cristenum folce,
þæt is þæt ælc bisceop bið æt his biscopstole on þæne
wodnesdæg þe we cweðað <foreign>caput ieiunium</foreign> ær lenctene.
 1.12. Þonne ælc þæra manna þe mid heafodleahtre
besmiten bið on þære scire sceal on þæne dæg him to cuman &
his synna him andettan, & he þonne him tæcð heora synna bote
ælcum be þæs gyltes mæðe.
 1.12. & hi swa þonne be his leafe ham hwyrfað, & eft
on þæne þunres dæg ær eastron to þære ylcan stowe ealle
gesamniað, & heom se bisceop ofer singð & forgifenesse deð, &
hy swa ham hwyrfað mid þæs bisceopes bletsunge.
 1.12. Þis is þus to healdenne eallum cristenum folce, &
þeh hwæðere sceal se sacerd geornlice smeagean, mid hwylcere
anbryrdnesse & mid hwylcere fulfremednesse se dædbeta gebet hæbbe
þæt him getæht wæs, & swa him be þam forgifenesse do.
 1.13. Be þam men þe bið husel forboden & under þam
forðfærð.
 1.13. Be þisum þingum ne cunne we smeagean nan oðer þing,
butan hit sy on godes dome gelang, forþam on godes anwealde wæs, þæt
he butan husle gewat.
 1.14. Be þam men þe for mislicum gyltum to his synna bote
gecyrran wyle mid fulre anbryrdnesse.
 1.14. Se man se ðe mid manigfealdum leahtrum gebunden bið &
þa mid anbryrdum mode & for lufe þæs ecean lifes andettan wylle his
scrifte & betan swa he him tæce, we gelyfað þæt he æt gode
forgifenesse hæbbe.
 1.15. Be Iacobes ærendgewrite þæs halgan apostoles, on
þam segð hu man sceal for þæne seocan man gebiddan & hine mid ele
smyrian.
 1.15. Her tæcð sanctus Iacobus, þæt gif hwa geuntrumad
beo, þæt he gelaðige him his sacerd to & oðre godes þeowas,
þæt hi him ofer rædan & se untruma his þearfe him secge & hy
hine smyrigean on godes naman mid þam halgan ele.
 1.15. & þurh þæra geleafulra manna bene & þurh
þa smyrenesse he mæg beon gehealden, & drihten hine aræreð, &
gif he synful bið hy beoð him forgifene.
 1.15. Þy sceal ælc geleaful man, gif he mæg, þa
smyrenesse begitan & þa gerihto þe þærto gebyriað.
 1.15. Forþam hit is awriten, þæt ælc þæra manna þe
þas gerihto hæfð, þæt his sawl bið gelice clæne æfter his
forðsiðe ealswa þæt cild bið þe æfter fulwihte sona gewit.
 2.1. Be þam men þe willes man ofslyhð.
 2.1. Se læweda man þe oðerne ofslyhð butan gylte, fæste
VII ger, þa þreo on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII swa him his
scrift tæce.
 2.1. & æfter þæra VII geara bote æfre he geornlice
hreowsige his misdæda be þam dæle þe he mæge, gif he fulle
forgifenesse æt gode habban wyle, forþam him is uncuð hu andfenge gode
wæron his bota.
 2.1. Se man se ðe oðerne ofslean wyle & ne mæg his
willan þurhteon, fæste III ger, I ger on hlafe & on wætere, &
þa II swa him his scrift tæce.
 2.1. Gif læwede man neadunga man ofslyhð, fæste III ger, an
ger on hlafe & on wætere, & þa II swa him his scrift wisige.
 2.1. Gif hit bið subdiacon, fæste VI ger, gif hit beo diacon,
fæste VII ger, gif hit beo mæssepreost, fæste X ger, gif hit beo
biscop, fæste XII ger.
 2.1. Gif hwa his cild ofslyhð to deaðe ungewealdes, fæste
III ger, an on hlafe & on wætere, & þa twa swa him his scrift
tæce.
 2.1. Gif bisceop oððe mæssepreost man ofslea, þolige his
hades.
 2.2. Be þam wifmen þe hig forligeð & þonne for ege hire
bearn fordeð.
 2.2. Gif hwylc wif hire cild amyrð innan hire mid drence
oððe mid oðrum mislicum þingum, oððe formyrþreð syððan hit
forð cymð, fæste X ger, þa III on halfe & on wætere, & þa
VII swa hire scrift hire mildheortlice tæcean wylle.
 2.3. Be þam men þe his þeowan ofslyhð for þyfðe butan
his hundredes gewitnesse.
 2.3. Gif hwylc man his æht ofslehð, & he nane gewitnesse
næbbe þæt he forworht sy, butan he hine for his hatheortnesse & for
his gymeleaste ofslyhð, fæste II ger.
 2.4. Be þam gif wif ofslyhð hire wifman for andan.
 2.4. Gif hwylc wif for hwylcum lyðrum andan hire wifman
swingeð, & heo þurh þa swingele wurð dead, & heo unscyldig
bið, fæste seo hlæfdige VII ger, gif heo þonne gewitnesse hæbbe,
þæt heo scyldig sy, fæste heo III ger.
 2.5. Be þam men þe hine sylfne ofslyhð for hwylcere
gymeleaste, & be þam men þe for his gyltum bið gewitnod.
 2.5. Se man se ðe hine sylfne ofslyhð mid wæpne oððe
for hwylcum mislicum deofles onbringe, nis hit na alyfed þæt man for
swylcum men mæssan singe oððe mid ænigum sealmsange þæt lic
eorðan befæste.
 2.5. Þæne ylcan dom man sceal don þam ðe for his gylta
pinunga his lif alett.
 2.6. Be þam men þe ungedafenlice hæmð, þæt is wið
nytenum, oððe hine mid geonglingum besmiteð, oððe wæpnedman wið
oðerne.
 2.6. Se man þe hine wið nytenu besmiteð, oððe
wæpnedman wið oðerne mid ungesceadelicum þinge, gif he bið XX wintra
eald man, þæt he understandan mæg þæt he þa sceamlican þing
& þa manfullan begæð, geswice & andette & fæste XV
winter/.
 2.6. & gif se man his gemæccan hæbbe & he beo XL
wintra & swylce þing begæð, geswice & fæste þa hwile þe
his lif beo & ne gedyrstlæce þæt he drihtnes lichaman underfo ær
his endedæge.
 2.6. Geonge men & andgitlease man sceal þearle swingan ðe
swylce ðing begað.
 2.7. Be þam þe æwe brecað oððe æwebrece habbað.
 2.7. Gif se man æwe brycð, fæste VII gear ðry dagas on
wucan on hlafe & on wætere, & gif wif ofer hire rihthlaford oðerne
man hæbbe, beo heo ðæs ylcan wurðe.
 2.8. Be þam men þe his æwe forlæt, & be þam wife
þe hire wer forlæt & oðerne cyst.
 2.8. Se man þe his rihtæwe forlæt & oðer wif nimð,
he bið æwbreca, ne sylle him nan preost husl ne nan ðara gerihta þe
cristenum men gebyreð, & gif him forðsið getimað, ne lecge hine man
na mid cristenum mannum.
 2.8. & gif wif hire rihtwer forlæt & cysð oðerne,
beo heo þæs ylcan domes wyrðe þe herbufan sægð.
 2.8. & þa magas þe æt þam dihte wæron ðolien
þæne ylcan dom, butan hi ær to bote gecyrron wyllon swa hire scrift him
tæce.
 2.9. Be ðam men þe hæfð his æwe & eac cifese.
 2.9. Se man ðe rihtæwe hæfð & eac cyfese, ne sylle
him nan preost husl ne nan gerihto þe man cristenum mannum deð, butan he to
bote gecyrre.
 2.9. & gif he cyfesan hæbbe & nane rihtæwe, he ah
ðæs to donne swa him geðincð, wite he þeah þæt he beo on anre
gehealden, beo hit cyfes beo hit æwe.
 2.10. Be þam men þe hæfð his rihtæwe & geræst on
elþeodigum wifmen.
 2.10. Gif hwylc man wið oðre rihtæwe hæmð, oððe
wif wið oðres wifes rihtgemæccean, fæste VII ger, þa III on hlafe
& on wætere, & þa IIII swa him his scrift tæce.
 2.11. Be þam men þe wifað on twam geswusternum, oððe wif
nimð broðor æfter oðrum.
 2.11. Gif hwylc wif twegen gebroðro nymð hire to gemæccean,
oðerne æfter oðrum, todo man hi, & beon hi on dædbote þa hwile
ðe hi lybban swa hira scrift him tæce.
 2.11. & æt hira forðsiðe do se sacerd him þa gerihto
swa man cristenum mannum deð, gif hi þæt gehatað þæt hi leng
betan woldon gif hi leng lybban mosten.
 2.11. Gif hwa on swylcum manfullum sinscipe ðurhwunað oð his
lifes ænde, ne cunne we him nane bote tæcean, butan hit is æt godes
dome gelang.
 2.12. Be þam gif hwylc wifman beweddod beo, nis hit na alyfed
þæt hine ænig oðer man æt þam bereafige.
 2.12. Gif hwylc wif beweddod beo, nis hit na alyfed þæt hwylc
oðer man hine ðæs bereafige, gif hit hwa do, beo he amansumad.
 2.13. Be þam men þe wif oððe mæden ofernimð mid
unrihtum þingum.
 2.13. Gif hwa mid his ofercræfte wif oððe mæden neadinga
nimð to unrihthæmede hire unwilles, beo he amansumad.
 2.14. Be þam men þe þæne wifman fram his hlaforde aspanð
þe his wicnere bið, for unrihtum hæmede.
 2.14. Gif hwa mid his lotwrencum oðres mannes folgere fram him
apæce for hæmedðinge, & hire unwilles wið hi hæme, gif he
bið gehadod man, þolige his hades, gif he beo læwede, beo he amansumad.
 2.15. Be þam gif mædenman beweddod bið & hine oðer
man þæs bereafige hire unwilles.
 2.15. Gif hwylc mæden beweddod bið & under ðam bið
gehergod, oððe mid sumum intingan afyrred beo þam þe heo beweddod
wæs & hit æft gelimpe þæt hi on neawist becumen, be leafe hi
moton togædere, forðan heo wæs hire unwilles fram him.
 2.16. Be þam gif gehadod mæden to hæmedþinge
geræsð/.
 2.16. Gif hwylc wifman gehadod bið gemænes hades, & heo
syððan forhogie ðæne brydguman þe heo ær beweddod wæs,
þæt is crist, & to woruldlicre idelnesse gecyrð & hiwrædene
underfehð, & ðencð þæt heo mid hire æhton & woruldspedon
þa æbylignesse gebete þe heo gode abylhð, nis þæt naht.
 2.16. Ac ne mæg heo nan þara ðinga gedon þe gode
licwyrðe/ beo, ne hire nan preost scrifan ne mot ær heo þæne synscipe
forlæte & to criste gecyrre, & syððan hire lif libbe swa hire
scrift hire tæce.
 2.17. Be ungehadod mædene þe to unrihtum hæmede
geræsð.
 2.17. Gif hwylc mædenman on geferrædenne mid gehadedum mannum
wunað, & heo to þam ylcan hade þence & under þam þurh deofles
costunga on hæmedþing geræse, ne bið heo na wið god unscyldig,
þeah heo ungehadod wære, forþam ðe heo ær þohte þæt heo
godes bryd wurðan wolde, þonne is hire mycel nydþearf þæt heo hire
misdæda andette & bete swa hire scrift hire tæce.
 2.18. Be þam men þe on his magan gewifað.
 2.18. Gif hwylc man wifige on his nehstan magan oððe on his
gefæderan oððe on his broðor lafe oððe on his steopmoder, beo he
amansumad fram eallum cristenum mannum, & gif he to bote gecyrð swa he
þearfe ah, bete he æfre & hreowsige þa hwile þe he beo be
bisceopes dome.
 2.19. Be þam hu sanctus Gregorius sprecð be unrihtum
hæmede.
 2.19. Gif hwa mynecene þe godes bryd bið gehaten him to wife
nimð, beo he amansumad fram eallra geleaffulra manna gemænscipe, halige
bec secgeað, þæt he beo eallswa scyldig wið crist swa þæs cynges
þeowa wære, gif he wið þæs cinges gebeddan hæmde.
 2.19. Gif hit ahwænne swa gelimpð swa hit ne gewurðe,
þæt ænig man þurh deofles costnunga on befealle, todo man hi on
twa, & beo heora ægðer æfre hreowsigende & betende þa hwyle
þe hi on life beon, eall be biscopes dome.
 2.20. Be þam men þe gelomlice wifþing begæð.
 2.20. Nis na alyfed nænigum cristenum men nu, þæt he oftor
wifige þænne tuwa, forðan sanctus Paulus hit forbyt on his lare &
tæcð ælcum men hu he ymbe þæt don sceal, þæt is gif hwylces
weres forme wif bið dead, þæt he be leafe oðer niman mote, & gif
he þa oferbit, wunige he a syððan wifleas.
 2.20. Wif eallswa, gif hyre forman were forðsið gebyrige, be
leafe heo nime oðerne, gif heo þæt geceosan wyle, & gif heo
þæne oferbit, wunige heo a syððan on wudewanhade þa hwile þe hire
lif si.
 2.20. & gif ahwænne wer oððe wif þas ðing
abrecað, ne ortrywen hi na godes mildheortnesse, ac gecyrran & beten swa
hira scrift heom tæce.
 2.21. Be þam hu gesynhiwan heora þeawas healdan sceolan for
gode.
 2.21. Halige bec tæceð hwæt ælcum geleaffullum were to
donne is, þonne he his rihtæwe ærost ham bringeð, þæt is
æfter boca tæcinge þæt hy þreora daga & nihta fyrst heora
clænnesse healdan sceolon, & þonne on þone þriddan dæg heora
mæssan gestandan & hy butu husl niman, & syððan heora gesynscipe
healdan for gode & for worulde swa heora þearf sy.
 2.21. & ælcon gesynhiwen gebyreð, þæt hy heora
clænnesse healdon XL daga & nihta ær þam halgan eastron & ealle
þa easterwican & æfre sunnannihte & wodnesnihte & frigenihte.
 2.21. & ælc æwfæst wif healde hire clænnesse III
monþas ær þam byrðre, & æfter þære acennednesse healde
hire clænnesse XL daga & nihta, beo hit hyse cild beo hit mæden
cild.
 2.22. Be þam men þe gedwællice þing begæð.
 2.22. Gif hwylc man his ælmessan gehate oððe bringe to
hwylcum wylle oððe to stane oððe to treowe oððe to ænigum
oðrum gesceaftum butan on godes naman to godes cyrcean, fæste III ger on
hlafe & on wætere.
 2.22. & þeah he geþristlæce þæt he æt swylcum
stowum ete oððe drince & nane lac ne bringe, fæste he þeah
hwæðere an gear on hlafe & on wætere.
 2.23. Be þam þe alyfed nis idele hwatunga to beganne.
 2.23. Nis na soðlice nanum cristenum men alyfed þæt he idela
hwatunga/ bega swa hæðene men doð, þæt is þæt hi gelyfen on
sunnan & on monan & on steorren ryne & secen tida hwatunga hira
þing to beginnenne, ne wyrta gaderunga mid nanum galdre butan mid <foreign>pater
noster</foreign> & mid credo oððe mid sumon gebede þe to gode belimpe.
 2.23. Gif hwa þas idelan þing bega, geswice & andette &
fæste XL daga, & gif he eft to þære idelnesse gehwyrfe, þonne
fæste he III lengten.
 2.24. Be mansware, hu man þæt gebetan scyle.
 2.24. Gif hwylc læwede man hine forswerige & he wite
þæt he manswærige, fæste IIII gear, gif he bið gemænes hades
man, fæste V gear, subdiacon VI, diacon VII, mæssepreost X, bisceop XII.
 2.24. & gif hwa bið genydd þæt he manswerige oððe he
þæt man nyte, fæste III gear, an ger on hlafe & on wætere, &
þa twa swa his scrift him tæce, & gif hine onhagige, gefreoge ænne
man for godes lufan.
 2.24. & gif hwa for æniges mannes ege oððe lufe oððe
for ænigum sceatte hine forswerege, dæle his æhta þearfendum mannum
& fare to mynstre & bete swa his scrift him tæce & hreowsige a
þa hwile þe he on life beo.
 2.25. Be stale.
 2.25. Gif hwylc man stele deorwurðe þing, gif he bið
læwede man, fæste V ger, subdiacon VI, diacon VII, mæssepreost X,
bisceop XII.
 2.25. & gif hwylc man medeme þing stele, agife þa stale
þam þe hi ahte & fæste I ger on hlafe & on wætere, & gif
he næbbe þa stale to agifanne, fæste III ger on hlafe & on
wætere.
 2.26. Be leasre gewitnesse.
 2.26. Gif hwa on leasre gewittnesse beo, nis him na alyfed
þæt he husles onfo ær he andette & bete swa his scrift him
tæce.
 2.27. Be ungeðwærnesse wið his nehstan.
 2.27. Soðlice nis nanum cristenum men alyfed, þæt he on
godes cyrcean gode lac offrige þa hwile þe he nið oððe andan oððe
ænige unþwærnesse on his heortan hæbbe wið his þone nehstan.
 2.27. Forþam his lac ne beoð gode andfenge, ærþam þe he
hine sylfne geðwærie & gegladige wið his nehstan.
 2.27. Forþam se hælend cwæð on his godspelle, gif þu
lac bringe to godes weofode, & þu þær gemunst þæt þin
broðor þæt is ælc cristen man sy ungeðwære wið þe,
forlæt þær þine lac & ga to þinum breþer & geðwæra
þe/ wið hine, & syððan cume to þam weofode & offragode
gecweme lac.
 2.28. Be hatheortnesse.
 2.28. Gif hwylc man to þam hatheort sy & strangmod, þæt
he to nanum worldrihte & sibbe fon nelle wið þæne þe wið hine
agylt hæfð, beo he amansumad.
 2.29. Be þam men þe aðas sylð, þæt he to sibbe fon
nelle wið his nehstan.
 2.29. Se man þe for hwylcere ungeðwærnesse winð wið his
nehstan & to þam strið bið þæt he aðas sylð, þæt he to
nanre sibbe fon nelle æt þam þe wið hine agylt hæfð, beo he
amansumod.
 2.29. Gif he þonne gecyrran wyle & to sibbe fon, fæste an
ger for his aðes þingon & III lengteno on hlafe & on wætere,
& þæs geares ofereacan fæste swa him his scrift tæce.
 2.30. Be þam þe alyfed nis þæt ænig man his feoh to
unrihtum gafole sylle.
 2.30. Ælcum geleaffullum men is forboden, þæt he his feoh
ne his æhta to nanum unrihtum gafole ne læne, þæt is þæt he
hine maran ne bidde to agifanne þonne he him ær lænde, ac for lufe
& for þearfe læne gehwa oðrum his feoh & his æhta, swa he
wylle þæt man him do.
 2.30. Gif hwa for hwylcere manfulre gitsunge þis do, halige bec
him/ tæceað III geara fæsten, an ger on hlafe & on wætere, &
þa II swa him his scrift tæce.
 3.1. Her onginð se forma capitul, be gehadodra manna wifunga.
 3.1. Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon wifigen, þolian heora
hades.
 3.1. & gif hy æfter þam hæmedþing begað, na
þæt an þæt hy behadod syn, ac eac swylce fæston VII gear be
bisceopes dome.
 3.2. Be þam men þe gyrnð sacerdhades.
 3.2. Gif se mæssepreost geleahtrod wæs mid heaofdlicum
leahtrum ær he gehadod wære & þæt ær andette & bette swa
him his scrift tæhte, gif he eft syððan he gehadod bið þa ylcan
leahtras begæð þe he ær bette ne bið he na wyrðe þæt he
ænige þenunga æt godes weofode do, ac wunige him elles mid gemænes
hades mannum, & gif he gecyrran wyle, bete swa se bisceop him tæce.
 3.3. Be mæssepreostum.
 3.3. Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon man ofslea oððe hi
forswerigen, þolian heora hades, & gif hi to bote gecyrran wyllan, betan
be bisceopes dome.
 3.4. Eft be godes þeowum.
 3.4. Godes sacerdas & diaconas & oðre godes þeowas þe
on godes temple gode þenian sceolon & haligdom & halige bec
handlian, þa sceolon symble heora clænnesse healdan.
 3.4. Þonne gif ænig swa gerad man on hæmedþing befealle,
andette his scrifte & bete swa he him tæce.
 3.4. Forþam se hælend cwæð, beon ge halige, forþam þe
ic drihten god & eower hlaford eom halig.
 3.5. Be þam hu se sacerd hine healdan sceal & se diacon.
 3.5. Ða sacerdas & diaconas & þa godes þeowas þe hi
sylfe ne magon ne nellað for gode þa clænnesse healdan þe him beboden
is, ascyrige man hy fram þære þenunge þe clæne men on godes huse
gode þeniað, & gif hi þonne gecyrran & andettan wyllan, betan swa
hira scrift him tæce.
 3.6. Be þam bisceopum & be oðrum godes þeowum.
 3.6. Soðlice eallunga is forboden on haligum bocum ælcon
bisceope & abbude & mæssepreoste, þæt hi nænigne wifmannes
neawiste mid him næbban.
 3.6. Ge eac swylce ælcon godes þeowe þe on clænnesse gode
þeowian scyle is forboden, þæt he naðer ne his magan ne oðerne
wifman for nanes weorces þingon inne mid him næbbe, þy læs he þurh
deofles costnunge þæron gesyngie.
 3.7. Be þam gehadedum mannum þe heora feoh lænað to
hyre.
 3.7. Gif bisceop oððe mæssepreost oððe hwylc godes
þeow lænð his feoh to unrihtum gafole & ne geman hwæt se
hælend cwæð þurh Dauid þone sealmsceop, he cwæð, þæt þa
sceoldan his rices brucan þe heora feoh to nanum unrihtum gafole ne
syllað.
 3.7. Gif hwa þis abrecð, ne bið he wyrðe þæt he husl
underfo, ærþam þe he gebete swa herbufan awriten is, þæt is III
geara fæsten.
 3.8. Eft be gehadodra manna wicnungum.
 3.8. Nis nanum mæssepreoste alyfed ne diacone, þæt hy
gerefan beon ne wicneras, ne ymbe nane worldbisgunge abisgod butan mid
þære þe hy to getitolode beoð.
 3.9. Be þam þe gehadod man geðoftrædene nimð wið
wifman.
 3.9. Se riht godes þeow þe mid godes þeowdome abysgod byð,
ne gebyreð him na to farenne fram stowe to stowe ne fram huse to huse
wifmannes neawiste gyrnende butan his lareowes leafe.
 3.9. Þonne gif hwa þisne gewunan hæbbe, geswice & bete
swa his scrift him tæce.
 3.10. Eft be þam ylcan.
 3.10. Se munuc þe hine sylfne gode behat & þone halgan
regol underfehð, ne gedafenað him na þæt he æniges worldlices
wyrðmyntes gyrne oððe þæt abrece þæt he gode behet, gif he
þis deð, beo he amansumad fram eallum geleaffullum mannum.
 3.11. Be muneces mishealdnesse & mynecene.
 3.11. Munuc & mynecene þe gode sylfum beoð gehalgode &
heora gehat gode behaten habbað, gif hi þonne þurh deofles costnunga
þæt abrecað, beon hy ascyrode fram eallum gehadedum mannum.
 3.11. & gif hi to gode gecyrran wyllað þe hy ær
wiðsocon, andettan & beton þa hwile þe hi on life beon swa heom
þære scire bisceop tæce.
 3.12. Be wifmannes þenunge on godes weofode þe hire to ne
gebyrað.
 3.12. Gelomlice we habbað geræd on halgum bocum, þæt hit
alyfed nis þæt ænig læwede wif & unsyfre godes geryno on cristes
weofode handlian sceole ne haligdom ne ða halgan bec þe gehadode man
handlian sceolan, forþam sanctus Paulus hit hæfð swiðe forboden.
 3.13. Be þam þe ælc sacerd sceal cunnan his gerihto.
 3.13. Ælcon sacerde gebyreð þæt he cunne þa halgan lare
þe to his hade belimpð & folc mid læran & trymman sceal to godes
rihte & to heora sawle þearfe.
 3.14. Be þam þe sanctus Agustinus sende to rome to sancte
Gregorie, & hu sanctus Gregorius him andsware sende.
 3.14. Sona swa sanctus Agustinus on engla þeode fulluht gebroht
hæfde & godes þeowas gehwær gesett & geendebyrd hæfde, þa
sende he ærendgewrit to Rome to sancte Gregorie þe þa wæs papa &
bæd hine, þæt he him sende on gewrite, hu him to donne wære ymbe
þa nihtlican besmitenesse þe foroft mannum on slæpe gelimpð,
hwæðer he þæs on morgen to husle moste gan oððe husel halgian gif
he mæssepreost wære.
 3.14. & he him þa wislice andsware sende & cwæð,
þæt ælc godes þeow geornlice smeagean sceolde, fram hwilcum þingum
seo nihtlice besmitenes cume.
 3.14. Forþam of þreom þingum heo cymð þam slæpendan on
mode, hwilon for þære gecyndelican untrumnesse & tydernesse, hwilon
for oferflownesse ætes & drinces, hwilon eac þæt se man geþencð
& smeað on dæg idele þing & unalyfedlice, þonne þæt he on
dæg geþencð waciende, þæt him becymð on niht slæpende.
 3.14. Þonne gif hwa besmiten beo on swefne for þære
flæsclican tydernesse, nah he þæs geweald, þingie him georne wið
god & him forgifenesse bidde.
 3.14. & gif hit gelimpð for oferflownesse metes oððe
drynces, he bið gyltig, & nis him þeah husl to forbeodenne ne mæsse
to singanne gif he mæssepreost bið, gif hit oferneod beo & þær
oðer sacerd ne beo þæt þa þenunga forðdo.
 3.14. Gif þær þonne oðer beo þæt þa þenunga don
mæge, betere him is þæt he þæs dæges hit forga & him
georne mid his sealmsange & mid ælmessan forgifenesse bidde.
 3.14. Gif hit þonne on þa þriddan wisan gelimpð, þæt
se man on dæg geseo oððe geþence oððe smeage ymbe unalyfede þing
& idele lufe þærto nimð & lustbærnesse & þonne þurh
þæt & þurh deofles hiwunga besmiten bið on slæpe, nis þam
alyfed husl to nimanne þæs morgenes þe him on niht swa gelimpð, ac he
ah þearfe þæt he hit andette & bete swa him his scrift tæce.
 3.15. Be þam ðe þam sacerde naht ne fremeð þæt he
rihtwis beo, gif he þam unrihtwisan styran nele heora unrihtes.
 3.15. Se halga apostol Paulus læreð ælcum mæssepreoste
þe godes folce to lareowe bið gesett, þæt heora nan ne wandige for
nanes mannes ege ne for lufe ne for sceame ne for nanum sceatte, þæt hy ne
bodian ælcon men hwæt him sy to donne & hwæt to forganne, gif hy
sylfe wyllað þæt heom beo geborhgen on domesdæg beforan gode sylfum.
 3.16. Be mæssepreosta drohtnunga.
 3.16. Ælc mæssepreost sceal beon swa he gehaten is sacerd,
þæt is grecisc word & is on leden <foreign>sacrum dans</foreign> & on ure geðeode
halig syllend.
 3.16. He sceal syllan halignesse þam folce þe he to lareowe
& to hyrde bið gesett, þæt is þæt he sceal halige þeawas
& bysna mannum æteowan.
 3.16. Warnige hine þæt be him ne beo gecweden þæt
egeslice word þæt se hælend cwæð be Israela folces hyrdum, þa he
cwæð, Wa eow hyrdas, þe þæra eowena meolc ge brucon, & mid
heora wulle ge eow scryddon, & þa ðe fætte wæron þa ge snidon,
& þa ðe unstrange wæron þa ge ne gestrangedon ne þa wanhalan ge
ne lacnedon, & þa ðe forbrocene wæron þa ge ne wriðon, &
þa ðe tosceadene wæron þa ge ne samnedon, & þa forlorenan þa
ge ne sohton.
 3.16. Nu is eall min heord tosceacred, forþam hi næfdon
nænne hyrde & synd geworden eallum wildeorum to mete.
 3.16. Eall þis is gecweden be biscopon & be mæssepreoston
þe godes folc on domesdæg to þam dome lædan sceolon, ælc þæne
dæl þe him her on life ær betæht wæs.
 4.0. Hit is þeah to witanne, hwy þeos feorðe boc sy
uncapitulod, nu þa ærran bec synt gecapitulod, þæt is forþam þe
þeos feorðe boc is genumen of þam þreom bocum, & þæt man on
þam þreom hraðe findan ne mæg, hit man fint on þisse feorðan
ægðer ge be maran þingum ge be læssan openlicor & hrædlicor.
 4.1. Gif hwylc bisceop man ofslea, þolige his hades &
fæste XII gear, þa VII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa V fæste
III dagas on þære wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
 4.1. Gif mæssepreost oððe munuc man ofslea, þolige his
hades & fæste X ger, þa V on hlafe & on wætere, & þa
oðre V fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
 4.1. Gif diacon man ofslea, þolige his hades & fæste VII
ger, þa IIII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III fæste III dagas
on wican & þa oðre bruce his metes.
 4.1. Gif cleric man ofslea, fæste VI ger, þa IIII on hlafe
& on wætere, & þa II fæste III dagas on wican & þa oðre
bruce his metes.
 4.1. Gif læwede man man ofslea, fæste V ger, þa III on
hlafe & on wætere, & þa II fæste III dagas on wican & þa
oðre bruce his metes.
 4.2. Gif hwa gehadodne man ofslea oððe his nehstan mæg,
forlæte his eard & his æhta & fare to rome to þam papan, &
syððan do swa se papa him wisige.
 4.3. Gif hwylc bisceop hæmedþing drihð oððe æwe
brycð, fæste XII ger, & mæssepreost & munuc X ger, & diacon
VII ger, & cleric VI ger, & læwede man V ger, fæste ælc be
his endebyrdnesse, eallswa herbufan awriten is be manslehte.
 4.5. Gif hwa hæme wið mynecene þe gode sylfum to bryde
beweddod bið, gif hit bisceop deð, fæste XII ger, þa VII on hlafe
& on wætere, & þa V fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe & on
wætere, & þa oðre dagas bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
 4.5. Gif hit bið mæssepreost oððe munuc, fæste X ger,
þa V on hlafe & on wætere, & þa V fæste III dagas on wican on
hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan flæsce
anum.
 4.5. Gif hit bið diacon, fæste VII ger, þa III on hlafe
& on wætere, & þa IIII fæste III dagas on wican on hlafe &
on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
 4.5. Gif hit cleric oððe læwede man beo, fæste VI ger,
þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III fæste III dagas on
wican on hlafe & on wætere & þa odre bruce his metes butan
flæsce anum.
 4.5. & seo mynecenu, fæste heo X ger, eallswa herbufan be
þam mæssepreoste awriten is.
 4.6. Gif hwylc man wolde hæman wið mynecenu & heo
geðafian nolde, fæste he an ger for his unrihtwillan on hlafe & on
wætere.
 4.7. Gif hwa wolde hæman wið oðres mannes rihtæwe &
heo geðafian nolde, fæste he for his unrihtwillan III lencgten on hlafe
& on wætere, an lencten foran to middansumera, & oðer foran to
hærfæstes emnnihte, & þridde to middanwintra.
 4.8. Gif hwa wylle wið wifman unrihtlice hæman & heo
geðafian nylle, fæste he XL daga & nihta on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.9. Gif hwylc man reafað oðerne æt his dehter, bete wið
þa freond, & fæste heora ægðer I ger wodnesdagum & frigedagum
on hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre dagas brucan heora metes butan
flæsce & nime hy syððan to rihtæwe, gif þa freond þæt
wyllað.
 4.10. Gif hwylcne man deofol to þam swiðe undergan hæbbe
þæt he wið dumbe nytenu hæme, andette his scrifte & fæste XV
ger, þa VIII on hlafe & on wætere, & þa VII fæste ælce
geare III lencten on hlafe & on wætere, an lencten ær eastron, oðer
ofer pentecosten, þridde ær middanwintra, & æfre fæste
wodnesdagum & frigedagum þa hwile þe he libbe.
 4.11. Gif hwa on gewunan hæbbe þæt he hine sylfne besmite
his agenes willes, fæste III ger, on ælcon þæra geara III lencten on
hlafe & on wætere, & þa oðre dagas forga ælce dæge
flæsc butan sunnandæge anum.
 4.12. Gif ænig man oðerne mid wiccecræfte fordo, fæste
VII ger, þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII ger III dagas
on wucan on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.13. Gif hwa drife stacan on ænigne man, fæste III ger, an
ger/ on hlafe & on wætere, & þa III ger fæste III dagas on
wucan on hlafe & on wætere, & gif se man for þære stacunge dead
bið, þonne fæste he VII ger ealswa herbufan awriten is.
 4.14. Gif hwa wiccige ymbe æniges mannes lufe & him on
æte sylle oððe on drence oððe on æniges cynnes galdorcræfte,
þæt heora lufe for þam þe mare beon sceole, gif hit læwede man do,
fæste he healf ger wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere
& þa oðre dagas bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
 4.14. Gif hit bið cleric, fæste an ger twegen dagas on wican
on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas forgange flæsc.
 4.14. Gif he beo diacon, fæste III ger twegen dagas on wican on
hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas forgange flæsc.
 4.14. Gif hit bið mæssepreost, fæste V ger, þæt an on
hlafe on wætere, & þa IIII ger ælce frigedæge on hlafe & on
wætere & ælc þæra oðra daga forgange flæsc.
 4.15. Gif hwa hlytas oððe hwatunga bega, oððe his wæccan
æt ænigum wylle hæbbe oððe æt ænigre oðre gesceafte butan
æt godes cyrcean, fæste he III ger, þæt an on hlafe & on
wætere, & þa II wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on
wætere & þa oðre dagas bruce his metes butan flæsce anum.
 4.16. Wifman beo þæs ylcan wyrðe, gif heo tilað hire
cilde mid ænigum wiccecræfte oððe æt wega gelætan þurh þa
eorðan tyhð, forþam þæt is mycel hæðenscipe.
 4.17. Gif hwylc wif hire bearn mid drence on hire sylfre fordo hire
agenes willes oððe mid ænigum þingum hit amyrre, fæste heo VII ger,
þa III on hlafe & on wætere, & þa IIII ger þreo dagas on
wucan on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre bruce his metes butan
flæsce anum.
 4.18. Gif hwylc læwede man oðerne wundige, gebete wið hine
þa wundlan & begite him þa lacnunge & fæste an lencten foran to
middanwintra, a oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.19. Gif hwa godes cyrcean brece for stale, agife þa stale &
fæste VII ger swa hit herbufan awriten is be manslyhte.
 4.20. Gif hwylc man stele mete oððe claðas & hine hungor
oððe næced þærto drife, fæste III wican on hlafe & on
wætere, gif he þonne þa stale agifan mæge, ne neadige man hine to
fæstene, ac do man him forgifenesse for godes lufan.
 4.21. Gif hwylc cristen man his agen bearn oððe his nehstan
mæg wið ænigum wurðe sylle, næbbe he nænne gemanan mid
cristenum mannum ær he hine alysed hæbbe of þam þeowdome.
 4.21. Gif he þonne hine begitan ne mæge, dæle swa mycel
feoh for hine swa he ær mid him nam & alyse oðerne of þeowdome &
gefreoge þæne & fæste VII wican on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.21. & gif he þæs gestreones næbbe þæt he hine
alysan mæge, fæste þonne XXVIII wicæna on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.22. Gif hwa blod ete oððe styrfig flæsc, & he hit for
neode ne do, fæste XII Wican a oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.22. & gif he hit for neode do, fæste III dagas on hlafe
& on wætere.
 4.23. Gif hwylc man mid arwan deor ofsceote, & hit þeah
ætberste & hit man þonne ymbe þreo niht dead finde & þær
hund oððe wulf oððe fox oððe bera on befangen hæbbe oððe
ænig oðer deorcyn, ne abite his nan cristen man.
 4.24. Gif wulf æniges cynnes orf toslite & hit for þam
dead beo, ne abite his nan cristen man, & gif hit þonne hwa do, fæste
he IIII wican on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.24. & gif hit alyfeð & hit man syððan ofslyhð,
bruce his man syððan be leafe.
 4.25. Gif hwylc deor bið on nette awyrged, nis hit nanum men
alyfed to brucanne, gif his hwa bruce, fæste IIII wican a oðerne dæg on
hlafe & on wætere.
 4.26. Gif hwa finde deadne fisc on fiscpole & he his bruce,
fæste IIII wican wodnesdagum & frigedagum on hlafe & on wætere
& þa oðre dagas forga flæsc.
 4.26. & gif man on ea deadne fisc finde, bruce his man be
leafe.
 4.27. Gif hwylc gehadod man on huntað fare, gif hit beo cleric,
forga XII monð flæsc, diacon II ger, mæssepreost III, bisceop VII.
 4.28. Gif hwylc bisceop oððe ænig gehadod man hine oft
rædlice oferdrince, oððe he þæs geswice oððe his hades
þolige.
 4.29. Gif munuc for oferdruncennesse spiwe, fæste XXX daga.
 4.29. Gif mæssepreost oððe diacon for oferdruncennesse
spiwe, fæste XL daga.
 4.30. Se ðe þurh facn oðerne oderdrencð, fæste XL daga.
 4.31. Beon gif hy man acwellað, cwelle hy man raðe, & ete
man þæt hunig þæt hy ær worhton.
 4.32. Gif mus on wætan befealle, do hy man aweg & astrede
mid haligwætere, & gif heo cucu sy, þicge man þæne wætan, gif
heo þonne dead sy, geote hit man ut & þwea þæt fæt.
 4.32. Eft hit cweð on oðre stowe, gif þæs metes mycel sy
ætsamne, strede mid haligwætere & þicge gif his þære sy, &
þæt þonne for neodþearfe.
 4.33. On þearfe fiftan cneorisse geleofe men hi moton gesamnian,
& on þære feorðan gif hi gemette syn, ne sceade hi man, æt þam
þriddan cneowe syn hy gesceadene.
 4.34. Wif on hire monaðadle cyrcean ne sece ne to husle ne ga,
naðer/ ne nunne ne læwede wif, & gif hy hit don, fæste XX daga.
 4.35. Se ðe awiht þicge þæs þe hund oððe mus of
æte oððe wesle widlige, & he hit wite, singe C sealma, gif he hit
nyte, singe L sealma.
 4.36. Se ðe sylle oðrum þæne wætan þe mus oððe
wesle bið on adruncen, gif hit folces man sy, fæste III dagas, gif hit
mynsterman sy, singe CCC sealma.
 4.36. Se ðe hit ær nyste & eft wite, singe saltere.
 4.37. Gif man awiht blodiges þicge on samsodenum mete, gif he
hit nyte, fæste III dagas oððe singe saltere, gif he hit wite, fæste
VII dagas.
 4.38. Se ðe his sylfes blod on spatle mid ungewisse forswelge,
nis þæt nan synn.
 4.39. Gif hwa on his gymeleaste husl forleose, fæste III
lenctenu ælce frigedæg on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre
dagas bruce his metes buton flæsce anum.
 4.40. Gif seo onsægdnes on eorðan fealle for gymeleaste, singe
L sealma.
 4.41. Se ðe forgymeleasige gehalgod husl on þam þæt hit
to lange licge þæt him sy unsyfernes on oððe hit næbbe his hiw,
fæste XL daga.
 4.42. Gif man husl aspiwe for druncennesse oððe for oferfylle,
fæste XL daga.
 4.43. Gif he for untrumnesse his husl aspiwe, fæste VII dagas
oððe twegen salteras singe.
 4.44. Gif man husl worpe on fyr oððe on stream þonne hit
molsað to þicganne, singe he C sealma.
 4.45. Gif hund þæne spiwðan frete, fæste C daga, gif he
hit nyste, fæste XL daga.
 4.46. Ælc husl þe bið on unsyfernesse oððe on ylde,
forbærne man hit.
 4.47. Gif mus ete husl for gymeleaste þæs mannes þe hit
healdan sceolde, fæste XL daga.
 4.48. Se ðe husles ænigne dæl on cyrcean forleose,
fæste XX daga.
 4.49. Se ðe on folce his crisman forleose & hine eft ne
finde, fæste III lenctenu oððe an ger.
 4.50. Se ðe his calic ageote on gemang mæssan, fæste XXX
daga.
 4.51. Se ðe ete ærþam þe he to husle ga & æfter
þam hus þicge, fæste VII dagas.
 4.52. Wer & wif þa ðe heom on hæmede geðeodde
wæron, gif oðer wyle godes þeow beon, oðer nelle, oððe heora
oðer bið untrum, oðer hal, swa þeah be heora begra geðafunge hyl
dælon hy, gif hy wyllen, & þæt beo be bisceopes gewitnesse.
 4.53. Se godes þeow þe on slæpe besmiten bið, arise &
singe his VII sealmas & bige his cneowa to eorðan æt ælces ferses
ende & fæste þæs on morgen on hlafe & on wætere oððe
singe XXX þæra sealma þe him betste þincen & æt ælces
ferses ende bige his cneowa to eorðan.
 4.54. Gif swin oððe henna oððe æniges cynnes yrfe ete of
mannes lichaman oððe of his blode drince, slea man þæt yrfe &
sylle hit hundum.
 4.55. Gif hwa bærne oðres mannes hus, fæste III ger a
oðerne dæg on hlafe & on wætere & þa oðre dagas fæste to
nones & forga flæsc.
 4.56. Gif æniges cynnes yrfe fealle on wæterpytt & hit
man þær dead finde, formige man þone pytt clæne & strede
þæron haligwæter.
 4.56. & gif hwa his onbyrge ær se pytt gehalgod sy, fæste
ane wican on hlafe & on wætere, gif he hit wite, gif he hit nyte,
fæste ænne dæg on hlafe & on wætere.
 4.57. Gif hwa for his untrumnysse oþþe for his hnescnysse
þæt fæsten & þa stiðnysse aberan ne mæg þe his scrift him
tæcð, him ys alyfed þæt he mot his fæsten alysan mid godcundnysse
& mid his worldæhton, þæt is þonne gif he byþ welig, sylle for
XII monþa fæstene <foreign>triginta solidos</foreign>, þæt is on ure geþeode XXX
scillinga.
 4.57. Gif hine to swa mycelum ne onhagige, þonne sylle he XX
scyllinga, gif hine þonne to swa mycelum ne onhagige, sylle X scyllingas, gif
hit þonne þearfigende mann beo, þæt him to X ne onhagige, sylle III
scyllingas, forþon se welega mæg eaþor syllan XXX scillinga þonne se
wædla þry.
 4.57. Se rihtscylling byð a be twelf penegum.
 4.57. Swa gerade ælmyssan man sceal on þreo wisan dælan, an
ys þæt hig man uppan godes weofod legce, oþer þæt man gebicge man
of þeowdome & hine syþþan gefreoge, þrydde þæt hig man godes
þearfum dæle.
 4.58. Anes dæges fæsten man mæg mid anum penige alysan
oþþe mid twam hund sealmum, & on oðre wisan singe <foreign>miserere mei
dominus</foreign> XII siþon & XII <foreign>pater noster</foreign> & æt ælces ferses ende
hine on eorþan astrecce ætforan godes weofode.
 4.58. & gif se man sealmsang ne cunne, þonne singe he for
anes dæges fæsten XL <foreign>pater noster</foreign> & swa oft hine on eorþan
astrecce.
 4.58. & VII wintra fæsten man mæg on XII monþum alysan,
gif he ælce dæg asingeð saltere & oþerne on niht & an fiftig
on æfen.
 4.59. Mid anre mæssan man mæg alysan XII daga fæsten,
& mid X mæssan man mæg alysan IIII monþa fæsten, & mid XX
mæssan man mæg alysan VIIII monþa fæsten, & mid XXX mæssan
man mæg alysan XII monþa fæsten, gif he wyle mid soþre godes lufe him
sylfum þingian.

END_TEXT

Conf 3.1.2 (Raith X)
B11.3.1.2.
Poenitentiale pseudo-Egberti (Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Junius 121): Raith 1933, 69-70.



 1. Gif hwa fullice on ungecyndelicum ðingum ongean godes
gesceafte ðurh ænig ðinc hine sylfne besmite, bereowsige þæt
æfre þa hwile ðe he libbe be ðam þe seo dæd sy.
 2. Gif hwa on slæpe his bearn oflicge þæt hit dead wyrðe,
fæste III gear, an gear on hlafe & on wætere, & ða II þreo
dagas on wucan, & gif hit ðurh druncen gewyrðe, bete þe deoppor swa
his scrift tæce & behreowsige hit æfre.
 3. Gif untrum cild hæþen swelte, & hit on preoste gelanc
sy, ðolige his hades & bete hit georne.
 4. & gif hit ðurh freonda gemeleaste gewurðe, fæstan III
gear, an on hlafe & on wætere, & ða twa gear þry dagas on wucan
& behreowsian hit æfre.
 4. Gif hwa cristene man on hæðendom sylle, se ne bið wyrðe
ænigre reste mid cristenum folce, butan he begyte eft ham ongean þæt he
ut sealde.
 5. & gif he þæt don ne mæge, gedæle þæt wyrð
eall godes ðances, & oðerne alyse mid oðrum wyrðe & ðone
þonne gefreoge, & ðærtoeacan bete III gear fulle swa his scrift him
tæce.
 8. & gif he feoh næbbe þæt he man mid alysan mæge,
he bete þe deoppor, þæt is VII gear fulle, & behreowsige æfre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Conf 3.2 (Raith Y)
B11.3.2.
Sanctus Gregorius: Raith 1933, 71-3.



 1. Sanctus Gregorius se halga papa gesamnode sinoð on Rome mid
oðrum welmanegum halgum bisceopum & mæssepreostum.
 3. Þa betwux oðrum spræcum þe hy cristenum þeodum to
rihte gesetton, þa cwæð he sanctus Gregorius, ic geomrigende cweðe
þæt þas cristenan folc gehwær geþurh þas italian mægðe
wunigende ic gehyrde swiðe þristlice don wið þan rihtan geleafan &
þam domum ealra haligra fædera.
 7. Þæt hy synt swa ðriste þæt hy þa gehalgedon nunnan
on gode synd nimende him to gemæccum & eac þa gesibban men heora
agenes cynnes, þæt þonne us þinceð gerisne him fram to aceorfenne
mid þam twyecgan swurde þam haligan godes wordon, þe læs se æcer
þæs godan landes sy gefylled mid þam þyfelum þæra yfelra weoda
þæt hy þæt godes mennen on gesynscipe habbon.
 13. Þa cwæð sanctus gregorius si he amansumod.
 14. & him andwyrdan ealle þa halgan bisceopas &
cwædon þriwa, si he amansumod.
 15. & gif hwa his gastlican cumædran hæbbe him on
gesinscipe/, si he amansumad.
 17. & him andwyrdon ealle þa bisceopas þriwa &
cwædon, si he amansumod.
 18. & gif hwa his agene magan hæbbe on gesinscipe oððe
þæt wif þæt his neahmæg ær hæfde, si he amansumod.
 20. & him andwyrdan ealle þa bisceopas & cwædon
þriwa, si he amansumad.
 21. & gif hwa fæmnan forstele unbeweddode, nime hy eft to
rihtlife oððe he si amansumod.
 22. & ealle þa ðe on þam fultume syn, syn hy amansumode.
 23. Þa andswaredon ealle þa bisceopas & cwædon þriwa,
syn hi amansumode, buton hi to rihtere dædbote gecyrran wyllon & heom
þonne forgifenesse geearnian mid soðum geleafan untweogendum.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Conf 4 (Fowler)
B11.4.2.
Handbook for the Use of a Confessor: Fowler 1965, 17-34.



 17.25. Efter þisum arise eadmodlice to his scrifte, and cweðe
þonne ærest, Ic gelife on Drihten heahfæder, ealra þinga wealdend,
and on þone sunu, and on þone halgan gast, and ic gelife to life æfter
deaðe, and ic gelife to arisenne on domes dæge.
 17.30. And eal þis ic gelife þurh Godes mægen and his miltse
to weorðone.
 17.32. And cweðe þonne mid reowsigendum mode and eadmodlice his
andetnessa to his scrifte, onbugende eadmodlice, and þus cweðe, Ic andette
ælmihtigum Gode and minum scrifte, þam gastlican læce, ealle þa synna
þe me æfre þurh awirgede gastas on besmitene wurdon, oððe on dæde
oððe on geþohte, oððe wið wæpmen oððe wið wifmen oððe
wið ænige gesceaft, gecyndelicra sinna oððe ungecyndelicra.
 17.39. Ic andette gifernesse ætes ge ær tide ge ofer tide.
 17.40. Ic andette ælce gitsunga, and æfest, and tælnessa,
and twispræcnessa, leasunga, and unriht gilp, and idel word, and unriht
cysta, and ælcne glængc þe to mines lichaman unræde æfre
belumpe.
 17.44. Ic andette þæt ic wæs to oft sinna wirhta, and sinna
geþafa, and sinna gewita, and sinna lareow.
 17.45. Ic andette mines modes morðor, and mæne aðas, and
unsibbe, and ofermodignesse, receleasnessa Godes beboda.
 17.48. Ic andette eal þæt ic æfre mid eagum geseah to
gitsunge oððe to tælnesse, oððe mid earum to unitte gehirde,
oððe mid minum muðe to unnytte gecwæð.
 17.50. Ic andette þe ealles mines lichamon synna, for fel and for
flæsc, and for ban and for sinuwan, and for æddran and for grislan, and
for tungan and for weleras, and for goman and for teð, and for feax and for
mearh, and for æghwæt hnesces oððe heardes, wætes oððe
driges.
 18.55. Ic andette þæt ic min fulluht wyrs geheold þonne ic
minum Drihtene behete, and minne had þe ic scolde Gode and his halgum to lofe
healdan and me silfum to ecere hæle ic hæbbe unmedumlice gehealdan.
 18.59. Ic andette þæt ic mine tidsangas oft agælde, and ic
swor mæne aðas minra hlaforda life, and mines Drihtenes naman ic nemnode
on idelnesse.
 18.62. Ealles ic bidde mines Drihtenes forgifnesse, þæt me
næfre deofol on astælan ne mæge, þæt ic buton andetnesse and
betnessa sy minra synna.
 18.64. Swa ic to dæg ealle andette mine scylda toforan Drihtene,
hælendum Criste, se wealdeð heofonas and eorðan, and beforan þissum
halgan weofode and þisum reliquium, and beforan minum scryfte and Drihtenes
mæssepreoste, and eom on clænre and on soðre andetnesse, and on godan
willan to gebetenne ealle mine sinna, and eft swilces geswican þæs þe ic
æfre mæg.
 18.71. And þu hælend Crist sy myltsigende mynre sawle, and
forgifende and adilgigende mine synna and mine giltas þe ic sið oððe
ær æfre gefremode, and gelæde me to ðinum uplican rice, þæt ic
mote ðar wunian mid þinum halgum and gecorenum a buton ende on ecnesse.
 18.76. Nu ic bidde þe eadmodlice, Drihtenes sacerd, þæt þu
sy me to gewitnesse on domes dæge, þæt þe deofol ne mage on me
anweald agan, and þæt þu to Drihtene beo min þingere þæt ic mote
myne sinna and mine giltas gebetan, and oðres swilces geswican.
 19.80. To ðon me gefultumige se Drihten se ðe leofað and
rixað a buton ende on ecnesse, Amen.
 19.82. ðæt sceal geþencan se þe bið manna sawla læce
and heora dæda gewita þæt gedal and þæt gescad, hu he mannum heora
dæda gescrife, and þeah hwæðre ne fordeme ne hig ormode ne gedon.
 18.85. þonne se man him his misdæda andettan wille, gehire him
ærest geþildelice hu his wise gerad sy.
 18.87. Gif he wille and cunne eadmodlice his dæda andettan, and
þu ongite þæt him his sinna reowan, lær hine luflice and
mildheortlice, gif he ne cunne his dæda andettan and his giltas asmeagan,
acsa hine his wisena and atred him þa giltas ut and asec his dæda.
 19.91. And geþengc ðu þæt þu ne scealt næfre gelice
deman þam rican and þam heanan, þam freon and þam þeowan, þam
ealdan and þam geongan, þam halan and þam unhalan, þam eadmodan and
þam ofermodan, þam strangan and þam unmagan, þam gehadodum and þam
læwedum.
 19.96. ælce dæde sceal gescadwis dema wislice toscadan, hu
heo gedon si and hwar oððe hwænne.
 19.98. Nis on ænigne timan unriht alifed, and þeah man sceal
freolstidan and fæstentidum and on freolsstowan eac swa geornlicost
beorgan.
 19.100. And a swa man bið mihtigra oððe maran hades, swa he
sceal deoppor for Gode and for worlde unriht gebetan, forðam þe se maga and
se unmaga ne magon na gelice byrdene ahebban, ne se unhala þam halum gelice.
 20.104. And þi man sceal medemian and gescadlice toscadan ylde
and geoguðe, welan and wædlan, hale and unhale and hade gehwilcne.
 20.107. And gif hwa hwæt ungewealdes misdeð, ne bið þæt
na gelic þam ðe willes and gewealdes silfwilles misdeð.
 20.108. And eac se ðe nydwyrhta bið ðæs þe he misdeð,
se bið gebeorges and þe beteran domes symle wyrðe þe he nydwyrhta
wæs þæs þe he worhte.
 20.111. ælce dæde toscade man wærlice for Gode and for
worlde.
 20.113. þas þeawas man healt begeondan sæ.
 20.113. þæt is þæt ælc biscop bið his biscopstole on
ðone Wodnesdæg þe we hatað Capud Ieiunii, þonne ælc þara manna
þe mid heafodleahtre besmiten bið on ðare scire sceal þonne him to
cuman on dæg and his sinna him gecyðan.
 20.117. And he þonne tæcað him dædbote, ælcum be
giltes mæðe.
 20.118. þa ðe þæs wyrðe beoð he asindrað of
ciriclicum gemanan, and hi þeah to heora agenre þearfe hyrteð and
tihteð, and hi swa þonne be his leafe ham hwyrfað.
 20.121. And eft on ðone þurnesdæg ær Eastron to ðare
ylcan stowe ealle gesomniað, and him þonne se biscop ofer singeð and
absolutionem deð, and hi swa ham hwyrfað mid þæs biscopes bletsunge
siððan.
 20.124. ðis is þus to healdenne eallum Cristenum folce.
 20.125. And þeah hwæðre sceal se sacerd geornlice smeagan
mid hwilcre onbrirdnesse and mid hwilcere fulfremednesse se dædbeta gebet
hæbbe þæt him getæht wæs, and swa him forgifnesse don.
 21.130. Gyf læwede man oðerne slihð buton gilte, fæste
vii gear, iii on hlafe and on wætere and þa iiii swa his scrift him
tæce, and æfter þara vii geara bote æfre geornlice he reowsige his
misdæda be þam dæle þe he mæge, forðam hit is uncuð hu
andfænge his bot wære mid Gode.
 21.135. Se ðe oðerne ofslean wille and ne mæg his willan
þurhteon, fæste iii gear, an on hlafe and on wætere and twa swa his
scrift hym tæce.
 21.138. Gyf læwede man neadunga man slihð, fæste iii gear,
an on hlafe and on wætere, and twa swa his scrift him tæce, and
bereowsige his misdæda æfre.
 21.140. Gyf hit bið subdiacon, fæste six gear, gyf hit beo
diacon, fæste seofon gear, gyf hit beo mæssepreost, fæste x gear, and
biscop xii and reowsige æfre.
 21.144. Gyf hwa his cild slihð to deaðe ungewealdes, fæste v
gear, iii on hlafe and on wætere <foreign>ut supra</foreign>.
 21.146. Gyf biscop oððe mæssepreost man slihð, þolige
his hades and bete georne æfre.
 21.148. Gyf wif hyre cild formyrðrige innan hire oððe
siððan hit forð cume mid dræncum oððe mid mistlicum þingum,
fæste x gear, iii on hlafe and on wætere and þa vii swa hire scryft
hyre mildheortlice tæce, and æfre hit bereowsige.
 21.152. Gyf hwa his æht ofslihð buton gilte for his
hatheortnesse, fæste iii gear.
 21.154. Gyf wif hire man swingð for hwilcum liðrum andan, and
heo on ðam bið dead, and heo beo unscildig, fæste swa ðeah iii gear
and reowsige hire misdæda æfre.
 21.157. Gyf man hine sylfne gewealdes ofslihð mid wæpne
oððe mid hwilcum deofles onbrincge, nis na alifed þæt man for swilcne
man mæssan synge, ne mid ænigum sealmsange þæt lic eorðan
befæste, ne on clænan legere ne licge bebirged.
 22.161. ðone ilcan dom man sceal don þam þe for his gilta
pinunge his lif alæt, þæt bið þeof and morðwyrhta and
hlafordswica.
 22.164. Gyf hwa hyne wið nytenu besmyteð, oððe wæpnedman
wið oðerne, gif he bið xx wintra, fæste xv winter, and gif se man his
gemæccan habbe and he beo xl wintra and swilce þingc begæð, geswice
and fæste þa hwile þe his lif beo, and ne geþristlæce þæt he
Drihtenes lichaman underfo ær his endetiman.
 22.169. Geonge men and andgitlease man sceal þearle swingan þe
swilce þingc begæð.
 22.171. Se man þe æwe brycð, fæste vii gear iii dagas on
wucan on hlafe and on wætere, sy hit wif si hit were.
 22.173. Se þe his æwe forlæt and nymð oðer wif, he
bið æwbrica, ne sille man nan ðara gerihta þe Cristenum mannum
gebireð, ne for deaðe ne for life, ne hine man ne lecge mid Cristenum
mannum, and be wife ealswa, and þa magas þe æt þam dihte wæron,
þolian þone ylcan dom buton hi ær gecirran willan and georne gebetan.
 22.179. Se þe hafað æwe and eac cifese, ne do him nan preost
nane gerihta mid Cristenum mannum, buton he to bote gecyrre, beo hym on anre
gehealdan, beo hit æwe beo hit cyfes.
 22.183. Gyf ceorl wið oðres rihtæwe hæmð, oððe wif
wið oðres wifes rihtgemæccan, fæste vii gear, þa iii on hlafe and
on wætere and þa iiii swa his scrift him tæce, and reowsige his
misdæda æfre.
 22.187. Gyf hwilc wif twegen gebroðra nymð hire to gemæccan
oðerne æfter oðrum, todo man hi and beon hi on dædbote georne þa
hwile þe hi libban swa heora scrift him tæce, and æt heora forðsiðe
do se sacerd heom þa gerihta swa man Cristenum mannum deð, gif hi þæt
gehatað þæt hi lengc betan woldon gif hi lengc libban moston.
 23.193. Gyf hwa on swilcum manfullum sinscipe þurhwunað oð
his lifes ende buton ælcere geswicenesse, ne cunne we him nænne ræd
geþencan, buton hit is æt Godes dome gelang, ne he to clænan ne mot.
 23.197. Gyf hwilc wif beweddod sy, nis nit na alifed þæt hwilc
oðer man hine þæs bereafige, gif hit hwa do, beo he amansumod.
 23.200. Gyf hwa mid his ofercræfte wif oððe mæden
neadinga nymð to unrihthæmede hire unwilles, beo he amansumod.
 23.202. Gyf hwa mid his lotwræncum oðres mannes folgere fram
him apæce for hæmedþinge, and hire unwilles wið hi hæme, gif he
bið gehadod man, ðolige his hades, gif he beo læwede, beo he amansumad
fram eallum Cristenum þingum.
 23.207. Gyf hwilc mæden beweddod bið, and under þam bið
gehergod oððe mid sumon intingon afirsad wyrð fram þam þe heo
beweddod wæs, and hit eft gelympe þæt heo on neaweste becume, be leafe
hi moton togædere, forðam heo wæs hire unwilles fram him.
 23.212. Gyf wifman gehadod bið, and heo siððan to worldlicre
idelnesse gecyrreð and hiwrædene underfehð and þengð þæt heo
mid hire æhtan gebete þæt heo Gode abealh, nis þæt naht, ac
forlæte þone synscipe and gecyrre to Criste, and libbe hire lif swa hire
scrift tæce, and bete þa misdæde æfre swiðe georne.
 23.218. Gyf mæssepreost oððe munuc man slea, þolige his
hades and fæste x gear, v on hlafe and on wætere and fif þri dagas on
wucan and þa oðre bruce his metes, and reowsige his misdæda æfre,
diacon viii on hlafe and on wætere and þa oðre <foreign>ut supra</foreign>, cleric vi
gear iiii on hlafe and on wætere, læwede v gear iiii on hlafe and on
wætere <foreign>ut supra</foreign>.
 24.225. Gyf hwa gehadodne man slea oððe his agenne nihstan
mæg, forlæte his eard and his æhta and do swa hym se papa wissige, and
reowsige æfre.
 24.230. Gyf mæssepreost oððe munuc hæmedþingc drihð
oððe æwe brycð, fæste x gear, and reowsige æfre, diacon vii,
cleric vi, læwede man v, swa be manslihte.
 24.231. Gyf mæssepreost oððe munuc oððe diacon riht wif
hæfde ær he gehadod wære, and hi forlete and to hade fencge, and
siððan þurh hæmedþingc hi eft underfenge, fæste heora ælc swa
be manslihte, and reowsian swiðe.
 24.235. Gyf mæssepreost oððe munuc oððe diacon oððe
læwede oððe cleric wið minicene hæme, fæste ælc swa his hade
to gebirige swa be manslihte, and æfre he sceal flæsc forgan, and seo
minicene x gear swa swa mæssepreost and reowsian æfre.
 24.240. Gyf hwa wolde hæman wið minicene and heo nolde,
fæste i gear for ðam unrihtan willan on hlafe and on wætere.
 24.243. Gyf hwa wolde hæman wið oðres rihtæwe and heo
nolde, fæste iii legnten on hlafe and on wætere, an on sumera, oðer on
hærfesta, þridde on wyntra.
 24.246. Gyf hwa wille wið wifman unrihtlice hæman, fæste xl
daga on hlafe and on wætere.
 24.248. Gyf hwa oðerne æt his dehter reafað, bete wið ða
frynd and fæste heora ægðer i gear on Wodnesdæg and on Frigedæg
and on oðran dagan brucan heora metes buton flæsce, and nime hi to
rihtæwe.
 24.252. Gyf hwa wið nytenu hæme, fæste xv gear, eahta on
hlafe and on wætere and þa vii ælce geare iii xl and on Wodnesdæg
and on Frigedæg þa hwile þa he libbe, and reowsige æfre þa
misdæde.
 25.256. Gyf hwa hine silfne besmite his agenes willes, fæste iii
gear, on ælcon iii xl daga on hlafe and on wætere and forga flæsc
ælce dæge buton Sunnandæge.
 25.259. Gyf hwa oðerne mid wiccecræfte fordo, fæste vii
gear, iii on hlafe and on wætere and þa feower gear iii dagas on wucan on
hlafe and on wætere, and reowsige æfre.
 25.262. Gyf hwa drife stacan on man, fæste iii gear, an on hlafe
and on wætere, and ða twa iii dagas on wucan on hlafe and on wætere.
 25.264. And gif se man for þare sace dead bið, þonne fæste
he vii gear swa her awriten is, and reowsige his misdæda æfre.
 25.267. Gyf hwa wiccige ymbon oðres lufu and him sille on æte
oððe on drence on galdorcræftum, gif hit beo læwede man fæste
healf gear Wodnesdagum and Frigedagum on hlafe and on wætere, and ða
oðre dagas bruce his metes buton flæsce, cleric i gear <foreign>ut supra</foreign>, iii
dagas on wucan on hlafe and on wætere, diacon iii gear <foreign>ut supra</foreign>,
mæssepreost v gear, þæt an on hlafe and on wætere and ða iiii
ælce Frigedæg on hlafe and on wætere and þa oðre dagas forga
flæsc.
 25.275. Gyf hwa fullice on ungecyndelicum þingum ongean Godes
gesceafte þurh ænig þingc hine sylfne besmyte, bereowsige þæt
æfre ða hwile þe he libbe, be þam þe seo dæd sy.
 25.279. Gyf hwa on slæpe his bearn oflicge þæt hit dead
wurðe, fæste iii gear, an on hlafe and on wætere and þa twa gear iii
dagas on wucan, and gif hit þurh druncen gewurðe, bete þe deoppor swa his
scrift tæce, and bereowsige hit æfre.
 25.284. Gyf untrum cild hæðen gewite and hit on preoste gelang
sy, þolige his hades and bete hit georne, and gif hit þurh freonda
gimeliste wurðe, fæste iii gear, an on hlafe and on wætere and ða twa
gear iii dagas on wucan and bereowsian hit æfre.
 26.289. Gyf hwa Cristene man on hæðendom sille, se ne bið
wurðe ænigere reste mid Cristenum folce buton he hy bicge eft ham ongean
þæt he ut sealde.
 26.291. And gif he þæt don ne mæge, gedæle þæt
wurð eal Godes þances and oðerne alyse mid oðrum wurðe, and þæne
þonne gefreoge, and þartoeacan betan þreo gear fullice swa swa scrift
tæce.
 26.294. And gif he feoh næbbe þæt he man mid alesan
mæge, bete þe deoppor, þæt is vii gear fulle, and bereowsige
æfre.
 26.297. Gyf hwa hine silfne swiðe forwyrce on mænifealdan
synnan, and he æfter þam wille geswican and geornlice betan, gebuge to
mynstre and þeowige þar æfre Gode and mannum swa swa man him tæce,
oððe of earde weallige wide and dædbote æfre þa hwile þe he libbe
and helpe his sawle, oððe huru on earde be þam deopestan bete þe he
æfre acunnan mæge swa swa man him tæce.
 26.304. Be dædbetan.
 26.305. On wisum scryfte bið swiðe forðgelang forsyngodes
mannes nydhelp, ealswa on godan læce bið seoces mannes lacnung.
 26.207. Mystlice men agiltað oft and unseldon þurh deofles
scife, and þæt bið egeslic þæt gehadode men swa swiðe wið God
agilton þæt hi had forwyrcan.
 27.309. And þar mot to bote stiðlic dædbot, a þeah be
hades and be giltes mæðe, æfter canon dome.
 27.311. And eac hit man mot secan be þæs mannes mihtum and be
his mæðe and be his silfes heortan reowsunge, sumon gearbote, sumon ma
geara, and eft be giltes mæðe, sumon monðbote, sumon ma monða, sumon
wucubote, sumon ma wucena, sumon dægbote, and sumon ma daga, and sumon ealle
his lifdagas.
 27.317. Se læca þe sceal sare wunda wel gehælan, he mot
habban gode sealfe to.
 27.318. Ne syndon nane swa yfele wunda swa sindon synwunda,
forðam þurh þa forwyrð se man ecan deaðe buton he þurh andetnesse
and þurh geswicenesse and þurh dædbote gehæled wurðe, þonne mot
se læca beon wis and wær þe ða wunda hælan sceal.
 27.322. ðurh gode lare man sceal ærest hi lacnian, and mid
þam gedon þæt man aspiwe þæt attor þæt him oninnan bið,
þæt is þæt he geclænsige hine silfne ærost þurh andetnesse.
 27.325. Eal man sceal aspiwan sinna þurh gode lare mid andetnesse
ealswa man unlibban deð ðurh godne drenc.
 27.327. Ne mæg æni læce wel lacnian ær ðæt attor
ute sy, ne æni man eac dædbote wel tæcan þam ðe andettan nele, ne
æni man ne mæg synna buton andetnesse næ gebetan þe ma þe se
mæg wel hal wurðan þe unlibban gedruncen hæfð buton he þæt
attor swiðe aspiwe.
 28.332. æfter andetnesse man mæg mid dædbote Godes
mildheortnesse raðe geearnian, gif he mid inneweardre heortan heofe þæt
bereowsað þæt he þurh deofles scyfe ær gefremode to unrihte.
 28.335. On wisum scrifte bið eac swiðe forðgelang wislic
dædbot, ealswa on godum læce bið þearflic broces bot.
 28.337. And be mannes gewyrhtum hit man mot secan æfter canon
dome, and eac medemian be mihtum and be mæðe and be þam þe man ongit
his heortan reowsunge and his silfes geornfulnesse.
 28.341. Deoplic dædbot bið þæt læwede man his wæpna
lecge, and weallige bærfot wide, and ne beo niht þar oðre, and fæste
swiðe and wacige, and gebidde georne dæges and nihtes, and willen werige,
and swa æscære beo þæt iren ne cume on hære ne on nægle, ne
þæt he cume on wearmon baðe ne on softum bedde, ne flæsces ne onbite,
ne he æniges þinges þe druncen of cume, ne he innan cirican ne cume, ac
þeah halige stowa georne sece and his giltas cyðe and him þingrædene
bidde, and ænigne man ne cysse, ac symle sy his synna reowsigende swiðe.
 28.350. Reowlice gefærð se ðe hine sylfne þus forð
forscildgað, and gesæli bið he þeah gif he na ne onwacað þæt he
fulbete, forðam ne wurð æni man on worlde swa swiðe forsyngod þæt
he wið God gebetan ne mæge, aginne he hit georne.
 29.355. Dædbota sind gedihte on mistlice wisan, and micel man
mæg mid ælmessan alysan.
 29.356. Se ðe þara mihta hæbbe, arære cirican Gode to
lofe, and gif hine þarto onhagige, sille þar land to, and læte þær
teon geonge men to, þæt þar for hine magon þeowian and þær
dæghwamlice Gode magon þenian, and godige eac Godes circan gehwar be ðam
þe hine onhagige, and godige folces fær mid bricgum ofer deope wæteru
and ofer fule wegas, and dæle Godes þances georne þæt he hæbbe swa
forð swa hine firmest onhagige, and helpe earmra manna georne, wuduwan and
steopcildan and ælþeodigra manna.
 29.365. Freoge his agene þeowan, and alese æt oðrum mannum
heora þeowan to freote, and huru earme gehergode men, and fede þearfan, and
scride, husige and firige, baðige and beddige.
 29.368. And, him silfum to þearfe, æghwar georne
gebedrædene begite on mæssangum and on sealmsangum, and hine silfne on
his Drihtenes est þreage swiðe þearle mid forhæfdnesse ætes and
wætes and gehwilces lichamlices lustes.
 29.372. And git se þe þonne læssan speda hæbbe, do be his
mæðe georne þæt he don mæge, teoðige on Godes est eal þæt
he age, and wege hine silfne swa hine oftost onhagige, and sece mid his
ælmessan cirican gelome, and halige stowa mid his leohte gegrete, and gife
his hushleow and mete and munde þam ðe þæs beþurfe, and fir and
foddor and bed and bæð, and do to scrud, and filste earmon gif he hwæt
mæg.
 30.379. Geneosige mid gode þa sarigmode and seoce, and deade
bebirige on Godes est.
 30.381. And silf he on diglum gecneowige gelome, and hine on
eorðan swiðe aþenige oft and gelome, and fæste and wacige and gebidde
hine georne dæges and nihtes oft and gelome.
 30.385. And se þe git læssan mihte hæbbe, do be his
mæðe georne þæt he don mæge.
 30.386. Huru swæncan his lichaman ongean lust, gif he ær
þurh liðerne lust deofle gecwemde, fæste nu ongean þæt þe he
ær þurh fille unriht gefremode, wacige and swince þar ongean þæt he
ær beslep and slawode þonne he na ne scolde oððe on unnyt wacode to
swiðe, þolige cile and ceald bæð ongean ða hliwðe þe he þurh
synlust ahwar gefremode.
 30.392. And gif he abilhðe ahwam on unriht ahwar geweolde, gebete
hit georne, and gif him abulge æni man swiðe, forgife þæt on Godes
est.
 30.394. And aa þæs þe he mæge þence swiðe georne
hwæt to bote mæge ongean ælcne synræs þe he ðurh deofles sæd
ær wearð aweaxen.
 30.397. And gif he of wege toeacan him silfum ænigne gebrohte,
gebringe hine georne eft on his riht wege.
 30.398. ðæt is þæt ic mæne, gif he ænigne man on
sinne bespeone, do swa him þearf is, gebringe hine of ðam and læde hine
on his riht wege.
 31.401. And ælcne man georne spane he of sinnum, þonne beoð
his sinna sona ðe leohtre.
 31.403. ðonne dom se man mæg mid scriftes geþeahte him
silfum deman þe anrædlice wile his synna geswican and his sinna gebetan,
dæle on Godes est eal þæt he age, and forlæte mid ealle eard and
eðel and ealle þas worldlufu, and þeowige his Drihtene dæges and
nihtes, and swænce hine silfne swa he swiðost mæge ongean his silfes
lust ealle his lifdagas.
 31.409. Hwæt mæg he mare, buton þæt he tihte toeacan him
silfum ælcne man to rihte swa he geornost mæge?
 31.411. Her cyð on hu seoc man mot his fæsten alesan.
 31.412. Man mæg anes dæges fæsten mid anan pænige
alysan.
 31.413. Eac man mæg alysan anes dæges fæsten mid twam hund
sealma and xx sealma.
 31.414. Eac man mæg twelf monða fæsten alysan mid xxx
scillinga, oððe ænne man gefreoge þe þæs feos wurð sy.
 31.416. And for anes dæges fæstene þæt man singe six
siðum <foreign>Beati</foreign> and six siðum <foreign>Pater Noster</foreign>.
 31.417. And for anes dæges fæstene þæt man cneowige and
gebige sixtigum siðum to eorðan mit Pater Nostere.
 31.419. Eac man mæg anes dæges fæsten alysan gif he hine
aðenað eallum limum to Gode æt his gebedum, and mid soðre reowe and
mid rihtan geleafan, and xv siðum singe <foreign>Miserere mei Deus</foreign> and xv <foreign>Pater
Noster</foreign>, and þonne him bið ealne dæg geseald his sinna lihtinge.
 32.424. Seofon wintra fæsten man mæg on twelf monðum
gebetan gif he ælce dæge asyngeð saltere sealma, and oðerne on niht
and fiftig on æfen.
 32.426. Eac mid anre mæssan man mæg alysan xii daga
fæsten, and mid x mæssan man mæg gelihtan iiii monða fæsten, and
mid xxx mæssan man mæg gelihtan xii monða fæsten, gif he wile mid
soðre Godes lufe him silfum þingian and his synna his scrifte andettan and
hi swa gebetan swa he him tæcð, and georne æfre geswican.
 32.433. Be mihtigum mannum.
 32.434. þus mæg mihtig man and freondspedig his dædbote mid
freonda fultume micclum gelihtan.
 32.435. ærest on Godes naman be his scriftes gewitnesse
geswutelige rihtne geleafan and gemiltsige eallum ðam þe wið hine
agilton, and do his andetnesse unforwandodlice, and behate geswicenesse, and
underfo dædbote mid micelre geomrunge.
 32.440. Alecge þonne his wæpna and idele rænca, and nime
stæf him on hand and ga bærefot georne, and do willen to lice oððe
hæran, and ne cume on bedde ac alicge on flette, and do þæt vii
geargetælu beon binnon þrim dagum þus gefadode.
 32.444. Fo on mid fultume, nime him to ærest xii men, and
fæstan iii dagas be hlafe and be grenum wyrtum and be wætere, and begite
þartoeacan, swa hu swa he mæge, septies cxx manna þæt fæstan eac
for hine iii dagas, þonne wyrð gefæst swa fela fæstena swa bið daga
on vii gearum.
 33.448. ðonne man fæste, þonne dæle man ða þenunga
þe man brucan scolde ealle Godes þearfan.
 33.450. And þa ðrig dagas þe man fæste, forlæte man
ælce worldbysga, and dæges and nihtes, swa man oftost mæge, on cirican
gewunige and mid ælmesleohte wacigan þar georne, and to Gode clipian and
forgifnesse biddan mid geomrigendum mode, and cneowian gelome on rodetacne,
hwilum upp, hwilum nyðer aðenige, and cunnige georne mage man of eagum
tearas geræcan and sinna bewepan.
 33.457. And fede man þa ðri dagas þearfena swa fela swa man
mæst mæge, and on ðam feorðan dæge baðige man ealle, and
feormige and feoh dæle, and silf se dædbeta beo ymbe heora fotþweal.
 33.460. And mæssige man ðy dæge for hine swa fela mæssan
swa man æfre mæst begitan mæge, and æt þare siðmæstan do
man him Absolutionem, and ga he þonne to husle, buton he to ðam swiðe
forgilt sy þæt he þonne git ne mote, and behate þonne huru þæt he
aa ðanon forð Godes wyllan wyrcan wille, and ælces unrihtes þurh Godes
fultum swa forð geswican swa he æfre firmest mæge, Cristendom rihtlice
healdan and ælcne hæðendom mid ealle awurpan, ge þanc ge þeawas,
word and weorc georne gerihtan, ælc riht aræran and unriht afillan þurh
Godes fultum swa he æfre geornost mæge, and to micelre þearfe gedeð
he hit him sylfum se ðe gelæst þæt he Gode behet.
 34.473. þis is mihtiges mannes and freondspediges
dædbotlihtingc, ac an unmaga ne mæg swilc geforðian, ac þi he mot on
hine silfne hit secan þe geornor.
 34.475. And þæt bið eac rihtast þæt gehwa his agene
misdæda wrece on him silfum mid geornfulre bote.
 34.477. <foreign>Scriptum est enim quia unusquisque onus suum portabit</foreign>.
